tapaḥsvādhyāyanirataṃ tapasvī vāgvidāṃ varam / nāradaṃ paripapraccha vālmīkir munipuṃgavam // 1.001.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko nv asmin sāmprataṃ loke guṇavān kaś ca vīryavān / dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca satyavākyo dṛḍhavrataḥ // 1.001.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cāritreṇa ca ko yuktaḥ sarvabhūteṣu ko hitaḥ / vidvān kaḥ kaḥ samarthaś ca kaś caikapriyadarśanaḥ // 1.001.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmavān ko jitakrodho matimān ko 'nasūyakaḥ / kasya bibhyati devāś ca jātaroṣasya saṃyuge // 1.001.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me / maharṣe tvaṃ samartho 'si jñātum evaṃvidhaṃ naram // 1.001.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā caitat trilokajño vālmīker nārado vacaḥ / śrūyatām iti cāmantrya prahṛṣṭo vākyam abravīt // 1.001.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahavo durlabhāś caiva ye tvayā kīrtitā guṇāḥ / mune vakṣyāmy ahaṃ buddhvā tair yuktaḥ śrūyatāṃ naraḥ // 1.001.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhavo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ / niyatātmā mahāvīryo dyutimān dhṛtimān vaśī // 1.001.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhimān nītimān vāgmī śrīmāñ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ / vipulāṃso mahābāhuḥ kambugrīvo mahāhanuḥ // 1.001.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahorasko maheṣvāso gūḍhajatrur ariṃdamaḥ / ājānubāhuḥ suśirāḥ sulalāṭaḥ suvikramaḥ // 1.001.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samaḥ samavibhaktāṅgaḥ snigdhavarṇaḥ pratāpavān / pīnavakṣā viśālākṣo lakṣmīvāñ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ // 1.001.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ / yaśasvī jñānasaṃpannaḥ śucir vaśyaḥ samādhimān // 1.001.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣitā jīvalokasya dharmasya parirakṣitā / vedavedāṅgatattvajño dhanurvede ca niṣṭhitaḥ // 1.001.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaśāstrārthatattvajño smṛtimān pratibhānavān / sarvalokapriyaḥ sādhur adīnātmā vicakṣaṇaḥ // 1.001.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvadābhigataḥ sadbhiḥ samudra iva sindhubhiḥ / āryaḥ sarvasamaś caiva sadaikapriyadarśanaḥ // 1.001.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca sarvaguṇopetaḥ kausalyānandavardhanaḥ / samudra iva gāmbhīrye dhairyeṇa himavān iva // 1.001.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣṇunā sadṛśo vīrye somavat priyadarśanaḥ / kālāgnisadṛśaḥ krodhe kṣamayā pṛthivīsamaḥ // 1.001.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanadena samas tyāge satye dharma ivāparaḥ / tam evaṃguṇasaṃpannaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam // 1.001.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyeṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaguṇair yuktaṃ priyaṃ daśarathaḥ sutam / yauvarājyena saṃyoktum aicchat prītyā mahīpatiḥ // 1.001.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyābhiṣekasaṃbhārān dṛṣṭvā bhāryātha kaikayī / pūrvaṃ dattavarā devī varam enam ayācata // 1.001.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivāsanaṃ ca rāmasya bharatasyābhiṣecanam // 1.001.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa satyavacanād rājā dharmapāśena saṃyataḥ / vivāsayām āsa sutaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathaḥ priyam // 1.001.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa jagāma vanaṃ vīraḥ pratijñām anupālayan / pitur vacananirdeśāt kaikeyyāḥ priyakāraṇāt // 1.001.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ vrajantaṃ priyo bhrātā lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha / snehād vinayasaṃpannaḥ sumitrānandavardhanaḥ // 1.001.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannā nārīṇām uttamā vadhūḥ / sītāpy anugatā rāmaṃ śaśinaṃ rohiṇī yathā // 1.001.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paurair anugato dūraṃ pitrā daśarathena ca / śṛṅgaverapure sūtaṃ gaṅgākūle vyasarjayat // 1.001.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te vanena vanaṃ gatvā nadīs tīrtvā bahūdakāḥ / citrakūṭam anuprāpya bharadvājasya śāsanāt // 1.001.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ramyam āvasathaṃ kṛtvā ramamāṇā vane trayaḥ / devagandharvasaṃkāśās tatra te nyavasan sukham // 1.001.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
citrakūṭaṃ gate rāme putraśokāturas tadā / rājā daśarathaḥ svargaṃ jagāma vilapan sutam // 1.001.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛte tu tasmin bharato vasiṣṭhapramukhair dvijaiḥ / niyujyamāno rājyāya naicchad rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ // 1.001.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa jagāma vanaṃ vīro rāmapādaprasādakaḥ // 1.001.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāduke cāsya rājyāya nyāsaṃ dattvā punaḥ punaḥ / nivartayām āsa tato bharataṃ bharatāgrajaḥ // 1.001.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kāmam anavāpyaiva rāmapādāv upaspṛśan / nandigrāme 'karod rājyaṃ rāmāgamanakāṅkṣayā // 1.001.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmas tu punar ālakṣya nāgarasya janasya ca / tatrāgamanam ekāgre daṇḍakān praviveśa ha // 1.001.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ hatvā śarabhaṅgaṃ dadarśa ha / sutīkṣṇaṃ cāpy agastyaṃ ca agastya bhrātaraṃ tathā // 1.001.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agastyavacanāc caiva jagrāhaindraṃ śarāsanam / khaḍgaṃ ca paramaprītas tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau // 1.001.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasatas tasya rāmasya vane vanacaraiḥ saha / ṛṣayo 'bhyāgaman sarve vadhāyāsurarakṣasām // 1.001.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena tatraiva vasatā janasthānanivāsinī / virūpitā śūrpaṇakhā rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī // 1.001.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāvākyād udyuktān sarvarākṣasān / kharaṃ triśirasaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ caiva rākṣasaṃ // 1.001.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nijaghāna raṇe rāmas teṣāṃ caiva padānugān / rakṣasāṃ nihatāny āsan sahasrāṇi caturdaśa // 1.001.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato jñātivadhaṃ śrutvā rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / sahāyaṃ varayām āsa mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasaṃ // 1.001.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāryamāṇaḥ subahuśo mārīcena sa rāvaṇaḥ / na virodho balavatā kṣamo rāvaṇa tena te // 1.001.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anādṛtya tu tad vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ / jagāma sahamarīcas tasyāśramapadaṃ tadā // 1.001.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena māyāvinā dūram apavāhya nṛpātmajau / jahāra bhāryāṃ rāmasya gṛdhraṃ hatvā jaṭāyuṣam // 1.001.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛdhraṃ ca nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛtāṃ śrutvā ca maithilīm / rāghavaḥ śokasaṃtapto vilalāpākulendriyaḥ // 1.001.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tenaiva śokena gṛdhraṃ dagdhvā jaṭāyuṣam / mārgamāṇo vane sītāṃ rākṣasaṃ saṃdadarśa ha // 1.001.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kabandhaṃ nāma rūpeṇa vikṛtaṃ ghoradarśanam / taṃ nihatya mahābāhur dadāha svargataś ca saḥ // 1.001.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cāsya kathayām āsa śabarīṃ dharmacāriṇīm / śramaṇīṃ dharmanipuṇām abhigaccheti rāghava // 1.001.046.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhyagacchan mahātejāḥ śabarīṃ śatrusūdanaḥ // 1.001.046.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śabaryā pūjitaḥ samyag rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / pampātīre hanumatā saṃgato vānareṇa ha // 1.001.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanumadvacanāc caiva sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ / sugrīvāya ca tat sarvaṃ śaṃsad rāmo mahābalaḥ // 1.001.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vānararājena vairānukathanaṃ prati / rāmāyāveditaṃ sarvaṃ praṇayād duḥkhitena ca // 1.001.049.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vālinaś ca balaṃ tatra kathayām āsa vānaraḥ // 1.001.049.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratijñātaṃ ca rāmeṇa tadā vālivadhaṃ prati / sugrīvaḥ śaṅkitaś cāsīn nityaṃ vīryeṇa rāghave // 1.001.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavaḥ pratyayārthaṃ tu dundubheḥ kāyam uttamam / pādāṅguṣṭhena cikṣepa saṃpūrṇaṃ daśayojanam // 1.001.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bibheda ca punaḥ sālān saptaikena maheṣuṇā / giriṃ rasātalaṃ caiva janayan pratyayaṃ tadā // 1.001.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prītamanās tena viśvastaḥ sa mahākapiḥ / kiṣkindhāṃ rāmasahito jagāma ca guhāṃ tadā // 1.001.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'garjad dharivaraḥ sugrīvo hemapiṅgalaḥ / tena nādena mahatā nirjagāma harīśvaraḥ // 1.001.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sugrīvavacanād dhatvā vālinam āhave / sugrīvam eva tad rājye rāghavaḥ pratyapādayat // 1.001.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca sarvān samānīya vānarān vānararṣabhaḥ / diśaḥ prasthāpayām āsa didṛkṣur janakātmajām // 1.001.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gṛdhrasya vacanāt saṃpāter hanumān balī / śatayojanavistīrṇaṃ pupluve lavaṇārṇavam // 1.001.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra laṅkāṃ samāsādya purīṃ rāvaṇapālitām / dadarśa sītāṃ dhyāyantīm aśokavanikāṃ gatām // 1.001.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivedayitvābhijñānaṃ pravṛttiṃ ca nivedya ca / samāśvāsya ca vaidehīṃ mardayām āsa toraṇam // 1.001.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pañca senāgragān hatvā sapta mantrisutān api / śūram akṣaṃ ca niṣpiṣya grahaṇaṃ samupāgamat // 1.001.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
astreṇonmuham ātmānaṃ jñātvā paitāmahād varāt / marṣayan rākṣasān vīro yantriṇas tān yadṛcchayā // 1.001.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dagdhvā purīṃ laṅkām ṛte sītāṃ ca maithilīm / rāmāya priyam ākhyātuṃ punar āyān mahākapiḥ // 1.001.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhigamya mahātmānaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ pradakṣiṇam / nyavedayad ameyātmā dṛṣṭā sīteti tattvataḥ // 1.001.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sugrīvasahito gatvā tīraṃ mahodadheḥ / samudraṃ kṣobhayām āsa śarair ādityasaṃnibhaiḥ // 1.001.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśayām āsa cātmānaṃ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ / samudravacanāc caiva nalaṃ setum akārayat // 1.001.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena gatvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave / abhyaṣiñcat sa laṅkāyāṃ rākṣasendraṃ vibhīṣaṇam // 1.001.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karmaṇā tena mahatā trailokyaṃ sacarācaram / sadevarṣigaṇaṃ tuṣṭaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ // 1.001.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā paramasaṃtuṣṭaiḥ pūjitaḥ sarvadaivataiḥ / kṛtakṛtyas tadā rāmo vijvaraḥ pramumoda ha // 1.001.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devatābhyo varān prāpya samutthāpya ca vānarān / puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya nandigrāmaṃ yayau tadā // 1.001.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nandigrāme jaṭāṃ hitvā bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito 'naghaḥ / rāmaḥ sītām anuprāpya rājyaṃ punar avāptavān // 1.001.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭamudito lokas tuṣṭaḥ puṣṭaḥ sudhārmikaḥ / nirāyamo arogaś ca durbhikṣabhayavarjitaḥ // 1.001.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na putramaraṇaṃ ke cid drakṣyanti puruṣāḥ kva cit / nāryaś cāvidhavā nityaṃ bhaviṣyanti pativratāḥ // 1.001.072	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na vātajaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cin nāpsu majjanti jantavaḥ / na cāgrijaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cid yathā kṛtayuge tathā // 1.001.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśvamedhaśatair iṣṭvā tathā bahusuvarṇakaiḥ / gavāṃ koṭyayutaṃ dattvā vidvadbhyo vidhipūrvakam // 1.001.074	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājavaṃśāñ śataguṇān sthāpayiṣyati rāghavaḥ / cāturvarṇyaṃ ca loke 'smin sve sve dharme niyokṣyati // 1.001.075	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca / rāmo rājyam upāsitvā brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati // 1.001.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ pavitraṃ pāpaghnaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam / yaḥ paṭhed rāmacaritaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // 1.001.077	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad ākhyānam āyuṣyaṃ paṭhan rāmāyaṇaṃ naraḥ / saputrapautraḥ sagaṇaḥ pretya svarge mahīyate // 1.001.078	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paṭhan dvijo vāgṛṣabhatvam īyāt; syāt kṣatriyo bhūmipatitvam īyāt / vaṇigjanaḥ paṇyaphalatvam īyāj; janaś ca śūdro 'pi mahattvam īyāt // 1.001.079	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vākyaviśāradaḥ / pūjayām āsa dharmātmā sahaśiṣyo mahāmuniḥ // 1.002.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāvat pūjitas tena devarṣir nāradas tadā / āpṛṣṭvaivābhyanujñātaḥ sa jagāma vihāyasaṃ // 1.002.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa muhūtaṃ gate tasmin devalokaṃ munis tadā / jagāma tamasātīraṃ jāhnavyās tv avidūrataḥ // 1.002.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu tīraṃ samāsādya tamasāyā mahāmuniḥ / śiṣyam āha sthitaṃ pārśve dṛṣṭvā tīrtham akardamam // 1.002.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akardamam idaṃ tīrthaṃ bharadvāja niśāmaya / ramaṇīyaṃ prasannāmbu sanmanuṣyamano yathā // 1.002.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nyasyatāṃ kalaśas tāta dīyatāṃ valkalaṃ mama / idam evāvagāhiṣye tamasātīrtham uttamam // 1.002.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto bharadvājo vālmīkena mahātmanā / prāyacchata munes tasya valkalaṃ niyato guroḥ // 1.002.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śiṣyahastād ādāya valkalaṃ niyatendriyaḥ / vicacāra ha paśyaṃs tat sarvato vipulaṃ vanam // 1.002.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyābhyāśe tu mithunaṃ carantam anapāyinam / dadarśa bhagavāṃs tatra krauñcayoś cāruniḥsvanam // 1.002.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt tu mithunād ekaṃ pumāṃsaṃ pāpaniścayaḥ / jaghāna vairanilayo niṣādas tasya paśyataḥ // 1.002.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ śoṇitaparītāṅgaṃ veṣṭamānaṃ mahītale / bhāryā tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rurāva karuṇāṃ giram // 1.002.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tu taṃ dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣādena nipātitam / ṛṣer dharmātmanas tasya kāruṇyaṃ samapadyata // 1.002.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ karuṇaveditvād adharmo 'yam iti dvijaḥ / niśāmya rudatīṃ krauñcīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.002.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā niṣāda pratiṣṭhāṃ tvam agamaḥ śāśvatīṃ samāḥ / yat krauñcamithunād ekam avadhīḥ kāmamohitam // 1.002.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaivaṃ bruvataś cintā babhūva hṛdi vīkṣataḥ / śokārtenāsya śakuneḥ kim idaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ mayā // 1.002.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cintayan sa mahāprājñaś cakāra matimān matim / śiṣyaṃ caivābravīd vākyam idaṃ sa munipuṃgavaḥ // 1.002.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pādabaddho 'kṣarasamas tantrīlayasamanvitaḥ / śokārtasya pravṛtto me śloko bhavatu nānyathā // 1.002.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śiṣyas tu tasya bruvato muner vākyam anuttamam / pratijagrāha saṃhṛṣṭas tasya tuṣṭo 'bhavad guruḥ // 1.002.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhiṣekaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tīrthe tasmin yathāvidhi / tam eva cintayann artham upāvartata vai muniḥ // 1.002.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharadvājas tataḥ śiṣyo vinītaḥ śrutavān guroḥ / kalaśaṃ pūrṇam ādāya pṛṣṭhato 'nujagāma ha // 1.002.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa praviśyāśramapadaṃ śiṣyeṇa saha dharmavit / upaviṣṭaḥ kathāś cānyāś cakāra dhyānam āsthitaḥ // 1.002.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājagāma tato brahmā lokakartā svayaṃprabhuḥ / caturmukho mahātejā draṣṭuṃ taṃ munipuṃgavam // 1.002.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vālmīkir atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasotthāya vāg yataḥ / prāñjaliḥ prayato bhūtvā tasthau paramavismitaḥ // 1.002.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjayām āsa taṃ devaṃ pādyārghyāsanavandanaiḥ / praṇamya vidhivac cainaṃ pṛṣṭvānāmayam avyayam // 1.002.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athopaviśya bhagavān āsane paramārcite / vālmīkaye maharṣaye saṃdideśāsanaṃ tataḥ // 1.002.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upaviṣṭe tadā tasmin sākṣāl lokapitāmahe / tad gatenaiva manasā vālmīkir dhyānam āsthitaḥ // 1.002.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāpātmanā kṛtaṃ kaṣṭaṃ vairagrahaṇabuddhinā / yas tādṛśaṃ cāruravaṃ krauñcaṃ hanyād akāraṇāt // 1.002.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śocann eva muhuḥ krauñcīm upaślokam imaṃ punaḥ / jagāv antargatamanā bhūtvā śokaparāyaṇaḥ // 1.002.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca tato brahmā prahasan munipuṃgavam / śloka eva tvayā baddho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // 1.002.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
macchandād eva te brahman pravṛtteyaṃ sarasvatī / rāmasya caritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kuru tvam ṛṣisattama // 1.002.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmātmano guṇavato loke rāmasya dhīmataḥ / vṛttaṃ kathaya dhīrasya yathā te nāradāc chrutam // 1.002.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rahasyaṃ ca prakāśaṃ ca yad vṛttaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ / rāmasya saha saumitre rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // 1.002.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehyāś caiva yad vṛttaṃ prakāśaṃ yadi vā rahaḥ / tac cāpy aviditaṃ sarvaṃ viditaṃ te bhaviṣyati // 1.002.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na te vāg anṛtā kāvye kā cid atra bhaviṣyati / kuru rāma kathāṃ puṇyāṃ ślokabaddhāṃ manoramām // 1.002.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvat sthāsyanti girayaḥ saritaś ca mahītale / tāvad rāmāyaṇakathā lokeṣu pracariṣyati // 1.002.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvad rāmasya ca kathā tvatkṛtā pracariṣyati / tāvad ūrdhvam adhaś ca tvaṃ mallokeṣu nivatsyasi // 1.002.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā bhagavān brahmā tatraivāntaradhīyata / tataḥ saśiṣyo vālmīkir munir vismayam āyayau // 1.002.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya śiṣyās tataḥ sarve jaguḥ ślokam imaṃ punaḥ / muhur muhuḥ prīyamāṇāḥ prāhuś ca bhṛśavismitāḥ // 1.002.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samākṣaraiś caturbhir yaḥ pādair gīto maharṣiṇā / so 'nuvyāharaṇād bhūyaḥ śokaḥ ślokatvam āgataḥ // 1.002.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā vālmīker bhāvitātmanaḥ / kṛtsnaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kāvyam īdṛśaiḥ karavāṇy aham // 1.002.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udāravṛttārthapadair manoramais; tadāsya rāmasya cakāra kīrtimān / samākṣaraiḥ ślokaśatair yaśasvino; yaśaskaraṃ kāvyam udāradhīr muniḥ // 1.002.041	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
śrutvā vas tu samagraṃ tad dharmātmā dharmasaṃhitam / vyaktam anveṣate bhūyo yad vṛttaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // 1.003.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upaspṛśyodakaṃ saṃyan muniḥ sthitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ / prācīnāgreṣu darbheṣu dharmeṇānveṣate gatim // 1.003.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janma rāmasya sumahad vīryaṃ sarvānukūlatām / lokasya priyatāṃ kṣāntiṃ saumyatāṃ satyaśīlatām // 1.003.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānācitrāḥ kathāś cānyā viśvāmitrasahāyane / jānakyāś ca vivāhaṃ ca dhanuṣaś ca vibhedanam // 1.003.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmarāmavivādaṃ ca guṇān dāśarathes tathā / tathābhiṣekaṃ rāmasya kaikeyyā duṣṭabhāvatām // 1.003.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyāghātaṃ cābhiṣekasya rāmasya ca vivāsanam / rājñaḥ śokaṃ vilāpaṃ ca paralokasya cāśrayam // 1.003.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṛtīnāṃ viṣādaṃ ca prakṛtīnāṃ visarjanam / niṣādādhipasaṃvādaṃ sūtopāvartanaṃ tathā // 1.003.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaṅgāyāś cābhisaṃtāraṃ bharadvājasya darśanam / bharadvājābhyanujñānāc citrakūṭasya darśanam // 1.003.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāstukarmaniveśaṃ ca bharatāgamanaṃ tathā / prasādanaṃ ca rāmasya pituś ca salilakriyām // 1.003.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pādukāgryābhiṣekaṃ ca nandigrāma nivāsanam / daṇḍakāraṇyagamanaṃ sutīkṣṇena samāgamam // 1.003.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anasūyāsamasyāṃ ca aṅgarāgasya cārpaṇam / śūrpaṇakhyāś ca saṃvādaṃ virūpakaraṇaṃ tathā // 1.003.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhaṃ kharatriśirasor utthānaṃ rāvaṇasya ca / mārīcasya vadhaṃ caiva vaidehyā haraṇaṃ tathā // 1.003.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya vilāpaṃ ca gṛdhrarājanibarhaṇam / kabandhadarśanaṃ caiva pampāyāś cāpi darśanam // 1.003.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarbaryā darśanaṃ caiva hanūmaddarśanaṃ tathā / vilāpaṃ caiva pampāyāṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ // 1.003.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣyamūkasya gamanaṃ sugrīveṇa samāgamam / pratyayotpādanaṃ sakhyaṃ vālisugrīvavigraham // 1.003.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vālipramathanaṃ caiva sugrīvapratipādanam / tārāvilāpasamayaṃ varṣarātrinivāsanam // 1.003.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kopaṃ rāghavasiṃhasya balānām upasaṃgraham / diśaḥ prasthāpanaṃ caiva pṛthivyāś ca nivedanam // 1.003.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgulīyakadānaṃ ca ṛkṣasya biladarśanam / prāyopaveśanaṃ caiva saṃpāteś cāpi darśanam // 1.003.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parvatārohaṇaṃ caiva sāgarasya ca laṅghanam / rātrau laṅkāpraveśaṃ ca ekasyāpi vicintanam // 1.003.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpānabhūmigamanam avarodhasya darśanam / aśokavanikāyānaṃ sītāyāś cāpi darśanam // 1.003.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhijñānapradānaṃ ca sītāyāś cāpi bhāṣaṇam / rākṣasītarjanaṃ caiva trijaṭāsvapnadarśanam // 1.003.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maṇipradānaṃ sītāyā vṛkṣabhaṅgaṃ tathaiva ca / rākṣasīvidravaṃ caiva kiṃkarāṇāṃ nibarhaṇam // 1.003.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
grahaṇaṃ vāyusūnoś ca laṅkādāhābhigarjanam / pratiplavanam evātha madhūnāṃ haraṇaṃ tathā // 1.003.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavāśvāsanaṃ caiva maṇiniryātanaṃ tathā / saṃgamaṃ ca samudrasya nalasetoś ca bandhanam // 1.003.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratāraṃ ca samudrasya rātrau laṅkāvarodhanam / vibhīṣaṇena saṃsargaṃ vadhopāyanivedanam // 1.003.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇasya nidhanaṃ meghanādanibarhaṇam / rāvaṇasya vināśaṃ ca sītāvāptim areḥ pure // 1.003.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bibhīṣaṇābhiṣekaṃ ca puṣpakasya ca darśanam / ayodhyāyāś ca gamanaṃ bharatena samāgamam // 1.003.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmābhiṣekābhyudayaṃ sarvasainyavisarjanam / svarāṣṭrarañjanaṃ caiva vaidehyāś ca visarjanam // 1.003.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anāgataṃ ca yat kiṃ cid rāmasya vasudhātale / tac cakārottare kāvye vālmīkir bhagavān ṛṣiḥ // 1.003.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptarājyasya rāmasya vālmīkir bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / cakāra caritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vicitrapadam ātmavān // 1.004.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtvā tu tan mahāprājñaḥ sabhaviṣyaṃ sahottaram / cintayām āsa ko nv etat prayuñjīyād iti prabhuḥ // 1.004.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya cintayamānasya maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ / agṛhṇītāṃ tataḥ pādau muniveṣau kuśīlavau // 1.004.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśīlavau tu dharmajñau rājaputrau yaśasvinau / bhrātarau svarasaṃpannau dadarśāśramavāsinau // 1.004.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu medhāvinau dṛṣṭvā vedeṣu pariniṣṭhitau / vedopabṛhmaṇārthāya tāv agrāhayata prabhuḥ // 1.004.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāvyaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sītāyāś caritaṃ mahat / paulastya vadham ity eva cakāra caritavrataḥ // 1.004.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṭhye geye ca madhuraṃ pramāṇais tribhir anvitam / jātibhiḥ saptabhir yuktaṃ tantrīlayasamanvitam // 1.004.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hāsyaśṛṅgārakāruṇyaraudravīrabhayānakaiḥ / bībhatsādirasair yuktaṃ kāvyam etad agāyatām // 1.004.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tu gāndharvatattvajñau sthāna mūrcchana kovidau / bhrātarau svarasaṃpannau gandharvāv iva rūpiṇau // 1.004.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rūpalakṣaṇasaṃpannau madhurasvarabhāṣiṇau / bimbād ivoddhṛtau bimbau rāmadehāt tathāparau // 1.004.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau rājaputrau kārtsnyena dharmyam ākhyānam uttamam / vāco vidheyaṃ tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā kāvyam aninditau // 1.004.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣīṇāṃ ca dvijātīnāṃ sādhūnāṃ ca samāgame / yathopadeśaṃ tattvajñau jagatus tau samāhitau // 1.004.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahātmānau mahābhāgau sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitau // 1.004.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau kadā cit sametānām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām / āsīnānāṃ samīpasthāv idaṃ kāvyam agāyatām // 1.004.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā munayaḥ sarve bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇāḥ / sādhu sādhv ity tāv ūcatuḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ // 1.004.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te prītamanasaḥ sarve munayo dharmavatsalāḥ / praśaśaṃsuḥ praśastavyau gāyamānau kuśīlavau // 1.004.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho gītasya mādhuryaṃ ślokānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ / ciranirvṛttam apy etat pratyakṣam iva darśitam // 1.004.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśya tāv ubhau suṣṭhu tadā bhāvam agāyatām / sahitau madhuraṃ raktaṃ saṃpannaṃ svarasaṃpadā // 1.004.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ praśasyamānau tau tapaḥślāghyair maharṣibhiḥ / saṃraktataram atyarthaṃ madhuraṃ tāv agāyatām // 1.004.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prītaḥ kaś cin munis tābhyāṃ saṃsthitaḥ kalaśaṃ dadau / prasanno valkalaṃ kaś cid dadau tābhyāṃ mahāyaśāḥ // 1.004.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āścaryam idam ākhyānaṃ muninā saṃprakīrtitam / paraṃ kavīnām ādhāraṃ samāptaṃ ca yathākramam // 1.004.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praśasyamānau sarvatra kadā cit tatra gāyakau / rathyāsu rājamārgeṣu dadarśa bharatāgrajaḥ // 1.004.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svaveśma cānīya tato bhrātarau sakuśīlavau / pūjayām āsa pūjārhau rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ // 1.004.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsīnaḥ kāñcane divye sa ca siṃhāsane prabhuḥ / upopaviṣṭaiḥ sacivair bhrātṛbhiś ca paraṃtapaḥ // 1.004.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā tu rūpasaṃpannau tāv ubhau vīṇinau tataḥ / uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaḥ śatrughnaṃ bharataṃ tathā // 1.004.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyatām idam ākhyānam anayor devavarcasoḥ / vicitrārthapadaṃ samyag gāyator madhurasvaram // 1.004.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau munī pārthivalakṣmaṇānvitau; kuśīlavau caiva mahātapasvinau / mamāpi tad bhūtikaraṃ pracakṣate; mahānubhāvaṃ caritaṃ nibodhata // 1.004.026	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas tu tau rāmavacaḥ pracoditāv; agāyatāṃ mārgavidhānasaṃpadā / sa cāpi rāmaḥ pariṣadgataḥ śanair; bubhūṣayāsaktamanā babhūva // 1.004.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
sarvāpūrvam iyaṃ yeṣām āsīt kṛtsnā vasuṃdharā / prajāpatim upādāya nṛpāṇāṃ jayaśālinām // 1.005.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yeṣāṃ sa sagaro nāma sāgaro yena khānitaḥ / ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi yaṃ yāntaṃ paryavārayan // 1.005.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇām idaṃ teṣāṃ rājñāṃ vaṃśe mahātmanām / mahad utpannam ākhyānaṃ rāmāyaṇam iti śrutam // 1.005.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad idaṃ vartayiṣyāmi sarvaṃ nikhilam āditaḥ / dharmakāmārthasahitaṃ śrotavyam anasūyayā // 1.005.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kosalo nāma muditaḥ sphīto janapado mahān / niviṣṭaḥ sarayūtīre prabhūtadhanadhānyavān // 1.005.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyā nāma nagarī tatrāsīl lokaviśrutā / manunā mānavendreṇa yā purī nirmitā svayam // 1.005.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyatā daśa ca dve ca yojanāni mahāpurī / śrīmatī trīṇi vistīrṇā suvibhaktamahāpathā // 1.005.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājamārgeṇa mahatā suvibhaktena śobhitā / muktapuṣpāvakīrṇena jalasiktena nityaśaḥ // 1.005.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tu rājā daśaratho mahārāṣṭravivardhanaḥ / purīm āvāsayām āsa divi devapatir yathā // 1.005.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kapāṭatoraṇavatīṃ suvibhaktāntarāpaṇām / sarvayantrāyudhavatīm upetāṃ sarvaśilpibhiḥ // 1.005.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūtamāgadhasaṃbādhāṃ śrīmatīm atulaprabhām / uccāṭṭāladhvajavatīṃ śataghnīśatasaṃkulām // 1.005.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhūnāṭakasaṅghaiś ca saṃyuktāṃ sarvataḥ purīm / udyānāmravaṇopetāṃ mahatīṃ sālamekhalām // 1.005.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
durgagambhīraparighāṃ durgām anyair durāsadām / vājivāraṇasaṃpūrṇāṃ gobhir uṣṭraiḥ kharais tathā // 1.005.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāmantarājasaṅghaiś ca balikarmabhir āvṛtām / nānādeśanivāsaiś ca vaṇigbhir upaśobhitām // 1.005.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasādai ratnavikṛtaiḥ parvatair upaśobhitām / kūṭāgāraiś ca saṃpūrṇām indrasyevāmarāvatīm // 1.005.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
citrām aṣṭāpadākārāṃ varanārīgaṇair yutām / sarvaratnasamākīrṇāṃ vimānagṛhaśobhitām // 1.005.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhagāḍhām avicchidrāṃ samabhūmau niveśitām / śālitaṇḍulasaṃpūrṇām ikṣukāṇḍarasodakām // 1.005.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dundubhībhir mṛdaṅgaiś ca vīṇābhiḥ paṇavais tathā / nāditāṃ bhṛśam atyarthaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tām anuttamām // 1.005.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimānam iva siddhānāṃ tapasādhigataṃ divi / suniveśitaveśmāntāṃ narottamasamāvṛtām // 1.005.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye ca bāṇair na vidhyanti viviktam aparāparam / śabdavedhyaṃ ca vitataṃ laghuhastā viśāradāḥ // 1.005.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhavyāghravarāhāṇāṃ mattānāṃ nadatāṃ vane / hantāro niśitaiḥ śastrair balād bāhubalair api // 1.005.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tādṛśānāṃ sahasrais tām abhipūrṇāṃ mahārathaiḥ / purīm āvāsayām āsa rājā daśarathas tadā // 1.005.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām agnimadbhir guṇavadbhir āvṛtāṃ; dvijottamair vedaṣaḍaṅgapāragaiḥ / sahasradaiḥ satyaratair mahātmabhir; maharṣikalpair ṛṣibhiś ca kevalaiḥ // 1.005.023	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
puryāṃ tasyām ayodhyāyāṃ vedavit sarvasaṃgrahaḥ / dīrghadarśī mahātejāḥ paurajānapadapriyaḥ // 1.006.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇām atiratho yajvā dharmarato vaśī / maharṣikalpo rājarṣis triṣu lokṛṣu viśrutaḥ // 1.006.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balavān nihatāmitro mitravān vijitendriyaḥ / dhanaiś ca saṃcayaiś cānyaiḥ śakravaiśravaṇopamaḥ // 1.006.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā manur mahātejā lokasya parirakṣitā / tathā daśaratho rājā vasañ jagad apālayat // 1.006.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena satyābhisaṃdhena trivargam anutiṣṭhatā / pālitā sā purī śreṣṭhendreṇa ivāmarāvatī // 1.006.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin puravare hṛṣṭā dharmātmanā bahu śrutāḥ / narās tuṣṭādhanaiḥ svaiḥ svair alubdhāḥ satyavādinaḥ // 1.006.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nālpasaṃnicayaḥ kaś cid āsīt tasmin purottame / kuṭumbī yo hy asiddhārtho 'gavāśvadhanadhānyavān // 1.006.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmī vā na kadaryo vā nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣaḥ kva cit / draṣṭuṃ śakyam ayodhyāyāṃ nāvidvān na ca nāstikaḥ // 1.006.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve narāś ca nāryaś ca dharmaśīlāḥ susaṃyatāḥ / muditāḥ śīlavṛttābhyāṃ maharṣaya ivāmalāḥ // 1.006.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nākuṇḍalī nāmukuṭī nāsragvī nālpabhogavān / nāmṛṣṭo nānuliptāṅgo nāsugandhaś ca vidyate // 1.006.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāmṛṣṭabhojī nādātā nāpy anaṅgadaniṣkadhṛk / nāhastābharaṇo vāpi dṛśyate nāpy anātmavān // 1.006.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāhitāgnir nāyajvā vipro nāpy asahasradaḥ / kaś cid āsīd ayodhyāyāṃ na ca nirvṛttasaṃkaraḥ // 1.006.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svakarmaniratā nityaṃ brāhmaṇā vijitendriyāḥ / dānādhyayanaśīlāś ca saṃyatāś ca pratigrahe // 1.006.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na nāstiko nānṛtako na kaś cid abahuśrutaḥ / nāsūyako na cāśakto nāvidvān vidyate tadā // 1.006.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na dīnaḥ kṣiptacitto vā vyathito vāpi kaś cana / kaś cin naro vā nārī vā nāśrīmān nāpy arūpavān // 1.006.015.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
draṣṭuṃ śakyam ayodhyāyāṃ nāpi rājanyabhaktimān // 1.006.015.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varṇeṣv agryacaturtheṣu devatātithipūjakāḥ / dīrghāyuṣo narāḥ sarve dharmaṃ satyaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ // 1.006.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatraṃ brahmamukhaṃ cāsīd vaiśyāḥ kṣatram anuvratāḥ / śūdrāḥ svadharmaniratās trīn varṇān upacāriṇaḥ // 1.006.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tenekṣvākunāthena purī suparirakṣitā / yathā purastān manunā mānavendreṇa dhīmatā // 1.006.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yodhānām agnikalpānāṃ peśalānām amarṣiṇām / saṃpūrṇākṛtavidyānāṃ guhākesariṇām iva // 1.006.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmbojaviṣaye jātair bāhlīkaiś ca hayottamaiḥ / vanāyujair nadījaiś ca pūrṇāharihayopamaiḥ // 1.006.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vindhyaparvapajair mattaiḥ pūrṇā haimavatair api / madānvitair atibalair mātaṅgaiḥ parvatopamaiḥ // 1.006.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
añjanād api niṣkrāntair vāmanād api ca dvipaiḥ / bhadramandrair bhadramṛgair mṛgamandraiś ca sā purī // 1.006.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityamattaiḥ sadā pūrṇā nāgair acalasaṃnibhaiḥ / sā yojane ca dve bhūyaḥ satyanāmā prakāśate // 1.006.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ satyanāmāṃ dṛḍhatoraṇārgalām; gṛhair vicitrair upaśobhitāṃ śivām / purīm ayodhyāṃ nṛsahasrasaṃkulāṃ; śaśāsa vai śakrasamo mahīpatiḥ // 1.006.024	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
aṣṭau babhūvur vīrasya tasyāmātyā yaśasvinaḥ / śucayaś cānuraktāś ca rājakṛtyeṣu nityaśaḥ // 1.007.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhṛṣṭir jayanto vijayaḥ siddhārtho arthasādhakaḥ / aśoko mantrapālaś ca sumantraś cāṣṭamo 'bhavat // 1.007.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛtvijau dvāv abhimatau tasyāstām ṛṣisattamau / vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca mantriṇaś ca tathāpare // 1.007.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrīmantaś ca mahātmānaḥ śāstrajñā dṛḍhavikramāḥ / kīrtimantaḥ praṇihitā yathā vacanakāriṇaḥ // 1.007.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tejaḥkṣamāyaśaḥprāptāḥ smitapūrvābhibhāṣiṇaḥ / krodhāt kāmārthahetor vā na brūyur anṛtaṃ vacaḥ // 1.007.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām aviditaṃ kiṃ cit sveṣu nāsti pareṣu vā / kriyamāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vāpi cāreṇāpi cikīrṣitam // 1.007.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśalā vyavahāreṣu sauhṛdeṣu parīkṣitāḥ / prāptakālaṃ yathā daṇḍaṃ dhārayeyuḥ suteṣv api // 1.007.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kośasaṃgrahaṇe yuktā balasya ca parigrahe / ahitaṃ cāpi puruṣaṃ na vihiṃsyur adūṣakam // 1.007.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīrāṃś ca niyatotsāhā rāja śāstram anuṣṭhitāḥ / śucīnāṃ rakṣitāraś ca nityaṃ viṣayavāsinām // 1.007.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmakṣatram ahiṃsantas te kośaṃ samapūrayan / sutīkṣṇadaṇḍāḥ saṃprekṣya puruṣasya balābalam // 1.007.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śucīnām ekabuddhīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃprajānatām / nāsīt pure vā rāṣṭre vā mṛṣāvādī naraḥ kva cit // 1.007.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaś cin na duṣṭas tatrāsīt paradāraratir naraḥ / praśāntaṃ sarvam evāsīd rāṣṭraṃ puravaraṃ ca tat // 1.007.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suvāsasaḥ suveśāś ca te ca sarve suśīlinaḥ / hitārthaṃ ca narendrasya jāgrato nayacakṣuṣā // 1.007.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gurau guṇagṛhītāś ca prakhyātāś ca parākramaiḥ / videśeṣv api vijñātāḥ sarvato buddhiniścayāt // 1.007.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īdṛśais tair amātyais tu rājā daśaratho 'naghaḥ / upapanno guṇopetair anvaśāsad vasuṃdharām // 1.007.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avekṣamāṇaś cāreṇa prajā dharmeṇa rañjayan / nādhyagacchad viśiṣṭaṃ vā tulyaṃ vā śatrum ātmanaḥ // 1.007.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair mantribhir mantrahitair niviṣṭair; vṛto 'nuraktaiḥ kuśalaiḥ samarthaiḥ / sa pārthivo dīptim avāpa yuktas; tejomayair gobhir ivodito 'rkaḥ // 1.007.017	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tasya tv evaṃ prabhāvasya dharmajñasya mahātmanaḥ / sutārthaṃ tapyamānasya nāsīd vaṃśakaraḥ sutaḥ // 1.008.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cintayānasya tasyaivaṃ buddhir āsīn mahātmanaḥ / sutārthaṃ vājimedhena kimarthaṃ na yajāmy aham // 1.008.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa niścitāṃ matiṃ kṛtvā yaṣṭavyam iti buddhimān / mantribhiḥ saha dharmātmā sarvair eva kṛtātmabhiḥ // 1.008.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīd idaṃ rājā sumantraṃ mantrisattamam / śīghram ānaya me sarvān gurūṃs tān sapurohitān // 1.008.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā rahaḥ sūto rājānam idam abravīt / ṛtvigbhir upadiṣṭo 'yaṃ purāvṛtto mayā śrutaḥ // 1.008.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sanatkumāro bhagavān pūrvaṃ kathitavān kathām / ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau rājaṃs tava putrāgamaṃ prati // 1.008.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāśyapasya tu putro 'sti vibhāṇḍaka iti śrutaḥ / ṛṣyaśṛṅga iti khyātas tasya putro bhaviṣyati // 1.008.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vane nityasaṃvṛddho munir vanacaraḥ sadā / nānyaṃ jānāti viprendro nityaṃ pitranuvartanāt // 1.008.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvaividhyaṃ brahmacaryasya bhaviṣyati mahātmanaḥ / lokeṣu prathitaṃ rājan vipraiś ca kathitaṃ sadā // 1.008.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaivaṃ vartamānasya kālaḥ samabhivartata / agniṃ śuśrūṣamāṇasya pitaraṃ ca yaśasvinam // 1.008.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn eva kāle tu romapādaḥ pratāpavān / aṅgeṣu prathitā rājā bhaviṣyati mahābalaḥ // 1.008.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya vyatikramād rājño bhaviṣyati sudāruṇā / anāvṛṣṭiḥ sughorā vai sarvabhūtabhayāvahā // 1.008.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anāvṛṣṭyāṃ tu vṛttāyāṃ rājā duḥkhasamanvitaḥ / brāhmaṇāñ śrutavṛddhāṃś ca samānīya pravakṣyati // 1.008.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavantaḥ śrutadharmāṇo loke cāritravedinaḥ / samādiśantu niyamaṃ prāyaścittaṃ yathā bhavet // 1.008.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vakṣyanti te mahīpālaṃ brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ / vibhāṇḍakasutaṃ rājan sarvopāyair ihānaya // 1.008.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānāyya ca mahīpāla ṛṣyaśṛṅgaṃ susatkṛtam / prayaccha kanyāṃ śāntāṃ vai vidhinā susamāhitaḥ // 1.008.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā cintāṃ prapatsyate / kenopāyena vai śakyam ihānetuṃ sa vīryavān // 1.008.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rājā viniścitya saha mantribhir ātmavān / purohitam amātyāṃś ca preṣayiṣyati satkṛtān // 1.008.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu rājño vacaḥ śrutvā vyathitā vanatānanāḥ / na gacchema ṛṣer bhītā anuneṣyanti taṃ nṛpam // 1.008.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vakṣyanti cintayitvā te tasyopāyāṃś ca tān kṣamān / āneṣyāmo vayaṃ vipraṃ na ca doṣo bhaviṣyati // 1.008.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam aṅgādhipenaiva gaṇikābhir ṛṣeḥ sutaḥ / ānīto 'varṣayad devaḥ śāntā cāsmai pradīyate // 1.008.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣyaśṛṅgas tu jāmātā putrāṃs tava vidhāsyati / sanatkumārakathitam etāvad vyāhṛtaṃ mayā // 1.008.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha hṛṣṭo daśarathaḥ sumantraṃ pratyabhāṣata / yatharṣyaśṛṅgas tv ānīto vistareṇa tvayocyatām // 1.008.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantraś codito rājñā provācedaṃ vacas tadā / yatharṣyaśṛṅgas tv ānītaḥ śṛṇu me mantribhiḥ saha // 1.009.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
romapādam uvācedaṃ sahāmātyaḥ purohitaḥ / upāyo nirapāyo 'yam asmābhir abhicintitaḥ // 1.009.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣyaśṛṅgo vanacaras tapaḥsvādhyāyane rataḥ / anabhijñaḥ sa nārīṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ sukhasya ca // 1.009.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indriyārthair abhimatair naracitta pramāthibhiḥ / puram ānāyayiṣyāmaḥ kṣipraṃ cādhyavasīyatām // 1.009.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaṇikās tatra gacchantu rūpavatyaḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ / pralobhya vividhopāyair āneṣyantīha satkṛtāḥ // 1.009.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tatheti rājā ca pratyuvāca purohitam / purohito mantriṇaś ca tathā cakruś ca te tadā // 1.009.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāramukhyās tu tac chrutvā vanaṃ praviviśur mahat / āśramasyāvidūre 'smin yatnaṃ kurvanti darśane // 1.009.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣiputrasya ghorasya nityam āśramavāsinaḥ / pituḥ sa nityasaṃtuṣṭo nāticakrāma cāśramāt // 1.009.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tena janmaprabhṛti dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ tapasvinā / strī vā pumān vā yac cānyat sattvaṃ nagara rāṣṭrajam // 1.009.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kadā cit taṃ deśam ājagāma yadṛcchayā / vibhāṇḍakasutas tatra tāś cāpaśyad varāṅganāḥ // 1.009.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāś citraveṣāḥ pramadā gāyantyo madhurasvaraiḥ / ṛṣiputram upāgamya sarvā vacanam abruvan // 1.009.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kas tvaṃ kiṃ vartase brahmañ jñātum icchāmahe vayam / ekas tvaṃ vijane ghore vane carasi śaṃsa naḥ // 1.009.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛṣṭarūpās tās tena kāmyarūpā vane striyaḥ / hārdāt tasya matir jātā ākhyātuṃ pitaraṃ svakam // 1.009.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitā vibhāṇḍako 'smākaṃ tasyāhaṃ suta aurasaḥ / ṛṣyaśṛṅga iti khyātaṃ nāma karma ca me bhuvi // 1.009.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ihāśramapado 'smākaṃ samīpe śubhadarśanāḥ / kariṣye vo 'tra pūjāṃ vai sarveṣāṃ vidhipūrvakam // 1.009.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣiputravacaḥ śrutvā sarvāsāṃ matir āsa vai / tad āśramapadaṃ draṣṭuṃ jagmuḥ sarvāś ca tena ha // 1.009.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatānāṃ tu tataḥ pūjām ṛṣiputraś cakāra ha / idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam idaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca naḥ // 1.009.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ sarvā eva samutsukāḥ / ṛṣer bhītāś ca śīghraṃ tu gamanāya matiṃ dadhuḥ // 1.009.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmākam api mukhyāni phalānīmāni vai dvija / gṛhāṇa prati bhadraṃ te bhakṣayasva ca mā ciram // 1.009.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tās taṃ samāliṅgya sarvā harṣasamanvitāḥ / modakān pradadus tasmai bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhāñ śubhān // 1.009.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni cāsvādya tejasvī phalānīti sma manyate / anāsvāditapūrvāṇi vane nityanivāsinām // 1.009.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpṛcchya ca tadā vipraṃ vratacaryāṃ nivedya ca / gacchanti smāpadeśāt tā bhītās tasya pituḥ striyaḥ // 1.009.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatāsu tāsu sarvāsu kāśyapasyātmajo dvijaḥ / asvasthahṛdayaś cāsīd duḥkhaṃ sma parivartate // 1.009.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'paredyus taṃ deśam ājagāma sa vīryavān / manojñā yatra tā dṛṣṭā vāramukhyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ // 1.009.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvaiva ca tadā vipram āyāntaṃ hṛṣṭa mānasāḥ / upasṛtya tataḥ sarvās tās tam ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ // 1.009.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ehy āśramapadaṃ saumya asmākam iti cābruvan / tatrāpy eṣa vidhiḥ śrīmān viśeṣeṇa bhaviṣyati // 1.009.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ hṛdayaṃgamam / gamanāya matiṃ cakre taṃ ca ninyus tadā striyaḥ // 1.009.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra cānīyamāne tu vipre tasmin mahātmani / vavarṣa sahasā devo jagat prahlādayaṃs tadā // 1.009.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varṣeṇaivāgataṃ vipraṃ viṣayaṃ svaṃ narādhipaḥ / pratyudgamya muniṃ prahvaḥ śirasā ca mahīṃ gataḥ // 1.009.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arghyaṃ ca pradadau tasmai nyāyataḥ susamāhitaḥ / vavre prasādaṃ viprendrān mā vipraṃ manyur āviśet // 1.009.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antaḥpuraṃ praviśyāsmai kanyāṃ dattvā yathāvidhi / śāntāṃ śāntena manasā rājā harṣam avāpa saḥ // 1.009.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa nyavasat tatra sarvakāmaiḥ supūjitaḥ / ṛṣyaśṛṅgo mahātejāḥ śāntayā saha bhāryayā // 1.009.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūya eva ca rājendra śṛṇu me vacanaṃ hitam / yathā sa devapravaraḥ kathayām āsa buddhimān // 1.010.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jāto bhaviṣyati sudhārmikaḥ / rājā daśaratho nāmnā śrīmān satyapratiśravaḥ // 1.010.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgarājena sakhyaṃ ca tasya rājño bhaviṣyati / kanyā cāsya mahābhāgā śāntā nāma bhaviṣyati // 1.010.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putras tv aṅgasya rājñas tu romapāda iti śrutaḥ / taṃ sa rājā daśaratho gamiṣyati mahāyaśāḥ // 1.010.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anapatyo 'smi dharmātmañ śāntā bhāryā mama kratum / āhareta tvayājñaptaḥ saṃtānārthaṃ kulasya ca // 1.010.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā rājño 'tha tad vākyaṃ manasā sa vicintya ca / pradāsyate putravantaṃ śāntā bhartāram ātmavān // 1.010.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya ca taṃ vipraṃ sa rājā vigatajvaraḥ / āhariṣyati taṃ yajñaṃ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā // 1.010.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ ca rājā daśaratho yaṣṭukāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ / ṛṣyaśṛṅgaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ varayiṣyati dharmavit // 1.010.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajñārthaṃ prasavārthaṃ ca svargārthaṃ ca nareśvaraḥ / labhate ca sa taṃ kāmaṃ dvija mukhyād viśāṃ patiḥ // 1.010.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putrāś cāsya bhaviṣyanti catvāro 'mitavikramāḥ / vaṃśapratiṣṭhānakarāḥ sarvalokeṣu viśrutāḥ // 1.010.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa devapravaraḥ pūrvaṃ kathitavān kathām / sanatkumāro bhagavān purā devayuge prabhuḥ // 1.010.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla tam ānaya susatkṛtam / svayam eva mahārāja gatvā sabalavāhanaḥ // 1.010.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anumānya vasiṣṭhaṃ ca sūtavākyaṃ niśamya ca / sāntaḥpuraḥ sahāmātyaḥ prayayau yatra sa dvijaḥ // 1.010.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanāni saritaś caiva vyatikramya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ / abhicakrāma taṃ deśaṃ yatra vai munipuṃgavaḥ // 1.010.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsādya taṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ romapādasamīpagam / ṛṣiputraṃ dadarśādau dīpyamānam ivānalam // 1.010.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rājā yathānyāyaṃ pūjāṃ cakre viśeṣataḥ / sakhitvāt tasya vai rājñaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā // 1.010.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
romapādena cākhyātam ṛṣiputrāya dhīmate / sakhyaṃ saṃbandhakaṃ caiva tadā taṃ pratyapūjayat // 1.010.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ susatkṛtas tena sahoṣitvā nararṣabhaḥ / saptāṣṭadivasān rājā rājānam idam abravīt // 1.010.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāntā tava sutā rājan saha bhartrā viśāmpate / madīyaṃ nagaraṃ yātu kāryaṃ hi mahad udyatam // 1.010.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti rājā saṃśrutya gamanaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ / uvāca vacanaṃ vipraṃ gaccha tvaṃ saha bhāryayā // 1.010.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣiputraḥ pratiśrutya tathety āha nṛpaṃ tadā / sa nṛpeṇābhyanujñātaḥ prayayau saha bhāryayā // 1.010.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv anyonyāñjaliṃ kṛtvā snehāt saṃśliṣya corasā / nanandatur daśaratho romapādaś ca vīryavān // 1.010.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ suhṛdam āpṛcchya prasthito raghunandanaḥ / paurebhyaḥ preṣayām āsa dūtān vai śīghragāminaḥ // 1.010.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kriyatāṃ nagaraṃ sarvaṃ kṣipram eva svalaṃkṛtam // 1.010.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ paurās te śrutvā rājānam āgatam / tathā pracakrus tat sarvaṃ rājñā yat preṣitaṃ tadā // 1.010.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ svalaṃkṛtaṃ rājā nagaraṃ praviveśa ha / śaṅkhadundubhinirghoṣaiḥ puraskṛtya dvijarṣabham // 1.010.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pramuditāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā vai nāgarā dvijam / praveśyamānaṃ satkṛtya narendreṇendrakarmaṇā // 1.010.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antaḥpuraṃ praveśyainaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tu śāstrataḥ / kṛtakṛtyaṃ tadātmānaṃ mene tasyopavāhanāt // 1.010.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antaḥpurāṇi sarvāṇi śāntāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāgatām / saha bhartrā viśālākṣīṃ prītyānandam upāgaman // 1.010.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjyamānā ca tābhiḥ sā rājñā caiva viśeṣataḥ / uvāsa tatra sukhitā kaṃ cit kālaṃ saha dvijā // 1.010.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kāle bahutithe kasmiṃś cit sumanohare / vasante samanuprāpte rājño yaṣṭuṃ mano 'bhavat // 1.011.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prasādya śirasā taṃ vipraṃ devavarṇinam / yajñāya varayām āsa saṃtānārthaṃ kulasya ca // 1.011.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti ca sa rājānam uvāca ca susatkṛtaḥ / saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantāṃ te turagaś ca vimucyatām // 1.011.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rājābravīd vākyaṃ sumantraṃ mantrisattamam / sumantrāvāhaya kṣipram ṛtvijo brahmavādinaḥ // 1.011.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sumantras tvaritaṃ gatvā tvaritavikramaḥ / samānayat sa tān viprān samastān vedapāragān // 1.011.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suyajñaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca jābālim atha kāśyapam / purohitaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ // 1.011.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān pūjayitvā dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā / idaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.011.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama lālapyamānasya putrārthaṃ nāsti vai sukham / tadarthaṃ hayamedhena yakṣyāmīti matir mama // 1.011.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad ahaṃ yaṣṭum icchāmi śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā / ṛṣiputraprabhāvena kāmān prāpsyāmi cāpy aham // 1.011.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sādhv iti tad vākyaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ pratyapūjayan / vasiṣṭhapramukhāḥ sarve pārthivasya mukhāc cyutam // 1.011.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣyaśṛṅgapurogāś ca pratyūcur nṛpatiṃ tadā / saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantāṃ te turagaś ca vimucyatām // 1.011.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā prāpyase putrāṃś caturo 'mitavikramān / yasya te dhārmikī buddhir iyaṃ putrārtham āgatāḥ // 1.011.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prīto 'bhavad rājā śrutvā tad dvijabhāṣitam / amātyāṃś cābravīd rājā harṣeṇedaṃ śubhākṣaram // 1.011.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gurūṇāṃ vacanāc chīghraṃ saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantu me / samarthādhiṣṭhitaś cāśvaḥ sopādhyāyo vimucyatām // 1.011.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarayvāś cottare tīre yajñabhūmir vidhīyatām / śāntayaś cābhivardhantāṃ yathākalpaṃ yathāvidhi // 1.011.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śakyaḥ kartum ayaṃ yajñaḥ sarveṇāpi mahīkṣitā / nāparādho bhavet kaṣṭo yady asmin kratusattame // 1.011.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
chidraṃ hi mṛgayante 'tra vidvāṃso brahmarākṣasāḥ / vidhihīnasya yajñasya sadyaḥ kartā vinaśyati // 1.011.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad yathāvidhi pūrvaṃ me kratur eṣa samāpyate / tathāvidhānaṃ kriyatāṃ samarthāḥ karaṇeṣv iha // 1.011.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti ca tataḥ sarve mantriṇaḥ pratyapūjayan / pārthivendrasya tad vākyaṃ yathājñaptam akurvata // 1.011.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dvijās te dharmajñam astuvan pārthivarṣabham / anujñātās tataḥ sarve punar jagmur yathāgatam // 1.011.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatānāṃ tu dvijātīnāṃ mantriṇas tān narādhipaḥ / visarjayitvā svaṃ veśma praviveśa mahā dyutiḥ // 1.011.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
punaḥ prāpte vasante tu pūrṇaḥ saṃvatsaro 'bhavat / abhivādya vasiṣṭhaṃ ca nyāyataḥ pratipūjya ca // 1.012.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ prasavārthaṃ dvijottamam / yajño me kriyatāṃ vipra yathoktaṃ munipuṃgava // 1.012.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā na vighnaḥ kriyate yajñāṅgeṣu vidhīyatām / bhavān snigdhaḥ suhṛn mahyaṃ guruś ca paramo bhavān // 1.012.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
voḍhavyo bhavatā caiva bhāro yajñasya codyataḥ / tatheti ca sa rājānam abravīd dvijasattamaḥ // 1.012.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kariṣye sarvam evaitad bhavatā yat samarthitam / tato 'bravīd dvijān vṛddhān yajñakarmasu niṣṭhitān // 1.012.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthāpatye niṣṭhitāṃś caiva vṛddhān paramadhārmikān / karmāntikāñ śilpakārān vardhakīn khanakān api // 1.012.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaṇakāñ śilpinaś caiva tathaiva naṭanartakān / tathā śucīñ śāstravidaḥ puruṣān subahuśrutān // 1.012.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajñakarma samīhantāṃ bhavanto rājaśāsanāt / iṣṭakā bahusāhasrī śīghram ānīyatām iti // 1.012.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aupakāryāḥ kriyantāṃ ca rājñāṃ bahuguṇānvitāḥ / brāhmaṇāvasathāś caiva kartavyāḥ śataśaḥ śubhāḥ // 1.012.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhakṣyānnapānair bahubhiḥ samupetāḥ suniṣṭhitāḥ / tathā paurajanasyāpi kartavyā bahuvistarāḥ // 1.012.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āvāsā bahubhakṣyā vai sarvakāmair upasthitāḥ / tathā jānapadasyāpi janasya bahuśobhanam // 1.012.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dātavyam annaṃ vidhivat satkṛtya na tu līlayā / sarvavarṇā yathā pūjāṃ prāpnuvanti susatkṛtāḥ // 1.012.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāvajñā prayoktavyā kāmakrodhavaśād api / yajñakarmasu ye 'vyagrāḥ puruṣāḥ śilpinas tathā // 1.012.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām api viśeṣeṇa pūjā kāryā yathākramam / yathā sarvaṃ suvihitaṃ na kiṃ cit parihīyate // 1.012.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā bhavantaḥ kurvantu prītisnigdhena cetasā / tataḥ sarve samāgamya vasiṣṭham idam abruvan // 1.012.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathoktaṃ tat kariṣyāmo na kiṃ cit parihāsyate / tataḥ sumantram āhūya vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt // 1.012.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nimantrayasya nṛpatīn pṛthivyāṃ ye ca dhārmikāḥ / brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ // 1.012.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samānayasva satkṛtya sarvadeśeṣu mānavān / mithilādhipatiṃ śūraṃ janakaṃ satyavikramam // 1.012.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣṭhitaṃ sarvaśāstreṣu tathā vedeṣu niṣṭhitam / tam ānaya mahābhāgaṃ svayam eva susatkṛtam // 1.012.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvasaṃbandhinaṃ jñātvā tataḥ pūrvaṃ bravīmi te // 1.012.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā kāśipatiṃ snigdhaṃ satataṃ priyavādinam / sadvṛttaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ svayam evānayasva ha // 1.012.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā kekayarājānaṃ vṛddhaṃ paramadhārmikam / śvaśuraṃ rājasiṃhasya saputraṃ tam ihānaya // 1.012.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgeśvaraṃ mahābhāgaṃ romapādaṃ susatkṛtam / vayasyaṃ rājasiṃhasya tam ānaya yaśasvinam // 1.012.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prācīnān sindhusauvīrān saurāṣṭhreyāṃś ca pārthivān / dākṣiṇātyān narendrāṃś ca samastān ānayasva ha // 1.012.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
santi snigdhāś ca ye cānye rājānaḥ pṛthivītale / tān ānaya yathākṣipraṃ sānugān sahabāndhavān // 1.012.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhavākyaṃ tac chrutvā sumantras tvaritas tadā / vyādiśat puruṣāṃs tatra rājñām ānayane śubhān // 1.012.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svayam eva hi dharmātmā prayayau muniśāsanāt / sumantras tvarito bhūtvā samānetuṃ mahīkṣitaḥ // 1.012.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te ca karmāntikāḥ sarve vasiṣṭhāya ca dhīmate / sarvaṃ nivedayanti sma yajñe yad upakalpitam // 1.012.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prīto dvijaśreṣṭhas tān sarvān punar abravīt / avajñayā na dātavyaṃ kasya cil līlayāpi vā // 1.012.028.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avajñayā kṛtaṃ hanyād dātāraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // 1.012.028.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kaiś cid ahorātrair upayātā mahīkṣitaḥ / bahūni ratnāny ādāya rājño daśarathasya ha // 1.012.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vasiṣṭhaḥ suprīto rājānam idam abravīt / upayātā naravyāghra rājānas tava śāsanāt // 1.012.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayāpi satkṛtāḥ sarve yathārhaṃ rājasattamāḥ / yajñiyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ rājan puruṣaiḥ susamāhitaiḥ // 1.012.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niryātu ca bhavān yaṣṭuṃ yajñāyatanam antikāt / sarvakāmair upahṛtair upetaṃ vai samantataḥ // 1.012.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā vasiṣṭhavacanād ṛṣyaśṛṅgasya cobhayoḥ / śubhe divasa nakṣatre niryāto jagatīpatiḥ // 1.012.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vasiṣṭhapramukhāḥ sarva eva dvijottamāḥ / ṛṣyaśṛṅgaṃ puraskṛtya yajñakarmārabhaṃs tadā // 1.012.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe tasmin prāpte turaṅgame / sarayvāś cottare tīre rājño yajño 'bhyavartata // 1.013.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣyaśṛṅgaṃ puraskṛtya karma cakrur dvijarṣabhāḥ / aśvamedhe mahāyajñe rājño 'sya sumahātmanaḥ // 1.013.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karma kurvanti vidhivad yājakā vedapāragāḥ / yathāvidhi yathānyāyaṃ parikrāmanti śāstrataḥ // 1.013.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pravargyaṃ śāstrataḥ kṛtvā tathaivopasadaṃ dvijāḥ / cakruś ca vidhivat sarvam adhikaṃ karma śāstrataḥ // 1.013.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhipūjya tato hṛṣṭāḥ sarve cakrur yathāvidhi / prātaḥsavanapūrvāṇi karmāṇi munipuṃgavāḥ // 1.013.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāhutam abhūt tatra skhalitaṃ vāpi kiṃ cana / dṛśyate brahmavat sarvaṃ kṣemayuktaṃ hi cakrire // 1.013.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na teṣv ahaḥsu śrānto vā kṣudhito vāpi dṛśyate / nāvidvān brāhmaṇas tatra nāśatānucaras tathā // 1.013.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇā bhuñjate nityaṃ nāthavantaś ca bhuñjate / tāpasā bhujate cāpi śramaṇā bhuñjate tathā // 1.013.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛddhāś ca vyādhitāś caiva striyo bālās tathaiva ca / aniśaṃ bhuñjamānānāṃ na tṛptir upalabhyate // 1.013.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīyatāṃ dīyatām annaṃ vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca / iti saṃcoditās tatra tathā cakrur anekaśaḥ // 1.013.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
annakūṭāś ca bahavo dṛśyante parvatopamāḥ / divase divase tatra siddhasya vidhivat tadā // 1.013.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
annaṃ hi vidhivat svādu praśaṃsanti dvijarṣabhāḥ / aho tṛptāḥ sma bhadraṃ te iti śuśrāva rāghavaḥ // 1.013.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svalaṃkṛtāś ca puruṣā brāhmaṇān paryaveṣayan / upāsate ca tān anye sumṛṣṭamaṇikuṇḍalāḥ // 1.013.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karmāntare tadā viprā hetuvādān bahūn api / prāhuḥ suvāgmino dhīrāḥ parasparajigīṣayā // 1.013.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divase divase tatra saṃstare kuśalā dvijāḥ / sarvakarmāṇi cakrus te yathāśāstraṃ pracoditāḥ // 1.013.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāṣaḍaṅgavid atrāsīn nāvrato nābahuśrutaḥ / sadasyas tasya vai rājño nāvādakuśalo dvijaḥ // 1.013.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāpte yūpocchraye tasmin ṣaḍ bailvāḥ khādirās tathā / tāvanto bilvasahitāḥ parṇinaś ca tathāpare // 1.013.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śleṣmātakamayo diṣṭo devadārumayas tathā / dvāv eva tatra vihitau bāhuvyastaparigrahau // 1.013.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāritāḥ sarva evaite śāstrajñair yajñakovidaiḥ / śobhārthaṃ tasya yajñasya kāñcanālaṃkṛtā bhavan // 1.013.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinyastā vidhivat sarve śilpibhiḥ sukṛtā dṛḍhāḥ / aṣṭāśrayaḥ sarva eva ślakṣṇarūpasamanvitāḥ // 1.013.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ācchāditās te vāsobhiḥ puṣpair gandhaiś ca bhūṣitāḥ / saptarṣayo dīptimanto virājante yathā divi // 1.013.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iṣṭakāś ca yathānyāyaṃ kāritāś ca pramāṇataḥ / cito 'gnir brāhmaṇais tatra kuśalaiḥ śulbakarmaṇi // 1.013.022.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cityo rājasiṃhasya saṃcitaḥ kuśalair dvijaiḥ // 1.013.022.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
garuḍo rukmapakṣo vai triguṇo 'ṣṭādaśātmakaḥ / niyuktās tatra paśavas tat tad uddiśya daivatam // 1.013.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uragāḥ pakṣiṇaś caiva yathāśāstraṃ pracoditāḥ / śāmitre tu hayas tatra tathā jala carāś ca ye // 1.013.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛtvigbhiḥ sarvam evaitan niyuktaṃ śāstratas tadā / paśūnāṃ triśataṃ tatra yūpeṣu niyataṃ tadā // 1.013.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśvaratnottamaṃ tasya rājño daśarathasya ha // 1.013.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā taṃ hayaṃ tatra paricarya samantataḥ / kṛpāṇair viśaśāsainaṃ tribhiḥ paramayā mudā // 1.013.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patatriṇā tadā sārdhaṃ susthitena ca cetasā / avasad rajanīm ekāṃ kausalyā dharmakāmyayā // 1.013.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hotādhvaryus tathodgātā hayena samayojayan / mahiṣyā parivṛtthyātha vāvātām aparāṃ tathā // 1.013.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patatriṇas tasya vapām uddhṛtya niyatendriyaḥ / ṛtvik parama saṃpannaḥ śrapayām āsa śāstrataḥ // 1.013.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhūmagandhaṃ vapāyās tu jighrati sma narādhipaḥ / yathākālaṃ yathānyāyaṃ nirṇudan pāpam ātmanaḥ // 1.013.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hayasya yāni cāṅgāni tāni sarvāṇi brāhmaṇāḥ / agnau prāsyanti vidhivat samastāḥ ṣoḍaśartvijaḥ // 1.013.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plakṣaśākhāsu yajñānām anyeṣāṃ kriyate haviḥ / aśvamedhasya caikasya vaitaso bhāga iṣyate // 1.013.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tryaho 'śvamedhaḥ saṃkhyātaḥ kalpasūtreṇa brāhmaṇaiḥ / catuṣṭomam ahas tasya prathamaṃ parikalpitam // 1.013.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ukthyaṃ dvitīyaṃ saṃkhyātam atirātraṃ tathottaram / kāritās tatra bahavo vihitāḥ śāstradarśanāt // 1.013.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyotiṣṭomāyuṣī caiva atirātrau ca nirmitau / abhijid viśvajic caiva aptoryāmo mahākratuḥ // 1.013.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prācīṃ hotre dadau rājā diśaṃ svakulavardhanaḥ / adhvaryave pratīcīṃ tu brahmaṇe dakṣiṇāṃ diśam // 1.013.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udgātre tu tathodīcīṃ dakṣiṇaiṣā vinirmitā / aśvamedhe mahāyajñe svayambhuvihite purā // 1.013.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kratuṃ samāpya tu tadā nyāyataḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ / ṛtvigbhyo hi dadau rājā dharāṃ tāṃ kratuvardhanaḥ // 1.013.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛtvijas tv abruvan sarve rājānaṃ gatakalmaṣam / bhavān eva mahīṃ kṛtsnām eko rakṣitum arhati // 1.013.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na bhūmyā kāryam asmākaṃ na hi śaktāḥ sma pālane / ratāḥ svādhyāyakaraṇe vayaṃ nityaṃ hi bhūmipa // 1.013.040.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣkrayaṃ kiṃ cid eveha prayacchatu bhavān iti // 1.013.040.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi daśa tebhyo dadau nṛpaḥ / daśakoṭiṃ suvarṇasya rajatasya caturguṇam // 1.013.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛtvijas tu tataḥ sarve pradaduḥ sahitā vasu / ṛṣyaśṛṅgāya munaye vasiṣṭhāya ca dhīmate // 1.013.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te nyāyataḥ kṛtvā pravibhāgaṃ dvijottamāḥ / suprītamanasaḥ sarve pratyūcur muditā bhṛśam // 1.013.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prītamanā rājā prāpya yajñam anuttamam / pāpāpahaṃ svarnayanaṃ dustaraṃ pārthivarṣabhaiḥ // 1.013.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīd ṛṣyaśṛṅgaṃ rājā daśarathas tadā / kulasya vardhanaṃ tat tu kartum arhasi suvrata // 1.013.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti ca sa rājānam uvāca dvijasattamaḥ / bhaviṣyanti sutā rājaṃś catvāras te kulodvahāḥ // 1.013.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
medhāvī tu tato dhyātvā sa kiṃ cid idam uttamam / labdhasaṃjñas tatas taṃ tu vedajño nṛpam abravīt // 1.014.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iṣṭiṃ te 'haṃ kariṣyāmi putrīyāṃ putrakāraṇāt / atharvaśirasi proktair mantraiḥ siddhāṃ vidhānataḥ // 1.014.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prākramad iṣṭiṃ tāṃ putrīyāṃ putra kāraṇāt / juhāva cāgnau tejasvī mantradṛṣṭena karmaṇā // 1.014.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / bhāgapratigrahārthaṃ vai samavetā yathāvidhi // 1.014.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāḥ sametya yathānyāyaṃ tasmin sadasi devatāḥ / abruvaṃl lokakartāraṃ brahmāṇaṃ vacanaṃ mahat // 1.014.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavaṃs tvatprasādena rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ / sarvānno bādhate vīryāc chāsituṃ taṃ na śaknumaḥ // 1.014.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā tasmai varo dattaḥ prītena bhagavan purā / mānayantaś ca taṃ nityaṃ sarvaṃ tasya kṣamāmahe // 1.014.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udvejayati lokāṃs trīn ucchritān dveṣṭi durmatiḥ / śakraṃ tridaśarājānaṃ pradharṣayitum icchati // 1.014.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣīn yakṣān sagandharvān asurān brāhmaṇāṃs tathā / atikrāmati durdharṣo varadānena mohitaḥ // 1.014.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nainaṃ sūryaḥ pratapati pārśve vāti na mārutaḥ / calormimālī taṃ dṛṣṭvā samudro 'pi na kampate // 1.014.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan manan no bhayaṃ tasmād rākṣasād ghoradarśanāt / vadhārthaṃ tasya bhagavann upāyaṃ kartum arhasi // 1.014.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ suraiḥ sarvaiś cintayitvā tato 'bravīt / hantāyaṃ vihitas tasya vadhopāyo durātmanaḥ // 1.014.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena gandharvayakṣāṇāṃ devadānavarakṣasām / avadhyo 'smīti vāg uktā tathety uktaṃ ca tan mayā // 1.014.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nākīrtayad avajñānāt tad rakṣo mānuṣāṃs tadā / tasmāt sa mānuṣād vadhyo mṛtur nānyo 'sya vidyate // 1.014.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā priyaṃ vākyaṃ brahmaṇā samudāhṛtam / devā maharṣayaḥ sarve prahṛṣṭās te 'bhavaṃs tadā // 1.014.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare viṣṇur upayāto mahādyutiḥ / brahmaṇā ca samāgamya tatra tasthau samāhitaḥ // 1.014.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam abruvan surāḥ sarve samabhiṣṭūya saṃnatāḥ / tvāṃ niyokṣyāmahe viṣṇo lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // 1.014.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājño daśarathasya tvam ayodhyādhipater vibho / dharmajñasya vadānyasya maharṣisamatejasaḥ // 1.014.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya bhāryāsu tisṛṣu hrīśrīkīrtyupamāsu ca / viṣṇo putratvam āgaccha kṛtvātmānaṃ caturvidham // 1.014.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra tvaṃ mānuṣo bhūtvā pravṛddhaṃ lokakaṇṭakam / avadhyaṃ daivatair viṣṇo samare jahi rāvaṇam // 1.014.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi devān sagandharvān siddhāṃś ca ṛṣisattamān / rākṣaso rāvaṇo mūrkho vīryotsekena bādhate // 1.014.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad uddhataṃ rāvaṇam ṛddhatejasaṃ; pravṛddhadarpaṃ tridaśeśvaradviṣam / virāvaṇaṃ sādhu tapasvikaṇṭakaṃ; tapasvinām uddhara taṃ bhayāvaham // 1.014.021	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato nārāyaṇo viṣṇur niyuktaḥ surasattamaiḥ / jānann api surān evaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.015.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāyaḥ ko vadhe tasya rākṣasādhipateḥ surāḥ / yam ahaṃ taṃ samāsthāya nihanyām ṛṣikaṇṭakam // 1.015.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktāḥ surāḥ sarve pratyūcur viṣṇum avyayam / mānuṣīṃ tanum āsthāya rāvaṇaṃ jahi saṃyuge // 1.015.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ dīrghakālam ariṃdama / yena tuṣṭo 'bhavad brahmā lokakṛl lokapūjitaḥ // 1.015.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃtuṣṭaḥ pradadau tasmai rākṣasāya varaṃ prabhuḥ / nānāvidhebhyo bhūtebhyo bhayaṃ nānyatra mānuṣāt // 1.015.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avajñātāḥ purā tena varadānena mānavāḥ / tasmāt tasya vadho dṛṣṭo mānuṣebhyaḥ paraṃtapa // 1.015.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā surāṇāṃ viṣṇur ātmavān / pitaraṃ rocayām āsa tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam // 1.015.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cāpy aputro nṛpatis tasmin kāle mahādyutiḥ / ayajat putriyām iṣṭiṃ putrepsur arisūdanaḥ // 1.015.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vai yajamānasya pāvakād atulaprabham / prādurbhūtaṃ mahad bhūtaṃ mahāvīryaṃ mahābalam // 1.015.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛṣṇaṃ raktāmbaradharaṃ raktāsyaṃ dundubhisvanam / snigdhaharyakṣatanujaśmaśrupravaramūrdhajam // 1.015.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śubhalakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ divyābharaṇabhūṣitam / śailaśṛṅgasamutsedhaṃ dṛptaśārdūlavikramam // 1.015.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divākarasamākāraṃ dīptānalaśikhopamam / taptajāmbūnadamayīṃ rājatāntaparicchadām // 1.015.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyapāyasasaṃpūrṇāṃ pātrīṃ patnīm iva priyām / pragṛhya vipulāṃ dorbhyāṃ svayaṃ māyāmayīm iva // 1.015.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samavekṣyābravīd vākyam idaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam / prājāpatyaṃ naraṃ viddhi mām ihābhyāgataṃ nṛpa // 1.015.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paraṃ tadā rājā pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ / bhagavan svāgataṃ te 'stu kim ahaṃ karavāṇi te // 1.015.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atho punar idaṃ vākyaṃ prājāpatyo naro 'bravīt / rājann arcayatā devān adya prāptam idaṃ tvayā // 1.015.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ tu naraśārdūla pāyasaṃ devanirmitam / prajākaraṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dhanyam ārogyavardhanam // 1.015.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāryāṇām anurūpāṇām aśnīteti prayaccha vai / tāsu tvaṃ lapsyase putrān yadarthaṃ yajase nṛpa // 1.015.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti nṛpatiḥ prītaḥ śirasā pratigṛhyatām / pātrīṃ devānnasaṃpūrṇāṃ devadattāṃ hiraṇmayīm // 1.015.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādya ca tad bhūtam adbhutaṃ priyadarśanam / mudā paramayā yuktaś cakārābhipradakṣiṇam // 1.015.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato daśarathaḥ prāpya pāyasaṃ devanirmitam / babhūva paramaprītaḥ prāpya vittam ivādhanaḥ // 1.015.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tad adbhutaprakhyaṃ bhūtaṃ paramabhāsvaram / saṃvartayitvā tat karma tatraivāntaradhīyata // 1.015.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harṣaraśmibhir udyotaṃ tasyāntaḥpuram ābabhau / śāradasyābhirāmasya candrasyeva nabho'ṃśubhiḥ // 1.015.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'ntaḥpuraṃ praviśyaiva kausalyām idam abravīt / pāyasaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva putrīyaṃ tv idam ātmanaḥ // 1.015.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyāyai narapatiḥ pāyasārdhaṃ dadau tadā / ardhād ardhaṃ dadau cāpi sumitrāyai narādhipaḥ // 1.015.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyyai cāvaśiṣṭārdhaṃ dadau putrārthakāraṇāt / pradadau cāvaśiṣṭārdhaṃ pāyasasyāmṛtopamam // 1.015.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anucintya sumitrāyai punar eva mahīpatiḥ / evaṃ tāsāṃ dadau rājā bhāryāṇāṃ pāyasaṃ pṛthak // 1.015.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tās tv etat pāyasaṃ prāpya narendrasyottamāḥ striyaḥ / saṃmānaṃ menire sarvāḥ praharṣoditacetasaḥ // 1.015.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putratvaṃ tu gate viṣṇau rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ / uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ svayambhūr bhagavān idam // 1.016.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyasaṃdhasya vīrasya sarveṣāṃ no hitaiṣiṇaḥ / viṣṇoḥ sahāyān balinaḥ sṛjadhvaṃ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // 1.016.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māyāvidaś ca śūrāṃś ca vāyuvegasamāñjave / nayajñān buddhisaṃpannān viṣṇutulyaparākramān // 1.016.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asaṃhāryān upāyajñān divyasaṃhananānvitān / sarvāstraguṇasaṃpannān amṛtaprāśanān iva // 1.016.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apsaraḥsu ca mukhyāsu gandharvīṇāṃ tanūṣu ca / yakṣapannagakanyāsu ṛṣkavidyādharīṣu ca // 1.016.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃnarīṇāṃ ca gātreṣu vānarīṇāṃ tanūṣu ca / sṛjadhvaṃ harirūpeṇa putrāṃs tulyaparākramān // 1.016.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tathoktā bhagavatā tat pratiśrutya śāsanam / janayām āsur evaṃ te putrān vānararūpiṇaḥ // 1.016.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣayaś ca mahātmānaḥ siddhavidyādharoragāḥ / cāraṇāś ca sutān vīrān sasṛjur vanacāriṇaḥ // 1.016.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te sṛṣṭā bahusāhasrā daśagrīvavadhodyatāḥ / aprameyabalā vīrā vikrāntāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // 1.016.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gajācalasaṃkāśā vapuṣmanto mahābalāḥ / ṛkṣavānaragopucchāḥ kṣipram evābhijajñire // 1.016.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya devasya yad rūpaṃ veṣo yaś ca parākramaḥ / ajāyata samastena tasya tasya sutaḥ pṛthak // 1.016.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
golāṅgūlīṣu cotpannāḥ ke cit saṃmatavikramāḥ / ṛkṣīṣu ca tathā jātā vānarāḥ kiṃnarīṣu ca // 1.016.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śilāpraharaṇāḥ sarve sarve pādapayodhinaḥ / nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhāḥ sarve sarve sarvāstrakovidāḥ // 1.016.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicālayeyuḥ śailendrān bhedayeyuḥ sthirān drumān / kṣobhayeyuś ca vegena samudraṃ saritāṃ patim // 1.016.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dārayeyuḥ kṣitiṃ padbhyām āplaveyur mahārṇavam / nabhastalaṃ viśeyuś ca gṛhṇīyur api toyadān // 1.016.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhṇīyur api mātaṅgān mattān pravrajato vane / nardamānāṃś ca nādena pātayeyur vihaṃgamān // 1.016.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īdṛśānāṃ prasūtāni harīṇāṃ kāmarūpimām / śataṃ śatasahasrāṇi yūthapānāṃ mahātmanām // 1.016.017.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhūvur yūthapaśreṣṭhā vīrāṃś cājanayan harīn // 1.016.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anye ṛkṣavataḥ prasthān upatasthuḥ sahasraśaḥ / anye nānāvidhāñ śailān kānanāni ca bhejire // 1.016.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūryaputraṃ ca sugrīvaṃ śakraputraṃ ca vālinam / bhrātarāv upatasthus te sarva eva harīśvarāḥ // 1.016.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair meghavṛndācalatulyakāyair; mahābalair vānarayūthapālaiḥ / babhūva bhūr bhīmaśarīrarūpaiḥ; samāvṛtā rāmasahāyahetoḥ // 1.016.020	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
nirvṛtte tu kratau tasmin hayamedhe mahātmanaḥ / pratigṛhya surā bhāgān pratijagmur yathāgatam // 1.017.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāptadīkṣāniyamaḥ patnīgaṇasamanvitaḥ / praviveśa purīṃ rājā sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ // 1.017.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathārhaṃ pūjitās tena rājñā vai pṛthivīśvarāḥ / muditāḥ prayayur deśān praṇamya munipuṃgavam // 1.017.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gateṣu pṛthivīśeṣu rājā daśarathaḥ punaḥ / praviveśa purīṃ śrīmān puraskṛtya dvijottamān // 1.017.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāntayā prayayau sārdham ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ supūjitaḥ / anvīyamāno rājñātha sānuyātreṇa dhīmatā // 1.017.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyājanayad rāmaṃ divyalakṣaṇasaṃyutam / viṣṇor ardhaṃ mahābhāgaṃ putram ikṣvākunandanam // 1.017.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā śuśubhe tena putreṇāmitatejasā / yathā vareṇa devānām aditir vajrapāṇinā // 1.017.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharato nāma kaikeyyāṃ jajñe satyaparākramaḥ / sākṣād viṣṇoś caturbhāgaḥ sarvaiḥ samudito guṇaiḥ // 1.017.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha lakṣmaṇaśatrughnau sumitrājanayat sutau / vīrau sarvāstrakuśalau viṣṇor ardhasamanvitau // 1.017.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājñaḥ putrā mahātmānaś catvāro jajñire pṛthak / guṇavanto 'nurūpāś ca rucyā proṣṭhapadopamāḥ // 1.017.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atītyaikādaśāhaṃ tu nāma karma tathākarot / jyeṣṭhaṃ rāmaṃ mahātmānaṃ bharataṃ kaikayīsutam // 1.017.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇam iti śatrughnam aparaṃ tathā / vasiṣṭhaḥ paramaprīto nāmāni kṛtavāṃs tadā // 1.017.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ janmakriyādīni sarvakarmāṇy akārayat // 1.017.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ ketur iva jyeṣṭho rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ / babhūva bhūyo bhūtānāṃ svayambhūr iva saṃmataḥ // 1.017.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve vedavidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve lokahite ratāḥ / sarve jñānopasaṃpannāḥ sarve samuditā guṇaiḥ // 1.017.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām api mahātejā rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / bālyāt prabhṛti susnigdho lakṣmaṇo lakṣmivardhanaḥ // 1.017.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya lokarāmasya bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya nityaśaḥ / sarvapriyakaras tasya rāmasyāpi śarīrataḥ // 1.017.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇo lakṣmisaṃpanno bahiḥprāṇa ivāparaḥ / na ca tena vinā nidrāṃ labhate puruṣottamaḥ // 1.017.017.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛṣṭam annam upānītam aśnāti na hi taṃ vinā // 1.017.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā hi hayam ārūḍho mṛgayāṃ yāti rāghavaḥ / tadainaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'bhyeti sadhanuḥ paripālayan // 1.017.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasyāpi śatrughno lakṣmaṇāvarajo hi saḥ / prāṇaiḥ priyataro nityaṃ tasya cāsīt tathā priyaḥ // 1.017.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa caturbhir mahābhāgaiḥ putrair daśarathaḥ priyaiḥ / babhūva paramaprīto devair iva pitāmahaḥ // 1.017.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te yadā jñānasaṃpannāḥ sarve samuditā guṇaiḥ / hrīmantaḥ kīrtimantaś ca sarvajñā dīrghadarśinaḥ // 1.017.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rājā daśarathas teṣāṃ dārakriyāṃ prati / cintayām āsa dharmātmā sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ // 1.017.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya cintayamānasya mantrimadhye mahātmanaḥ / abhyāgacchan mahātejo viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ // 1.017.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājño darśanākāṅkṣī dvārādhyakṣān uvāca ha / śīghram ākhyāta māṃ prāptaṃ kauśikaṃ gādhinaḥ sutam // 1.017.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya rājaveśma pradudruvuḥ / saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ sarve tena vākyena coditāḥ // 1.017.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gatvā rājabhavanaṃ viśvāmitram ṛṣiṃ tadā / prāptam āvedayām āsur nṛpāyekṣvākave tadā // 1.017.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sapurodhāḥ samāhitaḥ / pratyujjagāma saṃhṛṣṭo brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ // 1.017.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā jvalitaṃ dīptyā tāpasaṃ saṃśitavratam / prahṛṣṭavadano rājā tato 'rghyam upahārayat // 1.017.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājñaḥ pratigṛhyārghyaṃ śāstradṛṣṭtena karmaṇā / kuśalaṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva paryapṛcchan narādhipam // 1.017.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhaṃ ca samāgamya kuśalaṃ munipuṃgavaḥ / ṛṣīṃś ca tān yathā nyāyaṃ mahābhāgān uvāca ha // 1.017.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te sarve hṛṣṭamanasas tasya rājño niveśanam / viviśuḥ pūjitās tatra niṣeduś ca yathārthataḥ // 1.017.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha hṛṣṭamanā rājā viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim / uvāca paramodāro hṛṣṭas tam abhipūjayan // 1.017.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāmṛtasya saṃprāptir yathā varṣam anūdake / yathā sadṛśadāreṣu putrajanmāprajasya ca // 1.017.033.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pranaṣṭasya yathā lābho yathā harṣo mahodaye / tathaivāgamanaṃ manye svāgataṃ te mahāmune // 1.017.033.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaṃ ca te paramaṃ kāmaṃ karomi kim u harṣitaḥ / pātrabhūto 'si me vipra diṣṭyā prāpto 'si dhārmika // 1.017.034.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ ca sujīvitam // 1.017.034.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvaṃ rājarṣiśabdena tapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ / brahmarṣitvam anuprāptaḥ pūjyo 'si bahudhā mayā // 1.017.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad adbhutam idaṃ vipra pavitraṃ paramaṃ mama / śubhakṣetragataś cāhaṃ tava saṃdarśanāt prabho // 1.017.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brūhi yat prārthitaṃ tubhyaṃ kāryam āgamanaṃ prati / icchāmy anugṛhīto 'haṃ tvadarthaparivṛddhaye // 1.017.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāryasya na vimarśaṃ ca gantum arhasi kauśika / kartā cāham aśeṣeṇa daivataṃ hi bhavān mama // 1.017.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti hṛdayasukhaṃ niśamya vākyaṃ; śrutisukham ātmavatā vinītam uktam / prathitaguṇayaśā guṇair viśiṣṭaḥ; parama ṛṣiḥ paramaṃ jagāma harṣam // 1.017.039	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
tac chrutvā rājasiṃhasya vākyam adbhutavistaram / hṛṣṭaromā mahātejā viśvāmitro 'bhyabhāṣata // 1.018.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśaṃ rājaśārdūla tavaitad bhuvi nānyataḥ / mahāvaṃśaprasūtasya vasiṣṭhavyapadeśinaḥ // 1.018.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tu me hṛdgataṃ vākyaṃ tasya kāryasya niścayam / kuruṣva rājaśārdūla bhava satyapratiśravaḥ // 1.018.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ niyamam ātiṣṭha siddhyarthaṃ puruṣarṣabha / tasya vighnakarau dvau tu rākṣasau kāmarūpiṇau // 1.018.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vrate me bahuśaś cīrṇe samāptyāṃ rākṣasāv imau / mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca vīryavantau suśikṣitau // 1.018.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau māṃsarudhiraugheṇa vediṃ tām abhyavarṣatām // 1.018.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avadhūte tathā bhūte tasmin niyamaniścaye / kṛtaśramo nirutsāhas tasmād deśād apākrame // 1.018.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca me krodham utsraṣṭuṃ buddhir bhavati pārthiva / tathābhūtā hi sā caryā na śāpas tatra mucyate // 1.018.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svaputraṃ rājaśārdūla rāmaṃ satyaparākramam / kākapakṣadharaṃ śūraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ me dātum arhasi // 1.018.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śakto hy eṣa mayā gupto divyena svena tejasā / rākṣasā ye vikartāras teṣām api vināśane // 1.018.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śreyaś cāsmai pradāsyāmi bahurūpaṃ na saṃśayaḥ / trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yena khyātiṃ gamiṣyati // 1.018.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca tau rāmam āsādya śaktau sthātuṃ kathaṃ cana / na ca tau rāghavād anyo hantum utsahate pumān // 1.018.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīryotsiktau hi tau pāpau kālapāśavaśaṃ gatau / rāmasya rājaśārdūla na paryāptau mahātmanaḥ // 1.018.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca putrakṛtaṃ snehaṃ kartum arhasi pārthiva / ahaṃ te pratijānāmi hatau tau viddhi rākṣasau // 1.018.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ vedmi mahātmānaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam / vasiṣṭho 'pi mahātejā ye ceme tapasi sthitāḥ // 1.018.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi te dharmalābhaṃ ca yaśaś ca paramaṃ bhuvi / sthiram icchasi rājendra rāmaṃ me dātum arhasi // 1.018.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady abhyanujñāṃ kākutstha dadate tava mantriṇaḥ / vasiṣṭha pramukhāḥ sarve tato rāmaṃ visarjaya // 1.018.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhipretam asaṃsaktam ātmajaṃ dātum arhasi / daśarātraṃ hi yajñasya rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam // 1.018.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātyeti kālo yajñasya yathāyaṃ mama rāghava / tathā kuruṣva bhadraṃ te mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ // 1.018.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā dharmātmā dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ / virarāma mahātejā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ // 1.018.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti hṛdayamanovidāraṇaṃ; munivacanaṃ tad atīva śuśruvān / narapatir agamad bhayaṃ mahad; vyathitamanāḥ pracacāla cāsanāt // 1.018.020	aparavaktra (1,3: nnrlg, 2,4: njjr)
tac chrutvā rājaśārdūla viśvāmitrasya bhāṣitam / muhūrtam iva niḥsaṃjñaḥ saṃjñāvān idam abravīt // 1.019.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūnaṣoḍaśavarṣo me rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ / na yuddhayogyatām asya paśyāmi saha rākṣasaiḥ // 1.019.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyam akṣauhiṇī pūrṇā yasyāhaṃ patir īśvaraḥ / anayā saṃvṛto gatvā yodhāhaṃ tair niśācaraiḥ // 1.019.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime śūrāś ca vikrāntā bhṛtyā me 'straviśāradāḥ / yogyā rakṣogaṇair yoddhuṃ na rāmaṃ netum arhasi // 1.019.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham eva dhanuṣpāṇir goptā samaramūrdhani / yāvat prāṇān dhariṣyāmi tāvad yotsye niśācaraiḥ // 1.019.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirvighnā vratavaryā sā bhaviṣyati surakṣitā / ahaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmil na rāma netum arhasi // 1.019.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bālo hy akṛtavidyaś ca na ca vetti balābalam / na cāstrabalasaṃyukto na ca yuddhaviśāradaḥ // 1.019.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāsau rakṣasāṃ yogyaḥ kūṭayuddhā hi te dhruvam // 1.019.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viprayukto hi rāmeṇa muhūrtam api notsahe / jīvituṃ muniśārdūla na rāmaṃ netum arhasi // 1.019.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi vā rāghavaṃ brahman netum icchasi suvrata / caturaṅgasamāyuktaṃ mayā saha ca taṃ naya // 1.019.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṣaṣṭir varṣasahasrāṇi jātasya mama kauśikaḥ / duḥkhenotpāditaś cāyaṃ na rāmaṃ netum arhasi // 1.019.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturṇām ātmajānāṃ hi prītiḥ paramikā mama / jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmapradhānaṃ ca na rāmaṃ netum arhasi // 1.019.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ vīryā rākṣasās te ca kasya putrāś ca ke ca te / kathaṃ pramāṇāḥ ke caitān rakṣanti munipuṃgava // 1.019.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ ca pratikartavyaṃ teṣāṃ rāmeṇa rakṣasām / māmakair vā balair brahman mayā vā kūṭayodhinām // 1.019.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan kathaṃ teṣāṃ mayā raṇe / sthātavyaṃ duṣṭabhāvānāṃ vīryotsiktā hi rākṣasāḥ // 1.019.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā viśvāmitro 'bhyabhāṣata / paulastyavaṃśaprabhavo rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ // 1.019.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa brahmaṇā dattavaras trailokyaṃ bādhate bhṛśam / mahābalo mahāvīryo rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtaḥ // 1.019.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyate hi mahāvīryo rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / sākṣād vaiśravaṇabhrātā putro viśvaraso muneḥ // 1.019.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā svayaṃ na yajñasya vighnakartā mahābalaḥ / tena saṃcoditau tau tu rākṣasau sumahā balau // 1.019.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca yajñavighnaṃ kariṣyataḥ // 1.019.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity ukto muninā tena rājovāca muniṃ tadā / na hi śakto 'smi saṃgrāme sthātuṃ tasya durātmanaḥ // 1.019.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ dharmajña kuruṣva mama putrake / devadānavagandharvā yakṣāḥ pataga pannagāḥ // 1.019.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na śaktā rāvaṇaṃ soḍhuṃ kiṃ punar mānavā yudhi / sa hi vīryavatāṃ vīryam ādatte yudhi rākṣasaḥ // 1.019.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena cāhaṃ na śakto 'smi saṃyoddhuṃ tasya vā balaiḥ / sabalo vā muniśreṣṭha sahito vā mamātmajaiḥ // 1.019.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
katham apy amaraprakhyaṃ saṃgrāmāṇām akovidam / bālaṃ me tanayaṃ brahman naiva dāsyāmi putrakam // 1.019.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha kālopamau yuddhe sutau sundopasundayoḥ / yajñavighnakarau tau te naiva dāsyāmi putrakam // 1.019.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca vīryavantau suśikṣitau / tayor anyatareṇāhaṃ yoddhā syāṃ sasuhṛdgaṇaḥ // 1.019.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya snehaparyākulākṣaram / samanyuḥ kauśiko vākyaṃ pratyuvaca mahīpatim // 1.020.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvam arthaṃ pratiśrutya pratijñāṃ hātum icchasi / rāgavāṇām ayukto 'yaṃ kulasyāsya viparyayaḥ // 1.020.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad idaṃ te kṣamaṃ rājan gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam / mithyāpratijñaḥ kākutstha sukhī bhava sabāndhavaḥ // 1.020.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya roṣaparītasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ / cacāla vasudhā kṛtsnā viveśa ca bhayaṃ surān // 1.020.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trastarūpaṃ tu vijñāya jagat sarvaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ / nṛpatiṃ suvrato dhīro vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt // 1.020.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jātaḥ sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ / dhṛtimānsuvrataḥ śrīmān na dharmaṃ hātum arhasi // 1.020.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triṣu lokeṣu vikhyāto dharmātmā iti rāghavaḥ / svadharmaṃ pratipadyasva nādharmaṃ voḍhum arhasi // 1.020.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃśrutyaivaṃ kariṣyāmīty akurvāṇasya rāghava / iṣṭāpūrtavadho bhūyāt tasmād rāmaṃ visarjaya // 1.020.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtāstram akṛtāstraṃ vā nainaṃ śakṣyanti rākṣasāḥ / guptaṃ kuśikaputreṇa jvalanenāmṛtaṃ yathā // 1.020.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa vigrahavān dharma eṣa vīryavatāṃ varaḥ / eṣa buddhyādhiko loke tapasaś ca parāyaṇam // 1.020.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣo 'strān vividhān vetti trailokye sacarācare / nainam anyaḥ pumān vetti na ca vetsyanti ke cana // 1.020.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na devā narṣayaḥ ke cin nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ / gandharvayakṣapravarāḥ sakiṃnaramahoragāḥ // 1.020.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvāstrāṇi kṛśāśvasya putrāḥ paramadhārmikāḥ / kauśikāya purā dattā yadā rājyaṃ praśāsati // 1.020.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te 'pi putrāḥ kṛśāśvasya prajāpatisutāsutāḥ / nakarūpā mahāvīryā dīptimanto jayāvahāḥ // 1.020.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jayā ca suprabhā caiva dakṣakanye sumadhyame / te suvāte 'straśastrāṇi śataṃ parama bhāsvaram // 1.020.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pañcāśataṃ sutāṃl lebhe jayā nāma varān purā / vadhāyāsurasainyānām ameyān kāmarūpiṇaḥ // 1.020.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suprabhājanayac cāpi putrān pañcāśataṃ punaḥ / saṃhārān nāma durdharṣān durākrāmān balīyasaḥ // 1.020.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni cāstrāṇi vetty eṣa yathāvat kuśikātmajaḥ / apūrvāṇāṃ ca janane śakto bhūyaś ca dharmavit // 1.020.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vīryo mahātejā viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ / na rāmagamane rājan saṃśayaṃ gantum arhasi // 1.020.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā vasiṣṭhe bruvati rājā daśarathaḥ sutam / prahṛṣṭavadano rāmam ājuhāva salakṣmaṇam // 1.021.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtasvastyayanaṃ mātrā pitrā daśarathena ca / purodhasā vasiṣṭhena maṅgalair abhimantritam // 1.021.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa putraṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya rājā daśarathaḥ priyam / dadau kuśikaputrāya suprītenāntarātmanā // 1.021.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vāyuḥ sukhasparśo virajasko vavau tadā / viśvāmitragataṃ rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājīvalocanam // 1.021.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
