puṣpavṛṣṭir mahaty āsīd devadundubhinisvanaḥ / śaṅkhadundubhinirghoṣaḥ prayāte tu mahātmani // 1.021.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitro yayāv agre tato rāmo mahāyaśāḥ / kākapakṣadharo dhanvī taṃ ca saumitrir anvagāt // 1.021.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kalāpinau dhanuṣpāṇī śobhayānau diśo daśa / viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānaṃ triśīrṣāv iva pannagau // 1.021.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujagmatur akṣudrau pitāmaham ivāśvinau // 1.021.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
baddhagodhāṅgulitrāṇau khaḍgavantau mahādyutī / sthāṇuṃ devam ivācintyaṃ kumārāv iva pāvakī // 1.021.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhyardhayojanaṃ gatvā sarayvā dakṣiṇe taṭe / rāmeti madhurā vāṇīṃ viśvāmitro 'bhyabhāṣata // 1.021.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhāṇa vatsa salilaṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ / mantragrāmaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ balām atibalāṃ tathā // 1.021.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na śramo na jvaro vā te na rūpasya viparyayaḥ / na ca suptaṃ pramattaṃ vā dharṣayiṣyanti nairṛtāḥ // 1.021.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na bāhvoḥ sadṛśo vīrye pṛthivyām asti kaś cana / triṣu lokeṣu vā rāma na bhavet sadṛśas tava // 1.021.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na saubhāgye na dākṣiṇye na jñāne buddhiniścaye / nottare pratipattavyo samo loke tavānagha // 1.021.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etadvidyādvaye labdhe bhavitā nāsti te samaḥ / balā cātibalā caiva sarvajñānasya mātarau // 1.021.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣutpipāse na te rāma bhaviṣyete narottama / balām atibalāṃ caiva paṭhataḥ pathi rāghava // 1.021.015.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidyādvayam adhīyāne yaśaś cāpy atulaṃ bhuvi // 1.021.015.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahasute hy ete vidye tejaḥsamanvite / pradātuṃ tava kākutstha sadṛśas tvaṃ hi dhārmika // 1.021.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ bahuguṇāḥ sarve tvayy ete nātra saṃśayaḥ / tapasā saṃbhṛte caite bahurūpe bhaviṣyataḥ // 1.021.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmo jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śuciḥ / pratijagrāha te vidye maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ // 1.021.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidyāsamudito rāmaḥ śuśubhe bhūrivikramaḥ // 1.021.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gurukāryāṇi sarvāṇi niyujya kuśikātmaje / ūṣus tāṃ rajanīṃ tatra sarayvāṃ susukhaṃ trayaḥ // 1.021.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / abhyabhāṣata kākutsthaṃ śayānaṃ parṇasaṃstare // 1.022.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā suprajā rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate / uttiṣṭha naraśārdūla kartavyaṃ daivam āhnikam // 1.022.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyarṣeḥ paramodāraṃ vacaḥ śrutvā nṛpātmajau / snātvā kṛtodakau vīrau jepatuḥ paramaṃ japam // 1.022.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtāhnikau mahāvīryau viśvāmitraṃ tapodhanam / abhivādyābhisaṃhṛṣṭau gamanāyopatasthatuḥ // 1.022.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau prayāte mahāvīryau divyaṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm / dadṛśāte tatas tatra sarayvāḥ saṃgame śubhe // 1.022.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāśramapadaṃ puṇyam ṛṣīṇām ugratejasām / bahuvarṣasahasrāṇi tapyatāṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ // 1.022.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītau rāghavau puṇyam āśramam / ūcatus taṃ mahātmānaṃ viśvāmitram idaṃ vacaḥ // 1.022.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasyāyam āśramaḥ puṇyaḥ ko nv asmin vasate pumān / bhagavañ śrotum icchāvaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi nau // 1.022.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prahasya munipuṃgavaḥ / abravīc chrūyatāṃ rāma yasyāyaṃ pūrva āśramaḥ // 1.022.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kandarpo mūrtimān āsīt kāma ity ucyate budhaiḥ // 1.022.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapasyantam iha sthāṇuṃ niyamena samāhitam / kṛtodvāhaṃ tu deveśaṃ gacchantaṃ samarudgaṇam // 1.022.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharṣayām āsa durmedhā huṃkṛtaś ca mahātmanā // 1.022.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dagdhasya tasya raudreṇa cakṣuṣā raghunandana / vyaśīryanta śarīrāt svāt sarvagātrāṇi durmateḥ // 1.022.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya gātraṃ hataṃ tatra nirdagdhasya mahātmanā / aśarīraḥ kṛtaḥ kāmaḥ krodhād deveśvareṇa ha // 1.022.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anaṅga iti vikhyātas tadā prabhṛti rāghava / sa cāṅgaviṣayaḥ śrīmān yatrāṅgaṃ sa mumoca ha // 1.022.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāyam āśramaḥ puṇyas tasyeme munayaḥ purā / śiṣyā dharmaparā vīra teṣāṃ pāpaṃ na vidyate // 1.022.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ihādya rajanīṃ rāma vasema śubhadarśana / puṇyayoḥ saritor madhye śvas tariṣyāmahe vayam // 1.022.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tatra tapo dīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā / vijñāya paramaprītā munayo harṣam āgaman // 1.022.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arghyaṃ pādyaṃ tathātithyaṃ nivedyakuśikātmaje / rāmalakṣmaṇayoḥ paścād akurvann atithikriyām // 1.022.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satkāraṃ samanuprāpya kathābhir abhirañjayan / nyavasan susukhaṃ tatra kāmāśramapade tadā // 1.022.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prabhāte vimale kṛtāhnikam ariṃdamau / viśvāmitraṃ puraskṛtya nadyās tīram upāgatau // 1.023.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te ca sarve mahātmāno munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / upasthāpya śubhāṃ nāvaṃ viśvāmitram athābruvan // 1.023.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārohatu bhavān nāvaṃ rājaputrapuraskṛtaḥ / ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ // 1.023.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitras tathety uktvā tān ṛṣīn abhipūjya ca / tatāra sahitas tābhyāṃ saritaṃ sāgaraṃ gamām // 1.023.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rāmaḥ sarinmadhye papraccha munipuṅgavam / vāriṇo bhidyamānasya kim ayaṃ tumulo dhvaniḥ // 1.023.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā kautūhala samanvitam / kathayām āsa dharmātmā tasya śabdasya niścayam // 1.023.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kailāsaparvate rāma manasā nirmitaṃ saraḥ / brahmaṇā naraśārdūla tenedaṃ mānasaṃ saraḥ // 1.023.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt susrāva sarasaḥ sāyodhyām upagūhate / saraḥpravṛttā sarayūḥ puṇyā brahmasaraścyutā // 1.023.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāyam atulaḥ śabdo jāhnavīm abhivartate / vārisaṃkṣobhajo rāma praṇāmaṃ niyataḥ kuru // 1.023.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tābhyāṃ tu tāv ubhau kṛtvā praṇāmam atidhārmikau / tīraṃ dakṣiṇam āsādya jagmatur laghuvikramau // 1.023.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vanaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpavarātmajaḥ / aviprahatam aikṣvākaḥ papraccha munipuṃgavam // 1.023.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho vanam idaṃ durgaṃ jhillikāgaṇanāditam / bhairavaiḥ śvāpadaiḥ kīrṇaṃ śakuntair dāruṇāravaiḥ // 1.023.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāprakāraiḥ śakunair vāśyadbhir bhairavasvanaiḥ / siṃhavyāghravarāhaiś ca vāraṇaiś cāpi śobhitam // 1.023.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhavāśvakarṇakakubhair bilvatindukapāṭalaiḥ / saṃkīrṇaṃ badarībhiś ca kiṃ nv idaṃ dāruṇaṃ vanam // 1.023.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca mahātejā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / śrūyatāṃ vatsa kākutstha yasyaitad dāruṇaṃ vanam // 1.023.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etau janapadau sphītau pūrvam āstāṃ narottama / maladāś ca karūṣāś ca devanirmāṇa nirmitau // 1.023.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā vṛtravadhe rāma malena samabhiplutam / kṣudhā caiva sahasrākṣaṃ brahmahatyā yadāviśat // 1.023.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam indraṃ snāpayan devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ / kalaśaiḥ snāpayām āsur malaṃ cāsya pramocayan // 1.023.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iha bhūmyāṃ malaṃ dattvā dattvā kāruṣam eva ca / śarīrajaṃ mahendrasya tato harṣaṃ prapedire // 1.023.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirmalo niṣkarūṣaś ca śucir indro yadābhavat / dadau deśasya suprīto varaṃ prabhur anuttamam // 1.023.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau janapadau sthītau khyātiṃ loke gamiṣyataḥ / maladāś ca karūṣāś ca mamāṅgamaladhāriṇau // 1.023.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhu sādhv iti taṃ devāḥ pākaśāsanam abruvan / deśasya pūjāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtāṃ śakreṇa dhīmatā // 1.023.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etau janapadau sthītau dīrghakālam ariṃdama / maladāś ca karūṣāś ca muditau dhanadhānyataḥ // 1.023.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya cit tv atha kālasya yakṣī vai kāmarūpiṇī / balaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayantī tadā hy abhūt // 1.023.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṭakā nāma bhadraṃ te bhāryā sundasya dhīmataḥ / mārīco rākṣasaḥ putro yasyāḥ śakraparākramaḥ // 1.023.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau janapadau nityaṃ vināśayati rāghava / maladāṃś ca karūṣāṃś ca tāṭakā duṣṭacāriṇī // 1.023.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
seyaṃ panthānam āvārya vasaty atyardhayojane / ata eva ca gantavyaṃ tāṭakāyā vanaṃ yataḥ // 1.023.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svabāhubalam āśritya jahīmāṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm / manniyogād imaṃ deśaṃ kuru niṣkaṇṭakaṃ punaḥ // 1.023.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi kaś cid imaṃ deśaṃ śakroty āgantum īdṛśam / yakṣiṇyā ghorayā rāma utsāditam asahyayā // 1.023.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathaitad daruṇaṃ vanam / yakṣyā cotsāditaṃ sarvam adyāpi na nivartate // 1.023.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tasyāprameyasya muner vacanam uttamam / śrutvā puruṣaśārdūlaḥ pratyuvāca śubhāṃ giram // 1.024.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alpavīryā yadā yakṣāḥ śrūyante munipuṃgava / kathaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayaty abalā balam // 1.024.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitro 'bravīd vākyaṃ śṛṇu yena balottarā / varadānakṛtaṃ vīryaṃ dhārayaty abalā balam // 1.024.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvam āsīn mahāyakṣaḥ suketur nāma vīryavān / anapatyaḥ śubhācāraḥ sa ca tepe mahat tapaḥ // 1.024.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahas tu suprītas tasya yakṣapates tadā / kanyāratnaṃ dadau rāma tāṭakāṃ nāma nāmataḥ // 1.024.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadau nāgasahasrasya balaṃ cāsyāḥ pitāmahaḥ / na tv eva putraṃ yakṣāya dadau brahmā mahāyaśāḥ // 1.024.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tu jātāṃ vivardhantīṃ rūpayauvanaśālinīm / jambhaputrāya sundāya dadau bhāryāṃ yaśasvinīm // 1.024.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya cit tv atha kālalsya yakṣī putraṃ vyajāyata / mārīcaṃ nāma durdharṣaṃ yaḥ śāpād rākṣaso 'bhavat // 1.024.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sunde tu nihate rāma agastyam ṛṣisattamam / tāṭakā saha putreṇa pradharṣayitum icchati // 1.024.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasatvaṃ bhajasveti mārīcaṃ vyājahāra saḥ / agastyaḥ paramakruddhas tāṭakām api śaptavān // 1.024.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puruṣādī mahāyakṣī virūpā vikṛtānanā / idaṃ rūpam apahāya dāruṇaṃ rūpam astu te // 1.024.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saiṣā śāpakṛtāmarṣā tāṭakā krodhamūrchitā / deśam utsādayaty enam agastyacaritaṃ śubham // 1.024.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
enāṃ rāghava durvṛttāṃ yakṣīṃ paramadāruṇām / gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya jahi duṣṭaparākramām // 1.024.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy enāṃ śāpasaṃsṛṣṭāṃ kaś cid utsahate pumān / nihantuṃ triṣu lokeṣu tvām ṛte raghunandana // 1.024.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi te strīvadhakṛte ghṛṇā kāryā narottama / cāturvarṇyahitārthāya kartavyaṃ rājasūnunā // 1.024.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyabhāraniyuktānām eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ / adharmyāṃ jahi kākutsha dharmo hy asyā na vidyate // 1.024.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyate hi purā śakro virocanasutāṃ nṛpa / pṛthivīṃ hantum icchantīṃ mantharām abhyasūdayat // 1.024.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣṇunā ca purā rāma bhṛgupatnī dṛḍhavratā / anindraṃ lokam icchantī kāvyamātā niṣūditā // 1.024.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhī rājaputramahātmabhiḥ / adharmaniratā nāryo hatāḥ puruṣasattamaiḥ // 1.024.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muner vacanam aklībaṃ śrutvā naravarātmajaḥ / rāghavaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā pratyuvāca dṛḍhavrataḥ // 1.025.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitur vacananirdeśāt pitur vacanagauravāt / vacanaṃ kauśikasyeti kartavyam aviśaṅkayā // 1.025.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anuśiṣṭo 'smy ayodhyāyāṃ gurumadhye mahātmanā / pitrā daśarathenāhaṃ nāvajñeyaṃ ca tad vacaḥ // 1.025.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ pitur vacaḥ śrutvā śāsanād brahma vādinaḥ / kariṣyāmi na saṃdehas tāṭakāvadham uttamam // 1.025.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya deśasyāsya sukhāya ca / tava caivāprameyasya vacanaṃ kartum udyataḥ // 1.025.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā dhanurmadhye baddhvā muṣṭim ariṃdamaḥ / jyāśabdam akarot tīvraṃ diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan // 1.025.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena śabdena vitrastās tāṭakā vanavāsinaḥ / tāṭakā ca susaṃkruddhā tena śabdena mohitā // 1.025.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ śabdam abhinidhyāya rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā / śrutvā cābhyadravad vegād yataḥ śabdo viniḥsṛtaḥ // 1.025.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ kruddhāṃ vikṛtāṃ vikṛtānanām / pramāṇenātivṛddhāṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ so 'bhyabhāṣata // 1.025.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya lakṣmaṇa yakṣiṇyā bhairavaṃ dāruṇaṃ vapuḥ / bhidyeran darśanād asyā bhīrūṇāṃ hṛdayāni ca // 1.025.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
enāṃ paśya durādharṣāṃ māyā balasamanvitām / vinivṛttāṃ karomy adya hṛtakarṇāgranāsikām // 1.025.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy enām utsahe hantuṃ strīsvabhāvena rakṣitām / vīryaṃ cāsyā gatiṃ cāpi haniṣyāmīti me matiḥ // 1.025.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇe rāme tu tāṭakā krodhamūrchitā / udyamya bāhū garjantī rāmam evābhyadhāvata // 1.025.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām āpatantīṃ vegena vikrāntām aśanīm iva / śareṇorasi vivyādha sā papāta mamāra ca // 1.025.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ hatāṃ bhīmasaṃkāśāṃ dṛṣṭvā surapatis tadā / sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ surāś ca samapūjayan // 1.025.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca paramaprītaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ / surāś ca sarve saṃhṛṣṭā viśvāmitram athābruvan // 1.025.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mune kauśike bhadraṃ te sendrāḥ sarve marudgaṇāḥ / toṣitāḥ karmaṇānena snehaṃ darśaya rāghave // 1.025.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajāpater bhṛśāśvasya putrān satyaparākramān / tapobalabhṛtān brahman rāghavāya nivedaya // 1.025.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pātrabhūtaś ca te brahmaṃs tavānugamane dhṛtaḥ / kartavyaṃ ca mahat karma surāṇāṃ rājasūnunā // 1.025.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā surāḥ sarve hṛṣṭā jagmur yathāgatam / viśvāmitraṃ pūjayitvā tataḥ saṃdhyā pravartate // 1.025.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato munivaraḥ prītis tāṭakā vadhatoṣitaḥ / mūrdhni rāmam upāghrāya idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.025.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ihādya rajanīṃ rāma vasema śubhadarśana / śvaḥ prabhāte gamiṣyāmas tad āśramapadaṃ mama // 1.025.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tāṃ rajanīm uṣya viśvāmiro mahāyaśāḥ / prahasya rāghavaṃ vākyam uvāca madhurākṣaram // 1.026.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ / prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmy astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ // 1.026.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devāsuragaṇān vāpi sagandharvoragān api / yair amitrān prasahyājau vaśīkṛtya jayiṣyasi // 1.026.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni divyāni bhadraṃ te dadāmy astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ / daṇḍacakraṃ mahad divyaṃ tava dāsyāmi rāghava // 1.026.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmacakraṃ tato vīra kālacakraṃ tathaiva ca / viṣṇucakraṃ tathātyugram aindraṃ cakraṃ tathaiva ca // 1.026.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajram astraṃ naraśreṣṭha śaivaṃ śūlavaraṃ tathā / astraṃ brahmaśiraś caiva aiṣīkam api rāghava // 1.026.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadāmi te mahābāho brāhmam astram anuttamam / gade dve caiva kākutstha modakī śikharī ubhe // 1.026.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradīpte naraśārdūla prayacchāmi nṛpātmaja / dharmapāśam ahaṃ rāma kālapāśaṃ tathaiva ca // 1.026.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāruṇaṃ pāśam astraṃ ca dadāny aham anuttamam / aśanī dve prayacchāmi śuṣkārdre raghunandana // 1.026.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadāmi cāstraṃ painākam astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tathā / āgneyam astra dayitaṃ śikharaṃ nāma nāmataḥ // 1.026.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāyavyaṃ prathamaṃ nāma dadāmi tava rāghava / astraṃ hayaśiro nāma krauñcam astraṃ tathaiva ca // 1.026.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śakti dvayaṃ ca kākutstha dadāmi tava cānagha / kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ ghoraṃ kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam // 1.026.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhārayanty asurā yāni dadāmy etāni sarvaśaḥ / vaidyādharaṃ mahāstraṃ ca nandanaṃ nāma nāmataḥ // 1.026.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asiratnaṃ mahābāho dadāmi nṛvarātmaja / gāndharvam astraṃ dayitaṃ mānavaṃ nāma nāmataḥ // 1.026.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasvāpanapraśamane dadmi sauraṃ ca rāghava / darpaṇaṃ śoṣaṇaṃ caiva saṃtāpanavilāpane // 1.026.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madanaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ kandarpadayitaṃ tathā / paiśācam astraṃ dayitaṃ mohanaṃ nāma nāmataḥ // 1.026.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratīccha naraśārdūla rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ // 1.026.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāmasaṃ naraśārdūla saumanaṃ ca mahābalam / saṃvartaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ mausalaṃ ca nṛpātmaja // 1.026.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyam astraṃ mahābāho tathā māyādharaṃ param / ghoraṃ tejaḥprabhaṃ nāma paratejo'pakarṣaṇam // 1.026.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
somāstraṃ śiśiraṃ nāma tvāṣṭram astraṃ sudāmanam / dāruṇaṃ ca bhagasyāpi śīteṣum atha mānavam // 1.026.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etān nāma mahābāho kāmarūpān mahābalān / gṛhāṇa paramodārān kṣipram eva nṛpātmaja // 1.026.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthitas tu prāṅmukho bhūtvā śucir nivaratas tadā / dadau rāmāya suprīto mantragrāmam anuttamam // 1.026.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
japatas tu munes tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ / upatasthur mahārhāṇi sarvāṇy astrāṇi rāghavam // 1.026.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūcuś ca muditā rāmaṃ sarve prāñjalayas tadā / ime sma paramodāra kiṃkarās tava rāghava // 1.026.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya ca kākutsthaḥ samālabhya ca pāṇinā / manasā me bhaviṣyadhvam iti tāny abhyacodayat // 1.026.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prītamanā rāmo viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim / abhivādya mahātejā gamanāyopacakrame // 1.026.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya tato 'strāṇi prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śuciḥ / gacchann eva ca kākutstho viśvāmitram athābravīt // 1.027.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhītāstro 'smi bhagavan durādharṣaḥ surair api / astrāṇāṃ tv aham icchāmi saṃhāraṃ munipuṃgava // 1.027.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / saṃhāraṃ vyājahārātha dhṛtimān suvrataḥ śuciḥ // 1.027.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyavantaṃ satyakīrtiṃ dhṛṣṭaṃ rabhasam eva ca / pratihārataraṃ nāma parāṅmukham avāṅmukham // 1.027.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣākṣaviṣamau caiva dṛḍhanābhasunābhakau / daśākṣaśatavaktrau ca daśaśīrṣaśatodarau // 1.027.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmanābhamahānābhau dundunābhasunābhakau / jyotiṣaṃ kṛśanaṃ caiva nairāśya vimalāv ubhau // 1.027.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaugandharaharidrau ca daityapramathanau tathā / pitryaṃ saumanasaṃ caiva vidhūtamakarāv ubhau // 1.027.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karavīrakaraṃ caiva dhanadhānyau ca rāghava / kāmarūpaṃ kāmaruciṃ moham āvaraṇaṃ tathā // 1.027.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jṛmbhakaṃ sarvanābhaṃ ca santānavaraṇau tathā / bhṛśāśvatanayān rāma bhāsvarān kāmarūpiṇaḥ // 1.027.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratīccha mama bhadraṃ te pātrabhūto 'si rāghava / divyabhāsvaradehāś ca mūrtimantaḥ sukhapradāḥ // 1.027.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaṃ prāñjalayo bhūtvābruvan madhurabhāṣiṇaḥ / ime sma naraśārdūla śādhi kiṃ karavāma te // 1.027.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamyatām iti tān āha yatheṣṭaṃ raghunandanaḥ / mānasāḥ kāryakāleṣu sāhāyyaṃ me kariṣyatha // 1.027.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha te rāmam āmantrya kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam / evam astv iti kākutstham uktvā jagmur yathāgatam // 1.027.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca tān rāghavo jñātvā viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim / gacchann evātha madhuraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.027.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nv etan meghasaṃkāśaṃ parvatasyāvidūrataḥ / vṛkṣaṣaṇḍam ito bhāti paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // 1.027.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśanīyaṃ mṛgākīrṇaṃ manoharam atīva ca / nānāprakāraiḥ śakunair valgubhāṣair alaṃkṛtam // 1.027.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niḥsṛtāḥ sma muniśreṣṭha kāntārād romaharṣaṇāt / anayā tv avagacchāmi deśasya sukhavattayā // 1.027.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan kasyāśramapadaṃ tv idam / saṃprāptā yatra te pāpā brahmaghnā duṣṭacāriṇaḥ // 1.027.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tasyāprameyasya tad vanaṃ paripṛcchataḥ / viśvāmitro mahātejā vyākhyātum upacakrame // 1.028.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa pūrvāśramo rāma vāmanasya mahātmanaḥ / siddhāśrama iti khyātaḥ siddho hy atra mahātapāḥ // 1.028.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn eva kāle tu rājā vairocanir baliḥ / nirjitya daivatagaṇān sendrāṃś ca samarudgaṇān // 1.028.003.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kārayām āsa tad rājyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ // 1.028.003.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bales tu yajamānasya devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ / samāgamya svayaṃ caiva viṣṇum ūcur ihāśrame // 1.028.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balir vairocanir viṣṇo yajate yajñam uttamam / asamāpte kratau tasmin svakāryam abhipadyatām // 1.028.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye cainam abhivartante yācitāra itas tataḥ / yac ca yatra yathāvac ca sarvaṃ tebhyaḥ prayacchati // 1.028.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ surahitārthāya māyāyogam upāśritaḥ / vāmanatvaṃ gato viṣṇo kuru kalyāṇam uttamam // 1.028.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ siddhāśramo nāma prasādāt te bhaviṣyati / siddhe karmaṇi deveśa uttiṣṭha bhagavann itaḥ // 1.028.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha viṣṇur mahātejā adityāṃ samajāyata / vāmanaṃ rūpam āsthāya vairocanim upāgamat // 1.028.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trīn kramān atha bhikṣitvā pratigṛhya ca mānataḥ / ākramya lokāṃl lokātmā sarvabhūtahite rataḥ // 1.028.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahendrāya punaḥ prādān niyamya balim ojasā / trailokyaṃ sa mahātejāś cakre śakravaśaṃ punaḥ // 1.028.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenaiṣa pūrvam ākrānta āśramaḥ śramanāśanaḥ / mayāpi bhaktyā tasyaiṣa vāmanasyopabhujyate // 1.028.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etam āśramam āyānti rākṣasā vighnakāriṇaḥ / atra te puruṣavyāghra hantavyā duṣṭacāriṇaḥ // 1.028.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya gacchāmahe rāma siddhāśramam anuttamam / tad āśramapadaṃ tāta tavāpy etad yathā mama // 1.028.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ sarve siddhāśramanivāsinaḥ / utpatyotpatya sahasā viśvāmitram apūjayan // 1.028.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathārhaṃ cakrire pūjāṃ viśvāmitrāya dhīmate / tathaiva rājaputrābhyām akurvann atithikriyām // 1.028.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muhūrtam atha viśrāntau rājaputrāv ariṃdamau / prāñjalī muniśārdūlam ūcatū raghunandanau // 1.028.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyaiva dīkṣāṃ praviśa bhadraṃ te munipuṃgava / siddhāśramo 'yaṃ siddhaḥ syāt satyam astu vacas tava // 1.028.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto mahātejā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / praviveśa tadā dīkṣāṃ niyato niyatendriyaḥ // 1.028.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumārāv api tāṃ rātrim uṣitvā susamāhitau / prabhātakāle cotthāya viśvāmitram avandatām // 1.028.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tau deśakālajñau rājaputrāv ariṃdamau / deśe kāle ca vākyajñāv abrūtāṃ kauśikaṃ vacaḥ // 1.029.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavañ śrotum icchāvo yasmin kāle niśācarau / saṃrakṣaṇīyau tau brahman nātivarteta tatkṣaṇam // 1.029.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇau kākutsthau tvaramāṇau yuyutsayā / sarve te munayaḥ prītāḥ praśaśaṃsur nṛpātmajau // 1.029.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya prabhṛti ṣaḍrātraṃ rakṣataṃ rāghavau yuvām / dīkṣāṃ gato hy eṣa munir maunitvaṃ ca gamiṣyati // 1.029.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tu tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrau yaśasvinau / anidrau ṣaḍahorātraṃ tapovanam arakṣatām // 1.029.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāsāṃ cakratur vīrau yattau paramadhanvinau / rarakṣatur munivaraṃ viśvāmitram ariṃdamau // 1.029.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha kāle gate tasmin ṣaṣṭhe 'hani samāgate / saumitram abravīd rāmo yatto bhava samāhitaḥ // 1.029.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasyaivaṃ bruvāṇasya tvaritasya yuyutsayā / prajajvāla tato vediḥ sopādhyāyapurohitā // 1.029.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantravac ca yathānyāyaṃ yajño 'sau saṃpravartate / ākāśe ca mahāñ śabdaḥ prādur āsīd bhayānakaḥ // 1.029.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āvārya gaganaṃ megho yathā prāvṛṣi nirgataḥ / tathā māyāṃ vikurvāṇau rākṣasāv abhyadhāvatām // 1.029.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca tayor anucarās tathā / āgamya bhīmasaṃkāśā rudhiraughān avāsṛjan // 1.029.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv āpatantau sahasā dṛṣṭvā rājīvalocanaḥ / lakṣmaṇaṃ tv abhisaṃprekṣya rāmo vacanam abravīt // 1.029.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya lakṣmaṇa durvṛttān rākṣasān piśitāśanān / mānavāstrasamādhūtān anilena yathāghanān // 1.029.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānavaṃ paramodāram astraṃ paramabhāsvaram / cikṣepa paramakruddho mārīcor asi rāghavaḥ // 1.029.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tena paramāstreṇa mānavena samāhitaḥ / saṃpūrṇaṃ yojanaśataṃ kṣiptaḥ sāgarasaṃplave // 1.029.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicetanaṃ vighūrṇantaṃ śīteṣubalapīḍitam / nirastaṃ dṛśya mārīcaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // 1.029.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya lakṣmaṇa śīteṣuṃ mānavaṃ dharmasaṃhitam / mohayitvā nayaty enaṃ na ca prāṇair viyujyate // 1.029.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imān api vadhiṣyāmi nirghṛṇān duṣṭacāriṇaḥ / rākṣasān pāpakarmasthān yajñaghnān rudhirāśanān // 1.029.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vigṛhya sumahac cāstram āgneyaṃ raghunandanaḥ / subāhur asi cikṣepa sa viddhaḥ prāpatad bhuvi // 1.029.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śeṣān vāyavyam ādāya nijaghāna mahāyaśāḥ / rāghavaḥ paramodāro munīnāṃ mudam āvahan // 1.029.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hatvā rākṣasān sarvān yajñaghnān raghunandanaḥ / ṛṣibhiḥ pūjitas tatra yathendro vijaye purā // 1.029.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha yajñe samāpte tu viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / nirītikā diśo dṛṣṭvā kākutstham idam abravīt // 1.029.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtārtho 'smi mahābāho kṛtaṃ guruvacas tvayā / siddhāśramam idaṃ satyaṃ kṛtaṃ rāma mahāyaśaḥ // 1.029.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tāṃ rajanīṃ tatra kṛtārthau rāmalakṣaṇau / ūṣatur muditau vīrau prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā // 1.030.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ kṛtapaurvāhṇikakriyau / viśvāmitram ṛṣīṃś cānyān sahitāv abhijagmatuḥ // 1.030.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādya muniśreṣṭhaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam / ūcatur madhurodāraṃ vākyaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇau // 1.030.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau svo muniśārdūla kiṃkarau samupasthitau / ājñāpaya yatheṣṭaṃ vai śāsanaṃ karavāva kim // 1.030.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukte tatas tābhyāṃ sarva eva maharṣayaḥ / viśvāmitraṃ puraskṛtya rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan // 1.030.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maithilasya naraśreṣṭha janakasya bhaviṣyati / yajñaḥ paramadharmiṣṭhas tatra yāsyāmahe vayam // 1.030.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ caiva naraśārdūla sahāsmābhir gamiṣyasi / adbhutaṃ ca dhanūratnaṃ tatra tvaṃ draṣṭum arhasi // 1.030.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dhi pūrvaṃ naraśreṣṭha dattaṃ sadasi daivataiḥ / aprameyabalaṃ ghoraṃ makhe paramabhāsvaram // 1.030.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāsya devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ / kartum āropaṇaṃ śaktā na kathaṃ cana mānuṣāḥ // 1.030.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanuṣas tasya vīryaṃ hi jijñāsanto mahīkṣitaḥ / na śekur āropayituṃ rājaputrā mahābalāḥ // 1.030.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dhanur naraśārdūla maithilasya mahātmanaḥ / tatra drakṣyasi kākutstha yajñaṃ cādbhutadarśanam // 1.030.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dhi yajñaphalaṃ tena maithilenottamaṃ dhanuḥ / yācitaṃ naraśārdūla sunābhaṃ sarvadaivataiḥ // 1.030.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā munivaraḥ prasthānam akarot tadā / sarṣisaṃghaḥ sakākutstha āmantrya vanadevatāḥ // 1.030.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svasti vo 'stu gamiṣyāmi siddhaḥ siddhāśramād aham / uttare jāhnavītīre himavantaṃ śiloccayam // 1.030.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā siddhāśramam anuttamam / uttarāṃ diśam uddiśya prasthātum upacakrame // 1.030.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ vrajantaṃ munivaram anvagād anusāriṇām / śakaṭī śatamātraṃ tu prayāṇe brahmavādinām // 1.030.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛgapakṣigaṇāś caiva siddhāśramanivāsinaḥ / anujagmur mahātmānaṃ viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim // 1.030.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare / vāsaṃ cakrur munigaṇāḥ śoṇākūle samāhitāḥ // 1.030.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te 'staṃ gate dinakare snātvā hutahutāśanāḥ / viśvāmitraṃ puraskṛtya niṣedur amitaujasaḥ // 1.030.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo 'pi sahasaumitrir munīṃs tān abhipūjya ca / agrato niṣasādātha viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ // 1.030.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rāmo mahātejā viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim / papraccha muniśārdūlaṃ kautūhalasamanvitaḥ // 1.030.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan ko nv ayaṃ deśaḥ samṛddhavanaśobhitaḥ / śrotum icchāmi bhadraṃ te vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ // 1.030.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
codito rāmavākyena kathayām āsa suvrataḥ / tasya deśasya nikhilam ṛṣimadhye mahātapāḥ // 1.030.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmayonir mahān āsīt kuśo nāma mahātapāḥ / vaidarbhyāṃ janayām āsa caturaḥ sadṛśān sutān // 1.031.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśāmbaṃ kuśanābhaṃ ca ādhūrta rajasaṃ vasum / dīptiyuktān mahotsāhān kṣatradharmacikīrṣayā // 1.031.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān uvāca kuśaḥ putrān dharmiṣṭhān satyavādinaḥ // 1.031.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśasya vacanaṃ śrutvā catvāro lokasaṃmatāḥ / niveśaṃ cakrire sarve purāṇāṃ nṛvarās tadā // 1.031.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśāmbas tu mahātejāḥ kauśāmbīm akarot purīm / kuśanābhas tu dharmātmā paraṃ cakre mahodayam // 1.031.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādhūrtarajaso rāma dharmāraṇyaṃ mahīpatiḥ / cakre puravaraṃ rājā vasuś cakre girivrajam // 1.031.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā vasumatī rāma vasos tasya mahātmanaḥ / ete śailavarāḥ pañca prakāśante samantataḥ // 1.031.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumāgadhī nadī ramyā māgadhān viśrutāyayau / pañcānāṃ śailamukhyānāṃ madhye māleva śobhate // 1.031.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saiṣā hi māgadhī rāma vasos tasya mahātmanaḥ / pūrvābhicaritā rāma sukṣetrā sasyamālinī // 1.031.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśanābhas tu rājarṣiḥ kanyāśatam anuttamam / janayām āsa dharmātmā ghṛtācyāṃ raghunandana // 1.031.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tās tu yauvanaśālinyo rūpavatyaḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ / udyānabhūmim āgamya prāvṛṣīva śatahradāḥ // 1.031.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gāyantyo nṛtyamānāś ca vādayantyaś ca rāghava / āmodaṃ paramaṃ jagmur varābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ // 1.031.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tāś cārusarvāṅgyo rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi / udyānabhūmim āgamya tārā iva ghanāntare // 1.031.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāḥ sarvaguṇasaṃpannā rūpayauvanasaṃyutāḥ / dṛṣṭvā sarvātmako vāyur idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.031.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ vaḥ kāmaye sarvā bhāryā mama bhaviṣyatha / mānuṣas tyajyatāṃ bhāvo dīrgham āyur avāpsyatha // 1.031.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāyor akliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / apahāsya tato vākyaṃ kanyāśatam athābravīt // 1.031.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antaś carasi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ surottama / prabhāvajñāś ca te sarvāḥ kim asmān avamanyase // 1.031.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśanābhasutāḥ sarvāḥ samarthās tvāṃ surottama / sthānāc cyāvayituṃ devaṃ rakṣāmas tu tapo vayam // 1.031.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā bhūt sa kālo durmedhaḥ pitaraṃ satyavādinam / nāvamanyasva dharmeṇa svayaṃvaram upāsmahe // 1.031.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitā hi prabhur asmākaṃ daivataṃ paramaṃ hi saḥ / yasya no dāsyati pitā sa no bhartā bhaviṣyati // 1.031.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāyuḥ paramakopanaḥ / praviśya sarvagātrāṇi babhañja bhagavān prabhuḥ // 1.031.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāḥ kanyā vāyunā bhagnā viviśur nṛpater gṛham / dṛṣṭvā bhagnās tadā rājā saṃbhrānta idam abravīt // 1.031.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim idaṃ kathyatāṃ putryaḥ ko dharmam avamanyate / kubjāḥ kena kṛtāḥ sarvā veṣṭantyo nābhibhāṣatha // 1.031.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ / śirobhiś caraṇau spṛṣṭvā kanyāśatam abhāṣata // 1.032.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāyuḥ sarvātmako rājan pradharṣayitum icchati / aśubhaṃ mārgam āsthāya na dharmaṃ pratyavekṣate // 1.032.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitṛmatyaḥ sma bhadraṃ te svacchande na vayaṃ sthitāḥ / pitaraṃ no vṛṇīṣva tvaṃ yadi no dāsyate tava // 1.032.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena pāpānubandhena vacanaṃ na pratīcchatā / evaṃ bruvantyaḥ sarvāḥ sma vāyunā nihatā bhṛṣam // 1.032.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā paramadhārmikaḥ / pratyuvāca mahātejāḥ kanyāśatam anuttamam // 1.032.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣāntaṃ kṣamāvatāṃ putryaḥ kartavyaṃ sumahat kṛtam / aikamatyam upāgamya kulaṃ cāvekṣitaṃ mama // 1.032.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaṃkāro hi nārīṇāṃ kṣamā tu puruṣasya vā / duṣkaraṃ tac ca vaḥ kṣāntaṃ tridaśeṣu viśeṣataḥ // 1.032.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yādṛśīr vaḥ kṣamā putryaḥ sarvāsām aviśeṣataḥ / kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ ca putrikāḥ // 1.032.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣamā yaśaḥ kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamāyāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat / visṛjya kanyāḥ kākutstha rājā tridaśavikramaḥ // 1.032.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantrajño mantrayām āsa pradānaṃ saha mantribhiḥ / deśe kāle pradānasya sadṛśe pratipādanam // 1.032.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn eva kāle tu cūlī nāma mahāmuniḥ / ūrdhvaretāḥ śubhācāro brāhmaṃ tapa upāgamat // 1.032.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapyantaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tatra gandharvī paryupāsate / somadā nāma bhadraṃ te ūrmilā tanayā tadā // 1.032.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā ca taṃ praṇatā bhūtvā śuśrūṣaṇaparāyaṇā / uvāsa kāle dharmiṣṭhā tasyās tuṣṭo 'bhavad guruḥ // 1.032.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca tāṃ kālayogena provāca raghunandana / parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te kiṃ karomi tava priyam // 1.032.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parituṣṭaṃ muniṃ jñātvā gandharvī madhurasvaram / uvāca paramaprītā vākyajñā vākyakovidam // 1.032.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmyā samudito brāhmyā brahmabhūto mahātapāḥ / brāhmeṇa tapasā yuktaṃ putram icchāmi dhārmikam // 1.032.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apatiś cāsmi bhadraṃ te bhāryā cāsmi na kasya cit / brāhmeṇopagatāyāś ca dātum arhasi me sutam // 1.032.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāḥ prasanno brahmarṣir dadau putram anuttamam / brahmadatta iti khyātaṃ mānasaṃ cūlinaḥ sutam // 1.032.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā brahmadattas tu purīm adhyavasat tadā / kāmpilyāṃ parayā lakṣmyā devarājo yathā divam // 1.032.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa buddhiṃ kṛtavān rājā kuśanābhaḥ sudhārmikaḥ / brahmadattāya kākutstha dātuṃ kanyāśataṃ tadā // 1.032.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āhūya mahātejā brahmadattaṃ mahīpatiḥ / dadau kanyāśataṃ rājā suprītenāntarātmanā // 1.032.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathākramaṃ tataḥ pāṇiṃ jagrāha raghunandana / brahmadatto mahī pālas tāsāṃ devapatir yathā // 1.032.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
spṛṣṭamātre tataḥ pāṇau vikubjā vigatajvarāḥ / yuktāḥ paramayā lakṣmyā babhuḥ kanyāśataṃ tadā // 1.032.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā vāyunā muktāḥ kuśanābho mahīpatiḥ / babhūva paramaprīto harṣaṃ lebhe punaḥ punaḥ // 1.032.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtodvāhaṃ tu rājānaṃ brahmadattaṃ mahīpatiḥ / sadāraṃ preṣayām āsa sopādhyāya gaṇaṃ tadā // 1.032.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
somadāpi susaṃhṛṣṭā putrasya sadṛśīṃ kriyām / yathānyāyaṃ ca gandharvī snuṣās tāḥ pratyanandata // 1.032.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtodvāhe gate tasmin brahmadatte ca rāghava / aputraḥ putralābhāya pautrīm iṣṭim akalpayat // 1.033.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iṣṭyāṃ tu vartamānāyāṃ kuśanābhaṃ mahīpatim / uvāca paramaprītaḥ kuśo brahmasutas tadā // 1.033.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putras te sadṛśaḥ putra bhaviṣyati sudhārmikaḥ / gādhiṃ prāpsyasi tena tvaṃ kīrtiṃ loke ca śāśvatīm // 1.033.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā kuśo rāma kuśanābhaṃ mahīpatim / jagāmākāśam āviśya brahmalokaṃ sanātanam // 1.033.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya cit tv atha kālasya kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ / jajñe paramadharmiṣṭho gādhir ity eva nāmataḥ // 1.033.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pitā mama kākutstha gādhiḥ paramadhārmikaḥ / kuśavaṃśaprasūto 'smi kauśiko raghunandana // 1.033.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvajā bhaginī cāpi mama rāghava suvratā / nāmnā satyavatī nāma ṛcīke pratipāditā // 1.033.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saśarīrā gatā svargaṃ bhartāram anuvartinī / kauśikī paramodārā sā pravṛttā mahānadī // 1.033.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyā puṇyodakā ramyā himavantam upāśritā / lokasya hitakāmārthaṃ pravṛttā bhaginī mama // 1.033.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ himavatpārśve vasāmi niyataḥ sukham / bhaginyāḥ snehasaṃyuktaḥ kauśikyā raghunandana // 1.033.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tu satyavatī puṇyā satye dharme pratiṣṭhitā / pativratā mahābhāgā kauśikī saritāṃ varā // 1.033.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ hi niyamād rāma hitvā tāṃ samupāgataḥ / siddhāśramam anuprāpya siddho 'smi tava tejasā // 1.033.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā rāma mamotpattiḥ svasya vaṃśasya kīrtitā / deśasya ca mahābāho yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // 1.033.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gato 'rdharātraḥ kākutstha kathāḥ kathayato mama / nidrām abhyehi bhadraṃ te mā bhūd vighno 'dhvanīha naḥ // 1.033.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣpandās taravaḥ sarve nilīnā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / naiśena tamasā vyāptā diśaś ca raghunandana // 1.033.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śanair viyujyate saṃdhyā nabho netrair ivāvṛtam / nakṣatratārāgahanaṃ jyotirbhir avabhāsate // 1.033.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttiṣṭhati ca śītāṃśuḥ śaśī lokatamonudaḥ / hlādayan prāṇināṃ loke manāṃsi prabhayā vibho // 1.033.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiśāni sarvabhūtāni pracaranti tatas tataḥ / yakṣarākṣasasaṃghāś ca raudrāś ca piśitāśanāḥ // 1.033.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātejā virarāma mahāmuniḥ / sādhu sādhv iti taṃ sarve munayo hy abhyapūjayan // 1.033.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo 'pi saha saumitriḥ kiṃ cid āgatavismayaḥ / praśasya muniśārdūlaṃ nidrāṃ samupasevate // 1.033.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāsya rātriśeṣaṃ tu śoṇākūle maharṣibhiḥ / niśāyāṃ suprabhātāyāṃ viśvāmitro 'bhyabhāṣata // 1.034.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suprabhātā niśā rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate / uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te gamanāyābhirocaya // 1.034.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā paurvāhṇikīṃ kriyām / gamanaṃ rocayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // 1.034.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ śoṇaḥ śubhajalo gādhaḥ pulinamaṇḍitaḥ / katareṇa pathā brahman saṃtariṣyāmahe vayam // 1.034.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa viśvāmitro 'bravīd idam / eṣa panthā mayoddiṣṭo yena yānti maharṣayaḥ // 1.034.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ gate 'rdhadivase tadā / jāhnavīṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ dadṛśur munisevitām // 1.034.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇyasalilāṃ haṃsasārasasevitām / babhūvur muditāḥ sarve munayaḥ saharāghavāḥ // 1.034.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyās tīre tataś cakrus te āvāsaparigraham // 1.034.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ snātvā yathānyāyaṃ saṃtarpya pitṛdevatāḥ / hutvā caivāgnihotrāṇi prāśya cāmṛtavad dhaviḥ // 1.034.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viviśur jāhnavītīre śucau muditamānasāḥ / viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānaṃ parivārya samantataḥ // 1.034.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃprahṛṣṭamanā rāmo viśvāmitram athābravīt / bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi gaṅgāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm // 1.034.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trailokyaṃ katham ākramya gatā nadanadīpatim // 1.034.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
codito rāma vākyena viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / vṛddhiṃ janma ca gaṅgāyā vaktum evopacakrame // 1.034.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailendro himavān nāma dhātūnām ākaro mahān / tasya kanyā dvayaṃ rāma rūpeṇāpratimaṃ bhuvi // 1.034.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā meruduhitā rāma tayor mātā sumadhyamā / nāmnā menā manojñā vai patnī himavataḥ priyā // 1.034.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṃ gaṅgeyam abhavaj jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā / umā nāma dvitīyābhūt kanyā tasyaiva rāghava // 1.034.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha jyeṣṭhāṃ surāḥ sarve devatārthacikīrṣayā / śailendraṃ varayām āsur gaṅgāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm // 1.034.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadau dharmeṇa himavāṃs tanayāṃ lokapāvanīm / svacchandapathagāṃ gaṅgāṃ trailokyahitakāmyayā // 1.034.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya trilokārthaṃ trilokahitakāriṇaḥ / gaṅgām ādāya te 'gacchan kṛtārthenāntarātmanā // 1.034.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā cānyā śailaduhitā kanyāsīd raghunandana / ugraṃ sā vratam āsthāya tapas tepe tapodhanā // 1.034.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ugreṇa tapasā yuktāṃ dadau śailavaraḥ sutām / rudrāyāpratirūpāya umāṃ lokanamaskṛtām // 1.034.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete te śaila rājasya sute lokanamaskṛte / gaṅgā ca saritāṃ śreṣṭhā umā devī ca rāghava // 1.034.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat te dharmam ākhyātaṃ yathā tripathagā nadī / khaṃ gatā prathamaṃ tāta gatiṃ gatimatāṃ vara // 1.034.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ukta vākye munau tasminn ubhau rāghavalakṣmaṇau / pratinandya kathāṃ vīrāv ūcatur munipuṃgavam // 1.035.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmayuktam idaṃ brahman kathitaṃ paramaṃ tvayā / duhituḥ śailarājasya jyeṣṭhāya vaktum arhasi // 1.035.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vistaraṃ vistarajño 'si divyamānuṣasaṃbhavam / trīn patho hetunā kena pāvayel lokapāvanī // 1.035.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ gaṅgāṃ tripathagā viśrutā sariduttamā / triṣu lokeṣu dharmajña karmabhiḥ kaiḥ samanvitā // 1.035.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā bruvati kākutsthe viśvāmitras tapodhanaḥ / nikhilena kathāṃ sarvām ṛṣimadhye nyavedayat // 1.035.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā rāma kṛtodvāhaḥ śitikaṇṭho mahātapāḥ / dṛṣṭvā ca spṛhayā devīṃ maithunāyopacakrame // 1.035.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śitikaṇṭhasya devasya divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ gatam / na cāpi tanayo rāma tasyām āsīt paraṃtapa // 1.035.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ samudvignāḥ pitāmahapurogamāḥ / yad ihotpadyate bhūtaṃ kas tat pratisahiṣyate // 1.035.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhigamya surāḥ sarve praṇipatyedam abruvan / devadeva mahādeva lokasyāsya hite rata // 1.035.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
surāṇāṃ praṇipātena prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // 1.035.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na lokā dhārayiṣyanti tava tejaḥ surottama / brāhmeṇa tapasā yukto devyā saha tapaś cara // 1.035.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trailokyahitakāmārthaṃ tejas tejasi dhāraya / rakṣa sarvān imāṃl lokān nālokaṃ kartum arhasi // 1.035.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devatānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sarvalokamaheśvaraḥ / bāḍham ity abravīt sarvān punaś cedam uvāca ha // 1.035.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tejas tejasy eva sahomayā / tridaśāḥ pṛthivī caiva nirvāṇam adhigacchatu // 1.035.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad idaṃ kṣubhitaṃ sthānān mama tejo hy anuttamam / dhārayiṣyati kas tan me bruvantu surasattamāḥ // 1.035.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktās tato devāḥ pratyūcur vṛṣabhadhvajam / yat tejaḥ kṣubhitaṃ hy etat tad dharā dhārayiṣyati // 1.035.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ surapatiḥ pramumoca mahītale / tejasā pṛthivī yena vyāptā sagirikānanā // 1.035.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ punar idam ūcuś cātha hutāśanam / praviśa tvaṃ mahātejo raudraṃ vāyusamanvitaḥ // 1.035.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad agninā punar vyāptaṃ saṃjātaḥ śvetaparvataḥ / divyaṃ śaravaṇaṃ caiva pāvakādityasaṃnibham // 1.035.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatra jāto mahātejāḥ kārtikeyo 'gnisaṃbhavaḥ // 1.035.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athomāṃ ca śivaṃ caiva devāḥ sarṣi gaṇās tadā / pūjayām āsur atyarthaṃ suprītamanasas tataḥ // 1.035.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha śaila sutā rāma tridaśān idam abravīt / samanyur aśapat sarvān krodhasaṃraktalocanā // 1.035.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmān nivāritā caiva saṃgatā putrakāmyayā / apatyaṃ sveṣu dāreṣu notpādayitum arhatha // 1.035.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya prabhṛti yuṣmākam aprajāḥ santu patnayaḥ // 1.035.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā surān sarvāñ śaśāpa pṛthivīm api / avane naikarūpā tvaṃ bahubhāryā bhaviṣyasi // 1.035.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca putrakṛtāṃ prītiṃ matkrodhakaluṣī kṛtā / prāpsyasi tvaṃ sudurmedhe mama putram anicchatī // 1.035.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān sarvān vrīḍitān dṛṣṭvā surān surapatis tadā / gamanāyopacakrāma diśaṃ varuṇapālitām // 1.035.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā tapa ātiṣṭhat pārśve tasyottare gireḥ / himavatprabhave śṛṅge saha devyā maheśvaraḥ // 1.035.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa te vistaro rāma śailaputryā niveditaḥ / gaṅgāyāḥ prabhavaṃ caiva śṛṇu me sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // 1.035.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapyamāne tapo deve devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā / senāpatim abhīpsantaḥ pitāmaham upāgaman // 1.036.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bruvan surāḥ sarve bhagavantaṃ pitāmaham / praṇipatya śubhaṃ vākyaṃ sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ // 1.036.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo naḥ senāpatir deva datto bhagavatā purā / sa tapaḥ param āsthāya tapyate sma sahomayā // 1.036.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad atrānantaraṃ kāryaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā / saṃvidhatsva vidhānajña tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ // 1.036.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devatānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sarvalokapitāmahaḥ / sāntvayan madhurair vākyais tridaśān idam abravīt // 1.036.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailaputryā yad uktaṃ tan na prajāsyatha patniṣu / tasyā vacanam akliṣṭaṃ satyam eva na saṃśayaḥ // 1.036.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyam ākāśagā gaṅgā yasyāṃ putraṃ hutāśanaḥ / janayiṣyati devānāṃ senāpatim ariṃdamam // 1.036.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyeṣṭhā śailendraduhitā mānayiṣyati taṃ sutam / umāyās tad bahumataṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // 1.036.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtārthā raghunandana / praṇipatya surāḥ sarve pitāmaham apūjayan // 1.036.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gatvā parvataṃ rāma kailāsaṃ dhātumaṇḍitam / agniṃ niyojayām āsuḥ putrārthaṃ sarvadevatāḥ // 1.036.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devakāryam idaṃ deva samādhatsva hutāśana / śailaputryāṃ mahātejo gaṅgāyāṃ teja utsṛja // 1.036.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devatānāṃ pratijñāya gaṅgām abhyetya pāvakaḥ / garbhaṃ dhāraya vai devi devatānām idaṃ priyam // 1.036.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā divyaṃ rūpam adhārayat / sa tasyā mahimāṃ dṛṣṭvā samantād avakīryata // 1.036.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samantatas tadā devīm abhyaṣiñcata pāvakaḥ / sarvasrotāṃsi pūrṇāni gaṅgāyā raghunandana // 1.036.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca tato gaṅgā sarvadevapurohitam / aśaktā dhāraṇe deva tava tejaḥ samuddhatam // 1.036.015.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dahyamānāgninā tena saṃpravyathitacetanā // 1.036.015.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīd idaṃ gaṅgāṃ sarvadevahutāśanaḥ / iha haimavate pāde garbho 'yaṃ saṃniveśyatām // 1.036.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tv agnivaco gaṅgā taṃ garbham atibhāsvaram / utsasarja mahātejāḥ srotobhyo hi tadānagha // 1.036.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad asyā nirgataṃ tasmāt taptajāmbūnadaprabham / kāñcanaṃ dharaṇīṃ prāptaṃ hiraṇyam amalaṃ śubham // 1.036.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāmraṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ caiva taikṣṇyād evābhijāyata / malaṃ tasyābhavat tatra trapusīsakam eva ca // 1.036.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad etad dharaṇīṃ prāpya nānādhātur avardhata // 1.036.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nikṣiptamātre garbhe tu tejobhir abhirañjitam / sarvaṃ parvatasaṃnaddhaṃ sauvarṇam abhavad vanam // 1.036.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jātarūpam iti khyātaṃ tadā prabhṛti rāghava / suvarṇaṃ puruṣavyāghra hutāśanasamaprabham // 1.036.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ kumāraṃ tato jātaṃ sendrāḥ sahamarudgaṇāḥ / kṣīrasaṃbhāvanārthāya kṛttikāḥ samayojayan // 1.036.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāḥ kṣīraṃ jātamātrasya kṛtvā samayam uttamam / daduḥ putro 'yam asmākaṃ sarvāsām iti niścitāḥ // 1.036.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ kārtikeya iti bruvan / putras trailokya vikhyāto bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // 1.036.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā skannaṃ garbhaparisrave / snāpayan parayā lakṣmyā dīpyamānam ivānalam // 1.036.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
skanda ity abruvan devāḥ skannaṃ garbhaparisravāt / kārtikeyaṃ mahābhāgaṃ kākutsthajvalanopamam // 1.036.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prādurbhūtaṃ tataḥ kṣīraṃ kṛttikānām anuttamam / ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaḍānano bhūtvā jagrāha stanajaṃ payaḥ // 1.036.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhītvā kṣīram ekāhnā sukumāra vapus tadā / ajayat svena vīryeṇa daityasainyagaṇān vibhuḥ // 1.036.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
surasenāgaṇapatiṃ tatas tam amaladyutim / abhyaṣiñcan suragaṇāḥ sametyāgnipurogamāḥ // 1.036.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyā vistaro 'bhihito mayā / kumārasaṃbhavaś caiva dhanyaḥ puṇyas tathaiva ca // 1.036.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ kathāṃ kauśiko rāme nivedya madhurākṣaram / punar evāparaṃ vākyaṃ kākutstham idam abravīt // 1.037.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyādhipatiḥ śūraḥ pūrvam āsīn narādhipaḥ / sagaro nāma dharmātmā prajākāmaḥ sa cāprajaḥ // 1.037.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidarbhaduhitā rāma keśinī nāma nāmataḥ / jyeṣṭhā sagarapatnī sā dharmiṣṭhā satyavādinī // 1.037.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ariṣṭanemiduhitā rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi / dvitīyā sagarasyāsīt patnī sumatisaṃjñitā // 1.037.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tābhyāṃ saha tadā rājā patnībhyāṃ taptavāṃs tapaḥ / himavantaṃ samāsādya bhṛguprasravaṇe girau // 1.037.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha varṣa śate pūrṇe tapasārādhito muniḥ / sagarāya varaṃ prādād bhṛguḥ satyavatāṃ varaḥ // 1.037.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apatyalābhaḥ sumahān bhaviṣyati tavānagha / kīrtiṃ cāpratimāṃ loke prāpsyase puruṣarṣabha // 1.037.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekā janayitā tāta putraṃ vaṃśakaraṃ tava / ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇi aparā janayiṣyati // 1.037.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāṣamāṇaṃ naravyāghraṃ rājapatnyau prasādya tam / ūcatuḥ paramaprīte kṛtāñjalipuṭe tadā // 1.037.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekaḥ kasyāḥ suto brahman kā bahūñ janayiṣyati / śrotum icchāvahe brahman satyam astu vacas tava // 1.037.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhṛguḥ parama dhārmikaḥ / uvāca paramāṃ vāṇīṃ svacchando 'tra vidhīyatām // 1.037.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eko vaṃśakaro vāstu bahavo vā mahābalāḥ / kīrtimanto mahotsāhāḥ kā vā kaṃ varam icchati // 1.037.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
munes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā keśinī raghunandana / putraṃ vaṃśakaraṃ rāma jagrāha nṛpasaṃnidhau // 1.037.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇi suparṇabhaginī tadā / mahotsāhān kīrtimato jagrāha sumatiḥ sutān // 1.037.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradakṣiṇam ṛṣiṃ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca / jagāma svapuraṃ rājā sabhāryā raghunandana // 1.037.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha kāle gate tasmiñ jyeṣṭhā putraṃ vyajāyata / asamañja iti khyātaṃ keśinī sagarātmajam // 1.037.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumatis tu naravyāghra garbhatumbaṃ vyajāyata / ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi tumbabhedād viniḥsṛtāḥ // 1.037.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghṛtapūrṇeṣu kumbheṣu dhātryas tān samavardhayan / kālena mahatā sarve yauvanaṃ pratipedire // 1.037.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha dīrgheṇa kālena rūpayauvanaśālinaḥ / ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi sagarasyābhavaṃs tadā // 1.037.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca jyeṣṭho naraśreṣṭha sagarasyātmasaṃbhavaḥ / bālān gṛhītvā tu jale sarayvā raghunandana // 1.037.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṣipya prahasan nityaṃ majjatas tān nirīkṣya vai // 1.037.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paurāṇām ahite yuktaḥ pitrā nirvāsitaḥ purāt // 1.037.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya putro 'ṃśumān nāma asamañjasya vīryavān / saṃmataḥ sarvalokasya sarvasyāpi priyaṃvadaḥ // 1.037.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kālena mahatā matiḥ samabhijāyata / sagarasya naraśreṣṭha yajeyam iti niścitā // 1.037.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kṛtvā niścayaṃ rājā sopādhyāyagaṇas tadā / yajñakarmaṇi vedajño yaṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // 1.037.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitravacaḥ śrutvā kathānte raghunandana / uvāca paramaprīto muniṃ dīptam ivānalam // 1.038.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrotum ichāmi bhadraṃ te vistareṇa kathām imām / pūrvako me kathaṃ brahman yajñaṃ vai samupāharat // 1.038.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitras tu kākutstham uvāca prahasann iva / śrūyatāṃ vistaro rāma sagarasya mahātmanaḥ // 1.038.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṃkaraśvaśuro nāma himavān acalottamaḥ / vindhyaparvatam āsādya nirīkṣete parasparam // 1.038.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayor madhye pravṛtto 'bhūd yajñaḥ sa puruṣottama / sa hi deśo naravyāghra praśasto yajñakarmaṇi // 1.038.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāśvacaryāṃ kākutstha dṛḍhadhanvā mahārathaḥ / aṃśumān akarot tāta sagarasya mate sthitaḥ // 1.038.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya parvaṇi taṃ yajñaṃ yajamānasya vāsavaḥ / rākṣasīṃ tanum āsthāya yajñiyāśvam apāharat // 1.038.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hriyamāṇe tu kākutstha tasminn aśve mahātmanaḥ / upādhyāya gaṇāḥ sarve yajamānam athābruvan // 1.038.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ parvaṇi vegena yajñiyāśvo 'panīyate / hartāraṃ jahi kākutstha hayaś caivopanīyatām // 1.038.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajñac chidraṃ bhavaty etat sarveṣām aśivāya naḥ / tat tathā kriyatāṃ rājan yathāchidraḥ kratur bhavet // 1.038.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upādhyāya vacaḥ śrutvā tasmin sadasi pārthivaḥ / ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇi vākyam etad uvāca ha // 1.038.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatiṃ putrā na paśyāmi rakṣasāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ / mantrapūtair mahābhāgair āsthito hi mahākratuḥ // 1.038.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad gacchata vicinvadhvaṃ putrakā bhadram astu vaḥ / samudramālinīṃ sarvāṃ pṛthivīm anugacchata // 1.038.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekaikaṃ yojanaṃ putrā vistāram abhigacchata // 1.038.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvat turagasaṃdarśas tāvat khanata medinīm / tam eva hayahartāraṃ mārgamāṇā mamājñayā // 1.038.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīkṣitaḥ pautrasahitaḥ sopādhyāyagaṇo hy aham / iha sthāsyāmi bhadraṃ vo yāvat turagadarśanam // 1.038.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā hṛṣṭamanaso rājaputrā mahābalāḥ / jagmur mahītalaṃ rāma pitur vacanayantritāḥ // 1.038.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yojanāyām avistāram ekaiko dharaṇītalam / bibhiduḥ puruṣavyāghra vajrasparśasamair bhujaiḥ // 1.038.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūlair aśanikalpaiś ca halaiś cāpi sudāruṇaiḥ / bhidyamānā vasumatī nanāda raghunandana // 1.038.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāgānāṃ vadhyamānānām asurāṇāṃ ca rāghava / rākṣasānāṃ ca durdharṣaḥ sattvānāṃ ninado 'bhavat // 1.038.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiṃ tu raghunandana / bibhidur dharaṇīṃ vīrā rasātalam anuttamam // 1.038.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ parvatasaṃbādhaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ nṛpātmajāḥ / khananto nṛpaśārdūla sarvataḥ paricakramuḥ // 1.038.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ sāsurāḥ sahapannagāḥ / saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ sarve pitāmaham upāgaman // 1.038.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te prasādya mahātmānaṃ viṣaṇṇavadanās tadā / ūcuḥ paramasaṃtrastāḥ pitāmaham idaṃ vacaḥ // 1.038.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan pṛthivī sarvā khanyate sagarātmajaiḥ / bahavaś ca mahātmāno vadhyante jalacāriṇaḥ // 1.038.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ yajñahano 'smākam anenāśvo 'panīyate / iti te sarvabhūtāni nighnanti sagarātmajaḥ // 1.038.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devatānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhagavān vai pitāmahaḥ / pratyuvāca susaṃtrastān kṛtāntabalamohitān // 1.039.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasyeyaṃ vasudhā kṛtsnā vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ / kāpilaṃ rūpam āsthāya dhārayaty aniśaṃ dharām // 1.039.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛthivyāś cāpi nirbhedo dṛṣṭa eva sanātanaḥ / sagarasya ca putrāṇāṃ vināśo 'dīrghajīvinām // 1.039.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā trayas triṃśad ariṃdamaḥ / devāḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭāḥ punar jagmur yathāgatam // 1.039.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sagarasya ca putrāṇāṃ prādur āsīn mahātmanām / pṛthivyāṃ bhidyamānāyāṃ nirghāta sama niḥsvanaḥ // 1.039.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bhittvā mahīṃ sarvāṃ kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam / sahitāḥ sagarāḥ sarve pitaraṃ vākyam abruvan // 1.039.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parikrāntā mahī sarvā sattvavantaś ca sūditāḥ / devadānavarakṣāṃsi piśācoragakiṃnarāḥ // 1.039.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca paśyāmahe 'śvaṃ tam aśvahartāram eva ca / kiṃ kariṣyāma bhadraṃ te buddhir atra vicāryatām // 1.039.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā putrāṇāṃ rājasattamaḥ / samanyur abravīd vākyaṃ sagaro raghunandana // 1.039.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūyaḥ khanata bhadraṃ vo nirbhidya vasudhātalam / aśvahartāram āsādya kṛtārthāś ca nivartatha // 1.039.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitur vacanam āsthāya sagarasya mahātmanaḥ / ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi rasātalam abhidravan // 1.039.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
khanyamāne tatas tasmin dadṛśuḥ parvatopamam / diśāgajaṃ virūpākṣaṃ dhārayantaṃ mahītalam // 1.039.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saparvatavanāṃ kṛtsnāṃ pṛthivīṃ raghunandana / śirasā dhārayām āsa virūpākṣo mahāgajaḥ // 1.039.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā parvaṇi kākutstha viśramārthaṃ mahāgajaḥ / khedāc cālayate śīrṣaṃ bhūmikampas tadhā bhavet // 1.039.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ te pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā diśāpālaṃ mahāgajam / mānayanto hi te rāma jagmur bhittvā rasātalam // 1.039.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ bhittvā dakṣiṇāṃ bibhiduḥ punaḥ / dakṣiṇasyām api diśi dadṛśus te mahāgajam // 1.039.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāpadmaṃ mahātmānaṃ sumahāparvatopamam / śirasā dhārayantaṃ te vismayaṃ jagmur uttamam // 1.039.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā sagarasya mahātmanaḥ / ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi paścimāṃ bibhidur diśam // 1.039.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paścimāyām api diśi mahāntam acalopamam / diśāgajaṃ saumanasaṃ dadṛśus te mahābalāḥ // 1.039.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ te pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā cāpi nirāmayam / khanantaḥ samupakrāntā diśaṃ somavatīṃ tadā // 1.039.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttarasyāṃ raghuśreṣṭha dadṛśur himapāṇḍuram / bhadraṃ bhadreṇa vapuṣā dhārayantaṃ mahīm imām // 1.039.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samālabhya tataḥ sarve kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam / ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi bibhidur vasudhātalam // 1.039.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prāguttarāṃ gatvā sāgarāḥ prathitāṃ diśam / roṣād abhyakhanan sarve pṛthivīṃ sagarātmajāḥ // 1.039.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadṛśuḥ kapilaṃ tatra vāsudevaṃ sanātanam / hayaṃ ca tasya devasya carantam avidūrataḥ // 1.039.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te taṃ yajñahanaṃ jñātvā krodhaparyākulekṣaṇāḥ / abhyadhāvanta saṃkruddhās tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābruvan // 1.039.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmākaṃ tvaṃ hi turagaṃ yajñiyaṃ hṛtavān asi / durmedhas tvaṃ hi saṃprāptān viddhi naḥ sagarātmajān // 1.039.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tad vacanaṃ teṣāṃ kapilo raghunandana / roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭo huṃkāram akarot tadā // 1.039.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tenāprameyena kapilena mahātmanā / bhasmarāśīkṛtāḥ sarve kākutstha sagarātmajāḥ // 1.039.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putrāṃś ciragatāñ jñātvā sagaro raghunandana / naptāram abravīd rājā dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā // 1.040.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūraś ca kṛtavidyaś ca pūrvais tulyo 'si tejasā / pitḥṇāṃ gatim anviccha yena cāśvo 'pahāritaḥ // 1.040.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarbhaumāni sattvāni vīryavanti mahānti ca / teṣāṃ tvaṃ pratighātārthaṃ sāsiṃ gṛhṇīṣva kārmukam // 1.040.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādyābhivādyāṃs tvaṃ hatvā vighnakarān api / siddhārthaḥ saṃnivartasva mama yajñasya pāragaḥ // 1.040.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto 'ṃśumān samyak sagareṇa mahātmanā / dhanur ādāya khaḍgaṃ ca jagāma laghuvikramaḥ // 1.040.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa khātaṃ pitṛbhir mārgam antarbhaumaṃ mahātmabhiḥ / prāpadyata naraśreṣṭha tena rājñābhicoditaḥ // 1.040.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daityadānavarakṣobhiḥ piśācapatagoragaiḥ / pūjyamānaṃ mahātejā diśāgajam apaśyata // 1.040.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā caiva nirāmayam / pitḥn sa paripapraccha vājihartāram eva ca // 1.040.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diśāgajas tu tac chrutvā prītyāhāṃśumato vacaḥ / āsamañjakṛtārthas tvaṃ sahāśvaḥ śīghram eṣyasi // 1.040.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvān eva diśāgajān / yathākramaṃ yathānyāyaṃ praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // 1.040.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taiś ca sarvair diśāpālair vākyajñair vākyakovidaiḥ / pūjitaḥ sahayaś caiva gantāsīty abhicoditaḥ // 1.040.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā jagāma laghuvikramaḥ / bhasmarāśīkṛtā yatra pitaras tasya sāgarāḥ // 1.040.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa duḥkhavaśam āpannas tv asamañjasutas tadā / cukrośa paramārtas tu vadhāt teṣāṃ suduḥkhitaḥ // 1.040.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajñiyaṃ ca hayaṃ tatra carantam avidūrataḥ / dadarśa puruṣavyāghro duḥkhaśokasamanvitaḥ // 1.040.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadarśa puruṣavyāghro kartukāmo jalakriyām / salilārthī mahātejā na cāpaśyaj jalāśayam // 1.040.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visārya nipuṇāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ tato 'paśyat khagādhipam / pitḥṇāṃ mātulaṃ rāma suparṇam anilopamam // 1.040.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cainam abravīd vākyaṃ vainateyo mahābalaḥ / mā śucaḥ puruṣavyāghra vadho 'yaṃ lokasaṃmataḥ // 1.040.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kapilenāprameyena dagdhā hīme mahābalāḥ / salilaṃ nārhasi prājña dātum eṣāṃ hi laukikam // 1.040.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaṅgā himavato jyeṣṭhā duhitā puruṣarṣabha / bhasmarāśīkṛtān etān pāvayel lokapāvanī // 1.040.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayā klinnam idaṃ bhasma gaṅgayā lokakāntayā / ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇi svargalokaṃ nayiṣyati // 1.040.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaccha cāśvaṃ mahābhāga saṃgṛhya puruṣarṣabha / yajñaṃ paitāmahaṃ vīra nirvartayitum arhasi // 1.040.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suparṇavacanaṃ śrutvā so 'ṃśumān ativīryavān / tvaritaṃ hayam ādāya punar āyān mahāyaśāḥ // 1.040.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rājānam āsādya dīkṣitaṃ raghunandana / nyavedayad yathāvṛttaṃ suparṇavacanaṃ tathā // 1.040.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyam aṃśumato nṛpaḥ / yajñaṃ nirvartayām āsa yathākalpaṃ yathāvidhi // 1.040.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svapuraṃ cāgamac chrīmān iṣṭayajño mahīpatiḥ / gaṅgāyāś cāgame rājā niścayaṃ nādhyagacchata // 1.040.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agatvā niścayaṃ rājā kālena mahatā mahān / triṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi rājyaṃ kṛtvā divaṃ gataḥ // 1.040.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāladharmaṃ gate rāma sagare prakṛtījanāḥ / rājānaṃ rocayām āsur aṃśumantaṃ sudhārmikam // 1.041.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā sumahān āsīd aṃśumān raghunandana / tasya putro mahān āsīd dilīpa iti viśrutaḥ // 1.041.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin rājyaṃ samāveśya dilīpe raghunandana / himavacchikhare ramye tapas tepe sudāruṇam // 1.041.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvādtriṃśac ca sahasrāṇi varṣāṇi sumahāyaśāḥ / tapovanagato rājā svargaṃ lebhe tapodhanaḥ // 1.041.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dilīpas tu mahātejāḥ śrutvā paitāmahaṃ vadham / duḥkhopahatayā buddhyā niścayaṃ nādhyagacchata // 1.041.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ jalakriyā / tārayeyaṃ kathaṃ caitān iti cintā paro 'bhavat // 1.041.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya cintayato nityaṃ dharmeṇa viditātmanaḥ / putro bhagīratho nāma jajñe paramadhārmikaḥ // 1.041.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dilīpas tu mahātejā yajñair bahubhir iṣṭavān / triṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi rājā rājyam akārayat // 1.041.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agatvā niścayaṃ rājā teṣām uddharaṇaṃ prati / vyādhinā naraśārdūla kāladharmam upeyivān // 1.041.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indralokaṃ gato rājā svārjitenaiva karmaṇā / ramye bhagīrathaṃ putram abhiṣicya nararṣabhaḥ // 1.041.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagīrathas tu rājarṣir dhārmiko raghunandana / anapatyo mahātejāḥ prajākāmaḥ sa cāprajaḥ // 1.041.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tapo dīrgham ātiṣṭhad gokarṇe raghunandana / ūrdhvabāhuḥ pañcatapā māsāhāro jitendriyaḥ // 1.041.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya varṣasahasrāṇi ghore tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ / suprīto bhagavān brahmā prajānāṃ patir īśvaraḥ // 1.041.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ suragaṇaiḥ sārdham upāgamya pitāmahaḥ / bhagīrathaṃ mahātmānaṃ tapyamānam athābravīt // 1.041.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagīratha mahābhāga prītas te 'haṃ janeśvara / tapasā ca sutaptena varaṃ varaya suvrata // 1.041.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca mahātejāḥ sarvalokapitāmaham / bhagīratho mahābhāgaḥ kṛtāñjalir avasthitaḥ // 1.041.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yṛadi me bhagavān prīto yady asti tapasaḥ phalam / sagarasyātmajāḥ sarve mattaḥ salilam āpnuyuḥ // 1.041.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaṅgāyāḥ salilaklinne bhasmany eṣāṃ mahātmanām / svargaṃ gaccheyur atyantaṃ sarve me prapitāmahāḥ // 1.041.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
deyā ca saṃtator deva nāvasīdet kulaṃ ca naḥ / ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule deva eṣa me 'stu varaḥ paraḥ // 1.041.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uktavākyaṃ tu rājānaṃ sarvalokapitāmahaḥ / pratyuvāca śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ madhurāṃ madhurākṣarām // 1.041.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manoratho mahān eṣa bhagīratha mahāratha / evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te ikṣvākukulavardhana // 1.041.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ haimavatī gaṅgā jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā / tāṃ vai dhārayituṃ rājan haras tatra niyujyatām // 1.041.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaṅgāyāḥ patanaṃ rājan pṛthivī na sahiṣyate / tau vai dhārayituṃ vīra nānyaṃ paśyāmi śūlinaḥ // 1.041.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evam uktvā rājānaṃ gaṅgāṃ cābhāṣya lokakṛt / jagāma tridivaṃ devaḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ // 1.041.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadeve gate tasmin so 'ṅguṣṭhāgranipīḍitām / kṛtvā vasumatīṃ rāma saṃvatsaram upāsata // 1.042.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ / umāpatiḥ paśupatī rājānam idam abravīt // 1.042.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prītas te 'haṃ naraśreṣṭha kariṣyāmi tava priyam / śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi śailarājasutām aham // 1.042.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato haimavatī jyeṣṭhā sarvalokanamaskṛtā / tadā sātimahad rūpaṃ kṛtvā vegaṃ ca duḥsaham // 1.042.004.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ākāśād apatad rāma śive śivaśirasy uta // 1.042.004.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva sā nirgamaṃ lekhe jaṭāmaṇḍalamohitā / tatraivābabhramad devī saṃvatsaragaṇān bahūn // 1.042.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anena toṣitaś cāsīd atyarthaṃ raghunandana / visasarja tato gaṅgāṃ haro bindusaraḥ prati // 1.042.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaganāc chaṃkaraśiras tato dharaṇim āgatā / vyasarpata jalaṃ tatra tīvraśabdapuraskṛtam // 1.042.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devarṣigandharvā yakṣāḥ siddhagaṇās tathā / vyalokayanta te tatra gaganād gāṃ gatāṃ tadā // 1.042.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimānair nagarākārair hayair gajavarais tathā / pāriplavagatāś cāpi devatās tatra viṣṭhitāḥ // 1.042.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad adbhutatamaṃ loke gaṅgā patanam uttamam / didṛkṣavo devagaṇāḥ sameyur amitaujasaḥ // 1.042.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpatadbhiḥ suragaṇais teṣāṃ cābharaṇaujasā / śatādityam ivābhāti gaganaṃ gatatoyadam // 1.042.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śiṃśumāroragagaṇair mīnair api ca cañcalaiḥ / vidyudbhir iva vikṣiptair ākāśam abhavat tadā // 1.042.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇḍuraiḥ salilotpīḍaiḥ kīryamāṇaiḥ sahasradhā / śāradābhrair ivākrītṇaṃ gaganaṃ haṃsasaṃplavaiḥ // 1.042.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva cid drutataraṃ yāti kuṭilaṃ kva cid āyatam / vinataṃ kva cid uddhūtaṃ kva cid yāti śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // 1.042.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
salilenaiva salilaṃ kva cid abhyāhataṃ punaḥ / muhur ūrdhvapathaṃ gatvā papāta vasudhāṃ punaḥ // 1.042.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chaṃkaraśirobhraṣṭaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ bhūmitale punaḥ / vyarocata tadā toyaṃ nirmalaṃ gatakalmaṣam // 1.042.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrarṣigaṇagandharvā vasudhātalavāsinaḥ / bhavāṅgapatitaṃ toyaṃ pavitram iti paspṛśuḥ // 1.042.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāpāt prapatitā ye ca gaganād vasudhātalam / kṛtvā tatrābhiṣekaṃ te babhūvur gatakalmaṣāḥ // 1.042.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhūpapāpāḥ punas tena toyenātha subhāsvatā / punar ākāśam āviśya svāṃl lokān pratipedire // 1.042.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mumude mudito lokas tena toyena bhāsvatā / kṛtābhiṣeko gaṅgāyāṃ babhūva vigataklamaḥ // 1.042.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagīratho 'pi rājarṣir divyaṃ syandanam āsthitaḥ / prāyād agre mahātejās taṃ gaṅgā pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt // 1.042.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve daityadānavarākṣasāḥ / gandharvayakṣapravarāḥ sakiṃnaramahoragāḥ // 1.042.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvāś cāpsaraso rāma bhagīratharathānugāḥ / gaṅgām anvagaman prītāḥ sarve jalacarāś ca ye // 1.042.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yato bhagīratho rājā tato gaṅgā yaśasvinī / jagāma saritāṃ śreṣṭhā sarvapāpavināśinī // 1.042.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā sāgaraṃ rājā gaṅgayānugatas tadā / praviveśa talaṃ bhūmer yatra te bhasmasātkṛtāḥ // 1.043.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhasmany athāplute rāma gaṅgāyāḥ salilena vai / sarva lokaprabhur brahmā rājānam idam abravīt // 1.043.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāritā naraśārdūla divaṃ yātāś ca devavat / ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi sagarasya mahātmanaḥ // 1.043.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgarasya jalaṃ loke yāvat sthāsyati pārthiva / sagarasyātmajās tāvat svarge sthāsyanti devavat // 1.043.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ ca duhitā jyeṣṭhā tava gaṅgā bhaviṣyati / tvatkṛtena ca nāmnā vai loke sthāsyati viśrutā // 1.043.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaṅgā tripathagā nāma divyā bhāgīrathīti ca / tripatho bhāvayantīti tatas tripathagā smṛtā // 1.043.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvam atra manujādhipa / kuruṣva salilaṃ rājan pratijñām apavarjaya // 1.043.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvakeṇa hi te rājaṃs tenātiyaśasā tadā / dharmiṇāṃ pravareṇātha naiṣa prāpto manorathaḥ // 1.043.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaivāṃśumatā tāta loke 'pratimatejasā / gaṅgāṃ prārthayatā netuṃ pratijñā nāpavarjitā // 1.043.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājarṣiṇā guṇavatā maharṣisamatejasā / mattulyatapasā caiva kṣatradharmasthitena ca // 1.043.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dilīpena mahābhāga tava pitrātitejasā / punar na śaṅkitā netuṃ gaṅgāṃ prārthayatānagha // 1.043.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tvayā samatikrāntā pratijñā puruṣarṣabha / prāpto 'si paramaṃ loke yaśaḥ paramasaṃmatam // 1.043.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yac ca gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ tvayā kṛtam ariṃdama / anena ca bhavān prāpto dharmasyāyatanaṃ mahat // 1.043.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plāvayasva tvam ātmānaṃ narottama sadocite / salile puruṣavyāghra śuciḥ puṇyaphalo bhava // 1.043.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kuruṣva salilakriyām / svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi svaṃ lokaṃ gamyatāṃ nṛpa // 1.043.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā deveśaḥ sarvalokapitāmahaḥ / yathāgataṃ tathāgacchad devalokaṃ mahāyaśāḥ // 1.043.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagīratho 'pi rājarṣiḥ kṛtvā salilam uttamam / yathākramaṃ yathānyāyaṃ sāgarāṇāṃ mahāyaśāḥ // 1.043.017.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtodakaḥ śucī rājā svapuraṃ praviveśa ha // 1.043.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samṛddhārtho naraśreṣṭha svarājyaṃ praśaśāsa ha / pramumoda ca lokas taṃ nṛpam āsādya rāghava // 1.043.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naṣṭaśokaḥ samṛddhārtho babhūva vigatajvaraḥ // 1.043.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyā vistaro 'bhihito mayā / svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te saṃdhyākālo 'tivartate // 1.043.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ putryam athāpi ca / idam ākhyānam ākhyātaṃ gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ mayā // 1.043.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitravacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā viśvāmitram athābravīt // 1.044.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman kathitaṃ paramaṃ tvayā / gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ puṇyaṃ sāgarasya ca pūraṇam // 1.044.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya sā śarvarī sarvā saha saumitriṇā tadā / jagāma cintayānasya viśvāmitrakathāṃ śubhām // 1.044.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prabhāte vimale viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim / uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ kṛtāhnikam ariṃdamaḥ // 1.044.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatā bhagavatī rātriḥ śrotavyaṃ paramaṃ śrutam / kṣaṇabhūteva sā rātriḥ saṃvṛtteyaṃ mahātapaḥ // 1.044.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ cintayataḥ sarvāṃ nikhilena kathāṃ tava // 1.044.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tarāma saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ puṇyāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm / naur eṣā hi sukhāstīrṇā ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām // 1.044.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavantam iha prāptaṃ jñātvā tvaritam āgatā // 1.044.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ / saṃtāraṃ kārayām āsa sarṣisaṃghaḥ sarāghavaḥ // 1.044.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttaraṃ tīram āsādya saṃpūjyarṣigaṇaṃ tatha / gaṅgākūle niviṣṭās te viśālāṃ dadṛśuḥ purīm // 1.044.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato munivaras tūrṇaṃ jagāma saharāghavaḥ / viśālāṃ nagarīṃ ramyāṃ divyāṃ svargopamāṃ tadā // 1.044.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rāmo mahāprājño viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim / papraccha prāñjalir bhūtvā viśālām uttamāṃ purīm // 1.044.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kataro rājavaṃśo 'yaṃ viśālāyāṃ mahāmune / śrotum icchāmi bhadraṃ te paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // 1.044.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmasya munipuṃgavaḥ / ākhyātuṃ tat samārebhe viśālasya purātanam // 1.044.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyatāṃ rāma śakrasya kathāṃ kathayataḥ śubhām / asmin deśe hi yad vṛttaṃ śṛṇu tattvena rāghava // 1.044.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge rāma diteḥ putrā mahābalāḥ / aditeś ca mahābhāgā vīryavantaḥ sudhārmikāḥ // 1.044.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas teṣāṃ naraśreṣṭha buddhir āsīn mahātmanām / amarā nirjarāś caiva kathaṃ syāma nirāmayāḥ // 1.044.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ cintayatāṃ rāma buddhir āsīd vipaścitām / kṣīrodamathanaṃ kṛtvā rasaṃ prāpsyāma tatra vai // 1.044.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato niścitya mathanaṃ yoktraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim / manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā mamanthur amitaujasaḥ // 1.044.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha dhanvantarir nāma apsarāś ca suvarcasaḥ / apsu nirmathanād eva rasāt tasmād varastriyaḥ // 1.044.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utpetur manujaśreṣṭha tasmād apsaraso 'bhavan // 1.044.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṣaṣṭiḥ koṭyo 'bhavaṃs tāsām apsarāṇāṃ suvarcasām / asaṃkhyeyās tu kākutstha yās tāsāṃ paricārikāḥ // 1.044.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tāḥ sma pratigṛhṇanti sarve te devadānavāḥ / apratigrahaṇāc caiva tena sādhāraṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // 1.044.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varuṇasya tataḥ kanyā vāruṇī raghunandana / utpapāta mahābhāgā mārgamāṇā parigraham // 1.044.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diteḥ putrā na tāṃ rāma jagṛhur varuṇātmajām / adites tu sutā vīra jagṛhus tām aninditām // 1.044.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asurās tena daiteyāḥ surās tenāditeḥ sutāḥ / hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāś cāsan vāruṇī grahaṇāt surāḥ // 1.044.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uccaiḥśravā hayaśreṣṭho maṇiratnaṃ ca kaustubham / udatiṣṭhan naraśreṣṭha tathaivāmṛtam uttamam // 1.044.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tasya kṛte rāma mahān āsīt kulakṣayaḥ / adites tu tataḥ putrā diteḥ putrāṇa sūdayan // 1.044.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aditer ātmajā vīrā diteḥ putrān nijaghnire / tasmin ghore mahāyuddhe daiteyādityayor bhṛśam // 1.044.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatya ditiputrāṃs tu rājyaṃ prāpya puraṃdaraḥ / śaśāsa mudito lokān sarṣisaṃghān sacāraṇān // 1.044.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hateṣu teṣu putreṣu ditiḥ paramaduḥkhitā / mārīcaṃ kāśyapaṃ rāma bhartāram idam abravīt // 1.045.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hataputrāsmi bhagavaṃs tava putrair mahābalaiḥ / śakrahantāram icchāmi putraṃ dīrghatapo'rjitam // 1.045.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāhaṃ tapaś cariṣyāmi garbhaṃ me dātum arhasi / īdṛśaṃ śakrahantāraṃ tvam anujñātum arhasi // 1.045.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā mārīcaḥ kāśyapas tadā / pratyuvāca mahātejā ditiṃ paramaduḥkhitām // 1.045.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te śucir bhava tapodhane / janayiṣyasi putraṃ tvaṃ śakra hantāram āhave // 1.045.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu śucir yadi bhaviṣyasi / putraṃ trailokya hantāraṃ mattas tvaṃ janayiṣyasi // 1.045.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātejāḥ pāṇinā sa mamārja tām / samālabhya tataḥ svastīty uktvā sa tapase yayau // 1.045.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gate tasmin naraśreṣṭha ditiḥ paramaharṣitā / kuśaplavanam āsādya tapas tepe sudāruṇam // 1.045.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapas tasyāṃ hi kurvatyāṃ paricaryāṃ cakāra ha / sahasrākṣo naraśreṣṭha parayā guṇasaṃpadā // 1.045.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agniṃ kuśān kāṣṭham apaḥ phalaṃ mūlaṃ tathaiva ca / nyavedayat sahasrākṣo yac cānyad api kāṅkṣitam // 1.045.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gātrasaṃvāhanaiś caiva śramāpanayanais tathā / śakraḥ sarveṣu kāleṣu ditiṃ paricacāra ha // 1.045.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha varṣasahasretu daśone raghu nandana / ditiḥ paramasaṃprītā sahasrākṣam athābravīt // 1.045.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapaś carantyā varṣāṇi daśa vīryavatāṃ vara / avaśiṣṭāni bhadraṃ te bhrātaraṃ drakṣyase tataḥ // 1.045.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ahaṃ tvatkṛte putra samādhāsye jayotsukam / trailokyavijayaṃ putra saha bhokṣyasi vijvaraḥ // 1.045.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā ditiḥ śakraṃ prāpte madhyaṃ divākare / nidrayāpahṛtā devī pādau kṛtvātha śīrṣataḥ // 1.045.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā tām aśuciṃ śakraḥ pādataḥ kṛtamūrdhajām / śiraḥsthāne kṛtau pādau jahāsa ca mumoda ca // 1.045.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāḥ śarīravivaraṃ viveśa ca puraṃdaraḥ / garbhaṃ ca saptadhā rāma bibheda paramātmavān // 1.045.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bidhyamānas tato garbho vajreṇa śataparvaṇā / ruroda susvaraṃ rāma tato ditir abudhyata // 1.045.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā rudo mā rudaś ceti garbhaṃ śakro 'bhyabhāṣata / bibheda ca mahātejā rudantam api vāsavaḥ // 1.045.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hantavyo na hantavya ity evaṃ ditir abravīt / niṣpapāta tataḥ śakro mātur vacanagauravāt // 1.045.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāñjalir vajrasahito ditiṃ śakro 'bhyabhāṣata / aśucir devi suptāsi pādayoḥ kṛtamūrdhajā // 1.045.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadantaram ahaṃ labdhvā śakrahantāram āhave / abhindaṃ saptadhā devi tan me tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi // 1.045.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saptadhā tu kṛte garbhe ditiḥ paramaduḥkhitā / sahasrākṣaṃ durādharṣaṃ vākyaṃ sānunayābravīt // 1.046.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamāparādhād garbho 'yaṃ saptadhā viphalīkṛtaḥ / nāparādho 'sti deveśa tavātra balasūdana // 1.046.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyaṃ tu kṛtam icchāmi mama garbhaviparyaye / marutāṃ saptaṃ saptānāṃ sthānapālā bhavantv ime // 1.046.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vātaskandhā ime sapta carantu divi putrakāḥ / mārutā iti vikhyātā divyarūpā mamātmajāḥ // 1.046.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmalokaṃ caratv eka indralokaṃ tathāparaḥ / divi vāyur iti khyātas tṛtīyo 'pi mahāyaśāḥ // 1.046.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
catvāras tu suraśreṣṭha diśo vai tava śāsanāt / saṃcariṣyanti bhadraṃ te devabhūtā mamātmajāḥ // 1.046.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvatkṛtenaiva nāmnā ca mārutā iti viśrutāḥ // 1.046.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ / uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ ditiṃ balaniṣūdanaḥ // 1.046.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvam etad yathoktaṃ te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ / vicariṣyanti bhadraṃ te devabhūtās tavātmajāḥ // 1.046.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ tau niścayaṃ kṛtvā mātāputrau tapovane / jagmatus tridivaṃ rāma kṛtārthāv iti naḥ śrutam // 1.046.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa deśaḥ sa kākutstha mahendrādhyuṣitaḥ purā / ditiṃ yatra tapaḥ siddhām evaṃ paricacāra saḥ // 1.046.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākos tu naravyāghra putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ / alambuṣāyām utpanno viśāla iti viśrutaḥ // 1.046.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena cāsīd iha sthāne viśāleti purī kṛtā // 1.046.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśālasya suto rāma hemacandro mahābalaḥ / sucandra iti vikhyāto hemacandrād anantaraḥ // 1.046.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sucandratanayo rāma dhūmrāśva iti viśrutaḥ / dhūmrāśvatanayaś cāpi sṛñjayaḥ samapadyata // 1.046.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sṛñjayasya sutaḥ śrīmān sahadevaḥ pratāpavān / kuśāśvaḥ sahadevasya putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ // 1.046.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśāśvasya mahātejāḥ somadattaḥ pratāpavān / somadattasya putras tu kākutstha iti viśrutaḥ // 1.046.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya putro mahātejāḥ saṃpraty eṣa purīm imām / āvasaty amaraprakhyaḥ sumatir nāma durjayaḥ // 1.046.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākos tu prasādena sarve vaiśālikā nṛpāḥ / dīrghāyuṣo mahātmāno vīryavantaḥ sudhārmikāḥ // 1.046.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ihādya rajanīṃ rāma sukhaṃ vatsyāmahe vayam / śvaḥ prabhāte naraśreṣṭha janakaṃ draṣṭum arhasi // 1.046.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumatis tu mahātejā viśvāmitram upāgatam / śrutvā naravaraśreṣṭhaḥ pratyudgacchan mahāyaśāḥ // 1.046.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjāṃ ca paramāṃ kṛtvā sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ / prāñjaliḥ kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā viśvāmitram athābravīt // 1.046.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me viṣayaṃ mune / saṃprāpto darśanaṃ caiva nāsti dhanyataro mama // 1.046.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣṭvā tu kuśalaṃ tatra parasparasamāgame / kathānte sumatir vākyaṃ vyājahāra mahāmunim // 1.047.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau kumārau bhadraṃ te devatulyaparākramau / gajasiṃhagatī vīrau śārdūlavṛṣabhopamau // 1.047.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmapatraviśālākṣau khaḍgatūṇīdhanurdharau / aśvināv iva rūpeṇa samupasthitayauvanau // 1.047.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadṛcchayaiva gāṃ prāptau devalokād ivāmarau / kathaṃ padbhyām iha prāptau kimarthaṃ kasya vā mune // 1.047.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūṣayantāv imaṃ deśaṃ candrasūryāv ivāmbaram / parasparasya sadṛśau pramāṇeṅgitaceṣṭitaiḥ // 1.047.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kimarthaṃ ca naraśreṣṭhau saṃprāptau durgame pathi / varāyudhadharau vīrau śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // 1.047.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā yathāvṛtthaṃ nyavedayat / siddhāśramanivāsaṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ vadhaṃ tathā // 1.047.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitravacaḥ śrutvā rājā paramaharṣitaḥ / atithī paramau prāptau putrau daśarathasya tau // 1.047.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjayām āsa vidhivat satkārārhau mahābalau // 1.047.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paramasatkāraṃ sumateḥ prāpya rāghavau / uṣya tatra niśām ekāṃ jagmatur mithilāṃ tataḥ // 1.047.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ sarve janakasya purīṃ śubhām / sādhu sādhv iti śaṃsanto mithilāṃ samapūjayan // 1.047.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
