mithilopavane tatra āśramaṃ dṛśya rāghavaḥ / purāṇaṃ nirjanaṃ ramyaṃ papraccha munipuṃgavam // 1.047.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrīmadāśramasaṃkāśaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ munivarjitam / śrotum icchāmi bhagavan kasyāyaṃ pūrva āśramaḥ // 1.047.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutā rāghaveṇoktaṃ vākyaṃ vākya viśāradaḥ / pratyuvāca mahātejā viśvamitro mahāmuniḥ // 1.047.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena rāghava / yasyaitad āśramapadaṃ śaptaṃ kopān mahātmanā // 1.047.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gautamasya naraśreṣṭha pūrvam āsīn mahātmanaḥ / āśramo divyasaṃkāśaḥ surair api supūjitaḥ // 1.047.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ceha tapa ātiṣṭhad ahalyāsahitaḥ purā / varṣapūgāny anekāni rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ // 1.047.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāntaraṃ viditvā tu sahasrākṣaḥ śacīpatiḥ / muniveṣadharo 'halyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.047.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛtukālaṃ pratīkṣante nārthinaḥ susamāhite / saṃgamaṃ tv aham icchāmi tvayā saha sumadhyame // 1.047.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muniveṣaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ vijñāya raghunandana / matiṃ cakāra durmedhā devarājakutūhalāt // 1.047.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīt suraśreṣṭhaṃ kṛtārthenāntarātmanā / kṛtārtho 'si suraśreṣṭha gaccha śīghram itaḥ prabho // 1.047.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmānaṃ māṃ ca deveśa sarvadā rakṣa mānadaḥ // 1.047.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indras tu prahasan vākyam ahalyām idam abravīt / suśroṇi parituṣṭo 'smi gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam // 1.047.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ saṃgamya tu tayā niścakrāmoṭajāt tataḥ / sa saṃbhramāt tvaran rāma śaṅkito gautamaṃ prati // 1.047.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gautamaṃ sa dadarśātha praviśanti mahāmunim / devadānavadurdharṣaṃ tapobalasamanvitam // 1.047.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tīrthodakapariklinnaṃ dīpyamānam ivānalam / gṛhītasamidhaṃ tatra sakuśaṃ munipuṅgavam // 1.047.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā surapatis trasto viṣaṇṇavadano 'bhavat // 1.047.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaṃ muniveṣadharaṃ muniḥ / durvṛttaṃ vṛttasaṃpanno roṣād vacanam abravīt // 1.047.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama rūpaṃ samāsthāya kṛtavān asi durmate / akartavyam idaṃ yasmād viphalas tvaṃ bhaviṣyati // 1.047.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gautamenaivam uktasya saroṣeṇa mahātmanā / petatur vṛṣaṇau bhūmau sahasrākṣasya tatkṣaṇāt // 1.047.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā śaptvā sa vai śakraṃ bhāryām api ca śaptavān / iha varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni tvaṃ nivatsyasi // 1.047.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāyubhakṣā nirāhārā tapyantī bhasmaśāyinī / adṛśyā sarvabhūtānām āśrame 'smin nivatsyasi // 1.047.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā caitad vanaṃ ghoraṃ rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / āgamiṣyati durdharṣas tadā pūtā bhaviṣyasi // 1.047.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyātithyena durvṛtte lobhamohavivarjitā / matsakāśe mudā yuktā svaṃ vapur dhārayiṣyasi // 1.047.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātejā gautamo duṣṭacāriṇīm / imam āśramam utsṛjya siddhacāraṇasevite // 1.047.032.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
himavacchikhare ramye tapas tepe mahātapāḥ // 1.047.032.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aphalas tu tataḥ śakro devān agnipurogamān / abravīt trastavadanaḥ sarṣisaṃghān sacāraṇān // 1.048.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kurvatā tapaso vighnaṃ gautamasya mahātmanaḥ / krodham utpādya hi mayā surakāryam idaṃ kṛtam // 1.048.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aphalo 'smi kṛtas tena krodhāt sā ca nirākṛtā / śāpamokṣeṇa mahatā tapo 'syāpahṛtaṃ mayā // 1.048.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan māṃ suravarāḥ sarve sarṣisaṃghāḥ sacāraṇāḥ / surasāhyakaraṃ sarve saphalaṃ kartum arhatha // 1.048.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatakrator vacaḥ śrutvā devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ / pitṛdevān upetyāhuḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ // 1.048.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ meṣaḥ savṛṣaṇaḥ śakro hy avṛṣaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ / meṣasya vṛṣaṇau gṛhya śakrāyāśu prayacchata // 1.048.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aphalas tu kṛto meṣaḥ parāṃ tuṣṭiṃ pradāsyati / bhavatāṃ harṣaṇārthāya ye ca dāsyanti mānavāḥ // 1.048.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agnes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā pitṛdevāḥ samāgatāḥ / utpāṭya meṣavṛṣaṇau sahasrākṣe nyavedayan // 1.048.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadā prabhṛti kākutstha pitṛdevāḥ samāgatāḥ / aphalān bhuñjate meṣān phalais teṣām ayojayan // 1.048.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indras tu meṣavṛṣaṇas tadā prabhṛti rāghava / gautamasya prabhāvena tapasaś ca mahātmanaḥ // 1.048.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadāgaccha mahāteja āśramaṃ puṇyakarmaṇaḥ / tārayaināṃ mahābhāgām ahalyāṃ devarūpiṇīm // 1.048.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitravacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / viśvāmitraṃ puraskṛtya āśramaṃ praviveśa ha // 1.048.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadarśa ca mahābhāgāṃ tapasā dyotitaprabhām / lokair api samāgamya durnirīkṣyāṃ surāsuraiḥ // 1.048.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prayatnān nirmitāṃ dhātrā divyāṃ māyāmayīm iva / dhūmenābhiparītāṅgīṃ pūrṇacandraprabhām iva // 1.048.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satuṣārāvṛtāṃ sābhrāṃ pūrṇacandraprabhām iva / madhye 'mbhaso durādharṣāṃ dīptāṃ sūryaprabhām iva // 1.048.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi gautamavākyena durnirīkṣyā babhūva ha / trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yāvad rāmasya darśanam // 1.048.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavau tu tatas tasyāḥ pādau jagṛhatus tadā / smarantī gautamavacaḥ pratijagrāha sā ca tau // 1.048.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pādyam arghyaṃ tathātithyaṃ cakāra susamāhitā / pratijagrāha kākutstho vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā // 1.048.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpavṛṣṭir mahaty āsīd devadundubhinisvanaiḥ / gandharvāpsarasāṃ cāpi mahān āsīt samāgamaḥ // 1.048.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhu sādhv iti devās tām ahalyāṃ samapūjayan / tapobalaviśuddhāṅgīṃ gautamasya vaśānugām // 1.048.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gautamo 'pi mahātejā ahalyāsahitaḥ sukhī / rāmaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivat tapas tepe mahātapāḥ // 1.048.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo 'pi paramāṃ pūjāṃ gautamasya mahāmuneḥ / sakāśād vidhivat prāpya jagāma mithilāṃ tataḥ // 1.048.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prāguttarāṃ gatvā rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha / viśvāmitraṃ puraskṛtya yajñavāṭam upāgamat // 1.049.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmas tu muniśārdūlam uvāca sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / sādhvī yajñasamṛddhir hi janakasya mahātmanaḥ // 1.049.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahūnīha sahasrāṇi nānādeśanivāsinām / brāhmaṇānāṃ mahābhāga vedādhyayanaśālinām // 1.049.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣivāṭāś ca dṛśyante śakaṭīśatasaṃkulāḥ / deśo vidhīyatāṃ brahman yatra vatsyāmahe vayam // 1.049.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / niveśam akarod deśe vivikte salilāyute // 1.049.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitraṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ śrutvā sa nṛpatis tadā / śatānandaṃ puraskṛtya purohitam aninditam // 1.049.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛtvijo 'pi mahātmānas tv arghyam ādāya satvaram / viśvāmitrāya dharmeṇa dadur mantrapuraskṛtam // 1.049.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ janakasya mahātmanaḥ / papraccha kuśalaṃ rājño yajñasya ca nirāmayam // 1.049.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tāṃś cāpi munīn pṛṣṭvā sopādhyāya purodhasaḥ / yathānyāyaṃ tataḥ sarvaiḥ samāgacchat prahṛṣṭavān // 1.049.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rājā muniśreṣṭhaṃ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata / āsane bhagavān āstāṃ sahaibhir munisattamaiḥ // 1.049.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā niṣasāda mahāmuniḥ / purodhā ṛtvijaś caiva rājā ca saha mantribhiḥ // 1.049.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsaneṣu yathānyāyam upaviṣṭān samantataḥ / dṛṣṭvā sa nṛpatis tatra viśvāmitram athābravīt // 1.049.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya yajñasamṛddhir me saphalā daivataiḥ kṛtā / adya yajñaphalaṃ prāptaṃ bhagavaddarśanān mayā // 1.049.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me munipuṃgava / yajñopasadanaṃ brahman prāpto 'si munibhiḥ saha // 1.049.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvādaśāhaṃ tu brahmarṣe śeṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ / tato bhāgārthino devān draṣṭum arhasi kauśika // 1.049.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā muniśārdūlaṃ prahṛṣṭavadanas tadā / punas taṃ paripapraccha prāñjaliḥ prayato nṛpaḥ // 1.049.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau kumārau bhadraṃ te devatulyaparākramau / gajasiṃhagatī vīrau śārdūlavṛṣabhopamau // 1.049.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmapatraviśālākṣau khaḍgatūṇīdhanurdharau / aśvināv iva rūpeṇa samupasthitayauvanau // 1.049.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadṛcchayaiva gāṃ prāptau devalokād ivāmarau / kathaṃ padbhyām iha prāptau kimarthaṃ kasya vā mune // 1.049.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varāyudhadharau vīrau kasya putrau mahāmune / bhūṣayantāv imaṃ deśaṃ candrasūryāv ivāmbaram // 1.049.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parasparasya sadṛśau pramāṇeṅgitaceṣṭitaiḥ / kākapakṣadharau vīrau śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // 1.049.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā janakasya mahātmanaḥ / nyavedayan mahātmānau putrau daśarathasya tau // 1.049.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siddhāśramanivāsaṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ vadhaṃ tathā / tac cāgamanam avyagraṃ viśālāyāś ca darśanam // 1.049.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahalyādarśanaṃ caiva gautamena samāgamam / mahādhanuṣi jijñāsāṃ kartum āgamanaṃ tathā // 1.049.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat sarvaṃ mahātejā janakāya mahātmane / nivedya virarāmātha viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ // 1.049.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ / hṛṣṭaromā mahātejāḥ śatānando mahātapāḥ // 1.050.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gautamasya suto jyeṣṭhas tapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ / rāmasaṃdarśanād eva paraṃ vismayam āgataḥ // 1.050.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tau niṣaṇṇau saṃprekṣya sukhāsīnau nṛpātmajau / śatānando muniśreṣṭhaṃ viśvāmitram athābravīt // 1.050.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api te muniśārdūla mama mātā yaśasvinī / darśitā rājaputrāya tapo dīrgham upāgatā // 1.050.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api rāme mahātejo mama mātā yaśasvinī / vanyair upāharat pūjāṃ pūjārhe sarvadehinām // 1.050.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api rāmāya kathitaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ purātanam / mama mātur mahātejo devena duranuṣṭhitam // 1.050.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api kauśika bhadraṃ te guruṇā mama saṃgatā / mātā mama muniśreṣṭha rāmasaṃdarśanād itaḥ // 1.050.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api me guruṇā rāmaḥ pūjitaḥ kuśikātmaja / ihāgato mahātejāḥ pūjāṃ prāpya mahātmanaḥ // 1.050.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api śāntena manasā gurur me kuśikātmaja / ihāgatena rāmeṇa prayatenābhivāditaḥ // 1.050.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / pratyuvāca śatānandaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam // 1.050.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātikrāntaṃ muniśreṣṭha yat kartavyaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā / saṃgatā muninā patnī bhārgaveṇeva reṇukā // 1.050.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ / śatānando mahātejā rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.050.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svāgataṃ te naraśreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava / viśvāmitraṃ puraskṛtya maharṣim aparājitam // 1.050.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acintyakarmā tapasā brahmarṣir amitaprabhaḥ / viśvāmitro mahātejā vetsy enaṃ paramāṃ gatim // 1.050.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāsti dhanyataro rāma tvatto 'nyo bhuvi kaś cana / goptā kuśikaputras te yena taptaṃ mahat tapaḥ // 1.050.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyatāṃ cābhidāsyāmi kauśikasya mahātmanaḥ / yathābalaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu // 1.050.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājābhūd eṣa dharmātmā dīrgha kālam ariṃdamaḥ / dharmajñaḥ kṛtavidyaś ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ // 1.050.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajāpatisutas tv āsīt kuśo nāma mahīpatiḥ / kuśasya putro balavān kuśanābhaḥ sudhārmikaḥ // 1.050.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśanābhasutas tv āsīd gādhir ity eva viśrutaḥ / gādheḥ putro mahātejā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ // 1.050.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvamitro mahātejāḥ pālayām āsa medinīm / bahuvarṣasahasrāṇi rājā rājyam akārayat // 1.050.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadā cit tu mahātejā yojayitvā varūthinīm / akṣauhiṇīparivṛtaḥ paricakrāma medinīm // 1.050.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nagarāṇi ca rāṣṭrāṇi saritaś ca tathā girīn / āśramān kramaśo rājā vicarann ājagāmaha // 1.050.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhasyāśramapadaṃ nānāpuṣpaphaladrumam / nānāmṛgagaṇākīrṇaṃ siddhacāraṇasevitam // 1.050.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavagandharvaiḥ kiṃnarair upaśobhitam / praśāntahariṇākīrṇaṃ dvijasaṃghaniṣevitam // 1.050.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmarṣigaṇasaṃkīrṇaṃ devarṣigaṇasevitam / tapaścaraṇasaṃsiddhair agnikalpair mahātmabhiḥ // 1.050.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satataṃ saṃkulaṃ śrīmad brahmakalpair mahātmabhiḥ / abbhakṣair vāyubhakṣaiś ca śīrṇaparṇāśanais tathā // 1.050.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phalamūlāśanair dāntair jitaroṣair jitendriyaiḥ / ṛṣibhir vālakhilyaiś ca japahomaparāyaṇaiḥ // 1.050.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhasyāśramapadaṃ brahmalokam ivāparam / dadarśa jayatāṃ śreṣṭha viśvāmitro mahābalaḥ // 1.050.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā paramaprīto viśvāmitro mahābalaḥ / praṇato vinayād vīro vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam // 1.051.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svāgataṃ tava cety ukto vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā / āsanaṃ cāsya bhagavān vasiṣṭho vyādideśa ha // 1.051.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upaviṣṭāya ca tadā viśvāmitrāya dhīmate / yathānyāyaṃ munivaraḥ phalamūlam upāharat // 1.051.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ vasiṣṭhād rājasattamaḥ / tapo'gnihotraśiṣyeṣu kuśalaṃ paryapṛcchata // 1.051.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitro mahātejā vanaspatigaṇe tathā / sarvatra kuśalaṃ cāha vasiṣṭho rājasattamam // 1.051.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukhopaviṣṭaṃ rājānaṃ viśvāmitraṃ mahātapāḥ / papraccha japatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭho brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ // 1.051.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit te kuśalaṃ rājan kaccid dharmeṇa rañjayan / prajāḥ pālayase rājan rājavṛttena dhārmika // 1.051.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit te subhṛtā bhṛtyāḥ kaccit tiṣṭhanti śāsane / kaccit te vijitāḥ sarve ripavo ripusūdana // 1.051.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid bale ca kośe ca mitreṣu ca paraṃtapa / kuśalaṃ te naravyāghra putrapautre tathānagha // 1.051.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvatra kuśalaṃ rājā vasiṣṭhaṃ pratyudāharat / viśvāmitro mahātejā vasiṣṭhaṃ vinayānvitaḥ // 1.051.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtvobhau suciraṃ kālaṃ dharmiṣṭhau tāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ / mudā paramayā yuktau prīyetāṃ tau parasparam // 1.051.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vasiṣṭho bhagavān kathānte raghunandana / viśvāmitram idaṃ vākyam uvāca prahasann iva // 1.051.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātithyaṃ kartum icchāmi balasyāsya mahābala / tava caivāprameyasya yathārhaṃ saṃpratīccha me // 1.051.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satkriyāṃ tu bhavān etāṃ pratīcchatu mayodyatām / rājaṃs tvam atithiśreṣṭhaḥ pūjanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ // 1.051.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto vasiṣṭhena viśvāmitro mahāmatiḥ / kṛtam ity abravīd rājā pūjāvākyena me tvayā // 1.051.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phalamūlena bhagavan vidyate yat tavāśrame / pādyenācamanīyena bhagavaddarśanena ca // 1.051.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā ca mahāprājña pūjārheṇa supūjitaḥ / gamiṣyāmi namas te 'stu maitreṇekṣasva cakṣuṣā // 1.051.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvantaṃ rājānaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ punar eva hi / nyamantrayata dharmātmā punaḥ punar udāradhīḥ // 1.051.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāḍham ity eva gādheyo vasiṣṭhaṃ pratyuvāca ha / yathā priyaṃ bhagavatas tathāstu munisattama // 1.051.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto mahātejā vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ / ājuhāva tataḥ prītaḥ kalmāṣīṃ dhūtakalmaṣaḥ // 1.051.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ehy ehi śabale kṣipraṃ śṛṇu cāpi vaco mama / sabalasyāsya rājarṣeḥ kartuṃ vyavasito 'smy aham // 1.051.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhojanena mahārheṇa satkāraṃ saṃvidhatsva me // 1.051.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya yasya yathākāmaṃ ṣaḍraseṣv abhipūjitam / tat sarvaṃ kāmadhug divye abhivarṣakṛte mama // 1.051.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rasenānnena pānena lehyacoṣyeṇa saṃyutam / annānāṃ nicayaṃ sarvaṃ sṛjasva śabale tvara // 1.051.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā vasiṣṭhena śabalā śatrusūdana / vidadhe kāmadhuk kāmān yasya yasya yathepsitam // 1.052.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣūn madhūṃs tathā lājān maireyāṃś ca varāsavān / pānāni ca mahārhāṇi bhakṣyāṃś coccāvacāṃs tathā // 1.052.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uṣṇāḍhyasyaudanasyāpi rāśayaḥ parvatopamāḥ / mṛṣṭānnāni ca sūpāś ca dadhikulyās tathaiva ca // 1.052.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāsvādurasānāṃ ca ṣāḍavānāṃ tathaiva ca / bhājanāni supūrṇāni gauḍāni ca sahasraśaḥ // 1.052.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvam āsīt susaṃtuṣṭaṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulam / viśvāmitrabalaṃ rāma vasiṣṭhenābhitarpitam // 1.052.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitro 'pi rājarṣir hṛṣṭapuṣṭas tadābhavat / sāntaḥ puravaro rājā sabrāhmaṇapurohitaḥ // 1.052.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāmātyo mantrisahitaḥ sabhṛtyaḥ pūjitas tadā / yuktaḥ pareṇa harṣeṇa vasiṣṭham idam abravīt // 1.052.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjito 'haṃ tvayā brahman pūjārheṇa susatkṛtaḥ / śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi vākyaṃ vākyaviśārada // 1.052.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gavāṃ śatasahasreṇa dīyatāṃ śabalā mama / ratnaṃ hi bhagavann etad ratnahārī ca pārthivaḥ // 1.052.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmān me śabalāṃ dehi mamaiṣā dharmato dvija // 1.052.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu bhagavān vasiṣṭho munisattamaḥ / viśvāmitreṇa dharmātmā pratyuvāca mahīpatim // 1.052.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāhaṃ śatasahasreṇa nāpi koṭiśatair gavām / rājan dāsyāmi śabalāṃ rāśibhī rajatasya vā // 1.052.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na parityāgam arheyaṃ matsakāśād ariṃdama / śāśvatī śabalā mahyaṃ kīrtir ātmavato yathā // 1.052.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asyāṃ havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ ca prāṇayātrā tathaiva ca / āyattam agnihotraṃ ca balir homas tathaiva ca // 1.052.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svāhākāravaṣaṭkārau vidyāś ca vividhās tathā / āyattam atra rājarṣe sarvam etan na saṃśayaḥ // 1.052.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarva svam etat satyena mama tuṣṭikarī sadā / kāraṇair bahubhī rājan na dāsye śabalāṃ tava // 1.052.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhenaivam uktas tu viśvāmitro 'bravīt tataḥ / saṃrabdhataram atyarthaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ // 1.052.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hairaṇyakakṣyāgraiveyān suvarṇāṅkuśabhūṣitān / dadāmi kuñjarāṇāṃ te sahasrāṇi caturdaśa // 1.052.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hairaṇyānāṃ rathānāṃ ca śvetāśvānāṃ caturyujām / dadāmi te śatāny aṣṭau kiṅkiṇīkavibhūṣitān // 1.052.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hayānāṃ deśajātānāṃ kulajānāṃ mahaujasām / sahasram ekaṃ daśa ca dadāmi tava suvrata // 1.052.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāvarṇavibhaktānāṃ vayaḥsthānāṃ tathaiva ca / dadāmy ekāṃ gavāṃ koṭiṃ śabalā dīyatāṃ mama // 1.052.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu bhagavān viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā / na dāsyāmīti śabalāṃ prāha rājan kathaṃ cana // 1.052.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad eva hi me ratnam etad eva hi me dhanam / etad eva hi sarvasvam etad eva hi jīvitam // 1.052.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśaś ca pūrṇamāsaś ca yajñāś caivāptadakṣiṇāḥ / etad eva hi me rājan vividhāś ca kriyās tathā // 1.052.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adomūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā mama rājan na saṃśayaḥ / bahūnāṃ kiṃ pralāpena na dāsye kāmadohinīm // 1.052.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmadhenuṃ vasiṣṭho 'pi yadā na tyajate muniḥ / tadāsya śabalāṃ rāma viśvāmitro 'nvakarṣata // 1.053.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīyamānā tu śabalā rāma rājñā mahātmanā / duḥkhitā cintayām āsa rudantī śokakarśitā // 1.053.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parityaktā vasiṣṭhena kim ahaṃ sumahātmanā / yāhaṃ rājabhṛtair dīnā hriyeyaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitā // 1.053.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ mayāpakṛtaṃ tasya maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ / yan mām anāgasaṃ bhaktām iṣṭāṃ tyajati dhārmikaḥ // 1.053.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti sā cintayitvā tu niḥśvasya ca punaḥ punaḥ / jagāma vegena tadā vasiṣṭhaṃ paramaujasaṃ // 1.053.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirdhūya tāṃs tadā bhṛtyāñ śataśaḥ śatrusūdana / jagāmānilavegena pādamūlaṃ mahātmanaḥ // 1.053.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śabalā sā rudantī ca krośantī cedam abravīt / vasiṣṭhasyāgrataḥ sthitvā meghadundubhirāviṇī // 1.053.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan kiṃ parityaktā tvayāhaṃ brahmaṇaḥ suta / yasmād rājabhṛtā māṃ hi nayante tvatsakāśataḥ // 1.053.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu brahmarṣir idaṃ vacanam abravīt / śokasaṃtaptahṛdayāṃ svasāram iva duḥkhitām // 1.053.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tvāṃ tyajāmi śabale nāpi me 'pakṛtaṃ tvayā / eṣa tvāṃ nayate rājā balān matto mahābalaḥ // 1.053.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi tulyaṃ balaṃ mahyaṃ rājā tv adya viśeṣataḥ / balī rājā kṣatriyaś ca pṛthivyāḥ patir eva ca // 1.053.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyam akṣauhiṇīpūrṇā savājirathasaṃkulā / hastidhvajasamākīrṇā tenāsau balavattaraḥ // 1.053.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā vasiṣṭhena pratyuvāca vinītavat / vacanaṃ vacanajñā sā brahmarṣim amitaprabham // 1.053.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na balaṃ kṣatriyasyāhur brāhmaṇo balavattaraḥ / brahman brahmabalaṃ divyaṃ kṣatrāt tu balavattaram // 1.053.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aprameyabalaṃ tubhyaṃ na tvayā balavattaraḥ / viśvāmitro mahāvīryas tejas tava durāsadam // 1.053.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niyuṅkṣva māṃ mahātejas tvadbrahmabalasaṃbhṛtām / tasya darpaṃ balaṃ yat tan nāśayāmi durātmanaḥ // 1.053.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktas tu tayā rāma vasiṣṭhaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ / sṛjasveti tadovāca balaṃ parabalārujam // 1.053.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyā humbhāravotsṛṣṭāḥ pahlavāḥ śataśo nṛpa / nāśayanti balaṃ sarvaṃ viśvāmitrasya paśyataḥ // 1.053.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā paramakruddhaḥ krodhavisphāritekṣaṇaḥ / pahlavān nāśayām āsa śastrair uccāvacair api // 1.053.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitrārditān dṛṣṭvā pahlavāñ śataśas tadā / bhūya evāsṛjad ghorāñ śakān yavanamiśritān // 1.053.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair āsīt saṃvṛtā bhūmiḥ śakair yavanamiśritaiḥ / prabhāvadbhir mahāvīryair hemakiñjalkasaṃnibhaiḥ // 1.053.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīrghāsipaṭṭiśadharair hemavarṇāmbarāvṛtaiḥ / nirdagdhaṃ tad balaṃ sarvaṃ pradīptair iva pāvakaiḥ // 1.053.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'strāṇi mahātejā viśvāmitro mumoca ha // 1.053.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tān ākulān dṛṣṭvā viśvāmitrāstramohitān / vasiṣṭhaś codayām āsa kāmadhuk sṛja yogataḥ // 1.054.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyā humbhāravāj jātāḥ kāmbojā ravisaṃnibhāḥ / ūdhasas tv atha saṃjātāḥ pahlavāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ // 1.054.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yonideśāc ca yavanaḥ śakṛddeśāc chakās tathā / romakūpeṣu mecchāś ca harītāḥ sakirātakāḥ // 1.054.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tais tan niṣūditaṃ sainyaṃ viśvamitrasya tatkṣaṇāt / sapadātigajaṃ sāśvaṃ sarathaṃ raghunandana // 1.054.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā niṣūditaṃ sainyaṃ vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā / viśvāmitrasutānāṃ tu śataṃ nānāvidhāyudham // 1.054.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddhaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam / huṃkāreṇaiva tān sarvān nirdadāha mahān ṛṣiḥ // 1.054.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te sāśvarathapādātā vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā / bhasmīkṛtā muhūrtena viśvāmitrasutās tadā // 1.054.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā vināśitān putrān balaṃ ca sumahāyaśāḥ / savrīḍaś cintayāviṣṭo viśvāmitro 'bhavat tadā // 1.054.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃdura iva nirvego bhagnadaṃṣṭra ivoragaḥ / uparakta ivādityaḥ sadyo niṣprabhatāṃ gataḥ // 1.054.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hataputrabalo dīno lūnapakṣa iva dvijaḥ / hatadarpo hatotsāho nirvedaṃ samapadyata // 1.054.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa putram ekaṃ rājyāya pālayeti niyujya ca / pṛthivīṃ kṣatradharmeṇa vanam evānvapadyata // 1.054.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā himavatpārśvaṃ kiṃnaroragasevitam / mahādevaprasādārthaṃ tapas tepe mahātapāḥ // 1.054.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kena cit tv atha kālena deveśo vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ / darśayām āsa varado viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim // 1.054.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kimarthaṃ tapyase rājan brūhi yat te vivakṣitam / varado 'smi varo yas te kāṅkṣitaḥ so 'bhidhīyatām // 1.054.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu devena viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ / praṇipatya mahādevam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.054.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tuṣṭo mahādeva dhanurvedo mamānagha / sāṅgopāṅgopaniṣadaḥ sarahasyaḥ pradīyatām // 1.054.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāni deveṣu cāstrāṇi dānaveṣu maharṣiṣu / gandharvayakṣarakṣaḥsu pratibhāntu mamānagha // 1.054.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava prasādād bhavatu devadeva mamepsitam / evam astv iti deveśo vākyam uktvā divaṃ gataḥ // 1.054.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāpya cāstrāṇi rājarṣir viśvāmitro mahābalaḥ / darpeṇa mahatā yukto darpapūrṇo 'bhavat tadā // 1.054.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivardhamāno vīryeṇa samudra iva parvaṇi / hatam eva tadā mene vasiṣṭham ṛṣisattamam // 1.054.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gatvāśramapadaṃ mumocāstrāṇi pārthivaḥ / yais tat tapovanaṃ sarvaṃ nirdagdhaṃ cāstratejasā // 1.054.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udīryamāṇam astraṃ tad viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ / dṛṣṭvā vipradrutā bhītā munayaḥ śataśo diśaḥ // 1.054.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhasya ca ye śiṣyās tathaiva mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / vidravanti bhayād bhītā nānādigbhyaḥ sahasraśaḥ // 1.054.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhasyāśramapadaṃ śūnyam āsīn mahātmanaḥ / muhūrtam iva niḥśabdam āsīd īriṇasaṃnibham // 1.054.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadato vai vasiṣṭhasya mā bhaiṣṭeti muhur muhuḥ / nāśayāmy adya gādheyaṃ nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ // 1.054.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātejā vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ / viśvāmitraṃ tadā vākyaṃ saroṣam idam abravīt // 1.054.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśramaṃ cirasaṃvṛddhaṃ yad vināśitavān asi / durācāro 'si yan mūḍha tasmāt tvaṃ na bhaviṣyasi // 1.054.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā paramakruddho daṇḍam udyamya satvaraḥ / vidhūma iva kālāgnir yamadaṇḍam ivāparam // 1.054.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto vasiṣṭhena viśvāmitro mahābalaḥ / āgneyam astram utkṣipya tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt // 1.055.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭho bhagavān krodhād idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.055.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatrabandho sthito 'smy eṣa yad balaṃ tad vidarśaya / nāśayāmy eṣa te darpaṃ śastrasya tava gādhija // 1.055.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva ca te kṣatriyabalaṃ kva ca brahmabalaṃ mahat / paśya brahmabalaṃ divyaṃ mama kṣatriyapāṃsana // 1.055.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāstraṃ gādhiputrasya ghoram āgneyam uttamam / brahmadaṇḍena tac chāntam agner vega ivāmbhasā // 1.055.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāruṇaṃ caiva raudraṃ ca aindraṃ pāśupataṃ tathā / aiṣīkaṃ cāpi cikṣepa ruṣito gādhinandanaḥ // 1.055.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānavaṃ mohanaṃ caiva gāndharvaṃ svāpanaṃ tathā / jṛmbhaṇaṃ mohanaṃ caiva saṃtāpanavilāpane // 1.055.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śoṣaṇaṃ dāraṇaṃ caiva vajram astraṃ sudurjayam / brahmapāśaṃ kālapāśaṃ vāruṇaṃ pāśam eva ca // 1.055.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pinākāstraṃ ca dayitaṃ śuṣkārdre aśanī tathā / daṇḍāstram atha paiśācaṃ krauñcam astraṃ tathāiva ca // 1.055.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmacakraṃ kālacakraṃ viṣṇucakraṃ tathaiva ca / vāyavyaṃ mathanaṃ caiva astraṃ hayaśiras tathā // 1.055.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaktidvayaṃ ca cikṣepa kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā / vaidyādharaṃ mahāstraṃ ca kālāstram atha dāruṇam // 1.055.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triśūlam astraṃ ghoraṃ ca kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam / etāny astrāṇi cikṣepa sarvāṇi raghunandana // 1.055.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhe japatāṃ śreṣṭhe tad adbhutam ivābhavat / tāni sarvāṇi daṇḍena grasate brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ // 1.055.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣu śānteṣu brahmāstraṃ kṣiptavān gādhinandanaḥ / tad astram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ // 1.055.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devarṣayaś ca saṃbhrāntā gandharvāḥ samahoragāḥ / trailokyam āsīt saṃtrastaṃ brahmāstre samudīrite // 1.055.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad apy astraṃ mahāghoraṃ brāhmaṃ brāhmeṇa tejasā / vasiṣṭho grasate sarvaṃ brahmadaṇḍena rāghava // 1.055.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmāstraṃ grasamānasya vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ / trailokyamohanaṃ raudraṃ rūpam āsīt sudāruṇam // 1.055.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
romakūpeṣu sarveṣu vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ / marīcya iva niṣpetur agner dhūmākulārciṣaḥ // 1.055.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prājvalad brahmadaṇḍaś ca vasiṣṭhasya karodyataḥ / vidhūma iva kālāgnir yamadaṇḍa ivāparaḥ // 1.055.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'stuvan munigaṇā vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam / amoghaṃ te balaṃ brahmaṃs tejo dhāraya tejasā // 1.055.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nigṛhītas tvayā brahman viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ / prasīda japatāṃ śreṣṭha lokāḥ santu gatavyathāḥ // 1.055.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto mahātejāḥ śamaṃ cakre mahātapāḥ / viśvāmitro 'pi nikṛto viniḥśvasyedam abravīt // 1.055.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhig balaṃ kṣatriyabalaṃ brahmatejobalaṃ balam / ekena brahmadaṇḍena sarvāstrāṇi hatāni me // 1.055.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad etat samavekṣyāhaṃ prasannendriyamānasaḥ / tapo mahat samāsthāsye yad vai brahmatvakārakam // 1.055.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃtaptahṛdayaḥ smaran nigraham ātmanaḥ / viniḥśvasya viniḥśvasya kṛtavairo mahātmanā // 1.056.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ gatvā mahiṣyā saha rāghava / tatāpa paramaṃ ghoraṃ viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ // 1.056.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phalamūlāśano dāntaś cacāra paramaṃ tapaḥ // 1.056.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāsya jajñire putrāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥ / haviṣpando madhuṣpando dṛḍhanetro mahārathaḥ // 1.056.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ / abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ viśvāmitraṃ tapodhanam // 1.056.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jitā rājarṣilokās te tapasā kuśikātmaja / anena tapasā tvāṃ hi rājarṣir iti vidmahe // 1.056.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātejā jagāma saha daivataiḥ / triviṣṭapaṃ brahmalokaṃ lokānāṃ parameśvaraḥ // 1.056.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitro 'pi tac chrutvā hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ / duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭaḥ samanyur idam abravīt // 1.056.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapaś ca sumahat taptaṃ rājarṣir iti māṃ viduḥ / devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve nāsti manye tapaḥphalam // 1.056.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ niścitya manasā bhūya eva mahātapāḥ / tapaś cacāra kākutstha paramaṃ paramātmavān // 1.056.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn eva kāle tu satyavādī jitendriyaḥ / triśaṅkur iti vikhyāta ikṣvāku kulanandanaḥ // 1.056.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā yajeyam iti rāghava / gaccheyaṃ svaśarīreṇa devānāṃ paramāṃ gatim // 1.056.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vasiṣṭhaṃ samāhūya kathayām āsa cintitam / aśakyam iti cāpy ukto vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā // 1.056.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyākhyāto vasiṣṭhena sa yayau dakṣiṇāṃ diśam / vasiṣṭhā dīrgha tapasas tapo yatra hi tepire // 1.056.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triśaṅkuḥ sumahātejāḥ śataṃ paramabhāsvaram / vasiṣṭhaputrān dadṛśe tapyamānān yaśasvinaḥ // 1.056.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhigamya mahātmānaḥ sarvān eva guroḥ sutān / abhivādyānupūrvyeṇa hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ // 1.056.015.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīt sumahātejāḥ sarvān eva kṛtāñjaliḥ // 1.056.015.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaraṇaṃ vaḥ prapadye 'haṃ śaraṇyāñ śaraṇāgataḥ / pratyākhyāto 'smi bhadraṃ vo vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā // 1.056.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaṣṭukāmo mahāyajñaṃ tad anujñātum arthatha / guruputrān ahaṃ sarvān namaskṛtya prasādaye // 1.056.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śirasā praṇato yāce brāhmaṇāṃs tapasi sthitān / te māṃ bhavantaḥ siddhyarthaṃ yājayantu samāhitāḥ // 1.056.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saśarīro yathāhaṃ hi devalokam avāpnuyām // 1.056.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyākhyāto vasiṣṭhena gatim anyāṃ tapodhanāḥ / guruputrān ṛte sarvān nāhaṃ paśyāmi kāṃ cana // 1.056.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ / tasmād anantaraṃ sarve bhavanto daivataṃ mama // 1.056.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas triśaṅkor vacanaṃ śrutvā krodhasamanvitam / ṛṣiputraśataṃ rāma rājānam idam abravīt // 1.057.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyākhyāto 'si durbuddhe guruṇā satyavādinā / taṃ kathaṃ samatikramya śākhāntaram upeyivān // 1.057.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ / na cātikramituṃ śakyaṃ vacanaṃ satyavādinaḥ // 1.057.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśakyam iti covāca vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / taṃ vayaṃ vai samāhartuṃ kratuṃ śaktāḥ kathaṃ tava // 1.057.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāliśas tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gamyatāṃ svapuraṃ punaḥ / yājane bhagavāñ śaktas trailokyasyāpi pārthiva // 1.057.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā krodhaparyākulākṣaram / sa rājā punar evaitān idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.057.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyākhyāto 'smi guruṇā guruputrais tathaiva ca / anyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu tapodhanāḥ // 1.057.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣiputrās tu tac chrutvā vākyaṃ ghorābhisaṃhitam / śepuḥ paramasaṃkruddhāś caṇḍālatvaṃ gamiṣyasi // 1.057.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātmāno viviśus te svam āśramam // 1.057.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ / nīlavastradharo nīlaḥ paruṣo dhvastamūrdhajaḥ // 1.057.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cityamālyānulepaś ca āyasābharaṇo 'bhavat // 1.057.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā mantriṇaḥ sarve tyaktvā caṇḍālarūpiṇam / prādravan sahitā rāma paurā ye 'syānugāminaḥ // 1.057.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eko hi rājā kākutstha jagāma paramātmavān / dahyamāno divārātraṃ viśvāmitraṃ tapodhanam // 1.057.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitras tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ viphalīkṛtam / caṇḍālarūpiṇaṃ rāma muniḥ kāruṇyam āgataḥ // 1.057.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāruṇyāt sa mahātejā vākyaṃ parama dhārmikaḥ / idaṃ jagāda bhadraṃ te rājānaṃ ghoradarśanam // 1.057.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim āgamanakāryaṃ te rājaputra mahābala / ayodhyādhipate vīra śāpāc caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ // 1.057.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tad vākyam ākarṇya rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ / abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam // 1.057.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyākhyāto 'smi guruṇā guruputrais tathaiva ca / anavāpyaiva taṃ kāmaṃ mayā prāpto viparyayaḥ // 1.057.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saśarīro divaṃ yāyām iti me saumyadarśanam / mayā ceṣṭaṃ kratuśataṃ tac ca nāvāpyate phalam // 1.057.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anṛtaṃ nokta pūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana / kṛcchreṣv api gataḥ saumya kṣatradharmeṇa te śape // 1.057.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajñair bahuvidhair iṣṭaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālitāḥ / guravaś ca mahātmānaḥ śīlavṛttena toṣitāḥ // 1.057.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharme prayatamānasya yajñaṃ cāhartum icchataḥ / paritoṣaṃ na gacchanti guravo munipuṃgava // 1.057.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daivam eva paraṃ manye pauruṣaṃ tu nirarthakam / daivenākramyate sarvaṃ daivaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ // 1.057.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya me paramārtasya prasādam abhikāṅkṣataḥ / kartum arhasi bhadraṃ te daivopahatakarmaṇaḥ // 1.057.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi nānyaḥ śaraṇam asti me / daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa nivartayitum arhasi // 1.057.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uktavākyaṃ tu rājānaṃ kṛpayā kuśikātmajaḥ / abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ sākṣāc caṇḍālarūpiṇam // 1.058.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvāko svāgataṃ vatsa jānāmi tvāṃ sudhārmikam / śaraṇaṃ te bhaviṣyāmi mā bhaiṣīr nṛpapuṃgava // 1.058.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham āmantraye sarvān maharṣīn puṇyakarmaṇaḥ / yajñasāhyakarān rājaṃs tato yakṣyasi nirvṛtaḥ // 1.058.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guruśāpakṛtaṃ rūpaṃ yad idaṃ tvayi vartate / anena saha rūpeṇa saśarīro gamiṣyasi // 1.058.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hastaprāptam ahaṃ manye svargaṃ tava nareśvara / yas tvaṃ kauśikam āgamya śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // 1.058.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātejāḥ putrān paramadhārmikān / vyādideśa mahāprājñān yajñasaṃbhārakāraṇāt // 1.058.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvāñ śiṣyān samāhūya vākyam etad uvāca ha // 1.058.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvān ṛṣivarān vatsā ānayadhvaṃ mamājñayā / saśiṣyān suhṛdaś caiva sartvijaḥ subahuśrutān // 1.058.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad anyo vacanaṃ brūyān madvākyabalacoditaḥ / tat sarvam akhilenoktaṃ mamākhyeyam anādṛtam // 1.058.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā diśo jagmus tadājñayā / ājagmur atha deśebhyaḥ sarvebhyo brahmavādinaḥ // 1.058.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te ca śiṣyāḥ samāgamya muniṃ jvalitatejasaṃ / ūcuś ca vacanaṃ sarve sarveṣāṃ brahmavādinām // 1.058.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā te vacanaṃ sarve samāyānti dvijātayaḥ / sarvadeśeṣu cāgacchan varjayitvā mahodayam // 1.058.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāsiṣṭhaṃ tac chataṃ sarvaṃ krodhaparyākulākṣaram / yad āha vacanaṃ sarvaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ munipuṃgava // 1.058.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatriyo yājako yasya caṇḍālasya viśeṣataḥ / kathaṃ sadasi bhoktāro havis tasya surarṣayaḥ // 1.058.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇā vā mahātmāno bhuktvā caṇḍālabhojanam / kathaṃ svargaṃ gamiṣyanti viśvāmitreṇa pālitāḥ // 1.058.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad vacanaṃ naiṣṭhuryam ūcuḥ saṃraktalocanāḥ / vāsiṣṭhā muniśārdūla sarve te samahodayāḥ // 1.058.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ munipuṃgavaḥ / krodhasaṃraktanayanaḥ saroṣam idam abravīt // 1.058.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad dūṣayanty aduṣṭaṃ māṃ tapa ugraṃ samāsthitam / bhasmībhūtā durātmāno bhaviṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ // 1.058.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya te kālapāśena nītā vaivasvatakṣayam / saptajātiśatāny eva mṛtapāḥ santu sarvaśaḥ // 1.058.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvamāṃsaniyatāhārā muṣṭikā nāma nirghṛṇāḥ / vikṛtāś ca virūpāś ca lokān anucarantv imān // 1.058.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahodayaś ca durbuddhir mām adūṣyaṃ hy adūṣayat / dūṣiṭaḥ sarvalokeṣu niṣādatvaṃ gamiṣyati // 1.058.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāṇātipātanirato niranukrośatāṃ gataḥ / dīrghakālaṃ mama krodhād durgatiṃ vartayiṣyati // 1.058.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ / virarāma mahātejā ṛṣimadhye mahāmuniḥ // 1.058.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapobalahatān kṛtvā vāsiṣṭhān samahodayān / ṛṣimadhye mahātejā viśvāmitro 'bhyabhāṣata // 1.059.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayam ikṣvākudāyādas triśaṅkur iti viśrutaḥ / dharmiṣṭhaś ca vadānyaś ca māṃ caiva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // 1.059.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svenānena śarīreṇa devalokajigīṣayā // 1.059.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāyaṃ svaśarīreṇa devalokaṃ gamiṣyati / tathā pravartyatāṃ yajño bhavadbhiś ca mayā saha // 1.059.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitravacaḥ śrutvā sarva eva maharṣayaḥ / ūcuḥ sametya sahitā dharmajñā dharmasaṃhitam // 1.059.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ kuśikadāyādo muniḥ paramakopanaḥ / yad āha vacanaṃ samyag etat kāryaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // 1.059.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agnikalpo hi bhagavāñ śāpaṃ dāsyati roṣitaḥ / tasmāt pravartyatāṃ yajñaḥ saśarīro yathā divam // 1.059.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gacched ikṣvākudāyādo viśvāmitrasya tejasā // 1.059.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pravartyatāṃ yajñaḥ sarve samadhitiṣṭhate // 1.059.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā maharṣayaḥ saṃjahrus tāḥ kriyās tadā / yājakāś ca mahātejā viśvāmitro 'bhavat kratau // 1.059.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛtvijaś cānupūrvyeṇa mantravan mantrakovidāḥ / cakruḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi yathākalpaṃ yathāvidhi // 1.059.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kālena mahatā viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ / cakārāvāhanaṃ tatra bhāgārthaṃ sarvadevatāḥ // 1.059.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāhyāgamaṃs tadāhūtā bhāgārthaṃ sarvadevatāḥ / tataḥ krodhasamāviṣṭo viśvamitro mahāmuniḥ // 1.059.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sruvam udyamya sakrodhas triśaṅkum idam abravīt / paśya me tapaso vīryaṃ svārjitasya nareśvara // 1.059.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa tvāṃ svaśarīreṇa nayāmi svargam ojasā / duṣprāpaṃ svaśarīreṇa divaṃ gaccha narādhipa // 1.059.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svārjitaṃ kiṃ cid apy asti mayā hi tapasaḥ phalam / rājaṃs tvaṃ tejasā tasya saśarīro divaṃ vraja // 1.059.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uktavākye munau tasmin saśarīro nareśvaraḥ / divaṃ jagāma kākutstha munīnāṃ paśyatāṃ tadā // 1.059.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devalokagataṃ dṛṣṭvā triśaṅkuṃ pākaśāsanaḥ / saha sarvaiḥ suragaṇair idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 1.059.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triśaṅko gaccha bhūyas tvaṃ nāsi svargakṛtālayaḥ / guruśāpahato mūḍha pata bhūmim avākśirāḥ // 1.059.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto mahendreṇa triśaṅkur apatat punaḥ / vikrośamānas trāhīti viśvāmitraṃ tapodhanam // 1.059.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya krośamānasya kauśikaḥ / roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt // 1.059.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣimadhye sa tejasvī prajāpatir ivāparaḥ / sṛjan dakṣiṇamārgasthān saptarṣīn aparān punaḥ // 1.059.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nakṣatramālām aparām asṛjat krodhamūrchitaḥ / dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya munimadhye mahāyaśāḥ // 1.059.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sṛṣṭvā nakṣatravaṃśaṃ ca krodhena kaluṣīkṛtaḥ / anyam indraṃ kariṣyāmi loko vā syād anindrakaḥ // 1.059.022.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daivatāny api sa krodhāt sraṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // 1.059.022.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paramasaṃbhrāntāḥ sarṣisaṃghāḥ surarṣabhāḥ / viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānam ūcuḥ sānunayaṃ vacaḥ // 1.059.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ rājā mahābhāga guruśāpaparikṣataḥ / saśarīro divaṃ yātuṃ nārhaty eva tapodhana // 1.059.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā devānāṃ munipuṃgavaḥ / abravīt sumahad vākyaṃ kauśikaḥ sarvadevatāḥ // 1.059.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saśarīrasya bhadraṃ vas triśaṅkor asya bhūpateḥ / ārohaṇaṃ pratijñāya nānṛtaṃ kartum utsahe // 1.059.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sargo 'stu saśarīrasya triśaṅkor asya śāśvataḥ / nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi māmakāni dhruvāṇy atha // 1.059.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāval lokā dhariṣyanti tiṣṭhantv etāni sarvaśaḥ / matkṛtāni surāḥ sarve tad anujñātum arhatha // 1.059.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktāḥ surāḥ sarve pratyūcur munipuṃgavam // 1.059.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te tiṣṭhantv etāni sarvaśaḥ / gagane tāny anekāni vaiśvānarapathād bahiḥ // 1.059.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nakṣatrāṇi muniśreṣṭha teṣu jyotiḥṣu jājvalan / avākśirās triśaṅkuś ca tiṣṭhatv amarasaṃnibhaḥ // 1.059.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā sarvadevair abhiṣṭutaḥ / ṛṣibhiś ca mahātejā bāḍham ity āha devatāḥ // 1.059.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devā mahātmāno munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ / jagmur yathāgataṃ sarve yajñasyānte narottama // 1.059.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitro mahātmātha prasthitān prekṣya tān ṛṣīn / abravīn naraśārdūla sarvāṃs tān vanavāsinaḥ // 1.060.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāvighnaḥ pravṛtto 'yaṃ dakṣiṇām āsthito diśam / diśam anyāṃ prapatsyāmas tatra tapsyāmahe tapaḥ // 1.060.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paścimāyāṃ viśālāyāṃ puṣkareṣu mahātmanaḥ / sukhaṃ tapaś cariṣyāmaḥ paraṃ tad dhi tapovanam // 1.060.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātejāḥ puṣkareṣu mahāmuniḥ / tapa ugraṃ durādharṣaṃ tepe mūlaphalāśanaḥ // 1.060.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn eva kāle tu ayodhyādhipatir nṛpaḥ / ambarīṣa iti khyāto yaṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // 1.060.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya vai yajamānasya paśum indro jahāra ha / pranaṣṭe tu paśau vipro rājānam idam abravīt // 1.060.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśur adya hṛto rājan pranaṣṭas tava durnayāt / arakṣitāraṃ rājānaṃ ghnanti doṣā nareśvara // 1.060.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāyaścittaṃ mahad dhy etan naraṃ vā puruṣarṣabha / ānayasva paśuṃ śīghraṃ yāvat karma pravartate // 1.060.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upādhyāya vacaḥ śrutvā sa rājā puruṣarṣabha / anviyeṣa mahābuddhiḥ paśuṃ gobhiḥ sahasraśaḥ // 1.060.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
deśāñ janapadāṃs tāṃs tān nagarāṇi vanāni ca / āśramāṇi ca puṇyāni mārgamāṇo mahīpatiḥ // 1.060.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa putrasahitaṃ tāta sabhāryaṃ raghunandana / bhṛgutunde samāsīnam ṛcīkaṃ saṃdadarśa ha // 1.060.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca mahātejāḥ praṇamyābhiprasādya ca / brahmarṣiṃ tapasā dīptaṃ rājarṣir amitaprabhaḥ // 1.060.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣṭvā sarvatra kuśalam ṛcīkaṃ tam idaṃ vacaḥ // 1.060.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gavāṃ śatasahasreṇa vikriṇīṣe sutaṃ yadi / paśor arthe mahābhāga kṛtakṛtyo 'smi bhārgava // 1.060.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve parisṛtā deśā yajñiyaṃ na labhe paśum / dātum arhasi mūlyena sutam ekam ito mama // 1.060.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto mahātejā ṛcīkas tv abravīd vacaḥ / nāhaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ naraśreṣṭhaṃ vikrīṇīyāṃ kathaṃ cana // 1.060.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛcīkasya vacaḥ śrutvā teṣāṃ mātā mahātmanām / uvāca naraśārdūlam ambarīṣaṃ tapasvinī // 1.060.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamāpi dayitaṃ viddhi kaniṣṭhaṃ śunakaṃ nṛpa // 1.060.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāyeṇa hi naraśreṣṭha jyeṣṭhāḥ pitṛṣu vallabhāḥ / mātḥṇāṃ ca kanīyāṃsas tasmād rakṣe kanīyasaṃ // 1.060.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uktavākye munau tasmin munipatnyāṃ tathaiva ca / śunaḥśepaḥ svayaṃ rāma madhyamo vākyam abravīt // 1.060.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitā jyeṣṭham avikreyaṃ mātā cāha kanīyasaṃ / vikrītaṃ madhyamaṃ manye rājan putraṃ nayasva mām // 1.060.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gavāṃ śatasahasreṇa śunaḥśepaṃ nareśvaraḥ / gṛhītvā paramaprīto jagāma raghunandana // 1.060.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ambarīṣas tu rājarṣī ratham āropya satvaraḥ / śunaḥśepaṃ mahātejā jagāmāśu mahāyaśāḥ // 1.060.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śunaḥśepaṃ naraśreṣṭha gṛhītvā tu mahāyaśāḥ / vyaśrāmyat puṣkare rājā madhyāhne raghunandana // 1.061.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya viśramamāṇasya śunaḥśepo mahāyaśāḥ / puṣkaraṃ śreṣṭham āgamya viśvāmitraṃ dadarśa ha // 1.061.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣaṇṇavadano dīnas tṛṣṇayā ca śrameṇa ca / papātāṅke mune rāma vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // 1.061.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na me 'sti mātā na pitā jñātayo bāndhavāḥ kutaḥ / trātum arhasi māṃ saumya dharmeṇa munipuṃgava // 1.061.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trātā tvaṃ hi muniśreṣṭha sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ hi bhāvanaḥ / rājā ca kṛtakāryaḥ syād ahaṃ dīrghāyur avyayaḥ // 1.061.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svargalokam upāśnīyāṃ tapas taptvā hy anuttamam / sa me nātho hy anāthasya bhava bhavyena cetasā // 1.061.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
piteva putraṃ dharmātmaṃs trātum arhasi kilbiṣāt // 1.061.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ / sāntvayitvā bahuvidhaṃ putrān idam uvāca ha // 1.061.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatkṛte pitaraḥ putrāñ janayanti śubhārthinaḥ / paralokahitārthāya tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ // 1.061.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ munisuto bālo mattaḥ śaraṇam icchati / asya jīvitamātreṇa priyaṃ kuruta putrakāḥ // 1.061.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve sukṛtakarmāṇaḥ sarve dharmaparāyaṇāḥ / paśubhūtā narendrasya tṛptim agneḥ prayacchata // 1.061.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāthavāṃś ca śunaḥśepo yajñaś cāvighnato bhavet / devatās tarpitāś ca syur mama cāpi kṛtaṃ vacaḥ // 1.061.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
munes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā madhuṣyandādayaḥ sutāḥ / sābhimānaṃ naraśreṣṭha salīlam idam abruvan // 1.061.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
katham ātmasutān hitvā trāyase 'nyasutaṃ vibho / akāryam iva paśyāmaḥ śvamāṃsam iva bhojane // 1.061.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā putrāṇāṃ munipuṃgavaḥ / krodhasaṃraktanayano vyāhartum upacakrame // 1.061.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niḥsādhvasam idaṃ proktaṃ dharmād api vigarhitam / atikramya tu madvākyaṃ dāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam // 1.061.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvamāṃsabhojinaḥ sarve vāsiṣṭhā iva jātiṣu / pūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu pṛthivyām anuvatsyatha // 1.061.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtvā śāpasamāyuktān putrān munivaras tadā / śunaḥśepam uvācārtaṃ kṛtvā rakṣāṃ nirāmayām // 1.061.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pavitrapāśair āsakto raktamālyānulepanaḥ / vaiṣṇavaṃ yūpam āsādya vāgbhir agnim udāhara // 1.061.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime tu gāthe dve divye gāyethā muniputraka / ambarīṣasya yajñe 'smiṃs tataḥ siddhim avāpsyasi // 1.061.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śunaḥśepo gṛhītvā te dve gāthe susamāhitaḥ / tvarayā rājasiṃhaṃ tam ambarīṣam uvāca ha // 1.061.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājasiṃha mahāsattva śīghraṃ gacchāvahe sadaḥ / nivartayasva rājendra dīkṣāṃ ca samupāhara // 1.061.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vākyam ṛṣiputrasya śrutvā harṣaṃ samutsukaḥ / jagāma nṛpatiḥ śīghraṃ yajñavāṭam atandritaḥ // 1.061.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadasyānumate rājā pavitrakṛtalakṣaṇam / paśuṃ raktāmbaraṃ kṛtvā yūpe taṃ samabandhayat // 1.061.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa baddho vāgbhir agryābhir abhituṣṭāva vai surau / indram indrānujaṃ caiva yathāvan muniputrakaḥ // 1.061.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prītaḥ sahasrākṣo rahasyastutitarpitaḥ / dīrgham āyus tadā prādāc chunaḥśepāya rāghava // 1.061.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca rājā naraśreṣṭha yajñasya ca samāptavān / phalaṃ bahuguṇaṃ rāma sahasrākṣaprasādajam // 1.061.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitro 'pi dharmātmā bhūyas tepe mahātapāḥ / puṣkareṣu naraśreṣṭha daśavarṣaśatāni ca // 1.061.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu vratasnātaṃ mahāmunim / abhyāgacchan surāḥ sarve tapaḥphalacikīrṣavaḥ // 1.062.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīt sumahātejā brahmā suruciraṃ vacaḥ / ṛṣis tvam asi bhadraṃ te svārjitaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ // 1.062.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evam uktvā deveśas tridivaṃ punar abhyagāt / viśvāmitro mahātejā bhūyas tepe mahat tapaḥ // 1.062.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kālena mahatā menakā paramāpsarāḥ / puṣkareṣu naraśreṣṭha snātuṃ samupacakrame // 1.062.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ dadarśa mahātejā menakāṃ kuśikātmajaḥ / rūpeṇāpratimāṃ tatra vidyutaṃ jalade yathā // 1.062.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā kandarpavaśago munis tām idam abravīt / apsaraḥ svāgataṃ te 'stu vasa ceha mamāśrame // 1.062.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anugṛhṇīṣva bhadraṃ te madanena sumohitam // 1.062.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktā sā varārohā tatrāvāsam athākarot / tapaso hi mahāvighno viśvāmitram upāgataḥ // 1.062.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṃ vasantyāṃ varṣāṇi pañca pañca ca rāghava / viśvāmitrāśrame saumya sukhena vyaticakramuḥ // 1.062.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha kāle gate tasmin viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / savrīḍa iva saṃvṛttaś cintāśokaparāyaṇaḥ // 1.062.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhir muneḥ samutpannā sāmarṣā raghunandana / sarvaṃ surāṇāṃ karmaitat tapo'paharaṇaṃ mahat // 1.062.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahorātrāpadeśena gatāḥ saṃvatsarā daśa / kāmamohābhibhūtasya vighno 'yaṃ pratyupasthitaḥ // 1.062.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viniḥśvasan munivaraḥ paścāt tāpena duḥkhitaḥ // 1.062.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhītām apsarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā vepantīṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitām / menakāṃ madhurair vākyair visṛjya kuśikātmajaḥ // 1.062.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttaraṃ parvataṃ rāma viśvāmitro jagāma ha // 1.062.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kṛtvā naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhiṃ jetukāmo mahāyaśāḥ / kauśikītīram āsādya tapas tepe sudāruṇam // 1.062.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya varṣasahasraṃ tu ghoraṃ tapa upāsataḥ / uttare parvate rāma devatānām abhūd bhayam // 1.062.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amantrayan samāgamya sarve sarṣigaṇāḥ surāḥ / maharṣiśabdaṃ labhatāṃ sādhv ayaṃ kuśikātmajaḥ // 1.062.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devatānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sarvalokapitāmahaḥ / abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ viśvāmitraṃ tapodhanam // 1.062.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maharṣe svāgataṃ vatsa tapasogreṇa toṣitaḥ / mahattvam ṛṣimukhyatvaṃ dadāmi tava kauśika // 1.062.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmaṇaḥ sa vacaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitras tapodhanaḥ / prāñjaliḥ praṇato bhūtvā pratyuvāca pitāmaham // 1.062.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmarṣi śabdam atulaṃ svārjitaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ / yadi me bhagavān āha tato 'haṃ vijitendriyaḥ // 1.062.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca tato brahmā na tāvat tvaṃ jitendriyaḥ / yatasva muniśārdūla ity uktvā tridivaṃ gataḥ // 1.062.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viprasthiteṣu deveṣu viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / ūrdhvabāhur nirālambo vāyubhakṣas tapaś caran // 1.062.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharme pañcatapā bhūtvā varṣāsv ākāśasaṃśrayaḥ / śiśire salilasthāyī rātryahāni tapodhanaḥ // 1.062.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi tapo ghoram upāgamat / tasmin saṃtapyamāne tu viśvāmitre mahāmunau // 1.062.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃbhramaḥ sumahān āsīt surāṇāṃ vāsavasya ca / rambhām apsarasaṃ śakraḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ // 1.062.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvācātmahitaṃ vākyam ahitaṃ kauśikasya ca // 1.062.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tathoktā sāpsarā rāma sahasrākṣeṇa dhīmatā / vrīḍitā prāñjalir bhūtvā pratyuvāca sureśvaram // 1.063.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ surapate ghoro viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / krodham utsrakṣyate ghoraṃ mayi deva na saṃśayaḥ // 1.063.003.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato hi me bhayaṃ deva prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // 1.063.003.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām uvāca sahasrākṣo vepamānāṃ kṛtāñjalim / mā bhaiṣi rambhe bhadraṃ te kuruṣva mama śāsanam // 1.063.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tvaṃ hi rūpaṃ bahuguṇaṃ kṛtvā paramabhāsvaram / tam ṛṣiṃ kauśikaṃ rambhe bhedayasva tapasvinam // 1.063.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

kokilasya tu śuśrāva valgu vyāharataḥ svanam / saṃprahṛṣṭena manasā tata enām udaikṣata // 1.063.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

yan māṃ lobhayase rambhe kāmakrodhajayaiṣiṇam / daśavarṣasahasrāṇi śailī sthāsyasi durbhage // 1.063.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇaḥ sumahātejās tapobalasamanvitaḥ / uddhariṣyati rambhe tvāṃ matkrodhakaluṣīkṛtām // 1.063.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tasya śāpena mahatā rambhā śailī tadābhavat / vacaḥ śrutvā ca kandarpo maharṣeḥ sa ca nirgataḥ // 1.063.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kopena sa mahātejās tapo 'paharaṇe kṛte / indriyair ajitai rāma na lebhe śāntim ātmanaḥ // 1.063.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ pannagāsurarākṣasāḥ / mohitās tejasā tasya tapasā mandaraśmayaḥ // 1.064.004.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaśmalopahatāḥ sarve pitāmaham athābruvan // 1.064.004.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

na hy asya vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cid dṛśyate sūkṣmam apy atha / na dīyate yadi tv asya manasā yad abhīpsitam // 1.064.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vināśayati trailokyaṃ tapasā sacarācaram / vyākulāś ca diśaḥ sarvā na ca kiṃ cit prakāśate // 1.064.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgarāḥ kṣubhitāḥ sarve viśīryante ca parvatāḥ / prakampate ca pṛthivī vāyur vāti bhṛśākulaḥ // 1.064.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhiṃ na kurute yāvan nāśe deva mahāmuniḥ / tāvat prasādyo bhagavān agnirūpo mahādyutiḥ // 1.064.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālāgninā yathā pūrvaṃ trailokyaṃ dahyate 'khilam / devarājye cikīrṣeta dīyatām asya yan matam // 1.064.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ suragaṇāḥ sarve pitāmahapurogamāḥ / viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānaṃ vākyaṃ madhuram abruvan // 1.064.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmarṣe svāgataṃ te 'stu tapasā sma sutoṣitāḥ / brāhmaṇyaṃ tapasogreṇa prāptavān asi kauśika // 1.064.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ ca divaukasām / kṛtvā praṇāmaṃ mudito vyājahāra mahāmuniḥ // 1.064.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇyaṃ yadi me prāptaṃ dīrgham āyus tathaiva ca / oṃkāro 'tha vaṣaṭkāro vedāś ca varayantu mām // 1.064.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatravedavidāṃ śreṣṭho brahmavedavidām api / brahmaputro vasiṣṭho mām evaṃ vadatu devatāḥ // 1.064.015.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady ayaṃ paramaḥ kāmaḥ kṛto yāntu surarṣabhāḥ // 1.064.015.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prasādito devair vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ / sakhyaṃ cakāra brahmarṣir evam astv iti cābravīt // 1.064.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmarṣitvaṃ na saṃdehaḥ sarvaṃ saṃpatsyate tava / ity uktvā devatāś cāpi sarvā jagmur yathāgatam // 1.064.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitro 'pi dharmātmā labdhvā brāhmaṇyam uttamam / pūjayām āsa brahmarṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam // 1.064.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtakāmo mahīṃ sarvāṃ cacāra tapasi sthitaḥ / evaṃ tv anena brāhmaṇyaṃ prāptaṃ rāma mahātmanā // 1.064.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa rāma muniśreṣṭha eṣa vigrahavāṃs tapaḥ / eṣa dharmaḥ paro nityaṃ vīryasyaiṣa parāyaṇam // 1.064.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me munipuṃgava / yajñaṃ kākutstha sahitaḥ prāptavān asi dhārmika // 1.064.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

viśvāmitro 'pi dharmātmā saharāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ / svaṃ vāṭam abhicakrāma pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ // 1.064.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

yasmād bhāgārthino bhāgān nākalpayata me surāḥ / varāṅgāni mahārhāṇi dhanuṣā śātayāmi vaḥ // 1.065.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

prītiyuktaḥ sa sarveṣāṃ dadau teṣāṃ mahātmanām // 1.065.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

bhūtalād utthitā sā tu vyavardhata mamātmajā / vīryaśulketi me kanyā sthāpiteyam ayonijā // 1.065.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

teṣāṃ varayatāṃ kanyāṃ sarveṣāṃ pṛthivīkṣitām / vīryaśulketi bhagavan na dadāmi sutām aham // 1.065.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sarve nṛpatayaḥ sametya munipuṃgava / mithilām abhyupāgamya vīryaṃ jijñāsavas tadā // 1.065.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

teṣāṃ vīryavatāṃ vīryam alpaṃ jñātvā mahāmune / pratyākhyātā nṛpatayas tan nibodha tapodhana // 1.065.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paramakopena rājāno munipuṃgava / arundhan mithilāṃ sarve vīryasaṃdeham āgatāḥ // 1.065.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmānam avadhūtaṃ te vijñāya munipuṃgava / roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭāḥ pīḍayan mithilāṃ purīm // 1.065.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe kṣayaṃ yātāni sarvaśaḥ / sādhanāni munireṣṭha tato 'haṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ // 1.065.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tataḥ sa rājā janakaḥ sacivān vyādideśa ha / dhanur ānīyatāṃ divyaṃ gandhamālyavibhūṣitam // 1.066.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

naitat suragaṇāḥ sarve nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ / gandharvayakṣapravarāḥ sakiṃnaramahoragāḥ // 1.066.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva gatir mānuṣāṇāṃ ca dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe / āropaṇe samāyoge vepane tolane 'pi vā // 1.066.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad etad dhanuṣāṃ śreṣṭham ānītaṃ munipuṃgava / darśayaitan mahābhāga anayo rājaputrayoḥ // 1.066.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā śrutvā janakabhāṣitam / vatsa rāma dhanuḥ paśya iti rāghavam abravīt // 1.066.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maharṣer vacanād rāmo yatra tiṣṭhati tad dhanuḥ / mañjūṣāṃ tām apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā dhanur athābravīt // 1.066.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ dhanurvaraṃ brahman saṃspṛśāmīha pāṇinā / yatnavāṃś ca bhaviṣyāmi tolane pūraṇe 'pi vā // 1.066.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

paśyatāṃ nṛṣahasrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ raghunandanaḥ / āropayat sa dharmātmā salīlam iva tad dhanuḥ // 1.066.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āropayitvā maurvīṃ ca pūrayām āsa vīryavān / tad babhañja dhanur madhye naraśreṣṭho mahāyaśāḥ // 1.066.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya śabdo mahān āsīn nirghātasamaniḥsvanaḥ / bhūmikampaś ca sumahān parvatasyeva dīryataḥ // 1.066.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nipetuś ca narāḥ sarve tena śabdena mohitāḥ / vrajayitvā munivaraṃ rājānaṃ tau ca rāghavau // 1.066.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyāśvasto jane tasmin rājā vigatasādhvasaḥ / uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ vākyajño munipuṃgavam // 1.066.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan dṛṣṭavīryo me rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / atyadbhutam acintyaṃ ca atarkitam idaṃ mayā // 1.066.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janakānāṃ kule kīrtim āhariṣyati me sutā / sītā bhartāram āsādya rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam // 1.066.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama satyā pratijñā ca vīryaśulketi kauśika / sītā prāṇair bahumatā deyā rāmāya me sutā // 1.066.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavato 'numate brahmañ śīghraṃ gacchantu mantriṇaḥ / mama kauśika bhadraṃ te ayodhyāṃ tvaritā rathaiḥ // 1.066.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājānaṃ praśritair vākyair ānayantu puraṃ mama / pradānaṃ vīryaśulkāḥ kathayantu ca sarvaśaḥ // 1.066.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muniguptau ca kākutsthau kathayantu nṛpāya vai / prīyamāṇaṃ tu rājānam ānayantu suśīghragāḥ // 1.066.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kauśikaś ca tathety āha rājā cābhāṣya mantriṇaḥ / ayodhyāṃ preṣayām āsa dharmātmā kṛtaśāsanāt // 1.066.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janakena samādiṣṭā dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ / trirātram uṣitvā mārge te 'yodhyāṃ prāviśan purīm // 1.067.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te rājavacanād dūtā rājaveśmapraveśitāḥ / dadṛśur devasaṃkāśaṃ vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // 1.067.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
baddhāñjalipuṭāḥ sarve dūtā vigatasādhvasāḥ / rājānaṃ prayatā vākyam abruvan madhurākṣaram // 1.067.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maithilo janako rājā sāgnihotrapuraskṛtaḥ / kuśalaṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva sopādhyāyapurohitam // 1.067.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muhur muhur madhurayā snehasaṃyuktayā girā / janakas tvāṃ mahārāja pṛcchate sapuraḥsaram // 1.067.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣṭvā kuśalam avyagraṃ vaideho mithilādhipaḥ / kauśikānumate vākyaṃ bhavantam idam abravīt // 1.067.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvaṃ pratijñā viditā vīryaśulkā mamātmajā / rājānaś ca kṛtāmarṣā nirvīryā vimukhīkṛtāḥ // 1.067.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
seyaṃ mama sutā rājan viśvāmitra puraḥsaraiḥ / yadṛcchayāgatair vīrair nirjitā tava putrakaiḥ // 1.067.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac ca rājan dhanur divyaṃ madhye bhagnaṃ mahātmanā / rāmeṇa hi mahārāja mahatyāṃ janasaṃsadi // 1.067.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmai deyā mayā sītā vīryaśulkā mahātmane / pratijñāṃ tartum icchāmi tad anujñātum arhasi // 1.067.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sopādhyāyo mahārāja purohitapuraskṛtaḥ / śīghram āgaccha bhadraṃ te draṣṭum arhasi rāghavau // 1.067.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prītiṃ ca mama rājendra nirvartayitum arhasi / putrayor ubhayor eva prītiṃ tvam api lapsyase // 1.067.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ videhādhipatir madhuraṃ vākyam abravīt / viśvāmitrābhyanujñātaḥ śatānandamate sthitaḥ // 1.067.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūtavākyaṃ tu tac chrutvā rājā paramaharṣitaḥ / vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca mantriṇo 'nyāṃś ca so 'bravīt // 1.067.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guptaḥ kuśikaputreṇa kausalyānandavardhanaḥ / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā videheṣu vasaty asau // 1.067.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭavīryas tu kākutstho janakena mahātmanā / saṃpradānaṃ sutāyās tu rāghave kartum icchati // 1.067.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi vo rocate vṛttaṃ janakasya mahātmanaḥ / purīṃ gacchāmahe śīghraṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ // 1.067.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantriṇo bāḍham ity āhuḥ saha sarvair maharṣibhiḥ / suprītaś cābravīd rājā śvo yātreti sa mantriṇaḥ // 1.067.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantriṇas tu narendrasya rātriṃ paramasatkṛtāḥ / ūṣuḥ pramuditāḥ sarve guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitāḥ // 1.067.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ / rājā daśaratho hṛṣṭaḥ sumantram idam abravīt // 1.068.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya sarve dhanādhyakṣā dhanam ādāya puṣkalam / vrajantv agre suvihitā nānāratnasamanvitāḥ // 1.068.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturaṅgabalaṃ cāpi śīghraṃ niryātu sarvaśaḥ / mamājñāsamakālaṃ ca yānayugyam anuttamam // 1.068.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ / mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dīrghāyur ṛṣiḥ kātyāyanas tathā // 1.068.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete dvijāḥ prayāntv agre syandanaṃ yojayasva me / yathā kālātyayo na syād dūtā hi tvarayanti mām // 1.068.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vacanāc ca narendrasya sā senā caturaṅgiṇī / rājānam ṛṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ vrajantaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt // 1.068.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatvā caturahaṃ mārgaṃ videhān abhyupeyivān / rājā tu janakaḥ śrīmāñ śrutvā pūjām akalpayat // 1.068.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rājānam āsādya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam / janako mudito rājā harṣaṃ ca paramaṃ yayau // 1.068.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca na naraśreṣṭho naraśreṣṭhaṃ mudānvitam // 1.068.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svāgataṃ te mahārāja diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava / putrayor ubhayoḥ prītiṃ lapsyase vīryanirjitām // 1.068.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā prāpto mahātejā vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / saha sarvair dvijaśreṣṭhair devair iva śatakratuḥ // 1.068.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā me nirjitā vighnā diṣṭyā me pūjitaṃ kulam / rāghavaiḥ saha saṃbandhād vīryaśreṣṭhair mahātmabhiḥ // 1.068.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvaḥ prabhāte narendrendra nirvartayitum arhasi / yajñasyānte naraśreṣṭha vivāham ṛṣisaṃmatam // 1.068.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā ṛṣimadhye narādhipaḥ / vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca mahīpatim // 1.068.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigraho dātṛvaśaḥ śrutam etan mayā purā / yathā vakṣyasi dharmajña tat kariṣyāmahe vayam // 1.068.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dharmiṣṭhaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca vacanaṃ satyavādinaḥ / śrutvā videhādhipatiḥ paraṃ vismayam āgataḥ // 1.068.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sarve munigaṇāḥ parasparasamāgame / harṣeṇa mahatā yuktās tāṃ niśām avasan sukham // 1.068.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā ca rāghavau putrau niśāmya pariharṣitaḥ / uvāsa paramaprīto janakena supūjitaḥ // 1.068.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janako 'pi mahātejāḥ kriyā dharmeṇa tattvavit / yajñasya ca sutābhyāṃ ca kṛtvā rātrim uvāsa ha // 1.068.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prabhāte janakaḥ kṛtakarmā maharṣibhiḥ / uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajñaḥ śatānandaṃ purohitam // 1.069.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātā mama mahātejā yavīyān atidhārmikaḥ / kuśadhvaja iti khyātaḥ purīm adhyavasac chubhām // 1.069.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāryāphalakaparyantāṃ pibann ikṣumatīṃ nadīm / sāṃkāśyāṃ puṇyasaṃkāśāṃ vimānam iva puṣpakam // 1.069.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi yajñagoptā sa me mataḥ / prītiṃ so 'pi mahātejā iṃmāṃ bhoktā mayā saha // 1.069.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāsanāt tu narendrasya prayayuḥ śīghravājibhiḥ / samānetuṃ naravyāghraṃ viṣṇum indrājñayā yathā // 1.069.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājñayā tu narendrasya ājagāma kuśadhvajaḥ // 1.069.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ janakaṃ dharmavatsalam / so 'bhivādya śatānandaṃ rājānaṃ cāpi dhārmikam // 1.069.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājārhaṃ paramaṃ divyam āsanaṃ cādhyarohata / upaviṣṭāv ubhau tau tu bhrātarāv amitaujasau // 1.069.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
preṣayām āsatur vīrau mantriśreṣṭhaṃ sudāmanam / gaccha mantripate śīghram aikṣvākam amitaprabham // 1.069.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmajaiḥ saha durdharṣam ānayasva samantriṇam // 1.069.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aupakāryāṃ sa gatvā tu raghūṇāṃ kulavardhanam / dadarśa śirasā cainam abhivādyedam abravīt // 1.069.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyādhipate vīra vaideho mithilādhipaḥ / sa tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ vyavasitaḥ sopādhyāyapurohitam // 1.069.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantriśreṣṭhavacaḥ śrutvā rājā sarṣigaṇas tadā / sabandhur agamat tatra janako yatra vartate // 1.069.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā mantrisahitaḥ sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ / vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭho vaideham idam abravīt // 1.069.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viditaṃ te mahārāja ikṣvākukuladaivatam / vaktā sarveṣu kṛtyeṣu vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ // 1.069.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitrābhyanujñātaḥ saha sarvair maharṣibhiḥ / eṣa vakṣyati dharmātmā vasiṣṭho me yathākramam // 1.069.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tūṣṇīṃbhūte daśarathe vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajño vaidehaṃ sapurohitam // 1.069.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avyaktaprabhavo brahmā śāśvato nitya avyayaḥ / tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ // 1.069.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivaivataḥ smṛtaḥ / manuḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ // 1.069.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam / ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān vikukṣir udapadyata // 1.069.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān / bāṇasya tu mahātejā anaraṇyaḥ pratāpavān // 1.069.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anaraṇyāt pṛthur jajñe triśaṅkus tu pṛthoḥ sutaḥ / triśaṅkor abhavat putro dhundhumāro mahāyaśāḥ // 1.069.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhundhumārān mahātejā yuvanāśvo mahārathaḥ / yuvanāśvasutaḥ śrīmān māndhātā pṛthivīpatiḥ // 1.069.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māndhātus tu sutaḥ śrīmān susaṃdhir udapadyata / susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit // 1.069.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato nāma nāmataḥ / bharatāt tu mahātejā asito nāma jāyata // 1.069.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saha tena gareṇaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat / sagarasyāsamañjas tu asamañjād athāṃśumān // 1.069.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dilīpo 'ṃśumataḥ putro dilīpasya bhagīrathaḥ / bhagīrathāt kakutsthaś ca kakutsthasya raghus tathā // 1.069.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ / kalmāṣapādo hy abhavat tasmāj jātas tu śaṅkhaṇaḥ // 1.069.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sudarśanaḥ śaṅkhaṇasya agnivarṇaḥ sudarśanāt / śīghragas tv agnivarṇasya śīghragasya maruḥ sutaḥ // 1.069.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maroḥ praśuśrukas tv āsīd ambarīṣaḥ praśuśrukāt / ambarīṣasya putro 'bhūn nahuṣaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // 1.069.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nahuṣasya yayātis tu nābhāgas tu yayātijaḥ / nābhāgasya bhabhūvāja ajād daśaratho 'bhavat // 1.069.030.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād daśarathāj jātau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 1.069.030.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādivaṃśaviśuddhānāṃ rājñāṃ paramadharmiṇām / ikṣvākukulajātānāṃ vīrāṇāṃ satyavādinām // 1.069.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmalakṣmaṇayor arthe tvatsute varaye nṛpa / sadṛśābhyāṃ naraśreṣṭha sadṛśe dātum arhasi // 1.069.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ janakaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ / śrotum arhasi bhadraṃ te kulaṃ naḥ kīrtitaṃ param // 1.070.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradāne hi muniśreṣṭha kulaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ / vaktavyaṃ kulajātena tan nibodha mahāmune // 1.070.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājābhūt triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ svena karmaṇā / nimiḥ paramadharmātmā sarvasattvavatāṃ varaḥ // 1.070.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya putro mithir nāma janako mithi putrakaḥ / prathamo janako nāma janakād apy udāvasuḥ // 1.070.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udāvasos tu dharmātmā jāto vai nandivardhanaḥ / nandivardhana putras tu suketur nāma nāmataḥ // 1.070.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suketor api dharmātmā devarāto mahābalaḥ / devarātasya rājarṣer bṛhadratha iti śrutaḥ // 1.070.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bṛhadrathasya śūro 'bhūn mahāvīraḥ pratāpavān / mahāvīrasya dhṛtimān sudhṛtiḥ satyavikramaḥ // 1.070.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sudhṛter api dharmātmā dhṛṣṭaketuḥ sudhārmikaḥ / dhṛṣṭaketos tu rājarṣer haryaśva iti viśrutaḥ // 1.070.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haryaśvasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ pratīndhakaḥ / pratīndhakasya dharmātmā rājā kīrtirathaḥ sutaḥ // 1.070.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putraḥ kīrtirathasyāpi devamīḍha iti smṛtaḥ / devamīḍhasya vibudho vibudhasya mahīdhrakaḥ // 1.070.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahīdhrakasuto rājā kīrtirāto mahābalaḥ / kīrtirātasya rājarṣer mahāromā vyajāyata // 1.070.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāroṃṇas tu dharmātmā svarṇaromā vyajāyata / svarṇaroṃṇas tu rājarṣer hrasvaromā vyajāyata // 1.070.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya putradvayaṃ jajñe dharmajñasya mahātmanaḥ / jyeṣṭho 'ham anujo bhrātā mama vīraḥ kuśadhvajaḥ // 1.070.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃ tu jyeṣṭhaṃ pitā rājye so 'bhiṣicya narādhipaḥ / kuśadhvajaṃ samāveśya bhāraṃ mayi vanaṃ gataḥ // 1.070.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛddhe pitari svaryāte dharmeṇa dhuram āvaham / bhrātaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ snehāt paśyan kuśadhvajam // 1.070.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya cit tv atha kālasya sāṃkāśyād agamat purāt / sudhanvā vīryavān rājā mithilām avarodhakaḥ // 1.070.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca me preṣayām āsa śaivaṃ dhanur anuttamam / sītā kanyā ca padmākṣī mahyaṃ vai dīyatām iti // 1.070.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāpradānād brahmarṣe yuddham āsīn mayā saha / sa hato 'bhimukho rājā sudhanvā tu mayā raṇe // 1.070.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatya taṃ muniśreṣṭha sudhanvānaṃ narādhipam / sāṃkāśye bhrātaraṃ śūram abhyaṣiñcaṃ kuśadhvajam // 1.070.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kanīyān eṣa me bhrātā ahaṃ jyeṣṭho mahāmune / dadāmi paramaprīto vadhvau te munipuṃgava // 1.070.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāṃ rāmāya bhadraṃ te ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇāya ca / vīryaśulkāṃ mama sutāṃ sītāṃ surasutopamām // 1.070.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvitīyām ūrmilāṃ caiva trir vadāmi na saṃśayaḥ / dadāmi paramaprīto vadhvau te raghunandana // 1.070.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmalakṣmaṇayo rājan godānaṃ kārayasva ha / pitṛkāryaṃ ca bhadraṃ te tato vaivāhikaṃ kuru // 1.070.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maghā hy adya mahābāho tṛtīye divase prabho / phalgunyām uttare rājaṃs tasmin vaivāhikaṃ kuru // 1.070.024.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmalakṣmaṇayor arthe dānaṃ kāryaṃ sukhodayam // 1.070.024.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uktavantaṃ vaidehaṃ viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / uvāca vacanaṃ vīraṃ vasiṣṭhasahito nṛpam // 1.071.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acintyāny aprameyāni kulāni narapuṃgava / ikṣvākūṇāṃ videhānāṃ naiṣāṃ tulyo 'sti kaś cana // 1.071.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśo dharmasaṃbandhaḥ sadṛśo rūpasaṃpadā / rāmalakṣmaṇayo rājan sītā cormilayā saha // 1.071.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaktavyaṃ na naraśreṣṭha śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama // 1.071.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātā yavīyān dharmajña eṣa rājā kuśadhvajaḥ / asya dharmātmano rājan rūpeṇāpratimaṃ bhuvi // 1.071.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sutā dvayaṃ naraśreṣṭha patnyarthaṃ varayāmahe // 1.071.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasya kumārasya śatrughnasya ca dhīmataḥ / varayema sute rājaṃs tayor arthe mahātmanoḥ // 1.071.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putrā daśarathasyeme rūpayauvanaśālinaḥ / lokapālopamāḥ sarve devatulyaparākramāḥ // 1.071.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhayor api rājendra saṃbandhenānubadhyatām / ikṣvākukulam avyagraṃ bhavataḥ puṇyakarmaṇaḥ // 1.071.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitravacaḥ śrutvā vasiṣṭhasya mate tadā / janakaḥ prāñjalir vākyam uvāca munipuṃgavau // 1.071.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśaṃ kulasaṃbandhaṃ yad ājñāpayathaḥ svayam / evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vaḥ kuśadhvajasute ime // 1.071.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patnyau bhajetāṃ sahitau śatrughnabharatāv ubhau // 1.071.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekāhnā rājaputrīṇāṃ catasḥṇāṃ mahāmune / pāṇīn gṛhṇantu catvāro rājaputrā mahābalāḥ // 1.071.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttare divase brahman phalgunībhyāṃ manīṣiṇaḥ / vaivāhikaṃ praśaṃsanti bhago yatra prajāpatiḥ // 1.071.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā vacaḥ saumyaṃ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ / ubhau munivarau rājā janako vākyam abravīt // 1.071.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paro dharmaḥ kṛto mahyaṃ śiṣyo 'smi bhavatoḥ sadā / imāny āsanamukhyāni āsetāṃ munipuṃgavau // 1.071.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā daśarathasyeyaṃ tathāyodhyā purī mama / prabhutve nāsit saṃdeho yathārhaṃ kartum arhathaḥ // 1.071.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā bruvati vaidehe janake raghunandanaḥ / rājā daśaratho hṛṣṭaḥ pratyuvāca mahīpatim // 1.071.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuvām asaṃkhyeya guṇau bhrātarau mithileśvarau / ṛṣayo rājasaṃghāś ca bhavadbhyām abhipūjitāḥ // 1.071.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te gamiṣyāmi svam ālayam / śrāddhakarmāṇi sarvāṇi vidhāsya iti cābravīt // 1.071.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āpṛṣṭvā narapatiṃ rājā daśarathas tadā / munīndrau tau puraskṛtya jagāmāśu mahāyaśāḥ // 1.071.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā nilayaṃ rājā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ / prabhāte kālyam utthāya cakre godānam uttamam // 1.071.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi brāhmaṇebhyo narādhipaḥ / ekaikaśo dadau rājā putrān uddhiśya dharmataḥ // 1.071.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suvarṇaśṛṅgāḥ saṃpannāḥ savatsāḥ kāṃsyadohanāḥ / gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi catvāri puruṣarṣabhaḥ // 1.071.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vittam anyac ca subahu dvijebhyo raghunandanaḥ / dadau godānam uddiśya putrāṇāṃ putravatsalaḥ // 1.071.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sutaiḥ kṛtagodānair vṛtaś ca nṛpatis tadā / lokapālair ivābhāti vṛtaḥ saumyaḥ prajāpatiḥ // 1.071.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmiṃs tu divase rājā cakre godānam uttamam / tasmiṃs tu divase śūro yudhājit samupeyivān // 1.072.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

śrutvā tv ahaym ayodhyāyāṃ vivāhārthaṃ tāv ātmajān / mithilām upayātās tu tvayā saha mahīpate // 1.072.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

dṛṣṭvā paramasatkāraiḥ pūjārhaṃ samapūjayat / tatas tām uṣito rātriṃ saha putrair mahātmabhiḥ // 1.072.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣīṃs tadā puraskṛtya yajñavāṭam upāgamat / yukte muhūrte vijaye sarvābharaṇabhūṣitaiḥ // 1.072.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rāmaḥ kṛtakautukamaṅgalaḥ // 1.072.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

kṛtakautukasarvasvā vedimūlam upāgatāḥ / mama kanyā muniśreṣṭha dīptā vahner ivārciṣaḥ // 1.072.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sajjo 'haṃ tvatpratīkṣo 'smi vedyām asyāṃ pratiṣhitaḥ / avighnaṃ kurutāṃ rājā kimarthaṃ hi vilambyate // 1.072.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadvākyaṃ janakenoktaṃ śrutvā daśarathas tadā / praveśayām āsa sutān sarvān ṛṣigaṇān api // 1.072.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

sarve bhavantaḥ saṃyāś ca sarve sucaritavratāḥ / patnībhiḥ santu kākutsthā mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ // 1.072.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

nanṛtuś cāpsaraḥsaṃghā gandharvāś ca jaguḥ kalam / vivāhe raghumukhyānāṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat // 1.072.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

athopakāryāṃ jagmus te sadārā raghunandanaḥ / rājāpy anuyayau paśyan sarṣisaṃghaḥ sabāndhavaḥ // 1.072.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ / āpṛcchya tau ca rājānau jagāmottaraparvatam // 1.073.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

ṛṣīn sarvān puraskṛtya jagāma sabalānugaḥ / gacchantaṃ tu naravyāghraṃ sarṣisaṃghaṃ sarāghavam // 1.073.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghorāḥ sma pakṣiṇo vāco vyāharanti tatas tataḥ / bhaumāś caiva mṛgāḥ sarve gacchanti sma pradakṣiṇam // 1.073.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān dṛṣṭvā rājaśārdūlo vasiṣṭhaṃ paryapṛcchata / asaumyāḥ pakṣiṇo ghorā mṛgāś cāpi pradakṣiṇāḥ // 1.073.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim idaṃ hṛdayotkampi mano mama viṣīdati // 1.073.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tatra vāyuḥ prādur babhūva ha / kampayan medinīṃ sarvāṃ pātayaṃś ca drumāṃḥ śubhān // 1.073.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tamasā saṃvṛtaḥ sūryaḥ sarvā na prababhur diśaḥ / bhasmanā cāvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ saṃmūḍham iva tad balam // 1.073.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭha ṛṣayaś cānye rājā ca sasutas tadā / sasaṃjñā iva tatrāsan sarvam anyad vicetanam // 1.073.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tamasi ghore tu bhasmacchanneva sā camūḥ / dadarśa bhīmasaṃkāśaṃ jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇam // 1.073.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kailāsam iva durdharṣaṃ kālāgnim iva duḥsaham / jvalantam iva tejobhir durnirīkṣyaṃ pṛthagjanaiḥ // 1.073.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam / vasiṣṭhapramukhā viprā japahomaparāyaṇāḥ // 1.073.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃgatā munayaḥ sarve saṃjajalpur atho mithaḥ // 1.073.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

kṣatrasyotsādanaṃ bhūyo na khalv asya cikīrṣitam // 1.073.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjām ṛṣidattāṃ pratāpavān / rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ rāmo jāmadagnyo 'bhyabhāṣata // 1.073.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāma dāśarathe vīra vīryaṃ te śrūyate 'dhutam / dhanuṣo bhedanaṃ caiva nikhilena mayā śrutam // 1.074.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca bhedanaṃ dhanuṣas tvayā / tac chrutvāham anuprāpto dhanur gṛhyāparaṃ śubham // 1.074.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad idaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahad dhanuḥ / pūrayasva śareṇaiva svabalaṃ darśayasva ca // 1.074.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarataḥs tadā / viṣaṇṇavadano dīnaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt // 1.074.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

bhārgavāṇāṃ kule jātaḥ svādhyāyavrataśālinām / sahasrākṣe pratijñāya śastraṃ nikṣiptavān asi // 1.074.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ dharmaparo bhūtvā kāśyapāya vasuṃdharām / dattvā vanam upāgamya mahendrakṛtaketanaḥ // 1.074.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

bruvaty evaṃ daśarathe jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān / anādṛtyaiva tad vākyaṃ rāmam evābhyabhāṣata // 1.074.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime dve dhanuṣī śreṣṭhe divye lokābhiviśrute / dṛḍhe balavatī mukhye sukṛte viśvakarmaṇā // 1.074.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

devais tadā samāgamya sarṣisaṃghaiḥ sacāraṇaiḥ / yācitau praśamaṃ tatra jagmatus tau surottamau // 1.074.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

idaṃ ca viṣṇavaṃ rāma dhanuḥ parapuraṃjayam / ṛcīke bhārgave prādād viṣṇuḥ sa nyāsam uttamam // 1.074.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

pṛthivīṃ cākhilāṃ prāpya kāśyapāya mahātmane / yajñasyānte tadā rāma dakṣiṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇe // 1.074.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

śrutavān asmi yat karma kṛtavān asi bhārgava / anurundhyāmahe brahman pitur ānṛṇyam āsthitaḥ // 1.075.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīryahīnam ivāśaktaṃ kṣatradharmeṇa bhārgava / avajānāmi me tejaḥ paśya me 'dya parākramam // 1.075.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā rāghavaḥ kruddho bhārgavasya varāyudham / śaraṃ ca pratisaṃgṛhya hastāl laghuparākramaḥ // 1.075.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āropya sa dhanū rāmaḥ śaraṃ sajyaṃ cakāra ha / jāmadagnyaṃ tato rāmaṃ rāmaḥ kruddho 'bravīd vacaḥ // 1.075.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇo 'sīti pūjyo me viśvāmitrakṛtena ca / tasmāc chakto na te rāma moktuṃ prāṇaharaṃ śaram // 1.075.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ vā tvadgatiṃ rāma tapobalasamārjitān / lokān apratimān vāpi haniṣyāmi yad icchasi // 1.075.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy ayaṃ vaiṣṇavo divyaḥ śaraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ / moghaḥ patati vīryeṇa baladarpavināśanaḥ // 1.075.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varāyudhadharaṃ rāma draṣṭuṃ sarṣigaṇāḥ surāḥ / pitāmahaṃ puraskṛtya sametās tatra saṃghaśaḥ // 1.075.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandharvāpsarasaś caiva siddhacāraṇakiṃnarāḥ / yakṣarākṣasanāgāś ca tad draṣṭuṃ mahad adbhutam // 1.075.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaḍīkṛte tadā loke rāme varadhanurdhare / nirvīryo jāmadagnyo 'sau ramo rāmam udaikṣata // 1.075.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tejobhir hatavīryatvāj jāmadagnyo jaḍīkṛtaḥ / rāmaṃ kamala patrākṣaṃ mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha // 1.075.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāśyapāya mayā dattā yadā pūrvaṃ vasuṃdharā / viṣaye me na vastavyam iti māṃ kāśyapo 'bravīt // 1.075.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
