so 'haṃ guruvacaḥ kurvan pṛthivyāṃ na vase niśām / iti pratijñā kākutstha kṛtā vai kāśyapasya ha // 1.075.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad imāṃ tvaṃ gatiṃ vīra hantuṃ nārhasi rāghava / manojavaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahendraṃ parvatottamam // 1.075.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lokās tv apratimā rāma nirjitās tapasā mayā / jahi tāñ śaramukhyena mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ // 1.075.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṣayyaṃ madhuhantāraṃ jānāmi tvāṃ sureśvaram / dhanuṣo 'sya parāmarśāt svasti te 'stu paraṃtapa // 1.075.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete suragaṇāḥ sarve nirīkṣante samāgatāḥ / tvām apratimakarmāṇam apratidvandvam āhave // 1.075.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ceyaṃ mama kākutstha vrīḍā bhavitum arhati / tvayā trailokyanāthena yad ahaṃ vimukhīkṛtaḥ // 1.075.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaram apratimaṃ rāma moktum arhasi suvrata / śaramokṣe gamiṣyāmi mahendraṃ parvatottamam // 1.075.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā bruvati rāme tu jāmadagnye pratāpavān / rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmāṃś cikṣepa śaram uttamam // 1.075.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vitimirāḥ sarvā diśā copadiśas tathā / surāḥ sarṣigaṇā rāmaṃ praśaśaṃsur udāyudham // 1.075.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ praśasya ca / tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya jagāmātmagatiṃ prabhuḥ // 1.075.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gate rāme praśāntātmā rāmo dāśarathir dhanuḥ / varuṇāyāprameyāya dadau haste sasāyakam // 1.076.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādya tato rāmo vasiṣṭha pramukhān ṛṣīn / pitaraṃ vihvalaṃ dṛṣṭvā provāca raghunandanaḥ // 1.076.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmadagnyo gato rāmaḥ prayātu caturaṅgiṇī / ayodhyābhimukhī senā tvayā nāthena pālitā // 1.076.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarathaḥ sutam / bāhubhyāṃ saṃpariṣvajya mūrdhni cāghrāya rāghavam // 1.076.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gato rāma iti śrutvā hṛṣṭaḥ pramudito nṛpaḥ / codayām āsa tāṃ senāṃ jagāmāśu tataḥ purīm // 1.076.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patākādhvajinīṃ ramyāṃ tūryodghuṣṭanināditām / siktarājapathāṃ ramyāṃ prakīrṇakusumotkarām // 1.076.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājapraveśasumukhaiḥ paurair maṅgalavādibhiḥ / saṃpūrṇāṃ prāviśad rājā janaughaiḥ samalaṃkṛtām // 1.076.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca sumadhyamā / vadhūpratigrahe yuktā yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // 1.076.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgām ūrmilāṃ ca yaśasvinīm / kuśadhvajasute cobhe jagṛhur nṛpapatnayaḥ // 1.076.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maṅgalālāpanaiś caiva śobhitāḥ kṣaumavāsasaḥ / devatāyatanāny āśu sarvās tāḥ pratyapūjayan // 1.076.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādyābhivādyāṃś ca sarvā rājasutās tadā / remire muditāḥ sarvā bhartṛbhiḥ sahitā rahaḥ // 1.076.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtadārāḥ kṛtāstrāś ca sadhanāḥ sasuhṛjjanāḥ / śuśrūṣamāṇāḥ pitaraṃ vartayanti nararṣabhāḥ // 1.076.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām atiyaśā loke rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / svayambhūr iva bhūtānāṃ babhūva guṇavattaraḥ // 1.076.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmas tu sītayā sārdhaṃ vijahāra bahūn ṛtūn / manasvī tadgatas tasyā nityaṃ hṛdi samarpitaḥ // 1.076.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyā tu sītā rāmasya dārāḥ pitṛkṛtā iti / guṇād rūpaguṇāc cāpi prītir bhūyo vyavardhata // 1.076.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāś ca bhartā dviguṇaṃ hṛdaye parivartate / antarjātam api vyaktam ākhyāti hṛdayaṃ hṛdā // 1.076.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya bhūyo viśeṣeṇa maithilī janakātmajā / devatābhiḥ samā rūpe sītā śrīr iva rūpiṇī // 1.076.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayā sa rājarṣisuto 'bhirāmayā; sameyivān uttamarājakanyayā / atīva rāmaḥ śuśubhe 'tikāmayā; vibhuḥ śriyā viṣṇur ivāmareśvaraḥ // 1.076.018	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
kasya cit tv atha kālasya rājā daśarathaḥ sutam / bharataṃ kekayīputram abravīd raghunandanaḥ // 2.001.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ kekayarājasya putro vasati putraka / tvāṃ netum āgato vīra yudhājin mātulas tava // 2.001.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā daśarathasyaitad bharataḥ kekayīsutaḥ / gamanāyābhicakrāma śatrughnasahitas tadā // 2.001.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpṛcchya pitaraṃ śūro rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam / mātṝṃś cāpi naraśreṣṭhaḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // 2.001.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yudhājit prāpya bharataṃ saśatrughnaṃ praharṣitaḥ / svapuraṃ prāviśad vīraḥ pitā tasya tutoṣa ha // 2.001.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tatra nyavasad bhrātrā saha satkārasatkṛtaḥ / mātulenāśvapatinā putrasnehena lālitaḥ // 2.001.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāpi nivasantau tau tarpyamāṇau ca kāmataḥ / bhrātarau smaratāṃ vīrau vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // 2.001.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājāpi tau mahātejāḥ sasmāra proṣitau sutau / ubhau bharataśatrughnau mahendravaruṇopamau // 2.001.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarva eva tu tasyeṣṭāś catvāraḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ / svaśarīrād vinirvṛttāś catvāra iva bāhavaḥ // 2.001.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām api mahātejā rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ / svayambhūr iva bhūtānāṃ babhūva guṇavattaraḥ // 2.001.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gate ca bharate rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ / pitaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ pūjayām āsatus tadā // 2.001.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitur ājñāṃ puraskṛtya paurakāryāṇi sarvaśaḥ / cakāra rāmo dharmātmā priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // 2.001.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātṛbhyo mātṛkāryāṇi kṛtvā paramayantritaḥ / gurūṇāṃ gurukāryāṇi kāle kāle 'nvavaikṣata // 2.001.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ daśarathaḥ prīto brāhmaṇā naigamās tathā / rāmasya śīlavṛttena sarve viṣayavāsinaḥ // 2.001.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi nityaṃ praśāntātmā mṛdupūrvaṃ ca bhāṣate / ucyamāno 'pi paruṣaṃ nottaraṃ pratipadyate // 2.001.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ cid upakāreṇa kṛtenaikena tuṣyati / na smaraty apakārāṇāṃ śatam apy ātmavattayā // 2.001.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīlavṛddhair jñānavṛddhair vayovṛddhaiś ca sajjanaiḥ / kathayann āsta vai nityam astrayogyāntareṣv api // 2.001.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kalyāṇābhijanaḥ sādhur adīnaḥ satyavāg ṛjuḥ / vṛddhair abhivinītaś ca dvijair dharmārthadarśibhiḥ // 2.001.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmārthakāmatattvajñaḥ smṛtimān pratibhāvanān / laukike samayācare kṛtakalpo viśāradaḥ // 2.001.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāstrajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca puruṣāntarakovidaḥ / yaḥ pragrahānugrahayor yathānyāyaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // 2.001.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyakarmaṇy upāyajñaḥ saṃdṛṣṭavyayakarmavit / śraiṣṭhyaṃ śāstrasamūheṣu prāpto vyāmiśrakeṣv api // 2.001.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthadharmau ca saṃgṛhya sukhatantro na cālasaḥ / vaihārikāṇāṃ śilpānāṃ vijñātārthavibhāgavit // 2.001.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārohe vinaye caiva yukto vāraṇavājinām / dhanurvedavidāṃ śreṣṭho loke 'tirathasaṃmataḥ // 2.001.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiyātā prahartā ca senānayaviśāradaḥ / apradhṛṣyaś ca saṃgrāme kruddhair api surāsuraiḥ // 2.001.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anasūyo jitakrodho na dṛpto na ca matsarī / na cāvamantā bhūtānāṃ na ca kālavaśānugaḥ // 2.001.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ śraiṣṭhair guṇair yuktaḥ prajānāṃ pārthivātmajaḥ / saṃmatas triṣu lokeṣu vasudhāyāḥ kṣamāguṇaiḥ // 2.001.026.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhyā bṛhaspates tulyo vīryeṇāpi śacīpateḥ // 2.001.026.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā sarvaprajākāntaiḥ prītisaṃjananaiḥ pituḥ / guṇair viruruce rāmo dīptaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ // 2.001.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evaṃvṛttasaṃpannam apradhṛṣya parākramam / lokapālopamaṃ nātham akāmayata medinī // 2.001.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etais tu bahubhir yuktaṃ guṇair anupamaiḥ sutam / dṛṣṭvā daśaratho rājā cakre cintāṃ paraṃtapaḥ // 2.001.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā hy asya parā prītir hṛdi saṃparivartate / kadā nāma sutaṃ drakṣyāmy abhiṣiktam ahaṃ priyam // 2.001.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛddhikāmo hi lokasya sarvabhūtānukampanaḥ / mattaḥ priyataro loke parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // 2.001.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yamaśakrasamo vīrye bṛhaspatisamo matau / mahīdharasamo dhṛtyāṃ mattaś ca guṇavattaraḥ // 2.001.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahīm aham imāṃ kṛtsnām adhitiṣṭhantam ātmajam / anena vayasā dṛṣṭvā yathā svargam avāpnuyām // 2.001.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ samīkṣya mahārājo yuktaṃ samuditair guṇaiḥ / niścitya sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ yuvarājam amanyata // 2.001.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānānagaravāstavyān pṛthagjānapadān api / samānināya medinyāḥ pradhānān pṛthivīpatiḥ // 2.001.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rājavitīrṇeṣu vividheṣv āsaneṣu ca / rājānam evābhimukhā niṣedur niyatā nṛpāḥ // 2.001.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa labdhamānair vinayānvitair nṛpaiḥ; purālayair jānapadaiś ca mānavaiḥ / upopaviṣṭair nṛpatir vṛto babhau; sahasracakṣur bhagavān ivāmaraiḥ // 2.001.037	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ pariṣadaṃ sarvām āmantrya vasudhādhipaḥ / hitam uddharṣaṇaṃ cedam uvācāpratimaṃ vacaḥ // 2.002.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dundubhisvanakalpena gambhīreṇānunādinā / svareṇa mahatā rājā jīgmūta iva nādayan // 2.002.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'ham ikṣvākubhiḥ pūrvair narendraiḥ paripālitam / śreyasā yoktukāmo 'smi sukhārham akhilaṃ jagat // 2.002.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayāpy ācaritaṃ pūrvaiḥ panthānam anugacchatā / prajā nityam atandreṇa yathāśakty abhirakṣatā // 2.002.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ śarīraṃ kṛtsnasya lokasya caratā hitam / pāṇḍur asyātapatrasyac chāyāyāṃ jaritaṃ mayā // 2.002.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāpya varṣasahasrāṇi bahūny āyūṃṣi jīvitaḥ / jīrṇasyāsya śarīrasya viśrāntim abhirocaye // 2.002.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājaprabhāvajuṣṭāṃ hi durvahām ajitendriyaiḥ / pariśrānto 'smi lokasya gurvīṃ dharmadhuraṃ vahan // 2.002.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ viśramam icchāmi putraṃ kṛtvā prajāhite / saṃnikṛṣṭān imān sarvān anumānya dvijarṣabhān // 2.002.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujāto hi me sarvair guṇair jyeṣṭho mamātmajaḥ / puraṃdarasamo vīrye rāmaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ // 2.002.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ candram iva puṣyeṇa yuktaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam / yauvarājyena yoktāsmi prītaḥ puruṣapuṃgavam // 2.002.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anurūpaḥ sa vo nātho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / trailokyam api nāthena yena syān nāthavattaram // 2.002.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anena śreyasā sadyaḥ saṃyojyāham imāṃ mahīm / gatakleśo bhaviṣyāmi sute tasmin niveśya vai // 2.002.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti bruvantaṃ muditāḥ pratyanandan nṛpā nṛpam / vṛṣṭimantaṃ mahāmeghaṃ nardantam iva barhiṇaḥ // 2.002.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya dharmārthaviduṣo bhāvam ājñāya sarvaśaḥ / ūcuś ca manasā jñātvā vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // 2.002.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anekavarṣasāhasro vṛddhas tvam asi pārthiva / sa rāmaṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣiñcasva pārthivam // 2.002.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā teṣāṃ manaḥpriyam / ajānann iva jijñāsur idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.002.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ nu mayi dharmeṇa pṛthivīm anuśāsati / bhavanto draṣṭum icchanti yuvarājaṃ mamātmajam // 2.002.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadaiḥ saha / bahavo nṛpa kalyāṇā guṇāḥ putrasya santi te // 2.002.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyair guṇaiḥ śakrasamo rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / ikṣvākubhyo hi sarvebhyo 'py atirakto viśāmpate // 2.002.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaḥ satpuruṣo loke satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ / dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca śīlavān anasūyakaḥ // 2.002.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣāntaḥ sāntvayitā ślakṣṇaḥ kṛtajño vijitendriyaḥ / mṛduś ca sthiracittaś ca sadā bhavyo 'nasūyakaḥ // 2.002.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyavādī ca bhūtānāṃ satyavādī ca rāghavaḥ / bahuśrutānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ brāhmaṇānām upāsitā // 2.002.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenāsyehātulā kīrtir yaśas tejaś ca vardhate / devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ sarvāstreṣu viśāradaḥ // 2.002.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā vrajati saṃgrāmaṃ grāmārthe nagarasya vā / gatvā saumitrisahito nāvijitya nivartate // 2.002.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃgrāmāt punar āgamya kuñjareṇa rathena vā / paurān svajanavan nityaṃ kuśalaṃ paripṛcchati // 2.002.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putreṣv agniṣu dāreṣu preṣyaśiṣyagaṇeṣu ca / nikhilenānupūrvyā ca pitā putrān ivaurasān // 2.002.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuśrūṣante ca vaḥ śiṣyāḥ kaccit karmasu daṃśitāḥ / iti naḥ puruṣavyāghraḥ sadā rāmo 'bhibhāṣate // 2.002.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyasaneṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ bhṛśaṃ bhavati duḥkhitaḥ / utsaveṣu ca sarveṣu piteva parituṣyati // 2.002.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyavādī maheṣvāso vṛddhasevī jitendriyaḥ / vatsaḥ śreyasi jātas te diṣṭyāsau tava rāghavaḥ // 2.002.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā putraguṇair yukto mārīca iva kaśyapaḥ // 2.002.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balam ārogyam āyuś ca rāmasya viditātmanaḥ / āśaṃsate janaḥ sarvo rāṣṭre puravare tathā // 2.002.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyantaraś ca bāhyaś ca paurajānapado janaḥ / striyo vṛddhās taruṇyaś ca sāyaṃprātaḥ samāhitāḥ // 2.002.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvān devān namasyanti rāmasyārthe yaśasvinaḥ / teṣām āyācitaṃ deva tvatprasādāt samṛdhyatām // 2.002.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmam indīvaraśyāmaṃ sarvaśatrunibarhaṇam / paśyāmo yauvarājyasthaṃ tava rājottamātmajam // 2.002.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ devadevopamam ātmajaṃ te; sarvasya lokasya hite niviṣṭam / hitāya naḥ kṣipram udārajuṣṭaṃ; mudābhiṣektuṃ varada tvam arhasi // 2.002.034	indravajrā [ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [jtjB], indravajrā [ttjgg])
teṣām ajñalipadmāni pragṛhītāni sarvaśaḥ / pratigṛhyābravīd rājā tebhyaḥ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // 2.003.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho 'smi paramaprītaḥ prabhāvaś cātulo mama / yan me jyeṣṭhaṃ priyaṃ putraṃ yauvarājyastham icchatha // 2.003.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti pratyarcya tān rājā brāhmaṇān idam abravīt / vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca teṣām evopaśṛṇvatām // 2.003.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caitraḥ śrīmān ayaṃ māsaḥ puṇyaḥ puṣpitakānanaḥ / yauvarājyāya rāmasya sarvam evopakalpyatām // 2.003.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtam ity eva cābrūtām abhigamya jagatpatim / yathoktavacanaṃ prītau harṣayuktau dvijarṣabhau // 2.003.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sumantraṃ dyutimān rājā vacanam abravīt / rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bhavatā śīghram ānīiyatām iti // 2.003.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tatheti pratijñāya sumantro rājaśāsanāt / rāmaṃ tatrānayāṃ cakre rathena rathināṃ varam // 2.003.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tatra samāsīnās tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam / prācyodīcyāḥ pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhūmipāḥ // 2.003.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mlecchāś cāryāś ca ye cānye vanaśailāntavāsinaḥ / upāsāṃ cakrire sarve taṃ devā iva vāsavam // 2.003.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ madhye sa rājarṣir marutām iva vāsavaḥ / prāsādastho rathagataṃ dadarśāyāntam ātmajam // 2.003.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandharvarājapratimaṃ loke vikhyātapauruṣam / dīrghabāhuṃ mahāsattvaṃ mattamātaṅgagāminam // 2.003.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candrakāntānanaṃ rāmam atīva priyadarśanam / rūpaudāryaguṇaiḥ puṃsāṃ dṛṣṭicittāpahāriṇam // 2.003.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gharmābhitaptāḥ parjanyaṃ hlādayantam iva prajāḥ / na tatarpa samāyāntaṃ paśyamāno narādhipaḥ // 2.003.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avatārya sumantras taṃ rāghavaṃ syandanottamāt / pituḥ samīpaṃ gacchantaṃ prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt // 2.003.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ kailāsaśṛṅgābhaṃ prāsādaṃ narapuṃgavaḥ / āruroha nṛpaṃ draṣṭuṃ saha sūtena rāghavaḥ // 2.003.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa prāñjalir abhipretya praṇataḥ pitur antike / nāma svaṃ śrāvayan rāmo vavande caraṇau pituḥ // 2.003.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ pārśve kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ nṛpaḥ / gṛhyāñjalau samākṛṣya sasvaje priyam ātmajam // 2.003.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmai cābhyudyataṃ śrīmān maṇikāñcanabhūṣitam / dideśa rājā ruciraṃ rāmāya paramāsanam // 2.003.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad āsanavaraṃ prāpya vyadīpayata rāghavaḥ / svayeva prabhayā merum udaye vimalo raviḥ // 2.003.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena vibhrājitā tatra sā sabhābhivyarocata / vimalagrahanakṣatrā śāradī dyaur ivendunā // 2.003.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ paśyamāno nṛpatis tutoṣa priyam ātmajam / alaṃkṛtam ivātmānam ādarśatalasaṃsthitam // 2.003.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ sasmitam ābhāṣya putraṃ putravatāṃ varaḥ / uvācedaṃ vaco rājā devendram iva kaśyapaḥ // 2.003.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyeṣṭhāyām asi me patnyāṃ sadṛśyāṃ sadṛśaḥ sutaḥ / utpannas tvaṃ guṇaśreṣṭho mama rāmātmajaḥ priyaḥ // 2.003.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā yataḥ prajāś cemāḥ svaguṇair anurañjitāḥ / tasmāt tvaṃ puṣyayogena yauvarājyam avāpnuhi // 2.003.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmatas tvaṃ prakṛtyaiva vinīto guṇavān asi / guṇavaty api tu snehāt putra vakṣyāmi te hitam // 2.003.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūyo vinayam āsthāya bhava nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ / kāmakrodhasamutthāni tyajethā vyasanāni ca // 2.003.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parokṣayā vartamāno vṛttyā pratyakṣayā tathā / amātyaprabhṛtīḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtīś cānurañjaya // 2.003.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tuṣṭānuraktaprakṛtir yaḥ pālayati medinīm / tasya nandanti mitrāṇi labdhvāmṛtam ivāmarāḥ // 2.003.028.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt putra tvam ātmānaṃ niyamyaiva samācara // 2.003.028.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā suhṛdas tasya rāmasya priyakāriṇaḥ / tvaritāḥ śīghram abhyetya kausalyāyai nyavedayan // 2.003.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā hiraṇyaṃ ca gāś caiva ratnāni vividhāni ca / vyādideśa priyākhyebhyaḥ kausalyā pramadottamā // 2.003.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābhivādya rājānaṃ ratham āruhya rāghavaḥ / yayau svaṃ dyutimad veśma janaughaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ // 2.003.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te cāpi paurā nṛpater vacas tac; chrutvā tadā lābham iveṣṭam āpya / narendram āmantya gṛhāṇi gatvā; devān samānarcur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ // 2.003.032	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
gateṣv atha nṛpo bhūyaḥ paureṣu saha mantribhiḥ / mantrayitvā tataś cakre niścayajñaḥ sa niścayam // 2.004.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śva eva puṣyo bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣecyeta me sutaḥ / rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo yauvarājya iti prabhuḥ // 2.004.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāntargṛham āviśya rājā daśarathas tadā / sūtam ājñāpayām āsa rāmaṃ punar ihānaya // 2.004.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya sa tadvākyaṃ sūtaḥ punar upāyayau / rāmasya bhavanaṃ śīghraṃ rāmam ānayituṃ punaḥ // 2.004.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvāḥsthair āveditaṃ tasya rāmāyāgamanaṃ punaḥ / śrutvaiva cāpi rāmas taṃ prāptaṃ śaṅkānvito 'bhavat // 2.004.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praveśya cainaṃ tvaritaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt / yad āgamanakṛtyaṃ te bhūyas tad brūhy aśeṣataḥ // 2.004.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca tataḥ sūto rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati / śrutvā pramāṇam atra tvaṃ gamanāyetarāya vā // 2.004.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti sūtavacaḥ śrutvā rāmo 'tha tvarayānvitaḥ / prayayau rājabhavanaṃ punar draṣṭuṃ nareśvaram // 2.004.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ śrutvā samanuprāptaṃ rāmaṃ daśaratho nṛpaḥ / praveśayām āsa gṛhaṃ vivikṣuḥ priyam uttamam // 2.004.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśann eva ca śrīmān rāghavo bhavanaṃ pituḥ / dadarśa pitaraṃ dūrāt praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ // 2.004.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praṇamantaṃ samutthāpya taṃ pariṣvajya bhūmipaḥ / pradiśya cāsmai ruciram āsanaṃ punar abravīt // 2.004.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāma vṛddho 'smi dīrghāyur bhuktā bhogā mayepsitāḥ / annavadbhiḥ kratuśatais tatheṣṭaṃ bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ // 2.004.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jātam iṣṭam apatyaṃ me tvam adyānupamaṃ bhuvi / dattam iṣṭam adhītaṃ ca mayā puruṣasattama // 2.004.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anubhūtāni ceṣṭāni mayā vīra sukhāni ca / devarṣi pitṛviprāṇām anṛṇo 'smi tathātmanaḥ // 2.004.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kiṃ cin mama kartavyaṃ tavānyatrābhiṣecanāt / ato yat tvām ahaṃ brūyāṃ tan me tvaṃ kartum arhasi // 2.004.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya prakṛtayaḥ sarvās tvām icchanti narādhipam / atas tvāṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣekṣyāmi putraka // 2.004.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api cādyāśubhān rāma svapnān paśyāmi dāruṇān / sanirghātā maholkāś ca patantīha mahāsvanāḥ // 2.004.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaṣṭabdhaṃ ca me rāma nakṣatraṃ dāruṇair grahaiḥ / āvedayanti daivajñāḥ sūryāṅgārakarāhubhiḥ // 2.004.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāyeṇa hi nimittānām īdṛśānāṃ samudbhave / rājā vā mṛtyum āpnoti ghorāṃ vāpadam ṛcchati // 2.004.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad yāvad eva me ceto na vimuhyati rāghava / tāvad evābhiṣiñcasva calā hi prāṇināṃ matiḥ // 2.004.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya candro 'bhyupagataḥ puṣyāt pūrvaṃ punar vasum / śvaḥ puṣya yogaṃ niyataṃ vakṣyante daivacintakāḥ // 2.004.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra puṣye 'bhiṣiñcasva manas tvarayatīva mām / śvas tvāham abhiṣekṣyāmi yauvarājye paraṃtapa // 2.004.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt tvayādya vratinā niśeyaṃ niyatātmanā / saha vadhvopavastavyā darbhaprastaraśāyinā // 2.004.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suhṛdaś cāpramattās tvāṃ rakṣantv adya samantataḥ / bhavanti bahuvighnāni kāryāṇy evaṃvidhāni hi // 2.004.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viproṣitaś ca bharato yāvad eva purād itaḥ / tāvad evābhiṣekas te prāptakālo mato mama // 2.004.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ khalu satāṃ vṛtte bhrātā te bharataḥ sthitaḥ / jyeṣṭhānuvartī dharmātmā sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ // 2.004.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tu cittaṃ manuṣyāṇām anityam iti me matiḥ / satāṃ ca dharmanityānāṃ kṛtaśobhi ca rāghava // 2.004.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktaḥ so 'bhyanujñātaḥ śvobhāviny abhiṣecane / vrajeti rāmaḥ pitaram abhivādyābhyayād gṛham // 2.004.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśya cātmano veśma rājñoddiṣṭe 'bhiṣecane / tasmin kṣaṇe vinirgatya mātur antaḥpuraṃ yayau // 2.004.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra tāṃ pravaṇām eva mātaraṃ kṣaumavāsinīm / vāgyatāṃ devatāgāre dadarśa yācatīṃ śriyam // 2.004.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāg eva cāgatā tatra sumitrā lakṣmaṇas tathā / sītā cānāyitā śrutvā priyaṃ rāmābhiṣecanam // 2.004.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin kāle hi kausalyā tasthāv āmīlitekṣaṇā / sumitrayānvāsyamānā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca // 2.004.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā puṣyeṇa putrasya yauvarājyābhiṣecanam / prāṇāyāmena puruṣaṃ dhyāyamānā janārdanam // 2.004.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā saniyamām eva so 'bhigamyābhivādya ca / uvāca vacanaṃ rāmo harṣayaṃs tām idaṃ tadā // 2.004.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amba pitrā niyukto 'smi prajāpālanakarmaṇi / bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣeko me yathā me śāsanaṃ pituḥ // 2.004.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītayāpy upavastavyā rajanīyaṃ mayā saha / evam ṛtvigupādhyāyaiḥ saha mām uktavān pitā // 2.004.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāni yāny atra yogyāni śvobhāviny abhiṣecane / tāni me maṅgalāny adya vaidehyāś caiva kāraya // 2.004.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā tu kausalyā cirakālābhikāṅkṣitam / harṣabāṣpakalaṃ vākyam idaṃ rāmam abhāṣata // 2.004.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vatsa rāma ciraṃ jīva hatās te paripanthinaḥ / jñātīn me tvaṃ śriyā yuktaḥ sumitrāyāś ca nandaya // 2.004.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kalyāṇe bata nakṣatre mayi jāto 'si putraka / yena tvayā daśaratho guṇair ārādhitaḥ pitā // 2.004.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amoghaṃ bata me kṣāntaṃ puruṣe puṣkarekṣaṇe / yeyam ikṣvākurājyaśrīḥ putra tvāṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // 2.004.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam ukto mātredaṃ rāmo bhāratam abravīt / prāñjaliṃ prahvam āsīnam abhivīkṣya smayann iva // 2.004.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇemāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ praśādhi tvaṃ vasuṃdharām / dvitīyaṃ me 'ntarātmānaṃ tvām iyaṃ śrīr upasthitā // 2.004.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitre bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs tvam iṣṭān rājyaphalāni ca / jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca tvadartham abhikāmaye // 2.004.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mātarāv abhivādya ca / abhyanujñāpya sītāṃ ca jagāma svaṃ niveśanam // 2.004.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃdiśya rāmaṃ nṛpatiḥ śvobhāviny abhiṣecane / purohitaṃ samāhūya vasiṣṭham idam abravīt // 2.005.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gacchopavāsaṃ kākutsthaṃ kārayādya tapodhana / śrīyaśorājyalābhāya vadhvā saha yatavratam // 2.005.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti ca sa rājānam uktvā vedavidāṃ varaḥ / svayaṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān yayau rāmaniveśanam // 2.005.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmabhavanaṃ prāpya pāṇḍurābhraghanaprabham / tisraḥ kakṣyā rathenaiva viveśa munisattamaḥ // 2.005.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ rāmas tvarann iva sasaṃbhramaḥ / mānayiṣyan sa mānārhaṃ niścakrāma niveśanāt // 2.005.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyetya tvaramāṇaś ca rathābhyāśaṃ manīṣiṇaḥ / tato 'vatārayām āsa parigṛhya rathāt svayam // 2.005.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cainaṃ praśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣyābhiprasādya ca / priyārhaṃ harṣayan rāmam ity uvāca purohitaḥ // 2.005.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasannas te pitā rāma yauvarājyam avāpsyasi / upavāsaṃ bhavān adya karotu saha sītayā // 2.005.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prātas tvām abhiṣektā hi yauvarājye narādhipaḥ / pitā daśarathaḥ prītyā yayātiṃ nahuṣo yathā // 2.005.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā sa tadā rāmam upavāsaṃ yatavratam / mantravat kārayām āsa vaidehyā sahitaṃ muniḥ // 2.005.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yathāvad rāmeṇa sa rājño gurur arcitaḥ / abhyanujñāpya kākutsthaṃ yayau rāmaniveśanāt // 2.005.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suhṛdbhis tatra rāmo 'pi tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ / sabhājito viveśātha tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ // 2.005.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛṣṭanārī narayutaṃ rāmaveśma tadā babhau / yathā mattadvijagaṇaṃ praphullanalinaṃ saraḥ // 2.005.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājabhavanaprakhyāt tasmād rāmaniveśanāt / nirgatya dadṛśe mārgaṃ vasiṣṭho janasaṃvṛtam // 2.005.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛndavṛndair ayodhyāyāṃ rājamārgāḥ samantataḥ / babhūvur abhisaṃbādhāḥ kutūhalajanair vṛtāḥ // 2.005.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janavṛndormisaṃgharṣaharṣasvanavatas tadā / babhūva rājamārgasya sāgarasyeva nisvanaḥ // 2.005.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siktasaṃmṛṣṭarathyā hi tad ahar vanamālinī / āsīd ayodhyā nagarī samucchritagṛhadhvajā // 2.005.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadā hy ayodhyā nilayaḥ sastrībālābalo janaḥ / rāmābhiṣekam ākāṅkṣann ākāṅkṣann udayaṃ raveḥ // 2.005.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajālaṃkārabhūtaṃ ca janasyānandavardhanam / utsuko 'bhūj jano draṣṭuṃ tam ayodhyā mahotsavam // 2.005.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ taṃ janasaṃbādhaṃ rājamārgaṃ purohitaḥ / vyūhann iva janaughaṃ taṃ śanai rāja kulaṃ yayau // 2.005.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sitābhraśikharaprakhyaṃ prāsadam adhiruhya saḥ / samiyāya narendreṇa śakreṇeva bṛhaspatiḥ // 2.005.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āgatam abhiprekṣya hitvā rājāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ / papraccha sa ca tasmai tat kṛtam ity abhyavedayat // 2.005.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guruṇā tv abhyanujñāto manujaughaṃ visṛjya tam / viveśāntaḥpuraṃ rājā siṃho giriguhām iva // 2.005.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad agryaveṣapramadājanākulaṃ; mahendraveśmapratimaṃ niveśanam / vyadīpayaṃś cāru viveśa pārthivaḥ; śaśīva tārāgaṇasaṃkulaṃ nabhaḥ // 2.005.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
gate purohite rāmaḥ snāto niyatamānasaḥ / saha patnyā viśālākṣyā nārāyaṇam upāgamat // 2.006.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pragṛhya śirasā pātrīṃ haviṣo vidhivat tadā / mahate daivatāyājyaṃ juhāva jvalite 'nale // 2.006.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śeṣaṃ ca haviṣas tasya prāśyāśāsyātmanaḥ priyam / dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ svāstīrṇe kuśasaṃstare // 2.006.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāgyataḥ saha vaidehyā bhūtvā niyatamānasaḥ / śrīmaty āyatane viṣṇoḥ śiśye naravarātmajaḥ // 2.006.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekayāmāvaśiṣṭāyāṃ rātryāṃ prativibudhya saḥ / alaṃkāravidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ kārayām āsa veśmanaḥ // 2.006.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra śṛṇvan sukhā vācaḥ sūtamāgadhabandinām / pūrvāṃ saṃdhyām upāsīno jajāpa yatamānasaḥ // 2.006.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tuṣṭāva praṇataś caiva śirasā madhusūdanam / vimalakṣaumasaṃvīto vācayām āsa ca dvijān // 2.006.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ puṇyāhaghoṣo 'tha gambhīramadhuras tadā / ayodhyāṃ pūrayām āsa tūryaghoṣānunāditaḥ // 2.006.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtopavāsaṃ tu tadā vaidehyā saha rāghavam / ayodhyā nilayaḥ śrutvā sarvaḥ pramudito janaḥ // 2.006.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paurajanaḥ sarvaḥ śrutvā rāmābhiṣecanam / prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā cakre śobhāṃ parāṃ punaḥ // 2.006.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sitābhraśikharābheṣu devatāyataneṣu ca / catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu caityeṣv aṭṭālakeṣu ca // 2.006.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāpaṇyasamṛddheṣu vaṇijām āpaṇeṣu ca / kuṭumbināṃ samṛddheṣu śrīmatsu bhavaneṣu ca // 2.006.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sabhāsu caiva sarvāsu vṛkṣeṣv ālakṣiteṣu ca / dhvajāḥ samucchritāś citrāḥ patākāś cābhavaṃs tadā // 2.006.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naṭanartakasaṃghānāṃ gāyakānāṃ ca gāyatām / manaḥkarṇasukhā vācaḥ śuśruvuś ca tatas tataḥ // 2.006.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmābhiṣekayuktāś ca kathāś cakrur mitho janāḥ / rāmābhiṣeke saṃprāpte catvareṣu gṛheṣu ca // 2.006.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bālā api krīḍamānā gṛhadvāreṣu saṃghaśaḥ / rāmābhiṣekasaṃyuktāś cakrur eva mithaḥ kathāḥ // 2.006.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtapuṣpopahāraś ca dhūpagandhādhivāsitaḥ / rājamārgaḥ kṛtaḥ śrīmān paurai rāmābhiṣecane // 2.006.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakāśīkaraṇārthaṃ ca niśāgamanaśaṅkayā / dīpavṛkṣāṃs tathā cakrur anu rathyāsu sarvaśaḥ // 2.006.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaṃkāraṃ purasyaivaṃ kṛtvā tat puravāsinaḥ / ākāṅkṣamāṇā rāmasya yauvarājyābhiṣecanam // 2.006.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sametya saṃghaśaḥ sarve catvareṣu sabhāsu ca / kathayanto mithas tatra praśaśaṃsur janādhipam // 2.006.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho mahātmā rājāyam ikṣvākukulanandanaḥ / jñātvā yo vṛddham ātmānaṃ rāmaṃ rājye 'hbiṣekṣyati // 2.006.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve hy anugṛhītāḥ sma yan no rāmo mahīpatiḥ / cirāya bhavitā goptā dṛṣṭalokaparāvaraḥ // 2.006.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anuddhatamanā vidvān dharmātmā bhrātṛvatsalaḥ / yathā ca bhrātṛṣu snigdhas tathāsmāsv api rāghavaḥ // 2.006.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ciraṃ jīvatu dharmātmā rājā daśaratho 'naghaḥ / yatprasādenābhiṣiktaṃ rāmaṃ drakṣyāmahe vayam // 2.006.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃvidhaṃ kathayatāṃ paurāṇāṃ śuśruvus tadā / digbhyo 'pi śrutavṛttāntāḥ prāptā jānapadā janāḥ // 2.006.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu digbhyaḥ purīṃ prāptā draṣṭuṃ rāmābhiṣecanam / rāmasya pūrayām āsuḥ purīṃ jānapadā janāḥ // 2.006.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janaughais tair visarpadbhiḥ śuśruve tatra nisvanaḥ / parvasūdīrṇavegasya sāgarasyeva nisvanaḥ // 2.006.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tad indrakṣayasaṃnibhaṃ puraṃ; didṛkṣubhir jānapadair upāgataiḥ / samantataḥ sasvanam ākulaṃ babhau; samudrayādobhir ivārṇavodakam // 2.006.028	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
jñātidāsī yato jātā kaikeyyās tu sahoṣitā / prāsādaṃ candrasaṃkāśam āruroha yadṛcchayā // 2.007.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siktarājapathāṃ kṛtsnāṃ prakīrṇakamalotpalām / ayodhyāṃ mantharā tasmāt prāsādād anvavaikṣata // 2.007.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patākābhir varārhābhir dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtām / siktāṃ candanatoyaiś ca śiraḥsnātajanair vṛtām // 2.007.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avidūre sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhātrīṃ papraccha mantharā / uttamenābhisaṃyuktā harṣeṇārthaparā satī // 2.007.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmamātā dhanaṃ kiṃ nu janebhyaḥ saṃprayacchati / atimātraṃ praharṣo 'yaṃ kiṃ janasya ca śaṃsa me // 2.007.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kārayiṣyati kiṃ vāpi saṃprahṛṣṭo mahīpatiḥ // 2.007.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidīryamāṇā harṣeṇa dhātrī paramayā mudā / ācacakṣe 'tha kubjāyai bhūyasīṃ rāghave śriyam // 2.007.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvaḥ puṣyeṇa jitakrodhaṃ yauvarājyena rāghavam / rājā daśaratho rāmam abhiṣecayitānagham // 2.007.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhātryās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kubjā kṣipram amarṣitā / kailāsa śikharākārāt prāsādād avarohata // 2.007.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā dahyamānā kopena mantharā pāpadarśinī / śayānām etya kaikeyīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.007.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttiṣṭha mūḍhe kiṃ śeṣe bhayaṃ tvām abhivartate / upaplutamahaughena kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase // 2.007.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aniṣṭe subhagākāre saubhāgyena vikatthase / calaṃ hi tava saubhāgyaṃ nadyaḥ srota ivoṣṇage // 2.007.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu kaikeyī ruṣṭayā paruṣaṃ vacaḥ / kubjayā pāpadarśinyā viṣādam agamat param // 2.007.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyī tv abravīt kubjāṃ kaccit kṣemaṃ na manthare / viṣaṇṇavadanāṃ hi tvāṃ lakṣaye bhṛśaduḥkhitām // 2.007.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantharā tu vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyyā madhurākṣaram / uvāca krodhasaṃyuktā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradā // 2.007.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā viṣaṇṇatarā bhūtvā kubjā tasyā hitaiṣiṇī / viṣādayantī provāca bhedayantī ca rāghavam // 2.007.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṣemaṃ sumahad devi pravṛttaṃ tvadvināśanam / rāmaṃ daśaratho rājā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // 2.007.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāsmy agādhe bhaye magnā duḥkhaśokasamanvitā / dahyamānānaleneva tvaddhitārtham ihāgatā // 2.007.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava duḥkhena kaikeyi mama duḥkhaṃ mahad bhavet / tvadvṛddhau mama vṛddhiś ca bhaved atra na saṃśayaḥ // 2.007.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
narādhipakule jātā mahiṣī tvaṃ mahīpateḥ / ugratvaṃ rājadharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ devi na budhyase // 2.007.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmavādī śaṭho bhartā ślakṣṇavādī ca dāruṇaḥ / śuddhabhāve na jānīṣe tenaivam atisaṃdhitā // 2.007.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upasthitaṃ payuñjānas tvayi sāntvam anarthakam / arthenaivādya te bhartā kausalyāṃ yojayiṣyati // 2.007.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apavāhya sa duṣṭātmā bharataṃ tava bandhuṣu / kālyaṃ sthāpayitā rāmaṃ rājye nihatakaṇṭake // 2.007.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatruḥ patipravādena mātreva hitakāmyayā / āśīviṣa ivāṅkena bāle paridhṛtas tvayā // 2.007.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā hi kuryāt sarpo vā śatrur vā pratyupekṣitaḥ / rājñā daśarathenādya saputrā tvaṃ tathā kṛtā // 2.007.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāpenānṛtasantvena bāle nityaṃ sukhocite / rāmaṃ sthāpayatā rājye sānubandhā hatā hy asi // 2.007.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā prāptakālaṃ kaikeyi kṣipraṃ kuru hitaṃ tava / trāyasva putram ātmānaṃ māṃ ca vismayadarśane // 2.007.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantharāyā vacaḥ śrutvā śayanāt sa śubhānanā / evam ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pradadau śubham // 2.007.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dattvā tv ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pramadottamā / kaikeyī mantharāṃ hṛṣṭā punar evābravīd idam // 2.007.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ tu manthare mahyam ākhyāsi paramaṃ priyam / etan me priyam ākhyātuḥ kiṃ vā bhūyaḥ karomi te // 2.007.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāme vā bharate vāhaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye / tasmāt tuṣṭāsmi yad rājā rāmaṃ rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // 2.007.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na me paraṃ kiṃ cid itas tvayā punaḥ; priyaṃ priyārhe suvacaṃ vaco varam / tathā hy avocas tvam ataḥ priyottaraṃ; varaṃ paraṃ te pradadāmi taṃ vṛṇu // 2.007.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
mantharā tv abhyasūyyainām utsṛjyābharaṇaṃ ca tat / uvācedaṃ tato vākyaṃ kopaduḥkhasamanvitā // 2.008.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harṣaṃ kim idam asthāne kṛtavaty asi bāliśe / śokasāgaramadhyastham ātmānaṃ nāvabudhyase // 2.008.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
subhagā khalu kausalyā yasyāḥ putro 'bhiṣekṣyate / yauvarājyena mahatā śvaḥ puṣyeṇa dvijottamaiḥ // 2.008.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptāṃ sumahatīṃ prītiṃ pratītāṃ tāṃ hatadviṣam / upasthāsyasi kausalyāṃ dāsīva tvaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // 2.008.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛṣṭāḥ khalu bhaviṣyanti rāmasya paramāḥ striyaḥ / aprahṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti snuṣās te bharatakṣaye // 2.008.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāṃ bruvantīṃ mantharāṃ tataḥ / rāmasyaiva guṇān devī kaikeyī praśaśaṃsa ha // 2.008.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmajño gurubhir dāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ / rāmo rājñaḥ suto jyeṣṭho yauvarājyam ato 'rhati // 2.008.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātṝn bhṛtyāṃś ca dīrghāyuḥ pitṛvat pālayiṣyati / saṃtapyase kathaṃ kubje śrutvā rāmābhiṣecanam // 2.008.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataś cāpi rāmasya dhruvaṃ varṣaśatāt param / pitṛpaitāmahaṃ rājyam avāpsyati nararṣabhaḥ // 2.008.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tvam abhyudaye prāpte vartamāne ca manthare / bhaviṣyati ca kalyāṇe kimarthaṃ paritapyase // 2.008.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyāto 'tiriktaṃ ca sa tu śuśrūṣate hi mām // 2.008.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyyā vacanaṃ śrutvā mantharā bhṛśaduḥkhitā / dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // 2.008.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anarthadarśinī maurkhyān nātmānam avabudhyase / śokavyasanavistīrṇe majjantī duḥkhasāgare // 2.008.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavitā rāghavo rājā rāghavasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ / rājavaṃśāt tu bharataḥ kaikeyi parihāsyate // 2.008.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi rājñaḥ sutāḥ sarve rājye tiṣṭhanti bhāmini / sthāpyamāneṣu sarveṣu sumahān anayo bhavet // 2.008.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāj jyeṣṭhe hi kaikeyi rājyatantrāṇi pārthivāḥ / sthāpayanty anavadyāṅgi guṇavatsv itareṣv api // 2.008.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asāv atyantanirbhagnas tava putro bhaviṣyati / anāthavat sukhebhyaś ca rājavaṃśāc ca vatsale // 2.008.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāhaṃ tvadarthe saṃprāptā tvaṃ tu māṃ nāvabudhyase / sapatnivṛddhau yā me tvaṃ pradeyaṃ dātum icchasi // 2.008.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhruvaṃ tu bharataṃ rāmaḥ prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakam / deśāntaraṃ nāyayitvā lokāntaram athāpi vā // 2.008.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāla eva hi mātulyaṃ bharato nāyitas tvayā / saṃnikarṣāc ca sauhārdaṃ jāyate sthāvareṣv api // 2.008.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
goptā hi rāmaṃ saumitrir lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi rāghavaḥ / aśvinor iva saubhrātraṃ tayor lokeṣu viśrutam // 2.008.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmān na lakṣmaṇe rāmaḥ pāpaṃ kiṃ cit kariṣyati / rāmas tu bharate pāpaṃ kuryād iti na saṃśayaḥ // 2.008.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād rājagṛhād eva vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ / etad dhi rocate mahyaṃ bhṛśaṃ cāpi hitaṃ tava // 2.008.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ te jñātipakṣasya śreyaś caiva bhaviṣyati / yadi ced bharato dharmāt pitryaṃ rājyam avāpsyati // 2.008.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa te sukhocito bālo rāmasya sahajo ripuḥ / samṛdhārthasya naṣṭārtho jīviṣyati kathaṃ vaśe // 2.008.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhidrutam ivāraṇye siṃhena gajayūthapam / pracchādyamānaṃ rāmeṇa bharataṃ trātum arhasi // 2.008.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darpān nirākṛtā pūrvaṃ tvayā saubhāgyavattayā / rāmamātā sapatnī te kathaṃ vairaṃ na yātayet // 2.008.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā hi rāmaḥ pṛthivīm avāpsyati; dhruvaṃ pranaṣṭo bharato bhaviṣyati / ato hi saṃcintaya rājyam ātmaje; parasya cādyaiva vivāsa kāraṇam // 2.008.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
evam uktā tu kaikeyī krodhena jvalitānanā / dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya mantharām idam abravīt // 2.009.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya rāmam itaḥ kṣipraṃ vanaṃ prasthāpayāmy aham / yauvarājyena bharataṃ kṣipram evābhiṣecaye // 2.009.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ tv idānīṃ saṃpaśya kenopāyena manthare / bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃ cana // 2.009.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī / rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kaikeyīm idam abravīt // 2.009.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hantedānīṃ pravakṣyāmi kaikeyi śrūyatāṃ ca me / yathā te bharato rājyaṃ putraḥ prāpsyati kevalam // 2.009.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyā mantharāyās tu kaikayī / kiṃ cid utthāya śayanāt svāstīrṇād idam abravīt // 2.009.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaya tvaṃ mamopāyaṃ kenopāyena manthare / bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃ cana // 2.009.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī / rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kubjā vacanam abravīt // 2.009.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava devāsure yuddhe saha rājarṣibhiḥ patiḥ / agacchat tvām upādāya devarājasya sāhyakṛt // 2.009.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diśam āsthāya kaikeyi dakṣiṇāṃ daṇḍakān prati / vaijayantam iti khyātaṃ puraṃ yatra timidhvajaḥ // 2.009.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śambara iti khyātaḥ śatamāyo mahāsuraḥ / dadau śakrasya saṃgrāmaṃ devasaṃghair anirjitaḥ // 2.009.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin mahati saṃgrāme rājā daśarathas tadā / apavāhya tvayā devi saṃgrāmān naṣṭacetanaḥ // 2.009.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāpi vikṣataḥ śastraiḥ patis te rakṣitas tvayā / tuṣṭena tena dattau te dvau varau śubhadarśane // 2.009.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvayoktaḥ patir devi yadeccheyaṃ tadā varau / gṛhṇīyām iti tat tena tathety uktaṃ mahātmanā // 2.009.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anabhijñā hy ahaṃ devi tvayaiva kathitaṃ purā // 2.009.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau varau yāca bhartāraṃ bharatasyābhiṣecanam / pravrājanaṃ ca rāmasya tvaṃ varṣāṇi caturdaśa // 2.009.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krodhāgāraṃ praviśyādya kruddhevāśvapateḥ sute / śeṣvānantarhitāyāṃ tvaṃ bhūmau malinavāsinī // 2.009.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā smainaṃ pratyudīkṣethā mā cainam abhibhāṣathāḥ // 2.009.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dayitā tvaṃ sadā bhartur atra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ / tvatkṛte ca mahārājo viśed api hutāśanam // 2.009.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tvāṃ krodhayituṃ śakto na kruddhāṃ pratyudīkṣitum / tava priyārthaṃ rājā hi prāṇān api parityajet // 2.009.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy atikramituṃ śaktas tava vākyaṃ mahīpatiḥ / mandasvabhāve budhyasva saubhāgyabalam ātmanaḥ // 2.009.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maṇimuktāsuvarṇāni ratnāni vividhāni ca / dadyād daśaratho rājā mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ // 2.009.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yau tau devāsure yuddhe varau daśaratho 'dadāt / tau smāraya mahābhāge so 'rtho mā tvām atikramet // 2.009.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā tu te varaṃ dadyāt svayam utthāpya rāghavaḥ / vyavasthāpya mahārājaṃ tvam imaṃ vṛṇuyā varam // 2.009.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaṃ pravrājayāraṇye nava varṣāṇi pañca ca / bharataḥ kriyatāṃ rājā pṛthivyāṃ pārthivarṣabhaḥ // 2.009.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ pravrājitaś caiva rāmo 'rāmo bhaviṣyati / bharataś ca hatāmitras tava rājā bhaviṣyati // 2.009.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena kālena rāmaś ca vanāt pratyāgamiṣyati / tena kālena putras te kṛtamūlo bhaviṣyati // 2.009.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃgṛhītamanuṣyaś ca suhṛdbhiḥ sārdham ātmavān // 2.009.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptakālaṃ tu te manye rājānaṃ vītasādhvasā / rāmābhiṣekasaṃkalpān nigṛhya vinivartaya // 2.009.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anartham artharūpeṇa grāhitā sā tatas tayā / hṛṣṭā pratītā kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // 2.009.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kubje tvāṃ nābhijānāmi śreṣṭhāṃ śreṣṭhābhidhāyinīm / pṛthivyām asi kubjānām uttamā buddhiniścaye // 2.009.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvam eva tu mamārtheṣu nityayuktā hitaiṣiṇī / nāhaṃ samavabudhyeyaṃ kubje rājñaś cikīrṣitam // 2.009.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
santi duḥsaṃsthitāḥ kubjā vakrāḥ paramapāpikāḥ / tvaṃ padmam iva vātena saṃnatā priyadarśanā // 2.009.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uras te 'bhiniviṣṭaṃ vai yāvat skandhāt samunnatam / adhastāc codaraṃ śāntaṃ sunābham iva lajjitam // 2.009.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaghanaṃ tava nirghuṣṭaṃ raśanādāmaśobhitam / jaṅghe bhṛśam upanyaste pādau cāpy āyatāv ubhau // 2.009.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvam āyatābhyāṃ sakthibhyāṃ manthare kṣaumavāsini / agrato mama gacchantī rājahaṃsīva rājase // 2.009.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavedaṃ sthagu yad dīrghaṃ rathaghoṇam ivāyatam / matayaḥ kṣatravidyāś ca māyāś cātra vasanti te // 2.009.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra te pratimokṣyāmi mālāṃ kubje hiraṇmayīm / abhiṣikte ca bharate rāghave ca vanaṃ gate // 2.009.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jātyena ca suvarṇena suniṣṭaptena sundari / labdhārthā ca pratītā ca lepayiṣyāmi te sthagu // 2.009.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mukhe ca tilakaṃ citraṃ jātarūpamayaṃ śubham / kārayiṣyāmi te kubje śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // 2.009.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paridhāya śubhe vastre devadeva cariṣyasi / candram āhvayamānena mukhenāpratimānanā // 2.009.038.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamiṣyasi gatiṃ mukhyāṃ garvayantī dviṣajjanam // 2.009.038.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavāpi kubjāḥ kubjāyāḥ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ / pādau paricariṣyanti yathaiva tvaṃ sadā mama // 2.009.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti praśasyamānā sā kaikeyīm idam abravīt / śayānāṃ śayane śubhre vedyām agniśikhām iva // 2.009.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatodake setubandho na kalyāṇi vidhīyate / uttiṣṭha kuru kalyāṇaṃ rājānam anudarśaya // 2.009.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā protsāhitā devī gatvā mantharayā saha / krodhāgāraṃ viśālākṣī saubhāgyamadagarvitā // 2.009.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anekaśatasāhasraṃ muktāhāraṃ varāṅganā / avamucya varārhāṇi śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // 2.009.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato hemopamā tatra kubjā vākyaṃ vaśaṃ gatā / saṃviśya bhūmau kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // 2.009.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iha vā māṃ mṛtāṃ kubje nṛpāyāvedayiṣyasi / vanaṃ tu rāghave prāpte bharataḥ prāpsyati kṣitim // 2.009.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athaitad uktvā vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ; nidhāya sarvābharaṇāni bhāminī / asaṃvṛtām āstaraṇena medinīṃ; tadādhiśiśye patiteva kinnarī // 2.009.046	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
udīrṇasaṃrambhatamovṛtānanā; tathāvamuktottamamālyabhūṣaṇā / narendrapatnī vimanā babhūva sā; tamovṛtā dyaur iva magnatārakā // 2.009.047	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
ājñāpya tu mahārājo rāghavasyābhiṣecanam / priyārhāṃ priyam ākhyātuṃ viveśāntaḥpuraṃ vaśī // 2.010.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tatra patitāṃ bhūmau śayānām atathocitām / pratapta iva duḥkhena so 'paśyaj jagatīpatiḥ // 2.010.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vṛddhas taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm / apāpaḥ pāpasaṃkalpāṃ dadarśa dharaṇītale // 2.010.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kareṇum iva digdhena viddhāṃ mṛgayuṇā vane / mahāgaja ivāraṇye snehāt parimamarśa tām // 2.010.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parimṛśya ca pāṇibhyām abhisaṃtrastacetanaḥ / kāmī kamalapatrākṣīm uvāca vanitām idam // 2.010.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na te 'ham abhijānāmi krodham ātmani saṃśritam / devi kenābhiyuktāsi kena vāsi vimānitā // 2.010.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad idaṃ mama duḥkhāya śeṣe kalyāṇi pāṃsuṣu / bhūmau śeṣe kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mayi kalyāṇa cetasi // 2.010.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūtopahatacitteva mama cittapramāthinī // 2.010.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
santi me kuśalā vaidyā abhituṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ / sukhitāṃ tvāṃ kariṣyanti vyādhim ācakṣva bhāmini // 2.010.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya vā te priyaṃ kāryaṃ kena vā vipriyaṃ kṛtam / kaḥ priyaṃ labhatām adya ko vā sumahad apriyam // 2.010.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avadhyo vadhyatāṃ ko vā vadhyaḥ ko vā vimucyatām / daridraḥ ko bhavatv āḍhyo dravyavān vāpy akiṃcanaḥ // 2.010.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ caiva madīyāś ca sarve tava vaśānugāḥ / na te kaṃ cid abhiprāyaṃ vyāhantum aham utsahe // 2.010.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmano jīvitenāpi brūhi yan manasecchasi / yāvad āvartate cakraṃ tāvatī me vasuṃdharā // 2.010.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathoktā sā samāśvastā vaktukāmā tad apriyam / paripīḍayituṃ bhūyo bhartāram upacakrame // 2.010.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāsmi viprakṛtā deva kena cin na vimānitā / abhiprāyas tu me kaś cit tam icchāmi tvayā kṛtam // 2.010.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratijñāṃ pratijānīṣva yadi tvaṃ kartum icchasi / atha tad vyāhariṣyāmi yad abhiprārthitaṃ mayā // 2.010.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tayā rājā priyayā strīvaśaṃ gataḥ / tām uvāca mahātejāḥ kaikeyīm īṣadutsmitaḥ // 2.010.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avalipte na jānāsi tvattaḥ priyataro mama / manujo manujavyāghrād rāmād anyo na vidyate // 2.010.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhadre hṛdayam apy etad anumṛśśyoddharasva me / etat samīkṣya kaikeyi brūhi yat sādhu manyase // 2.010.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balam ātmani paśyantī na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi / kariṣyāmi tava prītiṃ sukṛtenāpi te śape // 2.010.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena vākyena saṃhṛṣṭā tam abhiprāyam ātmanaḥ / vyājahāra mahāghoram abhyāgatam ivāntakam // 2.010.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathākrameṇa śapasi varaṃ mama dadāsi ca / tac chṛṇvantu trayastriṃśad devāḥ sendrapurogamāḥ // 2.010.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candrādityau nabhaś caiva grahā rātryahanī diśaḥ / jagac ca pṛthivī caiva sagandharvā sarākṣasā // 2.010.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśācarāṇi bhūtāni gṛheṣu gṛhadevatāḥ / yāni cānyāni bhūtāni jānīyur bhāṣitaṃ tava // 2.010.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyasaṃdho mahātejā dharmajñaḥ susamāhitaḥ / varaṃ mama dadāty eṣa tan me śṛṇvantu devatāḥ // 2.010.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti devī maheṣvāsaṃ parigṛhyābhiśasya ca / tataḥ param uvācedaṃ varadaṃ kāmamohitam // 2.010.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varau yau me tvayā deva tadā dattau mahīpate / tau tāvad aham adyaiva vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vacaḥ // 2.010.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣeka samārambho rāghavasyopakalpitaḥ / anenaivābhiṣekeṇa bharato me 'bhiṣicyatām // 2.010.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nava pañca ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ / cīrājinajaṭādhārī rāmo bhavatu tāpasaḥ // 2.010.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharato bhajatām adya yauvarājyam akaṇṭakam / adya caiva hi paśyeyaṃ prayāntaṃ rāghavaṃ vane // 2.010.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śrutvā mahārāja kaikeyyā dāruṇaṃ vacaḥ / vyathito vilavaś caiva vyāghrīṃ dṛṣṭvā yathā mṛgaḥ // 2.010.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asaṃvṛtāyām āsīno jagatyāṃ dīrgham ucchvasan / aho dhig iti sāmarṣo vācam uktvā narādhipaḥ // 2.010.031.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
moham āpedivān bhūyaḥ śokopahatacetanaḥ // 2.010.031.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cireṇa tu nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya suduḥkhitaḥ / kaikeyīm abravīt kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā // 2.010.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nṛśaṃse duṣṭacāritre kulasyāsya vināśini / kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava rāmeṇa pāpe pāpaṃ mayāpi vā // 2.010.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadā te jananī tulyāṃ vṛttiṃ vahati rāghavaḥ / tasyaiva tvam anarthāya kiṃnimittam ihodyatā // 2.010.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ mayātmavināśāya bhavanaṃ svaṃ praveśitā / avijñānān nṛpasutā vyālī tīkṣṇaviṣā yathā // 2.010.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jīvaloko yadā sarvo rāmasyeha guṇastavam / aparādhaṃ kam uddiśya tyakṣyāmīṣṭam ahaṃ sutam // 2.010.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyāṃ vā sumitrāṃ vā tyajeyam api vā śriyam / jīvitaṃ vātmano rāmaṃ na tv eva pitṛvatsalam // 2.010.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parā bhavati me prītir dṛṣṭvā tanayam agrajam / apaśyatas tu me rāmaṃ naṣṭā bhavati cetanā // 2.010.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiṣṭhel loko vinā sūryaṃ sasyaṃ vā salilaṃ vinā / na tu rāmaṃ vinā dehe tiṣṭhet tu mama jīvitam // 2.010.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad alaṃ tyajyatām eṣa niścayaḥ pāpaniścaye / api te caraṇau mūrdhnā spṛśāmy eṣa prasīda me // 2.010.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhūmipālo vilapann anāthavat; striyā gṛhīto dṛhaye 'timātratā / papāta devyāś caraṇau prasāritāv; ubhāv asaṃspṛśya yathāturas tathā // 2.010.041	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
atadarhaṃ mahārājaṃ śayānam atathocitam / yayātim iva puṇyānte devalokāt paricyutam // 2.011.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anartharūpā siddhārthā abhītā bhayadarśinī / punar ākārayām āsa tam eva varam aṅganā // 2.011.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ katthase mahārāja satyavādī dṛḍhavrataḥ / mama cemaṃ varaṃ kasmād vidhārayitum icchasi // 2.011.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu kaikeyyā rājā daśarathas tadā / pratyuvāca tataḥ kruddho muhūrtaṃ vihvalann iva // 2.011.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛte mayi gate rāme vanaṃ manujapuṃgave / hantānārye mamāmitre rāmaḥ pravrājito vanam // 2.011.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi satyaṃ bravīmy etat tad asatyaṃ bhaviṣyati / akīrtir atulā loke dhruvaṃ paribhavaś ca me // 2.011.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā vilapatas tasya paribhramitacetasaḥ / astam abhyagamat sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata // 2.011.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa triyāmā tathārtasya candramaṇḍalamaṇḍitā / rājño vilapamānasya na vyabhāsata śarvarī // 2.011.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaivoṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya vṛddho daśaratho nṛpaḥ / vilalāpārtavad duḥkhaṃ gaganāsaktalocanaḥ // 2.011.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na prabhātaṃ tvayecchāmi mayāyaṃ racito 'ñjaliḥ / atha vā gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ nāham icchāmi nirghṛṇām // 2.011.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nṛśaṃsāṃ kaikeyīṃ draṣṭuṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat // 2.011.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tato rājā kaikeyīṃ saṃyatāñjaliḥ / prasādayām āsa punaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // 2.011.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhuvṛttasya dīnasya tvadgatasya gatāyuṣaḥ / prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ devi bhadre rājño viśeṣataḥ // 2.011.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūnyena khalu suśroṇi mayedaṃ samudāhṛtam / kuru sādhu prasādaṃ me bāle sahṛdayā hy asi // 2.011.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśuddhabhāvasya hi duṣṭabhāvā; tāmrekṣaṇasyāśrukalasya rājñaḥ / śrutvā vicitraṃ karuṇaṃ vilāpaṃ; bhartur nṛśaṃsā na cakāra vākyam // 2.011.014	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ sa rājā punar eva mūrchitaḥ; priyām atuṣṭāṃ pratikūlabhāṣiṇīm / samīkṣya putrasya vivāsanaṃ prati; kṣitau visaṃjño nipapāta duḥkhitaḥ // 2.011.015	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
putraśokārditaṃ pāpā visaṃjñaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi / viveṣṭamānam udīkṣya saikṣvākam idam abravīt // 2.012.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāpaṃ kṛtveva kim idaṃ mama saṃśrutya saṃśravam / śeṣe kṣititale sannaḥ sthityāṃ sthātuṃ tvam arhasi // 2.012.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ / satyam āśritya hi mayā tvaṃ ca dharmaṃ pracoditaḥ // 2.012.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃśrutya śaibyaḥ śyenāya svāṃ tanuṃ jagatīpatiḥ / pradāya pakṣiṇo rājañ jagāma gatim uttamām // 2.012.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatha hy alarkas tejasvī brāhmaṇe vedapārage / yācamāne svake netre uddhṛtyāvimanā dadau // 2.012.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saritāṃ tu patiḥ svalpāṃ maryādāṃ satyam anvitaḥ / satyānurodhāt samaye velāṃ khāṃ nātivartate // 2.012.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samayaṃ ca mamāryemaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi / agratas te parityaktā parityakṣyāmi jīvitam // 2.012.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ pracodito rājā kaikeyyā nirviśaṅkayā / nāśakat pāśam unmoktuṃ balir indrakṛtaṃ yathā // 2.012.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udbhrāntahṛdayaś cāpi vivarṇavanado 'bhavat / sa dhuryo vai parispandan yugacakrāntaraṃ yathā // 2.012.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vihvalābhyāṃ ca netrābhyām apaśyann iva bhūmipaḥ / kṛcchrād dhairyeṇa saṃstabhya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // 2.012.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas te mantrakṛtaḥ pāṇir agnau pāpe mayā dhṛtaḥ / taṃ tyajāmi svajaṃ caiva tava putraṃ saha tvayā // 2.012.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pāpasamācārā kaikeyī pārthivaṃ punaḥ / uvāca paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ vākyajñā roṣamūrchitā // 2.012.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim idaṃ bhāṣase rājan vākyaṃ gararujopamam / ānāyayitum akliṣṭaṃ putraṃ rāmam ihārhasi // 2.012.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthāpya rājye mama sutaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ vanecaram / niḥsapatnāṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi // 2.012.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nunna iva tīkṣeṇa pratodena hayottamaḥ / rājā pradocito 'bhīkṣṇaṃ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // 2.012.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmabandhena baddho 'smi naṣṭā ca mama cetanā / jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ priyaṃ rāmaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi dhārmikam // 2.012.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyī tadanantaram / svayam evābravīt sūtaṃ gaccha tvaṃ rāmam ānaya // 2.012.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sannaharṣaḥ sutaṃ prati / śokāraktekṣaṇaḥ śrīmān udvīkṣyovāca dhārmikaḥ // 2.012.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantraḥ karuṇaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā dīnaṃ ca pārthivam / pragṛhītāñjaliḥ kiṃ cit tasmād deśād apākraman // 2.012.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā vaktuṃ svayaṃ dainyān na śaśāka mahīpatiḥ / tadā sumantraṃ mantrajñā kaikeyī pratyuvāca ha // 2.012.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantra rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi śīghram ānaya sundaram / sa manyamānaḥ kalyāṇaṃ hṛdayena nananda ca // 2.012.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantraś cintayām āsa tvaritaṃ coditas tayā / vyaktaṃ rāmo 'bhiṣekārtham ihāyāsyati dharmavit // 2.012.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti sūto matiṃ kṛtvā harṣeṇa mahatā punaḥ / nirjagāma mahātejā rāghavasya didṛkṣayā // 2.012.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ purastāt sahasā vinirgato; mahīpatīn dvāragatān vilokayan / dadarśa paurān vividhān mahādhanān; upasthitān dvāram upetya viṣṭhitān // 2.012.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
te tu tāṃ rajanīm uṣya brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ / upatasthur upasthānaṃ saharājapurohitāḥ // 2.013.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amātyā balamukhyāś ca mukhyā ye nigamasya ca / rāghavasyābhiṣekārthe prīyamāṇās tu saṃgatāḥ // 2.013.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udite vimale sūrye puṣye cābhyāgate 'hani / abhiṣekāya rāmasya dvijendrair upakalpitam // 2.013.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanā jalakumbhāś ca bhadrapīṭhaṃ svalaṃkṛtam / rāmaś ca samyagāstīrṇo bhāsvarā vyāghracarmaṇā // 2.013.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaṅgāyamunayoḥ puṇyāt saṃgamād āhṛtaṃ jalam / yāś cānyāḥ saritaḥ puṇyā hradāḥ kūpāḥ sarāṃsi ca // 2.013.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāgvāhāś cordhvavāhāś ca tiryagvāhāḥ samāhitāḥ / tābhyaś caivāhṛtaṃ toyaṃ samudrebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ // 2.013.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣaudraṃ dadhighṛtaṃ lājā dharbhāḥ sumanasaḥ payaḥ / salājāḥ kṣīribhiś channā ghaṭāḥ kāñcanarājatāḥ // 2.013.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmotpalayutā bhānti pūrṇāḥ paramavāriṇā // 2.013.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candrāṃśuvikacaprakhyaṃ pāṇḍuraṃ ratnabhūṣitam / sajjaṃ tiṣṭhati rāmasya vālavyajanam uttamam // 2.013.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candramaṇḍalasaṃkāśam ātapatraṃ ca pāṇḍuram / sajjaṃ dyutikaraṃ śrīmad abhiṣekapuraskṛtam // 2.013.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇḍuraś ca vṛṣaḥ sajjaḥ pāṇḍurāśvaś ca susthitaḥ / prasrutaś ca gajaḥ śrīmān aupavāhyaḥ pratīkṣate // 2.013.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṣṭau kanyāś ca maṅgalyāḥ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ / vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi bandinaś ca tathāpare // 2.013.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇāṃ yathā rājye saṃbhriyetābhiṣecanam / tathā jātīyām ādāya rājaputrābhiṣecanam // 2.013.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te rājavacanāt tatra samavetā mahīpatim / apaśyanto 'bruvan ko nu rājño naḥ prativedayet // 2.013.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na paśyāmaś ca rājānam uditaś ca divākaraḥ / yauvarājyābhiṣekaś ca sajjo rāmasya dhīmataḥ // 2.013.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti teṣu bruvāṇeṣu sārvabhaumān mahīpatīn / abravīt tān idaṃ sarvān sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ // 2.013.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ pṛcchāmi vacanāt sukham āyuṣmatām aham / rājñaḥ saṃpratibuddhasya yac cāgamanakāraṇam // 2.013.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvāntaḥpuradvāram ājagāma purāṇavit / āśīrbhir guṇayuktābhir abhituṣṭāva rāghavam // 2.013.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatā bhagavatī rātrirahaḥ śivam upasthitam / budhyasva nṛpaśārdūla kuru kāryam anantaram // 2.013.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇā balamukhyāś ca naigamāś cāgatā nṛpa / darśanaṃ pratikāṅkṣante pratibudhyasva rāghava // 2.013.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
stuvantaṃ taṃ tadā sūtaṃ sumantraṃ mantrakovidam / pratibudhya tato rājā idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.013.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na caiva saṃprasuto 'ham ānayed āśu rāghavam / iti rājā daśarathaḥ sūtaṃ tatrānvaśāt punaḥ // 2.013.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śirasā pratipūjya tam / nirjagāma nṛpāvāsān manyamānaḥ priyaṃ mahat // 2.013.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prapanno rājamārgaṃ ca patākā dhvajaśobhitam / sa sūtas tatra śuśrāva rāmādhikaraṇāḥ kathāḥ // 2.013.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dadarśa ruciraṃ kailāsasadṛśaprabham / rāmaveśma sumantras tu śakraveśmasamaprabham // 2.013.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahākapāṭapihitaṃ vitardiśataśobhitam / kāñcanapratimaikāgraṃ maṇividrumatoraṇam // 2.013.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāradābhraghanaprakhyaṃ dīptaṃ meruguhopamam / dāmabhir varamālyānāṃ sumahadbhir alaṃkṛtam // 2.013.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vājiyuktena rathena sārathir; narākulaṃ rājakulaṃ vilokayan / tataḥ samāsādya mahādhanaṃ mahat; prahṛṣṭaromā sa babhūva sārathiḥ // 2.013.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tad adrikūṭācalameghasaṃnibhaṃ; mahāvimānottamaveśmasaṃghavat / avāryamāṇaḥ praviveśa sārathiḥ; prabhūtaratnaṃ makaro yathārṇavam // 2.013.028	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tad antaḥpuradvāraṃ samatītya janākulam / praviviktāṃ tataḥ kakṣyām āsasāda purāṇavit // 2.014.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāsakārmukabibhradbhir yuvabhir mṛṣṭakuṇḍalaiḥ / apramādibhir ekāgraiḥ svanuraktair adhiṣṭhitām // 2.014.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra kāṣāyiṇo vṛddhān vetrapāṇīn svalaṃkṛtān / dadarśa viṣṭhitān dvāri stryadhyakṣān susamāhitān // 2.014.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te samīkṣya samāyāntaṃ rāmapriyacikīrṣavaḥ / sahabhāryāya rāmāya kṣipram evācacakṣire // 2.014.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prativeditam ājñāya sūtam abhyantaraṃ pituḥ / tatraivānāyayām āsa rāghavaḥ priyakāmyayā // 2.014.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ vaiśravaṇasaṃkāśam upaviṣṭaṃ svalaṃkṛtam / dādarśa sūtaḥ paryaṅke sauvaṇo sottaracchade // 2.014.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varāharudhirābheṇa śucinā ca sugandhinā / anuliptaṃ parārdhyena candanena paraṃtapam // 2.014.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthitayā pārśvataś cāpi vālavyajanahastayā / upetaṃ sītayā bhūyaś citrayā śaśinaṃ yathā // 2.014.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tapantam ivādityam upapannaṃ svatejasā / vavande varadaṃ bandī niyamajño vinītavat // 2.014.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāñjalis tu sukhaṃ pṛṣṭvā vihāraśayanāsane / rājaputram uvācedaṃ sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ // 2.014.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā suprabhā deva pitā tvaṃ draṣṭum icchati / mahiṣyā saha kaikeyyā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // 2.014.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu saṃhṛṣṭo narasiṃho mahādyutiḥ / tataḥ saṃmānayām āsa sītām idam uvāca ha // 2.014.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devi devaś ca devī ca samāgamya madantare / mantreyete dhruvaṃ kiṃ cid abhiṣecanasaṃhitam // 2.014.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣayitvā hy abhiprāyaṃ priyakāmā sudakṣiṇā / saṃcodayati rājānaṃ madarthaṃ madirekṣaṇā // 2.014.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yādṛśī pariṣat tatra tādṛśo dūta āgataḥ / dhruvam adyaiva māṃ rājā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // 2.014.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanta śīghram ito gatvā drakṣyāmi ca mahīpatiḥ / saha tvaṃ parivāreṇa sukham āssva ramasya ca // 2.014.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patisaṃmānitā sītā bhartāram asitekṣaṇā / ādvāram anuvavrāja maṅgalāny abhidadhyuṣī // 2.014.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sarvān arthino dṛṣṭvā sametya pratinandya ca / tataḥ pāvakasaṃkāśam āruroha rathottamam // 2.014.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muṣṇantam iva cakṣūṃṣi prabhayā hemavarcasaṃ / kareṇuśiśukalpaiś ca yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ // 2.014.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hariyuktaṃ sahasrākṣo ratham indra ivāśugam / prayayau tūrṇam āsthāya rāghavo jvalitaḥ śriyā // 2.014.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa parjanya ivākāśe svanavān abhinādayan / niketān niryayau śrīmān mahābhrād iva candramāḥ // 2.014.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
chatracāmarapāṇis tu lakṣmaṇo rāghavānujaḥ / jugopa bhrātaraṃ bhrātā ratham āsthāya pṛṣṭhataḥ // 2.014.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato halahalāśabdas tumulaḥ samajāyata / tasya niṣkramamāṇasya janaughasya samantataḥ // 2.014.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāghavas tatra kathāpralāpaṃ; śuśrāva lokasya samāgatasya / ātmādhikārā vividhāś ca vācaḥ; prahṛṣṭarūpasya pure janasya // 2.014.024	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
eṣa śriyaṃ gacchati rāghavo 'dya; rājaprasādād vipulāṃ gamiṣyan / ete vayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmā; yeṣām ayaṃ no bhavitā praśāstā // 2.014.025.1	indravajrā [ttjgg]
lābho janasyāsya yad eṣa sarvaṃ; prapatsyate rāṣṭram idaṃ cirāya // 2.014.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ghoṣavadbhiś ca hayaiḥ sanāgaiḥ; puraḥsaraiḥ svastikasūtamāgadhaiḥ / mahīyamānaḥ pravaraiś ca vādakair; abhiṣṭuto vaiśravaṇo yathā yayau // 2.014.026	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kareṇumātaṅgarathāśvasaṃkulaṃ; mahājanaughaiḥ paripūrṇacatvaram / prabhūtaratnaṃ bahupaṇyasaṃcayaṃ; dadarśa rāmo ruciraṃ mahāpatham // 2.014.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa rāmo ratham āsthāya saṃprahṛṣṭasuhṛjjanaḥ / apaśyan nagaraṃ śrīmān nānājanasamākulam // 2.015.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gṛhair abhrasaṃkāśaiḥ pāṇḍurair upaśobhitam / rājamārgaṃ yayau rāmo madhyenāgarudhūpitam // 2.015.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śobhamānam asaṃbādhaṃ taṃ rājapatham uttamam / saṃvṛtaṃ vividhaiḥ paṇyair bhakṣyair uccāvacair api // 2.015.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśīrvādān bahūñ śṛṇvan suhṛdbhiḥ samudīritān / yathārhaṃ cāpi saṃpūjya sarvān eva narān yayau // 2.015.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahair ācaritaṃ tathaiva prapitāmahaiḥ / adyopādāya taṃ mārgam abhiṣikto 'nupālaya // 2.015.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā sma lālitāḥ pitrā yathā pūrvaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ / tataḥ sukhataraṃ sarve rāme vatsyāma rājani // 2.015.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alam adya hi bhuktena paramārthair alaṃ ca naḥ / yathā paśyāma niryāntaṃ rāmaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhitam // 2.015.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ato hi na priyataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid bhaviṣyati / yathābhiṣeko rāmasya rājyenāmitatejasaḥ // 2.015.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāś cānyāś ca suhṛdām udāsīnaḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ / ātmasaṃpūjanīḥ śṛṇvan yayau rāmo mahāpatham // 2.015.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi tasmān manaḥ kaś cic cakṣuṣī vā narottamāt / naraḥ śaknoty apākraṣṭum atikrānte 'pi rāghave // 2.015.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarveṣāṃ sa hi dharmātmā varṇānāṃ kurute dayām / caturṇāṃ hi vayaḥsthānāṃ tena te tam anuvratāḥ // 2.015.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājakulam āsādya mahendrabhavanopamam / rājaputraḥ pitur veśma praviveśa śriyā jvalan // 2.015.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sarvāḥ samatikramya kakṣyā daśarathātmajaḥ / saṃnivartya janaṃ sarvaṃ śuddhāntaḥpuram abhyagāt // 2.015.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ praviṣṭe pitur antikaṃ tadā; janaḥ sa sarvo mudito nṛpātmaje / pratīkṣate tasya punaḥ sma nirgamaṃ; yathodayaṃ candramasaḥ saritpatiḥ // 2.015.014	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa dadarśāsane rāmo niṣaṇṇaṃ pitaraṃ śubhe / kaikeyīsahitaṃ dīnaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā // 2.016.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pituś caraṇau pūrvam abhivādya vinītavat / tato vavande caraṇau kaikeyyāḥ susamāhitaḥ // 2.016.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmety uktvā ca vacanaṃ vāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ / śaśāka nṛpatir dīno nekṣituṃ nābhibhāṣitum // 2.016.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad apūrvaṃ narapater dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ bhayāvaham / rāmo 'pi bhayam āpannaḥ padā spṛṣṭveva pannagam // 2.016.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indriyair aprahṛṣṭais taṃ śokasaṃtāpakarśitam / niḥśvasantaṃ mahārājaṃ vyathitākulacetasaṃ // 2.016.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūrmi mālinam akṣobhyaṃ kṣubhyantam iva sāgaram / upaplutam ivādityam uktānṛtam ṛṣiṃ yathā // 2.016.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acintyakalpaṃ hi pitus taṃ śokam upadhārayan / babhūva saṃrabdhataraḥ samudra iva parvaṇi // 2.016.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cintayām āsa ca tadā rāmaḥ pitṛhite rataḥ / kiṃsvid adyaiva nṛpatir na māṃ pratyabhinandati // 2.016.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyadā māṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā kupito 'pi prasīdati / tasya mām adya saṃprekṣya kimāyāsaḥ pravartate // 2.016.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dīna iva śokārto viṣaṇṇavadanadyutiḥ / kaikeyīm abhivādyaiva rāmo vacanam abravīt // 2.016.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin mayā nāparādham ajñānād yena me pitā / kupitas tan mamācakṣva tvaṃ caivainaṃ prasādaya // 2.016.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivarṇavadano dīno na hi mām abhibhāṣate / śārīro mānaso vāpi kaccid enaṃ na bādhate // 2.016.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃtāpo vābhitāpo vā durlabhaṃ hi sadā sukham // 2.016.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin na kiṃ cid bharate kumāre priyadarśane / śatrughne vā mahāsattve mātṝṇāṃ vā mamāśubham // 2.016.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atoṣayan mahārājam akurvan vā pitur vacaḥ / muhūrtam api neccheyaṃ jīvituṃ kupite nṛpe // 2.016.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatomūlaṃ naraḥ paśyet prādurbhāvam ihātmanaḥ / kathaṃ tasmin na varteta pratyakṣe sati daivate // 2.016.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit te paruṣaṃ kiṃ cid abhimānāt pitā mama / ukto bhavatyā kopena yatrāsya lulitaṃ manaḥ // 2.016.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad ācakṣva me devi tattvena paripṛcchataḥ / kiṃnimittam apūrvo 'yaṃ vikāro manujādhipe // 2.016.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ hi vacanād rājñaḥ pateyam api pāvake / bhakṣayeyaṃ viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ majjeyam api cārṇave // 2.016.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niyukto guruṇā pitrā nṛpeṇa ca hitena ca // 2.016.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad brūhi vacanaṃ devi rājño yad abhikāṅkṣitam / kariṣye pratijāne ca rāmo dvir nābhibhāṣate // 2.016.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ārjavasamāyuktam anāryā satyavādinam / uvāca rāmaṃ kaikeyī vacanaṃ bhṛśadāruṇam // 2.016.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā devāsure yuddhe pitrā te mama rāghava / rakṣitena varau dattau saśalyena mahāraṇe // 2.016.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra me yācito rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam / gamanaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye tava cādyaiva rāghava // 2.016.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi satyapratijñaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ kartum icchasi / ātmānaṃ ca narareṣṭha mama vākyam idaṃ śṛṇu // 2.016.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nideśe pitus tiṣṭha yathā tena pratiśrutam / tvayāraṇyaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca // 2.016.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sapta sapta ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ / abhiṣekam imaṃ tyaktvā jaṭācīradharo vasa // 2.016.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataḥ kosalapure praśāstu vasudhām imām / nānāratnasamākīrṇaṃ savājirathakuñjarām // 2.016.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad apriyam amitraghno vacanaṃ maraṇopamam / śrutvā na vivyathe rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // 2.016.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam astu gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ vastum ahaṃ tv ataḥ / jaṭācīradharo rājñaḥ pratijñām anupālayan // 2.016.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ tu jñātum icchāmi kimarthaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ / nābhinandati durdharṣo yathāpuram ariṃdamaḥ // 2.016.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manyur na ca tvayā kāryo devi brūhi tavāgrataḥ / yāsyāmi bhava suprītā vanaṃ cīrajaṭādharaḥ // 2.016.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hitena guruṇā pitrā kṛtajñena nṛpeṇa ca / niyujyamāno viśrabdhaṃ kiṃ na kuryād ahaṃ priyam // 2.016.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alīkaṃ mānasaṃ tv ekaṃ hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me / svayaṃ yan nāha māṃ rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam // 2.016.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ hi sītāṃ rājyaṃ ca prāṇān iṣṭān dhanāni ca / hṛṣṭo bhrātre svayaṃ dadyāṃ bharatāyāpracoditaḥ // 2.016.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ punar manujendreṇa svayaṃ pitrā pracoditaḥ / tava ca priyakāmārthaṃ pratijñām anupālayan // 2.016.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad āśvāsaya hīmaṃ tvaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ yan mahīpatiḥ / vasudhāsaktanayano mandam aśrūṇi muñcati // 2.016.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gacchantu caivānayituṃ dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ / bharataṃ mātulakulād adyaiva nṛpaśāsanāt // 2.016.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daṇḍakāraṇyam eṣo 'ham ito gacchāmi satvaraḥ / avicārya pitur vākyaṃ samāvastuṃ caturdaśa // 2.016.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā hṛṣṭā tasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā rāmasya kaikayī / prasthānaṃ śraddadhānā hi tvarayām āsa rāghavam // 2.016.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bhavatu yāsyanti dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ / bharataṃ mātulakulād upāvartayituṃ narāḥ // 2.016.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava tv ahaṃ kṣamaṃ manye notsukasya vilambanam / rāma tasmād itaḥ śīghraṃ vanaṃ tvaṃ gantum arhasi // 2.016.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vrīḍānvitaḥ svayaṃ yac ca nṛpas tvāṃ nābhibhāṣate / naitat kiṃ cin naraśreṣṭha manyur eṣo 'panīyatām // 2.016.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvat tvaṃ na vanaṃ yātaḥ purād asmād abhitvaran / pitā tāvan na te rāma snāsyate bhokṣyate 'pi vā // 2.016.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhik kaṣṭam iti niḥśvasya rājā śokapariplutaḥ / mūrchito nyapatat tasmin paryaṅke hemabhūṣite // 2.016.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo 'py utthāpya rājānaṃ kaikeyyābhipracoditaḥ / kaśayevāhato vājī vanaṃ gantuṃ kṛtatvaraḥ // 2.016.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad apriyam anāryāyā vacanaṃ dāruṇodaram / śrutvā gatavyatho rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ vākyam abravīt // 2.016.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāham arthaparo devi lokam āvastum utsahe / viddhi mām ṛṣibhis tulyaṃ kevalaṃ dharmam āsthitam // 2.016.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad atrabhavataḥ kiṃ cic chakyaṃ kartuṃ priyaṃ mayā / prāṇān api parityajya sarvathā kṛtam eva tat // 2.016.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy ato dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃ cid asti mahattaram / yathā pitari śuśrūṣā tasya vā vacanakriyā // 2.016.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anukto 'py atrabhavatā bhavatyā vacanād aham / vane vatsyāmi vijane varṣāṇīha caturdaśa // 2.016.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na nūnaṃ mayi kaikeyi kiṃ cid āśaṃsase guṇam / yad rājānam avocas tvaṃ mameśvaratarā satī // 2.016.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvan mātaram āpṛcche sītāṃ cānunayāmy aham / tato 'dyaiva gamiṣyāmi daṇḍakānāṃ mahad vanam // 2.016.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataḥ pālayed rājyaṃ śuśrūṣec ca pitur yathā / tahā bhavatyā kartavyaṃ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // 2.016.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ duḥkhahataḥ pitā / śokād aśaknuvan bāṣpaṃ praruroda mahāsvanam // 2.016.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanditvā caraṇau rāmo visaṃjñasya pitus tadā / kaikeyyāś cāpy anāryāyā niṣpapāta mahādyutiḥ // 2.016.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmaḥ pitaraṃ kṛtvā kaikeyīṃ ca pradakṣiṇam / niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt svaṃ dadarśa suhṛjjanam // 2.016.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ bāṣpaparipūrṇākṣaḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nujagāma ha / lakṣmaṇaḥ paramakruddhaḥ sumitrānandavardhanaḥ // 2.016.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ābhiṣecanikaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛtvā rāmaḥ pradakṣiṇam / śanair jagāma sāpekṣo dṛṣṭiṃ tatrāvicālayan // 2.016.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāsya mahatīṃ lakṣmīṃ rājyanāśo 'pakarṣati / lokakāntasya kāntatvaṃ śītaraśmer iva kṣapā // 2.016.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na vanaṃ gantukāmasya tyajataś ca vasuṃdharām / sarvalokātigasyeva lakṣyate cittavikriyā // 2.016.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhārayan manasā duḥkham indriyāṇi nigṛhya ca / praviveśātmavān veśma māturapriyaśaṃsivān // 2.016.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśya veśmātibhṛśaṃ mudānvitaṃ; samīkṣya tāṃ cārthavipattim āgatām / na caiva rāmo 'tra jagāma vikriyāṃ; suhṛjjanasyātmavipattiśaṅkayā // 2.016.061	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
rāmas tu bhṛśam āyasto niḥśvasann iva kuñjaraḥ / jagāma sahito bhrātrā mātur antaḥpuraṃ vaśī // 2.017.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'paśyat puruṣaṃ tatra vṛddhaṃ paramapūjitam / upaviṣṭaṃ gṛhadvāri tiṣṭhataś cāparān bahūn // 2.017.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśya prathamāṃ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ / brāhmaṇān vedasaṃpannān vṛddhān rājñābhisatkṛtān // 2.017.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praṇamya rāmas tān vṛddhāṃs tṛtīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ / striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca dvārarakṣaṇatatparāḥ // 2.017.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vardhayitvā prahṛṣṭās tāḥ praviśya ca gṛhaṃ striyaḥ / nyavedayanta tvaritā rāma mātuḥ priyaṃ tadā // 2.017.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyāpi tadā devī rātriṃ sthitvā samāhitā / prabhāte tv akarot pūjāṃ viṣṇoḥ putrahitaiṣiṇī // 2.017.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā kṣaumavasanā hṛṣṭā nityaṃ vrataparāyaṇā / agniṃ juhoti sma tadā mantravat kṛtamaṅgalā // 2.017.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśya ca tadā rāmo mātur antaḥpuraṃ śubham / dadarśa mātaraṃ tatra hāvayantīṃ hutāśanam // 2.017.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā cirasyātmajaṃ dṛṣṭvā mātṛnandanam āgatam / abhicakrāma saṃhṛṣṭā kiśoraṃ vaḍavā yathā // 2.017.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca durādharṣaṃ rāghavaṃ sutam ātmanaḥ / kausalyā putravātsalyād idaṃ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // 2.017.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛddhānāṃ dharmaśīlānāṃ rājarṣīṇāṃ mahātmanām / prāpnuhy āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca dharmaṃ copahitaṃ kule // 2.017.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyapratijñaṃ pitaraṃ rājānaṃ paśya rāghava / adyaiva hi tvāṃ dharmātmā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // 2.017.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātaraṃ rāghavaḥ kiṃ cit prasāryāñjalim abravīt / sa svabhāvavinītaś ca gauravāc ca tadānataḥ // 2.017.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devi nūnaṃ na jānīṣe mahad bhayam upasthitam / idaṃ tava ca duḥkhāya vaidehyā lakṣmaṇasya ca // 2.017.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vatsyāmi vijane vane / madhumūlaphalair jīvan hitvā munivad āmiṣam // 2.017.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatāya mahārājo yauvarājyaṃ prayacchati / māṃ punar daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ vivāsayati tāpasaṃ // 2.017.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām aduḥkhocitāṃ dṛṣṭvā patitāṃ kadalīm iva / rāmas tūtthāpayām āsa mātaraṃ gatacetasaṃ // 2.017.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāvṛtyotthitāṃ dīnāṃ vaḍavām iva vāhitām / pāṃśuguṇṭhitasarvāgnīṃ vimamarśa ca pāṇinā // 2.017.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā rāghavam upāsīnam asukhārtā sukhocitā / uvāca puruṣavyāghram upaśṛṇvati lakṣmaṇe // 2.017.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi putra na jāyethā mama śokāya rāghava / na sma duḥkham ato bhūyaḥ paśyeyam aham aprajā // 2.017.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānavaḥ / aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hy anyaḥ putra vidyate // 2.017.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sukhaṃ vā patipauruṣe / api putre vipaśyeyam iti rāmāsthitaṃ mayā // 2.017.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā bahūny amanojñāni vākyāni hṛdayacchidām / ahaṃ śroṣye sapatnīnām avarāṇāṃ varā satī // 2.017.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu pramadānāṃ bhaviṣyati // 2.017.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayi saṃnihite 'py evam aham āsaṃ nirākṛtā / kiṃ punaḥ proṣite tāta dhruvaṃ maraṇam eva me // 2.017.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo hi māṃ sevate kaś cid atha vāpy anuvartate / kaikeyyāḥ putram anvīkṣya sa jano nābhibhāṣate // 2.017.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśa sapta ca varṣāṇi tava jātasya rāghava / atītāni prakāṅkṣantyā mayā duḥkhaparikṣayam // 2.017.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upavāsaiś ca yogaiś ca bahubhiś ca pariśramaiḥ / duḥkhaṃ saṃvardhito moghaṃ tvaṃ hi durgatayā mayā // 2.017.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthiraṃ tu hṛdayaṃ manye mamedaṃ yan na dīryate / prāvṛṣīva mahānadyāḥ spṛṣṭaṃ kūlaṃ navāmbhasā // 2.017.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamaiva nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ na vidyate; na cāvakāśo 'sti yamakṣaye mama / yad antako 'dyaiva na māṃ jihīrṣati; prasahya siṃho rudatīṃ mṛgīm iva // 2.017.029	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sthiraṃ hi nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mamāyasaṃ; na bhidyate yad bhuvi nāvadīryate / anena duḥkhena ca deham arpitaṃ; dhruvaṃ hy akāle maraṇaṃ na vidyate // 2.017.030	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yad anarthakāni me; vratāni dānāni ca saṃyamāś ca hi / tapaś ca taptaṃ yad apatyakāraṇāt; suniṣphalaṃ bījam ivoptam ūṣare // 2.017.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
yadi hy akāle maraṇaṃ svayecchayā; labheta kaś cid guru duḥkha karśitaḥ / gatāham adyaiva pareta saṃsadaṃ; vinā tvayā dhenur ivātmajena vai // 2.017.032	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
bhṛśam asukham amarṣitā tadā; bahu vilalāpa samīkṣya rāghavam / vyasanam upaniśāmya sā mahat; sutam iva baddham avekṣya kiṃnarī // 2.017.033	aparavaktra (1,3: nnrlg, 2,4: njjr)
tathā tu vilapantīṃ tāṃ kausalyāṃ rāmamātaram / uvāca lakṣmaṇo dīnas tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ // 2.018.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na rocate mamāpy etad ārye yad rāghavo vanam / tyaktvā rājyaśriyaṃ gacchet striyā vākyavaśaṃ gataḥ // 2.018.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viparītaś ca vṛddhaś ca viṣayaiś ca pradharṣitaḥ / nṛpaḥ kim iva na brūyāc codyamānaḥ samanmathaḥ // 2.018.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāsyāparādhaṃ paśyāmi nāpi doṣaṃ tathā vidham / yena nirvāsyate rāṣṭrād vanavāsāya rāghavaḥ // 2.018.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ loke parokṣam api yo naraḥ / amitro 'pi nirasto 'pi yo 'sya doṣam udāharet // 2.018.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devakalpam ṛjuṃ dāntaṃ ripūṇām api vatsalam / avekṣamāṇaḥ ko dharmaṃ tyajet putram akāraṇāt // 2.018.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad idaṃ vacanaṃ rājñaḥ punar bālyam upeyuṣaḥ / putraḥ ko hṛdaye kuryād rājavṛttam anusmaran // 2.018.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvad eva na jānāti kaś cid artham imaṃ naraḥ / tāvad eva mayā sādham ātmasthaṃ kuru śāsanam // 2.018.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā pārśve sadhanuṣā tava guptasya rāghava / kaḥ samartho 'dhikaṃ kartuṃ kṛtāntasyeva tiṣṭhataḥ // 2.018.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirmanuṣyām imāṃ sarvām ayodhyāṃ manujarṣabha / kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇair yadi sthāsyati vipriye // 2.018.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasyātha pakṣyo vā yo vāsya hitam icchati / sarvān etān vadhiṣyāmi mṛdur hi paribhūyate // 2.018.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā caiva mayā caiva kṛtvā vairam anuttamam / kasya śaktiḥ śriyaṃ dātuṃ bharatāyāriśāsana // 2.018.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anurakto 'smi bhāvena bhrātaraṃ devi tattvataḥ / satyena dhanuṣā caiva datteneṣṭena te śape // 2.018.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīptam agnim araṇyaṃ vā yadi rāmaḥ pravekṣyate / praviṣṭaṃ tatra māṃ devi tvaṃ pūrvam avadhāraya // 2.018.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harāmi vīryād duḥkhaṃ te tamaḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ / devī paśyatu me vīryaṃ rāghavaś caiva paśyatu // 2.018.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ / uvāca rāmaṃ kausalyā rudantī śokalālasā // 2.018.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātus te vadataḥ putra lakṣmaṇasya śrutaṃ tvayā / yad atrānantaraṃ tat tvaṃ kuruṣva yadi rocate // 2.018.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cādharmyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sapatnyā mama bhāṣitam / vihāya śokasaṃtaptāṃ gantum arhasi mām itaḥ // 2.018.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmajña yadi dharmiṣṭho dharmaṃ caritum icchasi / śuśrūṣa mām ihasthas tvaṃ cara dharmam anuttamam // 2.018.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuśrūṣur jananīṃ putra svagṛhe niyato vasan / pareṇa tapasā yuktaḥ kāśyapas tridivaṃ gataḥ // 2.018.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathaiva rājā pūjyas te gauraveṇa tathā hy aham / tvāṃ nāham anujānāmi na gantavyam ito vanam // 2.018.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvadviyogān na me kāryaṃ jīvitena sukhena vā / tvayā saha mama śreyas tṛṇānām api bhakṣaṇam // 2.018.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tvaṃ yāsyasi vanaṃ tyaktvā māṃ śokalālasām / ahaṃ prāyam ihāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum // 2.018.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tvaṃ prāpsyase putra nirayaṃ lokaviśrutam / brahmahatyām ivādharmāt samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // 2.018.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vilapantīṃ tathā dīnāṃ kausalyāṃ jananīṃ tataḥ / uvāca rāmo dharmātmā vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam // 2.018.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāsti śaktiḥ pitur vākyaṃ samatikramituṃ mama / prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā gantum icchāmy ahaṃ vanam // 2.018.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
