ṛṣiṇā ca pitur vākyaṃ kurvatā vratacāriṇā / gaur hatā jānatā dharmaṃ kaṇḍunāpi vipaścitā // 2.018.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmākaṃ ca kule pūrvaṃ sagarasyājñayā pituḥ / khanadbhiḥ sāgarair bhūtim avāptaḥ sumahān vadhaḥ // 2.018.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa reṇukā jananī svayam / kṛttā paraśunāraṇye pitur vacanakāriṇā // 2.018.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na khalv etan mayaikena kriyate pitṛśāsanam / pūrvair ayam abhipreto gato mārgo 'nugamyate // 2.018.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad etat tu mayā kāryaṃ kriyate bhuvi nānyathā / pitur hi vacanaṃ kurvan na kaś cin nāma hīyate // 2.018.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām evam uktvā jananīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ punar abravīt / tava lakṣmaṇa jānāmi mayi sneham anuttamam // 2.018.032.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiprāyam avijñāya satyasya ca śamasya ca // 2.018.032.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmo hi paramo loke dharme satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam / dharmasaṃśritam etac ca pitur vacanam uttamam // 2.018.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃśrutya ca pitur vākyaṃ mātur vā brāhmaṇasya vā / na kartavyaṃ vṛthā vīra dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhatā // 2.018.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ na śakṣyāmi pitur niyogam ativartitum / pitur hi vacanād vīra kaikeyyāhaṃ pracoditaḥ // 2.018.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad enāṃ visṛjānāryāṃ kṣatradharmāśritāṃ matim / dharmam āśraya mā taikṣṇyaṃ madbuddhir anugamyatām // 2.018.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evam uktvā sauhārdād bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / uvāca bhūyaḥ kausalyāṃ prāñjaliḥ śirasānataḥ // 2.018.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anumanyasva māṃ devi gamiṣyantam ito vanam / śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ kuru svastyayanāni me // 2.018.038.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tīrṇapratijñaś ca vanāt punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm // 2.018.038.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaśo hy ahaṃ kevalarājyakāraṇān; na pṛṣṭhataḥ kartum alaṃ mahodayam / adīrghakāle na tu devi jīvite; vṛṇe 'varām adya mahīm adharmataḥ // 2.018.039	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
prasādayan naravṛṣabhaḥ sa mātaraṃ; parākramāj jigamiṣur eva daṇḍakān / athānujaṃ bhṛśam anuśāsya darśanaṃ; cakāra tāṃ hṛdi jananīṃ pradakṣiṇam // 2.018.040	rucirā [jBsjg]
atha taṃ vyathayā dīnaṃ saviśeṣam amarṣitam / śvasantam iva nāgendraṃ roṣavisphāritekṣaṇam // 2.019.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṃ suhṛdaṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam / uvācedaṃ sa dhairyeṇa dhārayan sattvam ātmavān // 2.019.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitre yo 'bhiṣekārthe mama saṃbhārasaṃbhramaḥ / abhiṣekanivṛttyarthe so 'stu saṃbhārasaṃbhramaḥ // 2.019.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasyā madabhiṣekārthaṃ mānasaṃ paritapyate / mātā naḥ sā yathā na syāt saviśaṅkā tathā kuru // 2.019.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāḥ śaṅkāmayaṃ duḥkhaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe / manasi pratisaṃjātaṃ saumitre 'ham upekṣitum // 2.019.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na buddhipūrvaṃ nābuddhaṃ smarāmīha kadā cana / mātṝṇāṃ vā pitur vāhaṃ kṛtam alpaṃ ca vipriyam // 2.019.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyaḥ satyābhisaṃdhaś ca nityaṃ satyaparākramaḥ / paralokabhayād bhīto nirbhayo 'stu pitā mama // 2.019.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāpi hi bhaved asmin karmaṇy apratisaṃhṛte / satyaṃ neti manas tāpas tasya tāpas tapec ca mām // 2.019.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣekavidhānaṃ tu tasmāt saṃhṛtya lakṣmaṇa / anvag evāham icchāmi vanaṃ gantum itaḥ punaḥ // 2.019.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama pravrājanād adya kṛtakṛtyā nṛpātmajā / sutaṃ bharatam avyagram abhiṣecayitā tataḥ // 2.019.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayi cīrājinadhare jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇi / gate 'raṇyaṃ ca kaikeyyā bhaviṣyati manaḥsukham // 2.019.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhiḥ praṇītā yeneyaṃ manaś ca susamāhitam / tat tu nārhāmi saṃkleṣṭuṃ pravrajiṣyāmi māciram // 2.019.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtāntas tv eva saumitre draṣṭavyo matpravāsane / rājyasya ca vitīrṇasya punar eva nivartane // 2.019.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyyāḥ pratipattir hi kathaṃ syān mama pīḍane / yadi bhāvo na daivo 'yaṃ kṛtāntavihito bhavet // 2.019.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānāsi hi yathā saumya na mātṛṣu mamāntaram / bhūtapūrvaṃ viśeṣo vā tasyā mayi sute 'pi vā // 2.019.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhiṣekanivṛttyarthaiḥ pravāsārthaiś ca durvacaiḥ / ugrair vākyair ahaṃ tasyā nānyad daivāt samarthaye // 2.019.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ prakṛtisaṃpannā rājaputrī tathāguṇā / brūyāt sā prākṛteva strī matpīḍāṃ bhartṛsaṃnidhau // 2.019.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad acintyaṃ tu tad daivaṃ bhūteṣv api na hanyate / vyaktaṃ mayi ca tasyāṃ ca patito hi viparyayaḥ // 2.019.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaś cid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān / yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃ cit karmaṇo 'nyatra dṛśyate // 2.019.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukhaduḥkhe bhayakrodhau lābhālābhau bhavābhavau / yasya kiṃ cit tathā bhūtaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat // 2.019.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyāhate 'py abhiṣeke me paritāpo na vidyate / tasmād aparitāpaḥ saṃs tvam apy anuvidhāya mām // 2.019.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratisaṃhāraya kṣipram ābhiṣecanikīṃ kriyām // 2.019.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na lakṣmaṇāsmin mama rājyavighne; mātā yavīyasy atiśaṅkanīyā / daivābhipannā hi vadanty aniṣṭaṃ; jānāsi daivaṃ ca tathā prabhāvam // 2.019.022	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
iti bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇo 'dhaḥśirā muhuḥ / śrutvā madhyaṃ jagāmeva manasā duḥkhaharṣayoḥ // 2.020.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadā tu baddhvā bhrukuṭīṃ bhruvor madhye nararṣabha / niśaśvāsa mahāsarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ // 2.020.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya duṣprativīkṣyaṃ tad bhrukuṭīsahitaṃ tadā / babhau kruddhasya siṃhasya mukhasya sadṛśaṃ mukham // 2.020.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agrahas taṃ vidhunvaṃs tu hastī hastam ivātmanaḥ / tiryag ūrdhvaṃ śarīre ca pātayitvā śirodharām // 2.020.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agrākṣṇā vīkṣamāṇas tu tiryag bhrātaram abravīt / asthāne saṃbhramo yasya jāto vai sumahān ayam // 2.020.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmadoṣaprasaṅgena lokasyānatiśaṅkayā / kathaṃ hy etad asaṃbhrāntas tvadvidho vaktum arhati // 2.020.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā daivam aśauṇḍīraṃ śauṇḍīraḥ kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ / kiṃ nāma kṛpaṇaṃ daivam aśaktam abhiśaṃsasi // 2.020.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāpayos tu kathaṃ nāma tayoḥ śaṅkā na vidyate / santi dharmopadhāḥ ślakṣṇā dharmātman kiṃ na budhyase // 2.020.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lokavidviṣṭam ārabdhaṃ tvadanyasyābhiṣecanam / yeneyam āgatā dvaidhaṃ tava buddhir mahīpate // 2.020.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi dharmo mama dveṣyaḥ prasaṅgād yasya muhyasi // 2.020.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady api pratipattis te daivī cāpi tayor matam / tathāpy upekṣaṇīyaṃ te na me tad api rocate // 2.020.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viklavo vīryahīno yaḥ sa daivam anuvartate / vīrāḥ saṃbhāvitātmāno na daivaṃ paryupāsate // 2.020.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa yaḥ samarthaḥ prabādhitum / na daivena vipannārthaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'vasīdati // 2.020.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
drakṣyanti tv adya daivasya pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya ca / daivamānuṣayor adya vyaktā vyaktir bhaviṣyati // 2.020.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya matpauruṣahataṃ daivaṃ drakṣyanti vai janāḥ / yad daivād āhataṃ te 'dya dṛṣṭaṃ rājyābhiṣecanam // 2.020.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atyaṅkuśam ivoddāmaṃ gajaṃ madabaloddhatam / pradhāvitam ahaṃ daivaṃ pauruṣeṇa nivartaye // 2.020.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lokapālāḥ samastās te nādya rāmābhiṣecanam / na ca kṛtsnās trayo lokā vihanyuḥ kiṃ punaḥ pitā // 2.020.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yair vivāsas tavāraṇye mitho rājan samarthitaḥ / araṇye te vivatsyanti caturdaśa samās tathā // 2.020.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tadāśāṃ chetsyāmi pitus tasyāś ca yā tava / abhiṣekavighātena putrarājyāya vartate // 2.020.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madbalena viruddhāya na syād daivabalaṃ tathā / prabhaviṣyati duḥkhāya yathograṃ pauruṣaṃ mama // 2.020.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūrdhvaṃ varṣasahasrānte prajāpālyam anantaram / āryaputrāḥ kariṣyanti vanavāsaṃ gate tvayi // 2.020.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvarājarṣivṛttyā hi vanavāso vidhīyate / prajā nikṣipya putreṣu putravat paripālane // 2.020.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ced rājany anekāgre rājyavibhramaśaṅkayā / naivam icchasi dharmātman rājyaṃ rāma tvam ātmani // 2.020.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratijāne ca te vīra mā bhūvaṃ vīralokabhāk / rājyaṃ ca tava rakṣeyam ahaṃ veleva sāgaram // 2.020.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maṅgalair abhiṣiñcasva tatra tvaṃ vyāpṛto bhava / aham eko mahīpālān alaṃ vārayituṃ balāt // 2.020.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na śobhārthāv imau bāhū na dhanur bhūṣaṇāya me / nāsirābandhanārthāya na śarāḥ stambhahetavaḥ // 2.020.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amitradamanārthaṃ me sarvam etac catuṣṭayam / na cāhaṃ kāmaye 'tyarthaṃ yaḥ syāc chatrur mato mama // 2.020.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asinā tīkṣṇadhāreṇa vidyuccalitavarcasā / pragṛhītena vai śatruṃ vajriṇaṃ vā na kalpaye // 2.020.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
khaḍganiṣpeṣaniṣpiṣṭair gahanā duścarā ca me / hastyaśvanarahastoruśirobhir bhavitā mahī // 2.020.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
khaḍgadhārā hatā me 'dya dīpyamānā ivādrayaḥ / patiṣyanti dvipā bhūmau meghā iva savidyutaḥ // 2.020.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
baddhagodhāṅgulitrāṇe pragṛhītaśarāsane / kathaṃ puruṣamānī syāt puruṣāṇāṃ mayi sthite // 2.020.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahubhiś caikam atyasyann ekena ca bahūñ janān / viniyokṣyāmy ahaṃ bāṇān nṛvājigajamarmasu // 2.020.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya me 'straprabhāvasya prabhāvaḥ prabhaviṣyati / rājñaś cāprabhutāṃ kartuṃ prabhutvaṃ ca tava prabho // 2.020.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya candanasārasya keyūrāmokṣaṇasya ca / vasūnāṃ ca vimokṣasya suhṛdāṃ pālanasya ca // 2.020.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anurūpāv imau bāhū rāma karma kariṣyataḥ / abhiṣecanavighnasya kartṝṇāṃ te nivāraṇe // 2.020.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bravīhi ko 'dyaiva mayā viyujyatāṃ; tavāsuhṛt prāṇayaśaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ / yathā taveyaṃ vasudhā vaśe bhavet; tathaiva māṃ śādhi tavāsmi kiṃkaraḥ // 2.020.035	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
vimṛjya bāṣpaṃ parisāntvya cāsakṛt; sa lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ / uvāca pitrye vacane vyavasthitaṃ; nibodha mām eṣa hi saumya satpathaḥ // 2.020.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
taṃ samīkṣya tv avahitaṃ pitur nirdeśapālane / kausalyā bāṣpasaṃruddhā vaco dharmiṣṭham abravīt // 2.021.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛṣṭaduḥkho dharmātmā sarvabhūtapriyaṃvadaḥ / mayi jāto daśarathāt katham uñchena vartayet // 2.021.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya bhṛtyāś ca dāsāś ca mṛṣṭāny annāni bhuñjate / kathaṃ sa bhokṣyate nātho vane mūlaphalāny ayam // 2.021.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ka etac chraddadhec chrutvā kasya vā na bhaved bhayam / guṇavān dayito rājño rāghavo yad vivāsyate // 2.021.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā vihīnām iha māṃ śokāgnir atulo mahān / pradhakṣyati yathā kakṣaṃ citrabhānur himātyaye // 2.021.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ hi dhenuḥ svaṃ vatsaṃ gacchantaṃ nānugacchati / ahaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmi yatra putra gamiṣyasi // 2.021.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā nigaditaṃ mātrā tad vākyaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ / śrutvā rāmo 'bravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // 2.021.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyyā vañcito rājā mayi cāraṇyam āśrite / bhavatyā ca parityakto na nūnaṃ vartayiṣyati // 2.021.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhartuḥ kila parityāgo nṛśaṃsaḥ kevalaṃ striyāḥ / sa bhavatyā na kartavyo manasāpi vigarhitaḥ // 2.021.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvaj jīvati kākutsthaḥ pitā me jagatīpatiḥ / śuśrūṣā kriyatāṃ tāvat sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // 2.021.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu rāmeṇa kausalyā śubha darśanā / tathety uvāca suprītā rāmam akliṣṭakāriṇam // 2.021.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu vacanaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ / bhūyas tām abravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // 2.021.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā caiva bhavatyā ca kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ / rājā bhartā guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // 2.021.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāni tu mahāraṇye vihṛtya nava pañca ca / varṣāṇi paramaprītaḥ sthāsyāmi vacane tava // 2.021.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā priyaṃ putraṃ bāṣpapūrṇānanā tadā / uvāca paramārtā tu kausalyā putravatsalā // 2.021.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsāṃ rāma sapatnīnāṃ vastuṃ madhye na me kṣamam / naya mām api kākutstha vanaṃ vanyaṃ mṛgīṃ yathā // 2.021.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi te gamane buddhiḥ kṛtā pitur apekṣayā // 2.021.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ rāmo rudan vacanam abravīt / jīvantyā hi striyā bhartā daivataṃ prabhur eva ca // 2.021.017.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavatyā mama caivādya rājā prabhavati prabhuḥ // 2.021.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataś cāpi dharmātmā sarvabhūtapriyaṃvadaḥ / bhavatīm anuvarteta sa hi dharmarataḥ sadā // 2.021.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā mayi tu niṣkrānte putraśokena pārthivaḥ / śramaṃ nāvāpnuyāt kiṃ cid apramattā tathā kuru // 2.021.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vratopavāsaniratā yā nārī paramottamā / bhartāraṃ nānuvarteta sā ca pāpagatir bhavet // 2.021.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuśrūṣam eva kurvīta bhartuḥ priyahite ratā / eṣa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo loke vede śrutaḥ smṛtaḥ // 2.021.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjyās te matkṛte devi brāhmaṇāś caiva suvratāḥ / evaṃ kālaṃ pratīkṣasva mamāgamanakāṅkṣiṇī // 2.021.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāpsyase paramaṃ kāmaṃ mayi pratyāgate sati / yadi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho dhārayiṣyati jīvitam // 2.021.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu rāmeṇa bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇā / kausalyā putraśokārtā rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.021.024.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaccha putra tvam ekāgro bhadraṃ te 'stu sadā vibho // 2.021.024.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā hi rāmaṃ vanavāsaniścitaṃ; samīkṣya devī parameṇa cetasā / uvāca rāmaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ vaco; babhūva ca svastyayanābhikāṅkṣiṇī // 2.021.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sāpanīya tam āyāsam upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuci / cakāra mātā rāmasya maṅgalāni manasvinī // 2.022.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svasti sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutaś ca maharṣayaḥ / svasti dhātā vidhātā ca svasti pūṣā bhago 'ryamā // 2.022.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛtavaś caiva pakṣāś ca māsāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ / dināni ca muhūrtāś ca svasti kurvantu te sadā // 2.022.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
smṛtir dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca pāntu tvāṃ putra sarvataḥ / skandaś ca bhagavān devaḥ somaś ca sabṛhaspatiḥ // 2.022.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saptarṣayo nāradaś ca te tvāṃ rakṣantu sarvataḥ / nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi grahāś ca sahadevatāḥ // 2.022.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāvanāni carato muniveṣasya dhīmataḥ // 2.022.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plavagā vṛścikā daṃśā maśakāś caiva kānane / sarīsṛpāś ca kīṭāś ca mā bhūvan gahane tava // 2.022.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahādvipāś ca siṃhāś ca vyāghrā ṛkṣāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ / mahiṣāḥ śṛṅgiṇo raudrā na te druhyantu putraka // 2.022.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nṛmāṃsabhojanā raudrā ye cānye sattvajātayaḥ / mā ca tvāṃ hiṃsiṣuḥ putra mayā saṃpūjitās tv iha // 2.022.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgamās te śivāḥ santu sidhyantu ca parākramāḥ / sarvasaṃpattayo rāma svastimān gaccha putraka // 2.022.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svasti te 'stv āntarikṣebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ / sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyo ye ca te paripanthinaḥ // 2.022.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvalokaprabhur brahmā bhūtabhartā tatharṣayaḥ / ye ca śeṣāḥ surās te tvāṃ rakṣantu vanavāsinam // 2.022.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti mālyaiḥ suragaṇān gandhaiś cāpi yaśasvinī / stutibhiś cānurūpābhir ānarcāyatalocanā // 2.022.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yan maṅgalaṃ sahasrākṣe sarvadevanamaskṛte / vṛtranāśe samabhavat tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // 2.022.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yan maṅgalaṃ suparṇasya vinatākalpayat purā / amṛtaṃ prārthayānasya tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // 2.022.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
oṣadhīṃ cāpi siddhārthāṃ viśalyakaraṇīṃ śubhām / cakāra rakṣāṃ kausalyā mantrair abhijajāpa ca // 2.022.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānamya mūrdhni cāghrāya pariṣvajya yaśasvinī / avadat putra siddhārtho gaccha rāma yathāsukham // 2.022.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arogaṃ sarvasiddhārtham ayodhyāṃ punar āgatam / paśyāmi tvāṃ sukhaṃ vatsa susthitaṃ rājaveśmani // 2.022.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayārcitā devagaṇāḥ śivādayo; maharṣayo bhūtamahāsuroragāḥ / abhiprayātasya vanaṃ cirāya te; hitāni kāṅkṣantu diśaś ca rāghava // 2.022.018	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
itīva cāśrupratipūrṇalocanā; samāpya ca svastyayanaṃ yathāvidhi / pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ; punaḥ punaś cāpi nipīḍya sasvaje // 2.022.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tathā tu devyā sa kṛtapradakṣiṇo; nipīḍya mātuś caraṇau punaḥ punaḥ / jagāma sītānilayaṃ mahāyaśāḥ; sa rāghavaḥ prajvalitaḥ svayā śriyā // 2.022.020	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
abhivādya tu kausalyāṃ rāmaḥ saṃprasthito vanam / kṛtasvastyayano mātrā dharmiṣṭhe vartmani sthitaḥ // 2.023.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
virājayan rājasuto rājamārgaṃ narair vṛtam / hṛdayāny āmamantheva janasya guṇavattayā // 2.023.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehī cāpi tat sarvaṃ na śuśrāva tapasvinī / tad eva hṛdi tasyāś ca yauvarājyābhiṣecanam // 2.023.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devakāryaṃ sma sā kṛtvā kṛtajñā hṛṣṭacetanā / abhijñā rājadharmāṇāṃ rājaputraṃ pratīkṣate // 2.023.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviveśātha rāmas tu svaveśma suvibhūṣitam / prahṛṣṭajanasaṃpūrṇaṃ hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ // 2.023.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha sītā samutpatya vepamānā ca taṃ patim / apaśyac chokasaṃtaptaṃ cintāvyākulilendriyam // 2.023.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivarṇavadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ prasvinnam amarṣaṇam / āha duḥkhābhisaṃtaptā kim idānīm idaṃ prabho // 2.023.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya bārhaspataḥ śrīmān yuktaḥ puṣyo na rāghava / procyate brāhmaṇaiḥ prājñaiḥ kena tvam asi durmanāḥ // 2.023.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na te śataśalākena jalaphenanibhena ca / āvṛtaṃ vadanaṃ valgu chatreṇābhivirājate // 2.023.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyajanābhyāṃ ca mukhyābhyāṃ śatapatranibhekṣaṇam / candrahaṃsaprakāśābhyāṃ vījyate na tavānanam // 2.023.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāgmino bandinaś cāpi prahṛṣṭās tvaṃ nararṣabha / stuvanto nādya dṛśyante maṅgalaiḥ sūtamāgadhāḥ // 2.023.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na te kṣaudraṃ ca dadhi ca brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ / mūrdhni mūrdhāvasiktasya dadhati sma vidhānataḥ // 2.023.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tvāṃ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā śreṇīmukhyāś ca bhūṣitāḥ / anuvrajitum icchanti paurajāpapadās tathā // 2.023.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturbhir vegasaṃpannair hayaiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ / mukhyaḥ puṣyaratho yuktaḥ kiṃ na gacchati te 'grataḥ // 2.023.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hastī cāgrataḥ śrīmāṃs tava lakṣaṇapūjitaḥ / prayāṇe lakṣyate vīra kṛṣṇameghagiri prabhaḥ // 2.023.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca kāñcanacitraṃ te paśyāmi priyadarśana / bhadrāsanaṃ puraskṛtya yāntaṃ vīrapuraḥsaram // 2.023.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣeko yadā sajjaḥ kim idānīm idaṃ tava / apūrvo mukhavarṇaś ca na praharṣaś ca lakṣyate // 2.023.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
itīva vilapantīṃ tāṃ provāca raghunandanaḥ / sīte tatrabhavāṃs tāta pravrājayati māṃ vanam // 2.023.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kule mahati saṃbhūte dharmajñe dharmacāriṇi / śṛṇu jānaki yenedaṃ krameṇābhyāgataṃ mama // 2.023.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājñā satyapratijñena pitrā daśarathena me / kaikeyyai prītamanasā purā dattau mahāvarau // 2.023.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayādya mama sajje 'sminn abhiṣeke nṛpodyate / pracoditaḥ sa samayo dharmeṇa pratinirjitaḥ // 2.023.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyaṃ daṇḍake mayā / pitrā me bharataś cāpi yauvarājye niyojitaḥ // 2.023.022.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ tvām āgato draṣṭuṃ prasthito vijanaṃ vanam // 2.023.022.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasya samīpe te nāhaṃ kathyaḥ kadā cana / ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam // 2.023.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmān na te guṇāḥ kathyā bharatasyāgrato mama // 2.023.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāpi tvaṃ tena bhartavyā viśeṣeṇa kadā cana / anukūlatayā śakyaṃ samīpe tasya vartitum // 2.023.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ cāpi pratijñāṃ tāṃ guroḥ samanupālayan / vanam adyaiva yāsyāmi sthirā bhava manasvini // 2.023.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāte ca mayi kalyāṇi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam / vratopavāsaratayā bhavitavyaṃ tvayānaghe // 2.023.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālyam utthāya devānāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathāvidhi / vanditavyo daśarathaḥ pitā mama nareśvaraḥ // 2.023.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātā ca mama kausalyā vṛddhā saṃtāpakarśitā / dharmam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā tvattaḥ saṃmānam arhati // 2.023.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanditavyāś ca te nityaṃ yāḥ śeṣā mama mātaraḥ / snehapraṇayasaṃbhogaiḥ samā hi mama mātaraḥ // 2.023.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātṛputrasamau cāpi draṣṭavyau ca viśeṣataḥ / tvayā lakṣmaṇaśatrughnau prāṇaiḥ priyatarau mama // 2.023.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vipriyaṃ na ca kartavyaṃ bharatasya kadā cana / sa hi rājā prabhuś caiva deśasya ca kulasya ca // 2.023.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārādhitā hi śīlena prayatnaiś copasevitāḥ / rājānaḥ saṃprasīdanti prakupyanti viparyaye // 2.023.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aurasān api putrān hi tyajanty ahitakāriṇaḥ / samarthān saṃpragṛhṇanti janān api narādhipāḥ // 2.023.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahāvanaṃ priye; tvayā hi vastavyam ihaiva bhāmini / yathā vyalīkaṃ kuruṣe na kasya cit; tathā tvayā kāryam idaṃ vaco mama // 2.023.034	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
evam uktā tu vaidehī priyārhā priyavādinī / praṇayād eva saṃkruddhā bhartāram idam abravīt // 2.024.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āryaputra pitā mātā bhrātā putras tathā snuṣā / svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhāgyam upāsate // 2.024.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhartur bhāgyaṃ tu bhāryaikā prāpnoti puruṣarṣabha / ataś caivāham ādiṣṭā vane vastavyam ity api // 2.024.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na pitā nātmajo nātmā na mātā na sakhījanaḥ / iha pretya ca nārīṇāṃ patir eko gatiḥ sadā // 2.024.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tvaṃ prasthito durgaṃ vanam adyaiva rāghava / agratas te gamiṣyāmi mṛdnantī kuśakaṇṭakān // 2.024.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īrṣyā roṣau bahiṣkṛtya bhuktaśeṣam ivodakam / naya māṃ vīra viśrabdhaḥ pāpaṃ mayi na vidyate // 2.024.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāsādāgrair vimānair vā vaihāyasagatena vā / sarvāvasthāgatā bhartuḥ pādacchāyā viśiṣyate // 2.024.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anuśiṣṭāsmi mātrā ca pitrā ca vividhāśrayam / nāsmi saṃprati vaktavyā vartitavyaṃ yathā mayā // 2.024.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukhaṃ vane nivatsyāmi yathaiva bhavane pituḥ / acintayantī trīṃl lokāṃś cintayantī pativratam // 2.024.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuśrūṣamāṇā te nityaṃ niyatā brahmacāriṇī / saha raṃsye tvayā vīra vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu // 2.024.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ hi kartuṃ vane śakto rāma saṃparipālanam / anyasya pai janasyeha kiṃ punar mama mānada // 2.024.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phalamūlāśanā nityaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ / na te duḥkhaṃ kariṣyāmi nivasantī saha tvayā // 2.024.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
icchāmi saritaḥ śailān palvalāni vanāni ca / draṣṭuṃ sarvatra nirbhītā tvayā nāthena dhīmatā // 2.024.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇāḥ padminīḥ sādhupuṣpitāḥ / iccheyaṃ sukhinī draṣṭuṃ tvayā vīreṇa saṃgatā // 2.024.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saha tvayā viśālākṣa raṃsye paramanandinī / evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ vāhaṃ tvayā saha // 2.024.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svarge 'pi ca vinā vāso bhavitā yadi rāghava / tvayā mama naravyāghra nāhaṃ tam api rocaye // 2.024.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ sudurgamaṃ; mṛgāyutaṃ vānaravāraṇair yutam / vane nivatsyāmi yathā pitur gṛhe; tavaiva pādāv upagṛhya saṃmatā // 2.024.017	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
ananyabhāvām anuraktacetasaṃ; tvayā viyuktāṃ maraṇāya niścitām / nayasva māṃ sādhu kuruṣva yācanāṃ; na te mayāto gurutā bhaviṣyati // 2.024.018	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tathā bruvāṇām api dharmavatsalo; na ca sma sītāṃ nṛvaro ninīṣati / uvāca caināṃ bahu saṃnivartane; vane nivāsasya ca duḥkhitāṃ prati // 2.024.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ / nivartanārthe dharmātmā vākyam etad uvāca ha // 2.025.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sīte mahākulīnāsi dharme ca niratā sadā / ihācara svadharmaṃ tvaṃ mā yathā manasaḥ sukham // 2.025.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sīte yathā tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tathā kāryaṃ tvayābale / vane doṣā hi bahavo vadatas tān nibodha me // 2.025.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sīte vimucyatām eṣā vanavāsakṛtā matiḥ / bahudoṣaṃ hi kāntāraṃ vanam ity abhidhīyate // 2.025.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hitabuddhyā khalu vaco mayaitad abhidhīyate / sadā sukhaṃ na jānāmi duḥkham eva sadā vanam // 2.025.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
girinirjharasaṃbhūtā girikandaravāsinām / siṃhānāṃ ninadā duḥkhāḥ śrotuṃ duḥkham ato vanam // 2.025.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
supyate parṇaśayyāsu svayaṃ bhagnāsu bhūtale / rātriṣu śramakhinnena tasmād duḥkhataraṃ vanam // 2.025.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upavāsaś ca kartavyā yathāprāṇena maithili / jaṭābhāraś ca kartavyo valkalāmbaradhāriṇā // 2.025.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atīva vātas timiraṃ bubhukṣā cātra nityaśaḥ / bhayāni ca mahānty atra tato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // 2.025.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarīsṛpāś ca bahavo bahurūpāś ca bhāmini / caranti pṛthivīṃ darpād ato dukhataraṃ vanam // 2.025.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nadīnilayanāḥ sarpā nadīkuṭilagāminaḥ / tiṣṭhanty āvṛtya panthānam ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // 2.025.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pataṃgā vṛścikāḥ kīṭā daṃśāś ca maśakaiḥ saha / bādhante nityam abale sarvaṃ duḥkham ato vanam // 2.025.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
drumāḥ kaṇṭakinaś caiva kuśakāśāś ca bhāmini / vane vyākulaśākhāgrās tena duḥkhataraṃ vanam // 2.025.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad alaṃ te vanaṃ gatvā kṣamaṃ na hi vanaṃ tava / vimṛśann iha paśyāmi bahudoṣataraṃ vanam // 2.025.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanaṃ tu netuṃ na kṛtā matis tadā; babhūva rāmeṇa yadā mahātmanā / na tasya sītā vacanaṃ cakāra tat; tato 'bravīd rāmam idaṃ suduḥkhitā // 2.025.015	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sītā rāmasya duḥkhitā / prasaktāśrumukhī mandam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.026.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tvayā kīrtitā doṣā vane vastavyatāṃ prati / guṇān ity eva tān viddhi tava snehapuraskṛtān // 2.026.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā ca saha gantavyaṃ mayā gurujanājñayā / tvadviyogena me rāma tyaktavyam iha jīvitam // 2.026.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca māṃ tvatsamīpastham api śaknoti rāghava / surāṇām īśvaraḥ śakraḥ pradharṣayitum ojasā // 2.026.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patihīnā tu yā nārī na sā śakṣyati jīvitum / kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ rāma tvayā mama vidarśitam // 2.026.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha cāpi mahāprājña brāhmaṇānāṃ mayā śrutam / purā pitṛgṛhe satyaṃ vastavyaṃ kila me vane // 2.026.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣaṇibhyo dvijātibhyaḥ śrutvāhaṃ vacanaṃ gṛhe / vanavāsakṛtotsāhā nityam eva mahābala // 2.026.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādeśo vanavāsasya prāptavyaḥ sa mayā kila / sā tvayā saha tatrāhaṃ yāsyāmi priya nānyathā // 2.026.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtādeśā bhaviṣyāmi gamiṣyāmi saha tvayā / kālaś cāyaṃ samutpannaḥ satyavāg bhavatu dvijaḥ // 2.026.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanavāse hi jānāmi duḥkhāni bahudhā kila / prāpyante niyataṃ vīra puruṣair akṛtātmabhiḥ // 2.026.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kanyayā ca pitur gehe vanavāsaḥ śruto mayā / bhikṣiṇyāḥ sādhuvṛttāyā mama mātur ihāgrataḥ // 2.026.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasāditaś ca vai pūrvaṃ tvaṃ vai bahuvidhaṃ prabho / gamanaṃ vanavāsasya kāṅkṣitaṃ hi saha tvayā // 2.026.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtakṣaṇāhaṃ bhadraṃ te gamanaṃ prati rāghava / vanavāsasya śūrasya caryā hi mama rocate // 2.026.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuddhātman premabhāvād dhi bhaviṣyāmi vikalmaṣā / bhartāram anugacchantī bhartā hi mama daivatam // 2.026.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pretyabhāve 'pi kalyāṇaḥ saṃgamo me saha tvayā / śrutir hi śrūyate puṇyā brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśasvinām // 2.026.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iha loke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate / adbhir dattā svadharmeṇa pretyabhāve 'pi tasya sā // 2.026.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam asmāt svakāṃ nārīṃ suvṛttāṃ hi pativratām / nābhirocayase netuṃ tvaṃ māṃ keneha hetunā // 2.026.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaktāṃ pativratāṃ dīnāṃ māṃ samāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ / netum arhasi kākutstha samānasukhaduḥkhinīm // 2.026.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi māṃ duḥkhitām evaṃ vanaṃ netuṃ na cecchasi / viṣam agniṃ jalaṃ vāham āsthāsye mṛtyukāraṇāt // 2.026.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ taṃ sā yācate gamanaṃ prati / nānumene mahābāhus tāṃ netuṃ vijanaṃ vanam // 2.026.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu sā cintāṃ maithilī samupāgatā / snāpayantīva gām uṣṇair aśrubhir nayanacyutaiḥ // 2.026.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cintayantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu nivartayitum ātmavān / krodhāviṣṭāṃ tu vaidehīṃ kākutstho bahv asāntvayat // 2.026.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāntvyamānā tu rāmeṇa maithilī janakātmajā / vanavāsanimittāya bhartāram idam abravīt // 2.027.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tam uttamasaṃvignā sītā vipulavakṣasaṃ / praṇayāc cābhimānāc ca paricikṣepa rāghavam // 2.027.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tvāmanyata vaidehaḥ pitā me mithilādhipaḥ / rāma jāmātaraṃ prāpya striyaṃ puruṣavigraham // 2.027.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anṛtaṃ balaloko 'yam ajñānād yad dhi vakṣyati / tejo nāsti paraṃ rāme tapatīva divākare // 2.027.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ hi kṛtvā viṣaṇṇas tvaṃ kuto vā bhayam asti te / yat parityaktukāmas tvaṃ mām ananyaparāyaṇām // 2.027.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dyumatsenasutaṃ vīra satyavantam anuvratām / sāvitrīm iva māṃ viddhi tvam ātmavaśavartinīm // 2.027.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tv ahaṃ manasāpy anyaṃ draṣṭāsmi tvadṛte 'nagha / tvayā rāghava gaccheyaṃ yathānyā kulapāṃsanī // 2.027.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svayaṃ tu bhāryāṃ kaumārīṃ ciram adhyuṣitāṃ satīm / śailūṣa iva māṃ rāma parebhyo dātum icchasi // 2.027.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mām anādāya vanaṃ na tvaṃ prasthātum arhasi / tapo vā yadi vāraṇyaṃ svargo vā syāt saha tvayā // 2.027.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca me bhavitā tatra kaś cit pathi pariśramaḥ / pṛṣṭhatas tava gacchantyā vihāraśayaneṣv api // 2.027.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśakāśaśareṣīkā ye ca kaṇṭakino drumāḥ / tūlājinasamasparśā mārge mama saha tvayā // 2.027.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāvāta samuddhūtaṃ yan mām avakariṣyati / rajo ramaṇa tan manye parārdhyam iva candanam // 2.027.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śādvaleṣu yad āsiṣye vanānte vanagoracā / kuthāstaraṇatalpeṣu kiṃ syāt sukhataraṃ tataḥ // 2.027.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patraṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ yat tvam alpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu / dāsyasi svayam āhṛtya tan me 'mṛtarasopamam // 2.027.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na mātur na pitus tatra smariṣyāmi na veśmanaḥ / ārtavāny upabhuñjānā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca // 2.027.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca tatra gataḥ kiṃ cid draṣṭum arhasi vipriyam / matkṛte na ca te śoko na bhaviṣyāmi durbharā // 2.027.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tvayā saha sa svargo nirayo yas tvayā vinā / iti jānan parāṃ prītiṃ gaccha rāma mayā saha // 2.027.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha mām evam avyagrāṃ vanaṃ naiva nayiṣyasi / viṣam adyaiva pāsyāmi mā viśaṃ dviṣatāṃ vaśam // 2.027.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paścād api hi duḥkhena mama naivāsti jīvitam / ujjhitāyās tvayā nātha tadaiva maraṇaṃ varam // 2.027.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ hi sahituṃ śokaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe / kiṃ punar daśavarṣāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca duḥkhitā // 2.027.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti sā śokasaṃtaptā vilapya karuṇaṃ bahu / cukrośa patim āyastā bhṛśam āliṅgya sasvaram // 2.027.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā viddhā bahubhir vākyair digdhair iva gajāṅganā / cira saṃniyataṃ bāṣpaṃ mumocāgnim ivāraṇiḥ // 2.027.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāḥ sphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ vāri saṃtāpasaṃbhavam / netrābhyāṃ parisusrāva paṅkajābhyām ivodakam // 2.027.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ visaṃjñām iva duḥkhitām / uvāca vacanaṃ rāmaḥ pariviśvāsayaṃs tadā // 2.027.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na devi tava duḥkhena svargam apy abhirocaye / na hi me 'sti bhayaṃ kiṃ cit svayambhor iva sarvataḥ // 2.027.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava sarvam abhiprāyam avijñāya śubhānane / vāsaṃ na rocaye 'raṇye śaktimān api rakṣaṇe // 2.027.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat sṛṣṭāsi mayā sārdhaṃ vanavāsāya maithili / na vihātuṃ mayā śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā // 2.027.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmas tu gajanāsoru sadbhir ācaritaḥ purā / taṃ cāham anuvarte 'dya yathā sūryaṃ suvarcalā // 2.027.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa dharmas tu suśroṇi pitur mātuś ca vaśyatā / ataś cājñāṃ vyatikramya nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // 2.027.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa māṃ pitā yathā śāsti satyadharmapathe sthitaḥ / tathā vartitum icchāmi sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // 2.027.030.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anugacchasva māṃ bhīru sahadharmacarī bhava // 2.027.030.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ratnāni bhikṣukebhyaś ca bhojanam / dehi cāśaṃsamānebhyaḥ saṃtvarasva ca māciram // 2.027.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anukūlaṃ tu sā bhartur jñātvā gamanam ātmanaḥ / kṣipraṃ pramuditā devī dātum evopacakrame // 2.027.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahṛṣṭā paripūrṇamānasā; yaśasvinī bhartur avekṣya bhāṣitam / dhanāni ratnāni ca dātum aṅganā; pracakrame dharmabhṛtāṃ manasvinī // 2.027.033	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato 'bravīn mahātejā rāmo lakṣmaṇam agrataḥ / sthitaṃ prāggāminaṃ vīraṃ yācamānaṃ kṛtāñjalim // 2.028.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayādya saha saumitre tvayi gacchati tad vanam / ko bhariṣyati kausalyāṃ sumitrāṃ vā yaśasvinīm // 2.028.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivarṣati kāmair yaḥ parjanyaḥ pṛthivīm iva / sa kāmapāśaparyasto mahātejā mahīpatiḥ // 2.028.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā hi rājyam idaṃ prāpya nṛpasyāśvapateḥ sutā / duḥkhitānāṃ sapatnīnāṃ na kariṣyati śobhanam // 2.028.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā / pratyuvāca tadā rāmaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam // 2.028.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavaiva tejasā vīra bharataḥ pūjayiṣyati / kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca prayato nātra saṃśayaḥ // 2.028.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā bibhṛyād āryā sahasram api madvidhān / yasyāḥ sahasraṃ grāmāṇāṃ saṃprāptam upajīvanam // 2.028.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanur ādāya saśaraṃ khanitrapiṭakādharaḥ / agratas te gamiṣyāmi panthānam anudarśayan // 2.028.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āhariṣyāmi te nityaṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca / vanyāni yāni cānyāni svāhārāṇi tapasvinām // 2.028.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavāṃs tu saha vaidehyā girisānuṣu raṃsyate / ahaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi jāgrataḥ svapataś ca te // 2.028.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmas tv anena vākyena suprītaḥ pratyuvāca tam / vrajāpṛcchasva saumitre sarvam eva suhṛjjanam // 2.028.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye ca rājño dadau divye mahātmā varuṇaḥ svayam / janakasya mahāyajñe dhanuṣī raudradarśane // 2.028.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhedyakavace divye tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau / ādityavimalau cobhau khaḍgau hemapariṣkṛtau // 2.028.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satkṛtya nihitaṃ sarvam etad ācāryasadmani / sa tvam āyudham ādāya kṣipram āvraja lakṣmaṇa // 2.028.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa suhṛjjanam āmantrya vanavāsāya niścitaḥ / ikṣvākugurum āmantrya jagrāhāyudham uttamam // 2.028.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad divyaṃ rājaśārdūlaḥ satkṛtaṃ mālyabhūṣitam / rāmāya darśayām āsa saumitriḥ sarvam āyudham // 2.028.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvācātmavān rāmaḥ prītyā lakṣmaṇam āgatam / kāle tvam āgataḥ saumya kāṅkṣite mama lakṣmaṇa // 2.028.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ pradātum icchāmi yad idaṃ māmakaṃ dhanam / brāhmaṇebhyas tapasvibhyas tvayā saha paraṃtapa // 2.028.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasantīha dṛḍhaṃ bhaktyā guruṣu dvijasattamāḥ / teṣām api ca me bhūyaḥ sarveṣāṃ copajīvinām // 2.028.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhaputraṃ tu suyajñam āryaṃ; tvam ānayāśu pravaraṃ dvijānām / abhiprayāsyāmi vanaṃ samastān; abhyarcya śiṣṭān aparān dvijātīn // 2.028.020	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ śāsanam ājñāya bhrātuḥ śubhataraṃ priyam / gatvā sa praviveśāśu suyajñasya niveśanam // 2.029.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ vipram agnyagārasthaṃ vanditvā lakṣmaṇo 'bravīt / sakhe 'bhyāgaccha paśya tvaṃ veśma duṣkarakāriṇaḥ // 2.029.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsyāśu gatvā saumitriṇā saha / juṣṭaṃ tat prāviśal lakṣmyā ramyaṃ rāmaniveśanam // 2.029.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āgataṃ vedavidaṃ prāñjaliḥ sītayā saha / suyajñam abhicakrāma rāghavo 'gnim ivārcitam // 2.029.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jātarūpamayair mukhyair aṅgadaiḥ kuṇḍalaiḥ śubhaiḥ / sahema sūtrair maṇibhiḥ keyūrair valayair api // 2.029.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyaiś ca ratnair bahubhiḥ kākutsthaḥ pratyapūjayat / suyajñaṃ sa tadovāca rāmaḥ sītāpracoditaḥ // 2.029.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hāraṃ ca hemasūtraṃ ca bhāryāyai saumya hāraya / raśanāṃ cādhunā sītā dātum icchati te sakhe // 2.029.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paryaṅkam agryāstaraṇaṃ nānāratnavibhūṣitam / tam apīcchati vaidehī pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ tvayi // 2.029.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāgaḥ śatruṃ jayo nāma mātulo yaṃ dadau mama / taṃ te gajasahasreṇa dadāmi dvijapuṃgava // 2.029.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktaḥ sa hi rāmeṇa suyajñaḥ pratigṛhya tat / rāmalakṣmaṇasītānāṃ prayuyojāśiṣaḥ śivāḥ // 2.029.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha bhrātaram avyagraṃ priyaṃ rāmaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ / saumitriṃ tam uvācedaṃ brahmeva tridaśeśvaram // 2.029.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agastyaṃ kauśikaṃ caiva tāv ubhau brāhmaṇottamau / arcayāhūya saumitre ratnaiḥ sasyam ivāmbubhiḥ // 2.029.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyāṃ ca ya āśīrbhir bhaktaḥ paryupatiṣṭhati / ācāryas taittirīyāṇām abhirūpaś ca vedavit // 2.029.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya yānaṃ ca dāsīś ca saumitre saṃpradāpaya / kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi yāvat tuṣyati sa dvijaḥ // 2.029.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūtaś citrarathaś cāryaḥ sacivaḥ suciroṣitaḥ / toṣayainaṃ mahārhaiś ca ratnair vastrair dhanais tathā // 2.029.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śālivāhasahasraṃ ca dve śate bhadrakāṃs tathā / vyañjanārthaṃ ca saumitre gosahasram upākuru // 2.029.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ svayam / yathoktaṃ brāhmaṇendrāṇām adadād dhanado yathā // 2.029.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīd bāṣpakalāṃs tiṣṭhataś copajīvinaḥ / saṃpradāya bahu dravyam ekaikasyopajīvinaḥ // 2.029.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇasya ca yad veśma gṛhaṃ ca yad idaṃ mama / aśūnyaṃ kāryam ekaikaṃ yāvadāgamanaṃ mama // 2.029.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā duḥkhitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ tam upajīvinam / uvācedaṃ dhanadhyakṣaṃ dhanam ānīyatām iti // 2.029.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'sya dhanam ājahruḥ sarvam evopajīvinaḥ // 2.029.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / dvijebhyo bālavṛddhebhyaḥ kṛpaṇebhyo 'bhyadāpayat // 2.029.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāsīt piṅgalo gārgyas trijaṭo nāma vai dvijaḥ / ā pañcamāyāḥ kakṣyāyā nainaṃ kaś cid avārayat // 2.029.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājaputram āsādya trijaṭo vākyam abravīt / nirdhano bahuputro 'smi rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ // 2.029.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uñchavṛttir vane nityaṃ pratyavekṣasva mām iti // 2.029.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca tato rāmaḥ parihāsasamanvitam / gavāṃ sahasram apy ekaṃ na tu viśrāṇitaṃ mayā // 2.029.024.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parikṣipasi daṇḍena yāvat tāvad avāpsyasi // 2.029.024.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śāṭīṃ tvaritaḥ kaṭyāṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ pariveṣṭya tām / āvidhya daṇḍaṃ cikṣepa sarvaprāṇena vegitaḥ // 2.029.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca ca tato rāmas taṃ gārgyam abhisāntvayan / manyur na khalu kartavyaḥ parihāso hy ayaṃ mama // 2.029.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sabhāryas trijaṭo mahāmunir; gavām anīkaṃ pratigṛhya moditaḥ / yaśobalaprītisukhopabṛṃhiṇīs; tad āśiṣaḥ pratyavadan mahātmanaḥ // 2.029.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
dattvā tu saha vaidehyā brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ bahu / jagmatuḥ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // 2.030.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gṛhīte duṣprekṣye aśobhetāṃ tadāyudhe / mālādāmabhir āsakte sītayā samalaṃkṛte // 2.030.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prāsādaharmyāṇi vimānaśikharāṇi ca / adhiruhya janaḥ śrīmān udāsīno vyalokayat // 2.030.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi rathyāḥ sma śakyante gantuṃ bahujanākulāḥ / āruhya tasmāt prāsādān dīnāḥ paśyanti rāghavam // 2.030.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padātiṃ varjitacchatraṃ rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janāḥ / ūcur bahuvidhā vācaḥ śokopahatacetasaḥ // 2.030.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaṃ yāntam anuyāti sma caturaṅgabalaṃ mahat / tam ekaṃ sītayā sārdham anuyāti sma lakṣmaṇaḥ // 2.030.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aiśvaryasya rasajñaḥ san kāmināṃ caiva kāmadaḥ / necchaty evānṛtaṃ kartuṃ pitaraṃ dharmagauravāt // 2.030.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā na śakyā purā draṣṭuṃ bhūtair ākāśagair api / tām adya sītāṃ paśyanti rājamārgagatā janāḥ // 2.030.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgarāgocitāṃ sītāṃ raktacandana sevinīm / varṣam uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca neṣyaty āśu vivarṇatām // 2.030.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya nūnaṃ daśarathaḥ sattvam āviśya bhāṣate / na hi rājā priyaṃ putraṃ vivāsayitum arhati // 2.030.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirguṇasyāpi putrasyā kāthaṃ syād vipravāsanam / kiṃ punar yasya loko 'yaṃ jito vṛttena kevalam // 2.030.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ / rāghavaṃ śobhayanty ete ṣaḍguṇāḥ puruṣottamam // 2.030.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt tasyopaghātena prajāḥ paramapīḍitāḥ / audakānīva sattvāni grīṣme salilasaṃkṣayāt // 2.030.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pīḍayā pīḍitaṃ sarvaṃ jagad asya jagatpateḥ / mūlasyevopaghātena vṛkṣaḥ puṣpaphalopagaḥ // 2.030.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te lakṣmaṇa iva kṣipraṃ sapatnyaḥ sahabāndhavāḥ / gacchantam anugacchāmo yena gacchati rāghavaḥ // 2.030.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udyānāni parityajya kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca / ekaduḥkhasukhā rāmam anugacchāma dhārmikam // 2.030.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samuddhṛtanidhānāni paridhvastājirāṇi ca / upāttadhanadhānyāni hṛtasārāṇi sarvaśaḥ // 2.030.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rajasābhyavakīrṇāni parityaktāni daivataiḥ / asmattyaktāni veśmāni kaikeyī pratipadyatām // 2.030.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanaṃ nagaram evāstu yena gacchati rāghavaḥ / asmābhiś ca parityaktaṃ puraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ vanam // 2.030.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bilāni daṃṣṭriṇaḥ sarve sānūni mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / asmattyaktaṃ prapadyantāṃ sevyamānaṃ tyajantu ca // 2.030.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ vividhā vāco nānājanasamīritāḥ / śuśrāva rāmaḥ śrutvā ca na vicakre 'sya mānasaṃ // 2.030.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratīkṣamāṇo 'bhijanaṃ tadārtam; anārtarūpaḥ prahasann ivātha / jagāma rāmaḥ pitaraṃ didṛkṣuḥ; pitur nideśaṃ vidhivac cikīrṣuḥ // 2.030.022	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tat pūrvam aikṣvākasuto mahātmā; rāmo gamiṣyan vanam ārtarūpam / vyatiṣṭhata prekṣya tadā sumantraṃ; pitur mahātmā pratihāraṇārtham // 2.030.023	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
pitur nideśena tu dharmavatsalo; vanapraveśe kṛtabuddhiniścayaḥ / sa rāghavaḥ prekṣya sumantram abravīn; nivedayasvāgamanaṃ nṛpāya me // 2.030.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa rāmapreṣitaḥ kṣipraṃ saṃtāpakaluṣendriyaḥ / praviśya nṛpatiṃ sūto niḥśvasantaṃ dadarśa ha // 2.031.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ālokya tu mahāprājñaḥ paramākula cetasaṃ / rāmam evānuśocantaṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir āsadat // 2.031.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra dvāri tiṣṭhati te sutaḥ / brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā sarvaṃ caivopajīvinām // 2.031.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvā paśyatu bhadraṃ te rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / sarvān suhṛda āpṛcchya tvām idānīṃ didṛkṣate // 2.031.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamiṣyati mahāraṇyaṃ taṃ paśya jagatīpate / vṛtaṃ rājaguṇaiḥ sarvair ādityam iva raśmibhiḥ // 2.031.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa satyavādī dharmātmā gāmbhīryāt sāgaropamaḥ / ākāśa iva niṣpaṅko narendraḥ pratyuvāca tam // 2.031.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantrānaya me dārān ye ke cid iha māmakāḥ / dāraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvair draṣṭum icchāmi rāghavam // 2.031.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'ntaḥpuram atītyaiva striyas tā vākyam abravīt / āryo hvayati vo rājā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // 2.031.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ sumantreṇa nṛpājñayā / pracakramus tad bhavanaṃ bhartur ājñāya śāsanam // 2.031.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardhasaptaśatās tās tu pramadās tāmralocanāḥ / kausalyāṃ parivāryātha śanair jagmur dhṛtavratāḥ // 2.031.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgateṣu ca dāreṣu samavekṣya mahīpatiḥ / uvāca rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sumantrānaya me sutam // 2.031.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sūto rāmam ādāya lakṣmaṇaṃ maithilīṃ tadā / jagāmābhimukhas tūrṇaṃ sakāśaṃ jagatīpateḥ // 2.031.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā putram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrāt kṛtāñjalim / utpapātāsanāt tūrṇam ārtaḥ strījanasaṃvṛtaḥ // 2.031.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhidudrāva vegena rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśāṃ patiḥ / tam asaṃprāpya duḥkhārtaḥ papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ // 2.031.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ rāmo 'bhyapātat kṣipraṃ lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ / visaṃjñam iva duḥkhena saśokaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā // 2.031.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
strīsahasraninādaś ca saṃjajñe rājaveśmani / hāhā rāmeti sahasā bhūṣaṇadhvanimūrchitaḥ // 2.031.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau / paryaṅke sītayā sārdhaṃ rudantaḥ samaveśayan // 2.031.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rāmo muhūrtena labdhasaṃjñaṃ mahīpatim / uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā śokārṇavapariplutam // 2.031.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpṛcche tvāṃ mahārāja sarveṣām īśvaro 'si naḥ / prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ paśya tvaṃ kuśalena mām // 2.031.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇaṃ cānujānīhi sītā cānveti māṃ vanam / kāraṇair bahubhis tathyair vāryamāṇau na cecchataḥ // 2.031.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujānīhi sarvān naḥ śokam utsṛjya mānada / lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca prajāpatir iva prajāḥ // 2.031.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratīkṣamāṇam avyagram anujñāṃ jagatīpateḥ / uvāca rarjā saṃprekṣya vanavāsāya rāghavam // 2.031.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ rāghava kaikeyyā varadānena mohitaḥ / ayodhyāyās tvam evādya bhava rājā nigṛhya mām // 2.031.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto nṛpatinā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ / pratyuvācāñjaliṃ kṛtvā pitaraṃ vākyakovidaḥ // 2.031.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavān varṣasahasrāya pṛthivyā nṛpate patiḥ / ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi na me kāryaṃ tvayānṛtam // 2.031.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śreyase vṛddhaye tāta punarāgamanāya ca / gacchasvāriṣṭam avyagraḥ panthānam akutobhayam // 2.031.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya tv idānīṃ rajanīṃ putra mā gaccha sarvathā / mātaraṃ māṃ ca saṃpaśyan vasemām adya śarvarīm // 2.031.027.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tarpitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ śvaḥkāle sādhayiṣyasi // 2.031.027.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rāmas tathā śrutvā pitur ārtasya bhāṣitam / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dīno vacanam abravīt // 2.031.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāpsyāmi yān adya guṇān ko me śvastān pradāsyati / apakramaṇam evātaḥ sarvakāmair ahaṃ vṛṇe // 2.031.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ sarāṣṭrā sajanā dhanadhānyasamākulā / mayā visṛṣṭā vasudhā bharatāya pradīyatām // 2.031.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apagacchatu te duḥkhaṃ mā bhūr bāṣpapariplutaḥ / na hi kṣubhyati durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // 2.031.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naivāhaṃ rājyam icchāmi na sukhaṃ na ca maithilīm / tvām ahaṃ satyam icchāmi nānṛtaṃ puruṣarṣabha // 2.031.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca mahī ca kevalā; mayā nisṛṣṭā bharatāya dīyatām / ahaṃ nideśaṃ bhavato 'nupālayan; vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi cirāya sevitum // 2.031.033	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
mayā nisṛṣṭāṃ bharato mahīm imāṃ; saśailakhaṇḍāṃ sapurāṃ sakānanām / śivāṃ susīmām anuśāstu kevalaṃ; tvayā yad uktaṃ nṛpate yathāstu tat // 2.031.034	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
na me tathā pārthiva dhīyate mano; mahatsu kāmeṣu na cātmanaḥ priye / yathā nideśe tava śiṣṭasaṃmate; vyapaitu duḥkhaṃ tava matkṛte 'nagha // 2.031.035	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tad adya naivānagha rājyam avyayaṃ; na sarvakāmān na sukhaṃ na maithilīm / na jīvitaṃ tvām anṛtena yojayan; vṛṇīya satyaṃ vratam astu te tathā // 2.031.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
phalāni mūlāni ca bhakṣayan vane; girīṃś ca paśyan saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca / vanaṃ praviśyaiva vicitrapādapaṃ; sukhī bhaviṣyāmi tavāstu nirvṛtiḥ // 2.031.037	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ sumantram aikṣvākaḥ pīḍito 'tra pratijñayā / sabāṣpam atiniḥśvasya jagādedaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // 2.032.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūta ratnasusaṃpūrṇā caturvidhabalā camūḥ / rāgavasyānuyātrārthaṃ kṣipraṃ pratividhīyatām // 2.032.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rūpājīvā ca śālinyo vaṇijaś ca mahādhanāḥ / śobhayantu kumārasya vāhinīṃ suprasāritāḥ // 2.032.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye cainam upajīvanti ramate yaiś ca vīryataḥ / teṣāṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā tān apy atra niyojaya // 2.032.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nighnan mṛgān kuñjarāṃś ca pibaṃś cāraṇyakaṃ madhu / nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan na rājyaṃ saṃsmariṣyati // 2.032.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhānyakośaś ca yaḥ kaś cid dhanakośaś ca māmakaḥ / tau rāmam anugacchetāṃ vasantaṃ nirjane vane // 2.032.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajan puṇyeṣu deśeṣu visṛjaṃś cāptadakṣiṇāḥ / ṛṣibhiś ca samāgamya pravatsyati sukhaṃ vane // 2.032.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataś ca mahābāhur ayodhyāṃ pālayiṣyati / sarvakāmaiḥ punaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti // 2.032.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe kaikeyyā bhayam āgatam / mukhaṃ cāpy agamāc cheṣaṃ svaraś cāpi nyarudhyata // 2.032.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā viṣaṇṇā ca saṃtrastā kaikeyī vākyam abravīt / rājyaṃ gatajanaṃ sādho pītamaṇḍāṃ surām iva // 2.032.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirāsvādyatamaṃ śūnyaṃ bharato nābhipatsyate // 2.032.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyyāṃ muktalajjāyāṃ vadantyām atidāruṇam / rājā daśaratho vākyam uvācāyatalocanām // 2.032.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vahantaṃ kiṃ tudasi māṃ niyujya dhuri māhite // 2.032.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyī dviguṇaṃ kruddhā rājānam idam abravīt / tavaiva vaṃśe sagaro jyeṣṭhaṃ putram upārudhat // 2.032.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asamañja iti khyātaṃ tathāyaṃ gantum arhati // 2.032.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto dhig ity eva rājā daśaratho 'bravīt / vrīḍitaś ca janaḥ sarvaḥ sā ca tan nāvabudhyata // 2.032.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra vṛddho mahāmātraḥ siddhārtho nāma nāmataḥ / śucir bahumato rājñaḥ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // 2.032.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asamañjo gṛhītvā tu krīḍitaḥ pathi dārakān / sarayvāḥ prakṣipann apsu ramate tena durmatiḥ // 2.032.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgaraḥ sarve kruddhā rājānam abruvan / asamañjaṃ vṛṣīṇvaikam asmān vā rāṣṭravardhana // 2.032.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān uvāca tato rājā kiṃnimittam idaṃ bhayam / tāś cāpi rājñā saṃpṛṣṭā vākyaṃ prakṛtayo 'bruvan // 2.032.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krīḍitas tv eṣa naḥ putrān bālān udbhrāntacetanaḥ / sarayvāṃ prakṣipan maurkhyād atulāṃ prītim aśnute // 2.032.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tāsāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā prakṛtīnāṃ narādhipa / taṃ tatyājāhitaṃ putraṃ tāsāṃ priyacikīrṣayā // 2.032.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam atyajad rājā sagaro vai sudhārmikaḥ / rāmaḥ kim akarot pāpaṃ yenaivam uparudhyate // 2.032.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu siddhārthavaco rājā śrāntatarasvanaḥ / śokopahatayā vācā kaikeyīm idam abravīt // 2.032.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anuvrajiṣyāmy aham adya rāmaṃ; rājyaṃ parityajya sukhaṃ dhanaṃ ca / sahaiva rājñā bharatena ca tvaṃ; yathā sukhaṃ bhuṅkṣva cirāya rājyam // 2.032.022	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
mahāmātravacaḥ śrutvā rāmo daśarathaṃ tadā / anvabhāṣata vākyaṃ tu vinayajño vinītavat // 2.033.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaktabhogasya me rājan vane vanyena jīvataḥ / kiṃ kāryam anuyātreṇa tyaktasaṅgasya sarvataḥ // 2.033.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo hi dattvā dvipaśreṣṭhaṃ kakṣyāyāṃ kurute manaḥ / rajjusnehena kiṃ tasya tyajataḥ kuñjarottamam // 2.033.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā mama satāṃ śreṣṭha kiṃ dhvajinyā jagatpate / sarvāṇy evānujānāmi cīrāṇy evānayantu me // 2.033.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
khanitrapiṭake cobhe mamānayata gacchataḥ / caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi vasato mama // 2.033.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha cīrāṇi kaikeyī svayam āhṛtya rāghavam / uvāca paridhatsveti janaughe nirapatrapā // 2.033.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cīre puruṣavyāghraḥ kaikeyyāḥ pratigṛhya te / sūkṣmavastram avakṣipya munivastrāṇy avasta ha // 2.033.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tatraiva vihāya vasane śubhe / tāpasāc chādane caiva jagrāha pitur agrataḥ // 2.033.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athātmaparidhānārthaṃ sītā kauśeyavāsinī / samīkṣya cīraṃ saṃtrastā pṛṣatī vāgurām iva // 2.033.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā vyapatrapamāṇeva pratigṛhya ca durmanāḥ / gandharvarājapratimaṃ bhartāram idam abravīt // 2.033.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ nu cīraṃ badhnanti munayo vanavāsinaḥ // 2.033.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtvā kaṇṭhe ca sā cīram ekam ādāya pāṇinā / tasthau hy akuṣalā tatra vrīḍitā janakātmaja // 2.033.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyās tat kṣipram āgamya rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ / cīraṃ babandha sītāyāḥ kauśeyasyopari svayam // 2.033.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṃ cīraṃ vasānāyāṃ nāthavatyām anāthavat / pracukrośa janaḥ sarvo dhik tvāṃ daśarathaṃ tv iti // 2.033.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa niḥśvasyoṣṇam aikṣvākas tāṃ bhāryām idam abravīt / kaikeyi kuśacīreṇa na sītā gantum arhati // 2.033.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nanu paryāptam etat te pāpe rāmavivāsanam / kim ebhiḥ kṛpaṇair bhūyaḥ pātakair api te kṛtaiḥ // 2.033.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvantaṃ pitaraṃ rāmaḥ saṃprasthito vanam / avākśirasam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.033.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ dhārmika kausalyā mama mātā yaśasvinī / vṛddhā cākṣudraśīlā ca na ca tvāṃ devagarhite // 2.033.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā vihīnāṃ varada prapannāṃ śokasāgaram / adṛṣṭapūrvavyasanāṃ bhūyaḥ saṃmantum arhasi // 2.033.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ mahendropamajātagarbhiṇīṃ; tathā vidhātuṃ janamīṃ mamārhasi / yathā vanasthe mayi śokakarśitā; na jīvitaṃ nyasya yamakṣayaṃ vrajet // 2.033.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
rāmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā muniveṣadharaṃ ca tam / samīkṣya saha bhāryābhī rājā vigatacetanaḥ // 2.034.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nainaṃ duḥkhena saṃtaptaḥ pratyavaikṣata rāghavam / na cainam abhisaṃprekṣya pratyabhāṣata durmanāḥ // 2.034.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa muhūrtam ivāsaṃjño duḥkhitaś ca mahīpatiḥ / vilalāpa mahābāhū rāmam evānucintayan // 2.034.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manye khalu mayā pūrvaṃ vivatsā bahavaḥ kṛtāḥ / prāṇino hiṃsitā vāpi tasmād idam upasthitam // 2.034.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tv evānāgate kāle dehāc cyavati jīvitam / kaikeyyā kliśyamānasya mṛtyur mama na vidyate // 2.034.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo 'haṃ pāvakasaṃkāśaṃ paśyāmi purataḥ sthitam / vihāya vasane sūkṣme tāpasācchādam ātmajam // 2.034.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekasyāḥ khalu kaikeyyāḥ kṛte 'yaṃ kliśyate janaḥ / svārthe prayatamānāyāḥ saṃśritya nikṛtiṃ tv imām // 2.034.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu vacanaṃ bāṣpeṇa pihitekṣṇaha / rāmeti sakṛd evoktvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha // 2.034.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃjñāṃ tu pratilabhyaiva muhūrtāt sa mahīpatiḥ / netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ sumantram idam abravīt // 2.034.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aupavāhyaṃ rathaṃ yuktvā tvam āyāhi hayottamaiḥ / prāpayainaṃ mahābhāgam ito janapadāt param // 2.034.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ manye guṇavatāṃ guṇānāṃ phalam ucyate / pitrā mātrā ca yat sādhur vīro nirvāsyate vanam // 2.034.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājño vacanam ājñāya sumantraḥ śīghravikramaḥ / yojayitvāyayau tatra ratham aśvair alaṃkṛtam // 2.034.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ rathaṃ rājaputrāya sūtaḥ kanakabhūṣitam / ācacakṣe 'ñjaliṃ kṛtvā yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ // 2.034.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā satvaram āhūya vyāpṛtaṃ vittasaṃcaye / uvāca deśakālajño niścitaṃ sarvataḥ śuci // 2.034.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca / varṣāṇy etāni saṃkhyāya vaidehyāḥ kṣipram ānaya // 2.034.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
narendreṇaivam uktas tu gatvā kośagṛhaṃ tataḥ / prāyacchat sarvam āhṛtya sītāyai kṣipram eva tat // 2.034.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā sujātā sujātāni vaidehī prasthitā vanam / bhūṣayām āsa gātrāṇi tair vicitrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ // 2.034.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyarājayata vaidehī veśma tat suvibhūṣitā / udyato 'ṃśumataḥ kāle khaṃ prabheva vivasvataḥ // 2.034.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pariṣvajya śvaśrūr vacanam abravīt / anācarantīṃ kṛpaṇaṃ mūdhny upāghrāya maithilīm // 2.034.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asatyaḥ sarvaloke 'smin satataṃ satkṛtāḥ priyaiḥ / bhartāraṃ nānumanyante vinipātagataṃ striyaḥ // 2.034.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvayā nāvamantavyaḥ putraḥ pravrājito mama / tava daivatam astv eṣa nirdhanaḥ sadhano 'pi vā // 2.034.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vijñāya vacanaṃ sītā tasyā dharmārthasaṃhitam / kṛtāñjalir uvācedaṃ śvaśrūm abhimukhe sthitā // 2.034.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kariṣye sarvam evāham āryā yad anuśāsti mām / abhijñāsmi yathā bhartur vartitavyaṃ śrutaṃ ca me // 2.034.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na mām asajjanenāryā samānayitum arhati / dharmād vicalituṃ nāham alaṃ candrād iva prabhā // 2.034.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātantrī vādyate vīṇā nācakro vartate rathaḥ / nāpatiḥ sukham edhate yā syād api śatātmajā // 2.034.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ mātā mitaṃ sutaḥ / amitasya hi dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet // 2.034.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāham evaṃgatā śreṣṭhā śrutadharmaparāvarā / ārye kim avamanyeyaṃ strīṇāṃ bhartā hi daivatam // 2.034.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā kausalyā hṛdayaṃgamam / śuddhasattvā mumocāśru sahasā duḥkhaharṣajam // 2.034.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ prāñjalir abhikramya mātṛmadhye 'tisatkṛtām / rāmaḥ paramadharmajño mātaraṃ vākyam abravīt // 2.034.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amba mā duḥkhitā bhūs tvaṃ paśya tvaṃ pitaraṃ mama / kṣayo hi vanavāsasya kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // 2.034.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suptāyās te gamiṣyanti navavarṣāṇi pañca ca / sā samagram iha prāptaṃ māṃ drakṣyasi suhṛdvṛtam // 2.034.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvad abhinītārtham uktvā sa jananīṃ vacaḥ / trayaḥ śataśatārdhā hi dadarśāvekṣya mātaraḥ // 2.034.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāś cāpi sa tathaivārtā mātṝr daśarathātmajaḥ / dharmayuktam idaṃ vākyaṃ nijagāda kṛtāñjaliḥ // 2.034.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃvāsāt paruṣaṃ kiṃ cid ajñānād vāpi yat kṛtam / tan me samanujānīta sarvāś cāmantrayāmi vaḥ // 2.034.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jajñe 'tha tāsāṃ saṃnādaḥ krauñcīnām iva niḥsvanaḥ / mānavendrasya bhāryāṇām evaṃ vadati rāghave // 2.034.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
murajapaṇavameghaghoṣavad; daśarathaveśma babhūva yat purā / vilapita paridevanākulaṃ; vyasanagataṃ tad abhūt suduḥkhitam // 2.034.036	aparavaktra (1,3: nnrlg, 2,4: njjr)
atha rāmaś ca sītā ca lakṣmaṇaś ca kṛtāñjaliḥ / upasaṃgṛhya rājānaṃ cakrur dīnāḥ pradakṣiṇam // 2.035.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ cāpi samanujñāpya dharmajñaḥ sītayā saha / rāghavaḥ śokasaṃmūḍho jananīm abhyavādayat // 2.035.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anvakṣaṃ lakṣmaṇo bhrātuḥ kausalyām abhyavādayat / atha mātuḥ sumitrāyā jagrāha caraṇau punaḥ // 2.035.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ vandamānaṃ rudatī mātā saumitrim abravīt / hitakāmā mahābāhuṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya lakṣmaṇam // 2.035.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sṛṣṭas tvaṃ vanavāsāya svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane / rāme pramādaṃ mā kārṣīḥ putra bhrātari gacchati // 2.035.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyasanī vā samṛddho vā gatir eṣa tavānagha / eṣa loke satāṃ dharmo yaj jyeṣṭhavaśago bhavet // 2.035.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ hi vṛttam ucitaṃ kulasyāsya sanātanam / dānaṃ dīkṣā ca yajñeṣu tanutyāgo mṛdheṣu ca // 2.035.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaṃ daśarathaṃ viddhi māṃ viddhi janakātmajām / ayodhyām aṭavīṃ viddhi gaccha tāta yathāsukham // 2.035.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sumantraḥ kākutsthaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt / vinīto vinayajñaś ca mātalir vāsavaṃ yathā // 2.035.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ratham āroha bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ / kṣipraṃ tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi yatra māṃ rāma vakṣyasi // 2.035.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyāni vane tvayā / tāny upakramitavyāni yāni devyāsi coditaḥ // 2.035.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ rathaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ sītā hṛṣṭena cetasā / āruroha varārohā kṛtvālaṃkāram ātmanaḥ // 2.035.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaivāyudhajātāni bhrātṛbhyāṃ kavacāni ca / rathopasthe pratinyasya sacarmakaṭhinaṃ ca tat // 2.035.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītātṛtīyān ārūḍhān dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭam acodayat / sumantraḥ saṃmatān aśvān vāyuvegasamāñ jave // 2.035.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prayāte tu mahāraṇyaṃ cirarātrāya rāghave / babhūva nagare mūrcchā balamūrcchā janasya ca // 2.035.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat samākulasaṃbhrāntaṃ mattasaṃkupita dvipam / hayaśiñjitanirghoṣaṃ puram āsīn mahāsvanam // 2.035.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sabālavṛddhā sā purī paramapīḍitā / rāmam evābhidudrāva gharmārtaḥ salilaṃ yathā // 2.035.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāpi lambamānās tadunmukhāḥ / bāṣpapūrṇamukhāḥ sarve tam ūcur bhṛśaduḥkhitāḥ // 2.035.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃyaccha vājināṃ raśmīn sūta yāhi śanaiḥ śanaiḥ / mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi rāmasya durdarśaṃ no bhaviṣyati // 2.035.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyasaṃ hṛdayaṃ nūnaṃ rāmamātur asaṃśayam / yad devagarbhapratime vanaṃ yāti na bhidyate // 2.035.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtakṛtyā hi vaidehī chāyevānugatā patim / na jahāti ratā dharme merum arkaprabhā yathā // 2.035.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho lakṣmaṇa siddhārthaḥ satatāṃ priyavādinam / bhrātaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ yas tvaṃ paricariṣyasi // 2.035.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahaty eṣā hi te siddhir eṣa cābhyudayo mahān / eṣa svargasya mārgaś ca yad enam anugacchasi // 2.035.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vadantas te soḍhuṃ na śekur bāṣpam āgatam // 2.035.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rājā vṛtaḥ strībhir dīnābhir dīnacetanaḥ / nirjagāma priyaṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmīti bruvan gṛhāt // 2.035.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuśruve cāgrataḥ strīṇāṃ rudantīnāṃ mahāsvanaḥ / yathā nādaḥ kareṇūnāṃ baddhe mahati kuñjare // 2.035.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitā ca rājā kākutsthaḥ śrīmān sannas tadā babhau / paripūrṇaḥ śaśī kāle graheṇopapluto yathā // 2.035.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato halahalāśabdo jajñe rāmasya pṛṣṭhataḥ / narāṇāṃ prekṣya rājānaṃ sīdantaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitam // 2.035.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hā rāmeti janāḥ ke cid rāmamāteti cāpare / antaḥpuraṃ samṛddhaṃ ca krośantaṃ paryadevayan // 2.035.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anvīkṣamāṇo rāmas tu viṣaṇṇaṃ bhrāntacetasaṃ / rājānaṃ mātaraṃ caiva dadarśānugatau pathi // 2.035.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmapāśena saṃkṣiptaḥ prakāśaṃ nābhyudaikṣata // 2.035.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padātinau ca yānārhāv aduḥkhārhau sukhocitau / dṛṣṭvā saṃcodayām āsa śīghraṃ yāhīti sārathim // 2.035.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi tat puruṣavyāghro duḥkhadaṃ darśanaṃ pituḥ / mātuś ca sahituṃ śaktas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ // 2.035.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā rudantīṃ kausalyāṃ rathaṃ tam anudhāvatīm / krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca // 2.035.032.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asakṛt praikṣata tadā nṛtyantīm iva mātaram // 2.035.032.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiṣṭheti rājā cukroṣa yāhi yāhīti rāghavaḥ / sumantrasya babhūvātmā cakrayor iva cāntarā // 2.035.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāśrauṣam iti rājānam upālabdho 'pi vakṣyasi / ciraṃ duḥkhasya pāpiṣṭham iti rāmas tam abravīt // 2.035.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya sa vacaḥ kurvann anujñāpya ca taṃ janam / vrajato 'pi hayāñ śīghraṃ codayām āsa sārathiḥ // 2.035.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nyavartata jano rājño rāmaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam / manasāpy aśruvegaiś ca na nyavartata mānuṣam // 2.035.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yam icchet punar āyāntaṃ nainaṃ dūram anuvrajet / ity amātyā mahārājam ūcur daśarathaṃ vacaḥ // 2.035.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ vacaḥ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ; prasvinnagātraḥ praviṣaṇṇarūpaḥ / niśamya rājā kṛpaṇaḥ sabhāryo; vyavasthitas taṃ sutam īkṣamāṇaḥ // 2.035.038	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tasmiṃs tu puruṣavyāghre niṣkrāmati kṛtāñjalau / ārtaśabdo hi saṃjajñe strīṇām antaḥpure mahān // 2.036.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anāthasya janasyāsya durbalasya tapasvinaḥ / yo gatiṃ śaraṇaṃ cāsīt sa nāthaḥ kva nu gacchati // 2.036.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na krudhyaty abhiśasto 'pi krodhanīyāni varjayan / kruddhān prasādayan sarvān samaduḥkhaḥ kva gacchati // 2.036.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyāyāṃ mahātejā yathā mātari vartate / tathā yo vartate 'smāsu mahātmā kva nu gacchati // 2.036.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyyā kliśyamānena rājñā saṃcodito vanam / paritrātā janasyāsya jagataḥ kva nu gacchati // 2.036.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho niścetano rājā jīvalokasya saṃpriyam / dharmyaṃ satyavrataṃ rāmaṃ vanavāso pravatsyati // 2.036.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti sarvā mahiṣyas tā vivatsā iva dhenavaḥ / ruruduś caiva duḥkhārtāḥ sasvaraṃ ca vicukruśuḥ // 2.036.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tam antaḥpure ghoram ārtaśabdaṃ mahīpatiḥ / putraśokābhisaṃtaptaḥ śrutvā cāsīt suduḥkhitaḥ // 2.036.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāgnihotrāṇy ahūyanta sūryaś cāntaradhīyata / vyasṛjan kavalān nāgā gāvo vatsān na pāyayan // 2.036.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triśaṅkur lohitāṅgaś ca bṛhaspatibudhāv api / dāruṇāḥ somam abhyetya grahāḥ sarve vyavasthitāḥ // 2.036.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nakṣatrāṇi gatārcīṃṣi grahāś ca gatatejasaḥ / viśākhāś ca sadhūmāś ca nabhasi pracakāśire // 2.036.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akasmān nāgaraḥ sarvo jano dainyam upāgamat / āhāre vā vihāre vā na kaś cid akaron manaḥ // 2.036.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṣpaparyākulamukho rājamārgagato janaḥ / na hṛṣṭo lakṣyate kaś cit sarvaḥ śokaparāyaṇaḥ // 2.036.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na vāti pavanaḥ śīto na śaśī saumyadarśanaḥ / na sūryas tapate lokaṃ sarvaṃ paryākulaṃ jagat // 2.036.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anarthinaḥ sutāḥ strīṇāṃ bhartāro bhrātaras tathā / sarve sarvaṃ parityajya rāmam evānvacintayan // 2.036.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tu rāmasya suhṛdaḥ sarve te mūḍhacetasaḥ / śokabhāreṇa cākrāntāḥ śayanaṃ na juhus tadā // 2.036.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tv ayodhyā rahitā mahātmanā; puraṃdareṇeva mahī saparvatā / cacāla ghoraṃ bhayabhārapīḍitā; sanāgayodhāśvagaṇā nanāda ca // 2.036.017	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
yāvat tu niryatas tasya rajorūpam adṛśyata / naivekṣvākuvaras tāvat saṃjahārātmacakṣuṣī // 2.037.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvad rājā priyaṃ putraṃ paśyaty atyantadhārmikam / tāvad vyavardhatevāsya dharaṇyāṃ putradarśane // 2.037.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na paśyati rajo 'py asya yadā rāmasya bhūmipaḥ / tadārtaś ca viṣaṇṇaś ca papāta dharaṇītale // 2.037.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya dakṣiṇam anvagāt kausalyā bāhum aṅganā / vāmaṃ cāsyānvagāt pārśvaṃ kaikeyī bharatapriyā // 2.037.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ nayena ca saṃpanno dharmeṇa nivayena ca / uvāca rājā kaikeyīṃ samīkṣya vyathitendriyaḥ // 2.037.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyi mā mamāṅgāni sprākṣīs tvaṃ duṣṭacāriṇī / na hi tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi na bhāryā na ca bāndhavī // 2.037.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye ca tvām upajīvanti nāhaṃ teṣāṃ na te mama / kevalārthaparāṃ hi tvāṃ tyaktadharmāṃ tyajāmy aham // 2.037.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agṛhṇāṃ yac ca te pāṇim agniṃ paryaṇayaṃ ca yat / anujānāmi tat sarvam asmiṃl loke paratra ca // 2.037.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataś cet pratītaḥ syād rājyaṃ prāpyedam avyayam / yan me sa dadyāt pitrarthaṃ mā mā tad dattam āgamat // 2.037.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha reṇusamudhvastaṃ tam utthāpya narādhipam / nyavartata tadā devī kausalyā śokakarśitā // 2.037.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatveva brāhmaṇaṃ kāmāt spṛṣṭvāgnim iva pāṇinā / anvatapyata dharmātmā putraṃ saṃcintya tāpasaṃ // 2.037.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivṛtyaiva nivṛtyaiva sīdato rathavartmasu / rājño nātibabhau rūpaṃ grastasyāṃśumato yathā // 2.037.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vilalāpa ca duḥkhārtaḥ priyaṃ putram anusmaran / nagarāntam anuprāptaṃ buddhvā putram athābravīt // 2.037.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāhanānāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vahatāṃ taṃ mamātmajam / padāni pathi dṛśyante sa mahātmā na dṛśyate // 2.037.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nūnaṃ kva cid evādya vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ / kāṣṭhaṃ vā yadi vāśmānam upadhāya śayiṣyate // 2.037.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utthāsyati ca medinyāḥ kṛpaṇaḥ pāṃśuguṇṭhitaḥ / viniḥśvasan prasravaṇāt kareṇūnām ivarṣabhaḥ // 2.037.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
drakṣyanti nūnaṃ puruṣā dīrghabāhuṃ vanecarāḥ / rāmam utthāya gacchantaṃ lokanātham anāthavat // 2.037.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakāmā bhava kaikeyi vidhavā rājyam āvasa / na hi taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ vinā jīvitum utsahe // 2.037.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ vilapan rājā janaughenābhisaṃvṛtaḥ / apasnāta ivāriṣṭaṃ praviveśa purottamam // 2.037.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūnyacatvaraveśmāntāṃ saṃvṛtāpaṇadevatām / klāntadurbaladuḥkhārtāṃ nātyākīrṇamahāpathām // 2.037.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām avekṣya purīṃ sarvāṃ rāmam evānucintayan / vilapan prāviśad rājā gṛhaṃ sūrya ivāmbudam // 2.037.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāhradam ivākṣobhyaṃ suparṇena hṛtoragam / rāmeṇa rahitaṃ veśma vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // 2.037.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyāyā gṛhaṃ śīghraṃ rāma mātur nayantu mām / iti bruvantaṃ rājānam anayan dvāradarśitaḥ // 2.037.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tatra praviṣṭasya kausalyāyā niveśanam / adhiruhyāpi śayanaṃ babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // 2.037.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac ca dṛṣṭvā mahārājo bhujam udyamya vīryavān / uccaiḥ svareṇa cukrośa hā rāghava jahāsi mām // 2.037.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukhitā bata taṃ kālaṃ jīviṣyanti narottamāḥ / pariṣvajanto ye rāmaṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // 2.037.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tvāṃ paśyāmi kausalye sādhu māṃ pāṇinā spṛśa / rāmaṃ me 'nugatā dṛṣṭir adyāpi na nivartate // 2.037.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ rāmam evānuvicintayantaṃ; samīkṣya devī śayane narendram / upopaviśyādhikam ārtarūpā; viniḥśvasantī vilalāpa kṛcchraṃ // 2.037.028	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ samīkṣya śayane sannaṃ śokena pārthivam / kausalyā putraśokārtā tam uvāca mahīpatim // 2.038.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavo naraśārdūla viṣam uptvā dvijihvavat / vicariṣyati kaikeyī nirmukteva hi pannagī // 2.038.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivāsya rāmaṃ subhagā labdhakāmā samāhitā / trāsayiṣyati māṃ bhūyo duṣṭāhir iva veśmani // 2.038.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha sma nagare rāmaś caran bhaikṣaṃ gṛhe vaset / kāmakāro varaṃ dātum api dāsaṃ mamātmajam // 2.038.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pātayitvā tu kaikeyyā rāmaṃ sthānād yatheṣṭataḥ / pradiṣṭo rakṣasāṃ bhāgaḥ parvaṇīvāhitāgninā // 2.038.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajarājagatir vīro mahābāhur dhanurdharaḥ / vanam āviśate nūnaṃ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // 2.038.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vane tv adṛṣṭaduḥkhānāṃ kaikeyyānumate tvayā / tyaktānāṃ vanavāsāya kā nv avasthā bhaviṣyati // 2.038.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te ratnahīnās taruṇāḥ phalakāle vivāsitāḥ / kathaṃ vatsyanti kṛpaṇāḥ phalamūlaiḥ kṛtāśanāḥ // 2.038.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apīdānīṃ sa kālaḥ syān mama śokakṣayaḥ śivaḥ / sabhāryaṃ yat saha bhrātrā paśyeyam iha rāghavam // 2.038.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvaivopasthitau vīrau kadāyodhyā bhaviṣyati / yaśasvinī hṛṣṭajanā sūcchritadhvajamālinī // 2.038.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadā prekṣya naravyāghrāv araṇyāt punarāgatau / nandiṣyati purī hṛṣṭā samudra iva parvaṇi // 2.038.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadāyodhyāṃ mahābāhuḥ purīṃ vīraḥ pravekṣyati / puraskṛtya rathe sītāṃ vṛṣabho govadhūm iva // 2.038.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadā prāṇisahasrāṇi rājamārge mamātmajau / lājair avakariṣyanti praviśantāv ariṃdamau // 2.038.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadā sumanasaḥ kanyā dvijātīnāṃ phalāni ca / pradiśantyaḥ purīṃ hṛṣṭāḥ kariṣyanti pradakṣiṇam // 2.038.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadā pariṇato buddhyā vayasā cāmaraprabhaḥ / abhyupaiṣyati dharmajñas trivarṣa iva māṃ lalan // 2.038.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niḥsaṃśayaṃ mayā manye purā vīra kadaryayā / pātu kāmeṣu vatseṣu mātṝṇāṃ śātitāḥ stanāḥ // 2.038.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāhaṃ gaur iva siṃhena vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā / kaikeyyā puruṣavyāghra bālavatseva gaur balāt // 2.038.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi tāvad guṇair juṣṭaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam / ekaputrā vinā putram ahaṃ jīvitum utsahe // 2.038.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi me jīvite kiṃ cit sāmartham iha kalpyate / apaśyantyāḥ priyaṃ putraṃ mahābāhuṃ mahābalam // 2.038.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ hi māṃ dīpayate samutthitas; tanūjaśokaprabhavo hutāśanaḥ / mahīm imāṃ raśmibhir uttamaprabho; yathā nidāghe bhagavān divākaraḥ // 2.038.020	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
vilapantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu kausalyāṃ pramadottamām / idaṃ dharme sthitā dharmyaṃ sumitrā vākyam abravīt // 2.039.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavārye sadguṇair yuktaḥ putraḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ / kiṃ te vilapitenaivaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ruditena vā // 2.039.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tavārye gataḥ putras tyaktvā rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ / sādhu kurvan mahātmānaṃ pitaraṃ satyavādinām // 2.039.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śiṣṭair ācarite samyak śaśvat pretya phalodaye / rāmo dharme sthitaḥ śreṣṭho na sa śocyaḥ kadā cana // 2.039.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vartate cottamāṃ vṛttiṃ lakṣmaṇo 'smin sadānaghaḥ / dayāvān sarvabhūteṣu lābhas tasya mahātmanaḥ // 2.039.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
araṇyavāse yad duḥkhaṃ jānatī vai sukhocitā / anugacchati vaidehī dharmātmānaṃ tavātmajam // 2.039.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kīrtibhūtāṃ patākāṃ yo loke bhrāmayati prabhuḥ / damasatyavrataparaḥ kiṃ na prāptas tavātmajaḥ // 2.039.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyaktaṃ rāmasya vijñāya śaucaṃ māhātmyam uttamam / na gātram aṃśubhiḥ sūryaḥ saṃtāpayitum arhati // 2.039.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śivaḥ sarveṣu kāleṣu kānanebhyo viniḥsṛtaḥ / rāghavaṃ yuktaśītoṣṇaḥ seviṣyati sukho 'nilaḥ // 2.039.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śayānam anaghaṃ rātrau pitevābhipariṣvajan / raśmibhiḥ saṃspṛśañ śītaiś candramā hlādayiṣyati // 2.039.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadau cāstrāṇi divyāni yasmai brahmā mahaujase / dānavendraṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā timidhvajasutaṃ raṇe // 2.039.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛthivyā saha vaidehyā śriyā ca puruṣarṣabhaḥ / kṣipraṃ tisṛbhir etābhiḥ saha rāmo 'bhiṣekṣyate // 2.039.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duḥkhajaṃ visṛjanty asraṃ niṣkrāmantam udīkṣya yam / samutsrakṣyasi netrābhyāṃ kṣipram ānandajaṃ payaḥ // 2.039.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādayamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sasuhṛdaṃ sutam / mudāśru mokṣyase kṣipraṃ meghalekeva vārṣikī // 2.039.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putras te varadaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ punar āgataḥ / karābhyāṃ mṛdupīnābhyāṃ caraṇau pīḍayiṣyati // 2.039.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśamya tal lakṣmaṇamātṛvākyaṃ; rāmasya mātur naradevapatnyāḥ / sadyaḥ śarīre vinanāśa śokaḥ; śaradgato megha ivālpatoyaḥ // 2.039.016	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
anuraktā mahātmānaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparakramam / anujagmuḥ prayāntaṃ taṃ vanavāsāya mānavāḥ // 2.040.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivartite 'pi ca balāt suhṛdvarge ca rājini / naiva te saṃnyavartanta rāmasyānugatā ratham // 2.040.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyānilayānāṃ hi puruṣāṇāṃ mahāyaśāḥ / babhūva guṇasaṃpannaḥ pūrṇacandra iva priyaḥ // 2.040.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa yācyamānaḥ kākutsthaḥ svābhiḥ prakṛtibhis tadā / kurvāṇaḥ pitaraṃ satyaṃ vanam evānvapadyata // 2.040.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avekṣamāṇaḥ sasnehaṃ cakṣuṣā prapibann iva / uvāca rāmaḥ snehena tāḥ prajāḥ svāḥ prajā iva // 2.040.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā prītir bahumānaś ca mayy ayodhyānivāsinām / matpriyārthaṃ viśeṣeṇa bharate sā niveśyatām // 2.040.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi kalyāṇa cāritraḥ kaikeyyānandavardhanaḥ / kariṣyati yathāvad vaḥ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // 2.040.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jñānavṛddho vayobālo mṛdur vīryaguṇānvitaḥ / anurūpaḥ sa vo bhartā bhaviṣyati bhayāpahaḥ // 2.040.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi rājaguṇair yukto yuvarājaḥ samīkṣitaḥ / api cāpi mayā śiṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ vo bhartṛśāsanam // 2.040.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca tapyed yathā cāsau vanavāsaṃ gate mayi / mahārājas tathā kāryo mama priyacikīrṣayā // 2.040.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā yathā dāśarathir dharmam evāsthito 'bhavat / tathā tathā prakṛtayo rāmaṃ patim akāmayan // 2.040.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṣpeṇa pihitaṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha / cakarṣeva guṇair baddhvā janaṃ punar ivāsanam // 2.040.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te dvijās trividhaṃ vṛddhā jñānena vayasaujasā / vayaḥprakampaśiraso dūrād ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ // 2.040.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vahanto javanā rāmaṃ bho bho jātyās turaṃgamāḥ / nivartadhvaṃ na gantavyaṃ hitā bhavata bhartari // 2.040.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upavāhyas tu vo bhartā nāpavāhyaḥ purād vanam // 2.040.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ārtapralāpāṃs tān vṛddhān pralapato dvijān / avekṣya sahasā rāmo rathād avatatāra ha // 2.040.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padbhyām eva jagāmātha sasītaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / saṃnikṛṣṭapadanyāso rāmo vanaparāyaṇaḥ // 2.040.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvijātīṃs tu padātīṃs tān rāmaś cāritravatsalaḥ / na śaśāka ghṛṇācakṣuḥ parimoktuṃ rathena saḥ // 2.040.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gacchantam eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ saṃbhrāntamānasāḥ / ūcuḥ paramasaṃtaptā rāmaṃ vākyam idaṃ dvijāḥ // 2.040.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇyaṃ kṛtsnam etat tvāṃ brahmaṇyam anugacchati / dvijaskandhādhirūḍhās tvām agnayo 'py anuyānty amī // 2.040.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vājapeyasamutthāni chatrāṇy etāni paśya naḥ / pṛṣṭhato 'nuprayātāni haṃsān iva jalātyaye // 2.040.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anavāptātapatrasya raśmisaṃtāpitasya te / ebhiś chāyāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ svaiś chatrair vājapeyikaiḥ // 2.040.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā hi naḥ satataṃ buddhir vedamantrānusāriṇī / tvatkṛte sā kṛtā vatsa vanavāsānusāriṇī // 2.040.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛdayeṣv avatiṣṭhante vedā ye naḥ paraṃ dhanam / vatsyanty api gṛheṣv eva dārāś cāritrarakṣitāḥ // 2.040.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na punar niścayaḥ kāryas tvadgatau sukṛtā matiḥ / tvayi dharmavyapekṣe tu kiṃ syād dharmam avekṣitum // 2.040.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yācito no nivartasva haṃsaśuklaśiroruhaiḥ / śirobhir nibhṛtācāra mahīpatanapāṃśulaiḥ // 2.040.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahūnāṃ vitatā yajñā dvijānāṃ ya ihāgatāḥ / teṣāṃ samāptir āyattā tava vatsa nivartane // 2.040.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaktimanti hi bhūtāni jaṃgamājaṃgamāni ca / yācamāneṣu teṣu tvaṃ bhaktiṃ bhakteṣu darśaya // 2.040.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anugaṃtum aśaktās tvāṃ mūlair uddhṛtavegibhiḥ / unnatā vāyuvegena vikrośantīva pādapāḥ // 2.040.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśceṣṭāhārasaṃcārā vṛkṣaikasthānaviṣṭhitāḥ / pakṣiṇo 'pi prayācante sarvabhūtānukampinam // 2.040.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vikrośatāṃ teṣāṃ dvijātīnāṃ nivartane / dadṛśe tamasā tatra vārayantīva rāghavam // 2.040.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu tamasā tīraṃ ramyam āśritya rāghavaḥ / sītām udvīkṣya saumitrim idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.041.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyam adya niśā pūrvā saumitre prasthitā vanam / vanavāsasya bhadraṃ te sa notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // 2.041.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya śūnyāny araṇyāni rudantīva samantataḥ / yathānilayam āyadbhir nilīnāni mṛgadvijaiḥ // 2.041.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyāyodhyā tu nagarī rājadhānī pitur mama / sastrīpuṃsā gatān asmāñ śociṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // 2.041.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataḥ khalu dharmātmā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca me / dharmārthakāmasahitair vākyair āśvāsayiṣyati // 2.041.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasyānṛśaṃsatvaṃ saṃcintyāhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ / nānuśocāmi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa // 2.041.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā kāryaṃ naravyāghra mām anuvrajatā kṛtam / anveṣṭavyā hi vaidehyā rakṣaṇārthe sahāyatā // 2.041.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adbhir eva tu saumitre vatsyāmy adya niśām imām / etad dhi rocate mahyaṃ vanye 'pi vividhe sati // 2.041.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu saumitraṃ sumantram api rāghavaḥ / apramattas tvam aśveṣu bhava saumyety uvāca ha // 2.041.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'śvān sumantraḥ saṃyamya sūrye 'staṃ samupāgate / prabhūtayavasān kṛtvā babhūva pratyanantaraḥ // 2.041.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāsyatu śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rātrim upasthitām / rāmasya śayanaṃ cakre sūtaḥ saumitriṇā saha // 2.041.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ śayyāṃ tamasātīre vīkṣya vṛkṣadalaiḥ kṛtām / rāmaḥ saumitriṇāṃ sārdhaṃ sabhāryaḥ saṃviveśa ha // 2.041.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sabhāryaṃ saṃprasuptaṃ taṃ bhrātaraṃ vīkṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ / kathayām āsa sūtāya rāmasya vividhān guṇān // 2.041.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāgrato hy eva tāṃ rātriṃ saumitrer udito raviḥ / sūtasya tamasātīre rāmasya bruvato guṇān // 2.041.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gokulākulatīrāyās tamasāyā vidūrataḥ / avasat tatra tāṃ rātriṃ rāmaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ saha // 2.041.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utthāya tu mahātejāḥ prakṛtīs tā niśāmya ca / abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ puṇyalakṣaṇam // 2.041.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmadvyapekṣān saumitre nirapekṣān gṛheṣv api / vṛkṣamūleṣu saṃsuptān paśya lakṣmaṇa sāmpratam // 2.041.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathaite niyamaṃ paurāḥ kurvanty asmannivartane / api prāṇān asiṣyanti na tu tyakṣyanti niścayam // 2.041.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvad eva tu saṃsuptās tāvad eva vayaṃ laghu / ratham āruhya gacchāmaḥ panthānam akutobhayam // 2.041.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
