ato bhūyo 'pi nedānīm ikṣvākupuravāsinaḥ / svapeyur anuraktā māṃ vṛkṣamūlāni saṃśritāḥ // 2.041.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paurā hy ātmakṛtād duḥkhād vipramocyā nṛpātmajaiḥ / na tu khalv ātmanā yojyā duḥkhena puravāsinaḥ // 2.041.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīl lakṣmaṇo rāmaṃ sākṣād dharmam iva sthitam / rocate me mahāprājña kṣipram āruhyatām iti // 2.041.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūtas tataḥ saṃtvaritaḥ syandanaṃ tair hayottamaiḥ / yojayitvātha rāmāya prāñjaliḥ pratyavedayat // 2.041.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mohanārthaṃ tu paurāṇāṃ sūtaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ / udaṅmukhaḥ prayāhi tvaṃ ratham āsthāya sārathe // 2.041.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muhūrtaṃ tvaritaṃ gatvā nirgataya rathaṃ punaḥ / yathā na vidyuḥ paurā māṃ tathā kuru samāhitaḥ // 2.041.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tathā cakre sa sārathiḥ / pratyāgamya ca rāmasya syandanaṃ pratyavedayat // 2.041.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ syandanam adhiṣṭhāya rāghavaḥ saparicchadaḥ / śīghragām ākulāvartāṃ tamasām ataran nadīm // 2.041.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa saṃtīrya mahābāhuḥ śrīmāñ śivam akaṇṭakam / prāpadyata mahāmārgam abhayaṃ bhayadarśinām // 2.041.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ paurās te rāghavo vinā / śokopahataniśceṣṭā babhūvur hatacetasaḥ // 2.041.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śokajāśruparidyūnā vīkṣamāṇās tatas tataḥ / ālokam api rāmasya na paśyanti sma duḥkhitāḥ // 2.041.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mārgānusāreṇa gatvā kiṃ cit kṣaṇaṃ punaḥ / mārganāśād viṣādena mahatā samabhiplutaḥ // 2.041.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathasya mārganāśena nyavartanta manasvinaḥ / kim idaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmo daivenopahatā iti // 2.041.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yathāgatenaiva mārgeṇa klāntacetasaḥ / ayodhyām agaman sarve purīṃ vyathitasajjanām // 2.041.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anugamya nivṛttānāṃ rāmaṃ nagaravāsinām / udgatānīva sattvāni babhūvur amanasvinām // 2.042.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svaṃ svaṃ nilayam āgamya putradāraiḥ samāvṛtāḥ / aśrūṇi mumucuḥ sarve bāṣpeṇa pihitānanāḥ // 2.042.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāhṛṣyan na cāmodan vaṇijo na prasārayan / na cāśobhanta paṇyāni nāpacan gṛhamedhinaḥ // 2.042.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā nābhyanandan vipulaṃ vā dhanāgamam / putraṃ prathamajaṃ labdhvā jananī nābhyanandata // 2.042.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhe gṛhe rudantyaś ca bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam / vyagarhayanto duḥkhārtā vāgbhis totrair iva dvipān // 2.042.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu teṣāṃ gṛhaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ dāraiḥ kiṃ dhanena vā / putrair vā kiṃ sukhair vāpi ye na paśyanti rāghavam // 2.042.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekaḥ satpuruṣo loke lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā / yo 'nugacchati kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ paricaran vane // 2.042.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpagāḥ kṛtapuṇyās tāḥ padminyaś ca sarāṃsi ca / yeṣu snāsyati kākutstho vigāhya salilaṃ śuci // 2.042.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śobhayiṣyanti kākutstham aṭavyo ramyakānanāḥ / āpagāś ca mahānūpāḥ sānumantaś ca parvatāḥ // 2.042.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kānanaṃ vāpi śailaṃ vā yaṃ rāmo 'bhigamiṣyati / priyātithim iva prāptaṃ nainaṃ śakṣyanty anarcitum // 2.042.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicitrakusumāpīḍā bahumañjaridhāriṇaḥ / akāle cāpi mukhyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca // 2.042.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśayiṣyanty anukrośād girayo rāmam āgatam // 2.042.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidarśayanto vividhān bhūyaś citrāṃś ca nirjharān / pādapāḥ parvatāgreṣu ramayiṣyanti rāghavam // 2.042.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatra rāmo bhayaṃ nātra nāsti tatra parābhavaḥ / sa hi śūro mahābāhuḥ putro daśarathasya ca // 2.042.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā bhavati no dūrād anugacchāma rāghavam / pādacchāyā sukhā bhartus tādṛśasya mahātmanaḥ // 2.042.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi nātho janasyāsya sa gatiḥ sa parāyaṇam // 2.042.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vayaṃ paricariṣyāmaḥ sītāṃ yūyaṃ tu rāghavam / iti paurastriyo bhartṝn duḥkhārtās tat tad abruvan // 2.042.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuṣmākaṃ rāghavo 'raṇye yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyati / sītā nārījanasyāsya yogakṣemaṃ kariṣyati // 2.042.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko nv anenāpratītena sotkaṇṭhitajanena ca / saṃprīyetāmanojñena vāsena hṛtacetasā // 2.042.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyyā yadi ced rājyaṃ syād adharmyam anāthavat / na hi no jīvitenārthaḥ kutaḥ putraiḥ kuto dhanaiḥ // 2.042.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yayā putraś ca bhartā ca tyaktāv aiśvaryakāraṇāt / kaṃ sā parihared anyaṃ kaikeyī kulapāṃsanī // 2.042.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyyā na vayaṃ rājye bhṛtakā nivasemahi / jīvantyā jātu jīvantyaḥ putrair api śapāmahe // 2.042.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā putraṃ pārthivendrasya pravāsayati nirghṛṇā / kas tāṃ prāpya sukhaṃ jīved adharmyāṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm // 2.042.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi pravrajite rāme jīviṣyati mahīpatiḥ / mṛte daśarathe vyaktaṃ vilopas tadanantaram // 2.042.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te viṣaṃ pibatāloḍya kṣīṇapuṇyāḥ sudurgatāḥ / rāghavaṃ vānugacchadhvam aśrutiṃ vāpi gacchata // 2.042.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mithyā pravrājito rāmaḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / bharate saṃniṣṛṣṭāḥ smaḥ saunike paśavo yathā // 2.042.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tās tathā vilapantyas tu nagare nāgarastriyaḥ / cukruśur bhṛśasaṃtaptā mṛtyor iva bhayāgame // 2.042.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā striyo rāmanimittam āturā; yathā sute bhrātari vā vivāsite / vilapya dīnā rurudur vicetasaḥ; sutair hi tāsām adhiko hi so 'bhavat // 2.042.026	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
rāmo 'pi rātriśeṣeṇa tenaiva mahad antaram / jagāma puruṣavyāghraḥ pitur ājñām anusmaran // 2.043.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaiva gacchatas tasya vyapāyād rajanī śivā / upāsya sa śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ viṣayāntaṃ vyagāhata // 2.043.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
grāmān vikṛṣṭasīmāṃs tān puṣpitāni vanāni ca / paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ śarair iva hayottamaiḥ // 2.043.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṇvan vāco manuṣyāṇāṃ grāmasaṃvāsavāsinām / rājānaṃ dhig daśarathaṃ kāmasya vaśam āgatam // 2.043.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hā nṛśaṃsādya kaikeyī pāpā pāpānubandhinī / tīkṣṇā saṃbhinnamaryādā tīkṣṇe karmaṇi vartate // 2.043.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā putram īdṛśaṃ rājñaḥ pravāsayati dhārmikam / vana vāse mahāprājñaṃ sānukrośam atandritam // 2.043.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etā vāco manuṣyāṇāṃ grāmasaṃvāsavāsinām / śṛṇvann atiyayau vīraḥ kosalān kosaleśvaraḥ // 2.043.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vedaśrutiṃ nāma śivavārivahāṃ nadīm / uttīryābhimukhaḥ prāyād agastyādhyuṣitāṃ diśam // 2.043.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatvā tu suciraṃ kālaṃ tataḥ śītajalāṃ nadīm / gomatīṃ goyutānūpām atarat sāgaraṃgamām // 2.043.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gomatīṃ cāpy atikramya rāghavaḥ śīghragair hayaiḥ / mayūrahaṃsābhirutāṃ tatāra syandikāṃ nadīm // 2.043.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mahīṃ manunā rājñā dattām ikṣvākave purā / sphītāṃ rāṣṭrāvṛtāṃ rāmo vaidehīm anvadarśayat // 2.043.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūta ity eva cābhāṣya sārathiṃ tam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ / haṃsamattasvaraḥ śrīmān uvāca puruṣarṣabhaḥ // 2.043.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadāhaṃ punar āgamya sarayvāḥ puṣpite vane / mṛgayāṃ paryāṭaṣyāmi mātrā pitrā ca saṃgataḥ // 2.043.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātyartham abhikāṅkṣāmi mṛgayāṃ sarayūvane / ratir hy eṣātulā loke rājarṣigaṇasaṃmatā // 2.043.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tam adhvānam aikṣvākaḥ sūtaṃ madhurayā girā / taṃ tam artham abhipretya yayauvākyam udīrayan // 2.043.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśālān kosalān ramyān yātvā lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ / āsasāda mahābāhuḥ śṛṅgaverapuraṃ prati // 2.044.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra tripathagāṃ divyāṃ śivatoyām aśaivalām / dadarśa rāghavo gaṅgāṃ puṇyām ṛṣinisevitām // 2.044.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haṃsasārasasaṃghuṣṭāṃ cakravākopakūjitām / śiṃśumaraiś ca nakraiś ca bhujaṃgaiś ca niṣevitām // 2.044.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām ūrmikalilāvartām anvavekṣya mahārathaḥ / sumantram abravīt sūtam ihaivādya vasāmahe // 2.044.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avidūrād ayaṃ nadyā bahupuṣpapravālavān / sumahān iṅgudīvṛkṣo vasāmo 'traiva sārathe // 2.044.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣaṇaś ca sumantraś ca bāḍham ity eva rāghavam / uktvā tam iṅgudīvṛkṣaṃ tadopayayatur hayaiḥ // 2.044.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo 'bhiyāya taṃ ramyaṃ vṛkṣam ikṣvākunandanaḥ / rathād avātarat tasmāt sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // 2.044.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantro 'py avatīryaiva mocayitvā hayottamān / vṛkṣamūlagataṃ rāmam upatasthe kṛtāñjaliḥ // 2.044.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra rājā guho nāma rāmasyātmasamaḥ sakhā / niṣādajātyo balavān sthapatiś ceti viśrutaḥ // 2.044.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śrutvā puruṣavyāghraṃ rāmaṃ viṣayam āgatam / vṛddhaiḥ parivṛto 'mātyair jñātibhiś cāpy upāgataḥ // 2.044.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato niṣādādhipatiṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrād avasthitam / saha saumitriṇā rāmaḥ samāgacchad guhena saḥ // 2.044.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ārtaḥ saṃpariṣvajya guho rāghavam abravīt / yathāyodhyā tathedaṃ te rāma kiṃ karavāṇi te // 2.044.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato guṇavadannādyam upādāya pṛthagvidham / arghyaṃ copānayat kṣipraṃ vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // 2.044.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svāgataṃ te mahābāho taveyam akhilā mahī / vayaṃ preṣyā bhavān bhartā sādhu rājyaṃ praśādhi naḥ // 2.044.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca lehyaṃ cedam upasthitam / śayanāni ca mukhyāni vājināṃ khādanaṃ ca te // 2.044.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guham eva bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha / arcitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhavatā sarvathā vayam // 2.044.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padbhyām abhigamāc caiva snehasaṃdarśanena ca / bhujābhyāṃ sādhuvṛttābhyāṃ pīḍayan vākyam abravīt // 2.044.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā tvāṃ guha paśyāmi arogaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ / api te kūśalaṃ rāṣṭre mitreṣu ca dhaneṣu ca // 2.044.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tv idaṃ bhavatā kiṃ cit prītyā samupakalpitam / sarvaṃ tad anujānāmi na hi varte pratigrahe // 2.044.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśacīrājinadharaṃ phalamūlāśanaṃ ca mām / viddhi praṇihitaṃ dharme tāpasaṃ vanagocaram // 2.044.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśvānāṃ khādanenāham arthī nānyena kena cit / etāvatātrabhavatā bhaviṣyāmi supūjitaḥ // 2.044.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete hi dayitā rājñaḥ pitur daśarathasya me / etaiḥ suvihitair aśvair bhaviṣyāmy aham arcitaḥ // 2.044.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśvānāṃ pratipānaṃ ca khādanaṃ caiva so 'nvaśāt / guhas tatraiva puruṣāṃs tvaritaṃ dīyatām iti // 2.044.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataś cīrottarāsaṅgaḥ saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām / jalam evādade bhojyaṃ lakṣmaṇenāhṛtaṃ svayam // 2.044.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya bhūmau śayānasya pādau prakṣālya lakṣmaṇaḥ / sabhāryasya tato 'bhyetya tasthau vṛkṣam upāśritaḥ // 2.044.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guho 'pi saha sūtena saumitrim anubhāṣayan / anvajāgrat tato rāmam apramatto dhanurdharaḥ // 2.044.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā śayānasya tato 'sya dhīmato; yaśasvino dāśarather mahātmanaḥ / adṛṣṭaduḥkhasya sukhocitasya sā; tadā vyatīyāya cireṇa śarvarī // 2.044.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
taṃ jāgratam adambhena bhrātur arthāya lakṣmaṇam / guhaḥ saṃtāpasaṃtapto rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt // 2.045.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā / pratyāśvasihi sādhv asyāṃ rājaputra yathāsukham // 2.045.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ kleśānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ / guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmaḥ kākutsthasya vayaṃ niśām // 2.045.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaś cana / bravīmy etad ahaṃ satyaṃ satyenaiva ca te śape // 2.045.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ / dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // 2.045.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā / rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvato jñātibhiḥ saha // 2.045.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃ cid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā / caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ sumahat prasahemahi // 2.045.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇas taṃ tadovāca rakṣyamāṇās tvayānagha / nātra bhītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā // 2.045.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā / śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // 2.045.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi / taṃ paśya sukhasaṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // 2.045.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo mantra tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ / eko daśarathasyaiṣa putraḥ sadṛśalakṣaṇaḥ // 2.045.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin pravrajito rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati / vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // 2.045.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinadya sumahānādaṃ śrameṇoparatāḥ striyaḥ / nirghoṣoparataṃ tāta manye rājaniveśanam // 2.045.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama / nāśaṃse yadi jīvanti sarve te śarvarīm imām // 2.045.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā / tad duḥkhaṃ yat tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // 2.045.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anuraktajanākīrṇā sukhālokapriyāvahā / rājavyasanasaṃsṛṣṭā sā purī vinaśiṣyati // 2.045.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atikrāntam atikrāntam anavāpya manoratham / rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // 2.045.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite / pretakāryeṣu sarveṣu saṃskariṣyanti bhūmipam // 2.045.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ramyacatvarasaṃsthānāṃ suvibhaktamahāpathām / harmyaprāsādasaṃpannāṃ gaṇikāvaraśobhitām // 2.045.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathāśvagajasaṃbādhāṃ tūryanādavināditām / sarvakalyāṇasaṃpūrṇāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulām // 2.045.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārāmodyānasaṃpannāṃ samājotsavaśālinīm / sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama // 2.045.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api satyapratijñena sārdhaṃ kuśalinā vayam / nivṛtte vanavāse 'sminn ayodhyāṃ praviśemahi // 2.045.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paridevayamānasya duḥkhārtasya mahātmanaḥ / tiṣṭhato rājaputrasya śarvarī sātyavartata // 2.045.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā hi satyaṃ bruvati prajāhite; narendraputre gurusauhṛdād guhaḥ / mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyasanābhipīḍito; jvarāturo nāga iva vyathāturaḥ // 2.045.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pṛthu vṛkṣā mahāyaśāḥ / uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam // 2.046.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāskarodayakālo 'yaṃ gatā bhagavatī niśā / asau sukṛṣṇo vihagaḥ kokilas tāta kūjati // 2.046.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
barhiṇānāṃ ca nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate nadatāṃ vane / tarāma jāhnavīṃ saumya śīghragāṃ sāgaraṃgamām // 2.046.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vijñāya rāmasya vacaḥ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ / guham āmantrya sūtaṃ ca so 'tiṣṭhad bhrātur agrataḥ // 2.046.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kalāpān saṃnahya khaḍgau baddhvā ca dhanvinau / jagmatur yena tau gaṅgāṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // 2.046.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmam eva tu dharmajñam upagamya vinītavat / kim ahaṃ karavāṇīti sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // 2.046.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivartasvety uvācainam etāvad dhi kṛtaṃ mama / yānaṃ vihāya padbhyāṃ tu gamiṣyāmo mahāvanam // 2.046.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmānaṃ tv abhyanujñātam avekṣyārtaḥ sa sārathiḥ / sumantraḥ puruṣavyāghram aikṣvākam idam abravīt // 2.046.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātikrāntam idaṃ loke puruṣeṇeha kena cit / tava sabhrātṛbhāryasya vāsaḥ prākṛtavad vane // 2.046.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na manye brahmacarye 'sti svadhīte vā phalodayaḥ / mārdavārjavayor vāpi tvāṃ ced vyasanam āgatam // 2.046.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saha rāghava vaidehyā bhrātrā caiva vane vasan / tvaṃ gatiṃ prāpsyase vīra trīṃl lokāṃs tu jayann iva // 2.046.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vayaṃ khalu hatā rāma ye tayāpy upavañcitāḥ / kaikeyyā vaśam eṣyāmaḥ pāpāyā duḥkhabhāginaḥ // 2.046.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti bruvann ātma samaṃ sumantraḥ sārathis tadā / dṛṣṭvā dura gataṃ rāmaṃ duḥkhārto rurude ciram // 2.046.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu vigate bāṣpe sūtaṃ spṛṣṭodakaṃ śucim / rāmas tu madhuraṃ vākyaṃ punaḥ punar uvāca tam // 2.046.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇāṃ tvayā tulyaṃ suhṛdaṃ nopalakṣaye / yathā daśaratho rājā māṃ na śocet tathā kuru // 2.046.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śokopahata cetāś ca vṛddhaś ca jagatīpatiḥ / kāma bhārāvasannaś ca tasmād etad bravīmi te // 2.046.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad yad ājñāpayet kiṃ cit sa mahātmā mahīpatiḥ / kaikeyyāḥ priyakāmārthaṃ kāryaṃ tad avikāṅkṣayā // 2.046.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etadarthaṃ hi rājyāni praśāsati nareśvarāḥ / yad eṣāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu mano na pratihanyate // 2.046.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad yathā sa mahārājo nālīkam adhigacchati / na ca tāmyati duḥkhena sumantra kuru tat tathā // 2.046.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛṣṭaduḥkhaṃ rājānaṃ vṛddham āryaṃ jitendriyam / brūyās tvam abhivādyaiva mama hetor idaṃ vacaḥ // 2.046.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naivāham anuśocāmi lakṣmaṇo na ca maithilī / ayodhyāyāś cyutāś ceti vane vatsyāmaheti vā // 2.046.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśasu varṣeṣu nivṛtteṣu punaḥ punaḥ / lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca drakṣyasi kṣipram āgatān // 2.046.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ mātaraṃ ca sumantra me / anyāś ca devīḥ sahitāḥ kaikeyīṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // 2.046.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārogyaṃ brūhi kausalyām atha pādābhivandanam / sītāyā mama cāryasya vacanāl lakṣmaṇasya ca // 2.046.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brūyāś ca hi mahārājaṃ bharataṃ kṣipram ānaya / āgataś cāpi bharataḥ sthāpyo nṛpamate pade // 2.046.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataṃ ca pariṣvajya yauvarājye 'bhiṣicya ca / asmatsaṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na tvām abhibhaviṣyati // 2.046.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataś cāpi vaktavyo yathā rājani vartase / tathā mātṛṣu vartethāḥ sarvāsv evāviśeṣataḥ // 2.046.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā ca tava kaikeyī sumitrā cāviśeṣataḥ / tathaiva devī kausalyā mama mātā viśeṣataḥ // 2.046.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivartyamāno rāmeṇa sumantraḥ śokakarśitaḥ / tat sarvaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā snehāt kākutstham abravīt // 2.046.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad ahaṃ nopacāreṇa brūyāṃ snehād aviklavaḥ / bhaktimān iti tat tāvad vākyaṃ tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi // 2.046.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ hi tvadvihīno 'haṃ pratiyāsyāmi tāṃ purīm / tava tāta viyogena putraśokākulām iva // 2.046.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarāmam api tāvan me rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janaḥ / vinā rāmaṃ rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidīryetāpi sā purī // 2.046.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dainyaṃ hi nagarī gacched dṛṣṭvā śūnyam imaṃ ratham / sūtāvaśeṣaṃ svaṃ sainyaṃ hatavīram ivāhave // 2.046.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūre 'pi nivasantaṃ tvāṃ mānasenāgrataḥ sthitam / cintayantyo 'dya nūnaṃ tvāṃ nirāhārāḥ kṛtāḥ prajāḥ // 2.046.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārtanādo hi yaḥ paurair muktas tadvipravāsane / rathasthaṃ māṃ niśāmyaiva kuryuḥ śataguṇaṃ tataḥ // 2.046.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ kiṃ cāpi vakṣyāmi devīṃ tava suto mayā / nīto 'sau mātulakulaṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kṛthā iti // 2.046.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asatyam api naivāhaṃ brūyāṃ vacanam īdṛśam / katham apriyam evāhaṃ brūyāṃ satyam idaṃ vacaḥ // 2.046.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama tāvan niyogasthās tvadbandhujanavāhinaḥ / kathaṃ rathaṃ tvayā hīnaṃ pravakṣyanti hayottamāḥ // 2.046.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi me yācamānasya tyāgam eva kariṣyasi / saratho 'gniṃ pravekṣyāmi tyakta mātra iha tvayā // 2.046.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaviṣyanti vane yāni tapovighnakarāṇi te / rathena pratibādhiṣye tāni sattvāni rāghava // 2.046.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat kṛtena mayā prāptaṃ ratha caryā kṛtaṃ sukham / āśaṃse tvatkṛtenāhaṃ vanavāsakṛtaṃ sukham // 2.046.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasīdecchāmi te 'raṇye bhavituṃ pratyanantaraḥ / prītyābhihitam icchāmi bhava me patyanantaraḥ // 2.046.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mūrdhnā kariṣyāmi vane vasan / ayodhyāṃ devalokaṃ vā sarvathā prajahāmy aham // 2.046.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi śakyā praveṣṭuṃ sā mayāyodhyā tvayā vinā / rājadhānī mahendrasya yathā duṣkṛtakarmaṇā // 2.046.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime cāpi hayā vīra yadi te vanavāsinaḥ / paricaryāṃ kariṣyanti prāpsyanti paramāṃ gatim // 2.046.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanavāse kṣayaṃ prāpte mamaiṣa hi manorathaḥ / yad anena rathenaiva tvāṃ vaheyaṃ purīṃ punaḥ // 2.046.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi sahitasya tvayā vane / kṣaṇabhūtāni yāsyanti śataśas tu tato 'nyathā // 2.046.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhṛtyavatsala tiṣṭhantaṃ bhartṛputragate pathi / bhaktaṃ bhṛtyaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ tvaṃ na māṃ hātum arhasi // 2.046.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dīnaṃ yācamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ / rāmo bhṛtyānukampī tu sumantram idam abravīt // 2.046.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānāmi paramāṃ bhaktiṃ mayi te bhartṛvatsala / śṛṇu cāpi yadarthaṃ tvāṃ preṣayāmi purīm itaḥ // 2.046.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nagarīṃ tvāṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā jananī me yavīyasī / kaikeyī pratyayaṃ gacched iti rāmo vanaṃ gataḥ // 2.046.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parituṣṭā hi sā devi vanavāsaṃ gate mayi / rājānaṃ nātiśaṅketa mithyāvādīti dhārmikam // 2.046.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa me prathamaḥ kalpo yad ambā me yavīyasī / bharatārakṣitaṃ sphītaṃ putrarājyam avāpnuyāt // 2.046.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama priyārthaṃ rājñaś ca sarathas tvaṃ purīṃ vraja / saṃdiṣṭaś cāsi yānarthāṃs tāṃs tān brūyās tathātathā // 2.046.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā vacanaṃ sūtaṃ sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ / guhaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ rāmo hetumad abravīt // 2.046.055.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭāḥ kṛtvā gamiṣyāmi nyagrodhakṣīram ānaya // 2.046.055.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat kṣīraṃ rājaputrāya guhaḥ kṣipram upāharat / lakṣmaṇasyātmanaś caiva rāmas tenākaroj jaṭāḥ // 2.046.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tadā cīravasanau jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇau / aśobhetām ṛṣisamau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 2.046.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vaikhānasaṃ mārgam āsthitaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / vratam ādiṣṭavān rāmaḥ sahāyaṃ guham abravīt // 2.046.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apramatto bale kośe durge janapade tathā / bhavethā guha rājyaṃ hi durārakṣatamaṃ matam // 2.046.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ samanujñāya guham ikṣvākunandanaḥ / jagāma tūrṇam avyagraḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // 2.046.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dṛṣṭvā nadītīre nāvam ikṣvākunandanaḥ / titīrṣuḥ śīghragāṃ gaṅgām idaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // 2.046.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āroha tvaṃ nara vyāghra sthitāṃ nāvam imāṃ śanaiḥ / sītāṃ cāropayānvakṣaṃ parigṛhya manasvinīm // 2.046.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhrātuḥ śāsanaṃ śrutvā sarvam apratikūlayan / āropya maithilīṃ pūrvam ārurohātmavāṃs tataḥ // 2.046.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāruroha tejasvī svayaṃ lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ / tato niṣādādhipatir guho jñātīn acodayat // 2.046.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujñāya sumantraṃ ca sabalaṃ caiva taṃ guham / āsthāya nāvaṃ rāmas tu codayām āsa nāvikān // 2.046.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taiś coditā sā nauḥ karṇadhārasamāhitā / śubhasphyavegābhihatā śīghraṃ salilam atyagāt // 2.046.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madhyaṃ tu samanuprāpya bhāgīrathyās tv aninditā / vaidehī prāñjalir bhūtvā tāṃ nadīm idam abravīt // 2.046.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putro daśarathasyāyaṃ mahārājasya dhīmataḥ / nideśaṃ pālayatv enaṃ gaṅge tvadabhirakṣitaḥ // 2.046.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi samagrāṇy uṣya kānane / bhrātrā saha mayā caiva punaḥ pratyāgamiṣyati // 2.046.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tvāṃ devi subhage kṣemeṇa punar āgatā / yakṣye pramuditā gaṅge sarvakāmasamṛddhaye // 2.046.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ hi tripathagā devi brahma lokaṃ samīkṣase / bhāryā codadhirājasya loke 'smin saṃpradṛśyase // 2.046.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tvāṃ devi namasyāmi praśaṃsāmi ca śobhane / prāpta rājye naravyāghra śivena punar āgate // 2.046.072	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi vastrāṇy annaṃ ca peśalam / brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradāsyāmi tava priyacikīrṣayā // 2.046.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā saṃbhāṣamāṇā sā sītā gaṅgām aninditā / dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇaṃ tīraṃ kṣipram evābhyupāgamat // 2.046.074	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tīraṃ tu samanuprāpya nāvaṃ hitvā nararṣabhaḥ / prātiṣṭhata saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca paraṃtapaḥ // 2.046.075	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīn mahābāhuḥ sumitrānandavardhanam / agrato gaccha saumitre sītā tvām anugacchatu // 2.046.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣṭhato 'haṃ gamiṣyāmi tvāṃ ca sītāṃ ca pālayan / adya duḥkhaṃ tu vaidehī vanavāsasya vetsyati // 2.046.077	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gataṃ tu gaṅgāparapāram āśu; rāmaṃ sumantraḥ pratataṃ nirīkṣya / adhvaprakarṣād vinivṛttadṛṣṭir; mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyathitas tapasvī // 2.046.078	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tau tatra hatvā caturo mahāmṛgān; varāham ṛśyaṃ pṛṣataṃ mahārurum / ādāya medhyaṃ tvaritaṃ bubhukṣitau; vāsāya kāle yayatur vanaspatim // 2.046.079	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā indravaṃśā [ttjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
sa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ samāsādya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām / rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭha iti hovāca lakṣmaṇam // 2.047.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyeyaṃ prathamā rātrir yātā janapadād bahiḥ / yā sumantreṇa rahitā tāṃ notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // 2.047.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāgartavyam atandribhyām adya prabhṛti rātriṣu / yogakṣemo hi sītāyā vartate lakṣmaṇāvayoḥ // 2.047.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rātriṃ kathaṃ cid evemāṃ saumitre vartayāmahe / upāvartāmahe bhūmāv āstīrya svayam ārjitaiḥ // 2.047.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu saṃviśya medinyāṃ mahārhaśayanocitaḥ / imāḥ saumitraye rāmo vyājahāra kathāḥ śubhāḥ // 2.047.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhruvam adya mahārājo duḥkhaṃ svapiti lakṣmaṇa / kṛtakāmā tu kaikeyī tuṣṭā bhavitum arhati // 2.047.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā hi devī mahārājaṃ kaikeyī rājyakāraṇāt / api na cyāvayet prāṇān dṛṣṭvā bharatam āgatam // 2.047.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anāthaś caiva vṛddhaś ca mayā caiva vinākṛtaḥ / kiṃ kariṣyati kāmātmā kaikeyyā vaśam āgataḥ // 2.047.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ vyasanam ālokya rājñaś ca mativibhramam / kāma evārdhadharmābhyāṃ garīyān iti me matiḥ // 2.047.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko hy avidvān api pumān pramadāyāḥ kṛte tyajet / chandānuvartinaṃ putraṃ tāto mām iva lakṣmaṇa // 2.047.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukhī bata sabhāryaś ca bharataḥ kekayīsutaḥ / muditān kosalān eko yo bhokṣyaty adhirājavat // 2.047.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi sarvasya rājyasya mukham ekaṃ bhaviṣyati / tāte ca vayasātīte mayi cāraṇyam āśrite // 2.047.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthadharmau parityajya yaḥ kāmam anuvartate / evam āpadyate kṣipraṃ rājā daśaratho yathā // 2.047.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manye daśarathāntāya mama pravrājanāya ca / kaikeyī saumya saṃprāptā rājyāya bharatasya ca // 2.047.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apīdānīṃ na kaikeyī saubhāgyamadamohitā / kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca saṃprabādheta matkṛte // 2.047.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā sma matkāraṇād devī sumitrā duḥkham āvaset / ayodhyām ita eva tvaṃ kāle praviśa lakṣmaṇa // 2.047.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham eko gamiṣyāmi sītayā saha daṇḍakān / anāthāyā hi nāthas tvaṃ kausalyāyā bhaviṣyasi // 2.047.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣudrakarmā hi kaikeyī dveṣād anyāyyam ācaret / paridadyā hi dharmajñe bharate mama mātaram // 2.047.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nūnaṃ jātyantare kasmiṃḥ striyaḥ putrair viyojitāḥ / jananyā mama saumitre tad apy etad upasthitam // 2.047.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā hi cirapuṣṭena duḥkhasaṃvardhitena ca / viprāyujyata kausalyā phalakāle dhig astu mām // 2.047.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā sma sīmantinī kā cij janayet putram īdṛśam / saumitre yo 'ham ambāyā dadmi śokam anantakam // 2.047.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manye prītiviśiṣṭā sā matto lakṣmaṇasārikā / yasyās tac chrūyate vākyaṃ śuka pādam arer daśa // 2.047.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śocantyāś cālpabhāgyāyā na kiṃ cid upakurvatā / purtreṇa kim aputrāyā mayā kāryam ariṃdama // 2.047.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alpabhāgyā hi me mātā kausalyā rahitā mayā / śete paramaduḥkhārtā patitā śokasāgare // 2.047.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eko hy aham ayodhyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa / tareyam iṣubhiḥ kruddho nanu vīryam akāraṇam // 2.047.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adharmabhaya bhītaś ca paralokasya cānagha / tena lakṣmaṇa nādyāham ātmānam abhiṣecaye // 2.047.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad anyac ca karuṇaṃ vilapya vijane bahu / aśrupūrṇamukho rāmo niśi tūṣṇīm upāviśat // 2.047.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vilapyoparataṃ rāmaṃ gatārciṣam ivānalam / samudram iva nirvegam āśvāsayata lakṣmaṇaḥ // 2.047.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhruvam adya purī rāma ayodhyā yudhināṃ vara / niṣprabhā tvayi niṣkrānte gatacandreva śarvarī // 2.047.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naitad aupayikaṃ rāma yad idaṃ paritapyase / viṣādayasi sītāṃ ca māṃ caiva puruṣarṣabha // 2.047.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca sītā tvayā hīnā na cāham api rāghava / muhūrtam api jīvāvo jalān matsyāv ivoddhṛtau // 2.047.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi tātaṃ na śatrughnaṃ na sumitrāṃ paraṃtapa / draṣṭum iccheyam adyāhaṃ svargaṃ vāpi tvayā vinā // 2.047.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa lakṣmaṇasyottama puṣkalaṃ vaco; niśamya caivaṃ vanavāsam ādarāt / samāḥ samastā vidadhe paraṃtapaḥ; prapadya dharmaṃ sucirāya rāghavaḥ // 2.047.033	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
te tu tasmin mahāvṛkṣa uṣitvā rajanīṃ śivām / vimale 'bhyudite sūrye tasmād deśāt pratasthire // 2.048.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatra bhāgīrathī gaṅgā yamunām abhivartate / jagmus taṃ deśam uddiśya vigāhya sumahad vanam // 2.048.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te bhūmim āgān vividhān deśāṃś cāpi manoramān / adṛṣṭapūrvān paśyantas tatra tatra yaśasvinaḥ // 2.048.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathākṣemeṇa gacchan sa paśyaṃś ca vividhān drumān / nivṛttamātre divase rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt // 2.048.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prayāgam abhitaḥ paśya saumitre dhūmam unnatam / agner bhagavataḥ ketuṃ manye saṃnihito muniḥ // 2.048.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nūnaṃ prāptāḥ sma saṃbhedaṃ gaṅgāyamunayor vayam / tathā hi śrūyate śambdo vāriṇā vārighaṭṭitaḥ // 2.048.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dārūṇi paribhinnāni vanajair upajīvibhiḥ / bharadvājāśrame caite dṛśyante vividhā drumāḥ // 2.048.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanvinau tau sukhaṃ gatvā lambamāne divākare / gaṅgāyamunayoḥ saṃdhau prāpatur nilayaṃ muneḥ // 2.048.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmas tv āśramam āsādya trāsayan mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / gatvā muhūrtam adhvānaṃ bharadvājam upāgamat // 2.048.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tv āśramam āsādya muner darśanakāṅkṣiṇau / sītayānugatau vīrau dūrād evāvatasthatuḥ // 2.048.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hutāgnihotraṃ dṛṣṭvaiva mahābhāgaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ / rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sītayā cābhyavādayat // 2.048.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nyavedayata cātmānaṃ tasmai lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ / putrau daśarathasyāvāṃ bhagavan rāmalakṣmaṇau // 2.048.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāryā mameyaṃ vaidehī kalyāṇī janakātmajā / māṃ cānuyātā vijanaṃ tapovanam aninditā // 2.048.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitrā pravrājyamānaṃ māṃ saumitrir anujaḥ priyaḥ / ayam anvagamad bhrātā vanam eva dṛḍhavrataḥ // 2.048.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitrā niyuktā bhagavan praveṣyāmas tapovanam / dharmam evācariṣyāmas tatra mūlaphalāśanāḥ // 2.048.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrasya dhīmataḥ / upānayata dharmātmā gām arghyam udakaṃ tataḥ // 2.048.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛgapakṣibhir āsīno munibhiś ca samantataḥ / rāmam āgatam abhyarcya svāgatenāha taṃ muniḥ // 2.048.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya ca tām arcām upaviṣṭaṃ sarāghavam / bharadvājo 'bravīd vākyaṃ dharmayuktam idaṃ tadā // 2.048.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cirasya khalu kākutstha paśyāmi tvām ihāgatam / śrutaṃ tava mayā cedaṃ vivāsanam akāraṇam // 2.048.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avakāśo vivikto 'yaṃ mahānadyoḥ samāgame / puṇyaś ca ramaṇīyaś ca vasatv iha bhagān sukham // 2.048.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu vacanaṃ bharadvājena rāghavaḥ / pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāmaḥ sarvahite rataḥ // 2.048.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavann ita āsannaḥ paurajānapado janaḥ / āgamiṣyati vaidehīṃ māṃ cāpi prekṣako janaḥ // 2.048.022.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anena kāraṇenāham iha vāsaṃ na rocaye // 2.048.022.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekānte paśya bhagavann āśramasthānam uttamam / ramate yatra vaidehī sukhārhā janakātmajā // 2.048.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ / rāghavasya tato vākyam artha grāhakam abravīt // 2.048.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśakrośa itas tāta girir yasmin nivatsyasi / maharṣisevitaḥ puṇyaḥ sarvataḥ sukha darśanaḥ // 2.048.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
golāṅgūlānucarito vānararkṣaniṣevitaḥ / citrakūṭa iti khyāto gandhamādanasaṃnibhaḥ // 2.048.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvatā citra kūṭasya naraḥ śṛṅgāṇy avekṣate / kalyāṇāni samādhatte na pāpe kurute manaḥ // 2.048.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣayas tatra bahavo vihṛtya śaradāṃ śatam / tapasā divam ārūḍhāḥ kapālaśirasā saha // 2.048.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviviktam ahaṃ manye taṃ vāsaṃ bhavataḥ sukham / iha vā vanavāsāya vasa rāma mayā saha // 2.048.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmaṃ sarvakāmais taṃ bharadvājaḥ priyātithim / sabhāryaṃ saha ca bhrātrā pratijagrāha dharmavit // 2.048.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya prayāge rāmasya taṃ maharṣim upeyuṣaḥ / prapannā rajanī puṇyā citrāḥ kathayataḥ kathāḥ // 2.048.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu bharadvājam upāgamat / uvāca naraśārdūlo muniṃ jvalitatejasaṃ // 2.048.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarvarīṃ bhavanann adya satyaśīla tavāśrame / uṣitāḥ smeha vasatim anujānātu no bhavān // 2.048.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rātryāṃ tu tasyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ bharadvājo 'bravīd idam / madhumūlaphalopetaṃ citrakūṭaṃ vrajeti ha // 2.048.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra kuñjarayūthāni mṛgayūthāni cābhitaḥ / vicaranti vanānteṣu tāni drakṣyasi rāghava // 2.048.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭakoyaṣṭikakokilasvanair; vināditaṃ taṃ vasudhādharaṃ śivam / mṛgaiś ca mattair bahubhiś ca kuñjaraiḥ; suramyam āsādya samāvasāśramam // 2.048.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
uṣitvā rajanīṃ tatra rājaputrāv ariṃdamau / maharṣim abhivādyātha jagmatus taṃ giriṃ prati // 2.049.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasthitāṃś caiva tān prekṣya pitā putrān ivānvagāt / tataḥ pracakrame vaktuṃ vacanaṃ sa mahāmuniḥ // 2.049.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāsādya tu kālindīṃ śīghrasrotasamāpagām / tatra yūyaṃ plavaṃ kṛtvā taratāṃśumatīṃ nadīm // 2.049.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nyagrodham āsādya mahāntaṃ haritacchadam / vivṛddhaṃ bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ śyāmaṃ siddhopasevitam // 2.049.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krośamātraṃ tato gatvā nīlaṃ drakṣyatha kānanam / palāśabadarīmiśraṃ rāma vaṃśaiś ca yāmunaiḥ // 2.049.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa panthāś citrakūṭasya gataḥ subahuśo mayā / ramyo mārdavayuktaś ca vanadāvair vivarjitaḥ // 2.049.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti panthānam āvedya maharṣiḥ sa nyavartata // 2.049.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāvṛtte munau tasmin rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt / kṛtapuṇyāḥ sma saumitre munir yan no 'nukampate // 2.049.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti tau puruṣavyāghrau mantrayitvā manasvinau / sītām evāgrataḥ kṛtvā kālindīṃ jagmatur nadīm // 2.049.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau kāṣṭhasaṃghāṭam atho cakratuḥ sumahāplavam / cakāra lakṣmaṇaś chittvā sītāyāḥ sukhamānasaṃ // 2.049.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra śriyam ivācintyāṃ rāmo dāśarathiḥ priyām / īṣatsaṃlajjamānāṃ tām adhyāropayata plavam // 2.049.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ plavenāṃśumatīṃ śīghragām ūrmimālinīm / tīrajair bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ saṃterur yamunāṃ nadīm // 2.049.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tīrṇāḥ plavam utsṛjya prasthāya yamunāvanāt / śyāmaṃ nyagrodham āseduḥ śītalaṃ haritacchadam // 2.049.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyāṃ caiva paśyeyaṃ sumitrāṃ ca yaśasvinīm / iti sītāñjaliṃ kṛtvā paryagachad vanaspatim // 2.049.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krośamātraṃ tato gatvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / bahūn medhyān mṛgān hatvā ceratur yamunāvane // 2.049.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vihṛtya te barhiṇapūganādite; śubhe vane vāraṇavānarāyute / samaṃ nadīvapram upetya saṃmataṃ; nivāsam ājagmur adīnadarśanaḥ // 2.049.015	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyām avasuptam anantaram / prabodhayām āsa śanair lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ // 2.050.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitre śṛṇu vanyānāṃ valgu vyāharatāṃ svanam / saṃpratiṣṭhāmahe kālaḥ prasthānasya paraṃtapa // 2.050.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa suptaḥ samaye bhrātrā lakṣmaṇaḥ pratibodhitaḥ / jahau nidrāṃ ca tandrīṃ ca prasaktaṃ ca pathi śramam // 2.050.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tata utthāya te sarve spṛṣṭvā nadyāḥ śivaṃ jalam / panthānam ṛṣiṇoddiṣṭaṃ citrakūṭasya taṃ yayuḥ // 2.050.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃprasthitaḥ kāle rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha / sītāṃ kamalapatrākṣīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.050.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādīptān iva vaidehi sarvataḥ puṣpitān nagān / svaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kiṃśukān paśya mālinaḥ śiśirātyaye // 2.050.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya bhallātakān phullān narair anupasevitān / phalapatrair avanatān nūnaṃ śakṣyāmi jīvitum // 2.050.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya droṇapramāṇāni lambamānāni lakṣmaṇa / madhūni madhukārībhiḥ saṃbhṛtāni nage nage // 2.050.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa krośati natyūhas taṃ śikhī pratikūjati / ramaṇīye vanoddeśe puṣpasaṃstarasaṃkaṭe // 2.050.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātaṃgayūthānusṛtaṃ pakṣisaṃghānunāditam / citrakūṭam imaṃ paśya pravṛddhaśikharaṃ girim // 2.050.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tau pādacāreṇa gacchantau saha sītayā / ramyam āsedatuḥ śailaṃ citrakūṭaṃ manoramam // 2.050.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu parvatam āsādya nānāpakṣigaṇāyutam / ayaṃ vāso bhavet tāvad atra saumya ramemahi // 2.050.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇānaya dārūṇi dṛḍhāni ca varāṇi ca / kuruṣvāvasathaṃ saumya vāse me 'bhirataṃ manaḥ // 2.050.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitrir vividhān drumān / ājahāra tataś cakre parṇa śālām ariṃ dama // 2.050.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuśrūṣamāṇam ekāgram idaṃ vacanam abravīt / aiṇeyaṃ māṃsam āhṛtya śālāṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam // 2.050.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgaṃ hatvā medhyaṃ patāpavān / atha cikṣepa saumitriḥ samiddhe jātavedasi // 2.050.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu pakvaṃ samājñāya niṣṭaptaṃ chinnaśoṇitam / lakṣmaṇaḥ puruṣavyāghram atha rāghavam abravīt // 2.050.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ samāptāṅgaḥ śṛtaḥ kṛṣṇa mṛgo yathā / devatā devasaṃkāśa yajasva kuśalo hy asi // 2.050.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaḥ snātvā tu niyato guṇavāñ japyakovidaḥ / pāpasaṃśamanaṃ rāmaś cakāra balim uttamam // 2.050.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ vṛkṣaparṇac chadanāṃ manojñāṃ; yathāpradeśaṃ sukṛtāṃ nivātām / vāsāya sarve viviśuḥ sametāḥ; sabhāṃ yathā deva gaṇāḥ sudharmām // 2.050.020	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
anekanānāmṛgapakṣisaṃkule; vicitrapuṣpastabalair drumair yute / vanottame vyālamṛgānunādite; tathā vijahruḥ susukhaṃ jitendriyāḥ // 2.050.021	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
suramyam āsādya tu citrakūṭaṃ; nadīṃ ca tāṃ mālyavatīṃ sutīrthām / nananda hṛṣṭo mṛgapakṣijuṣṭāṃ; jahau ca duḥkhaṃ puravipravāsāt // 2.050.022	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
kathayitvā suduḥkhārtaḥ sumantreṇa ciraṃ saha / rāme dakṣiṇa kūlasthe jagāma svagṛhaṃ guhaḥ // 2.051.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujñātaḥ sumantro 'tha yojayitvā hayottamān / ayodhyām eva nagarīṃ prayayau gāḍhadurmanāḥ // 2.051.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vanāni sugandhīni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca / paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ grāmāṇi nagarāṇi ca // 2.051.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sāyāhnasamaye tṛtīye 'hani sārathiḥ / ayodhyāṃ samanuprāpya nirānandāṃ dadarśa ha // 2.051.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śūnyām iva niḥśabdāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadurmanāḥ / sumantraś cintayām āsa śokavegasamāhataḥ // 2.051.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin na sagajā sāśvā sajanā sajanādhipā / rāma saṃtāpaduḥkhena dagdhā śokāgninā purī // 2.051.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti cintāparaḥ sūtas tvaritaḥ praviveśa ha // 2.051.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantram abhiyāntaṃ taṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / kva rāma iti pṛcchantaḥ sūtam abhyadravan narāḥ // 2.051.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ śaśaṃsa gaṅgāyām aham āpṛcchya rāghavam / anujñāto nivṛtto 'smi dhārmikeṇa mahātmanā // 2.051.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tīrṇā iti vijñāya bāṣpapūrṇamukhā janāḥ / aho dhig iti niḥśvasya hā rāmeti ca cukruśuḥ // 2.051.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuśrāva ca vacas teṣāṃ vṛndaṃ vṛndaṃ ca tiṣṭhatām / hatāḥ sma khalu ye neha paśyāma iti rāghavam // 2.051.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dānayajñavivāheṣu samājeṣu mahatsu ca / na drakṣyāmaḥ punar jātu dhārmikaṃ rāmam antarā // 2.051.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ samarthaṃ janasyāsya kiṃ priyaṃ kiṃ sukhāvaham / iti rāmeṇa nagaraṃ pitṛvat paripālitam // 2.051.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vātāyanagatānāṃ ca strīṇām anvantarāpaṇam / rāmaśokābhitaptānāṃ śuśrāva paridevanam // 2.051.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājamārgamadhyena sumantraḥ pihitānanaḥ / yatra rājā daśarathas tad evopayayau gṛham // 2.051.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'vatīrya rathāc chīghraṃ rājaveśma praviśya ca / kakṣyāḥ saptābhicakrāma mahājanasamākulāḥ // 2.051.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato daśarathastrīṇāṃ prāsādebhyas tatas tataḥ / rāmaśokābhitaptānāṃ mandaṃ śuśrāva jalpitam // 2.051.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saha rāmeṇa niryāto vinā rāmam ihāgataḥ / sūtaḥ kiṃ nāma kausalyāṃ śocantīṃ prativakṣyati // 2.051.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā ca manye durjīvam evaṃ na sukaraṃ dhruvam / ācchidya putre niryāte kausalyā yatra jīvati // 2.051.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satya rūpaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājñaḥ strīṇāṃ niśāmayan / pradīptam iva śokena viveśa sahasā gṛham // 2.051.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa praviśyāṣṭamīṃ kakṣyāṃ rājānaṃ dīnam ātulam / putraśokaparidyūnam apaśyat pāṇḍare gṛhe // 2.051.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhigamya tam āsīnaṃ narendram abhivādya ca / sumantro rāmavacanaṃ yathoktaṃ pratyavedayat // 2.051.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tūṣṇīm eva tac chrutvā rājā vibhrānta cetanaḥ / mūrchito nyapatad bhūmau rāmaśokābhipīḍitaḥ // 2.051.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'ntaḥpuram āviddhaṃ mūrchite pṛthivīpatau / uddhṛtya bāhū cukrośa nṛpatau patite kṣitau // 2.051.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumitrayā tu sahitā kausalyā patitaṃ patim / utthāpayām āsa tadā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // 2.051.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imaṃ tasya mahābhāga dūtaṃ duṣkarakāriṇaḥ / vanavāsād anuprāptaṃ kasmān na pratibhāṣase // 2.051.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyemam anayaṃ kṛtvā vyapatrapasi rāghava / uttiṣṭha sukṛtaṃ te 'stu śoke na syāt sahāyatā // 2.051.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
deva yasyā bhayād rāmaṃ nānupṛcchasi sārathim / neha tiṣṭhati kaikeyī viśrabdhaṃ pratibhāṣyatām // 2.051.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tathoktvā mahārājaṃ kausalyā śokalālasā / dharaṇyāṃ nipapātāśu bāṣpaviplutabhāṣiṇī // 2.051.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vilapatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kausalyāṃ patitāṃ bhuvi / patiṃ cāvekṣya tāḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ // 2.051.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tam antaḥpuranādam utthitaṃ; samīkṣya vṛddhās taruṇāś ca mānavāḥ / striyaś ca sarvā ruruduḥ samantataḥ; puraṃ tadāsīt punar eva saṃkulam // 2.051.030	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
pratyāśvasto yadā rājā mohāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ / athājuhāva taṃ sūtaṃ rāmavṛttāntakāraṇāt // 2.052.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛddhaṃ paramasaṃtaptaṃ navagraham iva dvipam / viniḥśvasantaṃ dhyāyantam asvastham iva kuñjaram // 2.052.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā tu rajasā sūtaṃ dhvastāṅgaṃ samupasthitam / aśru pūrṇamukhaṃ dīnam uvāca paramārtavat // 2.052.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva nu vatsyati dharmātmā vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ / so 'tyantasukhitaḥ sūta kim aśiṣyati rāghavaḥ // 2.052.004.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūmipālātmajo bhūmau śete katham anāthavat // 2.052.004.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaṃ yāntam anuyānti sma padāti rathakuñjarāḥ / sa vatsyati kathaṃ rāmo vijanaṃ vanam āśritaḥ // 2.052.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyālair mṛgair ācaritaṃ kṛṣṇasarpaniṣevitam / kathaṃ kumārau vaidehyā sārdhaṃ vanam upasthitau // 2.052.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukumāryā tapasvinyā sumantra saha sītayā / rājaputrau kathaṃ pādair avaruhya rathād gatau // 2.052.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siddhārthaḥ khalu sūta tvaṃ yena dṛṣṭau mamātmajau / vanāntaṃ praviśantau tāv aśvināv iva mandaram // 2.052.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim uvāca vaco rāmaḥ kim uvāca ca lakṣmaṇaḥ / sumantra vanam āsādya kim uvāca ca maithilī // 2.052.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsitaṃ śayitaṃ bhuktaṃ sūta rāmasya kīrtaya // 2.052.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti sūto narendreṇa coditaḥ sajjamānayā / uvāca vācā rājānaṃ sabāṣpaparirabdhayā // 2.052.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīn māṃ mahārāja dharmam evānupālayan / añjaliṃ rāghavaḥ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca // 2.052.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūta madvacanāt tasya tātasya viditātmanaḥ / śirasā vandanīyasya vandyau pādau mahātmanaḥ // 2.052.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvam antaḥpuraṃ vācyaṃ sūta mad vacanāt tvayā / ārogyam aviśeṣeṇa yathārhaṃ cābhivādanam // 2.052.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātā ca mama kausalyā kuśalaṃ cābhivādanam / devi devasya pādau ca devavat paripālaya // 2.052.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataḥ kuśalaṃ vācyo vācyo madvacanena ca / sarvāsv eva yathānyāyaṃ vṛttiṃ vartasva mātṛṣu // 2.052.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaktavyaś ca mahābāhur ikṣvākukulanandanaḥ / pitaraṃ yauvarājyastho rājyastham anupālaya // 2.052.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ māṃ mahārāja bruvann eva mahāyaśāḥ / rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat // 2.052.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho niḥśvasan vākyam abravīt / kenāyam aparādhena rājaputro vivāsitaḥ // 2.052.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi pravrājito rāmo lobhakāraṇakāritam / varadānanimittaṃ vā sarvathā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam // 2.052.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya tu parityāge na hetum upalakṣaye // 2.052.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asamīkṣya samārabdhaṃ viruddhaṃ buddhilāghavāt / janayiṣyati saṃkrośaṃ rāghavasya vivāsanam // 2.052.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tāvan mahārāje pitṛtvaṃ nopalakṣaye / bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuś ca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ // 2.052.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvalokapriyaṃ tyaktvā sarvalokahite ratam / sarvaloko 'nurajyeta kathaṃ tvānena karmaṇā // 2.052.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānakī tu mahārāja niḥśvasantī tapasvinī / bhūtopahatacitteva viṣṭhitā vṛṣmṛtā sthitā // 2.052.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛṣṭapūrvavyasanā rājaputrī yaśasvinī / tena duḥkhena rudatī naiva māṃ kiṃ cid abravīt // 2.052.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udvīkṣamāṇā bhartāraṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā / mumoca sahasā bāṣpaṃ māṃ prayāntam udīkṣya sā // 2.052.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaiva rāmo 'śrumukhaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ; sthito 'bhaval lakṣmaṇabāhupālitaḥ / tathaiva sītā rudatī tapasvinī; nirīkṣate rājarathaṃ tathaiva mām // 2.052.026	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
mama tv aśvā nivṛttasya na prāvartanta vartmani / uṣṇam aśru vimuñcanto rāme saṃprasthite vanam // 2.053.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhābhyāṃ rājaputrābhyām atha kṛtvāham ajñalim / prasthito ratham āsthāya tad duḥkham api dhārayan // 2.053.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guheva sārdhaṃ tatraiva sthito 'smi divasān bahūn / āśayā yadi māṃ rāmaḥ punaḥ śabdāpayed iti // 2.053.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣaye te mahārāja rāmavyasanakarśitāḥ / api vṛkṣāḥ parimlānaḥ sapuṣpāṅkurakorakāḥ // 2.053.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca sarpanti sattvāni vyālā na prasaranti ca / rāmaśokābhibhūtaṃ tan niṣkūjam abhavad vanam // 2.053.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
līnapuṣkarapatrāś ca narendra kaluṣodakāḥ / saṃtaptapadmāḥ padminyo līnamīnavihaṃgamāḥ // 2.053.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jalajāni ca puṣpāṇi mālyāni sthalajāni ca / nādya bhānty alpagandhīni phalāni ca yathā puram // 2.053.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśantam ayodhyāṃ māṃ na kaś cid abhinandati / narā rāmam apaśyanto niḥśvasanti muhur muhuḥ // 2.053.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harmyair vimānaiḥ prāsādair avekṣya ratham āgatam / hāhākārakṛtā nāryo rāmādarśanakarśitāḥ // 2.053.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyatair vimalair netrair aśruvegapariplutaiḥ / anyonyam abhivīkṣante vyaktam ārtatarāḥ striyaḥ // 2.053.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāmitrāṇāṃ na mitrāṇām udāsīnajanasya ca / aham ārtatayā kaṃ cid viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye // 2.053.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aprahṛṣṭamanuṣyā ca dīnanāgaturaṃgamā / ārtasvaraparimlānā viniḥśvasitaniḥsvanā // 2.053.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirānandā mahārāja rāmapravrājanātulā / kausalyā putra hīneva ayodhyā pratibhāti mā // 2.053.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūtasya vacanaṃ śrutvā vācā paramadīnayā / bāṣpopahatayā rājā taṃ sūtam idam abravīt // 2.053.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyyā viniyuktena pāpābhijanabhāvayā / mayā na mantrakuśalair vṛddhaiḥ saha samarthitam // 2.053.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na suhṛdbhir na cāmātyair mantrayitvā na naigamaiḥ / mayāyam arthaḥ saṃmohāt strīhetoḥ sahasā kṛtaḥ // 2.053.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavitavyatayā nūnam idaṃ vā vyasanaṃ mahat / kulasyāsya vināśāya prāptaṃ sūta yadṛcchayā // 2.053.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūta yady asti te kiṃ cin mayāpi sukṛtaṃ kṛtam / tvaṃ prāpayāśu māṃ rāmaṃ prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // 2.053.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad yad yāpi mamaivājñā nivartayatu rāghavam / na śakṣyāmi vinā rāma muhūrtam api jīvitum // 2.053.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vāpi mahābāhur gato dūraṃ bhaviṣyati / mām eva ratham āropya śīghraṃ rāmāya darśaya // 2.053.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛttadaṃṣṭro maheṣvāsaḥ kvāsau lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ / yadi jīvāmi sādhv enaṃ paśyeyaṃ saha sītayā // 2.053.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lohitākṣaṃ mahābāhum āmuktamaṇikuṇḍalam / rāmaṃ yadi na paśyāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // 2.053.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ato nu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yo 'ham ikṣvākunandanam / imām avasthām āpanno neha paśyāmi rāghavam // 2.053.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hā rāma rāmānuja hā hā vaidehi tapasvinī / na māṃ jānīta duḥkhena mriyamāṇam anāthavat // 2.053.024.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dustaro jīvatā devi mayāyaṃ śokasāgaraḥ // 2.053.024.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśobhanaṃ yo 'ham ihādya rāghavaṃ; didṛkṣamāṇo na labhe salakṣmaṇam / itīva rājā vilapan mahāyaśāḥ; papāta tūrṇaṃ śayane sa mūrchitaḥ // 2.053.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
iti vilapati pārthive pranaṣṭe; karuṇataraṃ dviguṇaṃ ca rāmahetoḥ / vacanam anuniśamya tasya devī; bhayam agamat punar eva rāmamātā // 2.053.026	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
tato bhūtopasṛṣṭeva vepamānā punaḥ punaḥ / dharaṇyāṃ gatasattveva kausalyā sūtam abravīt // 2.054.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naya māṃ yatra kākutsthaḥ sītā yatra ca lakṣmaṇaḥ / tān vinā kṣaṇam apy atra jīvituṃ notsahe hy aham // 2.054.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ daṇḍakān naya mām api / atha tān nānugacchāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // 2.054.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṣpavegaupahatayā sa vācā sajjamānayā / idam āśvāsayan devīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // 2.054.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaja śokaṃ ca mohaṃ ca saṃbhramaṃ duḥkhajaṃ tathā / vyavadhūya ca saṃtāpaṃ vane vatsyati rāghavaḥ // 2.054.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmasya pādau paricaran vane / ārādhayati dharmajñaḥ paralokaṃ jitendriyaḥ // 2.054.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vijane 'pi vane sītā vāsaṃ prāpya gṛheṣv iva / visrambhaṃ labhate 'bhītā rāme saṃnyasta mānasā // 2.054.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāsyā dainyaṃ kṛtaṃ kiṃ cit susūkṣmam api lakṣaye / uciteva pravāsānāṃ vaidehī pratibhāti mā // 2.054.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nagaropavanaṃ gatvā yathā sma ramate purā / tathaiva ramate sītā nirjaneṣu vaneṣv api // 2.054.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāleva ramate sītā bālacandranibhānanā / rāmā rāme hy adīnātmā vijane 'pi vane satī // 2.054.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadgataṃ hṛdayaṃ hy asyās tad adhīnaṃ ca jīvitam / ayodhyāpi bhavet tasyā rāma hīnā tathā vanam // 2.054.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pathi pṛcchati vaidehī grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca / gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā nadīnāṃ ca pādapān vividhān api // 2.054.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhvanā vāta vegena saṃbhrameṇātapena ca / na hi gacchati vaidehyāś candrāṃśusadṛśī prabhā // 2.054.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśaṃ śatapatrasya pūrṇacandropamaprabham / vadanaṃ tadvadānyāyā vaidehyā na vikampate // 2.054.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaktarasaraktābhāv alaktarasavarjitau / adyāpi caraṇau tasyāḥ padmakośasamaprabhau // 2.054.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nūpurodghuṣṭaheleva khelaṃ gacchati bhāminī / idānīm api vaidehī tadrāgā nyastabhūṣaṇā // 2.054.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajaṃ vā vīkṣya siṃhaṃ vā vyāghraṃ vā vanam āśritā / nāhārayati saṃtrāsaṃ bāhū rāmasya saṃśritā // 2.054.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na śocyās te na cātmā te śocyo nāpi janādhipaḥ / idaṃ hi caritaṃ loke pratiṣṭhāsyati śāśvatam // 2.054.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhūya śokaṃ parihṛṣṭamānasā; maharṣiyāte pathi suvyavasthitāḥ / vane ratā vanyaphalāśanāḥ pituḥ; śubhāṃ pratijñāṃ paripālayanti te // 2.054.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tathāpi sūtena suyuktavādinā; nivāryamāṇā sutaśokakarśitā / na caiva devī virarāma kūjitāt; priyeti putreti ca rāghaveti ca // 2.054.020	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
vanaṃ gate dharmapare rāme ramayatāṃ vare / kausalyā rudatī svārtā bhartāram idam abravīt // 2.055.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady apitriṣu lokeṣu prathitaṃ te mayad yaśaḥ / sānukrośo vadānyaś ca priyavādī ca rāghavaḥ // 2.055.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ naravaraśreṣṭha putrau tau saha sītayā / duḥkhitau sukhasaṃvṛddhau vane duḥkhaṃ sahiṣyataḥ // 2.055.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā nūnaṃ taruṇī śyāmā sukumārī sukhocitā / katham uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca maithilī prasahiṣyate // 2.055.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhuktvāśanaṃ viśālākṣī sūpadaṃśānvitaṃ śubham / vanyaṃ naivāram āhāraṃ kathaṃ sītopabhokṣyate // 2.055.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gītavāditranirghoṣaṃ śrutvā śubham aninditā / kathaṃ kravyādasiṃhānāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty aśobhanam // 2.055.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahendradhvajasaṃkāśaḥ kva nu śete mahābhujaḥ / bhujaṃ parighasaṃkāśam upadhāya mahābalaḥ // 2.055.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmavarṇaṃ sukeśāntaṃ padmaniḥśvāsam uttamam / kadā drakṣyāmi rāmasya vadanaṃ puṣkarekṣaṇam // 2.055.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ me na saṃśayaḥ / apaśyantyā na taṃ yad vai phalatīdaṃ sahasradhā // 2.055.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi pañcadaśe varṣe rāghavaḥ punar eṣyati / jahyād rājyaṃ ca kośaṃ ca bharatenopabhokṣyate // 2.055.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ kanīyasā bhrātrā bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ viśāṃ pate / bhrātā jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhāś ca kimarthaṃ nāvamaṃsyate // 2.055.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na pareṇāhṛtaṃ bhakṣyaṃ vyāghraḥ khāditum icchati / evam eva naravyāghraḥ paralīḍhaṃ na maṃsyate // 2.055.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
havir ājyaṃ puroḍāśāḥ kuśā yūpāś ca khādirāḥ / naitāni yātayāmāni kurvanti punar adhvare // 2.055.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā hy āttam idaṃ rājyaṃ hṛtasārāṃ surām iva / nābhimantum alaṃ rāmo naṣṭasomam ivādhvaram // 2.055.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naivaṃvidham asatkāraṃ rāghavo marṣayiṣyati / balavān iva śārdūlo bāladher abhimarśanam // 2.055.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tādṛśaḥ siṃhabalo vṛṣabhākṣo nararṣabhaḥ / svayam eva hataḥ pitrā jalajenātmajo yathā // 2.055.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvijāti carito dharmaḥ śāstradṛṣṭaḥ sanātanaḥ / yadi te dharmanirate tvayā putre vivāsite // 2.055.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatir evāk patir nāryā dvitīyā gatir ātmajaḥ / tṛtīyā jñātayo rājaṃś caturthī neha vidyate // 2.055.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra tvaṃ caiva me nāsti rāmaś ca vanam āśritaḥ / na vanaṃ gantum icchāmi sarvathā hi hatā tvayā // 2.055.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hataṃ tvayā rājyam idaṃ sarāṣṭraṃ; hatas tathātmā saha mantribhiś ca / hatā saputrāsmi hatāś ca paurāḥ; sutaś ca bhāryā ca tava prahṛṣṭau // 2.055.020	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
imāṃ giraṃ dāruṇaśabdasaṃśritāṃ; niśamya rājāpi mumoha duḥkhitaḥ / tataḥ sa śokaṃ praviveśa pārthivaḥ; svaduṣkṛtaṃ cāpi punas tadāsmarat // 2.055.021	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
evaṃ tu kruddhayā rājā rāmamātrā saśokayā / śrāvitaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ cintayām āsa duḥkhitaḥ // 2.056.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya cintayamānasya pratyabhāt karma duṣkṛtam / yad anena kṛtaṃ pūrvam ajñānāc chabdavedhinā // 2.056.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amanās tena śokena rāmaśokena ca prabhuḥ / dahyamānas tu śokābhyāṃ kausalyām āha bhūpatiḥ // 2.056.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasādaye tvāṃ kausalye racito 'yaṃ mayāñjaliḥ / vatsalā cānṛśaṃsā ca tvaṃ hi nityaṃ pareṣv api // 2.056.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhartā tu khalu nārīṇāṃ guṇavān nirguṇo 'pi vā / dharmaṃ vimṛśamānānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ devi daivatam // 2.056.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tvaṃ dharmaparā nityaṃ dṛṣṭalokaparāvara / nārhase vipriyaṃ vaktuṃ duḥkhitāpi suduḥkhitam // 2.056.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vākyaṃ karuṇaṃ rājñaḥ śrutvā dīnasya bhāṣitam / kausalyā vyasṛjad bāṣpaṃ praṇālīva navodakam // 2.056.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mūdrhṇi baddhvā rudatī rājñaḥ padmam ivāñjalim / saṃbhramād abravīt trastā tvaramāṇākṣaraṃ vacaḥ // 2.056.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasīda śirasā yāce bhūmau nitatitāsmi te / yācitāsmi hatā deva hantavyāhaṃ na hi tvayā // 2.056.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiṣā hi sā strī bhavati ślāghanīyena dhīmatā / ubhayor lokayor vīra patyā yā saṃprasādyate // 2.056.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānāmi dharmaṃ dharmajña tvāṃ jāne satyavādinam / putraśokārtayā tat tu mayā kim api bhāṣitam // 2.056.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śoko nāśayate dhairyaṃ śoko nāśayate śrutam / śoko nāśayate sarvaṃ nāsti śokasamo ripuḥ // 2.056.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śayam āpatitaḥ soḍhuṃ praharo ripuhastataḥ / soḍhum āpatitaḥ śokaḥ susūkṣmo 'pi na śakyate // 2.056.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanavāsāya rāmasya pañcarātro 'dya gaṇyate / yaḥ śokahataharṣāyāḥ pañcavarṣopamo mama // 2.056.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ hi cintayamānāyāḥ śoko 'yaṃ hṛdi vardhate / adīnām iva vegena samudrasalilaṃ mahat // 2.056.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ hi kathayantyās tu kausalyāyāḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ / mandaraśmir abhūt suryo rajanī cābhyavartata // 2.056.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha prahlādito vākyair devyā kausalyayā nṛpaḥ / śokena ca samākrānto nidrāyā vaśam eyivān // 2.056.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratibuddho muhur tena śokopahatacetanaḥ / atha rājā daśarathaḥ sa cintām abhyapadyata // 2.057.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmalakṣmaṇayoś caiva vivāsād vāsavopamam / āviveśopasargas taṃ tamaḥ sūryam ivāsuram // 2.057.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā rajanīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ rāme pravrajite vanam / ardharātre daśarathaḥ saṃsmaran duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam // 2.057.003.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyāṃ putraśokārtām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.057.003.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad ācarati kalyāṇi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham / tad eva labhate bhadre kartā karmajam ātmanaḥ // 2.057.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guru lāghavam arthānām ārambhe karmaṇāṃ phalam / doṣaṃ vā yo na jānāti sa bāla iti hocyate // 2.057.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaś cid āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca niṣiñcati / puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame // 2.057.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'ham āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca nyaṣecayam / rāmaṃ phalāgame tyaktvā paścāc chocāmi durmatiḥ // 2.057.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
labdhaśabdena kausalye kumāreṇa dhanuṣmatā / kumāraḥ śabdavedhīti mayā pāpam idaṃ kṛtam // 2.057.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad idaṃ me 'nusaṃprāptaṃ devi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // 2.057.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃmohād iha bālena yathā syād bhakṣitaṃ viṣam / evaṃ mamāpy avijñātaṃ śabdavedhyamayaṃ phalam // 2.057.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devy anūḍhā tvam abhavo yuvarājo bhavāmy aham / tataḥ prāvṛḍ anuprāptā madakāmavivardhinī // 2.057.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāsyahi rasān bhaumāṃs taptvā ca jagad aṃśubhiḥ / paretācaritāṃ bhīmāṃ ravir āviśate diśam // 2.057.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uṣṇam antardadhe sadyaḥ snigdhā dadṛśire ghanāḥ / tato jahṛṣire sarve bhekasāraṅgabarhiṇaḥ // 2.057.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patitenāmbhasā channaḥ patamānena cāsakṛt / ābabhau mattasāraṅgas toyarāśir ivācalaḥ // 2.057.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasminn atisukhe kāle dhanuṣmān iṣumān rathī / vyāyāma kṛtasaṃkalpaḥ sarayūm anvagāṃ nadīm // 2.057.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nipāne mahiṣaṃ rātrau gajaṃ vābhyāgataṃ nadīm / anyaṃ vā śvāpadaṃ kaṃ cij jighāṃsur ajitendriyaḥ // 2.057.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāndhakāre tv aśrauṣaṃ jale kumbhasya paryataḥ / acakṣur viṣaye ghoṣaṃ vāraṇasyeva nardataḥ // 2.057.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ śaram uddhṛtya dīptam āśīviṣopamam / amuñcaṃ niśitaṃ bāṇam aham āśīviṣopamam // 2.057.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra vāg uṣasi vyaktā prādurāsīd vanaukasaḥ / hā heti patatas toye vāg abhūt tatra mānuṣī // 2.057.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
katham asmadvidhe śastraṃ nipatet tu tapasvini // 2.057.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviviktāṃ nadīṃ rātrāv udāhāro 'ham āgataḥ / iṣuṇābhihataḥ kena kasya vā kiṃ kṛtaṃ mayā // 2.057.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣer hi nyasta daṇḍasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ / kathaṃ nu śastreṇa vadho madvidhasya vidhīyate // 2.057.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭābhāradharasyaiva valkalājinavāsasaḥ / ko vadhena mamārthī syāt kiṃ vāsyāpakṛtaṃ mayā // 2.057.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ niṣphalam ārabdhaṃ kevalānarthasaṃhitam / na kaś cit sādhu manyeta yathaiva gurutalpagam // 2.057.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nemaṃ tathānuśocāmi jīvitakṣayam ātmanaḥ / mātaraṃ pitaraṃ cobhāv anuśocāmi madvidhe // 2.057.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad etān mithunaṃ vṛddhaṃ cirakālabhṛtaṃ mayā / mayi pañcatvam āpanne kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayiṣyati // 2.057.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛddhau ca mātāpitarāv ahaṃ caikeṣuṇā hataḥ / kena sma nihatāḥ sarve subālenākṛtātmanā // 2.057.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ giraṃ karuṇāṃ śrutvā mama dharmānukāṅkṣiṇaḥ / karābhyāṃ saśaraṃ cāpaṃ vyathitasyāpatad bhuvi // 2.057.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ deśam aham āgamya dīnasattvaḥ sudurmanāḥ / apaśyam iṣuṇā tīre sarayvās tāpasaṃ hatam // 2.057.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mām udvīkṣya netrābhyāṃ trastam asvasthacetasaṃ / ity uvāca vacaḥ krūraṃ didhakṣann iva tejasā // 2.057.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tavāpakṛtaṃ rājan vane nivasatā mayā / jihīrṣiur ambho gurvarthaṃ yad ahaṃ tāḍitas tvayā // 2.057.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekena khalu bāṇena marmaṇy abhihate mayi / dvāv andhau nihatau vṛddhau mātā janayitā ca me // 2.057.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau nūnaṃ durbalāv andhau matpratīkṣau pipāsitau / ciram āśākṛtāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ kaṣṭāṃ saṃdhārayiṣyataḥ // 2.057.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na nūnaṃ tapaso vāsti phalayogaḥ śrutasya vā / pitā yan māṃ na jānāti śayānaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi // 2.057.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānann api ca kiṃ kuryād aśaktir aparikramaḥ / bhidyamānam ivāśaktas trātum anyo nago nagam // 2.057.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitus tvam eva me gatvā śīghram ācakṣva rāghava / na tvām anudahet kruddho vanaṃ vahnir ivaidhitaḥ // 2.057.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyam ekapadī rājan yato me pitur āśramaḥ / taṃ prasādaya gatvā tvaṃ na tvāṃ sa kupitaḥ śapet // 2.057.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśalyaṃ kuru māṃ rājan marma me niśitaḥ śaraḥ / ruṇaddhi mṛdu sotsedhaṃ tīram amburayo yathā // 2.057.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na dvijātir ahaṃ rājan mā bhūt te manaso vyathā / śūdrāyām asmi vaiśyena jāto janapadādhipa // 2.057.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
itīva vadataḥ kṛcchrād bāṇābhihatamarmaṇaḥ / tasya tv ānamyamānasya taṃ bāṇam aham uddharam // 2.057.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jalārdragātraṃ tu vilapya kṛcchān; marmavraṇaṃ saṃtatam ucchasantam / tataḥ sarayvāṃ tam ahaṃ śayānaṃ; samīkṣya bhadre subhṛśaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ // 2.057.039	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tad ajñānān mahat pāpaṃ kṛtvā saṃkulitendriyaḥ / ekas tv acintayaṃ buddhyā kathaṃ nu sukṛtaṃ bhavet // 2.058.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ ghaṭam ādaya pūrṇaṃ paramavāriṇā / āśramaṃ tam ahaṃ prāpya yathākhyātapathaṃ gataḥ // 2.058.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāhaṃ durbalāv andhau vṛddhāv apariṇāyakau / apaśyaṃ tasya pitarau lūnapakṣāv iva dvijau // 2.058.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tannimittābhir āsīnau kathābhir aparikramau / tām āśāṃ matkṛte hīnāv udāsīnāv anāthavat // 2.058.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padaśabdaṃ tu me śrutvā munir vākyam abhāṣata / kiṃ cirāyasi me putra pānīyaṃ kṣipram ānaya // 2.058.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yannimittam idaṃ tāta salile krīḍitaṃ tvayā / utkaṇṭhitā te māteyaṃ praviśa kṣipram āśramam // 2.058.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad vyalīkaṃ kṛtaṃ putra mātrā te yadi vā mayā / na tan manasi kartavyaṃ tvayā tāta tapasvinā // 2.058.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ gatis tv agatīnāṃ ca cakṣus tvaṃ hīnacakṣuṣām / samāsaktās tvayi prāṇāḥ kiṃ cin nau nābhibhāṣase // 2.058.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
munim avyaktayā vācā tam ahaṃ sajjamānayā / hīnavyañjanayā prekṣya bhīto bhīta ivābruvam // 2.058.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manasaḥ karma ceṣṭābhir abhisaṃstabhya vāgbalam / ācacakṣe tv ahaṃ tasmai putravyasanajaṃ bhayam // 2.058.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatriyo 'haṃ daśaratho nāhaṃ putro mahātmanaḥ / sajjanāvamataṃ duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ svakarmajam // 2.058.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavaṃś cāpahasto 'haṃ sarayūtīram āgataḥ / jighāṃsuḥ śvāpadaṃ kiṃ cin nipāne vāgataṃ gajam // 2.058.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra śruto mayā śabdo jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ / dvipo 'yam iti matvā hi bāṇenābhihato mayā // 2.058.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatvā nadyās tatas tīram apaśyam iṣuṇā hṛdi / vinirbhinnaṃ gataprāṇaṃ śayānaṃ bhuvi tāpasaṃ // 2.058.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavañ śabdam ālakṣya mayā gajajighāṃsunā / visṛṣṭo 'mbhasi nārācas tena te nihataḥ sutaḥ // 2.058.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa coddhṛtena bāṇena tatraiva svargam āsthitaḥ / bhagavantāv ubhau śocann andhāv iti vilapya ca // 2.058.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ajñānād bhavataḥ putraḥ sahasābhihato mayā / śeṣam evaṃgate yat syāt tat prasīdatu me muniḥ // 2.058.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ niḥśvasañ śokakarśitaḥ / mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // 2.058.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady etad aśubhaṃ karma na sma me kathayeḥ svayam / phalen mūrdhā sma te rājan sadyaḥ śatasahasradhā // 2.058.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatriyeṇa vadho rājan vānaprasthe viśeṣataḥ / jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ sthānāc cyāvayed api vajriṇam // 2.058.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ajñānād dhi kṛtaṃ yasmād idaṃ tenaiva jīvasi / api hy adya kulaṃ nasyād rāghavāṇāṃ kuto bhavān // 2.058.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naya nau nṛpa taṃ deśam iti māṃ cābhyabhāṣata / adya taṃ draṣṭum icchāvaḥ putraṃ paścimadarśanam // 2.058.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rudhireṇāvasitāṅgaṃ prakīrṇājinavāsasaṃ / śayānaṃ bhuvi niḥsaṃjñaṃ dharmarājavaśaṃ gatam // 2.058.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāham ekas taṃ deśaṃ nītvā tau bhṛśaduḥkhitau / asparśayam ahaṃ putraṃ taṃ muniṃ saha bhāryayā // 2.058.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau putram ātmanaḥ spṛṣṭvā tam āsādya tapasvinau / nipetatuḥ śarīre 'sya pitā cāsyedam abravīt // 2.058.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na nv ahaṃ te priyaḥ putra mātaraṃ paśya dhārmika / kiṃ nu nāliṅgase putra sukumāra vaco vada // 2.058.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya vāpararātre 'haṃ śroṣyāmi hṛdayaṃgamam / adhīyānasya madhuraṃ śāstraṃ vānyad viśeṣataḥ // 2.058.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko māṃ saṃdhyām upāsyaiva snātvā hutahutāśanaḥ / ślāghayiṣyaty upāsīnaḥ putraśokabhayārditam // 2.058.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kandamūlaphalaṃ hṛtvā ko māṃ priyam ivātithim / bhojayiṣyaty akarmaṇyam apragraham anāyakam // 2.058.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imām andhāṃ ca vṛddhāṃ ca mātaraṃ te tapasvinīm / kathaṃ putra bhariṣyāmi kṛpaṇāṃ putragardhinīm // 2.058.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiṣṭha mā mā gamaḥ putra yamasya sadanaṃ prati / śvo mayā saha gantāsi jananyā ca samedhitaḥ // 2.058.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhāv api ca śokārtāv anāthau kṛpaṇau vane / kṣipram eva gamiṣyāvas tvayā hīnau yamakṣayam // 2.058.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vaivasvataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ pravakṣyāmi bhāratīm / kṣamatāṃ dharmarājo me bibhṛyāt pitarāv ayam // 2.058.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apāpo 'si yathā putra nihataḥ pāpakarmaṇā / tena satyena gacchāśu ye lokāḥ śastrayodhinām // 2.058.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yānti śūrā gatiṃ yāṃ ca saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ / hatās tv abhimukhāḥ putra gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ vraja // 2.058.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāṃ gatiṃ sagaraḥ śaibyo dilīpo janamejayaḥ / nahuṣo dhundhumāraś ca prāptās tāṃ gaccha putraka // 2.058.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā gatiḥ sarvasādhūnāṃ svādhyāyāt patasaś ca yā / bhūmidasyāhitāgneś ca ekapatnīvratasya ca // 2.058.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gosahasrapradātṝṇāṃ yā yā gurubhṛtām api / dehanyāsakṛtāṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha putraka // 2.058.038.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi tv asmin kule jāto gacchaty akuśalāṃ gatim // 2.058.038.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa kṛpaṇaṃ tatra paryadevayatāsakṛt / tato 'smai kartum udakaṃ pravṛttaḥ saha bhāryayā // 2.058.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu divyena rūpeṇa muniputraḥ svakarmabhiḥ / āśvāsya ca muhūrtaṃ tu pitarau vākyam abravīt // 2.058.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthānam asmi mahat prāpto bhavatoḥ paricāraṇāt / bhavantāv api ca kṣipraṃ mama mūlam upaiṣyataḥ // 2.058.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu divyena vimānena vapuṣmatā / āruroha divaṃ kṣipraṃ muniputro jitendriyaḥ // 2.058.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kṛtvā tūdakaṃ tūrṇaṃ tāpasaḥ saha bhāryayā / mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // 2.058.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyaiva jahi māṃ rājan maraṇe nāsti me vyathā / yac chareṇaikaputraṃ māṃ tvam akārṣīr aputrakam // 2.058.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā tu yad avijñānān nihato me sutaḥ śuciḥ / tena tvām abhiśapsyāmi suduḥkham atidāruṇam // 2.058.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putravyasanajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad etan mama sāmpratam / evaṃ tvaṃ putraśokena rājan kālaṃ kariṣyasi // 2.058.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmān mām āgataṃ bhadre tasyodārasya tadvacaḥ / yad ahaṃ putraśokena saṃtyakṣyāmy adya jīvitam // 2.058.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi māṃ saṃspṛśed rāmaḥ sakṛd adyālabheta vā / na tan me sadṛśaṃ devi yan mayā rāghave kṛtam // 2.058.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cakṣuṣā tvāṃ na paśyāmi smṛtir mama vilupyate / dūtā vaivasvatasyaite kausalye tvarayanti mām // 2.058.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad ahaṃ jīvitakṣaye / na hi paśyāmi dharmajñaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākyamam // 2.058.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na te manuṣyā devās te ye cāruśubhakuṇḍalam / mukhaṃ drakṣyanti rāmasya varṣe pañcadaśe punaḥ // 2.058.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmapatrekṣaṇaṃ subhru sudaṃṣṭraṃ cārunāsikam / dhanyā drakṣyanti rāmasya tārādhipanibhaṃ mukham // 2.058.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśaṃ śāradasyendoḥ phullasya kamalasya ca / sugandhi mama nāthasya dhanyā drakṣyanti tanmukham // 2.058.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivṛttavanavāsaṃ tam ayodhyāṃ punar āgatam / drakṣyanti sukhino rāmaṃ śukraṃ mārgagataṃ yathā // 2.058.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayam ātmabhavaḥ śoko mām anātham acetanam / saṃsādayati vegena yathā kūlaṃ nadīrayaḥ // 2.058.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hā rāghava mahābāho hā mamāyāsa nāśana / rājā daśarathaḥ śocañ jīvitāntam upāgamat // 2.058.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tu dīnaṃ kathayan narādhipaḥ; priyasya putrasya vivāsanāturaḥ / gate 'rdharātre bhṛśaduḥkhapīḍitas; tadā jahau prāṇam udāradarśanaḥ // 2.058.057	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ prātar evāpare 'hani / bandinaḥ paryupātiṣṭhaṃs tat pārthivaniveśanam // 2.059.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śucisamācārāḥ paryupasthāna kovidaḥ / strīvarṣavarabhūyiṣṭhā upatasthur yathāpuram // 2.059.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haricandanasaṃpṛktam udakaṃ kāñcanair ghaṭaiḥ / āninyuḥ snānaśikṣājñā yathākālaṃ yathāvidhi // 2.059.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maṅgalālambhanīyāni prāśanīyān upaskarān / upaninyus tathāpy anyāḥ kumārī bahulāḥ striyaḥ // 2.059.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha yāḥ kosalendrasya śayanaṃ pratyanantarāḥ / tāḥ striyas tu samāgamya bhartāraṃ pratyabodhayan // 2.059.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tā vepathuparītāś ca rājñaḥ prāṇeṣu śaṅkitāḥ / pratisrotas tṛṇāgrāṇāṃ sadṛśaṃ saṃcakampire // 2.059.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha saṃvepamanānāṃ strīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam / yat tad āśaṅkitaṃ pāpaṃ tasya jajñe viniścayaḥ // 2.059.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pracukruśur dīnāḥ sasvaraṃ tā varāṅganāḥ / kareṇava ivāraṇye sthānapracyutayūthapāḥ // 2.059.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsām ākranda śabdena sahasodgatacetane / kausalyā ca sumitrāca tyaktanidre babhūvatuḥ // 2.059.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā ca sumitrā ca dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam / hā nātheti parikruśya petatur dharaṇītale // 2.059.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā kosalendraduhitā veṣṭamānā mahītale / na babhrāja rajodhvastā tāreva gaganacyutā // 2.059.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat samuttrastasaṃbhrāntaṃ paryutsukajanākulam / sarvatas tumulākrandaṃ paritāpārtabāndhavam // 2.059.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadyo nipatitānandaṃ dīnaviklavadarśanam / babhūva naradevasya sadma diṣṭāntam īyuṣaḥ // 2.059.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atītam ājñāya tu pārthivarṣabhaṃ; yaśasvinaṃ saṃparivārya patnayaḥ / bhṛśaṃ rudantyaḥ karuṇaṃ suduḥkhitāḥ; pragṛhya bāhū vyalapann anāthavat // 2.059.014	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tam agnim iva saṃśāntam ambuhīnam ivārṇavam / hataprabham ivādityaṃ svargathaṃ prekṣya bhūmipam // 2.060.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā bāṣpapūrṇākṣī vividhaṃ śokakarśitā / upagṛhya śiro rājñaḥ kaikeyīṃ pratyabhāṣata // 2.060.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakāmā bhava kaikeyi bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam / tyaktvā rājānam ekāgrā nṛśaṃse duṣṭacāriṇi // 2.060.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vihāya māṃ gato rāmo bhartā ca svargato mama / vipathe sārthahīneva nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // 2.060.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhartāraṃ taṃ parityajya kā strī daivatam ātmanaḥ / icchej jīvitum anyatra kaikeyyās tyaktadharmaṇaḥ // 2.060.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na lubdho budhyate doṣān kiṃ pākam iva bhakṣayan / kubjānimittaṃ kaikeyyā rāghavāṇān kulaṃ hatam // 2.060.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aniyoge niyuktena rājñā rāmaṃ vivāsitam / sabhāryaṃ janakaḥ śrutvā patitapsyaty ahaṃ yathā // 2.060.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaḥ kamalapatrākṣo jīvanāśam ito gataḥ / videharājasya sutā tahā sītā tapasvinī // 2.060.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duḥkhasyānucitā duḥkhaṃ vane paryudvijiṣyati // 2.060.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nadatāṃ bhīmaghoṣāṇāṃ niśāsu mṛgapakṣiṇām / niśamya nūnaṃ saṃstrastā rāghavaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // 2.060.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛddhaś caivālpaputraś ca vaidehīm anicintayan / so 'pi śokasamāviṣṭo nanu tyakṣyati jīvitam // 2.060.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tataḥ saṃpariṣvajya vilapantīṃ tapasvinīm / vyapaninyuḥ suduḥkhārtāṃ kausalyāṃ vyāvahārikāḥ // 2.060.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tailadroṇyām athāmātyāḥ saṃveśya jagatīpatim / rājñaḥ sarvāṇy athādiṣṭāś cakruḥ karmāṇy anantaram // 2.060.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tu saṃkalanaṃ rājño vinā putreṇa mantriṇaḥ / sarvajñāḥ kartum īṣus te tato rakṣanti bhūmipam // 2.060.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tailadroṇyāṃ tu sacivaiḥ śāyitaṃ taṃ narādhipam / hā mṛto 'yam iti jñātvā striyas tāḥ paryadevayan // 2.060.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāhūn udyamya kṛpaṇā netraprasravaṇair mukhaiḥ / rudantyaḥ śokasaṃtaptāḥ kṛpaṇaṃ paryadevayan // 2.060.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśānakṣatrahīneva strīva bhartṛvivarjitā / purī nārājatāyodhyā hīnā rājñā mahātmanā // 2.060.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṣpaparyākulajanā hāhābhūtakulāṅganā / śūnyacatvaraveśmāntā na babhrāja yathāpuram // 2.060.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gataprabhā dyaur iva bhāskaraṃ vinā; vyapetanakṣatragaṇeva śarvarī / purī babhāse rahitā mahātmanā; na cāsrakaṇṭhākulamārgacatvarā // 2.060.018	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
narāś ca nāryaś ca sametya saṃghaśo; vigarhamāṇā bharatasya mātaram / tadā nagaryāṃ naradevasaṃkṣaye; babhūvur ārtā na ca śarma lebhire // 2.060.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
vyatītāyāṃ tu śarvaryām ādityasyodaye tataḥ / sametya rājakartāraḥ sabhām īyur dvijātayaḥ // 2.061.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārkaṇḍeyo 'tha maudgalyo vāmadevaś ca kāśyapaḥ / kātyayano gautamaś ca jābāliś ca mahāyaśāḥ // 2.061.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete dvijāḥ sahāmātyaiḥ pṛthag vācam udīrayan / vasiṣṭham evābhimukhāḥ śreṣṭho rājapurohitam // 2.061.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atītā śarvarī duḥkhaṃ yā no varṣaśatopamā / asmin pañcatvam āpanne putraśokena pārthive // 2.061.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svargataś ca mahārājo rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ / lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tejasvī rāmeṇaiva gataḥ saha // 2.061.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhau bharataśatrughnau kkekayeṣu paraṃtapau / pure rājagṛhe ramye mātāmahaniveśane // 2.061.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇām ihādyaiva kaś cid rājā vidhīyatām / arājakaṃ hi no rāṣṭraṃ na vināśam avāpnuyāt // 2.061.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārājale janapade vidyunmālī mahāsvanaḥ / abhivarṣati parjanyo mahīṃ divyena vāriṇā // 2.061.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārājake janapade bījamuṣṭiḥ prakīryate / nārākake pituḥ putro bhāryā vā vartate vaśe // 2.061.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arājake dhanaṃ nāsti nāsti bhāryāpy arājake / idam atyāhitaṃ cānyat kutaḥ satyam arājake // 2.061.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārājake janapade kārayanti sabhāṃ narāḥ / udyānāni ca ramyāṇi hṛṣṭāḥ puṇyagṛhāṇi ca // 2.061.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārājake janapade yajñaśīlā dvijātayaḥ / satrāṇy anvāsate dāntā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // 2.061.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārājake janapade prabhūtanaṭanartakāḥ / utsavāś ca samājāś ca vardhante rāṣṭravardhanāḥ // 2.061.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārajake janapade siddhārthā vyavahāriṇaḥ / kathābhir anurajyante kathāśīlāḥ kathāpriyaiḥ // 2.061.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārājake janapade vāhanaiḥ śīghragāmibhiḥ / narā niryānty araṇyāni nārībhiḥ saha kāminaḥ // 2.061.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārākaje janapade dhanavantaḥ surakṣitāḥ / śerate vivṛta dvārāḥ kṛṣigorakṣajīvinaḥ // 2.061.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārājake janapade vaṇijo dūragāminaḥ / gacchanti kṣemam adhvānaṃ bahupuṇyasamācitāḥ // 2.061.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārājake janapade caraty ekacaro vaśī / bhāvayann ātmanātmānaṃ yatrasāyaṃgṛho muniḥ // 2.061.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārājake janapade yogakṣemaṃ pravartate / na cāpy arājake senā śatrūn viṣahate yudhi // 2.061.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā hy anudakā nadyo yathā vāpy atṛṇaṃ vanam / agopālā yathā gāvas tathā rāṣṭram arājakam // 2.061.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārājake janapade svakaṃ bhavati kasya cit / matsyā iva narā nityaṃ bhakṣayanti parasparam // 2.061.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yehi saṃbhinnamaryādā nāstikāś chinnasaṃśayāḥ / te 'pi bhāvāya kalpante rājadaṇḍanipīḍitāḥ // 2.061.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃ cana / rājā cen na bhaveṃl loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī // 2.061.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jīvaty api mahārāje tavaiva vacanaṃ vayam / nātikramāmahe sarve velāṃ prāpyeva sāgaraḥ // 2.061.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa naḥ samīkṣya dvijavaryavṛttaṃ; nṛpaṃ vinā rājyam araṇyabhūtam / kumāram ikṣvākusutaṃ vadānyaṃ; tvam eva rājānam ihābhiṣiñcaya // 2.061.025	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha / mitrāmātyagaṇān sarvān brāhmaṇāṃs tān idaṃ vacaḥ // 2.062.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad asau mātulakule pure rājagṛhe sukhī / bharato vasati bhrātrā śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // 2.062.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chīghraṃ javanā dūtā gacchantu tvaritair hayaiḥ / ānetuṃ bhrātarau vīrau kiṃ samīkṣāmahe vayam // 2.062.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gacchantv iti tataḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abruvan / teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt // 2.062.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ehi siddhārtha vijaya jayantāśokanandana / śrūyatām itikartavyaṃ sarvān eva bravīmi vaḥ // 2.062.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puraṃ rājagṛhaṃ gatvā śīghraṃ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ / tyaktaśokair idaṃ vācyaḥ śāsanād bharato mama // 2.062.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purohitas tvāṃ kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ / tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // 2.062.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā cāsmai proṣitaṃ rāmaṃ mā cāsmai pitaraṃ mṛtam / bhavantaḥ śaṃsiṣur gatvā rāghavāṇām imaṃ kṣayam // 2.062.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca / kṣipram ādāya rājñaś ca bharatasya ca gacchata // 2.062.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhenābhyanujñātā dūtāḥ saṃtvaritā yayuḥ // 2.062.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te hastina pure gaṅgāṃ tīrtvā pratyaṅmukhā yayuḥ / pāñcāladeśam āsādya madhyena kurujāṅgalam // 2.062.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te prasannodakāṃ divyāṃ nānāvihagasevitām / upātijagmur vegena śaradaṇḍāṃ janākulām // 2.062.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nikūlavṛkṣam āsādya divyaṃ satyopayācanam / abhigamyābhivādyaṃ taṃ kuliṅgāṃ prāviśan purīm // 2.062.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhikālaṃ tataḥ prāpya tejo'bhibhavanāc cyutāḥ / yayur madhyena bāhlīkān sudāmānaṃ ca parvatam // 2.062.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣṇoḥ padaṃ prekṣamāṇā vipāśāṃ cāpi śālmalīm // 2.062.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te śrāntavāhanā dūtā vikṛṣṭena satā pathā / giri vrajaṃ pura varaṃ śīghram āsedur añjasā // 2.062.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhartuḥ priyārthaṃ kularakṣaṇārthaṃ; bhartuś ca vaṃśasya parigrahārtham / aheḍamānās tvarayā sma dūtā; rātryāṃ tu te tat puram eva yātāḥ // 2.062.015	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
yām eva rātriṃ te dūtāḥ praviśanti sma tāṃ purīm / bharatenāpi tāṃ rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭo 'yam apriyaḥ // 2.063.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyuṣṭām eva tu tāṃ rātriṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ svapnam apriyam / putro rājādhirājasya subhṛśaṃ paryatapyata // 2.063.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapyamānaṃ samājñāya vayasyāḥ priyavādinaḥ / āyāsaṃ hi vineṣyantaḥ sabhāyāṃ cakrire kathāḥ // 2.063.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
