vādayanti tathā śāntiṃ lāsayanty api cāpare / nāṭakāny apare prāhur hāsyāni vividhāni ca // 2.063.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tair mahātmā bharataḥ sakhibhiḥ priya vādibhiḥ / goṣṭhīhāsyāni kurvadbhir na prāhṛṣyata rāghavaḥ // 2.063.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam abravīt priyasakho bharataṃ sakhibhir vṛtam / suhṛdbhiḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kiṃ sakhe nānumodase // 2.063.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ suhṛdaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha / śṛṇu tvaṃ yan nimittaṃme dainyam etad upāgatam // 2.063.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svapne pitaram adrākṣaṃ malinaṃ muktamūrdhajam / patantam adriśikharāt kaluṣe gomaye hrade // 2.063.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plavamānaś ca me dṛṣṭaḥ sa tasmin gomayahrade / pibann añjalinā tailaṃ hasann iva muhur muhuḥ // 2.063.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tilodanaṃ bhuktvā punaḥ punar adhaḥśirāḥ / tailenābhyaktasarvāṅgas tailam evāvagāhata // 2.063.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svapne 'pi sāgaraṃ śuṣkaṃ candraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi / sahasā cāpi saṃśantaṃ jvalitaṃ jātavedasaṃ // 2.063.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avadīrṇāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ śuṣkāṃś ca vividhān drumān / ahaṃ paśyāmi vidhvastān sadhūmāṃś caiva pārvatān // 2.063.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pīṭhe kārṣṇāyase cainaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ kṛṣṇavāsasaṃ / prahasanti sma rājānaṃ pramadāḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalāḥ // 2.063.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaramāṇaś ca dharmātmā raktamālyānulepanaḥ / rathena kharayuktena prayāto dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // 2.063.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam etan mayā dṛṣṭam imāṃ rātriṃ bhayāvahām / ahaṃ rāmo 'tha vā rājā lakṣmaṇo vā mariṣyati // 2.063.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naro yānena yaḥ svapne kharayuktena yāti hi / acirāt tasya dhūmāgraṃ citāyāṃ saṃpradṛśyate // 2.063.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etannimittaṃ dīno 'haṃ tan na vaḥ pratipūjaye // 2.063.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuṣyatīva ca me kaṇṭho na svastham iva me manaḥ / jugupsann iva cātmānaṃ na ca paśyāmi kāraṇam // 2.063.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ hi duḥsvapnagatiṃ niśāmya tām; anekarūpām avitarkitāṃ purā / bhayaṃ mahat tad dhṛdayān na yāti me; vicintya rājānam acintyadarśanam // 2.063.018	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
bharate bruvati svapnaṃ dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ / praviśyāsahyaparikhaṃ ramyaṃ rājagṛhaṃ puram // 2.064.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāgamya tu rājñā ca rājaputreṇa cārcitāḥ / rājñaḥ pādau gṛhītvā tu tam ūcur bharataṃ vacaḥ // 2.064.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purohitas tvā kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ / tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // 2.064.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra viṃśatikoṭyas tu nṛpater mātulasya te / daśakoṭyas tu saṃpūrṇās tathaiva ca nṛpātmaja // 2.064.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane / dūtān uvāca bharataḥ kāmaiḥ saṃpratipūjya tān // 2.064.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit sukuśalī rājā pitā daśaratho mama / kaccic cārāgatā rāme lakṣmaṇe vā mahātmani // 2.064.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āryā ca dharmaniratā dharmajñā dharmadarśinī / arogā cāpi kausalyā mātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ // 2.064.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit sumitrā dharmajñā jananī lakṣmaṇasya yā / śatrughnasya ca vīrasya sārogā cāpi madhyamā // 2.064.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmakāmā sadā caṇḍī krodhanā prājñamāninī / arogā cāpi kaikeyī mātā me kim uvāca ha // 2.064.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktās tu te dūtā bharatena mahātmanā / ūcuḥ saṃpraśritaṃ vākyam idaṃ taṃ bharataṃ tadā // 2.064.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśalās te naravyāghra yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi // 2.064.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataś cāpi tān dūtān evam ukto 'bhyabhāṣata / āpṛcche 'haṃ mahārājaṃ dūtāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // 2.064.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu tān dūtān bharataḥ pārthivātmajaḥ / dūtaiḥ saṃcodito vākyaṃ mātāmaham uvāca ha // 2.064.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājan pitur gamiṣyāmi sakāśaṃ dūtacoditaḥ / punar apy aham eṣyāmi yadā me tvaṃ smariṣyasi // 2.064.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatenaivam uktas tu nṛpo mātāmahas tadā / tam uvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śirasy āghrāya rāghavam // 2.064.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaccha tātānujāne tvāṃ kaikeyī suprajās tvayā / mātaraṃ kuśalaṃ brūyāḥ pitaraṃ ca paraṃtapa // 2.064.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purohitaṃ ca kuśalaṃ ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ / tau ca tāta maheṣvāsau bhrātaru rāmalakṣmaṇau // 2.064.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmai hastyuttamāṃś citrān kambalān ajināni ca / abhisatkṛtya kaikeyo bharatāya dhanaṃ dadau // 2.064.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rukma niṣkasahasre dve ṣoḍaśāśvaśatāni ca / satkṛtya kaikeyī putraṃ kekayo dhanam ādiśat // 2.064.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathāmātyān abhipretān viśvāsyāṃś ca guṇānvitān / dadāv aśvapatiḥ śīghraṃ bharatāyānuyāyinaḥ // 2.064.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
airāvatān aindraśirān nāgān vai priyadarśanān / kharāñ śīghrān susaṃyuktān mātulo 'smai dhanaṃ dadau // 2.064.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antaḥpure 'tisaṃvṛddhān vyāghravīryabalānvitān / daṃṣṭrāyudhān mahākāyāñ śunaś copāyanaṃ dadau // 2.064.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mātāmaham āpṛcchya mātulaṃ ca yudhājitam / ratham āruhya bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // 2.064.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathān maṇḍalacakrāṃś ca yojayitvā paraḥśatam / uṣṭrago'śvakharair bhṛtyā bharataṃ yāntam anvayuḥ // 2.064.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balena gupto bharato mahātmā; sahāryakasyātmasamair amātyaiḥ / ādāya śatrughnam apetaśatrur; gṛhād yayau siddha ivendralokāt // 2.064.024	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa prāṅmukho rājagṛhād abhiniryāya vīryavān / hrādinīṃ dūrapārāṃ ca pratyaksrotas taraṅgiṇīm // 2.065.001.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatadrūm atarac chrīmān nadīm ikṣvākunandanaḥ // 2.065.001.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eladhāne nadīṃ tīrtvā prāpya cāparaparpaṭān / śilām ākurvatīṃ tīrtvā āgneyaṃ śalyakartanam // 2.065.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyasaṃdhaḥ śuciḥ śrīmān prekṣamāṇaḥ śilāvahām / atyayāt sa mahāśailān vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ prati // 2.065.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
veginīṃ ca kuliṅgākhyāṃ hrādinīṃ parvatāvṛtām / yamunāṃ prāpya saṃtīrṇo balam āśvāsayat tadā // 2.065.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śītīkṛtya tu gātrāṇi klāntān āśvāsya vājinaḥ / tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca prāyād ādāya codakam // 2.065.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājaputro mahāraṇyam anabhīkṣṇopasevitam / bhadro bhadreṇa yānena mārutaḥ kham ivātyayāt // 2.065.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
toraṇaṃ dakṣiṇārdhena jambūprastham upāgamat / varūthaṃ ca yayau ramyaṃ grāmaṃ daśarathātmajaḥ // 2.065.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra ramye vane vāsaṃ kṛtvāsau prāṅmukho yayau / udyānam ujjihānāyāḥ priyakā yatra pādapāḥ // 2.065.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sālāṃs tu priyakān prāpya śīghrān āsthāya vājinaḥ / anujñāpyātha bharato vāhinīṃ tvarito yayau // 2.065.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāsaṃ kṛtvā sarvatīrthe tīrtvā cottānakāṃ nadīm / anyā nadīś ca vividhāḥ pārvatīyais turaṃgamaiḥ // 2.065.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hastipṛṣṭhakam āsādya kuṭikām atyavartata / tatāra ca naravyāghro lauhitye sa kapīvatīm // 2.065.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekasāle sthāṇumatīṃ vinate gomatīṃ nadīm // 2.065.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaliṅga nagare cāpi prāpya sālavanaṃ tadā / bharataḥ kṣipram āgacchat supariśrāntavāhanaḥ // 2.065.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanaṃ ca samatītyāśu śarvaryām aruṇodaye / ayodhyāṃ manunā rājñā nirmitāṃ sa dadarśa ha // 2.065.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ purīṃ puruṣavyāghraḥ saptarātroṣiṭaḥ pathi / ayodhyām agrato dṛṣṭvā rathe sārathim abravīt // 2.065.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā nātipratītā me puṇyodyānā yaśasvinī / ayodhyā dṛśyate dūrāt sārathe pāṇḍumṛttikā // 2.065.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajvabhir guṇasaṃpannair brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ / bhūyiṣṭham ṛṣhair ākīrṇā rājarṣivarapālitā // 2.065.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyāyāṃ purāśabdaḥ śrūyate tumulo mahān / samantān naranārīṇāṃ tam adya na śṛṇomy aham // 2.065.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udyānāni hi sāyāhne krīḍitvoparatair naraiḥ / samantād vipradhāvadbhiḥ prakāśante mamānyadā // 2.065.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāny adyānurudantīva parityaktāni kāmibhiḥ / araṇyabhūteva purī sārathe pratibhāti me // 2.065.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy atra yānair dṛśyante na gajair na ca vājibhiḥ / niryānto vābhiyānto vā naramukhyā yathāpuram // 2.065.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aniṣṭāni ca pāpāni paśyāmi vividhāni ca / nimittāny amanojñāni tena sīdati te manaḥ // 2.065.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvāreṇa vaijayantena prāviśac chrāntavāhanaḥ / dvāḥsthair utthāya vijayaṃ pṛṣṭas taiḥ sahito yayau // 2.065.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tv anekāgrahṛdayo dvāḥsthaṃ pratyarcya taṃ janam / sūtam aśvapateḥ klāntam abravīt tatra rāghavaḥ // 2.065.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutā no yādṛśāḥ pūrvaṃ nṛpatīnāṃ vināśane / ākārās tān ahaṃ sarvān iha paśyāmi sārathe // 2.065.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
malinaṃ cāśrupūrṇākṣaṃ dīnaṃ dhyānaparaṃ kṛśam / sastrī puṃsaṃ ca paśyāmi janam utkaṇṭhitaṃ pure // 2.065.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā bharataḥ sūtaṃ taṃ dīnamānasaḥ / tāny aniṣṭāny ayodhyāyāṃ prekṣya rājagṛhaṃ yayau // 2.065.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ śūnyaśṛṅgāṭakaveśmarathyāṃ; rajo'ruṇadvārakapāṭayantrām / dṛṣṭvā purīm indrapurī prakāśāṃ; duḥkhena saṃpūrṇataro babhūva // 2.065.027	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
bahūni paśyan manaso 'priyāṇi; yāny annyadā nāsya pure babhūvuḥ / avākśirā dīnamanā nahṛṣṭaḥ; pitur mahātmā praviveśa veśma // 2.065.028	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
apaśyaṃs tu tatas tatra pitaraṃ pitur ālaye / jagāma bharato draṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ mātur ālaye // 2.066.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anuprāptaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyī proṣitaṃ sutam / utpapāta tadā hṛṣṭā tyaktvā sauvarṇamānasaṃ // 2.066.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa praviśyaiva dharmātmā svagṛhaṃ śrīvivarjitam / bharataḥ prekṣya jagrāha jananyāś caraṇau śubhau // 2.066.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ mūrdhni samupāghrāya pariṣvajya yaśasvinam / aṅke bharatam āropya praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // 2.066.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya te kati cid rātryaś cyutasyāryakaveśmanaḥ / api nādhvaśramaḥ śīghraṃ rathenāpatatas tava // 2.066.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āryakas te sukuśalo yudhājin mātulas tava / pravāsāc ca sukhaṃ putra sarvaṃ me vaktum arhasi // 2.066.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ pṛṣṭhas tu kaikeyyā priyaṃ pārthivanandanaḥ / ācaṣṭa bharataḥ sarvaṃ mātre rājīvalocanaḥ // 2.066.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya me saptamī rātriś cyutasyāryakaveśmanaḥ / ambāyāḥ kuśalī tāto yudhājin mātulaś ca me // 2.066.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yan me dhanaṃ ca ratnaṃ ca dadau rājā paraṃtapaḥ / pariśrāntaṃ pathy abhavat tato 'haṃ pūrvam āgataḥ // 2.066.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājavākyaharair dūtais tvaryamāṇo 'ham āgataḥ / yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi tad ambā vaktum arhasi // 2.066.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūnyo 'yaṃ śayanīyas te paryaṅko hemabhūṣitaḥ / na cāyam ikṣvākujanaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ pratibhāti me // 2.066.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā bhavati bhūyiṣṭhgam ihāmbāyā niveśane / tam ahaṃ nādya paśyāmi draṣṭum icchann ihāgataḥ // 2.066.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitur grahīṣye caraṇau taṃ mamākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ / āhosvid amba jyeṣṭhāyāḥ kausalyāyā niveśane // 2.066.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ pratyuvāca kaikeyī priyavad ghoram apriyam / ajānantaṃ prajānantī rājyalobhena mohitā // 2.066.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ te pitā gataḥ // 2.066.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ dharmābhijanavāñ śuciḥ / papāta sahasā bhūmau pitṛśokabalārditaḥ // 2.066.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śokena saṃvītaḥ pitur maraṇaduḥkhitaḥ / vilalāpa mahātejā bhrāntākulitacetanaḥ // 2.066.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat suruciraṃ bhāti pitur me śayanaṃ purā / tad idaṃ na vibhāty adya vihīnaṃ tena dhīmatā // 2.066.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ārtaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ samīkṣya patitaṃ bhuvi / utthāpayitvā śokārtaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // 2.066.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha kiṃ śeṣe rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ / tvadvidhā na hi śocanti santaḥ sadasi saṃmatāḥ // 2.066.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rudatyā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmau viparivṛtya ca / jananīṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ // 2.066.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣekṣyati rāmaṃ tu rājā yajñaṃ nu yakṣyati / ity ahaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpo hṛṣṭo yātrām ayāsiṣam // 2.066.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad idaṃ hy anyathā bhūtaṃ vyavadīrṇaṃ mano mama / pitaraṃ yo na paśyāmi nityaṃ priyahite ratam // 2.066.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amba kenātyagād rājā vyādhinā mayy anāgate / dhanyā rāmādayaḥ sarve yaiḥ pitā saṃskṛtaḥ svayam // 2.066.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na nūnaṃ māṃ mahārājaḥ prāptaṃ jānāti kīrtimān / upajighred dhi māṃ mūrdhni tātaḥ saṃnamya satvaram // 2.066.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva sa pāṇiḥ sukhasparśas tātasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / yena māṃ rajasā dhvastam abhīkṣṇaṃ parimārjati // 2.066.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo me bhrātā pitā bandhur yasya dāso 'smi dhīmataḥ / tasya māṃ śīghram ākhyāhi rāmasyākliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ // 2.066.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitā hi bhavati jyeṣṭho dharmam āryasya jānataḥ / tasya pādau grahīṣyāmi sa hīdānīṃ gatir mama // 2.066.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārye kim abravīd rājā pitā me satyavikramaḥ / paścimaṃ sādhusaṃdeśam icchāmi śrotum ātmanaḥ // 2.066.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti pṛṣṭā yathātattvaṃ kaikeyī vākyam abravīt / rāmeti rājā vilapan hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca // 2.066.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mahātmā paraṃ lokaṃ gato gatimatāṃ varaḥ // 2.066.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ tu paścimāṃ vācaṃ vyājahāra pitā tava / kāla dharmaparikṣiptaḥ pāśair iva mahāgajaḥ // 2.066.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siddhārthās tu narā rāmam āgataṃ sītayā saha / lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // 2.066.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā viṣasādaiva dvitīyā priyaśaṃsanāt / viṣaṇṇavadano bhūtvā bhūyaḥ papraccha mātaram // 2.066.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva cedānīṃ sa dharmātmā kausalyānandavardhanaḥ / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca samaṃ gataḥ // 2.066.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā pṛṣṭā yathātattvam ākhyātum upacakrame / mātāsya yugapad vākyaṃ vipriyaṃ priyaśaṅkayā // 2.066.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi rājasutaḥ putra cīravāsā mahāvanam / daṇḍakān saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇānucaro gataḥ // 2.066.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā bharatas trasto bhrātuś cāritraśaṅkayā / svasya vaṃśasya māhātmyāt praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // 2.066.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin na brāhmaṇavadhaṃ hṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasya cit / kaccin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ // 2.066.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin na paradārān vā rājaputro 'bhimanyate / kasmāt sa daṇḍakāraṇye bhrūṇaheva vivāsitaḥ // 2.066.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāsya capalā mātā tat svakarma yathātatham / tenaiva strīsvabhāvena vyāhartum upacakrame // 2.066.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na brāhmaṇa dhanaṃ kiṃcid dhṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasya cit / kaś cin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ // 2.066.040.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na rāmaḥ paradārāṃś ca cakṣurbhyām api paśyati // 2.066.040.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā tu putra śrutvaiva rāmasyaivābhiṣecanam / yācitas te pitā rājyaṃ rāmasya ca vivāsanam // 2.066.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa svavṛttiṃ samāsthāya pitā te tat tathākarot / rāmaś ca sahasaumitriḥ preṣitaḥ saha sītayā // 2.066.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam apaśyan priyaṃ putraṃ mahīpālo mahāyaśāḥ / putraśokaparidyūnaḥ pañcatvam upapedivān // 2.066.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā tv idānīṃ dharmajña rājatvam avalambyatām / tvatkṛte hi mayā sarvam idam evaṃvidhaṃ kṛtam // 2.066.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat putra śīghraṃ vidhinā vidhijñair; vasiṣṭhamukhyaiḥ sahito dvijendraiḥ / saṃkālya rājānam adīnasattvam; ātmānam urvyām abhiṣecayasva // 2.066.045	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
śrutvā tu pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ bhrātaru ca vivāsitau / bharato duḥkhasaṃtapta idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.067.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nuṇkāryaṃ hatasyeha mama rājyena śocataḥ / vihīnasyātha pitrā ca bhrātrā pitṛsamena ca // 2.067.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duḥkhe me duḥkham akaror vraṇe kṣāram ivādadhāḥ / rājānaṃ pretabhāvasthaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ ca tāpasaṃ // 2.067.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kulasya tvam abhāvāya kālarātrir ivāgatā / aṅgāram upagūhya sma pitā me nāvabuddhavān // 2.067.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā ca sumitrā ca putraśokābhipīḍite / duṣkaraṃ yadi jīvetāṃ prāpya tvāṃ jananīṃ mama // 2.067.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nanu tv āryo 'pi dharmātmā tvayi vṛttim anuttamām / vartate guruvṛttijño yathā mātari vartate // 2.067.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā jyeṣṭhā hi me mātā kausalyā dīrghadarśinī / tvayi dharmaṃ samāsthāya bhaginyām iva vartate // 2.067.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāḥ putraṃ kṛtātmānaṃ cīravalkalavāsasaṃ / prasthāpya vanavāsāya kathaṃ pāpe na śocasi // 2.067.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apāpadarśinaṃ śūraṃ kṛtātmānaṃ yaśasvinam / pravrājya cīravasanaṃ kiṃ nu paśyasi kāraṇam // 2.067.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lubdhāyā vidito manye na te 'haṃ rāghavaṃ prati / tathā hy anartho rājyārthaṃ tvayā nīto mahān ayam // 2.067.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ hi puruṣavyāghrāv apaśyan rāmalakṣmaṇau / kena śaktiprabhāvena rājyaṃ rakṣitum utsahe // 2.067.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ hi nityaṃ mahārājo balavantaṃ mahābalaḥ / apāśrito 'bhūd dharmātmā merur meruvanaṃ yathā // 2.067.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ katham imaṃ bhāraṃ mahādhuryasamudyatam / damyo dhuram ivāsādya saheyaṃ kena caujasā // 2.067.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā me bhavec chaktir yogair buddhibalena vā / sakāmāṃ na kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ putragardhinīm // 2.067.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivartayiṣyāmi vanād bhrātaraṃ svajanapriyam // 2.067.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā bharato mahātmā; priyetarair vākyagaṇais tudaṃs tām / śokāturaś cāpi nanāda bhūyaḥ; siṃho yathā parvatagahvarasthaḥ // 2.067.015	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tāṃ tathā garhayitvā tu mātaraṃ bharatas tadā / roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ // 2.068.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyād bhraṃśasva kaikeyi nṛśaṃse duṣṭacāriṇi / parityaktā ca dharmeṇa mā mṛtaṃ rudatī bhava // 2.068.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu te 'dūṣayad rājā rāmo vā bhṛśadhārmikaḥ / yayor mṛtyur vivāsaś ca tvatkṛte tulyam āgatau // 2.068.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrūṇahatyām asi prāptā kulasyāsya vināśanāt / kaikeyi narakaṃ gaccha mā ca bhartuḥ salokatām // 2.068.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tvayā hīdṛśaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoreṇa karmaṇā / sarvalokapriyaṃ hitvā mamāpy āpāditaṃ bhayam // 2.068.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvatkṛte me pitā vṛtto rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ / ayaśo jīvaloke ca tvayāhaṃ pratipāditaḥ // 2.068.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātṛrūpe mamāmitre nṛśaṃse rājyakāmuke / na te 'ham abhibhāṣyo 'smi durvṛtte patighātini // 2.068.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā mama mātaraḥ / duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭās tvāṃ prāpya kuladūṣiṇīm // 2.068.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tvam aśvapateḥ kanyā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ / rākṣasī tatra jātāsi kulapradhvaṃsinī pituḥ // 2.068.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tvayā dhārmiko rāmo nityaṃ satyaparāyaṇaḥ / vanaṃ prasthāpito duḥkhāt pitā ca tridivaṃ gataḥ // 2.068.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat pradhānāsi tat pāpaṃ mayi pitrā vinākṛte / bhrātṛbhyāṃ ca parityakte sarvalokasya cāpriye // 2.068.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyāṃ dharmasaṃyuktāṃ viyuktāṃ pāpaniścaye / kṛtvā kaṃ prāpsyase tv adya lokaṃ nirayagāminī // 2.068.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nāvabudhyase krūre niyataṃ bandhusaṃśrayam / jyeṣṭhaṃ pitṛsamaṃ rāmaṃ kausalyāyātmasaṃbhavam // 2.068.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgapratyaṅgajaḥ putro hṛdayāc cāpi jāyate / tasmāt priyataro mātuḥ priyatvān na tu bāndhavaḥ // 2.068.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyadā kila dharmajñā surabhiḥ surasaṃmatā / vahamānau dadarśorvyāṃ putrau vigatacetasau // 2.068.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv ardhadivase śrāntau dṛṣṭvā putrau mahītale / ruroda putra śokena bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇā // 2.068.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhastād vrajatas tasyāḥ surarājño mahātmanaḥ / bindavaḥ patitā gātre sūkṣmāḥ surabhigandhinaḥ // 2.068.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokasaṃtaptāṃ vajrapāṇir yaśasvinīm / indraḥ prāñjalir udvignaḥ surarājo 'bravīd vacaḥ // 2.068.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhayaṃ kaccin na cāsmāsu kutaś cid vidyate mahat / kuto nimittaḥ śokas te brūhi sarvahitaiṣiṇi // 2.068.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu surabhiḥ surarājena dhīmatā / patyuvāca tato dhīrā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradā // 2.068.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāntaṃ pātaṃ na vaḥ kiṃ cit kutaś cid amarādhipa / ahaṃ tu magnau śocāmi svaputrau viṣame sthitau // 2.068.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etau dṛṣṭvā kṛṣau dīnau sūryaraśmipratāpinau / vadhyamānau balīvardau karṣakeṇa surādhipa // 2.068.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama kāyāt prasūtau hi duḥkhitau bhāra pīḍitau / yau dṛṣṭvā paritapye 'haṃ nāsti putrasamaḥ priyaḥ // 2.068.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasyāḥ putra sahasrāṇi sāpi śocati kāmadhuk / kiṃ punar yā vinā rāmaṃ kausalyā vartayiṣyati // 2.068.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekaputrā ca sādhvī ca vivatseyaṃ tvayā kṛtā / tasmāt tvaṃ satataṃ duḥkhaṃ pretya ceha ca lapsyase // 2.068.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ hy apacitiṃ bhrātuḥ pituś ca sakalām imām / vardhanaṃ yaśasaś cāpi kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // 2.068.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānāyayitvā tanayaṃ kausalyāyā mahādyutim / svayam eva pravekṣyāmi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam // 2.068.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti nāga ivāraṇye tomarāṅkuśacoditaḥ / papāta bhuvi saṃkruddho niḥśvasann iva pannagaḥ // 2.068.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃraktanetraḥ śithilāmbaras tadā; vidhūtasarvābharaṇaḥ paraṃtapaḥ / babhūva bhūmau patito nṛpātmajaḥ; śacīpateḥ ketur ivotsavakṣaye // 2.068.029	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
tathaiva krośatas tasya bharatasya mahātmanaḥ / kausalyā śabdam ājñāya sumitrām idam abravīt // 2.069.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgataḥ krūrakāryāyāḥ kaikeyyā bharataḥ sutaḥ / tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi bharataṃ dīrghadarśinam // 2.069.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā sumitrāṃ sā vivarṇā malināmbarā / pratasthe bharato yatra vepamānā vicetanā // 2.069.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu rāmānujaś cāpi śatrughnasahitas tadā / pratasthe bharato yatra kausalyāyā niveśanam // 2.069.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śatrughna bharatau kausalyāṃ prekṣya duḥkhitau / paryaṣvajetāṃ duḥkhārtāṃ patitāṃ naṣṭacetanām // 2.069.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataṃ pratyuvācedaṃ kausalyā bhṛśaduḥkhitā / idaṃ te rājyakāmasya rājyaṃ prāptam akaṇṭakam // 2.069.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃprāptaṃ bata kaikeyyā śīghraṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā // 2.069.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasthāpya cīravasanaṃ putraṃ me vanavāsinam / kaikeyī kaṃ guṇaṃ tatra paśyati krūradarśinī // 2.069.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣipraṃ mām api kaikeyī prasthāpayitum arhati / hiraṇyanābho yatrāste suto me sumahāyaśāḥ // 2.069.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā svayam evāhaṃ sumitrānucarā sukham / agnihotraṃ puraskṛtya prasthāsye yatra rāghavaḥ // 2.069.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ vā svayam evādya tatra māṃ netum arhasi / yatrāsau puruṣavyāghras tapyate me tapaḥ sutaḥ // 2.069.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ hi tava vistīrṇaṃ dhanadhānyasamācitam / hastyaśvarathasaṃpūrṇaṃ rājyaṃ niryātitaṃ tayā // 2.069.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vilapamānāṃ tāṃ bharataḥ prāñjalis tadā / kausalyāṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtām // 2.069.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārye kasmād ajānantaṃ garhase mām akilbiṣam / vipulāṃ ca mama prītiṃ sthirāṃ jānāsi rāghave // 2.069.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtā śāstrānugā buddhir mā bhūt tasya kadā cana / satyasaṃdhaḥ satāṃ śreṣṭho yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praiṣyaṃ pāpīyasāṃ yātu sūryaṃ ca prati mehatu / hantu pādena gāṃ suptāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kārayitvā mahat karma bhartā bhṛtyam anarthakam / adharmo yo 'sya so 'syās tu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paripālayamānasya rājño bhūtāni putravat / tatas tu druhyatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
baliṣaḍbhāgam uddhṛtya nṛpasyārakṣataḥ prajāḥ / adharmo yo 'sya so 'syāstu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃśrutya ca tapasvibhyaḥ satre vai yajñadakṣiṇām / tāṃ vipralapatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hastyaśvarathasaṃbādhe yuddhe śastrasamākule / mā sma kārṣīt satāṃ dharmaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upadiṣṭaṃ susūkṣmārthaṃ śāstraṃ yatnena dhīmatā / sa nāśayatu duṣṭātmā yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ chāgaṃ vṛthā so 'śnātu nirghṛṇaḥ / gurūṃś cāpy avajānātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putrair dāraiś ca bhṛtyaiś ca svagṛhe parivāritaḥ / sa eko mṛṣṭam aśnātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājastrībālavṛddhānāṃ vadhe yat pāpam ucyate / bhṛtyatyāge ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // 2.069.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhe saṃdhye śayānasya yat pāpaṃ parikalpyate / tac ca pāpaṃ bhavet tasya yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad agnidāyake pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ gurutalpage / mitradrohe ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // 2.069.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca mātā pitros tathaiva ca / mā sma kārṣīt sa śuśrūṣāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satāṃ lokāt satāṃ kīrtyāḥ sajjuṣṭāt karmaṇas tathā / bhraśyatu kṣipram adyaiva yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // 2.069.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vihīnāṃ patiputrābhyāṃ kausalyāṃ pārthivātmajaḥ / evam āśvasayann eva duḥkhārto nipapāta ha // 2.069.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tu śapathaiḥ kaṣṭaiḥ śapamānam acetanam / bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // 2.069.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama duḥkham idaṃ putra bhūyaḥ samupajāyate / śapathaiḥ śapamāno hi prāṇān uparuṇatsi me // 2.069.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā na calito dharmād ātmā te sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / vatsa satyapratijño me satāṃ lokān avāpsyasi // 2.069.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vilapamānasya duḥkhārtasya mahātmanaḥ / mohāc ca śokasaṃrodhād babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // 2.069.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lālapyamānasya vicetanasya; pranaṣṭabuddheḥ patitasya bhūmau / muhur muhur niḥśvasataś ca dīrghaṃ; sā tasya śokena jagāma rātriḥ // 2.069.034	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tam evaṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ bharataṃ kekayīsutam / uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhavāg ṛṣiḥ // 2.070.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaṃ śokena bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ / prāptakālaṃ narapateḥ kuru saṃyānam uttaram // 2.070.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhasya vacaḥ śrutvā bharato dhāraṇāṃ gataḥ / pretakāryāṇi sarvāṇi kārayām āsa dharmavit // 2.070.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uddhṛtaṃ tailasaṃkledāt sa tu bhūmau niveśitam / āpītavarṇavadanaṃ prasuptam iva bhūmipam // 2.070.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niveśya śayane cāgrye nānāratnapariṣkṛte / tato daśarathaṃ putro vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ // 2.070.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ rājan proṣite mayy anāgate / vivāsya rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // 2.070.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva yāsyasi mahārāja hitvemaṃ duḥkhitaṃ janam / hīnaṃ puruṣasiṃhena rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā // 2.070.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yogakṣemaṃ tu te rājan ko 'smin kalpayitā pure / tvayi prayāte svas tāta rāme ca vanam āśrite // 2.070.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhavā pṛthivī rājaṃs tvayā hīnā na rājate / hīnacandreva rajanī nagarī pratibhāti mām // 2.070.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vilapamānaṃ taṃ bharataṃ dīnamānasaṃ / abravīd vacanaṃ bhūyo vasiṣṭhas tu mahān ṛṣiḥ // 2.070.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pretakāryāṇi yāny asya kartavyāni viśāmpateḥ / tāny avyagraṃ mahābāho kriyatām avicāritam // 2.070.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti bharato vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasyābhipūjya tat / ṛtvikpurohitācāryāṃs tvarayām āsa sarvaśaḥ // 2.070.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tv agrato narendrasya agny agārād bahiṣkṛtāḥ / ṛtvigbhir yājakaiś caiva te hriyante yathāvidhi // 2.070.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śibilāyām athāropya rājānaṃ gatacetanam / bāṣpakaṇṭhā vimanasas tam ūhuḥ paricārakāḥ // 2.070.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca / prakiranto janā mārgaṃ nṛpater agrato yayuḥ // 2.070.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candanāguruniryāsān saralaṃ padmakaṃ tathā / devadārūṇi cāhṛtya citāṃ cakrus tathāpare // 2.070.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandhān uccāvacāṃś cānyāṃs tatra dattvātha bhūmipam / tataḥ saṃveśayām āsuś citāmadhye tam ṛtvijaḥ // 2.070.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā hutāśanaṃ hutvā jepus tasya tadartvijaḥ / jaguś ca te yathāśāstraṃ tatra sāmāni sāmagāḥ // 2.070.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śibikābhiś ca yānaiś ca yathārhaṃ tasya yoṣitaḥ / nagarān niryayus tatra vṛddhaiḥ parivṛtās tadā // 2.070.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasavyaṃ cāpi taṃ cakrur ṛtvijo 'gnicitaṃ nṛpam / striyaś ca śokasaṃtaptāḥ kausalyā pramukhās tadā // 2.070.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krauñcīnām iva nārīṇāṃ ninādas tatra śuśruve / ārtānāṃ karuṇaṃ kāle krośantīnāṃ sahasraśaḥ // 2.070.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rudantyo vivaśā vilapya ca punaḥ punaḥ / yānebhyaḥ sarayūtīram avaterur varāṅganāḥ // 2.070.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtodakaṃ te bharatena sārdhaṃ; nṛpāṅganā mantripurohitāś ca / puraṃ praviśyāśruparītanetrā; bhūmau daśāhaṃ vyanayanta duḥkham // 2.070.023	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tato daśāhe 'tigate kṛtaśauco nṛpātmajaḥ / dvādaśe 'hani saṃprāpte śrāddhakarmāṇy akārayat // 2.071.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇebhyo dadau ratnaṃ dhanam annaṃ ca puṣkalam / bāstikaṃ bahuśuklaṃ ca gāś cāpi śataśas tathā // 2.071.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dāsīdāsaṃ ca yānaṃ ca veśmāni sumahānti ca / brāhmaṇebhyo dadau putro rājñas tasyaurdhvadaihikam // 2.071.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prabhātasamaye divase 'tha trayodaśe / vilalāpa mahābāhur bharataḥ śokamūrchitaḥ // 2.071.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śabdāpihitakaṇṭhaś ca śodhanārtham upāgataḥ / citāmūle pitur vākyam idam āha suduḥkhitaḥ // 2.071.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāta yasmin niṣṛṣṭo 'haṃ tvayā bhrātari rāghave / tasmin vanaṃ pravrajite śūnye tyakto 'smy ahaṃ tvayā // 2.071.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāgatir anāthāyāḥ putraḥ pravrājito vanam / tām ambāṃ tāta kausalyāṃ tyaktvā tvaṃ kva gato nṛpa // 2.071.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā bhasmāruṇaṃ tac ca dagdhāsthisthānamaṇḍalam / pituḥ śarīra nirvāṇaṃ niṣṭanan viṣasāda ha // 2.071.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dṛṣṭvā rudan dīnaḥ papāta dharaṇītale / utthāpyamānaḥ śakrasya yantra dhvaja iva cyutaḥ // 2.071.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhipetus tataḥ sarve tasyāmātyāḥ śucivratam / antakāle nipatitaṃ yayātim ṛṣayo yathā // 2.071.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughnaś cāpi bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā śokapariplutam / visaṃjño nyapatad bhūmau bhūmipālam anusmaran // 2.071.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
unmatta iva niścetā vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ / smṛtvā pitur guṇāṅgāni tāni tāni tadā tadā // 2.071.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantharā prabhavas tīvraḥ kaikeyīgrāhasaṃkulaḥ / varadānamayo 'kṣobhyo 'majjayac chokasāgaraḥ // 2.071.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukumāraṃ ca bālaṃ ca satataṃ lālitaṃ tvayā / kva tāta bharataṃ hitvā vilapantaṃ gato bhavān // 2.071.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nanu bhojyeṣu pāneṣu vastreṣv ābharaṇeṣu ca / pravārayasi naḥ sarvāṃs tan naḥ ko 'dya kariṣyati // 2.071.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avadāraṇa kāle tu pṛthivī nāvadīryate / vihīnā yā tvayā rājñā dharmajñena mahātmanā // 2.071.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitari svargam āpanne rāme cāraṇyam āśrite / kiṃ me jīvita sāmarthyaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam // 2.071.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hīno bhrātrā ca pitrā ca śūnyām ikṣvākupālitām / ayodhyāṃ na pravekṣyāmi pravekṣyāmi tapovanam // 2.071.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayor vilapitaṃ śrutvā vyasanaṃ cānvavekṣya tat / bhṛśam ārtatarā bhūyaḥ sarva evānugāminaḥ // 2.071.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato viṣaṇṇau śrāntau ca śatrughna bharatāv ubhau / dharaṇyāṃ saṃvyaceṣṭetāṃ bhagnaśṛṅgāv ivarṣabhau // 2.071.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prakṛtimān vaidyaḥ pitur eṣāṃ purohitaḥ / vasiṣṭho bharataṃ vākyam utthāpya tam uvāca ha // 2.071.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trīṇi dvandvāni bhūteṣu pravṛttāny aviśeṣataḥ / teṣu cāparihāryeṣu naivaṃ bhavitum arhati // 2.071.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantraś cāpi śatrughnam utthāpyābhiprasādya ca / śrāvayām āsa tattvajñaḥ sarvabhūtabhavābhavau // 2.071.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utthitau tau naravyāghrau prakāśete yaśasvinau / varṣātapapariklinnau pṛthag indradhvajāv iva // 2.071.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśrūṇi parimṛdnantau raktākṣau dīnabhāṣiṇau / amātyās tvarayanti sma tanayau cāparāḥ kriyāḥ // 2.071.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra yātrāṃ samīhantaṃ śatrughno lakṣmaṇānujaḥ / bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.072.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatir yaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ duḥkhe kiṃ punar ātmanaḥ / sa rāmaḥ sattva saṃpannaḥ striyā pravrājito vanam // 2.072.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balavān vīrya saṃpanno lakṣmaṇo nāma yo 'py asau / kiṃ na mocayate rāmaṃ kṛtvāpi pitṛnigraham // 2.072.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvam eva tu nigrāhyaḥ samavekṣya nayānayau / utpathaṃ yaḥ samārūḍho nāryā rājā vaśaṃ gataḥ // 2.072.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti saṃbhāṣamāṇe tu śatrughne lakṣmaṇānuje / prāgdvāre 'bhūt tadā kubjā sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā // 2.072.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
liptā candanasāreṇa rājavastrāṇi bibhratī / mekhalā dāmabhiś citrai rajjubaddheva vānarī // 2.072.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ samīkṣya tadā dvāḥstho bhṛśaṃ pāpasya kāriṇīm / gṛhītvākaruṇaṃ kubjāṃ śatrughnāya nyavedayat // 2.072.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasyāḥ kṛte vane rāmo nyastadehaś ca vaḥ pitā / seyaṃ pāpā nṛśaṃsā ca tasyāḥ kuru yathāmati // 2.072.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughnaś ca tad ājñāya vacanaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ / antaḥpuracarān sarvān ity uvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // 2.072.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tīvram utpāditaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ me tathā pituḥ / yayā seyaṃ nṛśaṃsasya karmaṇaḥ phalam aśnutām // 2.072.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā ca tenāśu sakhī janasamāvṛtā / gṛhītā balavat kubjā sā tadgṛham anādayat // 2.072.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ subhṛśa saṃtaptas tasyāḥ sarvaḥ sakhījanaḥ / kruddham ājñāya śatrughnaṃ vyapalāyata sarvaśaḥ // 2.072.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amantrayata kṛtsnaś ca tasyāḥ sarvasakhījanaḥ / yathāyaṃ samupakrānto niḥśeṣaṃ naḥ kariṣyati // 2.072.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sānukrośāṃ vadānyāṃ ca dharmajñāṃ ca yaśasvinīm / kausalyāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmaḥ sā hi no 'stu dhruvā gatiḥ // 2.072.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca roṣeṇa tāmrākṣaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ / vicakarṣa tadā kubjāṃ krośantīṃ pṛthivītale // 2.072.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyā hy ākṛṣyamāṇāyā mantharāyās tatas tataḥ / citraṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tad vyaśīryata // 2.072.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena bhāṇḍena saṃkīrṇaṃ śrīmadrājaniveśanam / aśobhata tadā bhūyaḥ śāradaṃ gaganaṃ yathā // 2.072.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa balī balavat krodhād gṛhītvā puruṣarṣabhaḥ / kaikeyīm abhinirbhartsya babhāṣe paruṣaṃ vacaḥ // 2.072.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair vākyaiḥ paruṣair duḥkhaiḥ kaikeyī bhṛśaduḥkhitā / śatrughna bhayasaṃtrastā putraṃ śaraṇam āgatā // 2.072.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ prekṣya bharataḥ kruddhaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt / avadhyāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pramadāḥ kṣamyatām iti // 2.072.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanyām aham imāṃ pāpāṃ kaikeyīṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm / yadi māṃ dhārmiko rāmo nāsūyen mātṛghātakam // 2.072.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imām api hatāṃ kubjāṃ yadi jānāti rāghavaḥ / tvāṃ ca māṃ caiva dharmātmā nābhibhāṣiṣyate dhruvam // 2.072.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā śatrughno lakṣmaṇānujaḥ / nyavartata tato roṣāt tāṃ mumoca ca mantharām // 2.072.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā pādamūle kaikeyyā mantharā nipapāta ha / niḥśvasantī suduḥkhārtā kṛpaṇaṃ vilalāpa ca // 2.072.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughnavikṣepavimūḍhasaṃjñāṃ; samīkṣya kubjāṃ bharatasya mātā / śanaiḥ samāśvāsayad ārtarūpāṃ; krauñcīṃ vilagnām iva vīkṣamāṇām // 2.072.025	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ prabhātasamaye divase 'tha caturdaśe / sametya rājakartāro bharataṃ vākyam abruvan // 2.073.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gato daśarathaḥ svargaṃ yo no gurutaro guruḥ / rāmaṃ pravrājya vai jyeṣṭhaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // 2.073.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvam adya bhava no rājā rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ / saṃgatyā nāparādhnoti rājyam etad anāyakam // 2.073.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ābhiṣecanikaṃ sarvam idam ādāya rāghava / pratīkṣate tvāṃ svajanaḥ śreṇayaś ca nṛpātmaja // 2.073.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyaṃ gṛhāṇa bharata pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat / abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ pāhi cāsmān nararṣabha // 2.073.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ābhiṣecanikaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛtvā sarvaṃ pradakṣiṇam / bharatas taṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ pratyuvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // 2.073.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyeṣṭhasya rājatā nityam ucitā hi kulasya naḥ / naivaṃ bhavanto māṃ vaktum arhanti kuśalā janāḥ // 2.073.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaḥ pūrvo hi no bhrātā bhaviṣyati mahīpatiḥ / ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi varṣāṇi nava pañca ca // 2.073.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yujyatāṃ mahatī senā caturaṅgamahābalā / ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāghavaṃ vanāt // 2.073.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ābhiṣecanikaṃ caiva sarvam etad upaskṛtam / puraskṛtya gamiṣyāmi rāmahetor vanaṃ prati // 2.073.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatraiva taṃ naravyāghram abhiṣicya puraskṛtam / āneṣyāmi tu vai rāmaṃ havyavāham ivādhvarāt // 2.073.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na sakāmā kariṣyāmi svam imāṃ mātṛgandhinīm / vane vatsyāmy ahaṃ durge rāmo rājā bhaviṣyati // 2.073.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kriyatāṃ śilpibhiḥ panthāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca / rakṣiṇaś cānusaṃyāntu pathi durgavicārakāḥ // 2.073.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇaṃ taṃ rāmahetor nṛpātmajam / pratyuvāca janaḥ sarvaḥ śrīmadvākyam anuttamam // 2.073.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya padmā śrīr upatiṣṭhatām / yas tvaṃ jyeṣṭhe nṛpasute pṛthivīṃ dātum icchasi // 2.073.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anuttamaṃ tad vacanaṃ nṛpātmaja; prabhāṣitaṃ saṃśravaṇe niśamya ca / praharṣajās taṃ prati bāṣpabindavo; nipetur āryānananetrasaṃbhavāḥ // 2.073.016	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
ūcus te vacanam idaṃ niśamya hṛṣṭāḥ; sāmātyāḥ sapariṣado viyātaśokāḥ / panthānaṃ naravarabhaktimāñ janaś ca; vyādiṣṭas tava vacanāc ca śilpivargaḥ // 2.073.017	praharṣiṇī [mnjrg]
atha bhūmipradeśajñāḥ sūtrakarmaviśāradāḥ / svakarmābhiratāḥ śūrāḥ khanakā yantrakās tathā // 2.074.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karmāntikāḥ sthapatayaḥ puruṣā yantrakovidāḥ / tathā vardhakayaś caiva mārgiṇo vṛkṣatakṣakāḥ // 2.074.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kūpakārāḥ sudhākārā vaṃśakarmakṛtas tathā / samarthā ye ca draṣṭāraḥ puratas te pratasthire // 2.074.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu harṣāt tam uddeśaṃ janaugho vipulaḥ prayān / aśobhata mahāvegaḥ sāgarasyeva parvaṇi // 2.074.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te svavāraṃ samāsthāya vartmakarmāṇi kovidāḥ / karaṇair vividhopetaiḥ purastāt saṃpratasthire // 2.074.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
latāvallīś ca gulmāṃś ca sthāṇūn aśmana eva ca / janās te cakrire mārgaṃ chindanto vividhān drumān // 2.074.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avṛkṣeṣu ca deśeṣu ke cid vṛkṣān aropayan / ke cit kuṭhāraiṣ ṭaṅkaiś ca dātraiś chindan kva cit kva cit // 2.074.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apare vīraṇastambān balino balavattarāḥ / vidhamanti sma durgāṇi sthalāni ca tatas tataḥ // 2.074.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apare 'pūrayan kūpān pāṃsubhiḥ śvabhram āyatam / nimnabhāgāṃs tathā ke cit samāṃś cakruḥ samantataḥ // 2.074.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babandhur bandhanīyāṃś ca kṣodyān saṃcukṣudus tadā / bibhidur bhedanīyāṃś ca tāṃs tān deśān narās tadā // 2.074.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acireṇaiva kālena parivāhān bahūdakān / cakrur bahuvidhākārān sāgarapratimān bahūn // 2.074.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udapānān bahuvidhān vedikā parimaṇḍitān // 2.074.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sasudhākuṭṭimatalaḥ prapuṣpitamahīruhaḥ / mattodghuṣṭadvijagaṇaḥ patākābhir alaṃkṛtaḥ // 2.074.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candanodakasaṃsikto nānākusumabhūṣitaḥ / bahv aśobhata senāyāḥ panthāḥ svargapathopamaḥ // 2.074.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājñāpyātha yathājñapti yuktās te 'dhikṛtā narāḥ / ramaṇīyeṣu deśeṣu bahusvāduphaleṣu ca // 2.074.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo niveśas tv abhipreto bharatasya mahātmanaḥ / bhūyas taṃ śobhayām āsur bhūṣābhir bhūṣaṇopamam // 2.074.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nakṣatreṣu praśasteṣu muhūrteṣu ca tadvidaḥ / niveśaṃ sthāpayām āsur bharatasya mahātmanaḥ // 2.074.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahupāṃsucayāś cāpi parikhāparivāritāḥ / tatrendrakīlapratimāḥ pratolīvaraśobhitāḥ // 2.074.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāsādamālāsaṃyuktāḥ saudhaprākārasaṃvṛtāḥ / patākā śobhitāḥ sarve sunirmitamahāpathāḥ // 2.074.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visarpatbhir ivākāśe viṭaṅkāgravimānakaiḥ / samucchritair niveśās te babhuḥ śakrapuropamāḥ // 2.074.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāhnavīṃ tu samāsādya vividhadruma kānanām / śītalāmalapānīyāṃ mahāmīnasamākulām // 2.074.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sacandratārāgaṇamaṇḍitaṃ yathā; nabhaḥkṣapāyām amalaṃ virājate / narendramārgaḥ sa tathā vyarājata; krameṇa ramyaḥ śubhaśilpinirmitaḥ // 2.074.021	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato nāndīmukhīṃ rātriṃ bharataṃ sūtamāgadhāḥ / tuṣṭuvur vāgviśeṣajñāḥ stavair maṅgalasaṃhitaiḥ // 2.075.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suvarṇakoṇābhihataḥ prāṇadad yāmadundubhiḥ / dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśo vādyāṃś coccāvacasvarān // 2.075.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tūrya ghoṣaḥ sumahān divam āpūrayann iva / bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ bhūyaḥ śokair arandhrayat // 2.075.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato prabuddho bharatas taṃ ghoṣaṃ saṃnivartya ca / nāhaṃ rājeti cāpy uktvā śatrughnam idam abravīt // 2.075.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya śatrughna kaikeyyā lokasyāpakṛtaṃ mahat / visṛjya mayi duḥkhāni rājā daśaratho gataḥ // 2.075.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaiṣā dharmarājasya dharmamūlā mahātmanaḥ / paribhramati rājaśrīr naur ivākarṇikā jale // 2.075.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ bharataṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ vicetanam / kṛpaṇaṃ ruruduḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ yoṣitas tadā // 2.075.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tasmin vilapati vasiṣṭho rājadharmavit / sabhām ikṣvākunāthasya praviveśa mahāyaśāḥ // 2.075.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāta kumbhamayīṃ ramyāṃ maṇiratnasamākulām / sudharmām iva dharmātmā sagaṇaḥ pratyapadyata // 2.075.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kāñcanamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ parārdhyāstaraṇāvṛtam / adhyāsta sarvavedajño dūtān anuśaśāsa ca // 2.075.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān yodhān amātyān gaṇaballabhān / kṣipram ānayatāvyagrāḥ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ hi naḥ // 2.075.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato halahalāśabdo mahān samudapadyata / rathair aśvair gajaiś cāpi janānām upagacchatām // 2.075.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bharatam āyāntaṃ śatakratum ivāmarāḥ / pratyanandan prakṛtayo yathā daśarathaṃ tathā // 2.075.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hrada iva timināgasaṃvṛtaḥ; stimitajalo maṇiśaṅkhaśarkaraḥ / daśarathasutaśobhitā sabhā; sadaśaratheva babhau yathā purā // 2.075.014	aparavaktra (1,3: nnrlg, 2,4: njjr)
tām āryagaṇasaṃpūrṇāṃ bharataḥ pragrahāṃ sabhām / dadarśa buddhisaṃpannaḥ pūrṇacandrāṃ niśām iva // 2.076.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsanāni yathānyāyam āryāṇāṃ viśatāṃ tadā / adṛśyata ghanāpāye pūrṇacandreva śarvarī // 2.076.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājñas tu prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ samagrāḥ prekṣya dharmavit / idaṃ purohito vākyaṃ bharataṃ mṛdu cābravīt // 2.076.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāta rājā daśarathaḥ svargato dharmam ācaran / dhana dhānyavatīṃ sphītāṃ pradāya pṛthivīṃ tava // 2.076.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmas tathā satyadhṛtiḥ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran / nājahāt pitur ādeśaṃ śaśī jyotsnām ivoditaḥ // 2.076.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitrā bhrātrā ca te dattaṃ rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam / tad bhuṅkṣva muditāmātyaḥ kṣipram evābhiṣecaya // 2.076.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udīcyāś ca pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kevalāḥ / koṭyāparāntāḥ sāmudrā ratnāny abhiharantu te // 2.076.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ śokenābhipariplutaḥ / jagāma manasā rāmaṃ dharmajño dharmakāṅkṣayā // 2.076.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bāṣpakalayā vācā kalahaṃsasvaro yuvā / vilalāpa sabhāmadhye jagarhe ca purohitam // 2.076.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caritabrahmacaryasya vidyā snātasya dhīmataḥ / dharme prayatamānasya ko rājyaṃ madvidho haret // 2.076.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ daśarathāj jāto bhaved rājyāpahārakaḥ / rājyaṃ cāhaṃ ca rāmasya dharmaṃ vaktum ihārhasi // 2.076.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca dharmātmā dilīpanahuṣopamaḥ / labdhum arhati kākutstho rājyaṃ daśaratho yathā // 2.076.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anāryajuṣṭam asvargyaṃ kuryāṃ pāpam ahaṃ yadi / ikṣvākūṇām ahaṃ loke bhaveyaṃ kulapāṃsanaḥ // 2.076.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad dhi mātrā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ nāhaṃ tad abhirocaye / ihastho vanadurgasthaṃ namasyāmi kṛtāñjaliḥ // 2.076.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmam evānugacchāmi sa rājā dvipadāṃ varaḥ / trayāṇām api lokānāṃ rāghavo rājyam arhati // 2.076.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vākyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāsadaḥ / harṣān mumucur aśrūṇi rāme nihitacetasaḥ // 2.076.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tv āryaṃ na śakṣyāmi vinivartayituṃ vanāt / vane tatraiva vatsyāmi yathāryo lakṣmaṇas tathā // 2.076.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvopāyaṃ tu vartiṣye vinivartayituṃ balāt / samakṣam ārya miśrāṇāṃ sādhūnāṃ guṇavartinām // 2.076.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ / samīpastham uvācedaṃ sumantraṃ mantrakovidam // 2.076.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tūrṇam utthāya gaccha tvaṃ sumantra mama śāsanāt / yātrām ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balaṃ caiva samānaya // 2.076.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ sumantras tu bharatena mahātmanā / prahṛṣṭaḥ so 'diśat sarvaṃ yathā saṃdiṣṭam iṣṭavat // 2.076.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ prakṛtayo balādhyakṣā balasya ca / śrutvā yātrāṃ samājñaptāṃ rāghavasya nivartane // 2.076.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yodhāṅganāḥ sarvā bhartṝn sarvān gṛhegṛhe / yātrā gamanam ājñāya tvarayanti sma harṣitāḥ // 2.076.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te hayair gorathaiḥ śīghraiḥ syandanaiś ca manojavaiḥ / saha yodhair balādhyakṣā balaṃ sarvam acodayan // 2.076.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sajjaṃ tu tad balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bharato gurusaṃnidhau / rathaṃ me tvarayasveti sumantraṃ pārśvato 'bravīt // 2.076.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasya tu tasyājñāṃ pratigṛhya praharṣitaḥ / rathaṃ gṛhītvā prayayau yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ // 2.076.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiḥ pratāpavān; bruvan suyuktaṃ dṛḍhasatyavikramaḥ / guruṃ mahāraṇyagataṃ yaśasvinaṃ; prasādayiṣyan bharato 'bravīt tadā // 2.076.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tūṇa samutthāya sumantra gaccha; balasya yogāya balapradhānān / ānetum icchāmi hi taṃ vanasthaṃ; prasādya rāmaṃ jagato hitāya // 2.076.028	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [Btjgl], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa sūtaputro bharatena samyag; ājñāpitaḥ saṃparipūrṇakāmaḥ / śaśāsa sarvān prakṛtipradhānān; balasya mukhyāṃś ca suhṛjjanaṃ ca // 2.076.029	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ samutthāya kule kule te; rājanyavaiśyā vṛṣalāś ca viprāḥ / ayūyujann uṣṭrarathān kharāṃś ca; nāgān hayāṃś caiva kulaprasūtān // 2.076.030	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ samutthitaḥ kālyam āsthāya syandanottamam / prayayau bharataḥ śīghraṃ rāmadarśanakāṅkṣayā // 2.077.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agrataḥ prayayus tasya sarve mantripurodhasaḥ / adhiruhya hayair yuktān rathān sūryarathopamān // 2.077.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
navanāgasahasrāṇi kalpitāni yathāvidhi / anvayur bharataṃ yāntam ikṣvāku kulanandanam // 2.077.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṣaṣṭhī rathasahasrāṇi dhanvino vividhāyudhāḥ / anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // 2.077.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śataṃ sahasrāṇy aśvānāṃ samārūḍhāni rāghavam / anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // 2.077.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyī ca sumitrā ca kausalyā ca yaśasvinī / rāmānayanasaṃhṛṣṭā yayur yānena bhāsvatā // 2.077.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prayātāś cāryasaṃghātā rāmaṃ draṣṭuṃ salakṣmaṇam / tasyaiva ca kathāś citrāḥ kurvāṇā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ // 2.077.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
meghaśyāmaṃ mahābāhuṃ sthirasattvaṃ dṛḍhavratam / kadā drakṣyāmahe rāmaṃ jagataḥ śokanāśanam // 2.077.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭa eva hi naḥ śokam apaneṣyati rāghavaḥ / tamaḥ sarvasya lokasya samudyann iva bhāskaraḥ // 2.077.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ kathayantas te saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ / pariṣvajānāś cānyonyaṃ yayur nāgarikās tadā // 2.077.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye ca tatrāpare sarve saṃmatā ye ca naigamāḥ / rāmaṃ prati yayur hṛṣṭāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tadā // 2.077.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maṇi kārāś ca ye ke cit kumbhakārāś ca śobhanāḥ / sūtrakarmakṛtaś caiva ye ca śastropajīvinaḥ // 2.077.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māyūrakāḥ krākacikā rocakā vedhakās tathā / dantakārāḥ sudhākārās tathā gandhopajīvinaḥ // 2.077.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suvarṇakārāḥ prakhyātās tathā kambaladhāvakāḥ / snāpakācchādakā vaidyā dhūpakāḥ śauṇḍikās tathā // 2.077.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rajakās tunnavāyāś ca grāmaghoṣamahattarāḥ / śailūṣāś ca saha strībhir yānti kaivartakās tathā // 2.077.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāhitā vedavido brāhmaṇā vṛttasaṃmatāḥ / gorathair bharataṃ yāntam anujagmuḥ sahasraśaḥ // 2.077.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suveṣāḥ śuddhavasanās tāmramṛṣṭānulepanāḥ / sarve te vividhair yānaiḥ śanair bharatam anvayuḥ // 2.077.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭamuditā senā sānvayāt kaikayīsutam / vyavatiṣṭhata sā senā bharatasyānuyāyinī // 2.077.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirīkṣyānugatāṃ senāṃ tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ śivodakām / bharataḥ sacivān sarvān abravīd vākyakovidaḥ // 2.077.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niveśayata me sainyam abhiprāyeṇa sarvaśaḥ / viśrāntaḥ pratariṣyāmaḥ śva idānīṃ mahānadīm // 2.077.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dātuṃ ca tāvad icchāmi svar gatasya mahīpateḥ / aurdhvadeha nimittārtham avatīryodakaṃ nadīm // 2.077.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaivaṃ bruvato 'mātyās tathety uktvā samāhitāḥ / nyaveśayaṃs tāṃś chandena svena svena pṛthakpṛthak // 2.077.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niveśya gaṅgām anu tāṃ mahānadīṃ; camūṃ vidhānaiḥ paribarha śobhinīm / uvāsa rāmasya tadā mahātmano; vicintayāno bharato nivartanam // 2.077.023	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato niviṣṭāṃ dhvajinīṃ gaṅgām anvāśritāṃ nadīm / niṣādarājo dṛṣṭvaiva jñātīn saṃtvarito 'bravīt // 2.078.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahatīyam ataḥ senā sāgarābhā pradṛśyate / nāsyāntam avagacchāmi manasāpi vicintayan // 2.078.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa eṣa hi mahākāyaḥ kovidāradhvajo rathe / bandhayiṣyati vā dāśān atha vāsmān vadhiṣyati // 2.078.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ pitrā rājyād vivāsitam / bharataḥ kaikeyīputro hantuṃ samadhigacchati // 2.078.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhartā caiva sakhā caiva rāmo dāśarathir mama / tasyārthakāmāḥ saṃnaddhā gaṅgānūpe 'tra tiṣṭhata // 2.078.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiṣṭhantu sarvadāśāś ca gaṅgām anvāśritā nadīm / balayuktā nadīrakṣā māṃsamūlaphalāśanāḥ // 2.078.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāvāṃ śatānāṃ pañcānāṃ kaivartānāṃ śataṃ śatam / saṃnaddhānāṃ tathā yūnāṃ tiṣṭhantv atyabhyacodayat // 2.078.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā tuṣṭas tu bharato rāmasyeha bhaviṣyati / seyaṃ svastimayī senā gaṅgām adya tariṣyati // 2.078.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvopāyanaṃ gṛhya matsyamāṃsamadhūni ca / abhicakrāma bharataṃ niṣādādhipatir guhaḥ // 2.078.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āyāntaṃ tu saṃprekṣya sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān / bharatāyācacakṣe 'tha vinayajño vinītavat // 2.078.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa jñātisahasreṇa sthapatiḥ parivāritaḥ / kuśalo daṇḍakāraṇye vṛddho bhrātuś ca te sakhā // 2.078.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt paśyatu kākutstha tvāṃ niṣādādhipo guhaḥ / asaṃśayaṃ vijānīte yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 2.078.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sumantrād bharataḥ śubham / uvāca vacanaṃ śīghraṃ guhaḥ paśyatu mām iti // 2.078.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
labdhvābhyanujñāṃ saṃhṛṣṭo jñātibhiḥ parivāritaḥ / āgamya bharataṃ prahvo guho vacanam abravīit // 2.078.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣkuṭaś caiva deśo 'yaṃ vañcitāś cāpi te vayam / nivedayāmas te sarve svake dāśakule vasa // 2.078.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asti mūlaṃ phalaṃ caiva niṣādaiḥ samupāhṛtam / ārdraṃ ca māṃsaṃ śuṣkaṃ ca vanyaṃ coccāvacaṃ mahat // 2.078.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśaṃse svāśitā senā vatsyatīmāṃ vibhāvarīm / arcito vividhaiḥ kāmaiḥ śvaḥ sasainyo gamiṣyasi // 2.078.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu bharato niṣādādhipatiṃ guham / pratyuvāca mahāprājño vākyaṃ hetvarthasaṃhitam // 2.079.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūrjitaḥ khalu te kāmaḥ kṛto mama guroḥ sakhe / yo me tvam īdṛśīṃ senām eko 'bhyarcitum icchasi // 2.079.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā tu mahātejā guhaṃ vacanam uttamam / abravīd bharataḥ śrīmān niṣādādhipatiṃ punaḥ // 2.079.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
katareṇa gamiṣyāmi bharadvājāśramaṃ guha / gahano 'yaṃ bhṛśaṃ deśo gaṅgānūpo duratyayaḥ // 2.079.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrasya dhīmataḥ / abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ guho gahanagocaraḥ // 2.079.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dāśās tv anugamiṣyanti dhanvinaḥ susamāhitāḥ / ahaṃ cānugamiṣyāmi rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ // 2.079.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin na duṣṭo vrajasi rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / iyaṃ te mahatī senā śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me // 2.079.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evam abhibhāṣantam ākāśa iva nirmalaḥ / bharataḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā guhaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.079.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā bhūt sa kālo yat kaṣṭaṃ na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi / rāghavaḥ sa hi me bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo mama // 2.079.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ nivartayituṃ yāmi kākutsthaṃ vanavāsinam / buddhir anyā na te kāryā guha satyaṃ bravīmi te // 2.079.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu saṃhṛṣṭavadanaḥ śrutvā bharatabhāṣitam / punar evābravīd vākyaṃ bharataṃ prati harṣitaḥ // 2.079.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanyas tvaṃ na tvayā tulyaṃ paśyāmi jagatītale / ayatnād āgataṃ rājyaṃ yas tvaṃ tyaktum ihecchasi // 2.079.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāśvatī khalu te kīrtir lokān anucariṣyati / yas tvaṃ kṛcchragataṃ rāmaṃ pratyānayitum icchasi // 2.079.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇasya guhasya bharataṃ tadā / babhau naṣṭaprabhaḥ sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata // 2.079.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃniveśya sa tāṃ senāṃ guhena paritoṣitaḥ / śatrughnena saha śrīmāñ śayanaṃ punar āgamat // 2.079.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmacintāmayaḥ śoko bharatasya mahātmanaḥ / upasthito hy anarhasya dharmaprekṣasya tādṛśaḥ // 2.079.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antardāhena dahanaḥ saṃtāpayati rāghavam / vanadāhābhisaṃtaptaṃ gūḍho 'gnir iva pādapam // 2.079.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasrutaḥ sarvagātrebhyaḥ svedaḥ śokāgnisaṃbhavaḥ / yathā sūryāṃśusaṃtapto himavān prasruto himam // 2.079.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhyānanirdaraśailena viniḥśvasitadhātunā / dainyapādapasaṃghena śokāyāsādhiśṛṅgiṇā // 2.079.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pramohānantasattvena saṃtāpauṣadhiveṇunā / ākrānto duḥkhaśailena mahatā kaikayīsutaḥ // 2.079.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guhena sārdhaṃ bharataḥ samāgato; mahānubhāvaḥ sajanaḥ samāhitaḥ / sudurmanās taṃ bharataṃ tadā punar; guhaḥ samāśvāsayad agrajaṃ prati // 2.079.021	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
ācacakṣe 'tha sadbhāvaṃ lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ / bharatāyāprameyāya guho gahanagocaraḥ // 2.080.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ jāgrataṃ guṇair yuktaṃ varacāpeṣudhāriṇam / bhrātṛ guptyartham atyantam ahaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravam // 2.080.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā / pratyāśvasihi śeṣvāsyāṃ sukhaṃ rāghavanandana // 2.080.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarve duḥkhānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ / dharmātmaṃs tasya guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmahe vayam // 2.080.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaś cana / motsuko bhūr bravīmy etad apy asatyaṃ tavāgrataḥ // 2.080.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ / dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // 2.080.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā / rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvaiḥ svair jñātibhiḥ saha // 2.080.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃ cid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā / caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ prasahema vayaṃ yudhi // 2.080.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam asmābhir uktena lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā / anunītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā // 2.080.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā / śakyā nidrāmayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // 2.080.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi / taṃ paśya guha saṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // 2.080.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahatā tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ / eko daśarathasyaiṣa putraḥ sadṛśalakṣaṇaḥ // 2.080.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin pravrājite rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati / vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // 2.080.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinadya sumahānādaṃ śrameṇoparatāḥ striyaḥ / nirghoṣoparataṃ nūnam adya rājaniveśanam // 2.080.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama / nāśaṃse yadi te sarve jīveyuḥ śarvarīm imām // 2.080.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā / duḥkhitā yā tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // 2.080.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atikrāntam atikrāntam anavāpya manoratham / rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // 2.080.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite / pretakāryeṣu sarveṣu saṃskariṣyanti bhūmipam // 2.080.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ramyacatvarasaṃsthānāṃ suvibhaktamahāpathām / harmyaprāsādasaṃpannāṃ sarvaratnavibhūṣitām // 2.080.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajāśvarathasaṃbādhāṃ tūryanādavināditām / sarvakalyāṇasaṃpūrṇāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulām // 2.080.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārāmodyānasaṃpūrṇāṃ samājotsavaśālinīm / sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama // 2.080.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api satyapratijñena sārdhaṃ kuśalinā vayam / nivṛtte samaye hy asmin sukhitāḥ praviśemahi // 2.080.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paridevayamānasya tasyaivaṃ sumahātmanaḥ / tiṣṭhato rājaputrasya śarvarī sātyavartata // 2.080.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhāte vimale sūrye kārayitvā jaṭā ubhau / asmin bhāgīrathī tīre sukhaṃ saṃtāritau mayā // 2.080.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭādharau tau drumacīravāsasau; mahābalau kuñjarayūthapopamau / vareṣucāpāsidharau paraṃtapau; vyavekṣamāṇau saha sītayā gatau // 2.080.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
guhasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharato bhṛśam apriyam / dhyānaṃ jagāma tatraiva yatra tac chrutam apriyam // 2.081.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukumāro mahāsattvaḥ siṃhaskandho mahābhujaḥ / puṇḍarīka viśālākṣas taruṇaḥ priyadarśanaḥ // 2.081.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyāśvasya muhūrtaṃ tu kālaṃ paramadurmanāḥ / papāta sahasā totrair hṛdi viddha iva dvipaḥ // 2.081.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadavasthaṃ tu bharataṃ śatrughno 'nantara sthitaḥ / pariṣvajya rurodoccair visaṃjñaḥ śokakarśitaḥ // 2.081.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sarvāḥ samāpetur mātaro bharatasya tāḥ / upavāsa kṛśā dīnā bhartṛvyasanakarśitāḥ // 2.081.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāś ca taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau rudantyaḥ paryavārayan / kausalyā tv anusṛtyainaṃ durmanāḥ pariṣasvaje // 2.081.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vatsalā svaṃ yathā vatsam upagūhya tapasvinī / paripapraccha bharataṃ rudantī śokalālasā // 2.081.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putravyādhir na te kaccic charīraṃ paribādhate / adya rājakulasyāsya tvadadhīnaṃ hi jīvitam // 2.081.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā putra jīvāmi rāme sabhrātṛke gate / vṛtte daśarathe rājñi nātha ekas tvam adya naḥ // 2.081.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin na lakṣmaṇe putra śrutaṃ te kiṃ cid apriyam / putra vā hy ekaputrāyāḥ sahabhārye vanaṃ gate // 2.081.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya rudann eva mahāyaśāḥ / kausalyāṃ parisāntvyedaṃ guhaṃ vacanam abravīt // 2.081.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātā me kvāvasad rātriṃ kva sītā kva ca lakṣmaṇaḥ / asvapac chayane kasmin kiṃ bhuktvā guha śaṃsa me // 2.081.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bravīd bharataṃ pṛṣṭo niṣādādhipatir guhaḥ / yad vidhaṃ pratipede ca rāme priyahite 'tithau // 2.081.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
annam uccāvacaṃ bhakṣyāḥ phalāni vividhāni ca / rāmāyābhyavahārārthaṃ bahucopahṛtaṃ mayā // 2.081.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat sarvaṃ pratyanujñāsīd rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / na hi tat pratyagṛhṇāt sa kṣatradharmam anusmaran // 2.081.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy asmābhiḥ pratigrāhyaṃ sakhe deyaṃ tu sarvadā / iti tena vayaṃ rājann anunītā mahātmanā // 2.081.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇena samānītaṃ pītvā vāri mahāyaśāḥ / aupavāsyaṃ tadākārṣīd rāghavaḥ saha sītayā // 2.081.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu jalaśeṣeṇa lakṣmaṇo 'py akarot tadā / vāg yatās te trayaḥ saṃdhyām upāsata samāhitāḥ // 2.081.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitris tu tataḥ paścād akarot svāstaraṃ śubham / svayam ānīya barhīṃṣi kṣipraṃ rāghava kāraṇāt // 2.081.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin samāviśad rāmaḥ svāstare saha sītayā / prakṣālya ca tayoḥ pādāv apacakrāma lakṣmaṇaḥ // 2.081.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat tad iṅgudīmūlam idam eva ca tat tṛṇam / yasmin rāmaś ca sītā ca rātriṃ tāṃ śayitāv ubhau // 2.081.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niyamya pṛṣṭhe tu talāṅgulitravāñ; śaraiḥ supūrṇāv iṣudhī paraṃtapaḥ / mahad dhanuḥ sajyam upohya lakṣmaṇo; niśām atiṣṭhat parito 'sya kevalam // 2.081.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas tv ahaṃ cottamabāṇacāpadhṛk; sthito 'bhavaṃ tatra sa yatra lakṣmaṇaḥ / atandribhir jñātibhir āttakārmukair; mahendrakalpaṃ paripālayaṃs tadā // 2.081.023	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tac chrutvā nipuṇaṃ sarvaṃ bharataḥ saha mantribhiḥ / iṅgudīmūlam āgamya rāmaśayyām avekṣya tām // 2.082.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīj jananīḥ sarvā iha tena mahātmanā / śarvarī śayitā bhūmāv idam asya vimarditam // 2.082.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahābhāgakulīnena mahābhāgena dhīmatā / jāto daśarathenorvyāṃ na rāmaḥ svaptum arhati // 2.082.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ajinottarasaṃstīrṇe varāstaraṇasaṃcaye / śayitvā puruṣavyāghraḥ kathaṃ śete mahītale // 2.082.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāsādāgra vimāneṣu valabhīṣu ca sarvadā / haimarājatabhaumeṣu varāstaraṇaśāliṣu // 2.082.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpasaṃcayacitreṣu candanāgarugandhiṣu / pāṇḍurābhraprakāśeṣu śukasaṃgharuteṣu ca // 2.082.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gītavāditranirghoṣair varābharaṇaniḥsvanaiḥ / mṛdaṅgavaraśabdaiś ca satataṃ pratibodhitaḥ // 2.082.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bandibhir vanditaḥ kāle bahubhiḥ sūtamāgadhaiḥ / gāthābhir anurūpābhiḥ stutibhiś ca paraṃtapaḥ // 2.082.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśraddheyam idaṃ loke na satyaṃ pratibhāti mā / muhyate khalu me bhāvaḥ svapno 'yam iti me matiḥ // 2.082.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na nūnaṃ daivataṃ kiṃ cit kālena balavattaram / yatra dāśarathī rāmo bhūmāv evaṃ śayīta saḥ // 2.082.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
videharājasya sutā sītā ca priyadarśanā / dayitā śayitā bhūmau snuṣā daśarathasya ca // 2.082.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ śayyā mama bhrātur idaṃ hi parivartitam / sthaṇḍile kaṭhine sarvaṃ gātrair vimṛditaṃ tṛṇam // 2.082.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manye sābharaṇā suptā sītāsmiñ śayane tadā / tatra tatra hi dṛśyante saktāḥ kanakabindavaḥ // 2.082.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttarīyam ihāsaktaṃ suvyaktaṃ sītayā tadā / tathā hy ete prakāśante saktāḥ kauśeyatantavaḥ // 2.082.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manye bhartuḥ sukhā śayyā yena bālā tapasvinī / sukumārī satī duḥkhaṃ na vijānāti maithilī // 2.082.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sārvabhauma kule jātaḥ sarvalokasukhāvahaḥ / sarvalokapriyas tyaktvā rājyaṃ priyam anuttamam // 2.082.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
katham indīvaraśyāmo raktākṣaḥ priyadarśanaḥ / sukhabhāgī ca duḥkhārhaḥ śayito bhuvi rāghavaḥ // 2.082.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siddhārthā khalu vaidehī patiṃ yānugatā vanam / vayaṃ saṃśayitāḥ sarve hīnās tena mahātmanā // 2.082.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akarṇadhārā pṛthivī śūnyeva pratibhāti mā / gate daśarathe svarge rāme cāraṇyam āśrite // 2.082.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca prārthayate kaś cin manasāpi vasuṃdharām / vane 'pi vasatas tasya bāhuvīryābhirakṣitām // 2.082.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūnyasaṃvaraṇārakṣām ayantritahayadvipām / apāvṛtapuradvārāṃ rājadhānīm arakṣitām // 2.082.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aprahṛṣṭabalāṃ nyūnāṃ viṣamasthām anāvṛtām / śatravo nābhimanyante bhakṣyān viṣakṛtān iva // 2.082.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya prabhṛti bhūmau tu śayiṣye 'haṃ tṛṇeṣu vā / phalamūlāśano nityaṃ jaṭācīrāṇi dhārayan // 2.082.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyārtham uttaraṃ kālaṃ nivatsyāmi sukhaṃ vane / taṃ pratiśravam āmucya nāsya mithyā bhaviṣyati // 2.082.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasantaṃ bhrātur arthāya śatrughno mānuvatsyati / lakṣmaṇena saha tv āryo ayodhyāṃ pālayiṣyati // 2.082.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣekṣyanti kākutstham ayodhyāyāṃ dvijātayaḥ / api me devatāḥ kuryur imaṃ satyaṃ manoratham // 2.082.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mayā svayaṃ; bahuprakāraṃ yadi na prapatsyate / tato 'nuvatsyāmi cirāya rāghavaṃ; vane vasan nārhati mām upekṣitum // 2.082.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
vyuṣya rātriṃ tu tatraiva gaṅgākūle sa rāghavaḥ / bharataḥ kālyam utthāya śatrughnam idam abravīt // 2.083.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughottiṣṭha kiṃ śeṣe niṣādādhipatiṃ guham / śīghram ānaya bhadraṃ te tārayiṣyati vāhinīm // 2.083.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāgarmi nāhaṃ svapimi tathaivāryaṃ vicintayan / ity evam abravīd bhrātrā śatrughno 'pi pracoditaḥ // 2.083.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti saṃvadator evam anyonyaṃ narasiṃhayoḥ / āgamya prāñjaliḥ kāle guho bharatam abravīt // 2.083.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit sukhaṃ nadītīre 'vātsīḥ kākutstha śarvarīm / kaccic ca saha sainyasya tava sarvam anāmayam // 2.083.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guhasya tat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād udīritam / rāmasyānuvaśo vākyaṃ bharato 'pīdam abravīt // 2.083.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukhā naḥ śarvarī rājan pūjitāś cāpi te vayam / gaṅgāṃ tu naubhir bahvībhir dāśāḥ saṃtārayantu naḥ // 2.083.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato guhaḥ saṃtvaritaḥ śrutvā bharataśāsanam / pratipraviśya nagaraṃ taṃ jñātijanam abravīt // 2.083.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttiṣṭhata prabudhyadhvaṃ bhadram astu hi vaḥ sadā / nāvaḥ samanukarṣadhvaṃ tārayiṣyāma vāhinīm // 2.083.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tathoktāḥ samutthāya tvaritā rājaśāsanāt / pañca nāvāṃ śatāny eva samāninyuḥ samantataḥ // 2.083.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyāḥ svastikavijñeyā mahāghaṇḍā dharā varāḥ / śobhamānāḥ patākinyo yuktavātāḥ susaṃhatāḥ // 2.083.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ svastikavijñeyāṃ pāṇḍukambalasaṃvṛtām / sanandighoṣāṃ kalyāṇīṃ guho nāvam upāharat // 2.083.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām āruroha bharataḥ śatrughnaś ca mahābalaḥ / kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // 2.083.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purohitaś ca tat pūrvaṃ gurave brāhmaṇāś ca ye / anantaraṃ rājadārās tathaiva śakaṭāpaṇāḥ // 2.083.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āvāsam ādīpayatāṃ tīrthaṃ cāpy avagāhatām / bhāṇḍāni cādadānānāṃ ghoṣas tridivam aspṛśat // 2.083.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patākinyas tu tā nāvaḥ svayaṃ dāśair adhiṣṭhitāḥ / vahantyo janam ārūḍhaṃ tadā saṃpetur āśugāḥ // 2.083.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārīṇām abhipūrṇās tu kāś cit kāś cit tu vājinām / kaś cit tatra vahanti sma yānayugyaṃ mahādhanam // 2.083.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāḥ sma gatvā paraṃ tīram avaropya ca taṃ janam / nivṛttāḥ kāṇḍacitrāṇi kriyante dāśabandhubhiḥ // 2.083.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
savaijayantās tu gajā gajārohaiḥ pracoditāḥ / tarantaḥ sma prakāśante sadhvajā iva parvatāḥ // 2.083.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāvaś cāruruhus tv anye plavais terus tathāpare / anye kumbhaghaṭais terur anye teruś ca bāhubhiḥ // 2.083.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā puṇyā dhvajinī gaṅgāṃ dāśaiḥ saṃtāritā svayam / maitre muhūrte prayayau prayāgavanam uttamam // 2.083.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśvāsayitvā ca camūṃ mahātmā; niveśayitvā ca yathopajoṣam / draṣṭuṃ bharadvājam ṛṣipravaryam; ṛtvig vṛtaḥ san bharataḥ pratasthe // 2.083.022	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
bharadvājāśramaṃ dṛṣṭvā krośād eva nararṣabhaḥ / balaṃ sarvam avasthāpya jagāma saha mantribhiḥ // 2.084.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padbhyām eva hi dharmajño nyastaśastraparicchadaḥ / vasāno vāsasī kṣaume purodhāya purohitam // 2.084.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃdarśane tasya bharadvājasya rāghavaḥ / mantriṇas tān avasthāpya jagāmānu purohitam // 2.084.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭham atha dṛṣṭvaiva bharadvājo mahātapāḥ / saṃcacālāsanāt tūrṇaṃ śiṣyān arghyam iti bruvan // 2.084.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāgamya vasiṣṭhena bharatenābhivāditaḥ / abudhyata mahātejāḥ sutaṃ daśarathasya tam // 2.084.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tābhyām arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca dattvā paścāt phalāni ca / ānupūrvyāc ca dharmajñaḥ papraccha kuśalaṃ kule // 2.084.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyāyāṃ bale kośe mitreṣv api ca mantriṣu / jānan daśarathaṃ vṛttaṃ na rājānam udāharat // 2.084.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭho bharataś cainaṃ papracchatur anāmayam / śarīre 'gniṣu vṛkṣeṣu śiṣyeṣu mṛgapakṣiṣu // 2.084.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti ca pratijñāya bharadvājo mahātapāḥ / bharataṃ pratyuvācedaṃ rāghavasnehabandhanāt // 2.084.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim ihāgamane kāryaṃ tava rājyaṃ praśāsataḥ / etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ na hi me śudhyate manaḥ // 2.084.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suṣuve yama mitraghnaṃ kausalyānandavardhanam / bhrātrā saha sabhāryo yaś ciraṃ pravrājito vanam // 2.084.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niyuktaḥ strīniyuktena pitrā yo 'sau mahāyaśāḥ / vanavāsī bhavetīha samāḥ kila caturdaśa // 2.084.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin na tasyāpāpasya pāpaṃ kartum ihecchasi / akaṇṭakaṃ bhoktumanā rājyaṃ tasyānujasya ca // 2.084.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto bharadvājaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha / paryaśru nayano duḥkhād vācā saṃsajjamānayā // 2.084.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hato 'smi yadi mām evaṃ bhagavān api manyate / matto na doṣam āśaṅker naivaṃ mām anuśādhi hi // 2.084.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṃś caitad iṣṭaṃ mātā me yad avocan madantare / nāham etena tuṣṭaś ca na tad vacanam ādade // 2.084.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tu taṃ naravyāghram upayātaḥ prasādakaḥ / pratinetum ayodhyāṃ ca pādau tasyābhivanditum // 2.084.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ mām evaṃ gataṃ matvā prasādaṃ kartum arhasi / śaṃsa me bhagavan rāmaḥ kva saṃprati mahīpatiḥ // 2.084.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca taṃ bharadvājaḥ prasādād bharataṃ vacaḥ / tvayy etat puruṣavyāghraṃ yuktaṃ rāghavavaṃśaje // 2.084.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guruvṛttir damaś caiva sādhūnāṃ cānuyāyitā // 2.084.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāne caitan manaḥsthaṃ te dṛḍhīkaraṇam astv iti / apṛcchaṃ tvāṃ tavātyarthaṃ kīrtiṃ samabhivardhayan // 2.084.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asau vasati te bhrātā citrakūṭe mahāgirau / śvas tu gantāsi taṃ deśaṃ vasādya saha mantribhiḥ // 2.084.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etaṃ me kuru suprājña kāmaṃ kāmārthakovida // 2.084.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tathety evam udāradarśanaḥ; pratītarūpo bharato 'bravīd vacaḥ / cakāra buddhiṃ ca tadā mahāśrame; niśānivāsāya narādhipātmajaḥ // 2.084.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
kṛtabuddhiṃ nivāsāya tathaiva sa munis tadā / bharataṃ kaikayī putram ātithyena nyamantrayat // 2.085.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīd bharatas tv enaṃ nanv idaṃ bhavatā kṛtam / pādyam arghyaṃ tathātithyaṃ vane yad ūpapadyate // 2.085.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athovāca bharadvājo bharataṃ prahasann iva / jāne tvāṃ prīti saṃyuktaṃ tuṣyes tvaṃ yena kena cit // 2.085.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
senāyās tu tavaitasyāḥ kartum icchāmi bhojanam / mama pritir yathā rūpā tvam arho manujarṣabha // 2.085.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kimarthaṃ cāpi nikṣipya dūre balam ihāgataḥ / kasmān nehopayāto 'si sabalaḥ puruṣarṣabha // 2.085.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataḥ pratyuvācedaṃ prāñjalis taṃ tapodhanam / sasainyo nopayāto 'smi bhagavan bhagavad bhayāt // 2.085.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāji mukhyā manuṣyāś ca mattāś ca vara vāraṇāḥ / pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmiṃ bhagavann anuyānti mām // 2.085.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te vṛkṣān udakaṃ bhūmim āśrameṣūṭajāṃs tathā / na hiṃsyur iti tenāham eka evāgatas tataḥ // 2.085.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānīyatām itaḥ senety ājñaptaḥ paramarṣiṇā / tathā tu cakre bharataḥ senāyāḥ samupāgamam // 2.085.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agniśālāṃ praviśyātha pītvāpaḥ parimṛjya ca / ātithyasya kriyāhetor viśvakarmāṇam āhvayat // 2.085.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āhvaye viśvakarmāṇam ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram eva ca / ātithyaṃ kartum icchāmi tatra me saṃvidhīyatām // 2.085.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāk srotasaś ca yā nadyaḥ pratyak srotasa eva ca / pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca samāyāntv adya sarvaśaḥ // 2.085.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyāḥ sravantu maireyaṃ surām anyāḥ suniṣṭhitām / aparāś codakaṃ śītam ikṣukāṇḍarasopamam // 2.085.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āhvaye devagandharvān viśvāvasuhahāhuhūn / tathaivāpsaraso devīr gandharvīś cāpi sarvaśaḥ // 2.085.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghṛtācīm atha viśvācīṃ miśrakeśīm alambusām / śakraṃ yāś copatiṣṭhanti brahmāṇaṃ yāś ca bhāminīḥ // 2.085.015.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvās tumburuṇā sārdham āhvaye saparicchadāḥ // 2.085.015.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanaṃ kuruṣu yad divyaṃ vāso bhūṣaṇapatravat / divyanārīphalaṃ śaśvat tat kauberam ihaiva tu // 2.085.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iha me bhagavān somo vidhattām annam uttamam / bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ ca lehyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu // 2.085.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicitrāṇi ca mālyāni pādapapracyutāni ca / surādīni ca peyāni māṃsāni vividhāni ca // 2.085.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ samādhinā yuktas tejasāpratimena ca / śikṣāsvarasamāyuktaṃ tapasā cābravīn muniḥ // 2.085.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manasā dhyāyatas tasya prāṅmukhasya kṛtāñjaleḥ / ājagmus tāni sarvāṇi daivatāni pṛthakpṛthak // 2.085.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
malayaṃ durduraṃ caiva tataḥ svedanudo 'nilaḥ / upaspṛśya vavau yuktyā supriyātmā sukhaḥ śivaḥ // 2.085.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bhyavartanta ghanā divyāḥ kusumavṛṣṭayaḥ / devadundubhighoṣaś ca dikṣu sarvāsu śuśruve // 2.085.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pravavuś cottamā vātā nanṛtuś cāpsarogaṇāḥ / prajagur devagandharvā vīṇā pramumucuḥ svarān // 2.085.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śabdo dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca prāṇināṃ śravaṇāni ca / viveśoccāritaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ samo layaguṇānvitaḥ // 2.085.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasminn uparate śabde divye śrotrasukhe nṛṇām / dadarśa bhārataṃ sainyaṃ vidhānaṃ viśvakarmaṇaḥ // 2.085.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhūva hi samā bhūmiḥ samantāt pañcayojanam / śādvalair bahubhiś channā nīlavaidūryasaṃnibhaiḥ // 2.085.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin bilvāḥ kapitthāś ca panasā bījapūrakāḥ / āmalakyo babhūvuś ca cūtāś ca phalabhūṣaṇāḥ // 2.085.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttarebhyaḥ kurubhyaś ca vanaṃ divyopabhogavat / ājagāma nadī divyā tīrajair bahubhir vṛtā // 2.085.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
catuḥśālāni śubhrāṇi śālāś ca gajavājinām / harmyaprāsādasaṃghātās toraṇāni śubhāni ca // 2.085.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sitameghanibhaṃ cāpi rājaveśma sutoraṇam / śuklamālyakṛtākāraṃ divyagandhasamukṣitam // 2.085.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturasram asaṃbādhaṃ śayanāsanayānavat / divyaiḥ sarvarasair yuktaṃ divyabhojanavastravat // 2.085.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upakalpita sarvānnaṃ dhautanirmalabhājanam / kḷptasarvāsanaṃ śrīmat svāstīrṇaśayanottamam // 2.085.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviveśa mahābāhur anujñāto maharṣiṇā / veśma tad ratnasaṃpūrṇaṃ bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ // 2.085.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve mantriṇaḥ sapurohitāḥ / babhūvuś ca mudā yuktā taṃ dṛṣṭvā veśma saṃvidhim // 2.085.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra rājāsanaṃ divyaṃ vyajanaṃ chatram eva ca / bharato mantribhiḥ sārdham abhyavartata rājavat // 2.085.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsanaṃ pūjayām āsa rāmāyābhipraṇamya ca / vālavyajanam ādāya nyaṣīdat sacivāsane // 2.085.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānupūrvyān niṣeduś ca sarve mantrapurohitāḥ / tataḥ senāpatiḥ paścāt praśāstā ca niṣedatuḥ // 2.085.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tatra muhūrtena nadyaḥ pāyasakardamāḥ / upātiṣṭhanta bharataṃ bharadvājasya śāsanat // 2.085.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsām ubhayataḥ kūlaṃ pāṇḍumṛttikalepanāḥ / ramyāś cāvasathā divyā brahmaṇas tu prasādajāḥ // 2.085.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenaiva ca muhūrtena divyābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ / āgur viṃśatisāhasrā brāhmaṇā prahitāḥ striyaḥ // 2.085.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suvarṇamaṇimuktena pravālena ca śobhitāḥ / āgur viṃśatisāhasrāḥ kuberaprahitāḥ striyaḥ // 2.085.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yābhir gṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sonmāda iva lakṣyate / āgur viṃśatisāhasrā nandanād apsarogaṇāḥ // 2.085.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāradas tumburur gopaḥ parvataḥ sūryavarcasaḥ / ete gandharvarājāno bharatasyāgrato jaguḥ // 2.085.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alambusā miśrakeśī puṇḍarīkātha vāmanā / upānṛtyaṃs tu bharataṃ bharadvājasya śāsanāt // 2.085.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāni mālyāni deveṣu yāni caitrarathe vane / prayāge tāny adṛśyanta bharadvājasya śāsanāt // 2.085.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bilvā mārdaṅgikā āsañ śamyā grāhā bibhītakāḥ / aśvatthā nartakāś cāsan bharadvājasya tejasā // 2.085.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saralatālāś ca tilakā naktamālakāḥ / prahṛṣṭās tatra saṃpetuḥ kubjābhūtātha vāmanāḥ // 2.085.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śiṃśapāmalakī jambūr yāś cānyāḥ kānane latāḥ / pramadā vigrahaṃ kṛtvā bharadvājāśrame 'vasan // 2.085.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
surāṃ surāpāḥ pibata pāyasaṃ ca bubhukśitāḥ / māṃsani ca sumedhyāni bhakṣyantāṃ yāvad icchatha // 2.085.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utsādya snāpayanti sma nadītīreṣu valguṣu / apy ekam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ pramadāḥ satpa cāṣṭa ca // 2.085.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃvahantyaḥ samāpetur nāryo ruciralocanāḥ / parimṛjya tathā nyāyaṃ pāyayanti varāṅganāḥ // 2.085.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hayān gajān kharān uṣṭrāṃs tathaiva surabheḥ sutān / ikṣūṃś ca madhujālāṃś ca bhojayanti sma vāhanān // 2.085.052.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākuvarayodhānāṃ codayanto mahābalāḥ // 2.085.052.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāśvabandho 'śvam ājānān na gajaṃ kuñjaragrahaḥ / mattapramattamuditā camūḥ sā tatra saṃbabhau // 2.085.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tarpitā sarvakāmais te raktacandanarūṣitāḥ / apsarogaṇasaṃyuktāḥ sainyā vācam udairayan // 2.085.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naivāyodhyāṃ gamiṣyāmo na gamiṣyāma daṇḍakān / kuśalaṃ bharatasyāstu rāmasyāstu tathā sukham // 2.085.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti pādātayodhāś ca hastyaśvārohabandhakāḥ / anāthās taṃ vidhiṃ labdhvā vācam etām udairayan // 2.085.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃprahṛṣṭā vinedus te narās tatra sahasraśaḥ / bharatasyānuyātāraḥ svarge 'yam iti cābruvan // 2.085.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bhuktavatāṃ teṣāṃ tad annam amṛtopamam / divyān udvīkṣya bhakṣyāṃs tān abhavad bhakṣaṇe matiḥ // 2.085.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
preṣyāś ceṭyaś ca vadhvaś ca balasthāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ / babhūvus te bhṛśaṃ tṛptāḥ sarve cāhatavāsasaḥ // 2.085.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuñjarāś ca kharoṣṭraś ca go'śvāś ca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / babhūvuḥ subhṛtās tatra nānyo hy anyam akalpayat // 2.085.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāśuklavāsās tatrāsīt kṣudhito malino 'pi vā / rajasā dhvastakeśo vā naraḥ kaś cid adṛśyata // 2.085.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājaiś cāpi ca vārāhair niṣṭhānavarasaṃcayaiḥ / phalaniryūhasaṃsiddhaiḥ sūpair gandharasānvitaiḥ // 2.085.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpadhvajavatīḥ pūrṇāḥ śuklasyānnasya cābhitaḥ / dadṛśur vismitās tatra narā lauhīḥ sahasraśaḥ // 2.085.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhūvur vanapārśveṣu kūpāḥ pāyasakardamāḥ / tāś ca kāmadughā gāvo drumāś cāsan madhuścyutaḥ // 2.085.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāpyo maireya pūrṇāś ca mṛṣṭamāṃsacayair vṛtāḥ / pratapta piṭharaiś cāpi mārgamāyūrakaukkuṭaiḥ // 2.085.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pātrīṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi śātakumbhamayāni ca / sthālyaḥ kumbhyaḥ karambhyaś ca dadhipūrṇāḥ susaṃskṛtāḥ // 2.085.066.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yauvanasthasya gaurasya kapitthasya sugandhinaḥ // 2.085.066.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hradāḥ pūrṇā rasālasya dadhnaḥ śvetasya cāpare / babhūvuḥ pāyasasyānte śarkarāyāś ca saṃcayāḥ // 2.085.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kalkāṃś cūrṇakaṣāyāṃś ca snānāni vividhāni ca / dadṛśur bhājanasthāni tīrtheṣu saritāṃ narāḥ // 2.085.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuklān aṃśumataś cāpi dantadhāvanasaṃcayān / śuklāṃś candanakalkāṃś ca samudgeṣv avatiṣṭhataḥ // 2.085.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darpaṇān parimṛṣṭāṃś ca vāsasāṃ cāpi saṃcayān / pādukopānahāṃ caiva yugmān yatra sahasraśaḥ // 2.085.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āñjanīḥ kaṅkatān kūrcāṃś chatrāṇi ca dhanūṃṣi ca / marmatrāṇāni citrāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca // 2.085.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratipānahradān pūrṇān kharoṣṭragajavājinām / avagāhya sutīrthāṃś ca hradān sotpala puṣkarān // 2.085.072	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlavaidūryavarṇāṃś ca mṛdūn yavasasaṃcayān / nirvāpārthaṃ paśūnāṃ te dadṛśus tatra sarvaśaḥ // 2.085.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
