vyasmayanta manuṣyās te svapnakalpaṃ tad adbhutam / dṛṣṭvātithyaṃ kṛtaṃ tādṛg bharatasya maharṣiṇā // 2.085.074	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

pratijagmuś ca tā nadyo gandharvāś ca yathāgatam / bharadvājam anujñāpya tāś ca sarvā varāṅganāḥ // 2.085.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaiva mattā madirotkaṭā narās; tathaiva divyāgurucandanokṣitāḥ / tathaiva divyā vividhāḥ sraguttamāḥ; pṛthakprakīrṇā manujaiḥ pramarditāḥ // 2.085.077	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas tāṃ rajanīm uṣya bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ / kṛtātithyo bharadvājaṃ kāmād abhijagāma ha // 2.086.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

kaccid atra sukhā rātris tavāsmadviṣaye gatā / samagras te janaḥ kaccid ātithye śaṃsa me 'nagha // 2.086.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvācāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bharato 'bhipraṇamya ca / āśramād abhiniṣkrantam ṛṣim uttama tejasaṃ // 2.086.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukhoṣito 'smi bhagavan samagrabalavāhanaḥ / tarpitaḥ sarvakāmaiś ca sāmātyo balavat tvayā // 2.086.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apetaklamasaṃtāpāḥ subhakṣyāḥ supratiśrayāḥ / api preṣyān upādāya sarve sma susukhoṣitāḥ // 2.086.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

iti pṛṣṭas tu bharataṃ bhrātṛdarśanalālasaṃ / pratyuvāca mahātejā bharadvājo mahātapāḥ // 2.086.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatārdhatṛtīyeṣu yojaneṣv ajane vane / citrakūṭo giris tatra ramyanirdarakānanaḥ // 2.086.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tataḥ papraccha bharataṃ bharadvājo dṛḍhavrataḥ / viśeṣaṃ jñātum icchāmi mātṝṇāṃ tava rāghava // 2.086.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca ruravaś ca samantataḥ / dṛśyante vanarājīṣu giriṣv api nadīṣu ca // 2.087.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa saṃpratasthe dharmātmā prīto daśarathātmajaḥ / vṛto mahatyā nādinyā senayā caturaṅgayā // 2.087.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgaraughanibhā senā bharatasya mahātmanaḥ / mahīṃ saṃchādayām āsa prāvṛṣi dyām ivāmbudaḥ // 2.087.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
turaṃgaughair avatatā vāraṇaiś ca mahājavaiḥ / anālakṣyā ciraṃ kālaṃ tasmin kāle babhūva bhūḥ // 2.087.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

mārutoddhūta śikharaiḥ pranṛtta iva parvataḥ / pādapaiḥ patrapuṣpāṇi sṛjadbhir abhito nadīm // 2.089.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin maṇinikāśodāṃ kaccit pulinaśālinīm / kaccit siddhajanākīrṇāṃ paśya mandākinīṃ nadīm // 2.089.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirdhūtān vāyunā paśya vitatān puṣpasaṃcayān / poplūyamānān aparān paśya tvaṃ jalamadhyagān // 2.089.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃś cātivalgu vacaso rathāṅgāhvayanā dvijāḥ / adhirohanti kalyāṇi niṣkūjantaḥ śubhā giraḥ // 2.089.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśanaṃ citrakūṭasya mandākinyāś ca śobhane / adhikaṃ puravāsāc ca manye ca tava darśanāt // 2.089.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhūtakaluṣaiḥ siddhais tapodamaśamānvitaiḥ / nityavikṣobhita jalāṃ vihāhasva mayā saha // 2.089.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakhīvac ca vigāhasva sīte mandakinīm imām / kamalāny avamajjantī puṣkarāṇi ca bhāmini // 2.089.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ paurajanavad vyālān ayodhyām iva parvatam / manyasva vanite nityaṃ sarayūvad imāṃ nadīm // 2.089.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇaś caiva dharmātmā mannideśe vyavasthitaḥ / tvaṃ cānukūlā vaidehi prītiṃ janayatho mama // 2.089.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upaspṛśaṃs triṣavaṇaṃ madhumūlaphalāśanaḥ / nāyodhyāyai na rājyāya spṛhaye 'dya tvayā saha // 2.089.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ hi ramyāṃ gajayūthalolitāṃ; nipītatoyāṃ gajasiṃhavānaraiḥ / supuṣpitaiḥ puṣpadharair alaṃkṛtāṃ; na so 'sti yaḥ syān na gatakramaḥ sukhī // 2.089.018	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
itīva rāmo bahusaṃgataṃ vacaḥ; priyā sahāyaḥ saritaṃ prati bruvan / cacāra ramyaṃ nayanāñjanaprabhaṃ; sa citrakūṭaṃ raghuvaṃśavardhanaḥ // 2.089.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tathā tatrāsatas tasya bharatasyopayāyinaḥ / sainya reṇuś ca śabdaś ca prādurāstāṃ nabhaḥ spṛśau // 2.090.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare trastāḥ śabdena mahatā tataḥ / arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthā dudruvur diśaḥ // 2.090.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ sainyasamudbhūtaṃ śabdaṃ śuśrava rāghavaḥ / tāṃś ca vipradrutān sarvān yūthapān anvavaikṣata // 2.090.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃś ca vidravato dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca śrutvā sa niḥsvanam / uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ // 2.090.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanta lakṣmaṇa paśyeha sumitrā suprajās tvayā / bhīmastanitagambhīras tumulaḥ śrūyate svanaḥ // 2.090.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā vā rājamātro vā mṛgayām aṭate vane / anyad vā śvāpadaṃ kiṃ cit saumitre jñātum arhasi // 2.090.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvam etad yathātattvam acirāj jñātum arhasi // 2.090.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃtvaritaḥ sālam āruhya puṣpitam / prekṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ pūrvāṃ diśam avaikṣata // 2.090.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udaṅmukhaḥ prekṣamāṇo dadarśa mahatīṃ camūm / rathāśvagajasaṃbādhāṃ yattair yuktāṃ padātibhiḥ // 2.090.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām aśvagajasaṃpūrṇāṃ rathadhvajavibhūṣitām / śaśaṃsa senāṃ rāmāya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // 2.090.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agniṃ saṃśamayatv āryaḥ sītā ca bhajatāṃ guhām / sajyaṃ kuruṣva cāpaṃ ca śarāṃś ca kavacaṃ tathā // 2.090.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ rāmaḥ puruṣavyāghro lakṣmaṇaṃ pratyuvāca ha / aṅgāvekṣasva saumitre kasyaitāṃ manyase camūm // 2.090.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmāṇo vākyam abravīt / didhakṣann iva tāṃ senāṃ ruṣitaḥ pāvako yathā // 2.090.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpannaṃ rājyam icchaṃs tu vyaktaṃ prāpyābhiṣecanam / āvāṃ hantuṃ samabhyeti kaikeyyā bharataḥ sutaḥ // 2.090.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa vai sumahāñ śrīmān viṭapī saṃprakāśate / virājaty udgataskandhaḥ kovidāra dhvajo rathe // 2.090.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhajanty ete yathākāmam aśvān āruhya śīghragān / ete bhrājanti saṃhṛṣṭā jagān āruhya sādinaḥ // 2.090.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhītadhanuṣau cāvāṃ giriṃ vīra śrayāvahe / api nau vaśam āgacchet kovidāradhvajo raṇe // 2.090.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api drakṣyāmi bharataṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat / tvayā rāghava saṃprāptaṃ sītayā ca mayā tathā // 2.090.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yannimittaṃ bhavān rājyāc cyuto rāghava śāśvatīm / saṃprāpto 'yam arir vīra bharato vadhya eva me // 2.090.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasya vadhe doṣaṃ nāhaṃ paśyāmi rāghava / pūrvāpakariṇāṃ tyāge na hy adharmo vidhīyate // 2.090.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn nihate kṛtsnām anuśādhi vasuṃdharām // 2.090.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya putraṃ hataṃ saṃkhye kaikeyī rājyakāmukā / mayā paśyet suduḥkhārtā hastibhagnam iva drumam // 2.090.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyīṃ ca vadhiṣyāmi sānubandhāṃ sabāndhavām / kaluṣeṇādya mahatā medinī parimucyatām // 2.090.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyemaṃ saṃyataṃ krodham asatkāraṃ ca mānada / mokṣyāmi śatrusainyeṣu kakṣeṣv iva hutāśanam // 2.090.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyaitac citrakūṭasya kānanaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / bhindañ śatruśarīrāṇi kariṣye śoṇitokṣitam // 2.090.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarair nirbhinnahṛdayān kuñjarāṃs turagāṃs tathā / śvāpadāḥ parikarṣantu narāś ca nihatān mayā // 2.090.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarāṇāṃ dhanuṣaś cāham anṛṇo 'smi mahāvane / sasainyaṃ bharataṃ hatvā bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // 2.090.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
susaṃrabdhaṃ tu saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ krodhamūrchitam / rāmas tu parisāntvyātha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // 2.091.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim atra dhanuṣā kāryam asinā vā sacarmaṇā / maheṣvāse mahāprājñe bharate svayam āgate // 2.091.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptakālaṃ yad eṣo 'smān bharato draṣṭum icchati / asmāsu manasāpy eṣa nāhitaṃ kiṃ cid ācaret // 2.091.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vipriyaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ te bharatena kadā na kim / īdṛśaṃ vā bhayaṃ te 'dya bharataṃ yo 'tra śaṅkase // 2.091.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi te niṣṭhuraṃ vācyo bharato nāpriyaṃ vacaḥ / ahaṃ hy apriyam uktaḥ syāṃ bharatasyāpriye kṛte // 2.091.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ nu putrāḥ pitaraṃ hanyuḥ kasyāṃ cid āpadi / bhrātā vā bhrātaraṃ hanyāt saumitre prāṇam ātmanaḥ // 2.091.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi rājyasya hetos tvam imāṃ vācaṃ prabhāṣase / vakṣyāmi bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyam asmai pradīyatām // 2.091.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ucyamāno hi bharato mayā lakṣmaṇa tattvataḥ / rājyam asmai prayaccheti bāḍham ity eva vakṣyati // 2.091.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathokto dharmaśīlena bhrātrā tasya hite rataḥ / lakṣmaṇaḥ praviveśeva svāni gātrāṇi lajjayā // 2.091.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vrīḍitaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha / eṣa manye mahābāhur ihāsmān draṣṭum āgataḥ // 2.091.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanavāsam anudhyāya gṛhāya pratineṣyati / imāṃ vāpy eśa vaidehīm atyantasukhasevinīm // 2.091.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etau tau saṃprakāśete gotravantau manoramau / vāyuvegasamau vīra javanau turagottamau // 2.091.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa eṣa sumahākāyaḥ kampate vāhinīmukhe / nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma vṛddhas tātasya dhīmataḥ // 2.091.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avatīrya tu sālāgrāt tasmāt sa samitiṃjayaḥ / lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ // 2.091.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatenātha saṃdiṣṭā saṃmardo na bhaved iti / samantāt tasya śailasya senāvāsam akalpayat // 2.091.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhyardham ikṣvākucamūr yojanaṃ parvatasya sā / pārśve nyaviśad āvṛtya gajavājirathākulā // 2.091.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā citrakūṭe bharatena senā; dharmaṃ puraskṛtya vidhūya darpam / prasādanārthaṃ raghunandanasya; virocate nītimatā praṇītā // 2.091.017	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
niveśya senāṃ tu vibhuḥ padbhyāṃ pādavatāṃ varaḥ / abhigantuṃ sa kākutstham iyeṣa guruvartakam // 2.092.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niviṣṭa mātre sainye tu yathoddeśaṃ vinītavat / bharato bhrātaraṃ vākyaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt // 2.092.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣipraṃ vanam idaṃ saumya narasaṃghaiḥ samantataḥ / lubdhaiś ca sahitair ebhis tvam anveṣitum arhasi // 2.092.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvan na rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ vā mahābalam / vaidehīṃ vā mahābhāgāṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // 2.092.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvan na candrasaṃkāśaṃ drakṣyāmi śubham ānanam / bhrātuḥ padmapalāśākṣaṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // 2.092.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvan na caraṇau bhrātuḥ pārthiva vyañjanānvitau / śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // 2.092.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvan na rājye rājyārhaḥ pitṛpaitāmahe sthitaḥ / abhiṣekajalaklinno na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // 2.092.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtakṛtyā mahābhāgā vaidehī janakātmajā / bhartāraṃ sāgarāntāyāḥ pṛthivyā yānugacchati // 2.092.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
subhagaś citrakūṭo 'sau girirājopamo giriḥ / yasmin vasati kākutsthaḥ kubera ivanandane // 2.092.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtakāryam idaṃ durgaṃ vanaṃ vyālaniṣevitam / yad adhyāste mahātejā rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // 2.092.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātejā bharataḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ / padbhyām eva mahātejāḥ praviveśa mahad vanam // 2.092.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tāni drumajālāni jātāni girisānuṣu / puṣpitāgrāṇi madhyena jagāma vadatāṃ varaḥ // 2.092.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gireś citrakūṭasya sālam āsādya puṣpitam / rāmāśramagatasyāgner dadarśa dhvajam ucchritam // 2.092.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā bharataḥ śrīmān mumoda sahabāndhavaḥ / atra rāma iti jñātvā gataḥ pāram ivāmbhasaḥ // 2.092.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa citrakūṭe tu girau niśāmya; rāmāśramaṃ puṇyajanopapannam / guhena sārdhaṃ tvarito jagāma; punar niveśyaiva camūṃ mahātmā // 2.092.015	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
niviṣṭāyāṃ tu senāyām utsuko bharatas tadā / jagāma bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ śatrughnam anudarśayan // 2.093.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ saṃdiśya mātṝr me śīghram ānaya / iti taritam agre sa jāgama guruvatsalaḥ // 2.093.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantras tv api śatughnam adūrād anvapadyata / rāmadārśanajas tarṣo bharatasyeva tasya ca // 2.093.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gacchann evātha bharatas tāpasālayasaṃsthitām / bhrātuḥ parṇakuṭīṃ śrīmān uṭajaṃ ca dadarśa ha // 2.093.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śālāyās tv agratas tasyā dadarśa bharatas tadā / kāṣṭāni cāvabhagnāni puṣpāṇy avacitāni ca // 2.093.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadarśa ca vane tasmin mahataḥ saṃcayān kṛtān / mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca karīṣaiḥ śītakāraṇāt // 2.093.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gacchan eva mahābāhur dyutimān bharatas tadā / śatrughnaṃ cābravīd dhṛṣṭas tān amātyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ // 2.093.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manye prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt / nātidūre hi manye 'haṃ nadīṃ mandākinīm itaḥ // 2.093.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uccair baddhāni cīrāṇi lakṣmaṇena bhaved ayam / abhijñānakṛtaḥ panthā vikāle gantum icchatā // 2.093.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ codāttadantānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ tarasvinām / śailapārśve parikrāntam anyonyam abhigarjatām // 2.093.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yam evādhātum icchanti tāpasāḥ satataṃ vane / tasyāsau dṛśyate dhūmaḥ saṃkulaḥ kṛṣṭavartmanaḥ // 2.093.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atrāhaṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ gurusatkārakāriṇam / āryaṃ drakṣyāmi saṃhṛṣṭo maharṣim iva rāghavam // 2.093.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha gatvā muhūrtaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ sa rāghavaḥ / mandākinīm anuprāptas taṃ janaṃ cedam abravīt // 2.093.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jagatyāṃ puruṣavyāghra āste vīrāsane rataḥ / janendro nirjanaṃ prāpya dhin me janma sajīvitam // 2.093.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
matkṛte vyasanaṃ prāpto lokanātho mahādyutiḥ / sarān kāmān parityajya vane vasati rāghavaḥ // 2.093.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti lokasamākruṣṭaḥ pādeṣv adya prasādayan / rāmasya nipatiṣyāmi sītāyāś ca punaḥ punaḥ // 2.093.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa vilapaṃs tasmin vane daśarathātmajaḥ / dadarśa mahatīṃ puṇyāṃ parṇaśālāṃ manoramām // 2.093.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sālatālāśvakarṇānāṃ parṇair bahubhir āvṛtām / viśālāṃ mṛdubhis tīrṇāṃ kuśair vedim ivādhvare // 2.093.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śakrāyudha nikāśaiś ca kārmukair bhārasādhanaiḥ / rukmapṛṣṭhair mahāsāraiḥ śobhitāṃ śatrubādhakaiḥ // 2.093.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arkaraśmipratīkāśair ghorais tūṇīgataiḥ śaraiḥ / śobhitāṃ dīptavadanaiḥ sarpair bhogavatīm iva // 2.093.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahārajatavāsobhyām asibhyāṃ ca virājitām / rukmabinduvicitrābhyāṃ carmabhyāṃ cāpi śobhitām // 2.093.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
godhāṅgulitrair āsāktaiś citraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣitaiḥ / arisaṃghair anādhṛṣyāṃ mṛgaiḥ siṃhaguhām iva // 2.093.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāgudaksravaṇāṃ vediṃ viśālāṃ dīptapāvakām / dadarśa bharatas tatra puṇyāṃ rāmaniveśane // 2.093.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirīkṣya sa muhūrtaṃ tu dadarśa bharato gurum / uṭaje rāmam āsīnāṃ jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇam // 2.093.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu kṛṣṇājinadharaṃ cīravalkalavāsasaṃ / dadarśa rāmam āsīnam abhitaḥ pāvakopamam // 2.093.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhaskandhaṃ mahābāhuṃ puṇḍarīkanibhekṣaṇam / pṛthivyāḥ sagarāntāyā bhartāraṃ dharmacāriṇam // 2.093.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upaviṣṭaṃ mahābāhuṃ brahmāṇam iva śāśvatam / sthaṇḍile darbhasasmtīrṇe sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca // 2.093.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā bharataḥ śrīmān duḥkhamohapariplutaḥ / abhyadhāvata dharmātmā bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ // 2.093.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā ca vilalāpārto bāṣpasaṃdigdhayā girā / aśaknuvan dhārayituṃ dhairyād vacanam abravīt // 2.093.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaḥ saṃsadi prakṛtibhir bhaved yukta upāsitum / vanyair mṛgair upāsīnaḥ so 'yam āste mamāgrajaḥ // 2.093.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāsobhir bahusāhasrair yo mahātmā purocitaḥ / mṛgājine so 'yam iha pravaste dharmam ācaran // 2.093.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhārayad yo vividhāś citrāḥ sumanasas tadā / so 'yaṃ jaṭābhāram imaṃ sahate rāghavaḥ katham // 2.093.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya yajñair yathādiṣṭair yukto dharmasya saṃcayaḥ / śarīra kleśasaṃbhūtaṃ sa dharmaṃ parimārgate // 2.093.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candanena mahārheṇa yasyāṅgam upasevitam / malena tasyāṅgam idaṃ katham āryasya sevyate // 2.093.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mannimittam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpto rāmaḥ sukhocitaḥ / dhig jīvitaṃ nṛśaṃsasya mama lokavigarhitam // 2.093.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ vilapan dīnaḥ prasvinnamukhapaṅkajaḥ / pādāv aprāpya rāmasya papāta bharato rudan // 2.093.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duḥkhābhitapto bharato rājaputro mahābalaḥ / uktvāryeti sakṛd dīnaṃ punar novāca kiṃ cana // 2.093.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṣpāpihita kaṇṭhaś ca prekṣya rāmaṃ yaśasvinam / āryety evābhisaṃkruśya vyāhartuṃ nāśakat tataḥ // 2.093.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughnaś cāpi rāmasya vavande caraṇau rudan / tāv ubhau sa samāliṅgya rāmo 'py aśrūṇy avartayat // 2.093.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sumantreṇa guhena caiva; samīyatū rājasutāv araṇye / divākaraś caiva niśākaraś ca; yathāmbare śukrabṛhaspatibhyām // 2.093.040	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tān pārthivān vāraṇayūthapābhān; samāgatāṃs tatra mahaty araṇye / vanaukasas te 'pi samīkṣya sarve 'py; aśrūṇy amuñcan pravihāya harṣam // 2.093.041	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
āghrāya rāmas taṃ mūrdhni pariṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ / aṅke bharatam āropya paryapṛcchat samāhitaḥ // 2.094.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva nu te 'bhūt pitā tāta yad araṇyaṃ tvam āgataḥ / na hi tvaṃ jīvatas tasya vanam āgantum arhasi // 2.094.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cirasya bata paśyāmi dūrād bharatam āgatam / duṣpratīkam araṇye 'smin kiṃ tāta vanam āgataḥ // 2.094.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid daśaratho rājā kuśalī satyasaṃgaraḥ / rājasūyāśvamedhānām āhartā dharmaniścayaḥ // 2.094.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kaccid brāhmaṇo vidvān dharmanityo mahādyutiḥ / ikṣvākūṇām upādhyāyo yathāvat tāta pūjyate // 2.094.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāta kaccic ca kausalyā sumitrā ca prajāvatī / sukhinī kaccid āryā ca devī nandati kaikayī // 2.094.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid vinaya saṃpannaḥ kulaputro bahuśrutaḥ / anasūyur anudraṣṭā satkṛtas te purohitaḥ // 2.094.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid agniṣu te yukto vidhijño matimān ṛjuḥ / hutaṃ ca hoṣyamāṇaṃ ca kāle vedayate sadā // 2.094.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iṣvastravarasaṃpannam arthaśāstraviśāradam / sudhanvānam upādhyāyaṃ kaccit tvaṃ tāta manyase // 2.094.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid ātma samāḥ śūrāḥ śrutavanto jitendriyāḥ / kulīnāś ceṅgitajñāś ca kṛtās te tāta mantriṇaḥ // 2.094.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantro vijayamūlaṃ hi rājñāṃ bhavati rāghava / susaṃvṛto mantradharair amātyaiḥ śāstrakovidaiḥ // 2.094.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin nidrāvaśaṃ naiṣi kaccit kāle vibudhyase / kac ciṃś cāpararātriṣu cintayasy arthanaipuṇam // 2.094.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin mantrayase naikaḥ kaccin na bahubhiḥ saha / kaccit te mantrito mantro rāṣṭraṃ na paridhāvati // 2.094.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid arthaṃ viniścitya laghumūlaṃ mahodayam / kṣipram ārabhase kartuṃ na dīrghayasi rāghava // 2.094.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit tu sukṛtāny eva kṛtarūpāṇi vā punaḥ / vidus te sarvakāryāṇi na kartavyāni pārthivāḥ // 2.094.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin na tarkair yuktvā vā ye cāpy aparikīrtitāḥ / tvayā vā tava vāmātyair budhyate tāta mantritam // 2.094.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit sahasrān mūrkhāṇām ekam icchasi paṇḍitam / paṇḍito hy arthakṛcchreṣu kuryān niḥśreyasaṃ mahat // 2.094.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahasrāṇy api mūrkhāṇāṃ yady upāste mahīpatiḥ / atha vāpy ayutāny eva nāsti teṣu sahāyatā // 2.094.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eko 'py amātyo medhāvī śūro dakṣo vicakṣaṇaḥ / rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam // 2.094.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin mukhyā mahatsv eva madhyameṣu ca madhyamāḥ / jaghanyāś ca jaghanyeṣu bhṛtyāḥ karmasu yojitāḥ // 2.094.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amātyān upadhātītān pitṛpaitāmahāñ śucīn / śreṣṭhāñ śreṣṭheṣu kaccit tvaṃ niyojayasi karmasu // 2.094.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit tvāṃ nāvajānanti yājakāḥ patitaṃ yathā / ugrapratigrahītāraṃ kāmayānam iva striyaḥ // 2.094.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāyakuśalaṃ vaidyaṃ bhṛtyasaṃdūṣaṇe ratam / śūram aiśvaryakāmaṃ ca yo na hanti sa vadhyate // 2.094.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid dhṛṣṭaś ca śūraś ca dhṛtimān matimāñ śuciḥ / kulīnaś cānuraktaś ca dakṣaḥ senāpatiḥ kṛtaḥ // 2.094.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balavantaś ca kaccit te mukhyā yuddhaviśāradāḥ / dṛṣṭāpadānā vikrāntās tvayā satkṛtya mānitāḥ // 2.094.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ka cid balasya bhaktaṃ ca vetanaṃ ca yathocitam / saṃprāptakālaṃ dātavyaṃ dadāsi na vilambase // 2.094.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālātikramaṇe hy eva bhakta vetanayor bhṛtāḥ / bhartuḥ kupyanti duṣyanti so 'narthaḥ sumahān smṛtaḥ // 2.094.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit sarve 'nuraktās tvāṃ kulaputrāḥ pradhānataḥ / kaccit prāṇāṃs tavārtheṣu saṃtyajanti samāhitāḥ // 2.094.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccij jānapado vidvān dakṣiṇaḥ pratibhānavān / yathoktavādī dūtas te kṛto bharata paṇḍitaḥ // 2.094.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid aṣṭādaśāny eṣu svapakṣe daśa pañca ca / tribhis tribhir avijñātair vetsi tīrthāni cārakaiḥ // 2.094.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid vyapāstān ahitān pratiyātāṃś ca sarvadā / durbalān anavajñāya vartase ripusūdana // 2.094.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin na lokāyatikān brāhmaṇāṃs tāta sevase / anartha kuśalā hy ete bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // 2.094.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmaśāstreṣu mukhyeṣu vidyamāneṣu durbudhāḥ / buddhimān vīkṣikīṃ prāpya nirarthaṃ pravadanti te // 2.094.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīrair adhyuṣitāṃ pūrvam asmākaṃ tāta pūrvakaiḥ / satyanāmāṃ dṛḍhadvārāṃ hastyaśvarathasaṃkulām // 2.094.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ svakarmanirataiḥ sadā / jitendriyair mahotsāhair vṛtāmātyaiḥ sahasraśaḥ // 2.094.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāsādair vividhākārair vṛtāṃ vaidyajanākulām / kaccit samuditāṃ sphītām ayodhyāṃ parirakṣasi // 2.094.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccic caityaśatair juṣṭaḥ suniviṣṭajanākulaḥ / devasthānaiḥ prapābhiś ca taḍāgaiś copaśobhitaḥ // 2.094.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭanaranārīkaḥ samājotsavaśobhitaḥ / sukṛṣṭasīmā paśumān hiṃsābhir abhivarjitaḥ // 2.094.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adevamātṛko ramyaḥ śvāpadaiḥ parivarjitaḥ / kaccij janapadaḥ sphītaḥ sukhaṃ vasati rāghava // 2.094.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit te dayitāḥ sarve kṛṣigorakṣajīvinaḥ / vārtāyāṃ saṃśritas tāta loko hi sukham edhate // 2.094.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ guptiparīhāraiḥ kaccit te bharaṇaṃ kṛtam / rakṣyā hi rājñā dharmeṇa sarve viṣayavāsinaḥ // 2.094.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit striyaḥ sāntvayasi kaccit tāś ca surakṣitāḥ / kaccin na śraddadhāsyāsāṃ kaccid guhyaṃ na bhāṣase // 2.094.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccin nāga vanaṃ guptaṃ kuñjarāṇaṃ ca tṛpyasi / kaccid darśayase nityaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ vibhūṣitam // 2.094.043.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utthāyotthāya pūrvāhṇe rājaputro mahāpathe // 2.094.043.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit sarvāṇi durgāṇi dhanadhānyāyudhodakaiḥ / yantraiś ca paripūrṇāni tathā śilpidhanurdharaiḥ // 2.094.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyas te vipulaḥ kaccit kaccid alpataro vyayaḥ / apātreṣu na te kaccit kośo gacchati rāghava // 2.094.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devatārthe ca pitrarthe brāhmaṇābhyāgateṣu ca / yodheṣu mitravargeṣu kaccid gacchati te vyayaḥ // 2.094.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid āryo viśuddhātmā kṣāritaś corakarmaṇā / apṛṣṭaḥ śāstrakuśalair na lobhād badhyate śuciḥ // 2.094.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhītaś caiva pṛṣṭaś ca kāle dṛṣṭaḥ sakāraṇaḥ / kaccin na mucyate coro dhanalobhān nararṣabha // 2.094.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyasane kaccid āḍhyasya dugatasya ca rāghava / arthaṃ virāgāḥ paśyanti tavāmātyā bahuśrutāḥ // 2.094.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāni mithyābhiśastānāṃ patanty asrāṇi rāghava / tāni putrapaśūn ghnanti prītyartham anuśāsataḥ // 2.094.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid vṛdhāṃś ca bālāṃś ca vaidyamukhyāṃś ca rāghava / dānena manasā vācā tribhir etair bubhūṣase // 2.094.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid gurūṃś ca vṛddhāṃś ca tāpasān devatātithīn / caityāṃś ca sarvān siddhārthān brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyasi // 2.094.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid arthena vā dharmaṃ dharmaṃ dharmeṇa vā punaḥ / ubhau vā prītilobhena kāmena na vibādhase // 2.094.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccid arthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca jayatāṃ vara / vibhajya kāle kālajña sarvān bharata sevase // 2.094.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit te brāhmaṇāḥ śarma sarvaśāstrārthakovidaḥ / āśaṃsante mahāprājña paurajānapadaiḥ saha // 2.094.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāstikyam anṛtaṃ krodhaṃ pramādaṃ dīrghasūtratām / adarśanaṃ jñānavatām ālasyaṃ pañcavṛttitām // 2.094.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekacintanam arthānām anarthajñaiś ca mantraṇam / niścitānām anārambhaṃ mantrasyāparilakṣaṇam // 2.094.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maṅgalasyāprayogaṃ ca pratyutthānaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / kaccit tvaṃ varjayasy etān rājadoṣāṃś caturdaśa // 2.094.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit svādukṛtaṃ bhojyam eko nāśnāsi rāghava / kaccid āśaṃsamānebhyo mitrebhyaḥ saṃprayacchasi // 2.094.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha / kiṃ me dharmād vihīnasya rājadharmaḥ kariṣyati // 2.095.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāśvato 'yaṃ sadā dharmaḥ sthito 'smāsu nararṣabha / jyeṣṭha putre sthite rājan na kanīyān bhaven nṛpaḥ // 2.095.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa samṛddhāṃ mayā sārdham ayodhyāṃ gaccha rāghava / abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ kulasyāsya bhavāya naḥ // 2.095.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājānaṃ mānuṣaṃ prāhur devatve saṃmato mama / yasya dharmārthasahitaṃ vṛttam āhur amānuṣam // 2.095.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kekayasthe ca mayi tu tvayi cāraṇyam āśrite / divam ārya gato rājā yāyajūkaḥ satāṃ mataḥ // 2.095.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttiṣṭha puruṣavyāghra kriyatām udakaṃ pituḥ / ahaṃ cāyaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ pūrvam eva kṛtodakau // 2.095.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyeṇa kila dattaṃ hi pitṛlokeṣu rāghava / akṣayyaṃ bhavatīty āhur bhavāṃś caiva pituḥ priyaḥ // 2.095.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ śrutvā karuṇāṃ vācaṃ pitur maraṇasaṃhitām / rāghavo bharatenoktāṃ babhūva gatacetanaḥ // 2.095.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāgvajraṃ bharatenoktam amanojñaṃ paraṃtapaḥ / pragṛhya bāhū rāmo vai puṣpitāgro yathā drumaḥ // 2.095.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vane paraśunā kṛttas tathā bhuvi papāta ha // 2.095.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā hi patitaṃ rāmaṃ jagatyāṃ jagatīpatim / kūlaghātapariśrāntaṃ prasuptam iva kuñjaram // 2.095.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātaras te maheṣvāsaṃ sarvataḥ śokakarśitam / rudantaḥ saha vaidehyā siṣicuḥ salilena vai // 2.095.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu saṃjñāṃ punar labdhvā netrābhyām āsram utsṛjan / upākrāmata kākutsthaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ bahubhāṣitum // 2.095.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu tasya mayā kāryaṃ durjātena mahātmanā / yo mṛto mama śokena na mayā cāpi saṃskṛtaḥ // 2.095.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho bharata siddhārtho yena rājā tvayānagha / śatrugheṇa ca sarveṣu pretakṛtyeṣu satkṛtaḥ // 2.095.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣpradhānām anekāgraṃ narendreṇa vinākṛtām / nivṛttavanavāso 'pi nāyodhyāṃ gantum utsahe // 2.095.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāptavanavāsaṃ mām ayodhyāyāṃ paraṃtapa / ko nu śāsiṣyati punas tāte lokāntaraṃ gate // 2.095.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā prekṣya suvṛttaṃ māṃ pitā yāny āha sāntvayan / vākyāni tāni śroṣyāmi kutaḥ karṇasukhāny aham // 2.095.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā sa bharataṃ bhāryām abhyetya rāghavaḥ / uvāca śokasaṃtaptaḥ pūrṇacandranibhānanām // 2.095.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sīte mṛtas te śvaśuraḥ pitrā hīno 'si lakṣmaṇa / bharato duḥkham ācaṣṭe svargataṃ pṛthivīpatim // 2.095.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāntvayitvā tu tāṃ rāmo rudantīṃ janakātmajām / uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ tatra duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ // 2.095.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānayeṅgudipiṇyākaṃ cīram āhara cottaram / jalakriyārthaṃ tātasya gamiṣyāmi mahātmanaḥ // 2.095.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītā purastād vrajatu tvam enām abhito vraja / ahaṃ paścād gamiṣyāmi gatir hy eṣā sudāruṇā // 2.095.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nityānugas teṣāṃ viditātmā mahāmatiḥ / mṛdur dāntaś ca śāntaś ca rāme ca dṛḍha bhaktimān // 2.095.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantras tair nṛpasutaiḥ sārdham āśvāsya rāghavam / avātārayad ālambya nadīṃ mandākinīṃ śivām // 2.095.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te sutīrthāṃ tataḥ kṛcchrād upāgamya yaśasvinaḥ / nadīṃ mandākinīṃ ramyāṃ sadā puṣpitakānanām // 2.095.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghrasrotasam āsādya tīrthaṃ śivam akardamam / siṣicus tūdakaṃ rājñe tata etad bhavatv iti // 2.095.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pragṛhya ca mahīpālo jalapūritam añjalim / diśaṃ yāmyām abhimukho rudan vacanam abravīt // 2.095.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat te rājaśārdūla vimalaṃ toyam akṣayam / pitṛlokagatasyādya maddattam upatiṣṭhatu // 2.095.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mandākinī tīrāt pratyuttīrya sa rāghavaḥ / pituś cakāra tejasvī nivāpaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha // 2.095.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aiṅgudaṃ badarīmiśraṃ piṇyākaṃ darbhasaṃstare / nyasya rāmaḥ suduḥkhārto rudan vacanam abravīt // 2.095.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ bhuṅkṣva mahārājaprīto yad aśanā vayam / yadannaḥ puruṣo bhavati tadannās tasya devatāḥ // 2.095.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tenaiva mārgeṇa pratyuttīrya nadītaṭāt / āruroha naravyāghro ramyasānuṃ mahīdharam // 2.095.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ parṇakuṭīdvāram āsādya jagatīpatiḥ / parijagrāha pāṇibhyām ubhau bharatalakṣmaṇau // 2.095.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tu rudatāṃ śabdāt pratiśrutkābhavad girau / bhrātṝṇāṃ saha vaidehyā siṃhānāṃ nardatām iva // 2.095.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vijñāya tumulaṃ śabdaṃ trastā bharatasainikāḥ / abruvaṃś cāpi rāmeṇa bharataḥ saṃgato dhruvam // 2.095.035.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām eva mahāñ śabdaḥ śocatāṃ pitaraṃ mṛtam // 2.095.035.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vāsān parityajya taṃ sarve 'bhimukhāḥ svanam / apy eka manaso jagmur yathāsthānaṃ pradhāvitāḥ // 2.095.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hayair anye gajair anye rathair anye svalaṃkṛtaiḥ / sukumārās tathaivānye padbhir eva narā yayuḥ // 2.095.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aciraproṣitaṃ rāmaṃ ciraviproṣitaṃ yathā / draṣṭukāmo janaḥ sarvo jagāma sahasāśramam // 2.095.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātṝṇāṃ tvaritās te tu draṣṭukāmāḥ samāgamam / yayur bahuvidhair yānaiḥ khuranemisamākulaiḥ // 2.095.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā bhūmir bahubhir yānaiḥ khuranemisamāhatā / mumoca tumulaṃ śabdaṃ dyaur ivābhrasamāgame // 2.095.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena vitrāsitā nāgāḥ kareṇuparivāritāḥ / āvāsayanto gandhena jagmur anyad vanaṃ tataḥ // 2.095.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varāhamṛgasiṃhāś ca mahiṣāḥ sarkṣavānarāḥ / vyāghra gokarṇagavayā vitreṣuḥ pṛṣataiḥ saha // 2.095.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathāṅgasāhvā natyūhā haṃsāḥ kāraṇḍavāḥ plavāḥ / tathā puṃskokilāḥ krauñcā visaṃjñā bhejire diśaḥ // 2.095.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena śabdena vitrastair ākāśaṃ pakṣibhir vṛtam / manuṣyair āvṛtā bhūmir ubhayaṃ prababhau tadā // 2.095.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān narān bāṣpapūrṇākṣān samīkṣyātha suduḥkhitān / paryaṣvajata dharmajñaḥ pitṛvan mātṛvac ca saḥ // 2.095.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tatra kāṃś cit pariṣasvaje narān; narāś ca ke cit tu tam abhyavādayan / cakāra sarvān savayasyabāndhavān; yathārham āsādya tadā nṛpātmajaḥ // 2.095.046	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ sa teṣāṃ rudatāṃ mahātmanāṃ; bhuvaṃ ca khaṃ cānuvinādayan svanaḥ / guhā girīṇāṃ ca diśaś ca saṃtataṃ; mṛdaṅgaghoṣapratimo viśuśruve // 2.095.047	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
vasiṣṭhaḥ purataḥ kṛtvā dārān daśarathasya ca / abhicakrāma taṃ deśaṃ rāmadarśanatarṣitaḥ // 2.096.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājapatnyaś ca gacchantyo mandaṃ mandākinīṃ prati / dadṛśus tatra tat tīrthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇasevitam // 2.096.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā bāṣpapūrṇena mukhena pariśuṣyatā / sumitrām abravīd dīnā yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // 2.096.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ teṣām anāthānāṃ kliṣṭam akliṣṭa karmaṇām / vane prāk kevalaṃ tīrthaṃ ye te nirviṣayī kṛtāḥ // 2.096.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
itaḥ sumitre putras te sadā jalam atandritaḥ / svayaṃ harati saumitrir mama putrasya kāraṇāt // 2.096.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dakṣiṇāgreṣu darbheṣu sā dadarśa mahītale / pitur iṅgudipiṇyākaṃ nyastam āyatalocanā // 2.096.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ bhūmau pitur ārtena nyastaṃ rāmeṇa vīkṣya sā / uvāca devī kausalyā sarvā daśarathastriyaḥ // 2.096.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idam ikṣvākunāthasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ / rāghaveṇa pitur dattaṃ paśyataitad yathāvidhi // 2.096.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya devasamānasya pārthivasya mahātmanaḥ / naitad aupayikaṃ manye bhuktabhogasya bhojanam // 2.096.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturantāṃ mahīṃ bhuktvā mahendra sadṛśo bhuvi / katham iṅgudipiṇyākaṃ sa bhuṅkte vasudhādhipaḥ // 2.096.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ato duḥkhataraṃ loke na kiṃ cit pratibhāti mā / yatra rāmaḥ pitur dadyād iṅgudīkṣodam ṛddhimān // 2.096.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmeṇeṅgudipiṇyākaṃ pitur dattaṃ samīkṣya me / kathaṃ duḥkhena hṛdayaṃ na sphoṭati sahasradhā // 2.096.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ārtāṃ sapatnyas tā jagmur āśvāsya tāṃ tadā / dadṛśuś cāśrame rāmaṃ svargāc cyutam ivāmaram // 2.096.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvabhogaiḥ parityaktaṃ rāma saṃprekṣya mātaraḥ / ārtā mumucur aśrūṇi sasvaraṃ śokakarśitāḥ // 2.096.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsāṃ rāmaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇāñ śubhān / mātṝṇāṃ manujavyāghraḥ sarvāsāṃ satyasaṃgaraḥ // 2.096.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāḥ pāṇibhiḥ sukhasparśair mṛdvaṅgulitalaiḥ śubhaiḥ / pramamārjū rajaḥ pṛṣṭhād rāmasyāyatalocanāḥ // 2.096.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitrir api tāḥ sarvā mātṝh saṃprekṣya duḥkhitaḥ / abhyavādayatāsaktaṃ śanai rāmād anantaram // 2.096.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā rāme tathā tasmin sarvā vavṛtire striyaḥ / vṛttiṃ daśarathāj jāte lakṣmaṇe śubhalakṣaṇe // 2.096.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāpi caraṇāṃs tāsām upasaṃgṛhya duḥkhitā / śvaśrūṇām aśrupūrṇākṣī sā babhūvāgrataḥ sthitā // 2.096.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ pariṣvajya duḥkhārtāṃ mātā duhitaraṃ yathā / vanavāsakṛśāṃ dīnāṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // 2.096.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
videharājasya sutā snuṣā daśarathasya ca / rāmapatnī kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃprāptā nirjane vane // 2.096.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmam ātapasaṃtaptaṃ parikliṣṭam ivotpalam / kāñcanaṃ rajasā dhvastaṃ kliṣṭaṃ candram ivāmbudaiḥ // 2.096.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mukhaṃ te prekṣya māṃ śoko dahaty agnir ivāśrayam / bhṛśaṃ manasi vaidehi vyasanāraṇisaṃbhavaḥ // 2.096.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bruvantyām evam ārtāyāṃ jananyāṃ bharatāgrajaḥ / pādāv āsādya jagrāha vasiṣṭhasya sa rāghavaḥ // 2.096.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purohitasyāgnisamasya tasya vai; bṛhaspater indra ivāmarādhipaḥ / pragṛhya pādau susamṛddhatejasaḥ; sahaiva tenopaviveśa rāghavaḥ // 2.096.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato jaghanyaṃ sahitaiḥ sa mantribhiḥ; purapradhānaiś ca sahaiva sainikaiḥ / janena dharmajñatamena dharmavān; upopaviṣṭo bharatas tadāgrajam // 2.096.026	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
upopaviṣṭas tu tadā sa vīryavāṃs; tapasviveṣeṇa samīkṣya rāghavam / śriyā jvalantaṃ bharataḥ kṛtāñjalir; yathā mahendraḥ prayataḥ prajāpatim // 2.096.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
kim eṣa vākyaṃ bharato 'dya rāghavaṃ; praṇamya satkṛtya ca sādhu vakṣyati / itīva tasyāryajanasya tattvato; babhūva kautūhalam uttamaṃ tadā // 2.096.028	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiś ca lakṣmaṇo; mahānubhāvo bharataś ca dhārmikaḥ / vṛtāḥ suhṛdbhiś ca virejur adhvare; yathā sadasyaiḥ sahitās trayo 'gnayaḥ // 2.096.029	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
taṃ tu rāmaḥ samāśvāsya bhrātaraṃ guruvatsalam / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // 2.097.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim etad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ pravyāhṛtaṃ tvayā / yasmāt tvam āgato deśam imaṃ cīrajaṭājinī // 2.097.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yannimittam imaṃ deśaṃ kṛṣṇājinajaṭādharaḥ / hitvā rājyaṃ praviṣṭas tvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi // 2.097.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktaḥ kekayīputraḥ kākutsthena mahātmanā / pragṛhya balavad bhūyaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt // 2.097.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āryaṃ tātaḥ parityajya kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram / gataḥ svargaṃ mahābāhuḥ putraśokābhipīḍitaḥ // 2.097.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
striyā niyuktaḥ kaikeyyā mama mātrā paraṃtapa / cakāra sumahat pāpam idam ātmayaśoharam // 2.097.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā rājyaphalam aprāpya vidhavā śokakarśitā / patiṣyati mahāghore niraye jananī mama // 2.097.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya me dāsabhūtasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi / abhiṣiñcasva cādyaiva rājyena maghavān iva // 2.097.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā vidhavā māturaś ca yāḥ / tvat sakāśam anuprāptāḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // 2.097.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadānupūrvyā yuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ cātmani mānada / rājyaṃ prāpnuhi dharmeṇa sakāmān suhṛdaḥ kuru // 2.097.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavatv avidhavā bhūmiḥ samagrā patinā tvayā / śaśinā vimaleneva śāradī rajanī yathā // 2.097.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ebhiś ca sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ śirasā yācito mayā / bhrātuḥ śiṣyasya dāsasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // 2.097.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad idaṃ śāśvataṃ pitryaṃ sarvaṃ sacivamaṇḍalam / pūjitaṃ puruṣavyāghra nātikramitum utsahe // 2.097.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahābāhuḥ sabāṣpaḥ kekayīsutaḥ / rāmasya śirasā pādau jagrāha bharataḥ punaḥ // 2.097.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ / bhrātaraṃ bharataṃ rāmaḥ pariṣvajyedam abravīt // 2.097.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kulīnaḥ sattvasaṃpannas tejasvī caritavrataḥ / rājyahetoḥ kathaṃ pāpam ācaret tvadvidho janaḥ // 2.097.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na doṣaṃ tvayi paśyāmi sūkṣmam apy ari sūdana / na cāpi jananīṃ bālyāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi // 2.097.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvat pitari dharmajña gauravaṃ lokasatkṛte / tāvad dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha jananyām api gauravam // 2.097.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etābhyāṃ dharmaśīlābhyāṃ vanaṃ gaccheti rāghava / mātā pitṛbhyām ukto 'haṃ katham anyat samācare // 2.097.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā rājyam ayodhyāyāṃ prāptavyaṃ lokasatkṛtam / vastavyaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye mayā valkalavāsasā // 2.097.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ kṛtvā mahārājo vibhāgaṃ lokasaṃnidhau / vyādiśya ca mahātejā divaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // 2.097.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca pramāṇaṃ dharmātmā rājā lokagurus tava / pitrā dattaṃ yathābhāgam upabhoktuṃ tvam arhasi // 2.097.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa samāḥ saumya daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ / upabhokṣye tv ahaṃ dattaṃ bhāgaṃ pitrā mahātmanā // 2.097.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad abravīn māṃ naralokasatkṛtaḥ; pitā mahātmā vibudhādhipopamaḥ / tad eva manye paramātmano hitaṃ; na sarvalokeśvarabhāvam avyayam // 2.097.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ puruṣasiṃhānāṃ vṛtānāṃ taiḥ suhṛdgaṇaiḥ / śocatām eva rajanī duḥkhena vyatyavartata // 2.098.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rajanyāṃ suprabhātāyāṃ bhrātaras te suhṛdvṛtāḥ / mandākinyāṃ hutaṃ japyaṃ kṛtvā rāmam upāgaman // 2.098.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tūṣṇīṃ te samupāsīnā na kaś cit kiṃ cid abravīt / bharatas tu suhṛnmadhye rāmavacanam abravīt // 2.098.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāntvitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama / tad dadāmi tavaivāhaṃ bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam // 2.098.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahatevāmbuvegena bhinnaḥ setur jalāgame / durāvāraṃ tvadanyena rājyakhaṇḍam idaṃ mahat // 2.098.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatiṃ khara ivāśvasya tārkṣyasyeva patatriṇaḥ / anugantuṃ na śaktir me gatiṃ tava mahīpate // 2.098.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sujīvaṃ nityaśas tasya yaḥ parair upajīvyate / rāma tena tu durjīvaṃ yaḥ parān upajīvati // 2.098.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā tu ropito vṛkṣaḥ puruṣeṇa vivardhitaḥ / hrasvakena durāroho rūḍhaskandho mahādrumaḥ // 2.098.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa yadā puṣpito bhūtvā phalāni na vidarśayet / sa tāṃ nānubhavet prītiṃ yasya hetoḥ prabhāvitaḥ // 2.098.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi / yadi tvam asmān ṛṣabho bhartā bhṛtyān na śādhi hi // 2.098.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śreṇayas tvāṃ mahārāja paśyantv agryāś ca sarvaśaḥ / pratapantam ivādityaṃ rājye sthitam ariṃdamam // 2.098.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavānuyāne kākutṣṭha mattā nardantu kuñjarāḥ / antaḥpura gatā nāryo nandantu susamāhitāḥ // 2.098.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya sādhv ity amanyanta nāgarā vividhā janāḥ / bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaṃ pratyanuyācataḥ // 2.098.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evaṃ duḥkhitaṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ yaśasvinam / rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bharataṃ samāśvāsayad ātmavān // 2.098.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātmanaḥ kāmakāro 'sti puruṣo 'yam anīśvaraḥ / itaś cetarataś cainaṃ kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati // 2.098.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ / saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam // 2.098.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā phalānaṃ pakvānāṃ nānyatra patanād bhayam / evaṃ narasya jātasya nānyatra maraṇād bhayam // 2.098.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāgāraṃ dṛḍhasthūṇaṃ jīrṇaṃ bhūtvāvasīdati / tathāvasīdanti narā jarāmṛtyuvaśaṃ gatāḥ // 2.098.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahorātrāṇi gacchanti sarveṣāṃ prāṇinām iha / āyūṃṣi kṣapayanty āśu grīṣme jalam ivāṃśavaḥ // 2.098.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmānam anuśoca tvaṃ kim anyam anuśocasi / āyus te hīyate yasya sthitasya ca gatasya ca // 2.098.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahaiva mṛtyur vrajati saha mṛtyur niṣīdati / gatvā sudīrgham adhvānaṃ saha mṛtyur nivartate // 2.098.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gātreṣu valayaḥ prāptāḥ śvetāś caiva śiroruhāḥ / jarayā puruṣo jīrṇaḥ kiṃ hi kṛtvā prabhāvayet // 2.098.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nandanty udita āditye nandanty astam ite ravau / ātmano nāvabudhyante manuṣyā jīvitakṣayam // 2.098.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛṣyanty ṛtumukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā navaṃ navam ihāgatam / ṛtūnāṃ parivartena prāṇināṃ prāṇasaṃkṣayaḥ // 2.098.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahārṇave / sametya ca vyapeyātāṃ kālam āsādya kaṃ cana // 2.098.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bhāryāś ca putrāś ca jñātayaś ca vasūni ca / sametya vyavadhāvanti dhruvo hy eṣāṃ vinābhavaḥ // 2.098.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātra kaś cid yathā bhāvaṃ prāṇī samabhivartate / tena tasmin na sāmarthyaṃ pretasyāsty anuśocataḥ // 2.098.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā hi sārthaṃ gacchantaṃ brūyāt kaś cit pathi sthitaḥ / aham apy āgamiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhato bhavatām iti // 2.098.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ pūrvair gato mārgaḥ pitṛpaitāmaho dhruvaḥ / tam āpannaḥ kathaṃ śoced yasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ // 2.098.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vayasaḥ patamānasya srotaso vānivartinaḥ / ātmā sukhe niyoktavyaḥ sukhabhājaḥ prajāḥ smṛtāḥ // 2.098.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmātmā sa śubhaiḥ kṛtsnaiḥ kratubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥ / dhūtapāpo gataḥ svargaṃ pitā naḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // 2.098.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇāt samyak prajānāṃ paripālanāt / arthādānāc ca dhārmeṇa pitā nas tridivaṃ gataḥ // 2.098.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iṣṭvā bahuvidhair yajñair bhogāṃś cāvāpya puṣkalān / uttamaṃ cāyur āsādya svar gataḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // 2.098.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa jīrṇaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ parityajya pitā hi naḥ / daivīm ṛddhim anuprāpto brahmalokavihāriṇīm // 2.098.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu naivaṃ vidhaḥ kaś cit prājñaḥ śocitum arhati / tvadvidho yadvidhaś cāpi śrutavān buddhimattaraḥ // 2.098.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete bahuvidhāḥ śokā vilāpa rudite tathā / varjanīyā hi dhīreṇa sarvāvasthāsu dhīmatā // 2.098.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa svastho bhava mā śoco yātvā cāvasa tāṃ purīm / tathā pitrā niyukto 'si vaśinā vadatāmv vara // 2.098.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatrāham api tenaiva niyuktaḥ puṇyakarmaṇā / tatraivāhaṃ kariṣyāmi pitur āryasya śāsanam // 2.098.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na mayā śāsanaṃ tasya tyaktuṃ nyāyyam ariṃdama / tat tvayāpi sadā mānyaṃ sa vai bandhuḥ sa naḥ pitā // 2.098.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu virate rāme vacanam arthavat / uvāca bharataś citraṃ dhārmiko dhārmikaṃ vacaḥ // 2.098.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko hi syād īdṛśo loke yādṛśas tvam ariṃdama / na tvāṃ pravyathayed duḥkhaṃ prītir vā na praharṣayet // 2.098.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃmataś cāsi vṛddhānāṃ tāṃś ca pṛcchasi saṃśayān / yathā mṛtas tathā jīvan yathāsati tathā sati // 2.098.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasyaiṣa buddhilābhaḥ syāt paritapyeta kena saḥ / sa evaṃ vyasanaṃ prāpya na viṣīditum arhati // 2.098.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amaropamasattvas tvaṃ mahātmā satyasaṃgaraḥ / sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca buddhimāṃś cāsi rāghava // 2.098.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tvām evaṃ guṇair yuktaṃ prabhavābhavakovidam / aviṣahyatamaṃ duḥkham āsādayitum arhati // 2.098.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
proṣite mayi yat pāpaṃ mātrā matkāraṇāt kṛtam / kṣudrayā tad aniṣṭaṃ me prasīdatu bhavān mama // 2.098.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmabandhena baddho 'smi tenemāṃ neha mātaram / hanmi tīvreṇa daṇḍena daṇḍārhāṃ pāpakāriṇīm // 2.098.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ daśarathāj jātaḥ śuddhābhijanakarmaṇaḥ / jānan dharmam adharmiṣṭhaṃ kuryāṃ karma jugupsitam // 2.098.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guruḥ kriyāvān vṛddhaś ca rājā pretaḥ piteti ca / tātaṃ na parigarheyaṃ daivataṃ ceti saṃsadi // 2.098.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko hi dharmārthayor hīnam īdṛśaṃ karma kilbiṣam / striyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ san kuryād dharmajña dharmavit // 2.098.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antakāle hi bhūtāni muhyantīti purāśrutiḥ / rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā // 2.098.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhv artham abhisaṃdhāya krodhān mohāc ca sāhasāt / tātasya yad atikrāntaṃ pratyāharatu tad bhavān // 2.098.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitur hi samatikrāntaṃ putro yaḥ sādhu manyate / tad apatyaṃ mataṃ loke viparītam ato 'nyathā // 2.098.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad apatyaṃ bhavān astu mā bhavān duṣkṛtaṃ pituḥ / abhipat tat kṛtaṃ karma loke dhīravigarhitam // 2.098.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyīṃ māṃ ca tātaṃ ca suhṛdo bāndhavāṃś ca naḥ / paurajānapadān sarvāṃs trātu sarvam idaṃ bhavān // 2.098.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva cāraṇyaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ kva jaṭāḥ kva ca pālanam / īdṛśaṃ vyāhataṃ karma na bhavān kartum arhati // 2.098.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha kleśajam eva tvaṃ dharmaṃ caritum icchasi / dharmeṇa caturo varṇān pālayan kleśam āpnuhi // 2.098.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ hi gārhasthyaṃ śreṣṭham āśramam / āhur dharmajña dharmajñās taṃ kathaṃ tyaktum arhasi // 2.098.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutena bālaḥ sthānena janmanā bhavato hy aham / sa kathaṃ pālayiṣyāmi bhūmiṃ bhavati tiṣṭhati // 2.098.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hīnabuddhiguṇo bālo hīnaḥ sthānena cāpy aham / bhavatā ca vinā bhūto na vartayitum utsahe // 2.098.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ nikhilam avyagraṃ pitryaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam / anuśādhi svadharmeṇa dharmajña saha bāndhavaiḥ // 2.098.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ihaiva tvābhiṣiñcantu dharmajña saha bāndhavaiḥ / ṛtvijaḥ savasiṣṭhāś ca mantravan mantrakovidāḥ // 2.098.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣiktas tvam asmābhir ayodhyāṃ pālane vraja / vijitya tarasā lokān marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ // 2.098.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṇāni trīṇy apākurvan durhṛdaḥ sādhu nirdahan / suhṛdas tarpayan kāmais tvam evātrānuśādhi mām // 2.098.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyārya muditāḥ santu suhṛdas te 'bhiṣecane / adya bhītāḥ pālayantāṃ durhṛdas te diśo daśa // 2.098.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ākrośaṃ mama mātuś ca pramṛjya puruṣarṣabha / adya tatra bhavantaṃ ca pitaraṃ rakṣa kilbiṣāt // 2.098.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śirasā tvābhiyāce 'haṃ kuruṣva karuṇāṃ mayi / bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu bhūteṣv iva maheśvaraḥ // 2.098.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā vanam eva bhavān itaḥ / gamiṣyati gamiṣyāmi bhavatā sārdham apy aham // 2.098.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathāpi rāmo bharatena tāmyata; prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mahīpatiḥ / na caiva cakre gamanāya sattvavān; matiṃ pitus tadvacane pratiṣṭhitaḥ // 2.098.069	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tad adbhutaṃ sthairyam avekṣya rāghave; samaṃ jano harṣam avāpa duḥkhitaḥ / na yāty ayodhyām iti duḥkhito 'bhavat; sthirapratijñatvam avekṣya harṣitaḥ // 2.098.070	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tam ṛtvijo naigamayūthavallabhās; tathā visaṃjñāśrukalāś ca mātaraḥ / tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ pratuṣṭuvuḥ; praṇamya rāmaṃ ca yayācire saha // 2.098.071	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
punar evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bharataṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / pratyuvaca tataḥ śrīmāñ jñātimadhye 'tisatkṛtaḥ // 2.099.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upapannam idaṃ vākyaṃ yat tvam evam abhāṣathāḥ / jātaḥ putro daśarathāt kaikeyyāṃ rājasattamāt // 2.099.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā bhrātaḥ pitā naḥ sa mātaraṃ te samudvahan / mātāmahe samāśrauṣīd rājyaśulkam anuttamam // 2.099.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devāsure ca saṃgrāme jananyai tava pārthivaḥ / saṃprahṛṣṭo dadau rājā varam ārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ // 2.099.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sā saṃpratiśrāvya tava mātā yaśasvinī / ayācata naraśreṣṭhaṃ dvau varau varavarṇinī // 2.099.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava rājyaṃ naravyāghra mama pravrājanaṃ tathā / tac ca rājā tathā tasyai niyuktaḥ pradadau varam // 2.099.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena pitrāham apy atra niyuktaḥ puruṣarṣabha / caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi varadānikam // 2.099.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ prāpto nirjanaṃ lakṣmaṇānvitaḥ / śītayā cāpratidvandvaḥ satyavāde sthitaḥ pituḥ // 2.099.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavān api tathety eva pitaraṃ satyavādinam / kartum arhati rājendraṃ kṣipram evābhiṣecanāt // 2.099.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṇān mocaya rājānaṃ matkṛte bharata prabhum / pitaraṃ trāhi dharmajña mātaraṃ cābhinandaya // 2.099.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyate hi purā tāta śrutir gītā yaśasvinī / gayena yajamānena gayeṣv eva pitṝn prati // 2.099.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṃ nāmnā narakād yasmāt pitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ / tasmāt putra iti proktaḥ pitṝn yat pāti vā sutaḥ // 2.099.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ / teṣāṃ vai samavetānām api kaś cid gayāṃ vrajet // 2.099.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ rājarṣayaḥ sarve pratītā rājanandana / tasmāt trāhi naraśreṣṭha pitaraṃ narakāt prabho // 2.099.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyāṃ gaccha bharata prakṛtīr anurañjaya / śatrughna sahito vīra saha sarvair dvijātibhiḥ // 2.099.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pravekṣye daṇḍakāraṇyam aham apy avilambayan / ābhyāṃ tu sahito rājan vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // 2.099.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ rājā bhava bharata svayaṃ narāṇāṃ; vanyānām aham api rājarāṇ mṛgāṇām / gaccha tvaṃ puravaram adya saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ; saṃhṛṣṭas tv aham api daṇḍakān pravekṣye // 2.099.017	praharṣiṇī [mnjrg]
chāyāṃ te dinakarabhāḥ prabādhamānaṃ; varṣatraṃ bharata karotu mūrdhni śītām / eteṣām aham api kānanadrumāṇāṃ; chāyāṃ tām atiśayinīṃ sukhaṃ śrayiṣye // 2.099.018	praharṣiṇī [mnjrg]
śatrughnaḥ kuśalamatis tu te sahāyaḥ; saumitrir mama viditaḥ pradhānamitram / catvāras tanayavarā vayaṃ narendraṃ; satyasthaṃ bharata carāma mā viṣādam // 2.099.019	praharṣiṇī [mnjrg]
āśvāsayantaṃ bharataṃ jābālir brāhmaṇottamaḥ / uvāca rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmāpetam idaṃ vacaḥ // 2.100.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhu rāghava mā bhūt te buddhir evaṃ nirarthakā / prākṛtasya narasyeva ārya buddhes tapasvinaḥ // 2.100.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaḥ kasya puruṣo bandhuḥ kim āpyaṃ kasya kena cit / yad eko jāyate jantur eka eva vinaśyati // 2.100.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmān mātā pitā ceti rāma sajjeta yo naraḥ / unmatta iva sa jñeyo nāsti kācid dhi kasya cit // 2.100.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā grāmāntaraṃ gacchan naraḥ kaś cit kva cid vaset / utsṛjya ca tam āvāsaṃ pratiṣṭhetāpare 'hani // 2.100.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ pitā mātā gṛhaṃ vasu / āvāsamātraṃ kākutstha sajjante nātra sajjanāḥ // 2.100.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitryaṃ rājyaṃ samutsṛjya sa nārhati narottama / āsthātuṃ kāpathaṃ duḥkhaṃ viṣamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam // 2.100.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samṛddhāyām ayodhyāyām ātmānam abhiṣecaya / ekaveṇīdharā hi tvāṃ nagarī saṃpratīkṣate // 2.100.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājabhogān anubhavan mahārhān pārthivātmaja / vihara tvam ayodhyāyāṃ yathā śakras triviṣṭape // 2.100.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na te kaś cid daśarataḥs tvaṃ ca tasya na kaś cana / anyo rājā tvam anyaś ca tasmāt kuru yad ucyate // 2.100.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gataḥ sa nṛpatis tatra gantavyaṃ yatra tena vai / pravṛttir eṣā martyānāṃ tvaṃ tu mithyā vihanyase // 2.100.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthadharmaparā ye ye tāṃs tāñ śocāmi netarān / te hi duḥkham iha prāpya vināśaṃ pretya bhejire // 2.100.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṣṭakā pitṛdaivatyam ity ayaṃ prasṛto janaḥ / annasyopadravaṃ paśya mṛto hi kim aśiṣyati // 2.100.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi bhuktam ihānyena deham anyasya gacchati / dadyāt pravasataḥ śrāddhaṃ na tat pathy aśanaṃ bhavet // 2.100.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dānasaṃvananā hy ete granthā medhāvibhiḥ kṛtāḥ / yajasva dehi dīkṣasva tapas tapyasva saṃtyaja // 2.100.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nāsti param ity eva kuru buddhiṃ mahāmate / pratyakṣaṃ yat tad ātiṣṭha parokṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuru // 2.100.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satāṃ buddhiṃ puraskṛtya sarvalokanidarśinīm / rājyaṃ tvaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva bharatena prasāditaḥ // 2.100.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jābāles tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ satyātmanāṃ varaḥ / uvāca parayā yuktyā svabuddhyā cāvipannayā // 2.101.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavān me priyakāmārthaṃ vacanaṃ yad ihoktavān / akāryaṃ kāryasaṃkāśam apathyaṃ pathyasaṃmitam // 2.101.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirmaryādas tu puruṣaḥ pāpācārasamanvitaḥ / mānaṃ na labhate satsu bhinnacāritradarśanaḥ // 2.101.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kulīnam akulīnaṃ vā vīraṃ puruṣamāninam / cāritram eva vyākhyāti śuciṃ vā yadi vāśucim // 2.101.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anārays tv ārya saṃkāśaḥ śaucād dhīnas tathā śuciḥ / lakṣaṇyavad alakṣaṇyo duḥśīlaḥ śīlavān iva // 2.101.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adharmaṃ dharmaveṣeṇa yadīmaṃ lokasaṃkaram / abhipatsye śubhaṃ hitvā kriyāvidhivivarjitam // 2.101.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaś cetayānaḥ puruṣaḥ kāryākāryavicakṣaṇaḥ / bahu maṃsyati māṃ loke durvṛttaṃ lokadūṣaṇam // 2.101.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya yāsyāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ kena vā svargam āpnuyām / anayā vartamāno 'haṃ vṛttyā hīnapratijñayā // 2.101.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmavṛttas tv ayaṃ lokaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samupavartate / yadvṛttāḥ santi rājānas tadvṛttāḥ santi hi prajāḥ // 2.101.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyam evānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca rājavṛttaṃ sanātanam / tasmāt satyātmakaṃ rājyaṃ satye lokaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // 2.101.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca satyam eva hi menire / satyavādī hi loke 'smin paramaṃ gacchati kṣayam // 2.101.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udvijante yathā sarpān narād anṛtavādinaḥ / dharmaḥ satyaṃ paro loke mūlaṃ svargasya cocyate // 2.101.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyam eveśvaro loke satyaṃ padmā samāśritā / satyamūlāni sarvāṇi satyān nāsti paraṃ padam // 2.101.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dattam iṣṭaṃ hutaṃ caiva taptāni ca tapāṃsi ca / vedāḥ satyapratiṣṭhānās tasmāt satyaparo bhavet // 2.101.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam / majjaty eko hi niraya ekaḥ svarge mahīyate // 2.101.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ pitur nideśaṃ tu kimarthaṃ nānupālaye / satyapratiśravaḥ satyaṃ satyena samayīkṛtaḥ // 2.101.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva lobhān na mohād vā na cājñānāt tamo'nvitaḥ / setuṃ satyasya bhetsyāmi guroḥ satyapratiśravaḥ // 2.101.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asatyasaṃdhasya sataś calasyāsthiracetasaḥ / naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam // 2.101.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyagātmam imaṃ dharmaṃ satyaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ svayam / bhāraḥ satpuruṣācīrṇas tad artham abhinandyate // 2.101.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣātraṃ dharmam ahaṃ tyakṣye hy adharmaṃ dharmasaṃhitam / kṣudraur nṛśaṃsair lubdhaiś ca sevitaṃ pāpakarmabhiḥ // 2.101.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāyena kurute pāpaṃ manasā saṃpradhārya ca / anṛtaṃ jihvayā cāha trividhaṃ karma pātakam // 2.101.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūmiḥ kīrtir yaśo lakṣmīḥ puruṣaṃ prārthayanti hi / svargasthaṃ cānubadhnanti satyam eva bhajeta tat // 2.101.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śreṣṭhaṃ hy anāryam eva syād yad bhavān avadhārya mām / āha yuktikarair vākyair idaṃ bhadraṃ kuruṣva ha // 2.101.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ hy ahaṃ pratijñāya vanavāsam imaṃ guroḥ / bharatasya kariṣyāmi vaco hitvā guror vacaḥ // 2.101.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthirā mayā pratijñātā pratijñā gurusaṃnidhau / prahṛṣṭamānasā devī kaikeyī cābhavat tadā // 2.101.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanavāsaṃ vasann evaṃ śucir niyatabhojanaḥ / mūlaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pitṝn devāṃś ca tarpayan // 2.101.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃtuṣṭapañcavargo 'haṃ lokayātrāṃ pravartaye / akuhaḥ śraddadhānaḥ san kāryākāryavicakṣaṇaḥ // 2.101.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karmabhūmim imāṃ prāpya kartavyaṃ karma yac chubham / agnir vāyuś ca somaś ca karmaṇāṃ phalabhāginaḥ // 2.101.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śataṃ kratūnām āhṛtya devarāṭ tridivaṃ gataḥ / tapāṃsy ugrāṇi cāsthāya divaṃ yātā maharṣayaḥ // 2.101.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca; bhūtānukampāṃ priyavāditāṃ ca / dvijātidevātithipūjanaṃ ca; panthānam āhus tridivasya santaḥ // 2.101.030	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
dharme ratāḥ satpuruṣaiḥ sametās; tejasvino dānaguṇapradhānāḥ / ahiṃsakā vītamalāś ca loke; bhavanti pūjyā munayaḥ pradhānāḥ // 2.101.031	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
kruddham ājñāya rāma tu vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha / jābālir api jānīte lokasyāsya gatāgatim // 2.102.001.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivartayitu kāmas tu tvām etad vākyam abravīt // 2.102.001.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ lokasamutpattiṃ lokanātha nibodha me / sarvaṃ salilam evāsīt pṛthivī yatra nirmitā // 2.102.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ samabhavad brahmā svayambhūr daivataiḥ saha // 2.102.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa varāhas tato bhūtvā projjahāra vasuṃdharām / asṛjac ca jagat sarvaṃ saha putraiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ // 2.102.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ākāśaprabhavo brahmā śāśvato nitya avyayaḥ / tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ // 2.102.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivastavaḥ smṛtaḥ / sa tu prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ // 2.102.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasyeyaṃ prathamaṃ dattā samṛddhā manunā mahī / tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam // 2.102.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān kukṣir eveti viśrutaḥ / kukṣer athātmajo vīro vikukṣir udapadyata // 2.102.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān / bāṇasya tu mahābāhur anaraṇyo mahāyaśāḥ // 2.102.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānā vṛṣṭir babhūvāsmin na durbhikṣaṃ satāṃ vare / anaraṇye mahārāje taskaro vāpi kaś cana // 2.102.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anaraṇyān mahābāhuḥ pṛthū rājā babhūva ha / tasmāt pṛthor mahārājas triśaṅkur udapadyata // 2.102.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa satyavacanād vīraḥ saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ // 2.102.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triśaṅkor abhavat sūnur dhundhumāro mahāyaśāḥ / dhundhumārān mahātejā yuvanāśvo vyajāyata // 2.102.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuvanāśva sutaḥ śrīmān māndhātā samapadyata / māndhātus tu mahātejāḥ susaṃdhir udapadyata // 2.102.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit / yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato ripusūdanaḥ // 2.102.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatāt tu mahābāhor asito nāma jāyata / yasyaite pratirājāna udapadyanta śatravaḥ // 2.102.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca śūrāś ca śaśabindavaḥ // 2.102.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃs tu sarvān prativyūhya yuddhe rājā pravāsitaḥ / sa ca śailavare ramye babhūvābhirato muniḥ // 2.102.015.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dve cāsya bhārye garbhiṇyau babhūvatur iti śrutiḥ // 2.102.015.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhārgavaś cyavano nāma himavantam upāśritaḥ / tam ṛṣiṃ samupāgamya kālindī tv abhyavādayat // 2.102.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tām abhyavadad vipro varepsuṃ putrajanmani / tataḥ sā gṛham āgamya devī putraṃ vyajāyata // 2.102.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sapatnyā tu garas tasyai datto garbhajighāṃsayā / gareṇa saha tenaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat // 2.102.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā sagaro nāma yaḥ samudram akhānayat / iṣṭvā parvaṇi vegena trāsayantam imāḥ prajāḥ // 2.102.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asamañjas tu putro 'bhūt sagarasyeti naḥ śrutam / jīvann eva sa pitrā tu nirastaḥ pāpakarmakṛt // 2.102.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṃśumān iti putro 'bhūd asamañjasya vīryavān / dilīpo 'ṃśumataḥ putro dilīpasya bhagīrathaḥ // 2.102.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagīrathāt kakutsthas tu kākutsthā yena tu smṛtāḥ / kakutsthasya tu putro 'bhūd raghur yena tu rāghavaḥ // 2.102.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ / kalmāṣapādaḥ saudāsa ity evaṃ prathito bhuvi // 2.102.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kalmāṣapādaputro 'bhūc chaṅkhaṇas tv iti viśrutaḥ / yas tu tad vīryam āsādya sahaseno vyanīnaśat // 2.102.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkhaṇasya tu putro 'bhūc chūraḥ śrīmān sudarśanaḥ / sudarśanasyāgnivarṇa agnivarṣasya śīghragaḥ // 2.102.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghragasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ praśuśrukaḥ / praśuśrukasya putro 'bhūd ambarīṣo mahādyutiḥ // 2.102.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ambarīṣasya putro 'bhūn nahuṣaḥ satyavikramaḥ / nahuṣasya ca nābhāgaḥ putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ // 2.102.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ajaś ca suvrataś caiva nābhāgasya sutāv ubhau / ajasya caiva dharmātmā rājā daśarathaḥ sutaḥ // 2.102.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya jyeṣṭho 'si dāyādo rāma ity abhiviśrutaḥ / tad gṛhāṇa svakaṃ rājyam avekṣasva jagan nṛpa // 2.102.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ rājā bhavati pūrvajaḥ / pūrvajenāvaraḥ putro jyeṣṭho rājye 'bhiṣicyate // 2.102.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāghavāṇāṃ kuladharmam ātmanaḥ; sanātanaṃ nādya vihātum arhasi / prabhūtaratnām anuśādhi medinīṃ; prabhūtarāṣṭrāṃ pitṛvan mahāyaśāḥ // 2.102.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
vasiṣṭhas tu tadā rāmam uktvā rājapurohitaḥ / abravīd dharmasaṃyuktaṃ punar evāparaṃ vacaḥ // 2.103.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puruṣasyeha jātasya bhavanti guravas trayaḥ / ācāryaś caiva kākutstha pitā mātā ca rāghava // 2.103.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitā hy enaṃ janayati puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha / prajñāṃ dadāti cācāryas tasmāt sa gurur ucyate // 2.103.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa te 'haṃ pitur ācāryas tava caiva paraṃtapa / mama tvaṃ vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // 2.103.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imā hi te pariṣadaḥ śreṇayaś ca samāgatāḥ / eṣu tāta caran dharmaṃ nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // 2.103.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛddhāyā dharmaśīlāyā mātur nārhasy avartitum / asyās tu vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // 2.103.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasya vacaḥ kurvan yācamānasya rāghava / ātmānaṃ nātivartes tvaṃ satyadharmaparākrama // 2.103.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ madhuram uktas tu guruṇā rāghavaḥ svayam / pratyuvāca samāsīnaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ // 2.103.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yan mātāpitarau vṛttaṃ tanaye kurutaḥ sadā / na supratikaraṃ tat tu mātrā pitrā ca yat kṛtam // 2.103.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāśakti pradānena snāpanāc chādanena ca / nityaṃ ca priyavādena tathā saṃvardhanena ca // 2.103.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi rājā janayitā pitā daśaratho mama / ājñātaṃ yan mayā tasya na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati // 2.103.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharataḥ pratyanantaram / uvāca paramodāraḥ sūtaṃ paramadurmanāḥ // 2.103.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iha me sthaṇḍile śīghraṃ kuśān āstara sārathe / āryaṃ pratyupavekṣyāmi yāvan me na prasīdati // 2.103.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anāhāro nirāloko dhanahīno yathā dvijaḥ / śeṣye purastāc chālāyā yāvan na pratiyāsyati // 2.103.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu rāmam avekṣantaṃ sumantraṃ prekṣya durmanāḥ / kuśottaram upasthāpya bhūmāv evāstarat svayam // 2.103.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca mahātejā rāmo rājarṣisattamāḥ / kiṃ māṃ bharata kurvāṇaṃ tāta pratyupavekṣyasi // 2.103.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇo hy ekapārśvena narān roddhum ihārhati / na tu mūrdhāvasiktānāṃ vidhiḥ pratyupaveśane // 2.103.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttiṣṭha naraśārdūla hitvaitad dāruṇaṃ vratam / puravaryām itaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ yāhi rāghava // 2.103.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsīnas tv eva bharataḥ paurajānapadaṃ janam / uvāca sarvataḥ prekṣya kim āryaṃ nānuśāsatha // 2.103.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadā janāḥ / kākutstham abhijānīmaḥ samyag vadati rāghavaḥ // 2.103.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣo 'pi hi mahābhāgaḥ pitur vacasi tiṣṭhati / ata eva na śaktāḥ smo vyāvartayitum añjasā // 2.103.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām ājñāya vacanaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt / evaṃ nibodha vacanaṃ suhṛdāṃ dharmacakṣuṣām // 2.103.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac caivobhayaṃ śrutvā samyak saṃpaśya rāghava / uttiṣṭha tvaṃ mahābāho māṃ ca spṛśa tathodakam // 2.103.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athotthāya jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā bharato vākyam abravīt / śṛṇvantu me pariṣado mantriṇaḥ śreṇayas tathā // 2.103.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na yāce pitaraṃ rājyaṃ nānuśāsāmi mātaram / āryaṃ paramadharmajñam abhijānāmi rāghavam // 2.103.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tv avaśyaṃ vastavyaṃ kartavyaṃ ca pitur vacaḥ / aham eva nivatsyāmi caturdaśa vane samāḥ // 2.103.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmātmā tasya tathyena bhrātur vākyena vismitaḥ / uvāca rāmaḥ saṃprekṣya paurajānapadaṃ janam // 2.103.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikrītam āhitaṃ krītaṃ yat pitrā jīvatā mama / na tal lopayituṃ śakyaṃ mayā vā bharatena vā // 2.103.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upadhir na mayā kāryo vanavāse jugupsitaḥ / yuktam uktaṃ ca kaikeyyā pitrā me sukṛtaṃ kṛtam // 2.103.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānāmi bharataṃ kṣāntaṃ gurusatkārakāriṇam / sarvam evātra kalyāṇaṃ satyasaṃdhe mahātmani // 2.103.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anena dharmaśīlena vanāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ / bhrātrā saha bhaviṣyāmi pṛthivyāḥ patir uttamaḥ // 2.103.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛto rājā hi kaikeyyā mayā tad vacanaṃ kṛtam / anṛtān mocayānena pitaraṃ taṃ mahīpatim // 2.103.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam apratimatejobhyāṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ romaharṣaṇam / vismitāḥ saṃgamaṃ prekṣya samavetā maharṣayaḥ // 2.104.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarhitās tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / tau bhrātarau mahātmānau kākutsthau praśaśaṃsire // 2.104.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dhanyo yasya putrau dvau dharmajñau dharmavikramau / śrutvā vayaṃ hi saṃbhāṣām ubhayoḥ spṛhayāmahe // 2.104.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ kṣipraṃ daśagrīvavadhaiṣiṇaḥ / bharataṃ rājaśārdūlam ity ūcuḥ saṃgatā vacaḥ // 2.104.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kule jāta mahāprājña mahāvṛtta mahāyaśaḥ / grāhyaṃ rāmasya vākyaṃ te pitaraṃ yady avekṣase // 2.104.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadānṛṇam imaṃ rāmaṃ vayam icchāmahe pituḥ / anṛṇatvāc ca kaikeyyāḥ svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // 2.104.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ gandharvāḥ samaharṣayaḥ / rājarṣayaś caiva tathā sarve svāṃ svāṃ gatiṃ gatāḥ // 2.104.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hlāditas tena vākyena śubhena śubhadarśanaḥ / rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭavadanas tān ṛṣīn abhyapūjayat // 2.104.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
srastagātras tu bharataḥ sa vācā sajjamānayā / kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vākyaṃ rāghavaṃ punar abravīt // 2.104.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājadharmam anuprekṣya kuladharmānusaṃtatim / kartum arhasi kākutstha mama mātuś ca yācanām // 2.104.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣituṃ sumahad rājyam aham ekas tu notsahe / paurajānapadāṃś cāpi raktān rañjayituṃ tathā // 2.104.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jñātayaś ca hi yodhāś ca mitrāṇi suhṛdaś ca naḥ / tvām eva pratikāṅkṣante parjanyam iva karṣakāḥ // 2.104.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ rājyaṃ mahāprājña sthāpaya pratipadya hi / śaktimān asi kākutstha lokasya paripālane // 2.104.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā nyapatad bhrātuḥ pādayor bharatas tadā / bhṛśaṃ saṃprārthayām āsa rāmam evaṃ priyaṃ vadaḥ // 2.104.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam aṅke bhrātaraṃ kṛtvā rāmo vacanam abravīt / śyāmaṃ nalinapatrākṣaṃ mattahaṃsasvaraḥ svayam // 2.104.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgatā tvām iyaṃ buddhiḥ svajā vainayikī ca yā / bhṛśam utsahase tāta rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm api // 2.104.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amātyaiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca buddhimadbhiś ca mantribhiḥ / sarvakāryāṇi saṃmantrya sumahānty api kāraya // 2.104.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmīś candrād apeyād vā himavān vā himaṃ tyajet / atīyāt sāgaro velāṃ na pratijñām ahaṃ pituḥ // 2.104.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmād vā tāta lobhād vā mātrā tubhyam idaṃ kṛtam / na tan manasi kartavyaṃ vartitavyaṃ ca mātṛvat // 2.104.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ bharataḥ kausalyāsutam abravīt / tejasādityasaṃkāśaṃ pratipaccandradarśanam // 2.104.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhirohārya pādābhyāṃ pāduke hemabhūṣite / ete hi sarvalokasya yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyataḥ // 2.104.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'dhiruhya naravyāghraḥ pāduke hy avaruhya ca / prāyacchat sumahātejā bharatāya mahātmane // 2.104.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pāduke te bharataḥ pratāpavān; svalaṃkṛte saṃparigṛhya dharmavit / pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ; cakāra caivottamanāgamūrdhani // 2.104.023	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
athānupūrvyāt pratipūjya taṃ janaṃ; gurūṃś ca mantriprakṛtīs tathānujau / vyasarjayad rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ; sthitaḥ svadharme himavān ivācalaḥ // 2.104.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
taṃ mātaro bāṣpagṛhītakaṇṭho; duḥkhena nāmantrayituṃ hi śekuḥ / sa tv eva mātṝr abhivādya sarvā; rudan kuṭīṃ svāṃ praviveśa rāmaḥ // 2.104.025	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ śirasi kṛtvā tu pāduke bharatas tadā / āruroha rathaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // 2.105.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābāliś ca dṛḍhavrataḥ / agrataḥ prayayuḥ sarve mantriṇo mantrapūjitāḥ // 2.105.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mandākinīṃ nadīṃ ramyāṃ prāṅmukhās te yayus tadā / pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kurvāṇāś citrakūṭaṃ mahāgirim // 2.105.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśyan dhātusahasrāṇi ramyāṇi vividhāni ca / prayayau tasya pārśvena sasainyo bharatas tadā // 2.105.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adūrāc citrakūṭasya dadarśa bharatas tadā / āśramaṃ yatra sa munir bharadvājaḥ kṛtālayaḥ // 2.105.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tam āśramam āgamya bharadvājasya buddhimān / avatīrya rathāt pādau vavande kulanandanaḥ // 2.105.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato hṛṣṭo bharadvājo bharataṃ vākyam abravīt / api kṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ tāta rāmeṇa ca samāgatam // 2.105.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhīmatā / pratyuvāca bharadvājaṃ bharato dharmavatsalaḥ // 2.105.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa yācyamāno guruṇā mayā ca dṛḍhavikramaḥ / rāghavaḥ paramaprīto vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abravīt // 2.105.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pituḥ pratijñāṃ tām eva pālayiṣyāmi tattvataḥ / caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi ya pratijñā pitur mama // 2.105.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto mahāprājño vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha / vākyajño vākyakuśalaṃ rāghavaṃ vacanaṃ mahat // 2.105.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete prayaccha saṃhṛṣṭaḥ pāduke hemabhūṣite / ayodhyāyāṃ mahāprājña yogakṣemakare tava // 2.105.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto vasiṣṭhena rāghavaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitaḥ / pāduke hemavikṛte mama rājyāya te dadau // 2.105.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivṛtto 'ham anujñāto rāmeṇa sumahātmanā / ayodhyām eva gacchāmi gṛhītvā pāduke śubhe // 2.105.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ / bharadvājaḥ śubhataraṃ munir vākyam udāharat // 2.105.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naitac citraṃ naravyāghra śīlavṛttavatāṃ vara / yad āryaṃ tvayi tiṣṭhet tu nimne vṛṣṭim ivodakam // 2.105.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amṛtaḥ sa mahābāhuḥ pitā daśarathas tava / yasya tvam īdṛśaḥ putro dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ // 2.105.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ṛṣiṃ tu mahātmānam uktavākyaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ / āmantrayitum ārebhe caraṇāv upagṛhya ca // 2.105.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā bharadvājaṃ punaḥ punaḥ / bharatas tu yayau śrīmān ayodhyāṃ saha mantribhiḥ // 2.105.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yānaiś ca śakaṭaiś caiva hayaiś nāgaiś ca sā camūḥ / punar nivṛttā vistīrṇā bharatasyānuyāyinī // 2.105.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te yamunāṃ divyāṃ nadīṃ tīrtvormimālinīm / dadṛśus tāṃ punaḥ sarve gaṅgāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm // 2.105.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ ramyajalasaṃpūrṇāṃ saṃtīrya saha bāndhavaḥ / śṛṅgaverapuraṃ ramyaṃ praviveśa sasainikaḥ // 2.105.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṅgaverapurād bhūya ayodhyāṃ saṃdadarśa ha / bharato duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ sārathiṃ cedam abravīt // 2.105.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sārathe paśya vidhvastā ayodhyā na prakāśate / nirākārā nirānandā dīnā pratihatasvanā // 2.105.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snigdhagambhīraghoṣeṇa syandanenopayān prabhuḥ / ayodhyāṃ bharataḥ kṣipraṃ praviveśa mahāyaśāḥ // 2.106.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
biḍālolūkacaritām ālīnanaravāraṇām / timirābhyāhatāṃ kālīm aprakāśāṃ niśām iva // 2.106.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāhuśatroḥ priyāṃ patnīṃ śriyā prajvalitaprabhām / graheṇābhyutthitenaikāṃ rohiṇīm iva pīḍitām // 2.106.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alpoṣṇakṣubdhasalilāṃ gharmottaptavihaṃgamām / līnamīnajhaṣagrāhāṃ kṛśāṃ girinadīm iva // 2.106.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhūmām iva hemābhām adhvarāgnisamutthitām / havirabhyukṣitāṃ paścāc chikhāṃ vipralayaṃ gatām // 2.106.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhvastakavacāṃ rugṇagajavājirathadhvajām / hatapravīrām āpannāṃ camūm iva mahāhave // 2.106.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saphenāṃ sasvanāṃ bhūtvā sāgarasya samutthitām / praśāntamārutoddhūtāṃ jalormim iva niḥsvanām // 2.106.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaktāṃ yajñāyudhaiḥ sarvair abhirūpaiś ca yājakaiḥ / sutyākāle vinirvṛtte vediṃ gataravām iva // 2.106.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
goṣṭhamadhye sthitām ārtām acarantīṃ navaṃ tṛṇam / govṛṣeṇa parityaktāṃ gavāṃ patnīm ivotsukām // 2.106.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhākarālaiḥ susnigdhaiḥ prajvaladbhir ivottamaiḥ / viyuktāṃ maṇibhir jātyair navāṃ muktāvalīm iva // 2.106.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahasā calitāṃ sthānān mahīṃ puṇyakṣayād gatām / saṃhṛtadyutivistārāṃ tārām iva divaś cyutām // 2.106.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpanaddhāṃ vasantānte mattabhramaraśālinīm / drutadāvāgnivipluṣṭāṃ klāntāṃ vanalatām iva // 2.106.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃmūḍhanigamāṃ sarvāṃ saṃkṣiptavipaṇāpaṇām / pracchannaśaśinakṣatrāṃ dyām ivāmbudharair vṛtām // 2.106.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣīṇapānottamair bhinnaiḥ śarāvair abhisaṃvṛtām / hataśauṇḍām ivākāśe pānabhūmim asaṃskṛtām // 2.106.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛkṇabhūmitalāṃ nimnāṃ vṛkṇapātraiḥ samāvṛtām / upayuktodakāṃ bhagnāṃ prapāṃ nipatitām iva // 2.106.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vipulāṃ vitatāṃ caiva yuktapāśāṃ tarasvinām / bhūmau bāṇair viniṣkṛttāṃ patitāṃ jyām ivāyudhāt // 2.106.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahasā yuddhaśauṇḍena hayāroheṇa vāhitām / nikṣiptabhāṇḍām utsṛṣṭāṃ kiśorīm iva durbalām // 2.106.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāvṛṣi pravigāḍhāyāṃ praviṣṭasyābhra maṇḍalam / pracchannāṃ nīlajīmūtair bhāskarasya prabhām iva // 2.106.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatas tu rathasthaḥ sañ śrīmān daśarathātmajaḥ / vāhayantaṃ rathaśreṣṭhaṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt // 2.106.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu khalv adya gambhīro mūrchito na niśamyate / yathāpuram ayodhyāyāṃ gītavāditraniḥsvanaḥ // 2.106.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāruṇīmadagandhāś ca mālyagandhaś ca mūrchitaḥ / dhūpitāgarugandhaś ca na pravāti samantataḥ // 2.106.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yānapravaraghoṣaś ca snigdhaś ca hayaniḥsvanaḥ / pramattagajanādaś ca mahāṃś ca rathaniḥsvanaḥ // 2.106.022.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nedānīṃ śrūyate puryām asyāṃ rāme vivāsite // 2.106.022.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taruṇaiś cāru veṣaiś ca narair unnatagāmibhiḥ / saṃpatadbhir ayodhyāyāṃ na vibhānti mahāpathāḥ // 2.106.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ jalpan viveśa vasatiṃ pituḥ / tena hīnāṃ narendreṇa siṃhahīnāṃ guhām iva // 2.106.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nikṣipya mātṝh sa ayodhyāyāṃ dṛḍhavrataḥ / bharataḥ śokasaṃtapto gurūn idam athābravīt // 2.107.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nandigrāmaṃ gamiṣyāmi sarvān āmantraye 'dya vaḥ / tatra duḥkham idaṃ sarvaṃ sahiṣye rāghavaṃ vinā // 2.107.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gataś ca hi divaṃ rājā vanasthaś ca gurur mama / rāmaṃ pratīkṣe rājyāya sa hi rājā mahāyaśāḥ // 2.107.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ / abruvan mantriṇaḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaś ca purohitaḥ // 2.107.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśaṃ ślāghanīyaṃ ca yad uktaṃ bharata tvayā / vacanaṃ bhrātṛvātsalyād anurūpaṃ tavaiva tat // 2.107.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityaṃ te bandhulubdhasya tiṣṭhato bhrātṛsauhṛde / āryamārgaṃ prapannasya nānumanyeta kaḥ pumān // 2.107.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantriṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā yathābhilaṣitaṃ priyam / abravīt sārathiṃ vākyaṃ ratho me yujyatām iti // 2.107.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ sarvā mātṝh samabhivādya saḥ / āruroha rathaṃ śrīmāñ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // 2.107.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āruhya tu rathaṃ śīghraṃ śatrughnabharatāv ubhau / yayatuḥ paramaprītau vṛtau mantripurohitaiḥ // 2.107.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agrato puravas tatra vasiṣṭha pramukhā dvijāḥ / prayayuḥ prāṅmukhāḥ sarve nandigrāmo yato 'bhavat // 2.107.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balaṃ ca tad anāhūtaṃ gajāśvarathasaṃkulam / prayayau bharate yāte sarve ca puravāsinaḥ // 2.107.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathasthaḥ sa tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ / nandigrāmaṃ yayau tūrṇaṃ śirasy ādhāya pāduke // 2.107.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu bharataḥ kṣipraṃ nandigrāmaṃ praviśya saḥ / avatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gurūn idam uvāca ha // 2.107.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad rājyaṃ mama bhrātrā dattaṃ saṃnyāsavat svayam / yogakṣemavahe ceme pāduke hemabhūṣite // 2.107.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam imaṃ pālayiṣyāmi rāghavāgamanaṃ prati // 2.107.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣipraṃ saṃyojayitvā tu rāghavasya punaḥ svayam / caraṇau tau tu rāmasya drakṣyāmi sahapādukau // 2.107.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nikṣiptabhāro 'haṃ rāghaveṇa samāgataḥ / nivedya gurave rājyaṃ bhajiṣye guruvṛttitām // 2.107.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavāya ca saṃnyāsaṃ dattveme varapāduke / rājyaṃ cedam ayodhyāṃ ca dhūtapāpo bhavāmi ca // 2.107.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣikte tu kākutsthe prahṛṣṭamudite jane / prītir mama yaśaś caiva bhaved rājyāc caturguṇam // 2.107.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ tu vilapan dīno bharataḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ / nandigrāme 'karod rājyaṃ duḥkhito mantribhiḥ saha // 2.107.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa valkalajaṭādhārī muniveṣadharaḥ prabhuḥ / nandigrāme 'vasad vīraḥ sasainyo bharatas tadā // 2.107.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmāgamanam ākāṅkṣan bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ / bhrātur vacanakārī ca pratijñāpāragas tadā // 2.107.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāduke tv abhiṣicyātha nandigrāme 'vasat tadā / bharataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ pādukābhyāṃ nyavedayat // 2.107.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratiprayāte bharate vasan rāmas tapovane / lakṣayām āsa sodvegam athautsukyaṃ tapasvinām // 2.108.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tatra citrakūṭasya purastāt tāpasāśrame / rāmam āśritya niratās tān alakṣayad utsukān // 2.108.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nayanair bhṛkuṭībhiś ca rāmaṃ nirdiśya śaṅkitāḥ / anyonyam upajalpantaḥ śanaiś cakrur mithaḥ kathāḥ // 2.108.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām autsukyam ālakṣya rāmas tv ātmani śaṅkitaḥ / kṛtāñjalir uvācedam ṛṣiṃ kulapatiṃ tataḥ // 2.108.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kaccid bhagavan kiṃ cit pūrvavṛttam idaṃ mayi / dṛśyate vikṛtaṃ yena vikriyante tapasvinaḥ // 2.108.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pramādāc caritaṃ kaccit kiṃ cin nāvarajasya me / lakṣmaṇasyarṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ nānurūpam ivātmanaḥ // 2.108.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccic chuśrūṣamāṇā vaḥ śuśrūṣaṇaparā mayi / pramadābhyucitāṃ vṛttiṃ sītā yuktaṃ na vartate // 2.108.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atharṣir jarayā vṛddhas tapasā ca jarāṃ gataḥ / vepamāna ivovāca rāmaṃ bhūtadayāparam // 2.108.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kutaḥ kalyāṇasattvāyāḥ kalyāṇābhirates tathā / calanaṃ tāta vaidehyās tapasviṣu viśeṣataḥ // 2.108.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvannimittam idaṃ tāvat tāpasān prati vartate / rakṣobhyas tena saṃvignāḥ kathayanti mithaḥ kathāḥ // 2.108.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇāvarajaḥ kaś cit kharo nāmeha rākṣasaḥ / utpāṭya tāpasān sarvāñ janasthānaniketanān // 2.108.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhṛṣṭaś ca jitakāśī ca nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣādakaḥ / avaliptaś ca pāpaś ca tvāṃ ca tāta na mṛṣyate // 2.108.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ yadā prabhṛti hy asminn āśrame tāta vartase / tadā prabhṛti rakṣāṃsi viprakurvanti tāpasān // 2.108.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśayanti hi bībhatsaiḥ krūrair bhīṣaṇakair api / nānā rūpair virūpaiś ca rūpair asukhadarśanaiḥ // 2.108.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apraśastair aśucibhiḥ saṃprayojya ca tāpasān / pratighnanty aparān kṣipram anāryāḥ purataḥ sthitaḥ // 2.108.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣu teṣv āśramasthāneṣv abuddham avalīya ca / ramante tāpasāṃs tatra nāśayanto 'lpacetasaḥ // 2.108.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apakṣipanti srugbhāṇḍān agnīn siñcanti vāriṇā / kalaśāṃś ca pramṛdnanti havane samupasthite // 2.108.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair durātmabhir āviṣṭān āśramān prajihāsavaḥ / gamanāyānyadeśasya codayanty ṛṣayo 'dya mām // 2.108.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat purā rāma śārīrām upahiṃsāṃ tapasviṣu / darśayati hi duṣṭās te tyakṣyāma imam āśramam // 2.108.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahumūlaphalaṃ citram avidūrād ito vanam / purāṇāśramam evāhaṃ śrayiṣye sagaṇaḥ punaḥ // 2.108.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
