kharas tvayy api cāyuktaṃ purā tāta pravartate / sahāsmābhir ito gaccha yadi buddhiḥ pravartate // 2.108.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakalatrasya saṃdeho nityaṃ yat tasya rāghava / samarthasyāpi hi sato vāso duḥkha ihādya te // 2.108.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktavantaṃ rāmas taṃ rājaputras tapasvinam / na śaśākottarair vākyair avaroddhuṃ samutsukam // 2.108.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhinandya samāpṛcchya samādhāya ca rāghavam / sa jagāmāśramaṃ tyaktvā kulaiḥ kulapatiḥ saha // 2.108.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaḥ saṃsādhya tv ṛṣigaṇam anugamanād; deśāt tasmāccit kulapatim abhivādyarṣim / samyakprītais tair anumata upadiṣṭārthaḥ; puṇyaṃ vāsāya svanilayam upasaṃpede // 2.108.025	upajāti (śakvarī: asaṃbādhā [mtnsgg], ajñātam [mtnnlg]) atha vā asaṃbādhā [mtnsgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
āśramaṃ tv ṛṣivirahitaṃ prabhuḥ; kṣaṇam api na jahau sa rāghavaḥ / rāghavaṃ hi satatam anugatās; tāpasāś carṣicaritadhṛtaguṇāḥ // 2.108.026	upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [rnslg], ajñātam [rBns], ajñātam [rnnlg], ajñātam [nnrlg])
rāghavas tv apayāteṣu tapasviṣu vicintayan / na tatrārocayad vāsaṃ kāraṇair bahubhis tadā // 2.109.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iha me bharato dṛṣṭo mātaraś ca sanāgarāḥ / sā ca me smṛtir anveti tān nityam anuśocataḥ // 2.109.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
skandhāvāraniveśena tena tasya mahātmanaḥ / hayahastikarīṣaiś ca upamardaḥ kṛto bhṛśam // 2.109.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād anyatra gacchāma iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ / prātiṣṭhata sa vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca saṃgataḥ // 2.109.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'trer āśramam āsādya taṃ vavande mahāyaśāḥ / taṃ cāpi bhagavān atriḥ putravat pratyapadyata // 2.109.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svayam ātithyam ādiśya sarvam asya susatkṛtam / saumitriṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ sītāṃ ca samasāntvayat // 2.109.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patnīṃ ca tam anuprāptāṃ vṛddhām āmantrya satkṛtām / sāntvayām āsa dharmajñaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ // 2.109.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anasūyāṃ mahābhāgāṃ tāpasīṃ dharmacāriṇīm / pratigṛhṇīṣva vaidehīm abravīd ṛṣisattamaḥ // 2.109.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmāya cācacakṣe tāṃ tāpasīṃ dharmacāriṇīm / daśa varṣāṇy anāvṛṣṭyā dagdhe loke nirantaram // 2.109.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yayā mūlaphale sṛṣṭe jāhnavī ca pravartitā / ugreṇa tapasā yuktā niyamaiś cāpy alaṃkṛtā // 2.109.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi yayā taptaṃ mahat tapaḥ / anasūyāvratais tāta pratyūhāś ca nibarhitāḥ // 2.109.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devakāryanimittaṃ ca yayā saṃtvaramāṇayā / daśarātraṃ kṛtvā rātriḥ seyaṃ māteva te 'nagha // 2.109.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām imāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ namaskāryāṃ yaśasvinīm / abhigacchatu vaidehī vṛddhām akrodhanāṃ sadā // 2.109.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tathety uktvā sa rāghavaḥ / sītām uvāca dharmajñām idaṃ vacanam uttamam // 2.109.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājaputri śrutaṃ tv etan muner asya samīritam / śreyo 'rtham ātmanaḥ śīghram abhigaccha tapasvinīm // 2.109.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anasūyeti yā loke karmabhiḥ kyātim āgatā / tāṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvam abhigamyāṃ tapasvinīm // 2.109.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavasya hitaiṣiṇī / tām atripatnīṃ dharmajñām abhicakrāma maithilī // 2.109.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śithilāṃ valitāṃ vṛddhāṃ jarāpāṇḍuramūrdhajām / satataṃ vepamānāṅgīṃ pravāte kadalī yathā // 2.109.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tu sītā mahābhāgām anasūyāṃ pativratām / abhyavādayad avyagrā svaṃ nāma samudāharat // 2.109.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādya ca vaidehī tāpasīṃ tām aninditām / baddhāñjalipuṭā hṛṣṭā paryapṛcchad anāmayam // 2.109.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ dharmacāriṇīm / sāntvayanty abravīd dhṛṣṭā diṣṭyā dharmam avekṣase // 2.109.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaktvā jñātijanaṃ sīte mānam ṛddhiṃ ca mānini / avaruddhaṃ vane rāmaṃ diṣṭyā tvam anugacchasi // 2.109.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nagarastho vanastho vā pāpo vā yadi vāśubhaḥ / yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ // 2.109.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duḥśīlaḥ kāmavṛtto vā dhanair vā parivarjitaḥ / strīṇām ārya svabhāvānāṃ paramaṃ daivataṃ patiḥ // 2.109.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāto viśiṣṭaṃ paśyāmi bāndhavaṃ vimṛśanty aham / sarvatra yogyaṃ vaidehi tapaḥ kṛtam ivāvyayam // 2.109.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tv evam avagacchanti guṇa doṣam asat striyaḥ / kāmavaktavyahṛdayā bhartṛnāthāś caranti yāḥ // 2.109.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāpnuvanty ayaśaś caiva dharmabhraṃśaṃ ca maithili / akārya vaśam āpannāḥ striyo yāḥ khalu tad vidhāḥ // 2.109.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvadvidhās tu guṇair yuktā dṛṣṭalokaparāvarāḥ / striyaḥ svarge cariṣyanti yathā puṇyakṛtas tathā // 2.109.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tv evam uktā vaidehī anasūyān asūyayā / pratipūjya vaco mandaṃ pravaktum upacakrame // 2.110.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naitad āścaryam āryāyā yan māṃ tvam anubhāṣase / viditaṃ tu mamāpy etad yathā nāryāḥ patir guruḥ // 2.110.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady apy eṣa bhaved bhartā mamārye vṛttavarjitaḥ / advaidham upavartavyas tathāpy eṣa mayā bhavet // 2.110.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ punar yo guṇaślāghyaḥ sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ / sthirānurāgo dharmātmā mātṛvartī pitṛ priyaḥ // 2.110.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāṃ vṛttiṃ vartate rāmaḥ kausalyāyāṃ mahābalaḥ / tām eva nṛpanārīṇām anyāsām api vartate // 2.110.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakṛd dṛṣṭāsv api strīṣu nṛpeṇa nṛpavatsalaḥ / mātṛvad vartate vīro mānam utsṛjya dharmavit // 2.110.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgacchantyāś ca vijanaṃ vanam evaṃ bhayāvaham / samāhitaṃ hi me śvaśrvā hṛdaye yat sthitaṃ mama // 2.110.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāṇipradānakāle ca yat purā tv agnisaṃnidhau / anuśiṣṭā jananyāsmi vākyaṃ tad api me dhṛtam // 2.110.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
navīkṛtaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ vākyais te dharmacāriṇi / patiśuśrūṣaṇān nāryās tapo nānyad vidhīyate // 2.110.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāvitrī patiśuśrūṣāṃ kṛtvā svarge mahīyate / tathā vṛttiś ca yātā tvaṃ patiśuśrūṣayā divam // 2.110.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
variṣṭhā sarvanārīṇām eṣā ca divi devatā / rohiṇī ca vinā candraṃ muhūrtam api dṛśyate // 2.110.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃvidhāś ca pravarāḥ striyo bhartṛdṛḍhavratāḥ / devaloke mahīyante puṇyena svena karmaṇā // 2.110.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'nasūyā saṃhṛṣṭā śrutvoktaṃ sītayā vacaḥ / śirasy āghrāya covāca maithilīṃ harṣayanty uta // 2.110.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niyamair vividhair āptaṃ tapo hi mahad asti me / tat saṃśritya balaṃ sīte chandaye tvāṃ śucivrate // 2.110.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca vacanaṃ tava maithili / prītā cāsmy ucitaṃ kiṃ te karavāṇi bravīhi me // 2.110.015.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtam ity abravīt sītā tapobalasamanvitām // 2.110.015.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tv evam uktā dharmajñā tayā prītatarābhavat / saphalaṃ ca praharṣaṃ te hanta sīte karomy aham // 2.110.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ divyaṃ varaṃ mālyaṃ vastram ābharaṇāni ca / aṅgarāgaṃ ca vaidehi mahārham anulepanam // 2.110.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā dattam idaṃ sīte tava gātrāṇi śobhayet / anurūpam asaṃkliṣṭaṃ nityam eva bhaviṣyati // 2.110.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgarāgeṇa divyena liptāṅgī janakātmaje / śobhayiṣyāmi bhartāraṃ yathā śrīr viṣṇum avyayam // 2.110.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā vastram aṅgarāgaṃ ca bhūṣaṇāni srajas tathā / maithilī pratijagrāha prītidānam anuttamam // 2.110.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya ca tat sītā prītidānaṃ yaśasvinī / śliṣṭāñjalipuṭā dhīrā samupāsta tapodhanām // 2.110.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā sītām upāsīnām anasūyā dṛḍhavratā / vacanaṃ praṣṭum ārebhe kathāṃ kāṃ cid anupriyām // 2.110.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svayaṃvare kila prāptā tvam anena yaśasvinā / rāghaveṇeti me sīte kathā śrutim upāgatā // 2.110.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ kathāṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa ca maithili / yathānubhūtaṃ kārtsnyena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // 2.110.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu sā sītā tāṃ tato dharmacāriṇīm / śrūyatām iti coktvā vai kathayām āsa tāṃ kathām // 2.110.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mithilādhipatir vīro janako nāma dharmavit / kṣatradharmaṇy abhirato nyāyataḥ śāsti medinīm // 2.110.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya lāṅgalahastasya karṣataḥ kṣetramaṇḍalam / ahaṃ kilotthitā bhittvā jagatīṃ nṛpateḥ sutā // 2.110.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa māṃ dṛṣṭvā narapatir muṣṭivikṣepatatparaḥ / pāṃśu guṇṭhita sarvāṅgīṃ vismito janako 'bhavat // 2.110.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anapatyena ca snehād aṅkam āropya ca svayam / mameyaṃ tanayety uktvā sneho mayi nipātitaḥ // 2.110.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarikṣe ca vāg uktāpratimā mānuṣī kila / evam etan narapate dharmeṇa tanayā tava // 2.110.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā pitā me mithilādhipaḥ / avāpto vipulām ṛddhiṃ mām avāpya narādhipaḥ // 2.110.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dattvā cāsmīṣṭavad devyai jyeṣṭhāyai puṇyakarmaṇā / tayā saṃbhāvitā cāsmi snigdhayā mātṛsauhṛdāt // 2.110.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patisaṃyogasulabhaṃ vayo dṛṣṭvā tu me pitā / cintām abhyagamad dīno vittanāśād ivādhanaḥ // 2.110.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśāc cāpakṛṣṭāc ca loke kanyāpitā janāt / pradharṣaṇām avāpnoti śakreṇāpi samo bhuvi // 2.110.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ dharṣaṇām adūrasthāṃ saṃdṛśyātmani pārthivaḥ / cinntārṇavagataḥ pāraṃ nāsasādāplavo yatha // 2.110.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayonijāṃ hi māṃ jñātvā nādhyagacchat sa cintayan / sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca mahīpālaḥ patiṃ mama // 2.110.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā cintayānasya saṃtatam / svayaṃ varaṃ tanūjāyāḥ kariṣyāmīti dhīmataḥ // 2.110.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāyajñe tadā tasya varuṇena mahātmanā / dattaṃ dhanurvaraṃ prītyā tūṇī cākṣayya sāyakau // 2.110.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asaṃcālyaṃ manuṣyaiś ca yatnenāpi ca gauravāt / tan na śaktā namayituṃ svapneṣv api narādhipāḥ // 2.110.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dhanuḥ prāpya me pitrā vyāhṛtaṃ satyavādinā / samavāye narendrāṇāṃ pūrvam āmantrya pārthivān // 2.110.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ ca dhanur udyamya sajyaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ / tasya me duhitā bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // 2.110.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac ca dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ gauravād girisaṃnibham / abhivādya nṛpā jagmur aśaktās tasya tolane // 2.110.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sudīrghasya tu kālasya rāghavo 'yaṃ mahādyutiḥ / viśvāmitreṇa sahito yajñaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāgataḥ // 2.110.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā mama pitrā supūjitaḥ // 2.110.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
provāca pitaraṃ tatra rāghavo rāmalakṣmaṇau / sutau daśarathasyemau dhanurdarśanakāṅkṣiṇau // 2.110.045.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktas tena vipreṇa tad dhanuḥ samupānayat // 2.110.045.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nimeṣāntaramātreṇa tad ānamya sa vīryavān / jyāṃ samāropya jhaṭiti pūrayām āsa vīryavān // 2.110.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena pūrayatā vegān madhye bhagnaṃ dvidhā dhanuḥ / tasya śabdo 'bhavad bhīmaḥ patitasyāśaner iva // 2.110.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ tatra rāmāya pitrā satyābhisaṃdhinā / udyatā dātum udyamya jalabhājanam uttamam // 2.110.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīyamānāṃ na tu tadā pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ / avijñāya pituś chandam ayodhyādhipateḥ prabhoḥ // 2.110.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śvaśuram āmantrya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam / mama pitrā ahaṃ dattā rāmāya viditātmane // 2.110.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama caivānujā sādhvī ūrmilā priyadarśanā / bhāryārthe lakṣmaṇasyāpi dattā pitrā mama svayam // 2.110.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ dattāsmi rāmāya tadā tasmin svayaṃ vare / anuraktā ca dharmeṇa patiṃ vīryavatāṃ varam // 2.110.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anasūyā tu dharmajñā śrutvā tāṃ mahatīṃ kathām / paryaṣvajata bāhubhyāṃ śirasy āghrāya maithilīm // 2.111.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyaktākṣarapadaṃ citraṃ bhāṣitaṃ madhuraṃ tvayā / yathā svayaṃvaraṃ vṛttaṃ tat sarvaṃ hi śrutaṃ mayā // 2.111.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rame 'haṃ kathayā te tu dṛṣḍhaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇi / ravir astaṃ gataḥ śrīmān upohya rajanīṃ śivām // 2.111.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divasaṃ prati kīrṇānām āhārārthaṃ patatriṇām / saṃdhyākāle nilīnānāṃ nidrārthaṃ śrūyate dhvaniḥ // 2.111.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete cāpy abhiṣekārdrā munayaḥ phalaśodhanāḥ / sahitā upavartante salilāplutavalkalāḥ // 2.111.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣīṇām agnihotreṣu huteṣu vidhipurvakam / kapotāṅgāruṇo dhūmo dṛśyate pavanoddhataḥ // 2.111.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alpaparṇā hi taravo ghanībhūtāḥ samantataḥ / viprakṛṣṭe 'pi ye deśe na prakāśanti vai diśaḥ // 2.111.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rajanī rasasattvāni pracaranti samantataḥ / tapovanamṛgā hy ete veditīrtheṣu śerate // 2.111.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpravṛttā niśā sīte nakṣatrasamalaṃkṛtā / jyotsnā prāvaraṇaś candro dṛśyate 'bhyudito 'mbare // 2.111.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamyatām anujānāmi rāmasyānucarī bhava / kathayantyā hi madhuraṃ tvayāhaṃ paritoṣitā // 2.111.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaṃkuru ca tāvat tvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ mama maithili / prītiṃ janaya me vatsa divyālaṃkāraśobhinī // 2.111.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tadā samalaṃkṛtya sītā surasutopamā / praṇamya śirasā tasyai rāmaṃ tv abhimukhī yayau // 2.111.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tu bhūṣitāṃ sītāṃ dadarśa vadatāṃ varaḥ / rāghavaḥ prītidānena tapasvinyā jaharṣa ca // 2.111.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nyavedayat tataḥ sarvaṃ sītā rāmāya maithilī / prītidānaṃ tapasvinyā vasanābharaṇasrajām // 2.111.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭas tv abhavad rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ / maithilyāḥ satkriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā mānuṣeṣu sudurlabhām // 2.111.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tāṃ sarvarīṃ prītaḥ puṇyāṃ śaśinibhānanaḥ / arcitas tāpasaiḥ siddhair uvāsa raghunandanaḥ // 2.111.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām abhiṣicya hutāgnikān / āpṛcchetāṃ naravyāghrau tāpasān vanagocarān // 2.111.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv ūcus te vanacarās tāpasā dharmacāriṇaḥ / vanasya tasya saṃcāraṃ rākṣasaiḥ samabhiplutam // 2.111.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa panthā maharṣīṇāṃ phalāny āharatāṃ vane / anena tu vanaṃ durgaṃ gantuṃ rāghava te kṣamam // 2.111.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
itīva taiḥ prāñjalibhis tapasvibhir; dvijaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaḥ paraṃtapaḥ / vanaṃ sabhāryaḥ praviveśa rāghavaḥ; salakṣmaṇaḥ sūrya ivābhramaṇḍalam // 2.111.020	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
praviśya tu mahāraṇyaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyam ātmavān / dadarśa rāmo durdharṣas tāpasāśramamaṇḍalam // 3.001.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśacīraparikṣiptaṃ brāhmyā lakṣmyā samāvṛtam / yathā pradīptaṃ durdharśaṃ gagane sūryamaṇḍalam // 3.001.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaraṇyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ susamṛṣṭājiraṃ sadā / pūjitaṃ copanṛttaṃ ca nityam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // 3.001.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśālair agniśaraṇaiḥ srugbhāṇḍair ajinaiḥ kuśaiḥ / samidbhis toyakalaśaiḥ phalamūlaiś ca śobhitam // 3.001.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āraṇyaiś ca mahāvṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svāduphalair vṛtam / balihomārcitaṃ puṇyaṃ brahmaghoṣanināditam // 3.001.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpair vanyaiḥ parikṣiptaṃ padminyā ca sapadmayā / phalamūlāśanair dāntaiś cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaraiḥ // 3.001.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūryavaiśvānarābhaiś ca purāṇair munibhir vṛtam / puṇyaiś a niyatāhāraiḥ śobhitaṃ paramarṣibhiḥ // 3.001.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad brahmabhavanaprakhyaṃ brahmaghoṣanināditam / brahmavidbhir mahābhāgair brāhmaṇair upaśobhitam // 3.001.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmāṃs tāpasāśramamaṇḍalam / abhyagacchan mahātejā vijyaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ // 3.001.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyajñānopapannās te rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā maharṣayaḥ / abhyagacchaṃs tadā prītā vaidehīṃ ca yaśasvinīm // 3.001.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te taṃ somam ivodyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai dharmacāriṇaḥ / maṅgalāni prayuñjānāḥ pratyagṛhṇan dṛḍhavratāḥ // 3.001.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rūpasaṃhananaṃ lakṣmīṃ saukumāryaṃ suveṣatām / dadṛśur vismitākārā rāmasya vanavāsinaḥ // 3.001.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaṃ netrair animiṣair iva / āścaryabhūtān dadṛśuḥ sarve te vanacāriṇaḥ // 3.001.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atrainaṃ hi mahābhāgāḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ / atithiṃ parṇaśālāyāṃ rāghavaṃ saṃnyaveśayan // 3.001.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmasya satkṛtya vidhinā pāvakopamāḥ / ājahrus te mahābhāgāḥ salilaṃ dharmacāriṇaḥ // 3.001.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mūlaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vanyam āśramaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ / nivedayītvā dharmajñās tataḥ prāñjalayo 'bruvan // 3.001.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmapālo janasyāsya śaraṇyaś ca mahāyaśāḥ / pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca rājā daṇḍadharo guruḥ // 3.001.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrasyaiva caturbhāgaḥ prajā rakṣati rāghava / rājā tasmād vanān bhogān bhuṅkte lokanamaskṛtaḥ // 3.001.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te vayaṃ bhavatā rakṣyā bhavadviṣayavāsinaḥ / nagarastho vanastho vā tvaṃ no rājā janeśvaraḥ // 3.001.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nyastadaṇḍā vayaṃ rājañ jitakrodhā jitendriyāḥ / rakṣitavyās tvayā śaśvad garbhabhūtās tapodhanāḥ // 3.001.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpair vanyaiś ca rāghavam / anyaiś ca vividhāhāraiḥ salakṣmaṇam apūjayan // 3.001.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathānye tāpasāḥ siddhā rāmaṃ vaiśvānaropamāḥ / nyāyavṛttā yathānyāyaṃ tarpayām āsur īśvaram // 3.001.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtātithyo 'tha rāmas tu sūryasyodayanaṃ prati / āmantrya sa munīn sarvān vanam evānvagāhata // 3.002.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāmṛgagaṇākīrṇaṃ śārdūlavṛkasevitam / dhvastavṛkṣalatāgulmaṃ durdarśa salilāśayam // 3.002.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣkūjanānāśakuni jhillikā gaṇanāditam / lakṣmaṇānugato rāmo vanamadhyaṃ dadarśa ha // 3.002.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanamadhye tu kākutsthas tasmin ghoramṛgāyute / dadarśa giriśṛṅgābhaṃ puruṣādaṃ mahāsvanam // 3.002.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gabhīrākṣaṃ mahāvaktraṃ vikaṭaṃ viṣamodaram / bībhatsaṃ viṣamaṃ dīrghaṃ vikṛtaṃ ghoradarśanam // 3.002.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasānaṃ carmavaiyāghraṃ vasārdraṃ rudhirokṣitam / trāsanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ vyāditāsyam ivāntakam // 3.002.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trīn siṃhāṃś caturo vyāghrān dvau vṛkau pṛṣatān daśa / saviṣāṇaṃ vasādigdhaṃ gajasya ca śiro mahat // 3.002.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avasajyāyase śūle vinadantaṃ mahāsvanam / sa rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maithilīm // 3.002.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddhaḥ prajāḥ kāla ivāntakaḥ / sa kṛtvā bhairavaṃ nādaṃ cālayann iva medinīm // 3.002.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgenādāya vaidehīm apakramya tato 'bravīt / yuvāṃ jaṭācīradharau sabhāryau kṣīṇajīvitau // 3.002.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviṣṭau daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ śaracāpāsidhāriṇau / kathaṃ tāpasayor vāṃ ca vāsaḥ pramadayā saha // 3.002.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adharmacāriṇau pāpau kau yuvāṃ munidūṣakau / ahaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ virāgho nāma rākṣasaḥ // 3.002.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
carāmi sāyudho nityam ṛṣimāṃsāni bhakṣayan / iyaṃ nārī varārohā mama bharyā bhaviṣyati // 3.002.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuvayoḥ pāpayoś cāhaṃ pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ mṛdhe // 3.002.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaivaṃ bruvato dhṛṣṭaṃ virādhasya durātmanaḥ / śrutvā sagarvitaṃ vākyaṃ saṃbhrāntā janakātmajā // 3.002.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītā prāvepatodvegāt pravāte kadalī yathā // 3.002.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ sītāṃ virādhāṅkagatāṃ śubhām / abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā // 3.002.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya saumya narendrasya janakasyātmasaṃbhavām / mama bhāryāṃ śubhācārāṃ virādhāṅke praveśitām // 3.002.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atyanta sukhasaṃvṛddhāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm // 3.002.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad abhipretam asmāsu priyaṃ vara vṛtaṃ ca yat / kaikeyyās tu susaṃvṛttaṃ kṣipram adyaiva lakṣmaṇa // 3.002.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā na tuṣyati rājyena putrārthe dīrghadarśinī / yayāhaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ hitaḥ prasthāpito vanam // 3.002.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyedānīṃ sakāmā sā yā mātā mama madhyamā // 3.002.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parasparśāt tu vaidehyā na duḥkhataram asti me / pitur vināśāt saumitre svarājyaharaṇāt tathā // 3.002.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti bruvati kākutsthe bāṣpaśokapariplute / abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho ruddho nāga iva śvasan // 3.002.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anātha iva bhūtānāṃ nāthas tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ / mayā preṣyeṇa kākutstha kimarthaṃ paritapsyase // 3.002.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śareṇa nihatasyādya mayā kruddhena rakṣasaḥ / virādhasya gatāsor hi mahī pāsyati śoṇitam // 3.002.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyakāme mama krodho bharate yo babhūva ha / taṃ virādhe vimokṣyāmi vajrī vajram ivācale // 3.002.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama bhujabalavegavegitaḥ; patatu śaro 'sya mahān mahorasi / vyapanayatu tanoś ca jīvitaṃ; patatu tataś ca mahīṃ vighūrṇitaḥ // 3.002.024	aparavaktra (1,3: nnrlg, 2,4: njjr)
athovāca punar vākyaṃ virādhaḥ pūrayan vanam / ātmānaṃ pṛcchate brūtaṃ kau yuvāṃ kva gamiṣyathaḥ // 3.003.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca tato rāmo rākṣasaṃ jvalitānanam / pṛcchantaṃ sumahātejā ikṣvākukulam ātmanaḥ // 3.003.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatriyo vṛttasaṃpannau viddhi nau vanagocarau / tvāṃ tu veditum icchāvaḥ kas tvaṃ carasi daṇḍakān // 3.003.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca virādhas tu rāmaṃ satyaparākramam / hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan nibodha mama rāghava // 3.003.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putraḥ kila jayasyāhaṃ mātā mama śatahradā / virādha iti mām āhuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvarākṣasāḥ // 3.003.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapasā cāpi me prāptā brahmaṇo hi prasādajā / śastreṇāvadhyatā loke 'cchedyābhedyatvam eva ca // 3.003.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utsṛjya pramadām enām anapekṣau yathāgatam / tvaramāṇau pālayethāṃ na vāṃ jīvitam ādade // 3.003.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ rāmaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ kopasaṃraktalocanaḥ / rākṣasaṃ vikṛtākāraṃ virādhaṃ pāpacetasaṃ // 3.003.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣudra dhik tvāṃ tu hīnārthaṃ mṛtyum anveṣase dhruvam / raṇe saṃprāpsyase tiṣṭha na me jīvan gamiṣyasi // 3.003.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā rāmaḥ suniśitāñ śarān / suśīghram abhisaṃdhāya rākṣasaṃ nijaghāna ha // 3.003.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanuṣā jyāguṇavatā saptabāṇān mumoca ha / rukmapuṅkhān mahāvegān suparṇānilatulyagān // 3.003.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te śarīraṃ virādhasya bhittvā barhiṇavāsasaḥ / nipetuḥ śoṇitādigdhā dharaṇyāṃ pāvakopamāḥ // 3.003.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vinadya mahānādaṃ śūlaṃ śakradhvajopamam / pragṛhyāśobhata tadā vyāttānana ivāntakaḥ // 3.003.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tasya raudrasya saumitrir bāhuṃ savyaṃ babhañja ha / rāmas tu dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ tarasā tasya rakṣasaḥ // 3.003.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhagnabāhuḥ saṃvigno nipapātāśu rākṣasaḥ / dharaṇyāṃ meghasaṃkāśo vajrabhinna ivācalaḥ // 3.003.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ provāca kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ puruṣarṣabham // 3.003.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

abhiśāpād ahaṃ ghorāṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasīṃ tanum / tumburur nāma gandharvaḥ śapto vaiśvaraṇena hi // 3.003.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasādyamānaś ca mayā so 'bravīn māṃ mahāyaśāḥ / yadā dāśarathī rāmas tvāṃ vadhiṣyati saṃyuge // 3.003.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadā prakṛtim āpanno bhavān svargaṃ gamiṣyati / iti vaiśravaṇo rājā rambhāsaktam uvāca ha // 3.003.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anupasthīyamāno māṃ saṃkruddho vyajahāra ha / tava prasādān mukto 'ham abhiśāpāt sudāruṇāt // 3.003.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavanaṃ svaṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu paraṃtapa // 3.003.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ito vasati dharmātmā śarabhaṅgaḥ pratāpavān / adhyardhayojane tāta maharṣiḥ sūryasaṃnibhaḥ // 3.003.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ kṣipram abhigaccha tvaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati / avaṭe cāpi māṃ rāma nikṣipya kuśalī vraja // 3.003.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣasāṃ gatasattvānām eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ / avaṭe ye nidhīyante teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ // 3.003.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ śarapīḍitaḥ / babhūva svargasaṃprāpto nyastadeho mahābalaḥ // 3.003.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ muktakaṇṭham utkṣipya śaṅkukarṇaṃ mahāsvanam / virādhaṃ prākṣipac chvabhre nadantaṃ bhairavasvanam // 3.003.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu tau kāñcanacitrakārmukau; nihatya rakṣaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm / vijahratus tau muditau mahāvane; divi sthitau candradivākarāv iva // 3.003.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
hatvā tu taṃ bhīmabalaṃ virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ vane / tataḥ sītāṃ pariṣvajya samāśvāsya ca vīryavān // 3.004.001.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīl lakṣmaṇāṃ rāmo bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasaṃ // 3.004.001.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaṣṭaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ na ca smo vanagocarāḥ / abhigacchāmahe śīghraṃ śarabhaṅgaṃ tapodhanam // 3.004.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśramaṃ śarabhaṅgasya rāghavo 'bhijagāma ha // 3.004.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya devaprabhāvasya tapasā bhāvitātmanaḥ / samīpe śarabhaṅgasya dadarśa mahad adbhutam // 3.004.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhrājamānaṃ vapuṣā sūryavaiśvānaropamam / asaṃspṛśantaṃ vasudhāṃ dadarśa vibudheśvaram // 3.004.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suprabhābharaṇaṃ devaṃ virajo 'mbaradhāriṇam / tadvidhair eva bahubhiḥ pūjyamānaṃ mahātmabhiḥ // 3.004.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haribhir vājibhir yuktam antarikṣagataṃ ratham / dadarśādūratas tasya taruṇādityasaṃnibham // 3.004.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇḍurābhraghanaprakhyaṃ candramaṇḍalasaṃnibham / apaśyad vimalaṃ chatraṃ citramālyopaśobhitam // 3.004.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cāmaravyajane cāgrye rukmadaṇḍe mahādhane / gṛhīte vananārībhyāṃ dhūyamāne ca mūrdhani // 3.004.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandharvāmarasiddhāś ca bahavaḥ paramarṣayaḥ / antarikṣagataṃ devaṃ vāgbhir agryābhir īḍire // 3.004.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā śatakratuṃ tatra rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt / ye hayāḥ puruhūtasya purā śakrasya naḥ śrutāḥ // 3.004.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarikṣagatā divyās ta ime harayo dhruvam // 3.004.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime ca puruṣavyāghra ye tiṣṭhanty abhito ratham / śataṃ śataṃ kuṇḍalino yuvānaḥ khaḍgapāṇayaḥ // 3.004.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
urodeśeṣu sarveṣāṃ hārā jvalanasaṃnibhāḥ / rūpaṃ bibhrati saumitre pañcaviṃśativārṣikam // 3.004.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad dhi kila devānāṃ vayo bhavati nityadā / yatheme puruṣavyāghrā dṛśyante priyadarśanāḥ // 3.004.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ihaiva saha vaidehyā muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha lakṣmaṇa / yāvaj janāmy ahaṃ vyaktaṃ ka eṣa dyutimān rathe // 3.004.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evam uktvā saumitrim ihaiva sthīyatām iti / abhicakrāma kākutsthaḥ śarabhaṅgāśramaṃ prati // 3.004.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ samabhigacchantaṃ prekṣya rāmaṃ śacīpatiḥ / śarabhaṅgam anujñāpya vibudhān idam abravīt // 3.004.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

sa puṇyakarmā bhuvane dvijarṣabhaḥ; pitāmahaṃ sānucaraṃ dadarśa ha / pitāmahaś cāpi samīkṣya taṃ dvijaṃ; nananda susvāgatam ity uvāca ha // 3.004.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
śarabhaṅge divaṃ prāpte munisaṃghāḥ samāgatāḥ / abhyagacchanta kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ jvalitatejasaṃ // 3.005.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaikhānasā vālakhilyāḥ saṃprakṣālā marīcipāḥ / aśmakuṭṭāś ca bahavaḥ patrāhārāś ca tāpasāḥ // 3.005.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

sarvāṃl lokāñ jitān āha mama puṇyena karmaṇā // 3.006.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣu devarṣijuṣṭeṣu jiteṣu tapasā mayā / matprasādāt sabhāryas tvaṃ viharasva salakṣmaṇaḥ // 3.006.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ugratapasaṃ dīptaṃ maharṣiṃ satyavādinam / pratyuvācātmavān rāmo brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ // 3.006.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham evāhariṣyāmi svayaṃ lokān mahāmune / āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane // 3.006.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavān sarvatra kuśalaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ / ākhyātaḥ śarabhaṅgena gautamena mahātmanā // 3.006.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ / abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ harṣeṇa mahatāplutaḥ // 3.006.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayam evāśramo rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha / ṛṣisaṃghānucaritaḥ sadā mūlaphalair yutaḥ // 3.006.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imam āśramam āgamya mṛgasaṃghā mahāyaśāḥ / aṭitvā pratigacchanti lobhayitvākutobhayāḥ // 3.006.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya maharṣer lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / uvāca vacanaṃ dhīro vikṛṣya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // 3.006.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān ahaṃ sumahābhāga mṛgasaṃghān samāgatān / hanyāṃ niśitadhāreṇa śareṇāśanivarcasā // 3.006.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavāṃs tatrābhiṣajyeta kiṃ syāt kṛcchrataraṃ tataḥ / etasminn āśrame vāsaṃ ciraṃ tu na samarthaye // 3.006.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evam uktvā varadaṃ rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāgamat / anvāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tatra vāsam akalpayat // 3.006.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śubhaṃ tāpasabhojyam annaṃ; svayaṃ sutīkṣṇaḥ puruṣarṣabhābhyām / tābhyāṃ susatkṛtya dadau mahātmā; saṃdhyānivṛttau rajanīṃ samīkṣya // 3.006.022	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
rāmas tu sahasaumitriḥ sutīkṣṇenābhipūjitaḥ / pariṇamya niśāṃ tatra prabhāte pratyabudhyata // 3.007.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utthāya tu yathākālaṃ rāghavaḥ saha sītayā / upāspṛśat suśītena jalenotpalagandhinā // 3.007.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha te 'gniṃ surāṃś caiva vaidehī rāmalakṣmaṇau / kālyaṃ vidhivad abhyarcya tapasviśaraṇe vane // 3.007.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udayanntaṃ dinakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā vigatakalmaṣāḥ / sutīkṣṇam abhigamyedaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abruvan // 3.007.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukhoṣitāḥ sma bhagavaṃs tvayā pūjyena pūjitāḥ / āpṛcchāmaḥ prayāsyāmo munayas tvarayanti naḥ // 3.007.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvarāmahe vayaṃ draṣṭuṃ kṛtsnam āśramamaṇḍalam / ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyaśīlānāṃ daṇḍakāraṇyavāsinām // 3.007.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyanujñātum icchāmaḥ sahaibhir munipuṅgavaiḥ / dharmanityais tapodāntair viśikhair iva pāvakaiḥ // 3.007.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aviṣahyātapo yāvat sūryo nātivirājite / amārgeṇāgatāṃ lakṣmīṃ prāpyevānvayavarjitaḥ // 3.007.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāvad icchāmahe gantum ity uktvā caraṇau muneḥ / vavande sahasaumitriḥ sītayā saha rāghavaḥ // 3.007.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau saṃspṛśantau caraṇāv utthāpya munipuṃgavaḥ / gāḍham āliṅgya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 3.007.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ rāma saumitriṇā saha / sītayā cānayā sārdhaṃ chāyayevānuvṛttayā // 3.007.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśyāśramapadaṃ ramyaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyavāsinām / eṣāṃ tapasvināṃ vīra tapasā bhāvitātmanām // 3.007.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suprājyaphalamūlāni puṣpitāni vanāni ca / praśāntamṛgayūthāni śāntapakṣigaṇāni ca // 3.007.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phullapaṅkajaṣaḍāni prasannasalilāni ca / kāraṇḍavavikīrṇāni taṭākāni sarāṃsi ca // 3.007.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
drakṣyase dṛṣṭiramyāṇi giriprasravaṇāni ca / ramaṇīyāny araṇyāni mayūrābhirutāni ca // 3.007.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamyatāṃ vatsa saumitre bhavān api ca gacchatu / āgantavyaṃ ca te dṛṣṭvā punar evāśramaṃ mama // 3.007.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tathety uktvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / pradakṣiṇaṃ muniṃ kṛtā prasthātum upacakrame // 3.007.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śubhatare tūṇī dhanuṣī cāyatekṣaṇā / dadau sītā tayor bhrātroḥ khaḍgau ca vimalau tataḥ // 3.007.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ābadhya ca śubhe tūṇī cāpe cādāya sasvane / niṣkrāntāv āśramād gantum ubhau tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 3.007.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sutīkṣṇenābhyanujñātaṃ prasthitaṃ raghunandanam / vaidehī snigdhayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt // 3.008.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ dharmaḥ susūkṣmeṇa vidhinā prāpyate mahān / nivṛttena ca śakyo 'yaṃ vyasanāt kāmajād iha // 3.008.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trīṇy eva vyasanāny atra kāmajāni bhavanty uta / mithyā vākyaṃ paramakaṃ tasmād gurutarāv ubhau // 3.008.003.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paradārābhigamanaṃ vinā vairaṃ ca raudratā // 3.008.003.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mithyāvākyaṃ na te bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati rāghava / kuto 'bhilaṣaṇaṃ strīṇāṃ pareṣāṃ dharmanāśanam // 3.008.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac ca sarvaṃ mahābāho śakyaṃ voḍhuṃ jitendriyaiḥ / tava vaśyendriyatvaṃ ca jānāmi śubhadarśana // 3.008.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tṛtīyaṃ yad idaṃ raudraṃ paraprāṇābhihiṃsanam / nirvairaṃ kriyate mohāt tac ca te samupasthitam // 3.008.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratijñātas tvayā vīra daṇḍakāraṇyavāsinām / ṛṣīṇāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya vadhaḥ saṃyati rakṣasām // 3.008.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etannimittaṃ ca vanaṃ daṇḍakā iti viśrutam / prasthitas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā dhṛtabāṇaśarāsanaḥ // 3.008.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tvāṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama cintākulaṃ manaḥ / tvad vṛttaṃ cintayantyā vai bhaven niḥśreyasaṃ hitam // 3.008.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi me rocate vīra gamanaṃ daṇḍakān prati / kāraṇaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi vadantyāḥ śrūyatāṃ mama // 3.008.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ hi bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir bhrātrā saha vanaṃ gataḥ / dṛṣṭvā vanacarān sarvān kaccit kuryāḥ śaravyayam // 3.008.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatriyāṇām iha dhanur hutāśasyendhanāni ca / samīpataḥ sthitaṃ tejobalam ucchrayate bhṛśam // 3.008.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā kila mahābāho tapasvī satyavāk śuciḥ / kasmiṃś cid abhavat puṇye vane ratamṛgadvije // 3.008.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaiva tapaso vighnaṃ kartum indraḥ śacīpatiḥ / khaḍgapāṇir athāgacchad āśramaṃ bhaṭa rūpadhṛk // 3.008.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tad āśramapade nihitaḥ khaḍga uttamaḥ / sa nyāsavidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ // 3.008.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tac chastram anuprāpya nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ / vane tu vicaraty eva rakṣan pratyayam ātmanaḥ // 3.008.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatra gacchaty upādātuṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca / na vinā yāti taṃ khaḍgaṃ nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ // 3.008.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityaṃ śastraṃ parivahan krameṇa sa tapodhanaḥ / cakāra raudrīṃ svāṃ buddhiṃ tyaktvā tapasi niścayam // 3.008.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa raudrābhirataḥ pramatto 'dharmakarṣitaḥ / tasya śastrasya saṃvāsāj jagāma narakaṃ muniḥ // 3.008.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snehāc ca bahumānāc ca smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye / na kathaṃ cana sā kāryā hṛhītadhanuṣā tvayā // 3.008.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhir vairaṃ vinā hantuṃ rākṣasān daṇḍakāśritān / aparādhaṃ vinā hantuṃ lokān vīra na kāmaye // 3.008.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu vīrāṇāṃ vaneṣu niyatātmanām / dhanuṣā kāryam etāvad ārtānām abhirakṣaṇam // 3.008.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva ca śastraṃ kva ca vanaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ tapaḥ kva ca / vyāviddham idam asmābhir deśadharmas tu pūjyatām // 3.008.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad āryakaluṣā buddhir jāyate śastrasevanāt / punar gatvā tv ayodhyāyāṃ kṣatradharmaṃ cariṣyasi // 3.008.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṣayā tu bhavet prītiḥ śvaśrū śvaśurayor mama / yadi rājyaṃ hi saṃnyasya bhaves tvaṃ nirato muniḥ // 3.008.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmād arthaḥ prabhavati dharmāt prabhavate sukham / dharmeṇa labhate sarvaṃ dharmasāram idaṃ jagat // 3.008.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmānaṃ niyamais tais taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ / prāpyate nipuṇair dharmo na sukhāl labhyate sukham // 3.008.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityaṃ śucimatiḥ saumya cara dharmaṃ tapovane / sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tubhyaṃ trailokyam api tattvataḥ // 3.008.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
strīcāpalād etad udāhṛtaṃ me; dharmaṃ ca vaktuṃ tava kaḥ samarthaḥ / vicārya buddhyā tu sahānujena; yad rocate tat kuru mācireṇa // 3.008.029	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
vākyam etat tu vaidehyā vyāhṛtaṃ bhartṛbhaktayā / śrutvā dharme sthito rāmaḥ pratyuvācātha maithilīm // 3.009.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hitam uktaṃ tvayā devi snigdhayā sadṛśaṃ vacaḥ / kulaṃ vyapadiśantyā ca dharmajñe janakātmaje // 3.009.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tu vakṣyāmy ahaṃ devi tvayaivoktam idaṃ vacaḥ / kṣatriyair dhāryate cāpo nārtaśabdo bhaved iti // 3.009.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te cārtā daṇḍakāraṇye munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / māṃ sīte svayam āgamya śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // 3.009.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasanto dharmaniratā vane mūlaphalāśanāḥ / na labhante sukhaṃ bhītā rākṣasaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ // 3.009.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāle kāle ca niratā niyamair vividhair vane / bhakṣyante rākṣasair bhīmair naramāṃsopajīvibhiḥ // 3.009.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te bhakṣyamāṇā munayo daṇḍakāraṇyavāsinaḥ / asmān abhyavapadyeti mām ūcur dvijasattamāḥ // 3.009.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā tu vacanaṃ śrutvā teṣām evaṃ mukhāc cyutam / kṛtvā caraṇaśuśrūṣāṃ vākyam etad udāhṛtam // 3.009.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasīdantu bhavanto me hrīr eṣā hi mamātulā / yadīdṛśair ahaṃ viprair upastheyair upasthitaḥ // 3.009.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ karomīti ca mayā vyāhṛtaṃ dvijasaṃnidhau // 3.009.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvair eva samāgamya vāg iyaṃ samudāhṛtā / rākṣasair daṇḍakāraṇye bahubhiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ // 3.009.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arditāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ rāma bhavān nas trātum arhati // 3.009.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
homakāle tu saṃprāpte parvakāleṣu cānagha / dharṣayanti sma durdharṣā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ // 3.009.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasair dharṣitānāṃ ca tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām / gatiṃ mṛgayamāṇānāṃ bhavān naḥ paramā gatiḥ // 3.009.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ tapaḥ prabhāvena śaktā hantuṃ niśācarān / cirārjitaṃ tu necchāmas tapaḥ khaṇḍayituṃ vayam // 3.009.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahuvighnaṃ taponityaṃ duścaraṃ caiva rāghava / tena śāpaṃ na muñcāmo bhakṣyamāṇāś ca rākṣasaiḥ // 3.009.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad ardyamānān rakṣobhir daṇḍakāraṇyavāsibhiḥ / rakṣanas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā tvannāthā hi vayaṃ vane // 3.009.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā caitad vacaḥ śrutvā kārtsnyena paripālanam / ṛṣīṇāṃ daṇḍakāraṇye saṃśrutaṃ janakātmaje // 3.009.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃśrutya ca na śakṣyāmi jīvamānaḥ pratiśravam / munīnām anyathā kartuṃ satyam iṣṭaṃ hi me sadā // 3.009.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ tvāṃ vā sīte salakṣmaṇām / na tu pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya brāhmaṇebhyo viśeṣataḥ // 3.009.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad avaśyaṃ mayā kāryam ṛṣīṇāṃ paripālanam / anuktenāpi vaidehi pratijñāya tu kiṃ punaḥ // 3.009.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama snehāc ca sauhārdād idam uktaṃ tvayā vacaḥ / parituṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ sīte na hy aniṣṭo 'nuśiṣyate // 3.009.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kulasya tava śobhane // 3.009.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā; sītāṃ priyāṃ maithila rājaputrīm / rāmo dhanuṣmān sahalakṣmaṇena; jagāma ramyāṇi tapovanāni // 3.009.021	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
agrataḥ prayayau rāmaḥ sītā madhye sumadhyamā / pṛṣṭhatas tu dhanuṣpāṇir lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha // 3.010.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau paśyamānau vividhāñ śailaprasthān vanāni ca / nadīś ca vividhā ramyā jagmatuḥ saha sītayā // 3.010.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sārasāṃś cakravākāṃś ca nadīpulinacāriṇaḥ / sarāṃsi ca sapadmāni yutāni jalajaiḥ khagaiḥ // 3.010.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yūthabaddhāṃś ca pṛṣatān madonmattān viṣāṇinaḥ / mahiṣāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca gajāṃś ca drumavairiṇaḥ // 3.010.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare / dadṛśuḥ sahitā ramyaṃ taṭākaṃ yojanāyatam // 3.010.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmapuṣkarasaṃbādhaṃ gajayūthair alaṃkṛtam / sārasair haṃsakādambaiḥ saṃkulaṃ jalacāribhiḥ // 3.010.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasannasalile ramyatasmin sarasi śuśruve / gītavāditranirghoṣo na tu kaś cana dṛśyate // 3.010.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kautūhalād rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ / muniṃ dharmabhṛtaṃ nāma praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // 3.010.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idam atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ no mahāmune / kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ kim idaṃ sādhu kathyatām // 3.010.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenaivam ukto dharmātmā rāghaveṇa munis tadā / prabhāvaṃ sarasaḥ kṛtsnam ākhyātum upacakrame // 3.010.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ pañcāpsaro nāma taṭākaṃ sārvakālikam / nirmitaṃ tapasā rāma muninā māṇḍakarṇinā // 3.010.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ māṇḍakarṇir mahāmuniḥ / daśavarṣasahasrāṇi vāyubhakṣo jalāśraya // 3.010.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pravyathitāḥ sarve devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ / abruvan vacanaṃ sarve paraspara samāgatāḥ // 3.010.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmakaṃ kasya cit sthānam eṣa prārthayate muniḥ // 3.010.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kartuṃ tapovighnaṃ sarvair devair niyojitāḥ / pradhānāpsarasaḥ pañcavidyuccalitavarcasaḥ // 3.010.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apsarobhis tatas tābhir munir dṛṣṭaparāvaraḥ / nīto madanavaśyatvaṃ surāṇāṃ kāryasiddhaye // 3.010.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāś caivāpsarasaḥ pañcamuneḥ patnītvam āgatāḥ / taṭāke nirmitaṃ tāsām asminn antarhitaṃ gṛham // 3.010.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatraivāpsarasaḥ pañcanivasantyo yathāsukham / ramayanti tapoyogān muniṃ yauvanam āsthitam // 3.010.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsāṃ saṃkrīḍamānānām eṣa vāditraniḥsvanaḥ / śrūyate bhūṣaṇonmiśro gītaśabdo manoharaḥ // 3.010.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āścaryam iti tasyaitad vacanaṃ bhāvitātmanaḥ / rāghavaḥ pratijagrāha saha bhrātrā mahāyaśāḥ // 3.010.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ kathayamānasya dadarśāśramamaṇḍalam / kuśacīraparikṣiptaṃ nānāvṛkṣasamāvṛtam // 3.010.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśya saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca rāghavaḥ / tadā tasmin sa kākutsthaḥ śrīmaty āśramamaṇḍale // 3.010.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uṣitvā susukhaṃ tatra pūrjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ / jagāma cāśramāṃs teṣāṃ paryāyeṇa tapasvinām // 3.010.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yeṣām uṣitavān pūrvaṃ sakāśe sa mahāstravit / kva cit paridaśān māsān ekaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kva cit // 3.010.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva cic ca caturo māsān pañcaṣaṭ cāparān kva cit / aparatrādhikān māsān adhyardham adhikaṃ kva cit // 3.010.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trīn māsān aṣṭamāsāṃś ca rāghavo nyavasat sukham / tathā saṃvasatas tasya munīnām āśrameṣu vai // 3.010.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ramataś cānukulyena yayuḥ saṃvatsarā daśa // 3.010.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parisṛtya ca dharmajño rāghavaḥ saha sītayā / sutīkṣṇasyāśramaṃ śrīmān punar evājagāma ha // 3.010.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tam āśramam āgamya munibhiḥ pratipūjitaḥ / tatrāpi nyavasad rāmaḥ kaṃ cit kālam ariṃdamaḥ // 3.010.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāśramastho vinayāt kadā cit taṃ mahāmunim / upāsīnaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ sutīkṣṇam idam abravīt // 3.010.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asminn araṇye bhagavann agastyo munisattamaḥ / vasatīti mayā nityaṃ kathāḥ kathayatāṃ śrutam // 3.010.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tu jānāmi taṃ deśaṃ vanasyāsya mahattayā / kutrāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ maharṣes tasya dhīmataḥ // 3.010.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasādāt tatra bhavataḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā / agastyam abhigaccheyam abhivādayituṃ munim // 3.010.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manoratho mahān eṣa hṛdi saṃparivartate / yad ahaṃ taṃ munivaraṃ śuśrūṣeyam api svayam // 3.010.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti rāmasya sa muniḥ śrutvā dharmātmano vacaḥ / sutīkṣṇaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ prīto daśarathātmajam // 3.010.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham apy etad eva tvāṃ vaktukāmaḥ salakṣmaṇam / agastyam abhigaccheti sītayā saha rāghava // 3.010.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā tv idānīm arthe 'smin svayam eva bravīṣi mām / aham ākhyāsi te vatsa yatrāgastyo mahāmuniḥ // 3.010.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yojanāny āśramāt tāta yāhi catvāri vai tataḥ / dakṣiṇena mahāñ śrīmān agastyabhrātur āśramaḥ // 3.010.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthalaprāye vanoddeśe pippalīvanaśobhite / bahupuṣpaphale ramye nānāśakuninādite // 3.010.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padminyo vividhās tatra prasannasalilāḥ śivāḥ / haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇāś cakravākopaśobhitāḥ // 3.010.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatraikāṃ rajanīm uṣya prabhāte rāma gamyatām / dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya vanakhaṇḍasya pārśvataḥ // 3.010.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāgastyāśramapadaṃ gatvā yojanam antaram / ramaṇīye vanoddeśe bahupādapa saṃvṛte // 3.010.040.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raṃsyate tatra vaidehī lakṣmaṇaś ca tvayā saha // 3.010.040.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo bahupādapasaṃkulaḥ / yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā draṣṭum agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim // 3.010.041.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyaiva gamane buddhiṃ rocayasva mahāyaśaḥ // 3.010.041.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti rāmo muneḥ śrutvā saha bhrātrābhivādya ca / pratasthe 'gastyam uddiśya sānujaḥ saha sītayā // 3.010.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśyan vanāni citrāṇi parvapāṃś cābhrasaṃnibhān / sarāṃsi saritaś caiva pathi mārgavaśānugāḥ // 3.010.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sutīkṣṇenopadiṣṭena gatvā tena pathā sukham / idaṃ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // 3.010.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad evāśramapadaṃ nūnaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ / agastyasya muner bhrātur dṛśyate puṇyakarmaṇaḥ // 3.010.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā hīme vanasyāsya jñātāḥ pathi sahasraśaḥ / saṃnatāḥ phalabhareṇa puṣpabhāreṇa ca drumāḥ // 3.010.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pippalīnāṃ ca pakvānāṃ vanād asmād upāgataḥ / gandho 'yaṃ pavanotkṣiptaḥ sahasā kaṭukodayaḥ // 3.010.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra tatra ca dṛśyante saṃkṣiptāḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayāḥ / lūnāś ca pathi dṛśyante darbhā vaidūryavarcasaḥ // 3.010.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac ca vanamadhyasthaṃ kṛṣṇābhraśikharopamam / pāvakasyāśramasthasya dhūmāgraṃ saṃpradṛśyate // 3.010.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivikteṣu ca tīrtheṣu kṛtasnānā dvijātayaḥ / puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti kusumaiḥ svayam ārjitaiḥ // 3.010.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat sutīkṣṇasya vacanaṃ yathā saumya mayā śrutam / agastyasyāśramo bhrātur nūnam eṣa bhaviṣyati // 3.010.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nigṛhya tarasā mṛtyuṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā / yasya bhrātrā kṛteyaṃ dik śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā // 3.010.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ihaikadā kila krūro vātāpir api celvalaḥ / bhrātarau sahitāv āstāṃ brāhmaṇaghnau mahāsurau // 3.010.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhārayan brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam ilvalaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vadan / āmantrayati viprān sa śrāddham uddiśya nirghṛṇaḥ // 3.010.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātaraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhrātā tatas taṃ meṣarūpiṇam / tān dvijān bhojayām āsa śrāddhadṛṣṭena karmaṇā // 3.010.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bhuktavatāṃ teṣāṃ viprāṇām ilvalo 'bravīt / vātāpe niṣkramasveti svareṇa mahatā vadan // 3.010.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā vātāpir meṣavan nadan / bhittvā bhitvā śarīrāṇi brāhmaṇānāṃ viniṣpatat // 3.010.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi tair evaṃ kāmarūpibhiḥ / vināśitāni saṃhatya nityaśaḥ piśitāśanaiḥ // 3.010.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agastyena tadā devaiḥ prārthitena maharṣiṇā / anubhūya kila śrāddhe bhakṣitaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ // 3.010.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃpannam ity uktvā dattvā hastāvasecanam / bhrātaraṃ niṣkramasveti ilvalaḥ so 'bhyabhāṣata // 3.010.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ tu bhrātaraṃ vipraghātinam / abravīt prahasan dhīmān agastyo munisattamaḥ // 3.010.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuto niṣkramituṃ śaktir mayā jīrṇasya rakṣasaḥ / bhrātus te meṣa rūpasya gatasya yamasādanam // 3.010.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur nidhanasaṃśritam / pradharṣayitum ārebhe muniṃ krodhān niśācaraḥ // 3.010.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhyadravad dvijendraṃ taṃ muninā dīptatejasā / cakṣuṣānalakalpena nirdagdho nidhanaṃ gataḥ // 3.010.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāyam āśramo bhrātus taṭākavanaśobhitaḥ / viprānukampayā yena karmedaṃ duṣkaraṃ kṛtam // 3.010.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ kathayamānasya tasya saumitriṇā saha / rāmasyāstaṃ gataḥ sūryaḥ saṃdhyākālo 'bhyavartata // 3.010.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ saha bhrātrā yathāvidhi / praviveśāśramapadaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ cābhyavādayan // 3.010.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samyak pratigṛhītas tu muninā tena rāghavaḥ / nyavasat tāṃ niśām ekāṃ prāśya mūlaphalāni ca // 3.010.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ vimale sūryamaṇḍale / bhrātaraṃ tam agastyasya āmantrayata rāghavaḥ // 3.010.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādaye tvā bhagavan sukham adhyuṣito niśām / āmantraye tvāṃ gacchāmi guruṃ te draṣṭum agrajam // 3.010.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamyatām iti tenokto jagāma raghunandanaḥ / yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa vanaṃ tac cāvalokayan // 3.010.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīvārān panasāṃs tālāṃs timiśān vañjulān dhavān / ciribilvān madhūkāṃś ca bilvān api ca tindukān // 3.010.072	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpitān puṣpitāgrābhir latābhir anuveṣṭitān / dadarśa rāmaḥ śataśas tatra kāntārapādapān // 3.010.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hastihastair vimṛditān vānarair upaśobhitān / mattaiḥ śakunisaṃghaiś ca śataśaḥ pratināditān // 3.010.074	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīt samīpasthaṃ rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ / pṛṣṭhato 'nugataṃ vīraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam // 3.010.075	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snigdhapatrā yathā vṛkṣā yathā kṣāntā mṛgadvijāḥ / āśramo nātidūrastho maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ // 3.010.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agastya iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā / āśramo dṛśyate tasya pariśrānta śramāpahaḥ // 3.010.077	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prājyadhūmākulavanaś cīramālāpariṣkṛtaḥ / praśāntamṛgayūthaś ca nānāśakunināditaḥ // 3.010.078	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nigṛhya tarasā mṛtyuṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā / dakṣiṇā dik kṛtā yena śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā // 3.010.079	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyedam āśramapadaṃ prabhāvād yasya rākṣasaiḥ / dig iyaṃ dakṣiṇā trāsād dṛśyate nopabhujyate // 3.010.080	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā prabhṛti cākrāntā dig iyaṃ puṇyakarmaṇā / tadā prabhṛti nirvairāḥ praśāntā rajanīcarāḥ // 3.010.081	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāmnā ceyaṃ bhagavato dakṣiṇā dik pradakṣiṇā / prathitā triṣu lokeṣu durdharṣā krūrakarmabhiḥ // 3.010.082	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārgaṃ niroddhuṃ satataṃ bhāskarasyācalottamaḥ / saṃdeśaṃ pālayaṃs tasya vindhyaśaulo na vardhate // 3.010.083	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ dīrghāyuṣas tasya loke viśrutakarmaṇaḥ / agastyasyāśramaḥ śrīmān vinītamṛgasevitaḥ // 3.010.084	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa lokārcitaḥ sādhur hite nityaṃ rataḥ satām / asmān adhigatān eṣa śreyasā yojayiṣyati // 3.010.085	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārādhayiṣyāmy atrāham agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim / śeṣaṃ ca vanavāsasya saumya vatsyāmy ahaṃ prabho // 3.010.086	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / agastyaṃ niyatāhāraṃ satataṃ paryupāsate // 3.010.087	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātra jīven mṛṣāvādī krūro vā yadi vā śaṭhaḥ / nṛśaṃsaḥ kāma vṛtto vā munir eṣa tathāvidhaḥ // 3.010.088	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra devāś ca yakṣāś ca nāgāś ca patagaiḥ saha / vasanti niyatāhāro dharmam ārādhayiṣṇavaḥ // 3.010.089	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra siddhā mahātmāno vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃnibhaiḥ / tyaktvā dehān navair dehaiḥ svaryātāḥ paramarṣayaḥ // 3.010.090	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yakṣatvam amaratvaṃ ca rājyāni vividhāni ca / atra devāḥ prayacchanti bhūtair ārādhitāḥ śubhaiḥ // 3.010.091	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgatāḥ smāśramapadaṃ saumitre praviśāgrataḥ / nivedayeha māṃ prāptam ṛṣaye saha sītayā // 3.010.092	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa praviśyāśramapadaṃ lakṣmaṇo rāghavānujaḥ / agastyaśiṣyam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha // 3.011.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā daśaratho nāma jyeṣṭhas tasya suto balī / rāmaḥ prāpto muniṃ draṣṭuṃ bhāryayā saha sītayā // 3.011.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇo nāma tasyāhaṃ bhrātā tv avarajo hitaḥ / anukūlaś ca bhaktaś ca yadi te śrotram āgataḥ // 3.011.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te vayaṃ vanam atyugraṃ praviṣṭāḥ pitṛśāsanāt / draṣṭum icchāmahe sarve bhagavantaṃ nivedyatām // 3.011.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya tapodhanaḥ / tathety uktvāgniśaraṇaṃ praviveśa niveditum // 3.011.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa praviśya muni śreṣṭhaṃ tapasā duṣpradharṣaṇam / kṛtāñjalir uvācedaṃ rāmāgamanam añjasā // 3.011.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putrau daśarathasyemau rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca / praviṣṭāv āśramapadaṃ sītayā saha bhāryayā // 3.011.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
draṣṭuṃ bhavantam āyātau śuśrūṣārtham ariṃdamau / yad atrānantaraṃ tattvam ājñāpayitum arhasi // 3.011.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śiṣyād upaśrutya prāptaṃ rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam / vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 3.011.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā rāmaś cirasyādya draṣṭuṃ māṃ samupāgataḥ / manasā kāṅkṣitaṃ hy asya mayāpy āgamanaṃ prati // 3.011.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamyatāṃ satkṛto rāmaḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kiṃ cāsau na praveśitaḥ // 3.011.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu muninā dharmajñena mahātmanā / abhivādyābravīc chiṣyas tatheti niyatāñjaliḥ // 3.011.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato niṣkramya saṃbhrāntaḥ śiṣyo lakṣmaṇam abravīt / kvāsau rāmo muniṃ draṣṭum etu praviśatu svayam // 3.011.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gatvāśramapadaṃ śiṣyeṇa sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / darśayām āsa kākutsthaṃ sītāṃ ca janakātmajām // 3.011.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ śiṣyaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam agastyavacanaṃ bruvan / prāveśayad yathānyāyaṃ satkārārthaṃ susatkṛtam // 3.011.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviveśa tato rāmaḥ sītayā sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / praśāntahariṇākīrṇam āśramaṃ hy avalokayan // 3.011.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tatra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam agneḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca / viṣṇoḥ sthānaṃ mahendrasya sthānaṃ caiva vivasvataḥ // 3.011.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
somasthānaṃ bhagasthānaṃ sthānaṃ kauberam eva ca / dhātur vidhātuḥ sthānaṃ ca vāyoḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca // 3.011.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto munir apy abhiniṣpatat / taṃ dadarśāgrato rāmo munīnāṃ dīptatejasaṃ // 3.011.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīd vacanaṃ vīro lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam // 3.011.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa lakṣmaṇa niṣkrāmaty agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / audāryeṇāvagacchāmi nidhānaṃ tapasām imam // 3.011.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahābāhur agastyaṃ sūryavarcasaṃ / jagrāha paramaprītas tasya pādau paraṃtapaḥ // 3.011.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādya tu dharmātmā tasthau rāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ / sītayā saha vaidehyā tadā rāma salakṣmaṇaḥ // 3.011.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya ca kākutstham arcayitvāsanodakaiḥ / kuśalapraśnam uktvā ca āsyatām iti so 'bravīt // 3.011.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agniṃ hutvā pradāyārghyam atithiṃ pratipūjya ca / vānaprasthena dharmeṇa sa teṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadau // 3.011.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prathamaṃ copaviśyātha dharmajño munipuṃgavaḥ / uvāca rāmam āsīnaṃ prāñjaliṃ dharmakovidam // 3.011.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyathā khalu kākutstha tapasvī samudācaran / duḥsākṣīva pare loke svāni māṃsāni bhakṣayet // 3.011.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā sarvasya lokasya dharmacārī mahārathaḥ / pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca bhavān prāptaḥ priyātithiḥ // 3.011.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpaiś cānyaiś ca rāghavam / pūjayitvā yathākāmaṃ punar eva tato 'bravīt // 3.011.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ divyaṃ mahac cāpaṃ hemavajravibhūṣitam / vaiṣṇavaṃ puruṣavyāghra nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // 3.011.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amoghaḥ sūryasaṃkāśo brahmadattaḥ śarottamaḥ / datto mama mahendreṇa tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau // 3.011.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpūrṇau niśitair bāṇair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ / mahārājata kośo 'yam asir hemavibhūṣitaḥ // 3.011.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anena dhanuṣā rāma hatvā saṃkhye mahāsurān / ājahāra śriyaṃ dīptāṃ purā viṣṇur divaukasām // 3.011.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dhanus tau ca tūṇīrau śaraṃ khaḍgaṃ ca mānada / jayāya pratigṛhṇīṣva vajraṃ vajradharo yathā // 3.011.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātejāḥ samastaṃ tad varāyudham / dattvā rāmāya bhagavān agastyaḥ punar abravīt // 3.011.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāma prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te parituṣṭo 'smi lakṣmaṇa / abhivādayituṃ yan māṃ prāptau sthaḥ saha sītayā // 3.012.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhvaśrameṇa vāṃ khedo bādhate pracuraśramaḥ / vyaktam utkaṇṭhate cāpi maithilī janakātmajā // 3.012.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā hi sukumārī ca duḥkhaiś ca na vimānitā / prājyadoṣaṃ vanaṃ praptā bhartṛsnehapracoditā // 3.012.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathaiṣā ramate rāma iha sītā tathā kuru / duṣkaraṃ kṛtavaty eṣā vane tvām anugacchatī // 3.012.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana / samastham anurajyante viṣamasthaṃ tyajanti ca // 3.012.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatahradānāṃ lolatvaṃ śastrāṇāṃ tīkṣṇatāṃ tathā / garuḍānilayoḥ śaighryam anugacchanti yoṣitaḥ // 3.012.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ tu bhavato bhāryā doṣair etair vivarjitāḥ / ślāghyā ca vyapadeśyā ca yathā devī hy arundhatī // 3.012.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaṃkṛto 'yaṃ deśaś ca yatra saumitriṇā saha / vaidehyā cānayā rāma vatsyasi tvam ariṃdama // 3.012.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu muninā rāghavaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ / uvāca praśritaṃ vākyam ṛṣiṃ dīptam ivānalam // 3.012.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me munipuṃgavaḥ / guṇaiḥ sabhrātṛbhāryasya varadaḥ parituṣyati // 3.012.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tu vyādiśa me deśaṃ sodakaṃ bahukānanam / yatrāśramapadaṃ kṛtvā vaseyaṃ nirataḥ sukham // 3.012.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīn muni śreṣṭhaḥ śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam / dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ dharmātmā dhīro dhīrataraṃ vacaḥ // 3.012.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ito dviyojane tāta bahumūlaphalodakaḥ / deśo bahumṛgaḥ śrīmān pañcavaṭy abhiviśrutaḥ // 3.012.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra gatvāśramapadaṃ kṛtvā saumitriṇā saha / ramasva tvaṃ pitur vākyaṃ yathoktam anupālayan // 3.012.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidito hy eṣa vṛttānto mama sarvas tavānagha / tapasaś ca prabhāvena snehād daśarathasya ca // 3.012.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛdayasthaś ca te chando vijñātas tapasā mayā / iha vāsaṃ pratijñāya mayā saha tapovane // 3.012.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ataś ca tvām ahaṃ brūmi gaccha pañcavaṭīm iti / sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo maithilī tatra raṃsyate // 3.012.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa deśaḥ ślāghanīyaś ca nātidūre ca rāghava / godāvaryāḥ samīpe ca maithilī tatra raṃsyate // 3.012.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prājyamūlaphalaiś caiva nānādvija gaṇair yutaḥ / viviktaś ca mahābāho puṇyo ramyas tathaiva ca // 3.012.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavān api sadāraś ca śaktaś ca parirakṣaṇe / api cātra vasan rāmas tāpasān pālayiṣyasi // 3.012.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad ālakṣyate vīra madhukānāṃ mahad vanam / uttareṇāsya gantavyaṃ nyagrodham abhigacchatā // 3.012.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sthalam upāruhya parvatasyāvidūrataḥ / khyātaḥ pañcavaṭīty eva nityapuṣpitakānanaḥ // 3.012.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agastyenaivam uktas tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha / sātkṛtyāmantrayām āsa tam ṛṣiṃ satyavādinam // 3.012.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tu tenābhyanujñātau kṛtapādābhivandanau / tadāśramāt pañcavaṭīṃ jagmatuḥ saha sītayā // 3.012.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhītacāpau tu narādhipātmajau; viṣaktatūṇī samareṣv akātarau / yathopadiṣṭena pathā maharṣiṇā; prajagmatuḥ pañcavaṭīṃ samāhitau // 3.012.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
atha pañcavaṭīṃ gacchann antarā raghunandanaḥ / āsasāda mahākāyaṃ gṛdhraṃ bhīmaparākramam // 3.013.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vanasthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau / menāte rākṣasaṃ pakṣiṃ bruvāṇau ko bhavān iti // 3.013.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayann iva / uvāca vatsa māṃ viddhi vayasyaṃ pitur ātmanaḥ // 3.013.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ pitṛsakhaṃ buddhvā pūjayām āsa rāghavaḥ / sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca // 3.013.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca / ācacakṣe dvijas tasmai sarvabhūtasamudbhavam // 3.013.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvakāle mahābāho ye prajāpatayo 'bhavan / tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditaḥ śṛṇu rāghava // 3.013.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kardamaḥ prathamas teṣāṃ vikṛtas tadanantaram / śeṣaś ca saṃśrayaś caiva bahuputraś ca vīryavān // 3.013.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthāṇur marīcir atriś ca kratuś caiva mahābalaḥ / pulastyaś cāṅgirāś caiva pracetāḥ pulahas tathā // 3.013.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dakṣo vivasvān aparo 'riṣṭanemiś ca rāghava / kaśyapaś ca mahātejās teṣām āsīc ca paścimaḥ // 3.013.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajāpates tu dakṣasya babhūvur iti naḥ śrutam / ṣaṣṭir duhitaro rāma yaśasvinyo mahāyaśaḥ // 3.013.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaśyapaḥ pratijagrāha tāsām aṣṭau sumadhyamāḥ / aditiṃ ca ditiṃ caiva danūm api ca kālakām // 3.013.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāmrāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva manuṃ cāpy analām api / tās tu kanyās tataḥ prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt // 3.013.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putrāṃs trailokyabhartṝn vai janayiṣyatha mat samān / aditis tan manā rāma ditiś ca danur eva ca // 3.013.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālakā ca mahābāho śeṣās tv amanaso 'bhavan / adityāṃ jajñire devās trayastriṃśad ariṃdama // 3.013.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca paraṃtapa / ditis tv ajanayat putrān daityāṃs tāta yaśasvinaḥ // 3.013.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām iyaṃ vasumatī purāsīt savanārṇavā / danus tv ajanayat putram aśvagrīvam ariṃdama // 3.013.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
narakaṃ kālakaṃ caiva kālakāpi vyajāyata / krauñcīṃ bhāsīṃ tathā śyenīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrīṃ tathā śukīm // 3.013.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāmrāpi suṣuve kanyāḥ pañcaitā lokaviśrutāḥ / ulūkāñ janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata // 3.013.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śyenī śyenāṃś ca gṛdhrāṃś ca vyajāyata sutejasaḥ / dhṛtarāṣṭrī tu haṃsāṃś ca kalahaṃsāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ // 3.013.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cakravākāṃś ca bhadraṃ te vijajñe sāpi bhāminī / śukī natāṃ vijajñe tu natāyā vinatā sutā // 3.013.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśakrodhavaśā rāma vijajñe 'py ātmasaṃbhavāḥ / mṛgīṃ ca mṛgamandāṃ ca harīṃ bhadramadām api // 3.013.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātaṅgīm atha śārdūlīṃ śvetāṃ ca surabhīṃ tathā / sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannāṃ surasāṃ kadrukām api // 3.013.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apatyaṃ tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyā naravarottama / ṛṣkāś ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāś camarās tathā // 3.013.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tv irāvatīṃ nāma jajñe bhadramadā sutām / tasyās tv airāvataḥ putro lokanātho mahāgajaḥ // 3.013.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haryāś ca harayo 'patyaṃ vānarāś ca tapasvinaḥ / golāṅgūlāṃś ca śārdūlī vyāghrāṃś cājanayat sutān // 3.013.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātaṅgyās tv atha mātaṅgā apatyaṃ manujarṣabha / diśāgajaṃ tu śvetākṣaṃ śvetā vyajanayat sutam // 3.013.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato duhitarau rāma surabhir devy ajāyata / rohiṇīṃ nāma bhadraṃ te gandharvīṃ ca yaśasvinīm // 3.013.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rohiṇy ajanayad gā vai gandharvī vājinaḥ sutān / surasājanayan nāgān rāma kadrūś ca pannagān // 3.013.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manur manuṣyāñ janayat kaśyapasya mahātmanaḥ / brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś ca manujarṣabha // 3.013.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mukhato brāhmaṇā jātā urasaḥ kṣatriyās tathā / ūrubhyāṃ jajñire vaiśyāḥ padbhyāṃ śūdrā iti śrutiḥ // 3.013.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvān puṇyaphalān vṛkṣān analāpi vyajāyata / vinatā ca śukī pautrī kadrūś ca surasā svasā // 3.013.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadrūr nāgasahaskraṃ tu vijajñe dharaṇīdharam / dvau putrau vinatāyās tu garuḍo 'ruṇa eva ca // 3.013.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāj jāto 'ham aruṇāt saṃpātiś ca mamāgrajaḥ / jaṭāyur iti māṃ viddhi śyenīputram ariṃdama // 3.013.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ vāsasahāyas te bhaviṣyāmi yadīcchasi / sītāṃ ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte salakṣmaṇe // 3.013.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭāyuṣaṃ tu pratipūjya rāghavo; mudā pariṣvajya ca saṃnato 'bhavat / pitur hi śuśrāva sakhitvam ātmavāñ; jaṭāyuṣā saṃkathitaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // 3.013.035	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tatra sītāṃ paridāya maithilīṃ; sahaiva tenātibalena pakṣiṇā / jagāma tāṃ pañcavaṭīṃ salakṣmaṇo; ripūn didhakṣañ śalabhān ivānalaḥ // 3.013.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ pañcavaṭīṃ gatvā nānāvyālamṛgāyutām / uvāca bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ // 3.014.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgatāḥ sma yathoddiṣṭam amuṃ deśaṃ maharṣiṇā / ayaṃ pañcavaṭī deśaḥ saumya puṣpitakānanaḥ // 3.014.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvataś cāryatāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kānane nipuṇo hy asi / āśramaḥ katarasmin no deśe bhavati saṃmataḥ // 3.014.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ramate yatra vaidehī tvam ahaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇa / tādṛśo dṛśyatāṃ deśaḥ saṃnikṛṣṭajalāśayaḥ // 3.014.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanarāmaṇyakaṃ yatra jalarāmaṇyakaṃ tathā / saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ ca yatra syāt samitpuṣpakuśodakam // 3.014.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakmaṇaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ / sītā samakṣaṃ kākutstham idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 3.014.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paravān asmi kākutstha tvayi varṣaśataṃ sthite / svayaṃ tu rucire deśe kriyatām iti māṃ vada // 3.014.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suprītas tena vākyena lakṣmaṇasya mahādyutiḥ / vimṛśan rocayām āsa deśaṃ sarvaguṇānvitam // 3.014.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ ruciram ākramya deśam āśramakarmaṇi / haste gṛhītvā hastena rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt // 3.014.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ deśaḥ samaḥ śrīmān puṣpitair tarubhir vṛtaḥ / ihāśramapadaṃ saumya yathāvat kartum arhasi // 3.014.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyam ādityasaṃkāśaiḥ padmaiḥ surabhigandhibhiḥ / adūre dṛśyate ramyā padminī padmaśobhitā // 3.014.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathākhyātam agastyena muninā bhāvitātmanā / iyaṃ godāvarī ramyā puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtā // 3.014.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇā cakravākopaśobhitā / nātidūre na cāsanne mṛgayūthanipīḍitā // 3.014.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayūranāditā ramyāḥ prāṃśavo bahukandarāḥ / dṛśyante girayaḥ saumya phullais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ // 3.014.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sauvarṇe rājatais tāmrair deśe deśe ca dhātubhiḥ / gavākṣitā ivābhānti gajāḥ paramabhaktibhiḥ // 3.014.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kharjūraiḥ panasāmrakaiḥ / nīvārais timiśaiś caiva puṃnāgaiś copaśobhitāḥ // 3.014.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cūtair aśokais tilakaiś campakaiḥ ketakair api / puṣpagulmalatopetais tais tais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ // 3.014.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candanaiḥ syandanair nīpaiḥ panasair lakucair api / dhavāśvakarṇakhadiraiḥ śamīkiṃśukapāṭalaiḥ // 3.014.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ bahumṛgadvijam / iha vatsyāma saumitre sārdham etena pakṣiṇā // 3.014.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā / acireṇāśramaṃ bhrātuś cakāra sumahābalaḥ // 3.014.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parṇaśālāṃ suvipulāṃ tatra saṃghātamṛttikām / sustambhāṃ maskarair dīrghaiḥ kṛtavaṃśāṃ suśobhanām // 3.014.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nadīṃ godāvarīṃ tadā / snātvā padmāni cādāya saphalaḥ punar āgataḥ // 3.014.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ ca sa yathāvidhi / darśayām āsa rāmāya tad āśramapadaṃ kṛtam // 3.014.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ saumyam āśramaṃ saha sītayā / rāghavaḥ parṇaśālāyāṃ harṣam āhārayat param // 3.014.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tadā / atisnigdhaṃ ca gāḍhaṃ ca vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // 3.014.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prīto 'smi te mahat karma tvayā kṛtam idaṃ prabho / pradeyo yannimittaṃ te pariṣvaṅgo mayā kṛtaḥ // 3.014.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāvajñena kṛtajñena dharmajñena ca lakṣmaṇa / tvayā putreṇa dharmātmā na saṃvṛttaḥ pitā mama // 3.014.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktvā tu rāghavo lakṣmivardhanaḥ / tasmin deśe bahuphale nyavasat sa sukhaṃ vaśī // 3.014.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaṃ cit kālaṃ sa dharmātmā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca / anvāsyamāno nyavasat svargaloke yathāmaraḥ // 3.014.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasatas tasya tu mukhaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ / śaradvyapāye hemanta ṛtur iṣṭaḥ pravartate // 3.015.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kadā cit prabhātāyāṃ śarvaryāṃ raghunandanaḥ / prayayāv abhiṣekārthaṃ ramyaṃ godāvarīṃ nadīm // 3.015.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahvaḥ kalaśahastas taṃ sītayā saha vīryavān / pṛṣṭhato 'nuvrajan bhrātā saumitrir idam abravīt // 3.015.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ priyo yas te priyaṃvada / alaṃkṛta ivābhāti yena saṃvatsaraḥ śubhaḥ // 3.015.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīhāraparuṣo lokaḥ pṛṣhivī sasyamālinī / jalāny anupabhogyāni subhago havyavāhanaḥ // 3.015.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
navāgrayaṇa pūjābhir abhyarcya pitṛdevatāḥ / kṛtāgrayaṇakāḥ kāle santo vigatakalmaṣāḥ // 3.015.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prājyakāmā janapadāḥ saṃpannataragorasāḥ / vicaranti mahīpālā yātrārthaṃ vijigīṣavaḥ // 3.015.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sevamāne dṛḍhaṃ sūrye diśam antakasevitām / vihīnatilakeva strī nottarā dik prakāśate // 3.015.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṛtyā himakośāḍhyo dūrasūryaś ca sāmpratam / yathārthanāmā suvyaktaṃ himavān himavān giriḥ // 3.015.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atyantasukhasaṃcārā madhyāhne sparśataḥ sukhāḥ / divasāḥ subhagādityāś chāyāsaliladurbhagāḥ // 3.015.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛdusūryāḥ sanīhārāḥ paṭuśītāḥ samārutāḥ / śūnyāraṇyā himadhvastā divasā bhānti sāmpratam // 3.015.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivṛttākāśaśayanāḥ puṣyanītā himāruṇāḥ / śītā vṛddhatarāyāmās triyāmā yānti sāmpratam // 3.015.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ravisaṃkrāntasaubhābyas tuṣārāruṇamaṇḍalaḥ / niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśaś candramā na prakāśate // 3.015.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyotsnā tuṣāramalinā paurṇamāsyāṃ na rājate / sīteva cātapa śyāmā lakṣyate na tu śobhate // 3.015.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṛtyā śītalasparśo himaviddhaś ca sāmpratam / pravāti paścimo vāyuḥ kāle dviguṇaśītalaḥ // 3.015.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṣpacchannān araṇyāni yavagodhūmavanti ca / śobhante 'bhyudite sūrye nadadbhiḥ krauñcasārasaiḥ // 3.015.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kharjūrapuṣpākṛtibhiḥ śirobhiḥ pūrṇataṇḍulaiḥ / śobhante kiṃ cidālambāḥ śālayaḥ kanakaprabhāḥ // 3.015.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayūkhair upasarpadbhir himanīhārasaṃvṛtaiḥ / dūram abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ śaśāṅka iva lakṣyate // 3.015.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agrāhyavīryaḥ pūrvāhṇe madhyāhne sparśataḥ sukhaḥ / saṃraktaḥ kiṃ cid āpāṇḍur ātapaḥ śobhate kṣitau // 3.015.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyāyanipātena kiṃ cit praklinnaśādvalā / vanānāṃ śobhate bhūmir niviṣṭataruṇātapā // 3.015.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyāyatamonaddhā nīhāratamasāvṛtāḥ / prasuptā iva lakṣyante vipuṣpā vanarājayaḥ // 3.015.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṣpasaṃchannasalilā rutavijñeyasārasāḥ / himārdravālukais tīraiḥ sarito bhānti sāmpratam // 3.015.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tuṣārapatanāc caiva mṛdutvād bhāskarasya ca / śaityād agāgrastham api prāyeṇa rasavaj jalam // 3.015.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jarājarjaritaiḥ parṇaiḥ śīrṇakesarakarṇikaiḥ / nālaśeṣā himadhvastā na bhānti kamalākarāḥ // 3.015.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmiṃs tu puruṣavyāghra kāle duḥkhasamanvitaḥ / tapaś carati dharmātmā tvadbhaktyā bharataḥ pure // 3.015.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaktvā rājyaṃ ca mānaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca vividhān bahūn / tapasvī niyatāhāraḥ śete śīte mahītale // 3.015.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'pi velām imāṃ nūnam abhiṣekārtham udyataḥ / vṛtaḥ prakṛtibhir nityaṃ prayāti sarayūṃ nadīm // 3.015.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atyantasukhasaṃvṛddhaḥ sukumāro himārditaḥ / kathaṃ tv apararātreṣu sarayūm avagāhate // 3.015.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmapatrekṣaṇaḥ śyāmaḥ śrīmān nirudaro mahān / dharmajñaḥ satyavādī ca hrī niṣedho jitendriyaḥ // 3.015.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyābhibhāṣī madhuro dīrghabāhur ariṃdamaḥ / saṃtyajya vividhān saukhyān āryaṃ sarvātmanāśritaḥ // 3.015.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jitaḥ svargas tava bhrātrā bharatena mahātmanā / vanastham api tāpasye yas tvām anuvidhīyate // 3.015.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na pitryam anuvarntante mātṛkaṃ dvipadā iti / khyāto lokapravādo 'yaṃ bharatenānyathākṛtaḥ // 3.015.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhartā daśaratho yasyāḥ sādhuś ca bharataḥ sutaḥ / kathaṃ nu sāmbā kaikeyī tādṛśī krūradarśinī // 3.015.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ lakṣmaṇe vākyaṃ snehād bruvati dharmike / parivādaṃ jananyās tam asahan rāghavo 'bravīt // 3.015.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na te 'mbā madhyamā tāta garhitavyā kathaṃ cana / tām evekṣvākunāthasya bharatasya kathāṃ kuru // 3.015.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niścitāpi hi me buddhir vanavāse dṛḍhavratā / bharatasnehasaṃtaptā bāliśī kriyate punaḥ // 3.015.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ vilapaṃs tatra prāpya godāvarīṃ nadīm / cakre 'bhiṣekaṃ kākutsthaḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā // 3.015.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tarpayitvātha salilais te pitṝn daivatāni ca / stuvanti smoditaṃ sūryaṃ devatāś ca samāhitāḥ // 3.015.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtābhiṣekaḥ sa rarāja rāmaḥ; sītādvitīyaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena / kṛtābhiṣekas tv agarājaputryā; rudraḥ sanandir bhagavān iveśaḥ // 3.015.039	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
kṛtābhiṣeko rāmas tu sītā saumitrir eva ca / tasmād godāvarītīrāt tato jagmuḥ svam āśramam // 3.016.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśramaṃ tam upāgamya rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ karma parṇaśālām upāgamat // 3.016.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmaḥ parṇaśālāyām āsīnaḥ saha sītayā / virarāja mahābāhuś citrayā candramā iva // 3.016.003.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cakāra vividhāḥ kathāḥ // 3.016.003.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadāsīnasya rāmasya kathāsaṃsaktacetasaḥ / taṃ deśaṃ rākṣasī kā cid ājagāma yadṛcchayā // 3.016.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tu śūrpaṇakhā nāma daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ / bhaginī rāmam āsādya dadarśa tridaśopamam // 3.016.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhoraskaṃ mahābāhuṃ padmapatranibhekṣaṇam / sukumāraṃ mahāsattvaṃ pārthivavyañjanānvitam // 3.016.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmam indīvaraśyāmaṃ kandarpasadṛśaprabham / babhūvendropamaṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī kāmamohitā // 3.016.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumukhaṃ durmukhī rāmaṃ vṛttamadhyaṃ mahodarī / viśālākṣaṃ virūpākṣī sukeśaṃ tāmramūrdhajā // 3.016.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyarūpaṃ virūpā sā susvaraṃ bhairavasnavā / taruṇaṃ dāruṇā vṛddhā dakṣiṇaṃ vāmabhāṣiṇī // 3.016.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nyāyavṛttaṃ sudurvṛttā priyam apriyadarśanā / śarīrajasamāviṣṭā rākṣasī rāmam abravīt // 3.016.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭī tāpasarūpeṇa sabhāryaḥ śaracāpadhṛk / āgatas tvam imaṃ deśaṃ kathaṃ rākṣasasevitam // 3.016.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rākṣasyā śūrpaṇakhyā paraṃtapaḥ / ṛjubuddhitayā sarvam ākhyātum upacakrame // 3.016.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsīd daśaratho nāma rājā tridaśavikramaḥ / tasyāham agrajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ // 3.016.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātāyaṃ lakṣmaṇo nāma yavīyān mām anuvrataḥ / iyaṃ bhāryā ca vaidehī mama sīteti viśrutā // 3.016.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niyogāt tu narendrasya pitur mātuś ca yantritaḥ / dharmārthaṃ dharmakāṅkṣī ca vanaṃ vastum ihāgataḥ // 3.016.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvāṃ tu veditum icchāmi kathyatāṃ kāsi kasya vā / iha vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvam āgatā brūhi tattvataḥ // 3.016.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sābravīd vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasī madanārditā / śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi tattvārthaṃ vacanaṃ mama // 3.016.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī / araṇyaṃ vicarāmīdam ekā sarvabhayaṃkarā // 3.016.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇo nāma me bhrātā rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ / pravṛddhanidraś ca sadā kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ // 3.016.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā na tu rākṣasaceṣṭitaḥ / prakhyātavīryau ca raṇe bhrātarau kharadūṣaṇau // 3.016.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān ahaṃ samatikrāntā rāma tvāpūrvadarśanāt / samupetāsmi bhāvena bhartāraṃ puruṣottamam // 3.016.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cirāya bhava bhartā me sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi // 3.016.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikṛtā ca virūpā ca na seyaṃ sadṛśī tava / aham evānurūpā te bhāryā rūpeṇa paśya mām // 3.016.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ virūpām asatīṃ karālāṃ nirṇatodarīm / anena saha te bhrātrā bhakṣayiṣyāmi mānuṣīm // 3.016.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ parvataśṛṅgāṇi vanāni vividhāni ca / paśyan saha mayā kānta daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi // 3.016.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktaḥ kākutsthaḥ prahasya madirekṣaṇām / idaṃ vacanam ārebhe vaktuṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ // 3.016.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tu śūrpaṇakhāṃ rāmaḥ kāmapāśāvapāśitām / svecchayā ślakṣṇayā vācā smitapūrvam athābravīt // 3.017.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtadāro 'smi bhavati bhāryeyaṃ dayitā mama / tvadvidhānāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ suduḥkhā sasapatnatā // 3.017.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujas tv eṣa me bhrātā śīlavān priyadarśanaḥ / śrīmān akṛtadāraś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān // 3.017.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apūrvī bhāryayā cārthī taruṇaḥ priyadarśanaḥ / anurūpaś ca te bhartā rūpasyāsya bhaviṣyati // 3.017.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
enaṃ bhaja viśālākṣi bhartāraṃ bhrātaraṃ mama / asapatnā varārohe merum arkaprabhā yathā // 3.017.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti rāmeṇa sā proktā rākṣasī kāmamohitā / visṛjya rāmaṃ sahasā tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt // 3.017.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asya rūpasya te yuktā bhāryāhaṃ varavarṇinī / mayā saha sukhaṃ sarvān daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi // 3.017.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu saumitrī rākṣasyā vākyakovidaḥ / tataḥ śūrpaṇakhīṃ smitvā lakṣmaṇo yuktam abravīt // 3.017.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ dāsasya me dāsī bhāryā bhavitum icchasi / so 'ham āryeṇa paravān bhātrā kamalavarṇinī // 3.017.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samṛddhārthasya siddhārthā muditāmalavarṇinī / āryasya tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā bhava yavīyasī // 3.017.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāṃ virūpām asatīṃ karālāṃ nirṇatodarīm / bhāryāṃ vṛddhāṃ parityajya tvām evaiṣa bhajiṣyati // 3.017.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko hi rūpam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ saṃtyajya varavarṇini / mānuṣeṣu varārohe kuryād bhāvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // 3.017.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti sā lakṣmaṇenoktā karālā nirṇatodarī / manyate tad vacaḥ satyaṃ parihāsāvicakṣaṇā // 3.017.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā rāmaṃ parṇaśālāyām upaviṣṭaṃ paraṃtapam / sītayā saha durdharṣam abravīt kāmamohitā // 3.017.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ virūpām asatīṃ karālāṃ nirṇatodarīm / vṛddhāṃ bhāryām avaṣṭabhya na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase // 3.017.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyemāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi paśyatas tava mānuṣīm / tvayā saha cariṣyāmi niḥsapatnā yathāsukham // 3.017.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā mṛgaśāvākṣīm alātasadṛśekṣaṇā / abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddhā maholkā rohiṇīm iva // 3.017.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ mṛtyupāśapratimām āpatantīṃ mahābalaḥ / nigṛhya rāmaḥ kupitas tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt // 3.017.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krūrair anāryaiḥ saumitre parihāsaḥ kathaṃ cana / na kāryaḥ paśya vaidehīṃ kathaṃ cit saumya jīvatīm // 3.017.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ virūpām asatīm atimattāṃ mahodarīm / rākṣasīṃ puruṣavyāghra virūpayitum arhasi // 3.017.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity ukto lakṣmaṇas tasyāḥ kruddho rāmasya paśyataḥ / uddhṛtya khaḍgaṃ ciccheda karṇanāsaṃ mahābalaḥ // 3.017.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nikṛttakarṇanāsā tu visvaraṃ sā vinadya ca / yathāgataṃ pradudrāva ghorā śūrpaṇakhā vanam // 3.017.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā virūpā mahāghorā rākṣasī śoṇitokṣitā / nanāda vividhān nādān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ // 3.017.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā vikṣarantī rudhiraṃ bahudhā ghoradarśanā / pragṛhya bāhū garjantī praviveśa mahāvanam // 3.017.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu sā rākṣasasaṃgha saṃvṛtaṃ; kharaṃ janasthānagataṃ virūpitā / upetya taṃ bhrātaram ugratejasaṃ; papāta bhūmau gaganād yathāśaniḥ // 3.017.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ sabhāryaṃ bhayamohamūrchitā; salakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavam āgataṃ vanam / virūpaṇaṃ cātmani śoṇitokṣitā; śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā // 3.017.026	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tāṃ tathā patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā virūpāṃ śoṇitokṣitām / bhaginīṃ krodhasaṃtaptaḥ kharaḥ papraccha rākṣasaḥ // 3.018.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balavikramasaṃpannā kāmagā kāmarūpiṇī / imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ kenāntakasamā gatā // 3.018.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devagandharvabhūtānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām / ko 'yam evaṃ mahāvīryas tvāṃ virūpāṃ cakāra ha // 3.018.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ loke yaḥ kuryān mama vipriyam / antarena sahasrākṣaṃ mahendraṃ pākaśāsanam // 3.018.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyāhaṃ mārgaṇaiḥ prāṇān ādāsye jīvitāntakaiḥ / salile kṣīram āsaktaṃ niṣpibann iva sārasaḥ // 3.018.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatasya mayā saṃkhye śarasaṃkṛttamarmaṇaḥ / saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktaṃ medinī kasya pāsyati // 3.018.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya patrarathāḥ kāyān māṃsam utkṛtya saṃgatāḥ / prahṛṣṭā bhakṣayiṣyanti nihatasya mayā raṇe // 3.018.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ / mayāpakṛṣṭaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ śaktās trātuṃ mahāhave // 3.018.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upalabhya śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi / yena tvaṃ durvinītena vane vikramya nirjitā // 3.018.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhasya ca viśeṣataḥ / tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ sabāṣpam idam abravīt // 3.018.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taruṇau rūpasaṃpannau sukūmārau mahābalau / puṇḍarīkaviśālākṣau cīrakṛṣṇājināmbarau // 3.018.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandharvarājapratimau pārthivavyañjanānvitau / devau vā mānuṣau vā tau na tarkayitum utsahe // 3.018.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taruṇī rūpasaṃpannā sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā / dṛṣṭā tatra mayā nārī tayor madhye sumadhyamā // 3.018.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ saṃbhūya pramadām adhikṛtya tām / imām avasthāṃ nītāhaṃ yathānāthāsatī tathā // 3.018.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāś cānṛjuvṛttāyās tayoś ca hatayor aham / saphenaṃ pātum icchāmi rudhiraṃ raṇamūrdhani // 3.018.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa me prathamaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtas tāta tvayā bhavet / tasyās tayoś ca rudhiraṃ pibeyam aham āhave // 3.018.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
