iti tasyāṃ bruvāṇāyāṃ caturdaśa mahābalān / vyādideśa kharaḥ kruddho rākṣasān antakopamān // 3.018.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānuṣau śastrasaṃpannau cīrakṛṣṇājināmbarau / praviṣṭau daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ ghoraṃ pramadayā saha // 3.018.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau hatvā tāṃ ca durvṛttām upāvartitum arhatha / iyaṃ ca rudhiraṃ teṣāṃ bhaginī mama pāsyati // 3.018.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manoratho 'yam iṣṭo 'syā bhaginyā mama rākṣasāḥ / śīghraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ gatvā tau pramathya svatejasā // 3.018.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti pratisamādiṣṭā rākṣasās te caturdaśa / tatra jagmus tayā sārdhaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā // 3.018.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā ghorā rāghavāśramam āgatā / rakṣasām ācacakṣe tau bhrātarau saha sītayā // 3.019.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te rāmaṃ parṇaśālāyām upaviṣṭaṃ mahābalam / dadṛśuḥ sītayā sārdhaṃ vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // 3.019.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān āgatāṃ tāṃ ca rākṣasīm / abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ // 3.019.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muhūrtaṃ bhava saumitre sītāyāḥ pratyanantaraḥ / imān asyā vadhiṣyāmi padavīm āgatān iha // 3.019.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vākyam etat tataḥ śrutvā rāmasya viditātmanaḥ / tatheti lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ rāmasya pratyapūjayat // 3.019.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavo 'pi mahac cāpaṃ cāmīkaravibhūṣitam / cakāra sajyaṃ dharmātmā tāni rakṣāṃsi cābravīt // 3.019.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putrau daśarathasyāvāṃ bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / praviṣṭau sītayā sārdhaṃ duścaraṃ daṇḍakāvanam // 3.019.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phalamūlāśanau dāntau tāpasau dharmacāriṇau / vasantau daṇḍakāraṇye kimartham upahiṃsatha // 3.019.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuṣmān pāpātmakān hantuṃ viprakārān mahāvane / ṛṣīṇāṃ tu niyogena prāpto 'haṃ saśarāsanaḥ // 3.019.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiṣṭhataivātra saṃtuṣṭā nopasarpitum arhatha / yadi prāṇair ihārtho vo nivartadhvaṃ niśācarāḥ // 3.019.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te caturdaśa / ūcur vācaṃ susaṃkruddhā brahmaghnaḥ śūlapāṇayaḥ // 3.019.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃraktanayanā ghorā rāmaṃ raktāntalocanam / paruṣā madhurābhāṣaṃ hṛṣṭādṛṣṭaparākramam // 3.019.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krodham utpādya no bhartuḥ kharasya sumahātmanaḥ / tvam eva hāsyase prāṇān adyāsmābhir hato yudhi // 3.019.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kā hi te śaktir ekasya bahūnāṃ raṇamūrdhani / asmākam agrataḥ sthātuṃ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave // 3.019.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ebhir bāhuprayuktair naḥ parighaiḥ śūlapaṭṭiśaiḥ / prāṇāṃs tyakṣyasi vīryaṃ ca dhanuś ca karapīḍitam // 3.019.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā saṃrabdhā rākṣasās te caturdaśa / udyatāyudhanistriṃśā rāmam evābhidudruvuḥ // 3.019.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cikṣipus tāni śūlāni rāghavaṃ prati durjayam // 3.019.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni śūlāni kākutsthaḥ samastāni caturdaśa / tāvadbhir eva ciccheda śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ // 3.019.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paścān mahātejā nārācān sūryasaṃnibhān / jagrāha paramakruddhaś caturdaśa śilāśitān // 3.019.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhītvā dhanur āyamya lakṣyān uddiśya rākṣasān / mumoca rāghavo bāṇān vajrān iva śatakratuḥ // 3.019.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rukmapuṅkhāś ca viśikhāḥ pradīptā hemabhūṣaṇāḥ / antarikṣe maholkānāṃ babhūvus tulyavarcasaḥ // 3.019.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te bhittvā rakṣasāṃ vegād vakṣāṃsi rudhirāplutāḥ / viniṣpetus tadā bhūmau nyamajjantāśanisvanāḥ // 3.019.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te bhinnahṛdayā bhūmau chinnamūlā iva drumāḥ / nipetuḥ śoṇitārdrāṅgā vikṛtā vigatāsavaḥ // 3.019.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā / paritrastā punas tatra vyasṛjad bhairavaṃ ravam // 3.019.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā nadantī mahānādaṃ javāc chūrpaṇakhā punaḥ / upagamya kharaṃ sā tu kiṃ cit saṃśuṣka śoṇitā // 3.019.024.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
papāta punar evārtā saniryāseva vallarī // 3.019.024.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nipātitān prekṣya raṇe tu rākṣasān; pradhāvitā śūrpaṇakhā punas tataḥ / vadhaṃ ca teṣāṃ nikhilena rakṣasāṃ; śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā // 3.019.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa punaḥ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāc chūrpaṇakhāṃ kharaḥ / uvāca vyaktatā vācā tām anarthārtham āgatām // 3.020.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā tv idānīṃ śūrās te rākṣasā rudhirāśanāḥ / tvatpriyārthaṃ vinirdiṣṭāḥ kimarthaṃ rudyate punaḥ // 3.020.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaktāś caivānuraktāś ca hitāś ca mama nityaśaḥ / ghnanto 'pi na nihantavyā na na kuryur vaco mama // 3.020.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim etac chrotum icchāmi kāraṇaṃ yatkṛte punaḥ / hā nātheti vinardantī sarpavad veṣṭase kṣitau // 3.020.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anāthavad vilapasi kiṃ nu nāthe mayi sthite / uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha mā bhaiṣīr vaiklavyaṃ tyajyatām iha // 3.020.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktā durdharṣā khareṇa parisāntvitā / vimṛjya nayane sāsre kharaṃ bhrātaram abravīt // 3.020.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
preṣitāś ca tvayā śūrā rākṣasās te caturdaśa / nihantuṃ rāghavaṃ ghorā matpriyārthaṃ salakṣmaṇam // 3.020.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu rāmeṇa sāmarṣāḥ śūlapaṭṭiśapāṇayaḥ / samare nihatāḥ sarve sāyakair marmabhedibhiḥ // 3.020.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaiva mahābalān / rāmasya ca mahat karma mahāṃs trāso 'bhavan mama // 3.020.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāsmi bhītā samudvignā viṣaṇṇā ca niśācara / śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ punaḥ prāptā sarvato bhayadarśinī // 3.020.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣādanakrādhyuṣite paritrāsormimālini / kiṃ māṃ na trāyase magnāṃ vipule śokasāgare // 3.020.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete ca nihatā bhūmau rāmeṇa niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / ye ca me padavīṃ prāptā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ // 3.020.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayi te yady anukrośo yadi rakṣaḥsu teṣu ca / rāmeṇa yadi śaktis te tejo vāsti niśācara // 3.020.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daṇḍakāraṇyanilayaṃ jahi rākṣasakaṇṭakam // 3.020.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi rāmaṃ mamāmitram adya tvaṃ na vadhiṣyasi / tava caivāgrataḥ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi nirapatrapā // 3.020.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhyāham anupaśyāmi na tvaṃ rāmasya saṃyuge / sthātuṃ pratimukhe śaktaḥ sacāpasya mahāraṇe // 3.020.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūramānī na śūras tvaṃ mithyāropitavikramaḥ / mānuṣau yan na śaknoṣi hantuṃ tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 3.020.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apayāhi janasthānāt tvaritaḥ sahabāndhavaḥ / niḥsattvasyālpavīryasya vāsas te kīdṛśas tv iha // 3.020.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmatejo'bhibhūto hi tvaṃ kṣipraṃ vinaśiṣyasi / sa hi tejaḥsamāyukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ // 3.020.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātā cāsya mahāvīryo yena cāsmi virūpitā // 3.020.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ādharṣitaḥ śūraḥ śūrpaṇakhyā kharas tadā / uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye kharaḥ kharataraṃ vacaḥ // 3.021.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavāpamānaprabhavaḥ krodho 'yam atulo mama / na śakyate dhārayituṃ lavaṇāmbha ivotthitam // 3.021.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na rāmaṃ gaṇaye vīryān mānuṣaṃ kṣīṇajīvitam / ātmā duścaritaiḥ prāṇān hato yo 'dya vimokṣyati // 3.021.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṣpaḥ saṃhriyatām eṣa saṃbhramaś ca vimucyatām / ahaṃ rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā nayāmi yamasādanam // 3.021.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paraśvadhahatasyādya mandaprāṇasya bhūtale / rāmasya rudhiraṃ raktam uṣṇaṃ pāsyasi rākṣasi // 3.021.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā prahṛṣṭvā vacaḥ śrutvā kharasya vadanāc cyutam / praśaśaṃsa punar maurkhyād bhrātaraṃ rakṣasāṃ varam // 3.021.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayā paruṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ punar eva praśaṃsitaḥ / abravīd dūṣaṇaṃ nāma kharaḥ senāpatiṃ tadā // 3.021.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi mama cittānuvartinām / rakṣasīṃ bhīmavegānāṃ samareṣv anivartinām // 3.021.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlajīmūtavarṇānāṃ ghorāṇāṃ krūrakarmaṇām / lokasiṃhāvihārāṇāṃ balinām ugratejasām // 3.021.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ śārdūladarpāṇāṃ mahāsyānāaṃ mahaujasām / sarvodyogam udīrṇānāṃ rakṣasāṃ saumya kāraya // 3.021.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ rathaṃ saumya dhanūṃṣi ca / śarāṃś ca citrān khaḍgāṃś ca śaktīś ca vividhāḥ śitāḥ // 3.021.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agre niryātum icchāmi paulastyānāṃ mahātmanām / vadhārthaṃ durvinītasya rāmasya raṇakovidaḥ // 3.021.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti tasya bruvāṇasya sūryavarṇaṃ mahāratham / sadaśvaiḥ śabalair yuktam ācacakṣe 'tha dūṣaṇaḥ // 3.021.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ meruśikharākāraṃ taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇam / hemacakram asaṃbādhaṃ vaidūryamaya kūbaram // 3.021.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
matsyaiḥ puṣpair drumaiḥ śailaiś candrasūryaiś ca kāñcanaiḥ / māṅgalyaiḥ pakṣisaṃghaiś ca tārābhiś ca samāvṛtam // 3.021.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhvajanistriṃśasaṃpannaṃ kiṅkiṇīkavibhūṣitam / sadaśvayuktaṃ so 'marṣād āruroha rathaṃ kharaḥ // 3.021.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśāmya taṃ rathagataṃ rāakṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ / tasthuḥ saṃparivāryainaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // 3.021.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kharas tu tān maheṣvāsān ghoracarmāyudhadhvajān / niryātety abravīd dṛṣṭvā rathasthaḥ sarvarākṣasān // 3.021.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tad rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ ghoracarmāyudhadhvajam / nirjagāma janasthānān mahānādaṃ mahājavam // 3.021.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mudgaraiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ / khaḍgaiś cakraiś ca hastasthair bhrājamānaiś ca tomaraiḥ // 3.021.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaktibhiḥ patighair ghorair atimātraiś ca kārmukaiḥ / gadāsimusalair vajrair gṛhītair bhīmadarśanaiḥ // 3.021.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasānāṃ sughorāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi caturdaśa / niryātāni janasthānāt kharacittānuvartinām // 3.021.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃs tv abhidravato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān bhīmavikramān / kharasyāpi rathaḥ kiṃ cij jagāma tadanantaram // 3.021.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tāñ śabalān aśvāṃs taptakāñcanabhūṣitān / kharasya matam ājñāya sārathiḥ samacodayat // 3.021.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa codito rathaḥ śīghraṃ kharasya ripughātinaḥ / śabdenāpūrayām āsa diśaś ca pratiśas tathā // 3.021.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pravṛddhamanyus tu kharaḥ kharasvano; ripor vadhārthaṃ tvarito yathāntakaḥ / acūcudat sārathim unnadan punar; mahābalo megha ivāśmavarṣavān // 3.021.026	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tat prayātaṃ balaṃ ghoram aśivaṃ śoṇitodakam / abhyavarṣan mahāmeghas tumulo gardabhāruṇaḥ // 3.022.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nipetus turagās tasya rathayuktā mahājavāḥ / same puṣpacite deśe rājamārge yadṛcchayā // 3.022.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śyāmaṃ rudhiraparyantaṃ babhūva pariveṣaṇam / alātacakrapratimaṃ pratigṛhya divākaram // 3.022.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dhvajam upāgamya hemadaṇḍaṃ samucchritam / samākramya mahākāyas tasthau gṛdhraḥ sudāruṇaḥ // 3.022.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janasthānasamīpe ca samākramya kharasvanāḥ / visvarān vividhāṃś cakrur māṃsādā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // 3.022.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyājahruś ca padīptāyāṃ diśi vai bhairavasvanam / aśivā yātu dāhānāṃ śivā ghorā mahāsvanāḥ // 3.022.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhinnagirisaṃkāśās toyaśoṣitadhāriṇaḥ / ākāśaṃ tad anākāśaṃ cakrur bhīmā balāhakāḥ // 3.022.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhūva timiraṃ ghoram uddhataṃ romaharṣaṇam / diśo vā vidiśo vāpi suvyaktaṃ na cakāśire // 3.022.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatajārdrasavarṇābhā saṃdhyākālaṃ vinā babhau / kharasyābhimukhaṃ nedus tadā ghorā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ // 3.022.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityāśivakarā yuddhe śivā ghoranidarśanāḥ / nedur balasyābhimukhaṃ jvālodgāribhir ānanaiḥ // 3.022.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kabandhaḥ parighābhāso dṛśyate bhāskarāntike / jagrāha sūryaṃ svarbhānur aparvaṇi mahāgrahaḥ // 3.022.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pravāti mārutaḥ śīghraṃ niṣprabho 'bhūd divākaraḥ / utpetuś ca vinā rātriṃ tārāḥ khadyotasaprabhāḥ // 3.022.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃlīnamīnavihagā nalinyaḥ puṣpapaṅkajāḥ / tasmin kṣaṇe babhūvuś ca vinā puṣpaphalair drumāḥ // 3.022.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uddhūtaś ca vinā vātaṃ reṇur jaladharāruṇaḥ / vīcīkūcīti vāśyanto babhūvus tatra sārikāḥ // 3.022.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ulkāś cāpi sanirghoṣā nipetur ghoradarśanāḥ / pracacāla mahī cāpi saśailavanakānanā // 3.022.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kharasya ca rathasthasya nardamānasya dhīmataḥ / prākampata bhujaḥ savyaḥ kharaś cāsyāvasajjata // 3.022.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāsrā saṃpadyate dṛṣṭiḥ paśyamānasya sarvataḥ / lalāṭe ca rujā jātā na ca mohān nyavartata // 3.022.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān samīkṣya mahotpātān utthitān romaharṣaṇān / abravīd rākṣasān sarvān prahasan sa kharas tadā // 3.022.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahotpātān imān sarvān utthitān ghoradarśanān / na cintayāmy ahaṃ vīryād balavān durbalān iva // 3.022.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tārā api śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayeyaṃ nabhastalāt / mṛtyuṃ maraṇadharmeṇa saṃkruddho yojayāmy aham // 3.022.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavaṃ taṃ balotsiktaṃ bhrātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇam / ahatvā sāyakais tīkṣṇair nopāvartitum utsahe // 3.022.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakāmā bhaginī me 'stu pītvā tu rudhiraṃ tayoḥ / yannimittaṃ tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya viparyayaḥ // 3.022.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kva cit prāptapūrvo me saṃyugeṣu parājayaḥ / yuṣmākam etat pratyakṣaṃ nānṛtaṃ kathayāmy aham // 3.022.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devarājam api kruddho mattairāvatayāyinam / vajrahastaṃ raṇe hanyāṃ kiṃ punas tau ca mānuṣau // 3.022.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tasya garjitaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya mahācamūḥ / praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mṛtyupāśāvapāśitā // 3.022.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sameyuś ca mahātmāno yuddhadarśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ // 3.022.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sametya coruḥ sahitās te 'nyāyaṃ puṇyakarmaṇaḥ / svasti gobrāhmaṇebhyo 'stu lokānāṃ ye ca saṃmatāḥ // 3.022.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jayatāṃ rāghavo yuddhe paulastyān rajanīcarān / cakrā hasto yathā yuddhe sarvān asurapuṃgavān // 3.022.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac cānyac ca bahuśo bruvāṇāḥ paramarṣayaḥ / dadṛśur vāhinīṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ gatāyuṣām // 3.022.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathena tu kharo vegāt sainyasyāgrād viniḥsṛtaḥ / taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ bhūyo rākṣasāś ca viniḥsṛtāḥ // 3.022.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śyena gāmī pṛthugrīvo yajñaśatrur vihaṃgamaḥ / durjayaḥ karavīrākṣaḥ paruṣaḥ kālakārmukaḥ // 3.022.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
meghamālī mahāmālī sarpāsyo rudhirāśanaḥ / dvādaśaite mahāvīryāḥ pratasthur abhitaḥ kharam // 3.022.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahākapālaḥ sthūlākṣaḥ pramāthī triśirās tathā / catvāra ete senāgryā dūṣaṇaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayuḥ // 3.022.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā bhīmavegā samarābhikāmā; sudāruṇā rākṣasavīra senā / tau rājaputrau sahasābhyupetā; mālāgrahāṇām iva candrasūryau // 3.022.034	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
āśramaṃ prati yāte tu khare kharaparākrame / tān evautpātikān rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā dadarśa ha // 3.023.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān utpātān mahāghorān utthitān romaharṣaṇān / prajānām ahitān dṛṣṭvā vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // 3.023.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imān paśya mahābāho sarvabhūtāpahāriṇaḥ / samutthitān mahotpātān saṃhartuṃ sarvarākṣasān // 3.023.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amī rudhiradhārās tu visṛjantaḥ kharasvanān / vyomni meghā vivartante paruṣā gardabhāruṇāḥ // 3.023.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadhūmāś ca śarāḥ sarve mama yuddhābhinandinaḥ / rukmapṛṣṭhāni cāpāni viveṣṭante ca lakṣmaṇa // 3.023.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yādṛśā iha kūjanti pakṣiṇo vanacāriṇaḥ / agrato no bhayaṃ prāptaṃ saṃśayo jīvitasya ca // 3.023.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃprahāras tu sumahān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ / ayam ākhyāti me bāhuḥ sphuramāṇo muhur muhuḥ // 3.023.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃnikarṣe tu naḥ śūra jayaṃ śatroḥ parājayam / suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca tava vaktraṃ hi lakṣyate // 3.023.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udyatānāṃ hi yuddhārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati lakṣmaṇaḥ / niṣprabhaṃ vadanaṃ teṣāṃ bhavaty āyuḥ parikṣayaḥ // 3.023.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anāgatavidhānaṃ tu kartavyaṃ śubham icchatā / āpadaṃ śaṅkamānena puruṣeṇa vipaścitā // 3.023.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād gṛhītvā vaidehīṃ śarapāṇir dhanurdharaḥ / guhām āśrayaśailasya durgāṃ pādapasaṃkulām // 3.023.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratikūlitum icchāmi na hi vākyam idaṃ tvayā / śāpito mama pādābhyāṃ gamyatāṃ vatsa māciram // 3.023.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā / śarān ādāya cāpaṃ ca guhāṃ durgāṃ samāśrayat // 3.023.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin praviṣṭe tu guhāṃ lakṣmaṇe saha sītayā / hanta niryuktam ity uktvā rāmaḥ kavacam āviśat // 3.023.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tenāgninikāśena kavacena vibhūṣitaḥ / babhūva rāmas timire vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ // 3.023.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cāpam udyamya mahac charān ādāya vīryavān / babhūvāvasthitas tatra jyāsvanaiḥ pūrayan diśaḥ // 3.023.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ / ūcuḥ paramasaṃtrastā guhyakāś ca parasparam // 3.023.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām / ekaś ca rāmo dharmātmā kathaṃ yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati // 3.023.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gambhīranirhrādaṃ ghoravarmāyudhadhvajam / anīkaṃ yātudhānānāṃ samantāt pratyadṛśyata // 3.023.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhanādaṃ visṛjatām anyonyam abhigarjatām / cāpāni vispharayatāṃ jṛmbhatāṃ cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ // 3.023.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vipraghuṣṭasvanānāṃ ca dundubhīṃś cāpi nighnatām / teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ pūrayām āsa tad vanam // 3.023.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena śabdena vitrastāḥ śvāpadā vanacāriṇaḥ / dudruvur yatra niḥśabdaṃ pṛṣṭhato nāvalokayan // 3.023.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat tv anīkaṃ mahāvegaṃ rāmaṃ samupasarpata / ghṛtanānāpraharaṇaṃ gambhīraṃ sāgaropamam // 3.023.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo 'pi cārayaṃś cakṣuḥ sarvato raṇapaṇḍitaḥ / dadarśa kharasainyaṃ tad yuddhābhimukham udyatam // 3.023.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vitatya ca dhanur bhīmaṃ tūṇyāś coddhṛtya sāyakān / krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām // 3.023.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duṣprekṣyaḥ so 'bhavat kruddho yugāntāgnir iva jvalan / taṃ dṛṣṭvā tejasāviṣṭaṃ prāvyathan vanadevatāḥ // 3.023.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya kruddhasya rūpaṃ tu rāmasya dadṛśe tadā / dakṣasyeva kratuṃ hantum udyatasya pinākinaḥ // 3.023.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaṣṭabdhadhanuṃ rāmaṃ kruddhaṃ ca ripughātinam / dadarśāśramam āgamya kharaḥ saha puraḥsaraiḥ // 3.024.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā saguṇaṃ cāpam udyamya kharaniḥsvanam / rāmasyābhimukhaṃ sūtaṃ codyatām ity acodayat // 3.024.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kharasyājñayā sūtas turagān samacodayat / yatra rāmo mahābāhur eko dhunvan dhanuḥ sthitaḥ // 3.024.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu niṣpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te rajanīcarāḥ / nardamānā mahānādaṃ sacivāḥ paryavārayan // 3.024.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa teṣāṃ yātudhānānāṃ madhye rato gataḥ kharaḥ / babhūva madhye tārāṇāṃ lohitāṅga ivoditaḥ // 3.024.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ bhīmadhanvānaṃ kruddhāḥ sarve niśācarāḥ / rāmaṃ nānāvidhaiḥ śastrair abhyavarṣanta durjayam // 3.024.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mudgarair āyasaiḥ śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ / rākṣasāḥ samare rāmaṃ nijaghnū roṣatatparāḥ // 3.024.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te balāhakasaṃkāśā mahānādā mahābalāḥ / abhyadhāvanta kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ yuddhe jighāṃsavaḥ // 3.024.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te rāme śaravarṣāṇi vyasṛjan rakṣasāṃ guṇāḥ / śailendram iva dhārābhir varṣamāṇā mahādhanāḥ // 3.024.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taiḥ parivṛto ghorai rāghavo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ / tithiṣv iva mahādevo vṛtaḥ pāriṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ // 3.024.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni muktāni śastrāṇi yātudhānaiḥ sa rāghavaḥ / pratijagrāha viśikhair nadyoghān iva sāgaraḥ // 3.024.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taiḥ praharaṇair ghorair bhinnagātro na vivyathe / rāmaḥ pradīptair bahubhir vajrair iva mahācalaḥ // 3.024.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa viddhaḥ kṣatajādigdhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ / babhūva rāmaḥ saṃdhyābhrair divākara ivāvṛtaḥ // 3.024.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣedur devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / ekaṃ sahastrair bahubhis tadā dṛṣṭvā samāvṛtam // 3.024.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmaḥ susaṃkruddho maṇḍalīkṛtakārmukaḥ / sasarja niśitān bāṇāñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // 3.024.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
durāvārān durviṣahān kālapāśopamān raṇe / mumoca līlayā rāmaḥ kaṅkapatrān ajihmagān // 3.024.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te śarāḥ śatrusainyeṣu muktā rāmeṇa līlayā / ādadū rakṣasāṃ prāṇān pāśāḥ kālakṛtā iva // 3.024.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhittvā rākṣasadehāṃs tāṃs te śarā rudhirāplutāḥ / antarikṣagatā rejur dīptāgnisamatejasaḥ // 3.024.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asaṃkhyeyās tu rāmasya sāyakāś cāpamaṇḍalāt / viniṣpetur atīvogrā rakṣaḥ prāṇāpahāriṇaḥ // 3.024.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca / bahūn sahastābharaṇān ūrūn karikaropamān // 3.024.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nālīkanārācais tīkṣṇāgraiś ca vikarṇibhiḥ / bhīmam ārtasvaraṃ cakrur bhidyamānā niśācarāḥ // 3.024.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat sainyaṃ niśitair bāṇair arditaṃ marmabhedibhiḥ / rāmeṇa na sukhaṃ lebhe śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā // 3.024.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cid bhīmabalāḥ śūrāḥ śūlān khaḍgān paraśvadhān / cikṣipuḥ paramakruddhā rāmāya rajanīcarāḥ // 3.024.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni bāṇair mahābāhuḥ śastrāṇy āvārya rāghavaḥ / jahāra samare prāṇāṃś ciccheda ca śirodharān // 3.024.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśiṣṭāś ca ye tatra viṣaṇṇāś ca niśācarāḥ / kharam evābhyadhāvanta śaraṇārthaṃ śarārditāḥ // 3.024.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān sarvān punar ādāya samāśvāsya ca dūṣaṇaḥ / abhyadhāvata kākutsthaṃ kruddho rudram ivāntakaḥ // 3.024.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivṛttās tu punaḥ sarve dūṣaṇāśrayanirbhayāḥ / rāmam evābhyadhāvanta sālatālaśilāyudhāḥ // 3.024.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad babhūvādbhutaṃ yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ romaharṣaṇam / rāmasyāsya mahāghoraṃ punas teṣāṃ ca rakṣasām // 3.024.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad drumāṇāṃ śilānāṃ ca varṣaṃ prāṇaharaṃ mahat / pratijagrāha dharmātmā rāghavas tīkṣṇasāyakaiḥ // 3.025.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya ca tad varaṃ nimīlita ivarṣabhaḥ / rāmaḥ krodhaṃ paraṃ bheje vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām // 3.025.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ krodhasamāviṣṭaḥ pradīpta iva tejasā / śarair abhyakirat sainyaṃ sarvataḥ sahadūṣaṇam // 3.025.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ senāpatiḥ kruddho dūṣaṇaḥ śatrudūṣaṇaḥ / jagrāha giriśṛṅgābhaṃ parighaṃ romaharṣaṇam // 3.025.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
veṣṭitaṃ kāñcanaiḥ paṭṭair devasainyābhimardanam / āyasaiḥ śaṅkubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ kīrṇaṃ paravasokṣitām // 3.025.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajrāśanisamasparśaṃ paragopuradāraṇam / taṃ mahoragasaṃkāśaṃ pragṛhya parighaṃ raṇe // 3.025.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūṣaṇo 'bhyapatad rāmaṃ krūrakarmā niśācaraḥ // 3.025.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyābhipatamānasya dūṣaṇasya sa rāghavaḥ / dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ ciccheda sahastābharaṇau bhujau // 3.025.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhraṣṭas tasya mahākāyaḥ papāta raṇamūrdhani / parighaś chinnahastasya śakradhvaja ivāgrataḥ // 3.025.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa karābhyāṃ vikīrṇābhyāṃ papāta bhuvi dūṣaṇaḥ / viṣāṇābhyāṃ viśīrṇābhyāṃ manasvīva mahāgajaḥ // 3.025.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau dūṣaṇaṃ nihataṃ raṇe / sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ sarvabhūtāny apūjayan // 3.025.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare kruddhās trayaḥ senāgrayāyinaḥ / saṃhatyābhyadravan rāmaṃ mṛtyupāśāvapāśitāḥ // 3.025.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahākapālaḥ sthūlākṣaḥ pramāthī ca mahābalaḥ // 3.025.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahākapālo vipulaṃ śūlam udyamya rākṣasaḥ / sthūlākṣaḥ paṭṭiśaṃ gṛhya pramāthī ca paraśvadham // 3.025.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvaivāpatatas tāṃs tu rāghavaḥ sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ / tīkṣṇāgraiḥ pratijagrāha saṃprāptān atithīn iva // 3.025.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahākapālasya śiraś ciccheda raghunaṅganaḥ / asaṃkhyeyais tu bāṇaughaiḥ pramamātha pramāthinam // 3.025.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthūlākṣasyākṣiṇī tīkṣṇaiḥ pūrayām āsa sāyakaiḥ / sa papāta hato bhūmau viṭapīva mahādrumaḥ // 3.025.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pāvakasaṃkāśair hemavajravibhūṣitaiḥ / jaghanaśeṣaṃ tejasvī tasya sainyasya sāyakaiḥ // 3.025.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te rukmapuṅkhā viśikhāḥ sadhūmā iva pāvakāḥ / nijaghnus tāni rakṣāṃsi vajrā iva mahādrumān // 3.025.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣasāṃ tu śataṃ rāmaḥ śatenaikena karṇinā / sahasraṃ ca sahasreṇa jaghāna raṇamūrdhani // 3.025.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair bhinnavarmābharaṇāś chinnabhinnaśarāsanāḥ / nipetuḥ śoṇitādigdhā dharaṇyāṃ rajanīcarāḥ // 3.025.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair muktakeśaiḥ samare patitaiḥ śoṇitokṣitaiḥ / āstīrṇā vasudhā kṛtsnā mahāvediḥ kuśair iva // 3.025.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣaṇena tu mahāghoraṃ vanaṃ nihatarākṣasaṃ / babhūva niraya prakhyaṃ māṃsaśoṇitakardamam // 3.025.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām / hatāny ekena rāmeṇa mānuṣeṇa padātinā // 3.025.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya sainyasya sarvasya kharaḥ śeṣo mahārathaḥ / rākṣasas triśirāś caiva rāmaś ca ripusūdanaḥ // 3.025.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu tad bhīmabalaṃ mahāhave; samīkṣya rāmeṇa hataṃ balīyasā / rathena rāmaṃ mahatā kharas tataḥ; samāsasādendra ivodyatāśaniḥ // 3.025.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
kharaṃ tu rāmābhimukhaṃ prayāntaṃ vāhinīpatiḥ / rākṣasas triśirā nāma saṃnipatyedam abravīt // 3.026.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃ niyojaya vikrānta saṃnivartasva sāhasāt / paśya rāmaṃ mahābāhuṃ saṃyuge vinipātitam // 3.026.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratijānāmi te satyam āyudhaṃ cāham ālabhe / yathā rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmi vadhārhaṃ sarvarakṣasām // 3.026.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ vāsya raṇe mṛtyur eṣa vā samare mama / vinivartya raṇotsāhaṃ muhūrtaṃ prāśniko bhava // 3.026.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭo vā hate rāme janasthānaṃ prayāsyasi / mayi vā nihate rāmaṃ saṃyugāyopayāsyasi // 3.026.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kharas triśirasā tena mṛtyulobhāt prasāditaḥ / gaccha yudhyety anujñāto rāghavābhimukho yayau // 3.026.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triśirāś ca rathenaiva vājiyuktena bhāsvatā / abhyadravad raṇe rāmaṃ triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ // 3.026.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaradhārā samūhān sa mahāmegha ivotsṛjan / vyasṛjat sadṛśaṃ nādaṃ jalārdrasyeva dundubheḥ // 3.026.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgacchantaṃ triśirasaṃ rākṣasaṃ prekṣya rāghavaḥ / dhanuṣā pratijagrāha vidhunvan sāyakāñ śitān // 3.026.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa saṃprahāras tumulo rāma triśirasor mahān / babhūvātīva balinoḥ siṃhakuñjarayor iva // 3.026.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas triśirasā bāṇair lalāṭe tāḍitas tribhiḥ / amarṣī kupito rāmaḥ saṃrabdham idam abravīt // 3.026.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho vikramaśūrasya rākṣasasyedṛśaṃ balam / puṣpair iva śarair yasya lalāṭe 'smi parikṣataḥ // 3.026.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamāpi pratigṛhṇīṣva śarāṃś cāpaguṇacyutān // 3.026.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaḥ śarān āśīviṣopamān / triśiro vakṣasi kruddho nijaghāna caturdaśa // 3.026.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturbhis turagān asya śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ / nyapātayata tejasvī caturas tasya vājinaḥ // 3.026.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṣṭabhiḥ sāyakaiḥ sūtaṃ rathopasthe nyapātayat / rāmaś ciccheda bāṇena dhvajaṃ cāsya samucchritam // 3.026.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato hatarathāt tasmād utpatantaṃ niśācaram / bibheda rāmas taṃ bāṇair hṛdaye so 'bhavaj jaḍaḥ // 3.026.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāyakaiś cāprameyātmā sāmarṣas tasya rakṣasaḥ / śirāṃsy apātayat trīṇi vegavadbhis tribhiḥ śataiḥ // 3.026.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhūmau śoṇitodgārī rāmabāṇābhipīḍitaḥ / nyapatat patitaiḥ pūrvaṃ svaśirobhir niśācaraḥ // 3.026.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hataśeṣās tato bhagnā rākṣasāḥ kharasaṃśrayāḥ / dravanti sma na tiṣṭhanti vyāghratrastā mṛgā iva // 3.026.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān kharo dravato dṛṣṭvā nivartya ruṣitaḥ svayam / rāmam evābhidudrāva rāhuś candramasaṃ yathā // 3.026.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihataṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe triśirasā saha / kharasyāpy abhavat trāso dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam // 3.027.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ sainyam aviṣahyaṃ mahābalam / hatam ekena rāmeṇa dūṣaṇas triśirā api // 3.027.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad balaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ vimanāḥ prekṣya rākṣasaḥ / āsasāda kharo rāmaṃ namucir vāsavaṃ yathā // 3.027.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikṛṣya balavac cāpaṃ nārācān raktabhojanān / kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya kruddhān āśīviṣān iva // 3.027.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyāṃ vidhunvan subahuśaḥ śikṣayāstrāṇi darśayan / cacāra samare mārgāñ śarai rathagataḥ kharaḥ // 3.027.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sarvāś ca diśo bāṇaiḥ pradiśaś ca mahārathaḥ / pūrayām āsa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo 'pi sumahad dhanuḥ // 3.027.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sāyakair durviṣahaiḥ sasphuliṅgair ivāgnibhiḥ / nabhaś cakārāvivaraṃ parjanya iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ // 3.027.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad babhūva śitair bāṇaiḥ khararāmavisarjitaiḥ / paryākāśam anākāśaṃ sarvataḥ śarasaṃkulam // 3.027.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarajālāvṛtaḥ sūryo na tadā sma prakāśate / anyonyavadhasaṃrambhād ubhayoḥ saṃprayudhyatoḥ // 3.027.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nālīkanārācais tīkṣṇāgraiś ca vikarṇibhiḥ / ājaghāna raṇe rāmaṃ totrair iva mahādvipam // 3.027.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ rathasthaṃ dhanuṣpāṇiṃ rākṣasaṃ paryavasthitam / dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni pāśahastam ivāntakam // 3.027.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ siṃham iva vikrāntaṃ siṃhavikrāntagāminam / dṛṣṭvā nodvijate rāmaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // 3.027.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sūryanikāśena rathena mahatā kharaḥ / āsasāda raṇe rāmaṃ pataṅga iva pāvakam // 3.027.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'sya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ muṣṭideśe mahātmanaḥ / kharaś ciccheda rāmasya darśayan pāṇilāghavam // 3.027.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa punas tv aparān sapta śarān ādāya varmaṇi / nijaghāna raṇe kruddhaḥ śakrāśanisamaprabhān // 3.027.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tat prahataṃ bāṇaiḥ kharamuktaiḥ suparvabhiḥ / papāta kavacaṃ bhūmau rāmasyādityavarcasaḥ // 3.027.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śarair arpitaḥ kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ / rarāja samare rāmo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan // 3.027.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gambhīranirhrādaṃ rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ / cakārāntāya sa ripoḥ sajyam anyan mahad dhanuḥ // 3.027.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumahad vaiṣṇavaṃ yat tad atisṛṣṭaṃ maharṣiṇā / varaṃ tad dhanur udyamya kharaṃ samabhidhāvata // 3.027.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kanakapuṅkhais tu śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ / ciccheda rāmaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kharasya samare dhvajam // 3.027.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa darśanīyo bahudhā vicchinnaḥ kāñcano dhvajaḥ / jagāma dharaṇīṃ sūryo devatānām ivājñayā // 3.027.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ caturbhiḥ kharaḥ kruddho rāmaṃ gātreṣu mārgaṇaiḥ / vivyādha hṛdi marmajño mātaṅgam iva tomaraiḥ // 3.027.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmo bahubhir bāṇaiḥ kharakārmukaniḥsṛtaiḥ / viddho rudhirasiktāṅgo babhūva ruṣito bhṛśam // 3.027.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya paramāhave / mumoca parameṣvāsaḥ ṣaṭ śarān abhilakṣitān // 3.027.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śirasy ekena bāṇena dvābhyāṃ bāhvor athārpayat / tribhiś candrārdhavaktraiś ca vakṣasy abhijaghāna ha // 3.027.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paścān mahātejā nārācān bhāskaropamān / jighāṃsū rākṣasaṃ kruddhas trayodaśa śilāśitān // 3.027.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'sya yugam ekena caturbhiś caturo hayān / ṣaṣṭhena ca śiraḥ saṃkhye ciccheda kharasāratheḥ // 3.027.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tribhis triveṇuṃ balavān dvābhyām akṣaṃ mahābalaḥ / dvādaśena tu bāṇena kharasya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // 3.027.028.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
chittvā vajranikāśena rāghavaḥ prahasann iva / trayodaśenendrasamo bibheda samare kharam // 3.027.028.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhagnadhanvā viratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ / gadāpāṇir avaplutya tasthau bhūmau kharas tadā // 3.027.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat karma rāmasya mahārathasya; sametya devāś ca maharṣayaś ca / apūjayan prāñjalayaḥ prahṛṣṭās; tadā vimānāgragatāḥ sametāḥ // 3.027.030	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
kharaṃ tu virathaṃ rāmo gadāpāṇim avasthitam / mṛdupūrvaṃ mahātejāḥ paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt // 3.028.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajāśvarathasaṃbādhe bale mahati tiṣṭhatā / kṛtaṃ sudāruṇaṃ karma sarvalokajugupsitam // 3.028.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udvejanīyo bhūtānāṃ nṛśaṃsaḥ pāpakarmakṛt / trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaro 'pi na tiṣṭhati // 3.028.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karma lokaviruddhaṃ tu kurvāṇaṃ kṣaṇadācara / tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭam ivāgatam // 3.028.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lobhāt pāpāni kurvāṇaḥ kāmād vā yo na budhyate / bhraṣṭaḥ paśyati tasyāntaṃ brāhmaṇī karakād iva // 3.028.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasato daṇḍakāraṇye tāpasān dharmacāriṇaḥ / kiṃ nu hatvā mahābhāgān phalaṃ prāpsyasi rākṣasa // 3.028.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ciraṃ pāpakarmāṇaḥ krūrā lokajugupsitāḥ / aiśvaryaṃ prāpya tiṣṭhanti śīrṇamūlā iva drumāḥ // 3.028.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ / ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam ivārtavam // 3.028.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nacirāt prāpyate loke pāpānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalam / saviṣāṇām ivānnānāṃ bhuktānāṃ kṣaṇadācara // 3.028.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāpam āccaratāṃ ghoraṃ lokasyāpriyam icchatām / aham āsādito rājā prāṇān hantuṃ niśācara // 3.028.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya hi tvāṃ mayā muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ / vidārya nipatiṣyanti valmīkam iva pannagāḥ // 3.028.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tvayā daṇḍakāraṇye bhakṣitā dharmacāriṇaḥ / tān adya nihataḥ saṃkhye sasainyo 'nugamiṣyasi // 3.028.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya tvāṃ nihataṃ bāṇaiḥ paśyantu paramarṣayaḥ / nirayasthaṃ vimānasthā ye tvayā hiṃsitāḥ purā // 3.028.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahara tvaṃ yathākāmaṃ kuru yatnaṃ kulādhama / adya te pātayiṣyāmi śiras tālaphalaṃ yathā // 3.028.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ / pratyuvāca tato rāmaṃ prahasan krodhamūrchitaḥ // 3.028.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prākṛtān rākṣasān hatvā yuddhe daśarathātmaja / ātmanā katham ātmānam apraśasyaṃ praśaṃsasi // 3.028.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikrāntā balavanto vā ye bhavanti nararṣabhāḥ / kathayanti na te kiṃ cit tejasā svena garvitāḥ // 3.028.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prākṛtās tv akṛtātmāno loke kṣatriyapāṃsanāḥ / nirarthakaṃ vikatthante yathā rāma vikatthase // 3.028.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kulaṃ vyapadiśan vīraḥ samare ko 'bhidhāsyati / mṛtyukāle hi saṃprāpte svayam aprastave stavam // 3.028.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā tu laghutvaṃ te katthanena vidarśitam / suvarṇapratirūpeṇa tapteneva kuśāgninā // 3.028.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tu mām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyasi tvaṃ gadādharam / dharādharam ivākampyaṃ parvataṃ dhātubhiś citam // 3.028.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paryāpto 'haṃ gadāpāṇir hantuṃ prāṇān raṇe tava / trayāṇām api lokānāṃ pāśahasta ivāntakaḥ // 3.028.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ bahv api vaktavyaṃ tvayi vakṣyāmi na tv aham / astaṃ gacched dhi savitā yuddhavighras tato bhavet // 3.028.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rākṣasānāṃ hatāni te / tvadvināśāt karomy adya teṣām aśrupramārjanam // 3.028.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā paramakruddhas tāṃ gadāṃ paramāṅgadām / kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya pradīptām aśaniṃ yathā // 3.028.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kharabāhupramuktā sā pradīptā mahatī gadā / bhasmavṛkṣāṃś ca gulmāṃś ca kṛtvāgāt tatsamīpataḥ // 3.028.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām āpatantīṃ jvalitāṃ mṛtyupāśopamāṃ gadā / antarikṣagatāṃ rāmaś ciccheda bahudhā śaraiḥ // 3.028.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā viśīrṇā śarair bhinnā papāta dharaṇītale / gadāmantrauṣadhibalair vyālīva vinipātitā // 3.028.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhittvā tu tāṃ gadāṃ bāṇai rāghavo dharmavatsalaḥ / smayamānaḥ kharaṃ vākyaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt // 3.029.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat te balasarvasvaṃ darśitaṃ rākṣasādhama / śaktihīnataro matto vṛthā tvam upagarjitam // 3.029.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā bāṇavinirbhinnā gadā bhūmitalaṃ gatā / abhidhānapragalbhasya tava pratyayaghātinī // 3.029.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tvayoktaṃ vinaṣṭānām idam aśrupramārjanam / rākṣasānāṃ karomīti mithyā tad api te vacaḥ // 3.029.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīcasya kṣudraśīlasya mithyāvṛttasya rakṣasaḥ / prāṇān apahariṣyāmi garutmān amṛtaṃ yathā // 3.029.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya te bhinnakaṇṭhasya phenabudbudabhūṣitam / vidāritasya madbāṇair mahī pāsyati śoṇitam // 3.029.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṃsurūṣitasarvāṅgaḥ srastanyastabhujadvayaḥ / svapsyase gāṃ samāśliṣya durlabhāṃ pramadām iva // 3.029.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pravṛddhanidre śayite tvayi rākṣasapāṃsane / bhaviṣyanty aśaraṇyānāṃ śaraṇyā daṇḍakā ime // 3.029.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janasthāne hatasthāne tava rākṣasamaccharaiḥ / nirbhayā vicariṣyanti sarvato munayo vane // 3.029.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya viprasariṣyanti rākṣasyo hatabāndhavāḥ / bāṣpārdravadanā dīnā bhayād anyabhayāvahāḥ // 3.029.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya śokarasajñās tā bhaviṣyanti niśācara / anurūpakulāḥ patnyo yāsāṃ tvaṃ patir īdṛśaḥ // 3.029.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nṛśaṃsaśīla kṣudrātman nityaṃ brāhmaṇakaṇṭaka / tvatkṛte śaṅkitair agnau munibhiḥ pātyate haviḥ // 3.029.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rāghavaṃ raṇe / kharo nirbhartsayām āsa roṣāt kharatara svanaḥ // 3.029.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛḍhaṃ khalv avalipto 'si bhayeṣv api ca nirbhayaḥ / vācyāvācyaṃ tato hi tvaṃ mṛtyuvaśyo na budhyase // 3.029.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālapāśaparikṣiptā bhavanti puruṣā hi ye / kāryākāryaṃ na jānanti te nirastaṣaḍindriyāḥ // 3.029.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ saṃrudhya bhṛkuṭiṃ tataḥ / sa dadarśa mahāsālam avidūre niśācaraḥ // 3.029.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raṇe praharaṇasyārthe sarvato hy avalokayan / sa tam utpāṭayām āsa saṃdṛśya daśanacchadam // 3.029.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ samutkṣipya bāhubhyāṃ vinarditvā mahābalaḥ / rāmam uddiśya cikṣepa hatas tvam iti cābravīt // 3.029.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āpatantaṃ bāṇaughaiś chittvā rāmaḥ pratāpavān / roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ nihantuṃ samare kharam // 3.029.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jātasvedas tato rāmo roṣād raktāntalocanaḥ / nirbibheda sahasreṇa bāṇānāṃ samare kharam // 3.029.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya bāṇāntarād raktaṃ bahu susrāva phenilam / gireḥ prasravaṇasyeva toyadhārāparisravaḥ // 3.029.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vihvalaḥ sa kṛto bāṇaiḥ kharo rāmeṇa saṃyuge / matto rudhiragandhena tam evābhyadravad drutam // 3.029.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āpatantaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ kṛtāstro rudhirāplutam / apasarpat pratipadaṃ kiṃ cit tvaritavikramaḥ // 3.029.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pāvakasaṃkāśaṃ badhāya samare śaram / kharasya rāmo jagrāha brahmadaṇḍam ivāparam // 3.029.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tad dattaṃ maghavatā surarājena dhīmatā / saṃdadhe ca sa dharmātmā mumoca ca kharaṃ prati // 3.029.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vimukto mahābāṇo nirghātasamaniḥsvanaḥ / rāmeṇa dhanur udyamya kharasyorasi cāpatat // 3.029.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa papāta kharo bhūmau dahyamānaḥ śarāgninā / rudreṇaiva vinirdagdhaḥ śvetāraṇye yathāndhakaḥ // 3.029.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vṛtra iva vajreṇa phenena namucir yathāa / balo vendrāśanihato nipapāta hataḥ kharaḥ // 3.029.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rājarṣayaḥ sarve saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ / sabhājya muditā rāmam idaṃ vacanam abruvan // 3.029.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etadarthaṃ mahātejā mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ / śarabhaṅgāśramaṃ puṇyam ājagāma puraṃdaraḥ // 3.029.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānītas tvam imaṃ deśam upāyena maharṣibhiḥ / eṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ krūrāṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ pāpakarmaṇām // 3.029.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā daśarathātmaja / sukhaṃ dharmaṃ cariṣyanti daṇḍakeṣu maharṣayaḥ // 3.029.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā / giridurgād viniṣkramya saṃviveśāśramaṃ sukhī // 3.029.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmas tu vijayī pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ / praviveśāśramaṃ vīro lakṣmaṇenābhivāditaḥ // 3.029.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā śatruhantāraṃ maharṣīṇāṃ sukhāvaham / babhūva hṛṣṭā vaidehī bhartāraṃ pariṣasvaje // 3.029.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā dṛṣṭvā sahasrāṇi caturdaśa / hatāny ekena rāmeṇa rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām // 3.030.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūṣaṇaṃ ca kharaṃ caiva hataṃ triśirasaṃ raṇe / dṛṣṭvā punar mahānādaṃ nanāda jaladopamā // 3.030.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā dṛṣṭvā karma rāmasya kṛtam anyaiḥ suduṣkaram / jagāma paramaudvignā laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām // 3.030.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśa vimānāgre rāvaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ / upopaviṣṭaṃ sacivair marudbhir iva vāsavam // 3.030.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsīnaṃ sūryasaṃkāśe kāñcane paramāsane / rukmavedigataṃ prājyaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam // 3.030.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devagandharvabhūtānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām / ajeyaṃ samare śūraṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakam // 3.030.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devāsuravimardeṣu vajrāśanikṛtavraṇam / airāvataviṣāṇāgrair utkṛṣṭakiṇavakṣasaṃ // 3.030.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṃśadbhujaṃ daśagrīvaṃ darśanīyaparicchadam / viśālavakṣasaṃ vīraṃ rājalakṣmaṇalakṣitam // 3.030.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snigdhavaidūryasaṃkāśaṃ taptakāñcanakuṇḍalam / subhujaṃ śukladaśanaṃ mahāsyaṃ parvatopamam // 3.030.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣṇucakranipātaiś ca śataśo devasaṃyuge / āhatāṅgaṃ samastaiś ca devapraharaṇais tathā // 3.030.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṣobhyāṇāṃ samudrāṇāṃ kṣobhaṇaṃ kṣiprakāriṇam / kṣeptāraṃ parvatāgrāṇāṃ surāṇāṃ ca pramardanam // 3.030.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ucchettāraṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ paradārābhimarśanam / sarvadivyāstrayoktāraṃ yajñavighnakaraṃ sadā // 3.030.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purīṃ bhogavatīṃ gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim / takṣakasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ parājitya jahāra yaḥ // 3.030.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kailāsaṃ parvataṃ gatvā vijitya naravāhanam / vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tasya kāmagaṃ vai jahāra yaḥ // 3.030.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ divyaṃ nalinīṃ nandanaṃ vanam / vināśayati yaḥ krodhād devodyānāni vīryavān // 3.030.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candrasūryau mahābhāgāv uttiṣṭhantau paraṃtapau / nivārayati bāhubhyāṃ yaḥ śailaśikharopamaḥ // 3.030.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahāvane / purā svayambhuve dhīraḥ śirāṃsy upajahāra yaḥ // 3.030.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavagandharvapiśācapatagoragaiḥ / abhayaṃ yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyuto mānuṣād ṛte // 3.030.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantrar abhituṣṭaṃ puṇyam adhvareṣu dvijātibhiḥ / havirdhāneṣu yaḥ somam upahanti mahābalaḥ // 3.030.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āptayajñaharaṃ krūraṃ brahmaghnaṃ duṣṭacāriṇam / karkaśaṃ niranukrośaṃ prajānām ahite ratam // 3.030.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvalokabhayāvaham // 3.030.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasī bhrātaraṃ krūraṃ sā dadarśa mahābalam / taṃ divyavastrābharaṇaṃ divyamālyopaśobhitam // 3.030.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasendraṃ mahābhāgaṃ paulastya kulanandanam // 3.030.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam abravīd dīptaviśālalocanaṃ; pradarśayitvā bhayamohamūrchitā / sudāruṇaṃ vākyam abhītacāriṇī; mahātmanā śūrpaṇakhā virūpitā // 3.030.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā dīnā rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam / amātyamadhye saṃkruddhā paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt // 3.031.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pramattaḥ kāmabhogeṣu svairavṛtto niraṅkuśaḥ / samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ boddhavyaṃ nāvabudhyase // 3.031.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saktaṃ grāmyeṣu bhogeṣu kāmavṛttaṃ mahīpatim / lubdhaṃ na bahu manyante śmaśānāgnim iva prajāḥ // 3.031.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svayaṃ kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle nānutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ / sa tu vai saha rājyena taiś ca kāryair vinaśyati // 3.031.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayuktacāraṃ durdarśam asvādhīnaṃ narādhipam / varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkam iva dvipāḥ // 3.031.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye na rakṣanti viṣayam asvādhīnā narādhipaḥ / te na vṛddhyā prakāśante girayaḥ sāgare yathā // 3.031.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmavadbhir vigṛhya tvaṃ devagandharvadānavaiḥ / ayuktacāraś capalaḥ kathaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi // 3.031.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yeṣāṃ cāraś ca kośaś ca nayaś ca jayatāṃ vara / asvādhīnā narendrāṇāṃ prākṛtais te janaiḥ samāḥ // 3.031.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmāt paśyanti dūrasthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ / cāreṇa tasmād ucyante rājāno dīrghacakṣuṣaḥ // 3.031.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayuktacāraṃ manye tvāṃ prākṛtaiḥ sacivair vṛtam / svajanaṃ ca janasthānaṃ hataṃ yo nāvabudhyase // 3.031.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām / hatāny ekena rāmeṇa kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ // 3.031.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ / dharṣitaṃ ca janasthānaṃ rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā // 3.031.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ tu lubdhaḥ pramattaś ca parādhīnaś ca rāvaṇa / viṣaye sve samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ yo nāvabudhyase // 3.031.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tīkṣṇam alpapradātāraṃ pramattaṃ garvitaṃ śaṭham / vyasane sarvabhūtāni nābhidhāvanti pārthivam // 3.031.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atimāninam agrāhyam ātmasaṃbhāvitaṃ naram / krodhanaṃ vyasane hanti svajano 'pi narādhipam // 3.031.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca / kṣipraṃ rājyāc cyuto dīnas tṛṇais tulyo bhaviṣyati // 3.031.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuṣkakāṣṭhair bhavet kāryaṃ loṣṭair api ca pāṃsubhiḥ / na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ syād vasudhādhipaiḥ // 3.031.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā / evaṃ rājyāt paribhraṣṭaḥ samartho 'pi nirarthakaḥ // 3.031.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apramattaś ca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ / kṛtajño dharmaśīlaś ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram // 3.031.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nayanābhyāṃ prasupto 'pi jāgarti nayacakṣuṣā / vyaktakrodhaprasādaś ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ // 3.031.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ tu rāvaṇadurbuddhir guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ / yasya te 'viditaś cārai rakṣasāṃ sumahān vadhaḥ // 3.031.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parāvamantā viṣayeṣu saṃgato; nadeśa kālapravibhāga tattvavit / ayuktabuddhir guṇadoṣaniścaye; vipannarājyo na cirād vipatsyate // 3.031.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
iti svadoṣān parikīrtitāṃs tayā; samīkṣya buddhyā kṣaṇadācareśvaraḥ / dhanena darpeṇa balena cānvito; vicintayām āsa ciraṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ // 3.031.023	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāṃ kruddhāṃ bruvatīṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ / amātyamadhye saṃkruddhaḥ paripapraccha rāvaṇaḥ // 3.032.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaś ca rāmaḥ kathaṃ vīryaḥ kiṃ rūpaḥ kiṃ parākramaḥ / kimarthaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ praviṣṭaś ca suduścaram // 3.032.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyudhaṃ kiṃ ca rāmasya nihatā yena rākṣasāḥ / kharaś ca nihataṃ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā // 3.032.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā / tato rāmaṃ yathānyāyam ākhyātum upacakrame // 3.032.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīrghabāhur viśālākṣaś cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaraḥ / kandarpasamarūpaś ca rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ // 3.032.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śakracāpanibhaṃ cāpaṃ vikṛṣya kanakāṅgadam / dīptān kṣipati nārācān sarpān iva mahāviṣān // 3.032.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nādadānaṃ śarān ghorān na muñcantaṃ mahābalam / na kārmukaṃ vikarṣantaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi saṃyuge // 3.032.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ paśyāmi śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ / indreṇaivottamaṃ sasyam āhataṃ tv aśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ // 3.032.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣasāṃ bhīmavīryāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi caturdaśa / nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇais tenaikena padātinā // 3.032.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardhādhikamuhūrtena kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ / ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ // 3.032.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekā kathaṃ cin muktāhaṃ paribhūya mahātmanā / strīvadhaṃ śaṅkamānena rāmeṇa viditātmanā // 3.032.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātā cāsya mahātejā guṇatas tulyavikramaḥ / anuraktaś ca bhaktaś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān // 3.032.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī / rāmasya dakṣiṇe bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiṣcaraḥ // 3.032.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya tu viśālākṣī dharmapatnī yaśasvinī / sītā nāma varārohā vaidehī tanumadhyamā // 3.032.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva devī na gandharvā na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī / tathārūpā mayā nārī dṛṣṭapūrvā mahītale // 3.032.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya sītā bhaved bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet / atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣv api puraṃdarāt // 3.032.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā suśīlā vapuḥślāghyā rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi / tavānurūpā bhāryā sā tvaṃ ca tasyās tathā patiḥ // 3.032.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tu vistīrṇajaghanāṃ pīnottuṅgapayodharām / bhāryārthe tu tavānetum udyatāhaṃ varānanām // 3.032.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvādya vaidehīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām / manmathasya śarāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ vidheyo bhaviṣyasi // 3.032.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tasyām abhiprāyo bhāryārthe tava jāyate / śīghram uddhriyatāṃ pādo jayārtham iha dakṣiṇaḥ // 3.032.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuru priyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ rākṣaseśvara / vadhāt tasya nṛśaṃsasya rāmasyāśramavāsinaḥ // 3.032.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ śarair niśitair hatvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham / hatanāthāṃ sukhaṃ sītāṃ yathāvad upabhokṣyase // 3.032.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rocate yadi te vākyaṃ mamaitad rākṣaseśvara / kriyatāṃ nirviśaṅkena vacanaṃ mama rāghava // 3.032.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśamya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagair; hatāñ janasthānagatān niśācarān / kharaṃ ca buddhvā nihataṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ; tvam adya kṛtyaṃ pratipattum arhasi // 3.032.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ tac chrutvā romaharṣaṇam / sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryaṃ buddhvā jagāma ha // 3.033.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat kāryam anugamyātha yathāvad upalabhya ca / doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam // 3.033.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti kartavyam ity eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ / sthirabuddhis tato ramyāṃ yānaśālāṃ jagāma ha // 3.033.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yānaśālāṃ tato gatvā pracchannaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ / sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa rathaḥ saṃyujyatām iti // 3.033.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ kṣaṇenaiva sārathir laghuvikramaḥ / rathaṃ saṃyojayām āsa tasyābhimatam uttamam // 3.033.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanaṃ ratham āsthāya kāmagaṃ ratnabhūṣitam / piśācavadanair yuktaṃ kharaiḥ kanakabhūṣaṇaiḥ // 3.033.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
meghapratimanādena sa tena dhanadānujaḥ / rākṣasādhipatiḥ śrīmān yayau nadanadīpatim // 3.033.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śvetabālavyasanaḥ śvetacchatro daśānanaḥ / snigdhavaidūryasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇaḥ // 3.033.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśāsyo viṃśatibhujo darśanīya paricchadaḥ / tridaśārir munīndraghno daśaśīrṣa ivādrirāṭ // 3.033.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmagaṃ ratham āsthāya śuśubhe rākṣasādhipaḥ / vidyunmaṇḍalavān meghaḥ sabalāka ivāmbare // 3.033.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saśailaṃ sāgarānūpaṃ vīryavān avalokayan / nānāpuṣpaphalair vṛkṣair anukīrṇaṃ sahasraśaḥ // 3.033.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śītamaṅgalatoyābhiḥ padminībhiḥ samantataḥ / viśālair āśramapadair vedimadbhiḥ samāvṛtam // 3.033.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadaly āḍhakisaṃbādhaṃ nālikeropaśobhitam / sālais tālais tamālaiś ca tarubhiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ // 3.033.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atyantaniyatāhāraiḥ śobhitaṃ paramarṣibhiḥ / nāgaiḥ suparṇair gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca sahasraśaḥ // 3.033.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jitakāmaiś ca siddhaiś ca cāmaṇaiś copaśobhitam / ājair vaikhānasair māṣair vālakhilyair marīcipaiḥ // 3.033.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyābharaṇamālyābhir divyarūpābhir āvṛtam / krīḍā ratividhijñābhir apsarobhiḥ sahasraśaḥ // 3.033.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sevitaṃ devapatnībhiḥ śrīmatībhiḥ śriyā vṛtam / devadānavasaṃghaiś ca caritaṃ tv amṛtāśibhiḥ // 3.033.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haṃsakrauñcaplavākīrṇaṃ sārasaiḥ saṃpraṇāditam / vaidūryaprastaraṃ ramyaṃ snigdhaṃ sāgaratejasā // 3.033.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇḍurāṇi viśālāni divyamālyayutāni ca / tūryagītābhijuṣṭāni vimānāni samantataḥ // 3.033.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapasā jitalokānāṃ kāmagāny abhisaṃpatan / gandharvāpsarasaś caiva dadarśa dhanadānujaḥ // 3.033.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niryāsarasamūlānāṃ candanānāṃ sahasraśaḥ / vanāni paśyan saumyāni ghrāṇatṛptikarāṇi ca // 3.033.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agarūṇāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vanāny upavanāni ca / takkolānāṃ ca jātyānāṃ phalānāṃ ca sugandhinām // 3.033.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpāṇi ca tamālasya gulmāni maricasya ca / muktānāṃ ca samūhāni śuṣyamāṇāni tīrataḥ // 3.033.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkhānāṃ prastaraṃ caiva pravālanicayaṃ tathā / kāñcanāni ca śailāni rājatāni ca sarvaśaḥ // 3.033.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasravāṇi manojñāni prasannāni hradāni ca / dhanadhānyopapannāni strīratnair āvṛtāni ca // 3.033.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hastyaśvarathagāḍhāni nagarāṇy avalokayan / taṃ samaṃ sarvataḥ snigdhaṃ mṛdusaṃsparśamārutam // 3.033.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anūpaṃ sindhurājasya dadarśa tridivopamam / tatrāpaśyat sa meghābhaṃ nyagrodham ṛṣibhir vṛtam // 3.033.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samantād yasya tāḥ śākhāḥ śatayojanam āyatāḥ / yasya hastinam ādāya mahākāyaṃ ca kaccapam // 3.033.028.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhakṣārthaṃ garuḍaḥ śākhām ājagāma mahābalaḥ // 3.033.028.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tāṃ sahasā śākhāṃ bhāreṇa patagottamaḥ / suparṇaḥ parṇabahulāṃ babhañjātha mahābalaḥ // 3.033.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra vaikhānasā māṣā vālakhilyā marīcipāḥ / ajā babhūvur dhūmrāś ca saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ // 3.033.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ dayārthaṃ garuḍas tāṃ śākhāṃ śatayojanām / jagāmādāya vegena tau cobhau gajakacchapau // 3.033.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekapādena dharmātmā bhakṣayitvā tad āmiṣam / niṣādaviṣayaṃ hatvā śākhayā patagottamaḥ // 3.033.032.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mokṣayitvā mahāmunīn // 3.033.032.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tenaiva praharṣeṇa dviguṇīkṛtavikramaḥ / amṛtānayanārthaṃ vai cakāra matimān matim // 3.033.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayojālāni nirmathya bhittvā ratnagṛhaṃ varam / mahendrabhavanād guptam ājahārāmṛtaṃ tataḥ // 3.033.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ maharṣigaṇair juṣṭaṃ suparṇakṛtalakṣaṇam / nāmnā subhadraṃ nyagrodhaṃ dadarśa dhanadānujaḥ // 3.033.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu gatvā paraṃ pāraṃ samudrasya nadīpateḥ / dadarśāśramam ekānte puṇye ramye vanāntare // 3.033.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra kṛṣṇājinadharaṃ jaṭāvalkaladhāriṇam / dadarśa niyatāhāraṃ mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasaṃ // 3.033.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāvaṇaḥ samāgamya vidhivat tena rakṣasā / tataḥ paścād idaṃ vākyam abravīd vākyakovidaḥ // 3.033.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārīca śrūyatāṃ tāta vacanaṃ mama bhāṣataḥ / ārto 'smi mama cārtasya bhavān hi paramā gatiḥ // 3.034.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānīṣe tvaṃ janasthānaṃ bhrātā yatra kharo mama / dūṣaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ svasā śūrpaṇakhā ca me // 3.034.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triśirāś ca mahātejā rākṣasaḥ piśitāśanaḥ / anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā labdhalakṣā niśācarāḥ // 3.034.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasanti manniyogena adhivāsaṃ ca rākṣasaḥ / bādhamānā mahāraṇye munīn ye dharmacāriṇaḥ // 3.034.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām / śūrāṇāṃ labdhalakṣāṇāṃ kharacittānuvartinām // 3.034.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tv idānīṃ janasthāne vasamānā mahābalāḥ / saṃgatāḥ param āyattā rāmeṇa saha saṃyuge // 3.034.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena saṃjātaroṣeṇa rāmeṇa raṇamūrdhani / anuktvā paruṣaṃ kiṃ cic charair vyāpāritaṃ dhanuḥ // 3.034.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām / nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇair mānuṣeṇa padātinā // 3.034.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ / hatvā triśirasaṃ cāpi nirbhayā daṇḍakāḥ kṛtāḥ // 3.034.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitrā nirastaḥ kruddhena sabhāryaḥ kṣīṇajīvitaḥ / sa hantā tasya sainyasya rāmaḥ kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ // 3.034.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśīlaḥ karkaśas tīkṣṇo mūrkho lubdho 'jitendriyaḥ / tyaktadharmas tv adharmātmā bhūtānām ahite rataḥ // 3.034.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena vairaṃ vināraṇye sattvam āśritya kevalam / karṇanāsāpahāreṇa bhaginī me virūpitā // 3.034.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya bhāryāṃ janasthānāt sītāṃ surasutopamām / ānayiṣyāmi vikramya sahāyas tatra me bhava // 3.034.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā hy ahaṃ sahāyena pārśvasthena mahābala / bhrātṛbhiś ca surān yuddhe samagrān nābhicintaye // 3.034.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat sahāyo bhava tvaṃ me samartho hy asi rākṣasa / vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hy asti sadṛśas tava // 3.034.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etadartham ahaṃ prāptas tvatsamīpaṃ niśācara / śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryaṃ vacanān mama // 3.034.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ / āśrame tasya rāmasya sītāyāḥ pramukhe cara // 3.034.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvāṃ tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ sītā dṛṣṭvā tu mṛgarūpiṇam / gṛhyatām iti bhartāraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ cābhidhāsyati // 3.034.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tayor apāye tu śūnye sītāṃ yathāsukham / nirābādho hariṣyāmi rāhuś candraprabhām iva // 3.034.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paścāt sukhaṃ rāme bhāryāharaṇakarśite / visrabdhaṃ prahariṣyāmi kṛtārthenāntarātmanā // 3.034.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya rāmakathāṃ śrutvā mārīcasya mahātmanaḥ / śuṣkaṃ samabhavad vaktraṃ paritrasto babhūva ca // 3.034.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāvaṇaṃ trastaviṣaṇṇacetā; mahāvane rāmaparākramajñaḥ / kṛtāñjalis tattvam uvāca vākyaṃ; hitaṃ ca tasmai hitam ātmanaś ca // 3.034.022	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tac chrutvā rākṣasendrasya vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ / pratyuvāca mahāprājño mārīco rākṣaseśvaram // 3.035.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sulabhāḥ puruṣā rājan satataṃ priyavādinaḥ / apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ // 3.035.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na nūnaṃ budhyase rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ guṇonnatam / ayuktacāraś capalo mahendravaruṇopamam // 3.035.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api svasti bhavet tāta sarveṣāṃ bhuvi rakṣasām / api rāmo na saṃkruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasaṃ // 3.035.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api te jīvitāntāya notpannā janakātmajā / api sītā nimittaṃ ca na bhaved vyasanaṃ mahat // 3.035.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api tvām īśvaraṃ prāpya kāmavṛttaṃ niraṅkuśam / na vinaśyet purī laṅkā tvayā saha sarākṣasā // 3.035.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvadvidhaḥ kāmavṛtto hi duḥśīlaḥ pāpamantritaḥ / ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sa rājā hanti durmatiḥ // 3.035.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca pitrā parityakto nāmaryādaḥ kathaṃ cana / na lubdho na ca duḥśīlo na ca kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ // 3.035.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca dharmaguṇair hīnaiḥ kausalyānandavardhanaḥ / na ca tīkṣṇo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ // 3.035.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vañcitaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyyā satyavādinam / kariṣyāmīti dharmātmā tataḥ pravrajito vanam // 3.035.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyyāḥ priyakāmārthaṃ pitur daśarathasya ca / hitvā rājyaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam // 3.035.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na rāmaḥ karkaśas tāta nāvidvān nājitendriyaḥ / anṛtaṃ na śrutaṃ caiva naiva tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // 3.035.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo vigrahavān dharmaḥ sādhuḥ satyaparākramaḥ / rājā sarvasya lokasya devānām iva vāsavaḥ // 3.035.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ tvaṃ tasya vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā / icchasi prasabhaṃ hartuṃ prabhām iva vivasvataḥ // 3.035.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarārciṣam anādhṛṣyaṃ cāpakhaḍgendhanaṃ raṇe / rāmāgniṃ sahasā dīptaṃ na praveṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi // 3.035.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanurvyāditadīptāsyaṃ śarārciṣam amarṣaṇam / cāpabāṇadharaṃ vīraṃ śatrusenāpahāriṇam // 3.035.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyaṃ sukhaṃ ca saṃtyajya jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ / nātyāsādayituṃ tāta rāmāntakam ihārhasi // 3.035.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aprameyaṃ hi tat tejo yasya sā janakātmajā / na tvaṃ samarthas tāṃ hartuṃ rāmacāpāśrayāṃ vane // 3.035.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāṇebhyo 'pi priyatarā bhāryā nityam anuvratā / dīptasyeva hutāśasya śikhā sītā sumadhyamā // 3.035.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim udyamaṃ vyartham imaṃ kṛtvā te rākṣasādhipa / dṛṣṭaś cet tvaṃ raṇe tena tad antaṃ tava jīvitam // 3.035.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jīvitaṃ ca sukhaṃ caiva rājyaṃ caiva sudurlabham // 3.035.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sarvaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ vibhīṣaṇapuraskṛtaiḥ / mantrayitvā tu dharmiṣṭhaiḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ // 3.035.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam / ātmanaś ca balaṃ jñātvā rāghavasya ca tattvataḥ // 3.035.022.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hitaṃ hi tava niścitya kṣamaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi // 3.035.022.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tu manye tava na kṣamaṃ raṇe; samāgamaṃ kosalarājasūnunā / idaṃ hi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu vākyam uttamaṃ; kṣamaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca niśācarādhipa // 3.035.023	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
kadā cid apy ahaṃ vīryāt paryaṭan pṛthivīm imām / balaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayan parvatopamaḥ // 3.036.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ / bhayaṃ lokasya janayan kirīṭī parighāyudhaḥ // 3.036.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyacaraṃ daṇḍakāraṇyam ṛṣimāṃsāni bhakṣayan // 3.036.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvāmitro 'tha dharmātmā madvitrasto mahāmuniḥ / svayaṃ gatvā daśarathaṃ narendram idam abravīt // 3.036.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ rakṣatu māṃ rāmaḥ parvakāle samāhitaḥ / mārīcān me bhayaṃ ghoraṃ samutpannaṃ nareśvara // 3.036.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam ukto dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā / pratyuvāca mahābhāgaṃ viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim // 3.036.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūna ṣoḍaśa varṣo 'yam akṛtāstraś ca rāghavaḥ / kāmaṃ tu mama yat sainyaṃ mayā saha gamiṣyati // 3.036.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
badhiṣyāmi muniśreṣṭha śatruṃ tava yathepsitam // 3.036.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktaḥ sa munī rājānaṃ punar abravīt / rāmān nānyad balaṃ loke paryāptaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ // 3.036.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bālo 'py eṣa mahātejāḥ samarthas tasya nigrahe / gamiṣye rāmam ādāya svasti te 'stu paraṃtapaḥ // 3.036.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā sa munis tam ādāya nṛpātmajam / jagāma paramaprīto viśvāmitraḥ svam āśramam // 3.036.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tadā daṇḍakāraṇye yajñam uddiśya dīkṣitam / babhūvāvasthito rāmaś citraṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ // 3.036.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ajātavyañjanaḥ śrīmān bālaḥ śyāmaḥ śubhekṣaṇaḥ / ekavastradharo dhanvī śikhī kanakamālayā // 3.036.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śobhayan daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ dīptena svena tejasā / adṛśyata tadā rāmo bālacandra ivoditaḥ // 3.036.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ meghasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ / balī dattavaro darpād ājagāma tadāśramam // 3.036.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena dṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭo 'haṃ sahasaivodyatāyudhaḥ / māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ sajyam asaṃbhrāntaś cakāra ha // 3.036.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avajānann ahaṃ mohād bālo 'yam iti rāghavam / viśvāmitrasya tāṃ vedim adhyadhāvaṃ kṛtatvaraḥ // 3.036.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena muktas tato bāṇaḥ śitaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ / tenāhaṃ tāḍitaḥ kṣiptaḥ samudre śatayojane // 3.036.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya śaravegena nirasto bhrāntacetanaḥ / pātito 'haṃ tadā tena gambhīre sāgarāmbhasi // 3.036.017.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāpya saṃjñāṃ cirāt tāta laṅkāṃ prati gataḥ purīm // 3.036.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam asmi tadā muktaḥ sahāyās te nipātitāḥ / akṛtāstreṇa rāmeṇa bālenākliṣṭakarmaṇā // 3.036.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan mayā vāryamāṇas tvaṃ yadi rāmeṇa vigraham / kariṣyasy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ kṣipraṃ prāpya naśiṣyasi // 3.036.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krīḍā ratividhijñānāṃ samājotsavaśālinām / rakṣasāṃ caiva saṃtāpam anarthaṃ cāhariṣyasi // 3.036.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harmyaprāsādasaṃbādhāṃ nānāratnavibhūuṣitām / drakṣyasi tvaṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vinaṣṭāṃ maithilīkṛte // 3.036.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akurvanto 'pi pāpāni śucayaḥ pāpasaṃśrayāt / parapāpair vinaśyanti matsyā nāgahrade yathā // 3.036.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyacandanadigdhāṅgān divyābharaṇabhūṣitān / drakṣyasy abhihatān bhūmau tava doṣāt tu rākṣasān // 3.036.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛtadārān sadārāṃś ca daśavidravato diśaḥ / hataśeṣān aśaraṇān drakṣyasi tvaṃ niśācarān // 3.036.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarajālaparikṣiptām agnijvālāsamāvṛtām / pradagdhabhavanāṃ laṅkāṃ drakṣyasi tvam asaṃśayam // 3.036.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pramadānāṃ sahasrāṇi tava rājan parigrahaḥ / bhava svadāranirataḥ svakulaṃ rakṣarākṣasa // 3.036.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam iātmanaḥ / yadīcchasi ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mā kṛthā rāma vipriyam // 3.036.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivāryamāṇaḥ suhṛdā mayā bhṛśaṃ; prasahya sītāṃ yadi dharṣayiṣyasi / gamiṣyasi kṣīṇabalaḥ sabāndhavo; yamakṣayaṃ rāmaśarāttajīvitaḥ // 3.036.028	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
evam asmi tadā muktaḥ kathaṃ cit tena saṃyuge / idānīm api yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yad uttaram // 3.037.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasābhyām ahaṃ dvābhyām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ / sahito mṛgarūpābhyāṃ praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam // 3.037.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīptajihvo mahākāyas tīkṣṇaśṛṇgo mahābalaḥ / vyacaran daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ māṃsabhakṣo mahāmṛgaḥ // 3.037.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agnihotreṣu tīrtheṣu caityavṛkṣeṣu rāvaṇa / atyantaghoro vyacaraṃs tāpasāṃs tān pradharṣayan // 3.037.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatya daṇḍakāraṇye tāpasān dharmacāriṇaḥ / rudhirāṇi pibaṃs teṣāṃ tathā māṃsāni bhakṣayan // 3.037.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣimāṃsāśanaḥ krūras trāsayan vanagocarān / tadā rudhiramatto 'haṃ vyacaraṃ daṇḍakāvanam // 3.037.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadāhaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye vicaran dharmadūṣakaḥ / āsādayaṃ tadā rāmaṃ tāpasaṃ dharmam āśritam // 3.037.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham / tāpasaṃ niyatāhāraṃ sarvabhūtahite ratam // 3.037.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ vanagataṃ rāmaṃ paribhūya mahābalam / tāpaso 'yam iti jñātvā pūrvavairam anusmaran // 3.037.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyadhāvaṃ susaṃkruddhas tīkṣṇaśṛṅgo mṛgākṛtiḥ / jighāṃsur akṛtaprajñas taṃ prahāram anusmaran // 3.037.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena muktās trayo bāṇāḥ śitāḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ / vikṛṣya balavac cāpaṃ suparṇānilatulyagāḥ // 3.037.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te bāṇā vajrasaṃkāśāḥ sughorā raktabhojanāḥ / ājagmuḥ sahitāḥ sarve trayaḥ saṃnataparvaṇaḥ // 3.037.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parākramajño rāmasya śaṭho dṛṣṭabhayaḥ purā / samutkrāntas tato muktas tāv ubhau rākṣasau hatau // 3.037.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śareṇa mukto rāmasya kathaṃ cit prāpya jīvitam / iha pravrājito yuktas tāpaso 'haṃ samāhitaḥ // 3.037.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛkṣe vṛkṣe hi paśyāmi cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaram / gṛhītadhanuṣaṃ rāmaṃ pāśahastam ivāntakam // 3.037.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api rāmasahasrāṇi bhītaḥ paśyāmi rāvaṇa / rāmabhūtam idaṃ sarvam araṇyaṃ pratibhāti me // 3.037.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmam eva hi paśyāmi rahite rākṣaseśvara / dṛṣṭvā svapnagataṃ rāmam udbhramāmi vicetanaḥ // 3.037.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakārādīni nāmāni rāmatrastasya rāvaṇa / ratnāni ca rathāś caiva trāsaṃ saṃjanayanti me // 3.037.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tasya prabhāvajño na yuddhaṃ tena te kṣamam / raṇe rāmeṇa yudhyasva kṣamāṃ vā kuru rākṣasa // 3.037.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na te rāmakathā kāryā yadi māṃ draṣṭum icchasi // 3.037.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ vaco bandhuhitārthinā mayā; yathocyamānaṃ yadi nābhipatsyase / sabāndhavas tyakṣyasi jīvitaṃ raṇe; hato 'dya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagaiḥ // 3.037.020	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
mārīcena tu tad vākyaṃ kṣamaṃ yuktaṃ ca rāvaṇaḥ / ukto na pratijagrāha martukāma ivauṣadham // 3.038.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ pathyahitavaktāraṃ mārīcaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ / abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyam ayuktaṃ kālacoditaḥ // 3.038.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat kilaitad ayuktārthaṃ mārīca mayi kathyate / vākyaṃ niṣphalam atyarthaṃ bījam uptam ivoṣare // 3.038.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvadvākyair na tu māṃ śakyaṃ bhettuṃ rāmasya saṃyuge / pāpaśīlasya mūrkhasya mānuṣasya viśeṣataḥ // 3.038.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tyaktvā suhṛdo rājyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā / strīvākyaṃ prākṛtaṃ śrutvā vanam ekapade gataḥ // 3.038.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyaṃ tu mayā tasya saṃyuge kharaghātinaḥ / prāṇaiḥ priyatarā sītā hartavyā tava saṃnidhau // 3.038.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ me niścitā buddhir hṛdi mārīca vartate / na vyāvartayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ // 3.038.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
doṣaṃ guṇaṃ vā saṃpṛṣṭas tvam evaṃ vaktum arhasi / apāyaṃ vāpy upāyaṃ vā kāryasyāsya viniścane // 3.038.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpṛṣṭena tu vaktavyaṃ sacivena vipaścitā / udyatāñjalinā rājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ // 3.038.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vākyam apratikūlaṃ tu mṛdupūrvaṃ śubhaṃ hitam / upacāreṇa yuktaṃ ca vaktavyo vasudhādhipaḥ // 3.038.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāvamardaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ mārīca hitam ucyate / nābhinandati tad rājā mānārho mānavarjitam // 3.038.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pañcarūpāṇi rājāno dhārayanty amitaujasaḥ / agner indrasya somasya yamasya varuṇasya ca // 3.038.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām // 3.038.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ / tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ moham āsthitaḥ // 3.038.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyāgataṃ māṃ daurātmyāt paruṣaṃ vadasīdṛśam / guṇadoṣau na pṛcchāmi kṣamaṃ cātmani rākṣasa // 3.038.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmiṃs tu sa bhavān kṛtye sāhāryyaṃ kartum arhasi // 3.038.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ / pralobhayitvā vaidehīṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gantum arhasi // 3.038.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvāṃ tu māyā mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāñcanaṃ jātavismayā / ānayainam iti kṣipraṃ rāmaṃ vakṣyati maithilī // 3.038.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apakrānte ca kākutsthe lakṣmaṇe ca yathāsukham / ānayiṣyāmi vaidehīṃ sahasrākṣaḥ śacīm iva // 3.038.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ kṛtvā tv idaṃ kāryaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha rākṣasa / rājyasyārdhaṃ pradāsyāmi mārīca tava suvrata // 3.038.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaccha saumya śivaṃ mārgaṃ kāryasyāsya vivṛddhaye / prāpya sītām ayuddhena vañcayitvā tu rāghavam // 3.038.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkāṃ prati gamiṣyāmi kṛtakāryaḥ saha tvayā // 3.038.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat kāryam avaśyaṃ me balād api kariṣyasi / rājño hi pratikūlastho na jātu sukham edhate // 3.038.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsādyā taṃ jīvitasaṃśayas te; mṛtyur dhruvo hy adya mayā virudhya / etad yathāvat parigṛhya buddhyā; yad atra pathyaṃ kuru tat tathā tvam // 3.038.021	upajāti (triṣṭubh: indravajrā [ttjgg], upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [mtjgg])
ājñapto rājavad vākyaṃ pratikūlaṃ niśācaraḥ / abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ mārīco rākṣasādhipam // 3.039.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kenāyam upadiṣṭas te vināśaḥ pāpakarmaṇā / saputrasya sarāṣṭrasya sāmātyasya niśācara // 3.039.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kas tvayā sukhinā rājan nābhinandati pāpakṛt / kenedam upadiṣṭaṃ te mṛtyudvāram upāyataḥ // 3.039.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatravas tava suvyaktaṃ hīnavīryā niśācara / icchanti tvāṃ vinaśyantam uparuddhaṃ balīyasā // 3.039.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kenedam upadiṣṭaṃ te kṣudreṇāhitavādinā / yas tvām icchati naśyantaṃ svakṛtena niśācara // 3.039.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhyāḥ khalu na hanyante sacivās tava rāvaṇa / ye tvām utpatham ārūḍhaṃ na nigṛhṇanti sarvaśaḥ // 3.039.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ / nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase // 3.039.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yaśaś ca jayatāṃ vara / svāmiprasādāt sacivāḥ prāpnuvanti niśācara // 3.039.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viparyaye tu tat sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ bhavati rāvaṇa / vyasanaṃ svāmivaiguṇyāt prāpnuvantītare janāḥ // 3.039.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājamūlo hi dharmaś ca jayaś ca jayatāṃ vara / tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu rakṣitavyo narādhipaḥ // 3.039.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyaṃ pālayituṃ śakyaṃ na tīkṣṇena niśācara / na cāpi pratikūlena nāvinītena rākṣasa // 3.039.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tīkṣṇamantrāḥ sacivā bhajyante saha tena vai / viṣameṣu rathāḥ śīghraṃ mandasārathayo yathā // 3.039.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahavaḥ sādhavo loke yuktadharmam anuṣṭhitāḥ / pareṣām aparādhena vinaṣṭāḥ saparicchadāḥ // 3.039.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svāminā pratikūlena prajās tīkṣṇena rāvaṇa / rakṣyamāṇā na vardhante meṣā gomāyunā yathā // 3.039.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyaṃ vinaśiṣyanti sarve rāvaṇarākṣasāḥ / yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ // 3.039.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad idaṃ kākatālīyaṃ ghoram āsāditaṃ tvayā / atra kiṃ śobhanaṃ yat tvaṃ sasainyo vinaśiṣyasi // 3.039.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃ nihatya tu rāmo 'sau nacirāt tvāṃ vadhiṣyati / anena kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mriye yad ariṇā hataḥ // 3.039.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśanād eva rāmasya hataṃ mām upadhāraya / ātmānaṃ ca hataṃ viddhi hṛtvā sītāṃ sabāndhavam // 3.039.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānayiṣyāmi cet sītām āśramāt sahito mayā / naiva tvam asi naivāhaṃ naiva laṅkā na rākṣasāḥ // 3.039.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivāryamāṇas tu mayā hitaiṣiṇā; na mṛṣyase vākyam idaṃ niśācara / paretakalpā hi gatāyuṣo narā; hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam // 3.039.020	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
evam uktvā tu paruṣaṃ mārīco rāvaṇo tataḥ / gacchāvety abravīd dīno bhayād rātriṃcaraprabhoḥ // 3.040.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭāś cāhaṃ punas tena śaracāpāsidhāriṇā / madvidhodyataśastreṇa vinaṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me // 3.040.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tu kartuṃ mayā śakyam evaṃ tvayi durātmani / eṣa gacchāmy ahaṃ tāta svasti te 'stu niśācaraḥ // 3.040.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭas tv abhavat tena vacanena sa rākṣasaḥ / pariṣvajya susaṃśliṣṭam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 3.040.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chauṇḍīryayuktaṃ te macchabdād iva bhāṣitam / idānīm asi mārīcaḥ pūrvam anyo niśācaraḥ // 3.040.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āruhyatām ayaṃ śīghraṃ khago ratnavibhūṣitaḥ / mayā saha ratho yuktaḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥ // 3.040.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāvaṇamārīcau vimānam iva taṃ ratham / āruhya yayatuḥ śīghraṃ tasmād āśramamaṇḍalāt // 3.040.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaiva tatra paśyantau pattanāni vanāni ca / girīṃś ca saritaḥ sarvā rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca // 3.040.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sametya daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ rāghavasyāśramaṃ tataḥ / dadarśa sahamarīco rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ // 3.040.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avatīrya rathāt tasmāt tataḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāt / haste gṛhītvā mārīcaṃ rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt // 3.040.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad rāmāśramapadaṃ dṛśyate kadalīvṛtam / kriyatāṃ tat sakhe śīghraṃ yadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ // 3.040.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāvaṇavacaḥ śrutvā mārīco rākṣasas tadā / mṛgo bhūtvāśramadvāri rāmasya vicacāra ha // 3.040.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maṇipravaraśṛṅgāgraḥ sitāsitamukhākṛtiḥ / raktapadmotpalamukha indranīlotpalaśravāḥ // 3.040.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ cid abhyunnata grīva indranīlanibhodaraḥ / madhūkanibhapārśvaś ca kañjakiñjalkasaṃnibhaḥ // 3.040.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidūryasaṃkāśakhuras tanujaṅghaḥ susaṃhataḥ / indrāyudhasavarṇena pucchenordhvaṃ virājitaḥ // 3.040.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manoharasnigdhavarṇo ratnair nānāvidhair vṛtaḥ / kṣaṇena rākṣaso jāto mṛgaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ // 3.040.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanaṃ prajvalayan ramyaṃ rāmāśramapadaṃ ca tat / manoharaṃ darśanīyaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā sa rākṣasaḥ // 3.040.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pralobhanārthaṃ vaidehyā nānādhātuvicitritam / vicaran gacchate samyak śādvalāni samantataḥ // 3.040.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rūpyabinduśataiś citro bhūtvā ca priyadarśanaḥ / viṭapīnāṃ kisalayān bhaṅktvādan vicacāra ha // 3.040.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadalīgṛhakaṃ gatvā karṇikārān itas tataḥ / samāśrayan mandagatiḥ sītāsaṃdarśanaṃ tadā // 3.040.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājīvacitrapṛṣṭhaḥ sa virarāja mahāmṛgaḥ / rāmāśramapadābhyāśe vicacāra yathāsukham // 3.040.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
punar gatvā nivṛttaś ca vicacāra mṛgottamaḥ / gatvā muhūrtaṃ tvarayā punaḥ pratinivartate // 3.040.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikrīḍaṃś ca punar bhūmau punar eva niṣīdati / āśramadvāram āgamya mṛgayūthāni gacchati // 3.040.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛgayūthair anugataḥ punar eva nivartate / sītādarśanam ākāṅkṣan rākṣaso mṛgatāṃ gataḥ // 3.040.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paribhramati citrāṇi maṇḍalāni viniṣpatan / samudvīkṣya ca sarve taṃ mṛgā ye 'nye vanecarāḥ // 3.040.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upagamya samāghrāya vidravanti diśo daśa / rākṣasaḥ so 'pi tān vanyān mṛgān mṛgavadhe rataḥ // 3.040.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pracchādanārthaṃ bhāvasya na bhakṣayati saṃspṛśan / tasminn eva tataḥ kāle vaidehī śubhalocanā // 3.040.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kusumāpacaye vyagrā pādapān atyavartata / karṇikārān aśokāṃś ca cūṭāṃś ca madirekṣaṇā // 3.040.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kusumāny apacinvantī cacāra rucirānanā / anarhāraṇyavāsasya sā taṃ ratnamayaṃ mṛgam // 3.040.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muktāmaṇivicitrāṅgaṃ dadarśa paramāṅganā // 3.040.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ vai ruciradaṇtauṣṭhaṃ rūpyadhātutanūruham / vismayotphullanayanā sasnehaṃ samudaikṣata // 3.040.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca tāṃ rāma dayitāṃ paśyan māyāmayo mṛgaḥ / vicacāra tatas tatra dīpayann iva tad vanam // 3.040.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ nānāratnamayaṃ mṛgam / vismayaṃ paramaṃ sītā jagāma janakātmajā // 3.040.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā taṃ saṃprekṣya suśroṇī kusumāni vicinvatī / hemarājata varṇābhyāṃ pārśvābhyām upaśobhitam // 3.041.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭā cānavadyāṅgī mṛṣṭahāṭakavarṇinī / bhartāram api cākrandal lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sāyudham // 3.041.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayāhūtau naravyāghrau vaidehyā rāmalakṣmaṇau / vīkṣamāṇau tu taṃ deśaṃ tadā dadṛśatur mṛgam // 3.041.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkamānas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt / tam evainam ahaṃ manye mārīcaṃ rākṣasaṃ mṛgam // 3.041.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caranto mṛgayāṃ hṛṣṭāḥ pāpenopādhinā vane / anena nihatā rāma rājānaḥ kāmarūpiṇā // 3.041.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asya māyāvido māyā mṛgarūpam idaṃ kṛtam / bhānumatpuruṣavyāghra gandharvapurasaṃnibham // 3.041.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛgo hy evaṃvidho ratnavicitro nāsti rāghava / jagatyāṃ jagatīnātha māyaiṣā hi na saṃśayaḥ // 3.041.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ prativārya śucismitā / uvāca sītā saṃhṛṣṭā chadmanā hṛtacetanā // 3.041.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āryaputrābhirāmo 'sau mṛgo harati me manaḥ / ānayainaṃ mahābāho krīḍārthaṃ no bhaviṣyati // 3.041.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ihāśramapade 'smākaṃ bahavaḥ puṇyadarśanāḥ / mṛgāś caranti sahitāś camarāḥ sṛmarās tathā // 3.041.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca vānarāḥ kinarās tathā / vicaranti mahābāho rūpaśreṣṭhā mahābalāḥ // 3.041.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāsya sadṛśo rājan dṛṣṭapūrvo mṛgaḥ purā / tejasā kṣamayā dīptyā yathāyaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ // 3.041.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāvarṇavicitrāṅgo ratnabindusamācitaḥ / dyotayan vanam avyagraṃ śobhate śaśisaṃnibhaḥ // 3.041.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho rūpam aho lakṣmīḥ svarasaṃpac ca śobhanā / mṛgo 'dbhuto vicitro 'sau hṛdayaṃ haratīva me // 3.041.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi grahaṇam abhyeti jīvann eva mṛgas tava / āścaryabhūtaṃ bhavati vismayaṃ janayiṣyati // 3.041.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāptavanavāsānāṃ rājyasthānāṃ ca naḥ punaḥ / antaḥpuravibhūṣārtho mṛga eṣa bhaviṣyati // 3.041.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasyāryaputrasya śvaśrūṇāṃ mama ca prabho / mṛgarūpam idaṃ divyaṃ vismayaṃ janayiṣyati // 3.041.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jīvan na yadi te 'bhyeti grahaṇaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ / ajinaṃ naraśārdūla ruciraṃ me bhaviṣyati // 3.041.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatasyāsya sattvasya jāmbūnadamayatvaci / śaṣpabṛsyāṃ vinītāyām icchāmy aham upāsitum // 3.041.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmavṛttam idaṃ raudraṃ strīṇām asadṛśaṃ matam / vapuṣā tv asya sattvasya vismayo janito mama // 3.041.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena kāñcanaroṃṇā tu maṇipravaraśṛṅgiṇā / taruṇādityavarṇena nakṣatrapathavarcasā // 3.041.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhūva rāghavasyāpi mano vismayam āgatam // 3.041.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sītāvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca mṛgam adbhutam / uvāca rāghavo hṛṣṭo bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ vacaḥ // 3.041.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ spṛhāṃ mṛgagatām imām / rūpaśreṣṭhatayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati // 3.041.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na vane nandanoddeśe na caitrarathasaṃśraye / kutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ saumitre yo 'sya kaś cit samo mṛgaḥ // 3.041.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratilomānulomāś ca rucirā romarājayaḥ / śobhante mṛgam āśritya citrāḥ kanakabindubhiḥ // 3.041.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśyāsya jṛmbhamāṇasya dīptām agniśikhopamām / jihvāṃ mukhān niḥsarantīṃ meghād iva śatahradām // 3.041.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
masāragalvarkamukhaḥ śaṅkhamuktānibhodaraḥ / kasya nāmānirūpyo 'sau na mano lobhayen mṛgaḥ // 3.041.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya rūpam idaṃ dṛṣṭvā jāmbūnadamaya prabham / nānāratnamayaṃ divyaṃ na mano vismayaṃ vrajet // 3.041.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃsahetor api mṛgān vihārārthaṃ ca dhanvinaḥ / ghnanti lakṣmaṇa rājāno mṛgayāyāṃ mahāvane // 3.041.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
