evam uktvā mahābāhur lakṣmaṇaṃ puruṣarṣabham / kruddho 'bravīd giriṃ tatra siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // 3.060.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ hemavarṇāṃ hemābhāṃ sītāṃ darśaya parvata / yāvat sānūni sarvāṇi na te vidhvaṃsayāmy aham // 3.060.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama bāṇāgninirdagdho bhasmībhūto bhaviṣyasi / asevyaḥ satataṃ caiva nistṛṇadrumapallavaḥ // 3.060.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ vā saritaṃ cādya śoṣayiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa / yadi nākhyāti me sītām adya candranibhānanām // 3.060.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa ruṣito rāmo didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā / dadarśa bhūmau niṣkrāntaṃ rākṣasasya padaṃ mahat // 3.060.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa samīkṣya parikrāntaṃ sītāyā rākṣasasya ca / saṃbhrāntahṛdayo rāmaḥ śaśaṃsa bhrātaraṃ priyam // 3.060.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ śīrṇāḥ kanakabindavaḥ / bhūṣaṇānāṃ hi saumitre mālyāni vividhāni ca // 3.060.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taptabindunikāśaiś ca citraiḥ kṣatajabindubhiḥ / āvṛtaṃ paśya saumitre sarvato dharaṇītalam // 3.060.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manye lakṣmaṇa vaidehī rākṣasaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ / bhittvā bhittvā vibhaktā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati // 3.060.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya nimittaṃ vaidehyā dvayor vivadamānayoḥ / babhūva yuddhaṃ saumitre ghoraṃ rākṣasayor iha // 3.060.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muktāmaṇicitaṃ cedaṃ tapanīyavibhūṣitam / dharaṇyāṃ patitaṃ saumya kasya bhagnaṃ mahad dhanuḥ // 3.060.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taruṇādityasaṃkāśaṃ vaidūryagulikācitam / viśīrṇaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau kavacaṃ kasya kāñcanam // 3.060.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
chatraṃ śataśalākaṃ ca divyamālyopaśobhitam / bhagnadaṇḍam idaṃ kasya bhūmau saumya nipātitam // 3.060.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanoraśchadāś ceme piśācavadanāḥ kharāḥ / bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ kasya vā nihatā raṇe // 3.060.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīptapāvakasaṃkāśo dyutimān samaradhvajaḥ / apaviddhaś ca bhagnaś ca kasya sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ // 3.060.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathākṣamātrā viśikhās tapanīyavibhūṣaṇāḥ / kasyeme 'bhihatā bāṇāḥ prakīrṇā ghorakarmaṇaḥ // 3.060.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vairaṃ śataguṇaṃ paśya mamedaṃ jīvitāntakam / sughorahṛdayaiḥ saumya rākṣasaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ // 3.060.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛtā mṛtā vā sītā hi bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī / na dharmas trāyate sītāṃ hriyamāṇāṃ mahāvane // 3.060.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhakṣitāyāṃ hi vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api lakṣmaṇa / ke hi loke priyaṃ kartuṃ śaktāḥ saumya mameśvarāḥ // 3.060.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kartāram api lokānāṃ śūraṃ karuṇavedinam / ajñānād avamanyeran sarvabhūtāni lakṣmaṇa // 3.060.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛduṃ lokahite yuktaṃ dāntaṃ karuṇavedinam / nirvīrya iti manyante nūnaṃ māṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ // 3.060.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃ prāpya hi guṇo doṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa / adyaiva sarvabhūtānāṃ rakṣasām abhavāya ca // 3.060.039.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃhṛtyaiva śaśijyotsnāṃ mahān sūrya ivoditaḥ // 3.060.039.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva yakṣā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ / kiṃnarā vā manuṣyā vā sukhaṃ prāpsyanti lakṣmaṇa // 3.060.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamāstrabāṇasaṃpūrṇam ākāśaṃ paśya lakṣmaṇa / niḥsaṃpātaṃ kariṣyāmi hy adya trailokyacāriṇām // 3.060.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃniruddhagrahagaṇam āvāritaniśākaram / vipranaṣṭānalamarudbhāskaradyutisaṃvṛtam // 3.060.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinirmathitaśailāgraṃ śuṣyamāṇajalāśayam / dhvastadrumalatāgulmaṃ vipraṇāśitasāgaram // 3.060.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tāṃ kuśalinīṃ sītāṃ pradāsyanti mameśvarāḥ / asmin muhūrte saumitre mama drakṣyanti vikramam // 3.060.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nākāśam utpatiṣyanti sarvabhūtāni lakṣmaṇa / mama cāpaguṇān muktair bāṇajālair nirantaram // 3.060.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arditaṃ mama nārācair dhvastabhrāntamṛgadvijam / samākulam amaryādaṃ jagat paśyādya lakṣmaṇa // 3.060.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ākarṇapūrṇair iṣubhir jīvalokaṃ durāvaraiḥ / kariṣye maithilīhetor apiśācam arākṣasaṃ // 3.060.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama roṣaprayuktānāṃ sāyakānāṃ balaṃ surāḥ / drakṣyanty adya vimuktānām amarṣād dūragāminām // 3.060.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva devā na daiteyā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ / bhaviṣyanti mama krodhāt trailokye vipraṇāśite // 3.060.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ lokā ye rakṣasām api / bahudhā nipatiṣyanti bāṇaughaiḥ śakulīkṛtāḥ // 3.060.050.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirmaryādān imāṃl lokān kariṣyāmy adya sāyakaiḥ // 3.060.050.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā jarā yathā mṛtyur yathākālo yathāvidhiḥ / nityaṃ na pratihanyante sarvabhūteṣu lakṣmaṇa // 3.060.051.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathāhaṃ krodhasaṃyukto na nivāryo 'smy asaṃśayam // 3.060.051.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pureva me cārudatīm aninditāṃ; diśanti sītāṃ yadi nādya maithilīm / sadevagandharvamanuṣya pannagaṃ; jagat saśailaṃ parivartayāmy aham // 3.060.052	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tapyamānaṃ tathā rāmaṃ sītāharaṇakarśitam / lokānām abhave yuktaṃ sāmvartakam ivānalam // 3.061.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīkṣamāṇaṃ dhanuḥ sajyaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ / hantukāmaṃ paśuṃ rudraṃ kruddhaṃ dakṣakratau yathā // 3.061.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ / abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā // 3.061.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā bhūtvā mṛdur dāntaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ / na krodhavaśam āpannaḥ prakṛtiṃ hātum arhasi // 3.061.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candre lakṣṇīḥ prabhā sūrye gatir vāyau bhuvi kṣamā / etac ca niyataṃ sarvaṃ tvayi cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ // 3.061.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tu jānāmi kasyāyaṃ bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ / kena vā kasya vā hetoḥ sāyudhaḥ saparicchadaḥ // 3.061.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
khuranemikṣataś cāyaṃ sikto rudhirabindubhiḥ / deśo nivṛttasaṃgrāmaḥ sughoraḥ pārthivātmaja // 3.061.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekasya tu vimardo 'yaṃ na dvayor vadatāṃ vara / na hi vṛttaṃ hi paśyāmi balasya mahataḥ padam // 3.061.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naikasya tu kṛte lokān vināśayitum arhasi / yuktadaṇḍā hi mṛdavaḥ praśāntā vasudhādhipāḥ // 3.061.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaḥ paramā gatiḥ / ko nu dārapraṇāśaṃ te sādhu manyeta rāghava // 3.061.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saritaḥ sāgarāḥ śailā devagandharvadānavāḥ / nālaṃ te vipriyaṃ kartuṃ dīkṣitasyeva sādhavaḥ // 3.061.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena rājan hṛtā sītā tam anveṣitum arhasi / maddvitīyo dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sahāyaiḥ paramarṣibhiḥ // 3.061.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samudraṃ ca viceṣyāmaḥ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca / guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nalinīḥ pārvatīś ca ha // 3.061.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devagandharvalokāṃś ca viceṣyāmaḥ samāhitāḥ / yāvan nādhigamiṣyāmas tava bhāryāpahāriṇam // 3.061.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cet sāmnā pradāsyanti patnīṃ te tridaśeśvarāḥ / kosalendra tataḥ paścāt prāptakālaṃ kariṣyasi // 3.061.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīlena sāmnā vinayena sītāṃ; nayena na prāpsyasi cen narendra / tataḥ samutsādaya hemapuṅkhair; mahendravajrapratimaiḥ śaraughaiḥ // 3.061.016	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
taṃ tathā śokasaṃtaptaṃ vilapantam anāthavat / mohena mahatāviṣṭaṃ paridyūnam acetanam // 3.062.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saumitrir āśvāsya muhūrtād iva lakṣmaṇaḥ / rāmaṃ saṃbodhayām āsa caraṇau cābhipīḍayan // 3.062.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahatā tapasā rāma mahatā cāpi karmaṇā / rājñā daśarathenāsīl labdho 'mṛtam ivāmaraiḥ // 3.062.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava caiva guṇair baddhas tvadviyogān mahīpatiḥ / rājā devatvam āpanno bharatasya yathā śrutam // 3.062.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ kākutstha na sahiṣyase / prākṛtaś cālpasattvaś ca itaraḥ kaḥ sahiṣyati // 3.062.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duḥkhito hi bhavāṃl lokāṃs tejasā yadi dhakṣyate / ārtāḥ prajā naravyāghra kva nu yāsyanti nirvṛtim // 3.062.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lokasvabhāva evaiṣa yayātir nahuṣātmajaḥ / gataḥ śakreṇa sālokyam anayas taṃ samaspṛśat // 3.062.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maharṣayo vasiṣṭhas tu yaḥ pitur naḥ purohitaḥ / ahnā putraśataṃ jajñe tathaivāsya punar hatam // 3.062.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā ceyaṃ jagato mātā devī lokanamaskṛtā / asyāś ca calanaṃ bhūmer dṛśyate satyasaṃśrava // 3.062.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yau cemau jagatāṃ netre yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam / ādityacandrau grahaṇam abhyupetau mahābalau // 3.062.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumahānty api bhūtāni devāś ca puruṣarṣabha / na daivasya pramuñcanti sarvabhūtāni dehinaḥ // 3.062.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śakrādiṣv api deveṣu vartamānau nayānayau / śrūyete naraśārdūla na tvaṃ vyathitum arhasi // 3.062.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naṣṭāyām api vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api cānagha / śocituṃ nārhase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā // 3.062.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvadvidhā hi na śocanti satataṃ satyadarśinaḥ / sumahatsv api kṛcchreṣu rāmānirviṇṇadarśaṇāḥ // 3.062.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tattvato hi naraśreṣṭha buddhyā samanucintaya / buddhyā yuktā mahāprājñā vijānanti śubhāśubhe // 3.062.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛṣṭaguṇadoṣāṇām adhṛtānāṃ ca karmaṇām / nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalam iṣṭaṃ pravartate // 3.062.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mām eva hi purā vīra tvam eva bahuṣo 'nvaśāḥ / anuśiṣyād dhi ko nu tvām api sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ // 3.062.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhiś ca te mahāprājña devair api duranvayā / śokenābhiprasuptaṃ te jñānaṃ saṃbodhayāmy aham // 3.062.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ caivam ātmanaś ca parākramam / ikṣvākuvṛṣabhāvekṣya yatasva dviṣatāṃ badhe // 3.062.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ te sarvavināśena kṛtena puruṣarṣabha / tam eva tu ripuṃ pāpaṃ vijñāyoddhartum arhasi // 3.062.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvajo 'py uktamātras tu lakṣmaṇena subhāṣitam / sāragrāhī mahāsāraṃ pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ // 3.063.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃnigṛhya mahābāhuḥ pravṛddhaṃ kopam ātmanaḥ / avaṣṭabhya dhanuś citraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // 3.063.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vatsa kva vā gacchāva lakṣmaṇa / kenopāyena paśyeyaṃ sītām iti vicintaya // 3.063.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tathā paritāpārtaṃ lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt / idam eva janasthānaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi // 3.063.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasair bahubhiḥ kīrṇaṃ nānādrumalatāyutam / santīha giridurgāṇi nirdarāḥ kandarāṇi ca // 3.063.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nānāmṛgagaṇākulāḥ / āvāsāḥ kiṃnarāṇāṃ ca gandharvabhavanāni ca // 3.063.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni yukto mayā sārdhaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi / tvadvidho buddhisaṃpannā māhātmāno nararṣabha // 3.063.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpatsu na prakampante vāyuvegair ivācalāḥ / ity uktas tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicacāra salakṣmaṇaḥ // 3.063.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kruddho rāmaḥ śaraṃ ghoraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram / tataḥ parvatakūṭābhaṃ mahābhāgaṃ dvijottamam // 3.063.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadarśa patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam / taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgābhaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // 3.063.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anena sītā vaidehī bhakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ // 3.063.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛdhrarūpam idaṃ vyaktaṃ rakṣo bhramati kānanam / bhakṣayitvā viśālākṣīm āste sītāṃ yathāsukham // 3.063.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
enaṃ vadhiṣye dīptāgrair ghorair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ // 3.063.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvābhyapatad gṛdhraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram / kruddho rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ cālayann iva medinīm // 3.063.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dīnadīnayā vācā saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman / abhyabhāṣata pakṣī tu rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam // 3.063.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yām oṣadhim ivāyuṣmann anveṣasi mahāvane / sā devī mama ca prāṇā rāvaṇenobhayaṃ hṛtam // 3.063.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā virahitā devī lakṣmaṇena ca rāghava / hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rāvaṇena balīyasā // 3.063.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītām abhyavapan no 'haṃ rāvaṇaś ca raṇe mayā / vidhvaṃsitarathacchatraḥ pātito dharaṇītale // 3.063.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad asya dhanur bhagnam etad asya śarāvaram / ayam asya raṇe rāma bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ // 3.063.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pariśrāntasya me pakṣau chittvā khaḍgena rāvaṇaḥ / sītām ādāya vaidehīm utpapāta vihāyasaṃ // 3.063.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣasā nihataṃ pūrvma na māṃ hantuṃ tvam arhasi // 3.063.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmas tasya tu vijñāya sītāsaktāṃ priyāṃ kathām / gṛdhrarājaṃ pariṣvajya ruroda sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // 3.063.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekam ekāyane durge niḥśvasantaṃ kathaṃ cana / samīkṣya duḥkhito rāmaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt // 3.063.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyād bhraṃśo vane vāsaḥ sītā naṣṭā hato dvijaḥ / īdṛśīyaṃ mamālakṣmīr nirdahed api pāvakam // 3.063.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpūrṇam api ced adya pratareyaṃ mahodadhim / so 'pi nūnaṃ mamālakṣmyā viśuṣyet saritāṃ patiḥ // 3.063.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāsty abhāgyataro loke matto 'smin sacarācare / yeneyaṃ mahatī prāptā mayā vyasanavāgurā // 3.063.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ pitṛvayasyo me gṛdhrarājo jarānvitaḥ / śete vinihato bhūmau mama bhāgyaviparyayāt // 3.063.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā bahuśo rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / jaṭāyuṣaṃ ca pasparśa pitṛsnehaṃ nidarśayan // 3.063.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nikṛttapakṣaṃ rudhirāvasiktaṃ; taṃ gṛdhrarājaṃ parirabhya rāmaḥ / kva maithili prāṇasamā mameti; vimucya vācaṃ nipapāta bhūmau // 3.063.026	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
rāmaḥ prekṣya tu taṃ gṛdhraṃ bhuvi raudreṇa pātitam / saumitriṃ mitrasaṃpannam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 3.064.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamāyaṃ nūnam artheṣu yatamāno vihaṃgamaḥ / rākṣasena hataḥ saṃkhye prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān // 3.064.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayam asya śarīre 'smin prāṇo lakṣmaṇa vidyate / tathā svaravihīno 'yaṃ viklavaṃ samudīkṣate // 3.064.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭāyo yadi śaknoṣi vākyaṃ vyāharituṃ punaḥ / sītām ākhyāhi bhadraṃ te vadham ākhyāhi cātmanaḥ // 3.064.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃnimitto 'harat sītāṃ rāvaṇas tasya kiṃ mayā / aparāddhaṃ tu yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena hṛtā priyā // 3.064.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ tac candrasaṃkāśaṃ mukham āsīn manoharam / sītayā kāni coktāni tasmin kāle dvijottama // 3.064.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃvīryaḥ kathaṃrūpaḥ kiṃkarmā sa ca rākṣasaḥ / kva cāsya bhavanaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ // 3.064.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam udvīkṣyātha dīnātmā vilapantam anantaram / vācātisannayā rāmaṃ jaṭāyur idam abravīt // 3.064.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā hṛtā rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena vihāyasā / māyām āsthāya vipulāṃ vātadurdinasaṃkulām // 3.064.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pariśrāntasya me tāta pakṣau chittvā niśācaraḥ / sītām ādāya vaidehīṃ prayāto dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ // 3.064.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uparudhyanti me prāṇā dṛṣṭir bhramati rāghava / paśyāmi vṛkṣān sauvarṇān uśīrakṛtamūrdhajān // 3.064.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena yāti muhūrtena sītām ādāya rāvaṇaḥ / vipranaṣṭaṃ dhanaṃ kṣipraṃ tat svāmipratipadyate // 3.064.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vindo nāma muhūrto 'sau sa ca kākutstha nābudhat / jhaṣavad baḍiśaṃ gṛhya kṣipram eva vinaśyati // 3.064.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca tvayā vyathā kāryā janakasya sutāṃ prati / vaidehyā raṃsyase kṣipraṃ hatvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe // 3.064.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asaṃmūḍhasya gṛdhrasya rāmaṃ pratyanubhāṣataḥ / āsyāt susrāva rudhiraṃ mriyamāṇasya sāmiṣam // 3.064.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca / ity uktvā durlabhān prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ // 3.064.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brūhi brūhīti rāmasya bruvāṇasya kṛtāñjaleḥ / tyaktvā śarīraṃ gṛdhrasya jagmuḥ prāṇā vihāyasaṃ // 3.064.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nikṣipya śiro bhūmau prasārya caraṇau tadā / vikṣipya ca śarīraṃ svaṃ papāta dharaṇītale // 3.064.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ gṛdhraṃ prekṣya tāmrākṣaṃ gatāsum acalopamam / rāmaḥ subahubhir duḥkhair dīnaḥ saumitrim abravīt // 3.064.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahūni rakṣasāṃ vāse varṣāṇi vasatā sukham / anena daṇḍakāraṇye vicīrṇam iha pakṣiṇā // 3.064.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anekavārṣiko yas tu cirakālaṃ samutthitaḥ / so 'yam adya hataḥ śete kālo hi duratikramaḥ // 3.064.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya lakṣmaṇa gṛdhro 'yam upakārī hataś ca me / sītām abhyavapan no vai rāvaṇena balīyasā // 3.064.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛdhrarājyaṃ parityajya pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat / mama hetor ayaṃ prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ // 3.064.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvatra khalu dṛśyante sādhavo dharmacāriṇaḥ / śūrāḥ śaraṇyāḥ saumitre tiryagyonigateṣv api // 3.064.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāharaṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na me saumya tathāgatam / yathā vināśo gṛdhrasya matkṛte ca paraṃtapa // 3.064.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān yathā mama mayā yaśāḥ / pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca tathāyaṃ patageśvaraḥ // 3.064.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitre hara kāṣṭhāni nirmathiṣyāmi pāvakam / gṛdhrarājaṃ didhakṣāmi matkṛte nidhanaṃ gatam // 3.064.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāthaṃ patagalokasya citām āropayāmy aham / imaṃ dhakṣyāmi saumitre hataṃ raudreṇa rakṣasā // 3.064.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā gatir yajñaśīlānām āhitāgneś ca yā gatiḥ / aparāvartināṃ yā ca yā ca bhūmipradāyinām // 3.064.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā tvaṃ samanujñāto gaccha lokān anuttamān / gṛdhrarāja mahāsattva saṃskṛtaś ca mayā vraja // 3.064.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā citāṃ dīptām āropya patageśvaram / dadāha rāmo dharmātmā svabandhum iva duḥkhitaḥ // 3.064.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo 'tha sahasaumitrir vanaṃ yātvā sa vīryavān / sthūlān hatvā mahārohīn anu tastāra taṃ dvijam // 3.064.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rohimāṃsāni coddhṛtya peśīkṛtvā mahāyaśāḥ / śakunāya dadau rāmo ramye haritaśādvale // 3.064.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tat pretasya martyasya kathayanti dvijātayaḥ / tat svargagamanaṃ tasya kṣipraṃ rāmo jajāpa ha // 3.064.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato godāvarīṃ gatvā nadīṃ naravarātmajau / udakaṃ cakratus tasmai gṛdhrarājāya tāv ubhau // 3.064.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gṛdhrarājaḥ kṛtavān yaśaskaraṃ; suduṣkaraṃ karma raṇe nipātitaḥ / maharṣikalpena ca saṃskṛtas tadā; jagāma puṇyāṃ gatim ātmanaḥ śubhām // 3.064.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
kṛtvaivam udakaṃ tasmai prasthitau rāghavau tadā / avekṣantau vane sītāṃ paścimāṃ jagmatur diśam // 3.065.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ diśaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ gatvā śaracāpāsidhāriṇau / aviprahatam aikṣvākau panthānaṃ pratipedatuḥ // 3.065.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gulmair vṛkṣaiś ca bahubhir latābhiś ca praveṣṭitam / āvṛtaṃ sarvato durgaṃ gahanaṃ ghoradarśanam // 3.065.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyatikramya tu vegena gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam / subhīmaṃ tan mahāraṇyaṃ vyatiyātau mahābalau // 3.065.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paraṃ janasthānāt trikrośaṃ gamya rāghavau / krauñcāraṇyaṃ viviśatur gahanaṃ tau mahaujasau // 3.065.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāmeghaghanaprakhyaṃ prahṛṣṭam iva sarvataḥ / nānāvarṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ puṣpair mṛgapakṣigaṇair yutam // 3.065.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
didṛkṣamāṇau vaidehīṃ tad vanaṃ tau vicikyatuḥ / tatra tatrāvatiṣṭhantau sītāharaṇakarśitau // 3.065.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇas tu mahātejāḥ sattvavāñ śīlavāñ śuciḥ / abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasaṃ // 3.065.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
spandate me dṛḍhaṃ bāhur udvignam iva me manaḥ / prāyaśaś cāpy aniṣṭāni nimittāny upalakṣaye // 3.065.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt sajjībhavārya tvaṃ kuruṣva vacanaṃ hitam / mamaiva hi nimittāni sadyaḥ śaṃsanti saṃbhramam // 3.065.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa vañculako nāma pakṣī paramadāruṇaḥ / āvayor vijayaṃ yuddhe śaṃsann iva vinardati // 3.065.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayor anveṣator evaṃ sarvaṃ tad vanam ojasā / saṃjajñe vipulaḥ śabdaḥ prabhañjann iva tad vanam // 3.065.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃveṣṭitam ivātyarthaṃ gahanaṃ mātariśvanā / vanasya tasya śabdo 'bhūd divam āpūrayann iva // 3.065.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ śabdaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇas tu rāmaḥ kakṣe sahānujaḥ / dadarśa sumahākāyaṃ rākṣasaṃ vipulorasaṃ // 3.065.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsedatus tatas tatra tāv ubhau pramukhe sthitam / vivṛddham aśirogrīvaṃ kabandham udare mukham // 3.065.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
romabhir nicitais tīkṣṇair mahāgirim ivocchritam / nīlameghanibhaṃ raudraṃ meghastanitaniḥsvanam // 3.065.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāpakṣmeṇa piṅgena vipulenāyatena ca / ekenorasi ghoreṇa nayanenāśudarśinā // 3.065.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahādaṃṣṭropapannaṃ taṃ lelihānaṃ mahāmukham / bhakṣayantaṃ mahāghorān ṛkṣasiṃhamṛgadvipān // 3.065.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghorau bhujau vikurvāṇam ubhau yojanam āyatau / karābhyāṃ vividhān gṛhya ṛṣkān pakṣigaṇān mṛgān // 3.065.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ākarṣantaṃ vikarṣantam anekān mṛgayūthapān / sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ tayor bhrātroḥ prapannayoḥ // 3.065.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tau samatikramya krośamātre dadarśatuḥ / mahāntaṃ dāruṇaṃ bhīmaṃ kabandhaṃ bhujasaṃvṛtam // 3.065.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mahābāhur atyarthaṃ prasārya vipulau bhujau / jagrāha sahitāv eva rāghavau pīḍayan balāt // 3.065.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
khaḍginau dṛḍhadhanvānau tigmatejau mahābhujau / bhrātarau vivaśaṃ prāptau kṛṣyamāṇau mahābalau // 3.065.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv uvāca mahābāhuḥ kabandho dānavottamaḥ / kau yuvāṃ vṛṣabhaskandhau mahākhaḍgadhanurdharau // 3.065.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghoraṃ deśam imaṃ prāptau mama bhakṣāv upasthitau / vadataṃ kāryam iha vāṃ kimarthaṃ cāgatau yuvām // 3.065.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imaṃ deśam anuprāptau kṣudhārtasyeha tiṣṭhataḥ / sabāṇacāpakhaḍgau ca tīkṣṇaśṛṅgāv ivarṣabhau // 3.065.026.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamāsyam anusaṃprāptau durlabhaṃ jīvitaṃ punaḥ // 3.065.026.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā kabandhasya durātmanaḥ / uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mukhena pariśuṣyatā // 3.065.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛcchrāt kṛcchrataraṃ prāpya dāruṇaṃ satyavikrama / vyasanaṃ jīvitāntāya prāptam aprāpya tāṃ priyām // 3.065.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālasya sumahad vīryaṃ sarvabhūteṣu lakṣmaṇa / tvāṃ ca māṃ ca naravyāghra vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitau // 3.065.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātibhāro 'sti daivasya sarvabhuteṣu lakṣmaṇa // 3.065.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire / kālābhipannāḥ sīdanti yathā vālukasetavaḥ // 3.065.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti bruvāṇo dṛḍhasatyavikramo; mahāyaśā dāśarathiḥ pratāpavān / avekṣya saumitrim udagravikramaṃ; sthirāṃ tadā svāṃ matim ātmanākarot // 3.065.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tau tu tatra sthitau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / bāhupāśaparikṣiptau kabandho vākyam abravīt // 3.066.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiṣṭhataḥ kiṃ nu māṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhārtaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhau / āhārārthaṃ tu saṃdiṣṭau daivena gatacetasau // 3.066.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ prāptakālaṃ hitaṃ tadā / uvācārtisamāpanno vikrame kṛtaniścayaḥ // 3.066.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvāṃ ca māṃ ca purā tūrṇam ādatte rākṣasādhamaḥ / tasmād asibhyām asyāśu bāhū chindāvahe gurū // 3.066.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tau deśakālajñau khaḍgābhyām eva rāghavau / acchindatāṃ susaṃhṛṣṭau bāhū tasyāṃsadeśayoḥ // 3.066.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum asaktam asinā tataḥ / ciccheda rāmo vegena savyaṃ vīras tu lakṣmaṇaḥ // 3.066.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa papāta mahābāhuś chinnabāhur mahāsvanaḥ / khaṃ ca gāṃ ca diśaś caiva nādayañ jalado yathā // 3.066.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nikṛttau bhujau dṛṣṭvā śoṇitaughapariplutaḥ / dīnaḥ papraccha tau vīrau kau yuvām iti dānavaḥ // 3.066.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti tasya bruvāṇasya lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ / śaśaṃsa tasya kākutsthaṃ kabandhasya mahābalaḥ // 3.066.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayam ikṣvākudāyādo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ / asyaivāvarajaṃ viddhi bhrātaraṃ māṃ ca lakṣmaṇam // 3.066.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asya devaprabhāvasya vasato vijane vane / rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā yām icchantāv ihāgatau // 3.066.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ tu ko vā kimarthaṃ vā kabandha sadṛśo vane / āsyenorasi dīptena bhagnajaṅgho viceṣṭase // 3.066.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ kabandhas tu lakṣmaṇenottaraṃ vacaḥ / uvāca paramaprītas tad indravacanaṃ smaran // 3.066.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svāgataṃ vāṃ naravyāghrau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cāpy aham / diṣṭyā cemau nikṛttau me yuvābhyāṃ bāhubandhanau // 3.066.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
virūpaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prāptaṃ hy avinayād yathā / tan me śṛṇu naravyāghra tattvataḥ śaṃsatas tava // 3.066.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā rāma mahābāho mahābalaparākrama / rūpam āsīn mamācintyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam // 3.067.001.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā somasya śakrasya sūryasya ca yathā vapuḥ // 3.067.001.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ rūpam idaṃ kṛtvā lokavitrāsanaṃ mahat / ṛṣīn vanagatān rāma trāsayāmi tatas tataḥ // 3.067.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sthūlaśirā nāma maharṣiḥ kopito mayā / saṃcinvan vividhaṃ vanyaṃ rūpeṇānena dharṣitaḥ // 3.067.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenāham uktaḥ prekṣyaivaṃ ghoraśāpābhidhāyinā / etad eva nṛśaṃsaṃ te rūpam astu vigarhitam // 3.067.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mayā yācitaḥ kruddhaḥ śāpasyānto bhaved iti / abhiśāpakṛtasyeti tenedaṃ bhāṣitaṃ vacaḥ // 3.067.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā chittvā bhujau rāmas tvāṃ dahed vijane vane / tadā tvaṃ prāpsyase rūpaṃ svam eva vipulaṃ śubham // 3.067.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śriyā virājitaṃ putraṃ danos tvaṃ viddhi lakṣmaṇa / indrakopād idaṃ rūpaṃ prāptam evaṃ raṇājire // 3.067.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ hi tapasogreṇa pitāmaham atoṣayam / dīrgham āyuḥ sa me prādāt tato māṃ vibhramo 'spṛśat // 3.067.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīrgham āyur mayā prāptaṃ kiṃ me śakraḥ kariṣyati / ity evaṃ buddhim āsthāya raṇe śakram adharṣayam // 3.067.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya bāhupramuktena vajreṇa śataparvaṇā / sakthinī ca śiraś caiva śarīre saṃpraveśitam // 3.067.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mayā yācyamānaḥ sann ānayad yamasādanam / pitāmahavacaḥ satyaṃ tad astv iti mamābravīt // 3.067.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anāhāraḥ kathaṃ śakto bhagnasakthiśiromukhaḥ / vajreṇābhihataḥ kālaṃ sudīrgham api jīvitum // 3.067.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu me śakro bāhū yojanam āyatau / prādād āsyaṃ ca me kukṣau tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭram akalpayat // 3.067.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ bhujābhyāṃ dīrghābhyāṃ samākṛṣya vanecarān / siṃhadvipamṛgavyāghrān bhakṣayāmi samantataḥ // 3.067.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu mām abravīd indro yadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ / chetsyate samare bāhū tadā svargaṃ gamiṣyasi // 3.067.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ rāmo 'si bhadraṃ te nāham anyena rāghava / śakyo hantuṃ yathātattvam evam uktaṃ maharṣiṇā // 3.067.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ hi matisācivyaṃ kariṣyāmi nararṣabha / mitraṃ caivopadekṣyāmi yuvābhyāṃ saṃskṛto 'gninā // 3.067.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu dharmātmā danunā tena rāghavaḥ / idaṃ jagāda vacanaṃ lakṣmaṇasyopaśṛṇvataḥ // 3.067.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā mama bhāryā yaśasvinī / niṣkrāntasya janasthānāt saha bhrātrā yathāsukham // 3.067.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāmamātraṃ tu jānāmi na rūpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ / nivāsaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vā vayaṃ tasya na vidmahe // 3.067.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śokārtānām anāthānām evaṃ viparidhāvatām / kāruṇyaṃ sadṛśaṃ kartum upakāre ca vartatām // 3.067.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāṣṭhāny ānīya śuṣkāṇi kāle bhagnāni kuñjaraiḥ / bhakṣyāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ vīra śvabhre mahati kalpite // 3.067.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ sītāṃ samācakṣva yena vā yatra vā hṛtā / kuru kalyāṇam atyarthaṃ yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ // 3.067.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vākyaṃ danur anuttamam / provāca kuśalo vaktuṃ vaktāram api rāghavam // 3.067.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyam asti na me jñānaṃ nābhijānāmi maithilīm / yas tāṃ jñāsyati taṃ vakṣye dagdhaḥ svaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ // 3.067.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adagdhasya hi vijñātuṃ śaktir asti na me prabho / rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahāvīryaṃ sītā yena hṛtā tava // 3.067.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vijñānaṃ hi mahad bhraṣṭaṃ śāpadoṣeṇa rāghava / svakṛtena mayā prāptaṃ rūpaṃ lokavigarhitam // 3.067.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tu yāvan na yāty astaṃ savitā śrāntavāhanaḥ / tāvan mām avaṭe kṣiptvā daha rāma yathāvidhi // 3.067.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dagdhas tvayāham avaṭe nyāyena raghunandana / vakṣyāmi tam ahaṃ vīra yas taṃ jñāsyati rākṣasaṃ // 3.067.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena sakhyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nyāyyavṛttena rāghava / kalpayiṣyati te prītaḥ sāhāyyaṃ laghuvikramaḥ // 3.067.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi tasyāsty avijñātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu rāghava / sarvān parisṛto lokān purā vai kāraṇāntare // 3.067.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktau tu tau vīrau kabandhena nareśvarau / giripradaram āsādya pāvakaṃ visasarjatuḥ // 3.068.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇas tu maholkābhir jvalitābhiḥ samantataḥ / citām ādīpayām āsa sā prajajvāla sarvataḥ // 3.068.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac charīraṃ kabandhasya ghṛtapiṇḍopamaṃ mahat / medasā pacyamānasya mandaṃ dahati pāvaka // 3.068.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vidhūya citām āśu vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ / araje vāsasī vibhran mālāṃ divyāṃ mahābalaḥ // 3.068.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataś citāyā vegena bhāsvaro virajāmbaraḥ / utpapātāśu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sarvapratyaṅgabhūṣaṇaḥ // 3.068.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimāne bhāsvare tiṣṭhan haṃsayukte yaśaskare / prabhayā ca mahātejā diśo daśa virājayan // 3.068.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'ntarikṣagato rāmaṃ kabandho vākyam abravīt / śṛṇu rāghava tattvena yathā sīmām avāpsyasi // 3.068.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāma ṣaḍ yuktayo loke yābhiḥ sarvaṃ vimṛśyate / parimṛṣṭo daśāntena daśābhāgena sevyate // 3.068.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśābhāgagato hīnas tvaṃ rāma sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / yat kṛte vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ tvayā dārapradharṣaṇam // 3.068.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad avaśyaṃ tvayā kāryaḥ sa suhṛt suhṛdāṃ vara / akṛtvā na hi te siddhim ahaṃ paśyāmi cintayan // 3.068.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ / bhrātrā nirastaḥ kruddhena vālinā śakrasūnunā // 3.068.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣyamūke girivare pampāparyantaśobhite / nivasaty ātmavān vīraś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // 3.068.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vayasyaṃ taṃ kuru kṣipram ito gatvādya rāghava / adrohāya samāgamya dīpyamāne vibhāvasau // 3.068.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca te so 'vamantavyaḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ / kṛtajñaḥ kāmarūpī ca sahāyārthī ca vīryavān // 3.068.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaktau hy adya yuvāṃ kartuṃ kāryaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam / kṛtārtho vākṛtārtho vā kṛtyaṃ tava kariṣyati // 3.068.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ṛkṣarajasaḥ putraḥ pampām aṭati śaṅkitaḥ / bhāskarasyaurasaḥ putro vālinā kṛtakilbiṣaḥ // 3.068.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃnidhāyāyudhaṃ kṣipram ṛṣyamūkālayaṃ kapim / kuru rāghava satyena vayasyaṃ vanacāriṇam // 3.068.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi sthānāni sarvāṇi kārtsnyena kapikuñjaraḥ / naramāṃsāśināṃ loke naipuṇyād adhigacchati // 3.068.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tasyāviditaṃ loke kiṃ cid asti hi rāghava / yāvat sūryaḥ pratapati sahasrāṃśur ariṃdama // 3.068.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nadīr vipulāñ śailān giridurgāṇi kandarān / anviṣya vānaraiḥ sārdhaṃ patnīṃ te 'dhigamiṣyati // 3.068.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṃś ca mahākāyān preṣayiṣyati rāghava / diśo vicetuṃ tāṃ sītāṃ tvadviyogena śocatīm // 3.068.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa meruśṛṅgāgragatām aninditāṃ; praviśya pātālatale 'pi vāśritām / plavaṃgamānāṃ pravaras tava priyāṃ; nihatya rakṣāṃsi punaḥ pradāsyati // 3.068.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
nidarśayitvā rāmāya sītāyāḥ pratipādane / vākyam anvartham arthajñaḥ kabandhaḥ punar abravīt // 3.069.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa rāma śivaḥ panthā yatraite puṣpitā drumāḥ / pratīcīṃ diśam āśritya prakāśante manoramāḥ // 3.069.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jambūpriyālapanasāḥ plakṣanyagrodhatindukāḥ / aśvatthāḥ karṇikārāś ca cūtāś cānye ca pādapāḥ // 3.069.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān āruhyāthavā bhūmau pātayitvā ca tān balāt / phalāny amṛtakalpāni bhakṣayantau gamiṣyathaḥ // 3.069.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caṅkramantau varān deśāñ śailāc chailaṃ vanād vanam / tataḥ puṣkariṇīṃ vīrau pampāṃ nāma gamiṣyathaḥ // 3.069.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśarkarām avibhraṃśāṃ samatīrtham aśaivalām / rāma saṃjātavālūkāṃ kamalotpalaśobhitām // 3.069.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra haṃsāḥ plavāḥ krauñcāḥ kurarāś caiva rāghava / valgusvarā nikūjanti pampāsalilagocarāḥ // 3.069.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nodvijante narān dṛṣṭvā vadhasyākovidāḥ śubhāḥ / ghṛtapiṇḍopamān sthūlāṃs tān dvijān bhakṣayiṣyathaḥ // 3.069.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rohitān vakratuṇḍāṃś ca nalamīnāṃś ca rāghava / pampāyām iṣubhir matsyāṃs tatra rāma varān hatān // 3.069.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nistvakpakṣān ayastaptān akṛśān ekakaṇṭakān / tava bhaktyā samāyukto lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃpradāsyati // 3.069.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhṛśaṃ te khādato matsyān pampāyāḥ puṣpasaṃcaye / padmagandhi śivaṃ vāri sukhaśītam anāmayam // 3.069.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uddhṛtya sa tadākliṣṭaṃ rūpyasphaṭikasaṃnibham / atha puṣkaraparṇena lakṣmaṇaḥ pāyayiṣyati // 3.069.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthūlān giriguhāśayyān varāhān vanacāriṇaḥ / apāṃ lobhād upāvṛttān vṛṣabhān iva nardataḥ // 3.069.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rūpānvitāṃś ca pampāyāṃ drakṣyasi tvaṃ narottama // 3.069.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāyāhne vicaran rāma viṭapī mālyadhāriṇaḥ / śītodakaṃ ca pampāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyasi // 3.069.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumanobhiś citāṃs tatra tilakān naktamālakān / utpalāni ca phullāni paṅkajāni ca rāghava // 3.069.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tāni kaś cin mālyāni tatrāropayitā naraḥ / mataṅgaśiṣyās tatrāsann ṛṣayaḥ susamāhitaḥ // 3.069.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ bhārābhitaptānāṃ vanyam āharatāṃ guroḥ / ye prapetur mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ śarīrāt svedabindavaḥ // 3.069.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni mālyāni jātāni munīnāṃ tapasā tadā / svedabindusamutthāni na vinaśyanti rāghava // 3.069.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām adyāpi tatraiva dṛśyate paricāriṇī / śramaṇī śabarī nāma kākutstha cirajīvinī // 3.069.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvāṃ tu dharme sthitā nityaṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtam / dṛṣṭvā devopamaṃ rāma svargalokaṃ gamiṣyati // 3.069.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tad rāma pampāyās tīram āśritya paścimam / āśramasthānam atulaṃ guhyaṃ kākutstha paśyasi // 3.069.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tatrākramituṃ nāgāḥ śaknuvanti tam āśramam / ṛṣes tasya mataṅgasya vidhānāt tac ca kānanam // 3.069.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin nandanasaṃkāśe devāraṇyopame vane / nānāvihagasaṃkīrṇe raṃsyase rāma nirvṛtaḥ // 3.069.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣyamūkas tu pampāyāḥ purastāt puṣpitadrumaḥ / suduḥkhārohaṇo nāma śiśunāgābhirakṣitaḥ // 3.069.024.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udāro brahmaṇā caiva pūrvakāle vinirmitaḥ // 3.069.024.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śayānaḥ puruṣo rāma tasya śailasya mūrdhani / yat svapne labhate vittaṃ tat prabuddho 'dhigacchati // 3.069.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tv enaṃ viṣamācāraḥ pāpakarmādhirohati / tatraiva praharanty enaṃ suptam ādāya rākṣasāḥ // 3.069.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'pi śiśunāgānām ākrandaḥ śrūyate mahān / krīḍatāṃ rāma pampāyāṃ mataṅgāraṇyavāsinām // 3.069.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siktā rudhiradhārābhiḥ saṃhatya paramadvipāḥ / pracaranti pṛthak kīrṇā meghavarṇās tarasvinaḥ // 3.069.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tatra pītvā pānīyaṃ vimalaṃ śītam avyayam / nivṛttāḥ saṃvigāhante vanāni vanagocarāḥ // 3.069.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāma tasya tu śailasya mahatī śobhate guhā / śilāpidhānā kākutstha duḥkhaṃ cāsyāḥ praveśanam // 3.069.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyā guhāyāḥ prāgdvāre mahāñ śītodako hradaḥ / bahumūlaphalo ramyo nānānagasamāvṛtaḥ // 3.069.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṃ vasati sugrīvaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ / kadā cic chikhare tasya parvatasyāvatiṣṭhate // 3.069.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kabandhas tv anuśāsyaivaṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau / sragvī bhāskaravarṇābhaḥ khe vyarocata vīryavān // 3.069.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu khasthaṃ mahābhāgaṃ kabandhaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau / prasthitau tvaṃ vrajasveti vākyam ūcatur antikāt // 3.069.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamyatāṃ kāryasiddhyartham iti tāv abravīc ca saḥ / suprītau tāv anujñāpya kabandhaḥ prasthitas tadā // 3.069.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tat kabandhaḥ pratipadya rūpaṃ; vṛtaḥ śriyā bhāskaratulyadehaḥ / nidarśayan rāmam avekṣya khasthaḥ; sakhyaṃ kuruṣveti tadābhyuvāca // 3.069.036	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tau kabandhena taṃ mārgaṃ pampāyā darśitaṃ vane / ātasthatur diśaṃ gṛhya pratīcīṃ nṛvarātmajau // 3.070.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau śaileṣv ācitānekān kṣaudrakalpaphaladrumān / vīkṣantau jagmatur draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau // 3.070.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtvā ca śailapṛṣṭhe tu tau vāsaṃ raghunandanau / pampāyāḥ paścimaṃ tīraṃ rāghavāv upatasthatuḥ // 3.070.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau puṣkariṇyāḥ pampāyās tīram āsādya paścimam / apaśyatāṃ tatas tatra śabaryā ramyam āśramam // 3.070.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tam āśramam āsādya drumair bahubhir āvṛtam / suramyam abhivīkṣantau śabarīm abhyupeyatuḥ // 3.070.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tu dṛṣṭvā tadā siddhā samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ / pādau jagrāha rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ // 3.070.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām uvāca tato rāmaḥ śramaṇīṃ saṃśitavratām / kaccit te nirjitā vighnāḥ kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ // 3.070.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit te niyataḥ kopa āhāraś ca tapodhane / kaccit te niyamāḥ prāptāḥ kaccit te manasaḥ sukham // 3.070.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit te guruśuśrūṣā saphalā cārubhāṣiṇi // 3.070.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmeṇa tāpasī pṛṣṭhā sā siddhā siddhasaṃmatā / śaśaṃsa śabarī vṛddhā rāmāya pratyupasthitā // 3.070.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
citrakūṭaṃ tvayi prāpte vimānair atulaprabhaiḥ / itas te divam ārūḍhā yān ahaṃ paryacāriṣam // 3.070.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taiś cāham uktā dharmajñair mahābhāgair maharṣibhiḥ / āgamiṣyati te rāmaḥ supuṇyam imam āśramam // 3.070.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa te pratigrahītavyaḥ saumitrisahito 'tithiḥ / taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā varāṃl lokān akṣayāṃs tvaṃ gamiṣyasi // 3.070.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā tu vividhaṃ vanyaṃ saṃcitaṃ puruṣarṣabha / tavārthe puruṣavyāghra pampāyās tīrasaṃbhavam // 3.070.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā śabaryā śabarīm idam / rāghavaḥ prāha vijñāne tāṃ nityam abahiṣkṛtām // 3.070.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
danoḥ sakāśāt tattvena prabhāvaṃ te mahātmanaḥ / śrutaṃ pratyakṣam icchāmi saṃdraṣṭuṃ yadi manyase // 3.070.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmavaktrād viniḥsṛtam / śabarī darśayām āsa tāv ubhau tad vanaṃ mahat // 3.070.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya meghaghanaprakhyaṃ mṛgapakṣisamākulam / mataṅgavanam ity eva viśrutaṃ raghunandana // 3.070.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iha te bhāvitātmāno guravo me mahādyute / juhavāṃś cakrire tīrthaṃ mantravan mantrapūjitam // 3.070.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ pratyak sthalī vedī yatra te me susatkṛtāḥ / puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti śramād udvepibhiḥ karaiḥ // 3.070.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tapaḥ prabhāvena paśyādyāpi raghūttama / dyotayanti diśaḥ sarvāḥ śriyā vedyo 'tulaprabhāḥ // 3.070.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśaknuvadbhis tair gantum upavāsaśramālasaiḥ / cintite 'bhyāgatān paśya sametān sapta sāgarān // 3.070.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtābhiṣekais tair nyastā valkalāḥ pādapeṣv iha / adyāpi na viśuṣyanti pradeśe raghunandana // 3.070.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtsnaṃ vanam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā / tad icchāmy abhyanujñātā tyaktum etat kalevaram // 3.070.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām icchāmy ahaṃ gantuṃ samīpaṃ bhāvitātmanām / munīnām āśraṃmo yeṣām ahaṃ ca paricāriṇī // 3.070.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmiṣṭhaṃ tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / anujānāmi gaccheti prahṛṣṭavadano 'bravīt // 3.070.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujñātā tu rāmeṇa hutvātmānaṃ hutāśane / jvalatpāvakasaṃkāśā svargam eva jagāma sā // 3.070.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatra te sukṛtātmāno viharanti maharṣayaḥ / tat puṇyaṃ śabarīsthānaṃ jagāmātmasamādhinā // 3.070.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divaṃ tu tasyāṃ yātāyāṃ śabaryāṃ svena karmaṇā / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ // 3.071.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cintayitvā tu dharmātmā prabhāvaṃ taṃ mahātmanām / hitakāriṇam ekāgraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavo 'bravīt // 3.071.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭo 'yam āśramaḥ saumya bahvāścaryaḥ kṛtātmanām / viśvastamṛgaśārdūlo nānāvihagasevitaḥ // 3.071.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saptānāṃ ca samudrāṇām eṣu tīrtheṣu lakṣmaṇa / upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca vidhivat pitaraś cāpi tarpitāḥ // 3.071.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pranaṣṭam aśubhaṃ yat tat kalyāṇaṃ samupasthitam / tena tv etat prahṛṣṭaṃ me mano lakṣmaṇa saṃprati // 3.071.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛdaye hi naravyāghra śubham āvirbhaviṣyati / tad āgaccha gamiṣyāvaḥ pampāṃ tāṃ priyadarśanām // 3.071.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛśyamūko girir yatra nātidūre prakāśate / yasmin vasati dharmātmā sugrīvo 'ṃśumataḥ sutaḥ // 3.071.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityaṃ vālibhayāt trastaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // 3.071.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhitvare ca taṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham / tadadhīnaṃ hi me saumya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam // 3.071.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ saumitrir idam abravīt / gacchāvas tvaritaṃ tatra mamāpi tvarate manaḥ // 3.071.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśramāt tu tatas tasmān niṣkramya sa viśāṃ patiḥ / ājagāma tataḥ pampāṃ lakṣmaṇena sahābhibhūḥ // 3.071.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samīkṣamāṇaḥ puṣpāḍhyaṃ sarvato vipuladrumam / koyaṣṭibhiś cārjunakaiḥ śatapatraiś ca kīcakaiḥ // 3.071.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etaiś cānyaiś ca vividhair nāditaṃ tad vanaṃ mahat // 3.071.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmo vidhivān vṛkṣān sarāṃsi vividhāni ca / paśyan kāmābhisaṃtapto jagāma paramaṃ hradam // 3.071.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tām āsādya vai rāmo dūrād udakavāhinīm / mataṅgasarasaṃ nāma hradaṃ samavagāhata // 3.071.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu śokasamāviṣṭo rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / viveśa nalinīṃ pampāṃ paṅkajaiś ca samāvṛtām // 3.071.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tilakāśokapuṃnāgabakuloddāla kāśinīm / ramyopavanasaṃbādhāṃ padmasaṃpīḍitodakām // 3.071.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sphaṭikopamatoyāḍhyāṃ ślakṣṇavālukasaṃtatām / matsyakacchapasaṃbādhāṃ tīrasthadrumaśobhitām // 3.071.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakhībhir iva yuktābhir latābhir anuveṣṭitām / kiṃnaroragagandharvayakṣarākṣasasevitām // 3.071.017.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānādrumalatākīrṇāṃ śītavārinidhiṃ śubhām // 3.071.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmaiḥ saugandhikais tāmrāṃ śuklāṃ kumudamaṇḍalaiḥ / nīlāṃ kuvalayoddhātair bahuvarṇāṃ kuthām iva // 3.071.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aravindotpalavatīṃ padmasaugandhikāyutām / puṣpitāmravaṇopetāṃ barhiṇodghuṣṭanāditām // 3.071.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ pampāṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha / vilalāpa ca tejasvī kāmād daśarathātmajaḥ // 3.071.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tilakair bījapūraiś ca vaṭaiḥ śukladrumais tathā / puṣpitaiḥ karavīraiś ca puṃnāgaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ // 3.071.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mālatīkundagulmaiś ca bhaṇḍīrair niculais tathā / aśokaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca ketakair atimuktakaiḥ // 3.071.022.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ pramadevopaśobhitām // 3.071.022.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asyās tīre tu pūrvoktaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ / ṛśyamūka iti khyātaś citrapuṣpitakānanaḥ // 3.071.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harir ṛkṣarajo nāmnaḥ putras tasya mahātmanaḥ / adhyāste taṃ mahāvīryaḥ sugrīva iti viśrutaḥ // 3.071.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvam abhigaccha tvaṃ vānarendraṃ nararṣabha / ity uvāca punar vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavikramam // 3.071.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mahad vartma ca dūrasaṃkramaṃ; krameṇa gatvā pravilokayan vanam / dadarśa pampāṃ śubhadarśa kānanām; anekanānāvidhapakṣisaṃkulām // 3.071.026	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ gatvā padmotpalajhaṣākulām / rāmaḥ saumitrisahito vilalāpākulendriyaḥ // 4.001.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya dṛṣṭvaiva tāṃ harṣād indriyāṇi cakampire / sa kāmavaśam āpannaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt // 4.001.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitre paśya pampāyāḥ kānanaṃ śubhadarśanam / yatra rājanti śailābhā drumāḥ saśikharā iva // 4.001.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃ tu śokābhisaṃtaptam ādhayaḥ pīḍayanti vai / bharatasya ca duḥkhena vaidehyā haraṇena ca // 4.001.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhikaṃ pravibhāty etan nīlapītaṃ tu śādvalam / drumāṇāṃ vividhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ paristomair ivārpitam // 4.001.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukhānilo 'yaṃ saumitre kālaḥ pracuramanmathaḥ / gandhavān surabhir māso jātapuṣpaphaladrumaḥ // 4.001.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya rūpāṇi saumitre vanānāṃ puṣpaśālinām / sṛjatāṃ puṣpavarṣāṇi varṣaṃ toyamucām iva // 4.001.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prastareṣu ca ramyeṣu vividhāḥ kānanadrumāḥ / vāyuvegapracalitāḥ puṣpair avakiranti gām // 4.001.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārutaḥ sukhaṃ saṃsparśe vāti candanaśītalaḥ / ṣaṭpadair anukūjadbhir vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu // 4.001.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
giriprastheṣu ramyeṣu puṣpavadbhir manoramaiḥ / saṃsaktaśikharā śailā virājanti mahādrumaiḥ // 4.001.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpitāgrāṃś ca paśyemān karṇikārān samantataḥ / hāṭakapratisaṃchannān narān pītāmbarān iva // 4.001.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ vasantaḥ saumitre nānāvihaganāditaḥ / sītayā viprahīṇasya śokasaṃdīpano mama // 4.001.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃ hi śokasamākrāntaṃ saṃtāpayati manmathaḥ / hṛṣṭaḥ pravadamānaś ca samāhvayati kokilaḥ // 4.001.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa dātyūhako hṛṣṭo ramye māṃ vananirjhare / praṇadan manmathāviṣṭaṃ śocayiṣyati lakṣmaṇa // 4.001.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimiśrā vihagāḥ pumbhir ātmavyūhābhinanditāḥ / bhṛṅgarājapramuditāḥ saumitre madhurasvarāḥ // 4.001.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃ hi sā mṛgaśāvākṣī cintāśokabalātkṛtam / saṃtāpayati saumitre krūraś caitravanānilaḥ // 4.001.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śikhinībhiḥ parivṛtā mayūrā girisānuṣu / manmathābhiparītasya mama manmathavardhanāḥ // 4.001.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya lakṣṇama nṛtyantaṃ mayūram upanṛtyati / śikhinī manmathārtaiṣā bhartāraṃ girisānuṣu // 4.001.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayūrasya vane nūnaṃ rakṣasā na hṛtā priyā / mama tv ayaṃ vinā vāsaḥ puṣpamāse suduḥsahaḥ // 4.001.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya lakṣmaṇa puṣpāṇi niṣphalāni bhavanti me / puṣpabhārasamṛddhānāṃ vanānāṃ śiśirātyaye // 4.001.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadanti rāvaṃ muditāḥ śakunāḥ saṃghaśaḥ kalam / āhvayanta ivānyonyaṃ kāmonmādakarā mama // 4.001.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nūnaṃ paravaśā sītā sāpi śocaty ahaṃ yathā / śyāmā padmapalāśākṣī mṛdubhāṣā ca me priyā // 4.001.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa puṣpavaho vāyuḥ sukhasparśo himāvahaḥ / tāṃ vicintayataḥ kāntāṃ pāvakapratimo mama // 4.001.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ vinātha vihaṃgo 'sau pakṣī praṇaditas tadā / vāyasaḥ pādapagataḥ prahṛṣṭam abhinardati // 4.001.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa vai tatra vaidehyā vihagaḥ pratihārakaḥ / pakṣī māṃ tu viśālākṣyāḥ samīpam upaneṣyati // 4.001.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya lakṣmaṇa saṃnādaṃ vane madavivardhanam / puṣpitāgreṣu vṛkṣeṣu dvijānām upakūjatām // 4.001.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitre paśya pampāyāś citrāsu vanarājiṣu / nalināni prakāśante jale taruṇasūryavat // 4.001.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā prasannasalilā padmanīlotpalāyatā / haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇā pampā saugandhikāyutā // 4.001.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cakravākayutā nityaṃ citraprasthavanāntarā / mātaṅgamṛgayūthaiś ca śobhate salilārthibhiḥ // 4.001.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmakośapalāśāni draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭir hi manyate / sītāyā netrakośābhyāṃ sadṛśānīti lakṣmaṇa // 4.001.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmakesarasaṃsṛṣṭo vṛkṣāntaraviniḥsṛtaḥ / niḥśvāsa iva sītāyā vāti vāyur manoharaḥ // 4.001.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitre paśya pampāyā dakṣiṇe girisānuni / puṣpitāṃ karṇikārasya yaṣṭiṃ paramaśobhanām // 4.001.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhikaṃ śailarājo 'yaṃ dhātubhis tu vibhūṣitaḥ / vicitraṃ sṛjate reṇuṃ vāyuvegavighaṭṭitam // 4.001.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
giriprasthās tu saumitre sarvataḥ saṃprapuṣpitaiḥ / niṣpatraiḥ sarvato ramyaiḥ pradīpā iva kuṃśukaiḥ // 4.001.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pampātīraruhāś ceme saṃsaktā madhugandhinaḥ / mālatīmallikāṣaṇḍāḥ karavīrāś ca puṣpitāḥ // 4.001.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ketakyaḥ sinduvārāś ca vāsantyaś ca supuṣpitāḥ / mādhavyo gandhapūrṇāś ca kundagulmāś ca sarvaśaḥ // 4.001.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ciribilvā madhūkāś ca vañjulā bakulās tathā / campakās tilakāś caiva nāgavṛkṣāś ca puṣpitāḥ // 4.001.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīpāś ca varaṇāś caiva kharjūrāś ca supuṣpitāḥ / aṅkolāś ca kuraṇṭāś ca cūrṇakāḥ pāribhadrakāḥ // 4.001.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cūtāḥ pāṭalayaś caiva kovidārāś ca puṣpitāḥ / mucukundārjunāś caiva dṛśyante girisānuṣu // 4.001.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ketakoddālakāś caiva śirīṣāḥ śiṃśapā dhavāḥ / śālmalyaḥ kiṃśukāś caiva raktāḥ kurabakās tathā // 4.001.040.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiniśā nakta mālāś ca candanāḥ syandanās tathā // 4.001.040.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vividhā vividhaiḥ puṣpais tair eva nagasānuṣu / vikīrṇaiḥ pītaraktābhāḥ saumitre prastarāḥ kṛtāḥ // 4.001.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
himānte paśya saumitre vṛkṣāṇāṃ puṣpasaṃbhavam / puṣpamāse hi taravaḥ saṃgharṣād iva puṣpitāḥ // 4.001.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya śītajalāṃ cemāṃ saumitre puṣkarāyutām / cakravākānucaritāṃ kāraṇḍavaniṣevitām // 4.001.043.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plavaiḥ krauñcaiś ca saṃpūrṇāṃ varāhamṛgasevitām // 4.001.043.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhikaṃ śobhate pampāvikūjadbhir vihaṃgamaiḥ // 4.001.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīpayantīva me kāmaṃ vividhā muditā dvijāḥ / śyāmāṃ candramukhīṃ smṛtvā priyāṃ padmanibhekṣaṇām // 4.001.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paya sānuṣu citreṣu mṛgībhiḥ sahitān mṛgān / māṃ punar mṛgaśāvākṣyā vaidehyā virahīkṛtam // 4.001.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa vilapaṃs tatra śokopahatacetanaḥ / avekṣata śivāṃ pampāṃ ramyavārivahāṃ śubhām // 4.001.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sahasā mahātmā; sarvaṃ vanaṃ nirjharakandaraṃ ca / udvignacetāḥ saha lakṣmaṇena; vicārya duḥkhopahataḥ pratasthe // 4.001.048	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tāv ṛṣyamūkaṃ sahitau prayātau; sugrīvaśākhāmṛgasevitaṃ tam / trastās tu dṛṣṭvā harayo babhūvur; mahaujasau rāghavalakṣmaṇau tau // 4.001.049	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tau tu dṛṣṭvā mahātmānau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / varāyudhadharau vīrau sugrīvaḥ śaṅkito 'bhavat // 4.002.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udvignahṛdayaḥ sarvā diśaḥ samavalokayan / na vyatiṣṭhata kasmiṃś cid deśe vānarapuṃgavaḥ // 4.002.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva cakre manaḥ sthāne vīkṣamāṇo mahābalau / kapeḥ paramabhītasya cittaṃ vyavasasāda ha // 4.002.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cintayitvā sa dharmātmā vimṛśya gurulāghavam / sugrīvaḥ paramodvignaḥ sarvair anucaraiḥ saha // 4.002.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa sacivebhyas tu sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ / śaśaṃsa paramodvignaḥ paśyaṃs tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 4.002.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etau vanam idaṃ durgaṃ vālipraṇihitau dhruvam / chadmanā cīravasanau pracarantāv ihāgatau // 4.002.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sugrīvasacivā dṛṣṭvā paramadhanvinau / jagmur giritaṭāt tasmād anyac chikharam uttamam // 4.002.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te kṣipram abhigamyātha yūthapā yūthaparṣabham / harayo vānaraśreṣṭhaṃ parivāryopatasthire // 4.002.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekam ekāyanagatāḥ plavamānā girer girim / prakampayanto vegena girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi ca // 4.002.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śākhāmṛgāḥ sarve plavamānā mahābalāḥ / babhañjuś ca nagāṃs tatra puṣpitān durgasaṃśritān // 4.002.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āplavanto harivarāḥ sarvatas taṃ mahāgirim / mṛgamārjāraśārdūlāṃs trāsayanto yayus tadā // 4.002.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sugrīvasacivāḥ parvatendraṃ samāśritāḥ / saṃgamya kapimukhyena sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ // 4.002.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ bhayasaṃtrastaṃ vālikilbiṣaśaṅkitam / uvāca hanumān vākyaṃ sugrīvaṃ vākyakovidaḥ // 4.002.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmād udvignacetās tvaṃ pradruto haripuṃgava / taṃ krūradarśanaṃ krūraṃ neha paśyāmi vālinam // 4.002.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmāt tava bhayaṃ saumya pūrvajāt pāpakarmaṇaḥ / sa neha vālī duṣṭātmā na te paśyāmy ahaṃ bhayam // 4.002.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho śākhāmṛgatvaṃ te vyaktam eva plavaṃgama / laghucittatayātmānaṃ na sthāpayasi yo matau // 4.002.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhivijñānasaṃpanna iṅgitaiḥ sarvam ācara / na hy abuddhiṃ gato rājā sarvabhūtāni śāsti hi // 4.002.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvas tu śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā sarvaṃ hanūmataḥ / tataḥ śubhataraṃ vākyaṃ hanūmantam uvāca ha // 4.002.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīrghabāhū viśālākṣau śaracāpāsidhāriṇau / kasya na syād bhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā etau surasutopamau // 4.002.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vālipraṇihitāv etau śaṅke 'haṃ puruṣottamau / rājāno bahumitrāś ca viśvāso nātra hi kṣamaḥ // 4.002.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arayaś ca manuṣyeṇa vijñeyāś channacāriṇaḥ / viśvastānām aviśvastāś chidreṣu praharanti hi // 4.002.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtyeṣu vālī medhāvī rājāno bahudarśanāḥ / bhavanti parahantāras te jñeyāḥ prākṛtair naraiḥ // 4.002.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tvayā prākṛtenaiva gatvā jñeyau plavaṃgama / śaṅkitānāṃ prakāraiś ca rūpavyābhāṣaṇena ca // 4.002.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣayasva tayor bhāvaṃ prahṛṣṭamanasau yadi / viśvāsayan praśaṃsābhir iṅgitaiś ca punaḥ punaḥ // 4.002.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamaivābhimukhaṃ sthitvā pṛccha tvaṃ haripuṃgava / prayojanaṃ praveśasya vanasyāsya dhanurdharau // 4.002.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuddhātmānau yadi tv etau jānīhi tvaṃ plavaṃgama / vyābhāṣitair vā rūpair vā vijñeyā duṣṭatānayoḥ // 4.002.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ kapirājena saṃdiṣṭo mārutātmajaḥ / cakāra gamane buddhiṃ yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 4.002.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti saṃpūjya vacas tu tasya; kapeḥ subhītasya durāsadasya / mahānubhāvo hanumān yayau tadā; sa yatra rāmo 'tibalaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ // 4.002.028	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [jtjr])
vaco vijñāya hanumān sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ / parvatād ṛśyamūkāt tu pupluve yatra rāghavau // 4.003.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tatra gatvā hanumān balavān vānarottamaḥ / upacakrāma tau vāgbhir mṛdvībhiḥ satyavikramaḥ // 4.003.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svakaṃ rūpaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpeṇa vānaraḥ / ābabhāṣe ca tau vīrau yathāvat praśaśaṃsa ca // 4.003.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājarṣidevapratimau tāpasau saṃśitavratau / deśaṃ katham imaṃ prāptau bhavantau varavarṇinau // 4.003.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trāsayantau mṛgagaṇān anyāṃś ca vanacāriṇaḥ / pampātīraruhān vṛkṣān vīkṣamāṇau samantataḥ // 4.003.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ nadīṃ śubhajalāṃ śobhayantau tarasvinau / dhairyavantau suvarṇābhau kau yuvāṃ cīravāsasau // 4.003.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhaviprekṣitau vīrau siṃhātibalavikramau / śakracāpanibhe cāpe pragṛhya vipulair bhujaiḥ // 4.003.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrīmantau rūpasaṃpannau vṛṣabhaśreṣṭhavikramau / hastihastopamabhujau dyutimantau nararṣabhau // 4.003.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhayā parvatendro 'yaṃ yuvayor avabhāsitaḥ / rājyārhāv amaraprakhyau kathaṃ deśam ihāgatau // 4.003.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmapatrekṣaṇau vīrau jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇau / anyonyasadṛśau vīrau devalokād ivāgatau // 4.003.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadṛcchayeva saṃprāptau candrasūryau vasuṃdharām / viśālavakṣasau vīrau mānuṣau devarūpiṇau // 4.003.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhaskandhau mahāsattvau samadāv iva govṛṣau / āyatāś ca suvṛttāś ca bāhavaḥ parighottamāḥ // 4.003.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvabhūṣaṇabhūṣārhāḥ kim arthaṃ na vibhūṣitaḥ // 4.003.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhau yogyāv ahaṃ manye rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm imām / sasāgaravanāṃ kṛtsnāṃ vindhyameruvibhūṣitām // 4.003.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime ca dhanuṣī citre ślakṣṇe citrānulepane / prakāśete yathendrasya vajre hemavibhūṣite // 4.003.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpūrṇā niśitair bāṇair tūṇāś ca śubhadarśanāḥ / jīvitāntakarair ghorair jvaladbhir iva pannagaiḥ // 4.003.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāpramāṇau vipulau taptahāṭakabhūṣitau / khaḍgāv etau virājete nirmuktabhujagāv iva // 4.003.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ māṃ paribhāṣantaṃ kasmād vai nābhibhāṣathaḥ // 4.003.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvo nāma dharmātmā kaś cid vānarayūthapaḥ / vīro vinikṛto bhrātrā jagad bhramati duḥkhitaḥ // 4.003.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāpto 'haṃ preṣitas tena sugrīveṇa mahātmanā / rājñā vānaramukhyānāṃ hanumān nāma vānaraḥ // 4.003.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuvābhyāṃ saha dharmātmā sugrīvaḥ sakhyam icchati / tasya māṃ sacivaṃ vittaṃ vānaraṃ pavanātmajam // 4.003.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhikṣurūpapraticchannaṃ sugrīvapriyakāmyayā / ṛśyamūkād iha prāptaṃ kāmagaṃ kāmarūpiṇam // 4.003.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu hanumāṃs tau vīrau rāmalakṣmaṇau / vākyajñau vākyakuśalaḥ punar novāca kiṃ cana // 4.003.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā vacas tasya rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt / prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śrīmān bhrātaraṃ pārśvataḥ sthitam // 4.003.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sacivo 'yaṃ kapīndrasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ / tam eva kāṅkṣamāṇasya mamāntikam upāgataḥ // 4.003.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam abhyabhāṣa saumitre sugrīvasacivaṃ kapim / vākyajñaṃ madhurair vākyaiḥ snehayuktam ariṃdamam // 4.003.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahṛṣṭo hanumān kṛtyavān iti tad vacaḥ / śrutvā madhurasaṃbhāṣaṃ sugrīvaṃ manasā gataḥ // 4.004.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavyo rājyāgamas tasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ / yad ayaṃ kṛtyavān prāptaḥ kṛtyaṃ caitad upāgatam // 4.004.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo hanūmān plavagarṣabhaḥ / pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ rāmaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ // 4.004.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kimarthaṃ tvaṃ vanaṃ ghoraṃ pampākānanamaṇḍitam / āgataḥ sānujo durgaṃ nānāvyālamṛgāyutam // 4.004.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇo rāmacoditaḥ / ācacakṣe mahātmānaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam // 4.004.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā daśaratho nāma dyutimān dharmavatsalaḥ / tasyāyaṃ pūrvajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ // 4.004.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaraṇyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pitur nirdeśapāragaḥ / vīro daśarathasyāyaṃ putrāṇāṃ guṇavattaraḥ // 4.004.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyād bhraṣṭo vane vastuṃ mayā sārdham ihāgataḥ / bhāryayā ca mahātejāḥ sītayānugato vaśī // 4.004.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dinakṣaye mahātejāḥ prabhayeva divākaraḥ // 4.004.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham asyāvaro bhrātā guṇair dāsyam upāgataḥ / kṛtajñasya bahujñasya lakṣmaṇo nāma nāmataḥ // 4.004.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukhārhasya mahārhasya sarvabhūtahitātmanaḥ / aiśvaryeṇa vihīnasya vanavāsāśritasya ca // 4.004.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā rahite kāmarūpiṇā / tac ca na jñāyate rakṣaḥ patnī yenāsya sā hṛtā // 4.004.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
danur nāma śriyaḥ putraḥ śāpād rākṣasatāṃ gataḥ / ākhyātas tena sugrīvaḥ samartho vānarādhipaḥ // 4.004.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa jñāsyati mahāvīryas tava bhāryāpahāriṇam / evam uktvā danuḥ svargaṃ bhrājamāno gataḥ sukham // 4.004.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ / ahaṃ caiva hi rāmaś ca sugrīvaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatau // 4.004.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa dattvā ca vittāni prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ / lokanāthaḥ purā bhūtvā sugrīvaṃ nātham icchati // 4.004.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śokābhibhūte rāme tu śokārte śaraṇaṃ gate / kartum arhati sugrīvaḥ prasādaṃ saha yūthapaiḥ // 4.004.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saumitriṃ karuṇaṃ sāśrupātanam / hanūmān pratyuvācedaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ // 4.004.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īdṛśā buddhisaṃpannā jitakrodhā jitendriyāḥ / draṣṭavyā vānarendreṇa diṣṭyā darśanam āgatāḥ // 4.004.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi rājyāc ca vibhraṣṭaḥ kṛtavairaś ca vālinā / hṛtadāro vane trasto bhrātrā vinikṛto bhṛśam // 4.004.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kariṣyati sa sāhāyyaṃ yuvayor bhāskarātmajaḥ / sugrīvaḥ saha cāsmābhiḥ sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇe // 4.004.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā hanumāñ ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā / babhāṣe so 'bhigacchāmaḥ sugrīvam iti rāghavam // 4.004.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ dharmātmā hanūmantaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ / pratipūjya yathānyāyam idaṃ provāca rāghavam // 4.004.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kapiḥ kathayate hṛṣṭo yathāyaṃ mārutātmajaḥ / kṛtyavān so 'pi saṃprāptaḥ kṛtakṛtyo 'si rāghava // 4.004.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasannamukhavarṇaś ca vyaktaṃ hṛṣṭaś ca bhāṣate / nānṛtaṃ vakṣyate vīro hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ // 4.004.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa tu mahāprājño hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / jagāmādāya tau vīrau harirājāya rāghavau // 4.004.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu vipula yaśāḥ kapipravīraḥ; pavanasutaḥ kṛtakṛtyavat prahṛṣṭaḥ / girivaram uruvikramaḥ prayātaḥ; sa śubhamatiḥ saha rāmalakṣmaṇābhyām // 4.004.026	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
ṛśyamūkāt tu hanumān gatvā taṃ malayaṃ giram / ācacakṣe tadā vīrau kapirājāya rāghavau // 4.005.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ rāmo mahāprājñaḥ saṃprāpto dṛḍhavikramaḥ / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā rāmo 'yaṃ satyavikramaḥ // 4.005.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jāto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / dharme nigaditaś caiva pitur nirdeśapālakaḥ // 4.005.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāsya vasato 'raṇye niyatasya mahātmanaḥ / rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā sa tvāṃ śaraṇam āgataḥ // 4.005.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājasūyāśvamedhaiś ca vahnir yenābhitarpitaḥ / dakṣiṇāś ca tathotsṛṣṭā gāvaḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // 4.005.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapasā satyavākyena vasudhā yena pālitā / strīhetos tasya putro 'yaṃ rāmas tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // 4.005.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavatā sakhyakāmau tau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / pratigṛhyārcayasvemau pūjanīyatamāv ubhau // 4.005.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ sugrīvo hṛṣṭamānasaḥ / bhayaṃ sa rāghavād ghoraṃ prajahau vigatajvaraḥ // 4.005.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kṛtvā mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ / darśanīyatamo bhūtvā prītyā provāca rāghavam // 4.005.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavān dharmavinītaś ca vikrāntaḥ sarvavatsalaḥ / ākhyātā vāyuputreṇa tattvato me bhavadguṇāḥ // 4.005.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan mamaivaiṣa satkāro lābhaś caivottamaḥ prabho / yat tvam icchasi sauhārdaṃ vānareṇa mayā saha // 4.005.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rocate yadi vā sakhyaṃ bāhur eṣa prasāritaḥ / gṛhyatāṃ pāṇinā pāṇir maryādā vadhyatāṃ dhruvā // 4.005.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvasya subhāṣitam / saṃprahṛṣṭamanā hastaṃ pīḍayām āsa pāṇinā // 4.005.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛdyaṃ sauhṛdam ālambya paryaṣvajata pīḍitam // 4.005.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato hanūmān saṃtyajya bhikṣurūpam ariṃdamaḥ / kāṣṭhayoḥ svena rūpeṇa janayām āsa pāvakam // 4.005.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīpyamānaṃ tato vahniṃ puṣpair abhyarcya satkṛtam / tayor madhye tu suprīto nidadhe susamāhitaḥ // 4.005.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'gniṃ dīpyamānaṃ tau cakratuś ca pradakṣiṇam / sugrīvo rāghavaś caiva vayasyatvam upāgatau // 4.005.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ suprīta manasau tāv ubhau harirāghavau / anyonyam abhivīkṣantau na tṛptim upajagmatuḥ // 4.005.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sarvārthavidvāṃsaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam / sugrīvaḥ prāha tejasvī vākyam ekamanās tadā // 4.005.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayam ākhyāti me rāma sacivo mantrisattamaḥ / hanumān yannimittaṃ tvaṃ nirjanaṃ vanam āgataḥ // 4.006.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vasataś ca vane tava / rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā maithilī janakātmajā // 4.006.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā viyuktā rudatī lakṣmaṇena ca dhīmatā / antaraṃ prepsunā tena hatvā gṛdhraṃ jaṭāyuṣam // 4.006.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāryāviyogajaṃ duḥkhaṃ nacirāt tvaṃ vimokṣyase / ahaṃ tām ānayiṣyāmi naṣṭāṃ vedaśrutiṃ yathā // 4.006.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rasātale vā vartantīṃ vartantīṃ vā nabhastale / aham ānīya dāsyāmi tava bhāryām ariṃdama // 4.006.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ tathyaṃ mama vacas tvam avehi ca rāghava / tyaja śokaṃ mahābāho tāṃ kāntām ānayāmi te // 4.006.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anumānāt tu jānāmi maithilī sā na saṃśayaḥ / hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rakṣasā krūrakarmaṇā // 4.006.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krośantī rāma rāmeti lakṣmaṇeti ca visvaram / sphurantī rāvaṇasyāṅke pannagendravadhūr yathā // 4.006.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmanā pañcamaṃ māṃ hi dṛṣṭvā śailataṭe sthitam / uttarīyaṃ tayā tyaktaṃ śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // 4.006.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāny asmābhir gṛhītāni nihitāni ca rāghava / ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tāni pratyabhijñātum arhasi // 4.006.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam abravīt tato rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ priyavādinam / ānayasva sakhe śīghraṃ kimarthaṃ pravilambase // 4.006.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu sugrīvaḥ śailasya gahanāṃ guhām / praviveśa tataḥ śīghraṃ rāghavapriyakāmyayā // 4.006.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttarīyaṃ gṛhītvā tu śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca / idaṃ paśyeti rāmāya darśayām āsa vānaraḥ // 4.006.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gṛhītvā tadvāsaḥ śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca / abhavad bāṣpasaṃruddho nīhāreṇeva candramāḥ // 4.006.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāsnehapravṛttena sa tu bāṣpeṇa dūṣitaḥ / hā priyeti rudan dhairyam utsṛjya nyapatat kṣitau // 4.006.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛdi kṛtvā sa bahuśas tam alaṃkāram uttamam / niśaśvāsa bhṛśaṃ sarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ // 4.006.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avicchinnāśruvegas tu saumitriṃ vīkṣya pārśvataḥ / paridevayituṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ samupacakrame // 4.006.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyā saṃtyaktaṃ hriyamāṇayā / uttarīyam idaṃ bhūmau śarīrād bhūṣaṇāni ca // 4.006.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śādvalinyāṃ dhruvaṃ bhūmyāṃ sītayā hriyamāṇayā / utsṛṣṭaṃ bhūṣaṇam idaṃ tathārūpaṃ hi dṛśyate // 4.006.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brūhi sugrīva kaṃ deśaṃ hriyantī lakṣitā tvayā / rakṣasā raudrarūpeṇa mama prāṇasamā priyā // 4.006.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva vā vasati tad rakṣo mahad vyasanadaṃ mama / yannimittam ahaṃ sarvān nāśayiṣyāmi rākṣasān // 4.006.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haratā maithilīṃ yena māṃ ca roṣayatā bhṛśam / ātmano jīvitāntāya mṛtyudvāram apāvṛtam // 4.006.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama dayitatamā hṛtā vanād; rajanicareṇa vimathya yena sā / kathaya mama ripuṃ tam adya vai; pravagapate yamasaṃnidhiṃ nayāmi // 4.006.023	ajñātasamavṛttam [nnrlg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
evam uktas tu sugrīvo rāmeṇārtena vānaraḥ / abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ sabāṣpaṃ bāṣpagadgadaḥ // 4.007.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na jāne nilayaṃ tasya sarvathā pāparakṣasaḥ / sāmarthyaṃ vikramaṃ vāpi dauṣkuleyasya vā kulam // 4.007.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyaṃ tu pratijānāmi tyaja śokam ariṃdama / kariṣyāmi tathā yatnaṃ yathā prāpsyasi maithilīm // 4.007.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaṃ sagaṇaṃ hatvā paritoṣyātmapauruṣam / tathāsmi kartā nacirād yathā prīto bhaviṣyasi // 4.007.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya dhairyam ātmagataṃ smara / tvadvidhānāṃ na sadṛśam īdṛśaṃ buddhilāghavam // 4.007.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayāpi vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ bhāryā haraṇajaṃ mahat / na cāham evaṃ śocāmi na ca dhairyaṃ parityaje // 4.007.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāhaṃ tām anuśocāmi prākṛto vānaro 'pi san / mahātmā ca vinītaś cā kiṃ punar dhṛtimān bhavān // 4.007.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṣpam āpatitaṃ dhairyān nigrahītuṃ tvam arhasi / maryādāṃ sattvayuktānāṃ dhṛtiṃ notsraṣṭum arhasi // 4.007.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyasane vārtha kṛcchre vā bhaye vā jīvitāntage / vimṛśan vai svayā buddhyā dhṛtimān nāvasīdati // 4.007.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāliśas tu naro nityaṃ vaiklavyaṃ yo 'nuvartate / sa majjaty avaśaḥ śoke bhārākrānteva naur jale // 4.007.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣo 'ñjalir mayā baddhaḥ praṇayāt tvāṃ prasādaye / pauruṣaṃ śraya śokasya nāntaraṃ dātum arhasi // 4.007.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye śokam anuvartante na teṣāṃ vidyate sukham / tejaś ca kṣīyate teṣāṃ na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi // 4.007.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hitaṃ vayasya bhāvena brūhi nopadiśāmi te / vayasyatāṃ pūjayan me na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi // 4.007.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madhuraṃ sāntvitas tena sugrīveṇa sa rāghavaḥ / mukham aśrupariklinnaṃ vastrāntena pramārjayat // 4.007.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṛtiṣṭhas tu kākutsthaḥ sugrīvavacanāt prabhuḥ / saṃpariṣvajya sugrīvam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 4.007.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kartavyaṃ yad vayasyena snigdhena ca hitena ca / anurūpaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca kṛtaṃ sugrīva tat tvayā // 4.007.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa ca prakṛtiṣṭho 'ham anunītas tvayā sakhe / durlabho hīdṛśo bandhur asmin kāle viśeṣataḥ // 4.007.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tu yatnas tvayā kāryo maithilyāḥ parimārgaṇe / rākṣasasya ca raudrasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ // 4.007.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā ca yad anuṣṭheyaṃ visrabdhena tad ucyatām / varṣāsv iva ca sukṣetre sarvaṃ saṃpadyate tava // 4.007.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā ca yad idaṃ vākyam abhimānāt samīritam / tat tvayā hariśārdūla tattvam ity upadhāryatām // 4.007.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana / etat te pratijānāmi satyenaiva śapāmi te // 4.007.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvo vānaraiḥ sacivaiḥ saha / rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā pratijñātaṃ viśeṣataḥ // 4.007.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahānubhāvasya vaco niśamya; harir narāṇām ṛṣabhasya tasya / kṛtaṃ sa mene harivīra mukhyas; tadā svakāryaṃ hṛdayena vidvān // 4.007.023	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
parituṣṭas tu sugrīvas tena vākyena vānaraḥ / lakṣmaṇasyāgrajaṃ rāmam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 4.008.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathāham anugrāhyo devatānām asaṃśayaḥ / upapannaguṇopetaḥ sakhā yasya bhavān mama // 4.008.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śakyaṃ khalu bhaved rāma sahāyena tvayānagha / surarājyam api prāptuṃ svarājyaṃ kiṃ punaḥ prabho // 4.008.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ sabhājyo bandhūnāṃ suhṛdāṃ caiva rāghava / yasyāgnisākṣikaṃ mitraṃ labdhaṃ rāghavavaṃśajam // 4.008.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham apy anurūpas te vayasyo jñāsyase śanaiḥ / na tu vaktuṃ samartho 'haṃ svayam ātmagatān guṇān // 4.008.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahātmanāṃ tu bhūyiṣṭhaṃ tvadvidhānāṃ kṛtātmanām / niścalā bhavati prītir dhairyam ātmavatām iva // 4.008.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rajataṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni vā / avibhaktāni sādhūnām avagacchanti sādhavaḥ // 4.008.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āḍhyo vāpi daridro vā duḥkhitaḥ sukhito 'pi vā / nirdoṣo vā sadoṣo vā vayasyaḥ paramā gatiḥ // 4.008.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanatyāgaḥ sukhatyāgo dehatyāgo 'pi vā punaḥ / vayasyārthe pravartante snehaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāvidham // 4.008.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat tathety abravīd rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ priyavādinam / lakṣmaṇasyāgrato lakṣmyā vāsavasyeva dhīmataḥ // 4.008.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam / sugrīvaḥ sarvataś cakṣur vane lolam apātayat // 4.008.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśa tataḥ sālam avidūre harīśvaraḥ / supuṣpam īṣatpatrāḍhyaṃ bhramarair upaśobhitam // 4.008.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaikāṃ parṇabahulāṃ bhaṅktvā śākhāṃ supuṣpitām / sālasyāstīrya sugrīvo niṣasāda sarāghavaḥ // 4.008.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv āsīnau tato dṛṣṭvā hanūmān api lakṣmaṇam / sālaśākhāṃ samutpāṭya vinītam upaveśayat // 4.008.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvaḥ ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā / uvāca praṇayād rāmaṃ harṣavyākulitākṣaram // 4.008.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ vinikṛto bhrātrā carāmy eṣa bhayārditaḥ / ṛśyamūkaṃ girivaraṃ hṛtabhāryaḥ suduḥkhitaḥ // 4.008.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ trasto bhaye magno vasāmy udbhrāntacetanaḥ / vālinā nikṛto bhrātrā kṛtavairaś ca rāghava // 4.008.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vālino me bhayārtasya sarvalokābhayaṃkara / mamāpi tvam anāthasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // 4.008.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu tejasvī dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ / pratyuvāca sa kākutsthaḥ sugrīvaṃ prahasann iva // 4.008.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upakāraphalaṃ mitram apakāro 'rilakṣaṇam / adyaiva taṃ haniṣyāmi tava bhāryāpahāriṇam // 4.008.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime hi me mahāvegāḥ patriṇas tigmatejasaḥ / kārtikeyavanodbhūtāḥ śarā hemavibhūṣitāḥ // 4.008.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaṅkapatrapraticchannā mahendrāśanisaṃnibhāḥ / suparvāṇaḥ sutīkṣṇāgrā saroṣā bhujagā iva // 4.008.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātṛsaṃjñam amitraṃ te vālinaṃ kṛtakilbiṣam / śarair vinihataṃ paśya vikīrṇam iva parvatam // 4.008.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvo vāhinīpatiḥ / praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt // 4.008.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaśokābhibhūto 'haṃ śokārtānāṃ bhavān gatiḥ / vayasya iti kṛtvā hi tvayy ahaṃ paridevaye // 4.008.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ hi pāṇipradānena vayasyo so 'gnisākṣikaḥ / kṛtaḥ prāṇair bahumataḥ satyenāpi śapāmy aham // 4.008.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vayasya iti kṛtvā ca visrabdhaṃ pravadāmy aham / duḥkham antargataṃ yan me mano dahati nityaśaḥ // 4.008.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ bāṣpadūṣitalocanaḥ / bāṣpopahatayā vācā noccaiḥ śaknoti bhāṣitum // 4.008.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṣpavegaṃ tu sahasā nadīvegam ivāgatam / dhārayām āsa dhairyeṇa sugrīvo rāmasaṃnidhau // 4.008.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃnigṛhya tu taṃ bāṣpaṃ pramṛjya nayane śubhe / viniḥśvasya ca tejasvī rāghavaṃ punar abravīt // 4.008.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purāhaṃ valinā rāma rājyāt svād avaropitaḥ / paruṣāṇi ca saṃśrāvya nirdhūto 'smi balīyasā // 4.008.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛtā bhāryā ca me tena prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī / suhṛdaś ca madīyā ye saṃyatā bandhaneṣu te // 4.008.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatnavāṃś ca suduṣṭātmā mad vināśāya rāghava / bahuśas tat prayuktāś ca vānarā nihatā mayā // 4.008.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkayā tv etayā cāhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvām api rāghava / nopasarpāmy ahaṃ bhīto bhaye sarve hi bibhyati // 4.008.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kevalaṃ hi sahāyā me hanumat pramukhās tv ime / ato 'haṃ dhārayāmy adya prāṇān kṛcchra gato 'pi san // 4.008.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete hi kapayaḥ snigdhā māṃ rakṣanti samantataḥ / saha gacchanti gantavye nityaṃ tiṣṭhanti ca sthite // 4.008.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃkṣepas tv eṣa me rāma kim uktvā vistaraṃ hi te / sa me jyeṣṭho ripur bhrātā vālī viśrutapauruṣaḥ // 4.008.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadvināśād dhi me duḥkhaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ syād anantaram / sukhaṃ me jīvitaṃ caiva tadvināśanibandhanam // 4.008.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa me rāma śokāntaḥ śokārtena niveditaḥ / duḥkhito 'duḥkhito vāpi sakhyur nityaṃ sakhā gatiḥ // 4.008.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvaitac ca vaco rāmaḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt / kiṃnimittam abhūd vairaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // 4.008.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukhaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ śrutvā vairasya tava vānara / ānantaryaṃ vidhāsyāmi saṃpradhārya balābalam // 4.008.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balavān hi mamāmarṣaḥ śrutvā tvām avamānitam / vardhate hṛdayotkampī prāvṛḍvega ivāmbhasaḥ // 4.008.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛṣṭaḥ kathaya visrabdho yāvad āropyate dhanuḥ / sṛṣṭaś ca hi mayā bāṇo nirastaś ca ripus tava // 4.008.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu sugrīvaḥ kākutsthena mahātmanā / praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // 4.008.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ sugrīvo lakṣmaṇāgraje / vairasya kāraṇaṃ tattvam ākhyātum upacakrame // 4.008.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vālī nāma mama bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ śatruniṣūdanaḥ / pitur bahumato nityaṃ mama cāpi tathā purā // 4.009.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitary uparate 'smākaṃ jyeṣṭho 'yam iti mantribhiḥ / kapīnām īśvaro rājye kṛtaḥ paramasaṃmataḥ // 4.009.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyaṃ praśāsatas tasya pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat / ahaṃ sarveṣu kāleṣu praṇataḥ preṣyavat sthitaḥ // 4.009.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māyāvī nāma tejasvī pūrvajo dundubheḥ sutaḥ / tena tasya mahad vairaṃ strīkṛtaṃ viśrutaṃ purā // 4.009.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu supte jane rātrau kiṣkindhād vāram āgataḥ / nardati sma susaṃrabdho vālinaṃ cāhvayad raṇe // 4.009.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasuptas tu mama bhrātā narditaṃ bhairavasvanam / śrutvā na mamṛṣe vālī niṣpapāta javāt tadā // 4.009.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu vai niḥsṛtaḥ krodhāt taṃ hantum asurottamam / vāryamāṇas tataḥ strībhir mayā ca praṇatātmanā // 4.009.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu nirdhūya sarvānno nirjagāma mahābalaḥ / tato 'ham api sauhārdān niḥsṛto vālinā saha // 4.009.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu me bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā māṃ ca dūrād avasthitam / asuro jātasaṃtrāsaḥ pradudrāva tadā bhṛśam // 4.009.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin dravati saṃtraste hy āvāṃ drutataraṃ gatau / prakāśo 'pi kṛto mārgaś candreṇodgacchatā tadā // 4.009.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tṛṇair āvṛtaṃ durgaṃ dharaṇyā vivaraṃ mahat / praviveśāsuro vegād āvām āsādya viṣṭhitau // 4.009.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ praviṣṭaṃ ripuṃ dṛṣṭvā bilaṃ roṣavaśaṃ gataḥ / mām uvāca tadā vālī vacanaṃ kṣubhitendriyaḥ // 4.009.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iha tvaṃ tiṣṭha sugrīva biladvāri samāhitaḥ / yāvad atra praviśyāhaṃ nihanmi samare ripum // 4.009.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā yācitaḥ sa paraṃtapa / śāpayitvā ca māṃ padbhyāṃ praviveśa bilaṃ tadā // 4.009.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya praviṣṭasya bilaṃ sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ / sthitasya ca mama dvāri sa kālo vyatyavartata // 4.009.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tu naṣṭaṃ taṃ jñātvā snehād āgatasaṃbhramaḥ / bhrātaraṃ na hi paśyāmi pāpaśaṅki ca me manaḥ // 4.009.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha dīrghasya kālasya bilāt tasmād viniḥsṛtam / saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktam ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā suduḥkhitaḥ // 4.009.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nardatām asurāṇāṃ ca dhvanir me śrotram āgataḥ / nirastasya ca saṃgrāme krośato niḥsvano guroḥ // 4.009.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tv avagato buddhyā cihnais tair bhrātaraṃ hatam / pidhāya ca biladvāraṃ śilayā girimātrayā // 4.009.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śokārtaś codakaṃ kṛtvā kiṣkindhām āgataḥ sakhe // 4.009.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gūhamānasya me tattvaṃ yatnato mantribhiḥ śrutam / tato 'haṃ taiḥ samāgamya sametair abhiṣecitaḥ // 4.009.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyaṃ praśāsatas tasya nyāyato mama rāghava / ājagāma ripuṃ hatvā vālī tam asurottamam // 4.009.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣiktaṃ tu māṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāt saṃraktalocanaḥ / madīyān mantriṇo baddhvā paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt // 4.009.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nigrahe 'pi samarthasya taṃ pāpaṃ prati rāghava / na prāvartata me buddhir bhrātṛgauravayantritā // 4.009.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānayaṃs taṃ mahātmānaṃ yathāvac cābhyavādayam / uktāś ca nāśiṣas tena saṃtuṣṭenāntarātmanā // 4.009.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ krodhasamāviṣṭaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ tam upāgatam / ahaṃ prasādayāṃ cakre bhrātaraṃ priyakāmyayā // 4.010.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyāsi kuśalī prāpto nihataś ca tvayā ripuḥ / anāthasya hi me nāthas tvam eko 'nāthanandanaḥ // 4.010.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ bahuśalākaṃ te pūrṇacandram ivoditam / chatraṃ savālavyajanaṃ pratīcchasva mayodyatam // 4.010.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvam eva rājā mānārhaḥ sadā cāhaṃ yathāpurā / nyāsabhūtam idaṃ rājyaṃ tava niryātayāmy aham // 4.010.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā ca roṣaṃ kṛthāḥ saumya mayi śatrunibarhaṇa / yāce tvāṃ śirasā rājan mayā baddho 'yam añjaliḥ // 4.010.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balād asmi samāgamya mantribhiḥ puravāsibhiḥ / rājabhāve niyukto 'haṃ śūnyadeśajigīṣayā // 4.010.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snigdham evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ māṃ sa tu nirbhartsya vānaraḥ / dhik tvām iti ca mām uktvā bahu tat tad uvāca ha // 4.010.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṛtīś ca samānīya mantriṇaś caiva saṃmatān / mām āha suhṛdāṃ madhye vākyaṃ paramagarhitam // 4.010.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viditaṃ vo yathā rātrau māyāvī sa mahāsuraḥ / māṃ samāhvayata krūro yuddhākāṅkṣī sudurmatiḥ // 4.010.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tad garjitaṃ śrutvā niḥsṛto 'haṃ nṛpālayāt / anuyātaś ca māṃ tūrṇam ayaṃ bhrātā sudāruṇaḥ // 4.010.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dṛṣṭvaiva māṃ rātrau sadvitīyaṃ mahābalaḥ / prādravad bhayasaṃtrasto vīkṣyāvāṃ tam anudrutau // 4.010.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anudrutas tu vegena praviveśa mahābilam // 4.010.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ praviṣṭaṃ viditvā tu sughoraṃ sumahad bilam / ayam ukto 'tha me bhrātā mayā tu krūradarśanaḥ // 4.010.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahatvā nāsti me śaktiḥ pratigantum itaḥ purīm / biladvāri pratīkṣa tvaṃ yāvad enaṃ nihanmy aham // 4.010.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthito 'yam iti matvā tu praviṣṭo 'haṃ durāsadam / taṃ ca me mārgamāṇasya gataḥ saṃvatsaras tadā // 4.010.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dṛṣṭo mayā śatrur anirvedād bhayāvahaḥ / nihataś ca mayā tatra so 'suro bandhubhiḥ saha // 4.010.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāsyāt tu pravṛttena rudhiraugheṇa tad bilam / pūrṇam āsīd durākrāmaṃ stanatas tasya bhūtale // 4.010.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūdayitvā tu taṃ śatruṃ vikrāntaṃ dundubheḥ sutam / niṣkrāmann eva paśyāmi bilasya pihitaṃ mukham // 4.010.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikrośamānasya tu me sugrīveti punaḥ punaḥ / yadā prativaco nāsti tato 'haṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ // 4.010.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
