kāmaṃ khalu śarair śaktaḥ surāsuramahoragān / vaśe dāśarathiḥ kartuṃ tvatpratijñāṃ tu kāṅkṣate // 4.028.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāṇatyāgāviśaṅkena kṛtaṃ tena tava priyam / tasya mārgāma vaidehīṃ pṛthivyām api cāmbare // 4.028.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na devā na ca gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ / na ca yakṣā bhayaṃ tasya kuryuḥ kim uta rākṣasāḥ // 4.028.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad evaṃ śaktiyuktasya pūrvaṃ priyakṛtas tathā / rāmasyārhasi piṅgeśa kartuṃ sarvātmanā priyam // 4.028.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nādhastād avanau nāpsu gatir nopari cāmbare / kasya cit sajjate 'smākaṃ kapīśvara tavājñayā // 4.028.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad ājñāpaya kaḥ kiṃ te kṛte vasatu kutra cit / harayo hy apradhṛṣyās te santi koṭyagrato 'nagha // 4.028.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā kāle sādhuniveditam / sugrīvaḥ sattvasaṃpannaś cakāra matim uttamām // 4.028.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa saṃdideśābhimataṃ nīlaṃ nityakṛtodyamam / dikṣu sarvāsu sarveṣāṃ sainyānām upasaṃgrahe // 4.028.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā senā samagrā me yūthapālāś ca sarvaśaḥ / samāgacchanty asaṃgena senāgrāṇi tathā kuru // 4.028.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tv antapālāḥ plavagāḥ śīghragā vyavasāyinaḥ / samānayantu te sainyaṃ tvaritāḥ śāsanān mama // 4.028.030.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svayaṃ cānantaraṃ sainyaṃ bhavān evānupaśyatu // 4.028.030.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tripañcarātrād ūrdhvaṃ yaḥ prāpnuyān neha vānaraḥ / tasya prāṇāntiko daṇḍo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // 4.028.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harīṃś ca vṛddhān upayātu sāṅgado; bhavān mamājñām adhikṛtya niścitām / iti vyavasthāṃ haripuṃgaveśvaro; vidhāya veśma praviveśa vīryavān // 4.028.032	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
guhāṃ praviṣṭe sugrīve vimukte gagane ghanaiḥ / varṣarātroṣito rāmaḥ kāmaśokābhipīḍitaḥ // 4.029.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇḍuraṃ gaganaṃ dṛṣṭvā vimalaṃ candramaṇḍalam / śāradīṃ rajanīṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā jyotsnānulepanām // 4.029.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmavṛttaṃ ca sugrīvaṃ naṣṭāṃ ca janakātmajām / buddhvā kālam atītaṃ ca mumoha paramāturaḥ // 4.029.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu saṃjñām upāgamya muhūrtān matimān punaḥ / manaḥsthām api vaidehīṃ cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ // 4.029.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsīnaḥ parvatasyāgre hemadhātuvibhūṣite / śāradaṃ gaganaṃ dṛṣṭva jagāma manasā priyām // 4.029.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā ca vimalaṃ vyoma gatavidyudbalāhakam / sārasāravasaṃghuṣṭaṃ vilalāpārtayā girā // 4.029.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sārasāravasaṃnādaiḥ sārasāravanādinī / yāśrame ramate bālā sādya me ramate katham // 4.029.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpitāṃś cāsanān dṛṣṭvā kāñcanān iva nirmalān / kathaṃ sa ramate bālā paśyantī mām apaśyatī // 4.029.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā purā kalahaṃsānāṃ svareṇa kalabhāṣiṇī / budhyate cārusarvāṅgī sādya me budhyate katham // 4.029.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niḥsvanaṃ cakravākānāṃ niśamya sahacāriṇām / puṇḍarīkaviśālākṣī katham eṣā bhaviṣyati // 4.029.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarāṃsi sarito vāpīḥ kānanāni vanāni ca / tāṃ vinā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ caran nādya sukhaṃ labhe // 4.029.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api tāṃ madviyogāc ca saukumāryāc ca bhāminīm / na dūraṃ pīḍayet kāmaḥ śaradguṇanirantaraḥ // 4.029.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evamādi naraśreṣṭho vilalāpa nṛpātmajaḥ / vihaṃga iva sāraṅgaḥ salilaṃ tridaśeśvarāt // 4.029.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataś cañcūrya ramyeṣu phalārthī girisānuṣu / dadarśa paryupāvṛtto lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇo 'grajam // 4.029.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ cintayā duḥsahayā parītaṃ; visaṃjñam ekaṃ vijane manasvī / bhrātur viṣādāt paritāpadīnaḥ; samīkṣya saumitrir uvāca rāmam // 4.029.015	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
kim ārya kāmasya vaśaṃgatena; kim ātmapauruṣyaparābhavena / ayaṃ sadā saṃhṛiyate samādhiḥ; kim atra yogena nivartitena // 4.029.016	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
kriyābhiyogaṃ manasaḥ prasādaṃ; samādhiyogānugataṃ ca kālam / sahāyasāmarthyam adīnasattva; svakarmahetuṃ ca kuruṣva hetum // 4.029.017	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
na jānakī mānavavaṃśanātha; tvayā sanāthā sulabhā pareṇa / na cāgnicūḍāṃ jvalitām upetya; na dahyate vīravarārha kaś cit // 4.029.018	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
salakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇam apradhṛṣyaṃ; svabhāvajaṃ vākyam uvāca rāmaḥ / hitaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca nayaprasaktaṃ; sasāmadharmārthasamāhitaṃ ca // 4.029.019	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
niḥsaṃśayaṃ kāryam avekṣitavyaṃ; kriyāviśeṣo hy anuvartitavyaḥ / nanu pravṛttasya durāsadasya; kumārakāryasya phalaṃ na cintyam // 4.029.020	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
atha padmapalāśākṣīṃ maithilīm anucintayan / uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mukhena pariśuṣyatā // 4.029.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tarpayitvā sahasrākṣaḥ salilena vasuṃdharām / nirvartayitvā sasyāni kṛtakarmā vyavasthitaḥ // 4.029.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snigdhagambhīranirghoṣāḥ śailadrumapurogamāḥ / visṛjya salilaṃ meghāḥ pariśrāntā nṛpātmaja // 4.029.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlotpaladalaśyāmaḥ śyāmīkṛtvā diśo daśa / vimadā iva mātaṅgāḥ śāntavegāḥ payodharāḥ // 4.029.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jalagarbhā mahāvegāḥ kuṭajārjunagandhinaḥ / caritvā viratāḥ saumya vṛṣṭivātāḥ samudyatāḥ // 4.029.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghanānāṃ vāraṇānāṃ ca mayūrāṇāṃ ca lakṣmaṇa / nādaḥ prasravaṇānāṃ ca praśāntaḥ sahasānagha // 4.029.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivṛṣṭā mahāmeghair nirmalāś citrasānavaḥ / anuliptā ivābhānti girayaś candraraśmibhiḥ // 4.029.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśayanti śarannadyaḥ pulināni śanaiḥ śanaiḥ / navasaṃgamasavrīḍā jaghanānīva yoṣitaḥ // 4.029.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasannasalilāḥ saumya kurarībhir vināditāḥ / cakravākagaṇākīrṇā vibhānti salilāśayāḥ // 4.029.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyonyabaddhavairāṇāṃ jigīṣūṇāṃ nṛpātmaja / udyogasamayaḥ saumya pārthivānām upasthitaḥ // 4.029.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ sā prathamā yātrā pārthivānāṃ nṛpātmaja / na ca paśyāmi sugrīvam udyogaṃ vā tathāvidham // 4.029.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
catvāro vārṣikā māsā gatā varṣaśatopamāḥ / mama śokābhitaptasya saumya sītām apaśyataḥ // 4.029.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyāvihīne duḥkhārte hṛtarājye vivāsite / kṛpāṃ na kurute rājā sugrīvo mayi lakṣmaṇa // 4.029.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anātho hṛtarājyo 'yaṃ rāvaṇena ca dharṣitaḥ / dīno dūragṛhaḥ kāmī māṃ caiva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // 4.029.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity etaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ saumya sugrīvasya durātmanaḥ / ahaṃ vānararājasya paribhūtaḥ paraṃtapa // 4.029.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kālaṃ parisaṃkhyāya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇe / kṛtārthaḥ samayaṃ kṛtvā durmatir nāvabudhyate // 4.029.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ praviśya ca kiṣkindhāṃ brūhi vānarapuṃgavam / mūrkhaṃ grāmya sukhe saktaṃ sugrīvaṃ vacanān mama // 4.029.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthinām upapannānāṃ pūrvaṃ cāpy upakāriṇām / āśāṃ saṃśrutya yo hanti sa loke puruṣādhamaḥ // 4.029.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ yo hi vākyam udīritam / satyena parigṛhṇāti sa vīraḥ puruṣottamaḥ // 4.029.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtārthā hy akṛtārthānāṃ mitrāṇāṃ na bhavanti ye / tān mṛtān api kravyādaḥ kṛtaghnān nopabhuñjate // 4.029.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nūnaṃ kāñcanapṛṣṭhasya vikṛṣṭasya mayā raṇe / draṣṭum icchanti cāpasya rūpaṃ vidyudgaṇopamam // 4.029.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghoraṃ jyātalanirghoṣaṃ kruddhasya mama saṃyuge / nirghoṣam iva vajrasya punaḥ saṃśrotum icchati // 4.029.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmam evaṃ gate 'py asya parijñāte parākrame / tvatsahāyasya me vīra na cintā syān nṛpātmaja // 4.029.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadartham ayam ārambhaḥ kṛtaḥ parapuraṃjaya / samayaṃ nābhijānāti kṛtārthaḥ plavageśvaraḥ // 4.029.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varṣāsamayakālaṃ tu pratijñāya harīśvaraḥ / vyatītāṃś caturo māsān viharan nāvabudhyate // 4.029.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāmātyapariṣat krīḍan pānam evopasevate / śokadīneṣu nāsmāsu sugrīvaḥ kurute dayām // 4.029.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ucyatāṃ gaccha sugrīvas tvayā vatsa mahābala / mama roṣasya yadrūpaṃ brūyāś cainam idaṃ vacaḥ // 4.029.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca saṃkucitaḥ panthā yena vālī hato gataḥ / samaye tiṣṭha sugrīvamā vālipatham anvagāḥ // 4.029.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eka eva raṇe vālī śareṇa nihato mayā / tvāṃ tu satyād atikrāntaṃ haniṣyāmi sabāndhavam // 4.029.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad evaṃ vihite kārye yad dhitaṃ puruṣarṣabha / tat tad brūhi naraśreṣṭha tvara kālavyatikramaḥ // 4.029.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuruṣva satyaṃ mayi vānareśvara; pratiśrutaṃ dharmam avekṣya śāśvatam / mā vālinaṃ pretya gato yamakṣayaṃ; tvam adya paśyer mama coditaiḥ śaraiḥ // 4.029.051	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
sa pūrvajaṃ tīvravivṛddhakopaṃ; lālapyamānaṃ prasamīkṣya dīnam / cakāra tīvrāṃ matim ugratejā; harīśvaramānavavaṃśanāthaḥ // 4.029.052	upajāti (triṣṭubh: ajñātam [jjjgg], upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa kāminaṃ dīnam adīnasattvaḥ; śokābhipannaṃ samudīrṇakopam / narendrasūnur naradevaputraṃ; rāmānujaḥ pūrvajam ity uvāca // 4.030.001	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
na vānaraḥ sthāsyati sādhuvṛtte; na maṃsyate kāryaphalānuṣaṅgān / na bhakṣyate vānararājyalakṣmīṃ; tathā hi nābhikramate 'sya buddhiḥ // 4.030.002	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
matikṣayād grāmyasukheṣu saktas; tava prasādāpratikārabuddhiḥ / hato 'grajaṃ paśyatu vālinaṃ sa; na rājyam evaṃ viguṇasya deyam // 4.030.003	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
na dhāraye kopam udīrṇavegaṃ; nihanmi sugrīvam asatyam adya / haripravīraiḥ saha vāliputro; narendrapatnyā vicayaṃ karotu // 4.030.004	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tam āttabāṇāsanam utpatantaṃ; niveditārthaṃ raṇacaṇḍakopam / uvaca rāmaḥ paravīrahantā; svavekṣitaṃ sānunayaṃ ca vākyam // 4.030.005	upajāti (triṣṭubh: ajñātam [ntjgg], upendravajrā [jtjgg])
na hi vai tvadvidho loke pāpam evaṃ samācaret / pāpam āryeṇa yo hanti sa vīraḥ puruṣottamaḥ // 4.030.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nedam adya tvayā grāhyaṃ sādhuvṛttena lakṣmaṇa / tāṃ prītim anuvartasva pūrvavṛttaṃ ca saṃgatam // 4.030.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāmopahitayā vācā rūkṣāṇi parivarjayan / vaktum arhasi sugrīvaṃ vyatītaṃ kālaparyaye // 4.030.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so' grajenānuśiṣṭārtho yathāvat puruṣarṣabhaḥ / praviveśa purīṃ vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā // 4.030.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śubhamatiḥ prājño bhrātuḥ priyahite rataḥ / lakṣmaṇaḥ pratisaṃrabdho jagāma bhavanaṃ kapeḥ // 4.030.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śakrabāṇāsanaprakhyaṃ dhanuḥ kālāntakopamaḥ / pragṛhya giriśṛṅgābhaṃ mandaraḥ sānumān iva // 4.030.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathoktakārī vacanam uttaraṃ caiva sottaram / bṛhaspatisamo buddhyā mattvā rāmānujas tadā // 4.030.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmakrodhasamutthena bhrātuḥ kopāgninā vṛtaḥ / prabhañjana ivāprītaḥ prayayau lakṣmaṇas tadā // 4.030.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sālatālāśvakarṇāṃś ca tarasā pātayan bahūn / paryasyan girikūṭāni drumān anyāṃś ca vegataḥ // 4.030.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śilāś ca śakalīkurvan padbhyāṃ gaja ivāśugaḥ / dūram ekapadaṃ tyaktvā yayau kāryavaśād drutam // 4.030.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām apaśyad balākīrṇāṃ harirājamahāpurīm / durgām ikṣvākuśārdūlaḥ kiṣkindhāṃ girisaṃkaṭe // 4.030.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
roṣāt prasphuramāṇauṣṭhaḥ sugrīvaṃ prati kalṣmaṇaḥ / dadarśa vānarān bhīmān kiṣkindhāyā bahiścarān // 4.030.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailaśṛṅgāṇi śataśaḥ pravṛddhāṃś ca mahīruhān / jagṛhuḥ kuñjaraprakhyā vānarāḥ parvatāntare // 4.030.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān gṛhītapraharaṇān harīn dṛṣṭvā tu lakṣmaṇaḥ / babhūva dviguṇaṃ kruddho bahvindhana ivānalaḥ // 4.030.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ te bhayaparītāṅgāḥ kruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā plavaṃgamāḥ / kālamṛtyuyugāntābhaṃ śataśo vidrutā diśaḥ // 4.030.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sugrīvabhavanaṃ praviśya haripuṃgavāḥ / krodham āgamanaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇasya nyavedayan // 4.030.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tārayā sahitaḥ kāmī saktaḥ kapivṛṣo rahaḥ / na teṣāṃ kapivīrāṇāṃ śuśrāva vacanaṃ tadā // 4.030.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sacivasaṃdiṣṭā harayo romaharṣaṇāḥ / girikuñjarameghābhā nagaryā niryayus tadā // 4.030.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhā ghorāḥ sarve vikṛtadarśanāḥ / sarve śārdūladarpāś ca sarve ca vikṛtānanāḥ // 4.030.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśanāgabalāḥ ke cit ke cid daśaguṇottarāḥ / ke cin nāgasahasrasya babhūvus tulyavikramāḥ // 4.030.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtsnāṃ hi kapibhir vyāptāṃ drumahastair mahābalaiḥ / apaśyal lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ kiṣkindhāṃ tāṃ durāsadam // 4.030.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te harayaḥ sarve prākāraparikhāntarāt / niṣkramyodagrasattvās tu tasthur āviṣkṛtaṃ tadā // 4.030.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvasya pramādaṃ ca pūrvajaṃ cārtam ātmavān / buddhvā kopavaśaṃ vīraḥ punar eva jagāma saḥ // 4.030.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dīrghoṣṇamahocchvāsaḥ kopasaṃraktalocanaḥ / babhūva naraśārdūlasadhūma iva pāvakaḥ // 4.030.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṇaśalyasphurajjihvaḥ sāyakāsanabhogavān / svatejoviṣasaṃghātaḥ pañcāsya iva pannagaḥ // 4.030.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ nāgendram iva kopitam / samāsādyāṅgadas trāsād viṣādam agamad bhṛśam // 4.030.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'ṅgadaṃ roṣatāmrākṣaḥ saṃdideśa mahāyaśāḥ / sugrīvaḥ kathyatāṃ vatsa mamāgamanam ity uta // 4.030.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa rāmānujaḥ prāptas tvatsakāśam ariṃdamaḥ / bhrātur vyasanasaṃtapto dvāri tiṣṭhati lakṣmaṇaḥ // 4.030.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā śokāviṣṭo 'ṅgado 'bravīt / pituḥ samīpam āgamya saumitrir ayam āgataḥ // 4.030.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te mahaughanibhaṃ dṛṣṭvā vajrāśanisamasvanam / siṃhanādaṃ samaṃ cakrur lakṣmaṇasya samīpataḥ // 4.030.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena śabdena mahatā pratyabudhyata vānaraḥ / madavihvalatāmrākṣo vyākulasragvibhūṣaṇaḥ // 4.030.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāṅgadavacaḥ śrutvā tenaiva ca samāgatau / mantriṇo vānarendrasya saṃmatodāradarśinau // 4.030.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plakṣaś caiva prabhāvaś ca mantriṇāv arthadharmayoḥ / vaktum uccāvacaṃ prāptaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tau śaśaṃsatuḥ // 4.030.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasādayitvā sugrīvaṃ vacanaiḥ sāmaniścitaiḥ / āsīnaṃ paryupāsīnau yathā śakraṃ marutpatim // 4.030.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyasaṃdhau mahābhāgau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / vayasya bhāvaṃ saṃprāptau rājyārhau rājyadāyinau // 4.030.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayor eko dhanuṣpāṇir dvāri tiṣṭhati lakṣmaṇaḥ / yasya bhītāḥ pravepante nādān muñcanti vānarāḥ // 4.030.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa eṣa rāghavabhrātā lakṣmaṇo vākyasārathiḥ / vyavasāya rathaḥ prāptas tasya rāmasya śāsanāt // 4.030.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya mūrdhnā praṇamya tvaṃ saputraḥ saha bandhubhiḥ / rājaṃs tiṣṭha svasamaye bhava satyapratiśravaḥ // 4.030.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvaḥ sacivaiḥ saha / lakṣmaṇaṃ kupitaṃ śrutvā mumocāsanam ātmavān // 4.031.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sacivān abravīd vākyaṃ niścitya gurulāghavam / mantrajñān mantrakuśalo mantreṣu pariniṣṭhitaḥ // 4.031.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na me durvyāhṛtaṃ kiṃ cin nāpi me duranuṣṭhitam / lakṣmaṇo rāghavabhrātā kruddhaḥ kim iti cintaye // 4.031.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asuhṛdbhir mamāmitrair nityam antaradarśibhiḥ / mama doṣān asaṃbhūtāñ śrāvito rāghavānujaḥ // 4.031.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra tāvad yathābuddhi sarvair eva yathāvidhi / bhavadbhir niścayas tasya vijñeyo nipuṇaṃ śanaiḥ // 4.031.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na khalv asti mama trāso lakṣmaṇān nāpi rāghavāt / mitraṃ tv asthāna kupitaṃ janayaty eva saṃbhramam // 4.031.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā sukaraṃ mitraṃ duṣkaraṃ paripālanam / anityatvāt tu cittānāṃ prītir alpe 'pi bhidyate // 4.031.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atonimittaṃ trasto 'haṃ rāmeṇa tu mahātmanā / yan mamopakṛtaṃ śakyaṃ pratikartuṃ na tan mayā // 4.031.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīveṇaivam uktas tu hanumān haripuṃgavaḥ / uvāca svena tarkeṇa madhye vānaramantriṇām // 4.031.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā naitad āścaryaṃ yat tvaṃ harigaṇeśvara / na vismarasi susnigdham upakārakṛtaṃ śubham // 4.031.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghaveṇa tu śūreṇa bhayam utsṛjya dūrataḥ / tvatpriyārthaṃ hato vālī śakratulyaparākramaḥ // 4.031.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā praṇayāt kruddho rāghavo nātra saṃśayaḥ / bhrātaraṃ sa prahitavāṃl lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam // 4.031.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ pramatto na jānīṣe kālaṃ kalavidāṃ vara / phullasaptacchadaśyāmā pravṛttā tu śarac chivā // 4.031.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirmala grahanakṣatrā dyauḥ pranaṣṭabalāhakā / prasannāś ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca // 4.031.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptam udyogakālaṃ tu nāvaiṣi haripuṃgava / tvaṃ pramatta iti vyaktaṃ lakṣmaṇo 'yam ihāgataḥ // 4.031.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārtasya hṛtadārasya paruṣaṃ puruṣāntarāt / vacanaṃ marṣaṇīyaṃ te rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ // 4.031.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtāparādhasya hi te nānyat paśyāmy ahaṃ kṣamam / antareṇāñjaliṃ baddhvā lakṣmaṇasya prasādanāt // 4.031.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niyuktair mantribhir vācyo avaśyaṃ pārthivo hitam / ata eva bhayaṃ tyaktvā bravīmy avadhṛtaṃ vacaḥ // 4.031.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhikruddhaḥ samartho hi cāpam udyamya rāghavaḥ / sadevāsuragandharvaṃ vaśe sthāpayituṃ jagat // 4.031.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na sa kṣamaḥ kopayituṃ yaḥ prasādya punar bhavet / pūrvopakāraṃ smaratā kṛtajñena viśeṣataḥ // 4.031.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya mūrdhnā praṇamya tvaṃ saputraḥ sasuhṛjjanaḥ / rājaṃs tiṣṭha svasamaye bhartur bhāryeva tadvaśe // 4.031.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na rāmarāmānujaśāsanaṃ tvayā; kapīndrayuktaṃ manasāpy apohitum / mano hi te jñāsyati mānuṣaṃ balaṃ; sarāghavasyāsya surendravarcasaḥ // 4.031.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
atha pratisamādiṣṭo lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā / praviveśa guhāṃ ghorāṃ kiṣkindhāṃ rāmaśāsanāt // 4.032.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvārasthā harayas tatra mahākāyā mahābalāḥ / babhūvur lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ // 4.032.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niḥśvasantaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddhaṃ daśarathātmajam / babhūvur harayas trastā na cainaṃ paryavārayan // 4.032.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ ratnamayīṃ śrīmān divyāṃ puṣpitakānanām / ramyāṃ ratnasamākīrṇāṃ dadarśa mahatīṃ guhām // 4.032.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harmyaprāsādasaṃbādhāṃ nānāpaṇyopaśobhitām / sarvakāmaphalair vṛkṣaiḥ puṣpitair upaśobhitām // 4.032.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devagandharvaputraiś ca vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ / divya mālyāmbaradhāraiḥ śobhitāṃ priyadarśanaiḥ // 4.032.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candanāgarupadmānāṃ gandhaiḥ surabhigandhinām / maireyāṇāṃ madhūnāṃ ca saṃmoditamahāpathām // 4.032.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vindhyamerugiriprasthaiḥ prāsādair naikabhūmibhiḥ / dadarśa girinadyaś ca vimalās tatra rāghavaḥ // 4.032.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadasya gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ maindasya dvividasya ca / gavayasya gavākṣasya gajasya śarabhasya ca // 4.032.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidyunmāleś ca saṃpāteḥ sūryākṣasya hanūmataḥ / vīrabāhoḥ subāhoś ca nalasya ca mahātmanaḥ // 4.032.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumudasya suṣeṇasya tārajāmbavatos tathā / dadhivaktrasya nīlasya supāṭalasunetrayoḥ // 4.032.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eteṣāṃ kapimukhyānāṃ rājamārge mahātmanām / dadarśa gṛhamukhyāni mahāsārāṇi lakṣmaṇaḥ // 4.032.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇḍurābhraprakāśāni divyamālyayutāni ca / prabhūtadhanadhānyāni strīratnaiḥ śobhitāni ca // 4.032.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇḍureṇa tu śailena parikṣiptaṃ durāsadam / vānarendragṛhaṃ ramyaṃ mahendrasadanopamam // 4.032.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śulkaiḥ prāsādaśikharaiḥ kailāsaśikharopamaiḥ / sarvakāmaphalair vṛkṣaiḥ puṣṭitair upaśobhitam // 4.032.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahendradattaiḥ śrīmadbhir nīlajīmūtasaṃnibhaiḥ / divyapuṣpaphalair vṛkṣaiḥ śītacchāyair manoramaiḥ // 4.032.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haribhiḥ saṃvṛtadvāraṃ balibhiḥ śastrapāṇibhiḥ / divyamālyāvṛtaṃ śubhraṃ taptakāñcanatoraṇam // 4.032.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvasya gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ praviveśa mahābalaḥ / avāryamāṇaḥ saumitrir mahābhram iva bhāskaraḥ // 4.032.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sapta kakṣyā dharmātmā yānāsanasamāvṛtāḥ / praviśya sumahad guptaṃ dadarśāntaḥpuraṃ mahat // 4.032.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haimarājataparyaṅkair bahubhiś ca varāsanaiḥ / mahārhāstaraṇopetais tatra tatropaśobhitam // 4.032.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśann eva satataṃ śuśrāva madhurasvaram / tantrīgītasamākīrṇaṃ samagītapadākṣaram // 4.032.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahvīś ca vividhākārā rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ / striyaḥ sugrīvabhavane dadarśa sa mahābalaḥ // 4.032.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvābhijanasaṃpannāś citramālyakṛtasrajaḥ / varamālyakṛtavyagrā bhūṣaṇottamabhūṣitāḥ // 4.032.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātṛptān nāti ca vyagrān nānudāttaparicchadān / sugrīvānucarāṃś cāpi lakṣayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ // 4.032.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sugrīvam āsīnaṃ kāñcane paramāsane / mahārhāstaraṇopete dadarśādityasaṃnibham // 4.032.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyābharaṇacitrāṅgaṃ divyarūpaṃ yaśasvinam / divyamālyāmbaradharaṃ mahendram iva durjayam // 4.032.026.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyābharaṇamālyābhiḥ pramadābhiḥ samāvṛtam // 4.032.026.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rumāṃ tu vīraḥ parirabhya gāḍhaṃ; varāsanastho varahemavarṇaḥ / dadarśa saumitrim adīnasattvaṃ; viśālanetraḥ suviśālanetram // 4.032.027	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tam apratihataṃ kruddhaṃ praviṣṭaṃ puruṣarṣabham / sugrīvo lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā babhūva vyathitendriyaḥ // 4.033.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kruddhaṃ niḥśvasamānaṃ taṃ pradīptam iva tejasā / bhrātur vyasanasaṃtaptaṃ dṛṣṭvā daśarathātmajam // 4.033.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utpapāta hariśreṣṭho hitvā sauvarṇam āsanam / mahān mahendrasya yathā svalaṃkṛta iva dhvajaḥ // 4.033.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utpatantam anūtpetū rumāprabhṛtayaḥ striyaḥ / sugrīvaṃ gagane pūrṇaṃ candraṃ tārāgaṇā iva // 4.033.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃraktanayanaḥ śrīmān vicacāla kṛtāñjaliḥ / babhūvāvasthitas tatra kalpavṛkṣo mahān iva // 4.033.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rumā dvitīyaṃ sugrīvaṃ nārīmadhyagataṃ sthitam / abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ satāraṃ śaśinaṃ yathā // 4.033.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sattvābhijanasaṃpannaḥ sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ / kṛtajñaḥ satyavādī ca rājā loke mahīyate // 4.033.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tu rājā sthito 'dharme mitrāṇām upakāriṇām / mithyāpratijñāṃ kurute ko nṛśaṃsataras tataḥ // 4.033.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatam aśvānṛte hanti sahasraṃ tu gavānṛte / ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ hanti puruṣaḥ puruṣānṛte // 4.033.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvaṃ kṛtārtho mitrāṇāṃ na tat pratikaroti yaḥ / kṛtaghnaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sa vadhyaḥ plavageśvara // 4.033.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gīto 'yaṃ brahmaṇā ślokaḥ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ / dṛṣṭvā kṛtaghnaṃ kruddhena taṃ nibodha plavaṃgama // 4.033.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā / niṣkṛtir vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ // 4.033.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anāryas tvaṃ kṛtaghnaś ca mithyāvādī ca vānara / pūrvaṃ kṛtārtho rāmasya na tat pratikaroṣi yat // 4.033.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nanu nāma kṛtārthena tvayā rāmasya vānara / sītāyā mārgaṇe yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ kṛtam icchatā // 4.033.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ grāmyeṣu bhogeṣu sakto mithyā pratiśravaḥ / na tvāṃ rāmo vijānīte sarpaṃ maṇḍūkarāviṇam // 4.033.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahābhāgena rāmeṇa pāpaḥ karuṇavedinā / harīṇāṃ prāpito rājyaṃ tvaṃ durātmā mahātmanā // 4.033.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtaṃ cen nābhijānīṣe rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / sadyas tvaṃ niśitair bāṇair hato drakṣyasi vālinam // 4.033.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca saṃkucitaḥ panthā yena vālī hato gataḥ / samaye tiṣṭha sugrīva mā vālipatham anvagāḥ // 4.033.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na nūnam ikṣvākuvarasya kārmukāc; cyutāñ śarān paśyasi vajrasaṃnibhān / tataḥ sukhaṃ nāma niṣevase sukhī; na rāmakāryaṃ manasāpy avekṣase // 4.033.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tathā bruvāṇaṃ saumitriṃ pradīptam iva tejasā / abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ tārā tārādhipanibhānanā // 4.034.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naivaṃ lakṣmaṇa vaktavyo nāyaṃ paruṣam arhati / harīṇām īśvaraḥ śrotuṃ tava vaktrād viśeṣataḥ // 4.034.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naivākṛtajñaḥ sugrīvo na śaṭho nāpi dāruṇaḥ / naivānṛtakatho vīra na jihmaś ca kapīśvaraḥ // 4.034.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upakāraṃ kṛtaṃ vīro nāpy ayaṃ vismṛtaḥ kapiḥ / rāmeṇa vīra sugrīvo yad anyair duṣkaraṃ raṇe // 4.034.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaprasādāt kīrtiṃ ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam / prāptavān iha sugrīvo rumāṃ māṃ ca paraṃtapa // 4.034.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suduḥkhaṃ śāyitaḥ pūrvaṃ prāpyedaṃ sukham uttamam / prāptakālaṃ na jānīte viśvāmitro yathā muniḥ // 4.034.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghṛtācyāṃ kila saṃsakto daśavarṣāṇi lakṣmaṇa / aho 'manyata dharmātmā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ // 4.034.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi prāptaṃ na jānīte kālaṃ kālavidāṃ varaḥ / viśvāmitro mahātejāḥ kiṃ punar yaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ // 4.034.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dehadharmaṃ gatasyāsya pariśrāntasya lakṣmaṇa / avitṛptasya kāmeṣu rāmaḥ kṣantum ihārhati // 4.034.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca roṣavaśaṃ tāta gantum arhasi lakṣmaṇa / niścayārtham avijñāya sahasā prākṛto yathā // 4.034.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sattvayuktā hi puruṣās tvadvidhāḥ puruṣarṣabha / avimṛśya na roṣasya sahasā yānti vaśyatām // 4.034.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasādaye tvāṃ dharmajña sugrīvārthe samāhitā / mahān roṣasamutpannaḥ saṃrambhas tyajyatām ayam // 4.034.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rumāṃ māṃ kapirājyaṃ ca dhanadhānyavasūni ca / rāmapriyārthaṃ sugrīvas tyajed iti matir mama // 4.034.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāneṣvyati sugrīvaḥ sītayā saha rāghavam / śaśāṅkam iva rohiṣyā nihatvā rāvaṇaṃ raṇe // 4.034.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatakoṭisahasrāṇi laṅkāyāṃ kila rakṣasām / ayutāni ca ṣaṭtriṃśat sahasrāṇi śatāni ca // 4.034.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahatvā tāṃś ca durdharṣān rākṣasān kāmarūpiṇaḥ / na śakyo rāvaṇo hantuṃ yena sā maithilī hṛtā // 4.034.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te na śakyā raṇe hantum asahāyena lakṣmaṇa / rāvaṇaḥ krūrakarmā ca sugrīveṇa viśeṣataḥ // 4.034.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ākhyātavān vālī sa hy abhijño harīśvaraḥ / āgamas tu na me vyaktaḥ śravāt tasya bravīmy aham // 4.034.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvatsahāyanimittaṃ vai preṣitā haripuṃgavāḥ / ānetuṃ vānarān yuddhe subahūn hariyūthapān // 4.034.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃś ca pratīkṣamāṇo 'yaṃ vikrāntān sumahābalān / rāghavasyārthasiddhyarthaṃ na niryāti harīśvaraḥ // 4.034.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtā tu saṃsthā saumitre sugrīveṇa yathāpurā / adya tair vānarair sarvair āgantavyaṃ mahābalaiḥ // 4.034.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛkṣakoṭisahasrāṇi golāṅgūlaśatāni ca / adya tvām upayāsyanti jahi kopam ariṃdama // 4.034.022.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
koṭyo 'nekās tu kākutstha kapīnāṃ dīptatejasām // 4.034.022.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava hi mukham idaṃ nirīkṣya kopāt; kṣatajanibhe nayane nirīkṣamāṇāḥ / harivaravanitā na yānti śāntiṃ; prathamabhayasya hi śaṅkitāḥ sma sarvāḥ // 4.034.023	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
ity uktas tārayā vākyaṃ praśritaṃ dharmasaṃhitam / mṛdusvabhāvaḥ saumitriḥ pratijagrāha tadvacaḥ // 4.035.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin pratigṛhīte tu vākye harigaṇeśvaraḥ / lakṣmaṇāt sumahat trāsaṃ vastraṃ klinnam ivātyajat // 4.035.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kaṇṭhagataṃ mālyaṃ citraṃ bahuguṇaṃ mahat / ciccheda vimadaś cāsīt sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ // 4.035.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa lakṣmaṇaṃ bhīmabalaṃ sarvavānarasattamaḥ / abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ sugrīvaḥ saṃpraharṣayan // 4.035.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pranaṣṭā śrīś ca kīrtiś ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam / rāmaprasādāt saumitre punaḥ prāptam idaṃ mayā // 4.035.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaḥ śaktas tasya devasya khyātasya svena karmaṇā / tādṛśaṃ vikramaṃ vīra pratikartum ariṃdama // 4.035.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāṃ prāpsyati dharmātmā vadhiṣyati ca rāvaṇam / sahāyamātreṇa mayā rāghavaḥ svena tejasā // 4.035.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahāyakṛtyaṃ hi tasya yena sapta mahādrumāḥ / śailaś ca vasudhā caiva bāṇenaikena dāritāḥ // 4.035.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanur visphāramāṇasya yasya śabdena lakṣmaṇa / saśailā kampitā bhūmiḥ sahāyais tasya kiṃ nu vai // 4.035.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anuyātrāṃ narendrasya kariṣye 'haṃ nararṣabha / gacchato rāvaṇaṃ hantuṃ vairiṇaṃ sapuraḥsaram // 4.035.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi kiṃ cid atikrāntaṃ viśvāsāt praṇayena vā / preṣyasya kṣamitavyaṃ me na kaś cin nāparādhyati // 4.035.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti tasya bruvāṇasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ / abhaval lakṣmaṇaḥ prītaḥ preṃṇā cedam uvāca ha // 4.035.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā hi mama bhrātā sanātho vānareśvara / tvayā nāthena sugrīva praśritena viśeṣataḥ // 4.035.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas te prabhāvaḥ sugrīva yac ca te śaucam uttamam / arhas taṃ kapirājyasya śriyaṃ bhoktum anuttamām // 4.035.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahāyena ca sugrīva tvayā rāmaḥ pratāpavān / vadhiṣyati raṇe śatrūn acirān nātra saṃśayaḥ // 4.035.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmajñasya kṛtajñasya saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ / upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca sugrīva tava bhāṣitam // 4.035.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
doṣajñaḥ sati sāmarthye ko 'nyo bhāṣitum arhati / varjayitvā mama jyeṣṭhaṃ tvāṃ ca vānarasattama // 4.035.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśaś cāsi rāmasya vikrameṇa balena ca / sahāyo daivatair dattaś cirāya haripuṃgava // 4.035.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tu śīghram ito vīra niṣkrāma tvaṃ mayā saha / sāntvayasva vayasyaṃ ca bhāryāharaṇaduḥkhitam // 4.035.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yac ca śokābhibhūtasya śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam / mayā tvaṃ paruṣāṇy uktas tac ca tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi // 4.035.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu sugrīvo lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā / hanumantaṃ sthitaṃ pārśve sacivaṃ vākyam abravīt // 4.036.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahendrahimavadvindhyakailāsaśikhareṣu ca / mandare pāṇḍuśikhare pañcaśaileṣu ye sthitāḥ // 4.036.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taruṇādityavarṇeṣu bhrājamāneṣu sarvaśaḥ / parvateṣu samudrānte paścimasyāṃ tu ye diśi // 4.036.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādityabhavane caiva girau saṃdhyābhrasaṃnibhe / padmatālavanaṃ bhīmaṃ saṃśritā haripuṃgavāḥ // 4.036.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
añjanāmbudasaṃkāśāḥ kuñjarapratimaujasaḥ / añjane parate caiva ye vasanti plavaṃgamāḥ // 4.036.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manaḥśilā guhāvāsā vānarāḥ kanakaprabhāḥ / merupārśvagatāś caiva ye ca dhūmragiriṃ śritāḥ // 4.036.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taruṇādityavarṇāś ca parvate ye mahāruṇe / pibanto madhumaireyaṃ bhīmavegāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ // 4.036.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaneṣu ca suramyeṣu sugandhiṣu mahatsu ca / tāpasānāṃ ca ramyeṣu vanānteṣu samantataḥ // 4.036.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃs tāṃs tvam ānaya kṣipraṃ pṛthivyāṃ sarvavānarān / sāmadānādibhiḥ kalpair āśu preṣaya vānarān // 4.036.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
preṣitāḥ prathamaṃ ye ca mayā dūtā mahājavāḥ / tvaraṇārthaṃ tu bhūyas tvaṃ harīn saṃpreṣayāparān // 4.036.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye prasaktāś ca kāmeṣu dīrghasūtrāś ca vānarāḥ / ihānayasva tān sarvāñ śīghraṃ tu mama śāsanāt // 4.036.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahobhir daśabhir ye ca nāgacchanti mamājñayā / hantavyās te durātmāno rājaśāsanadūṣakāḥ // 4.036.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatāny atha sahasrāṇi koṭyaś ca mama śāsanāt / prayāntu kapisiṃhānāṃ diśo mama mate sthitāḥ // 4.036.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
meghaparvatasaṃkāśāś chādayanta ivāmbaram / ghorarūpāḥ kapiśreṣṭhā yāntu macchāsanād itaḥ // 4.036.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gatijñā gatiṃ gatvā pṛthivyāṃ sarvavānarāḥ / ānayantu harīn sarvāṃs tvaritāḥ śāsanān mama // 4.036.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya vānararājasya śrutvā vāyusuto vacaḥ / dikṣu sarvāsu vikrāntān preṣayām āsa vānarān // 4.036.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te padaṃ viṣṇuvikrāntaṃ patatrijyotiradhvagāḥ / prayātāḥ prahitā rājñā harayas tatkṣaṇena vai // 4.036.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te samudreṣu giriṣu vaneṣu ca saritsu ca / vānarā vānarān sarvān rāmahetor acodayan // 4.036.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛtyukālopamasyājñāṃ rājarājasya vānarāḥ / sugrīvasyāyayuḥ śrutvā sugrīvabhayadarśinaḥ // 4.036.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te 'ñjanasaṃkāśā gires tasmān mahājavāḥ / tisraḥ koṭyaḥ plavaṃgānāṃ niryayur yatra rāghavaḥ // 4.036.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
astaṃ gacchati yatrārkas tasmin girivare ratāḥ / taptahemasamābhāsās tasmāt koṭyo daśacyutāḥ // 4.036.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kailāsa śikharebhyaś ca siṃhakesaravarcasām / tataḥ koṭisahasrāṇi vānarāṇām upāgaman // 4.036.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phalamūlena jīvanto himavantam upāśritāḥ / teṣāṃ koṭisahasrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ samavartata // 4.036.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgāraka samānānāṃ bhīmānāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām / vindhyād vānarakoṭīnāṃ sahasrāṇy apatan drutam // 4.036.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣīrodavelānilayās tamālavanavāsinaḥ / nārikelāśanāś caiva teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate // 4.036.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanebhyo gahvarebhyaś ca saridbhyaś ca mahājavāḥ / āgacchad vānarī senā pibantīva divākaram // 4.036.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tu tvarayituṃ yātā vānarāḥ sarvavānarān / te vīrā himavac chailaṃ dadṛśus taṃ mahādrumam // 4.036.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin girivare ramye yajño maheśvaraḥ purā / sarvadevamanastoṣo babhau divyo manoharaḥ // 4.036.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
annaviṣyandajātāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca / amṛtasvādukalpāni dadṛśus tatra vānarāḥ // 4.036.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad anna saṃbhavaṃ divyaṃ phalaṃ mūlaṃ manoharam / yaḥ kaś cit sakṛd aśnāti māsaṃ bhavati tarpitaḥ // 4.036.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni mūlāni divyāni phalāni ca phalāśanāḥ / auṣadhāni ca divyāni jagṛhur hariyūthapāḥ // 4.036.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāc ca yajñāyatanāt puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca / āninyur vānarā gatvā sugrīvapriyakāraṇāt // 4.036.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu sarve harivarāḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvavānarān / saṃcodayitvā tvaritaṃ yūthānāṃ jagmur agrataḥ // 4.036.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu tena muhūrtena yūthapāḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ / kiṣkindhāṃ tvarayā prāptāḥ sugrīvo yatra vānaraḥ // 4.036.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gṛhītvauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ phalaṃ mūlaṃ ca vānarāḥ / taṃ pratigrāhayām āsur vacanaṃ cedam abruvan // 4.036.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve parigatāḥ śailāḥ samudrāś ca vanāni ca / pṛthivyāṃ vānarāḥ sarve śāsanād upayānti te // 4.036.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ śrutvā tato hṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ / pratijagrāha ca prītas teṣāṃ sarvam upāyanam // 4.036.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya ca tat sarvam upānayam upāhṛtam / vānarān sāntvayitvā ca sarvān eva vyasarjayat // 4.037.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visarjayitvā sa harīñ śūrāṃs tān kṛtakarmaṇaḥ / mene kṛtārtham ātmānaṃ rāghavaṃ ca mahābalam // 4.037.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa lakṣmaṇo bhīmabalaṃ sarvavānarasattamam / abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ sugrīvaṃ saṃpraharṣayan // 4.037.003.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṣkindhāyā viniṣkrāma yadi te saumya rocate // 4.037.003.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya subhāṣitam / sugrīvaḥ paramaprīto vākyam etad uvāca ha // 4.037.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bhavatu gacchāmaḥ stheyaṃ tvacchāsane mayā / tam evam uktvā sugrīvo lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣmaṇam // 4.037.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visarjayām āsa tadā tārām anyāś ca yoṣitaḥ / etety uccair harivarān sugrīvaḥ samudāharat // 4.037.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā harayaḥ śīghram āyayuḥ / baddhāñjalipuṭāḥ sarve ye syuḥ strīdarśanakṣamāḥ // 4.037.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān uvāca tataḥ prāptān rājārkasadṛśaprabhaḥ / upasthāpayata kṣipraṃ śibikāṃ mama vānarāḥ // 4.037.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya harayaḥ śīghravikramāḥ / samupasthāpayām āsuḥ śibikāṃ priyadarśanām // 4.037.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām upasthāpitāṃ dṛṣṭvā śibikāṃ vānarādhipaḥ / lakṣmaṇāruhyatāṃ śīghram iti saumitrim abravīt // 4.037.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā kāñcanaṃ yānaṃ sugrīvaḥ sūryasaṃnibham / bṛhadbhir haribhir yuktam āruroha salakṣmaṇaḥ // 4.037.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇḍureṇātapatreṇa dhriyamāṇena mūrdhani / śuklaiś ca bālavyajanair dhūyamānaiḥ samantataḥ // 4.037.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkhabherīninādaiś ca bandibhiś cābhivanditaḥ / niryayau prāpya sugrīvo rājyaśriyam anuttamām // 4.037.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vānaraśatais tīṣkṇair bahubhiḥ śastrapāṇibhiḥ / parikīrṇo yayau tatra yatra rāmo vyavasthitaḥ // 4.037.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ deśam anuprāpya śreṣṭhaṃ rāmaniṣevitam / avātaran mahātejāḥ śibikāyāḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ // 4.037.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsādya ca tato rāmaṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭo 'bhavat / kṛtāñjalau sthite tasmin vānarāś cabhavaṃs tathā // 4.037.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṭākam iva tad dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ kuḍmalapaṅkajam / vānarāṇāṃ mahat sainyaṃ sugrīve prītimān abhūt // 4.037.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pādayoḥ patitaṃ mūrdhnā tam utthāpya harīśvaram / preṃṇā ca bahumānāc ca rāghavaḥ pariṣasvaje // 4.037.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pariṣvajya ca dharmātmā niṣīdeti tato 'bravīt / taṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā kṣitau rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ // 4.037.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca kāle yas tu niṣevate / vibhajya satataṃ vīra sa rājā harisattama // 4.037.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hitvā dharmaṃ tathārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ yas tu niṣevate / sa vṛkṣāgre yathā suptaḥ patitaḥ pratibudhyate // 4.037.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amitrāṇāṃ vadhe yukto mitrāṇāṃ saṃgrahe rataḥ / trivargaphalabhoktā tu rājā dharmeṇa yujyate // 4.037.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udyogasamayas tv eṣa prāptaḥ śatruvināśana / saṃcintyatāṃ hi piṅgeśa haribhiḥ saha mantribhiḥ // 4.037.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu sugrīvo rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt // 4.037.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pranaṣṭā śrīś ca kīrtiś ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam / tvatprasādān mahābāho punaḥ prāptam idaṃ mayā // 4.037.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava devaprasadāc ca bhrātuś ca jayatāṃ vara / kṛtaṃ na pratikuryād yaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ sa dūṣakaḥ // 4.037.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete vānaramukhyāś ca śataśaḥ śatrusūdana / prāptāś cādāya balinaḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvavānarān // 4.037.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛkṣāś cāvahitāḥ śūrā golāṅgūlāś ca rāghava / kāntāra vanadurgāṇām abhijñā ghoradarśanāḥ // 4.037.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devagandharvaputrāś ca vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / svaiḥ svaiḥ parivṛtāḥ sainyair vartante pathi rāghava // 4.037.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭibhiś ca plavaṃgamāḥ / ayutaiś cāvṛtā vīrā śaṅkubhiś ca paraṃtapa // 4.037.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arbudair arbudaśatair madhyaiś cāntaiś ca vānarāḥ / samudraiś ca parārdhaiś ca harayo hariyūthapāḥ // 4.037.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgamiṣyanti te rājan mahendrasamavikramāḥ / merumandarasaṃkāśā vindhyamerukṛtālayāḥ // 4.037.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tvām abhigamiṣyanti rākṣasaṃ ye sabāndhavam / nihatya rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye hy ānayiṣyanti maithilīm // 4.037.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tam udyogam avekṣya buddhimān; haripravīrasya nideśavartinaḥ / babhūva harṣād vasudhādhipātmajaḥ; prabuddhanīlotpalatulyadarśanaḥ // 4.037.034	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
iti bruvāṇaṃ sugrīvaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ / bāhubhyāṃ saṃpariṣvajya pratyuvāca kṛtāñjalim // 4.038.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad indro varṣate varṣaṃ na tac citraṃ bhaved bhuvi / ādityo vā sahasrāṃśuḥ kuryād vitimiraṃ nabhaḥ // 4.038.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candramā raśmibhiḥ kuryāt pṛthivīṃ saumya nirmalām / tvadvidho vāpi mitrāṇāṃ pratikuryāt paraṃtapa // 4.038.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ tvayi na tac citraṃ bhaved yat saumya śobhanam / jānāmy ahaṃ tvāṃ sugrīva satataṃ priyavādinam // 4.038.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvatsanāthaḥ sakhe saṃkhye jetāsmi sakalān arīn / tvam eva me suhṛn mitraṃ sāhāyyaṃ kartum arhasi // 4.038.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jahārātmavināśāya vaidehīṃ rākṣasādhamaḥ / vañcayitvā tu paulomīm anuhlādo yathā śacīm // 4.038.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nacirāt taṃ haniṣyāmi rāvaṇaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / paulomyāḥ pitaraṃ dṛptaṃ śatakratur ivārihā // 4.038.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare caiva rajaḥ samabhivartata / uṣṇāṃ tīvrāṃ sahasrāṃśoś chādayad gagane prabhām // 4.038.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diśaḥ paryākulāś cāsan rajasā tena mūrchitāḥ / cacāla ca mahī sarvā saśailavanakānanā // 4.038.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nagendrasaṃkāśais tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭrair mahābalaiḥ / kṛtsnā saṃchāditā bhūmir asaṃkhyeyaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ // 4.038.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nimeṣāntaramātreṇa tatas tair hariyūthapaiḥ / koṭīśataparīvāraiḥ kāmarūpibhir āvṛtā // 4.038.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nādeyaiḥ pārvatīyaiś ca sāmudraiś ca mahābalaiḥ / haribhir meghanirhrādair anyaiś ca vanacāribhiḥ // 4.038.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taruṇādityavarṇaiś ca śaśigauraiś ca vānaraiḥ / padmakesaravarṇaiś ca śvetair merukṛtālayaiḥ // 4.038.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
koṭīsahasrair daśabhiḥ śrīmān parivṛtas tadā / vīraḥ śatabalir nāma vānaraḥ pratyadṛśyata // 4.038.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kāñcanaśailābhas tārāyā vīryavān pitā / anekair daśasāhasraiḥ koṭibhiḥ pratyadṛśyata // 4.038.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmakesarasaṃkāśas taruṇārkanibhānanaḥ / buddhimān vānaraśreṣṭhaḥ sarvavānarasattamaḥ // 4.038.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anīkair bahusāhasrair vānarāṇāṃ samanvitaḥ / pitā hanumataḥ śrīmān kesarī pratyadṛśyata // 4.038.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
golāṅgūlamahārājo gavākṣo bhīmavikramaḥ / vṛtaḥ koṭisahasreṇa vānarāṇām adṛśyata // 4.038.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛkṣāṇāṃ bhīmavegānāṃ dhūmraḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ / vṛtaḥ koṭisahasrābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ samabhivartata // 4.038.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahācalanibhair ghoraiḥ panaso nāma yūthapaḥ / ājagāma mahāvīryas tisṛbhiḥ koṭibhir vṛtaḥ // 4.038.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlāñjanacayākāro nīlo nāmātha yūthapaḥ / adṛśyata mahākāyaḥ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ // 4.038.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darīmukhaś ca balavān yūthapo 'bhyāyayau tadā / vṛtaḥ koṭisahasreṇa sugrīvaṃ samupasthitaḥ // 4.038.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maindaś ca dvividaś cobhāv aśviputrau mahāvalau / koṭikoṭisahasreṇa vānarāṇām adṛśyatām // 4.038.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ koṭisahasrāṇāṃ sahasreṇa śatena ca / pṛṣṭhato 'nugataḥ prāpto haribhir gandhamādanaḥ // 4.038.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ padmasahasreṇa vṛtaḥ śaṅkuśatena ca / yuvarājo 'ṅgadaḥ prāptaḥ pitṛtulyaparākramaḥ // 4.038.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tārādyutis tāro harir bhīmaparākramaḥ / pañcabhir harikoṭībhir dūrataḥ pratyadṛśyata // 4.038.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrajānuḥ kapir vīro yūthapaḥ pratyadṛśyata / ekādaśānāṃ koṭīnām īśvaras taiś ca saṃvṛtaḥ // 4.038.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rambhas tv anuprāptas taruṇādityasaṃnibhaḥ / ayutena vṛtaś caiva sahasreṇa śatena ca // 4.038.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yūthapatir vīro durmukho nāma vānaraḥ / pratyadṛśyata koṭibhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ parivṛto balī // 4.038.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kailāsaśikharākārair vānarair bhīmavikramaiḥ / vṛtaḥ koṭisahasreṇa hanumān pratyadṛśyata // 4.038.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nalaś cāpi mahāvīryaḥ saṃvṛto drumavāsibhiḥ / koṭīśatena saṃprāptaḥ sahasreṇa śatena ca // 4.038.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarabhaḥ kumudo vahnir vānaro rambha eva ca / ete cānye ca bahavo vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // 4.038.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āvṛtya pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca / āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ // 4.038.033.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyavartanta sugrīvaṃ sūryam abhragaṇā iva // 4.038.033.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kurvāṇā bahuśabdāṃś ca prahṛṣṭā balaśālinaḥ / śirobhir vānarendrāya sugrīvāya nyavedayan // 4.038.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apare vānaraśreṣṭhāḥ saṃgamya ca yathocitam / sugrīveṇa samāgamya sthitāḥ prāñjalayas tadā // 4.038.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvas tvarito rāme sarvāṃs tān vānararṣabhān / nivedayitvā dharmajñaḥ sthitaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // 4.038.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā sukhaṃ parvatanirjhareṣu; vaneṣu sarveṣu ca vānarendrāḥ / niveśayitvā vidhivad balāni; balaṃ balajñaḥ pratipattum īṣṭe // 4.038.037	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
atha rājā samṛddhārthaḥ sugrīvaḥ plavageśvaraḥ / uvāca naraśārdūlaṃ rāmaṃ parabalārdanam // 4.039.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgatā viniviṣṭāś ca balinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / vānarendrā mahendrābhā ye madviṣayavāsinaḥ // 4.039.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ta ime bahusāhasrair haribhir bhīmavikramaiḥ / āgatā vānarā ghorā daityadānavasaṃnibhāḥ // 4.039.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
khyātakarmāpadānāś ca balavanto jitaklamāḥ / parākrameṣu vikhyātā vyavasāyeṣu cottamāḥ // 4.039.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛthivyambucarā rāma nānānaganivāsinaḥ / koṭyagraśa ime prāptā vānarās tava kiṃkarāḥ // 4.039.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nideśavartinaḥ sarve sarve guruhite ratāḥ / abhipretam anuṣṭhātuṃ tava śakṣyanty ariṃdama // 4.039.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yan manyase naravyāghra prāptakālaṃ tad ucyatām / tat sainyaṃ tvadvaśe yuktam ājñāpayitum arhasi // 4.039.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmam eṣām idaṃ kāryaṃ viditaṃ mama tattvataḥ / tathāpi tu yathā tattvam ājñāpayitum arhasi // 4.039.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā bruvāṇaṃ sugrīvaṃ rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / bāhubhyāṃ saṃpariṣvajya idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 4.039.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jñāyatāṃ saumya vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā / sa ca deśo mahāprājña yasmin vasati rāvaṇaḥ // 4.039.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhigamya ca vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca / prāptakālaṃ vidhāsyāmi tasmin kāle saha tvayā // 4.039.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāham asmin prabhuḥ kārye vānareśa na lakṣmaṇaḥ / tvam asya hetuḥ kāryasya prabhuś ca plavageśvara // 4.039.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvam evājñāpaya vibho mama kāryaviniścayam / tvaṃ hi jānāsi yat kāryaṃ mama vīra na saṃśayaḥ // 4.039.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suhṛddvitīyo vikrāntaḥ prājñaḥ kālaviśeṣavit / bhavān asmaddhite yuktaḥ sukṛtārtho 'rthavittamaḥ // 4.039.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu sugrīvo vinataṃ nāma yūthapam / abravīd rāma sāmnidhye lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ // 4.039.015.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailābhaṃ meghanirghoṣam ūrjitaṃ plavageśvaram // 4.039.015.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
somasūryātmajaiḥ sārdhaṃ vānarair vānarottama / deśakālanayair yuktaḥ kāryākāryaviniścaye // 4.039.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛtaḥ śatasahasreṇa vānarāṇāṃ tarasvinām / adhigaccha diśaṃ pūrvāṃ saśailavanakānanām // 4.039.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra sītāṃ ca vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca / mārgadhvaṃ giridurgeṣu vaneṣu ca nadīṣu ca // 4.039.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nadīṃ bhāgīrathīṃ ramyāṃ sarayūṃ kauśikīṃ tathā / kālindīṃ yamunāṃ ramyāṃ yāmunaṃ ca mahāgirim // 4.039.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarasvatīṃ ca sindhuṃ ca śoṇaṃ maṇinibhodakam / mahīṃ kālamahīṃ caiva śailakānanaśobhitām // 4.039.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmamālān videhāṃś ca mālavān kāśikosalān / māgadhāṃś ca mahāgrāmān puṇḍrān vaṅgāṃs tathaiva ca // 4.039.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pattanaṃ kośakārāṇāṃ bhūmiṃ ca rajatākarām / sarvam etad vicetavyaṃ mṛgayadbhir tatas tataḥ // 4.039.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya dayitāṃ bhāryāṃ sītāṃ daśarataḥ snuṣām / samudram avagāḍhāṃś ca parvatān pattanāni ca // 4.039.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mandarasya ca ye koṭiṃ saṃśritāḥ ke cid āyatām / karṇaprāvaraṇāś caiva tathā cāpy oṣṭhakarṇakāḥ // 4.039.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghorā lohamukhāś caiva javanāś caikapādakāḥ / akṣayā balavantaś ca puruṣāḥ puruṣādakāḥ // 4.039.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kirātāḥ karṇacūḍāś ca hemāṅgāḥ priyadarśanāḥ / āmamīnāśanās tatra kirātā dvīpavāsinaḥ // 4.039.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarjalacarā ghorā naravyāghrā iti śrutāḥ / eteṣām ālayāḥ sarve viceyāḥ kānanaukasaḥ // 4.039.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
giribhir ye ca gamyante plavanena plavena ca / ratnavantaṃ yavadvīpaṃ saptarājyopaśobhitam // 4.039.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suvarṇarūpyakaṃ caiva suvarṇākaramaṇḍitam / yavadvīpam atikramya śiśiro nāma parvataḥ // 4.039.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divaṃ spṛśati śṛṅgeṇa devadānavasevitaḥ / eteṣāṃ giridurgeṣu pratāpeṣu vaneṣu ca // 4.039.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ / tataḥ samudradvīpāṃś ca subhīmān draṣṭum arhatha // 4.039.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāsurā mahākāyāś chāyāṃ gṛhṇanti nityaśaḥ / brahmaṇā samanujñātā dīrghakālaṃ bubhukṣitāḥ // 4.039.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ kālameghapratimaṃ mahoraganiṣevitam / abhigamya mahānādaṃ tīrthenaiva mahodadhim // 4.039.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato raktajalaṃ bhīmaṃ lohitaṃ nāma sāgaram / gatā drakṣyatha tāṃ caiva bṛhatīṃ kūṭaśālmalīm // 4.039.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhaṃ ca vainateyasya nānāratnavibhūṣitam / tatra kailāsasaṃkāśaṃ vihitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // 4.039.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra śailanibhā bhīmā mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ / śailaśṛṅgeṣu lambante nānārūpā bhayāvahāḥ // 4.039.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te patanti jale nityaṃ sūryasyodayanaṃ prati / abhitaptāś ca sūryeṇa lambante sma punaḥ punaḥ // 4.039.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pāṇḍurameghābhaṃ kṣīraudaṃ nāma sāgaram / gatā drakṣyatha durdharṣā mukhā hāram ivormibhiḥ // 4.039.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya madhye mahāśveta ṛṣabho nāma parvataḥ / divyagandhaiḥ kusumitai rajataiś ca nagair vṛtaḥ // 4.039.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saraś ca rājataiḥ padmair jvalitair hemakesaraiḥ / nāmnā sudarśanaṃ nāma rājahaṃsaiḥ samākulam // 4.039.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibudhāś cāraṇā yakṣāḥ kiṃnarāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ / hṛṣṭāḥ samabhigacchanti nalinīṃ tāṃ riraṃsavaḥ // 4.039.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣīrodaṃ samatikramya tato drakṣyatha vānarāḥ / jalodaṃ sāgaraśreṣṭhaṃ sarvabhūtabhayāvaham // 4.039.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra tat kopajaṃ tejaḥ kṛtaṃ hayamukhaṃ mahat / asyāhus tan mahāvegam odanaṃ sacarācaram // 4.039.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra vikrośatāṃ nādo bhūtānāṃ sāgaraukasām / śrūyate cāsamarthānāṃ dṛṣṭvā tad vaḍavāmukham // 4.039.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svādūdasyottare deśe yojanāni trayodaśa / jātarūpaśilo nāma mahān kanakaparvataḥ // 4.039.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsīnaṃ parvatasyāgre sarvabhūtanamaskṛtam / sahasraśirasaṃ devam anantaṃ nīlavāsasaṃ // 4.039.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triśirāḥ kāñcanaḥ ketus tālas tasya mahātmanaḥ / sthāpitaḥ parvatasyāgre virājati savedikaḥ // 4.039.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvasyāṃ diśi nirmāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tat tridaśeśvaraiḥ / tataḥ paraṃ hemamayaḥ śrīmān udayaparvataḥ // 4.039.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya koṭir divaṃ spṛṣṭvā śatayojanam āyatā / jātarūpamayī divyā virājati savedikā // 4.039.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sālais tālais tamālaiś ca karṇikāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ / jātarūpamayair divyaiḥ śobhate sūryasaṃnibhaiḥ // 4.039.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra yojanavistāram ucchritaṃ daśayojanam / śṛṅgaṃ saumanasaṃ nāma jātarūpamayaṃ dhruvam // 4.039.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra pūrvaṃ padaṃ kṛtvā purā viṣṇus trivikrame / dvitīyaṃ śikharaṃ meroś cakāra puruṣottamaḥ // 4.039.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttareṇa parikramya jambūdvīpaṃ divākaraḥ / dṛśyo bhavati bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śikharaṃ tan mahocchrayam // 4.039.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra vaikhānasā nāma vālakhilyā maharṣayaḥ / prakāśamānā dṛśyante sūryavarṇās tapasvinaḥ // 4.039.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ sudarśano dvīpaḥ puro yasya prakāśate / yasmiṃs tejaś ca cakṣuś ca sarvaprānabhṛtām api // 4.039.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailasya tasya kuñjeṣu kandareṣu vaneṣu ca / rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ // 4.039.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanasya ca śailasya sūryasya ca mahātmanaḥ / āviṣṭā tejasā saṃdhyā pūrvā raktā prakāśate // 4.039.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paramagamyā syād dik pūrvā tridaśāvṛtā / rahitā candrasūryābhyām adṛśyā timirāvṛtā // 4.039.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaileṣu teṣu sarveṣu kandareṣu vaneṣu ca / ya ca noktā mayā deśā viceyā teṣu jānakī // 4.039.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvad vānaraiḥ śakyaṃ gantuṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ / abhāskaram amaryādaṃ na jānīmas tataḥ param // 4.039.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhigamya tu vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca / māse pūrṇe nivartadhvam udayaṃ prāpya parvatam // 4.039.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūrdhvaṃ māsān na vastavyaṃ vasan vadhyo bhaven mama / siddhārthāḥ saṃnivartadhvam adhigamya ca maithilīm // 4.039.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahendrakāntāṃ vanaṣaṇḍa maṇḍitāṃ; diśaṃ caritvā nipuṇena vānarāḥ / avāpya sītāṃ raghuvaṃśajapriyāṃ; tato nivṛttāḥ sukhito bhaviṣyatha // 4.039.063	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ prasthāpya sugrīvas tan mahad vānaraṃ balam / dakṣiṇāṃ preṣayām āsa vānarān abhilakṣitān // 4.040.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlam agnisutaṃ caiva hanumantaṃ ca vānaram / pitāmahasutaṃ caiva jāmbavantaṃ mahākapim // 4.040.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suhotraṃ ca śarīraṃ ca śaragulmaṃ tathaiva ca / gajaṃ gavākṣaṃ gavayaṃ suṣeṇam ṛṣabhaṃ tathā // 4.040.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ caiva vijayaṃ gandhamādanam / ulkāmukham asaṅgaṃ ca hutāśana sutāv ubhau // 4.040.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadapramukhān vīrān vīraḥ kapigaṇeśvaraḥ / vegavikramasaṃpannān saṃdideśa viśeṣavit // 4.040.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām agreṣaraṃ caiva mahad balam asaṃgagam / vidhāya harivīrāṇām ādiśad dakṣiṇāṃ diśam // 4.040.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye ke cana samuddeśās tasyāṃ diśi sudurgamāḥ / kapīśaḥ kapimukhyānāṃ sa teṣāṃ tān udāharat // 4.040.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahasraśirasaṃ vindhyaṃ nānādrumalatāvṛtam / narmadāṃ ca nadīṃ durgāṃ mahoraganiṣevitām // 4.040.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato godāvarīṃ ramyāṃ kṛṣṇāveṇīṃ mahānadīm / varadāṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ mahoraganiṣevitām // 4.040.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mekhalān utkalāṃś caiva daśārṇanagarāṇy api / avantīm abhravantīṃ ca sarvam evānupaśyata // 4.040.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidarbhān ṛṣikāṃś caiva ramyān māhiṣakān api / tathā baṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca kauśikāṃś ca samantataḥ // 4.040.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anvīkṣya daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ saparvatanadīguham / nadīṃ godāvarīṃ caiva sarvam evānupaśyata // 4.040.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaivāndhrāṃś ca puṇḍrāṃś ca colān pāṇḍyān sakeralān / ayomukhaś ca gantavyaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ // 4.040.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicitraśikharaḥ śrīmāṃś citrapuṣpitakānanaḥ / sacandanavanoddeśo mārgitavyo mahāgiriḥ // 4.040.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tām āpagāṃ divyāṃ prasannasalilāṃ śivām / tatra drakṣyatha kāverīṃ vihṛtām apsarogaṇaiḥ // 4.040.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāsīnaṃ nagasyāgre malayasya mahaujasaṃ / drakṣyathādityasaṃkāśam agastyam ṛṣisattamam // 4.040.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tenābhyanujñātāḥ prasannena mahātmanā / tāmraparṇīṃ grāhajuṣṭāṃ tariṣyatha mahānadīm // 4.040.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā candanavanair divyaiḥ pracchannā dvīpa śālinī / kānteva yuvatiḥ kāntaṃ samudram avagāhate // 4.040.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato hemamayaṃ divyaṃ muktāmaṇivibhūṣitam / yuktaṃ kavāṭaṃ pāṇḍyānāṃ gatā drakṣyatha vānarāḥ // 4.040.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ samudram āsādya saṃpradhāryārthaniścayam / agastyenāntare tatra sāgare viniveśitaḥ // 4.040.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
citranānānagaḥ śrīmān mahendraḥ parvatottamaḥ / jātarūpamayaḥ śrīmān avagāḍho mahārṇavam // 4.040.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāvidhair nagaiḥ phullair latābhiś copaśobhitam / devarṣiyakṣapravarair apsarobhiś ca sevitam // 4.040.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siddhacāraṇasaṃghaiś ca prakīrṇaṃ sumanoharam / tam upaiti sahasrākṣaḥ sadā parvasu parvasu // 4.040.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvīpas tasyāpare pāre śatayojanam āyataḥ / agamyo mānuṣair dīptas taṃ mārgadhvaṃ samantataḥ // 4.040.024.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra sarvātmanā sītā mārgitavyā viśeṣataḥ // 4.040.024.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi deśas tu vadhyasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ / rākṣasādhipater vāsaḥ sahasrākṣasamadyuteḥ // 4.040.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dakṣiṇasya samudrasya madhye tasya tu rākṣasī / aṅgāraketi vikhyātā chāyām ākṣipya bhojinī // 4.040.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam atikramya lakṣmīvān samudre śatayojane / giriḥ puṣpitako nāma siddhacāraṇasevitaḥ // 4.040.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candrasūryāṃśusaṃkāśaḥ sāgarāmbusamāvṛtaḥ / bhrājate vipulaiḥ śṛṅgair ambaraṃ vilikhann iva // 4.040.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaikaṃ kāñcanaṃ śṛṅgaṃ sevate yaṃ divākaraḥ / śvetaṃ rājatam ekaṃ ca sevate yaṃ niśākaraḥ // 4.040.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na taṃ kṛtaghnāḥ paśyanti na nṛśaṃsā na nāstikāḥ / praṇamya śirasā śailaṃ taṃ vimārgata vānarāḥ // 4.040.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam atikramya durdharṣāḥ sūryavān nāma parvataḥ / adhvanā durvigāhena yojanāni caturdaśa // 4.040.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tam apy atikramya vaidyuto nāma parvataḥ / sarvakāmaphalair vṛkṣaiḥ sarvakālamanoharaiḥ // 4.040.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra bhuktvā varārhāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca / madhūni pītvā mukhyāni paraṃ gacchata vānarāḥ // 4.040.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra netramanaḥkāntaḥ kuñjaro nāma parvataḥ / agastyabhavanaṃ yatra nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // 4.040.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra yojanavistāram ucchritaṃ daśayojanam / śaraṇaṃ kāñcanaṃ divyaṃ nānāratnavibhūṣitam // 4.040.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra bhogavatī nāma sarpāṇām ālayaḥ purī / viśālarathyā durdharṣā sarvataḥ parirakṣitā // 4.040.036.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣitā pannagair ghorais tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrair mahāviṣaiḥ // 4.040.036.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarparājo mahāghoro yasyāṃ vasati vāsukiḥ / niryāya mārgitavyā ca sā ca bhogavatī purī // 4.040.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ ca deśam atikramya mahān ṛṣabhasaṃsthitaḥ / sarvaratnamayaḥ śrīmān ṛṣabho nāma parvataḥ // 4.040.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gośīrṣakaṃ padmakaṃ ca hariśyāmaṃ ca candanam / divyam utpadyate yatra tac caivāgnisamaprabham // 4.040.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tu tac candanaṃ dṛṣṭvā spraṣṭavyaṃ ca kadā cana / rohitā nāma gandharvā ghorā rakṣanti tad vanam // 4.040.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra gandharvapatayaḥ pañcasūryasamaprabhāḥ / śailūṣo grāmaṇīr bhikṣuḥ śubhro babhrus tathaiva ca // 4.040.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ante pṛthivyā durdharṣās tatra svargajitaḥ sthitāḥ / tataḥ paraṃ na vaḥ sevyaḥ pitṛlokaḥ sudāruṇaḥ // 4.040.042.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājadhānī yamasyaiṣā kaṣṭena tamasāvṛtā // 4.040.042.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvad eva yuṣmābhir vīrā vānarapuṃgavāḥ / śakyaṃ vicetuṃ gantuṃ vā nāto gatimatāṃ gatiḥ // 4.040.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvam etat samālokya yac cānyad api dṛśyate / gatiṃ viditvā vaidehyāḥ saṃnivartitam arhatha // 4.040.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tu māsān nivṛtto 'gre dṛṣṭā sīteti vakṣyati / mattulyavibhavo bhogaiḥ sukhaṃ sa vihariṣyati // 4.040.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ priyataro nāsti mama prāṇād viśeṣataḥ / kṛtāparādho bahuśo mama bandhur bhaviṣyati // 4.040.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amitabalaparākramā bhavanto; vipulaguṇeṣu kuleṣu ca prasūtāḥ / manujapatisutāṃ yathā labhadhvaṃ; tad adhiguṇaṃ puruṣārtham ārabhadhvam // 4.040.047	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
tataḥ prasthāpya sugrīvas tān harīn dakṣiṇāṃ diśam / buddhivikramasaṃpannān vāyuvegasamāñjave // 4.041.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāhūya mahātejāḥ suṣeṇaṃ nāma yūthapam / tārāyāḥ pitaraṃ rājā śvaśurabhīmavikramam // 4.041.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīt prāñjalir vākyam abhigamya praṇamya ca / sāhāyyaṃ kuru rāmasya kṛtye 'smin samupasthite // 4.041.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛtaḥ śatasahasreṇa vānarāṇāṃ tarasvinām / abhigaccha diśaṃ saumya paścimāṃ vāruṇīṃ prabho // 4.041.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
surāṣṭrān saha bāhlīkāñ śūrābhīrāṃs tathaiva ca / sphītāñjanapadān ramyān vipulāni purāṇi ca // 4.041.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṃnāgagahanaṃ kukṣiṃ bahuloddālakākulam / tathā ketakaṣaṇḍāṃś ca mārgadhvaṃ hariyūthapāḥ // 4.041.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyak srotogamāś caiva nadyaḥ śītajalāḥ śivāḥ / tāpasānām araṇyāni kāntārā girayaś ca ye // 4.041.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
girijālāvṛtāṃ durgāṃ mārgitvā paścimāṃ diśam / tataḥ paścimam āsādya samudraṃ draṣṭum arhatha // 4.041.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
timi nakrāyuta jalam akṣobhyam atha vānaraḥ // 4.041.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ ketakaṣaṇḍeṣu tamālagahaneṣu ca / kapayo vihariṣyanti nārikelavaneṣu ca // 4.041.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra sītāṃ ca mārgadhvaṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca / marīcipattanaṃ caiva ramyaṃ caiva jaṭīpuram // 4.041.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avantīm aṅgalopāṃ ca tathā cālakṣitaṃ vanam / rāṣṭrāṇi ca viśālāni pattanāni tatas tataḥ // 4.041.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sindhusāgarayoś caiva saṃgame tatra parvataḥ / mahān hemagirir nāma śataśṛṅgo mahādrumaḥ // 4.041.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya prastheṣu ramyeṣu siṃhāḥ pakṣagamāḥ sthitāḥ / timimatsyagajāṃś caiva nīḍāny āropayanti te // 4.041.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni nīḍāni siṃhānāṃ giriśṛṅgagatāś ca ye / dṛptās tṛptāś ca mātaṅgās toyadasvananiḥsvanāḥ // 4.041.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicaranti viśāle 'smiṃs toyapūrṇe samantataḥ // 4.041.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya śṛṅgaṃ divasparśaṃ kāñcanaṃ citrapādapam / sarvam āśu vicetavyaṃ kapibhiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ // 4.041.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
koṭiṃ tatra samudre tu kāñcanīṃ śatayojanam / durdarśāṃ pariyātrasya gatā drakṣyatha vānarāḥ // 4.041.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
koṭyas tatra caturviṃśad gandharvāṇāṃ tarasvinām / vasanty agninikāśānāṃ ghorāṇāṃ kāmarūpiṇām // 4.041.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātyāsādayitavyās te vānarair bhīmavikramaiḥ / nādeyaṃ ca phalaṃ tasmād deśāt kiṃ cit plavaṃgamaiḥ // 4.041.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
durāsadā hi te vīrāḥ sattvavanto mahābalāḥ / phalamūlāni te tatra rakṣante bhīmavikramāḥ // 4.041.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra yatnaś ca kartavyo mārgitavyā ca jānakī / na hi tebhyo bhayaṃ kiṃ cit kapitvam anuvartatām // 4.041.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturbhāge samudrasya cakravān nāma parvataḥ / tatra cakraṃ sahasrāraṃ nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // 4.041.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra pañcajanaṃ hatvā hayagrīvaṃ ca dānavam / ājahāra tataś cakraṃ śaṅkhaṃ ca puruṣottamaḥ // 4.041.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya sānuṣu citreṣu viśālāsu guhāsu ca / rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ // 4.041.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yojanāni catuḥṣaṣṭir varāho nāma parvataḥ / suvarṇaśṛṅgaḥ suśrīmān agādhe varuṇālaye // 4.041.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra prāgjyotiṣaṃ nāma jātarūpamayaṃ puram / yasmin vasti duṣṭātmā narako nāma guhāsu ca // 4.041.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya sānuṣu citreṣu viśālāsu guhāsu ca / rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ // 4.041.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam atikramya śailendraṃ kāñcanāntaranirdaraḥ / parvataḥ sarvasauvarṇo dhārā prasravaṇāyutaḥ // 4.041.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ gajāś ca varāhāś ca siṃhā vyāghrāś ca sarvataḥ / abhigarjanti satataṃ tena śabdena darpitāḥ // 4.041.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin harihayaḥ śrīmān mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ / abhiṣiktaḥ surai rājā meghavān nāma parvataḥ // 4.041.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam atikramya śailendraṃ mahendraparipālitam / ṣaṣṭiṃ girisahasrāṇi kāñcanāni gamiṣyatha // 4.041.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taruṇādityavarṇāni bhrājamānāni sarvataḥ / jātarūpamayair vṛkṣaiḥ śobhitāni supuṣpitaiḥ // 4.041.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ madhye sthito rājā merur uttamaparvataḥ / ādityena prasannena śailo dattavaraḥ purā // 4.041.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenaivam uktaḥ śailendraḥ sarva eva tvadāśrayāḥ / matprasādād bhaviṣyanti divārātrau ca kāñcanāḥ // 4.041.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayi ye cāpi vatsyanti devagandharvadānavāḥ / te bhaviṣyanti raktāś ca prabhayā kāñcanaprabhāḥ // 4.041.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādityā vasavo rudrā marutaś ca divaukasaḥ / āgamya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ merum uttamaparvatam // 4.041.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādityam upatiṣṭhanti taiś ca sūryo 'bhipūjitaḥ / adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānām astaṃ gacchati parvatam // 4.041.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśatāni divākaraḥ / muhūrtārdhena taṃ śīghram abhiyāti śiloccayam // 4.041.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṅge tasya mahad divyaṃ bhavanaṃ sūryasaṃnibham / prāsādaguṇasaṃbādhaṃ vihitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // 4.041.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śobhitaṃ tarubhiś citrair nānāpakṣisamākulaiḥ / niketaṃ pāśahastasya varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ // 4.041.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarā merum astaṃ ca tālo daśaśirā mahān / jātarūpamayaḥ śrīmān bhrājate citravedikaḥ // 4.041.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣu sarveṣu durgeṣu saraḥsu ca saritsu ca / rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ // 4.041.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatra tiṣṭhati dharmātmā tapasā svena bhāvitaḥ / merusāvarṇir ity eva khyāto vai brahmaṇā samaḥ // 4.041.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praṣṭavyo merusāvarṇir maharṣiḥ sūryasaṃnibhaḥ / praṇamya śirasā bhūmau pravṛttiṃ maithilīṃ prati // 4.041.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvaj jīvalokasya bhāskaro rajanīkṣaye / kṛtvā vitimiraṃ sarvam astaṃ gacchati parvatam // 4.041.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvad vānaraiḥ śakyaṃ gantuṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ / abhāskaram amaryādaṃ na jānīmas tataḥ param // 4.041.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhigamya tu vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca / astaṃ parvatam āsādya pūrṇe māse nivartata // 4.041.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūrdhvaṃ māsān na vastavyaṃ vasan vadhyo bhaven mama / sahaiva śūro yuṣmābhiḥ śvaśuro me gamiṣyati // 4.041.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrotavyaṃ sarvam etasya bhavadbhir diṣṭa kāribhiḥ / gurur eṣa mahābāhuḥ śvaśuro me mahābalaḥ // 4.041.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavantaś cāpi vikrāntāḥ pramāṇaṃ sarvakarmasu / pramāṇam enaṃ saṃsthāpya paśyadhvaṃ paścimāṃ diśam // 4.041.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭāyāṃ tu narendrasyā patnyām amitatejasaḥ / kṛtakṛtyā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtasya pratikarmaṇā // 4.041.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ato 'nyad api yat kiṃ cit kāryasyāsya hitaṃ bhavet / saṃpradhārya bhavadbhiś ca deśakālārthasaṃhitam // 4.041.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ suṣeṇa pramukhāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ; sugrīvavākyaṃ nipuṇaṃ niśamya / āmantrya sarve plavagādhipaṃ te; jagmur diśaṃ tāṃ varuṇābhiguptām // 4.041.052	indravajrā [ttjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
tataḥ saṃdiśya sugrīvaḥ śvaśuraṃ paścimāṃ diśam / vīraṃ śatabaliṃ nāma vānaraṃ vānararṣabhaḥ // 4.042.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca rājā mantrajñaḥ sarvavānarasaṃmatam / vākyam ātmahitaṃ caiva rāmasya ca hitaṃ tathā // 4.042.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛtaḥ śatasahasreṇa tvadvidhānāṃ vanaukasām / vaivasvata sutaiḥ sārdhaṃ pratiṣṭhasva svamantribhiḥ // 4.042.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diśaṃ hy udīcīṃ vikrāntāṃ himaśailāvataṃsakām / sarvataḥ parimārgadhvaṃ rāmapatnīm aninditām // 4.042.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin kārye vinivṛtte kṛte dāśaratheḥ priye / ṛṇān muktā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtārthārthavidāṃ varāḥ // 4.042.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtaṃ hi priyam asmākaṃ rāghaveṇa mahātmanā / tasya cet pratikāro 'sti saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ bhavet // 4.042.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya dṛśyate jānakī yathā / tathā bhavadbhiḥ kartavyam asmatpriyahitaiṣibhiḥ // 4.042.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ hi sarvabhūtānāṃ mānyas tu narasattamaḥ / asmāsu cāgataprītī rāmaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ // 4.042.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāni vanadurgāṇi nadyaḥ śailāntarāṇi ca / bhavantaḥ parimārgaṃs tu buddhivikramasaṃpadā // 4.042.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra mlecchān pulindāṃś ca śūrasenāṃs tathāiva ca / prasthālān bharatāṃś caiva kurūṃś ca saha madrakaiḥ // 4.042.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmbojān yavanāṃś caiva śakān āraṭṭakān api / bāhlīkān ṛṣikāṃś caiva pauravān atha ṭaṅkaṇān // 4.042.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cīnān paramacīnāṃś ca nīhārāṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ / anviṣya daradāṃś caiva himavantaṃ vicinvatha // 4.042.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lodhrapadmakaṣaṇḍeṣu devadāruvaneṣu ca / rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehya mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ // 4.042.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ somāśramaṃ gatvā devagandharvasevitam / kālaṃ nāma mahāsānuṃ parvataṃ taṃ gamiṣyatha // 4.042.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahatsu tasya śṛṅgeṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca / vicinudhvaṃ mahābhāgāṃ rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm // 4.042.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam atikramya śailendraṃ hemavargaṃ mahāgirim / tataḥ sudarśanaṃ nāma parvataṃ gantum arhatha // 4.042.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya kānanaṣaṇḍeṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca / rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ // 4.042.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam atikramya cākāśaṃ sarvataḥ śatayojanam / aparvatanadī vṛkṣaṃ sarvasattvavivarjitam // 4.042.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu śīghram atikramya kāntāraṃ romaharṣaṇam / kailāsaṃ pāṇḍuraṃ śailaṃ prāpya hṛṣṭā bhaviṣyatha // 4.042.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra pāṇḍurameghābhaṃ jāmbūnadapariṣkṛtam / kuberabhavanaṃ divyaṃ nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // 4.042.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśālā nalinī yatra prabhūtakamalotpalā / haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇā apsarogaṇasevitā // 4.042.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra vaiśravaṇo rājā sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥ / dhanado ramate śrīmān guhyakaiḥ saha yakṣarāṭ // 4.042.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya candranikaśeṣu parvateṣu guhāsu ca / rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ // 4.042.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krauñcaṃ tu girim āsādya bilaṃ tasya sudurgamam / apramattaiḥ praveṣṭavyaṃ duṣpraveśaṃ hi tat smṛtam // 4.042.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasanti hi mahātmānas tatra sūryasamaprabhāḥ / devair apy arcitāḥ samyag devarūpā maharṣayaḥ // 4.042.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krauñcasya tu guhāś cānyāḥ sānūni śikharāṇi ca / nirdarāś ca nitambāś ca vicetavyās tatas tataḥ // 4.042.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krauñcasya śikharaṃ cāpi nirīkṣya ca tatas tataḥ / avṛkṣaṃ kāmaśailaṃ ca mānasaṃ vihagālayam // 4.042.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na gatis tatra bhūtānāṃ devadānavarakṣasām / sa ca sarvair vicetavyaḥ sasānuprasthabhūdharaḥ // 4.042.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krauñcaṃ girim atikramya maināko nāma parvataḥ / mayasya bhavanaṃ tatra dānavasya svayaṃ kṛtam // 4.042.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mainākas tu vicetavyaḥ sasānuprasthakandaraḥ / strīṇām aśvamukhīnāṃ ca niketās tatra tatra tu // 4.042.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ deśaṃ samatikramya āśramaṃ siddhasevitam / siddhā vaikhānasās tatra vālakhilyāś ca tāpasāḥ // 4.042.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vandyās te tu tapaḥsiddhās tāpasā vītakalmaṣāḥ / praṣṭavyāś cāpi sītāyāḥ pravṛttaṃ vinayānvitaiḥ // 4.042.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hemapuṣkarasaṃchannaṃ tatra vaikhānasaṃ saraḥ / taruṇādityasaṃkāśair haṃsair vicaritaṃ śubhaiḥ // 4.042.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aupavāhyaḥ kuberasya sarvabhauma iti smṛtaḥ / gajaḥ paryeti taṃ deśaṃ sadā saha kareṇubhiḥ // 4.042.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat sāraḥ samatikramya naṣṭacandradivākaram / anakṣatragaṇaṃ vyoma niṣpayodam anāadimat // 4.042.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gabhastibhir ivārkasya sa tu deśaḥ prakāśate / viśrāmyadbhis tapaḥ siddhair devakalpaiḥ svayamprabhaiḥ // 4.042.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu deśam atikramya śailodā nāma nimnagā / ubhayos tīrayor yasyāḥ kīcakā nāma veṇavaḥ // 4.042.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te nayanti paraṃ tīraṃ siddhān pratyānayanti ca / uttarāḥ kuravas tatra kṛtapuṇyapratiśriyāḥ // 4.042.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kāñcanapadmābhiḥ padminībhiḥ kṛtodakāḥ / nīlavaidūryapatrāḍhyā nadyas tatra sahasraśaḥ // 4.042.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raktotpalavanaiś cātra maṇḍitāś ca hiraṇmayaiḥ / taruṇādityasadṛśair bhānti tatra jalāśayāḥ // 4.042.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahārhamaṇipatraiś ca kāñcanaprabha kesaraiḥ / nīlotpalavanaiś citraiḥ sa deśaḥ sarvatovṛtaḥ // 4.042.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nistulābhiś ca muktābhir maṇibhiś ca mahādhanaiḥ / udbhūtapulinās tatra jātarūpaiś ca nimnagāḥ // 4.042.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaratnamayaiś citrair avagāḍhā nagottamaiḥ / jātarūpamayaiś cāpi hutāśanasamaprabhaiḥ // 4.042.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityapuṣpaphalāś cātra nagāḥ patrarathākulāḥ / divyagandharasasparśāḥ sarvakāmān sravanti ca // 4.042.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānākārāṇi vāsāṃsi phalanty anye nagottamāḥ / muktāvaidūryacitrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni tathaiva ca // 4.042.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
strīṇāṃ yāny anurūpāṇi puruṣāṇāṃ tathaiva ca / sarvartusukhasevyāni phalanty anye nagottamāḥ // 4.042.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahārhāṇi vicitrāṇi haimāny anye nagottamāḥ / śayanāni prasūyante citrāstāraṇavanti ca // 4.042.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manaḥkāntāni mālyāni phalanty atrāpare drumāḥ / pānāni ca mahārhāṇi bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni ca // 4.042.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
striyaś ca guṇasaṃpannā rūpayauvanalakṣitāḥ / gandharvāḥ kiṃnarā siddhā nāgā vidyādharās tathā // 4.042.049.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ramante sahitās tatra nārībhir bhāskaraprabhāḥ // 4.042.049.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve sukṛtakarmāṇaḥ sarve ratiparāyaṇāḥ / sarve kāmārthasahitā vasanti saha yoṣitaḥ // 4.042.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gītavāditranirghoṣaḥ sotkṛṣṭahasitasvanaḥ / śrūyate satataṃ tatra sarvabhūtamanoharaḥ // 4.042.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra nāmuditaḥ kaś cin nāsti kaś cid asatpriyaḥ / ahany ahani vardhante guṇās tatra manoramāḥ // 4.042.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samatikramya taṃ deśam uttaras toyasāṃ nidhiḥ / tatra somagirir nāma madhye hemamayo mahān // 4.042.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indralokagatā ye ca brahmalokagatāś ca ye / devās taṃ samavekṣante girirājaṃ divaṃ gatam // 4.042.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu deśo visūryo 'pi tasya bhāsā prakāśate / sūryalakṣmyābhivijñeyas tapaseva vivasvatā // 4.042.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavān api viśvātmā śambhur ekādaśātmakaḥ / brahmā vasati deveśo brahmarṣiparivāritaḥ // 4.042.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kathaṃ cana gantavyaṃ kurūṇām uttareṇa vaḥ / anyeṣām api bhūtānāṃ nātikrāmati vai gatiḥ // 4.042.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā hi somagirir nāma devānām api durgamaḥ / tam ālokya tataḥ kṣipram upāvartitum arhatha // 4.042.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvad vānaraiḥ śakyaṃ gantuṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ / abhāskaram amaryādaṃ na jānīmas tataḥ param // 4.042.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvam etad vicetavyaṃ yan mayā parikīrtitam / yad anyad api noktaṃ ca tatrāpi kriyatāṃ matiḥ // 4.042.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kṛtaṃ dāśarather mahat priyaṃ; mahattaraṃ cāpi tato mama priyam / kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyaty anilānalopamā; videhajā darśanajena karmaṇā // 4.042.061	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ kṛtārthāḥ sahitāḥ sabāndhavā; mayārcitāḥ sarvaguṇair manoramaiḥ / cariṣyathorvīṃ pratiśāntaśatravaḥ; sahapriyā bhūtadharāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ // 4.042.062	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
viśeṣeṇa tu sugrīvo hanumatyartham uktavān / sa hi tasmin hariśreṣṭhe niścitārtho 'rthasādhane // 4.043.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na bhūmau nāntarikṣe vā nāmbare nāmarālaye / nāpsu vā gatisaṃgaṃ te paśyāmi haripuṃgava // 4.043.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāsurāḥ sahagandharvāḥ sanāganaradevatāḥ / viditāḥ sarvalokās te sasāgaradharādharāḥ // 4.043.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatir vegaś ca tejaś ca lāghavaṃ ca mahākape / pitus te sadṛśaṃ vīra mārutasya mahaujasaḥ // 4.043.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tejasā vāpi te bhūtaṃ samaṃ bhuvi na vidyate / tad yathā labhyate sītā tattvam evopapādaya // 4.043.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayy eva hanumann asti balaṃ buddhiḥ parākramaḥ / deśakālānuvṛttaś ca nayaś ca nayapaṇḍita // 4.043.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kāryasamāsaṃgam avagamya hanūmati / viditvā hanumantaṃ ca cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ // 4.043.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā niścitārtho 'yaṃ hanūmati harīśvaraḥ / niścitārthataraś cāpi hanūmān kāryasādhane // 4.043.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad evaṃ prasthitasyāsya parijñātasya karmabhiḥ / bhartrā parigṛhītasya dhruvaḥ kāryaphalodayaḥ // 4.043.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ samīkṣya mahātejā vyavasāyottaraṃ harim / kṛtārtha iva saṃvṛttaḥ prahṛṣṭendriyamānasaḥ // 4.043.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadau tasya tataḥ prītaḥ svanāmāṅkopaśobhitam / aṅgulīyam abhijñānaṃ rājaputryāḥ paraṃtapaḥ // 4.043.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anena tvāṃ hariśreṣṭha cihnena janakātmajā / matsakāśād anuprāptam anudvignānupaśyati // 4.043.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyavasāyaś ca te vīra sattvayuktaś ca vikramaḥ / sugrīvasya ca saṃdeśaḥ siddhiṃ kathayatīva me // 4.043.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tad gṛhya hariśreṣṭhaḥ sthāpya mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ / vanditvā caraṇau caiva prasthitaḥ plavagottamaḥ // 4.043.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tat prakarṣan hariṇāṃ balaṃ mahad; babhūva vīraḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapi / gatāmbude vyomni viśuddhamaṇḍalaḥ; śaśīva nakṣatragaṇopaśobhitaḥ // 4.043.015	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
atibalabalam āśritas tavāhaṃ; harivaravikramavikramair analpaiḥ / pavanasuta yathābhigamyate sā; janakasutā hanumaṃs tathā kuruṣva // 4.043.016	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
tad ugraśāsanaṃ bhartur vijñāya haripuṃgavāḥ / śalabhā iva saṃchādya medinīṃ saṃpratasthire // 4.044.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaḥ prasravaṇe tasmin nyavasat sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / pratīkṣamāṇas taṃ māsaṃ yaḥ sītādhigame kṛtaḥ // 4.044.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttarāṃ tu diśaṃ ramyāṃ girirājasamāvṛtām / pratasthe sahasā vīro hariḥ śatabalis tadā // 4.044.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvāṃ diśaṃ prati yayau vinato hariyūthapaḥ // 4.044.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tārāṅgadādi sahitaḥ plavagaḥ pavanātmajaḥ / agastyacaritām āśāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ hariyūthapaḥ // 4.044.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paścimāṃ tu diśaṃ ghorāṃ suṣeṇaḥ plavageśvaraḥ / pratasthe hariśārdūlo bhṛśaṃ varuṇapālitām // 4.044.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sarvā diśo rājā codayitvā yathā tatham / kapisenā patīn mukhyān mumoda sukhitaḥ sukham // 4.044.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ saṃcoditāḥ sarve rājñā vānarayūthapāḥ / svāṃ svāṃ diśam abhipretya tvaritāḥ saṃpratasthire // 4.044.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nadantaś connadantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ / kṣvelanto dhāvamānāś ca yayuḥ plavagasattamāḥ // 4.044.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānayiṣyāmahe sītāṃ haniṣyāmaś ca rāvaṇam // 4.044.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham eko haniṣyāmi prāptaṃ rāvaṇam āhave / tataś conmathya sahasā hariṣye janakātmajām // 4.044.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vepamānaṃ śrameṇādya bhavadbhiḥ sthīyatām iti / eka evāhariṣyāmi pātālād api jānakīm // 4.044.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhamiṣyāmy ahaṃ vṛkṣān dārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ girīn / dharaṇīṃ dārayiṣyāmi kṣobhayiṣyāmi sāgarān // 4.044.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ yojanasaṃkhyāyāḥ plavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ / śataṃ yojanasaṃkhyāyāḥ śataṃ samadhikaṃ hy aham // 4.044.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūtale sāgare vāpi śaileṣu ca vaneṣu ca / pātālasyāpi vā madhye na mamācchidyate gatiḥ // 4.044.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity ekaikaṃ tadā tatra vānarā baladarpitāḥ / ūcuś ca vacanaṃ tasmin harirājasya saṃnidhau // 4.044.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gateṣu vānarendreṣu rāmaḥ sugrīvam abravīt / kathaṃ bhavān vinājīte sarvaṃ vai maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ // 4.045.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvas tu tato rāmam uvāca praṇatātmavān / śrūyatāṃ sarvam ākhyāsye vistareṇa nararṣabha // 4.045.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā tu dundubhiṃ nāma dānavaṃ mahiṣākṛtim / parikālayate vālī malayaṃ prati parvatam // 4.045.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadā viveśa mahiṣo malayasya guhāṃ prati / viveśa vālī tatrāpi malayaṃ tajjighāṃsayā // 4.045.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ tatra nikṣipto guhād vārivinītavat / na ca niṣkramate vālī tadā saṃvatsare gate // 4.045.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kṣatajavegena āpupūre tadā bilam / tad ahaṃ vismito dṛṣṭvā bhrātṛśokaviṣārditaḥ // 4.045.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāhaṃ kṛtabuddhis tu suvyaktaṃ nihato guruḥ / śilāparvatasaṃkāśā biladvāri mayā kṛtā // 4.045.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśaknuvan niṣkramituṃ mahiṣo vinaśed iti // 4.045.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'ham āgāṃ kiṣkindhāṃ nirāśas tasya jīvite / rājyaṃ ca sumahat prāptaṃ tārā ca rumayā saha // 4.045.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mitraiś ca sahitas tatra vasāmi vigatajvaraḥ // 4.045.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājagāma tato vālī hatvāṃ taṃ dānavarṣabham / tato 'ham adadāṃ rājyaṃ gauravād bhayayantritaḥ // 4.045.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa māṃ jighāṃsur duṣṭātmā vālī pravyathitendriyaḥ / parilākayate krodhād dhāvantaṃ sacivaiḥ saha // 4.045.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ vālinā tena sānubandhaḥ pradhāvitaḥ / nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan vanāni nagarāṇi ca // 4.045.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādarśatalasaṃkāśā tato vai pṛthivī mayā / alātacakrapratimā dṛṣṭā goṣpadavat tadā // 4.045.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pūrvam ahaṃ gatvā dakṣiṇām aham āśritaḥ / diśaṃ ca paścimāṃ bhūyo gato 'smi bhayaśaṅkitaḥ // 4.045.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttarāṃ tu diśaṃ yāntaṃ hanumān mām athābravīt // 4.045.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idānīṃ me smṛtaṃ rājan yathā vālī harīśvaraḥ / mataṅgena tadā śapto hy asminn āśramamaṇḍale // 4.045.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśed yadi vā vālī mūrdhāsya śatadhā bhavet / tatra vāsaḥ sukho 'smākaṃ nirudvigno bhaviṣyati // 4.045.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ parvatam āsādya ṛśyamūkaṃ nṛpātmaja / na viveśa tadā vālī mataṅgasya bhayāt tadā // 4.045.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ mayā tadā rājan pratyakṣam upalakṣitam / pṛthivīmaṇḍalaṃ kṛtsnaṃ guhām asmy āgatas tataḥ // 4.045.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśanārthaṃ tu vaidehyāḥ sarvataḥ kapiyūthapāḥ / vyādiṣṭāḥ kapirājena yathoktaṃ jagmur añjasā // 4.046.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarāṃsi saritaḥ kakṣān ākāśaṃ nagarāṇi ca / nadīdurgāṃs tathā śailān vicinvanti samantataḥ // 4.046.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīveṇa samākhyātān sarve vānarayūthapāḥ / pradeśān pravicinvanti saśailavanakānanān // 4.046.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicintya divasaṃ sarve sītādhigamane dhṛtāḥ / samāyānti sma medinyāṃ niśākāleśu vānarāḥ // 4.046.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvartukāṃś ca deśeṣu vānarāḥ saphalān drumān / āsādya rajanīṃ śayyāṃ cakruḥ sarveṣv ahaḥsu te // 4.046.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad ahaḥ prathamaṃ kṛtvā māse prasravaṇaṃ gatāḥ / kapirājena saṃgamya nirāśāḥ kapiyūthapāḥ // 4.046.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicitya tu diśaṃ pūrvāṃ yathoktāṃ sacivaiḥ saha / adṛṣṭvā vinataḥ sītām ājagāma mahābalaḥ // 4.046.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
