uttarāṃ tu diśaṃ sarvāṃ vicitya sa mahākapiḥ / āgataḥ saha sainyena vīraḥ śatabalis tadā // 4.046.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suṣeṇaḥ paścimām āśāṃ vicitya saha vānaraiḥ / sametya māse saṃpūrṇe sugrīvam upacakrame // 4.046.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ prasravaṇapṛṣṭhasthaṃ samāsādyābhivādya ca / āsīnaṃ saha rāmeṇa sugrīvam idam abruvan // 4.046.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicitāḥ parvatāḥ sarve vanāni nagarāṇi ca / nimnagāḥ sāgarāntāś ca sarve janapadās tathā // 4.046.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guhāś ca vicitāḥ sarvā yās tvayā parikīrtitāḥ / vicitāś ca mahāgulmā latāvitatasaṃtatāḥ // 4.046.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gahaneṣu ca deśeṣu durgeṣu viṣameṣu ca / sattvāny atipramāṇāni vicitāni hatāni ca // 4.046.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye caiva gahanā deśā vicitās te punaḥ punaḥ // 4.046.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udārasattvābhijano mahātmā; sa maithilīṃ drakṣyati vānarendraḥ / diśaṃ tu yām eva gatā tu sītā; tām āsthito vāyusuto hanūmān // 4.046.014	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sahatārāṅgadābhyāṃ tu gatvā sa hanumān kapiḥ / sugrīveṇa yathoddiṣṭaṃ taṃ deśam upacakrame // 4.047.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dūram upāgamya sarvais taiḥ kapisattamaiḥ / vicinoti sma vindhyasya guhāś ca gahanāni ca // 4.047.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parvatāgrān nadīdurgān sarāṃsi vipulān drumān / vṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃś ca vividhān parvatān ghanapādapān // 4.047.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anveṣamāṇās te sarve vānarāḥ sarvato diśam / na sītāṃ dadṛśur vīrā maithilīṃ janakātmajām // 4.047.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te bhakṣayanto mūlāni phalāni vividhāni ca / anveṣamāṇā durdharṣā nyavasaṃs tatra tatra ha // 4.047.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu deśo duranveṣo guhāgahanavān mahān // 4.047.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaktvā tu taṃ tadā deśaṃ sarve vai hariyūthapāḥ / deśam anyaṃ durādharṣaṃ viviśuś cākutobhayāḥ // 4.047.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatra vandhyaphalā vṛkṣā vipuṣpāḥ parṇavarjitāḥ / nistoyāḥ sarito yatra mūlaṃ yatra sudurlabham // 4.047.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na santi mahiṣā yatra na mṛgā na ca hastinaḥ / śārdūlāḥ pakṣiṇo vāpi ye cānye vanagocarāḥ // 4.047.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snigdhapatrāḥ sthale yatra padminyaḥ phullapaṅkajāḥ / prekṣaṇīyāḥ sugandhāś ca bhramaraiś cāpi varjitāḥ // 4.047.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaṇḍur nāma mahābhāgaḥ satyavādī tapodhanaḥ / maharṣiḥ paramāmarṣī niyamair duṣpradharṣaṇaḥ // 4.047.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tasmin vane putro bālako daśavārṣikaḥ / pranaṣṭo jīvitāntāya kruddhas tatra mahāmuniḥ // 4.047.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena dharmātmanā śaptaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tatra mahad vanam / aśaraṇyaṃ durādharṣaṃ mṛgapakṣivivarjitam // 4.047.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya te kānanāntāṃs tu girīṇāṃ kandarāṇi ca / prabhavāni nadīnāṃca vicinvanti samāhitāḥ // 4.047.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra cāpi mahātmāno nāpaśyañ janakātmajām / hartāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ vāpi sugrīvapriyakāriṇaḥ // 4.047.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te praviśya tu taṃ bhīmaṃ latāgulmasamāvṛtam / dadṛśuḥ krūrakarmāṇam asuraṃ suranirbhayam // 4.047.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā vanarā ghoraṃ sthitaṃ śailam ivāparam / gāḍhaṃ parihitāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ parvatopamam // 4.047.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'pi tān vānarān sarvān naṣṭāḥ sthety abravīd balī / abhyadhāvata saṃkruddho muṣṭim udyamya saṃhitam // 4.047.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āpatantaṃ sahasā vāliputro 'ṅgadas tadā / rāvaṇo 'yam iti jñātvā talenābhijaghāna ha // 4.047.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vāliputrābhihato vaktrāc choṇitam udvaman // 4.047.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asuro nyapatad bhūmau paryasta iva parvataḥ / te tu tasmin nirucchvāse vānarā jitakāśinaḥ // 4.047.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyacinvan prāyaśas tatra sarvaṃ tad girigahvaram // 4.047.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicitaṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā sarve te kānanaṃ punaḥ / anyadevāparaṃ ghoraṃ viviśur girigahvaram // 4.047.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te vicintya punaḥ khinnā viniṣpatya samāgatāḥ / ekānte vṛkṣamūle tu niṣedur dīnamānasāḥ // 4.047.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāṅgadas tadā sarvān vānarān idam abravīt / pariśrānto mahāprājñaḥ samāśvāsya śanair vacaḥ // 4.048.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanāni girayo nadyo durgāṇi gahanāni ca / daryo giriguhāś caiva vicitā naḥ samantataḥ // 4.048.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra tatra sahāsmābhir jānakī na ca dṛśyate / tad vā rakṣo hṛtā yena sītā surasutopamā // 4.048.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālaś ca no mahān yātaḥ sugrīvaś cograśāsanaḥ / tasmād bhavantaḥ sahitā vicinvantu samantataḥ // 4.048.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vihāya tandrīṃ śokaṃ ca nidrāṃ caiva samutthitām / vicinudhvaṃ yathā sītāṃ paśyāmo janakātmajām // 4.048.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anirvedaṃ ca dākṣyaṃ ca manasaś cāparājayam / kāryasiddhikarāṇy āhus tasmād etad bravīmy aham // 4.048.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyāpīdaṃ vanaṃ durgaṃ vicinvantu vanaukasaḥ / khedaṃ tyaktvā punaḥ sarvaṃ vanam etad vicīyatām // 4.048.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyaṃ kriyamāṇasya dṛśyate karmaṇaḥ phalam / alaṃ nirvedam āgamya na hi no malinaṃ kṣamam // 4.048.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvaḥ krodhano rājā tīkṣṇadaṇḍaś ca vānarāḥ / bhetavyaṃ tasya satataṃ rāmasya ca mahātmanaḥ // 4.048.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hitārtham etad uktaṃ vaḥ kriyatāṃ yadi rocate / ucyatāṃ vā kṣamaṃ yan naḥ sarveṣām eva vānarāḥ // 4.048.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā vacanaṃ gandhamādanaḥ / uvācāvyaktayā vācā pipāsā śramakhinnayā // 4.048.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśaṃ khalu vo vākyam aṅgado yad uvāca ha / hitaṃ caivānukūlaṃ ca kriyatām asya bhāṣitam // 4.048.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
punar mārgāmahe śailān kandarāṃś ca darīs tathā / kānanāni ca śūnyāni giriprasravaṇāni ca // 4.048.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathoddiṣṭhāni sarvāṇi sugrīveṇa mahātmanā / vicinvantu vanaṃ sarve giridurgāṇi sarvaśaḥ // 4.048.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ samutthāya punar vānarās te mahābalāḥ / vindhyakānanasaṃkīrṇāṃ vicerur dakṣiṇāṃ diśam // 4.048.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te śāradābhrapratimaṃ śrīmadrajataparvatam / śṛṅgavantaṃ darīvantam adhiruhya ca vānarāḥ // 4.048.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra lodhravanaṃ ramyaṃ saptaparṇavanāni ca / vicinvanto harivarāḥ sītādarśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 4.048.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāgram adhirūḍhās te śrāntā vipulavikramāḥ / na paśyanti sma vaidehīṃ rāmasya mahiṣīṃ priyām // 4.048.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu dṛṣṭigataṃ kṛtvā taṃ śailaṃ bahukandaram / avārohanta harayo vīkṣamāṇāḥ samantataḥ // 4.048.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaruhya tato bhūmiṃ śrāntā vigatacetasaḥ / sthitvā muhūrtaṃ tatrātha vṛkṣamūlam upāśritāḥ // 4.048.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te muhūrtaṃ samāśvastāḥ kiṃ cid bhagnapariśramāḥ / punar evodyatāḥ kṛtsnāṃ mārgituṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam // 4.048.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanumatpramukhās te tu prasthitāḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ / vindhyam evāditas tāvad vicerus te samantataḥ // 4.048.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saha tārāṅgadābhyāṃ tu saṃgamya hanumān kapiḥ / vicinoti sma vindhyasya guhāś ca gahanāni ca // 4.049.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhaśārdūlajuṣṭāś ca guhāś ca paritas tathā / viṣameṣu nagendrasya mahāprasravaṇeṣu ca // 4.049.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tatraiva vasatāṃ sa kālo vyatyavartata // 4.049.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi deśo duranveṣo guhā gahanavān mahān / tatra vāyusutaḥ sarvaṃ vicinoti sma parvatam // 4.049.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paraspareṇa rahitā anyonyasyāvidūrataḥ / gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ // 4.049.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maindaś ca dvividaś caiva hanumāñ jāmbavān api / aṅgado yuvarājaś ca tāraś ca vanagocaraḥ // 4.049.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
girijālāvṛtān deśān mārgitvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam / kṣutpipāsā parītāś ca śrāntāś ca salilārthinaḥ // 4.049.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avakīrṇaṃ latāvṛkṣair dadṛśus te mahābilam // 4.049.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ krauñcāś ca haṃsāś ca sārasāś cāpi niṣkraman / jalārdrāś cakravākāś ca raktāṅgāḥ padmareṇubhiḥ // 4.049.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tad bilam āsādya sugandhi duratikramam / vismayavyagramanaso babhūvur vānararṣabhāḥ // 4.049.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃjātapariśaṅkās te tad bilaṃ plavagottamāḥ / abhyapadyanta saṃhṛṣṭās tejovanto mahābalāḥ // 4.049.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ parvatakūṭābho hanumān mārutātmajaḥ / abravīd vānarān sarvān kāntāra vanakovidaḥ // 4.049.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
girijālāvṛtān deśān mārgitvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam / vayaṃ sarve pariśrāntā na ca paśyāmi maithilīm // 4.049.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmāc cāpi bilād dhaṃsāḥ krauñcāś ca saha sārasaiḥ / jalārdrāś cakravākāś ca niṣpatanti sma sarvaśaḥ // 4.049.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nūnaṃ salilavān atra kūpo vā yadi vā hradaḥ / tathā ceme biladvāre snigdhās tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ // 4.049.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktās tad bilaṃ sarve viviśus timirāvṛtam / acandrasūryaṃ harayo dadṛśū romaharṣaṇam // 4.049.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tasmin bile durge nānāpādapasaṃkule / anyonyaṃ saṃpariṣvajya jagmur yojanam antaram // 4.049.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te naṣṭasaṃjñās tṛṣitāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ salilārthinaḥ / paripetur bile tasmin kaṃ cit kālam atandritāḥ // 4.049.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te kṛśā dīnavadanāḥ pariśrāntāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ / ālokaṃ dadṛśur vīrā nirāśā jīvite tadā // 4.049.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ deśam āgamya saumyaṃ vitimiraṃ vanam / dadṛśuḥ kāñcanān vṛkṣān dīptavaiśvānaraprabhān // 4.049.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sālāṃs tālāṃś ca puṃnāgān kakubhān vañjulān dhavān / campakān nāgavṛkṣāṃś ca karṇikārāṃś ca puṣpitān // 4.049.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taruṇādityasaṃkāśān vaidūryamayavedikān / nīlavaidūryavarṇāś ca padminīḥ patagāvṛtāḥ // 4.049.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahadbhiḥ kāñcanair vṛkṣair vṛtaṃ bālārka saṃnibhaiḥ / jātarūpamayair matsyair mahadbhiś ca sakacchapaiḥ // 4.049.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nalinīs tatra dadṛśuḥ prasannasalilāyutāḥ / kāñcanāni vimānāni rājatāni tathaiva ca // 4.049.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapanīyagavākṣāṇi muktājālāvṛtāni ca / haimarājatabhaumāni vaidūryamaṇimanti ca // 4.049.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadṛśus tatra harayo gṛhamukhyāni sarvaśaḥ / puṣpitān phalino vṛkṣān pravālamaṇisaṃnibhān // 4.049.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanabhramarāṃś caiva madhūni ca samantataḥ / maṇikāñcanacitrāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca // 4.049.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahārhāṇi ca yānāni dadṛśus te samantataḥ / haimarājatakāṃsyānāṃ bhājanānāṃ ca saṃcayān // 4.049.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agarūṇāṃ ca divyānāṃ candanānāṃ ca saṃcayān / śucīny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca // 4.049.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahārhāṇi ca pānāni madhūni rasavanti ca / divyānām ambarāṇāṃ ca mahārhāṇāṃ ca saṃcayān // 4.049.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kambalānāṃ ca citrāṇām ajinānāṃ ca saṃcayān // 4.049.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra tatra vicinvanto bile tatra mahāprabhāḥ / dadṛśur vānarāḥ śūrāḥ striyaṃ kāṃ cid adūrataḥ // 4.049.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhṛśasaṃtrastāś cīrakṛṣṇājināmbarām / tāpasīṃ niyatāhārāṃ jvalantīm iva tejasā // 4.049.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato hanūmān girisaṃnikāśaḥ; kṛtāñjalis tām abhivādya vṛddhām / papraccha kā tvaṃ bhavanaṃ bilaṃ ca; ratnāni cemāni vadasva kasya // 4.049.032	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
ity uktvā hanumāṃs tatra punaḥ kṛṣṇājināmbarām / abravīt tāṃ mahābhāgāṃ tāpasīṃ dharmacāriṇīm // 4.050.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ praviṣṭāḥ sahasā bilaṃ timirasaṃvṛtam / kṣutpipāsā pariśrāntāḥ parikhinnāś ca sarvaśaḥ // 4.050.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahad dhiraṇyā vivaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ sma pipāsitāḥ / imāṃs tv evaṃ vidhān bhāvān vividhān adbhutopamān // 4.050.003.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā vayaṃ pravyathitāḥ saṃbhrāntā naṣṭacetasaḥ // 4.050.003.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasyeme kāñcanā vṛkṣās taruṇādityasaṃnibhāḥ / śucīny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca // 4.050.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanāni vimānāni rājatāni gṛhāṇi ca / tapanīya gavākṣāṇi maṇijālāvṛtāni ca // 4.050.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpitāḥ phālavantaś ca puṇyāḥ surabhigandhinaḥ / ime jāmbūnadamayāḥ pādapāḥ kasya tejasā // 4.050.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanāni ca padmāni jātāni vimale jale / kathaṃ matsyāś ca sauvarṇā caranti saha kacchapaiḥ // 4.050.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmānam anubhāvaṃ ca kasya caitat tapobalam / ajānatāṃ naḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvam ākhyātum arhasi // 4.050.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā hanumatā tāpasī dharmacāriṇī / pratyuvāca hanūmantaṃ sarvabhūtahite ratā // 4.050.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayo nāma mahātejā māyāvī dānavarṣabhaḥ / tenedaṃ nirmitaṃ sarvaṃ māyayā kāñcanaṃ vanam // 4.050.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā dānavamukhyānāṃ viśvakarmā babhūva ha / yenedaṃ kāñcanaṃ divyaṃ nirmitaṃ bhavanottamam // 4.050.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahāvane / pitāmahād varaṃ lebhe sarvam auśasanaṃ dhanam // 4.050.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhāya sarvaṃ balavān sarvakāmeśvaras tadā / uvāsa sukhitaḥ kālaṃ kaṃ cid asmin mahāvane // 4.050.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam apsarasi hemāyāṃ saktaṃ dānavapuṃgavam / vikramyaivāśaniṃ gṛhya jaghāneśaḥ puraṃdaraḥ // 4.050.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ ca brahmaṇā dattaṃ hemāyai vanam uttamam / śāśvataḥ kāmabhogaś ca gṛhaṃ cedaṃ hiraṇmayam // 4.050.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duhitā merusāvarṇer ahaṃ tasyāḥ svayaṃ prabhā / idaṃ rakṣāmi bhavanaṃ hemāyā vānarottama // 4.050.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama priyasakhī hemā nṛttagītaviśāradā / tayā dattavarā cāsmi rakṣāmi bhavanottamam // 4.050.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ kāryaṃ kasya vā hetoḥ kāntārāṇi prapadyatha / kathaṃ cedaṃ vanaṃ durgaṃ yuṣmābhir upalakṣitam // 4.050.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca / bhuktvā pītvā ca pānīyaṃ sarvaṃ me vaktum arhatha // 4.050.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tān abravīt sarvān viśrāntān hariyūthapān / idaṃ vacanam ekāgrā tāpasī dharmacāriṇī // 4.051.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarā yadi vaḥ khedaḥ pranaṣṭaḥ phalabhakṣaṇāt / yadi caitan mayā śrāvyaṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām // 4.051.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ / ārjavena yathātattvam ākhyātum upacakrame // 4.051.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā sarvasya lokasya mahendravaruṇopamaḥ / rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam // 4.051.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā / tasya bhāryā janasthānād rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt // 4.051.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīras tasya sakhā rājñaḥ sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ / rājā vānaramukhyānāṃ yena prasthāpitā vayam // 4.051.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agastyacaritām āśāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ yamarakṣitām / sahaibhir vānarair mukhyair aṅgadapramukhair vayam // 4.051.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaṃ sahitāḥ sarve rākṣasaṃ kāmarūpiṇam / sītayā saha vaidehyā mārgadhvam iti coditāḥ // 4.051.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicitya tu vayaṃ sarve samagrāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam / bubhukṣitāḥ pariśrāntā vṛkṣamūlam upāśritāḥ // 4.051.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivarṇavadanāḥ sarve sarve dhyānaparāyaṇāḥ / nādhigacchāmahe pāraṃ magnāś cintāmahārṇave // 4.051.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cārayantas tataś cakṣur dṛṣṭavanto mahad bilam / latāpādapasaṃchannaṃ timireṇa samāvṛtam // 4.051.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmād dhaṃsā jalaklinnāḥ pakṣaiḥ salilareṇubhiḥ / kurarāḥ sārasāś caiva niṣpatanti patatriṇaḥ // 4.051.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhv atra praviśāmeti mayā tūktāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ // 4.051.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām api hi sarveṣām anumānam upāgatam / gacchāmaḥ praviśāmeti bhartṛkāryatvarānvitāḥ // 4.051.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gāḍhaṃ nipatitā gṛhya hastau parasparam / idaṃ praviṣṭāḥ sahasā bilaṃ timirasaṃvṛtam // 4.051.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etan naḥ kāyam etena kṛtyena vayam āgatāḥ / tvāṃ caivopagatāḥ sarve paridyūnā bubhukṣitāḥ // 4.051.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātithyadharmadattāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca / asmābhir upabhuktāni bubhukṣāparipīḍitaiḥ // 4.051.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tvayā rakṣitāḥ sarve mriyamāṇā bubhukṣayā / brūhi pratyupakārārthaṃ kiṃ te kurvantu vānarāḥ // 4.051.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu sarvajñā vānarais taiḥ svayaṃprabhā / pratyuvāca tataḥ sarvān idaṃ vānarayūthapam // 4.051.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarveṣāṃ parituṣṭāsmi vānarāṇāṃ tarasvinām / carantyā mama dharmeṇa na kāryam iha kena cit // 4.051.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ śubhaṃ vākyaṃ tāpasyā dharmasaṃhitam / uvāca hanumān vākyaṃ tām aninditaceṣṭitām // 4.052.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapannāḥ smaḥ sarve vai dharmacāriṇi / yaḥ kṛtaḥ samayo 'smākaṃ sugrīveṇa mahātmanā // 4.052.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu kālo vyatikrānto bile ca parivartatām // 4.052.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tvam asmād bilād ghorād uttārayitum arhasi // 4.052.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt sugrīvavacanād atikrāntān gatāyuṣaḥ / trātum arhasi naḥ sarvān sugrīvabhayaśaṅkitān // 4.052.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahac ca kāryam asmābhiḥ kartavyaṃ dharmacāriṇi / tac cāpi na kṛtaṃ kāryam asmābhir iha vāsibhiḥ // 4.052.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā hanumatā tāpasī vākyam abravīt / jīvatā duṣkaraṃ manye praviṣṭena nivartitum // 4.052.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapasas tu prabhāvena niyamopārjitena ca / sarvān eva bilād asmād uddhariṣyāmi vānarān // 4.052.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nimīlayata cakṣūṃṣi sarve vānarapuṃgavāḥ / na hi niṣkramituṃ śakyam animīlitalocanaiḥ // 4.052.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃmīlitāḥ sarve sukumārāṅgulaiḥ karaiḥ / sahasā pidadhur dṛṣṭiṃ hṛṣṭā gamanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 4.052.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarās tu mahātmāno hastaruddhamukhās tadā / nimeṣāntaramātreṇa bilād uttāritās tayā // 4.052.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tān vānarān sarvāṃs tāpasī dharmacāriṇī / niḥsṛtān viṣamāt tasmāt samāśvāsyedam abravīt // 4.052.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa vindhyo giriḥ śrīmān nānādrumalatāyutaḥ / eṣa prasavaṇaḥ śailaḥ sāgaro 'yaṃ mahodadhiḥ // 4.052.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svasti vo 'stu gamiṣyāmi bhavanaṃ vānararṣabhāḥ / ity uktvā tad bilaṃ śrīmat praviveśa svayaṃprabhā // 4.052.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te dadṛśur ghoraṃ sāgaraṃ varuṇālayam / apāram abhigarjantaṃ ghorair ūrmibhir ākulam // 4.052.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayasya māyā vihitaṃ giridurgaṃ vicinvatām / teṣāṃ māso vyatikrānto yo rājñā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ // 4.052.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vindhyasya tu gireḥ pāde saṃprapuṣpitapādape / upaviśya mahābhāgāś cintām āpedire tadā // 4.052.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ puṣpātibhārāgrāṃl latāśatasamāvṛtān / drumān vāsantikān dṛṣṭvā babhūvur bhayaśaṅkitāḥ // 4.052.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te vasantam anuprāptaṃ prativedya parasparam / naṣṭasaṃdeśakālārthā nipetur dharaṇītale // 4.052.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu siṃharṣabha skandhaḥ pīnāyatabhujaḥ kapiḥ / yuvarājo mahāprājña aṅgado vākyam abravīt // 4.052.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāsanāt kapirājasya vayaṃ sarve vinirgatāḥ / māsaḥ pūrṇo bilasthānāṃ harayaḥ kiṃ na budhyate // 4.052.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasminn atīte kāle tu sugrīveṇa kṛte svayam / prāyopaveśanaṃ yuktaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca vanaukasām // 4.052.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tīkṣṇaḥ prakṛtyā sugrīvaḥ svāmibhāve vyavasthitaḥ / na kṣamiṣyati naḥ sarvān aparādhakṛto gatān // 4.052.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apravṛttau ca sītāyāḥ pāpam eva kariṣyati / tasmāt kṣamam ihādyaiva prāyopaviśanaṃ hi naḥ // 4.052.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaktvā putrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca dhanāni ca gṛhāṇi ca / yāvan na ghātayed rājā sarvān pratigatān itaḥ // 4.052.024.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhenāpratirūpeṇa śreyān mṛtyur ihaiva naḥ // 4.052.024.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāhaṃ yauvarājyena sugrīveṇābhiṣecitaḥ / narendreṇābhiṣikto 'smi rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā // 4.052.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pūrvaṃ baddhavairo māṃ rājā dṛṣṭvā vyatikramam / ghātayiṣyati daṇḍena tīkṣṇena kṛtaniścayaḥ // 4.052.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ me suhṛdbhir vyasanaṃ paśyadbhir jīvitāntare / ihaiva prāyam āsiṣye puṇye sāgararodhasi // 4.052.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā kumāreṇa yuvarājena bhāṣitam / sarve te vānaraśreṣṭhāḥ karuṇaṃ vākyam abruvan // 4.052.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tīkṣṇaḥ prakṛtyā sugrīvaḥ priyāsaktaś ca rāghavaḥ / adṛṣṭāyāṃ ca vaidehyāṃ dṛṣṭvāsmāṃś ca samāgatān // 4.052.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavapriyakāmārthaṃ ghātayiṣyaty asaṃśayam / na kṣamaṃ cāparāddhānāṃ gamanaṃ svāmipārśvataḥ // 4.052.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plavaṃgamānāṃ tu bhayārditānāṃ; śrutvā vacas tāra idaṃ babhāṣe / alaṃ viṣādena bilaṃ praviśya; vasāma sarve yadi rocate vaḥ // 4.052.031	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
idaṃ hi māyā vihitaṃ sudurgamaṃ; prabhūtavṛkṣodakabhojyapeyam / ihāsti no naiva bhayaṃ puraṃdarān; na rāghavād vānararājato 'pi vā // 4.052.032	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
śrutvāṅgadasyāpi vaco 'nukūlam; ūcuś ca sarve harayaḥ pratītāḥ / yathā na hanyema tathāvidhānam; asaktam adyaiva vidhīyatāṃ naḥ // 4.052.033	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tathā bruvati tāre tu tārādhipativarcasi / atha mene hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ hanumān aṅgadena tat // 4.053.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhyā hy aṣṭāṅgayā yuktaṃ caturbalasamanvitam / caturdaśaguṇaṃ mene hanumān vālinaḥ sutam // 4.053.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpūryamāṇaṃ śaśvac ca tejobalaparākramaiḥ / śaśinaṃ śuklapakṣādau vardhamānam iva śriyā // 4.053.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bṛhaspatisamaṃ buddhyā vikrame sadṛśaṃ pituḥ / śuśrūṣamāṇaṃ tārasya śukrasyeva puraṃdaram // 4.053.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhartur arthe pariśrāntaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam / abhisaṃdhātum ārebhe hanumān aṅgadaṃ tataḥ // 4.053.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa caturṇām upāyānāṃ tṛtīyam upavarṇayan / bhedayām āsa tān sarvān vānarān vākyasaṃpadā // 4.053.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣu sarveṣu bhinneṣu tato 'bhīṣayad aṅgadam / bhīṣaṇair bahubhir vākyaiḥ kopopāyasamanvitaiḥ // 4.053.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ samarthataraḥ pitrā yuddhe tāreya vai dhuram / dṛḍhaṃ dhārayituṃ śaktaḥ kapirājyaṃ yathā pitā // 4.053.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityam asthiracittā hi kapayo haripuṃgava / nājñāpyaṃ viṣahiṣyanti putradārān vinā tvayā // 4.053.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvāṃ naite hy anuyuñjeyuḥ pratyakṣaṃ pravadāmi te / yathāyaṃ jāmbavān nīlaḥ suhotraś ca mahākapiḥ // 4.053.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy ahaṃ ta ime sarve sāmadānādibhir guṇaiḥ / daṇḍena na tvayā śakyāḥ sugrīvād apakarṣitum // 4.053.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vigṛhyāsanam apy āhur durbalena balīyasaḥ / ātmarakṣākaras tasmān na vigṛhṇīta durbalaḥ // 4.053.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāṃ cemāṃ manyase dhātrīm etad bilam iti śrutam / etal lakṣmaṇabāṇānām īṣatkāryaṃ vidāraṇe // 4.053.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svalpaṃ hi kṛtam indreṇa kṣipatā hy aśaniṃ purā / lakṣmaṇo niśitair bāṇair bhindyāt patrapuṭaṃ yathā // 4.053.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇasya ca nārācā bahavaḥ santi tadvidhāḥ // 4.053.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avasthāne yadaiva tvam āsiṣyasi paraṃtapa / tadaiva harayaḥ sarve tyakṣyanti kṛtaniścayāḥ // 4.053.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
smarantaḥ putradārāṇāṃ nityodvignā bubhukṣitāḥ / kheditā duḥkhaśayyābhis tvāṃ kariṣyanti pṛṣṭhataḥ // 4.053.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ hīnaḥ suhṛdbhiś ca hitakāmaiś ca bandhubhiḥ / tṛṇād api bhṛśodvignaḥ spandamānād bhaviṣyasi // 4.053.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca jātu na hiṃsyus tvāṃ ghorā lakṣmaṇasāyakāḥ / apavṛttaṃ jighāṃsanto mahāvegā durāsadāḥ // 4.053.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmābhis tu gataṃ sārdhaṃ vinītavad upasthitam / ānupūrvyāt tu sugrīvo rājye tvāṃ sthāpayiṣyati // 4.053.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmakāmaḥ pitṛvyas te prītikāmo dṛḍhavrataḥ / śuciḥ satyapratijñaś ca nā tvāṃ jātu jighāṃsati // 4.053.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyakāmaś ca te mātus tadarthaṃ cāsya jīvitam / tasyāpatyaṃ ca nāsty anyat tasmād aṅgada gamyatām // 4.053.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ praśritaṃ dharmasaṃhitam / svāmisatkārasaṃyuktam aṅgado vākyam abravīt // 4.054.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthairyaṃ sarvātmanā śaucam ānṛśaṃsyam athārjavam / vikramaiś caiva dhairyaṃ ca sugrīve nopapadyate // 4.054.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya yo bhāryāṃ jīvito mahiṣīṃ priyām / dharmeṇa mātaraṃ yas tu svīkaroti jugupsitaḥ // 4.054.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ sa dharmaṃ jānīte yena bhrātrā durātmanā / yuddhāyābhiniyuktena bilasya pihitaṃ mukham // 4.054.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyāt pāṇigṛhītaś ca kṛtakarmā mahāyaśāḥ / vismṛto rāghavo yena sa kasya sukṛtaṃ smaret // 4.054.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇasya bhayād yena nādharmabhayabhīruṇā / ādiṣṭā mārgituṃ sītāṃ dharmam asmin kathaṃ bhavet // 4.054.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin pāpe kṛtaghne tu smṛtihīne calātmani / āryaḥ ko viśvasej jātu tat kulīno jijīviṣuḥ // 4.054.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājye putraṃ pratiṣṭhāpya saguṇo nirguṇo 'pi vā / kathaṃ śatrukulīnaṃ māṃ sugrīvo jīvayiṣyati // 4.054.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhinnamantro 'parāddhaś ca hīnaśaktiḥ kathaṃ hy aham / kiṣkindhāṃ prāpya jīveyam anātha iva durbalaḥ // 4.054.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāṃśudaṇḍena hi māṃ bandhanenopapādayet / śaṭhaḥ krūro nṛśaṃsaś ca sugrīvo rājyakāraṇāt // 4.054.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bandhanāc cāvasādān me śreyaḥ prāyopaveśanam / anujānīta māṃ sarve gṛhān gacchantu vānarāḥ // 4.054.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ vaḥ pratijānāmi na gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm / ihaiva prāyam āsiṣye śreyo maraṇam eva me // 4.054.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādanapūrvaṃ tu rājā kuśalam eva ca / vācyas tato yavīyān me sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ // 4.054.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārogyapūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ vācyā mātā rumā ca me / mātaraṃ caiva me tārām āśvāsayitum arhatha // 4.054.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṛtyā priyaputrā sā sānukrośā tapasvinī / vinaṣṭaṃ mām iha śrutvā vyaktaṃ hāsyati jīvitam // 4.054.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ vṛddhān apy abhivādya ca / saṃviveśāṅgado bhūmau rudan darbheṣu durmanāḥ // 4.054.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya saṃviśatas tatra rudanto vānararṣabhāḥ / nayanebhyaḥ pramumucur uṣṇaṃ vai vāriduḥkhitāḥ // 4.054.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvaṃ caiva nindantaḥ praśaṃsantaś ca vālinam / parivāryāṅgado sarve vyavasyan prāyam āsitum // 4.054.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mataṃ tad vāliputrasya vijñāya plavagarṣabhāḥ / upaspṛśyodakaṃ sarve prāṅmukhāḥ samupāviśan // 4.054.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dakṣiṇāgreṣu darbheṣu udaktīraṃ samāśritāḥ // 4.054.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa saṃviśadbhir bahubhir mahīdharo; mahādrikūṭapramitaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ / babhūva saṃnāditanirjharāntaro; bhṛśaṃ nadadbhir jaladair ivolbaṇaiḥ // 4.054.021	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
upaviṣṭās tu te sarve yasmin prāyaṃ giristhale / harayo gṛdhrarājaś ca taṃ deśam upacakrame // 4.055.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāmpātir nāma nāmnā tu cirajīvī vihaṃgamaḥ / bhrātā jaṭāyuṣaḥ śrīmān prakhyātabalapauruṣaḥ // 4.055.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kandarād abhiniṣkramya sa vindhyasya mahāgireḥ / upaviṣṭān harīn dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭātmā giram abravīt // 4.055.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhiḥ kila naraṃ loke vidhānenānuvartate / yathāyaṃ vihito bhakṣyaś cirān mahyam upāgataḥ // 4.055.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paramparāṇāṃ bhakṣiṣye vānarāṇāṃ mṛtaṃ mṛtam / uvācaivaṃ vacaḥ pakṣī tān nirīkṣya plavaṃgamān // 4.055.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā bhakṣalubdhasya pakṣiṇaḥ / aṅgadaḥ param āyasto hanūmantam athābravīt // 4.055.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya sītāpadeśena sākṣād vaivasvato yamaḥ / imaṃ deśam anuprāpto vānarāṇāṃ vipattaye // 4.055.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya na kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ rājño na ca vacaḥ kṛtam / harīṇām iyam ajñātā vipattiḥ sahasāgatā // 4.055.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehyāḥ priyakāmena kṛtaṃ karma jaṭāyuṣā / gṛdhrarājena yat tatra śrutaṃ vas tad aśeṣataḥ // 4.055.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni tiryagyonigatāny api / priyaṃ kurvanti rāmasya tyaktvā prāṇān yathā vayam // 4.055.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavārthe pariśrāntā vayaṃ saṃtyaktajīvitāḥ / kāntārāṇi prapannāḥ sma na ca paśyāma maithilīm // 4.055.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sukhī gṛdhrarājas tu rāvaṇena hato raṇe / muktaś ca sugrīvabhayād gataś ca paramāṃ gatim // 4.055.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭāyuṣo vināśena rājño daśarathasya ca / haraṇena ca vaidehyāḥ saṃśayaṃ harayo gatāḥ // 4.055.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmalakṣmaṇayor vāsām araṇye saha sītayā / rāghavasya ca bāṇena vālinaś ca tathā vadhaḥ // 4.055.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmakopād aśeṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ tathā vadhaḥ / kaikeyyā varadānena idaṃ hi vikṛtaṃ kṛtam // 4.055.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat tu śrutvā tadā vākyam aṅgadasya mukhodgatam / abravīd vacanaṃ gṛdhras tīkṣṇatuṇḍo mahāsvanaḥ // 4.055.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko 'yaṃ girā ghoṣayati prāṇaiḥ priyatarasya me / jaṭāyuṣo vadhaṃ bhrātuḥ kampayann iva me manaḥ // 4.055.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
katham āsīj janasthāne yuddhaṃ rākṣasagṛdhrayoḥ / nāmadheyam idaṃ bhrātuś cirasyādya mayā śrutam // 4.055.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yavīyaso guṇajñasya ślāghanīyasya vikramaiḥ / tad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ vināśaṃ vānararṣabhāḥ // 4.055.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātur jaṭāyuṣas tasya janasthānanivāsinaḥ / tasyaiva ca mama bhrātuḥ sakhā daśarathaḥ katham // 4.055.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya rāmaḥ priyaḥ putro jyeṣṭho gurujanapriyaḥ // 4.055.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūryāṃśudagdhapakṣatvān na śaknomi visarpitum / iccheyaṃ parvatād asmād avatartum ariṃdamāḥ // 4.055.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śokād bhraṣṭasvaram api śrutvā te hariyūthapāḥ / śraddadhur naiva tad vākyaṃ karmaṇā tasya śaṅkitāḥ // 4.056.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te prāyam upaviṣṭās tu dṛṣṭvā gṛdhraṃ plavaṃgamāḥ / cakrur buddhiṃ tadā raudrāṃ sarvān no bhakṣayiṣyati // 4.056.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā prāyam āsīnān yadi no bhakṣayiṣyati / kṛtakṛtyā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṣipraṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ // 4.056.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāṃ buddhiṃ tataś cakruḥ sarve te vānararṣabhāḥ / avatārya gireḥ śṛṅgād gṛdhram āhāṅgadas tadā // 4.056.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhūvur kṣarajo nāma vānarendraḥ pratāpavān / mamāryaḥ pārthivaḥ pakṣin dhārmikau tasya cātmajau // 4.056.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvaś caiva valī ca putrāv oghabalāv ubhau / loke viśrutakarmābhūd rājā vālī pitā mama // 4.056.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā kṛtsnasya jagata ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahārathaḥ / rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam // 4.056.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā / pitur nideśanirato dharmyaṃ panthānam āśritaḥ // 4.056.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya bhāryā janasthānād rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt // 4.056.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya ca pitur mitraṃ jaṭāyur nāma gṛdhrarāṭ / dadarśa sītāṃ vaidehīṃ hriyamāṇāṃ vihāyasā // 4.056.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā sthāpayitvā ca maithilīm / pariśrāntaś ca vṛddhaś ca rāvaṇena hato raṇe // 4.056.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ gṛdhro hatas tena rāvaṇena bahīyasā / saṃskṛtaś cāpi rāmeṇa gataś ca gatim uttamām // 4.056.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mama pitṛvyeṇa sugrīveṇa mahātmanā / cakāra rāghavaḥ sakhyaṃ so 'vadhīt pitaraṃ mama // 4.056.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māma pitrā viruddho hi sugrīvaḥ sacivaiḥ saha / nihatya vālinaṃ rāmas tatas tam abhiṣecayat // 4.056.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājye sthāpitas tena sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ / rājā vānaramukhyānāṃ yena prasthāpitā vayam // 4.056.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ rāmaprayuktās tu mārgamāṇās tatas tataḥ / vaidehīṃ nādhigacchāmo rātrau sūryaprabhām iva // 4.056.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te vayaṃ daṇdakāraṇyaṃ vicitya susamāhitāḥ / ajñānāt tu praviṣṭāḥ sma dharaṇyā vivṛtaṃ bilam // 4.056.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayasya māyā vihitaṃ tad bilaṃ ca vicinvatām / vyatītas tatra no māso yo rājñā sāmayaḥ kṛtaḥ // 4.056.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te vayaṃ kapirājasya sarve vacanakāriṇaḥ / kṛtāṃ saṃsthām atikrāntā bhayāt prāyam upāsmahe // 4.056.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kruddhe tasmiṃs tu kākutsthe sugrīve ca salakṣmaṇe / gatānām api sarveṣāṃ tatra no nāsti jīvitam // 4.056.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktaḥ karuṇaṃ vākyaṃ vānarais tyaktajīvitaiḥ / sabāṣpo vānarān gṛdhraḥ pratyuvāca mahāsvanaḥ // 4.057.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yavīyān mama sa bhrātā jaṭāyur nāma vānarāḥ / yamākhyāta hataṃ yuddhe rāvaṇena balīyasā // 4.057.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛddhabhāvād apakṣatvāc chṛṇvaṃs tad api marṣaye / na hi me śaktir adyāsti bhrātur vairavimokṣaṇe // 4.057.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā vṛtravadhe vṛtte sa cāhaṃ ca jayaiṣiṇau / ādityam upayātau svo jvalantaṃ raśmimālinam // 4.057.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āvṛtyākāśamārgeṇa javena sma gatau bhṛśam / madhyaṃ prāpte ca sūrye ca jaṭāyur avasīdati // 4.057.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ahaṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā sūryaraśmibhir arditam / pakṣābhyaṃ chādayām āsa snehāt paramavihvalam // 4.057.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirdagdhapakṣaḥ patito vindhye 'haṃ vānarottamāḥ / aham asmin vasan bhrātuḥ pravṛttiṃ nopalakṣaye // 4.057.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭāyuṣas tv evam ukto bhrātrā saṃpātinā tadā / yuvarājo mahāprājñaḥ pratyuvācāṅgadas tadā // 4.057.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭāyuṣo yadi bhrātā śrutaṃ te gaditaṃ mayā / ākhyāhi yadi jānāsi nilayaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ // 4.057.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adīrghadarśinaṃ taṃ vā rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam / antike yadi vā dūre yadi jānāsi śaṃsa naḥ // 4.057.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīn mahātejā jyeṣṭho bhrātā jaṭāyuṣaḥ / ātmānurūpaṃ vacanaṃ vānarān saṃpraharṣayan // 4.057.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirdagdhapakṣo gṛdhro 'haṃ gatavīryaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ / vāṅmātreṇa tu rāmasya kariṣye sāhyam uttamam // 4.057.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānāmi vāruṇāl lokān viṣṇos traivikramān api / devāsuravimardāṃś ca amṛtasya ca manthanam // 4.057.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya yad idaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ prathamaṃ mayā / jarayā ca hṛtaṃ tejaḥ prāṇāś ca śithilā mama // 4.057.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taruṇī rūpasaṃpannā sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā / hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rāvaṇena durātmanā // 4.057.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krośantī rāma rāmeti lakṣmaṇeti ca bhāminī / bhūṣaṇāny apavidhyantī gātrāṇi ca vidhunvatī // 4.057.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūryaprabheva śailāgre tasyāḥ kauśeyam uttamam / asite rākṣase bhāti yathā vā taḍidambude // 4.057.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tu sītām ahaṃ manye rāmasya parikīrtanāt / śrūyatāṃ me kathayato nilayaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ // 4.057.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca / adhyāste nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇo nāma rākasaḥ // 4.057.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ito dvīpe samudrasya saṃpūrṇe śatayojane / tasmiṃl laṅkā purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā // 4.057.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṃ vasati vaidehī dīnā kauśeyavāsinī / rāvaṇāntaḥpure ruddhā rākṣasībhiḥ surakṣitā // 4.057.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janakasyātmajāṃ rājñas tasyāṃ drakṣyatha maithilīm / laṅkāyām atha guptāyāṃ sāgareṇa samantataḥ // 4.057.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃprāpya sāgarasyāntaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ śatayojanam / āsādya dakṣiṇaṃ kūlaṃ tato drakṣyatha rāvaṇam // 4.057.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatraiva tvaritāḥ kṣipraṃ vikramadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ / jñānena khalu paśyāmi dṛṣṭvā pratyāgamiṣyatha // 4.057.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādyaḥ panthāḥ kuliṅgānāṃ ye cānye dhānyajīvinaḥ / dvitīyo balibhojānāṃ ye ca vṛkṣaphalāśinaḥ // 4.057.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāsās tṛtīyaṃ gacchanti krauñcāś ca kuraraiḥ saha / śyenāś caturthaṃ gacchanti gṛdhrā gacchanti pañcamam // 4.057.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balavīryopapannānāṃ rūpayauvanaśālinām / ṣaṣṭhas tu panthā haṃsānāṃ vainateyagatiḥ parā // 4.057.027.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vainateyāc ca no janma sarveṣāṃ vānararṣabhāḥ // 4.057.027.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
garhitaṃ tu kṛtaṃ karma yena sma piśitāśanāḥ / ihastho 'haṃ prapaśyāmi rāvaṇaṃ jānakīṃ tathā // 4.057.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmākam api sauvarṇaṃ divyaṃ cakṣurbalaṃ tathā / tasmād āhāravīryeṇa nisargeṇa ca vānarāḥ // 4.057.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyojanaśatāt sāgrād vayaṃ paśyāma nityaśaḥ // 4.057.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmākaṃ vihitā vṛttir nisārgeṇa ca dūrataḥ / vihitā pādamūle tu vṛttiś caraṇayodhinām // 4.057.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāyo dṛśyatāṃ kaś cil laṅghane lavaṇāmbhasaḥ / abhigamya tu vaidehīṃ samṛddhārthā gamiṣyatha // 4.057.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samudraṃ netum icchāmi bhavadbhir varuṇālayam / pradāsyāmy udakaṃ bhrātuḥ svargatasya mahātmanaḥ // 4.057.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nītvā tu taṃ deśaṃ tīre nadanadīpateḥ / nirdagdhapakṣaṃ saṃpātiṃ vānarāḥ sumahaujasaḥ // 4.057.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
punaḥ pratyānayitvā vai taṃ deśaṃ patageśvaram / babhūvur vānarā hṛṣṭāḥ pravṛttim upalabhya te // 4.057.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tad amṛtāsvādaṃ gṛdhrarājena bhāṣitam / niśamya vadato hṛṣṭās te vacaḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ // 4.058.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbavān vai hariśreṣṭhaḥ saha sarvaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ / bhūtalāt sahasotthāya gṛdhrarājānam abravīt // 4.058.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva sītā kena vā dṛṣṭā ko vā harati maithilīm / tad ākhyātu bhavān sarvaṃ gatir bhava vanaukasām // 4.058.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko dāśarathibāṇānāṃ vajraveganipātinām / svayaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktānāṃ na cintayati vikramam // 4.058.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa harīn prītisaṃyuktān sītā śrutisamāhitān / punar āśvāsayan prīta idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 4.058.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyatām iha vaidehyā yathā me haraṇaṃ śrutam / yena cāpi mamākhyātaṃ yatra cāyatalocanā // 4.058.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham asmin girau durge bahuyojanam āyate / cirān nipatito vṛddhaḥ kṣīṇaprāṇaparākramaḥ // 4.058.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ mām evaṃgataṃ putraḥ supārśvo nāma nāmataḥ / āhāreṇa yathākālaṃ bibharti patatāṃ varaḥ // 4.058.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tīkṣṇakāmās tu gandharvās tīkṣṇakopā bhujaṃgamāḥ / mṛgāṇāṃ tu bhayaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tatas tīkṣṇakṣudhā vayam // 4.058.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kadā cit kṣudhārtasya mama cāhārakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / gatasūryo 'hani prāpto mama putro hy anāmiṣaḥ // 4.058.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mayā vṛddhabhāvāc ca kopāc ca paribhartsitaḥ / kṣutpipāsā parītena kumāraḥ patatāṃ varaḥ // 4.058.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mamāhārasaṃrodhāt pīḍitaḥ prītivardhanaḥ / anumānya yathātattvam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 4.058.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tāta yathākālam āmiṣārthī kham āplutaḥ / mahendrasya girer dvāram āvṛtya ca samāsthitaḥ // 4.058.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra sattvasahasrāṇāṃ sāgarāntaracāriṇām / panthānam eko 'dhyavasaṃ saṃniroddhum avāṅmukhaḥ // 4.058.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra kaś cin mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sūryodayasamaprabhām / striyam ādāya gacchan vai bhinnāñjanacayopamaḥ // 4.058.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'ham abhyavahārārthī tau dṛṣṭvā kṛtaniścayaḥ / tena sāmnā vinītena panthānam abhiyācitaḥ // 4.058.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi sāmopapannānāṃ prahartā vidyate kva cit / nīceṣv api janaḥ kaś cit kim aṅga bata madvidhaḥ // 4.058.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa yātas tejasā vyoma saṃkṣipann iva vegataḥ / athāhaṃ khe carair bhūtair abhigamya sabhājitaḥ // 4.058.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā jīvasi tāteti abruvan māṃ maharṣayaḥ / kathaṃ cit sakalatro 'sau gatas te svasty asaṃśayam // 4.058.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tato 'haṃ taiḥ siddhaiḥ paramaśobhanaiḥ / sa ca me rāvaṇo rājā rakṣasāṃ prativeditaḥ // 4.058.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haran dāśarather bhāryāṃ rāmasya janakātmajām / bhraṣṭābharaṇakauśeyāṃ śokavegaparājitām // 4.058.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmalakṣmaṇayor nāma krośantīṃ muktamūrdhajām / eṣa kālātyayas tāvad iti vākyavidāṃ varaḥ // 4.058.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etam arthaṃ samagraṃ me supārśvaḥ pratyavedayat / tac chrutvāpi hi me buddhir nāsīt kā cit parākrame // 4.058.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apakṣo hi kathaṃ pakṣī karma kiṃ cid upakramet / yat tu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ vāgbuddhiguṇavartinā // 4.058.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyatāṃ tat pravakṣyāmi bhavatāṃ pauruṣāśrayam / vāṅmatibhyāṃ hi sārveṣāṃ kariṣyāmi priyaṃ hi vaḥ // 4.058.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad dhi dāśaratheḥ kāryaṃ mama tan nātra saṃśayaḥ // 4.058.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te bhavanto matiśreṣṭhā balavanto manasvinaḥ / sahitāḥ kapirājena devair api durāsadāḥ // 4.058.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmalakṣmaṇabāṇāś ca niśitāḥ kaṅkapatriṇaḥ / trayāṇām api lokānāṃ paryāptās trāṇanigrahe // 4.058.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ khalu daśagrīvas tejobalasamanvitaḥ / bhavatāṃ tu samarthānāṃ na kiṃ cid api duṣkaram // 4.058.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad alaṃ kālasaṃgena kriyatāṃ buddhiniścayaḥ / na hi karmasu sajjante buddhimanto bhavadvidhāḥ // 4.058.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kṛtodakaṃ snātaṃ taṃ gṛdhraṃ hariyūthapāḥ / upaviṣṭā girau durge parivārya samantataḥ // 4.059.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam aṅgadam upāsīnaṃ taiḥ sarvair haribhir vṛtam / janitapratyayo harṣāt saṃpātiḥ punar abravīt // 4.059.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtvā niḥśabdam ekāgrāḥ śṛṇvantu harayo mama / tattvaṃ saṃkīrtayiṣyāmi yathā jānāmi maithilīm // 4.059.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asya vindhyasya śikhare patito 'smi purā vane / sūryātapaparītāṅgo nirdagdhaḥ sūryaraśmibhiḥ // 4.059.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
labdhasaṃjñas tu ṣaḍrātrād vivaśo vihvalann iva / vīkṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvā nābhijānāmi kiṃ cana // 4.059.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu sāgarāñ śailān nadīḥ sarvāḥ sarāṃsi ca / vanāny aṭavideśāṃś ca samīkṣya matir āgamat // 4.059.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛṣṭapakṣigaṇākīrṇaḥ kandarāntarakūṭavān / dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre vindhyo 'yam iti niścitaḥ // 4.059.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsīc cātrāśramaṃ puṇyaṃ surair api supūjitam / ṛṣir niśākaro nāma yasminn ugratapābhavat // 4.059.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi tenāsminn ṛṣiṇā vinā / vasato mama dharmajñāḥ svargate tu niśākare // 4.059.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avatīrya ca vindhyāgrāt kṛcchreṇa viṣamāc chanaiḥ / tīkṣṇadarbhāṃ vasumatīṃ duḥkhena punar āgataḥ // 4.059.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ṛṣiṃ draṣṭu kāmo 'smi duḥkhenābhyāgato bhṛśam / jaṭāyuṣā mayā caiva bahuśo 'bhigato hi saḥ // 4.059.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāśramapadābhyāśe vavur vātāḥ sugandhinaḥ / vṛkṣo nāpuṣpitaḥ kaś cid aphalo vā na dṛśyate // 4.059.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upetya cāśramaṃ puṇyaṃ vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ / draṣṭukāmaḥ pratīkṣe ca bhagavantaṃ niśākaram // 4.059.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāpaśyam adūrastham ṛṣiṃ jvalitatejasaṃ / kṛtābhiṣekaṃ durdharṣam upāvṛttam udaṅmukham // 4.059.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ṛkṣāḥ sṛmarā vyāghrāḥ siṃhā nāgāḥ sarīsṛpāḥ / parivāryopagacchanti dātāraṃ prāṇino yathā // 4.059.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prāptam ṛṣiṃ jñātvā tāni sattvāni vai yayuḥ / praviṣṭe rājani yathā sarvaṃ sāmātyakaṃ balam // 4.059.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣis tu dṛṣṭvā māṃ tuṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaś cāśramaṃ punaḥ / muhūrtamātrān niṣkramya tataḥ kāryam apṛcchata // 4.059.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumya vaikalyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā roṃṇāṃ te nāvagamyate / agnidagdhāv imau pakṣau tvak caiva vraṇitā tava // 4.059.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvau gṛdhrau dṛṣṭapūrvau me mātariśvasamau jave / gṛdhrāṇāṃ caiva rājānau bhrātarau kāmarūpiṇau // 4.059.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyeṣṭhas tvaṃ tu ca saṃpātir jaṭāyur anujas tava / mānuṣaṃ rūpam āsthāya gṛhṇītāṃ caraṇau mama // 4.059.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ te vyādhisamutthānaṃ pakṣayoḥ patanaṃ katham / daṇḍo vāyaṃ dhṛtaḥ kena sarvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ // 4.059.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tad dāruṇaṃ karma duṣkaraṃ sāhasāt kṛtam / ācacakṣe muneḥ sarvaṃ sūryānugamanaṃ tathā // 4.060.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan vraṇayuktatvāl lajjayā cākulendriyaḥ / pariśrānto na śaknomi vacanaṃ paribhāṣitum // 4.060.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ caiva jaṭāyuś ca saṃgharṣād darpamohitau / ākāśaṃ patitau vīrau jighāsantau parākramam // 4.060.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kailāsaśikhare baddhvā munīnām agrataḥ paṇam / raviḥ syād anuyātavyo yāvad astaṃ mahāgirim // 4.060.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāvāṃ yugapat prāptāv apaśyāva mahītale / rathacakrapramāṇāni nagarāṇi pṛthak pṛthak // 4.060.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva cid vāditraghoṣāṃś ca brahmaghoṣāṃś ca śuśruva / gāyantīś cāṅganā bahvīḥ paśyāvo raktavāsasaḥ // 4.060.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tūrṇam utpatya cākāśam ādityapatham āsthitau / āvām ālokayāvas tad vanaṃ śādvalasaṃsthitam // 4.060.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upalair iva saṃchannā dṛśyate bhūḥ śiloccayaiḥ / āpagābhiś ca saṃvītā sūtrair iva vasuṃdharā // 4.060.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
himavāṃś caiva vindhyaś ca meruś ca sumahān nagaḥ / bhūtale saṃprakāśante nāgā iva jalāśaye // 4.060.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tīvrasvedaś ca khedaś ca bhayaṃ cāsīt tadāvayoḥ / samāviśata mohaś ca mohān mūrchā ca dāruṇā // 4.060.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na dig vijñāyate yāmyā nāgenyā na ca vāruṇī / yugānte niyato loko hato dagdha ivāgninā // 4.060.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatnena mahatā bhūyo raviḥ samavalokitaḥ / tulyaḥ pṛthvīpramāṇena bhāskaraḥ pratibhāti nau // 4.060.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭāyur mām anāpṛcchya nipapāta mahīṃ tataḥ / taṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam ākāśād ātmānaṃ muktavān aham // 4.060.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pakṣibhyāṃ ca mayā gupto jaṭāyur na pradahyata / pramādāt tatra nirdagdhaḥ patan vāyupathād aham // 4.060.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśaṅke taṃ nipatitaṃ janasthāne jaṭāyuṣam / ahaṃ tu patito vindhye dagdhapakṣo jaḍīkṛtaḥ // 4.060.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyena hīno bhrātrā ca pakṣābhyāṃ vikrameṇa ca / sarvathā martum evecchan patiṣye śikharād gireḥ // 4.060.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā muniśreṣṭham arudaṃ duḥkhito bhṛśam / atha dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu bhagavān idam abravīt // 4.061.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pakṣau ca te prapakṣau ca punar anyau bhaviṣyataḥ / cakṣuṣī caiva prāṇāś ca vikramaś ca balaṃ ca te // 4.061.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purāṇe sumahat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ hi mayā śrutam / dṛṣṭaṃ me tapasā caiva śrutvā ca viditaṃ mama // 4.061.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā daśaratho nāma kaś cid ikṣvākunandanaḥ / tasya putro mahātejā rāmo nāma bhaviṣyati // 4.061.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
araṇyaṃ ca saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena gamiṣyati / tasminn arthe niyuktaḥ san pitrā satyaparākramaḥ // 4.061.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nairṛto rāvaṇo nāma tasyā bhāryāṃ hariṣyati / rākṣasendro janasthānād avadhyaḥ suradānavaiḥ // 4.061.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā ca kāmaiḥ pralobhyantī bhakṣyair bhojyaiś ca maithilī / na bhokṣyati mahābhāgā duḥkhamagnā yaśasvinī // 4.061.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paramānnaṃ tu vaidehyā jñātvā dāsyati vāsavaḥ / yad annam amṛtaprakhyaṃ surāṇām api durlabham // 4.061.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad annaṃ maithilī prāpya vijñāyendrād idaṃ tv iti / agram uddhṛtya rāmāya bhūtale nirvapiṣyati // 4.061.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi jīvati me bhartā lakṣmaṇena saha prabhuḥ / devatvaṃ gatayor vāpi tayor annam idaṃ tv iti // 4.061.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣyanty anveṣakās tasyā rāmadūtāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ / ākhyeyā rāmamahiṣī tvayā tebhyo vihaṃgama // 4.061.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā tu na gantavyam īdṛśaḥ kva gamiṣyasi / deśakālau pratīkṣasva pakṣau tvaṃ pratipatsyase // 4.061.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utsaheyam ahaṃ kartum adyaiva tvāṃ sapakṣakam / ihasthas tvaṃ tu lokānāṃ hitaṃ kāryaṃ kariṣyasi // 4.061.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayāpi khalu tat kāryaṃ tayoś ca nṛpaputrayoḥ / brāhmaṇānāṃ surāṇāṃ ca munīnāṃ vāsavasya ca // 4.061.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
icchāmy aham api draṣṭuṃ bhrātaru rāmalakṣmaṇau / necche ciraṃ dhārayituṃ prāṇāṃs tyakṣye kalevaram // 4.061.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etair anyaiś ca bahubhir vākyair vākyaviśāradaḥ / māṃ praśasyābhyanujñāpya praviṣṭaḥ sa svam āśramam // 4.062.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kandarāt tu visarpitvā parvatasya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ / ahaṃ vindhyaṃ samāruhya bhavataḥ pratipālaye // 4.062.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya tv etasya kālasya sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ gatam / deśakālapratīkṣo 'smi hṛdi kṛtvā muner vacaḥ // 4.062.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāprasthānam āsādya svargate tu niśākare / māṃ nirdahati saṃtāpo vitarkair bahubhir vṛtam // 4.062.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utthitāṃ maraṇe buddhiṃ muni vākyair nivartaye / buddhir yā tena me dattā prāṇasaṃrakṣaṇāya tu // 4.062.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā me 'panayate duḥkhaṃ dīptevāgniśikhā tamaḥ // 4.062.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
budhyatā ca mayā vīryaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ / putraḥ saṃtarjito vāgbhir na trātā maithilī katham // 4.062.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyā vilapitaṃ śrutvā tau ca sītā vinākṛtau / na me daśarathasnehāt putreṇotpāditaṃ priyam // 4.062.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tv evaṃ bruvāṇasya saṃpāter vānaraiḥ saha / utpetatus tadā pakṣau samakṣaṃ vanacāriṇām // 4.062.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā svāṃ tanuṃ pakṣair udgatair aruṇacchadaiḥ / praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe vānarāṃś cedam abravīt // 4.062.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśākarasya maharṣeḥ prabhāvād amitātmanaḥ / ādityaraśminirdagdhau pakṣau me punar utthitau // 4.062.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yauvane vartamānasya mamāsīd yaḥ parākramaḥ / tam evādyāvagacchāmi balaṃ pauruṣam eva ca // 4.062.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ sītām adhigamiṣyatha / pakṣalābho mamāyaṃ vaḥ siddhipratyaya kārakaḥ // 4.062.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā tān harīn sarvān saṃpātiḥ patatāṃ varaḥ / utpapāta gireḥ śṛṅgāj jijñāsuḥ khagamo gatim // 4.062.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā prītisaṃhṛṣṭamānasāḥ / babhūvur hariśārdūlā vikramābhyudayonmukhāḥ // 4.062.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha pavanasamānavikramāḥ; plavagavarāḥ pratilabdha pauruṣāḥ / abhijidabhimukhāṃ diśaṃ yayur; janakasutā parimārgaṇonmukhāḥ // 4.062.015	aparavaktra (1,3: nnrlg, 2,4: njjr)
ākhyātā gṛdhrarājena samutpatya plavaṃgamāḥ / saṃgatāḥ prītisaṃyuktā vineduḥ siṃhavikramāḥ // 4.063.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpāter vacanaṃ śrutvā harayo rāvaṇakṣayam / hṛṣṭāḥ sāgaram ājagmuḥ sītādarśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 4.063.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhikramya tu taṃ deśaṃ dadṛśur bhīmavikramāḥ / kṛtsnaṃ lokasya mahataḥ pratibimbam iva sthitam // 4.063.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dakṣiṇasya samudrasya samāsādyottarāṃ diśam / saṃniveśaṃ tataś cakruḥ sahitā vānarottamāḥ // 4.063.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sattvair mahadbhir vikṛtaiḥ krīḍadbhir vividhair jale / vyāttāsyaiḥ sumahākāyair ūrmibhiś ca samākulam // 4.063.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasuptam iva cānyatra krīḍantam iva cānyataḥ / kva cit parvatamātraiś ca jalarāśibhir āvṛtam // 4.063.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃkulaṃ dānavendraiś ca pātālatalavāsibhiḥ / romaharṣakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣeduḥ kapikuñjarāḥ // 4.063.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ākāśam iva duṣpāraṃ sāgaraṃ prekṣya vānarāḥ / viṣeduḥ sahasā sarve kathaṃ kāryam iti bruvan // 4.063.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣaṇṇāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā sāgarasya nirīkṣaṇāt / āśvāsayām āsa harīn bhayārtān harisattamaḥ // 4.063.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na niṣādena naḥ kāryaṃ viṣādo doṣavattaraḥ / viṣādo hanti puruṣaṃ bālaṃ kruddha ivoragaḥ // 4.063.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣādo 'yaṃ prasahate vikrame paryupasthite / tejasā tasya hīnasya puruṣārtho na sidhyati // 4.063.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām aṅgado vānaraiḥ saha / harivṛddhaiḥ samāgamya punar mantram amantrayat // 4.063.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā vānarāṇāṃ dhvajinī parivāryāṅgadaṃ babhau / vāsavaṃ parivāryeva marutāṃ vāhinī sthitā // 4.063.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko 'nyas tāṃ vānarīṃ senāṃ śaktaḥ stambhayituṃ bhavet / anyatra vālitanayād anyatra ca hanūmataḥ // 4.063.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tān harivṛddhāṃś ca tac ca sainyam ariṃdamaḥ / anumānyāṅgadaḥ śrīmān vākyam arthavad abravīt // 4.063.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ka idānīṃ mahātejā laṅghayiṣyati sāgaram / kaḥ kariṣyati sugrīvaṃ satyasaṃdham ariṃdamam // 4.063.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko vīro yojanaśataṃ laṅghayeta plavaṃgamāḥ / imāṃś ca yūthapān sarvān mocayet ko mahābhayāt // 4.063.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya prasādād dārāṃś ca putrāṃś caiva gṛhāṇi ca / ito nivṛttāḥ paśyema siddhārthāḥ sukhino vayam // 4.063.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya prasādād rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam / abhigacchema saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sugrīvaṃ ca mahābalam // 4.063.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi kaś cit samartho vaḥ sāgaraplavane hariḥ / sa dadātv iha naḥ śīghraṃ puṇyām abhayadakṣiṇām // 4.063.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā na kaś cit kiṃ cid abravīt / stimitevābhavat sarvā sā tatra harivāhinī // 4.063.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
punar evāṅgadaḥ prāha tān harīn harisattamaḥ / sarve balavatāṃ śreṣṭhā bhavanto dṛḍhavikramāḥ // 4.063.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyapadeśya kule jātāḥ pūjitāś cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ / na hi vo gamane saṃgaḥ kadā cid api kasya cit // 4.063.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bruvadhvaṃ yasya yā śaktir gamane plavagarṣabhāḥ // 4.063.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'ṅgadavacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vānarottamāḥ / svaṃ svaṃ gatau samutsāham āhus tatra yathākramam // 4.064.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ / maindaś ca dvividaś caiva suṣeṇo jāmbavāṃs tathā // 4.064.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ābabhāṣe gajas tatra plaveyaṃ daśayojanam / gavākṣo yojanāny āha gamiṣyāmīti viṃśatim // 4.064.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gavayo vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha / triṃśataṃ tu gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ plavaṃgamāḥ // 4.064.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarabho vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha / catvāriṃśad gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // 4.064.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṃs tu mahātejā abravīd gandhamādanaḥ / yojanānāṃ gamiṣyāmi pañcāśat tu na saṃśayaḥ // 4.064.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maindas tu vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha / yojanānāṃ paraṃ ṣaṣṭim ahaṃ plavitum utsahe // 4.064.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tatra mahātejā dvividaḥ pratyabhāṣata / gamiṣyāmi na saṃdehaḥ saptatiṃ yojanāny aham // 4.064.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suṣeṇas tu hariśreṣṭhaḥ proktavān kapisattamān / aśītiṃ yojanānāṃ tu plaveyaṃ plavagarṣabhāḥ // 4.064.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ kathayatāṃ tatra sarvāṃs tān anumānya ca / tato vṛddhatamas teṣāṃ jāmbavān pratyabhāṣata // 4.064.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvam asmākam apy āsīt kaś cid gatiparākramaḥ / te vayaṃ vayasaḥ pāram anuprāptāḥ sma sāmpratam // 4.064.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tu naivaṃ gate śakyam idaṃ kāryam upekṣitum / yad arthaṃ kapirājaś ca rāmaś ca kṛtaniścayau // 4.064.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāmprataṃ kālabhedena yā gatis tāṃ nibodhata / navatiṃ yojanānāṃ tu gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // 4.064.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃś ca sarvān hariśreṣṭhāñ jāmbavān punar abravīt / na khalv etāvad evāsīd gamane me parākramaḥ // 4.064.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā mahābalaiś caiva yajñe viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ / pradakṣiṇīkṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ kramamāṇas trivikramaḥ // 4.064.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa idānīm ahaṃ vṛddhaḥ plavane mandavikramaḥ / yauvane ca tadāsīn me balam apratimaṃ paraiḥ // 4.064.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpraty etāvatīṃ śaktiṃ gamane tarkayāmy aham / naitāvatā ca saṃsiddhiḥ kāryasyāsya bhaviṣyati // 4.064.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athottaram udārārtham abravīd aṅgadas tadā / anumānya mahāprājño jāmbavantaṃ mahākapim // 4.064.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham etad gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ śataṃ mahat / nivartane tu me śaktiḥ syān na veti na niścitam // 4.064.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca hariśreṣṭho jāmbavān vākyakovidaḥ / jñāyate gamane śaktis tava haryṛkṣasattama // 4.064.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ śatasahasraṃ vā na hy eṣa vidhir ucyate / yojanānāṃ bhavāñ śakto gantuṃ pratinivartitum // 4.064.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi preṣayitā tata svāmī preṣyaḥ kathaṃ cana / bhavatāyaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ preṣyaḥ plavagasattama // 4.064.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavān kalatram asmākaṃ svāmibhāve vyavasthitaḥ / svāmī kalatraṃ sainyasya gatir eṣā paraṃtapa // 4.064.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt kalatravat tāta pratipālyaḥ sadā bhavān / api caitasya kāryasya bhavān mūlam ariṃdama // 4.064.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mūlam arthasya saṃrakṣyam eṣa kāryavidāṃ nayaḥ / mūle hi sati sidhyanti guṇāḥ puṣpaphalādayaḥ // 4.064.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad bhavān asyā kāryasya sādhane satyavikramaḥ / buddhivikramasaṃpanno hetur atra paraṃtapaḥ // 4.064.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guruś ca guruputraś ca tvaṃ hi naḥ kapisattama / bhavantam āśritya vayaṃ samarthā hy arthasādhane // 4.064.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uktavākyaṃ mahāprājñaṃ jāmbavantaṃ mahākapiḥ / pratyuvācottaraṃ vākyaṃ vālisūnur athāṅgadaḥ // 4.064.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi nāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi nānyo vānarapuṃgavaḥ / punaḥ khalv idam asmābhiḥ kāryaṃ prāyopaveśanam // 4.064.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy akṛtvā haripateḥ saṃdeśaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ / tatrāpi gatvā prāṇānāṃ paśyāmi parirakṣaṇam // 4.064.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi prasāde cātyarthaṃ kope ca harir īśvaraḥ / atītya tasya saṃdeśaṃ vināśo gamane bhavet // 4.064.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad yathā hy asya kāryasya na bhavaty anyathā gatiḥ / tad bhavān eva dṛṣṭārthaḥ saṃcintayitum arhati // 4.064.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'ṅgadena tadā vīraḥ pratyuktaḥ plavagarṣabhaḥ / jāmbavān uttaraṃ vākyaṃ provācedaṃ tato 'ṅgadam // 4.064.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asya te vīra kāryasya na kiṃ cit parihīyate / eṣa saṃcodayāmy enaṃ yaḥ kāryaṃ sādhayiṣyati // 4.064.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pratītaṃ plavatāṃ variṣṭham; ekāntam āśritya sukhopaviṣṭam / saṃcodayām āsa haripravīro; haripravīraṃ hanumantam eva // 4.064.035	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
anekaśatasāhasrīṃ viṣaṇṇāṃ harivāhinīm / jāmbavān samudīkṣyaivaṃ hanumantam athābravīt // 4.065.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīra vānaralokasya sarvaśāstram athābravīt / tūṣṇīm ekāntam āśritya hanuman kiṃ na jalpasi // 4.065.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanuman harirājasya sugrīvasya samo hy asi / rāmalakṣmaṇayoś cāpi tejasā ca balena ca // 4.065.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ariṣṭaneminaḥ putrau vainateyo mahābalaḥ / garutmān iva vikhyāta uttamaḥ sarvapakṣiṇām // 4.065.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahuśo hi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sāgare sa mahābalaḥ / bhujagān uddharan pakṣī mahāvego mahāyaśāḥ // 4.065.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pakṣayor yad balaṃ tasya tāvad bhujabalaṃ tava / vikramaś cāpi vegaś ca na te tenāpahīyate // 4.065.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca sattvaṃ ca harisattama / viśiṣṭaṃ sarvabhūteṣu kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase // 4.065.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apsarāpsarasāṃ śreṣṭhā vikhyātā puñjikasthalā / ajñaneti parikhyātā patnī kesariṇo hareḥ // 4.065.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiśāpād abhūt tāta vānarī kāmarūpiṇī / duhitā vānarendrasya kuñjarasya mahātmanaḥ // 4.065.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kapitve cārusarvāṅgī kadā cit kāmarūpiṇī / mānuṣaṃ vigrahaṃ kṛtvā yauvanottamaśālinī // 4.065.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acarat parvatasyāgre prāvṛḍambudasaṃnibhe / vicitramālyābharaṇā mahārhakṣaumavāsinī // 4.065.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyā vastraṃ viśālākṣyāḥ pītaṃ raktadaśaṃ śubham / sthitāyāḥ parvatasyāgre māruto 'paharac chanaiḥ // 4.065.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśa tatas tasyā vṛttāv ūrū susaṃhatau / stanau ca pīnau sahitau sujātaṃ cāru cānanam // 4.065.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ viśālāyataśroṇīṃ tanumadhyāṃ yaśasvinīm / dṛṣṭvaiva śubhasarvāgnīṃ pavanaḥ kāmamohitaḥ // 4.065.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pīnābhyāṃ paryaṣvajata mārutaḥ / manmathāviṣṭasarvāṅgo gatātmā tām aninditām // 4.065.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tu tatraiva saṃbhrāntā suvṛttā vākyam abravīt / ekapatnīvratam idaṃ ko nāśayitum icchati // 4.065.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
añjanāyā vacaḥ śrutvā mārutaḥ pratyabhāṣata / na tvāṃ hiṃsāmi suśroṇi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam // 4.065.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manasāsmi gato yat tvāṃ pariṣvajya yaśasvini / vīryavān buddhisaṃpannaḥ putras tava bhaviṣyati // 4.065.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyutthitaṃ tataḥ sūryaṃ bālo dṛṣṭvā mahāvane / phalaṃ ceti jighṛkṣus tvam utplutyābhyapato divam // 4.065.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatāni trīṇi gatvātha yojanānāṃ mahākape / tejasā tasya nirdhūto na viṣādaṃ tato gataḥ // 4.065.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāvad āpatatas tūrṇam antarikṣaṃ mahākape / kṣiptam indreṇa te vajraṃ krodhāviṣṭena dhīmatā // 4.065.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śailāgraśikhare vāmo hanur abhajyata / tato hi nāmadheyaṃ te hanumān iti kīrtyate // 4.065.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tvāṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyur gandhavahaḥ svayam / trailokye bhṛśasaṃkruddho na vavau vai prabhañjanaḥ // 4.065.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃbhrāntāś ca surāḥ sarve trailokye kṣubhite sati / prasādayanti saṃkruddhaṃ mārutaṃ bhuvaneśvarāḥ // 4.065.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasādite ca pavane brahmā tubhyaṃ varaṃ dadau / aśastravadhyatāṃ tāta samare satyavikrama // 4.065.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajrasya ca nipātena virujaṃ tvāṃ samīkṣya ca / sahasranetraḥ prītātmā dadau te varam uttamam // 4.065.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svacchandataś ca maraṇaṃ te bhūyād iti vai prabho / sa tvaṃ kesariṇaḥ putraḥ kṣetrajo bhīmavikramaḥ // 4.065.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārutasyaurasaḥ putras tejasā cāpi tatsamaḥ / tvaṃ hi vāyusuto vatsa plavane cāpi tatsamaḥ // 4.065.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vayam adya gataprāṇā bhavān asmāsu sāmpratam / dākṣyavikramasaṃpannaḥ pakṣirāja ivāparaḥ // 4.065.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trivikrame mayā tāta saśailavanakānanā / triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī parikrāntā pradakṣiṇam // 4.065.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadā cauṣadhayo 'smābhiḥ saṃcitā devaśāsanāt / niṣpannam amṛtaṃ yābhis tadāsīn no mahad balam // 4.065.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa idānīm ahaṃ vṛddhaḥ parihīnaparākramaḥ / sāmprataṃ kālam asmākaṃ bhavān sarvaguṇānvitaḥ // 4.065.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vijṛmbhasva vikrāntaḥ plavatām uttamo hy asi / tvadvīryaṃ draṣṭukāmeyaṃ sarvā vānaravāhinī // 4.065.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttiṣṭha hariśārdūla laṅghayasva mahārṇavam / parā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ hanuman yā gatis tava // 4.065.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣāṇṇā harayaḥ sarve hanuman kim upekṣase / vikramasva mahāvego viṣṇus trīn vikramān iva // 4.065.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu vai jāmbavatābhicoditaḥ; pratītavegaḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapiḥ / praharṣayaṃs tāṃ harivīra vāhinīṃ; cakāra rūpaṃ mahad ātmanas tadā // 4.065.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
saṃstūyamāno hanumān vyavardhata mahābalaḥ / samāvidhya ca lāṅgūlaṃ harṣāc ca balam eyivān // 4.066.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya saṃstūyamānasya sarvair vānarapuṃgavaiḥ / tejasāpūryamāṇasya rūpam āsīd anuttamam // 4.066.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā vijṛmbhate siṃho vivṛddho girigahvare / mārutasyaurasaḥ putras tathā saṃprati jṛmbhate // 4.066.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśobhata mukhaṃ tasya jṛmbhamāṇasya dhīmataḥ / ambarīṣopamaṃ dīptaṃ vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ // 4.066.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harīṇām utthito madhyāt saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ / abhivādya harīn vṛddhān hanumān idam abravīt // 4.066.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arujan parvatāgrāṇi hutāśanasakho 'nilaḥ / balavān aprameyaś ca vāyur ākāśagocaraḥ // 4.066.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāhaṃ śīghravegasya śīghragasya mahātmanaḥ / mārutasyaurasaḥ putraḥ plavane nāsti me samaḥ // 4.066.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utsaheyaṃ hi vistīrṇam ālikhantam ivāmbaram / meruṃ girim asaṃgena parigantuṃ sahasraśaḥ // 4.066.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāhuvegapraṇunnena sāgareṇāham utsahe / samāplāvayituṃ lokaṃ saparvatanadīhradam // 4.066.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamorujaṅghāvegena bhaviṣyati samutthitaḥ / saṃmūrchitamahāgrāhaḥ samudro varuṇālayaḥ // 4.066.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pannagāśanam ākāśe patantaṃ pakṣisevitam / vainateyam ahaṃ śaktaḥ parigantuṃ sahasraśaḥ // 4.066.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udayāt prasthitaṃ vāpi jvalantaṃ raśmimālinam / anastamitam ādityam abhigantuṃ samutsahe // 4.066.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bhūmim asaṃspṛśya punar āgantum utsahe / pravegenaiva mahatā bhīmena plavagarṣabhāḥ // 4.066.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utsaheyam atikrāntuṃ sarvān ākāśagocarān / sāgaraṃ kṣobhayiṣyāmi dārayiṣyāmi medinīm // 4.066.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parvatān kampayiṣyāmi plavamānaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ / hariṣye coruvegena plavamāno mahārṇavam // 4.066.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
latānāṃ vīrudhāṃ puṣpaṃ pādapānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / anuyāsyati mām adya plavamānaṃ vihāyasā // 4.066.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaviṣyati hi me panthāḥ svāteḥ panthā ivāmbare // 4.066.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
carantaṃ ghoram ākāśam utpatiṣyantam eva ca / drakṣyanti nipatantaṃ ca sarvabhūtāni vānarāḥ // 4.066.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāmerupratīkāśaṃ māṃ drakṣyadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ / divam āvṛtya gacchantaṃ grasamānam ivāmbaram // 4.066.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhamiṣyāmi jīmūtān kampayiṣyāmi parvatān / sāgaraṃ kṣobhayiṣyāmi plavamānaḥ samāhitaḥ // 4.066.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vainateyasya vā śaktir mama vā mārutasya vā / ṛte suparṇarājānaṃ mārutaṃ vā mahābalam // 4.066.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi bhūtaṃ prapaśyāmi yo māṃ plutam anuvrajet // 4.066.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nimeṣāntaramātreṇa nirālambhanam ambaram / sahasā nipatiṣyāmi ghanād vidyud ivotthitā // 4.066.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaviṣyati hi me rūpaṃ plavamānasya sāgaram / viṣṇoḥ prakramamāṇasya tadā trīn vikramān iva // 4.066.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhyā cāhaṃ prapaśyāmi manaś ceṣṭā ca me tathā / ahaṃ drakṣyāmi vaidehīṃ pramodadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ // 4.066.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārutasya samo vege garuḍasya samo jave / ayutaṃ yojanānāṃ tu gamiṣyāmīti me matiḥ // 4.066.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāsavasya savajrasya brahmaṇo vā svayambhuvaḥ / vikramya sahasā hastād amṛtaṃ tad ihānaye // 4.066.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkāṃ vāpi samutkṣipya gaccheyam iti me matiḥ // 4.066.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evaṃ vānaraśreṣṭhaṃ garjantam amitaujasaṃ / uvāca parisaṃhṛṣṭo jāmbavān harisattamaḥ // 4.066.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīra kesariṇaḥ putra vegavan mārutātmaja / jñātīnāṃ vipulaṃ śokas tvayā tāta praṇāśitaḥ // 4.066.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava kalyāṇarucayaḥ kapimukhyāḥ samāgatāḥ / maṅgalaṃ kāryasiddhyarthaṃ kariṣyanti samāhitāḥ // 4.066.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣīṇāṃ ca prasādena kapivṛddhamatena ca / gurūṇāṃ ca prasādena plavasva tvaṃ mahārṇavam // 4.066.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthāsyāmaś caikapādena yāvadāgamanaṃ tava / tvadgatāni ca sarveṣāṃ jīvitāni vanaukasām // 4.066.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu hariśārdūlas tān uvāca vanaukasaḥ / neyaṃ mama mahī vegaṃ plavane dhārayiṣyati // 4.066.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāni hi nagasyāsya śilāsaṃkaṭaśālinaḥ / śikharāṇi mahendrasya sthirāṇi ca mahānti ca // 4.066.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāni mama niṣpeṣaṃ pādayoḥ patatāṃ varāḥ / plavato dhārayiṣyanti yojanānām itaḥ śatam // 4.066.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu mārutaprakhyaḥ sa harir mārutātmajaḥ / āruroha nagaśreṣṭhaṃ mahendram arimardanaḥ // 4.066.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛtaṃ nānāvidhair vṛkṣair mṛgasevitaśādvalam / latākusumasaṃbādhaṃ nityapuṣpaphaladrumam // 4.066.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhaśārdūlacaritaṃ mattamātaṅgasevitam / mattadvijagaṇodghuṣṭaṃ salilotpīḍasaṃkulam // 4.066.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahadbhir ucchritaṃ śṛṅgair mahendraṃ sa mahābalaḥ / vicacāra hariśreṣṭho mahendrasamavikramaḥ // 4.066.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pādābhyāṃ pīḍitas tena mahāśailo mahātmanā / rarāsa siṃhābhihato mahān matta iva dvipaḥ // 4.066.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mumoca salilotpīḍān viprakīrṇaśiloccayaḥ / vitrastamṛgamātaṅgaḥ prakampitamahādrumaḥ // 4.066.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāgandharvamithunaiḥ pānasaṃsargakarkaśaiḥ / utpatadbhir vihaṃgaiś ca vidyādharagaṇair api // 4.066.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyajyamānamahāsānuḥ saṃnilīnamahoragaḥ / śailaśṛṅgaśilodghātas tadābhūt sa mahāgiriḥ // 4.066.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niḥśvasadbhis tadā tais tu bhujagair ardhaniḥsṛtaiḥ / sapatāka ivābhāti sa tadā dharaṇīdharaḥ // 4.066.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣibhis trāsa saṃbhrāntais tyajyamānaḥ śiloccayaḥ / sīdan mahati kāntāre sārthahīna ivādhvagaḥ // 4.066.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vegavān vegasamāhitātmā; haripravīraḥ paravīrahantā / manaḥ samādhāya mahānubhāvo; jagāma laṅkāṃ manasā manasvī // 4.066.044	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tato rāvaṇanītāyāḥ sītāyāḥ śatrukarśanaḥ / iyeṣa padam anveṣṭuṃ cāraṇācarite pathi // 5.001.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vaidūryavarṇeṣu śādvaleṣu mahābalaḥ / dhīraḥ salilakalpeṣu vicacāra yathāsukham // 5.001.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvijān vitrāsayan dhīmān urasā pādapān haran / mṛgāṃś ca subahūn nighnan pravṛddha iva kesarī // 5.001.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlalohitamāñjiṣṭhapadmavarṇaiḥ sitāsitaiḥ / svabhāvavihitaiś citrair dhātubhiḥ samalaṃkṛtam // 5.001.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmarūpibhir āviṣṭam abhīkṣṇaṃ saparicchadaiḥ / yakṣakiṃnaragandharvair devakalpaiś ca pannagaiḥ // 5.001.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tasya girivaryasya tale nāgavarāyute / tiṣṭhan kapivaras tatra hrade nāga ivābabhau // 5.001.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sūryāya mahendrāya pavanāya svayambhuve / bhūtebhyaś cāñjaliṃ kṛtvā cakāra gamane matim // 5.001.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
añjaliṃ prāṅmukhaḥ kurvan pavanāyātmayonaye / tato hi vavṛdhe gantuṃ dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam // 5.001.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plavaṃgapravarair dṛṣṭaḥ plavane kṛtaniścayaḥ / vavṛdhe rāmavṛddhyarthaṃ samudra iva parvasu // 5.001.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣpramāṇa śarīraḥ saṃl lilaṅghayiṣur arṇavam / bāhubhyāṃ pīḍayām āsa caraṇābhyāṃ ca parvatam // 5.001.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cacālācalāś cāru muhūrtaṃ kapipīḍitaḥ / tarūṇāṃ puṣpitāgrāṇāṃ sarvaṃ puṣpam aśātayat // 5.001.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena pādapamuktena puṣpaugheṇa sugandhinā / sarvataḥ saṃvṛtaḥ śailo babhau puṣpamayo yathā // 5.001.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena cottamavīryeṇa pīḍyamānaḥ sa parvataḥ / salilaṃ saṃprasusrāva madaṃ matta iva dvipaḥ // 5.001.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pīḍyamānas tu balinā mahendras tena parvataḥ / rītir nirvartayām āsa kāñcanāñjanarājatīḥ // 5.001.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mumoca ca śilāḥ śailo viśālāḥ samanaḥśilāḥ // 5.001.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
giriṇā pīḍyamānena pīḍyamānāni sarvaśaḥ / guhāviṣṭāni bhūtāni vinedur vikṛtaiḥ svaraiḥ // 5.001.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mahāsattvasaṃnādaḥ śailapīḍānimittajaḥ / pṛthivīṃ pūrayām āsa diśaś copavanāni ca // 5.001.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śirobhiḥ pṛthubhiḥ sarpā vyaktasvastikalakṣaṇaiḥ / vamantaḥ pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ dadaṃśur daśanaiḥ śilāḥ // 5.001.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tās tadā saviṣair daṣṭāḥ kupitais tair mahāśilāḥ / jajvaluḥ pāvakoddīptā vibhiduś ca sahasradhā // 5.001.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāni cauṣadhajālāni tasmiñ jātāni parvate / viṣaghnāny api nāgānāṃ na śekuḥ śamituṃ viṣam // 5.001.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhidyate 'yaṃ girir bhūtair iti matvā tapasvinaḥ / trastā vidyādharās tasmād utpetuḥ strīgaṇaiḥ saha // 5.001.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pānabhūmigataṃ hitvā haimam āsanabhājanam / pātrāṇi ca mahārhāṇi karakāṃś ca hiraṇmayān // 5.001.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lehyān uccāvacān bhakṣyān māṃsāni vividhāni ca / ārṣabhāṇi ca carmāṇi khaḍgāṃś ca kanakatsarūn // 5.001.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtakaṇṭhaguṇāḥ kṣībā raktamālyānulepanāḥ / raktākṣāḥ puṣkarākṣāś ca gaganaṃ pratipedire // 5.001.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hāranūpurakeyūra pārihārya dharāḥ striyaḥ / vismitāḥ sasmitās tasthur ākāśe ramaṇaiḥ saha // 5.001.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśayanto mahāvidyāṃ vidyādharamaharṣayaḥ / sahitās tasthur ākāśe vīkṣāṃ cakruś ca parvatam // 5.001.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuśruvuś ca tadā śabdam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām / cāraṇānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ sthitānāṃ vimale 'mbare // 5.001.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa parvatasaṃkāśo hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / titīrṣati mahāvegaṃ samudraṃ makarālayam // 5.001.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmārthaṃ vānarārthaṃ ca cikīrṣan karma duṣkaram / samudrasya paraṃ pāraṃ duṣprāpaṃ prāptum icchati // 5.001.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dudhuve ca sa romāṇi cakampe cācalopamaḥ / nanāda ca mahānādaṃ sumahān iva toyadaḥ // 5.001.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānupūrvyāc ca vṛttaṃ ca lāṅgūlaṃ romabhiś citam / utpatiṣyan vicikṣepa pakṣirāja ivoragam // 5.001.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya lāṅgūlam āviddham ativegasya pṛṣṭhataḥ / dadṛśe garuḍeneva hriyamāṇo mahoragaḥ // 5.001.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāhū saṃstambhayām āsa mahāparighasaṃnibhau / sasāda ca kapiḥ kaṭyāṃ caraṇau saṃcukopa ca // 5.001.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃhṛtya ca bhujau śrīmāṃs tathaiva ca śirodharām / tejaḥ sattvaṃ tathā vīryam āviveśa sa vīryavān // 5.001.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārgam ālokayan dūrād ūrdhvapraṇihitekṣaṇaḥ / rurodha hṛdaye prāṇān ākāśam avalokayan // 5.001.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padbhyāṃ dṛḍham avasthānaṃ kṛtvā sa kapikuñjaraḥ / nikuñcya karṇau hanumān utpatiṣyan mahābalaḥ // 5.001.035.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarān vānaraśreṣṭha idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 5.001.035.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā rāghavanirmuktaḥ śaraḥ śvasanavikramaḥ / gacchet tadvad gamiṣyāmi laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām // 5.001.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi drakṣyāmi yadi tāṃ laṅkāyāṃ janakātmajām / anenaiva hi vegena gamiṣyāmi surālayam // 5.001.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi vā tridive sītāṃ na drakṣyāmi kṛtaśramaḥ / baddhvā rākṣasarājānam ānayiṣyāmi rāvaṇam // 5.001.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā kṛtakāryo 'ham eṣyāmi saha sītayā / ānayiṣyāmi vā laṅkāṃ samutpāṭya sarāvaṇām // 5.001.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu hanumān vānarān vānarottamaḥ / utpapātātha vegena vegavān avicārayan // 5.001.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samutpatati tasmiṃs tu vegāt te nagarohiṇaḥ / saṃhṛtya viṭapān sarvān samutpetuḥ samantataḥ // 5.001.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mattakoyaṣṭibhakān pādapān puṣpaśālinaḥ / udvahann ūruvegena jagāma vimale 'mbare // 5.001.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūruvegoddhatā vṛkṣā muhūrtaṃ kapim anvayuḥ / prasthitaṃ dīrgham adhvānaṃ svabandhum iva bāndhavāḥ // 5.001.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ūruvegonmathitāḥ sālāś cānye nagottamāḥ / anujagmur hanūmantaṃ sainyā iva mahīpatim // 5.001.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
supuṣpitāgrair bahubhiḥ pādapair anvitaḥ kapiḥ / hanumān parvatākāro babhūvādbhutadarśanaḥ // 5.001.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāravanto 'tha ye vṛkṣā nyamajjaṃl lavaṇāmbhasi / bhayād iva mahendrasya parvatā varuṇālaye // 5.001.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nānākusumaiḥ kīrṇaḥ kapiḥ sāṅkurakorakaiḥ / śuśubhe meghasaṃkāśaḥ khadyotair iva parvataḥ // 5.001.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimuktās tasya vegena muktvā puṣpāṇi te drumāḥ / avaśīryanta salile nivṛttāḥ suhṛdo yathā // 5.001.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laghutvenopapannaṃ tad vicitraṃ sāgare 'patat / drumāṇāṃ vividhaṃ puṣpaṃ kapivāyusamīritam // 5.001.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpaugheṇānubaddhena nānāvarṇena vānaraḥ / babhau megha ivodyan vai vidyudgaṇavibhūṣitaḥ // 5.001.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya vegasamudbhūtaiḥ puṣpais toyam adṛśyata / tārābhir abhirāmābhir uditābhir ivāmbaram // 5.001.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāmbaragatau bāhū dadṛśāte prasāritau / parvatāgrād viniṣkrāntau pañcāsyāv iva pannagau // 5.001.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pibann iva babhau cāpi sormijālaṃ mahārṇavam / pipāsur iva cākāśaṃ dadṛśe sa mahākapiḥ // 5.001.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya vidyutprabhākāre vāyumārgānusāriṇaḥ / nayane viprakāśete parvatasthāv ivānalau // 5.001.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
piṅge piṅgākṣamukhyasya bṛhatī parimaṇḍale / cakṣuṣī saṃprakaśete candrasūryāv iva sthitau // 5.001.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mukhaṃ nāsikayā tasya tāmrayā tāmram ābabhau / saṃdhyayā samabhispṛṣṭaṃ yathā sūryasya maṇḍalam // 5.001.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lāṅgalaṃ ca samāviddhaṃ plavamānasya śobhate / ambare vāyuputrasya śakradhvaja ivocchritaḥ // 5.001.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lāṅgūlacakreṇa mahāñ śukladaṃṣṭro 'nilātmajaḥ / vyarocata mahāprājñaḥ pariveṣīva bhāskaraḥ // 5.001.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sphigdeśenābhitāmreṇa rarāja sa mahākapiḥ / mahatā dāriteneva girir gairikadhātunā // 5.001.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya vānarasiṃhasya plavamānasya sāgaram / kakṣāntaragato vāyur jīmūta iva garjati // 5.001.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
khe yathā nipataty ulkā uttarāntād viniḥsṛtā / dṛśyate sānubandhā ca tathā sa kapikuñjaraḥ // 5.001.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patatpataṃgasaṃkāśo vyāyataḥ śuśubhe kapiḥ / pravṛddha iva mātaṃgaḥ kakṣyayā badhyamānayā // 5.001.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upariṣṭāc charīreṇa chāyayā cāvagāḍhayā / sāgare mārutāviṣṭā naur ivāsīt tadā kapiḥ // 5.001.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaṃ yaṃ deśaṃ samudrasya jagāma sa mahākapiḥ / sa sa tasyāṅgavegena sonmāda iva lakṣyate // 5.001.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgarasyormijālānām urasā śailavarṣmaṇām / abhighnaṃs tu mahāvegaḥ pupluve sa mahākapiḥ // 5.001.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kapivātaś ca balavān meghavātaś ca niḥsṛtaḥ / sāgaraṃ bhīmanirghoṣaṃ kampayām āsatur bhṛśam // 5.001.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikarṣann ūrmijālāni bṛhanti lavaṇāmbhasi / atyakrāman mahāvegas taraṅgān gaṇayann iva // 5.001.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plavamānaṃ samīkṣyātha bhujaṅgāḥ sāgarālayāḥ / vyomni taṃ kapiśārdūlaṃ suparṇam iti menire // 5.001.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśayojanavistīrṇā triṃśadyojanam āyatā / chāyā vānarasiṃhasya jale cārutarābhavat // 5.001.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvetābhraghanarājīva vāyuputrānugāminī / tasya sā śuśubhe chāyā vitatā lavaṇāmbhasi // 5.001.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā plavagaṃ tvaritaṃ tadā / vavṛṣuḥ puṣpavarṣāṇi devagandharvadānavāḥ // 5.001.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatāpa na hi taṃ sūryaḥ plavantaṃ vānareśvaram / siṣeve ca tadā vāyū rāmakāryārthasiddhaye // 5.001.072	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣayas tuṣṭuvuś cainaṃ plavamānaṃ vihāyasā / jaguś ca devagandharvāḥ praśaṃsanto mahaujasaṃ // 5.001.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāgāś ca tuṣṭuvur yakṣā rakṣāṃsi vibudhāḥ khagāḥ / prekṣyākāśe kapivaraṃ sahasā vigataklamam // 5.001.074	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin plavagaśārdūle plavamāne hanūmati / ikṣvākukulamānārthī cintayām āsa sāgaraḥ // 5.001.075	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāhāyyaṃ vānarendrasya yadi nāhaṃ hanūmataḥ / kariṣyāmi bhaviṣyāmi sarvavācyo vivakṣatām // 5.001.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham ikṣvākunāthena sagareṇa vivardhitaḥ / ikṣvākusacivaś cāyaṃ nāvasīditum arhati // 5.001.077	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā mayā vidhātavyaṃ viśrameta yathā kapiḥ / śeṣaṃ ca mayi viśrāntaḥ sukhenātipatiṣyati // 5.001.078	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti kṛtvā matiṃ sādhvīṃ samudraś channam ambhasi / hiraṇyanābhaṃ mainākam uvāca girisattamam // 5.001.079	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvam ihāsurasaṃghānāṃ pātālatalavāsinām / devarājñā giriśreṣṭha parighaḥ saṃniveśitaḥ // 5.001.080	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvam eṣāṃ jñātavīryāṇāṃ punar evotpatiṣyatām / pātālasyāprameyasya dvāram āvṛtya tiṣṭhasi // 5.001.081	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva śaktis te śailavardhitum / tasmāt saṃcodayāmi tvām uttiṣṭha nagasattama // 5.001.082	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa eṣa kapiśārdūlas tvām uparyeti vīryavān / hanūmān rāmakāryārthaṃ bhīmakarmā kham āplutaḥ // 5.001.083	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya sāhyaṃ mayā kāryam ikṣvākukulavartinaḥ / mama ikṣvākavaḥ pūjyāḥ paraṃ pūjyatamās tava // 5.001.084	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuru sācivyam asmākaṃ na naḥ kāryam atikramet / kartavyam akṛtaṃ kāryaṃ satāṃ manyum udīrayet // 5.001.085	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
salilād ūrdhvam uttiṣṭha tiṣṭhatv eṣa kapis tvayi / asmākam atithiś caiva pūjyaś ca plavatāṃ varaḥ // 5.001.086	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cāmīkaramahānābha devagandharvasevita / hanūmāṃs tvayi viśrāntas tataḥ śeṣaṃ gamiṣyati // 5.001.087	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kākutsthasyānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca maithilyāś ca vivāsanam / śramaṃ ca plavagendrasya samīkṣyotthātum arhasi // 5.001.088	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hiraṇyanābho maināko niśamya lavaṇāmbhasaḥ / utpapāta jalāt tūrṇaṃ mahādrumalatāyutaḥ // 5.001.089	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sāgarajalaṃ bhittvā babhūvātyutthitas tadā / yathā jaladharaṃ bhittvā dīptaraśmir divākaraḥ // 5.001.090	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śātakumbhamayaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ sakiṃnaramahoragaiḥ / ādityodayasaṃkāśair ālikhadbhir ivāmbaram // 5.001.091	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya jāmbūnadaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ parvatasya samutthitaiḥ / ākāśaṃ śastrasaṃkāśam abhavat kāñcanaprabham // 5.001.092	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jātarūpamayaiḥ śṛṅgair bhrājamānaiḥ svayaṃ prabhaiḥ / ādityaśatasaṃkāśaḥ so 'bhavad girisattamaḥ // 5.001.093	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam utthitam asaṃgena hanūmān agrataḥ sthitam / madhye lavaṇatoyasya vighno 'yam iti niścitaḥ // 5.001.094	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tam ucchritam atyarthaṃ mahāvego mahākapiḥ / urasā pātayām āsa jīmūtam iva mārutaḥ // 5.001.095	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tadā pātitas tena kapinā parvatottamaḥ / buddhvā tasya kaper vegaṃ jaharṣa ca nananda ca // 5.001.096	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ākāśagataṃ vīram ākāśe samavasthitam / prīto hṛṣṭamanā vākyam abravīt parvataḥ kapim // 5.001.097.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānuṣaṃ dharayan rūpam ātmanaḥ śikhare sthitaḥ // 5.001.097.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duṣkaraṃ kṛtavān karma tvam idaṃ vānarottama / nipatya mama śṛṅgeṣu viśramasva yathāsukham // 5.001.098	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghāvasya kule jātair udadhiḥ parivardhitaḥ / sa tvāṃ rāmahite yuktaṃ pratyarcayati sāgaraḥ // 5.001.099	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛte ca pratikartavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ / so 'yaṃ tat pratikārārthī tvattaḥ saṃmānam arhati // 5.001.100	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvannimittam anenāhaṃ bahumānāt pracoditaḥ / yojanānāṃ śataṃ cāpi kapir eṣa samāplutaḥ // 5.001.101.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava sānuṣu viśrāntaḥ śeṣaṃ prakramatām iti // 5.001.101.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
