tiṣṭha tvaṃ hariśārdūla mayi viśramya gamyatām / tad idaṃ gandhavat svādu kandamūlaphalaṃ bahu // 5.001.102.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad āsvādya hariśreṣṭha viśrānto 'nugamiṣyasi // 5.001.102.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmākam api saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhyas tvayāsti vai / prakhyatas triṣu lokeṣu mahāguṇaparigrahaḥ // 5.001.103	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vegavantaḥ plavanto ye plavagā mārutātmaja / teṣāṃ mukhyatamaṃ manye tvām ahaṃ kapikuñjara // 5.001.104	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atithiḥ kila pūjārhaḥ prākṛto 'pi vijānatā / dharmaṃ jijñāsamānena kiṃ punar yādṛśo bhavān // 5.001.105	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ hi devavariṣṭhasya mārutasya mahātmanaḥ / putras tasyaiva vegena sadṛśaḥ kapikuñjara // 5.001.106	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjite tvayi dharmajña pūjāṃ prāpnoti mārutaḥ / tasmāt tvaṃ pūjanīyo me śṛṇu cāpy atra kāraṇam // 5.001.107	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge tāta parvatāḥ pakṣiṇo 'bhavan / te 'pi jagmur diśaḥ sarvā garuḍānilaveginaḥ // 5.001.108	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas teṣu prayāteṣu devasaṃghāḥ saharṣibhiḥ / bhūtāni ca bhayaṃ jagmus teṣāṃ patanaśaṅkayā // 5.001.109	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kruddhaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ parvatānāṃ śatakratuḥ / pakṣāṃś ciccheda vajreṇa tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ // 5.001.110	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mām upagataḥ kruddho vajram udyamya devarāṭ / tato 'haṃ sahasā kṣiptaḥ śvasanena mahātmanā // 5.001.111	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmiṃl lavaṇatoye ca prakṣiptaḥ plavagottama / guptapakṣaḥ samagraś ca tava pitrābhirakṣitaḥ // 5.001.112	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ mānayāmi tvāṃ mānyo hi mama mārutaḥ / tvayā me hy eṣa saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhya mahāguṇaḥ // 5.001.113	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asminn evaṃgate kārye sāgarasya mamaiva ca / prītiṃ prītamanā kartuṃ tvam arhasi mahākape // 5.001.114	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śramaṃ mokṣaya pūjāṃ ca gṛhāṇa kapisattama / prītiṃ ca bahumanyasva prīto 'smi tava darśanāt // 5.001.115	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ kapiśreṣṭhas taṃ nagottamam abravīt / prīto 'smi kṛtam ātithyaṃ manyur eṣo 'panīyatām // 5.001.116	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvarate kāryakālo me ahaś cāpy ativartate / pratijñā ca mayā dattā na sthātavyam ihāntarā // 5.001.117	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā pāṇinā śailam ālabhya haripuṃgavaḥ / jagāmākāśam āviśya vīryavān prahasann iva // 5.001.118	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa parvatasamudrābhyāṃ bahumānād avekṣitaḥ / pūjitaś copapannābhir āśīrbhir anilātmajaḥ // 5.001.119	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athordhvaṃ dūram utpatya hitvā śailamahārṇavau / pituḥ panthānam āsthāya jagāma vimale 'mbare // 5.001.120	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūyaś cordhvagatiṃ prāpya giriṃ tam avalokayan / vāyusūnur nirālambe jagāma vimale 'mbare // 5.001.121	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dvitīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram / praśaśaṃsuḥ surāḥ sarve siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ // 5.001.122	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devatāś cābhavan hṛṣṭās tatrasthās tasya karmaṇā / kāñcanasya sunābhasya sahasrākṣaś ca vāsavaḥ // 5.001.123	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān paritoṣāt sagadgadam / sunābhaṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ svayam eva śacīpatiḥ // 5.001.124	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hiraṇyanābhaśailendraparituṣṭo 'smi te bhṛśam / abhayaṃ te prayacchāmi tiṣṭha saumya yathāsukham // 5.001.125	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāhyaṃ kṛtaṃ te sumahad vikrāntasya hanūmataḥ / kramato yojanaśataṃ nirbhayasya bhaye sati // 5.001.126	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasyaiṣa hi dautyena yāti dāśarather hariḥ / satkriyāṃ kurvatā śakyā toṣito 'smi dṛḍhaṃ tvayā // 5.001.127	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ praharṣam alabhad vipulaṃ parvatottamaḥ / devatānāṃ patiṃ dṛṣṭvā parituṣṭaṃ śatakratum // 5.001.128	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vai dattavaraḥ śailo babhūvāvasthitas tadā / hanūmāṃś ca muhūrtena vyaticakrāma sāgaram // 5.001.129	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / abruvan sūryasaṃkāśāṃ surasāṃ nāgamātaram // 5.001.130	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ vātātmajaḥ śrīmān plavate sāgaropari / hanūmān nāma tasya tvaṃ muhūrtaṃ vighnam ācara // 5.001.131	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasaṃ rūpam āsthāya sughoraṃ parvatopamam / daṃṣṭrākarālaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ vaktraṃ kṛtvā nabhaḥspṛśam // 5.001.132	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balam icchāmahe jñātuṃ bhūyaś cāsya parākramam / tvāṃ vijeṣyaty upāyena viṣadaṃ vā gamiṣyati // 5.001.133	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu sā devī daivatair abhisatkṛtā / samudramadhye surasā bibhratī rākṣasaṃ vapuḥ // 5.001.134	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikṛtaṃ ca virūpaṃ ca sarvasya ca bhayāvaham / plavamānaṃ hanūmantam āvṛtyedam uvāca ha // 5.001.135	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama bhakṣaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam īśvarair vānararṣabha / ahaṃ tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi praviśedaṃ mamānanam // 5.001.136	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ surasayā prāñjalir vānararṣabhaḥ / prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 5.001.137	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo dāśarathir nāma praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā // 5.001.138	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asya kāryaviṣaktasya baddhavairasya rākṣasaiḥ / tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena yaśasvinī // 5.001.139	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāḥ sakāśaṃ dūto 'haṃ gamiṣye rāmaśāsanāt / kartum arhasi rāmasya sāhyaṃ viṣayavāsini // 5.001.140	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam / āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi te // 5.001.141	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā hanumatā surasā kāmarūpiṇī / abravīn nātivarten māṃ kaś cid eṣa varo mama // 5.001.142	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ surasayā kruddho vānarapuṃgavaḥ / abravīt kuru vai vaktraṃ yena māṃ viṣahiṣyase // 5.001.143	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā surasāṃ kruddho daśayojanam āyataḥ / daśayojanavistāro babhūva hanumāṃs tadā // 5.001.144	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā meghasaṃkāśaṃ daśayojanam āyatam / cakāra surasāpy āsyaṃ viṃśadyojanam āyatam // 5.001.145	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanumāṃs tu tataḥ kruddhas triṃśadyojanam āyataḥ / cakāra surasā vaktraṃ catvāriṃśat tathocchritam // 5.001.146	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhūva hanumān vīraḥ pañcāśadyojanocchritaḥ / cakāra surasā vaktraṃ ṣaṣṭiyojanam āyatam // 5.001.147	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaiva hanumān vīraḥ saptatiṃ yojanocchritaḥ / cakāra surasā vaktram aśītiṃ yojanāyatam // 5.001.148	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmān acala prakhyo navatiṃ yojanocchritaḥ / cakāra surasā vaktraṃ śatayojanam āyatam // 5.001.149	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ vāyuputraḥ sa buddhimān / dīrghajihvaṃ surasayā sughoraṃ narakopamam // 5.001.150	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa saṃkṣipyātmanaḥ kāyaṃ jīmūta iva mārutiḥ / tasmin muhūrte hanumān babhūvāṅguṣṭhamātrakaḥ // 5.001.151	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ niṣpatya ca mahājavaḥ / antarikṣe sthitaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 5.001.152	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviṣṭo 'smi hi te vaktraṃ dākṣāyaṇi namo 'stu te / gamiṣye yatra vaidehī satyaṃ cāstu vacas tava // 5.001.153	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā vadanān muktaṃ candraṃ rāhumukhād iva / abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa vānaram // 5.001.154	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthasiddhyai hariśreṣṭha gaccha saumya yathāsukham / samānaya ca vaidehīṃ rāghaveṇa mahātmanā // 5.001.155	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat tṛtīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram / sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni praśaśaṃsus tadā harim // 5.001.156	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sāgaram anādhṛṣyam abhyetya varuṇālayam / jagāmākāśam āviśya vegena garuṇopamaḥ // 5.001.157	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sevite vāridhāribhiḥ patagaiś ca niṣevite / carite kaiśikācāryair airāvataniṣevite // 5.001.158	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhakuñjaraśārdūlapatagoragavāhanaiḥ / vimānaiḥ saṃpatadbhiś ca vimalaiḥ samalaṃkṛte // 5.001.159	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajrāśanisamāghātaiḥ pāvakair upaśobhite / kṛtapuṇyair mahābhāgaiḥ svargajidbhir alaṃkṛte // 5.001.160	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahatā havyam atyantaṃ sevite citrabhānunā / grahanakṣatracandrārkatārāgaṇavibhūṣite // 5.001.161	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maharṣigaṇagandharvanāgayakṣasamākule / vivikte vimale viśve viśvāvasuniṣevite // 5.001.162	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devarājagajākrānte candrasūryapathe śive / vitāne jīvalokasya vitato brahmanirmite // 5.001.163	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahuśaḥ sevite vīrair vidyādharagaṇair varaiḥ / kapinā kṛṣyamāṇāni mahābhrāṇi cakāśire // 5.001.164	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśann abhrajālāni niṣpataṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ / prāvṛṣīndur ivābhāti niṣpatan praviśaṃs tadā // 5.001.165	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃhikā nāma rākṣasī / manasā cintayām āsa pravṛddhā kāmarūpiṇī // 5.001.166	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya dīrghasya kālasya bhaviṣyāmy aham āśitā / idaṃ hi me mahat sattvaṃ cirasya vaśam āgatam // 5.001.167	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti saṃcintya manasā chāyām asya samakṣipat / chāyāyāṃ saṃgṛhītāyāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ // 5.001.168	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samākṣipto 'smi sahasā paṅgūkṛtaparākramaḥ / pratilomena vātena mahānaur iva sāgare // 5.001.169	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva vīkṣamāṇas tataḥ kapiḥ / dadarśa sa mahāsattvam utthitaṃ lavaṇāmbhasi // 5.001.170	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kapirājñā yad ākhyātaṃ sattvam adbhutadarśanam / chāyāgrāhi mahāvīryaṃ tad idaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // 5.001.171	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tāṃ buddhvārthatattvena siṃhikāṃ matimān kapiḥ / vyavardhata mahākāyaḥ prāvṛṣīva balāhakaḥ // 5.001.172	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya sā kāyam udvīkṣya vardhamānaṃ mahākapeḥ / vaktraṃ prasārayām āsa pātālāmbarasaṃnibham // 5.001.173	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśa tatas tasyā vikṛtaṃ sumahan mukham / kāyamātraṃ ca medhāvī marmāṇi ca mahākapiḥ // 5.001.174	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tasyā vivṛte vaktre vajrasaṃhananaḥ kapiḥ / saṃkṣipya muhur ātmānaṃ niṣpapāta mahābalaḥ // 5.001.175	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsye tasyā nimajjantaṃ dadṛśuḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ / grasyamānaṃ yathā candraṃ pūrṇaṃ parvaṇi rāhuṇā // 5.001.176	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tasya nakhais tīkṣṇair marmāṇy utkṛtya vānaraḥ / utpapātātha vegena manaḥsaṃpātavikramaḥ // 5.001.177	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ hatāṃ vānareṇāśu patitāṃ vīkṣya siṃhikām / bhūtāny ākāśacārīṇi tam ūcuḥ plavagarṣabham // 5.001.178	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhīmam adya kṛtaṃ karma mahat sattvaṃ tvayā hatam / sādhayārtham abhipretam ariṣṭaṃ plavatāṃ vara // 5.001.179	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya tv etāni catvāri vānarendra yathā tava / dhṛtir dṛṣṭir matir dākṣyaṃ sa karmasu na sīdati // 5.001.180	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taiḥ saṃbhāvitaḥ pūjyaḥ pratipannaprayojanaḥ / jagāmākāśam āviśya pannagāśanavat kapiḥ // 5.001.181	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptabhūyiṣṭha pāras tu sarvataḥ pratilokayan / yojanānāṃ śatasyānte vanarājiṃ dadarśa saḥ // 5.001.182	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadarśa ca patann eva vividhadrumabhūṣitam / dvīpaṃ śākhāmṛgaśreṣṭho malayopavanāni ca // 5.001.183	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgaraṃ sāgarānūpān sāgarānūpajān drumān / sāgarasya ca patnīnāṃ mukhāny api vilokayan // 5.001.184	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mahāmeghasaṃkāśaṃ samīkṣyātmānam ātmanā / nirundhantam ivākāśaṃ cakāra matimān matim // 5.001.185	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāyavṛddhiṃ pravegaṃ ca mama dṛṣṭvaiva rākṣasāḥ / mayi kautūhalaṃ kuryur iti mene mahākapiḥ // 5.001.186	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śarīraṃ saṃkṣipya tan mahīdharasaṃnibham / punaḥ prakṛtim āpede vītamoha ivātmavān // 5.001.187	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cārunānāvidharūpadhārī; paraṃ samāsādya samudratīram / parair aśakyapratipannarūpaḥ; samīkṣitātmā samavekṣitārthaḥ // 5.001.188	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tataḥ sa lambasya gireḥ samṛddhe; vicitrakūṭe nipapāta kūṭe / saketakoddālakanālikere; mahādrikūṭapratimo mahātmā // 5.001.189	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
sa sāgaraṃ dānavapannagāyutaṃ; balena vikramya mahormimālinam / nipatya tīre ca mahodadhes tadā; dadarśa laṅkām amarāvatīm iva // 5.001.190	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa sāgaram anādhṛṣyam atikramya mahābalaḥ / trikūṭaśikhare laṅkāṃ sthitāṃ svastho dadarśa ha // 5.002.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pādapamuktena puṣpavarṣeṇa vīryavān / abhivṛṣṭaḥ sthitas tatra babhau puṣpamayo yathā // 5.002.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yojanānāṃ śataṃ śrīmāṃs tīrtvāpy uttamavikramaḥ / aniśvasan kapis tatra na glānim adhigacchati // 5.002.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatāny ahaṃ yojanānāṃ krameyaṃ subahūny api / kiṃ punaḥ sāgarasyāntaṃ saṃkhyātaṃ śatayojanam // 5.002.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu vīryavatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ plavatām api cottamaḥ / jagāma vegavāṃl laṅkāṃ laṅghayitvā mahodadhim // 5.002.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śādvalāni ca nīlāni gandhavanti vanāni ca / gaṇḍavanti ca madhyena jagāma nagavanti ca // 5.002.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailāṃś ca tarusaṃchannān vanarājīś ca puṣpitāḥ / abhicakrāma tejasvī hanumān plavagarṣabhaḥ // 5.002.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tasminn acale tiṣṭhan vanāny upavanāni ca / sa nagāgre ca tāṃ laṅkāṃ dadarśa pavanātmajaḥ // 5.002.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saralān karṇikārāṃś ca kharjūrāṃś ca supuṣpitān / priyālān muculindāṃś ca kuṭajān ketakān api // 5.002.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyaṅgūn gandhapūrṇāṃś ca nīpān saptacchadāṃs tathā / asanān kovidārāṃś ca karavīrāṃś ca puṣpitān // 5.002.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpabhāranibaddhāṃś ca tathā mukulitān api / pādapān vihagākīrṇān pavanādhūtamastakān // 5.002.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇā vāpīḥ padmotpalāyutāḥ / ākrīḍān vividhān ramyān vividhāṃś ca jalāśayān // 5.002.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃtatān vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ sarvartuphalapuṣpitaiḥ / udyānāni ca ramyāṇi dadarśa kapikuñjaraḥ // 5.002.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāsādya ca lakṣmīvāṃl laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām / parikhābhiḥ sapadmābhiḥ sotpalābhir alaṃkṛtām // 5.002.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāpaharaṇārthena rāvaṇena surakṣitām / samantād vicaradbhiś ca rākṣasair ugradhanvibhiḥ // 5.002.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanenāvṛtāṃ ramyāṃ prākāreṇa mahāpurīm / aṭṭālakaśatākīrṇāṃ patākādhvajamālinīm // 5.002.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
toraṇaiḥ kāñcanair divyair latāpaṅktivicitritaiḥ / dadarśa hanumāṃl laṅkāṃ divi devapurīm iva // 5.002.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
girimūrdhni sthitāṃ laṅkāṃ pāṇḍurair bhavanaiḥ śubhaiḥ / dadarśa sa kapiḥ śrīmān puram ākāśagaṃ yathā // 5.002.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pālitāṃ rākṣasendreṇa nirmitāṃ viśvakarmaṇā / plavamānām ivākāśe dadarśa hanumān purīm // 5.002.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpūrṇāṃ rākṣasair ghorair nāgair bhogavatīm iva / acintyāṃ sukṛtāṃ spaṣṭāṃ kuberādhyuṣitāṃ purā // 5.002.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daṃṣṭribhir bahubhiḥ śūraiḥ śūlapaṭṭiśapāṇibhiḥ / rakṣitāṃ rākṣasair ghorair guhām āśīviṣair api // 5.002.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vapraprākārajaghanāṃ vipulāmbunavāmbarām / śataghnīśūlakeśāntām aṭṭālakavataṃsakām // 5.002.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvāram uttaram āsādya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ / kailāsaśikharaprakhyam ālikhantam ivāmbaram // 5.002.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhriyamāṇam ivākāśam ucchritair bhavanottamaiḥ // 5.002.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāś ca mahatīṃ guptiṃ sāgaraṃ ca nirīkṣya saḥ / rāvaṇaṃ ca ripuṃ ghoraṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ // 5.002.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgatyāpīha harayo bhaviṣyanti nirarthakāḥ / na hi yuddhena vai laṅkā śakyā jetuṃ surair api // 5.002.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ tu viṣamāṃ durgāṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām / prāpyāpi sa mahābāhuḥ kiṃ kariṣyati rāghavaḥ // 5.002.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avakāśo na sāntvasya rākṣaseṣv abhigamyate / na dānasya na bhedasya naiva yuddhasya dṛśyate // 5.002.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturṇām eva hi gatir vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām / vāliputrasya nīlasya mama rājñaś ca dhīmataḥ // 5.002.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvaj jānāmi vaidehīṃ yadi jīvati vā na vā / tatraiva cintayiṣyāmi dṛṣṭvā tāṃ janakātmajām // 5.002.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ / giriśṛṅge sthitas tasmin rāmasyābhyudaye rataḥ // 5.002.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anena rūpeṇa mayā na śakyā rakṣasāṃ purī / praveṣṭuṃ rākṣasair guptā krūrair balasamanvitaiḥ // 5.002.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ugraujaso mahāvīryo balavantaś ca rākṣasāḥ / vañcanīyā mayā sarve jānakīṃ parimārgitā // 5.002.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣyālakṣyeṇa rūpeṇa rātrau laṅkā purī mayā / praveṣṭuṃ prāptakālaṃ me kṛtyaṃ sādhayituṃ mahat // 5.002.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ purīṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā durādharṣāṃ surāsuraiḥ / hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa viniḥśvasya muhur muhuḥ // 5.002.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kenopāyena paśyeyaṃ maithilīṃ janakātmajām / adṛṣṭo rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena durātmanā // 5.002.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ rāmasya viditātmanaḥ / ekām ekaś ca paśyeyaṃ rahite janakātmajām // 5.002.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūtāś cārtho vipadyante deśakālavirodhitāḥ / viklavaṃ dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā // 5.002.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthānarthāntare buddhir niścitāpi na śobhate / ghātayanti hi kāryāṇi dūtāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // 5.002.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ vaiklavyaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet / laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet // 5.002.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayi dṛṣṭe tu rakṣobhī rāmasya viditātmanaḥ / bhaved vyartham idaṃ kāryaṃ rāvaṇānartham icchataḥ // 5.002.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi śakyaṃ kva cit sthātum avijñātena rākṣasaiḥ / api rākṣasarūpeṇa kim utānyena kena cit // 5.002.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāyur apy atra nājñātaś cared iti matir mama / na hy asty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid rākṣasānāṃ balīyasām // 5.002.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ihāhaṃ yadi tiṣṭhāmi svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛtaḥ / vināśam upayāsyāmi bhartur arthaś ca hīyate // 5.002.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad ahaṃ svena rūpeṇa rajanyāṃ hrasvatāṃ gataḥ / laṅkām abhipatiṣyāmi rāghavasyārthasiddhaye // 5.002.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya purīṃ rātrau praviśya sudurāsadām / vicinvan bhavanaṃ sarvaṃ drakṣyāmi janakātmajām // 5.002.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti saṃcintya hanumān sūryasyāstamayaṃ kapiḥ / ācakāṅkṣe tadā vīrā vaidehyā darśanotsukaḥ // 5.002.046.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

prāsādamālāvitatāṃ stambhaiḥ kāñcanarājataiḥ / śātakumbhamayair jālair gandharvanagaropamām // 5.002.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saptabhaumāṣṭabhaumaiś ca sa dadarśa mahāpurīm / talaiḥ sphāṭikasaṃpūrṇaiḥ kārtasvaravibhūṣitaiḥ // 5.002.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidūryamaṇicitraiś ca muktājālavibhūṣitaiḥ / talaiḥ śuśubhire tāni bhavanāny atra rakṣasām // 5.002.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanāni vicitrāṇi toraṇāni ca rakṣasām / laṅkām uddyotayām āsuḥ sarvataḥ samalaṃkṛtām // 5.002.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acintyām adbhutākārāṃ dṛṣṭvā laṅkāṃ mahākapiḥ / āsīd viṣaṇṇo hṛṣṭaś ca vaidehyā darśanotsukaḥ // 5.002.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pāṇḍurodviddhavimānamālinīṃ; mahārhajāmbūnadajālatoraṇām / yaśasvināṃ rāvaṇabāhupālitāṃ; kṣapācarair bhīmabalaiḥ samāvṛtām // 5.002.053	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
candro 'pi sācivyam ivāsya kurvaṃs; tārāgaṇair madhyagato virājan / jyotsnāvitānena vitatya lokam; uttiṣṭhate naikasahasraraśmiḥ // 5.002.054	indravajrā [ttjgg]
śaṅkhaprabhaṃ kṣīramṛṇālavarṇam; udgacchamānaṃ vyavabhāsamānam / dadarśa candraṃ sa kapipravīraḥ; poplūyamānaṃ sarasīva haṃsaṃ // 5.002.055	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])

niśi laṅkāṃ mahāsattvo viveśa kapikuñjaraḥ / ramyakānanatoyāḍhyāṃ purīṃ rāvaṇapālitām // 5.003.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

vismayāviṣṭahṛdayaḥ purīm ālokya sarvataḥ / jāmbūnadamayair dvārair vaidūryakṛtavedikaiḥ // 5.003.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

vasvokasārāpratimāṃ samīkṣya nagarīṃ tataḥ / kham ivotpatitāṃ laṅkāṃ jaharṣa hanumān kapiḥ // 5.003.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ samīkṣya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rākṣasādhipateḥ śubhām / anuttamām ṛddhiyutāṃ cintayām āsa vīryavān // 5.003.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

samīkṣya tu mahābāho rāghavasya parākramam / lakṣmaṇasya ca vikrāntam abhavat prītimān kapiḥ // 5.003.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ ratnavasanopetāṃ koṣṭhāgārāvataṃsakām / yantrāgārastanīm ṛddhāṃ pramadām iva bhūṣitām // 5.003.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ naṣṭatimirāṃ dīpair bhāsvaraiś ca mahāgṛhaiḥ / nagarīṃ rākṣasendrasya dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ // 5.003.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
