gate hi hariśārdūla punarāgamanāya tu / prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ // 5.037.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavādarśanajaḥ śoko bhūyo māṃ paritāpayet / duḥkhād duḥkhaparāmṛṣṭāṃ dīpayann iva vānara // 5.037.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ ca vīra saṃdehas tiṣṭhatīva mamāgrataḥ / sumahāṃs tvatsahāyeṣu haryṛkṣeṣu harīśvara // 5.037.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim / tāni haryṛkṣasainyāni tau vā naravarātmajau // 5.037.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ sāgarasyeha laṅghane / śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya tava vā mārutasya vā // 5.037.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad asmin kāryaniryoge vīraivaṃ duratikrame / kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ tvaṃ hi kāryavidāṃ varaḥ // 5.037.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane / paryāptaḥ paravīraghna yaśasyas te balodayaḥ // 5.037.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ rāvaṇaṃ jitya saṃyuge / vijayī svapuraṃ yāyāt tat tu me syād yaśaskaram // 5.037.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ / māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet // 5.037.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ / bhaved āhava śūrasya tathā tvam upapādaya // 5.037.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad arthopahitaṃ vākyaṃ sahitaṃ hetusaṃhitam / niśamya hanumāñ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abravīt // 5.037.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devi haryṛkṣasainyānām īśvaraḥ plavatāṃ varaḥ / sugrīvaḥ sattvasaṃpannas tavārthe kṛtaniścayaḥ // 5.037.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vānarasahasrāṇāṃ koṭībhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ / kṣipram eṣyati vaidehi rākṣasānāṃ nibarhaṇaḥ // 5.037.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya vikramasaṃpannāḥ sattvavanto mahābalāḥ / manaḥsaṃkalpasaṃpātā nideśe harayaḥ sthitāḥ // 5.037.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ / na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ // 5.037.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asakṛt tair mahotsahaiḥ sasāgaradharādharā / pradakṣiṇīkṛtā bhūmir vāyumārgānusāribhiḥ // 5.037.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ / mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau // 5.037.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ / na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ // 5.037.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad alaṃ paritāpena devi śoko vyapaitu te / ekotpātena te laṅkām eṣyanti hariyūthapāḥ // 5.037.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau / tvatsakāśaṃ mahāsattvau nṛsiṃhāv āgamiṣyataḥ // 5.037.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau hi vīrau naravarau sahitau rāmalakṣmaṇau / āgamya nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ sāyakair vidhamiṣyataḥ // 5.037.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sagaṇaṃ rāvaṇaṃ hatvā rāghavo raghunandanaḥ / tvām ādāya varārohe svapuraṃ pratiyāsyati // 5.037.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad āśvasihi bhadraṃ te bhava tvaṃ kālakāṅkṣiṇī / nacirād drakṣyase rāmaṃ prajvajantam ivānilam // 5.037.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihate rākṣasendre ca saputrāmātyabāndhave / tvaṃ sameṣyasi rāmeṇa śaśāṅkeneva rohiṇī // 5.037.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣipraṃ tvaṃ devi śokasya pāraṃ yāsyasi maithili / rāvaṇaṃ caiva rāmeṇa nihataṃ drakṣyase 'cirāt // 5.037.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam āśvasya vaidehīṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / gamanāya matiṃ kṛtvā vaidehīṃ punar abravīt // 5.037.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam arighnaṃ kṛtātmānaṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam / lakṣmaṇaṃ ca dhanuṣpāṇiṃ laṅkādvāram upasthitam // 5.037.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhān vīrān siṃhaśārdūlavikramān / vānarān vāraṇendrābhān kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi saṃgatān // 5.037.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailāmbudanikāśānāṃ laṅkāmalayasānuṣu / nardatāṃ kapimukhyānām ārye yūthāny anekaśaḥ // 5.037.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu marmaṇi ghoreṇa tāḍito manmatheṣuṇā / na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃhārdita iva dvipaḥ // 5.037.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā rudo devi śokena mā bhūt te manaso 'priyam / śacīva pathyā śakreṇa bhartrā nāthavatī hy asi // 5.037.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmād viśiṣṭaḥ ko 'nyo 'sti kaś cit saumitriṇā samaḥ / agnimārutakalpau tau bhrātarau tava saṃśrayau // 5.037.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāsmiṃś ciraṃ vatsyasi devi deśe; rakṣogaṇair adhyuṣito 'tiraudre / na te cirād āgamanaṃ priyasya; kṣamasva matsaṃgamakālamātram // 5.037.053	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya vāyusūnor mahātmanaḥ / uvācātmahitaṃ vākyaṃ sītā surasutopamā // 5.038.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā priyavaktāraṃ saṃprahṛṣyāmi vānara / ardhasaṃjātasasyeva vṛṣṭiṃ prāpya vasuṃdharā // 5.038.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ gātraiḥ śokābhikarśitaiḥ / saṃspṛśeyaṃ sakāmāhaṃ tathā kuru dayāṃ mayi // 5.038.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhijñānaṃ ca rāmasya dattaṃ harigaṇottama / kṣiptām īṣikāṃ kākasya kopād ekākṣiśātanīm // 5.038.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manaḥśilāyās tikalo gaṇḍapārśve niveśitaḥ / tvayā pranaṣṭe tilake taṃ kila smartum arhasi // 5.038.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vīryavān kathaṃ sītāṃ hṛtāṃ samanumanyase / vasantīṃ rakṣasāṃ madhye mahendravaruṇopama // 5.038.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa cūḍāmaṇir divyo mayā suparirakṣitaḥ / etaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣyāmi vyasane tvām ivānagha // 5.038.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ / ataḥ paraṃ na śakṣyāmi jīvituṃ śokalālasā // 5.038.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asahyāni ca duḥkhāni vācaś ca hṛdayacchidaḥ / rākṣasīnāṃ sughorāṇāṃ tvatkṛte marṣayāmy aham // 5.038.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhārayiṣyāmi māsaṃ tu jīvitaṃ śatrusūdana / māsād ūrdhvaṃ na jīviṣye tvayā hīnā nṛpātmaja // 5.038.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghoro rākṣasarājo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭiś ca na sukhā mayi / tvāṃ ca śrutvā vipadyantaṃ na jīveyam ahaṃ kṣaṇam // 5.038.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā karuṇaṃ sāśrubhāṣitam / athābravīn mahātejā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ // 5.038.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape / rāme śokābhibhūte tu lakṣmaṇaḥ paritapyate // 5.038.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭā kathaṃ cid bhavatī na kālaḥ pariśocitum / imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini // 5.038.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau rājaputrāv aninditau / tvaddarśanakṛtotsāhau laṅkāṃ bhasmīkariṣyataḥ // 5.038.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatvā tu samare krūraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam / rāghavau tvāṃ viśālākṣi svāṃ purīṃ prāpayiṣyataḥ // 5.038.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite / prītisaṃjananaṃ tasya bhūyas tvaṃ dātum arhasi // 5.038.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sābravīd dattam eveha mayābhijñānam uttamam / etad eva hi rāmasya dṛṣṭvā matkeśabhūṣaṇam // 5.038.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śraddheyaṃ hanuman vākyaṃ tava vīra bhaviṣyati // 5.038.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ maṇivaraṃ gṛhya śrīmān plavagasattamaḥ / praṇamya śirasā devīṃ gamanāyopacakrame // 5.038.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam utpātakṛtotsāham avekṣya haripuṃgavam / vardhamānaṃ mahāvegam uvāca janakātmajā // 5.038.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśrupūrṇamukhī dīnā bāṣpagadgadayā girā // 5.038.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūman siṃhasaṃkāśau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam // 5.038.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ / asmād duḥkhāmbusaṃrodhāt tat samādhātum arhasi // 5.038.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imaṃ ca tīvraṃ mama śokavegaṃ; rakṣobhir ebhiḥ paribhartsanaṃ ca / brūyās tu rāmasya gataḥ samīpaṃ; śivaś ca te 'dhvāstu haripravīra // 5.038.023	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa rājaputryā prativeditārthaḥ; kapiḥ kṛtārthaḥ parihṛṣṭacetāḥ / tad alpaśeṣaṃ prasamīkṣya kāryaṃ; diśaṃ hy udīcīṃ manasā jagāma // 5.038.024	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
sa ca vāgbhiḥ praśastābhir gamiṣyan pūjitas tayā / tasmād deśād apakramya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ // 5.039.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alpaśeṣam idaṃ kāryaṃ dṛṣṭeyam asitekṣaṇā / trīn upāyān atikramya caturtha iha dṛśyate // 5.039.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na sāma rakṣaḥsu guṇāya kalpate; na danam arthopaciteṣu vartate / na bhedasādhyā baladarpitā janāḥ; parākramas tv eṣa mameha rocate // 5.039.003	upajāti (jagatī: ajñātam [ntjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
na cāsya kāryasya parākramād ṛte; viniścayaḥ kaś cid ihopapadyate / hṛtapravīrās tu raṇe hi rākṣasāḥ; kathaṃ cid īyur yad ihādya mārdavam // 5.039.004	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
kārye karmaṇi nirdiṣṭo yo bahūny api sādhayet / pūrvakāryavirodhena sa kāryaṃ kartum arhati // 5.039.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy ekaḥ sādhako hetuḥ svalpasyāpīha karmaṇaḥ / yo hy arthaṃ bahudhā veda sa samartho 'rthasādhane // 5.039.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ihaiva tāvat kṛtaniścayo hy ahaṃ; yadi vrajeyaṃ plavageśvarālayam / parātmasaṃmarda viśeṣatattvavit; tataḥ kṛtaṃ syān mama bhartṛśāsanam // 5.039.007	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
kathaṃ nu khalv adya bhavet sukhāgataṃ; prasahya yuddhaṃ mama rākṣasaiḥ saha / tathaiva khalv ātmabalaṃ ca sāravat; samānayen māṃ ca raṇe daśānanaḥ // 5.039.008	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
idam asya nṛśaṃsasya nandanopamam uttamam / vanaṃ netramanaḥkāntaṃ nānādrumalatāyutam // 5.039.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmi śuṣkaṃ vanam ivānalaḥ / asmin bhagne tataḥ kopaṃ kariṣyati sa rāvaṇaḥ // 5.039.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mahat sāśvamahārathadvipaṃ; balaṃ samāneṣv api rākṣasādhipaḥ / triśūlakālāyasapaṭṭiśāyudhaṃ; tato mahad yuddham idaṃ bhaviṣyati // 5.039.011	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
ahaṃ tu taiḥ saṃyati caṇḍavikramaiḥ; sametya rakṣobhir asaṃgavikramaḥ / nihatya tad rāvaṇacoditaṃ balaṃ; sukhaṃ gamiṣyāmi kapīśvarālayam // 5.039.012	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato mārutavat kruddho mārutir bhīmavikramaḥ / ūruvegena mahatā drumān kṣeptum athārabhat // 5.039.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tad dhanumān vīro babhañja pramadāvanam / mattadvijasamāghuṣṭaṃ nānādrumalatāyutam // 5.039.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vanaṃ mathitair vṛkṣair bhinnaiś ca salilāśayaiḥ / cūrṇitaiḥ parvatāgraiś ca babhūvāpriyadarśanam // 5.039.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
latāgṛhaiś citragṛhaiś ca nāśitair; mahoragair vyālamṛgaiś ca nirdhutaiḥ / śilāgṛhair unmathitais tathā gṛhaiḥ; pranaṣṭarūpaṃ tad abhūn mahad vanam // 5.039.016	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tasya kṛtvārthapater mahākapir; mahad vyalīkaṃ manaso mahātmanaḥ / yuyutsur eko bahubhir mahābalaiḥ; śriyā jvalaṃs toraṇam āśritaḥ kapiḥ // 5.039.017	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ pakṣininādena vṛkṣabhaṅgasvanena ca / babhūvus trāsasaṃbhrāntāḥ sarve laṅkānivāsinaḥ // 5.040.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidrutāś ca bhayatrastā vinedur mṛgapakṣuṇaḥ / rakṣasāṃ ca nimittāni krūrāṇi pratipedire // 5.040.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gatāyāṃ nidrāyāṃ rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ / tad vanaṃ dadṛśur bhagnaṃ taṃ ca vīraṃ mahākapim // 5.040.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tā dṛṣṭva mahābāhur mahāsattvo mahābalaḥ / cakāra sumahad rūpaṃ rākṣasīnāṃ bhayāvaham // 5.040.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ girisaṃkāśam atikāyaṃ mahābalam / rākṣasyo vānaraṃ dṛṣṭvā papracchur janakātmajām // 5.040.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāyaṃ kiṃnimittam ihāgataḥ / kathaṃ tvayā sahānena saṃvādaḥ kṛta ity uta // 5.040.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ācakṣva no viśālākṣi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam / saṃvādam asitāpāṅge tvayā kiṃ kṛtavān ayam // 5.040.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīt tadā sādhvī sītā sarvāṅgaśobhanā / rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpāṇāṃ vijñāne mama kā gatiḥ // 5.040.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yūyam evāsya jānīta yo 'yaṃ yad vā kariṣyati / ahir eva aheḥ pādān vijānāti na saṃśayaḥ // 5.040.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham apy asya bhītāsmi nainaṃ jānāmi ko 'nvayam / vedmi rākṣasam evainaṃ kāmarūpiṇam āgatam // 5.040.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasyo vidrutā drutam / sthitāḥ kāś cid gatāḥ kāś cid rāvaṇāya niveditum // 5.040.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya samīpe tu rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ / virūpaṃ vānaraṃ bhīmam ākhyatum upacakramuḥ // 5.040.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśokavanikā madhye rājan bhīmavapuḥ kapiḥ / sītayā kṛtasaṃvādas tiṣṭhaty amitavikramaḥ // 5.040.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca taṃ jānakī sītā hariṃ hariṇalocaṇā / asmābhir bahudhā pṛṣṭā nivedayitum icchati // 5.040.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāsavasya bhaved dūto dūto vaiśravaṇasya vā / preṣito vāpi rāmeṇa sītānveṣaṇakāṅkṣayā // 5.040.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena tvadbhūtarūpeṇa yat tat tava manoharam / nānāmṛgagaṇākīrṇaṃ pramṛṣṭaṃ pramadāvanam // 5.040.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tatra kaś cid uddeśo yas tena na vināśitaḥ / yatra sā jānakī sītā sa tena na vināśitaḥ // 5.040.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānakīrakṣaṇārthaṃ vā śramād vā nopalabhyate / atha vā kaḥ śramas tasya saiva tenābhirakṣitā // 5.040.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cārupallavapatrāḍhyaṃ yaṃ sītā svayam āsthitā / pravṛddhaḥ śiṃśapāvṛkṣaḥ sa ca tenābhirakṣitaḥ // 5.040.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyograrūpasyograṃ tvaṃ daṇḍam ājñātum arhasi / sītā saṃbhāṣitā yena tad vanaṃ ca vināśitam // 5.040.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manaḥparigṛhītāṃ tāṃ tava rakṣogaṇeśvara / kaḥ sītām abhibhāṣeta yo na syāt tyaktajīvitaḥ // 5.040.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasīnāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / hutāgir iva jajvāla kopasaṃvartitekṣaṇaḥ // 5.040.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmanaḥ sadṛśāñ śūrān kiṃkarān nāma rākṣasān / vyādideśa mahātejā nigrahārthaṃ hanūmataḥ // 5.040.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām aśītisāhasraṃ kiṃkarāṇāṃ tarasvinām / niryayur bhavanāt tasmāt kūṭamudgarapāṇayaḥ // 5.040.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahodarā mahādaṃṣṭrā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ / yuddhābhimanasaḥ sarve hanūmadgrahaṇonmukhāḥ // 5.040.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te kapiṃ taṃ samāsādya toraṇastham avasthitam / abhipetur mahāvegāḥ pataṅgā iva pāvakam // 5.040.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gadābhir vicitrābhiḥ parighaiḥ kāñcanāṅgadaiḥ / ājaghnur vānaraśreṣṭhaṃ śarair ādityasaṃnibhaiḥ // 5.040.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmān api tejasvī śrīmān parvatasaṃnibhaḥ / kṣitāv āvidhya lāṅgūlaṃ nanāda ca mahāsvanam // 5.040.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya saṃnādaśabdena te 'bhavan bhayaśaṅkitāḥ / dadṛśuś ca hanūmantaṃ saṃdhyāmegham ivonnatam // 5.040.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svāmisaṃdeśaniḥśaṅkās tatas te rākṣasāḥ kapim / citraiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ // 5.040.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ sarvataḥ sa mahābalaḥ / āsasādāyasaṃ bhīmaṃ parighaṃ toraṇāśritam // 5.040.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ parigham ādāya jaghāna rajanīcarān // 5.040.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pannagam ivādāya sphurantaṃ vinatāsutaḥ / vicacārāmbare vīraḥ parigṛhya ca mārutiḥ // 5.040.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hatvā rākṣasān vīraḥ kiṃkarān mārutātmajaḥ / yuddhākāṅkṣī punar vīras toraṇaṃ samupasthitaḥ // 5.040.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tasmād bhayān muktāḥ kati cit tatra rākṣasāḥ / nihatān kiṃkarān sarvān rāvaṇāya nyavedayan // 5.040.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rākṣasānāṃ nihataṃ mahābalaṃ; niśamya rājā parivṛttalocanaḥ / samādideśāpratimaṃ parākrame; prahastaputraṃ samare sudurjayam // 5.040.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ sa kiṃkarān hatvā hanūmān dhyānam āsthitaḥ / vanaṃ bhagnaṃ mayā caityaprāsādo na vināśitaḥ // 5.041.001.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt prāsādam apy evam imaṃ vidhvaṃsayāmy aham // 5.041.001.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti saṃcintya hanumān manasā darśayan balam / caityaprāsādam āplutya meruśṛṅgam ivonnatam // 5.041.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āruroha hariśreṣṭho hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ // 5.041.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpradhṛṣya ca durdharṣaś caityaprāsādam unnatam / hanūmān prajvalaṃl lakṣmyā pāriyātropamo 'bhavat // 5.041.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhūtvā tu mahākāyo hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / dhṛṣṭam āsphoṭayām āsa laṅkāṃ śabdena pūrayan // 5.041.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāsphoṭitaśabdena mahatā śrotraghātinā / petur vihaṃgā gaganād uccaiś cedam aghoṣayat // 5.041.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jayaty atibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ / rājā jayati sugrīvo rāghaveṇābhipālitaḥ // 5.041.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dāso 'haṃ kosalendrasya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / hanumāñ śatrusainyānāṃ nihantā mārutātmajaḥ // 5.041.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na rāvaṇasahasraṃ me yuddhe pratibalaṃ bhavet / śilābhis tu praharataḥ pādapaiś ca sahasraśaḥ // 5.041.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardayitvā purīṃ laṅkām abhivādya ca maithilīm / samṛddhārtho gamiṣyāmi miṣatāṃ sarvarakṣasām // 5.041.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā vimānasthaś caityasthān haripuṃgavaḥ / nanāda bhīmanirhrādo rakṣasāṃ janayan bhayam // 5.041.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena śabdena mahatā caityapālāḥ śataṃ yayuḥ / gṛhītvā vividhān astrān prāsān khaḍgān paraśvadhān // 5.041.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visṛjanto mahākṣayā mārutiṃ paryavārayan // 5.041.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āvarta iva gaṅgāyās toyasya vipulo mahān / parikṣipya hariśreṣṭhaṃ sa babhau rakṣasāṃ gaṇaḥ // 5.041.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vātātmajaḥ kruddho bhīmarūpaṃ samāsthitaḥ // 5.041.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāsādasya mahāṃs tasya stambhaṃ hemapariṣkṛtam / utpāṭayitvā vegena hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ // 5.041.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ bhrāmayām āsa śatadhāraṃ mahābalaḥ // 5.041.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rākṣasaśataṃ hatvā vajreṇendra ivāsurān / antarikṣasthitaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 5.041.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi visṛṣṭāni mahātmanām / balināṃ vānarendrāṇāṃ sugrīvavaśavartinām // 5.041.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭībhir ayutair api / āgamiṣyati sugrīvaḥ sarveṣāṃ vo niṣūdanaḥ // 5.041.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
neyam asti purī laṅkā na yūyaṃ na ca rāvaṇaḥ / yasmād ikṣvākunāthena baddhaṃ vairaṃ mahātmanā // 5.041.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃdiṣṭo rākṣasendreṇa prahastasya suto balī / jambumālī mahādaṃṣṭro nirjagāma dhanurdharaḥ // 5.042.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raktamālyāmbaradharaḥ sragvī rucirakuṇḍalaḥ / mahān vivṛttanayanaś caṇḍaḥ samaradurjayaḥ // 5.042.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanuḥ śakradhanuḥ prakhyaṃ mahad rucirasāyakam / visphārayāṇo vegena vajrāśanisamasvanam // 5.042.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya visphāraghoṣeṇa dhanuṣo mahatā diśaḥ / pradiśaś ca nabhaś caiva sahasā samapūryata // 5.042.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathena kharayuktena tam āgatam udīkṣya saḥ / hanūmān vegasaṃpanno jaharṣa ca nanāda ca // 5.042.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ toraṇaviṭaṅkasthaṃ hanūmantaṃ mahākapim / jambumālī mahābāhur vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // 5.042.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardhacandreṇa vadane śirasy ekena karṇinā / bāhvor vivyādha nārācair daśabhis taṃ kapīśvaram // 5.042.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tac chuśubhe tāmraṃ śareṇābhihataṃ mukham / śaradīvāmbujaṃ phullaṃ viddhaṃ bhāskararaśminā // 5.042.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cukopa bāṇābhihato rākṣasasya mahākapiḥ / tataḥ pārśve 'tivipulāṃ dadarśa mahatīṃ śilām // 5.042.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tarasā tāṃ samutpāṭya cikṣepa balavad balī / tāṃ śarair daśabhiḥ kruddhas tāḍayām āsa rākṣasaḥ // 5.042.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vipannaṃ karma tad dṛṣṭvā hanūmāṃś caṇḍavikramaḥ / sālaṃ vipulam utpāṭya bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān // 5.042.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrāmayantaṃ kapiṃ dṛṣṭvā sālavṛkṣaṃ mahābalam / cikṣepa subahūn bāṇāñ jambumālī mahābalaḥ // 5.042.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sālaṃ caturbhir ciccheda vānaraṃ pañcabhir bhuje / urasy ekena bāṇena daśabhis tu stanāntare // 5.042.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śaraiḥ pūritatanuḥ krodhena mahatā vṛtaḥ / tam eva parighaṃ gṛhya bhrāmayām āsa vegitaḥ // 5.042.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ativego 'tivegena bhrāmayitvā balotkaṭaḥ / parighaṃ pātayām āsa jambumāler mahorasi // 5.042.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya caiva śiro nāsti na bāhū na ca jānunī / na dhanur na ratho nāśvās tatrādṛśyanta neṣavaḥ // 5.042.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hatas tarasā tena jambumālī mahārathaḥ / papāta nihato bhūmau cūrṇitāṅgavibhūṣaṇaḥ // 5.042.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jambumāliṃ ca nihataṃ kiṃkarāṃś ca mahābalān / cukrodha rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā kopasaṃraktalocanaḥ // 5.042.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa roṣasaṃvartitatāmralocanaḥ; prahastaputre nihate mahābale / amātyaputrān ativīryavikramān; samādideśāśu niśācareśvaraḥ // 5.042.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas te rākṣasendreṇa coditā mantriṇaḥ sutāḥ / niryayur bhavanāt tasmāt sapta saptārcivarcasaḥ // 5.043.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahābalaparīvārā dhanuṣmanto mahābalāḥ / kṛtāstrāstravidāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ parasparajayaiṣiṇaḥ // 5.043.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hemajālaparikṣiptair dhvajavadbhiḥ patākibhiḥ / toyadasvananirghoṣair vājiyuktair mahārathaiḥ // 5.043.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taptakāñcanacitrāṇi cāpāny amitavikramāḥ / visphārayantaḥ saṃhṛṣṭās taḍidvanta ivāmbudāḥ // 5.043.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jananyas tās tatas teṣāṃ viditvā kiṃkarān hatān / babhūvuḥ śokasaṃbhrāntāḥ sabāndhavasuhṛjjanāḥ // 5.043.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te parasparasaṃgharṣās taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ / abhipetur hanūmantaṃ toraṇastham avasthitam // 5.043.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sṛjanto bāṇavṛṣṭiṃ te rathagarjitaniḥsvanāḥ / vṛṣṭimanta ivāmbhodā vicerur nairṛtarṣabhāḥ // 5.043.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avakīrṇas tatas tābhir hanūmāñ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ / abhavat saṃvṛtākāraḥ śailarāḍ iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ // 5.043.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śarān vañcayām āsa teṣām āśucaraḥ kapiḥ / rathavegāṃś ca vīrāṇāṃ vicaran vimale 'mbare // 5.043.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taiḥ krīḍan dhanuṣmadbhir vyomni vīraḥ prakāśate / dhanuṣmadbhir yathā meghair mārutaḥ prabhur ambare // 5.043.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kṛtvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ trāsayaṃs tāṃ mahācamūm / cakāra hanumān vegaṃ teṣu rakṣaḥsu vīryavān // 5.043.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
talenābhihanat kāṃś cit pādaiḥ kāṃś cit paraṃtapaḥ / muṣṭinābhyahanat kāṃś cin nakhaiḥ kāṃś cid vyadārayat // 5.043.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pramamāthorasā kāṃś cid ūrubhyām aparān kapiḥ / ke cit tasyaiva nādena tatraiva patitā bhuvi // 5.043.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas teṣv avapanneṣu bhūmau nipatiteṣu ca / tat sainyam agamat sarvaṃ diśo daśabhayārditam // 5.043.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinedur visvaraṃ nāgā nipetur bhuvi vājinaḥ / bhagnanīḍadhvajacchatrair bhūś ca kīrṇābhavad rathaiḥ // 5.043.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tān pravṛddhān vinihatya rākṣasān; mahābalaś caṇḍaparākramaḥ kapiḥ / yuyutsur anyaiḥ punar eva rākṣasais; tad eva vīro 'bhijagāma toraṇam // 5.043.016	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
hatān mantrisutān buddhvā vānareṇa mahātmanā / rāvaṇaḥ saṃvṛtākāraś cakāra matim uttamām // 5.044.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa virūpākṣayūpākṣau durdharaṃ caiva rākṣasaṃ / praghasaṃ bhāsakarṇaṃ ca pañcasenāgranāyakān // 5.044.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃdideśa daśagrīvo vīrān nayaviśāradān / hanūmadgrahaṇe vyagrān vāyuvegasamān yudhi // 5.044.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāta senāgragāḥ sarve mahābalaparigrahāḥ / savājirathamātaṅgāḥ sa kapiḥ śāsyatām iti // 5.044.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat taiś ca khalu bhāvyaṃ syāt tam āsādya vanālayam / karma cāpi samādheyaṃ deśakālavirodhitam // 5.044.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy ahaṃ taṃ kapiṃ manye karmaṇā pratitarkayan / sarvathā tan mahad bhūtaṃ mahābalaparigraham // 5.044.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaved indreṇa vā sṛṣṭam asmadarthaṃ tapobalāt // 5.044.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sanāgayakṣagandharvā devāsuramaharṣayaḥ / yuṣmābhiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair mayā saha vinirjitāḥ // 5.044.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair avaśyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ vyalīkaṃ kiṃ cid eva naḥ / tad eva nātra saṃdehaḥ prasahya parigṛhyatām // 5.044.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāvamanyo bhavadbhiś ca hariḥ krūraparākramaḥ / dṛṣṭā hi harayaḥ śīghrā mayā vipulavikramāḥ // 5.044.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vālī ca saha sugrīvo jāmbavāṃś ca mahābalaḥ / nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva ye cānye dvividādayaḥ // 5.044.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva teṣāṃ gatir bhīmā na tejo na parākramaḥ / na matir na balotsāho na rūpaparikalpanam // 5.044.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahat sattvam idaṃ jñeyaṃ kapirūpaṃ vyavasthitam / prayatnaṃ mahad āsthāya kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ // 5.044.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ lokās trayaḥ sendrāḥ sasurāsuramānavāḥ / bhavatām agrataḥ sthātuṃ na paryāptā raṇājire // 5.044.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathāpi tu nayajñena jayam ākāṅkṣatā raṇe / ātmā rakṣyaḥ prayatnena yuddhasiddhir hi cañcalā // 5.044.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te svāmivacanaṃ sarve pratigṛhya mahaujasaḥ / samutpetur mahāvegā hutāśasamatejasaḥ // 5.044.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathaiś ca mattair nāgaiś ca vājibhiś ca mahājavaiḥ / śastraiś ca vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ sarvaiś copacitā balaiḥ // 5.044.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahākapim / raśmimantam ivodyantaṃ svatejoraśmimālinam // 5.044.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
toraṇasthaṃ mahāvegaṃ mahāsattvaṃ mahābalam / mahāmatiṃ mahotsāhaṃ mahākāyaṃ mahābalam // 5.044.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ samīkṣyaiva te sarve dikṣu sarvāsv avasthitāḥ / tais taiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ // 5.044.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya pañcāyasās tīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ pītamukhāḥ śarāḥ / śirasty utpalapatrābhā durdhareṇa nipātitāḥ // 5.044.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taiḥ pañcabhir āviddhaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi vānaraḥ / utpapāta nadan vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan // 5.044.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu durdharo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajjakārmukaḥ / kirañ śaraśatair naikair abhipede mahābalaḥ // 5.044.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kapir vārayām āsa taṃ vyomni śaravarṣiṇam / vṛṣṭimantaṃ payodānte payodam iva mārutaḥ // 5.044.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardyamānas tatas tena durdhareṇānilātmajaḥ / cakāra ninadaṃ bhūyo vyavardhata ca vegavān // 5.044.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dūraṃ sahasotpatya durdharasya rathe hariḥ / nipapāta mahāvego vidyudrāśir girāv iva // 5.044.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ mathitāṣṭāśvaṃ rathaṃ bhagnākṣakūvaram / vihāya nyapatad bhūmau durdharas tyaktajīvitaḥ // 5.044.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ virūpākṣayūpākṣau dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ bhuvi / saṃjātaroṣau durdharṣāv utpetatur ariṃdamau // 5.044.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tābhyāṃ sahasotpatya viṣṭhito vimale 'mbare / mudgarābhyāṃ mahābāhur vakṣasy abhihataḥ kapiḥ // 5.044.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayor vegavator vegaṃ vinihatya mahābalaḥ / nipapāta punar bhūmau suparṇasamavikramaḥ // 5.044.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sālavṛkṣam āsādya samutpāṭya ca vānaraḥ / tāv ubhau rākṣasau vīrau jaghāna pavanātmajaḥ // 5.044.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tāṃs trīn hatāñ jñātvā vānareṇa tarasvinā / abhipede mahāvegaḥ prasahya praghaso harim // 5.044.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāsakarṇaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ śūlam ādāya vīryavān / ekataḥ kapiśārdūlaṃ yaśasvinam avasthitau // 5.044.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paṭṭiśena śitāgreṇa praghasaḥ pratyapothayat / bhāsakarṇaś ca śūlena rākṣasaḥ kapisattamam // 5.044.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tābhyāṃ vikṣatair gātrair asṛgdigdhatanūruhaḥ / abhavad vānaraḥ kruddho bālasūryasamaprabhaḥ // 5.044.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samutpāṭya gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ samṛgavyālapādapam / jaghāna hanumān vīro rākṣasau kapikuñjaraḥ // 5.044.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas teṣv avasanneṣu senāpatiṣu pañcasu / balaṃ tad avaśeṣaṃ tu nāśayām āsa vānaraḥ // 5.044.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśvair aśvān gajair nāgān yodhair yodhān rathai rathān / sa kapir nāśayām āsa sahasrākṣa ivāsurān // 5.044.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatair nāgaiś ca turagair bhagnākṣaiś ca mahārathaiḥ / hataiś ca rākṣasair bhūmī ruddhamārgā samantataḥ // 5.044.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kapis tān dhvajinīpatīn raṇe; nihatya vīrān sabalān savāhanān / tad eva vīraḥ parigṛhya toraṇaṃ; kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kāla iva prajākṣaye // 5.044.039	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
senāpatīn pañca sa tu pramāpitān; hanūmatā sānucarān savāhanān / samīkṣya rājā samaroddhatonmukhaṃ; kumāram akṣaṃ prasamaikṣatākṣatam // 5.045.001	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
sa tasya dṛṣṭyarpaṇasaṃpracoditaḥ; pratāpavān kāñcanacitrakārmukaḥ / samutpapātātha sadasy udīrito; dvijātimukhyair haviṣeva pāvakaḥ // 5.045.002	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato mahad bāladivākaraprabhaṃ; prataptajāmbūnadajālasaṃtatam / rathāṃ samāsthāya yayau sa vīryavān; mahāhariṃ taṃ prati nairṛtarṣabhaḥ // 5.045.003	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas tapaḥsaṃgrahasaṃcayārjitaṃ; prataptajāmbūnadajālaśobhitam / patākinaṃ ratnavibhūṣitadhvajaṃ; manojavāṣṭāśvavaraiḥ suyojitam // 5.045.004	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
surāsurādhṛṣyam asaṃgacāriṇaṃ; raviprabhaṃ vyomacaraṃ samāhitam / satūṇam aṣṭāsinibaddhabandhuraṃ; yathākramāveśitaśaktitomaram // 5.045.005	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
virājamānaṃ pratipūrṇavastunā; sahemadāmnā śaśisūryavarvasā / divākarābhaṃ ratham āsthitas tataḥ; sa nirjagāmāmaratulyavikramaḥ // 5.045.006	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa pūrayan khaṃ ca mahīṃ ca sācalāṃ; turaṃgamataṅgamahārathasvanaiḥ / balaiḥ sametaiḥ sa hi toraṇasthitaṃ; samartham āsīnam upāgamat kapim // 5.045.007	upajāti (jagatī: ajñātam [jjjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
sa taṃ samāsādya hariṃ harīkṣaṇo; yugāntakālāgnim iva prajākṣaye / avasthitaṃ vismitajātasaṃbhramaḥ; samaikṣatākṣo bahumānacakṣuṣā // 5.045.008	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tasya vegaṃ ca kaper mahātmanaḥ; parākramaṃ cāriṣu pārhtivātmajaḥ / vicārayan khaṃ ca balaṃ mahābalo; himakṣaye sūrya ivābhivardhate // 5.045.009	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa jātamanyuḥ prasamīkṣya vikramaṃ; sthiraḥ sthitaḥ saṃyati durnivāraṇam / samāhitātmā hanumantam āhave; pracodayām āsa śarais tribhiḥ śitaiḥ // 5.045.010	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ kapiṃ taṃ prasamīkṣya garvitaṃ; jitaśramaṃ śatruparājayor jitam / avaikṣatākṣaḥ samudīrṇamānasaḥ; sabāṇapāṇiḥ pragṛhītakārmukaḥ // 5.045.011	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa hemaniṣkāṅgadacārukuṇḍalaḥ; samāsasādāśu parākramaḥ kapim / tayor babhūvāpratimaḥ samāgamaḥ; surāsurāṇām api saṃbhramapradaḥ // 5.045.012	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
rarāsa bhūmir na tatāpa bhānumān; vavau na vāyuḥ pracacāla cācalaḥ / kapeḥ kumārasya ca vīkṣya saṃyugaṃ; nanāda ca dyaur udadhiś ca cukṣubhe // 5.045.013	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ sa vīraḥ sumukhān patatriṇaḥ; suvarṇapuṅkhān saviṣān ivoragān / samādhisaṃyogavimokṣatattvavic; charān atha trīn kapimūrdhny apātayat // 5.045.014	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa taiḥ śarair mūrdhni samaṃ nipātitaiḥ; kṣarann asṛgdigdhavivṛttalocanaḥ / navoditādityanibhaḥ śarāṃśumān; vyarājatāditya ivāṃśumālikaḥ // 5.045.015	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ sa piṅgādhipamantrisattamaḥ; samīkṣya taṃ rājavarātmajaṃ raṇe / udagracitrāyudhacitrakārmukaṃ; jaharṣa cāpūryata cāhavonmukhaḥ // 5.045.016	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa mandarāgrastha ivāṃśumālī; vivṛddhakopo balavīryasaṃyutaḥ / kumāram akṣaṃ sabalaṃ savāhanaṃ; dadāha netrāgnimarīcibhis tadā // 5.045.017	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
tataḥ sa bāṇāsanaśakrakārmukaḥ; śarapravarṣo yudhi rākṣasāmbudaḥ / śarān mumocāśu harīśvarācale; balāhako vṛṣṭim ivācalottame // 5.045.018	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ kapis taṃ raṇacaṇḍavikramaṃ; vivṛddhatejobalavīryasāyakam / kumāram akṣaṃ prasamīkṣya saṃyuge; nanāda harṣād ghanatulyavikramaḥ // 5.045.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa bālabhāvād yudhi vīryadarpitaḥ; pravṛddhamanyuḥ kṣatajopamekṣaṇaḥ / samāsasādāpratimaṃ raṇe kapiṃ; gajo mahākūpam ivāvṛtaṃ tṛṇaiḥ // 5.045.020	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tena bāṇaiḥ prasabhaṃ nipātitaiś; cakāra nādaṃ ghananādaniḥsvanaḥ / samutpapātāśu nabhaḥ sa mārutir; bhujoruvikṣepaṇa ghoradarśanaḥ // 5.045.021	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
samutpatantaṃ samabhidravad balī; sa rākṣasānāṃ pravaraḥ pratāpavān / rathī rathaśreṣṭhatamaḥ kirañ śaraiḥ; payodharaḥ śailam ivāśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ // 5.045.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tāñ śarāṃs tasya vimokṣayan kapiś; cacāra vīraḥ pathi vāyusevite / śarāntare mārutavad viniṣpatan; manojavaḥ saṃyati caṇḍavikramaḥ // 5.045.023	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tam āttabāṇāsanam āhavonmukhaṃ; kham āstṛṇantaṃ vividhaiḥ śarottamaiḥ / avaikṣatākṣaṃ bahumānacakṣuṣā; jagāma cintāṃ ca sa mārutātmajaḥ // 5.045.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ śarair bhinnabhujāntaraḥ kapiḥ; kumāravaryeṇa mahātmanā nadan / mahābhujaḥ karmaviśeṣatattvavid; vicintayām āsa raṇe parākramam // 5.045.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
abālavad bāladivākaraprabhaḥ; karoty ayaṃ karma mahan mahābalaḥ / na cāsya sarvāhavakarmaśobhinaḥ; pramāpaṇe me matir atra jāyate // 5.045.026	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
ayaṃ mahātmā ca mahāṃś ca vīryataḥ; samāhitaś cātisahaś ca saṃyuge / asaṃśayaṃ karmaguṇodayād ayaṃ; sanāgayakṣair munibhiś ca pūjitaḥ // 5.045.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
parākramotsāhavivṛddhamānasaḥ; samīkṣate māṃ pramukhāgataḥ sthitaḥ / parākramo hy asya manāṃsi kampayet; surāsurāṇām api śīghrakāriṇaḥ // 5.045.028	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
na khalv ayaṃ nābhibhaved upekṣitaḥ; parākramo hy asya raṇe vivardhate / pramāpaṇaṃ tv eva mamāsya rocate; na vardhamāno 'gnir upekṣituṃ kṣamaḥ // 5.045.029	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
iti pravegaṃ tu parasya tarkayan; svakarmayogaṃ ca vidhāya vīryavān / cakāra vegaṃ tu mahābalas tadā; matiṃ ca cakre 'sya vadhe mahākapiḥ // 5.045.030	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tasya tān aṣṭahayān mahājavān; samāhitān bhārasahān vivartane / jaghāna vīraḥ pathi vāyusevite; talaprahālaiḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapiḥ // 5.045.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas talenābhihato mahārathaḥ; sa tasya piṅgādhipamantrinirjitaḥ / sa bhagnanīḍaḥ parimuktakūbaraḥ; papāta bhūmau hatavājir ambarāt // 5.045.032	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa taṃ parityajya mahāratho rathaṃ; sakārmukaḥ khaḍgadharaḥ kham utpatat / tapo'bhiyogād ṛṣir ugravīryavān; vihāya dehaṃ marutām ivālayam // 5.045.033	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ kapis taṃ vicarantam ambare; patatrirājānilasiddhasevite / sametya taṃ mārutavegavikramaḥ; krameṇa jagrāha ca pādayor dṛḍham // 5.045.034	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa taṃ samāvidhya sahasraśaḥ kapir; mahoragaṃ gṛhya ivāṇḍajeśvaraḥ / mumoca vegāt pitṛtulyavikramo; mahītale saṃyati vānarottamaḥ // 5.045.035	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa bhagnabāhūrukaṭīśiro dharaḥ; kṣarann asṛn nirmathitāsthilocanaḥ / sa bhinnasaṃdhiḥ pravikīrṇabandhano; hataḥ kṣitau vāyusutena rākṣasaḥ // 5.045.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
mahākapir bhūmitale nipīḍya taṃ; cakāra rakṣo'dhipater mahad bhayam // 5.045.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maharṣibhiś cakracarair mahāvrataiḥ; sametya bhūtaiś ca sayakṣapannagaiḥ / suraiś ca sendrair bhṛśajātavismayair; hate kumāre sa kapir nirīkṣitaḥ // 5.045.038	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
nihatya taṃ vajrasutopamaprabhaṃ; kumāram akṣaṃ kṣatajopamekṣaṇam / tad eva vīro 'bhijagāma toraṇaṃ; kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kāla iva prajākṣaye // 5.045.039	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas tu rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; hanūmatākṣe nihate kumāre / manaḥ samādhāya tadendrakalpaṃ; samādideśendrajitaṃ sa roṣāt // 5.046.001	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tvam astravic chastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ; surāsurāṇām api śokadātā / sureṣu sendreṣu ca dṛṣṭakarmā; pitāmahārādhanasaṃcitāstraḥ // 5.046.002	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tavāstrabalam āsādya nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ / na kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu saṃyuge na gataśramaḥ // 5.046.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhujavīryābhiguptaś ca tapasā cābhirakṣitaḥ / deśakālavibhāgajñas tvam eva matisattamaḥ // 5.046.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na te 'sty aśakyaṃ samareṣu karmaṇā; na te 'sty akāryaṃ matipūrvamantraṇe / na so 'sti kaś cit triṣu saṃgraheṣu vai; na veda yas te 'strabalaṃ balaṃ ca te // 5.046.005	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
mamānurūpaṃ tapaso balaṃ ca te; parākramaś cāstrabalaṃ ca saṃyuge / na tvāṃ samāsādya raṇāvamarde; manaḥ śramaṃ gacchati niścitārtham // 5.046.006	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [jtjgg], ajñātam [ttjgg], vaṃśastha [jtjr])
nihatā iṃkarāḥ sarve jambumālī ca rākṣasaḥ / amātyaputrā vīrāś ca pañca senāgrayāyinaḥ // 5.046.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahodaras te dayitaḥ kumāro 'kṣaś ca sūditaḥ / na tu teṣv eva me sāro yas tvayy ariniṣūdana // 5.046.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ hi dṛṣṭvā matiman mahad balaṃ; kapeḥ prabhāvaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca / tvam ātmanaś cāpi samīkṣya sāraṃ; kuruṣva vegaṃ svabalānurūpam // 5.046.009	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
balāvamardas tvayi saṃnikṛṣṭe; yathā gate śāmyati śāntaśatrau / tathā samīkṣyātmabalaṃ paraṃ ca; samārabhasvāstravidāṃ variṣṭha // 5.046.010	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
na khalv iyaṃ matiḥ śreṣṭhā yat tvāṃ saṃpreṣayāmy aham / iyaṃ ca rājadharmāṇāṃ kṣatrasya ca matir matā // 5.046.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāśastraiś ca saṃgrāme vaiśāradyam ariṃdama / avaśyam eva boddhavyaṃ kāmyaś ca vijayo raṇe // 5.046.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pitus tad vacanaṃ niśamya; pradakṣiṇaṃ dakṣasutaprabhāvaḥ / cakāra bhartāram adīnasattvo; raṇāya vīraḥ pratipannabuddhiḥ // 5.046.013	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tatas taiḥ svagaṇair iṣṭair indrajit pratipūjitaḥ / yuddhoddhatakṛtotsāhaḥ saṃgrāmaṃ pratipadyata // 5.046.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrīmān padmapalāśākṣo rākṣasādhipateḥ sutaḥ / nirjagāma mahātejāḥ samudra iva parvasu // 5.046.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pakṣi rājopamatulyavegair; vyālaiś caturbhiḥ sitatīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraiḥ / rathaṃ samāyuktam asaṃgavegaṃ; samārurohendrajid indrakalpaḥ // 5.046.016	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa rathī dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śastrajño 'stravidāṃ varaḥ / rathenābhiyayau kṣipraṃ hanūmān yatra so 'bhavat // 5.046.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tasya rathanirghoṣaṃ jyāsvanaṃ kārmukasya ca / niśamya harivīro 'sau saṃprahṛṣṭataro 'bhavat // 5.046.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumahac cāpam ādāya śitaśalyāṃś ca sāyakān / hanūmantam abhipretya jagāma raṇapaṇḍitaḥ // 5.046.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tataḥ saṃyati jātaharṣe; raṇāya nirgacchati bāṇapāṇau / diśaś ca sarvāḥ kaluṣā babhūvur; mṛgāś ca raudrā bahudhā vineduḥ // 5.046.020	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
samāgatās tatra tu nāgayakṣā; maharṣayaś cakracarāś ca siddhāḥ / nabhaḥ samāvṛtya ca pakṣisaṃghā; vinedur uccaiḥ paramaprahṛṣṭāḥ // 5.046.021	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
āyantaṃ sarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam indrajitaṃ kapiḥ / vinanāda mahānādaṃ vyavardhata ca vegavān // 5.046.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrajit tu rathaṃ divyam āsthitaś citrakārmukaḥ / dhanur visphārayām āsa taḍidūrjitaniḥsvanam // 5.046.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sametāv atitīkṣṇavegau; mahābalau tau raṇanirviśaṅkau / kapiś ca rakṣo'dhipateś ca putraḥ; surāsurendrāv iva baddhavairau // 5.046.024	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
sa tasya vīrasya mahārathasyā; dhanuṣmataḥ saṃyati saṃmatasya / śarapravegaṃ vyahanat pravṛddhaś; cacāra mārge pitur aprameyaḥ // 5.046.025	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tataḥ śarān āyatatīkṣṇaśalyān; supatriṇaḥ kāñcanacitrapuṅkhān / mumoca vīraḥ paravīrahantā; susaṃtatān vajranipātavegān // 5.046.026	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
sa tasya tat syandananiḥsvanaṃ ca; mṛdaṅgabherīpaṭahasvanaṃ ca / vikṛṣyamāṇasya ca kārmukasya; niśamya ghoṣaṃ punar utpapāta // 5.046.027	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
śarāṇām antareṣv āśu vyavartata mahākapiḥ / haris tasyābhilakṣasya mokṣayaṃl lakṣyasaṃgraham // 5.046.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarāṇām agratas tasya punaḥ samabhivartata / prasārya hastau hanumān utpapātānilātmajaḥ // 5.046.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv ubhau vegasaṃpannau raṇakarmaviśāradau / sarvabhūtamanogrāhi cakratur yuddham uttamam // 5.046.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmato veda na rākṣaso 'ntaraṃ; na mārutis tasya mahātmano 'ntaram / parasparaṃ nirviṣahau babhūvatuḥ; sametya tau devasamānavikramau // 5.046.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas tu lakṣye sa vihanyamāne; śareṣu mogheṣu ca saṃpatatsu / jagāma cintāṃ mahatīṃ mahātmā; samādhisaṃyogasamāhitātmā // 5.046.032	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tato matiṃ rākṣasarājasūnuś; cakāra tasmin harivīramukhye / avadhyatāṃ tasya kapeḥ samīkṣya; kathaṃ nigacched iti nigrahārtham // 5.046.033	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tataḥ paitāmahāṃ vīraḥ so 'stram astravidāṃ varaḥ / saṃdadhe sumahātejās taṃ haripravaraṃ prati // 5.046.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avadhyo 'yam iti jñātvā tam astreṇāstratattvavit / nijagrāha mahābāhur mārutātmajam indrajit // 5.046.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena baddhas tato 'streṇa rākṣasena sa vānaraḥ / abhavan nirviceṣṭaś ca papāta ca mahītale // 5.046.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'tha buddhvā sa tadāstrabandhaṃ; prabhoḥ prabhāvād vigatālpavegaḥ / pitāmahānugraham ātmanaś ca; vicintayām āsa haripravīraḥ // 5.046.037	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tataḥ svāyambhuvair mantrair brahmāstram abhimantritam / hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa varadānaṃ pitāmahāt // 5.046.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na me 'strabandhasya ca śaktir asti; vimokṣaṇe lokaguroḥ prabhāvāt / ity evam evaṃvihito 'strabandho; mayātmayoner anuvartitavyaḥ // 5.046.039	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa vīryam astrasya kapir vicārya; pitāmahānugraham ātmanaś ca / vimokṣaśaktiṃ paricintayitvā; pitāmahājñām anuvartate sma // 5.046.040	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
astreṇāpi hi baddhasya bhayaṃ mama na jāyate / pitāmahamahendrābhyāṃ rakṣitasyānilena ca // 5.046.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
grahaṇe cāpi rakṣobhir mahan me guṇadarśanam / rākṣasendreṇa saṃvādas tasmād gṛhṇantu māṃ pare // 5.046.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa niścitārthaḥ paravīrahantā; samīkṣya karī vinivṛttaceṣṭaḥ / paraiḥ prasahyābhigatair nigṛhya; nanāda tais taiḥ paribhartsyamānaḥ // 5.046.043	upajāti (triṣṭubh: ajñātam [jjjgg], upendravajrā [jtjgg])
tatas taṃ rākṣasā dṛṣṭvā nirviceṣṭam ariṃdamam / babandhuḥ śaṇavalkaiś ca drumacīraiś ca saṃhataiḥ // 5.046.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rocayām āsa paraiś ca bandhanaṃ; prasahya vīrair abhinigrahaṃ ca / kautūhalān māṃ yadi rākṣasendro; draṣṭuṃ vyavasyed iti niścitārthaḥ // 5.046.045	indravajrā [ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [ttjgg], vaṃśastha [jtjr], ajñātam [jtjgl])
sa baddhas tena valkena vimukto 'streṇa vīryavān / astrabandhaḥ sa cānyaṃ hi na bandham anuvartate // 5.046.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athendrajit taṃ drumacīrabandhaṃ; vicārya vīraḥ kapisattamaṃ tam / vimuktam astreṇa jagāma cintām; anyena baddho hy anuvartate 'stram // 5.046.047	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
aho mahat karma kṛtaṃ nirarthakaṃ; na rākṣasair mantragatir vimṛṣṭā / punaś ca nāstre vihate 'stram anyat; pravartate saṃśayitāḥ sma sarve // 5.046.048	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
astreṇa hanumān mukto nātmānam avabudhyate / kṛṣyamāṇas tu rakṣobhis taiś ca bandhair nipīḍitaḥ // 5.046.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanyamānas tataḥ krūrai rākṣasaiḥ kāṣṭhamuṣṭibhiḥ / samīpaṃ rākṣasendrasya prākṛṣyata sa vānaraḥ // 5.046.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athendrajit taṃ prasamīkṣya muktam; astreṇa baddhaṃ drumacīrasūtraiḥ / vyadarśayat tatra mahābalaṃ taṃ; haripravīraṃ sagaṇāya rājñe // 5.046.051	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ baddhaṃ kapivarottamam / rākṣasā rākṣasendrāya rāvaṇāya nyavedayan // 5.046.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāpi kiṃ kāryaṃ ko vyapāśrayaḥ / iti rākṣasavīrāṇāṃ tatra saṃjajñire kathāḥ // 5.046.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanyatāṃ dahyatāṃ vāpi bhakṣyatām iti cāpare / rākṣasās tatra saṃkruddhāḥ parasparam athābruvan // 5.046.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atītya mārgaṃ sahasā mahātmā; sa tatra rakṣo'dhipapādamūle / dadarśa rājñaḥ paricāravṛddhān; gṛhaṃ mahāratnavibhūṣitaṃ ca // 5.046.055	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
sa dadarśa mahātejā rāvaṇaḥ kapisattamam / rakṣobhir vikṛtākāraiḥ kṛṣyamāṇam itas tataḥ // 5.046.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasādhipatiṃ cāpi dadarśa kapisattamaḥ / tejobalasamāyuktaṃ tapantam iva bhāskaram // 5.046.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa roṣasaṃvartitatāmradṛṣṭir; daśānanas taṃ kapim anvavekṣya / athopaviṣṭān kulaśīlavṛddhān; samādiśat taṃ prati mantramukhyān // 5.046.058	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
yathākramaṃ taiḥ sa kapiś ca pṛṣṭaḥ; kāryārtham arthasya ca mūlam ādau / nivedayām āsa harīśvarasya; dūtaḥ sakāśād aham āgato 'smi // 5.046.059	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ sa karmaṇā tasya vismito bhīmavikramaḥ / hanumān roṣatāmrākṣo rakṣo'dhipam avaikṣata // 5.047.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhājamānaṃ mahārheṇa kāñcanena virājatā / muktājālāvṛtenātha mukuṭena mahādyutim // 5.047.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajrasaṃyogasaṃyuktair mahārhamaṇivigrahaiḥ / haimair ābharaṇaiś citrair manaseva prakalpitaiḥ // 5.047.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahārhakṣaumasaṃvītaṃ raktacandanarūṣitam / svanuliptaṃ vicitrābhir vividhabhiś ca bhaktibhiḥ // 5.047.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vipulair darśanīyaiś ca rakṣākṣair bhīmadarśanaiḥ / dīptatīkṣṇamahādaṃṣṭraiḥ pralambadaśanacchadaiḥ // 5.047.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śirobhir daśabhir vīraṃ bhrājamānaṃ mahaujasaṃ / nānāvyālasamākīrṇaiḥ śikharair iva mandaram // 5.047.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlāñjanacaya prakhyaṃ hāreṇorasi rājatā / pūrṇacandrābhavaktreṇa sabalākam ivāmbudam // 5.047.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāhubhir baddhakeyūraiś candanottamarūṣitaiḥ / bhrājamānāṅgadaiḥ pīnaiḥ pañcaśīrṣair ivoragaiḥ // 5.047.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahati sphāṭike citre ratnasaṃyogasaṃskṛte / uttamāstaraṇāstīrṇe upaviṣṭaṃ varāsane // 5.047.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaṃkṛtābhir atyarthaṃ pramadābhiḥ samantataḥ / vālavyajanahastābhir ārāt samupasevitam // 5.047.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
durdhareṇa prahastena mahāpārśvena rakṣasā / mantribhir mantratattvajñair nikumbhena ca mantriṇā // 5.047.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upopaviṣṭaṃ rakṣobhiś caturbhir baladarpitaiḥ / kṛtsnaiḥ parivṛtaṃ lokaṃ caturbhir iva sāgaraiḥ // 5.047.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantribhir mantratattvajñair anyaiś ca śubhabuddhibhiḥ / anvāsyamānaṃ sacivaiḥ surair iva sureśvaram // 5.047.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apaśyad rākṣasapatiṃ hanūmān atitejasaṃ / viṣṭhitaṃ meruśikhare satoyam iva toyadam // 5.047.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taiḥ saṃpīḍyamāno 'pi rakṣobhir bhīmavikramaiḥ / vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā rakṣo'dhipam avaikṣata // 5.047.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrājamānaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā hanumān rākṣaseśvaram / manasā cintayām āsa tejasā tasya mohitaḥ // 5.047.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho sattvam aho dyutiḥ / aho rākṣasarājasya sarvalakṣaṇayuktatā // 5.047.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady adharmo na balavān syād ayaṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ / syād ayaṃ suralokasya saśakrasyāpi rakṣitā // 5.047.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena bibhyati khalv asmāl lokāḥ sāmaradānavāḥ / ayaṃ hy utsahate kruddhaḥ kartum ekārṇavaṃ jagat // 5.047.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti cintāṃ bahuvidhām akaron matimān kapiḥ / dṛṣṭvā rākṣasarājasya prabhāvam amitaujasaḥ // 5.047.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam udvīkṣya mahābāhuḥ piṅgākṣaṃ purataḥ sthitam / roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭo rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ // 5.048.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā roṣatāmrākṣaḥ prahastaṃ mantrisattamam / kālayuktam uvācedaṃ vaco vipulam arthavat // 5.048.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
durātmā pṛcchyatām eṣa kutaḥ kiṃ vāsya kāraṇam / vanabhaṅge ca ko 'syārtho rākṣasīnāṃ ca tarjane // 5.048.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahasto vākyam abravīt / samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te na bhīḥ kāryā tvayā kape // 5.048.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tāvat tvam indreṇa preṣito rāvaṇālayam / tattvam ākhyāhi mā te bhūd bhayaṃ vānara mokṣyase // 5.048.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi vaiśravaṇasya tvaṃ yamasya varuṇasya ca / cārurūpam idaṃ kṛtvā yamasya varuṇasya ca // 5.048.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣṇunā preṣito vāpi dūto vijayakāṅkṣiṇā / na hi te vānaraṃ tejo rūpamātraṃ tu vānaram // 5.048.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tattvataḥ kathayasvādya tato vānara mokṣyase / anṛtaṃ vadataś cāpi durlabhaṃ tava jīvitam // 5.048.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā yannimittas te praveśo rāvaṇālaye // 5.048.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto harivaras tadā rakṣogaṇeśvaram / abravīn nāsmi śakrasya yamasya varuṇasya vā // 5.048.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanadena na me sakhyaṃ viṣṇunā nāsmi coditaḥ / jātir eva mama tv eṣā vānaro 'ham ihāgataḥ // 5.048.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśane rākṣasendrasya durlabhe tad idaṃ mayā / vanaṃ rākṣasarājasya darśanārthe vināśitam // 5.048.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te rākṣasāḥ prāptā balino yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / rakṣaṇārthaṃ ca dehasya pratiyuddhā mayā raṇe // 5.048.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
astrapāśair na śakyo 'haṃ baddhuṃ devāsurair api / pitāmahād eva varo mamāpy eṣo 'bhyupāgataḥ // 5.048.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājānaṃ draṣṭukāmena mayāstram anuvartitam / vimukto aham astreṇa rākṣasais tv atipīḍitaḥ // 5.048.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūto 'ham iti vijñeyo rāghavasyāmitaujasaḥ / śrūyatāṃ cāpi vacanaṃ mama pathyam idaṃ prabho // 5.048.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ samīkṣya mahāsattvaṃ sattvavān harisattamaḥ / vākyam arthavad avyagras tam uvāca daśānanam // 5.049.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ sugrīvasaṃdeśād iha prāptas tavālayam / rākṣasendra harīśas tvāṃ bhrātā kuśalam abravīt // 5.049.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātuḥ śṛṇu samādeśaṃ sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ / dharmārthopahitaṃ vākyam iha cāmutra ca kṣamam // 5.049.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā daśaratho nāma rathakuñjaravājimān / piteva bandhur lokasya sureśvarasamadyutiḥ // 5.049.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyeṣṭhas tasya mahābāhuḥ putraḥ priyakaraḥ prabhuḥ / pitur nideśān niṣkrāntaḥ praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam // 5.049.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā cāpi bhāryayā / rāmo nāma mahātejā dharmyaṃ panthānam āśritaḥ // 5.049.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya bhāryā vane naṣṭā sītā patim anuvratā / vaidehasya sutā rājño janakasya mahātmanaḥ // 5.049.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mārgamāṇas tāṃ devīṃ rājaputraḥ sahānujaḥ / ṛśyamūkam anuprāptaḥ sugrīveṇa ca saṃgataḥ // 5.049.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tena pratijñātaṃ sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam / sugrīvasyāpi rāmeṇa harirājyaṃ niveditam // 5.049.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tena mṛdhe hatvā rājaputreṇa vālinam / sugrīvaḥ sthāpito rājye haryṛkṣāṇāṃ gaṇeśvaraḥ // 5.049.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sītāmārgaṇe vyagraḥ sugrīvaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ / harīn saṃpreṣayām āsa diśaḥ sarvā harīśvaraḥ // 5.049.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ harīṇāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni niyutāni ca / dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante adhaś copari cāmbare // 5.049.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vainateya samāḥ ke cit ke cit tatrānilopamāḥ / asaṃgagatayaḥ śīghrā harivīrā mahābalāḥ // 5.049.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tu hanumān nāma mārutasyaurasaḥ sutaḥ / sītāyās tu kṛte tūrṇaṃ śatayojanam āyatam // 5.049.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samudraṃ laṅghayitvaiva tāṃ didṛkṣur ihāgataḥ // 5.049.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad bhavān dṛṣṭadharmārthas tapaḥ kṛtaparigrahaḥ / paradārān mahāprājña noparoddhuṃ tvam arhasi // 5.049.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi dharmaviruddheṣu bahv apāyeṣu karmasu / mūlaghātiṣu sajjante buddhimanto bhavadvidhāḥ // 5.049.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaś ca lakṣmaṇamuktānāṃ rāmakopānuvartinām / śarāṇām agrataḥ sthātuṃ śakto devāsureṣv api // 5.049.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāpi triṣu lokeṣu rājan vidyeta kaś cana / rāghavasya vyalīkaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā sukham avāpnuyāt // 5.049.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat trikālahitaṃ vākyaṃ dharmyam arthānubandhi ca / manyasva naradevāya jānakī pratidīyatām // 5.049.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭā hīyaṃ mayā devī labdhaṃ yad iha durlabham / uttaraṃ karma yac cheṣaṃ nimittaṃ tatra rāghavaḥ // 5.049.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣiteyaṃ mayā sītā tathā śokaparāyaṇā / gṛhya yāṃ nābhijānāsi pañcāsyām iva pannagīm // 5.049.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
neyaṃ jarayituṃ śakyā sāsurair amarair api / viṣasaṃsṛṣṭam atyarthaṃ bhuktam annam ivaujasā // 5.049.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapaḥsaṃtāpalabdhas te yo 'yaṃ dharmaparigrahaḥ / na sa nāśayituṃ nyāyya ātmaprāṇaparigrahaḥ // 5.049.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avadhyatāṃ tapobhir yāṃ bhavān samanupaśyati / ātmanaḥ sāsurair devair hetus tatrāpy ayaṃ mahān // 5.049.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvo na hi devo 'yaṃ nāsuro na ca mānuṣaḥ / na rākṣaso na gandharvo na yakṣo na ca pannagaḥ // 5.049.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānuṣo rāghavo rājan sugrīvaś ca harīśvaraḥ / tasmāt prāṇaparitrāṇaṃ kathaṃ rājan kariṣyasi // 5.049.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tu dharmopasaṃhāram adharmaphalasaṃhitam / tad eva phalam anveti dharmaś cādharmanāśanaḥ // 5.049.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptaṃ dharmaphalaṃ tāvad bhavatā nātra saṃśayaḥ / phalam asyāpy adharmasya kṣipram eva prapatsyase // 5.049.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janasthānavadhaṃ buddhvā buddhvā vālivadhaṃ tathā / rāmasugrīvasakhyaṃ ca budhyasva hitam ātmanaḥ // 5.049.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ khalv aham apy ekaḥ savājirathakuñjarām / laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktas tasyaiṣa tu viniścayaḥ // 5.049.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmeṇa hi pratijñātaṃ haryṛkṣagaṇasaṃnidhau / utsādanam amitrāṇāṃ sītā yais tu pradharṣitā // 5.049.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apakurvan hi rāmasya sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ / na sukhaṃ prāpnuyād anyaḥ kiṃ punas tvadvidho janaḥ // 5.049.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāṃ sītety abhijānāsi yeyaṃ tiṣṭhati te vaśe / kālarātrīti tāṃ viddhi sarvalaṅkāvināśinīm // 5.049.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad alaṃ kālapāśena sītā vigraharūpiṇā / svayaṃ skandhāvasaktena kṣamam ātmani cintyatām // 5.049.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāyās tejasā dagdhāṃ rāmakopaprapīḍitām / dahyamanām imāṃ paśya purīṃ sāṭṭapratolikām // 5.049.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sauṣṭhavopetam adīnavādinaḥ; kaper niśamyāpratimo 'priyaṃ vacaḥ / daśānanaḥ kopavivṛttalocanaḥ; samādiśat tasya vadhaṃ mahākapeḥ // 5.049.036	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vānarasya mahātmanaḥ / ājñāpayad vadhaṃ tasya rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ // 5.050.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhe tasya samājñapte rāvaṇena durātmanā / niveditavato dautyaṃ nānumene vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 5.050.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ rakṣo'dhipatiṃ kruddhaṃ tac ca kāryam upasthitam / viditvā cintayām āsa kāryaṃ kāryavidhau sthitaḥ // 5.050.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niścitārthas tataḥ sāmnāpūjya śatrujidagrajam / uvāca hitam atyarthaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ // 5.050.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājan dharmaviruddhaṃ ca lokavṛtteś ca garhitam / tava cāsadṛśaṃ vīra kaper asya pramāpaṇam // 5.050.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asaṃśayaṃ śatrur ayaṃ pravṛddhaḥ; kṛtaṃ hy anenāpriyam aprameyam / na dūtavadhyāṃ pravadanti santo; dūtasya dṛṣṭā bahavo hi daṇḍāḥ // 5.050.006	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
vairūpyām aṅgeṣu kaśābhighāto; mauṇḍyaṃ tathā lakṣmaṇasaṃnipātaḥ / etān hi dūte pravadanti daṇḍān; vadhas tu dūtasya na naḥ śruto 'pi // 5.050.007	upajāti (triṣṭubh: indravajrā [ttjgg], upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [mtjgg])
kathaṃ ca dharmārthavinītabuddhiḥ; parāvarapratyayaniścitārthaḥ / bhavadvidhaḥ kopavaśe hi tiṣṭhet; kopaṃ niyacchanti hi sattvavantaḥ // 5.050.008	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
na dharmavāde na ca lokavṛtte; na śāstrabuddhigrahaṇeṣu vāpi / vidyeta kaś cit tava vīratulyas; tvaṃ hy uttamaḥ sarvasurāsurāṇām // 5.050.009	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
na cāpy asya kaper ghāte kaṃ cit paśyāmy ahaṃ guṇam / teṣv ayaṃ pātyatāṃ daṇḍo yair ayaṃ preṣitaḥ kapiḥ // 5.050.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhur vā yadi vāsādhur parair eṣa samarpitaḥ / bruvan parārthaṃ paravān na dūto vadham arhati // 5.050.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api cāsmin hate rājan nānyaṃ paśyāmi khecaram / iha yaḥ punar āgacchet paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadhiḥ // 5.050.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmān nāsya vadhe yatnaḥ kāryaḥ parapuraṃjaya / bhavān sendreṣu deveṣu yatnam āsthātum arhati // 5.050.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin vinaṣṭe na hi dūtam anyaṃ; paśyāmi yas tau nararājaputrau / yuddhāya yuddhapriyadurvinītāv; udyojayed dīrghapathāvaruddhau // 5.050.014	indravajrā [ttjgg]
parākramotsāhamanasvināṃ ca; surāsurāṇām api durjayena / tvayā manonandana nairṛtānāṃ; yuddhāyatir nāśayituṃ na yuktā // 5.050.015	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
hitāś ca śūrāś ca samāhitāś ca; kuleṣu jātāś ca mahāguṇeṣu / manasvinaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhāḥ; koṭyagraśaste subhṛtāś ca yodhāḥ // 5.050.016	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tad ekadeśena balasya tāvat; ke cit tavādeśakṛto 'payāntu / tau rājaputrau vinigṛhya mūḍhau; pareṣu te bhāvayituṃ prabhāvam // 5.050.017	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvo mahābalaḥ / deśakālahitaṃ vākyaṃ bhrātur uttamam abravīt // 5.051.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samyag uktaṃ hi bhavatā dūtavadhyā vigarhitā / avaśyaṃ tu vadhād anyaḥ kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ // 5.051.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kapīnāṃ kila lāṅgūlam iṣṭaṃ bhavati bhūṣaṇam / tad asya dīpyatāṃ śīghraṃ tena dagdhena gacchatu // 5.051.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paśyantv imaṃ dīnam aṅgavairūpyakarśitam / samitrā jñātayaḥ sarve bāndhavāḥ sasuhṛjjanāḥ // 5.051.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājñāpayad rākṣasendraḥ puraṃ sarvaṃ sacatvaram / lāṅgūlena pradīptena rakṣobhiḥ pariṇīyatām // 5.051.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasāḥ kopakarkaśāḥ / veṣṭante tasya lāṅgūlaṃ jīrṇaiḥ kārpāsikaiḥ paṭaiḥ // 5.051.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃveṣṭyamāne lāṅgūle vyavardhata mahākapiḥ / śuṣkam indhanam āsādya vaneṣv iva hutāśanaḥ // 5.051.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tailena pariṣicyātha te 'gniṃ tatrāvapātayan // 5.051.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lāṅgūlena pradīptena rākṣasāṃs tān apātayat / roṣāmarṣaparītātmā bālasūryasamānanaḥ // 5.051.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhūyaḥ saṃgataiḥ krūrai rākasair harisattamaḥ / nibaddhaḥ kṛtavān vīras tatkālasadṛśīṃ matim // 5.051.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ khalu na me śaktā nibadhasyāpi rākṣasāḥ / chittvā pāśān samutpatya hanyām aham imān punaḥ // 5.051.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarveṣām eva paryāpto rākṣasānām ahaṃ yudhi / kiṃ tu rāmasya prītyarthaṃ viṣahiṣye 'ham īdṛśam // 5.051.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkā carayitavyā me punar eva bhaved iti / rātrau na hi sudṛṣṭā me durgakarmavidhānataḥ // 5.051.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyam eva draṣṭavyā mayā laṅkā niśākṣaye // 5.051.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ bandhaiś ca me bhūyaḥ pucchasyoddīpanena ca / pīḍāṃ kurvantu rakṣāṃsi na me 'sti manasaḥ śramaḥ // 5.051.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te saṃvṛtākāraṃ sattvavantaṃ mahākapim / parigṛhya yayur hṛṣṭā rākṣasāḥ kapikuñjaram // 5.051.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkhabherīninādais tair ghoṣayantaḥ svakarmabhiḥ / rākṣasāḥ krūrakarmāṇaś cārayanti sma tāṃ purīm // 5.051.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanumāṃś cārayām āsa rākṣasānāṃ mahāpurīm / athāpaśyad vimānāni vicitrāṇi mahākapiḥ // 5.051.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃvṛtān bhūmibhāgāṃś ca suvibhaktāṃś ca catvarān / rathyāś ca gṛhasaṃbādhāḥ kapiḥ śṛṅgāṭakāni ca // 5.051.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
catvareṣu catuṣkeṣu rājamārge tathaiva ca / ghoṣayanti kapiṃ sarve cārīka iti rākṣasāḥ // 5.051.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīpyamāne tatas tasya lāṅgūlāgre hanūmataḥ / rākṣasyas tā virūpākṣyaḥ śaṃsur devyās tad apriyam // 5.051.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tvayā kṛtasaṃvādaḥ sīte tāmramukhaḥ kapiḥ / lāṅgūlena pradīptena sa eṣa pariṇīyate // 5.051.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tad vacanaṃ krūram ātmāpaharaṇopamam / vaidehī śokasaṃtaptā hutāśanam upāgamat // 5.051.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maṅgalābhimukhī tasya sā tadāsīn mahākapeḥ / upatasthe viśālākṣī prayatā havyavāhanam // 5.051.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady asti patiśuśrūṣā yady asti caritaṃ tapaḥ / yadi cāsty ekapatnītvaṃ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ // 5.051.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi kaś cid anukrośas tasya mayy asti dhīmataḥ / yadi vā bhāgyaśeṣaṃ me śīto bhava hanūmataḥ // 5.051.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi māṃ vṛttasaṃpannāṃ tatsamāgamalālasām / sa vijānāti dharmātmā śīto bhava hanūmataḥ // 5.051.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi māṃ tārayaty āryaḥ sugrīvaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ / asmād duḥkhān mahābāhuḥ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ // 5.051.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tīkṣṇārcir avyagraḥ pradakṣiṇaśikho 'nalaḥ / jajvāla mṛgaśāvākṣyāḥ śaṃsann iva śivaṃ kapeḥ // 5.051.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dahyamāne ca lāṅgūle cintayām āsa vānaraḥ / pradīpto 'gnir ayaṃ kasmān na māṃ dahati sarvataḥ // 5.051.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛśyate ca mahājvālaḥ karoti ca na me rujam / śiśirasyeva saṃpāto lāṅgūlāgre pratiṣṭhitaḥ // 5.051.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā tad idaṃ vyaktaṃ yad dṛṣṭaṃ plavatā mayā / rāmaprabhāvād āścaryaṃ parvataḥ saritāṃ patau // 5.051.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tāvat samudrasya mainākasya ca dhīmatha / rāmārthaṃ saṃbhramas tādṛk kim agnir na kariṣyati // 5.051.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāyāś cānṛśaṃsyena tejasā rāghavasya ca / pituś ca mama sakhyena na māṃ dahati pāvakaḥ // 5.051.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūyaḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ / utpapātātha vegena nanāda ca mahākapiḥ // 5.051.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puradvāraṃ tataḥ śrīmāñ śailaśṛṅgam ivonnatam / vibhaktarakṣaḥsaṃbādham āsasādānilātmajaḥ // 5.051.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhūtvā śailasaṃkāśaḥ kṣaṇena punar ātmavān / hrasvatāṃ paramāṃ prāpto bandhanāny avaśātayat // 5.051.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimuktaś cābhavac chrīmān punaḥ parvatasaṃnibhaḥ / vīkṣamāṇaś ca dadṛśe parighaṃ toraṇāśritam // 5.051.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ gṛhya mahābāhuḥ kālāyasapariṣkṛtam / rakṣiṇas tān punaḥ sarvān sūdayām āsa mārutiḥ // 5.051.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tān nihatvā raṇacaṇḍavikramaḥ; samīkṣamāṇaḥ punar eva laṅkām / pradīptalāṅgūlakṛtārcimālī; prakāśatāditya ivāṃśumālī // 5.051.039	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
vīkṣamāṇas tato laṅkāṃ kapiḥ kṛtamanorathaḥ / vardhamānasamutsāhaḥ kāryaśeṣam acintayat // 5.052.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu khalv aviśiṣṭaṃ me kartavyam iha sāmpratam / yad eṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ bhūyaḥ saṃtāpajananaṃ bhavet // 5.052.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanaṃ tāvat pramathitaṃ prakṛṣṭā rākṣasā hatāḥ / balaikadeśaḥ kṣapitaḥ śeṣaṃ durgavināśanam // 5.052.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
durge vināśite karma bhavet sukhapariśramam / alpayatnena kārye 'smin mama syāt saphalaḥ śramaḥ // 5.052.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo hy ayaṃ mama lāṅgūle dīpyate havyavāhanaḥ / asya saṃtarpaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ kartum ebhir gṛhottamaiḥ // 5.052.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pradīptalāṅgūlaḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ / bhavanāgreṣu laṅkāyā vicacāra mahākapiḥ // 5.052.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mumoca hanumān agniṃ kālānalaśikhopamam // 5.052.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvasanena ca saṃyogād ativego mahābalaḥ / kālāgnir iva jajvāla prāvardhata hutāśanaḥ // 5.052.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradīptam agniṃ pavanas teṣu veśmasu cārayat // 5.052.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni kāñcanajālāni muktāmaṇimayāni ca / bhavanāny avaśīryanta ratnavanti mahānti ca // 5.052.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni bhagnavimānāni nipetur vasudhātale / bhavanānīva siddhānām ambarāt puṇyasaṃkṣaye // 5.052.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajravidrumavaidūryamuktārajatasaṃhitān / vicitrān bhavanād dhātūn syandamānān dadarśa saḥ // 5.052.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāgnis tṛpyati kāṣṭhānāṃ tṛṇānāṃ ca yathā tathā / hanūmān rākṣasendrāṇāṃ vadhe kiṃ cin na tṛpyati // 5.052.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hutāśanajvālasamāvṛtā sā; hatapravīrā parivṛttayodhā / hanūmātaḥ krodhabalābhibhūtā; babhūva śāpopahateva laṅkā // 5.052.014	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [ytjgg])
sasaṃbhramaṃ trastaviṣaṇṇarākṣasāṃ; samujjvalaj jvālahutāśanāṅkitām / dadarśa laṅkāṃ hanumān mahāmanāḥ; svayambhukopopahatām ivāvanim // 5.052.015	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa rākṣasāṃs tān subahūṃś ca hatvā; vanaṃ ca bhaṅktvā bahupādapaṃ tat / visṛjya rakṣo bhavaneṣu cāgniṃ; jagāma rāmaṃ manasā mahātmā // 5.052.016	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
laṅkāṃ samastāṃ saṃdīpya lāṅgūlāgniṃ mahākapiḥ / nirvāpayām āsa tadā samudre harisattamaḥ // 5.052.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃdīpyamānāṃ vidhvastāṃ trastarakṣo gaṇāṃ purīm / avekṣya hānumāṃl laṅkāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ // 5.053.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyābhūt sumahāṃs trāsaḥ kutsā cātmany ajāyata / laṅkāṃ pradahatā karma kiṃsvit kṛtam idaṃ mayā // 5.053.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanyās te puruṣaśreṣṭha ye buddhyā kopam utthitam / nirundhanti mahātmāno dīptam agnim ivāmbhasā // 5.053.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi dagdhā tv iyaṃ laṅkā nūnam āryāpi jānakī / dagdhā tena mayā bhartur hataṃ kāryam ajānatā // 5.053.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad artham ayam ārambhas tat kāryam avasāditam / mayā hi dahatā laṅkāṃ na sītā parirakṣitā // 5.053.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īṣatkāryam idaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtam āsīn na saṃśayaḥ / tasya krodhābhibhūtena mayā mūlakṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ // 5.053.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinaṣṭā jānakī vyaktaṃ na hy adagdhaḥ pradṛśyate / laṅkāyāḥ kaś cid uddeśaḥ sarvā bhasmīkṛtā purī // 5.053.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tad vihataṃ kāryaṃ mayā prajñāviparyayāt / ihaiva prāṇasaṃnyāso mamāpi hy atirocate // 5.053.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim agnau nipatāmy adya āhosvid vaḍavāmukhe / śarīram āho sattvānāṃ dadmi sāgaravāsinām // 5.053.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ hi jīvatā śakyo mayā draṣṭuṃ harīśvaraḥ / tau vā puruṣaśārdūlau kāryasarvasvaghātinā // 5.053.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā khalu tad evedaṃ roṣadoṣāt pradarśitam / prathitaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kapitam anavasthitam // 5.053.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhig astu rājasaṃ bhāvam anīśam anavasthitam / īśvareṇāpi yad rāgān mayā sītā na rakṣitā // 5.053.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinaṣṭāyāṃ tu sītāyāṃ tāv ubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ / tayor vināśe sugrīvaḥ sabandhur vinaśiṣyati // 5.053.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad eva vacaḥ śrutvā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ / dharmātmā sahaśatrughnaḥ kathaṃ śakṣyati jīvitum // 5.053.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākuvaṃśe dharmiṣṭhe gate nāśam asaṃśayam / bhaviṣyanti prajāḥ sarvāḥ śokasaṃtāpapīḍitāḥ // 5.053.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad ahaṃ bhāgyarahito luptadharmārthasaṃgrahaḥ / roṣadoṣaparītātmā vyaktaṃ lokavināśanaḥ // 5.053.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti cintayatas tasya nimittāny upapedire / pūram apy upalabdhāni sākṣāt punar acintayat // 5.053.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā cārusarvāṅgī rakṣitā svena tejasā / na naśiṣyati kalyāṇī nāgnir agnau pravartate // 5.053.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi dharmān manas tasya bhāryām amitatejasaḥ / svacāritrābhiguptāṃ tāṃ spraṣṭum arhati pāvakaḥ // 5.053.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nūnaṃ rāmaprabhāvena vaidehyāḥ sukṛtena ca / yan māṃ dahanakarmāyaṃ nādahad dhavyavāhanaḥ // 5.053.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trayāṇāṃ bharatādīnāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ devatā ca yā / rāmasya ca manaḥkāntā sā kathaṃ vinaśiṣyati // 5.053.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad vā dahanakarmāyaṃ sarvatra prabhur avyayaḥ / na me dahati lāṅgūlaṃ katham āryāṃ pradhakṣyati // 5.053.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapasā satyavākyena ananyatvāc ca bhartari / api sā nirdahed agniṃ na tām agniḥ pradhakṣyati // 5.053.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tathā cintayaṃs tatra devyā dharmaparigraham / śuśrāva hanumān vākyaṃ cāraṇānāṃ mahātmanām // 5.053.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho khalu kṛtaṃ karma durviṣahyaṃ hanūmatā / agniṃ visṛjatābhīkṣṇaṃ bhīmaṃ rākṣasasadmani // 5.053.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dagdheyaṃ nagarī laṅkā sāṭṭaprākāratoraṇā / jānakī na ca dagdheti vismayo 'dbhuta eva naḥ // 5.053.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nimittaiś ca dṛṣṭārthaiḥ kāraṇaiś ca mahāguṇaiḥ / ṛṣivākyaiś ca hanumān abhavat prītamānasaḥ // 5.053.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kapiḥ prāptamanorathārthas; tām akṣatāṃ rājasutāṃ viditvā / pratyakṣatas tāṃ punar eva dṛṣṭvā; pratiprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra // 5.053.028	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tatas tu śiṃśapāmūle jānakīṃ paryavasthitām / abhivādyābravīd diṣṭyā paśyāmi tvām ihākṣatām // 5.054.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ prasthitaṃ sītā vīkṣamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ / bhartṛsnehānvitaṃ vākyaṃ hanūmantam abhāṣata // 5.054.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane / paryāptaḥ paravīraghna yaśasyas te balodayaḥ // 5.054.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ / māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tasya tat sādṛśaṃ bhavet // 5.054.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ / bhavaty āhavaśūrasya tattvam evopapādaya // 5.054.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad arthopahitaṃ vākyaṃ praśritaṃ hetusaṃhitam / niśamya hanumāṃs tasyā vākyam uttaram abravīt // 5.054.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣipram eṣyati kākutstho haryṛkṣapravarair vṛtaḥ / yas te yudhi vijityārīñ śokaṃ vyapanayiṣyati // 5.054.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam āśvāsya vaidehīṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / gamanāya matiṃ kṛtvā vaidehīm abhyavādayat // 5.054.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa kapiśārdūlaḥ svāmisaṃdarśanotsukaḥ / āruroha giriśreṣṭham ariṣṭam arimardanaḥ // 5.054.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tuṅgapadmakajuṣṭābhir nīlābhir vanarājibhiḥ / sālatālāśvakarṇaiś ca vaṃśaiś ca bahubhir vṛtam // 5.054.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
latāvitānair vitataiḥ puṣpavadbhir alaṃkṛtam / nānāmṛgagaṇākīrṇaṃ dhātuniṣyandabhūṣitam // 5.054.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahuprasravaṇopetaṃ śilāsaṃcayasaṃkaṭam / maharṣiyakṣagandharvakiṃnaroragasevitam // 5.054.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
latāpādapasaṃbādhaṃ siṃhākulitakandaram / vyāghrasaṃghasamākīrṇaṃ svādumūlaphaladrumam // 5.054.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ārurohātibalaḥ parvataṃ plavagottamaḥ / rāmadarśanaśīghreṇa praharṣeṇābhicoditaḥ // 5.054.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena pādatalākrāntā ramyeṣu girisānuṣu / saghoṣāḥ samaśīryanta śilāś cūrṇīkṛtās tataḥ // 5.054.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tam āruhya śailendraṃ vyavardhata mahākapiḥ / dakṣiṇād uttaraṃ pāraṃ prārthayaṃl lavaṇāmbhasaḥ // 5.054.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhiruhya tato vīraḥ parvataṃ pavanātmajaḥ / dadarśa sāgaraṃ bhīmaṃ mīnoraganiṣevitam // 5.054.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa māruta ivākāśaṃ mārutasyātmasaṃbhavaḥ / prapede hariśārdūlo dakṣiṇād uttarāṃ diśam // 5.054.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tadā pīḍitas tena kapinā parvatottamaḥ / rarāsa saha tair bhūtaiḥ prāviśad vasudhātalam // 5.054.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kampamānaiś ca śikharaiḥ patadbhir api ca drumaiḥ // 5.054.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyoruvegān mathitāḥ pādapāḥ puṣpaśālinaḥ / nipetur bhūtale rugṇāḥ śakrāyudhahatā iva // 5.054.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kandarodarasaṃsthānāṃ pīḍitānāṃ mahaujasām / siṃhānāṃ ninado bhīmo nabho bhindan sa śuśruve // 5.054.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
srastavyāviddhavasanā vyākulīkṛtabhūṣaṇā / vidyādharyaḥ samutpetuḥ sahasā dharaṇīdharāt // 5.054.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atipramāṇā balino dīptajihvā mahāviṣāḥ / nipīḍitaśirogrīvā vyaveṣṭanta mahāhayaḥ // 5.054.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃnaroragagandharvayakṣavidyādharās tathā / pīḍitaṃ taṃ nagavaraṃ tyaktvā gaganam āsthitāḥ // 5.054.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca bhūmidharaḥ śrīmān balinā tena pīḍitaḥ / savṛkṣaśikharodagrāḥ praviveśa rasātalam // 5.054.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśayojanavistāras triṃśadyojanam ucchritaḥ / dharaṇyāṃ samatāṃ yātaḥ sa babhūva dharādharaḥ // 5.054.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sacandrakumudaṃ ramyaṃ sārkakāraṇḍavaṃ śubham / tiṣyaśravaṇakadambam abhraśaivalaśādvalam // 5.055.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
punarvasu mahāmīnaṃ lohitāṅgamahāgraham / airāvatamahādvīpaṃ svātīhaṃsaviloḍitam // 5.055.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vātasaṃghātajātormiṃ candrāṃśuśiśirāmbumat / bhujaṃgayakṣagandharvaprabuddhakamalotpalam // 5.055.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
grasamāna ivākāśaṃ tārādhipam ivālikhan / harann iva sanakṣatraṃ gaganaṃ sārkamaṇḍalam // 5.055.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārutasyālayaṃ śrīmān kapir vyomacaro mahān / hanūmān meghajālāni vikarṣann iva gacchati // 5.055.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇḍurāruṇavarṇāni nīlamāñjiṣṭhakāni ca / haritāruṇavarṇāni mahābhrāṇi cakāśire // 5.055.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśann abhrajālāni niṣkramaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ / pracchannaś ca prakāśaś ca candramā iva lakṣyate // 5.055.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nadan nādena mahatā meghasvanamahāsvanaḥ / ājagāma mahātejāḥ punar madhyena sāgaram // 5.055.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parvatendraṃ sunābhaṃ ca samupaspṛśya vīryavān / jyāmukta iva nārāco mahāvego 'bhyupāgataḥ // 5.055.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kiṃ cid anusaṃprāptaḥ samālokya mahāgirim / mahendrameghasaṃkāśaṃ nanāda haripuṃgavaḥ // 5.055.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśamya nadato nādaṃ vānarās te samantataḥ / babhūvur utsukāḥ sarve suhṛddarśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 5.055.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbavān sa hariśreṣṭhaḥ prītisaṃhṛṣṭamānasaḥ / upāmantrya harīn sarvān idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 5.055.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā kṛtakāryo 'sau hanūmān nātra saṃśayaḥ / na hy asyākṛtakāryasya nāda evaṃvidho bhavet // 5.055.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyā bāhūruvegaṃ ca ninādaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ / niśamya harayo hṛṣṭāḥ samutpetus tatas tataḥ // 5.055.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te nagāgrān nagāgrāṇi śikharāc chikharāṇi ca / prahṛṣṭāḥ samapadyanta hanūmantaṃ didṛkṣavaḥ // 5.055.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te prītāḥ pādapāgreṣu gṛhya śākhāḥ supuṣpitāḥ / vāsāṃsīva prakāśāni samāvidhyanta vānarāḥ // 5.055.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam abhraghanasaṃkāśam āpatantaṃ mahākapim / dṛṣṭvā te vānarāḥ sarve tasthuḥ prāñjalayas tadā // 5.055.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu vegavāṃs tasya girer girinibhaḥ kapiḥ / nipapāta mahendrasya śikhare pādapākule // 5.055.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te prītamanasaḥ sarve vānarapuṃgavāḥ / hanūmantaṃ mahātmānaṃ parivāryopatasthire // 5.055.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parivārya ca te sarve parāṃ prītim upāgatāḥ / prahṛṣṭavadanāḥ sarve tam arogam upāgatam // 5.055.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāyanāni cādāya mūlāni ca phalāni ca / pratyarcayan hariśreṣṭhaṃ harayo mārutātmajam // 5.055.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinedur muditāḥ ke cic cakruḥ kila kilāṃ tathā / hṛṣṭāḥ pādapaśākhāś ca āninyur vānararṣabhāḥ // 5.055.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmāṃs tu gurūn vṛddhāñ jāmbavat pramukhāṃs tadā / kumāram aṅgadaṃ caiva so 'vandata mahākapiḥ // 5.055.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tābhyāṃ pūjitaḥ pūjyaḥ kapibhiś ca prasāditaḥ / dṛṣṭā devīti vikrāntaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa nyavedayat // 5.055.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣasāda ca hastena gṛhītvā vālinaḥ sutam / ramaṇīye vanoddeśe mahendrasya gires tadā // 5.055.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmān abravīd dhṛṣṭas tadā tān vānararṣabhān / aśokavanikāsaṃsthā dṛṣṭā sā janakātmajā // 5.055.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣyamāṇā sughorābhī rākṣasībhir aninditā / ekaveṇīdharā bālā rāmadarśanalālasā // 5.055.027.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upavāsapariśrāntā malinā jaṭilā kṛśā // 5.055.027.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dṛṣṭeti vacanaṃ mahārtham amṛtopamam / niśamya māruteḥ sarve muditā vānarā bhavan // 5.055.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣveḍanty anye nadanty anye garjanty anye mahābalāḥ / cakruḥ kila kilām anye pratigarjanti cāpare // 5.055.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cid ucchritalāṅgūlāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ kapikuñjarāḥ / añcitāyatadīrghāṇi lāṅgūlāni pravivyadhuḥ // 5.055.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apare tu hanūmantaṃ vānarā vāraṇopamam / āplutya giriśṛṅgebhyaḥ saṃspṛśanti sma harṣitāḥ // 5.055.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uktavākyaṃ hanūmantam aṅgadas tu tadābravīt / sarveṣāṃ harivīrāṇāṃ madhye vācam anuttamām // 5.055.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sattve vīrye na te kaś cit samo vānaravidyate / yad avaplutya vistīrṇaṃ sāgaraṃ punar āgataḥ // 5.055.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā dṛṣṭā tvayā devī rāmapatnī yaśasvinī / diṣṭyā tyakṣyati kākutsthaḥ śokaṃ sītā viyogajam // 5.055.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'ṅgadaṃ hanūmantaṃ jāmbavantaṃ ca vānarāḥ / parivārya pramuditā bhejire vipulāḥ śilāḥ // 5.055.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrotukāmāḥ samudrasya laṅghanaṃ vānarottamāḥ / darśanaṃ cāpi laṅkāyāḥ sītāyā rāvaṇasya ca // 5.055.036.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve hanūmad vadanonmukhāḥ // 5.055.036.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasthau tatrāṅgadaḥ śrīmān vānarair bahubhir vṛtaḥ / upāsyamāno vibudhair divi devapatir yathā // 5.055.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmatā kīrtimatā yaśasvinā; tathāṅgadenāṅgadabaddhabāhunā / mudā tadādhyāsitam unnataṃ mahan; mahīdharāgraṃ jvalitaṃ śriyābhavat // 5.055.038	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas tasya gireḥ śṛṅge mahendrasya mahābalāḥ / hanumatpramukhāḥ prītiṃ harayo jagmur uttamām // 5.056.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tataḥ pratisaṃhṛṣṭaḥ prītimantaṃ mahākapim / jāmbavān kāryavṛttāntam apṛcchad anilātmajam // 5.056.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā devī kathaṃ vā tatra vartate / tasyāṃ vā sa kathaṃ vṛttaḥ krūrakarmā daśānanaḥ // 5.056.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tattvataḥ sarvam etan naḥ prabrūhi tvaṃ mahākape / śrutārthāś cintayiṣyāmo bhūyaḥ kāryaviniścayam // 5.056.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaś cārthas tatra vaktavyo gatair asmābhir ātmavān / rakṣitavyaṃ ca yat tatra tad bhavān vyākarotu naḥ // 5.056.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa niyuktas tatas tena saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ / namasyañ śirasā devyai sītāyai pratyabhāṣata // 5.056.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyakṣam eva bhavatāṃ mahendrāgrāt kham āplutaḥ / udadher dakṣiṇaṃ pāraṃ kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ samāhitaḥ // 5.056.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gacchataś ca hi me ghoraṃ vighnarūpam ivābhavat / kāñcanaṃ śikharaṃ divyaṃ paśyāmi sumanoharam // 5.056.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthitaṃ panthānam āvṛtya mene vighnaṃ ca taṃ nagam // 5.056.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upasaṃgamya taṃ divyaṃ kāñcanaṃ nagasattamam / kṛtā me manasā buddhir bhettavyo 'yaṃ mayeti ca // 5.056.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahataṃ ca mayā tasya lāṅgūlena mahāgireḥ / śikharaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ vyaśīryata sahasradhā // 5.056.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyavasāyaṃ ca me buddhvā sa hovāca mahāgiriḥ / putreti madhurāṃ bāṇīṃ manaḥprahlādayann iva // 5.056.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitṛvyaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sakhāyaṃ mātariśvanaḥ / mainākam iti vikhyātaṃ nivasantaṃ mahodadhau // 5.056.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pakṣvavantaḥ purā putra babhūvuḥ parvatottamāḥ / chandataḥ pṛthivīṃ cerur bādhamānāḥ samantataḥ // 5.056.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā nagānāṃ caritaṃ mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ / ciccheda bhagavān pakṣān vajreṇaiṣāṃ sahasraśaḥ // 5.056.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tu mokṣitas tasmāt tava pitrā mahātmanā / mārutena tadā vatsa prakṣipto 'smi mahārṇave // 5.056.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya ca mayā sāhye vartitavyam ariṃdama / rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho mahendrasamavikramaḥ // 5.056.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā mayā tasya mainākasya mahātmanaḥ / kāryam āvedya tu girer uddhataṃ ca mano mama // 5.056.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena cāham anujñāto mainākena mahātmanā / uttamaṃ javam āsthāya śeṣam adhvānam āsthitaḥ // 5.056.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ suciraṃ kālaṃ vegenābhyagamaṃ pathi / tataḥ paśyāmy ahaṃ devīṃ surasāṃ nāgamātaram // 5.056.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samudramadhye sā devī vacanaṃ mām abhāṣata / mama bhakṣyaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam amārair harisattamam // 5.056.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi vihitas tvaṃ cirasya me // 5.056.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ surasayā prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ / vivarṇavadano bhūtvā vākyaṃ cedam udīrayam // 5.056.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ // 5.056.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena durātmanā / tasyāḥ sakāśaṃ dūto 'haṃ gamiṣye rāmaśāsanāt // 5.056.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kartum arhasi rāmasya sāhyaṃ viṣayavāsini // 5.056.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam / āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇoti me // 5.056.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā mayā sā tu surasā kāmarūpiṇī / abravīn nātivarteta kaś cid eṣa varo mama // 5.056.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ surasayā daśayojanam āyataḥ / tato 'rdhaguṇavistāro babhūvāhaṃ kṣaṇena tu // 5.056.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
matpramāṇānurūpaṃ ca vyāditaṃ tanmukhaṃ tayā / tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ hrasvaṃ hy akaravaṃ vapuḥ // 5.056.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin muhūrte ca punar babhūvāṅguṣṭhasaṃmitaḥ / abhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ nirgato 'haṃ tataḥ kṣaṇāt // 5.056.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa māṃ punaḥ / arthasiddhyai hariśreṣṭha gaccha saumya yathāsukham // 5.056.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samānaya ca vaidehīṃ rāghaveṇa mahātmanā / sukhī bhava mahābāho prītāsmi tava vānara // 5.056.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ sādhu sādhvīti sarvabhūtaiḥ praśaṃsitaḥ / tato 'ntarikṣaṃ vipulaṃ pluto 'haṃ garuḍo yathā // 5.056.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
chāyā me nigṛhītā ca na ca paśyāmi kiṃ cana / so 'haṃ vigatavegas tu diśo daśa vilokayan // 5.056.034.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kiṃ cit tatra paśyāmi yena me 'pahṛtā gatiḥ // 5.056.034.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato me buddhir utpannā kiṃ nāma gamane mama / īdṛśo vighna utpanno rūpaṃ yatra na dṛśyate // 5.056.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adho bhāgena me dṛṣṭiḥ śocatā pātitā mayā / tato 'drākṣam ahaṃ bhīmāṃ rākṣasīṃ salile śayām // 5.056.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahasya ca mahānādam ukto 'haṃ bhīmayā tayā / avasthitam asaṃbhrāntam idaṃ vākyam aśobhanam // 5.056.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kvāsi gantā mahākāya kṣudhitāyā mamepsitaḥ / bhakṣaḥ prīṇaya me dehaṃ ciram āhāravarjitam // 5.056.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāḍham ity eva tāṃ vāṇīṃ pratyagṛhṇām ahaṃ tataḥ / āsya pramāṇād adhikaṃ tasyāḥ kāyam apūrayam // 5.056.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāś cāsyaṃ mahad bhīmaṃ vardhate mama bhakṣaṇe / na ca māṃ sā tu bubudhe mama vā vikṛtaṃ kṛtam // 5.056.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ vipulaṃ rūpaṃ saṃkṣipya nimiṣāntarāt / tasyā hṛdayam ādāya prapatāmi nabhastalam // 5.056.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā visṛṣṭabhujā bhīmā papāta lavaṇāmbhasi / mayā parvatasaṃkāśā nikṛttahṛdayā satī // 5.056.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṇomi khagatānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ cāraṇaiḥ saha / rākṣasī siṃhikā bhīmā kṣipraṃ hanumatā hṛtā // 5.056.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ hatvā punar evāhaṃ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ smaran / gatvā ca mahad adhvānaṃ paśyāmi nagamaṇḍitam // 5.056.044.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
