dakṣiṇaṃ tīram udadher laṅkā yatra ca sā purī // 5.056.044.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
astaṃ dinakare yāte rakṣasāṃ nilayaṃ purīm / praviṣṭo 'ham avijñāto rakṣobhir bhīmavikramaiḥ // 5.056.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāhaṃ sarvarātraṃ tu vicinvañ janakātmajām / rāvaṇāntaḥpuragato na cāpaśyaṃ sumadhyamām // 5.056.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sītām apaśyaṃs tu rāvaṇasya niveśane / śokasāgaram āsādya na pāram upalakṣaye // 5.056.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śocatā ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ prākāreṇa samāvṛtam / kāñcanena vikṛṣṭena gṛhopavanam uttamam // 5.056.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa prākāram avaplutya paśyāmi bahupādapam // 5.056.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśokavanikāmadhye śiṃśapāpādapo mahān / tam āruhya ca paśyāmi kāñcanaṃ kadalī vanam // 5.056.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adūrāc chiṃśapāvṛkṣāt paśyāmi vanavarṇinīm / śyāmāṃ kamalapatrākṣīm upavāsakṛśānanām // 5.056.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasībhir virūpābhiḥ krūrābhir abhisaṃvṛtām / māṃsaśoṇitabhakṣyābhir vyāghrībhir hariṇīṃ yathā // 5.056.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśīṃ nārīṃ rāmapatnīm aninditām / tatraiva śiṃśapāvṛkṣe paśyann aham avasthitaḥ // 5.056.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato halahalāśabdaṃ kāñcīnūpuramiśritam / śṛṇomy adhikagambhīraṃ rāvaṇasya niveśane // 5.056.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ paramodvignaḥ svarūpaṃ pratyasaṃharam / ahaṃ ca śiṃśapāvṛkṣe pakṣīva gahane sthitaḥ // 5.056.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāvaṇadārāś ca rāvaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ / taṃ deśaṃ samanuprāptā yatra sītābhavat sthitā // 5.056.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvātha varārohā sītā rakṣogaṇeśvaram / saṃkucyorū stanau pīnau bāhubhyāṃ parirabhya ca // 5.056.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām uvāca daśagrīvaḥ sītāṃ paramaduḥkhitām / avākśirāḥ prapatito bahu manyasva mām iti // 5.056.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi cet tvaṃ tu māṃ darpān nābhinandasi garvite / dvimāsānantaraṃ sīte pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ tava // 5.056.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā vacas tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ / uvāca paramakruddhā sītā vacanam uttamam // 5.056.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasādhama rāmasya bhāryām amitatejasaḥ / ikṣvākukulanāthasya snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca // 5.056.061.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avācyaṃ vadato jihvā kathaṃ na patitā tava // 5.056.061.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃsvid vīryaṃ tavānārya yo māṃ bhartur asaṃnidhau / apahṛtyāgataḥ pāpa tenādṛṣṭo mahātmanā // 5.056.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tvaṃ rāmasya sadṛśo dāsye 'py asyā na yujyase / yajñīyaḥ satyavāk caiva raṇaślāghī ca rāghavaḥ // 5.056.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānakyā paruṣaṃ vākyam evam ukto daśānanaḥ / jajvāla sahasā kopāc citāstha iva pāvakaḥ // 5.056.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivṛtya nayane krūre muṣṭim udyamya dakṣiṇam / maithilīṃ hantum ārabdhaḥ strībhir hāhākṛtaṃ tadā // 5.056.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
strīṇāṃ madhyāt samutpatya tasya bhāryā durātmanaḥ / varā mandodarī nāma tayā sa pratiṣedhitaḥ // 5.056.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uktaś ca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tayā sa madanārditaḥ / sītayā tava kiṃ kāryaṃ mahendrasamavikrama // 5.056.067.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā saha ramasvādya madviśiṣṭā na jānakī // 5.056.067.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devagandharvakanyābhir yakṣakanyābhir eva ca / sārdhaṃ prabho ramasveha sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi // 5.056.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tābhiḥ sametābhir nārībhiḥ sa mahābalaḥ / utthāpya sahasā nīto bhavanaṃ svaṃ niśācaraḥ // 5.056.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāte tasmin daśagrīve rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ / sītāṃ nirbhartsayām āsur vākyaiḥ krūraiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ // 5.056.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tṛṇavad bhāṣitaṃ tāsāṃ gaṇayām āsa jānakī / tarjitaṃ ca tadā tāsāṃ sītāṃ prāpya nirarthakam // 5.056.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛthāgarjitaniśceṣṭā rākṣasyaḥ piśitāśanāḥ / rāvaṇāya śaśaṃsus tāḥ sītāvyavasitaṃ mahat // 5.056.072	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tāḥ sahitāḥ sarvā vihatāśā nirudyamāḥ / parikṣipya samantāt tāṃ nidrāvaśam upāgatāḥ // 5.056.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsu caiva prasuptāsu sītā bhartṛhite ratā / vilapya karuṇaṃ dīnā praśuśoca suduḥkhitā // 5.056.074	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ cāhaṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā sītāyā dāruṇāṃ daśām / cintayām āsa viśrānto na ca me nirvṛtaṃ manaḥ // 5.056.075	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃbhāṣaṇārthe ca mayā jānakyāś cintito vidhiḥ / ikṣvākukulavaṃśas tu tato mama puraskṛtaḥ // 5.056.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu gaditāṃ vācaṃ rājarṣigaṇapūjitām / pratyabhāṣata māṃ devī bāṣpaiḥ pihitalocanā // 5.056.077	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kas tvaṃ kena kathaṃ ceha prāpto vānarapuṃgava / kā ca rāmeṇa te prītis tan me śaṃsitum arhasi // 5.056.078	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā aham apy abruvaṃ vacaḥ / devi rāmasya bhartus te sahāyo bhīmavikramaḥ // 5.056.079.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvo nāma vikrānto vānarendo mahābalaḥ // 5.056.079.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya māṃ viddhi bhṛtyaṃ tvaṃ hanūmantam ihāgatam / bhartrāhaṃ prahitas tubhyaṃ rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā // 5.056.080	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ ca puruṣavyāghraḥ śrīmān dāśarathiḥ svayam / aṅgulīyam abhijñānam adāt tubhyaṃ yaśasvini // 5.056.081	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad icchāmi tvayājñaptaṃ devi kiṃ karavāṇy aham / rāmalakṣmaṇayoḥ pārśvaṃ nayāmi tvāṃ kim uttaram // 5.056.082	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā viditvā ca sītā janakanandinī / āha rāvaṇam utsādya rāghavo māṃ nayatv iti // 5.056.083	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praṇamya śirasā devīm aham āryām aninditām / rāghavasya manohlādam abhijñānam ayāciṣam // 5.056.084	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā varārohā maṇipravaram uttamam / prāyacchat paramodvignā vācā māṃ saṃdideśa ha // 5.056.085	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tasyai praṇamyāhaṃ rājaputryai samāhitaḥ / pradakṣiṇaṃ parikrāmam ihābhyudgatamānasaḥ // 5.056.086	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttaraṃ punar evāha niścitya manasā tadā / hanūman mama vṛttāntaṃ vaktum arhasi rāghave // 5.056.087	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā śrutvaiva nacirāt tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau / sugrīvasahitau vīrāv upeyātāṃ tathā kuru // 5.056.088	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady anyathā bhaved etad dvau māsau jīvitaṃ mama / na māṃ drakṣyati kākutstho mriye sāham anāthavat // 5.056.089	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā karuṇaṃ vākyaṃ krodho mām abhyavartata / uttaraṃ ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaśeṣam anantaram // 5.056.090	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'vardhata me kāyas tadā parvatasaṃnibhaḥ / yuddhakāṅkṣī vanaṃ tac ca vināśayitum ārabhe // 5.056.091	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad bhagnaṃ vanaṣaṇḍaṃ tu bhrāntatrastamṛgadvijam / pratibuddhā nirīkṣante rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ // 5.056.092	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vane tasmin samāgamya tatas tataḥ / tāḥ samabhyāgatāḥ kṣipraṃ rāvaṇāyācacakṣire // 5.056.093	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājan vanam idaṃ durgaṃ tava bhagnaṃ durātmanā / vānareṇa hy avijñāya tava vīryaṃ mahābala // 5.056.094	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
durbuddhes tasya rājendra tava vipriyakāriṇaḥ / vadham ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ yathāsau vilayaṃ vrajet // 5.056.095	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā rākṣasendreṇa visṛṣṭā bhṛśadurjayāḥ / rākṣasāḥ kiṃkarā nāma rāvaṇasya mano'nugāḥ // 5.056.096	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām aśītisāhasraṃ śūlamudgarapāṇinām / mayā tasmin vanoddeśe parigheṇa niṣūditam // 5.056.097	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tu hataśeṣā ye te gatā laghuvikramāḥ / nihataṃ ca mayā sainyaṃ rāvaṇāyācacakṣire // 5.056.098	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato me buddhir utpannā caityaprāsādam ākramam // 5.056.099	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrasthān rākṣasān hatvā śataṃ stambhena vai punaḥ / lalāma bhūto laṅkāyā mayā vidhvaṃsito ruṣā // 5.056.100	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahastasya sutaṃ jambumālinam ādiśat // 5.056.101	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ahaṃ balasaṃpannaṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇakovidam / parigheṇātighoreṇa sūdayāmi sahānugam // 5.056.102	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā rākṣasendras tu mantriputrān mahābalān / padātibalasaṃpannān preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ // 5.056.103.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parigheṇaiva tān sarvān nayāmi yamasādanam // 5.056.103.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantriputrān hatāñ śrutvā samare laghuvikramān / pañcasenāgragāñ śūrān preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ // 5.056.104.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān ahaṃ saha sainyān vai sarvān evābhyasūdayam // 5.056.104.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ punar daśagrīvaḥ putram akṣaṃ mahābalam / bahubhī rākasaiḥ sārdhaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge // 5.056.105	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu mandodarī putraṃ kumāraṃ raṇapaṇḍitam / sahasā khaṃ samutkrāntaṃ pādayoś ca gṛhītavān // 5.056.106.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
carmāsinaṃ śataguṇaṃ bhrāmayitvā vyapeṣayam // 5.056.106.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam akṣam āgataṃ bhagnaṃ niśamya sa daśānanaḥ / tata indrajitaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ sutam // 5.056.107.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyādideśa susaṃkruddho balinaṃ yuddhadurmadam // 5.056.107.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāpy ahaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ ca rākṣasapuṃgavam / naṣṭaujasaṃ raṇe kṛtvā paraṃ harṣam upāgamam // 5.056.108	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahatā hi mahābāhuḥ pratyayena mahābalaḥ / preṣito rāvaṇenaiṣa saha vīrair madotkaṭaiḥ // 5.056.109	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmeṇāstreṇa sa tu māṃ prabadhnāc cātivegataḥ / rajjūbhir abhibadhnanti tato māṃ tatra rākṣasāḥ // 5.056.110	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya samīpaṃ ca gṛhītvā mām upānayan / dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣitaś cāhaṃ rāvaṇena durātmanā // 5.056.111	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣṭaś ca laṅkāgamanaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca tad vadham / tat sarvaṃ ca mayā tatra sītārtham iti jalpitam // 5.056.112	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asyāhaṃ darśanākāṅkṣī prāptas tvadbhavanaṃ vibho / mārutasyaurasaḥ putro vānaro hanumān aham // 5.056.113	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmadūtaṃ ca māṃ viddhi sugrīvasacivaṃ kapim / so 'haṃ dautyena rāmasya tvatsamīpam ihāgataḥ // 5.056.114	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṇu cāpi samādeśaṃ yad ahaṃ prabravīmi te / rākṣaseśa harīśas tvāṃ vākyam āha samāhitam // 5.056.115.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmārthakāmasahitaṃ hitaṃ pathyam ivāśanam // 5.056.115.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasato ṛṣyamūke me parvate vipuladrume / rāghavo raṇavikrānto mitratvaṃ samupāgataḥ // 5.056.116	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena me kathitaṃ rājan bhāryā me rakṣasā hṛtā / tatra sāhāyyahetor me samayaṃ kartum arhasi // 5.056.117	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vālinā hṛtarājyena sugrīveṇa saha prabhuḥ / cakre 'gnisākṣikaṃ sakyaṃ rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // 5.056.118	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena vālinam utsādya śareṇaikena saṃyuge / vānarāṇāṃ mahārājaḥ kṛtaḥ saṃplavatāṃ prabhuḥ // 5.056.119	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya sāhāyyam asmābhiḥ kāryaṃ sarvātmanā tv iha / tena prasthāpitas tubhyaṃ samīpam iha dharmataḥ // 5.056.120	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣipram ānīyatāṃ sītā dīyatāṃ rāghavasya ca / yāvan na harayo vīrā vidhamanti balaṃ tava // 5.056.121	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṇāṃ prabhavo hi na kena viditaḥ purā / devatānāṃ sakāśaṃ ca ye gacchanti nimantritāḥ // 5.056.122	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti vānararājas tvām āhety abhihito mayā / mām aikṣata tato ruṣṭaś cakṣuṣā pradahann iva // 5.056.123	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena vadhyo 'ham ājñapto rakṣasā raudrakarmaṇā // 5.056.124	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vibhīṣaṇo nāma tasya bhrātā mahāmatiḥ / tena rākṣasarājo 'sau yācito mama kāraṇāt // 5.056.125	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūtavadhyā na dṛṣṭā hi rājaśāstreṣu rākṣasa / dūtena veditavyaṃ ca yathārthaṃ hitavādinā // 5.056.126	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumahaty aparādhe 'pi dūtasyātulavikramaḥ / virūpakaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na vadho 'stīha śāstrataḥ // 5.056.127	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇenaivam ukto rāvaṇaḥ saṃdideśa tān / rākṣasān etad evādya lāṅgūlaṃ dahyatām iti // 5.056.128	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā mama pucchaṃ samantataḥ / veṣṭitaṃ śaṇavalkaiś ca paṭaiḥ kārpāsakais tathā // 5.056.129	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasāḥ siddhasaṃnāhās tatas te caṇḍavikramāḥ / tad ādīpyanta me pucchaṃ hanantaḥ kāṣṭhamuṣṭibhiḥ // 5.056.130	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
baddhasya bahubhiḥ pāśair yantritasya ca rākṣasaiḥ / na me pīḍā bhavet kā cid didṛkṣor nagarīṃ divā // 5.056.131	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrā baddhaṃ mām agnisaṃvṛtam / aghoṣayan rājamārge nagaradvāram āgatāḥ // 5.056.132	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'haṃ sumahad rūpaṃ saṃkṣipya punar ātmanaḥ / vimocayitvā taṃ bandhaṃ prakṛtiṣṭhaḥ sthitaḥ punaḥ // 5.056.133	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyasaṃ parighaṃ gṛhya tāni rakṣāṃsy asūdayam / tatas tan nagaradvāraṃ vegenāplutavān aham // 5.056.134	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pucchena ca pradīptena tāṃ purīṃ sāṭṭagopurām / dahāmy aham asaṃbhrānto yugāntāgnir iva prajāḥ // 5.056.135	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dagdhvā laṅkāṃ punaś caiva śaṅkā mām abhyavartata / dahatā ca mayā laṅkāṃ daghdā sītā na saṃśayaḥ // 5.056.136	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāhaṃ vācam aśrauṣaṃ cāraṇānāṃ śubhākṣarām / jānakī na ca dagdheti vismayodantabhāṣiṇām // 5.056.137	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato me buddhir utpannā śrutvā tām adbhutāṃ giram / punar dṛṣṭā ca vaidehī visṛṣṭaś ca tayā punaḥ // 5.056.138	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya prabhāvena bhavatāṃ caiva tejasā / sugrīvasya ca kāryārthaṃ mayā sarvam anuṣṭhitam // 5.056.139	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat sarvaṃ mayā tatra yathāvad upapāditam / atra yan na kṛtaṃ śeṣaṃ tat sarvaṃ kriyatām iti // 5.056.140	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad ākhyānaṃ tat sarvaṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / bhūyaḥ samupacakrāma vacanaṃ vaktum uttaram // 5.057.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saphalo rāghavodyogaḥ sugrīvasya ca saṃbhramaḥ / śīlam āsādya sītāyā mama ca plavanaṃ mahat // 5.057.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āryāyāḥ sadṛśaṃ śīlaṃ sītāyāḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ / tapasā dhārayel lokān kruddhā vā nirdahed api // 5.057.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathātipravṛddho 'sau rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / yasya tāṃ spṛśato gātraṃ tapasā na vināśitam // 5.057.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tad agniśikhā kuryāt saṃspṛṣṭā pāṇinā satī / janakasyātmajā kuryād utkrodhakaluṣīkṛtā // 5.057.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśokavanikāmadhye rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ / adhastāc chiṃśapāvṛkṣe sādhvī karuṇam āsthitā // 5.057.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasībhiḥ parivṛtā śokasaṃtāpakarśitā / meghalekhāparivṛtā candralekheva niṣprabhā // 5.057.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acintayantī vaidehī rāvaṇaṃ baladarpitam / pativratā ca suśroṇī avaṣṭabdhā ca jānakī // 5.057.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anuraktā hi vaidehī rāmaṃ sarvātmanā śubhā / ananyacittā rāme ca paulomīva puraṃdare // 5.057.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad ekavāsaḥsaṃvītā rajodhvastā tathaiva ca / śokasaṃtāpadīnāṅgī sītā bhartṛhite ratā // 5.057.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā mayā rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ / rākṣasībhir virūpābhir dṛṣṭā hi pramadā vane // 5.057.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekaveṇīdharā dīnā bhartṛcintāparāyaṇā / adhaḥśayyā vivarṇāṅgī padminīva himāgame // 5.057.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇād vinivṛttārthā martavyakṛtaniścayā / kathaṃ cin mṛgaśāvākṣī viśvāsam upapāditā // 5.057.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃbhāṣitā caiva sarvam arthaṃ ca darśitā / rāmasugrīvasakhyaṃ ca śrutvā prītim upāgatā // 5.057.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niyataḥ samudācāro bhaktir bhartari cottamā // 5.057.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yan na hanti daśagrīvaṃ sa mahātmā daśānanaḥ / nimittamātraṃ rāmas tu vadhe tasya bhaviṣyati // 5.057.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam āste mahābhāgā sītā śokaparāyaṇā / yad atra pratikartavyaṃ tat sarvam upapādyatām // 5.057.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vālisūnur abhāṣata / jāmbavatpramukhān sarvān anujñāpya mahākapīn // 5.058.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asminn evaṃgate kārye bhavatāṃ ca nivedite / nyāyyaṃ sma saha vaidehyā draṣṭuṃ tau pārthivātmajau // 5.058.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham eko 'pi paryāptaḥ sarākṣasagaṇāṃ purīm / tāṃ laṅkāṃ tarasā hantuṃ rāvaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // 5.058.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ punaḥ sahito vīrair balavadbhiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ / kṛtāstraiḥ plavagaiḥ śaktair bhavadbhir vijayaiṣibhiḥ // 5.058.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tu rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe sasainyaṃ sapuraḥsaram / saputraṃ vidhamiṣyāmi sahodarayutaṃ yudhi // 5.058.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmam aindraṃ ca raudraṃ ca vāyavyaṃ vāruṇaṃ tathā / yadi śakrajito 'strāṇi durnirīkṣyāṇi saṃyuge // 5.058.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāny ahaṃ vidhamiṣyāmi nihaniṣyāmi rākṣasān // 5.058.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavatām abhyanujñāto vikramo me ruṇaddhi tam // 5.058.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayātulā visṛṣṭā hi śailavṛṣṭir nirantarā / devān api raṇe hanyāt kiṃ punas tān niśācarān // 5.058.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgaro 'py atiyād velāṃ mandaraḥ pracaled api / na jāmbavantaṃ samare kampayed arivāhinī // 5.058.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvarākṣasasaṃghānāṃ rākṣasā ye ca pūrvakāḥ / alam eko vināśāya vīro vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ // 5.058.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
panasasyoruvegena nīlasya ca mahātmanaḥ / mandaro 'py avaśīryeta kiṃ punar yudhi rākṣasāḥ // 5.058.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadevāsurayuddheṣu gandharvoragapakṣiṣu / maindasya pratiyoddhāraṃ śaṃsata dvividasya vā // 5.058.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśviputrau mahāvegāv etau plavagasattamau / pitāmahavarotsekāt paramaṃ darpam āsthitau // 5.058.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśvinor mānanārthaṃ hi sarvalokapitāmahaḥ / sarvāvadhyatvam atulam anayor dattavān purā // 5.058.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varotsekena mattau ca pramathya mahatīṃ camūm / surāṇām amṛtaṃ vīrau pītavantau plavaṃgamau // 5.058.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāv eva hi saṃkruddhau savājirathakuñjarām / laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktau sarve tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ // 5.058.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayuktaṃ tu vinā devīṃ dṛṣṭabadbhiḥ plavaṃgamāḥ / samīpaṃ gantum asmābhī rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ // 5.058.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭā devī na cānītā iti tatra nivedanam / ayuktam iva paśyāmi bhavadbhiḥ khyātavikramaiḥ // 5.058.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi vaḥ plavate kaś cin nāpi kaś cit parākrame / tulyaḥ sāmaradaityeṣu lokeṣu harisattamāḥ // 5.058.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣv evaṃ hatavīreṣu rākṣaseṣu hanūmatā / kim anyad atra kartavyaṃ gṛhītvā yāma jānakīm // 5.058.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpaṃ jāmbavān harisattamaḥ / uvāca paramaprīto vākyam arthavad arthavit // 5.058.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tāvad eṣā matir akṣamā no; yathā bhavān paśyati rājaputra / yathā tu rāmasya matir niviṣṭā; tathā bhavān paśyatu kāryasiddhim // 5.058.022	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tato jāmbavato vākyam agṛhṇanta vanaukasaḥ / aṅgadapramukhā vīrā hanūmāṃś ca mahākapiḥ // 5.059.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prītimantas tataḥ sarve vāyuputrapuraḥsarāḥ / mahendrāgraṃ parityajya pupluvuḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ // 5.059.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
merumandarasaṃkāśā mattā iva mahāgajāḥ / chādayanta ivākāśaṃ mahākāyā mahābalāḥ // 5.059.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sabhājyamānaṃ bhūtais tam ātmavantaṃ mahābalam / hanūmantaṃ mahāvegaṃ vahanta iva dṛṣṭibhiḥ // 5.059.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghave cārthanirvṛttiṃ bhartuś ca paramaṃ yaśaḥ / samādhāya samṛddhārthāḥ karmasiddhibhir unnatāḥ // 5.059.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyākhyānonmukhāḥ sarve sarve yuddhābhinandinaḥ / sarve rāmapratīkāre niścitārthā manasvinaḥ // 5.059.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plavamānāḥ kham āplutya tatas te kānanaukṣakaḥ / nandanopamam āsedur vanaṃ drumalatāyutam // 5.059.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tan madhuvanaṃ nāma sugrīvasyābhirakṣitam / adhṛṣyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvabhūtamanoharam // 5.059.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad rakṣati mahāvīryaḥ sadā dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ / mātulaḥ kapimukhyasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ // 5.059.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tad vanam upāgamya babhūvuḥ paramotkaṭāḥ / vānarā vānarendrasya manaḥkāntatamaṃ mahat // 5.059.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te vānarā hṛṣṭā dṛṣṭvā madhuvanaṃ mahat / kumāram abhyayācanta madhūni madhupiṅgalāḥ // 5.059.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kumāras tān vṛddhāñ jāmbavatpramukhān kapīn / anumānya dadau teṣāṃ nisargaṃ madhubhakṣaṇe // 5.059.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataś cānumatāḥ sarve saṃprahṛṣṭā vanaukasaḥ / muditāś ca tatas te ca pranṛtyanti tatas tataḥ // 5.059.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gāyanti ke cit praṇamanti ke cin; nṛtyanti ke cit prahasanti ke cit / patanti ke cid vicaranti ke cit; plavanti ke cit pralapanti ke cit // 5.059.014	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
parasparaṃ ke cid upāśrayante; parasparaṃ ke cid atibruvante / drumād drumaṃ ke cid abhiplavante; kṣitau nagāgrān nipatanti ke cit // 5.059.015	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
mahītalāt ke cid udīrṇavegā; mahādrumāgrāṇy abhisaṃpatante / gāyantam anyaḥ prahasann upaiti; hasantam anyaḥ prahasann upaiti // 5.059.016	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
rudantam anyaḥ prarudann upaiti; nudantam anyaḥ praṇudann upaiti / samākulaṃ tat kapisainyam āsīn; madhuprapānotkaṭa sattvaceṣṭam // 5.059.017.1	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
na cātra kaś cin na babhūva matto; na cātra kaś cin na babhūva tṛpto // 5.059.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vanaṃ tat paribhakṣyamāṇaṃ; drumāṃś ca vidhvaṃsitapatrapuṣpān / samīkṣya kopād dadhivaktranāmā; nivārayām āsa kapiḥ kapīṃs tān // 5.059.018	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
sa taiḥ pravṛddhaiḥ paribhartsyamāno; vanasya goptā harivīravṛddhaḥ / cakāra bhūyo matim ugratejā; vanasya rakṣāṃ prati vānarebhyaḥ // 5.059.019	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
uvāca kāṃś cit paruṣāṇi dhṛṣṭam; asaktam anyāṃś ca talair jaghāna / sametya kaiś cit kalahaṃ cakāra; tathaiva sāmnopajagāma kāṃś cit // 5.059.020	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
sa tair madāc cāprativārya vegair; balāc ca tenāprativāryamāṇaiḥ / pradharṣitas tyaktabhayaiḥ sametya; prakṛṣyate cāpy anavekṣya doṣam // 5.059.021	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
nakhais tudanto daśanair daśantas; talaiś ca pādaiś ca samāpnuvantaḥ / madāt kapiṃ taṃ kapayaḥ samagrā; mahāvanaṃ nirviṣayaṃ ca cakruḥ // 5.059.022	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tān uvāca hariśreṣṭho hanūmān vānararṣabhaḥ / avyagramanaso yūyaṃ madhu sevata vānarāḥ // 5.060.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ harīṇāṃ pravaro 'ṅgadaḥ / pratyuvāca prasannātmā pibantu harayo madhu // 5.060.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyaṃ kṛtakāryasya vākyaṃ hanumato mayā / akāryam api kartavyaṃ kim aṅga punar īdṛśam // 5.060.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
andagasya mukhāc chrutvā vacanaṃ vānararṣabhāḥ / sādhu sādhv iti saṃhṛṣṭā vānarāḥ pratyapūjayan // 5.060.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjayitvāṅgadaṃ sarve vānarā vānararṣabham / jagmur madhuvanaṃ yatra nadīvega iva drutam // 5.060.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te prahṛṣṭā madhuvanaṃ pālān ākramya vīryataḥ / atisargāc ca paṭavo dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca maithilīm // 5.060.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utpatya ca tataḥ sarve vanapālān samāgatāḥ / tāḍayanti sma śataśaḥ saktān madhuvane tadā // 5.060.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madhūni droṇamātrāṇi bahubhiḥ parigṛhya te / ghnanti sma sahitāḥ sarve bhakṣayanti tathāpare // 5.060.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cit pītvāpavidhyanti madhūni madhupiṅgalāḥ / madhūcciṣṭena ke cic ca jaghnur anyonyam utkaṭāḥ // 5.060.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apare vṛkṣamūleṣu śākhāṃ gṛhya vyavasthitaḥ / atyarthaṃ ca madaglānāḥ parṇāny āstīrya śerate // 5.060.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
unmattabhūtāḥ plavagā madhumattāś ca hṛṣṭavat / kṣipanty api tathānyonyaṃ skhalanty api tathāpare // 5.060.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cit kṣveḍān prakurvanti ke cit kūjanti hṛṣṭavat / harayo madhunā mattāḥ ke cit suptā mahītale // 5.060.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye 'py atra madhupālāḥ syuḥ preṣyā dadhimukhasya tu / te 'pi tair vānarair bhīmaiḥ pratiṣiddhā diśo gatāḥ // 5.060.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānubhiś ca prakṛṣṭāś ca devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ / abruvan paramodvignā gatvā dadhimukhaṃ vacaḥ // 5.060.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmatā dattavarair hataṃ madhuvanaṃ balāt / vayaṃ ca jānubhiḥ kṛṣṭā devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ // 5.060.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dadhimukhaḥ kruddho vanapas tatra vānaraḥ / hataṃ madhuvanaṃ śrutvā sāntvayām āsa tān harīn // 5.060.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāgacchata gacchāmo vānarān atidarpitān / balenāvārayiṣyāmo madhu bhakṣayato vayam // 5.060.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā dadhimukhasyedaṃ vacanaṃ vānararṣabhāḥ / punar vīrā madhuvanaṃ tenaiva sahitā yayuḥ // 5.060.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madhye caiṣāṃ dadhimukhaḥ pragṛhya sumahātarum / samabhyadhāvad vegenā te ca sarve plavaṃgamāḥ // 5.060.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te śilāḥ pādapāṃś cāpi pāṣāṇāṃś cāpi vānarāḥ / gṛhītvābhyāgaman kruddhā yatra te kapikuñjarāḥ // 5.060.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te svāmivacanaṃ vīrā hṛdayeṣv avasajya tat / tvarayā hy abhyadhāvanta sālatālaśilāyudhāḥ // 5.060.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛkṣasthāṃś ca talasthāṃś ca vānarān baladarpitān / abhyakrāmanta te vīrāḥ pālās tatra sahasraśaḥ // 5.060.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha dṛṣṭvā dadhimukhaṃ kruddhaṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ / abhyadhāvanta vegena hanūmatpramukhās tadā // 5.060.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ savṛkṣaṃ mahābāhum āpatantaṃ mahābalam / āryakaṃ prāharat tatra bāhubhyāṃ kupito 'ṅgadaḥ // 5.060.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madāndhaś a na vedainam āryako 'yaṃ mameti saḥ / athainaṃ niṣpipeṣāśu vegavad vasudhātale // 5.060.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhagnabāhur vimukho vihvalaḥ śoṇitokṣitaḥ / mumoha sahasā vīro muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ // 5.060.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kathaṃ cid vimuktas tair vānarair vānararṣabhaḥ / uvācaikāntam āgamya bhṛtyāṃs tān samupāgatān // 5.060.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete tiṣṭhantu gacchāmo bhartā no yatra vānaraḥ / sugrīvo vipulagrīvaḥ saha rāmeṇa tiṣṭhati // 5.060.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaṃ caivāṅgade doṣaṃ śrāvayiṣyāmi pārthiva / amarṣī vacanaṃ śrutvā ghātayiṣyati vānarān // 5.060.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iṣṭaṃ madhuvanaṃ hy etat sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ / pitṛpaitāmahaṃ divyaṃ devair api durāsadam // 5.060.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vānarān imān sarvān madhulubdhān gatāyuṣaḥ / ghātayiṣyati daṇḍena sugrīvaḥ sasuhṛjjanān // 5.060.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhyā hy ete durātmāno nṛpājñā paribhāvinaḥ / amarṣaprabhavo roṣaḥ saphalo no bhaviṣyati // 5.060.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā dadhimukho vanapālān mahābalaḥ / jagāma sahasotpatya vanapālaiḥ samanvitaḥ // 5.060.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nimeṣāntaramātreṇa sa hi prāpto vanālayaḥ / sahasrāṃśusuto dhīmān sugrīvo yatra vānaraḥ // 5.060.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā sugrīvam eva ca / samapratiṣṭhāṃ jagatīm ākāśān nipapāta ha // 5.060.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nipatya mahāvīryaḥ sarvais taiḥ parivāritaḥ / harir dadhimukhaḥ pālaiḥ pālānāṃ parameśvaraḥ // 5.060.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dīnavadano bhūtvā kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim / sugrīvasya śubhau mūrdhnā caraṇau pratyapīḍayat // 5.060.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mūrdhnā nipatitaṃ vānaraṃ vānararṣabhaḥ / dṛṣṭvaivodvignahṛdayo vākyam etad uvāca ha // 5.061.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha kasmāt tvaṃ pādayoḥ patito mama / abhayaṃ te bhaved vīra satyam evābhidhīyatām // 5.061.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu viśvāsitas tena sugrīveṇa mahātmanā / utthāya ca mahāprājño vākyaṃ dadhimukho 'bravīt // 5.061.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naivarkṣarajasā rājan na tvayā nāpi vālinā / vanaṃ nisṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hi bhakṣitaṃ tat tu vānaraiḥ // 5.061.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ebhiḥ pradharṣitāś caiva vāritā vanarakṣibhiḥ / madhūny acintayitvemān bhakṣayanti pibanti ca // 5.061.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śiṣṭam atrāpavidhyanti bhakṣayanti tathāpare / nivāryamāṇās te sarve bhruvau vai darśayanti hi // 5.061.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime hi saṃrabdhatarās tathā taiḥ saṃpradharṣitāḥ / vārayanto vanāt tasmāt kruddhair vānarapuṃgavaiḥ // 5.061.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tair bahubhir vīrair vānarair vānararṣabhāḥ / saṃraktanayanaiḥ krodhād dharayaḥ saṃpracālitāḥ // 5.061.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇibhir nihatāḥ ke cit ke cij jānubhir āhatāḥ / prakṛṣṭāś ca yathākāmaṃ devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ // 5.061.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ete hatāḥ śūrās tvayi tiṣṭhati bhartari / kṛtsnaṃ madhuvanaṃ caiva prakāmaṃ taiḥ prabhakṣyate // 5.061.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vijñāpyamānaṃ tu sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham / apṛcchat taṃ mahāprājño lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā // 5.061.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim ayaṃ vānaro rājan vanapaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ / kaṃ cārtham abhinirdiśya duḥkhito vākyam abravīt // 5.061.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu sugrīvo lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā / lakṣmaṇaṃ pratyuvācedaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ // 5.061.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārya lakṣmaṇa saṃprāha vīro dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ / aṅgadapramukhair vīrair bhakṣitaṃ madhuvānaraiḥ // 5.061.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiṣām akṛtakṛtyānām īdṛśaḥ syād upakramaḥ / vanaṃ yathābhipannaṃ taiḥ sādhitaṃ karma vānaraiḥ // 5.061.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā / na hy anyaḥ sādhane hetuḥ karmaṇo 'sya hanūmataḥ // 5.061.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāryasiddhir hanumati matiś ca haripuṃgava / vyavasāyaś ca vīryaṃ ca śrutaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam // 5.061.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadasya baleśvaraḥ / hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā // 5.061.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadapramukhair vīrair hataṃ madhuvanaṃ kila / vicintya dakṣiṇām āśām āgatair haripuṃgavaiḥ // 5.061.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgataiś ca praviṣṭaṃ tad yathā madhuvanaṃ hi taiḥ / dharṣitaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtsnam upayuktaṃ ca vānaraiḥ // 5.061.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāritāḥ sahitāḥ pālās tathā jānubhir āhatāḥ // 5.061.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etadartham ayaṃ prāpto vaktuṃ madhuravāg iha / nāmnā dadhimukho nāma hariḥ prakhyātavikramaḥ // 5.061.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭā sītā mahābāho saumitre paśya tattvataḥ / abhigamya yathā sarve pibanti madhu vānarāḥ // 5.061.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāpy adṛṣṭvā vaidehīṃ viśrutāḥ puruṣarṣabha / vanaṃ dātta varaṃ divyaṃ dharṣayeyur vanaukasaḥ // 5.061.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā lakṣmaṇaḥ saharāghavaḥ / śrutvā karṇasukhāṃ vāṇīṃ sugrīvavadanāc cyutām // 5.061.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāhṛṣyata bhṛśaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ / śrutvā dadhimukhasyedaṃ sugrīvas tu prahṛṣya ca // 5.061.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanapālaṃ punar vākyaṃ sugrīvaḥ pratyabhāṣata // 5.061.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prīto 'smi saumya yad bhuktaṃ vanaṃ taiḥ kṛtakarmabhiḥ / marṣitaṃ marṣaṇīyaṃ ca ceṣṭitaṃ kṛtakarmaṇām // 5.061.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
icchāmi śīghraṃ hanumatpradhānān; śākhāmṛgāṃs tān mṛgarājadarpān / draṣṭuṃ kṛtārthān saha rāghavābhyāṃ; śrotuṃ ca sītādhigame prayatnam // 5.061.027	indravajrā [ttjgg]
sugrīveṇaivam uktas tu hṛṣṭo dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ / rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sugrīvaṃ cābhyavādayat // 5.062.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa praṇamya ca sugrīvaṃ rāghavau ca mahābalau / vānaraiḥ sahitaiḥ śūrair divam evotpapāta ha // 5.062.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa yathaivāgataḥ pūrvaṃ tathaiva tvarito gataḥ / nipatya gaganād bhūmau tad vanaṃ praviveśa ha // 5.062.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa praviṣṭo madhuvanaṃ dadarśa hariyūthapān / vimadān uddhatān sarvān mehamānān madhūdakam // 5.062.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tān upāgamad vīro baddhvā karapuṭāñjalim / uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam idaṃ hṛṣṭavad aṅgadam // 5.062.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumya roṣo na kartavyo yad ebhir abhivāritaḥ / ajñānād rakṣibhiḥ krodhād bhavantaḥ pratiṣedhitāḥ // 5.062.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuvarājas tvam īśaś ca vanasyāsya mahābala / maurkhyāt pūrvaṃ kṛto doṣas tad bhavān kṣantum arhati // 5.062.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathaiva hi pitā te 'bhūt pūrvaṃ harigaṇeśvaraḥ / tathā tvam api sugrīvo nānyas tu harisattama // 5.062.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ākhyātaṃ hi mayā gatvā pitṛvyasya tavānagha / ihopayānaṃ sarveṣām eteṣāṃ vanacāriṇām // 5.062.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvadāgamanaṃ śrutvā sahaibhir hariyūthapaiḥ / prahṛṣṭo na tu ruṣṭo 'sau vanaṃ śrutvā pradharṣitam // 5.062.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭo māṃ pitṛvyas te sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ / śīghraṃ preṣaya sarvāṃs tān iti hovāca pārthivaḥ // 5.062.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā dadhimukhasyaitad vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam aṅgadaḥ / abravīt tān hariśreṣṭho vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ // 5.062.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅke śruto 'yaṃ vṛttānto rāmeṇa hariyūthapāḥ / tat kṣamaṃ neha naḥ sthātuṃ kṛte kārye paraṃtapāḥ // 5.062.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pītvā madhu yathākāmaṃ viśrāntā vanacāriṇaḥ / kiṃ śeṣaṃ gamanaṃ tatra sugrīvo yatra me guruḥ // 5.062.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve yathā māṃ vakṣyanti sametya hariyūthapāḥ / tathāsmi kartā kartavye bhavadbhiḥ paravān aham // 5.062.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nājñāpayitum īśo 'haṃ yuvarājo 'smi yady api / ayuktaṃ kṛtakarmāṇo yūyaṃ dharṣayituṃ mayā // 5.062.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bruvataś cāṅgadaś caivaṃ śrutvā vacanam avyayam / prahṛṣṭamanaso vākyam idam ūcur vanaukasaḥ // 5.062.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vakṣyati ko rājan prabhuḥ san vānararṣabha / aiśvaryamadamatto hi sarvo 'ham iti manyate // 5.062.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

sarve vayam api prāptās tatra gantuṃ kṛtakṣaṇāḥ / sa yatra harivīrāṇāṃ sugrīvaḥ patir avyayaḥ // 5.062.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā hy anuktair haribhir naiva śakyaṃ padāt padam / kva cid gantuṃ hariśreṣṭha brūmaḥ satyam idaṃ tu te // 5.062.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ tu vadatāṃ teṣām aṅgadaḥ pratyabhāṣata / bāḍhaṃ gacchāma ity uktvā utpapāta mahītalāt // 5.062.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utpatantam anūtpetuḥ sarve te hariyūthapāḥ / kṛtvākāśaṃ nirākāśaṃ yajñotkṣiptā ivānalāḥ // 5.062.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te 'mbaraṃ sahasotpatya vegavantaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ / vinadanto mahānādaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā // 5.062.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgade hy ananuprāpte sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ / uvāca śokopahataṃ rāmaṃ kamalalocanam // 5.062.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te dṛṣṭā devī na saṃśayaḥ / nāgantum iha śakyaṃ tair atīte samaye hi naḥ // 5.062.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na matsakāśam āgacchet kṛtye hi vinipātite / yuvarājo mahābāhuḥ plavatāṃ pravaro 'ṅgadaḥ // 5.062.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

pitṛpaitāmahaṃ caitat pūrvakair abhirakṣitam / na me madhuvanaṃ hanyād ahṛṣṭaḥ plavageśvaraḥ // 5.062.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyā suprajā rāma samāśvasihi suvrata / dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā // 5.062.030.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy anyaḥ karmaṇo hetuḥ sādhane tadvidho bhavet // 5.062.030.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadaś ca baleśvaraḥ / hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā // 5.062.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā bhūś cintā samāyuktaḥ saṃpraty amitavikrama // 5.062.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

kiṣkindhām upayātānāṃ siddhiṃ kathayatām iva // 5.062.034.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śrutvā ninādaṃ taṃ kapīnāṃ kapisattamaḥ / āyatāñcitalāṅgūlaḥ so 'bhavad dhṛṣṭamānasaḥ // 5.062.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājagmus te 'pi harayo rāmadarśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / aṅgadaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā hanūmantaṃ ca vānaram // 5.062.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te 'ṅgadapramukhā vīrāḥ prahṛṣṭāś ca mudānvitāḥ / nipetur harirājasya samīpe rāghavasya ca // 5.062.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmāṃś ca mahābahuḥ praṇamya śirasā tataḥ / niyatām akṣatāṃ devīṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat // 5.062.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niścitārthaṃ tatas tasmin sugrīvaṃ pavanātmaje / lakṣmaṇaḥ prītimān prītaṃ bahumānād avaikṣata // 5.062.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

rāvaṇāntaḥpure rodhaṃ rākṣasībhiś ca tarjanam / rāme samanurāgaṃ ca yaś cāpi samayaḥ kṛtaḥ // 5.063.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad ākhyānti te sarve harayo rāma saṃnidhau / vaidehīm akṣatāṃ śrutvā rāmas tūttaram abravīt // 5.063.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajñaḥ sītāyā darśanaṃ yathā // 5.063.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samudraṃ laṅghayitvāhaṃ śatayojanam āyatam / agacchaṃ jānakīṃ sītāṃ mārgamāṇo didṛkṣayā // 5.063.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

dṛṣṭā me rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ / rākṣasībhir virūpābhī rakṣitā pramadāvane // 5.063.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duḥkham āpadyate devī tavāduḥkhocitā satī / rāvaṇāntaḥpure ruddhvā rākṣasībhiḥ surakṣitā // 5.063.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

ugreṇa tapasā yuktā tvadbhaktyā puruṣarṣabha // 5.063.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

idaṃ cāsmai pradātavyaṃ yatnāt suparirakṣitam / bruvatā vacanāny evaṃ sugrīvasyopaśṛṇvataḥ // 5.063.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa cūḍāmaṇiḥ śrīmān mayā te yatnarakṣitaḥ / manaḥśilāyās tikalas taṃ smarasveti cābravīt // 5.063.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ / etaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramodiṣye vyasane tvām ivānagha // 5.063.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jīvitaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi māsaṃ daśarathātmaja / ūrdhvaṃ māsān na jīveyaṃ rakṣasāṃ vaśam āgatā // 5.063.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti mām abravīt sītā kṛśāṅgī dharma cāriṇī / rāvaṇāntaḥpure ruddhā mṛgīvotphullalocanā // 5.063.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad eva mayākhyātaṃ sarvaṃ rāghava yad yathā / sarvathā sāgarajale saṃtāraḥ pravidhīyatām // 5.063.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau jātāśvāsau rājaputrau viditvā; tac cābhijñānaṃ rāghavāya pradāya / devyā cākhyātaṃ sarvam evānupūrvyād; vācā saṃpūrṇaṃ vāyuputraḥ śaśaṃsa // 5.063.026	vaiśvadevī [mmyy]
evam ukto hanumatā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / taṃ maṇiṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā praruroda salakṣmaṇaḥ // 5.064.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā maṇiśreṣṭhaṃ rāghavaḥ śokakarśitaḥ / netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ sugrīvam idam abravīt // 5.064.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tatas tasmin mahābāho kopasaṃvartitekṣaṇaḥ / vāyase tvaṃ kṛtvāḥ krūrāṃ matiṃ matimatāṃ vara // 5.065.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa darbhaṃ saṃstarād gṛhya brahmāstreṇa nyayojayaḥ / sa dīpta iva kālāgnir jajvālābhimukhaḥ khagam // 5.065.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ pradīptaṃ cikṣepa darbhaṃ taṃ vāyasaṃ prati / tatas tu vāyasaṃ dīptaḥ sa darbho 'nujagāma ha // 5.065.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair maharṣibhiḥ / trīṃl lokān saṃparikramya trātāraṃ nādhigacchati // 5.065.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tvaṃ nipatitaṃ bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatam / vadhārham api kākutstha kṛpayā paripālayaḥ // 5.065.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mogham astraṃ na śakyaṃ tu kartum ity eva rāghava / tatas tasyākṣikākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam // 5.065.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāma tvāṃ sa namaskṛtvā rājño daśarathasya ca / visṛṣṭas tu tadā kākaḥ pratipede kham ālayam // 5.065.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavāñ śīlavān api / kimartham astraṃ rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava // 5.065.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na nāgā nāpi gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ / tava rāma mukhe sthātuṃ śaktāḥ pratisamādhitum // 5.065.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava vīryavataḥ kaccin mayi yady asti saṃbhramaḥ / kṣipraṃ suniśitair bāṇair hanyatāṃ yudhi rāvaṇaḥ // 5.065.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātur ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇo vā paraṃtapaḥ / sa kimarthaṃ naravaro na māṃ rakṣati rāghavaḥ // 5.065.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaktau tau puruṣavyāghrau vāyvagnisamatejasau / surāṇām api durdharṣau kimarthaṃ mām upekṣataḥ // 5.065.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamaiva duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ / samarthau sahitau yan māṃ nāpekṣete paraṃtapau // 5.065.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā karuṇaṃ sāśrubhāṣitam / punar apy aham āryāṃ tām idaṃ vacanam abruvam // 5.065.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape / rāme duḥkhābhibhūte ca lakṣmaṇaḥ paritapyate // 5.065.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ cid bhavatī dṛṣṭā na kālaḥ pariśocitum / imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini // 5.065.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv ubhau naraśārdūlau rājaputrāv ariṃdamau / tvaddarśanakṛtotsāhau laṅkāṃ bhasmīkariṣyataḥ // 5.065.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatvā ca samare raudraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam / rāghavas tvāṃ mahābāhuḥ svāṃ purīṃ nayate dhruvam // 5.065.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite / prītisaṃjananaṃ tasya pradātuṃ tattvam arhasi // 5.065.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sābhivīkṣya diśaḥ sarvā veṇyudgrathanam uttamam / muktvā vastrād dadau mahyaṃ maṇim etaṃ mahābala // 5.065.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya maṇiṃ divyaṃ tava heto raghūttama / śirasā saṃpraṇamyainām aham āgamane tvare // 5.065.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamane ca kṛtotsāham avekṣya varavarṇinī / vivardhamānaṃ ca hi mām uvāca janakātmajā // 5.065.032.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśrupūrṇamukhī dīnā bāṣpasaṃdigdhabhāṣiṇī // 5.065.032.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanuman siṃhasaṃkāśau tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau / sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam // 5.065.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ / asmād duḥkhāmbusaṃrodhāt tat samādhātum arhasi // 5.065.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imaṃ ca tīvraṃ mama śokavegaṃ; rakṣobhir ebhiḥ paribhartsanaṃ ca / brūyās tu rāmasya gataḥ samīpaṃ; śivaś ca te 'dhvāstu haripravīra // 5.065.035	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
etat tavāryā nṛparājasiṃha; sītā vacaḥ prāha viṣādapūrvam / etac ca buddhvā gaditaṃ mayā tvaṃ; śraddhatsva sītāṃ kuśalāṃ samagrām // 5.065.036	indravajrā [ttjgg]
athāham uttaraṃ devyā punar uktaḥ sasaṃbhramam / tava snehān naravyāghra sauhāryād anumānya ca // 5.066.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vācyo rāmo dāśarathis tvayā / yathā mām āpnuyāc chīghraṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave // 5.066.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi vā manyase vīra vasaikāham ariṃdama / kasmiṃś cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvo gamiṣyasi // 5.066.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama cāpy alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vānara / asya śokavipākasya muhūrtaṃ syād vimokṣaṇam // 5.066.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gate hi tvayi vikrānte punarāgamanāya vai / prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ // 5.066.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavādarśanajaḥ śoko bhūyo māṃ paritāpayet / duḥkhād duḥkhaparābhūtāṃ durgatāṃ duḥkhabhāginīm // 5.066.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ tu vīrasaṃdehas tiṣṭhatīva mamāgrataḥ / sumahāṃs tvatsahāyeṣu haryṛkṣeṣu asaṃśayaḥ // 5.066.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim / tāni haryṛkṣasainyāni tau vā naravarātmajau // 5.066.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ sāgarasyāsya laṅghane / śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya vāyor vā tava vānagha // 5.066.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad asmin kāryaniyoge vīraivaṃ duratikrame / kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ brūhi kāryavidāṃ vara // 5.066.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane / paryāptaḥ paravīraghna yaśasyas te balodayaḥ // 5.066.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave / vijayī svāṃ purīṃ rāmo nayet tat syād yaśaskaram // 5.066.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāhaṃ tasya vīrasya vanād upadhinā hṛtā / rakṣasā tad bhayād eva tathā nārhati rāghavaḥ // 5.066.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ / māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet // 5.066.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ / bhavaty āhavaśūrasya tathā tvam upapādaya // 5.066.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad arthopahitaṃ vākyaṃ praśritaṃ hetusaṃhitam / niśamyāhaṃ tataḥ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abruvam // 5.066.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devi haryṛkṣasainyānām īśvaraḥ plavatāṃ varaḥ / sugrīvaḥ sattvasaṃpannas tavārthe kṛtaniścayaḥ // 5.066.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya vikramasaṃpannāḥ sattvavanto mahābalāḥ / manaḥsaṃkalpasaṃpātā nideśe harayaḥ sthitāḥ // 5.066.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ / na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ // 5.066.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asakṛt tair mahābhāgair vānarair balasaṃyutaiḥ / pradakṣiṇīkṛtā bhūmir vāyumārgānusāribhiḥ // 5.066.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ / mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau // 5.066.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ / na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ // 5.066.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad alaṃ paritāpena devi manyur vyapaitu te / ekotpātena te laṅkām eṣyanti hariyūthapāḥ // 5.066.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau / tvatsakāśaṃ mahābhāge nṛsiṃhāv āgamiṣyataḥ // 5.066.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arighnaṃ siṃhasaṃkāśaṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam / lakṣmaṇaṃ ca dhanuṣpāṇiṃ laṅkā dvāram upasthitam // 5.066.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhān vīrān siṃhaśārdūlavikramān / vānarān vānarendrābhān kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi saṃgatān // 5.066.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailāmbudan nikāśānāṃ laṅkāmalayasānuṣu / nardatāṃ kapimukhyānām acirāc choṣyase svanam // 5.066.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivṛttavanavāsaṃ ca tvayā sārdham ariṃdamam / abhiṣiktam ayodhyāyāṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam // 5.066.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mayā vāgbhir adīnabhāṣiṇī; śivābhir iṣṭābhir abhiprasāditā / jagāma śāntiṃ mama maithilātmajā; tavāpi śokena tathābhipīḍitā // 5.066.029	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ yathāvad abhibhāṣitam / rāmaḥ prītisamāyukto vākyam uttaram abravīt // 6.001.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtaṃ hanumatā kāryaṃ sumahad bhuvi duṣkaram / manasāpi yad anyena na śakyaṃ dharaṇītale // 6.001.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi taṃ paripaśyāmi yas tareta mahārṇavam / anyatra garuṇād vāyor anyatra ca hanūmataḥ // 6.001.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasām / apradhṛṣyāṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇena surakṣitām // 6.001.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviṣṭaḥ sattvam āśritya jīvan ko nāma niṣkramet / ko viśet sudurādharṣāṃ rākṣasaiś ca surakṣitām // 6.001.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo vīryabalasaṃpanno na samaḥ syād dhanūmataḥ // 6.001.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhṛtyakāryaṃ hanumatā sugrīvasya kṛtaṃ mahat / evaṃ vidhāya svabalaṃ sadṛśaṃ vikramasya ca // 6.001.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo hi bhṛtyo niyuktaḥ san bhartrā karmaṇi duṣkare / kuryāt tadanurāgeṇa tam āhuḥ puruṣottamam // 6.001.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niyukto nṛpateḥ kāryaṃ na kuryād yaḥ samāhitaḥ / bhṛtyo yuktaḥ samarthaś ca tam āhuḥ puruṣādhamam // 6.001.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tanniyoge niyuktena kṛtaṃ kṛtyaṃ hanūmatā / na cātmā laghutāṃ nītaḥ sugrīvaś cāpi toṣitaḥ // 6.001.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ ca raghuvaṃśaś ca lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ / vaidehyā darśanenādya dharmataḥ parirakṣitāḥ // 6.001.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ tu mama dīnasyā mano bhūyaḥ prakarṣati / yad ihāsya priyākhyātur na kurmi sadṛśaṃ priyam // 6.001.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa sarvasvabhūtas tu pariṣvaṅgo hanūmataḥ / mayā kālam imaṃ prāpya dattas tasya mahātmanaḥ // 6.001.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā sukṛtaṃ tāvat sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam / sāgaraṃ tu samāsādya punar naṣṭaṃ mano mama // 6.001.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ nāma samudrasya duṣpārasya mahāmbhasaḥ / harayo dakṣiṇaṃ pāraṃ gamiṣyanti samāhitāḥ // 6.001.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady apy eṣa tu vṛttānto vaidehyā gadito mama / samudrapāragamane harīṇāṃ kim ivottaram // 6.001.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā śokasaṃbhrānto rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ / hanūmantaṃ mahābāhus tato dhyānam upāgamat // 6.001.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu śokaparidyūnaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam / uvāca vacanaṃ śrīmān sugrīvaḥ śokanāśanam // 6.002.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tvaṃ saṃtapyase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā / maivaṃ bhūs tyaja saṃtāpaṃ kṛtaghna iva sauhṛdam // 6.002.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃtāpasya ca te sthānaṃ na hi paśyāmi rāghava / pravṛttāv upalabdhāyāṃ jñāte ca nilaye ripoḥ // 6.002.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhṛtimāñ śāstravit prājñaḥ paṇḍitaś cāsi rāghava / tyajemāṃ pāpikāṃ buddhiṃ kṛtvātmevārthadūṣaṇīm // 6.002.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samudraṃ laṅghayitvā tu mahānakrasamākulam / laṅkām ārohayiṣyāmo haniṣyāmaś ca te ripum // 6.002.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirutsāhasya dīnasya śokaparyākulātmanaḥ / sarvārthā vyavasīdanti vyasanaṃ cādhigacchati // 6.002.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime śūrāḥ samarthāś ca sarve no hariyūthapāḥ / tvatpriyārthaṃ kṛtotsāhāḥ praveṣṭum api pāvakam // 6.002.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣāṃ harṣeṇa jānāmi tarkaś cāsmin dṛḍho mama / vikrameṇa samāneṣye sītāṃ hatvā yathā ripum // 6.002.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
setur atra yathā vadhyed yathā paśyema tāṃ purīm / tasya rākṣasarājasya tathā tvaṃ kuru rāghava // 6.002.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā tāṃ hi purīṃ laṅkāṃ trikūṭaśikhare sthitām / hataṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe darśanād upadhāraya // 6.002.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
setubaddhaḥ samudre ca yāval laṅkā samīpataḥ / sarvaṃ tīrṇaṃ ca vai sainyaṃ jitam ity upadhāryatām // 6.002.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime hi samare śūrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / tad alaṃ viklavā buddhī rājan sarvārthanāśanī // 6.002.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puruṣasya hi loke 'smiñ śokaḥ śauryāpakarṣaṇaḥ / yat tu kāryaṃ manuṣyeṇa śauṇḍīryam avalambatā // 6.002.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūrāṇāṃ hi manuṣyāṇāṃ tvadvidhānāṃ mahātmanām // 6.002.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinaṣṭe vā pranaṣṭe vā śokaḥ sarvārthanāśanaḥ / tvaṃ tu buddhimatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvaśāstrārthakovidaḥ // 6.002.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madvidhaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārtham ariṃ jetum ihārhasi / na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ kaṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava // 6.002.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhītadhanuṣo yas te tiṣṭhed abhimukho raṇe / vānareṣu samāsaktaṃ na te kāryaṃ vipatsyate // 6.002.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acirād drakṣyase sītāṃ tīrtvā sāgaram akṣayam / tad alaṃ śokam ālambya krodham ālamba bhūpate // 6.002.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśceṣṭāḥ kṣatriyā mandāḥ sarve caṇḍasya bibhyati / laṅganārthaṃ ca ghorasya samudrasya nadīpateḥ // 6.002.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahāsmābhir ihopetaḥ sūkṣmabuddhir vicāraya / ime hi samare śūrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // 6.002.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān arīn vidhamiṣyanti śilāpādapavṛṣṭibhiḥ / kathaṃ cit paripaśyāmas te vayaṃ varuṇālayam // 6.002.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim uktvā bahudhā cāpi sarvathā vijayī bhavān // 6.002.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetumat paramārthavit / pratijagrāha kākutstho hanūmantam athābravīt // 6.003.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tarasā setubandhena sāgarocchoṣaṇena vā / sarvathā susamartho 'smi sāgarasyāsya laṅghane // 6.003.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kati durgāṇi durgāyā laṅkāyās tad bravīhi me / jñātum icchāmi tat sarvaṃ darśanād iva vānara // 6.003.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balasya parimāṇaṃ ca dvāradurgakriyām api / gupti karma ca laṅkāyā rakṣasāṃ sadanāni ca // 6.003.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāsukhaṃ yathāvac ca laṅkāyām asi dṛṣṭavān / saram ācakṣva tattvena sarvathā kuśalo hy asi // 6.003.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā rāmasya vacanaṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭho rāmaṃ punar athābravīt // 6.003.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyatāṃ sarvam ākhyāsye durgakarmavidhānataḥ / guptā purī yathā laṅkā rakṣitā ca yathā balaiḥ // 6.003.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parāṃ samṛddhiṃ laṅkāyāḥ sāgarasya ca bhīmatām / vibhāgaṃ ca balaughasya nirdeśaṃ vāhanasya ca // 6.003.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭā muditā laṅkā mattadvipasamākulā / mahatī rathasaṃpūrṇā rakṣogaṇasamākulā // 6.003.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛḍhabaddhakavāṭāni mahāparighavanti ca / dvārāṇi vipulāny asyāś catvāri sumahānti ca // 6.003.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vapreṣūpalayantrāṇi balavanti mahānti ca / āgataṃ parasainyaṃ tais tatra pratinivāryate // 6.003.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvāreṣu saṃskṛtā bhīmāḥ kālāyasamayāḥ śitāḥ / śataśo rocitā vīraiḥ śataghnyo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // 6.003.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sauvarṇaś ca mahāṃs tasyāḥ prākāro duṣpradharṣaṇaḥ / maṇividrumavaidūryamuktāvicaritāntaraḥ // 6.003.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvataś ca mahābhīmāḥ śītatoyā mahāśubhāḥ / agādhā grāhavatyaś ca parikhā mīnasevitāḥ // 6.003.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvāreṣu tāsāṃ catvāraḥ saṃkramāḥ paramāyatāḥ / yantrair upetā bahubhir mahadbhir dṛḍhasaṃdhibhiḥ // 6.003.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trāyante saṃkramās tatra parasainyāgame sati / yantrais tair avakīryante parikhāsu samantataḥ // 6.003.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekas tv akampyo balavān saṃkramaḥ sumahādṛḍhaḥ / kāñcanair bahubhiḥ stambhair vedikābhiś ca śobhitaḥ // 6.003.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svayaṃ prakṛtisaṃpanno yuyutsū rāma rāvaṇaḥ / utthitaś cāpramattaś ca balānām anudarśane // 6.003.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkā purī nirālambā devadurgā bhayāvahā / nādeyaṃ pārvataṃ vanyaṃ kṛtrimaṃ ca caturvidham // 6.003.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthitā pāre samudrasya dūrapārasya rāghava / naupathaś cāpi nāsty atra nirādeśaś ca sarvataḥ // 6.003.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailāgre racitā durgā sā pūr devapuropamā / vājivāraṇasaṃpūrṇā laṅkā paramadurjayā // 6.003.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parighāś ca śataghnyaś ca yantrāṇi vividhāni ca / śobhayanti purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ // 6.003.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayutaṃ rakṣasām atra paścimadvāram āśritam / śūlahastā durādharṣāḥ sarve khaḍgāgrayodhinaḥ // 6.003.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niyutaṃ rakṣasām atra dakṣiṇadvāram āśritam / caturaṅgeṇa sainyena yodhās tatrāpy anuttamāḥ // 6.003.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prayutaṃ rakṣasām atra pūrvadvāraṃ samāśritam / carmakhaḍgadharāḥ sarve tathā sarvāstrakovidāḥ // 6.003.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arbudaṃ rakṣasām atra uttaradvāram āśritam / rathinaś cāśvavāhāś ca kulaputrāḥ supūjitāḥ // 6.003.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ madhyamaṃ gulmam āśritam / yātudhānā durādharṣāḥ sāgrakoṭiś ca rakṣasām // 6.003.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te mayā saṃkramā bhagnāḥ parikhāś cāvapūritāḥ / dagdhā ca nagarī laṅkā prākārāś cāvasāditāḥ // 6.003.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena kena tu mārgeṇa tarāma varuṇālayam / hateti nagarī laṅkāṃ vānarair avadhāryatām // 6.003.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgado dvivido maindo jāmbavān panaso nalaḥ / nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva balaśeṣeṇa kiṃ tava // 6.003.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plavamānā hi gatvā tāṃ rāvaṇasya mahāpurīm / saprakārāṃ sabhavanām ānayiṣyanti maithilīm // 6.003.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balānāṃ sarvasaṃgraham / muhūrtena tu yuktena prasthānam abhirocaya // 6.003.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā hanūmato vākyaṃ yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ / tato 'bravīn mahātejā rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ // 6.004.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāṃ nivedayase laṅkāṃ purīṃ bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ / kṣipram enāṃ vadhiṣyāmi satyam etad bravīmi te // 6.004.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin muhūrte sugrīva prayāṇam abhirocaye / yukto muhūrto vijayaḥ prāpto madhyaṃ divākaraḥ // 6.004.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttarā phalgunī hy adya śvas tu hastena yokṣyate / abhiprayāma sugrīva sarvānīkasamāvṛtāḥ // 6.004.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nimittāni ca dhanyāni yāni prādurbhavanti me / nihatya rāvaṇaṃ sītām ānayiṣyāmi jānakīm // 6.004.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upariṣṭād dhi nayanaṃ sphuramāṇam idaṃ mama / vijayaṃ samanuprāptaṃ śaṃsatīva manoratham // 6.004.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agre yātu balasyāsya nīlo mārgam avekṣitum / vṛtaḥ śatasahasreṇa vānarāṇāṃ tarasvinām // 6.004.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phalamūlavatā nīla śītakānanavāriṇā / pathā madhumatā cāśu senāṃ senāpate naya // 6.004.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūṣayeyur durātmānaḥ pathi mūlaphalodakam / rākṣasāḥ parirakṣethās tebhyas tvaṃ nityam udyataḥ // 6.004.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nimneṣu vanadurgeṣu vaneṣu ca vanaukasaḥ / abhiplutyābhipaśyeyuḥ pareṣāṃ nihataṃ balam // 6.004.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgaraughanibhaṃ bhīmam agrānīkaṃ mahābalāḥ / kapisiṃhā prakarṣantu śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // 6.004.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajaś ca girisaṃkāśo gavayaś ca mahābalaḥ / gavākṣaś cāgrato yāntu gavāṃ dṛptā ivarṣabhāḥ // 6.004.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yātu vānaravāhinyā vānaraḥ plavatāṃ patiḥ / pālayan dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam ṛṣabho vānararṣabhaḥ // 6.004.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandhahastīva durdharṣas tarasvī gandhamādanaḥ / yātu vānaravāhinyāḥ savyaṃ pārśvam adhiṣṭhitaḥ // 6.004.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāsyāmi balamadhye 'haṃ balaugham abhiharṣayan / adhiruhya hanūmantam airāvatam iveśvaraḥ // 6.004.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadenaiṣa saṃyātu lakṣmaṇaś cāntakopamaḥ / sārvabhaumeṇa bhūteśo draviṇādhipatir yathā // 6.004.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbavāṃś ca suṣeṇaś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ / ṛkṣarājo mahāsattvaḥ kukṣiṃ rakṣantu te trayaḥ // 6.004.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvo vāhinīpatiḥ / vyādideśa mahāvīryān vānarān vānararṣabhaḥ // 6.004.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te vānaragaṇāḥ sarve samutpatya yuyutsavaḥ / guhābhyaḥ śikharebhyaś ca āśu pupluvire tadā // 6.004.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vānararājena lakṣmaṇena ca pūjitaḥ / jagāma rāmo dharmātmā sasainyo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam // 6.004.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭībhir ayutair api / vāraṇābhiś ca haribhir yayau parivṛtas tadā // 6.004.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ yāntam anuyāti sma mahatī harivāhinī // 6.004.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāḥ sarve sugrīveṇābhipālitāḥ / āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.004.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣvelanto ninadantaś ca jagmur vai dakṣiṇāṃ diśam // 6.004.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhakṣayantaḥ sugandhīni madhūni ca phalāni ca / udvahanto mahāvṛkṣān mañjarīpuñjadhāriṇaḥ // 6.004.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyonyaṃ sahasā dṛṣṭā nirvahanti kṣipanti ca / patantaś cotpatanty anye pātayanty apare parān // 6.004.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇo no nihantavyaḥ sarve ca rajanīcarāḥ / iti garjanti harayo rāghavasya samīpataḥ // 6.004.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purastād ṛṣabho vīro nīlaḥ kumuda eva ca / pathānaṃ śodhayanti sma vānarair bahubhiḥ saha // 6.004.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madhye tu rājā sugrīvo rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca / bahubhir balibhir bhīmair vṛtāḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ // 6.004.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hariḥ śatabalir vīraḥ koṭībhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ / sarvām eko hy avaṣṭabhya rarakṣa harivāhinīm // 6.004.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
koṭīśataparīvāraḥ kesarī panaso gajaḥ / arkaś cātibalaḥ pārśvam ekaṃ tasyābhirakṣati // 6.004.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suṣeṇo jāmbavāṃś caiva ṛkṣair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ / sugrīvaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā jaghanaṃ saṃrarakṣatuḥ // 6.004.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ senāpatir vīro nīlo vānarapuṃgavaḥ / saṃpatan patatāṃ śreṣṭhas tad balaṃ paryapālayat // 6.004.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darīmikhaḥ prajaṅghaś ca jambho 'tha rabhasaḥ kapiḥ / sarvataś ca yayur vīrās tvarayantaḥ plavaṃgamān // 6.004.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ te hariśārdūlā gacchanto baladarpitāḥ / apaśyaṃs te giriśreṣṭhaṃ sahyaṃ drumalatāyutam // 6.004.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgaraughanibhaṃ bhīmaṃ tad vānarabalaṃ mahat / niḥsasarpa mahāghoṣaṃ bhīmavega ivārṇavaḥ // 6.004.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya dāśaratheḥ pārśve śūrās te kapikuñjarāḥ / tūrṇam āpupluvuḥ sarve sadaśvā iva coditāḥ // 6.004.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kapibhyām uhyamānau tau śuśubhate nararṣabhau / mahadbhyām iva saṃspṛṣṭau grāhābhyāṃ candrabhāskarau // 6.004.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam aṅgadagato rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhayā girā / uvāca pratipūrṇārthaḥ smṛtimān pratibhānavān // 6.004.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛtām avāpya vaidehīṃ kṣipraṃ hatvā ca rāvaṇam / samṛddhārthaḥ samṛddhārthām ayodhyāṃ pratiyāsyasi // 6.004.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahānti ca nimittāni divi bhūmau ca rāghava / śubhānti tava paśyāmi sarvāṇy evārthasiddhaye // 6.004.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anu vāti śubho vāyuḥ senāṃ mṛduhitaḥ sukhaḥ / pūrṇavalgusvarāś ceme pravadanti mṛgadvijāḥ // 6.004.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasannāś ca diśaḥ sarvā vimalaś ca divākaraḥ / uśanā ca prasannārcir anu tvāṃ bhārgavo gataḥ // 6.004.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmarāśir viśuddhaś ca śuddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / arciṣmantaḥ prakāśante dhruvaṃ sarve pradakṣiṇam // 6.004.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triśaṅkur vimalo bhāti rājarṣiḥ sapurohitaḥ / pitāmahavaro 'smākam iṣkvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām // 6.004.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimale ca prakāśete viśākhe nirupadrave / nakṣatraṃ param asmākam ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām // 6.004.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nairṛtaṃ nairṛtānāṃ ca nakṣatram abhipīḍyate / mūlaṃ mūlavatā spṛṣṭaṃ dhūpyate dhūmaketunā // 6.004.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saraṃ caitad vināśāya rākṣasānām upasthitam / kāle kālagṛhītānāṃ nakatraṃ grahapīḍitam // 6.004.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasannāḥ surasāś cāpo vanāni phalavanti ca / pravānty abhyadhikaṃ gandhā yathartukusumā drumāḥ // 6.004.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyūḍhāni kapisainyāni prakāśante 'dhikaṃ prabho / devānām iva sainyāni saṃgrāme tārakāmaye // 6.004.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ārya samīkṣyaitān prīto bhavitum arhasi / iti bhrātaram āśvāsya hṛṣṭaḥ saumitrir abravīt // 6.004.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāvṛtya mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jagāma mahatī camūḥ / ṛkṣavānaraśārdūlair nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhair vṛtā // 6.004.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karāgraiś caraṇāgraiś ca vānarair uddhataṃ rajaḥ / bhaumam antardadhe lokaṃ nivārya savituḥ prabhām // 6.004.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā sma yāti divārātraṃ mahatī harivāhinī / hṛṣṭapramuditā senā sugrīveṇābhirakṣitā // 6.004.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanarās tvaritaṃ yānti sarve yuddhābhinandanaḥ / mumokṣayiṣavaḥ sītāṃ muhūrtaṃ kvāpi nāsata // 6.004.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pādapasaṃbādhaṃ nānāmṛgasamākulam / sahyaparvatam āsedur malayaṃ ca mahī dharam // 6.004.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kānanāni vicitrāṇi nadīprasravaṇāni ca / paśyann api yayau rāmaḥ sahyasya malayasya ca // 6.004.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
campakāṃs tilakāṃś cūtān aśokān sinduvārakān / karavīrāṃś ca timiśān bhañjanti sma plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.004.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phalāny amṛtagandhīni mūlāni kusumāni ca / bubhujur vānarās tatra pādapānāṃ balotkaṭāḥ // 6.004.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
droṇamātrapramāṇāni lambamānāni vānarāḥ / yayuḥ pibanto hṛṣṭās te madhūni madhupiṅgalāḥ // 6.004.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pādapān avabhañjanto vikarṣantas tathā latāḥ / vidhamanto girivarān prayayuḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ // 6.004.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛkṣebhyo 'nye tu kapayo nardanto madhudarpitāḥ / anye vṛkṣān prapadyante prapatanty api cāpare // 6.004.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhūva vasudhā tais tu saṃpūrṇā haripuṃgavaiḥ / yathā kamalakedāraiḥ pakvair iva vasuṃdharā // 6.004.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahendram atha saṃprāpya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ / adhyārohan mahābāhuḥ śikharaṃ drumabhūṣitam // 6.004.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śikharam āruhya rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / kūrmamīnasamākīrṇam apaśyat salilāśayam // 6.004.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te sahyaṃ samatikramya malayaṃ ca mahāgirim / āsedur ānupūrvyeṇa samudraṃ bhīmaniḥsvanam // 6.004.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaruhya jagāmāśu velāvanam anuttamam / rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sasugrīvaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.004.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha dhautopalatalāṃ toyaughaiḥ sahasotthitaiḥ / velām āsādya vipulāṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt // 6.004.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete vayam anuprāptāḥ sugrīva varuṇālayam / ihedānīṃ vicintā sā yā na pūrvaṃ samutthitā // 6.004.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ataḥ paramatīro 'yaṃ sāgaraḥ saritāṃ pati / na cāyam anupāyena śakyas taritum arṇavaḥ // 6.004.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad ihaiva niveśo 'stu mantraḥ prastūyatām iha / yathedaṃ vānarabalaṃ paraṃ pāram avāpnuyāt // 6.004.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
itīva sa mahābāhuḥ sītāharaṇakarśitaḥ / rāmaḥ sāgaram āsādya vāsam ājñāpayat tadā // 6.004.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃprāpto mantrakālo naḥ sāgarasyeha laṅghane / svāṃ svāṃ senāṃ samutsṛjya mā ca kaś cit kuto vrajet // 6.004.072.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gacchantu vānarāḥ śūrā jñeyaṃ channaṃ bhayaṃ ca naḥ // 6.004.072.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / senāṃ nyaveśayat tīre sāgarasya drumāyute // 6.004.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
virarāja samīpasthaṃ sāgarasya tu tad balam / madhupāṇḍujalaḥ śrīmān dvitīya iva sāgaraḥ // 6.004.074	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
velāvanam upāgamya tatas te haripuṃgavāḥ / viniviṣṭāḥ paraṃ pāraṃ kāṅkṣamāṇā mahodadheḥ // 6.004.075	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā mahārṇavam āsādya hṛṣṭā vānaravāhinī / vāyuvegasamādhūtaṃ paśyamānā mahārṇavam // 6.004.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūrapāram asaṃbādhaṃ rakṣogaṇaniṣevitam / paśyanto varuṇāvāsaṃ niṣedur hariyūthapāḥ // 6.004.077	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caṇḍanakragrahaṃ ghoraṃ kṣapādau divasakṣaye / candrodaye samādhūtaṃ praticandrasamākulam // 6.004.078	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caṇḍānilamahāgrāhaiḥ kīrṇaṃ timitimiṃgilaiḥ / dīptabhogair ivākrīrṇaṃ bhujaṃgair varuṇālayam // 6.004.079	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avagāḍhaṃ mahāsattair nānāśailasamākulam / durgaṃ drugam amārgaṃ tam agādham asurālayam // 6.004.080	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
makarair nāgabhogaiś ca vigāḍhā vātalohitāḥ / utpetuś ca nipetuś ca pravṛddhā jalarāśayaḥ // 6.004.081	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agnicūrṇam ivāviddhaṃ bhāskarāmbumanoragam / surāriviṣayaṃ ghoraṃ pātālaviṣamaṃ sadā // 6.004.082	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgaraṃ cāmbaraprakhyam ambaraṃ sāgaropamam / sāgaraṃ cāmbaraṃ ceti nirviśeṣam adṛśyata // 6.004.083	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpṛktaṃ nabhasā hy ambhaḥ saṃpṛktaṃ ca nabho 'mbhasā / tādṛgrūpe sma dṛśyete tārā ratnasamākule // 6.004.084	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samutpatitameghasya vīcci mālākulasya ca / viśeṣo na dvayor āsīt sāgarasyāmbarasya ca // 6.004.085	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyonyair āhatāḥ saktāḥ sasvanur bhīmaniḥsvanāḥ / ūrmayaḥ sindhurājasya mahābherya ivāhave // 6.004.086	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ratnaughajalasaṃnādaṃ viṣaktam iva vāyunā / utpatantam iva kruddhaṃ yādogaṇasamākulam // 6.004.087	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadṛśus te mahātmāno vātāhatajalāśayam / aniloddhūtam ākāśe pravalgatam ivormibhiḥ // 6.004.088.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrāntormijalasaṃnādaṃ pralolam iva sāgaram // 6.004.088.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tu nīlena vidhivat svārakṣā susamāhitā / sāgarasyottare tīre sādhu senā niveśitā // 6.005.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maindaś ca dvividhaś cobhau tatra vānarapuṃgavau / viceratuś ca tāṃ senāṃ rakṣārthaṃ sarvato diśam // 6.005.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niviṣṭāyāṃ tu senāyāṃ tīre nadanadīpateḥ / pārśvasthaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo vacanam abravīt // 6.005.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śokaś ca kila kālena gacchatā hy apagacchati / mama cāpaśyataḥ kāntām ahany ahani vardhate // 6.005.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na me duḥkhaṃ priyā dūre na me duḥkhaṃ hṛteti ca / etad evānuśocāmi vayo 'syā hy ativartate // 6.005.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāhi vāta yataḥ kanyā tāṃ spṛṣṭvā mām api spṛśa / tvayi me gātrasaṃsparśaś candre dṛṣṭisamāgamaḥ // 6.005.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan me dahati gātrāṇi viṣaṃ pītam ivāśaye / hā nātheti priyā sā māṃ hriyamāṇā yad abravīt // 6.005.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadviyogendhanavatā taccintāvipulārciṣā / rātriṃ divaṃ śarīraṃ me dahyate madanāgninā // 6.005.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avagāhyārṇavaṃ svapsye saumitre bhavatā vinā / kathaṃ cit prajvalan kāmaḥ samāsuptaṃ jale dahet // 6.005.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahv etat kāmayānasya śakyam etena jīvitum / yad ahaṃ sā ca vāmorur ekāṃ dharaṇim āśritau // 6.005.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kedārasyeva kedāraḥ sodakasya nirūdakaḥ / upasnehena jīvāmi jīvantīṃ yac chṛṇomi tām // 6.005.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadā tu khalu susśoṇīṃ śatapatrāyatekṣaṇām / vijitya śatrūn drakṣyāmi sītāṃ sphītām iva śriyam // 6.005.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadā nu cārubimbauṣṭhaṃ tasyāḥ padmam ivānanam / īṣadunnamya pāsyāmi rasāyanam ivāturaḥ // 6.005.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tasyāḥ saṃhatau pīnau stanau tālaphalopamau / kadā nu khalu sotkampau hasantyā māṃ bhajiṣyataḥ // 6.005.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā nūnam asitāpāṅgī rakṣomadhyagatā satī / mannāthā nāthahīneva trātāraṃ nādhigacchati // 6.005.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadā vikṣobhya rakṣāṃsi sā vidhūyotpatiṣyati / vidhūya jaladān nīlāñ śaśilekhā śaratsv iva // 6.005.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svabhāvatanukā nūnaṃ śokenānaśanena ca / bhūyas tanutarā sītā deśakālaviparyayāt // 6.005.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadā nu rākṣasendrasya nidhāyorasi sāyakān / sītāṃ pratyāhariṣyāmi śokam utsṛjya mānasaṃ // 6.005.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadā nu khalu māṃ sādhvī sītāmarasutopamā / sotkaṇṭhā kaṇṭham ālambya mokṣyaty ānandajaṃ jalam // 6.005.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadā śokam imaṃ ghoraṃ maithilī viprayogajam / sahasā vipramokṣyāmi vāsaḥ śukletaraṃ yathā // 6.005.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vilapatas tasya tatra rāmasya dhīmataḥ / dinakṣayān mandavapur bhāskaro 'stam upāgamat // 6.005.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśvāsito lakṣmaṇena rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāsata / smaran kamalapatrākṣīṃ sītāṃ śokākulīkṛtaḥ // 6.005.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkāyāṃ tu kṛtaṃ karma ghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavāvaham / rākṣasendro hanumatā śakreṇeva mahātmanā // 6.006.001.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīd rākṣasān sarvān hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ // 6.006.001.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharṣitā ca praviṣṭā ca laṅkā duṣprasahā purī / tena vānaramātreṇa dṛṣṭā sītā ca jānakī // 6.006.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasādo dharṣitaś caityaḥ pravarā rākṣasā hatāḥ / āvilā ca purī laṅkā sarvā hanumatā kṛtā // 6.006.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ kariṣyāmi bhadraṃ vaḥ kiṃ vā yuktam anantaram / ucyatāṃ naḥ samarthaṃ yat kṛtaṃ ca sukṛtaṃ bhavet // 6.006.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantramūlaṃ hi vijayaṃ prāhur āryā manasvinaḥ / tasmād vai rocaye mantraṃ rāmaṃ prati mahābalāḥ // 6.006.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trividhāḥ puruṣā loke uttamādhamamadhyamāḥ / teṣāṃ tu samavetānāṃ guṇadoṣaṃ vadāmy aham // 6.006.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantribhir hitasaṃyuktaiḥ samarthair mantranirṇaye / mitrair vāpi samānārthair bāndhavair api vā hitaiḥ // 6.006.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahito mantrayitvā yaḥ karmārambhān pravartayet / daive ca kurute yatnaṃ tam āhuḥ puruṣottamam // 6.006.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eko 'rthaṃ vimṛśed eko dharme prakurute manaḥ / ekaḥ kāryāṇi kurute tam āhur madhyamaṃ naram // 6.006.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guṇadoṣāv aniścitya tyaktvā daivavyapāśrayam / kariṣyāmīti yaḥ kāryam upekṣet sa narādhamaḥ // 6.006.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatheme puruṣā nityam uttamādhamamadhyamāḥ / evaṃ mantro 'pi vijñeya uttamādhamamadhyamaḥ // 6.006.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aikamatyam upāgamya śāstradṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā / mantriṇo yatra nirastās tam āhur mantram uttamam // 6.006.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahvyo 'pi matayo gatvā mantriṇo hy arthanirṇaye / punar yatraikatāṃ prāptaḥ sa mantro madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ // 6.006.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyonyamatim āsthāya yatra saṃpratibhāṣyate / na caikamatye śreyo 'sti mantraḥ so 'dhama ucyate // 6.006.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt sumantritaṃ sādhu bhavanto mantrisattamāḥ / kāryaṃ saṃpratipadyantām etat kṛtyatamaṃ mama // 6.006.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṇāṃ hi vīrāṇāṃ sahasraiḥ parivāritaḥ / rāmo 'bhyeti purīṃ laṅkām asmākam uparodhakaḥ // 6.006.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tariṣyati ca suvyaktaṃ rāghavaḥ sāgaraṃ sukham / tarasā yuktarūpeṇa sānujaḥ sabalānugaḥ // 6.006.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asminn evaṃgate kārye viruddhe vānaraiḥ saha / hitaṃ pure ca sainye ca sarvaṃ saṃmantryatāṃ mama // 6.006.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasās te mahābalāḥ / ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram // 6.007.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājan parighaśaktyṛṣṭiśūlapaṭṭasasaṃkulam / sumahan no balaṃ kasmād viṣādaṃ bhajate bhavān // 6.007.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kailāsaśikharāvāsī yakṣair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ / sumahat kadanaṃ kṛtvā vaśyas te dhanadaḥ kṛtaḥ // 6.007.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa maheśvarasakhyena ślāghamānas tvayā vibho / nirjitaḥ samare roṣāl lokapālo mahābalaḥ // 6.007.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinihatya ca yakṣaughān vikṣobhya ca vigṛhya ca / tvayā kailāsaśikharād vimānam idam āhṛtam // 6.007.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayena dānavendreṇa tvadbhayāt sakhyam icchatā / duhitā tava bhāryārthe dattā rākṣasapuṃgava // 6.007.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dānavendro madhur nāma vīryotsikto durāsadaḥ / vigṛhya vaśam ānītaḥ kumbhīnasyāḥ sukhāvahaḥ // 6.007.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirjitās te mahābāho nāgā gatvā rasātalam / vāsukis takṣakaḥ śaṅkho jaṭī ca vaśam āhṛtāḥ // 6.007.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṣayā balavantaś ca śūrā labdhavarāḥ punaḥ / tvayā saṃvatsaraṃ yuddhvā samare dānavā vibho // 6.007.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svabalaṃ samupāśritya nītā vaśam ariṃdama / māyāś cādhigatās tatra bahavo rākṣasādhipa // 6.007.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūrāś ca balavantaś ca varuṇasya sutā raṇe / nirjitās te mahābāho caturvidhabalānugāḥ // 6.007.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛtyudaṇḍamahāgrāhaṃ śālmalidvīpamaṇḍitam / avagāhya tvayā rājan yamasya balasāgaram // 6.007.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jayaś ca viplulaḥ prāpto mṛtyuś ca pratiṣedhitaḥ / suyuddhena ca te sarve lokās tatra sutoṣitāḥ // 6.007.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatriyair bahubhir vīraiḥ śakratulyaparākramaiḥ / āsīd vasumatī pūrṇā mahadbhir iva pādapaiḥ // 6.007.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ vīryaguṇotsāhair na samo rāghavo raṇe / prasahya te tvayā rājan hatāḥ paramadurjayāḥ // 6.007.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājan nāpad ayukteyam āgatā prākṛtāj janāt / hṛdi naiva tvayā kāryā tvaṃ vadhiṣyasi rāghavam // 6.007.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nīlāmbudanibhaḥ prahasto nāma rākṣasaḥ / abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ śūraḥ senāpatis tadā // 6.008.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavagandharvāḥ piśācapatagoragāḥ / na tvāṃ dharṣayituṃ śaktāḥ kiṃ punar vānarā raṇe // 6.008.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve pramattā viśvastā vañcitāḥ sma hanūmatā / na hi me jīvato gacchej jīvan sa vanagocaraḥ // 6.008.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvāṃ sāgaraparyantāṃ saśailavanakānanām / karomy avānarāṃ bhūmim ājñāpayatu māṃ bhavān // 6.008.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣāṃ caiva vidhāsyāmi vānarād rajanīcara / nāgamiṣyati te duḥkhaṃ kiṃ cid ātmāparādhajam // 6.008.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca susaṃkruddho durmukho nāma rākṣasaḥ / idaṃ na kṣamaṇīyaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ naḥ pradharṣaṇam // 6.008.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ paribhavo bhūyaḥ purasyāntaḥpurasya ca / śrīmato rākṣasendrasya vānarendrapradharṣaṇam // 6.008.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin muhūrte hatvaiko nivartiṣyāmi vānarān / praviṣṭān sāgaraṃ bhīmam ambaraṃ vā rasātalam // 6.008.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīt susaṃkruddho vajradaṃṣṭro mahābalaḥ / pragṛhya parighaṃ ghoraṃ māṃsaśoṇitarūpitam // 6.008.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ vo hanumatā kāryaṃ kṛpaṇena tapasvinā / rāme tiṣṭhati durdharṣe sugrīve sahalakṣmaṇe // 6.008.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya rāmaṃ sasugrīvaṃ parigheṇa salakṣmaṇam / āgamiṣyāmi hatvaiko vikṣobhya harivāhinīm // 6.008.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaumbhakarṇis tato vīro nikumbho nāma vīryavān / abravīt paramakurddho rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam // 6.008.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve bhavantas tiṣṭhantu mahārājena saṃgatāḥ / aham eko haniṣyāmi rāghavaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam // 6.008.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vajrahanur nāma rākṣasaḥ parvatopamaḥ / kruddhaḥ parilihan vaktraṃ jihvayā vākyam abravīt // 6.008.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svairaṃ kurvantu kāryāṇi bhavanto vigatajvarāḥ / eko 'haṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi tān sarvān hariyūthapān // 6.008.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svasthāḥ krīḍantu niścintāḥ pibantu madhuvāruṇīm / aham eko haniṣyāmi sugrīvaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam // 6.008.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāṅgadaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ rāmaṃ ca raṇakuñjaram // 6.008.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nikumbho rabhasaḥ sūryaśatrur mahābalaḥ / suptaghno yajñakopaś ca mahāpārśvo mahoaraḥ // 6.009.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ / indrajic ca mahātejā balavān rāvaṇātmajaḥ // 6.009.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahasto 'tha virūpākṣo vajradaṃṣṭro mahābalaḥ / dhūmrākṣaś cātikāyaś ca durmukhaś caiva rākṣasaḥ // 6.009.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parighān paṭṭasān prāsāñ śaktiśūlaparaśvadhān / cāpāni ca sabāṇāni khaḍgāṃś ca vipulāñ śitān // 6.009.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pragṛhya paramakruddhāḥ samutpatya ca rākṣasāḥ / abruvan rāvaṇaṃ sarve pradīptā iva tejasā // 6.009.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ ca salakṣmaṇam / kṛpaṇaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ laṅkā yena pradharṣitā // 6.009.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān gṛhītāyudhān sarvān vārayitvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ / abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ punaḥ pratyupaveśya tān // 6.009.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apy upāyais tribhis tāta yo 'rthaḥ prāptuṃ na śakyate / tasya vikramakālāṃs tān yuktān āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // 6.009.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pramatteṣv abhiyukteṣu daivena prahateṣu ca / vikramās tāta sidhyanti parīkṣya vidhinā kṛtāḥ // 6.009.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apramattaṃ kathaṃ taṃ tu vijigīṣuṃ bale sthitam / jitaroṣaṃ durādharṣaṃ pradharṣayitum icchatha // 6.009.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samudraṃ laṅghayitvā tu ghoraṃ nadanadīpatim / kṛtaṃ hanumatā karma duṣkaraṃ tarkayeta kaḥ // 6.009.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balāny aparimeyāni vīryāṇi ca niśācarāḥ / pareṣāṃ sahasāvajñā na kartavyā kathaṃ cana // 6.009.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ ca rākṣasarājasya rāmeṇāpakṛtaṃ purā / ājahāra janasthānād yasya bhāryāṃ yaśasvinaḥ // 6.009.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kharo yady ativṛttas tu rāmeṇa nihato raṇe / avaśyaṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇā rakṣitavyā yathā balam // 6.009.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etannimittaṃ vaidehī bhayaṃ naḥ sumahad bhavet / āhṛtā sā parityājyā kalahārthe kṛte na kim // 6.009.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na naḥ kṣamaṃ vīryavatā tena dharmānuvartinā / vairaṃ nirarthakaṃ kartuṃ dīyatām asya maithilī // 6.009.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvan na sagajāṃ sāśvāṃ bahuratnasamākulām / purīṃ dārayate bāṇair dīyatām asya maithilī // 6.009.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvat sughorā mahatī durdharṣā harivāhinī / nāvaskandati no laṅkāṃ tāvat sītā pradīyatām // 6.009.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinaśyed dhi purī laṅkā śūrāḥ sarve ca rākṣasāḥ / rāmasya dayitā patnī na svayaṃ yadi dīyate // 6.009.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasādaye tvāṃ bandhutvāt kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama / hitaṃ pathyaṃ tv ahaṃ brūmi dīyatām asya maithilī // 6.009.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā śaratsūryamarīcisaṃnibhān; navāgrapuṅkhān sudṛḍhān nṛpātmajaḥ / sṛjaty amoghān viśikhān vadhāya te; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī // 6.009.021	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tyajasva kopaṃ sukhadharmanāśanaṃ; bhajasva dharmaṃ ratikīrtivardhanam / prasīda jīvema saputrabāndhavāḥ; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī // 6.009.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
suniviṣṭaṃ hitaṃ vākyam uktavantaṃ vibhīṣaṇam / abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ // 6.010.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaset saha sapatnena kruddhenāśīviṣeṇa vā / na tu mitrapravādena saṃvasec chatrusevinā // 6.010.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānāmi śīlaṃ jñātīnāṃ sarvalokeṣu rākṣasa / hṛṣyanti vyasaneṣv ete jñātīnāṃ jñātayaḥ sadā // 6.010.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradhānaṃ sādhakaṃ vaidyaṃ dharmaśīlaṃ ca rākṣasa / jñātayo hy avamanyante śūraṃ paribhavanti ca // 6.010.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityam anyonyasaṃhṛṣṭā vyasaneṣv ātatāyinaḥ / pracchannahṛdayā ghorā jñātayas tu bhayāvahāḥ // 6.010.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyante hastibhir gītāḥ ślokāḥ padmavane kva cit / pāśahastān narān dṛṣṭvā śṛṇu tān gadato mama // 6.010.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāgnir nānyāni śastrāṇi na naḥ pāśā bhayāvahāḥ / ghorāḥ svārthaprayuktās tu jñātayo no bhayāvahāḥ // 6.010.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāyam ete vakṣyanti grahaṇe nātra saṃśayaḥ / kṛtsnād bhayāj jñātibhayaṃ sukaṣṭaṃ viditaṃ ca naḥ // 6.010.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidyate goṣu saṃpannaṃ vidyate brāhmaṇe damaḥ / vidyate strīṣu cāpalyaṃ vidyate jñātito bhayam // 6.010.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato neṣṭam idaṃ saumya yad ahaṃ lokasatkṛtaḥ / aiśvaryam abhijātaś ca ripūṇāṃ mūrdhni ca sthitaḥ // 6.010.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyas tv evaṃvidhaṃ brūyād vākyam etan niśācara / asmin muhūrte na bhavet tvāṃ tu dhik kulapāṃsanam // 6.010.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ nyāyavādī vibhīṣaṇaḥ / utpapāta gadāpāṇiś caturbhiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ // 6.010.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca tadā vākyaṃ jātakrodho vibhīṣaṇaḥ / antarikṣagataḥ śrīmān bhrātaraṃ rākṣasādhipam // 6.010.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ bhrātāsi me rājan brūhi māṃ yad yad icchasi / idaṃ tu paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ na kṣamāmy anṛtaṃ tava // 6.010.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sunītaṃ hitakāmena vākyam uktaṃ daśānana / na gṛhṇanty akṛtātmānaḥ kālasya vaśam āgatāḥ // 6.010.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sulabhāḥ puruṣā rājan satataṃ priyavādinaḥ / apriyasya tu pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ // 6.010.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
baddhaṃ kālasya pāśena sarvabhūtāpahāriṇā / na naśyantam upekṣeyaṃ pradīptaṃ śaraṇaṃ yathā // 6.010.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīptapāvakasaṃkāśaiḥ śitaiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ / na tvām icchāmy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ rāmeṇa nihataṃ śaraiḥ // 6.010.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire / kālābhipannā sīdanti yathā vālukasetavaḥ // 6.010.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmānaṃ sarvathā rakṣa purīṃ cemāṃ sarākṣasām / svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi sukhī bhava mayā vinā // 6.010.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivāryamāṇasya mayā hitaiṣiṇā; na rocate te vacanaṃ niśācara / parītakālā hi gatāyuṣo narā; hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam // 6.010.021	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rāvaṇānujaḥ / ājagāma muhūrtena yatra rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.011.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ meruśikharākāraṃ dīptām iva śatahradām / gaganasthaṃ mahīsthās te dadṛśur vānarādhipāḥ // 6.011.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ātmapañcamaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ / vānaraiḥ saha durdharṣaś cintayām āsa buddhimān // 6.011.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ tu vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha / hanūmatpramukhān sarvān idaṃ vacanam uttamam // 6.011.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa sarvāyudhopetaś caturbhiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ / rākṣaso 'bhyeti paśyadhvam asmān hantuṃ na saṃśayaḥ // 6.011.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vānarottamāḥ / sālān udyamya śailāṃś ca idaṃ vacanam abruvan // 6.011.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghraṃ vyādiśa no rājan vadhāyaiṣāṃ durātmanām / nipatantu hatāś caite dharaṇyām alpajīvitāḥ // 6.011.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
