teṣāṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇānām anyonyaṃ sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ / uttaraṃ tīram āsādya khastha eva vyatiṣṭhata // 6.011.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca ca mahāprājñaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān / sugrīvaṃ tāṃś ca saṃprekṣya khastha eva vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.011.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇo nāma durvṛtto rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ / tasyāham anujo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇa iti śrutaḥ // 6.011.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena sītā janasthānād dhṛtā hatvā jaṭāyuṣam / ruddhvā ca vivaśā dīnā rākṣasībhiḥ surakṣitā // 6.011.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ahaṃ hetubhir vākyair vividhaiś ca nyadarśayam / sādhu niryātyatāṃ sītā rāmāyeti punaḥ punaḥ // 6.011.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca na pratijagrāha rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ / ucyamāno hitaṃ vākyaṃ viparīta ivauṣadham // 6.011.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ paruṣitas tena dāsavac cāvamānitaḥ / tyaktvā putrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca rāghavaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // 6.011.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvalokaśaraṇyāya rāghavāya mahātmane / nivedayata māṃ kṣipraṃ vibhīṣaṇam upasthitam // 6.011.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvo laghuvikramaḥ / lakṣmaṇasyāgrato rāmaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt // 6.011.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasyānujo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇa iti śrutaḥ / caturbhiḥ saha rakṣobhir bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // 6.011.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇena praṇihitaṃ tam avehi vibhīṣaṇam / tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye kṣamaṃ kṣamavatāṃ vara // 6.011.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣaso jihmayā buddhyā saṃdiṣṭo 'yam upasthitaḥ / prahartuṃ māyayā channo viśvaste tvayi rāghava // 6.011.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
badhyatām eṣa tīvreṇa daṇḍena sacivaiḥ saha / rāvaṇasya nṛśaṃsasya bhrātā hy eṣa vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.011.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu taṃ rāmaṃ saṃrabdho vāhinīpatiḥ / vākyajño vākyakuśalaṃ tato maunam upāgamat // 6.011.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā rāmo mahābalaḥ / samīpasthān uvācedaṃ hanūmatpramukhān harīn // 6.011.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad uktaṃ kapirājena rāvaṇāvarajaṃ prati / vākyaṃ hetumad atyarthaṃ bhavadbhir api tac chrutam // 6.011.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suhṛdā hy arthakṛccheṣu yuktaṃ buddhimatā satā / samarthenāpi saṃdeṣṭuṃ śāśvatīṃ bhūtim icchatā // 6.011.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ paripṛṣṭās te svaṃ svaṃ matam atandritāḥ / sopacāraṃ tadā rāmam ūcur hitacikīrṣavaḥ // 6.011.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ajñātaṃ nāsti te kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava / ātmānaṃ pūjayan rāma pṛcchasy asmān suhṛttayā // 6.011.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ hi satyavrataḥ śūro dhārmiko dṛḍhavikramaḥ / parīkṣya kārā smṛtimān nisṛṣṭātmā suhṛtsu ca // 6.011.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād ekaikaśas tāvad bruvantu sacivās tava / hetuto matisaṃpannāḥ samarthāś ca punaḥ punaḥ // 6.011.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity ukte rāghavāyātha matimān aṅgado 'grataḥ / vibhīṣaṇaparīkṣārtham uvāca vacanaṃ hariḥ // 6.011.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatroḥ sakāśāt saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkya eva hi / viśvāsayogyaḥ sahasā na kartavyo vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.011.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
chādayitvātmabhāvaṃ hi caranti śaṭhabuddhayaḥ / praharanti ca randhreṣu so 'narthaḥ sumahān bhavet // 6.011.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthānarthau viniścitya vyavasāyaṃ bhajeta ha / guṇataḥ saṃgrahaṃ kuryād doṣatas tu visarjayet // 6.011.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi doṣo mahāṃs tasmiṃs tyajyatām aviśaṅkitam / guṇān vāpi bahūñ jñātvā saṃgrahaḥ kriyatāṃ nṛpa // 6.011.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarabhas tv atha niścitya sārthaṃ vacanam abravīt / kṣipram asmin naravyāghra cāraḥ pratividhīyatām // 6.011.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praṇidhāya hi cāreṇa yathāvat sūkṣmabuddhinā / parīkṣya ca tataḥ kāryo yathānyāyaṃ parigrahaḥ // 6.011.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbavāṃs tv atha saṃprekṣya śāstrabuddhyā vicakṣaṇaḥ / vākyaṃ vijñāpayām āsa guṇavad doṣavarjitam // 6.011.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
baddhavairāc ca pāpāc ca rākṣasendrād vibhīṣaṇaḥ / adeśa kāle saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkyatām ayam // 6.011.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato maindas tu saṃprekṣya nayāpanayakovidaḥ / vākyaṃ vacanasaṃpanno babhāṣe hetumattaram // 6.011.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vacanaṃ nāma tasyaiṣa rāvaṇasya vibhīṣaṇaḥ / pṛcchyatāṃ madhureṇāyaṃ śanair naravareśvara // 6.011.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāvam asya tu vijñāya tatas tattvaṃ kariṣyasi / yadi dṛṣṭo na duṣṭo vā buddhipūrvaṃ nararṣabha // 6.011.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha saṃskārasaṃpanno hanūmān sacivottamaḥ / uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam arthavan madhuraṃ laghu // 6.011.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na bhavantaṃ matiśreṣṭhaṃ samarthaṃ vadatāṃ varam / atiśāyayituṃ śakto bṛhaspatir api bruvan // 6.011.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na vādān nāpi saṃgharṣān nādhikyān na ca kāmataḥ / vakṣyāmi vacanaṃ rājan yathārthaṃ rāmagauravāt // 6.011.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthānarthanimittaṃ hi yad uktaṃ sacivais tava / tatra doṣaṃ prapaśyāmi kriyā na hy upapadyate // 6.011.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛte niyogāt sāmarthyam avaboddhuṃ na śakyate / sahasā viniyogo hi doṣavān pratibhāti me // 6.011.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cārapraṇihitaṃ yuktaṃ yad uktaṃ sacivais tava / arthasyāsaṃbhavāt tatra kāraṇaṃ nopapadyate // 6.011.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adeśa kāle saṃprāpta ity ayaṃ yad vibhīṣaṇaḥ / vivakṣā cātra me 'stīyaṃ tāṃ nibodha yathā mati // 6.011.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa eṣa deśaḥ kālaś ca bhavatīha yathā tathā / puruṣāt puruṣaṃ prāpya tathā doṣaguṇāv api // 6.011.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daurātmyaṃ rāvaṇe dṛṣṭvā vikramaṃ ca tathā tvayi / yuktam āgamanaṃ tasya sadṛśaṃ tasya buddhitaḥ // 6.011.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ajñātarūpaiḥ puruṣaiḥ sa rājan pṛcchyatām iti / yad uktam atra me prekṣā kā cid asti samīkṣitā // 6.011.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛcchyamāno viśaṅketa sahasā buddhimān vacaḥ / tatra mitraṃ praduṣyeta mithyapṛṣṭaṃ sukhāgatam // 6.011.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśakyaḥ sahasā rājan bhāvo vettuṃ parasya vai / antaḥ svabhāvair gītais tair naipuṇyaṃ paśyatā bhṛśam // 6.011.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tv asya bruvato jātu lakṣyate duṣṭabhāvatā / prasannaṃ vadanaṃ cāpi tasmān me nāsti saṃśayaḥ // 6.011.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśaṅkitamatiḥ svastho na śaṭhaḥ parisarpati / na cāsya duṣṭā vāk cāpi tasmān nāstīha saṃśayaḥ // 6.011.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ākāraś chādyamāno 'pi na śakyo vinigūhitum / balād dhi vivṛṇoty eva bhāvam antargataṃ nṛṇām // 6.011.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
deśakālopapannaṃ ca kāryaṃ kāryavidāṃ vara / saphalaṃ kurute kṣipraṃ prayogeṇābhisaṃhitam // 6.011.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udyogaṃ tava saṃprekṣya mithyāvṛttaṃ ca rāvaṇam / vālinaś ca vadhaṃ śrutvā sugrīvaṃ cābhiṣecitam // 6.011.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyaṃ prārthayamānaś ca buddhipūrvam ihāgataḥ / etāvat tu puraskṛtya yujyate tv asya saṃgrahaḥ // 6.011.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāśakti mayoktaṃ tu rākṣasasyārjavaṃ prati / tvaṃ pramāṇaṃ tu śeṣasya śrutvā buddhimatāṃ vara // 6.011.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rāmaḥ prasannātmā śrutvā vāyusutasya ha / pratyabhāṣata durdharṣaḥ śrutavān ātmani sthitam // 6.012.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamāpi tu vivakṣāsti kā cit prati vibhīṣaṇam / śrutam icchāmi tat sarvaṃ bhavadbhiḥ śreyasi sthitaiḥ // 6.012.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mitrabhāvena saṃprāptaṃ na tyajeyaṃ kathaṃ cana / doṣo yady api tasya syāt satām etad agarhitam // 6.012.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvaḥ plavageśvaraḥ / pratyabhāṣata kākutsthaṃ sauhārdenābhicoditaḥ // 6.012.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim atra citraṃ dharmajña lokanāthaśikhāmaṇe / yat tvam āryaṃ prabhāṣethāḥ sattvavān sapathe sthitaḥ // 6.012.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama cāpy antarātmāyaṃ śuddhiṃ vetti vibhīṣaṇam / anumanāc ca bhāvāc ca sarvataḥ suparīkṣitaḥ // 6.012.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt kṣipraṃ sahāsmābhis tulyo bhavatu rāghava / vibhīṣaṇo mahāprājñaḥ sakhitvaṃ cābhyupaitu naḥ // 6.012.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sugrīvasya tad vākyayṃ rāmaḥ śrutvā vimṛśya ca / tataḥ śubhataraṃ vākyam uvāca haripuṃgavam // 6.012.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suduṣṭo vāpy aduṣṭo vā kim eṣa rajanīcaraḥ / sūkṣmam apy ahitaṃ kartuṃ mamāśaktaḥ kathaṃ cana // 6.012.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
piśācān dānavān yakṣān pṛthivyāṃ caiva rākṣasān / aṅgulyagreṇa tān hanyām icchan harigaṇeśvara // 6.012.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyate hi kapotena śatruḥ śaraṇam āgataḥ / arcitaś ca yathānyāyaṃ svaiś ca māṃsair nimantritaḥ // 6.012.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi taṃ pratijagrāha bhāryā hartāram āgatam / kapoto vānaraśreṣṭha kiṃ punar madvidho janaḥ // 6.012.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣeḥ kaṇvasya putreṇa kaṇḍunā paramarṣiṇā / śṛṇu gāthāṃ purā gītāṃ dharmiṣṭhāṃ satyavādinā // 6.012.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
baddhāñjalipuṭaṃ dīnaṃ yācantaṃ śaraṇāgatam / na hanyād ānṛśaṃsyārtham api śatruṃ paraṃ pata // 6.012.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārto vā yadi vā dṛptaḥ pareṣāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ / ariḥ prāṇān parityajya rakṣitavyaḥ kṛtātmanā // 6.012.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ced bhayād vā mohād vā kāmād vāpi na rakṣati / svayā śaktyā yathātattvaṃ tat pāpaṃ lokagarhitam // 6.012.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinaṣṭaḥ paśyatas tasya rakṣiṇaḥ śaraṇāgataḥ / ādāya sukṛtaṃ tasya sarvaṃ gacched arakṣitaḥ // 6.012.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ doṣo mahān atra prapannānām arakṣaṇe / asvargyaṃ cāyaśasyaṃ ca balavīryavināśanam // 6.012.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kariṣyāmi yathārthaṃ tu kaṇḍor vacanam uttamam / dharmiṣṭhaṃ ca yaśasyaṃ ca svargyaṃ syāt tu phalodaye // 6.012.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakṛd eva prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yācate / abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadāmy etad vrataṃ mama // 6.012.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānayainaṃ hariśreṣṭha dattam asyābhayaṃ mayā / vibhīṣaṇo vā sugrīva yadi vā rāvaṇaḥ svayam // 6.012.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu sugrīvavaco niśamya tad; dharīśvareṇābhihitaṃ nareśvaraḥ / vibhīṣaṇenāśu jagāma saṃgamaṃ; patatrirājena yathā puraṃdaraḥ // 6.012.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
rāghaveṇābhaye datte saṃnato rāvaṇānujaḥ / khāt papātāvaniṃ hṛṣṭo bhaktair anucaraiḥ saha // 6.013.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu rāmasya dharmātmā nipapāta vibhīṣaṇaḥ / pādayoḥ śaraṇānveṣī caturbhiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ // 6.013.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ vākyaṃ tatra vibhīṣaṇaḥ / dharmayuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca sāmprataṃ saṃpraharṣaṇam // 6.013.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujo rāvaṇasyāhaṃ tena cāsmy avamānitaḥ / bhavantaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // 6.013.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parityaktā mayā laṅkā mitrāṇi ca dhanāni ca / bhavadgataṃ me rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca sukhāni ca // 6.013.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasānāṃ vadhe sāhyaṃ laṅkāyāś ca pradharṣaṇe / kariṣyāmi yathāprāṇaṃ pravekṣyāmi ca vāhinīm // 6.013.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti bruvāṇaṃ rāmas tu pariṣvajya vibhīṣaṇam / abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ prītaḥ samudrāj jalam ānaya // 6.013.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena cemaṃ mahāprājñam abhiṣiñca vibhīṣaṇam / rājānaṃ rakṣasāṃ kṣipraṃ prasanne mayi mānada // 6.013.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu saumitrir abhyaṣiñcad vibhīṣaṇam / madhye vānaramukhyānāṃ rājānaṃ rāmaśāsanāt // 6.013.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ prasādaṃ tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā sadyaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ / pracukruśur mahānādān sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan // 6.013.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca hanūmāṃś ca sugrīvaś ca vibhīṣaṇam / kathaṃ sāgaram akṣobhyaṃ tarāma varuṇālayam // 6.013.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāyair abhigacchāmo yathā nadanadīpatim / tarāma tarasā sarve sasainyā varuṇālayam // 6.013.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu dharmajñaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ / samudraṃ rāghavo rājā śaraṇaṃ gantum arhati // 6.013.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
khānitaḥ sagareṇāyam aprameyo mahodadhiḥ / kartum arhati rāmasya jñāteḥ kāryaṃ mahodadhiḥ // 6.013.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vibhīṣaṇenokte rākṣasena vipaścitā / prakṛtyā dharmaśīlasya rāghavasyāpy arocata // 6.013.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa lakṣmaṇaṃ mahātejāḥ sugrīvaṃ ca harīśvaram / satkriyārthaṃ kriyādakṣaḥ smitapūrvam uvāca ha // 6.013.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇasya mantro 'yaṃ mama lakṣmaṇa rocate / brūhi tvaṃ sahasugrīvas tavāpi yadi rocate // 6.013.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvaḥ paṇḍito nityaṃ bhavān mantravicakṣaṇaḥ / ubhābhyāṃ saṃpradhāryāryaṃ rocate yat tad ucyatām // 6.013.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktau tu tau vīrāv ubhau sugrīvalakṣmaṇau / samudācāra saṃyuktam idaṃ vacanam ūcatuḥ // 6.013.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kimarthaṃ no naravyāghra na rociṣyati rāghava / vibhīṣaṇena yat tūktam asmin kāle sukhāvaham // 6.013.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abaddhvā sāgare setuṃ ghore 'smin varuṇālaye / laṅkā nāsādituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ // 6.013.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇasya śūrasya yathārthaṃ kriyatāṃ vacaḥ / alaṃ kālātyayaṃ kṛtvā samudro 'yaṃ niyujyatām // 6.013.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ kuśāstīrṇe tīre nadanadīpateḥ / saṃviveśa tadā rāmo vedyām iva hutāśanaḥ // 6.013.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya rāmasya suptasya kuśāstīrṇe mahītale / niyamād apramattasya niśās tisro 'ticakramuḥ // 6.014.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca darśayate mandas tadā rāmasya sāgaraḥ / prayatenāpi rāmeṇa yathārham abhipūjitaḥ // 6.014.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samudrasya tataḥ kruddho rāmo raktāntalocanaḥ / samīpastham uvācedaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣmaṇam // 6.014.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya tāvad anāryasya pūjyamānasya lakṣmaṇa / avalepaṃ samudrasya na darśayati yat svayam // 6.014.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praśamaś ca kṣamā caiva ārjavaṃ priyavāditā / asāmarthyaṃ phalanty ete nirguṇeṣu satāṃ guṇāḥ // 6.014.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmapraśaṃsinaṃ duṣṭaṃ dhṛṣṭaṃ viparidhāvakam / sarvatrotsṛṣṭadaṇḍaṃ ca lokaḥ satkurute naram // 6.014.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na sāmnā śakyate kīrtir na sāmnā śakyate yaśaḥ / prāptuṃ lakṣmaṇa loke 'smiñ jayo vā raṇamūdhani // 6.014.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya madbāṇanirbhinnair makarair makarālayam / niruddhatoyaṃ saumitre plavadbhiḥ paśya sarvataḥ // 6.014.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahābhogāni matsyānāṃ kariṇāṃ ca karān iha / bhogāṃś ca paśya nāgānāṃ mayā bhinnāni lakṣmaṇa // 6.014.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saśaṅkhaśuktikā jālaṃ samīnamakaraṃ śaraiḥ / adya yuddhena mahatā samudraṃ pariśoṣaye // 6.014.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣamayā hi samāyuktaṃ mām ayaṃ makarālayaḥ / asamarthaṃ vijānāti dhik kṣamām īdṛśe jane // 6.014.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cāpam ānaya saumitre śarāṃś cāśīviṣopamān / adyākṣobhyam api kruddhaḥ kṣobhayiṣyāmi sāgaram // 6.014.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
velāsu kṛtamaryādaṃ sahasormisamākulam / nirmaryādaṃ kariṣyāmi sāyakair varuṇālayam // 6.014.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā dhanuṣpāṇiḥ krodhavisphāritekṣaṇaḥ / babhūva rāmo durdharṣo yugāntāgnir iva jvalan // 6.014.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpīḍya ca dhanur ghoraṃ kampayitvā śarair jagat / mumoca viśikhān ugrān vajrāṇīva śatakratuḥ // 6.014.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te jvalanto mahāvegās tejasā sāyakottamāḥ / praviśanti samudrasya salilaṃ trastapannagam // 6.014.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vegaḥ samudrasya sanakramakaro mahān / saṃbabhūva mahāghoraḥ samārutaravas tadā // 6.014.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahormimālāvitataḥ śaṅkhaśuktisamākulaḥ / sadhūmaparivṛttormiḥ sahasābhūn mahodadhiḥ // 6.014.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyathitāḥ pannagāś cāsan dīptāsyā dīptalocanāḥ / dānavāś ca mahāvīryāḥ pātālatalavāsinaḥ // 6.014.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūrmayaḥ sindhurājasya sanakramakarās tadā / vindhyamandarasaṃkāśāḥ samutpetuḥ sahasraśaḥ // 6.014.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āghūrṇitataraṅgaughaḥ saṃbhrāntoragarākṣasaḥ / udvartita mahāgrāhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ salilāśayaḥ // 6.014.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato madhyāt samudrasya sāgaraḥ svayam utthitaḥ / udayan hi mahāśailān meror iva divākaraḥ // 6.015.001.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pannagaiḥ saha dīptāsyaiḥ samudraḥ pratyadṛśyata // 6.015.001.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snigdhavaidūryasaṃkāśo jāmbūnadavibhūṣitaḥ / raktamālyāmbaradharaḥ padmapatranibhekṣaṇaḥ // 6.015.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgaraḥ samatikramya pūrvam āmantrya vīryavān / abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ rāghavaṃ śarapāṇinam // 6.015.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca rāghavaḥ / svabhāve saumya tiṣṭhanti śāśvataṃ mārgam āśritāḥ // 6.015.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat svabhāvo mamāpy eṣa yad agādho 'ham aplavaḥ / vikāras tu bhaved rādha etat te pravadāmy aham // 6.015.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kāmān na ca lobhād vā na bhayāt pārthivātmaja / grāhanakrākulajalaṃ stambhayeyaṃ kathaṃ cana // 6.015.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhāsye rāma yenāpi viṣahiṣye hy ahaṃ tathā / grāhā na prahariṣyanti yāvat senā tariṣyati // 6.015.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ saumya nalo nāma tanujo viśvakarmaṇaḥ / pitrā dattavaraḥ śrīmān pratimo viśvakarmaṇaḥ // 6.015.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa setuṃ mahotsāhaḥ karotu mayi vānaraḥ / tam ahaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi tathā hy eṣa yathā pitā // 6.015.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvodadhir naṣṭaḥ samutthāya nalas tataḥ / abravīd vānaraśreṣṭho vākyaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalaḥ // 6.015.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ setuṃ kariṣyāmi vistīrṇe varuṇālaye / pituḥ sāmarthyam āsthāya tattvam āha mahodadhiḥ // 6.015.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama mātur varo datto mandare viśvakarmaṇā / aurasas tasya putro 'haṃ sadṛśo viśvakarmaṇā // 6.015.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāpy aham anukto vai prabrūyām ātmano guṇān / kāmam adyaiva badhnantu setuṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ // 6.015.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nisṛṣṭarāmeṇa sarvato hariyūthapāḥ / abhipetur mahāraṇyaṃ hṛṣṭāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // 6.015.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te nagān nagasaṃkāśāḥ śākhāmṛgagaṇarṣabhāḥ / babhañjur vānarās tatra pracakarṣuś ca sāgaram // 6.015.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te sālaiś cāśvakarṇaiś ca dhavair vaṃśaiś ca vānarāḥ / kuṭajair arjunais tālais tikalais timiśair api // 6.015.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bilvakaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca karṇikāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ / cūtaiś cāśokavṛkṣaiś ca sāgaraṃ samapūrayan // 6.015.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samūlāṃś ca vimūlāṃś ca pādapān harisattamāḥ / indraketūn ivodyamya prajahrur harayas tarūn // 6.015.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṣipyamāṇair acalaiḥ sahasā jalam uddhatam / samutpatitam ākāśam apāsarpat tatas tataḥ // 6.015.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśayojanavistīrṇaṃ śatayojanam āyatam / nalaś cakre mahāsetuṃ madhye nadanadīpateḥ // 6.015.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śilānāṃ kṣipyamāṇānāṃ śailānāṃ tatra pātyatām / babhūva tumulaḥ śabdas tadā tasmin mahodadhau // 6.015.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nalena kṛtaḥ setuḥ sāgare makarālaye / śuśubhe subhagaḥ śrīmān svātīpatha ivāmbare // 6.015.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ // 6.015.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ / tam acintyam asahyaṃ ca adbhutaṃ lomaharṣaṇam // 6.015.024.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni sāgare setubandhanam // 6.015.024.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni koṭisahasrāṇi vānarāṇāṃ mahaujasām / badhnantaḥ sāgare setuṃ jagmuḥ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ // 6.015.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśālaḥ sukṛtaḥ śrīmān subhūmiḥ susamāhitaḥ / aśobhata mahāsetuḥ sīmanta iva sāgare // 6.015.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pare samudrasya gadāpāṇir vibhīṣaṇaḥ / pareṣām abhighatārtham atiṣṭhat sacivaiḥ saha // 6.015.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agratas tasya sainyasya śrīmān rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ / jagāma dhanvī dharmātmā sugrīveṇa samanvitaḥ // 6.015.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anye madhyena gacchanti pārśvato 'nye plavaṃgamāḥ / salile prapatanty anye mārgam anye na lebhire // 6.015.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cid vaihāyasa gatāḥ suparṇā iva pupluvuḥ // 6.015.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghoṣeṇa mahatā ghoṣaṃ sāgarasya samucchritam / bhīmam antardadhe bhīmā tarantī harivāhinī // 6.015.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṇāṃ hi sā tīrṇā vāhinī nala setunā / tīre niviviśe rājñā bahumūlaphalodake // 6.015.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad adbhutaṃ rāghava karma duṣkaraṃ; samīkṣya devāḥ saha siddhacāraṇaiḥ / upetya rāmaṃ sahitā maharṣibhiḥ; samabhyaṣiñcan suśubhair jalaiḥ pṛthak // 6.015.032	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
jayasva śatrūn naradeva medinīṃ; sasāgarāṃ pālaya śāśvatīḥ samāḥ / itīva rāmaṃ naradevasatkṛtaṃ; śubhair vacobhir vividhair apūjayan // 6.015.033	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sabale sāgaraṃ tīrṇe rāme daśarathātmaje / amātyau rāvaṇaḥ śrīmān abravīc chukasāraṇau // 6.016.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samagraṃ sāgaraṃ tīrṇaṃ dustaraṃ vānaraṃ balam / abhūtapūrvaṃ rāmeṇa sāgare setubandhanam // 6.016.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgare setubandhaṃ tu na śraddadhyāṃ kathaṃ cana / avaśyaṃ cāpi saṃkhyeyaṃ tan mayā vānaraṃ balam // 6.016.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavantau vānaraṃ sainyaṃ praviśyānupalakṣitau / parimāṇaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca ye ca mukhyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.016.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantriṇo ye ca rāmasya sugrīvasya ca saṃmatāḥ / ye pūrvam abhivartante ye ca śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.016.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa ca setur yathā baddhaḥ sāgare salilārṇave / niveśaś ca yathā teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām // 6.016.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya vyavasāyaṃ ca vīryaṃ praharaṇāni ca / lakṣmaṇasya ca vīrasya tattvato jñātum arhatha // 6.016.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaś ca senāpatis teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahaujasām / etaj jñātvā yathātattvaṃ śīghram agantum arhathaḥ // 6.016.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti pratisamādiṣṭau rākṣasau śukasāraṇau / harirūpadharau vīrau praviṣṭau vānaraṃ balam // 6.016.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tad vānaraṃ sainyam acintyaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / saṃkhyātuṃ nādhyagacchetāṃ tadā tau śukasāraṇau // 6.016.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat sthitaṃ parvatāgreṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca / samudrasya ca tīreṣu vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca // 6.016.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taramāṇaṃ ca tīrṇaṃ ca tartukāmaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / niviṣṭaṃ niviśac caiva bhīmanādaṃ mahābalam // 6.016.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau dadarśa mahātejāḥ pracchannau ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ / ācacakṣe 'tha rāmāya gṛhītvā śukasāraṇau // 6.016.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkāyāḥ samanuprāptau cārau parapuraṃjayau // 6.016.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau dṛṣṭvā vyathitau rāmaṃ nirāśau jīvite tadā / kṛtāñjalipuṭau bhītau vacanaṃ cedam ūcatuḥ // 6.016.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āvām ihāgatau saumya rāvaṇaprahitāv ubhau / parijñātuṃ balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tavedaṃ raghunandana // 6.016.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / abravīt prahasan vākyaṃ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ // 6.016.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi dṛṣṭaṃ balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vayaṃ vā susamīkṣitāḥ / yathoktaṃ vā kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ chandataḥ pratigamyatām // 6.016.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśya nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ bhavadbhyāṃ dhanadānujaḥ / vaktavyo rakṣasāṃ rājā yathoktaṃ vacanaṃ mama // 6.016.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad balaṃ ca samāśritya sītāṃ me hṛtavān asi / tad darśaya yathākāmaṃ sasainyaḥ sahabāndhavaḥ // 6.016.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvaḥkāle nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ saprākārāṃ satoraṇām / rākṣasaṃ ca balaṃ paśya śarair vidhvaṃsitaṃ mayā // 6.016.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghoraṃ roṣam ahaṃ mokṣye balaṃ dhāraya rāvaṇa / śvaḥkāle vajravān vajraṃ dānaveṣv iva vāsavaḥ // 6.016.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti pratisamādiṣṭau rākṣasau śukasāraṇau / āgamya nagarīṃ laṅkām abrūtāṃ rākṣasādhipam // 6.016.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇagṛhītau tu vadhārhau rākṣaseśvara / dṛṣṭvā dharmātmanā muktau rāmeṇāmitatejasā // 6.016.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekasthānagatā yatra catvāraḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ / lokapālopamāḥ śūrāḥ kṛtāstrā dṛḍhavikramāḥ // 6.016.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmāṃl lakṣmaṇaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ / sugrīvaś ca mahātejā mahendrasamavikramaḥ // 6.016.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete śaktāḥ purīṃ laṅkāṃ saprākārāṃ satoraṇām / utpāṭya saṃkrāmayituṃ sarve tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ // 6.016.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yādṛśaṃ tasya rāmasya rūpaṃ praharaṇāni ca / vadhiṣyati purīṃ laṅkām ekas tiṣṭhantu te trayaḥ // 6.016.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmalakṣmaṇaguptā sā sugrīveṇa ca vāhinī / babhūva durdharṣatarā sarvair api surāsuraiḥ // 6.016.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭarūpā dhvajinī vanaukasāṃ; mahātmanāṃ saṃprati yoddhum icchatām / alaṃ virodhena śamo vidhīyatāṃ; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī // 6.016.029	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tad vacaḥ pathyam aklībaṃ sāraṇenābhibhāṣitam / niśamya rāvaṇo rājā pratyabhāṣata sāraṇam // 6.017.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi mām abhiyuñjīran devagandharvadānavāḥ / naiva sītāṃ pradāsyāmi sarvalokabhayād api // 6.017.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ tu saumya paritrasto haribhir nirjito bhṛśam / pratipradānam adyaiva sītāyāḥ sādhu manyase // 6.017.003.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko hi nāma sapatno māṃ samare jetum arhati // 6.017.003.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / āruroha tataḥ śrīmān prāsādaṃ himapāṇḍuram // 6.017.004.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahutālasamutsedhaṃ rāvaṇo 'tha didṛkṣayā // 6.017.004.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tābhyāṃ carābhyāṃ sahito rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / paśyamānaḥ samudraṃ ca parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca // 6.017.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadarśa pṛthivīdeśaṃ susaṃpūrṇaṃ plavaṃgamaiḥ // 6.017.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad apāram asaṃkhyeyaṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahad balam / ālokya rāvaṇo rājā paripapraccha sāraṇam // 6.017.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣāṃ vānaramukhyānāṃ ke śūrāḥ ke mahābalāḥ / ke pūrvam abhivartante mahotsāhāḥ samantataḥ // 6.017.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
keṣāṃ śṛṇoti sugrīvaḥ ke vā yūthapayūthapāḥ / sāraṇācakṣva me sarvaṃ ke pradhānāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.017.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāraṇo rākṣasendrasya vacanaṃ paripṛcchataḥ / ācacakṣe 'tha mukhyajño mukhyāṃs tāṃs tu vanaukasaḥ // 6.017.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa yo 'bhimukho laṅkāṃ nardaṃs tiṣṭhati vānaraḥ / yūthapānāṃ sahasrāṇāṃ śatena parivāritaḥ // 6.017.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya ghoṣeṇa mahatā saprākārā satoraṇā / laṅkā pravepate sarvā saśailavanakānanā // 6.017.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaśākhāmṛgendrasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ / balāgre tiṣṭhate vīro nīlo nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ // 6.017.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāhū pragṛhya yaḥ padbhyāṃ mahīṃ gacchati vīryavān / laṅkām abhimukhaḥ kopād abhīkṣṇaṃ ca vijṛmbhate // 6.017.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
giriśṛṅgapratīkāśaḥ padmakiñjalkasaṃnibhaḥ / sphoṭayaty abhisaṃrabdho lāṅgūlaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // 6.017.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya lāṅgūlaśabdena svanantīva diśo daśa / eṣa vānararājena surgrīveṇābhiṣecitaḥ // 6.017.015.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yauvarājye 'ṅgado nāma tvām āhvayati saṃyuge // 6.017.015.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tu viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi kṣveḍayanti nadanti ca / utthāya ca vijṛmbhante krodhena haripuṃgavāḥ // 6.017.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete duṣprasahā ghorāś caṇḍāś caṇḍaparākramāḥ / aṣṭau śatasahasrāṇi daśakoṭiśatāni ca // 6.017.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ya enam anugacchanti vīrāś candanavāsinaḥ / eṣa āśaṃsate laṅkāṃ svenānīkena marditum // 6.017.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śveto rajatasaṃkāśaḥ sabalo bhīmavikramaḥ / buddhimān vānaraḥ śūras triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ // 6.017.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tūrṇaṃ sugrīvam āgamya punar gacchati vānaraḥ / vibhajan vānarīṃ senām anīkāni praharṣayan // 6.017.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaḥ purā gomatītīre ramyaṃ paryeti parvatam / nāmnā saṃkocano nāma nānānagayuto giriḥ // 6.017.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra rājyaṃ praśāsty eṣa kumudo nāma yūthapaḥ / yo 'sau śatasahasrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ parikarṣati // 6.017.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya vālā bahuvyāmā dīrghalāṅgūlam āśritāḥ / tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇā ghorakarmaṇaḥ // 6.017.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adīno roṣaṇaś caṇḍaḥ saṃgrāmam abhikāṅkṣati / eṣaivāśaṃsate laṅkāṃ svenānīkena marditum // 6.017.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tv eṣa siṃhasaṃkāśaḥ kapilo dīrghakesaraḥ / nibhṛtaḥ prekṣate laṅkāṃ didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā // 6.017.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vindhyaṃ kṛṣṇagiriṃ sahyaṃ parvataṃ ca sudarśanam / rājan satatam adhyāste rambho nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ // 6.017.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ triṃśac ca hariyūthapāḥ / parivāryānugacchanti laṅkāṃ marditum ojasā // 6.017.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tu karṇau vivṛṇute jṛmbhate ca punaḥ punaḥ / na ca saṃvijate mṛtyor na ca yūthād vidhāvati // 6.017.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahābalo vītabhayo ramyaṃ sālveya parvatam / rājan satatam adhyāste śarabho nāma yūthapaḥ // 6.017.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasya balinaḥ sarve vihārā nāma yūthapāḥ / rājañ śatasahasrāṇi catvāriṃśat tathaiva ca // 6.017.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tu megha ivākāśaṃ mahān āvṛtya tiṣṭhati / madhye vānaravīrāṇāṃ surāṇām iva vāsavaḥ // 6.017.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bherīṇām iva saṃnādo yasyaiṣa śrūyate mahān / ghoraḥ śākhāmṛgendrāṇāṃ saṃgrāmam abhikāṅkṣatām // 6.017.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa parvatam adhyāste pāriyātram anuttamam / yuddhe duṣprasaho nityaṃ panaso nāma yūthapaḥ // 6.017.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
enaṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ śatārdhaṃ paryupāsate / yūthapā yūthapaśreṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ yūthāni bhāgaśaḥ // 6.017.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tu bhīmāṃ pravalgantīṃ camūṃ tiṣṭhati śobhayan / sthitāṃ tīre samudrasya dvitīya iva sāgaraḥ // 6.017.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa dardarasaṃkāśo vinato nāma yūthapaḥ / pibaṃś carati parṇāśāṃ nadīnām uttamāṃ nadīm // 6.017.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṣaṣṭiḥ śatasahasrāṇi balam asya plavaṃgamāḥ / tvām āhvayati yuddhāya krathano nāma yūthapaḥ // 6.017.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tu gairikavarṇābhaṃ vapuḥ puṣyati vānaraḥ / gavayo nāma tejasvī tvāṃ krodhād abhivartate // 6.017.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
enaṃ śatasahasrāṇi saptatiḥ paryupāsate / eṣa āśaṃsate laṅkāṃ svenānīkena marditum // 6.017.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete duṣprasahā ghorā balinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / yūthapā yūthapaśreṣṭhā yeṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate // 6.017.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃs tu te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi prekṣamāṇasya yūthapān / rāghavārthe parākrāntā ye na rakṣanti jīvitam // 6.018.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snigdhā yasya bahuśyāmā bālā lāṅgūlam āśritāḥ / tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇā ghorakarmaṇaḥ // 6.018.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pragṛhītāḥ prakāśante sūryasyeva marīcayaḥ / pṛthivyāṃ cānukṛṣyante haro nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ // 6.018.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nugacchanti śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / drumān udyamya sahitā laṅkārohaṇatatparāḥ // 6.018.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa koṭīsahasreṇa vānarāṇāṃ mahaujasām / ākāṅkṣate tvāṃ saṃgrāme jetuṃ parapuraṃjaya // 6.018.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlān iva mahāmeghāṃs tiṣṭhato yāṃs tu paśyasi / asitāñ janasaṃkāśān yuddhe satyaparākramān // 6.018.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhān vīrāṃs tīkṣṇakopān bhayāvahān / asaṃkhyeyān anirdeśyān paraṃ pāram ivodadheḥ // 6.018.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parvateṣu ca ye ke cid viṣameṣu nadīṣu ca / ete tvām abhivartante rājann ṛṣkāḥ sudāruṇāḥ // 6.018.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣāṃ madhye sthito rājan bhīmākṣo bhīmadarśanaḥ / parjanya iva jīmūtaiḥ samantāt parivāritaḥ // 6.018.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛkṣavantaṃ giriśreṣṭham adhyāste narmadāṃ piban / sarvarkṣāṇām adhipatir dhūmro nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ // 6.018.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yavīyān asya tu bhrātā paśyainaṃ parvatopamam / bhrātrā samāno rūpeṇa viśiṣṭas tu parākrame // 6.018.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa eṣa jāmbavān nāma mahāyūthapayūthapaḥ / praśānto guruvartī ca saṃprahāreṣv amarṣaṇaḥ // 6.018.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etena sāhyaṃ sumahat kṛtaṃ śakrasya dhīmatā / devāsure jāmbavatā labdhāś ca bahavo varāḥ // 6.018.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āruhya parvatāgrebhyo mahābhravipulāḥ śilāḥ / muñcanti vipulākārā na mṛtyor udvijanti ca // 6.018.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasānāṃ ca sadṛśāḥ piśācānāṃ ca romaśāḥ / etasya sainye bahavo vicaranty agnitejasaḥ // 6.018.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaṃ tv enam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ plavamānam iva sthitam / prekṣante vānarāḥ sarve sthitaṃ yūthapayūthapam // 6.018.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa rājan sahasrākṣaṃ paryupāste harīśvaraḥ / balena balasaṃpanno rambho nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ // 6.018.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaḥ sthitaṃ yojane śailaṃ gacchan pārśvena sevate / ūrdhvaṃ tathaiva kāyena gataḥ prāpnoti yojanam // 6.018.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmān na paramaṃ rūpaṃ catuṣpādeṣu vidyate / śrutaḥ saṃnādano nāma vānarāṇāṃ pitāmahaḥ // 6.018.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena yuddhaṃ tadā dattaṃ raṇe śakrasya dhīmatā / parājayaś ca na prāptaḥ so 'yaṃ yūthapayūthapaḥ // 6.018.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya vikramamāṇasya śakrasyeva parākramaḥ // 6.018.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa gandharvakanyāyām utpannaḥ kṛṣṇavartmanā / purā devāsure yuddhe sāhyārthaṃ tridivaukasām // 6.018.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya vaiśravaṇo rājā jambūm upaniṣevate / yo rājā parvatendrāṇāṃ bahukiṃnarasevinām // 6.018.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vihārasukhado nityaṃ bhrātus te rākṣasādhipa / tatraiṣa vasati śrīmān balavān vānararṣabhaḥ // 6.018.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuddheṣv akatthano nityaṃ krathano nāma yūthapaḥ // 6.018.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛtaḥ koṭisahasreṇa harīṇāṃ samupasthitaḥ / eṣaivāśaṃsate laṅkāṃ svenānīkena marditum // 6.018.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo gaṅgām anu paryeti trāsayan hastiyūthapān / hastināṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca pūrvavairam anusmaran // 6.018.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa yūthapatir netā gacchan giriguhāśayaḥ / harīṇāṃ vāhinī mukhyo nadīṃ haimavatīm anu // 6.018.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uśīra bījam āśritya parvataṃ mandaropamam / ramate vānaraśreṣṭho divi śakra iva svayam // 6.018.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
enaṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ sahasram abhivartate / eṣa durmarṣaṇo rājan pramāthī nāma yūthapaḥ // 6.018.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vātenevoddhataṃ meghaṃ yam enam anupaśyasi / vivartamānaṃ bahuśo yatraitad bahulaṃ rajaḥ // 6.018.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete 'sitamukhā ghorā golāṅgūlā mahābalāḥ / śataṃ śatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā vai setubandhanam // 6.018.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
golāṅgūlaṃ mahāvegaṃ gavākṣaṃ nāma yūthapam / parivāryābhivartante laṅkāṃ marditum ojasā // 6.018.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhramarācaritā yatra sarvakāmaphaladrumāḥ / yaṃ sūryatulyavarṇābham anuparyeti parvatam // 6.018.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya bhāsā sadā bhānti tadvarṇā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / yasya prasthaṃ mahātmāno na tyajanti maharṣayaḥ // 6.018.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatraiṣa ramate rājan ramye kāñcanaparvate / mukhyo vānaramukhyānāṃ kesarī nāma yūthapaḥ // 6.018.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṣaṣṭir girisahasrāṇāṃ ramyāḥ kāñcanaparvatāḥ / teṣāṃ madhye girivaras tvam ivānagha rakṣasām // 6.018.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatraite kapilāḥ śvetās tāmrāsyā madhupiṅgalāḥ / nivasanty uttamagirau tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrānakhāyudhāḥ // 6.018.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃha iva caturdaṃṣṭrā vyāghrā iva durāsadāḥ / sarve vaiśvanarasamā jvalitāśīviṣopamāḥ // 6.018.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sudīrghāñcitalāṅgūlā mattamātaṃgasaṃnibhāḥ / mahāparvatasaṃkāśā mahājīmūtanisvanāḥ // 6.018.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa caiṣām adhipatir madhye tiṣṭhati vīryavān / nāmnā pṛthivyāṃ vikhyāto rājañ śatabalīti yaḥ // 6.018.039.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣaivāśaṃsate laṅkāṃ svenānīkena marditum // 6.018.039.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajo gavākṣo gavayo nalo nīlaś ca vānaraḥ / ekaika eva yūthānāṃ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ // 6.018.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathānye vānaraśreṣṭhā vindhyaparvatavāsinaḥ / na śakyante bahutvāt tu saṃkhyātuṃ laghuvikramāḥ // 6.018.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve mahārāja mahāprabhāvāḥ; sarve mahāśailanikāśakāyāḥ / sarve samarthāḥ pṛthivīṃ kṣaṇena; kartuṃ pravidhvastavikīrṇaśailām // 6.018.042	indravajrā [ttjgg]
sāraṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam / balam ālokayan sarvaṃ śuko vākyam athābravīt // 6.019.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthitān paśyasi yān etān mattān iva mahādvipān / nyagrodhān iva gāṅgeyān sālān haimavatīn iva // 6.019.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete duṣprasahā rājan balinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / daityadānavasaṃkāśā yuddhe devaparākramāḥ // 6.019.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣāṃ koṭisahasrāṇi nava pañcaca sapta ca / tathā śaṅkhasahasrāṇi tathā vṛndaśatāni ca // 6.019.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete sugrīvasacivāḥ kiṣkindhānilayāḥ sadā / harayo devagandharvair utpannāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // 6.019.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yau tau paśyasi tiṣṭhantau kumārau devarūpiṇau / maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau tābhyāṃ nāsti samo yudhi // 6.019.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmaṇā samanujñātāv amṛtaprāśināv ubhau / āśaṃsete yudhā laṅkām etau marditum ojasā // 6.019.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāv etāv etayoḥ pārśve sthitau parvatasaṃnibhau / sumukho vimukhaś caiva mṛtyuputrau pituḥ samau // 6.019.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaṃ tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantaṃ prabhinnam iva kuñjaram / yo balāt kṣobhayet kruddhaḥ samudram api vānaraḥ // 6.019.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣo 'bhigantā laṅkāyā vaidehyās tava ca prabho / enaṃ paśya purā dṛṣṭaṃ vānaraṃ punar āgatam // 6.019.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyeṣṭhaḥ kesariṇaḥ putro vātātmaja iti śrutaḥ / hanūmān iti vikhyāto laṅghito yena sāgaraḥ // 6.019.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmarūpī hariśreṣṭho balarūpasamanvitaḥ / anivāryagatiś caiva yathā satatagaḥ prabhuḥ // 6.019.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udyantaṃ bhāskaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bālaḥ kila pipāsitaḥ / triyojanasahasraṃ tu adhvānam avatīrya hi // 6.019.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādityam āhariṣyāmi na me kṣut pratiyāsyati / iti saṃcintya manasā puraiṣa baladarpitaḥ // 6.019.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anādhṛṣyatamaṃ devam api devarṣidānavaiḥ / anāsādyaiva patito bhāskarodayane girau // 6.019.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patitasya kaper asya hanur ekā śilātale / kiṃ cid bhinnā dṛḍhahanor hanūmān eṣa tena vai // 6.019.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyam āgamayogena mamaiṣa vidito hariḥ / nāsya śakyaṃ balaṃ rūpaṃ prabhāvo vānubhāṣitum // 6.019.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa āśaṃsate laṅkām eko marditum ojasā / yaś caiṣo 'nantaraḥ śūraḥ śyāmaḥ padmanibhekṣaṇaḥ // 6.019.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ikṣvākūṇām atiratho loke vikhyāta pauruṣaḥ / yasmin na calate dharmo yo dharmaṃ nātivartate // 6.019.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo brāhmam astraṃ vedāṃś ca veda vedavidāṃ varaḥ / yo bhindyād gaganaṃ bāṇaiḥ parvatāṃś cāpi dārayet // 6.019.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya mṛtyor iva krodhaḥ śakrasyeva parākramaḥ / sa eṣa rāmas tvāṃ yoddhuṃ rājan samabhivartate // 6.019.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaś caiṣa dakṣiṇe pārśve śuddhajāmbūnadaprabhaḥ / viśālavakṣās tāmrākṣo nīlakuñcitamūrdhajaḥ // 6.019.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣo 'sya lakṣmaṇo nāma bhrātā prāṇasamaḥ priyaḥ / naye yuddhe ca kuśalaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ // 6.019.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī / rāmasya dakṣiṇo bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ // 6.019.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy eṣa rāghavasyārthe jīvitaṃ parirakṣati / eṣaivāśaṃsate yuddhe nihantuṃ sarvarākṣasān // 6.019.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tu savyam asau pakṣaṃ rāmasyāśritya tiṣṭhati / rakṣogaṇaparikṣipto rājā hy eṣa vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.019.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrīmatā rājarājena laṅkāyām abhiṣecitaḥ / tvām eva pratisaṃrabdho yuddhāyaiṣo 'bhivartate // 6.019.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaṃ tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantaṃ madhye girim ivācalam / sarvaśākhāmṛgendrāṇāṃ bhartāram aparājitam // 6.019.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tejasā yaśasā buddhyā jñānenābhijanena ca / yaḥ kapīn ati babhrāja himavān iva parvatān // 6.019.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṣkindhāṃ yaḥ samadhyāste guhāṃ sagahanadrumām / durgāṃ parvatadurgasthāṃ pradhānaiḥ saha yūthapaiḥ // 6.019.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasyaiṣā kāñcanī mālā śobhate śatapuṣkarā / kāntā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ yasyāṃ lakṣmīḥ pratiṣṭhitā // 6.019.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāṃ ca mālāṃ tārāṃ ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam / sugrīvo vālinaṃ hatvā rāmeṇa pratipāditaḥ // 6.019.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ koṭisahasreṇa śaṅkūnāṃ ca śatena ca / sugrīvo vānarendras tvāṃ yuddhārtham abhivartate // 6.019.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ mahārājasamīkṣya vāhinīm; upasthitāṃ prajvalitagrahopamām / tataḥ prayatnaḥ paramo vidhīyatāṃ; yathā jayaḥ syān na paraiḥ parājayaḥ // 6.019.034	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
śukena tu samākhyātāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā hariyūthapān / samīpasthaṃ ca rāmasya bhrātaraṃ svaṃ vibhīṣaṇam // 6.020.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ bhujaṃ rāmasya dakṣiṇam / sarvavānararājaṃ ca sugrīvaṃ bhīmavikramam // 6.020.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ cid āvignahṛdayo jātakrodhaś ca rāvaṇaḥ / bhartsayām āsa tau vīrau kathānte śukasāraṇau // 6.020.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhomukhau tau praṇatāv abravīc chukasāraṇau / roṣagadgadayā vācā saṃrabdhaḥ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ // 6.020.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tāvat sadṛśaṃ nāma sacivair upajīvibhiḥ / vipriyaṃ nṛpater vaktuṃ nigrahapragrahe vibhoḥ // 6.020.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ripūṇāṃ pratikūlānāṃ yuddhārtham abhivartatām / ubhābhyāṃ sadṛśaṃ nāma vaktum aprastave stavam // 6.020.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ācāryā guravo vṛddhā vṛthā vāṃ paryupāsitāḥ / sāraṃ yad rājaśāstrāṇām anujīvyaṃ na gṛhyate // 6.020.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhīto vā na vijñāto bhāro jñānasya vochyate / īdṛśaiḥ sacivair yukto mūrkhair diṣṭyā dharāmy aham // 6.020.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu mṛtyor bhayaṃ nāsti māṃ vaktuṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ / yasya me śāsato jihvā prayacchati śubhāśubham // 6.020.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apy eva dahanaṃ spṛṣṭvā vane tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ / rājadoṣaparāmṛṣṭās tiṣṭhante nāparādhinaḥ // 6.020.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanyām aham imau pāpau śatrupakṣapraśaṃsakau / yadi pūrvopakārair me na krodho mṛdutāṃ vrajet // 6.020.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apadhvaṃsata gacchadhvaṃ saṃnikarṣād ito mama / na hi vāṃ hantum icchāmi smarann upakṛtāni vām // 6.020.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatāv eva kṛtaghnau tau mayi snehaparāṅmukhau // 6.020.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktau tu savrīḍau tāv ubhau śukasāraṇau / rāvaṇaṃ jayaśabdena pratinandyābhiniḥsṛtau // 6.020.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīt sa daśagrīvaḥ samīpasthaṃ mahodaram / upasthāpaya śīghraṃ me cārān nītiviśāradān // 6.020.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataś carāḥ saṃtvaritāḥ prāptāḥ pārthivaśāsanāt / upasthitāḥ prāñjalayo vardhayitvā jayāśiṣā // 6.020.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān abravīt tato vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / cārān pratyayikāñ śūrān bhaktān vigatasādhvasān // 6.020.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ito gacchata rāmasya vyavasāyaṃ parīkṣatha / mantreṣv abhyantarā ye 'sya prītyā tena samāgatāḥ // 6.020.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ svapiti jāgarti kim anyac ca kariṣyati / vijñāya nipuṇaṃ sarvam āgantavyam aśeṣataḥ // 6.020.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cāreṇa viditaḥ śatruḥ paṇḍitair vasudhādhipaiḥ / yuddhe svalpena yatnena samāsādya nirasyate // 6.020.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cārās tu te tathety uktvā prahṛṣṭā rākṣaseśvaram / kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ jagmur yatra rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.020.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te suvelasya śailasya samīpe rāmalakṣmaṇau / pracchannā dadṛśur gatvā sasugrīvavibhīṣaṇau // 6.020.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu dharmātmanā dṛṣṭā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasāḥ / vibhīṣaṇena tatrasthā nigṛhītā yadṛcchayā // 6.020.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarair arditās te tu vikrāntair laghuvikramaiḥ / punar laṅkām anuprāptāḥ śvasanto naṣṭacetasaḥ // 6.020.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato daśagrīvam upasthitās te; cārā bahirnityacarā niśācarāḥ / gireḥ suvelasya samīpavāsinaṃ; nyavedayan bhīmabalaṃ mahābalāḥ // 6.020.024	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [ttjr], ajñātam [jtjr])
tatas tam akṣobhya balaṃ laṅkādhipataye carāḥ / suvele rāghavaṃ śaile niviṣṭaṃ pratyavedayan // 6.021.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cārāṇāṃ rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalam / jātodvego 'bhavat kiṃ cic chārdūlaṃ vākyam abravīt // 6.021.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayathāvac ca te varṇo dīnaś cāsi niśācara / nāsi kaccid amitrāṇāṃ kruddhānāṃ vaśam āgataḥ // 6.021.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti tenānuśiṣṭas tu vācaṃ mandam udīrayat / tadā rākṣasaśārdūlaṃ śārdūlo bhayavihvalaḥ // 6.021.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na te cārayituṃ śakyā rājan vānarapuṃgavāḥ / vikrāntā balavantaś ca rāghaveṇa ca rakṣitāḥ // 6.021.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāpi saṃbhāṣituṃ śakyāḥ saṃpraśno 'tra na labhyate / sarvato rakṣyate panthā vānaraiḥ parvatopamaiḥ // 6.021.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviṣṭamātre jñāto 'haṃ bale tasminn acārite / balād gṛhīto bahubhir bahudhāsmi vidāritaḥ // 6.021.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānubhir muṣṭibhir dantais talaiś cābhihato bhṛśam / pariṇīto 'smi haribhir balavadbhir amarṣaṇaiḥ // 6.021.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pariṇīya ca sarvatra nīto 'haṃ rāmasaṃsadam / rudhirādigdhasarvāṅgo vihvalaś calitendriyaḥ // 6.021.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haribhir vadhyamānaś ca yācamānaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ / rāghaveṇa paritrāto jīvāmi ha yadṛcchayā // 6.021.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa śailaiḥ śilābhiś ca pūrayitvā mahārṇavam / dvāram āśritya laṅkāyā rāmas tiṣṭhati sāyudhaḥ // 6.021.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
garuḍavyūham āsthāya sarvato haribhir vṛtaḥ / māṃ visṛjya mahātejā laṅkām evābhivartate // 6.021.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā prākāram āyāti kṣipram ekataraṃ kuru / sītāṃ cāsmai prayacchāśu suyuddhaṃ vā pradīyatām // 6.021.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manasā saṃtatāpātha tac chrutvā rākṣasādhipaḥ / śārdūlasya mahad vākyam athovāca sa rāvaṇaḥ // 6.021.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi māṃ pratiyudhyeran devagandharvadānavāḥ / naiva sītāṃ pradāsyāmi sarvalokabhayād api // 6.021.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātejā rāvaṇaḥ punar abravīt / cāritā bhavatā senā ke 'tra śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.021.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kīdṛśāḥ kiṃprabhāvāś ca vānarā ye durāsadāḥ / kasya putrāś ca pautrāś ca tattvam ākhyāhi rākṣasa // 6.021.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatr atra pratipatsyāmi jñātvā teṣāṃ balābalam / avaśyaṃ balasaṃkhyānaṃ kartavyaṃ yuddham icchatā // 6.021.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athaivam uktaḥ śārdūlo rāvaṇenottamaś caraḥ / idaṃ vacanam ārebhe vaktuṃ rāvaṇasaṃnidhau // 6.021.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atharkṣarajasaḥ putro yudhi rājan sudurjayaḥ / gadgadasyātha putro 'tra jāmbavān iti viśrutaḥ // 6.021.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gadgadasyaiva putro 'nyo guruputraḥ śatakratoḥ / kadanaṃ yasya putreṇa kṛtam ekena rakṣasām // 6.021.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suṣeṇaś cāpi dharmātmā putro dharmasya vīryavān / saumyaḥ somātmajaś cātra rājan dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ // 6.021.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumukho durmukhaś cātra vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ / mṛtyur vānararūpeṇa nūnaṃ sṛṣṭaḥ svayambhuvā // 6.021.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putro hutavahasyātha nīlaḥ senāpatiḥ svayam / anilasya ca putro 'tra hanūmān iti viśrutaḥ // 6.021.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naptā śakrasya durdharṣo balavān aṅgado yuvā / maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau balināv aśvisaṃbhavau // 6.021.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putrā vaivasvatasyātra pañcakālāntakopamāḥ / gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ // 6.021.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śveto jyotirmukhaś cātra bhāskarasyātmasaṃbhavau / varuṇasya ca putro 'tha hemakūṭaḥ plavaṃgamaḥ // 6.021.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvakarmasuto vīro nalaḥ plavagasattamaḥ / vikrānto vegavān atra vasuputraḥ sudurdharaḥ // 6.021.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśavānarakoṭyaś ca śūrāṇāṃ yuddhakāṅkṣiṇām / śrīmatāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ śeṣān nākhyātum utsahe // 6.021.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putro daśarathasyaiṣa siṃhasaṃhanano yuvā / dūṣaṇo nihato yena kharaś ca triśirās tathā // 6.021.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāsti rāmasya sadṛśo vikrame bhuvi kaś cana / virādho nihato yena kabandhaś cāntakopamaḥ // 6.021.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaktuṃ na śakto rāmasya naraḥ kaś cid guṇān kṣitau / janasthānagatā yena tāvanto rākṣasā hatāḥ // 6.021.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇaś cātra dharmātmā mātaṃgānām ivarṣabhaḥ / yasya bāṇapathaṃ prāpya na jīved api vāsavaḥ // 6.021.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasānāṃ variṣṭhaś ca tava bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ / parigṛhya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāghavasya hite rataḥ // 6.021.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti sarvaṃ samākhyātaṃ tavedaṃ vānaraṃ balam / suvele 'dhiṣṭhitaṃ śaile śeṣakārye bhavān gatiḥ // 6.021.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tam akṣobhyabalaṃ laṅkāyāṃ nṛpateś caraḥ / suvele rāghavaṃ śaile niviṣṭaṃ pratyavedayan // 6.022.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cārāṇāṃ rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalam / jātodvego 'bhavat kiṃ cit sacivāṃś cedam abravīt // 6.022.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantriṇaḥ śīghram āyāntu sarve vai susamāhitāḥ / ayaṃ no mantrakālo hi saṃprāpta iva rākṣasāḥ // 6.022.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tac chāsanaṃ śrutvā mantriṇo 'bhyāgaman drutam / tataḥ saṃmantrayām āsa sacivai rākṣasaiḥ saha // 6.022.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantrayitvā sa durdharṣaḥ kṣamaṃ yat samanantaram / visarjayitvā sacivān praviveśa svam ālayam // 6.022.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rākṣasam āhūya vidyujjihvaṃ mahābalam / māyāvidaṃ mahāmāyaḥ prāviśad yatra maithilī // 6.022.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidyujjihvaṃ ca māyājñam abravīd rākṣasādhipaḥ / mohayiṣyāmahe sītāṃ māyayā janakātmajām // 6.022.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śiro māyāmayaṃ gṛhya rāghavasya niśācara / māṃ tvaṃ samupatiṣṭhasva mahac ca saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // 6.022.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tathety āha vidyujjihvo niśācaraḥ / tasya tuṣṭo 'bhavad rājā pradadau ca vibhūṣaṇam // 6.022.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśokavanikāyāṃ tu praviveśa mahābalaḥ / tato dīnām adainyārhāṃ dadarśa dhanadānujaḥ // 6.022.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhomukhīṃ śokaparām upaviṣṭāṃ mahītale // 6.022.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhartāram eva dhyāyantīm aśokavanikāṃ gatām / upāsyamānāṃ ghorābhī rākṣasībhir adūrataḥ // 6.022.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upasṛtya tataḥ sītāṃ praharṣan nāma kīrtayan / idaṃ ca vacanaṃ dhṛṣṭam uvāca janakātmajām // 6.022.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāntvyamānā mayā bhadre yam upāśritya valgase / khara hantā sa te bhartā rāghavaḥ samare hataḥ // 6.022.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
chinnaṃ te sarvato mūlaṃ darpas te nihato mayā / vyasanenātmanaḥ sīte mama bhāryā bhaviṣyasi // 6.022.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alpapuṇye nivṛttārthe mūḍhe paṇḍitamānini / śṛṇu bhartṛbadhaṃ sīte ghoraṃ vṛtravadhaṃ yathā // 6.022.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāyātaḥ samudrāntaṃ māṃ hantuṃ kila rāghavaḥ / vānarendrapraṇītena balena mahatā vṛtaḥ // 6.022.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃniviṣṭaḥ samudrasya tīram āsādya dakṣiṇam / balena mahatā rāmo vrajaty astaṃ divākare // 6.022.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athādhvani pariśrāntam ardharātre sthitaṃ balam / sukhasuptaṃ samāsādya cāritaṃ prathamaṃ caraiḥ // 6.022.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat prahastapraṇītena balena mahatā mama / balam asya hataṃ rātrau yatra rāmaḥ sulakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.022.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paṭṭasān parighān khaḍgāṃś cakrān daṇḍān mahāyasān / bāṇajālāni śūlāni bhāsvarān kūṭamudgarān // 6.022.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaṣṭīś ca tomarān prāsaṃś cakrāṇi musalāni ca / udyamyodyamya rakṣobhir vānareṣu nipātitāḥ // 6.022.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha suptasya rāmasya prahastena pramāthinā / asaktaṃ kṛtahastena śiraś chinnaṃ mahāsinā // 6.022.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇaḥ samutpatya nigṛhīto yadṛcchayā / diśaḥ pravrājitaḥ sarvair lakṣmaṇaḥ plavagaiḥ saha // 6.022.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvo grīvayā śete bhagnayā plavagādhipaḥ / nirastahanukaḥ śete hanūmān rākṣasair hataḥ // 6.022.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbavān atha jānubhyām utpatan nihato yudhi / paṭṭasair bahubhiś chinno nikṛttaḥ pādapo yathā // 6.022.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau nihatau vānararṣabhau / niḥśvasantau rudantau ca rudhireṇa samukṣitau // 6.022.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asinābhyāhataś chinno madhye ripuniṣūdanaḥ / abhiṣṭanati medinyāṃ panasaḥ panaso yathā // 6.022.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārācair bahubhiś chinnaḥ śete daryāṃ darīmukhaḥ / kumudas tu mahātejā niṣkūjan sāyakair hataḥ // 6.022.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgado bahubhiś chinnaḥ śarair āsādya rākṣasaiḥ / pātito rudhirodgārī kṣitau nipatito 'ṅgadaḥ // 6.022.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harayo mathitā nāgai rathajālais tathāpare / śāyitā mṛditās tatra vāyuvegair ivāmbudāḥ // 6.022.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradrutāś ca pare trastā hanyamānā jaghanyataḥ / abhidrutās tu rakṣobhiḥ siṃhair iva mahādvipāḥ // 6.022.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgare patitāḥ ke cit ke cid gaganam āśritāḥ / ṛkṣā vṛkṣān upārūḍhā vānarais tu vimiśritāḥ // 6.022.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgarasya ca tīreṣu śaileṣu ca vaneṣu ca / piṅgākṣās te virūpākṣair bahubhir bahavo hatāḥ // 6.022.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ tava hato bhartā sasainyo mama senayā / kṣatajārdraṃ rajodhvastam idaṃ cāsyāhṛtaṃ śiraḥ // 6.022.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paramadurdharṣo rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / sītāyām upaśṛṇvantyāṃ rākṣasīm idam abravīt // 6.022.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasaṃ krūrakarmāṇaṃ vidyujjihvaṃ tvam ānaya / yena tad rāghavaśiraḥ saṃgrāmāt svayam āhṛtam // 6.022.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidyujjihvas tato gṛhya śiras tat saśarāsanam / praṇāmaṃ śirasā kṛtvā rāvaṇasyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ // 6.022.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam abravīt tato rājā rāvaṇo rākṣasaṃ sthitam / vidyujjihvaṃ mahājihvaṃ samīpaparivartinam // 6.022.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agrataḥ kuru sītāyāḥ śīghraṃ dāśaratheḥ śiraḥ / avasthāṃ paścimāṃ bhartuḥ kṛpaṇā sādhu paśyatu // 6.022.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaṃ tu tad rakṣaḥ śiras tat priyadarśanam / upanikṣipya sītāyāḥ kṣipram antaradhīyata // 6.022.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaś cāpi cikṣepa bhāsvaraṃ kārmukaṃ mahat / triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ sītām idam uvāca ha // 6.022.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ tat tava rāmasya kārmukaṃ jyāsamanvitam / iha prahastenānītaṃ hatvā taṃ niśi mānuṣam // 6.022.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vidyujjihvena sahaiva tac chiro; dhanuś ca bhūmau vinikīrya rāvaṇaḥ / videharājasya sutāṃ yaśasvinīṃ; tato 'bravīt tāṃ bhava me vaśānugā // 6.022.043	upajāti (jagatī: vaṃśastha [jtjr], ajñātam [ytjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
sā sītā tac chiro dṛṣṭvā tac ca kārmukam uttamam / sugrīvapratisaṃsargam ākhyātaṃ ca hanūmatā // 6.023.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nayane mukhavarṇaṃ ca bhartus tat sadṛśaṃ mukham / keśān keśāntadeśaṃ ca taṃ ca cūḍāmaṇiṃ śubham // 6.023.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etaiḥ sarvair abhijñānair abhijñāya suduḥkhitā / vijagarhe 'tha kaikeyīṃ krośantī kurarī yathā // 6.023.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakāmā bhava kaikeyi hato 'yaṃ kulanandanaḥ / kulam utsāditaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā kalahaśīlayā // 6.023.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āryeṇa kiṃ nu kaikeyyāḥ kṛtaṃ rāmeṇa vipriyam / yad gṛhāc cīravasanas tayā prasthāpito vanam // 6.023.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu vaidehī vepamānā tapasvinī / jagāma jagatīṃ bālā chinnā tu kadalī yathā // 6.023.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā muhūrtāt samāśvasya pratilabhya ca cetanām / tac chiraḥ samupāghrāya vilalāpāyatekṣaṇā // 6.023.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hā hatāsmi mahābāho vīravratam anuvratā / imāṃ te paścimāvasthāṃ gatāsmi vidhavā kṛtā // 6.023.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prathamaṃ maraṇaṃ nāryā bhartur vaiguṇyam ucyate / suvṛttaḥ sādhuvṛttāyāḥ saṃvṛttas tvaṃ mamāgrataḥ // 6.023.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ prapannāyā magnāyāḥ śokasāgare / yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'pi tvaṃ vinipātitaḥ // 6.023.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā śvaśrūr mama kausalyā tvayā putreṇa rāghava / vatseneva yathā dhenur vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā // 6.023.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādiṣṭaṃ dīrgham āyus te yair acintyaparākrama / anṛtaṃ vacanaṃ teṣām alpāyur asi rāghava // 6.023.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā naśyati prajñā prājñasyāpi satas tava / pacaty enaṃ tathā kālo bhūtānāṃ prabhavo hy ayam // 6.023.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛṣṭaṃ mṛtyum āpannaḥ kasmāt tvaṃ nayaśāstravit / vyasanānām upāyajñaḥ kuśalo hy asi varjane // 6.023.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tvaṃ saṃpariṣvajya raudrayātinṛśaṃsayā / kālarātryā mayācchidya hṛtaḥ kamalalocanaḥ // 6.023.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upaśeṣe mahābāho māṃ vihāya tapasvinīm / priyām iva śubhāṃ nārīṃ pṛthivīṃ puruṣarṣabha // 6.023.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arcitaṃ satataṃ yatnād gandhamālyair mayā tava / idaṃ te matpriyaṃ vīra dhanuḥ kāñcanabhūṣitam // 6.023.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitrā daśarathena tvaṃ śvaśureṇa mamānagha / pūrvaiś ca pitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ nūnaṃ svarge samāgataḥ // 6.023.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divi nakṣatrabhūtas tvaṃ mahat karma kṛtaṃ priyam / puṇyaṃ rājarṣivaṃśaṃ tvam ātmanaḥ samupekṣase // 6.023.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ mān na prekṣase rājan kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase / bālāṃ bālena saṃprāptāṃ bhāryāṃ māṃ sahacāriṇīm // 6.023.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃśrutaṃ gṛhṇatā pāṇiṃ cariṣyāmīti yat tvayā / smara tan mama kākutstha naya mām api duḥkhitām // 6.023.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasmān mām apahāya tvaṃ gato gatimatāṃ vara / asmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ tyaktvā mām iha duḥkhitām // 6.023.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kalyāṇair ucitaṃ yat tat pariṣvaktaṃ mayaiva tu / kravyādais tac charīraṃ te nūnaṃ viparikṛṣyate // 6.023.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agniṣṭomādibhir yajñair iṣṭavān āptadakṣiṇaiḥ / agnihotreṇa saṃskāraṃ kena tvaṃ tu na lapsyase // 6.023.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pravrajyām upapannānāṃ trayāṇām ekam āgatam / pariprakṣyati kausalyā lakṣmaṇaṃ śokalālasā // 6.023.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tasyāḥ paripṛcchantyā vadhaṃ mitrabalasya te / tava cākhyāsyate nūnaṃ niśāyāṃ rākṣasair vadham // 6.023.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tvāṃ suptaṃ hataṃ śrutvā māṃ ca rakṣogṛhaṃ gatām / hṛdayena vidīrṇena na bhaviṣyati rāghava // 6.023.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhu pātaya māṃ kṣipraṃ rāmasyopari rāvaṇaḥ / samānaya patiṃ patnyā kuru kalyāṇam uttamam // 6.023.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śirasā me śiraś cāsya kāyaṃ kāyena yojaya / rāvaṇānugamiṣyāmi gatiṃ bhartur mahātmanaḥ // 6.023.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muhūrtam api necchāmi jīvituṃ pāpajīvinā // 6.023.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutaṃ mayā vedavidāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ pitur gṛhe / yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ // 6.023.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣamā yasmin damas tyāgaḥ satyaṃ dharmaḥ kṛtajñatā / ahiṃsā caiva bhūtānāṃ tam ṛte kā gatir mama // 6.023.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti sā duḥkhasaṃtaptā vilalāpāyatekṣaṇā / bhartuḥ śiro dhanus tatra samīkṣya janakātmajā // 6.023.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ lālapyamānāyāṃ sītāyāṃ tatra rākṣasaḥ / abhicakrāma bhartāram anīkasthaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ // 6.023.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vijayasvāryaputreti so 'bhivādya prasādya ca / nyavedayad anuprāptaṃ prahastaṃ vāhinīpatim // 6.023.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amātyaiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ prahastaḥ samupasthitaḥ / kiṃ cid ātyayikaṃ kāryaṃ teṣāṃ tvaṃ darśanaṃ kuru // 6.023.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā daśagrīvo rākṣasaprativeditam / aśokavanikāṃ tyaktvā mantriṇāṃ darśanaṃ yayau // 6.023.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu sarvaṃ samarthyaiva mantribhiḥ kṛtyam ātmanaḥ / sabhāṃ praviśya vidadhe viditvā rāmavikramam // 6.023.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antardhānaṃ tu tac chīrṣaṃ tac ca kārmukam uttamam / jagāma rāvaṇasyaiva niryāṇasamanantaram // 6.023.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasendras tu taiḥ sārdhaṃ mantribhir bhīmavikramaiḥ / samarthayām āsa tadā rāmakāryaviniścayam // 6.023.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avidūrasthitān sarvān balādhyakṣān hitaiṣiṇaḥ / abravīt kālasadṛśo rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ // 6.023.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghraṃ bherīninādena sphuṭakoṇāhatena me / samānayadhvaṃ sainyāni vaktavyaṃ ca na kāraṇam // 6.023.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tatheti pratigṛhya tad vaco; balādhipās te mahad ātmano balam / samānayaṃś caiva samāgataṃ ca te; nyavedayan bhartari yuddhakāṅkṣiṇi // 6.023.042	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sītāṃ tu mohitāṃ dṛṣṭvā saramā nāma rākṣasī / āsasādāśu vaidehīṃ priyāṃ praṇayinī sakhī // 6.024.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā hi tatra kṛtā mitraṃ sītayā rakṣyamāṇayā / rakṣantī rāvaṇād iṣṭā sānukrośā dṛḍhavratā // 6.024.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā dadarśa sakhīṃ sītāṃ saramā naṣṭacetanām / upāvṛtyotthitāṃ dhvastāṃ vaḍavām iva pāṃsuṣu // 6.024.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ samāśvāsayām āsa sakhī snehena suvratā / uktā yad rāvaṇena tvaṃ pratyuktaṃ ca svayaṃ tvayā // 6.024.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakhīsnehena tad bhīru mayā sarvaṃ pratiśrutam / līnayā ganahe śūhye bhayam utsṛjya rāvaṇāt // 6.024.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava hetor viśālākṣi na hi me jīvitaṃ priyam // 6.024.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa saṃbhrāntaś ca niṣkrānto yat kṛte rākṣasādhipaḥ / tac ca me viditaṃ sarvam abhiniṣkramya maithili // 6.024.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na śakyaṃ sauptikaṃ kartuṃ rāmasya viditātmanaḥ / vadhaś ca puruṣavyāghre tasminn evopapadyate // 6.024.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na caiva vānarā hantuṃ śakyāḥ pādapayodhinaḥ / surā devarṣabheṇeva rāmeṇa hi surakṣitāḥ // 6.024.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīrghavṛttabhujaḥ śrīmān mahoraskaḥ pratāpavān / dhanvī saṃhananopeto dharmātmā bhuvi viśrutaḥ // 6.024.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

hantā parabalaughānām acintyabalapauruṣaḥ / na hato rāghavaḥ śrīmān sīte śatrunibarhaṇaḥ // 6.024.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

iti bruvāṇā saramā rākṣasī sītayā saha / sarvodyogena sainyānāṃ śabdaṃ śuśrāva bhairavam // 6.024.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

udyatāyudhahastānāṃ rākṣasendrānuyāyinām / saṃbhramo rakṣasām eṣa tumulo lomaharṣaṇaḥ // 6.024.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrīs tvāṃ bhajati śokaghnī rakṣasāṃ bhayam āgatam / rāmāt kamalapatrākṣi daityānām iva vāsavāt // 6.024.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

girivaram abhito 'nuvartamāno; haya iva maṇḍalam āśu yaḥ karoti / tam iha śaraṇam abhyupehi devi; divasakaraṃ prabhavo hy ayaṃ prajānām // 6.024.036	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)

rākṣasānāṃ ca sarveṣām ātmanaś ca vadhena hi // 6.025.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatya rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye sarvathā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / pratineṣyati rāmas tvām ayodhyām asitekṣaṇe // 6.025.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare śabdo bherīśaṅkhasamākulaḥ / śruto vai sarvasainyānāṃ kampayan dharaṇītalam // 6.025.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu taṃ vānarasainyaśabdaṃ; laṅkāgatā rākṣasarājabhṛtyāḥ / naṣṭaujaso dainyaparītaceṣṭāḥ; śreyo na paśyanti nṛpasya doṣaiḥ // 6.025.028	indravajrā [ttjgg]
tena śaṅkhavimiśreṇa bherīśabdena rāghavaḥ / upayato mahābāhū rāmaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ // 6.026.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ ninādaṃ niśamyātha rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthāya sacivān abhyudaikṣata // 6.026.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tān sacivāṃs tatra sarvān ābhāṣya rāvaṇaḥ / sabhāṃ saṃnādayan sarvām ity uvāca mahābalaḥ // 6.026.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taraṇaṃ sāgarasyāpi vikramaṃ balasaṃcayam / yad uktavanto rāmasya bhavantas tan mayā śrutam // 6.026.004.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavataś cāpy ahaṃ vedmi yuddhe satyaparākramān // 6.026.004.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu sumahāprājño mālyavān nāma rākṣasaḥ / rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā mātuḥ paitāmaho 'bravīt // 6.026.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidyāsv abhivinīto yo rājā rājan nayānugaḥ / sa śāsti ciram aiśvaryam arīṃś ca kurute vaśe // 6.026.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃdadhāno hi kālena vigṛhṇaṃś cāribhiḥ saha / svapakṣavardhanaṃ kurvan mahad aiśvaryam aśnute // 6.026.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hīyamānena kartavyo rājñā saṃdhiḥ samena ca / na śatrum avamanyeta jyāyān kurvīta vigraham // 6.026.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan mahyaṃ rocate saṃdhiḥ saha rāmeṇa rāvaṇa / yadartham abhiyuktāḥ sma sītā tasmai pradīyatām // 6.026.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya devarṣayaḥ sarve gandharvāś ca jayaiṣiṇaḥ / virodhaṃ mā gamas tena saṃdhis te tena rocatām // 6.026.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asṛjad bhagavān pakṣau dvāv eva hi pitāmahaḥ / surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca dharmādharmau tadāśrayau // 6.026.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmo hi śrūyate pakṣaḥ surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām / adharmo rakṣasaṃ pakṣo hy asurāṇāṃ ca rāvaṇa // 6.026.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmo vai grasate 'dharmaṃ tataḥ kṛtam abhūd yugam / adharmo grasate dharmaṃ tatas tiṣyaḥ pravartate // 6.026.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat tvayā caratā lokān dharmo vinihato mahān / adharmaḥ pragṛhītaś ca tenāsmadbalinaḥ pare // 6.026.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pramādād vivṛddhas te 'dharmo 'hir grasate hi naḥ / vivardhayati pakṣaṃ ca surāṇāṃ surabhāvanaḥ // 6.026.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣayeṣu prasaktena yatkiṃcitkāriṇā tvayā / ṛṣīṇām agnikalpānām udvego janito mahān // 6.026.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ prabhāvo durdharṣaḥ pradīpta iva pāvakaḥ // 6.026.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapasā bhāvitātmāno dharmasyānugrahe ratāḥ / mukhyair yajñair yajanty ete nityaṃ tais tair dvijātayaḥ // 6.026.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
juhvaty agnīṃś ca vidhivad vedāṃś coccair adhīyate / abhibhūya ca rakṣāṃsi brahmaghoṣān udairayan // 6.026.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diśo vipradrutāḥ sarve stanayitnur ivoṣṇage // 6.026.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣīṇām agnikalpānām agnihotrasamutthitaḥ / ādatte rakṣasāṃ tejo dhūmo vyāpya diśo daśa // 6.026.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣu teṣu ca deśeṣu puṇyeṣu ca dṛḍhavrataiḥ / caryamāṇaṃ tapas tīvraṃ saṃtāpayati rākṣasān // 6.026.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utpātān vividhān dṛṣṭvā ghorān bahuvidhāṃs tathā / vināśam anupaśyāmi sarveṣāṃ rakṣasām aham // 6.026.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kharābhis tanitā ghorā meghāḥ pratibhayaṃkaraḥ / śoṇitenābhivarṣanti laṅkām uṣṇena sarvataḥ // 6.026.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rudatāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca prapatanty asrabindavaḥ / dhvajā dhvastā vivarṇāś ca na prabhānti yathāpuram // 6.026.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyālā gomāyavo gṛdhrā vāśanti ca subhairavam / praviśya laṅkām aniśaṃ samavāyāṃś ca kurvate // 6.026.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālikāḥ pāṇḍurair dantaiḥ prahasanty agrataḥ sthitāḥ / striyaḥ svapneṣu muṣṇantyo gṛhāṇi pratibhāṣya ca // 6.026.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhāṇāṃ balikarmāṇi śvānaḥ paryupabhuñjate / kharā goṣu prajāyante mūṣikā nakulaiḥ saha // 6.026.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārjārā dvīpibhiḥ sārdhaṃ sūkarāḥ śunakaiḥ saha / kiṃnarā rākṣasaiś cāpi sameyur mānuṣaiḥ saha // 6.026.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇḍurā raktapādāś ca vihagāḥ kālacoditāḥ / rākṣasānāṃ vināśāya kapotā vicaranti ca // 6.026.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cīkī kūcīti vāśantyaḥ śārikā veśmasu sthitāḥ / patanti grathitāś cāpi nirjitāḥ kalahaiṣiṇaḥ // 6.026.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karālo vikaṭo muṇḍaḥ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalaḥ / kālo gṛhāṇi sarveṣāṃ kāle kāle 'nvavekṣate // 6.026.030.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāny anyāni duṣṭāni nimittāny utpatanti ca // 6.026.030.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣṇuṃ manyāmahe rāmaṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitam / na hi mānuṣamātro 'sau rāghavo dṛḍhavikramaḥ // 6.026.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena baddhaḥ samudrasya sa setuḥ paramādbhutaḥ / kuruṣva nararājena saṃdhiṃ rāmeṇa rāvaṇa // 6.026.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ vacas tatra nigadya mālyavan; parīkṣya rakṣo'dhipater manaḥ punaḥ / anuttameṣūttamapauruṣo balī; babhūva tūṣṇīṃ samavekṣya rāvaṇam // 6.026.033	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tat tu mālyavato vākyaṃ hitam uktaṃ daśānanaḥ / na marṣayati duṣṭātmā kālasya vaśam āgataḥ // 6.027.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa baddhvā bhrukuṭiṃ vaktre krodhasya vaśam āgataḥ / amarṣāt parivṛttākṣo mālyavantam athābravīt // 6.027.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hitabuddhyā yad ahitaṃ vacaḥ paruṣam ucyate / parapakṣaṃ praviśyaiva naitac chrotragataṃ mama // 6.027.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānuṣaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ rāmam ekaṃ śākhāmṛgāśrayam / samarthaṃ manyase kena tyaktaṃ pitrā vanālayam // 6.027.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣasām īśvaraṃ māṃ ca devatānāṃ bhayaṃkaram / hīnaṃ māṃ manyase kena ahīnaṃ sarvavikramaiḥ // 6.027.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīradveṣeṇa vā śaṅke pakṣapātena vā ripoḥ / tvayāhaṃ paruṣāṇy uktaḥ paraprotsāhanena vā // 6.027.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhavantaṃ padasthaṃ hi paruṣaṃ ko 'hbidhāsyati / paṇḍitaḥ śāstratattvajño vinā protsāhanād ripoḥ // 6.027.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānīya ca vanāt sītāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam / kimarthaṃ pratidāsyāmi rāghavasya bhayād aham // 6.027.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛtaṃ vānarakoṭībhiḥ sasugrīvaṃ salakṣmaṇam / paśya kaiś cid ahobhis tvaṃ rāghavaṃ nihataṃ mayā // 6.027.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvandve yasya na tiṣṭhanti daivatāny api saṃyuge / sa kasmād rāvaṇo yuddhe bhayam āhārayiṣyati // 6.027.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvidhā bhajyeyam apy evaṃ na nameyaṃ tu kasya cit / eṣa me sahajo doṣaḥ svabhāvo duratikramaḥ // 6.027.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tāvat samudre tu setur baddho yadṛcchayā / rāmeṇa vismayaḥ ko 'tra yena te bhayam āgatam // 6.027.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu tīrtvārṇavaṃ rāmaḥ saha vānarasenayā / pratijānāmi te satyaṃ na jīvan pratiyāsyati // 6.027.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ ruṣṭaṃ vijñāya rāvaṇam / vrīḍito mālyavān vākyaṃ nottaraṃ pratyapadyata // 6.027.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jayāśiṣā ca rājānaṃ vardhayitvā yathocitam / mālyavān abhyanujñāto jagāma svaṃ niveśanam // 6.027.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇas tu sahāmātyo mantrayitvā vimṛśya ca / laṅkāyām atulāṃ guptiṃ kārayām āsa rākṣasaḥ // 6.027.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyādideśa ca pūrvasyāṃ prahastaṃ dvāri rākṣasaṃ / dakṣiṇasyāṃ mahāvīryau mahāpārśva mahodarau // 6.027.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paścimāyām atho dvāri putram indrajitaṃ tathā / vyādideśa mahāmāyaṃ rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtam // 6.027.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttarasyāṃ puradvāri vyādiśya śukasāraṇau / svayaṃ cātra bhaviṣyāmi mantriṇas tān uvāca ha // 6.027.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasaṃ tu virūpākṣaṃ mahāvīryaparākramam / madhyame 'sthāpayad gulme bahubhiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ // 6.027.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃvidhānaṃ laṅkāyāṃ kṛtvā rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ / mene kṛtārtham ātmānaṃ kṛtāntavaśam āgataḥ // 6.027.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visarjayām āsa tataḥ sa mantriṇo; vidhānam ājñāpya purasya puṣkalam / jayāśiṣā mantragaṇena pūjito; viveśa so 'ntaḥpuram ṛddhiman mahat // 6.027.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
naravānararājau tau sa ca vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ / jāmbavān ṛkṣarājaś ca rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.028.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgado vāliputraś ca saumitriḥ śarabhaḥ kapiḥ / suṣeṇaḥ sahadāyādo maindo dvivida eva ca // 6.028.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajo gavākṣo kumudo nalo 'tha panasas tathā / amitraviṣayaṃ prāptāḥ samavetāḥ samarthayan // 6.028.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ sā lakṣyate laṅkā purī rāvaṇapālitā / sāsuroragagandharvair amarair api durjayā // 6.028.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāryasiddhiṃ puraskṛtya mantrayadhvaṃ vinirṇaye / nityaṃ saṃnihito hy atra rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ // 6.028.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā teṣu bruvāṇeṣu rāvaṇāvarajo 'bravīt / vākyam agrāmyapadavat puṣkalārthaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.028.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
analaḥ śarabhaś caiva saṃpātiḥ praghasas tathā / gatvā laṅkāṃ mamāmātyāḥ purīṃ punar ihāgatāḥ // 6.028.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūtvā śakunayaḥ sarve praviṣṭāś ca ripor balam / vidhānaṃ vihitaṃ yac ca tad dṛṣṭvā samupasthitāḥ // 6.028.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃvidhānaṃ yathāhus te rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ / rāma tad bruvataḥ sarvaṃ yathātathyena me śṛṇu // 6.028.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvaṃ prahastaḥ sabalo dvāram āsādya tiṣṭhati / dakṣiṇaṃ ca mahāvīryau mahāpārśvamahodarau // 6.028.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrajit paścimadvāraṃ rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtaḥ / paṭṭasāsidhanuṣmadbhiḥ śūlamudgarapāṇibhiḥ // 6.028.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śūrair āvṛto rāvaṇātmajaḥ / rākṣasānāṃ sahasrais tu bahubhiḥ śastrapāṇibhiḥ // 6.028.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuktaḥ paramasaṃvigno rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtaḥ / uttaraṃ nagaradvāraṃ rāvaṇaḥ svayam āsthitaḥ // 6.028.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
virūpākṣas tu mahatā śūlakhaḍgadhanuṣmatā / balena rākṣasaiḥ sārdhaṃ madhyamaṃ gulmam āsthitaḥ // 6.028.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etān evaṃvidhān gulmāṃl laṅkāyāṃ samudīkṣya te / māmakāḥ sacivāḥ sarve śīghraṃ punar ihāgatāḥ // 6.028.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajānāṃ ca sahasraṃ ca rathānām ayutaṃ pure / hayānām ayute dve ca sāgrakoṭī ca rakṣasām // 6.028.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikrāntā balavantaś ca saṃyugeṣv ātatāyinaḥ / iṣṭā rākṣasarājasya nityam ete niśācarāḥ // 6.028.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekaikasyātra yuddhārthe rākṣasasya viśāṃ pate / parivāraḥ sahasrāṇāṃ sahasram upatiṣṭhate // 6.028.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāṃ pravṛttiṃ laṅkāyāṃ mantriproktaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ / rāmaṃ kamalapatrākṣam idam uttaram abravīt // 6.028.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuberaṃ tu yadā rāma rāvaṇaḥ pratyayudhyata / ṣaṣṭiḥ śatasahasrāṇi tadā niryānti rākṣasāḥ // 6.028.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parākrameṇa vīryeṇa tejasā sattvagauravāt / sadṛśā yo 'tra darpeṇa rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ // 6.028.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra manyur na kartavyo roṣaye tvāṃ na bhīṣaye / samartho hy asi vīryeṇa surāṇām api nigrahe // 6.028.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad bhavāṃś caturaṅgeṇa balena mahatā vṛtaḥ / vyūhyedaṃ vānarānīkaṃ nirmathiṣyasi rāvaṇam // 6.028.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇāvaraje vākyam evaṃ bruvati rāghavaḥ / śatrūṇāṃ pratighātārtham idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 6.028.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvadvāre tu laṅkāyā nīlo vānarapuṃgavaḥ / prahastaṃ pratiyoddhā syād vānarair bahubhir vṛtaḥ // 6.028.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgado vāliputras tu balena mahatā vṛtaḥ / dakṣiṇe bādhatāṃ dvāre mahāpārśvamahodarau // 6.028.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmān paścimadvāraṃ nipīḍya pavanātmajaḥ / praviśatv aprameyātmā bahubhiḥ kapibhir vṛtaḥ // 6.028.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daityadānavasaṃghānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām / viprakārapriyaḥ kṣudro varadānabalānvitaḥ // 6.028.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parikrāmati yaḥ sarvāṃl lokān saṃtāpayan prajāḥ / tasyāhaṃ rākṣasendrasya svayam eva vadhe dhṛtaḥ // 6.028.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttaraṃ nagaradvāram ahaṃ saumitriṇā saha / nipīḍyābhipravekṣyāmi sabalo yatra rāvaṇaḥ // 6.028.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarendraś ca balavān ṛkṣarājaś ca jāmbavān / rākṣasendrānujaś caiva gulme bhavatu madhyame // 6.028.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na caiva mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ kāryaṃ haribhir āhave / eṣā bhavatu naḥ saṃjñā yuddhe 'smin vānare bale // 6.028.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarā eva niścihnaṃ svajane 'smin bhaviṣyati / vayaṃ tu mānuṣeṇaiva sapta yotsyāmahe parān // 6.028.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham eva saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena mahaujasā / ātmanā pañcamaś cāyaṃ sakhā mama vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.028.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmaḥ kāryasiddhyartham evam uktvā vibhīṣaṇam / suvelārohaṇe buddhiṃ cakāra matimān matim // 6.028.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu rāmo mahatā balena; pracchādya sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ mahātmā / prahṛṣṭarūpo 'bhijagāma laṅkāṃ; kṛtvā matiṃ so 'rivadhe mahātmā // 6.028.036	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa tu kṛtvā suvelasya matim ārohaṇaṃ prati / lakṣmaṇānugato rāmaḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt // 6.029.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇaṃ ca dharmajñam anuraktaṃ niśācaram / mantrajñaṃ ca vidhijñaṃ ca ślakṣṇayā parayā girā // 6.029.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suvelaṃ sādhu śailendram imaṃ dhātuśataiś citam / adhyārohāmahe sarve vatsyāmo 'tra niśām imām // 6.029.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkāṃ cālokayiṣyāmo nilayaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ / yena me maraṇāntāya hṛtā bhāryā durātmanā // 6.029.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena dharmo na vijñāto na vṛttaṃ na kulaṃ tathā / rākṣasyā nīcayā buddhyā yena tad garhitaṃ kṛtam // 6.029.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmin me vardhate roṣaḥ kīrtite rākṣasādhame / yasyāparādhān nīcasya vadhaṃ drakṣyāmi rakṣasām // 6.029.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eko hi kurute pāpaṃ kālapāśavaśaṃ gataḥ / nīcenātmāpacāreṇa kulaṃ tena vinaśyati // 6.029.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ saṃmantrayann eva sakrodho rāvaṇaṃ prati / rāmaḥ suvelaṃ vāsāya citrasānum upāruhat // 6.029.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣṭhato lakṣmaṇa cainam anvagacchat samāhitaḥ / saśaraṃ cāpam udyamya sumahad vikrame rataḥ // 6.029.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam anvarohat sugrīvaḥ sāmātyaḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ / hanūmān aṅgado nīlo maindo dvivida eva ca // 6.029.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ / panasaḥ kumudaś caiva haro rambhaś ca yūthapaḥ // 6.029.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete cānye ca bahavo vānarāḥ śīghragāminaḥ / te vāyuvegapravaṇās taṃ giriṃ giricāriṇaḥ // 6.029.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhyārohanta śataśaḥ suvelaṃ yatra rāghavaḥ // 6.029.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tv adīrgheṇa kālena girim āruhya sarvataḥ / dadṛśuḥ śikhare tasya viṣaktām iva khe purīm // 6.029.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ śubhāṃ pravaradvārāṃ prākāravaraśobhitām / laṅkāṃ rākṣasasaṃpūrṇāṃ dadṛśur hariyūthapāḥ // 6.029.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prākāracayasaṃsthaiś ca tathā nīlair niśācaraiḥ / dadṛśus te hariśreṣṭhāḥ prākāram aparaṃ kṛtam // 6.029.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasān yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / mumucur vipulān nādāṃs tatra rāmasya paśyataḥ // 6.029.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'stam agamat sūryaḥ saṃdhyayā pratirañjitaḥ / pūrṇacandrapradīpā ca kṣapā samabhivartate // 6.029.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa rāmo harivāhinīpatir; vibhīṣaṇena pratinandya satkṛtaḥ / salakṣmaṇo yūthapayūthasaṃvṛtaḥ; suvela pṛṣṭhe nyavasad yathāsukham // 6.029.018	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tāṃ rātrim uṣitās tatra suvele haripuṃgavāḥ / laṅkāyāṃ dadṛśur vīrā vanāny upavanāni ca // 6.030.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samasaumyāni ramyāṇi viśālāny āyatāni ca / dṛṣṭiramyāṇi te dṛṣṭvā babhūvur jātavismayāḥ // 6.030.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
campakāśokapuṃnāgasālatālasamākulā / tamālavanasaṃchannā nāgamālāsamāvṛtā // 6.030.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hintālair arjunair nīpaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca puṣpitaiḥ / tilakaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca paṭālaiś ca samantataḥ // 6.030.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuśubhe puṣpitāgraiś ca latāparigatair drumaiḥ / laṅkā bahuvidhair divyair yathendrasyāmarāvatī // 6.030.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vicitrakusumopetai raktakomalapallavaiḥ / śādvalaiś ca tathā nīlaiś citrābhir vanarājibhiḥ // 6.030.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandhāḍhyāny abhiramyāṇi puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca / dhārayanty agamās tatra bhūṣaṇānīva mānavāḥ // 6.030.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac caitrarathasaṃkāśaṃ manojñaṃ nandanopamam / vanaṃ sarvartukaṃ ramyaṃ śuśubhe ṣaṭpadāyutam // 6.030.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
natyūhakoyaṣṭibhakair nṛtyamānaiś ca barhibhiḥ / rutaṃ parabhṛtānāṃ ca śuśruve vananirjhare // 6.030.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityamattavihaṃgāni bhramarācaritāni ca / kokilākulaṣaṇḍāni vihagābhirutāni ca // 6.030.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhṛṅgarājābhigītāni bhramaraiḥ sevitāni ca / koṇālakavighuṣṭāni sārasābhirutāni ca // 6.030.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viviśus te tatas tāni vanāny upavanāni ca / hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditā vīrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // 6.030.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ praviśatāṃ tatra vānarāṇāṃ mahaujasām / puṣpasaṃsargasurabhir vavau ghrāṇasukho 'nilaḥ // 6.030.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anye tu harivīrāṇāṃ yūthān niṣkramya yūthapāḥ / sugrīveṇābhyanujñātā laṅkāṃ jagmuḥ patākinīm // 6.030.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vitrāsayanto vihagāṃs trāsayanto mṛgadvipān / kampayantaś ca tāṃ laṅkāṃ nādaiḥ svair nadatāṃ varāḥ // 6.030.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kurvantas te mahāvegā mahīṃ cāraṇapīḍitām / rajaś ca sahasaivordhvaṃ jagāma caraṇoddhatam // 6.030.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛkṣāḥ siṃhā varāhāś ca mahiṣā vāraṇā mṛgāḥ / tena śabdena vitrastā jagmur bhītā diśo daśa // 6.030.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śikharaṃ tu trikūṭasya prāṃśu caikaṃ divispṛśam / samantāt puṣpasaṃchannaṃ mahārajatasaṃnibham // 6.030.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatayojanavistīrṇaṃ vimalaṃ cārudarśanam / ślakṣṇaṃ śrīman mahac caiva duṣprāpaṃ śakunair api // 6.030.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manasāpi durārohaṃ kiṃ punaḥ karmaṇā janaiḥ / niviṣṭā tatra śikhare laṅkā rāvaṇapālitā // 6.030.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā purī gopurair uccaiḥ pāṇḍurāmbudasaṃnibhaiḥ / kāñcanena ca sālena rājatena ca śobhitā // 6.030.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāsādaiś ca vimānaiś ca laṅkā paramabhūṣitā / ghanair ivātapāpāye madhyamaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ padam // 6.030.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasyāṃ stambhasahasreṇa prāsādaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ / kailāsaśikharākāro dṛśyate kham ivollikhan // 6.030.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caityaḥ sa rākṣasendrasya babhūva purabhūṣaṇam / śatena rakṣasāṃ nityaṃ yaḥ samagreṇa rakṣyate // 6.030.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ samṛddhāṃ samṛddhārtho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / rāvaṇasya purīṃ rāmo dadarśa saha vānaraiḥ // 6.030.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ ratnapūrṇāṃ bahusaṃvidhānāṃ; prāsādamālābhir alaṃkṛtāṃ ca / purīṃ mahāyantrakavāṭamukhyāṃ; dadarśa rāmo mahatā balena // 6.030.026	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
atha tasmin nimittāni dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ / lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmisaṃpannam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 6.031.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parigṛhyodakaṃ śītaṃ vanāni phalavanti ca / balaughaṃ saṃvibhajyemaṃ vyūhya tiṣṭhema lakṣmaṇa // 6.031.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lokakṣayakaraṃ bhīmaṃ bhayaṃ paśyāmy upasthitam / nibarhaṇaṃ pravīrāṇām ṛkṣavānararakṣasām // 6.031.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vātāś ca paruṣaṃ vānti kampate ca vasuṃdharā / parvatāgrāṇi vepante patanti dharaṇīdharāḥ // 6.031.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
meghāḥ kravyādasaṃkāśāḥ paruṣāḥ paruṣasvanāḥ / krūrāḥ krūraṃ pravarṣanti miśraṃ śoṇitabindubhiḥ // 6.031.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raktacandanasaṃkāśā saṃdhyāparamadāruṇā / jvalac ca nipataty etad ādityād agnimaṇḍalam // 6.031.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādityam abhivāśyante janayanto mahad bhayam / dīnā dīnasvarā ghorā apraśastā mṛgadvijāḥ // 6.031.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rajanyām aprakāśaś ca saṃtāpayati candramāḥ / kṛṣṇaraktāṃśuparyanto yathā lokasya saṃkṣaye // 6.031.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hrasvo rūkṣo 'praśastaś ca pariveṣaḥ sulohitaḥ / ādityamaṇḍale nīlaṃ lakṣma lakṣmaṇa dṛśyate // 6.031.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛśyante na yathāvac ca nakṣatrāṇy abhivartate / yugāntam iva lokasya paśya lakṣmaṇa śaṃsati // 6.031.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kākāḥ śyenās tathā gṛdhrā nīcaiḥ paripatanti ca / śivāś cāpy aśivā vācaḥ pravadanti mahāsvanāḥ // 6.031.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
