kṣipram adya durādharṣāṃ purīṃ rāvaṇapālitām / abhiyāma javenaiva sarvato haribhir vṛtāḥ // 6.031.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ tu vadan vīro lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / tasmād avātarac chīghraṃ parvatāgrān mahābalaḥ // 6.031.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avatīrya tu dharmātmā tasmāc chailāt sa rāghavaḥ / paraiḥ paramadurdharṣaṃ dadarśa balam ātmanaḥ // 6.031.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃnahya tu sasugrīvaḥ kapirājabalaṃ mahat / kālajño rāghavaḥ kāle saṃyugāyābhyacodayat // 6.031.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kāle mahābāhur balena mahatā vṛtaḥ / prasthitaḥ purato dhanvī laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm // 6.031.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ vibhīṣaṇa sugrīvau hanūmāñ jāmbavān nalaḥ / ṛkṣarājas tathā nīlo lakṣmaṇaś cānyayus tadā // 6.031.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paścāt sumahatī pṛtanarkṣavanaukasām / pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmim anuyāti sma rāghavam // 6.031.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailaśṛṅgāṇi śataśaḥ pravṛddhāṃś ca mahīruhām / jagṛhuḥ kuñjaraprakhyā vānarāḥ paravāraṇāḥ // 6.031.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tv adīrgheṇa kālena bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / rāvaṇasya purīṃ laṅkām āsedatur ariṃdamau // 6.031.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patākāmālinīṃ ramyām udyānavanaśobhitām / citravaprāṃ suduṣprāpām uccaprākāratoraṇām // 6.031.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ surair api durdharṣāṃ rāmavākyapracoditāḥ / yathānideśaṃ saṃpīḍya nyaviśanta vanaukasaḥ // 6.031.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkāyās tūttaradvāraṃ śailaśṛṅgam ivonnatam / rāmaḥ sahānujo dhanvī jugopa ca rurodha ca // 6.031.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkām upaniviṣṭaś ca rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / lakṣmaṇānucaro vīraḥ purīṃ rāvaṇapālitām // 6.031.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttaradvāram āsādya yatra tiṣṭhati rāvaṇaḥ / nānyo rāmād dhi tad dvāraṃ samarthaḥ parirakṣitum // 6.031.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇādhiṣṭhitaṃ bhīmaṃ varuṇeneva sāgaram / sāyudhau rākṣasair bhīmair abhiguptaṃ samantataḥ // 6.031.026.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laghūnāṃ trāsajananaṃ pātālam iva dānavaiḥ // 6.031.026.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinyastāni ca yodhānāṃ bahūni vividhāni ca / dadarśāyudhajālāni tathaiva kavacāni ca // 6.031.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvaṃ tu dvāram āsādya nīlo haricamūpatiḥ / atiṣṭhat saha maindena dvividena ca vīryavān // 6.031.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgado dakṣiṇadvāraṃ jagrāha sumahābalaḥ / ṛṣabheṇa gavākṣeṇa gajena gavayena ca // 6.031.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmān paścimadvāraṃ rarakṣa balavān kapiḥ / pramāthi praghasābhyāṃ ca vīrair anyaiś ca saṃgataḥ // 6.031.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madhyame ca svayaṃ gulme sugrīvaḥ samatiṣṭhata / saha sarvair hariśreṣṭhaiḥ suparṇaśvasanopamaiḥ // 6.031.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṇāṃ tu ṣaṭtriṃśat koṭyaḥ prakhyātayūthapāḥ / nipīḍyopaniviṣṭāś ca sugrīvo yatra vānaraḥ // 6.031.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāsanena tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ / dvāre dvāre harīṇāṃ tu koṭiṃ koṭiṃ nyaveśayat // 6.031.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paścimena tu rāmasya sugrīvaḥ saha jāmbavān / adūrān madhyame gulme tasthau bahubalānugaḥ // 6.031.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu vānaraśārdūlāḥ śārdūlā iva daṃṣṭriṇaḥ / gṛhītvā drumaśailāgrān hṛṣṭā yuddhāya tasthire // 6.031.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve vikṛtalāṅgūlāḥ sarve daṃṣṭrānakhāyudhāḥ / sarve vikṛtacitrāṅgāḥ sarve ca vikṛtānanāḥ // 6.031.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśanāgabalāḥ ke cit ke cid daśaguṇottarāḥ / ke cin nāgasahasrasya babhūvus tulyavikramāḥ // 6.031.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
santi caughā balāḥ ke cit ke cic chataguṇottarāḥ / aprameyabalāś cānye tatrāsan hariyūthapāḥ // 6.031.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adbhutaś ca vicitraś ca teṣām āsīt samāgamaḥ / tatra vānarasainyānāṃ śalabhānām ivodgamaḥ // 6.031.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paripūrṇam ivākāśaṃ saṃchanneva ca medinī / laṅkām upaniviṣṭaiś ca saṃpatadbhiś ca vānaraiḥ // 6.031.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ pṛthag ṛkṣavanaukasām / laṅkā dvārāṇy upājagmur anye yoddhuṃ samantataḥ // 6.031.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āvṛtaḥ sa giriḥ sarvais taiḥ samantāt plavaṃgamaiḥ / ayutānāṃ sahasraṃ ca purīṃ tām abhyavartata // 6.031.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarair balavadbhiś ca babhūva drumapāṇibhiḥ / sarvataḥ saṃvṛtā laṅkā duṣpraveśāpi vāyunā // 6.031.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasā vismayaṃ jagmuḥ sahasābhinipīḍitāḥ / vānarair meghasaṃkāśaiḥ śakratulyaparākramaiḥ // 6.031.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāñ śabdo 'bhavat tatra balaughasyābhivartataḥ / sāgarasyeva bhinnasya yathā syāt salilasvanaḥ // 6.031.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena śabdena mahatā saprākārā satoraṇā / laṅkā pracalitā sarvā saśailavanakānanā // 6.031.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmalakṣmaṇaguptā sā sugrīveṇa ca vāhinī / babhūva durdharṣatarā sarvair api surāsuraiḥ // 6.031.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavaḥ saṃniveśyaivaṃ sainyaṃ svaṃ rakṣasāṃ vadhe / saṃmantrya mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ niścitya ca punaḥ punaḥ // 6.031.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ānantaryam abhiprepsuḥ kramayogārthatattvavit / vibhīṣaṇasyānumate rājadharmam anusmaran // 6.031.049.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadaṃ vālitanayaṃ samāhūyedam abravīt // 6.031.049.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatvā saumya daśagrīvaṃ brūhi madvacanāt kape / laṅghayitvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ bhayaṃ tyaktvā gatavyathaḥ // 6.031.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhraṣṭaśrīkagataiśvaryamumūrṣo naṣṭacetanaḥ / ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca gandharvāpsarasāṃ tathā // 6.031.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāgānām atha yakṣāṇāṃ rājñāṃ ca rajanīcara / yac ca pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mohād avaliptena rākṣasa // 6.031.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nūnam adya gato darpaḥ svayambhū varadānajaḥ / yasya daṇḍadharas te 'haṃ dārāharaṇakarśitaḥ // 6.031.053.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daṇḍaṃ dhārayamāṇas tu laṅkādvare vyavasthitaḥ // 6.031.053.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padavīṃ devatānāṃ ca maharṣīṇāṃ ca rākṣasa / rājarṣīṇāṃ ca sarveṇāṃ gamiṣyasi mayā hataḥ // 6.031.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balena yena vai sītāṃ māyayā rākṣasādhama / mām atikrāmayitvā tvaṃ hṛtavāṃs tad vidarśaya // 6.031.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arākṣasam imaṃ lokaṃ kartāsmi niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / na cec charaṇam abhyeṣi mām upādāya maithilīm // 6.031.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmātmā rakṣasāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ saṃprāpto 'yaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ / laṅkaiśvaryaṃ dhruvaṃ śrīmān ayaṃ prāpnoty akaṇṭakam // 6.031.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi rājyam adharmeṇa bhoktuṃ kṣaṇam api tvayā / śakyaṃ mūrkhasahāyena pāpenāvijitātmanā // 6.031.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yudhyasva vā dhṛtiṃ kṛtvā śauryam ālambya rākṣasa / maccharais tvaṃ raṇe śāntas tataḥ pūto bhaviṣyasi // 6.031.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady āviśasi lokāṃs trīn pakṣibhūto manojavaḥ / mama cakṣuṣpathaṃ prāpya na jīvan pratiyāsyasi // 6.031.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bravīmi tvāṃ hitaṃ vākyaṃ kriyatām aurdhvadekikam / sudṛṣṭā kriyatāṃ laṅkā jīvitaṃ te mayi sthitam // 6.031.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktaḥ sa tu tāreyo rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā / jagāmākāśam āviśya mūrtimān iva havyavāṭ // 6.031.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'tipatya muhūrtena śrīmān rāvaṇamandiram / dadarśāsīnam avyagraṃ rāvaṇaṃ sacivaiḥ saha // 6.031.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tasyāvidūreṇa nipatya haripuṃgavaḥ / dīptāgnisadṛśas tasthāv aṅgadaḥ kanakāṅgadaḥ // 6.031.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad rāmavacanaṃ sarvam anyūnādhikam uttamam / sāmātyaṃ śrāvayām āsa nivedyātmānam ātmanā // 6.031.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūto 'haṃ kosalendrasya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / vāliputro 'ṅgado nāma yadi te śrotram āgataḥ // 6.031.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āha tvāṃ rāghavo rāmaḥ kausalyānandavardhanaḥ / niṣpatya pratiyudhyasva nṛśaṃsaṃ puruṣādhama // 6.031.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hantāsmi tvāṃ sahāmātyaṃ saputrajñātibāndhavam / nirudvignās trayo lokā bhaviṣyanti hate tvayi // 6.031.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasām / śatrum adyoddhariṣyāmi tvām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca kaṇṭakam // 6.031.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇasya caiśvaryaṃ bhaviṣyati hate tvayi / na cet satkṛtya vaidehīṃ praṇipatya pradāsyasi // 6.031.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ bruvāṇe haripuṃgave / amarṣavaśam āpanno niśācaragaṇeśvaraḥ // 6.031.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa roṣatāmrākṣaḥ śaśāsa sacivāṃs tadā / gṛhyatām eṣa durmedhā vadhyatām iti cāsakṛt // 6.031.072	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dīptāgnisamatejasaḥ / jagṛhus taṃ tato ghorāś catvāro rajanīcarāḥ // 6.031.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
grāhayām āsa tāreyaḥ svayam ātmānam ātmanā / balaṃ darśayituṃ vīro yātudhānagaṇe tadā // 6.031.074	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tān bāhudvaye saktān ādāya patagān iva / prāsādaṃ śailasaṃkāśam utpāpātāṅgadas tadā // 6.031.075	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te 'ntarikṣād vinirdhūtās tasya vegena rākṣasāḥ / bhumau nipatitāḥ sarve rākṣasendrasya paśyataḥ // 6.031.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prāsādaśikharaṃ śailaśṛṅgam ivonnatam / tat paphāla tadākrāntaṃ daśagrīvasya paśyataḥ // 6.031.077	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaṅktvā prāsādaśikharaṃ nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ / vinadya sumahānādam utpapāta vihāyasā // 6.031.078	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇas tu paraṃ cakre krodhaṃ prāsādadharṣaṇāt / vināśaṃ cātmanaḥ paśyan niḥśvāsaparamo 'bhavat // 6.031.079	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmas tu bahubhir hṛṣṭair ninadadbhiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ / vṛto ripuvadhākāṅkṣī yuddhāyaivābhyavartata // 6.031.080	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suṣeṇas tu mahāvīryo girikūṭopamo hariḥ / bahubhiḥ saṃvṛtas tatra vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ // 6.031.081	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdvārāṇi sarvāṇi sugrīvavacanāt kapiḥ / paryākramata durdharṣo nakṣatrāṇīva candramāḥ // 6.031.082	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām akṣauhiṇiśataṃ samavekṣya vanaukasām / laṅkām upaniviṣṭānāṃ sāgaraṃ cātivartatām // 6.031.083	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasā vismayaṃ jagmus trāsaṃ jagmus tathāpare / apare samaroddharṣād dharṣam evopapedire // 6.031.084	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtsnaṃ hi kapibhir vyāptaṃ prākāraparikhāntaram / dadṛśū rākṣasā dīnāḥ prākāraṃ vānarīkṛtam // 6.031.085	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin mahābhīṣaṇake pravṛtte; kolāhale rākṣasarājadhānyām / pragṛhya rakṣāṃsi mahāyudhāni; yugāntavātā iva saṃviceruḥ // 6.031.086	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tatas te rākṣasās tatra gatvā rāvaṇamandiram / nyavedayan purīṃ ruddhāṃ rāmeṇa saha vānaraiḥ // 6.032.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ruddhāṃ tu nagarīṃ śrutvā jātakrodho niśācaraḥ / vidhānaṃ dviguṇaṃ śrutvā prāsādaṃ so 'dhyarohata // 6.032.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśāvṛtāṃ laṅkāṃ saśailavanakānanām / asaṃkhyeyair harigaṇaiḥ sarvato yuddhakāṅkṣibhiḥ // 6.032.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā vānaraiḥ sarvāṃ vasudhāṃ kavalīkṛtām / kathaṃ kṣapayitavyāḥ syur iti cintāparo 'bhavat // 6.032.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cintayitvā suciraṃ dhairyam ālambya rāvaṇaḥ / rāghavaṃ hariyūthāṃś ca dadarśāyatalocanaḥ // 6.032.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prekṣato rākṣasendrasya tāny anīkāni bhāgaśaḥ / rāghavapriyakāmārthaṃ laṅkām āruruhus tadā // 6.032.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tāmravaktrā hemābhā rāmārthe tyaktajīvitāḥ / laṅkām evāhyavartanta sālatālaśilāyudhāḥ // 6.032.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te drumaiḥ parvatāgraiś ca muṣṭibhiś ca plavaṃgamāḥ / prāsādāgrāṇi coccāni mamantus toraṇāni ca // 6.032.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pārikhāḥ pūrayanti sma prasannasalilāyutāḥ / pāṃsubhiḥ parvatāgraiś ca tṛṇaiḥ kāṣṭhaiś ca vānarāḥ // 6.032.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sahasrayūthāś ca koṭiyūthāś ca yūthapāḥ / koṭīśatayutāś cānye laṅkām āruruhus tadā // 6.032.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanāni pramṛdnantas toraṇāni plavaṃgamāḥ / kailāsaśikharābhāni gopurāṇi pramathya ca // 6.032.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ / laṅkāṃ tām abhyavartanta mahāvāraṇasaṃnibhāḥ // 6.032.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jayaty atibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ / rājā jayati sugrīvo rāghaveṇābhipālitaḥ // 6.032.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ ghoṣayantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ / abhyadhāvanta laṅkāyāḥ prākāraṃ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // 6.032.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīrabāhuḥ subāhuś ca nalaś ca vanagocaraḥ / nipīḍyopaniviṣṭās te prākāraṃ hariyūthapāḥ // 6.032.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare cakruḥ skandhāvāraniveśanam // 6.032.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvadvāraṃ tu kumudaḥ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ / āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau haribhir jitakāśibhiḥ // 6.032.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dakṣiṇadvāram āgamya vīraḥ śatabaliḥ kapiḥ / āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau viṃśatyā koṭibhir vṛtaḥ // 6.032.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suṣeṇaḥ paścimadvāraṃ gatas tārā pitā hariḥ / āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau ṣaṣṭi koṭibhir āvṛtaḥ // 6.032.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttaradvāram āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha / āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau sugrīvaś ca harīśvaraḥ // 6.032.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
golāṅgūlo mahākāyo gavākṣo bhīmadarśanaḥ / vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahāvīryas tasthau rāmasya pārvataḥ // 6.032.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣkāṇāṃ bhīmavegānāṃ dhūmraḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ / vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahāvīryas tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ // 6.032.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃnaddhas tu mahāvīryo gadāpāṇir vibhīṣaṇaḥ / vṛto yas tais tu sacivais tasthau tatra mahābalaḥ // 6.032.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ / samantāt parighāvanto rarakṣur harivāhinīm // 6.032.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kopaparītātmā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / niryāṇaṃ sarvasainyānāṃ drutam ājñāpayat tadā // 6.032.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣpatanti tataḥ sainyā hṛṣṭā rāvaṇacoditāḥ / samaye pūryamāṇasya vegā iva mahodadheḥ // 6.032.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare ghoraḥ saṃgrāmaḥ samapadyata / rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca yathā devāsure purā // 6.032.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gadābhiḥ pradīptābhiḥ śaktiśūlaparaśvadhaiḥ / nijaghnur vānarān ghorāḥ kathayantaḥ svavikramān // 6.032.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā vṛkṣair mahākāyāḥ parvatāgraiś ca vānarāḥ / rākṣasās tāni rakṣāṃsi nakhair dantaiś ca vegitāḥ // 6.032.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasās tv apare bhīmāḥ prākārasthā mahīgatān / bhiṇḍipālaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca śūlaiś caiva vyadārayan // 6.032.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāś cāpi saṃkruddhāḥ prākārasthān mahīgatāḥ / rākṣasān pātayām āsuḥ samāplutya plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.032.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa saṃprahāras tumulo māṃsaśoṇitakardamaḥ / rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca saṃbabhūvādbhutopamāḥ // 6.032.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yudhyatāṃ tu tatas teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām / rakṣasāṃ saṃbabhūvātha balakopaḥ sudāruṇaḥ // 6.033.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te hayaiḥ kāñcanāpīḍair dhvajaiś cāgniśikhopamaiḥ / rathaiś cādityasaṃkāśaiḥ kavacaiś ca manoramaiḥ // 6.033.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niryayū rākṣasavyāghrā nādayanto diśo daśa / rākṣasā bhīmakarmāṇo rāvaṇasya jayaiṣiṇaḥ // 6.033.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṇām api camūr mahatī jayam iccatām / abhyadhāvata tāṃ senāṃ rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpiṇām // 6.033.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare teṣām anyonyam abhidhāvatām / rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca dvandvayuddham avartata // 6.033.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadenendrajit sārdhaṃ vāliputreṇa rākṣasaḥ / ayudhyata mahātejās tryambakeṇa yathāndhakaḥ // 6.033.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajaṅghena ca saṃpātir nityaṃ durmarṣaṇo raṇe / jambūmālinam ārabdho hanūmān api vānaraḥ // 6.033.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃgataḥ sumahākrodho rākṣaso rāvaṇānujaḥ / samare tīkṣṇavegena mitraghnena vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.033.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapanena gajaḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣasena mahābalaḥ / nikumbhena mahātejā nīlo 'pi samayudhyata // 6.033.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarendras tu sugrīvaḥ praghasena samāgataḥ / saṃgataḥ samare śrīmān virūpākṣeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.033.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ / suptaghno yajñakopaś ca rāmeṇa saha saṃgatāḥ // 6.033.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajramuṣṭis tu maindena dvividenāśaniprabhaḥ / rākṣasābhyāṃ sughorābhyāṃ kapimukhyau samāgatau // 6.033.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīraḥ pratapano ghoro rākṣaso raṇadurdharaḥ / samare tīkṣṇavegena nalena samayudhyata // 6.033.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmasya putro balavān suṣeṇa iti viśrutaḥ / sa vidyunmālinā sārdham ayudhyata mahākapiḥ // 6.033.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāś cāpare bhīmā rākṣasair aparaiḥ saha / dvandvaṃ samīyur bahudhā yuddhāya bahubhiḥ saha // 6.033.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāsīt sumahad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatām // 6.033.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harirākṣasadehebhyaḥ prasṛtāḥ keśaśāḍvalāḥ / śarīrasaṃghāṭavahāḥ prasusruḥ śoṇitāpagāḥ // 6.033.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājaghānendrajit kruddho vajreṇeva śatakratuḥ / aṅgadaṃ gadayā vīraṃ śatrusainyavidāraṇam // 6.033.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya kāñcanacitrāṅgaṃ rathaṃ sāśvaṃ sasārathim / jaghāna samare śrīmān aṅgado vegavān kapiḥ // 6.033.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpātis tu tribhir bāṇaiḥ prajaṅghena samāhataḥ / nijaghānāśvakarṇena prajaṅghaṃ raṇamūrdhani // 6.033.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jambūmālī rathasthas tu rathaśaktyā mahābalaḥ / bibheda samare kruddho hanūmantaṃ stanāntare // 6.033.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya taṃ ratham āsthāya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / pramamātha talenāśu saha tenaiva rakṣasā // 6.033.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhinnagātraḥ śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣiprahastena rakṣasā / prajaghānādriśṛṅgeṇa tapanaṃ muṣṭinā gajaḥ // 6.033.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
grasantam iva sainyāni praghasaṃ vānarādhipaḥ / sugrīvaḥ saptaparṇena nirbibheda jaghāna ca // 6.033.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prapīḍya śaravarṣeṇa rākṣasaṃ bhīmadarśanam / nijaghāna virūpākṣaṃ śareṇaikena lakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.033.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ / suptighno yajñakopaś ca rāmaṃ nirbibhiduḥ śaraiḥ // 6.033.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ rāmas tu śirāṃsi samare śaraiḥ / kruddhaś caturbhiś ciccheda ghorair agniśikhopamaiḥ // 6.033.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajramuṣṭis tu maindena muṣṭinā nihato raṇe / papāta sarathaḥ sāśvaḥ purāṭṭa iva bhūtale // 6.033.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajrāśanisamasparśo dvivido 'py aśaniprabham / jaghāna giriśṛṅgeṇa miṣatāṃ sarvarakṣasām // 6.033.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvividaṃ vānarendraṃ tu drumayodhinam āhave / śarair aśanisaṃkāśaiḥ sa vivyādhāśaniprabhaḥ // 6.033.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śarair atividdhāṅgo dvividaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / sālena sarathaṃ sāśvaṃ nijaghānāśaniprabham // 6.033.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nikumbhas tu raṇe nīlaṃ nīlāñjanacayaprabham / nirbibheda śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ karair megham ivāṃśumān // 6.033.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
punaḥ śaraśatenātha kṣiprahasto niśācaraḥ / bibheda samare nīlaṃ nikumbhaḥ prajahāsa ca // 6.033.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaiva rathacakreṇa nīlo viṣṇur ivāhave / śiraś ciccheda samare nikumbhasya ca sāratheḥ // 6.033.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidyunmālī rathasthas tu śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ / suṣeṇaṃ tāḍayām āsa nanāda ca muhur muhuḥ // 6.033.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ rathastham atho dṛṣṭvā suṣeṇo vānarottamaḥ / giriśṛṅgeṇa mahatā ratham āśu nyapātayat // 6.033.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lāghavena tu saṃyukto vidyunmālī niśācaraḥ / apakramya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gadāpāṇiḥ kṣitau sthitaḥ // 6.033.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ krodhasamāviṣṭaḥ suṣeṇo haripuṃgavaḥ / śilāṃ sumahatīṃ gṛhya niśācaram abhidravat // 6.033.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āpatantaṃ gadayā vidyunmālī niśācaraḥ / vakṣasy abhijagnānāśu suṣeṇaṃ harisattamam // 6.033.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gadāprahāraṃ taṃ ghoram acintyaplavagottamaḥ / tāṃ śilāṃ pātayām āsa tasyorasi mahāmṛdhe // 6.033.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śilāprahārābhihato vidyunmālī niśācaraḥ / niṣpiṣṭahṛdayo bhūmau gatāsur nipapāta ha // 6.033.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ tair vānaraiḥ śūraiḥ śūrās te rajanīcarāḥ / dvandve vimṛditās tatra daityā iva divaukasaiḥ // 6.033.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhallaiḥ khaḍgair gadābhiś ca śaktitomara paṭṭasaiḥ / apaviddhaś ca bhinnaś ca rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair hayaiḥ // 6.033.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihataiḥ kuñjarair mattais tathā vānararākṣasaiḥ / cakrākṣayugadaṇḍaiś ca bhagnair dharaṇisaṃśritaiḥ // 6.033.044.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhūvāyodhanaṃ ghoraṃ gomāyugaṇasevitam // 6.033.044.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kabandhāni samutpetur dikṣu vānararakṣasām / vimarde tumule tasmin devāsuraraṇopame // 6.033.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidāryamāṇā haripuṃgavais tadā; niśācarāḥ śoṇitadigdhagātrāḥ / punaḥ suyuddhaṃ tarasā samāśritā; divākarasyāstamayābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 6.033.046	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
yudhyatām eva teṣāṃ tu tadā vānararakṣasām / ravir astaṃ gato rātriḥ pravṛttā prāṇahāriṇī // 6.034.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyonyaṃ baddhavairāṇāṃ ghorāṇāṃ jayam icchatām / saṃpravṛttaṃ niśāyuddhaṃ tadā vāraṇarakṣasām // 6.034.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣaso 'sīti harayo hariś cāsīti rākṣasāḥ / anyonyaṃ samare jaghnus tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe // 6.034.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jahi dāraya caitīti kathaṃ vidravasīti ca / evaṃ sutumulaḥ śabdas tasmiṃs tamasi śuśruve // 6.034.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālāḥ kāñcanasaṃnāhās tasmiṃs tamasi rākṣasāḥ / saṃprādṛśyanta śailendrā dīptauṣadhivanā iva // 6.034.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tamasi duṣpāre rākṣasāḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ / paripetur mahāvegā bhakṣayantaḥ plavaṃgamān // 6.034.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te hayān kāñcanāpīḍan dhvajāṃś cāgniśikhopamān / āplutya daśanais tīkṣṇair bhīmakopā vyadārayan // 6.034.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuñjarān kuñjarārohān patākādhvajino rathān / cakarṣuś ca dadaṃśuś ca daśanaiḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ // 6.034.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmaś ca śarair āśīviṣomapaiḥ / dṛśyādṛśyāni rakṣāṃsi pravarāṇi nijaghnatuḥ // 6.034.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
turaṃgakhuravidhvastaṃ rathanemisamuddhatam / rurodha karṇanetrāṇiṇyudhyatāṃ dharaṇīrajaḥ // 6.034.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vartamāne tathā ghore saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇe / rudhirodā mahāvegā nadyas tatra prasusruvuḥ // 6.034.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bherīmṛdaṅgānāṃ paṇavānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ / śaṅkhaveṇusvanonmiśraḥ saṃbabhūvādbhutopamaḥ // 6.034.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatānāṃ stanamānānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ / śastrāṇāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca saṃbabhūvātidāruṇaḥ // 6.034.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śastrapuṣpopahārā ca tatrāsīd yuddhamedinī / durjñeyā durniveśā ca śoṇitāsravakardamā // 6.034.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā babhūva niśā ghorā harirākṣasahāriṇī / kālarātrīva bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ duratikramā // 6.034.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te rākṣasās tatra tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe / rāmam evābhyadhāvanta saṃhṛṣṭā śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ // 6.034.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām āpatatāṃ śabdaḥ kruddhānām abhigarjatām / udvarta iva saptānāṃ samudrāṇām abhūt svanaḥ // 6.034.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ rāmaḥ śaraiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍ jaghāna niśācarān / nimeṣāntaramātreṇa śitair agniśikhopamaiḥ // 6.034.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajñaśatruś ca durdharṣo mahāpārśvamahodarau / vajradaṃṣṭro mahākāyas tau cobhau śukasāraṇau // 6.034.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu rāmeṇa bāṇaughaḥ sarvamarmasu tāḍitāḥ / yuddhād apasṛtās tatra sāvaśeṣāyuṣo 'bhavan // 6.034.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kāñcanacitrāṅgaiḥ śarair agniśikhopamaiḥ / diśaś cakāra vimalāḥ pradiśaś ca mahābalaḥ // 6.034.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tv anye rākṣasā vīrā rāmasyābhimukhe sthitāḥ / te 'pi naṣṭāḥ samāsādya pataṃgā iva pāvakam // 6.034.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suvarṇapuṅkhair viśikhaiḥ saṃpatadbhiḥ sahasraśaḥ / babhūva rajanī citrā khadyotair iva śāradī // 6.034.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasānāṃ ca ninadair harīṇāṃ cāpi garjitaiḥ / sā babhūva niśā ghorā bhūyo ghoratarā tadā // 6.034.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena śabdena mahatā pravṛddhena samantataḥ / trikūṭaḥ kandarākīrṇaḥ pravyāharad ivācalaḥ // 6.034.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
golāṅgūlā mahākāyās tamasā tulyavarcasaḥ / saṃpariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ bhakṣayan rajanīcarān // 6.034.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadas tu raṇe śatruṃ nihantuṃ samupasthitaḥ / rāvaṇer nijaghānāśu sārathiṃ ca hayān api // 6.034.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrajit tu rathaṃ tyaktvā hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ / aṅgadena mahāmāyas tatraivāntaradhīyata // 6.034.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'ntardhāna gataḥ pāpo rāvaṇī raṇakarkaśaḥ / brahmadattavaro vīro rāvaṇiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ // 6.034.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛśyo niśitān bāṇān mumocāśanivarcasaḥ // 6.034.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva ghorair nāgamayaiḥ śaraiḥ / bibheda samare kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rākṣasaḥ // 6.034.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tasya gatim anvicchan rājaputraḥ pratāpavān / dideśātibalo rāmo daśavānarayūthapān // 6.035.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvau suṣeṇasya dāyādau nīlaṃ ca plavagarṣabham / aṅgadaṃ vāliputraṃ ca śarabhaṃ ca tarasvinam // 6.035.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinataṃ jāmbavantaṃ ca sānuprasthaṃ mahābalam / ṛṣabhaṃ carṣabhaskandham ādideśa paraṃtapaḥ // 6.035.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te saṃprahṛṣṭā harayo bhīmān udyamya pādapān / ākāśaṃ viviśuḥ sarve mārgāmāṇā diśo daśa // 6.035.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ vegavatāṃ vegam iṣubhir vegavattaraiḥ / astravit paramāstreṇa vārayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ // 6.035.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ bhīmavegā harayo nārācaiḥ kṣatavikṣatāḥ / andhakāre na dadṛśur meghaiḥ sūryam ivāvṛtam // 6.035.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmalakṣmaṇayor eva sarvamarmabhidaḥ śarān / bhṛśam āveśayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ samitiṃjayaḥ // 6.035.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirantaraśarīrau tu bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / kruddhenendrajotā vīrau pannagaiḥ śaratāṃ gataiḥ // 6.035.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayoḥ kṣatajamārgeṇa susrāva rudhiraṃ bahu / tāv ubhau ca prakāśete puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau // 6.035.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paryantaraktākṣo bhinnāñjanacayopamaḥ / rāvaṇir bhrātarau vākyam antardhānagato 'bravīt // 6.035.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yudhyamānam anālakṣyaṃ śakro 'pi tridaśeśvaraḥ / draṣṭum āsādituṃ vāpi na śaktaḥ kiṃ punar yuvām // 6.035.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāvṛtāv iṣujālena rāghavau kaṅkapatriṇā / eṣa roṣaparītātmā nayāmi yamasādanam // 6.035.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu dharmajñau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / nirbibheda śitair bāṇaiḥ prajaharṣa nanāda ca // 6.035.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhinnāñjanacayaśyāmo visphārya vipulaṃ dhanuḥ / bhūyo bhūyaḥ śarān ghorān visasarja mahāmṛdhe // 6.035.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato marmasu marmajño majjayan niśitāñ śarān / rāmalakṣmaṇayor vīro nanāda ca muhur muhuḥ // 6.035.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
baddhau tu śarabandhena tāv ubhau raṇamūrdhani / nimeṣāntaramātreṇa na śekatur udīkṣitum // 6.035.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vibhinnasarvāṅgau śaraśalyācitāv ubhau / dhvajāv iva mahendrasya rajjumuktau prakampitau // 6.035.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau saṃpracalitau vīrau marmabhedena karśitau / nipetatur maheṣvāsau jagatyāṃ jagatīpatī // 6.035.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau vīraśayane vīrau śayānau rudhirokṣitau / śaraveṣṭitasarvāṅgāv ārtau paramapīḍitau // 6.035.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy aviddhaṃ tayor gātraṃ babhūvāṅgulam antaram / nānirbhinnaṃ na cāstabdham ā karāgrād ajihmagaiḥ // 6.035.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tu krūreṇa nihatau rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā / asṛksusruvatus tīvraṃ jalaṃ prasravaṇāv iva // 6.035.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
papāta prathamaṃ rāmo viddho marmasu mārgaṇaiḥ / krodhād indrajitā yena purā śakro vinirjitaḥ // 6.035.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāracair ardhanārācair bhallair añjalikair api / vivyādha vatsadantaiś ca siṃhadaṃṣṭraiḥ kṣurais tathā // 6.035.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vīraśayane śiśye vijyam ādāya kārmukam / bhinnamuṣṭiparīṇāhaṃ triṇataṃ rukmabhūṣitam // 6.035.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṇapātāntare rāmaṃ patitaṃ puruṣarṣabham / sa tatra lakṣmaṇo dṛṣṭvā nirāśo jīvite 'bhavat // 6.035.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
baddhau tu vīrau patitau śayānau; tau vānarāḥ saṃparivārya tasthuḥ / samāgatā vāyusutapramukhyā; viṣadam ārtāḥ paramaṃ ca jagmuḥ // 6.035.026	upajāti (triṣṭubh: ajñātam [ntjgg], upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tato dyāṃ pṛthivīṃ caiva vīkṣamāṇā vanaukasaḥ / dadṛśuḥ saṃtatau bāṇair bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 6.036.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛṣṭvevoparate deve kṛtakarmaṇi rākṣase / ājagāmātha taṃ deśaṃ sasugrīvo vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.036.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīladvividamaindāś ca suṣeṇasumukhāṅgadāḥ / tūrṇaṃ hanumatā sārdham anvaśocanta rāghavau // 6.036.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśceṣṭau mandaniḥśvāsau śoṇitaughapariplutau / śarajālācitau stabdhau śayānau śaratalpayoḥ // 6.036.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niḥśvasantau yathā sarpau niśceṣṭau mandavikramau / rudhirasrāvadigdhāṅgau tāpanīyāv iva dhvajau // 6.036.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau vīraśayane vīrau śayānau mandaceṣṭitau / yūthapais taiḥ parivṛtau bāṣpavyākulalocanaiḥ // 6.036.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavau patitau dṛṣṭvā śarajālasamāvṛtau / babhūvur vyathitāḥ sarve vānarāḥ savibhīṣaṇāḥ // 6.036.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarikṣaṃ nirīkṣanto diśaḥ sarvāś ca vānarāḥ / na cainaṃ māyayā channaṃ dadṛśū rāvaṇiṃ raṇe // 6.036.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu māyāpraticchinnaṃ māyayaiva vibhīṣaṇaḥ / vīkṣamāṇo dadarśātha bhrātuḥ putram avasthitam // 6.036.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam apratima karmāṇam apratidvandvam āhave / dadarśāntarhitaṃ vīraṃ varadānād vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.036.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrajit tv ātmanaḥ karma tau śayānau samīkṣya ca / uvāca paramaprīto harṣayan sarvanairṛtān // 6.036.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūṣaṇasya ca hantārau kharasya ca mahābalau / sāditau māmakair bāṇair bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 6.036.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nemau mokṣayituṃ śakyāv etasmād iṣubandhanāt / sarvair api samāgamya sarṣisaṅghaiḥ surāsuraiḥ // 6.036.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatkṛte cintayānasya śokārtasya pitur mama / aspṛṣṭvā śayanaṃ gātrais triyāmā yāti śarvatī // 6.036.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtsneyaṃ yatkṛte laṅkā nadī varṣāsv ivākulā / so 'yaṃ mūlaharo 'narthaḥ sarveṣāṃ nihato mayā // 6.036.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya lakṣmaṇasyaiva sarveṣāṃ ca vanaukasām / vikramā niṣphalāḥ sarve yathā śaradi toyadāḥ // 6.036.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu tān sarvān rākṣasān paripārśvagān / yūthapān api tān sarvāṃs tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ // 6.036.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān ardayitvā bāṇaughais trāsayitvā ca vānarān / prajahāsa mahābāhur vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // 6.036.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarabandhena ghoreṇa mayā baddhau camūmukhe / sahitau bhrātarāv etau niśāmayata rākṣasāḥ // 6.036.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktās tu te sarve rākṣasāḥ kūṭayodhinaḥ / paraṃ vismayam ājagmuḥ karmaṇā tena toṣitāḥ // 6.036.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vineduś ca mahānādān sarve te jaladopamāḥ / hato rāma iti jñātvā rāvaṇiṃ samapūjayan // 6.036.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣpandau tu tadā dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau / vasudhāyāṃ nirucchvāsau hatāv ity anvamanyata // 6.036.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harṣeṇa tu samāviṣṭa indrajit samitiṃjayaḥ / praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ harṣayan sarvanairṛtān // 6.036.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmalakṣmaṇayor dṛṣṭvā śarīre sāyakaiś cite / sarvāṇi cāṅgopāṅgāni sugrīvaṃ bhayam āviśat // 6.036.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca paritrastaṃ vānarendraṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ / sabāṣpavadanaṃ dīnaṃ śokavyākulalocanam // 6.036.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaṃ trāsena sugrīva bāṣpavego nigṛhyatām / evaṃ prāyāṇi yuddhāni vijayo nāsti naiṣṭhikaḥ // 6.036.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saśeṣabhāgyatāsmākaṃ yadi vīra bhaviṣyati / moham etau prahāsyete bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 6.036.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paryavasthāpayātmānam anāthaṃ māṃ ca vānara / satyadharmānuraktānāṃ nāsti mṛtyukṛtaṃ bhayam // 6.036.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tatas tasya jalaklinnena pāṇinā / sugrīvasya śubhe netre pramamārja vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.036.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pramṛjya vadanaṃ tasya kapirājasya dhīmataḥ / abravīt kālasaṃprātam asaṃbhrāntam idaṃ vacaḥ // 6.036.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kālaḥ kapirājendra vaiklavyam anuvartitum / atisneho 'py akāle 'smin maraṇāyopapadyate // 6.036.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād utsṛjya vaiklavyaṃ sarvakāryavināśanam / hitaṃ rāmapurogāṇāṃ sainyānām anucintyatām // 6.036.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā rakṣyatāṃ rāmo yāvat saṃjñā viparyayaḥ / labdhasaṃjñau tu kākutsthau bhayaṃ no vyapaneṣyataḥ // 6.036.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naitat kiṃ cana rāmasya na ca rāmo mumūrṣati / na hy enaṃ hāsyate lakṣmīr durlabhā yā gatāyuṣām // 6.036.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād āśvāsayātmānaṃ balaṃ cāśvāsaya svakam / yāvat sarvāṇi sainyāni punaḥ saṃsthāpayāmy aham // 6.036.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete hy utphullanayanās trāsād āgatasādhvasāḥ / karṇe karṇe prakathitā harayo haripuṃgava // 6.036.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pradhāvantam anīkaṃ saṃpraharṣitum / tyajantu harayas trāsaṃ bhuktapūrvām iva srajam // 6.036.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāśvāsya tu sugrīvaṃ rākṣasendro vibhīṣaṇaḥ / vidrutaṃ vānarānīkaṃ tat samāśvāsayat punaḥ // 6.036.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrajit tu mahāmāyaḥ sarvasainyasamāvṛtaḥ / viveśa nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ pitaraṃ cābhyupāgamat // 6.036.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra rāvaṇam āsīnam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ / ācacakṣe priyaṃ pitre nihatau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 6.036.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utpapāta tato hṛṣṭaḥ putraṃ ca pariṣasvaje / rāvaṇo rakṣasāṃ madhye śrutvā śatrū nipātitau // 6.036.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upāghrāya sa mūrdhny enaṃ papraccha prītamānasaḥ / pṛcchate ca yathāvṛttaṃ pitre sarvaṃ nyavedayat // 6.036.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa harṣavegānugatāntarātmā; śrutvā vacas tasya mahārathasya / jahau jvaraṃ dāśaratheḥ samutthitaṃ; prahṛṣya vācābhinananda putram // 6.036.043	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [jtjr], indravajrā [ttjgg])
pratipraviṣṭe laṅkāṃ tu kṛtārthe rāvaṇātmaje / rāghavaṃ parivāryārtā rarakṣur vānararṣabhāḥ // 6.037.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmān aṅgado nīlaḥ suṣeṇaḥ kumudo nalaḥ / gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ // 6.037.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbavān ṛṣabhaḥ sundo rambhaḥ śatabaliḥ pṛthuḥ / vyūḍhānīkāś ca yattāś ca drumān ādāya sarvataḥ // 6.037.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīkṣamāṇā diśaḥ sarvās tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca vānarāḥ / tṛṇeṣv api ca ceṣṭatsu rākṣasā iti menire // 6.037.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaś cāpi saṃhṛṣṭo visṛjyendrajitaṃ sutam / ājuhāva tataḥ sītā rakṣaṇī rākṣasīs tadā // 6.037.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasyas trijaṭā cāpi śāsanāt tam upasthitāḥ / tā uvāca tato hṛṣṭo rākṣasī rākṣaseśvaraḥ // 6.037.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatāv indrajitākhyāta vaidehyā rāmalakṣmaṇau / puṣpakaṃ ca samāropya darśayadhvaṃ hatau raṇe // 6.037.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad āśrayād avaṣṭabdho neyaṃ mām upatiṣṭhati / so 'syā bhartā saha bhrātrā nirasto raṇamūrdhani // 6.037.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirviśaṅkā nirudvignā nirapekṣā ca maithilī / mām upasthāsyate sītā sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā // 6.037.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya kālavaśaṃ prāptaṃ raṇe rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam / avekṣya vinivṛttāśā nānyāṃ gatim apaśyatī // 6.037.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ / rākṣasyas tās tathety uktvā prajagmur yatra puṣpakam // 6.037.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ puṣpakam ādaya rākṣasyo rāvaṇājñayā / aśokavanikāsthāṃ tāṃ maithilīṃ samupānayan // 6.037.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām ādāya tu rākṣasyo bhartṛśokaparāyaṇām / sītām āropayām āsur vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tadā // 6.037.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ puṣpakam āropya sītāṃ trijaṭayā saha / rāvaṇo 'kārayal laṅkāṃ patākādhvajamālinīm // 6.037.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāghoṣayata hṛṣṭaś ca laṅkāyāṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ / rāghavo lakṣmaṇaś caiva hatāv indrajitā raṇe // 6.037.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimānenāpi sītā tu gatvā trijaṭayā saha / dadarśa vānarāṇāṃ tu sarvaṃ sinyaṃ nipātitam // 6.037.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahṛṣṭamanasaś cāpi dadarśa piśitāśanān / vānarāṃś cāpi duḥkhārtān rāmalakṣmaṇapārśvataḥ // 6.037.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sītā dadarśobhau śayānau śatatalpayoḥ / lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva rāmaṃ ca visaṃjñau śarapīḍitau // 6.037.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhvastakavacau vīrau vipraviddhaśarāsanau / sāyakaiś chinnasarvāṅgau śarastambhamayau kṣitau // 6.037.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau tatra vīrau sā puruṣarṣabhau / duḥkhārtā subhṛśaṃ sītā karuṇaṃ vilalāpa ha // 6.037.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā bāṣpaśokābhihatā samīkṣya; tau bhrātarau devasamaprabhāvau / vitarkayantī nidhanaṃ tayoḥ sā; duḥkhānvitā vākyam idaṃ jagāda // 6.037.021	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam / vilalāpa bhṛśaṃ sītā karuṇaṃ śokakarśitā // 6.038.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūcur lakṣaṇikā ye māṃ putriṇy avidhaveti ca / te 'sya sarve hate rāme 'jñānino 'nṛtavādinaḥ // 6.038.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajvano mahiṣīṃ ye mām ūcuḥ patnīṃ ca satriṇaḥ / te 'dya sarve hate rāme 'jñānino 'nṛtavādinaḥ // 6.038.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīrapārthivapatnī tvaṃ ye dhanyeti ca māṃ viduḥ / te 'dya sarve hate rāme 'jñānino 'nṛtavādinaḥ // 6.038.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūcuḥ saṃśravaṇe ye māṃ dvijāḥ kārtāntikāḥ śubhām / te 'dya sarve hate rāme 'jñānino 'nṛtavādinaḥ // 6.038.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāni khalu padmāni pādayor yaiḥ kila striyaḥ / adhirājye 'bhiṣicyante narendraiḥ patibhiḥ saha // 6.038.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidhavyaṃ yānti yair nāryo 'lakṣaṇair bhāgyadurlabhāḥ / nātmanas tāni paśyāmi paśyantī hatalakṣaṇā // 6.038.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyānīmāni padmāni strīṇām uktvāni lakṣaṇe / tāny adya nihate rāme vitathāni bhavanti me // 6.038.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
keśāḥ sūkṣmāḥ samā nīlā bhruvau cāsaṃgate mama / vṛtte cālomaśe jaṅghe dantāś cāviralā mama // 6.038.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkhe netre karau pādau gulphāv ūrū ca me citau / anuvṛttā nakhāḥ snigdhāḥ samāś cāṅgulayo mama // 6.038.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
stanau cāviralau pīnau mamemau magnacūcukau / magnā cotsaṅginī nābhiḥ pārśvoraskaṃ ca me citam // 6.038.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama varṇo maṇinibho mṛdūny aṅgaruhāṇi ca / pratiṣṭhitāṃ dvadaśabhir mām ūcuḥ śubhalakṣaṇām // 6.038.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samagrayavam acchidraṃ pāṇipādaṃ ca varṇavat / mandasmitety eva ca māṃ kanyālakṣaṇikā viduḥ // 6.038.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhirājye 'bhiṣeko me brāhmaṇaiḥ patinā saha / kṛtāntakuśalair uktaṃ tat sarvaṃ vitathīkṛtam // 6.038.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śodhayitvā janasthānaṃ pravṛttim upalabhya ca / tīrtvā sāgaram akṣobhyaṃ bhrātarau goṣpade hatau // 6.038.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nanu vāruṇam āgneyam aindraṃ vāyavyam eva ca / astraṃ brahmaśiraś caiva rāghavau pratyapadyatām // 6.038.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛśyamānena raṇe māyayā vāsavopamau / mama nāthāv anāthāyā nihatau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 6.038.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāpya rāghavasya raṇe ripuḥ / jīvan pratinivarteta yady api syān manojavaḥ // 6.038.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kālasyātibhāro 'sti kṛtāntaś ca sudurjayaḥ / yatra rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā śete yudhi nipāthitaḥ // 6.038.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāhaṃ śocāmi bhartāraṃ nihataṃ na ca lakṣmaṇam / nātmānaṃ jananī cāpi yathā śvaśrūṃ tapasvinīm // 6.038.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā hi cintayate nityaṃ samāptavratam āgatam / kadā drakṣyāmi sītāṃ ca rāmaṃ ca sahalakṣmaṇam // 6.038.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paridevayamānāṃ tāṃ rākṣasī trijaṭābravīt / mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā devi bhartāyaṃ tava jīvati // 6.038.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāraṇāni ca vakṣyāmi mahānti sadṛśāni ca / yathemau jīvato devi bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 6.038.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi kopaparītāni harṣaparyutsukāni ca / bhavanti yudhi yodhānāṃ mukhāni nihate patau // 6.038.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ vimānaṃ vaidehi puṣpakaṃ nāma nāmataḥ / divyaṃ tvāṃ dhārayen nedaṃ yady etau gajajīvitau // 6.038.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatavīrapradhānā hi hatotsāhā nirudyamā / senā bhramati saṃkhyeṣu hatakarṇeva naur jale // 6.038.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ punar asaṃbhrāntā nirudvignā tarasvinī / senā rakṣati kākutsthau māyayā nirjitau raṇe // 6.038.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tvaṃ bhava suvisrabdhā anumānaiḥ sukhodayaiḥ / ahatau paśya kākutsthau snehād etad bravīmi te // 6.038.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana / cāritrasukhaśīlatvāt praviṣṭāsi mano mama // 6.038.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nemau śakyau raṇe jetuṃ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ / etayor ānanaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā cāveditaṃ tava // 6.038.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ ca sumahac cihnaṃ śanaiḥ paśyasva maithili / niḥsaṃjñāv apy ubhāv etau naiva lakṣmīr viyujyate // 6.038.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāyeṇa gatasattvānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ gatāyuṣām / dṛśyamāneṣu vaktreṣu paraṃ bhavati vaikṛtam // 6.038.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaja śokaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca mohaṃ ca janakātmaje / rāmalakṣmaṇayor arthe nādya śakyam ajīvitum // 6.038.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasyāḥ sītā surasutopamā / kṛtāñjalir uvācedam evam astv iti maithilī // 6.038.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tat tu samivartya manojavam / dīnā trijaṭayā sītā laṅkām eva praveśitā // 6.038.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas trijaṭayā sārdhaṃ puṣpakād avaruhya sā / aśokavanikām eva rakṣasībhiḥ praveśitā // 6.038.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśya sītā bahuvṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃ; tāṃ rākṣasendrasya vihārabhūmim / saṃprekṣya saṃcintya ca rājaputrau; paraṃ viṣādaṃ samupājagāma // 6.038.037	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
ghoreṇa śarabandhena baddhau daśarathātmajau / niśvasantau yathā nāgau śayānau rudhirokṣitau // 6.039.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve te vānaraśreṣṭhāḥ sasugrīvā mahābalāḥ / parivārya mahātmānau tasthuḥ śokapariplutāḥ // 6.039.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antere rāmaḥ pratyabudhyata vīryavān / sthiratvāt sattvayogāc ca śaraiḥ saṃdānito 'pi san // 6.039.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dṛṣṭvā sarudhiraṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ gāḍham arpitam / bhrātaraṃ dīnavadanaṃ paryadevayad āturaḥ // 6.039.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu me sītayā kāryaṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ jīvitena vā / śayānaṃ yo 'dya paśyāmi bhrātaraṃ yudhi nirjitam // 6.039.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śakyā sītā samā nārī prāptuṃ loke vicinvatā / na lakṣmaṇasamo bhrātā sacivaḥ sāmparāyikaḥ // 6.039.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parityakṣyāmy ahaṃ prāṇān vānarāṇāṃ tu paśyatām / yadi pañcatvam āpannaḥ sumitrānandavardhanaḥ // 6.039.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi kausalyāṃ mātaraṃ kiṃ nu kaikayīm / katham ambāṃ sumitrāṃca putradarśanalālasām // 6.039.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivatsāṃ vepamānāṃ ca krośantīṃ kurarīm iva / katham āśvāsayiṣyāmi yadi yāsyāmi taṃ vinā // 6.039.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ vakṣyāmi śatrughnaṃ bharataṃ ca yaśasvinam / mayā saha vanaṃ yāto vinā tenāgataḥ punaḥ // 6.039.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upālambhaṃ na śakṣyāmi soḍhuṃ bata sumitrayā / ihaiva dehaṃ tyakṣyāmi na hi jīvitum utsahe // 6.039.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhiṅ māṃ duṣkṛtakarmāṇam anāryaṃ yatkṛte hy asau / lakṣmaṇaḥ patitaḥ śete śaratalpe gatāsuvat // 6.039.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ nityaṃ suviṣaṇṇaṃ mām āśvāsayasi lakṣmaṇa / gatāsur nādya śaknoṣi mām ārtam abhibhāṣitum // 6.039.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yenādya bahavo yuddhe rākṣasā nihatāḥ kṣitau / tasyām eva kṣitau vīraḥ sa śete nihataḥ paraiḥ // 6.039.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śayānaḥ śaratalpe 'smin svaśoṇitapariplutaḥ / śarajālaiś cito bhāti bhāskaro 'stam iva vrajan // 6.039.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṇābhihatamarmatvān na śaknoty abhivīkṣitum / rujā cābruvato hy asya dṛṣṭirāgeṇa sūcyate // 6.039.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathaiva māṃ vanaṃ yāntam anuyāto mahādyutiḥ / aham apy anuyāsyāmi tathaivainaṃ yamakṣayam // 6.039.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iṣṭabandhujano nityaṃ māṃ ca nityam anuvrataḥ / imām adya gato 'vasthāṃ mamānāryasya durnayaiḥ // 6.039.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suruṣṭenāpi vīreṇa lakṣmaṇenā na saṃsmare / paruṣaṃ vipriyaṃ vāpi śrāvitaṃ na kadā cana // 6.039.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visasarjaikavegena pañcabāṇaśatāni yaḥ / iṣvastreṣv adhikas tasmāt kārtavīryāc ca lakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.039.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
astrair astrāṇi yo hanyāc chakrasyāpi mahātmanaḥ / so 'yam urvyāṃhataḥ śete mahārhaśayanocitaḥ // 6.039.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac ca mithyā pralaptaṃ māṃ pradhakṣyati na saṃśayaḥ / yan mayā na kṛto rājā rākṣasānāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.039.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin muhūrte sugrīva pratiyātum ito 'rhasi / matvā hīnaṃ mayā rājan rāvaṇo 'bhidraved balī // 6.039.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadaṃ tu puraskṛtya sasainyaḥ sasuhṛjjanaḥ / sāgaraṃ tara sugrīva punas tenaiva setunā // 6.039.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtaṃ hanumatā kāryaṃ yad anyair duṣkaraṃ raṇe / ṛkṣarājena tuṣyāmi golāṅgūlādhipena ca // 6.039.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadena kṛtaṃ karma maindena dvividena ca / yuddhaṃ kesariṇā saṃkhye ghoraṃ saṃpātinā kṛtam // 6.039.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gavayena gavākṣeṇa śarabheṇa gajena ca / anyaiś ca haribhir yuddhaṃ madārthe tyaktajīvitaiḥ // 6.039.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cātikramituṃ śakyaṃ daivaṃ sugrīva mānuṣaiḥ / yat tu śakyaṃ vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa // 6.039.028.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtaṃ sugrīva tat sarvaṃ bhavatādharmabhīruṇā // 6.039.028.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mitrakāryaṃ kṛtam idaṃ bhavadbhir vānararṣabhāḥ / anujñātā mayā sarve yatheṣṭaṃ gantum arhatha // 6.039.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śuśruvus tasya te sarve vānarāḥ paridevitam / vartayāṃ cakrur aśrūṇi netraiḥ kṛṣṇetarekṣaṇāḥ // 6.039.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sarvāṇy anīkāni sthāpayitvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ / ājagāma gadāpāṇis tvarito yatra rāghavaḥ // 6.039.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaritaṃ yāntaṃ nīlāñjanacayopamam / vānarā dudruvuḥ sarve manyamānās tu rāvaṇim // 6.039.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athovāca mahātejā harirājo mahābalaḥ / kim iyaṃ vyathitā senā mūḍhavāteva naur jale // 6.040.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvasya vacaḥ śrutvā vāliputro 'ṅgado 'bravīt / na tvaṃ paśyasi rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // 6.040.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarajālācitau vīrāv ubhau daśarathātmajau / śaratalpe mahātmānau śayānāu rudhirokṣitau // 6.040.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīd vānarendraḥ sugrīvaḥ putram aṅgadam / nānimittam idaṃ manye bhavitavyaṃ bhayena tu // 6.040.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣaṇṇavadanā hy ete tyaktapraharaṇā diśaḥ / prapalāyanti harayas trāsād utphullalocanāḥ // 6.040.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyonyasya na lajjante na nirīkṣanti pṛṣṭhataḥ / viprakarṣanti cānyonyaṃ patitaṃ laṅghayanti ca // 6.040.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare vīro gadāpāṇir vibhīṣaṇaḥ / sugrīvaṃ vardhayām āsa rāghavaṃ ca niraikṣata // 6.040.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇaṃ taṃ sugrīvo dṛṣṭvā vānarabhīṣaṇam / ṛkṣarājaṃ samīpasthaṃ jāmbavantam uvāca ha // 6.040.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇo 'yaṃ saṃprāpto yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānararṣabhāḥ / vidravanti paritrastā rāvaṇātmajaśaṅkayā // 6.040.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghram etān suvitrastān bahudhā vipradhāvitān / paryavasthāpayākhyāhi vibhīṣaṇam upasthitam // 6.040.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīveṇaivam uktas tu jāmbavān ṛkṣapārthivaḥ / vānarān sāntvayām āsa saṃnivartya prahāvataḥ // 6.040.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te nivṛttāḥ punaḥ sarve vānarās tyaktasaṃbhramāḥ / ṛkṣarājavacaḥ śrutvā taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇam // 6.040.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇas tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā gātraṃ śaraiś citam / lakṣmaṇasya ca dharmātmā babhūva vyathitendriyaḥ // 6.040.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jalaklinnena hastena tayor netre pramṛjya ca / śokasaṃpīḍitamanā ruroda vilalāpa ca // 6.040.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau tau sattvasaṃpannau vikrāntau priyasaṃyugau / imām avasthāṃ gamitau rākasaiḥ kūṭayodhibhiḥ // 6.040.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātuḥ putreṇa me tena duṣputreṇa durātmanā / rākṣasyā jihmayā buddhyā chalitāv ṛjuvikramau // 6.040.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarair imāv alaṃ viddhau rudhireṇa samukṣitau / vasudhāyām ima suptau dṛśyete śalyakāv iva // 6.040.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yayor vīryam upāśritya pratiṣṭhā kāṅkṣitā mayā / tāv ubhau dehanāśāya prasuptau puruṣarṣabhau // 6.040.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jīvann adya vipanno 'smi naṣṭarājyamanorathaḥ / prāptapratijñaś ca ripuḥ sakāmo rāvaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ // 6.040.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vilapamānaṃ taṃ pariṣvajya vibhīṣaṇam / sugrīvaḥ sattvasaṃpanno harirājo 'bravīd idam // 6.040.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyaṃ prāpsyasi dharmajña laṅkāyāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ / rāvaṇaḥ saha putreṇa sa rājyaṃ neha lapsyate // 6.040.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarasaṃpīḍitāv etāv ubhau rāghavalakṣmaṇau / tyaktvā mohaṃ vadhiṣyete sagaṇaṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe // 6.040.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evaṃ sāntvayitvā tu samāśvāsya ca rākṣasaṃ / suṣeṇaṃ śvaśuraṃ pārśve sugrīvas tam uvāca ha // 6.040.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saha śūrair harigaṇair labdhasaṃjñāv ariṃdamau / gaccha tvaṃ bhrātarau gṛhya kiṣkindhāṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau // 6.040.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tu rāvaṇaṃ hatvā saputraṃ sahabāndhavam / maithilīm ānayiṣyāmi śakro naṣṭām iva śriyam // 6.040.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvaitad vānarendrasya suṣeṇo vākyam abravīt / devāsuraṃ mahāyuddham anubhūtaṃ sudāruṇam // 6.040.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadā sma dānavā devāñ śarasaṃsparśakovidāḥ / nijaghnuḥ śastraviduṣaś chādayanto muhur muhuḥ // 6.040.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān ārtān naṣṭasaṃjñāṃś ca parāsūṃś ca bṛhaspatiḥ / vidhyābhir mantrayuktābhir oṣadhībhiś cikitsati // 6.040.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāny auṣadhāny ānayituṃ kṣīrodaṃ yāntu sāgaram / javena vānarāḥ śīghraṃ saṃpāti panasādayaḥ // 6.040.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harayas tu vijānanti pārvatī te mahauṣadhī / saṃjīvakaraṇīṃ divyāṃ viśalyāṃ devanirmitām // 6.040.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candraś ca nāma droṇaś ca parvatau sāgarottame / amṛtaṃ yatra mathitaṃ tatra te paramauṣadhī // 6.040.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tatra nihite devaiḥ parvate paramauṣadhī / ayaṃ vāyusuto rājan hanūmāṃs tatra gacchatu // 6.040.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare vāyur meghāṃś cāpi savidyutaḥ / paryasyan sāgare toyaṃ kampayann iva parvatān // 6.040.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahatā pakṣavātena sarve dvīpamahādrumāḥ / nipetur bhagnaviṭapāḥ samūlā lavaṇāmbhasi // 6.040.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhavan pannagās trastā bhoginas tatravāsinaḥ / śīghraṃ sarvāṇi yādāṃsi jagmuś ca lavaṇārṇavam // 6.040.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato muhūrtad garuḍaṃ vainateyaṃ mahābalam / vānarā dadṛśuḥ sarve jvalantam iva pāvakam // 6.040.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āgatam abhiprekṣya nāgās te vipradudruvuḥ / yais tau satpuruṣau baddhau śarabhūtair mahābalau // 6.040.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ suparṇaḥ kākutsthau dṛṣṭvā pratyabhinandya ca / vimamarśa ca pāṇibhyāṃ mukhe candrasamaprabhe // 6.040.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vainateyena saṃspṛṣṭās tayoḥ saṃruruhur vraṇāḥ / suvarṇe ca tanū snigdhe tayor āśu babhūvatuḥ // 6.040.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tejo vīryaṃ balaṃ cauja utsāhaś ca mahāguṇāḥ / pradarśanaṃ ca buddhiś ca smṛtiś ca dviguṇaṃ tayoḥ // 6.040.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv utthāpya mahāvīryau garuḍo vāsavopamau / ubhau tau sasvaje hṛṣṭau rāmaś cainam uvāca ha // 6.040.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavatprasādād vyasanaṃ rāvaṇiprabhavaṃ mahat / āvām iha vyatikrāntau śīghraṃ ca balinau kṛtau // 6.040.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā tātaṃ daśarathaṃ yathājaṃ ca pitāmaham / tathā bhavantam āsādya hṛṣayaṃ me prasīdati // 6.040.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko bhavān rūpasaṃpanno divyasraganulepanaḥ / vasāno viraje vastre divyābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ // 6.040.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca mahātejā vainateyo mahābalaḥ / patatrirājaḥ prītātmā harṣaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ // 6.040.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ sakhā te kākutstha priyaḥ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ / garutmān iha saṃprāpto yuvayoḥ sāhyakāraṇāt // 6.040.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asurā vā mahāvīryā dānavā vā mahābalāḥ / surāś cāpi sagandharvāḥ puraskṛtya śatakratum // 6.040.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nemaṃ mokṣayituṃ śaktāḥ śarabandhaṃ sudāruṇam / māyā balād indrajitā nirmitaṃ krūrakarmaṇā // 6.040.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete nāgāḥ kādraveyās tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrāviṣolbaṇāḥ / rakṣomāyā prabhāvena śarā bhūtvā tvadāśritāḥ // 6.040.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sabhāgyaś cāsi dharmajña rāma satyaparākrama / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā samare ripughātinā // 6.040.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imaṃ śrutvā tu vṛttāntaṃ tvaramāṇo 'ham āgataḥ / sahasā yuvayoḥ snehāt sakhitvam anupālayan // 6.040.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mokṣitau ca mahāghorād asmāt sāyakabandhanāt / apramādaś ca kartavyo yuvābhyāṃ nityam eva hi // 6.040.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṛtyā rākṣasāḥ sarve saṃgrāme kūṭayodhinaḥ / śūrāṇāṃ śuddhabhāvānāṃ bhavatām ārjavaṃ balam // 6.040.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan na viśvasitavyaṃ vo rākṣasānāṃ raṇājire / etenaivopamānena nityajihmā hi rākṣasāḥ // 6.040.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ suparṇaḥ sumahābalaḥ / pariṣvajya suhṛtsnigdham āpraṣṭum upacakrame // 6.040.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakhe rāghava dharmajña ripūṇām api vatsala / abhyanujñātum icchāmi gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam // 6.040.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bālavṛddhāvaśeṣāṃ tu laṅkāṃ kṛtvā śarormibhiḥ / rāvaṇaṃ ca ripuṃ hatvā sītāṃ samupalapsyase // 6.040.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ suparṇaḥ śīghravikramaḥ / rāmaṃ ca virujaṃ kṛtvā madhye teṣāṃ vanaukasām // 6.040.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pariṣvajya ca vīryavān / jagāmākāśam āviśya suparṇaḥ pavano yathā // 6.040.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
virujau rāghavau dṛṣṭvā tato vānarayūthapāḥ / siṃhanādāṃs tadā nedur lāṅgūlaṃ dudhuvuś ca te // 6.040.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bherīḥ samājaghnur mṛdaṅgāṃś ca vyanādayan / dadhmuḥ śaṅkhān saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ kṣvelanty api yathāpuram // 6.040.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsphoṭyāsphoṭya vikrāntā vānarā nagayodhinaḥ / drumān utpāṭya vividhāṃs tasthuḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // 6.040.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visṛjanto mahānādāṃs trāsayanto niśācarān / laṅkādvārāṇy upājagmur yoddhukāmāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.040.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu bhīmas tumulo ninādo; babhūva śākhāmṛgayūthapānām / kṣaye nidāghasya yathā ghanānāṃ; nādaḥ subhīmo nadatāṃ niśīthe // 6.040.064	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
teṣāṃ sutumulaṃ śabdaṃ vānarāṇāṃ tarasvinām / nardatāṃ rākṣasaiḥ sārdhaṃ tadā śuśrāva rāvaṇaḥ // 6.041.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snigdhagambhīranirghoṣaṃ śrutvā sa ninadaṃ bhṛśam / sacivānāṃ tatas teṣāṃ madhye vacanam abravīt // 6.041.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāsau saṃprahṛṣṭānāṃ vānarāṇāṃ samutthitaḥ / bahūnāṃ sumahān nādo meghānām iva garjatām // 6.041.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyaktaṃ sumahatī prītir eteṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ / tathā hi vipulair nādaiś cukṣubhe varuṇālayaḥ // 6.041.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tu baddhau śarais tīṣkṇair bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / ayaṃ ca sumahān nādaḥ śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me // 6.041.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat tu vacanaṃ coktvā mantriṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / uvāca nairṛtāṃs tatra samīpaparivartinaḥ // 6.041.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jñāyatāṃ tūrṇam etaṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vanacāriṇām / śokakāle samutpanne harṣakāraṇam utthitam // 6.041.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathoktās tena saṃbhrāntāḥ prākāram adhiruhya te / dadṛśuḥ pālitāṃ senāṃ sugrīveṇa mahātmanā // 6.041.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau ca muktau sughoreṇa śarabandhena rāghavau / samutthitau mahābhāgau viṣeduḥ prekṣya rākṣasāḥ // 6.041.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃtrastahṛdayā sarve prākārād avaruhya te / viṣaṇṇavadanāḥ sarve rākṣasendram upasthitāḥ // 6.041.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad apriyaṃ dīnamukhā rāvaṇasya niśācarāḥ / kṛtsnaṃ nivedayām āsur yathāvad vākyakovidāḥ // 6.041.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yau tāv indrajitā yuddhe bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / nibaddhau śarabandhena niṣprakampabhujau kṛtau // 6.041.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimuktau śarabandhena tau dṛśyete raṇājire / pāśān iva gajāu chittvā gajendrasamavikramau // 6.041.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasendro mahābalaḥ / cintāśokasamākrānto viṣaṇṇavadano 'bravīt // 6.041.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghorair dattavarair baddhau śarair āśīviṣomapaiḥ / amoghaiḥ sūryasaṃkāśaiḥ pramathyendrajitā yudhi // 6.041.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam astrabandham āsādya yadi muktau ripū mama / saṃśayastham idaṃ sarvam anupaśyāmy ahaṃ balam // 6.041.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣphalāḥ khalu saṃvṛttāḥ śarā vāsukitejasaḥ / ādattaṃ yais tu saṃgrāme ripūṇāṃ mama jīvitam // 6.041.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu saṃkruddho niśvasann urago yathā / abravīd rakṣasāṃ madhye dhūmrākṣaṃ nāma rākasaṃ // 6.041.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balena mahatā yukto rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām / tvaṃ vadhāyābhiniryāhi rāmasya saha vānaraiḥ // 6.041.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu dhūmrākṣo rākṣasendreṇa dhīmatā / kṛtvā praṇāmaṃ saṃhṛṣṭo nirjagāma nṛpālayāt // 6.041.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiniṣkramya taddvāraṃ balādhyakṣam uvāca ha / tvarayasva balaṃ tūrṇaṃ kiṃ cireṇa yuyutsataḥ // 6.041.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhūmrākṣasya vacaḥ śrutvā balādhyakṣo balānugaḥ / balam udyojayām āsa rāvaṇasyājñayā drutam // 6.041.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te baddhaghaṇṭā balino ghorarūpā niśācarāḥ / vinardamānāḥ saṃhṛṣṭā dhūmrākṣaṃ paryavārayan // 6.041.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vividhāyudhahastāś ca śūlamudgarapāṇayaḥ / gadābhiḥ paṭṭasair daṇḍair āyasair musalair bhṛśam // 6.041.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parighair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca bhallaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ / niryayū rākṣasā ghorā nardanto jaladā yathā // 6.041.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathaiḥ kavacinas tv anye dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtaiḥ / suvarṇajālavihitaiḥ kharaiś ca vividhānanaiḥ // 6.041.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hayaiḥ paramaśīghraiś ca gajendraiś ca madotkaṭaiḥ / niryayū rākṣasavyāghrā vyāghrā iva durāsadāḥ // 6.041.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛkasiṃhamukhair yuktaṃ kharaiḥ kanakabhūṣaṇaiḥ / āruroha rathaṃ divyaṃ dhūmrākṣaḥ kharanisvanaḥ // 6.041.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa niryāto mahāvīryo dhūmrākṣo rākṣasair vṛtaḥ / prahasan paścimadvāraṃ hanūmān yatra yūthapaḥ // 6.041.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prayāntaṃ tu mahāghoraṃ rākṣasaṃ bhīmadarśanam / antarikṣagatāḥ krūrāḥ śakunāḥ pratyavārayan // 6.041.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathaśīrṣe mahābhīmo gṛdhraś ca nipapāta ha / dhvajāgre grathitāś caiva nipetuḥ kuṇapāśanāḥ // 6.041.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rudhirārdro mahāñ śvetaḥ kabandhaḥ patito bhuvi / visvaraṃ cotsṛjan nādaṃ dhūmrākṣasya samīpataḥ // 6.041.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaḥ saṃcacāla ca medinī / pratilomaṃ vavau vāyur nirghātasamanisvanaḥ // 6.041.033.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
timiraughāvṛtās tatra diśaś ca na cakāśire // 6.041.033.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tūtpātāṃs tato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasānāṃ bhayāvahān / prādurbhūtān sughorāṃś ca dhūmrākṣo vyathito 'bhavat // 6.041.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ subhīmo bahubhir niśācarair; vṛto 'bhiniṣkramya raṇotsuko balī / dadarśa tāṃ rāghavabāhupālitāṃ; samudrakalpāṃ bahuvānarīṃ camūm // 6.041.035	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
dhūmrākṣaṃ prekṣya niryāntaṃ rākṣasaṃ bhīmanisvanam / vinedur vānarāḥ sarve prahṛṣṭā yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 6.042.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tu tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ saṃjajñe harirakṣasām / anyonyaṃ pādapair ghorair nighnataṃ śūlamudgaraiḥ // 6.042.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasair vānarā ghorā vinikṛttāḥ samantataḥ / vānarai rākṣasāś cāpi drumair bhūmau samīkṛtāḥ // 6.042.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasāś cāpi saṃkruddhā vānarān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / vivyadhur ghorasaṃkāśaiḥ kaṅkapatrair ajihmagaiḥ // 6.042.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gadābhiś ca bhīmābhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ kūṭamudgaraiḥ / ghoraiś ca parighaiś citrais triśūlaiś cāpi saṃśitaiḥ // 6.042.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidāryamāṇā rakṣobhir vānarās te mahābalāḥ / amarṣāj janitoddharṣāś cakruḥ karmāṇy abhītavat // 6.042.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaranirbhinnagātrās te śūlanirbhinnadehinaḥ / jagṛhus te drumāṃs tatra śilāś ca hariyūthapāḥ // 6.042.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te bhīmavegā harayo nardamānās tatas tataḥ / mamanthū rākṣasān bhīmān nāmāni ca babhāṣire // 6.042.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad babhūvādbhutaṃ ghoraṃ yuddhaṃ vānararakṣasām / śilābhir vividhābhiś ca bahuśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ // 6.042.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasā mathitāḥ ke cid vānarair jitakāśibhiḥ / vavarṣū rudhiraṃ ke cin mukhai rudhirabhojanāḥ // 6.042.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pārśveṣu dāritāḥ ke cit ke cid rāśīkṛtā drumaiḥ / śilābhiś cūrṇitāḥ ke cit ke cid dantair vidāritāḥ // 6.042.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhvajair vimathitair bhagnaiḥ kharaiś ca vinipātitaiḥ / rathair vidhvaṃsitaiś cāpi patitai rajanīcaraiḥ // 6.042.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarair bhīmavikrāntair āplutyāplutya vegitaiḥ / rākṣasāḥ karajais tīkṣṇair mukheṣu vinikartitāḥ // 6.042.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivarṇavadanā bhūyo viprakīrṇaśiroruhāḥ / mūḍhāḥ śoṇitagandhena nipetur dharaṇītale // 6.042.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naye tu paramakruddhā rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ / talair evābhidhāvanti vajrasparśasamair harīn // 6.042.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanarair āpatantas te vegitā vegavattaraiḥ / muṣṭibhiś caraṇair dantaiḥ pādapaiś cāpapothitāḥ // 6.042.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sanyaṃ tu vidrutaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūmrākṣo rākṣasarṣabhaḥ / krodhena kadanaṃ cakre vānarāṇāṃ yuyutsatām // 6.042.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāsaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cid vānarāḥ śoṇitasravāḥ / mudgarair āhatāḥ ke cit patitā dharaṇītale // 6.042.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parighair mathitaḥ ke cid bhiṇḍipālair vidāritāḥ / paṭṭasair āhatāḥ ke cid vihvalanto gatāsavaḥ // 6.042.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cid vinihatā bhūmau rudhirārdrā vanaukasaḥ / ke cid vidrāvitā naṣṭāḥ saṃkruddhai rākṣasair yudhi // 6.042.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhinnahṛdayāḥ ke cid ekapārśvena śāyitāḥ / vidāritāstraśūlai ca ke cid āntrair vinisrutāḥ // 6.042.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat subhīmaṃ mahad yuddhaṃ harirākasa saṃkulam / prababhau śastrabahulaṃ śilāpādapasaṃkulam // 6.042.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanurjyātantrimadhuraṃ hikkātālasamanvitam / mandrastanitasaṃgītaṃ yuddhagāndharvam ābabhau // 6.042.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhūmrākṣas tu dhanuṣpāṇir vānarān raṇamūrdhani / hasan vidrāvayām āsa diśas tāñ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ // 6.042.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhūmrākṣeṇārditaṃ sainyaṃ vyathitaṃ dṛśya mārutiḥ / abhyavartata saṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya vipulāṃ śilām // 6.042.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krodhād dviguṇatāmrākṣaḥ pitṛtulyaparākramaḥ / śilāṃ tāṃ pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣasya rathaṃ prati // 6.042.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpatantīṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā gadām udyamya saṃbhramāt / rathād āplutya vegena vasudhāyāṃ vyatiṣṭhata // 6.042.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā pramathya rathaṃ tasya nipapāta śilābhuvi / sacakrakūbaraṃ sāśvaṃ sadhvajaṃ saśarāsanam // 6.042.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhaṅktvā tu rathaṃ tasya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / rakṣasāṃ kadanaṃ cakre saskandhaviṭapair drumaiḥ // 6.042.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhinnaśiraso bhūtvā rākṣasāḥ śoṇitokṣitāḥ / drumaiḥ pramathitāś cānye nipetur dharaṇītale // 6.042.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidrāvya rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / gireḥ śikharam ādāya dhūmrākṣam abhidudruve // 6.042.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āpatantaṃ dhūmrākṣo gadām udyamya vīryavān / vinardamānaḥ sahasā hanūmantam abhidravat // 6.042.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kruddhas tu vegena gadāṃ tāṃ bahukaṇṭakām / pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣo mastake tu hanūmataḥ // 6.042.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāḍitaḥ sa tayā tatra gadayā bhīmarūpayā / sa kapir mārutabalas taṃ prahāram acintayan // 6.042.034.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhūmrākṣasya śiro madhye giriśṛṅgam apātayat // 6.042.034.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vihvalitasarvāṅgo giriśṛṅgeṇa tāḍitaḥ / papāta sahasā bhūmau vikīrṇa iva parvataḥ // 6.042.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhūmrākṣaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ / trastāḥ praviviśur laṅkāṃ vadhyamānāḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ // 6.042.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu pavanasuto nihatya śatruṃ; kṣatajavahāḥ saritaś ca saṃvikīrya / ripuvadhajanitaśramo mahātmā; mudam agamat kapibhiś ca pūjyamānaḥ // 6.042.037	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
dhūmrākṣaṃ nihataṃ śrutvā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / balādhyakṣam uvācedaṃ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // 6.043.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghraṃ niryāntu durdharṣā rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ / akampanaṃ puraskṛtya sarvaśastraprakovidam // 6.043.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nānāpraharaṇā bhīmākṣā bhīmadarśanāḥ / niṣpetū rākṣasā mukhyā balādhyakṣapracoditāḥ // 6.043.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ratham āsthāya vipulaṃ taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ / rākasaiḥ saṃvṛto ghorais tadā niryāty akampanaḥ // 6.043.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi kampayituṃ śakyaḥ surair api mahāmṛdhe / akampanas tatas teṣām āditya iva tejasā // 6.043.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya nidhāvamānasya saṃrabdhasya yuyutsayā / akasmād dainyam āgacchad dhayānāṃ rathavāhinām // 6.043.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyasphuran nayanaṃ cāsya savyaṃ yuddhābhinandinaḥ / vivarṇo mukhavarṇaś ca gadgadaś cābhavat svaraḥ // 6.043.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhavat sudine cāpi durdine rūkṣamārutam / ūcuḥ khagā mṛgāḥ sarve vācaḥ krūrā bhayāvahāḥ // 6.043.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa siṃhopacitaskandhaḥ śārdūlasamavikramaḥ / tān utpātān acintyaiva nirjagāma raṇājiram // 6.043.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadā nirgacchatas tasya rakṣasaḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ / babhūva sumahān nādaḥ kṣobhayann iva sāgaram // 6.043.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena śabdena vitrastā vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūḥ / drumaśailapraharaṇā yoddhuṃ samavatiṣṭhata // 6.043.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ mahāraudraṃ saṃjajñe kapirakṣasām / rāmarāvaṇayor arthe samabhityaktajīvinām // 6.043.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve hy atibalāḥ śūrāḥ sarve parvatasaṃnibhāḥ / harayo rākṣasāś caiva parasparajighaṃsavaḥ // 6.043.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ vinardātāṃ śabdaḥ saṃyuge 'titarasvinām / śuśruve sumahān krodhād anyonyam abhigarjatām // 6.043.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rajaś cāruṇavarṇābhaṃ subhīmam abhavad bhṛśam / uddhūtaṃ harirakṣobhiḥ saṃrurodha diśo daśa // 6.043.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyonyaṃ rajasā tena kauśeyoddhūtapāṇḍunā / saṃvṛtāni ca bhūtāni dadṛśur na raṇājire // 6.043.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na dhvajo na patākāvā varma vā turago 'pi vā / āyudhaṃ syandanaṃ vāpi dadṛśe tena reṇunā // 6.043.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śabdaś ca sumahāṃs teṣāṃ nardatām abhidhāvatām / śrūyate tumule yuddhe na rūpāṇi cakāśire // 6.043.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harīn eva susaṃkruddhā harayo jaghnur āhave / rākṣasāś cāpi rakṣāṃsi nijaghnus timire tadā // 6.043.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parāṃś caiva vinighnantaḥ svāṃś ca vānararākṣasāḥ / rudhirārdraṃ tadā cakrur mahīṃ paṅkānulepanām // 6.043.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu rudhiraugheṇa siktaṃ vyapagataṃ rajaḥ / śarīraśavasaṃkīrṇā babhūva ca vasuṃdharā // 6.043.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
drumaśaktiśilāprāsair gadāparighatomaraiḥ / harayo rākṣasās tūrṇaṃ jaghnur anyonyam ojasā // 6.043.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāhubhiḥ parighākārair yudhyantaḥ parvatopamāḥ / harayo bhīmakarmāṇo rākṣasāñ jaghnur āhave // 6.043.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasāś cāpi saṃkruddhāḥ prāsatomarapāṇayaḥ / kapīn nijaghnire tatra śastraiḥ paramadāruṇaiḥ // 6.043.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harayas tv api rakṣāṃsi mahādrumamahāśmabhiḥ / vidārayanty abhikramya śastrāṇy ācchidya vīryataḥ // 6.043.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare vīrā harayaḥ kumudo nalaḥ / maindaś ca paramakruddhaś cakrur vegam anuttamam // 6.043.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu vṛkṣair mahāvegā rākṣasānāṃ camūmukhe / kadanaṃ sumaha cakrur līlayā hariyūthapāḥ // 6.043.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dṛṣṭvā sumahat karma kṛtaṃ vānarasattamaiḥ / krodham āhārayām āsa yudhi tīvram akampanaḥ // 6.044.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krodhamūrchitarūpas tu dhnuvan paramakārmukam / dṛṣṭvā tu karma śatrūṇāṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt // 6.044.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatraiva tāvat tvaritaṃ rathaṃ prāpaya sārathe / ete 'tra bahavo ghnanti subahūn rākṣasān raṇe // 6.044.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete 'tra balavanto hi bhīmakāyāś ca vānarāḥ / drumaśailapraharaṇās tiṣṭhanti pramukhe mama // 6.044.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etān nihantum icchāmi samaraślāghino hy aham / etaiḥ pramathitaṃ sarvaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasaṃ balam // 6.044.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prajavitāśvena rathena rathināṃ varaḥ / harīn abhyahanat krodhāc charajālair akampanaḥ // 6.044.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na sthātuṃ vānarāḥ śekuḥ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave / akampanaśarair bhagnāḥ sarva eva pradudruvuḥ // 6.044.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān mṛtyuvaśam āpannān akampanavaśaṃ gatān / samīkṣya hanumāñ jñātīn upatasthe mahābalaḥ // 6.044.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ mahāplavagaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve plavagayūthapāḥ / sametya samare vīrāḥ sahitāḥ paryavārayan // 6.044.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyavasthitaṃ hanūmantaṃ te dṛṣṭvā hariyūthapāḥ / babhūvur balavanto hi balavantam upāśritāḥ // 6.044.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akampanas tu śailābhaṃ hanūmantam avasthitam / mahendra iva dhārābhiḥ śarair abhivavarṣa ha // 6.044.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acintayitvā bāṇaughāñ śarīre patitāñ śitān / akampanavadhārthāya mano dadhre mahābalaḥ // 6.044.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa prahasya mahātejā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / abhidudrāva tad rakṣaḥ kampayann iva medinīm // 6.044.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyābhinardamānasya dīpyamānasya tejasā / babhūva rūpaṃ durdharṣaṃ dīptasyeva vibhāvasoḥ // 6.044.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmānaṃ tv apraharaṇaṃ jñātvā krodhasamanvitaḥ / śailam utpāṭayām āsa vegena haripuṃgavaḥ // 6.044.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ gṛhītvā mahāśailaṃ pāṇinaikena mārutiḥ / vinadya sumahānādaṃ bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān // 6.044.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tam abhidudrāva rākṣasendram akampanam / yathā hi namuciṃ saṃkhye vajreṇeva puraṃdaraḥ // 6.044.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akampanas tu tad dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgaṃ samudyatam / dūrād eva mahābāṇair ardhacandrair vyadārayat // 6.044.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat parvatāgram ākāśe rakṣobāṇavidāritam / vikīrṇaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā hanūmān krodhamūrchitaḥ // 6.044.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'śvakarṇaṃ samāsādya roṣadarpānvito hariḥ / tūrṇam utpāṭayām āsa mahāgirim ivocchritam // 6.044.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ gṛhītvā mahāskandhaṃ so 'śvakarṇaṃ mahādyutiḥ / prahasya parayā prītyā bhrāmayām āsa saṃyuge // 6.044.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradhāvann uruvegena prabhañjaṃs tarasā drumān / hanūmān paramakruddhaś caraṇair dārayat kṣitim // 6.044.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajāṃś ca sagajārohān sarathān rathinas tathā / jaghāna hanumān dhīmān rākṣasāṃś ca padātikān // 6.044.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ samare prāṇahāriṇam / hanūmantam abhiprekṣya rākṣasā vipradudruvuḥ // 6.044.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āpatantaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ rākṣasānāṃ bhayāvaham / dadarśākampano vīraś cukrodha ca nanāda ca // 6.044.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa caturdaśabhir bāṇaiḥ śitair dehavidāraṇaiḥ / nirbibheda hanūmantaṃ mahāvīryam akampanaḥ // 6.044.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tathā pratividdhas tu bahvībhiḥ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ / hanūmān dadṛśe vīraḥ prarūḍha iva sānumān // 6.044.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'nyaṃ vṛkṣam utpāṭya kṛtvā vegam anuttamam / śirasy abhijaghānāśu rākṣasendram akampanam // 6.044.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vṛkṣeṇa hatas tena sakrodhena mahātmanā / rākṣaso vānarendreṇa papāta sa mamāra ca // 6.044.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ bhūmau rākṣasendram akampanam / vyathitā rākṣasāḥ sarve kṣitikampa iva drumāḥ // 6.044.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaktapraharaṇāḥ sarve rākṣasās te parājitāḥ / laṅkām abhiyayus trastā vānarais tair abhidrutāḥ // 6.044.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te muktakeśāḥ saṃbhrāntā bhagnamānāḥ parājitāḥ / sravacchramajalair aṅgaiḥ śvasanto vipradudruvuḥ // 6.044.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyonyaṃ pramamantus te viviśur nagaraṃ bhayāt / pṛṣṭhatas te susaṃmūḍhāḥ prekṣamāṇā muhur muhuḥ // 6.044.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣu laṅkāṃ praviṣṭeṣu rākṣaseṣu mahābalāḥ / sametya harayaḥ sarve hanūmantam apūjayan // 6.044.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'pi prahṛṣṭas tān sarvān harīn saṃpratyapūjayat / hanūmān sattvasaṃpanno yathārham anukūlataḥ // 6.044.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vineduś ca yathā prāṇaṃ harayo jitakāśinaḥ / cakarṣuś ca punas tatra saprāṇān eva rākṣasān // 6.044.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vīraśobhām abhajan mahākapiḥ; sametya rakṣāṃsi nihatya mārutiḥ / mahāsuraṃ bhīmam amitranāśanaṃ; yathaiva viṣṇur balinaṃ camūmukhe // 6.044.037	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
apūjayan devagaṇās tadā kapiṃ; svayaṃ ca rāmo 'tibalaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ / tathaiva sugrīvamukhāḥ plavaṃgamā; vibhīṣaṇaś caiva mahābalas tadā // 6.044.038	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
akampanavadhaṃ śrutvā kruddho vai rākṣaseśvaraḥ / kiṃ cid dīnamukhaś cāpi sacivāṃs tān udaikṣata // 6.045.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu mantribhiḥ saṃvicārya ca / purīṃ pariyayau laṅkāṃ sarvān gulmān avekṣitum // 6.045.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ rākṣasagaṇair guptāṃ gulmair bahubhir āvṛtām / dadarśa nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ patākādhvajamālinīm // 6.045.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ruddhāṃ tu nagarīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / uvācāmarṣitaḥ kāle prahastaṃ yuddhakovidam // 6.045.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purasyopaniviṣṭasya sahasā pīḍitasya ca / nānyaṃ yuddhāt prapaśyāmi mokṣaṃ yuddhaviśārada // 6.045.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ vā kumbhakarṇo vā tvaṃ vā senāpatir mama / indrajid vā nikumbho vā vaheyur bhāram īdṛśam // 6.045.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ balam itaḥ śīghram ādāya parigṛhya ca / vijayāyābhiniryāhi yatra sarve vanaukasaḥ // 6.045.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niryāṇād eva te nūnaṃ capalā harivāhinī / nardatāṃ rākṣasendrāṇāṃ śrutvā nādaṃ draviṣyati // 6.045.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
capalā hy avinītāś ca calacittāś ca vānarāḥ / na sahiṣyanti te nādaṃ siṃhanādam iva dvipāḥ // 6.045.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidrute ca bale tasmin rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha / avaśaste nirālambaḥ prahastavaśam eṣyati // 6.045.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpatsaṃśayitā śreyo nātra niḥsaṃśayīkṛtā / pratilomānulomaṃ vā yad vā no manyase hitam // 6.045.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇenaivam uktas tu prahasto vāhinīpatiḥ / rākṣasendram uvācedam asurendram ivośanā // 6.045.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājan mantritapūrvaṃ naḥ kuśalaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ / vivādaś cāpi no vṛttaḥ samavekṣya parasparam // 6.045.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradānena tu sītāyāḥ śreyo vyavasitaṃ mayā / apradāne punar yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭam etat tathaiva naḥ // 6.045.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ dānaiś ca mānaiś ca satataṃ pūjitas tvayā / sāntvaiś ca vividhaiḥ kāle kiṃ na kuryāṃ priyaṃ tava // 6.045.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi me jīvitaṃ rakṣyaṃ putradāradhanāni vā / tvaṃ paśya māṃ juhūṣantaṃ tvadarthe jīvitaṃ yudhi // 6.045.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu bhartāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ vāhinīpatiḥ / samānayata me śīghraṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahad balam // 6.045.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madbāṇāśanivegena hatānāṃ tu raṇājire / adya tṛpyantu māṃsena pakṣiṇaḥ kānanaukasām // 6.045.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktās te prahastena balādhyakṣāḥ kṛtatvarāḥ / balam udyojayām āsus tasmin rākṣasamandire // 6.045.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā babhūva muhūrtena tigmanānāvidhāyudhaiḥ / laṅkā rākṣasavīrais tair gajair iva samākulā // 6.045.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hutāśanaṃ tarpayatāṃ brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyatām / ājyagandhaprativahaḥ surabhir māruto vavau // 6.045.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
srajaś ca vividhākārā jagṛhus tv abhimantritāḥ / saṃgrāmasajjāḥ saṃhṛṣṭā dhārayan rākṣasās tadā // 6.045.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadhanuṣkāḥ kavacino vegād āplutya rākṣasāḥ / rāvaṇaṃ prekṣya rājānaṃ prahastaṃ paryavārayan // 6.045.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāmantrya ca rājānaṃ bherīm āhatya bhairavām / āruroha rathaṃ divyaṃ prahastaḥ sajjakalpitam // 6.045.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hayair mahājavair yuktaṃ samyak sūtasusaṃyutam / mahājaladanirghoṣaṃ sākṣāc candrārkabhāsvaram // 6.045.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uragadhvajadurdharṣaṃ suvarūthaṃ svapaskaram / suvarṇajālasaṃyuktaṃ prahasantam iva śriyā // 6.045.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ ratham āsthāya rāvaṇārpitaśāsanaḥ / laṅkāyā niryayau tūrṇaṃ balena mahatā vṛtaḥ // 6.045.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato duṃdubhinirghoṣaḥ parjanyaninadopamaḥ / śuśruve śaṅkhaśabdaś ca prayāte vāhinīpatau // 6.045.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ninadantaḥ svarān ghorān rākṣasā jagmur agrataḥ / bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ prahastasya puraḥsarāḥ // 6.045.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyūḍhenaiva sughoreṇa pūrvadvārāt sa niryayau / gajayūthanikāśena balena mahatā vṛtaḥ // 6.045.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgarapratimaughena vṛtas tena balena saḥ / prahasto niryayau tūrṇaṃ kruddhaḥ kālāntakopamaḥ // 6.045.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya niryāṇa ghoṣeṇa rākṣasānāṃ ca nardatām / laṅkāyāṃ sarvabhūtāni vinedur vikṛtaiḥ svaraiḥ // 6.045.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyabhram ākāśam āviśya māṃsaśoṇitabhojanāḥ / maṇḍalāny apasavyāni khagāś cakrū rathaṃ prati // 6.045.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vamantyaḥ pāvakajvālāḥ śivā ghorā vavāśire // 6.045.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarikṣāt papātolkā vāyuś ca paruṣo vavau / anyonyam abhisaṃrabdhā grahāś ca na cakāśire // 6.045.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vavarṣū rudhiraṃ cāsya siṣicuś ca puraḥsarān / ketumūrdhani gṛdhro 'sya vilīno dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // 6.045.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sārather bahuśaś cāsya saṃgrāmam avagāhataḥ / pratodo nyapatad dhastāt sūtasya hayasādinaḥ // 6.045.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niryāṇa śrīś ca yāsyāsīd bhāsvarā ca sudurlabhā / sā nanāśa muhūrtena same ca skhalitā hayāḥ // 6.045.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahastaṃ tv abhiniryāntaṃ prakhyāta balapauruṣam / yudhi nānāpraharaṇā kapisenābhyavartata // 6.045.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha ghoṣaḥ sutumulo harīṇāṃ samajāyata / vṛkṣān ārujatāṃ caiva gurvīś cāgṛhṇatāṃ śilāḥ // 6.045.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhe pramudite sainye rakṣogaṇavanaukasām / vegitānāṃ samarthānām anyonyavadhakāṅkṣiṇām // 6.045.041.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parasparaṃ cāhvayatāṃ ninādaḥ śrūyate mahān // 6.045.041.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahastaḥ kapirājavāhinīm; abhipratasthe vijayāya durmatiḥ / vivṛddhavegāṃ ca viveśa tāṃ camūṃ; yathā mumūrṣuḥ śalabho vibhāvasum // 6.045.042	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ prahastaṃ niryāntaṃ bhīmaṃ bhīmaparākramam / garjantaṃ sumahākāyaṃ rākṣasair abhisaṃvṛtam // 6.046.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadarśa mahatī senā vānarāṇāṃ balīyasām / atisaṃjātaroṣāṇāṃ prahastam abhigarjatām // 6.046.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
khaḍgaśaktyaṣṭibāṇāś ca śūlāni musalāni ca / gadāś ca parighāḥ prāsā vividhāś ca paraśvadhāḥ // 6.046.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanūṃṣi ca vicitrāṇi rākṣasānāṃ jayaiṣiṇām / pragṛhītāny aśobhanta vānarān abhidhāvatām // 6.046.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jagṛhuḥ pādapāṃś cāpi puṣpitān vānararṣabhāḥ / śilāś ca vipulā dīrghā yoddhukāmāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.046.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām anyonyam āsādya saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān abhūt / bahūnām aśmavṛṣṭiṃ ca śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca varṣatām // 6.046.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahavo rākṣasā yuddhe bahūn vānarayūthapān / vānarā rākṣasāṃś cāpi nijaghnur bahavo bahūn // 6.046.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūlaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cit ke cit tu paramāyudhaiḥ / parighair āhatāḥ ke cit ke cic chinnāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ // 6.046.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirucchvāsāḥ punaḥ ke cit patitā dharaṇītale / vibhinnahṛdayāḥ ke cid iṣusaṃtānasaṃditāḥ // 6.046.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cid dvidhākṛtāḥ khaḍgaiḥ sphurantaḥ patitā bhuvi / vānarā rākṣasaiḥ śūlaiḥ pārśvataś ca vidāritāḥ // 6.046.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānaraiś cāpi saṃkruddhai rākṣasaughāḥ samantataḥ / pādapair giriśṛṅgaiś ca saṃpiṣṭā vasudhātale // 6.046.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajrasparśatalair hastair muṣṭibhiś ca hatā bhṛśam / vemuḥ śoṇitam āsyebhyo viśīrṇadaśanekṣaṇaḥ // 6.046.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārtasvaraṃ ca svanatāṃ siṃhanādaṃ ca nardatām / babhūva tumulaḥ śabdo harīṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ yudhi // 6.046.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarā rākṣasāḥ kruddhā vīramārgam anuvratāḥ / vivṛttanayanāḥ krūrāś cakruḥ karmāṇy abhītavat // 6.046.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
narāntakaḥ kumbhahanur mahānādaḥ samunnataḥ / ete prahastasacivāḥ sarve jaghnur vanaukasaḥ // 6.046.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām āpatatāṃ śīghraṃ nighnatāṃ cāpi vānarān / dvivido giriśṛṅgeṇa jaghānaikaṃ narāntakam // 6.046.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
durmukhaḥ punar utpāṭya kapiḥ sa vipuladrumam / rākṣasaṃ kṣiprahastas tu samunnatam apothayat // 6.046.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbavāṃs tu susaṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ śilām / pātayām āsa tejasvī mahānādasya vakṣasi // 6.046.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha kumbhahanus tatra tāreṇāsādya vīryavān / vṛkṣeṇābhihato mūrdhni prāṇāṃs tatyāja rākṣasaḥ // 6.046.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amṛṣyamāṇas tat karma prahasto ratham āsthitaḥ / cakāra kadanaṃ ghoraṃ dhanuṣpāṇir vanaukasām // 6.046.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āvarta iva saṃjajñe ubhayoḥ senayos tadā / kṣubhitasyāprameyasya sāgarasyeva nisvanaḥ // 6.046.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahatā hi śaraugheṇa prahasto yuddhakovidaḥ / ardayām āsa saṃkruddho vānarān paramāhave // 6.046.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṇāṃ śarīrais tu rākṣasānāṃ ca medinī / babhūva nicitā ghorā patitair iva parvataiḥ // 6.046.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā mahīrudhiraugheṇa pracchannā saṃprakāśate / saṃchannā mādhave māsi palāśair iva puṣpitaiḥ // 6.046.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatavīraughavaprāṃ tu bhagnāyudhamahādrumām / śoṇitaughamahātoyāṃ yamasāgaragāminīm // 6.046.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yakṛtplīhamahāpaṅkāṃ vinikīrṇāntraśaivalām / bhinnakāyaśiromīnām aṅgāvayavaśāḍvalām // 6.046.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
