gṛdhrahaṃsagaṇākīrṇāṃ kaṅkasārasasevitām / medhaḥphenasamākīrṇām ārtastanitanisvanām // 6.046.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ kāpuruṣadustārāṃ yuddhabhūmimayīṃ nadīm / nadīm iva ghanāpāye haṃsasārasasevitām // 6.046.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasāḥ kapimukhyāś ca terus tāṃ dustarāṃ nadīm / yathā padmarajodhvastāṃ nalinīṃ gajayūthapāḥ // 6.046.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sṛjantaṃ bāṇaughān prahastaṃ syandane sthitam / dadarśa tarasā nīlo vinighnantaṃ plavaṃgamān // 6.046.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ paramadurdharṣam āpatantaṃ mahākapiḥ / prahastaṃ tāḍayām āsa vṛkṣam utpāṭya vīryavān // 6.046.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tenābhihataḥ kruddho nadan rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ / vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi plavagānāṃ camūpatau // 6.046.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apārayan vārayituṃ pratyagṛhṇān nimīlitaḥ / yathaiva govṛṣo varṣaṃ śāradaṃ śīghram āgatam // 6.046.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam eva prahastasya śaravarṣaṃ durāsadam / nimīlitākṣaḥ sahasā nīlaḥ sehe sudāruṇam // 6.046.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
roṣitaḥ śaravarṣeṇa sālena mahatā mahān / prajaghāna hayān nīlaḥ prahastasya manojavān // 6.046.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhanus tu kṛtas tena prahasto vāhinīpatiḥ / pragṛhya musalaṃ ghoraṃ syandanād avapupluve // 6.046.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv ubhau vāhinīmukhyau jātaroṣau tarasvinau / sthitau kṣatajadigdhāṅgau prabhinnāv iva kuñjarau // 6.046.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ullikhantau sutīkṣṇābhir daṃṣṭrābhir itaretaram / siṃhaśārdūlasadṛśau siṃhaśārdūlaceṣṭitau // 6.046.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikrāntavijayau vīrau samareṣv anivartinau / kāṅkṣamāṇau yaśaḥ prāptuṃ vṛtravāsavayoḥ samau // 6.046.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājaghāna tadā nīlaṃ lalāṭe musalena saḥ / prahastaḥ paramāyastas tasya susrāva śoṇitam // 6.046.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śoṇitadigdhāṅgaḥ pragṛhya sumahātarum / prahastasyorasi kruddho visasarja mahākapiḥ // 6.046.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam acintyaprahāraṃ sa pragṛhya musalaṃ mahat / abhidudrāva balinaṃ balī nīlaṃ plavaṃgamam // 6.046.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ugravegaṃ saṃrabdham āpatantaṃ mahākapiḥ / tataḥ saṃprekṣya jagrāha mahāvego mahāśilām // 6.046.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya yuddhābhikāmasya mṛdhe musalayodhinaḥ / prahastasya śilāṃ nīlo mūrdhni tūrṇam apātayat // 6.046.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tena kapimukhyena vimuktā mahatī śilā / bibheda bahudhā ghorā prahastasya śiras tadā // 6.046.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatāsur gataśrīko gatasattvo gatendriyaḥ / papāta sahasā bhūmau chinnamūla iva drumaḥ // 6.046.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhinnaśirasas tasya bahu susrāvaśoṇitam / śarīrād api susrāva gireḥ prasravaṇaṃ yathā // 6.046.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hate prahaste nīlena tad akampyaṃ mahad balam / rakṣasām aprahṛṣṭānāṃ laṅkām abhijagāma ha // 6.046.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na śekuḥ samavasthātuṃ nihate vāhinīpatau / setubandhaṃ samāsādya viśīrṇaṃ salilaṃ yathā // 6.046.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hate tasmiṃś camūmukhye rākṣasas te nirudyamāḥ / rakṣaḥpatigṛhaṃ gatvā dhyānamūkatvam āgatāḥ // 6.046.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu nīlo vijayī mahābalaḥ; praśasyamānaḥ svakṛtena karmaṇā / sametya rāmeṇa salakṣmaṇena; prahṛṣṭarūpas tu babhūva yūthapaḥ // 6.046.051	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
tasmin hate rākṣasasainyapāle; plavaṃgamānām ṛṣabheṇa yuddhe / bhīmāyudhaṃ sāgaratulyavegaṃ; pradudruve rākṣasarājasainyam // 6.047.001	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
gatvā tu rakṣo'dhipateḥ śaśaṃsuḥ; senāpatiṃ pāvakasūnuśastam / tac cāpi teṣāṃ vacanaṃ niśamya; rakṣo'dhipaḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma // 6.047.002	indravajrā [ttjgg]
saṃkhye prahastaṃ nihataṃ niśamya; śokārditaḥ krodhaparītacetāḥ / uvāca tān nairṛtayodhamukhyān; indro yathā cāmarayodhamukhyān // 6.047.003	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
nāvajñā ripave kāryā yair indrabalasūdanaḥ / sūditaḥ sainyapālo me sānuyātraḥ sakuñjaraḥ // 6.047.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ ripuvināśāya vijayāyāvicārayan / svayam eva gamiṣyāmi raṇaśīrṣaṃ tad adbhutam // 6.047.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya tad vānarānīkaṃ rāmaṃ ca sahalakṣmaṇam / nirdahiṣyāmi bāṇaughair vanaṃ dīptair ivāgnibhiḥ // 6.047.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa evam uktvā jvalanaprakāśaṃ; rathaṃ turaṃgottamarājiyuktam / prakāśamānaṃ vapuṣā jvalantaṃ; samārurohāmararājaśatruḥ // 6.047.007	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
sa śaṅkhabherīpaṭaha praṇādair; āsphoṭitakṣveḍitasiṃhanādaiḥ / puṇyaiḥ stavaiś cāpy abhipūjyamānas; tadā yayau rākṣasarājamukhyaḥ // 6.047.008	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa śailajīmūtanikāśa rūpair; māṃsāśanaiḥ pāvakadīptanetraiḥ / babhau vṛto rākṣasarājamukhyair; bhūtair vṛto rudra ivāmareśaḥ // 6.047.009	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tato nagaryāḥ sahasā mahaujā; niṣkramya tad vānarasainyam ugram / mahārṇavābhrastanitaṃ dadarśa; samudyataṃ pādapaśailahastam // 6.047.010	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tad rākṣasānīkam atipracaṇḍam; ālokya rāmo bhujagendrabāhuḥ / vibhīṣaṇaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭham; uvāca senānugataḥ pṛthuśrīḥ // 6.047.011	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
nānāpatākādhvajaśastrajuṣṭaṃ; prāsāsiśūlāyudhacakrajuṣṭam / sainyaṃ nagendropamanāgajuṣṭaṃ; kasyedam akṣobhyam abhīrujuṣṭam // 6.047.012	indravajrā [ttjgg]
tatas tu rāmasya niśamya vākyaṃ; vibhīṣaṇaḥ śakrasamānavīryaḥ / śaśaṃsa rāmasya balapravekaṃ; mahātmanāṃ rākṣasapuṃgavānām // 6.047.013	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
yo 'sau gajaskandhagato mahātmā; navoditārkopamatāmravaktraḥ / prakampayan nāgaśiro 'bhyupaiti hy; akampanaṃ tv enam avehi rājan // 6.047.014	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
yo 'sau rathastho mṛgarājaketur; dhūnvan dhanuḥ śakradhanuḥprakāśam / karīva bhāty ugravivṛttadaṃṣṭraḥ; sa indrajin nāma varapradhānaḥ // 6.047.015	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
yaś caiṣa vindhyāstamahendrakalpo; dhanvī rathastho 'tiratho 'tivīryaḥ / visphārayaṃś cāpam atulyamānaṃ; nāmnātikāyo 'tivivṛddhakāyaḥ // 6.047.016	indravajrā [ttjgg]
yo 'sau navārkoditatāmracakṣur; āruhya ghaṇṭāninadapraṇādam / gajaṃ kharaṃ garjati vai mahātmā; mahodaro nāma sa eṣa vīraḥ // 6.047.017	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
yo 'sau hayaṃ kāñcanacitrabhāṇḍam; āruhya saṃdhyābhragiriprakāśam / prāsaṃ samudyamya marīcinaddhaṃ; piśāca eṣāśanitulyavegaḥ // 6.047.018	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
yaś caiṣa śūlaṃ niśitaṃ pragṛhya; vidyutprabhaṃ kiṃkaravajravegam / vṛṣendram āsthāya giriprakāśam; āyāti so 'sau triśirā yaśasvī // 6.047.019	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
asau ca jīmūtanikāśa rūpaḥ; kumbhaḥ pṛthuvyūḍhasujātavakṣāḥ / samāhitaḥ pannagarājaketur; visphārayan bhāti dhanur vidhūnvan // 6.047.020	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
yaś caiṣa jāmbūnadavajrajuṣṭaṃ; dīptaṃ sadhūmaṃ parighaṃ pragṛhya / āyāti rakṣobalaketubhūtaḥ; so 'sau nikumbho 'dbhutaghorakarmā // 6.047.021	indravajrā [ttjgg]
yaś caiṣa cāpāsiśaraughajuṣṭaṃ; patākinaṃ pāvakadīptarūpam / rathaṃ samāsthāya vibhāty udagro; narāntako 'sau nagaśṛṅgayodhī // 6.047.022	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
yaś caiṣa nānāvidhaghorarūpair; vyāghroṣṭranāgendramṛgendravaktraiḥ / bhūtair vṛto bhāti vivṛttanetraiḥ; so 'sau surāṇām api darpahantā // 6.047.023	indravajrā [ttjgg]
yatraitad indupratimaṃ vibhātic; chattraṃ sitaṃ sūkṣmaśalākam agryam / atraiṣa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; bhūtair vṛto rudra ivāvabhāti // 6.047.024	indravajrā [ttjgg]
asau kirīṭī calakuṇḍalāsyo; nāgendravindhyopamabhīmakāyaḥ / mahendravaivasvatadarpahantā; rakṣo'dhipaḥ sūrya ivāvabhāti // 6.047.025	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
pratyuvāca tato rāmo vibhīṣaṇam ariṃdamam / aho dīpto mahātejā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ // 6.047.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āditya iva duṣprekṣyo raśmibhir bhāti rāvaṇaḥ / suvyaktaṃ lakṣaye hy asya rūpaṃ tejaḥsamāvṛtam // 6.047.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavavīrāṇāṃ vapur naivaṃvidhaṃ bhavet / yādṛśaṃ rākṣasendrasya vapur etat prakāśate // 6.047.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve parvatasaṃkāśāḥ sarve parvatayodhinaḥ / sarve dīptāyudhadharā yodhaś cāsya mahaujasaḥ // 6.047.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāti rākṣasarājo 'sau pradīptair bhīmavikramaiḥ / bhūtaiḥ parivṛtas tīkṣṇair dehavadbhir ivāntakaḥ // 6.047.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tato rāmo dhanur ādāya vīryavān / lakṣmaṇānucaras tasthau samuddhṛtya śarottamam // 6.047.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; rakṣāṃsi tāny āha mahābalāni / dvāreṣu caryāgṛhagopureṣu; sunirvṛtās tiṣṭhata nirviśaṅkāḥ // 6.047.032	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
visarjayitvā sahasā tatas tān; gateṣu rakṣaḥsu yathāniyogam / vyadārayad vānarasāgaraughaṃ; mahājhaṣaḥ pūrmam ivārṇavaugham // 6.047.033	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tam āpatantaṃ sahasā samīkṣya; dīpteṣucāpaṃ yudhi rākṣasendram / mahat samutpāṭya mahīdharāgraṃ; dudrāva rakṣo'dhipatiṃ harīśaḥ // 6.047.034	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tac chailaśṛṅgaṃ bahuvṛkṣasānuṃ; pragṛhya cikṣepa niśācarāya / tam āpatantaṃ sahasā samīkṣya; bibheda bāṇais tapanīyapuṅkhaiḥ // 6.047.035	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tasmin pravṛddhottamasānuvṛkṣe; śṛṅge vikīrṇe patite pṛthivyām / mahāhikalpaṃ śaram antakābhaṃ; samādade rākṣasalokanāthaḥ // 6.047.036	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa taṃ gṛhītvānilatulyavegaṃ; savisphuliṅgajvalanaprakāśam / bāṇaṃ mahendrāśanitulyavegaṃ; cikṣepa sugrīvavadhāya ruṣṭaḥ // 6.047.037	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa sāyako rāvaṇabāhumuktaḥ; śakrāśaniprakhyavapuḥ śitāgraḥ / sugrīvam āsādya bibheda vegād; guheritā kraucam ivograśaktiḥ // 6.047.038	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa sāyakārto viparītacetāḥ; kūjan pṛthivyāṃ nipapāta vīraḥ / taṃ prekṣya bhūmau patitaṃ visaṃjmaṃ; neduḥ prahṛṣṭā yudhi yātudhānāḥ // 6.047.039	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tato gavākṣo gavayaḥ sudaṃṣṭras; tatharṣabho jyotimukho nalaś ca / śailān samudyamya vivṛddhakāyāḥ; pradudruvus taṃ prati rākṣasendram // 6.047.040	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
teṣāṃ prahārān sa cakāra meghān; rakṣo'dhipo bāṇagaṇaiḥ śitāgraiḥ / tān vānarendrān api bāṇajālair; bibheda jāmbūnadacitrapuṅkhaiḥ // 6.047.041	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
te vānarendrās tridaśāribāṇair; bhinnā nipetur bhuvi bhīmarūpāḥ / tatas tu tad vānarasainyam ugraṃ; pracchādayām āsa sa bāṇajālaiḥ // 6.047.042	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
te vadhyamānāḥ patitāgryavīrā; nānadyamānā bhayaśalyaviddhāḥ / śākhāmṛgā rāvaṇasāyakārtā; jagmuḥ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ sma rāmam // 6.047.043	indravajrā [ttjgg]
tato mahātmā sa dhanur dhanuṣmān; ādāya rāmaḥ saharā jagāma / taṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir abhyupetya; uvāca vākyaṃ paramārthayuktam // 6.047.044	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
kāmam āryaḥ suparyāpto vadhāyāsya durātmanaḥ / vidhamiṣyāmy ahaṃ nīcam anujānīhi māṃ vibho // 6.047.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam abravīn mahātejā rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / gaccha yatnaparaś cāpi bhava lakṣmaṇa saṃyuge // 6.047.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇo hi mahāvīryo raṇe 'dbhutaparākramaḥ / trailokyenāpi saṃkruddho duṣprasahyo na saṃśayaḥ // 6.047.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya cchidrāṇi mārgasva svacchidrāṇi ca gopaya / cakṣuṣā dhanuṣā yatnād rakṣātmānaṃ samāhitaḥ // 6.047.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃpariṣvajya pūjya ca / abhivādya tato rāmaṃ yayau saumitrir āhavam // 6.047.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāvaṇaṃ vāraṇahastabāhur; dadarśa dīptodyatabhīmacāpam / pracchādayantaṃ śaravṛṣṭijālais; tān vānarān bhinnavikīrṇadehān // 6.047.050	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tam ālokya mahātejā hanūmān mārutātmajā / nivārya śarajālāni pradudrāva sa rāvaṇam // 6.047.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathaṃ tasya samāsādya bhujam udyamya dakṣiṇam / trāsayan rāvaṇaṃ dhīmān hanūmān vākyam abravīt // 6.047.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavagandharvā yakṣāś ca saha rākṣasaiḥ / avadhyatvāt tvayā bhagnā vānarebhyas tu te bhayam // 6.047.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa me dakṣiṇo bāhuḥ pañcaśākhaḥ samudyataḥ / vidhamiṣyati te dehād bhūtātmānaṃ ciroṣitam // 6.047.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā hanūmato vākyaṃ rāvaṇo bhīmavikramaḥ / saṃraktanayanaḥ krodhād idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 6.047.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣipraṃ prahara niḥśaṅkaṃ sthirāṃ kīrtim avāpnuhi / tatas tvāṃ jñātivikrāntaṃ nāśayiṣyāmi vānara // 6.047.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā vāyusūnur vaco 'bravīt / prahṛtaṃ hi mayā pūrvam akṣaṃ smara sutaṃ tava // 6.047.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto mahātejā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / ājaghānānilasutaṃ talenorasi vīryavān // 6.047.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa talābhihatas tena cacāla ca muhur muhuḥ / ājaghānābhisaṃkruddhas talenaivāmaradviṣam // 6.047.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas talenābhihato vānareṇa mahātmanā / daśagrīvaḥ samādhūto yathā bhūmicale 'calaḥ // 6.047.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃgrāme taṃ tathā dṛṣṭva rāvaṇaṃ talatāḍitam / ṛṣayo vānarāḥ siddhā nedur devāḥ sahāsurāḥ // 6.047.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāśvasya mahātejā rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt / sādhu vānaravīryeṇa ślāghanīyo 'si me ripuḥ // 6.047.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇenaivam uktas tu mārutir vākyam abravīt / dhig astu mama vīryaṃ tu yat tvaṃ jīvasi rāvaṇa // 6.047.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakṛt tu praharedānīṃ durbuddhe kiṃ vikatthase / tatas tvāṃ māmako muṣṭir nayiṣyāmi yathākṣayam // 6.047.064.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mārutivākyena krodhas tasya tadājvalat // 6.047.064.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃraktanayano yatnān muṣṭim udyamya dakṣiṇam / pātayām āsa vegena vānarorasi vīryavān // 6.047.065.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmān vakṣasi vyūdhe saṃcacāla hataḥ punaḥ // 6.047.065.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vihvalaṃ taṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hanūmantaṃ mahābalam / rathenātirathaḥ śīghraṃ nīlaṃ prati samabhyagāt // 6.047.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pannagapratimair bhīmaiḥ paramarmātibhedibhiḥ / śarair ādīpayām āsa nīlaṃ haricamūpatim // 6.047.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śaraughasamāyasto nīlaḥ kapicamūpatiḥ / kareṇaikena śailāgraṃ rakṣo'dhipataye 'sṛjat // 6.047.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmān api tejasvī samāśvasto mahāmanāḥ / viprekṣamāṇo yuddhepsuḥ saroṣam idam abravīt // 6.047.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlena saha saṃyuktaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram / anyena yudhyamānasya na yuktam abhidhāvanam // 6.047.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇo 'pi mahātejās tac chṛṅgaṃ saptabhiḥ śaraiḥ / ājaghāna sutīkṣṇāgrais tad vikīrṇaṃ papāta ha // 6.047.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vikīrṇaṃ gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā haricamūpatiḥ / kālāgnir iva jajvāla krodhena paravīrahā // 6.047.072	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'śvakarṇān dhavān sālāṃś cūtāṃś cāpi supuṣpitān / anyāṃś ca vividhān vṛkṣān nīlaś cikṣepa saṃyuge // 6.047.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tān vṛkṣān samāsādya praticiccheda rāvaṇaḥ / abhyavarṣat sughoreṇa śaravarṣeṇa pāvakim // 6.047.074	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivṛṣṭaḥ śaraugheṇa megheneva mahācalaḥ / hrasvaṃ kṛtvā tadā rūpaṃ dhvajāgre nipapāta ha // 6.047.075	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāvakātmajam ālokya dhvajāgre samavasthitam / jajvāla rāvaṇaḥ krodhāt tato nīlo nanāda ha // 6.047.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhvajāgre dhanuṣaś cāgre kirīṭāgre ca taṃ harim / lakṣmaṇo 'tha hanūmāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā rāmaś ca vismitāḥ // 6.047.077	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇo 'pi mahātejāḥ kapilāghavavismitaḥ / astram āhārayām āsa dīptam āgneyam adbhutam // 6.047.078	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te cukruśur hṛṣṭā labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ / nīlalāghavasaṃbhrāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āhave // 6.047.079	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṇāṃ ca nādena saṃrabdho rāvaṇas tadā / saṃbhramāviṣṭahṛdayo na kiṃ cit pratyapadyata // 6.047.080	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgneyenātha saṃyuktaṃ gṛhītvā rāvaṇaḥ śaram / dhvajaśīrṣasthitaṃ nīlam udaikṣata niśācaraḥ // 6.047.081	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīn mahātejā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / kape lāghavayukto 'si māyayā parayānayā // 6.047.082	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jīvitaṃ khalu rakṣasva yadi śaknoṣi vānara / tāni tāny ātmarūpāṇi sṛjase tvam anekaśaḥ // 6.047.083	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathāpi tvāṃ mayā muktaḥ sāyako 'straprayojitaḥ / jīvitaṃ parirakṣantaṃ jīvitād bhraṃśayiṣyati // 6.047.084	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahābāhū rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / saṃdhāya bāṇam astreṇa camūpatim atāḍayat // 6.047.085	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'strayuktena bāṇena nīlo vakṣasi tāḍitaḥ / nirdahyamānaḥ sahasā nipapāta mahītale // 6.047.086	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitṛmāhātmya saṃyogād ātmanaś cāpi tejasā / jānubhyām apatad bhūmau na ca prāṇair vyayujyata // 6.047.087	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visaṃjñaṃ vānaraṃ dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvo raṇotsukaḥ / rathenāmbudanādena saumitrim abhidudruve // 6.047.088	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āha saumitrir adīnasattvo; visphārayantaṃ dhanur aprameyam / anvehi mām eva niśācarendra; na vānarāṃs tvaṃ prati yoddhum arhasi // 6.047.089	indravajrā [ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [jtjB], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa tasya vākyaṃ paripūrṇaghoṣaṃ; jyāśabdam ugraṃ ca niśamya rājā / āsādya saumitrim avasthitaṃ taṃ; kopānvitaṃ vākyam uvāca rakṣaḥ // 6.047.090	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
diṣṭyāsi me rāghava dṛṣṭimārgaṃ; prāpto 'ntagāmī viparītabuddhiḥ / asmin kṣaṇe yāsyasi mṛtyudeśaṃ; saṃsādyamāno mama bāṇajālaiḥ // 6.047.091	indravajrā [ttjgg]
tam āha saumitrir avismayāno; garjantam udvṛttasitāgradaṃṣṭram / rājan na garjanti mahāprabhāvā; vikatthase pāpakṛtāṃ variṣṭha // 6.047.092	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
jānāmi vīryaṃ tava rākṣasendra; balaṃ pratāpaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca / avasthito 'haṃ śaracāpapāṇir; āgaccha kiṃ moghavikatthanena // 6.047.093	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa evam uktaḥ kupitaḥ sasarja; rakṣo'dhipaḥ saptaśarān supuṅkhān / tāṃl lakṣmaṇaḥ kāñcanacitrapuṅkhaiś; ciccheda bāṇair niśitāgradhāraiḥ // 6.047.094	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tān prekṣamāṇaḥ sahasā nikṛttān; nikṛttabhogān iva pannagendrān / laṅkeśvaraḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma; sasarja cānyān niśitān pṛṣatkān // 6.047.095	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa bāṇavarṣaṃ tu vavarṣa tīvraṃ; rāmānujaḥ kārmukasaṃprayuktam / kṣurārdhacandrottamakarṇibhallaiḥ; śarāṃś ca ciccheda na cukṣubhe ca // 6.047.096	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa lakṣmaṇaś cāśu śarāñ śitāgrān; mahendravajrāśanitulyavegān / saṃdhāya cāpe jvalanaprakāśān; sasarja rakṣo'dhipater vadhāya // 6.047.097	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa tān praciccheda hi rākṣasendraś; chittvā ca tāṃl lakṣmaṇam ājaghāna / śareṇa kālāgnisamaprabheṇa; svayambhudattena lalāṭadeśe // 6.047.098	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇasāyakārtaś; cacāla cāpaṃ śithilaṃ pragṛhya / punaś ca saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya kṛcchrāc; ciccheda cāpaṃ tridaśendraśatroḥ // 6.047.099	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
nikṛttacāpaṃ tribhir ājaghāna; bāṇais tadā dāśarathiḥ śitāgraiḥ / sa sāyakārto vicacāla rājā; kṛcchrāc ca saṃjñāṃ punar āsasāda // 6.047.100	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa kṛttacāpaḥ śaratāḍitaś ca; svedārdragātro rudhirāvasiktaḥ / jagrāha śaktiṃ samudagraśaktiḥ; svayambhudattāṃ yudhi devaśatruḥ // 6.047.101	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa tāṃ vidhūmānalasaṃnikāśāṃ; vitrāsanīṃ vānaravāhinīnām / cikṣepa śaktiṃ tarasā jvalantīṃ; saumitraye rākṣasarāṣṭranāthaḥ // 6.047.102	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tām āpatantīṃ bharatānujo 'strair; jaghāna bāṇaiś ca hutāgnikalpaiḥ / tathāpi sā tasya viveśa śaktir; bhujāntaraṃ dāśarather viśālam // 6.047.103	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
śaktyā brāmyā tu saumitris tāḍitas tu stanāntare / viṣṇor acintyaṃ svaṃ bhāgam ātmānaṃ pratyanusmarat // 6.047.104	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dānavadarpaghnaṃ saumitriṃ devakaṇṭakaḥ / taṃ pīḍayitvā bāhubhyām aprabhur laṅghane 'bhavat // 6.047.105	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
himavān mandaro merus trailokyaṃ vā sahāmaraiḥ / śakyaṃ bhujābhyām uddhartuṃ na saṃkhye bharatānujaḥ // 6.047.106	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athainaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ bhāgaṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitam / visaṃjñaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo vismito 'bhavat // 6.047.107	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vāyusutaḥ kruddho rāvaṇaṃ samabhidravat / ājaghānorasi kruddho vajrakalpena muṣṭinā // 6.047.108	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena muṣṭiprahāreṇa rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / jānubhyām apatad bhūmau cacāla ca papāta ca // 6.047.109	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visaṃjñaṃ rāvaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā samare bhīmavikramam / ṛṣayo vānarāś caiva nedur devāḥ savāsavāḥ // 6.047.110	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmān api tejasvī lakṣmaṇaṃ rāvaṇārditam / anayad rāghavābhyāśaṃ bāhubhyāṃ parigṛhya tam // 6.047.111	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāyusūnoḥ suhṛttvena bhaktyā paramayā ca saḥ / śatrūṇām aprakampyo 'pi laghutvam agamat kapeḥ // 6.047.112	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ samutsṛjya sā śaktiḥ saumitriṃ yudhi durjayam / rāvaṇasya rathe tasmin sthānaṃ punar upāgamat // 6.047.113	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇo 'pi mahātejāḥ prāpya saṃjñāṃ mahāhave / ādade niśitān bāṇāñ jagrāha ca mahad dhanuḥ // 6.047.114	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśvastaś ca viśalyaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ śatrusūdanaḥ / viṣṇor bhāgam amīmāṃsyam ātmānaṃ pratyanusmaran // 6.047.115	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nipātitamahāvīrāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūm / rāghavas tu raṇe dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaṃ samabhidravat // 6.047.116	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athainam upasaṃgamya hanūmān vākyam abravīt / mama pṛṣṭhaṃ samāruhya rakṣasaṃ śāstum arhasi // 6.047.117	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā rāghavo vākyaṃ vāyuputreṇa bhāṣitam / ārohat sahasā śūro hanūmantaṃ mahākapim // 6.047.118.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathasthaṃ rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye dadarśa manujādhipaḥ // 6.047.118.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ālokya mahātejāḥ pradudrāva sa rāghavaḥ / vairocanam iva kruddho viṣṇur abhyudyatāyudhaḥ // 6.047.119	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyāśabdam akarot tīvraṃ vajraniṣpeṣanisvanam / girā gambhīrayā rāmo rākṣasendram uvāca ha // 6.047.120	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mama tvaṃ hi kṛtvā vipriyam īdṛśam / kva nu rākṣasaśārdūla gato mokṣam avāpsyasi // 6.047.121	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadīndravaivasvata bhāskarān vā; svayambhuvaiśvānaraśaṃkarān vā / gamiṣyasi tvaṃ daśa vā diśo vā; tathāpi me nādya gato vimokṣyase // 6.047.122	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
yaś caiṣa śaktyābhihatas tvayādya; icchan viṣādaṃ sahasābhyupetaḥ / sa eṣa rakṣogaṇarāja mṛtyuḥ; saputradārasya tavādya yuddhe // 6.047.123	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā rākṣasendro mahākapim / ājaghāna śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kālānalaśikhopamaiḥ // 6.047.124	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasenāhave tasya tāḍitasyāpi sāyakaiḥ / svabhāvatejoyuktasya bhūyas tejo vyavardhata // 6.047.125	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmo mahātejā rāvaṇena kṛtavraṇam / dṛṣṭvā plavagaśārdūlaṃ krodhasya vaśam eyivān // 6.047.126	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyābhisaṃkramya rathaṃ sacakraṃ; sāśvadhvajacchatramahāpatākam / sasārathiṃ sāśaniśūlakhaḍgaṃ; rāmaḥ praciccheda śaraiḥ supuṅkhaiḥ // 6.047.127	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
athendraśatruṃ tarasā jaghāna; bāṇena vajrāśanisaṃnibhena / bhujāntare vyūḍhasujātarūpe; vajreṇa meruṃ bhagavān ivendraḥ // 6.047.128	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
yo vajrapātāśanisaṃnipātān; na cukṣubhe nāpi cacāla rājā / sa rāmabāṇābhihato bhṛśārtaś; cacāla cāpaṃ ca mumoca vīraḥ // 6.047.129	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
taṃ vihvalantaṃ prasamīkṣya rāmaḥ; samādade dīptam athārdhacandram / tenārkavarṇaṃ sahasā kirīṭaṃ; ciccheda rakṣo'dhipater mahātmāḥ // 6.047.130	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
taṃ nirviṣāśīviṣasaṃnikāśaṃ; śāntārciṣaṃ sūryam ivāprakāśam / gataśriyaṃ kṛttakirīṭakūṭam; uvāca rāmo yudhi rākṣasendram // 6.047.131	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
kṛtaṃ tvayā karma mahat subhīmaṃ; hatapravīraś ca kṛtas tvayāham / tasmāt pariśrānta iti vyavasya; na tvaṃ śarair mṛtyuvaśaṃ nayāmi // 6.047.132	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa evam ukto hatadarpaharṣo; nikṛttacāpaḥ sa hatāśvasūtaḥ / śarārditaḥ kṛttamahākirīṭo; viveśa laṅkāṃ sahasā sma rājā // 6.047.133	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tasmin praviṣṭe rajanīcarendre; mahābale dānavadevaśatrau / harīn viśalyān sahalakṣmaṇena; cakāra rāmaḥ paramāhavāgre // 6.047.134	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tasmin prabhagne tridaśendraśatrau; surāsurā bhūtagaṇā diśaś ca / sasāgarāḥ sarṣimahoragāś ca; tathaiva bhūmyambucarāś ca hṛṣṭāḥ // 6.047.135	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa praviśya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāmabāṇabhayārditaḥ / bhagnadarpas tadā rājā babhūva vyathitendriyaḥ // 6.048.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātaṃga iva siṃhena garuḍeneva pannagaḥ / abhibhūto 'bhavad rājā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā // 6.048.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmadaṇḍaprakāśānāṃ vidyutsadṛśavarcasām / smaran rāghavabāṇānāṃ vivyathe rākṣaseśvaraḥ // 6.048.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kāñcanamayaṃ divyam āśritya paramāsanam / vikprekṣamāṇo rakṣāṃsi rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt // 6.048.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaṃ tat khalu me moghaṃ yat taptaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ / yat samāno mahendreṇa mānuṣeṇāsmi nirjitaḥ // 6.048.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ tad brahmaṇo ghoraṃ vākyaṃ mām abhyupasthitam / mānuṣebhyo vijānīhi bhayaṃ tvam iti tat tathā // 6.048.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavagandharvair yakṣarākṣasapannagaiḥ / avadhyatvaṃ mayā prāptaṃ mānuṣebhyo na yācitam // 6.048.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad evābhyupāgamya yatnaṃ kartum ihārhatha / rākṣasāś cāpi tiṣṭhantu caryāgopuramūrdhasu // 6.048.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cāpratimagambhīro devadānavadarpahā / brahmaśāpābhibhūtas tu kumbhakarṇo vibodhyatām // 6.048.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa parājitam ātmānaṃ prahastaṃ ca niṣūditam / jñātvā rakṣobalaṃ bhīmam ādideśa mahābalaḥ // 6.048.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvāreṣu yatnaḥ kriyatāṃ prākārāś cādhiruhyatām / nidrāvaśasamāviṣṭaḥ kumbhakarṇo vibodhyatām // 6.048.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nava ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau ca māsān svapiti rākṣasaḥ / taṃ tu bodhayata kṣipraṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam // 6.048.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi saṃkhye mahābāhuḥ kakudaṃ sarvarakṣasām / vānarān rājaputrau ca kṣipram eva vadhiṣyati // 6.048.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇaḥ sadā śete mūḍho grāmyasukhe rataḥ / rāmeṇābhinirastasya saṃgrāmo 'smin sudāruṇe // 6.048.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaviṣyati na me śokaḥ kumbhakarṇe vibodhite / kiṃ kariṣyāmy ahaṃ tena śakratulyabalena hi // 6.048.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īdṛśe vyasane prāpte yo na sāhyāya kalpate / te tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasendrasya rākṣasāḥ // 6.048.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jagmuḥ paramasaṃbhrāntāḥ kumbhakarṇaniveśanam / te rāvaṇasamādiṣṭā māṃsaśoṇitabhojanāḥ // 6.048.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandhamālyāṃs tathā bhakṣyān ādāya sahasā yayuḥ / tāṃ praviśya mahādvārāṃ sarvato yojanāyatām // 6.048.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇaguhāṃ ramyāṃ sarvagandhapravāhinīm / pratiṣṭhamānāḥ kṛcchreṇa yatnāt praviviśur guhām // 6.048.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ praviśya guhāṃ ramyāṃ śubhāṃ kāñcanakuṭṭimām / dadṛśur nairṛtavyāghraṃ śayānaṃ bhīmadarśanam // 6.048.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu taṃ vikṛtaṃ suptaṃ vikīrṇam iva parvatam / kumbhakarṇaṃ mahānidraṃ sahitāḥ pratyabodhayan // 6.048.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūrdhvaromāñcitatanuṃ śvasantam iva pannagam / trāsayantaṃ mahāśvāsaiḥ śayānaṃ bhīmadarśanam // 6.048.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhīmanāsāpuṭaṃ taṃ tu pātālavipulānanam / dadṛśur nairṛtavyāghraṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam // 6.048.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataś cakrur mahātmānaḥ kumbhakarṇāgratas tadā / māṃsānāṃ merusaṃkāśaṃ rāśiṃ paramatarpaṇam // 6.048.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca varāhāṇāṃ ca saṃcayān / cakrur nairṛtaśārdūlā rāśimann asya cādbhutam // 6.048.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śoṇitakumbhāṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca / purastāt kumbhakarṇasya cakrus tridaśaśatravaḥ // 6.048.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lilipuś ca parārdhyena candanena paraṃtapam / divyair ācchādayām āsur mālyair gandhaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ // 6.048.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhūpaṃ sugandhaṃ sasṛjus tuṣṭuvuś ca paraṃtapam / jaladā iva conedur yātudhānāḥ sahasraśaḥ // 6.048.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkhān āpūrayām āsuḥ śaśāṅkasadṛśaprabhān / tumulaṃ yugapac cāpi vineduś cāpy amarṣitāḥ // 6.048.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nedur āsphoṭayām āsuś cikṣipus te niśācarāḥ / kumbhakarṇavibodhārthaṃ cakrus te vipulaṃ svanam // 6.048.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saśaṅkhabherīpaṭahapraṇādam; āsphoṭitakṣveḍitasiṃhanādam / diśo dravantas tridivaṃ kirantaḥ; śrutvā vihaṃgāḥ sahasā nipetuḥ // 6.048.031	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
yadā bhṛśaṃ tair ninadair mahātmā; na kumbhakarṇo bubudhe prasuptaḥ / tato musuṇḍīmusalāni sarve; rakṣogaṇās te jagṛhur gadāś ca // 6.048.032	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
taṃ śailaśṛṅgair musalair gadābhir; vṛkṣais talair mudgaramuṣṭibhiś ca / sukhaprasuptaṃ bhuvi kumbhakarṇaṃ; rakṣāṃsy udagrāṇi tadā nijaghnuḥ // 6.048.033	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tasya niśvāsavātena kumbhakarṇasya rakṣasaḥ / rākṣasā balavanto 'pi sthātuṃ nāśaknuvan puraḥ // 6.048.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'sya purato gāḍhaṃ rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ / mṛdaṅgapaṇavān bherīḥ śaṅkhakumbhagaṇāṃs tathā // 6.048.035.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśarākṣasasāhasraṃ yugapat paryavādayan // 6.048.035.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlāñjanacayākāraṃ te tu taṃ pratyabodhayan / abhighnanto nadantaś ca naiva saṃvivide tu saḥ // 6.048.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā cainaṃ na śekus te pratibodhayituṃ tadā / tato gurutaraṃ yatnaṃ dāruṇaṃ samupākraman // 6.048.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśvān uṣṭrān kharān nāgāñ jaghnur daṇḍakaśāṅkuśaiḥ / bherīśaṅkhamṛdaṅgāṃś ca sarvaprāṇair avādayan // 6.048.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nijaghnuś cāsya gātrāṇi mahākāṣṭhakaṭaṃ karaiḥ / mudgarair musalaiś caiva sarvaprāṇasamudyataiḥ // 6.048.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena śabdena mahatā laṅkā samabhipūritā / saparvatavanā sarvā so 'pi naiva prabudhyate // 6.048.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sahasraṃ bherīṇāṃ yugapat samahanyata / mṛṣṭakāñcanakoṇānām asaktānāṃ samantataḥ // 6.048.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam apy atinidras tu yadā naiva prabudhyata / śāpasya vaśam āpannas tataḥ kruddhā niśācarāḥ // 6.048.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahākrodhasamāviṣṭāḥ sarve bhīmaparākramāḥ / tad rakṣobodhayiṣyantaś cakrur anye parākramam // 6.048.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anye bherīḥ samājaghnur anye cakrur mahāsvanam / keśān anye pralulupuḥ karṇāv anye daśanti ca // 6.048.044.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kumbhakarṇaḥ paspande mahānidrāvaśaṃ gataḥ // 6.048.044.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anye ca balinas tasya kūṭamudgarapāṇayaḥ / mūrdhni vakṣasi gātreṣu pātayan kūṭamudgarān // 6.048.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rajjubandhanabaddhābhiḥ śataghnībhiś ca sarvataḥ / vadhyamāno mahākāyo na prābudhyata rākṣasaḥ // 6.048.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāraṇānāṃ sahasraṃ tu śarīre 'sya pradhāvitam / kumbhakarṇas tato buddhaḥ sparśaṃ param abudhyata // 6.048.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pātyamānair giriśṛṅgavṛkṣair; acintayaṃs tān vipulān prahārān / nidrākṣayāt kṣudbhayapīḍitaś ca; vijṛmbhamāṇaḥ sahasotpapāta // 6.048.048	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa nāgabhogācalaśṛṅgakalpau; vikṣipya bāhū giriśṛṅgasārau / vivṛtya vaktraṃ vaḍavāmukhābhaṃ; niśācaro 'sau vikṛtaṃ jajṛmbhe // 6.048.049	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tasya jājṛmbhamāṇasya vaktraṃ pātālasaṃnibham / dadṛśe meruśṛṅgāgre divākara ivoditaḥ // 6.048.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vijṛmbhamāṇo 'tibalaḥ pratibuddho niśācaraḥ / niśvāsaś cāsya saṃjajñe parvatād iva mārutaḥ // 6.048.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rūpam uttiṣṭhatas tasya kumbhakarṇasya tad babhau / tapānte sabalākasya meghasyeva vivarṣataḥ // 6.048.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya dīptāgnisadṛśe vidyutsadṛśavarcasī / dadṛśāte mahānetre dīptāv iva mahāgrahau // 6.048.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādad bubhukṣito māṃsaṃ śoṇitaṃ tṛṣito 'pibat / medaḥ kumbhaṃ ca madyaṃ ca papau śakraripus tadā // 6.048.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tṛpta iti jñātvā samutpetur niśācarāḥ / śirobhiś ca praṇamyainaṃ sarvataḥ paryavārayan // 6.048.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sarvān sāntvayām āsa nairṛtān nairṛtarṣabhaḥ / bodhanād vismitaś cāpi rākṣasān idam abravīt // 6.048.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kimartham aham āhatya bhavadbhiḥ pratibodhitaḥ / kaccit sukuśalaṃ rājño bhayaṃ vā neha kiṃ cana // 6.048.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā dhruvam anyebhyo bhayaṃ param upasthitam / yadartham eva tvaritair bhavadbhiḥ pratibodhitaḥ // 6.048.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya rākṣasarājasya bhayam utpāṭayāmy aham / pātayiṣye mahendraṃ vā śātayiṣye tathānalam // 6.048.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy alpakāraṇe suptaṃ bodhayiṣyati māṃ bhṛśam / tad ākhyātārthatattvena matprabodhanakāraṇam // 6.048.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ kumbhakarṇam ariṃdamam / yūpākṣaḥ sacivo rājñaḥ kṛtāñjalir uvāca ha // 6.048.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na no devakṛtaṃ kiṃ cid bhayam asti kadā cana / na daityadānavebhyo vā bhayam asti hi tādṛśam // 6.048.062.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yādṛśaṃ mānuṣaṃ rājan bhayam asmān upasthitam // 6.048.062.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānaraiḥ parvatākārair laṅkeyaṃ parivāritā / sītāharaṇasaṃtaptād rāmān nas tumulaṃ bhayam // 6.048.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekena vānareṇeyaṃ pūrvaṃ dagdhā mahāpurī / kumāro nihataś cākṣaḥ sānuyātraḥ sakuñjaraḥ // 6.048.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svayaṃ rakṣo'dhipaś cāpi paulastyo devakaṇṭakaḥ / mṛteti saṃyuge muktārāmeṇādityatejasā // 6.048.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yan na devaiḥ kṛto rājā nāpi daityair na dānavaiḥ / kṛtaḥ sa iha rāmeṇa vimuktaḥ prāṇasaṃśayāt // 6.048.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa yūpākṣavacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur yudhi parājayam / kumbhakarṇo vivṛttākṣo yūpākṣam idam abravīt // 6.048.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvam adyaiva yūpākṣa harisainyaṃ salakṣmaṇam / rāghavaṃ ca raṇe hatvā paścād drakṣyāmi rāvaṇam // 6.048.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasāṃs tarpayiṣyāmi harīṇāṃ māṃsaśoṇitaiḥ / rāmalakṣmaṇayoś cāpi svayaṃ pāsyāmi śoṇitam // 6.048.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat tasya vākyaṃ bruvato niśamya; sagarvitaṃ roṣavivṛddhadoṣam / mahodaro nairṛtayodhamukhyaḥ; kṛtāñjalir vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe // 6.048.070	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā guṇadoṣu vimṛśya ca / paścād api mahābāho śatrūn yudhi vijeṣyasi // 6.048.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahodaravacaḥ śrutvā rākṣasaiḥ parivāritaḥ / kumbhakarṇo mahātejāḥ saṃpratasthe mahābalaḥ // 6.048.072	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ samutthāpya bhīmākṣaṃ bhīmarūpaparākramam / rākṣasās tvaritā jagmur daśagrīvaniveśanam // 6.048.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gatvā daśagrīvam āsīnaṃ paramāsane / ūcur baddhāñjalipuṭāḥ sarva eva niśācarāḥ // 6.048.074	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabuddhaḥ kumbhakarṇo 'sau bhrātā te rākṣasarṣabha / kathaṃ tatraiva niryātu drakṣyase tam ihāgatam // 6.048.075	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇas tv abravīd dhṛṣṭo yathānyāyaṃ ca pūjitam / draṣṭum enam ihecchāmi yathānyāyaṃ ca pūjitam // 6.048.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathety uktvā tu te sarve punar āgamya rākṣasāḥ / kumbhakarṇam idaṃ vākyam ūcū rāvaṇacoditāḥ // 6.048.077	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
draṣṭuṃ tvāṃ kāṅkṣate rājā sarvarākṣasapuṃgavaḥ / gamane kriyatāṃ buddhir bhrātaraṃ saṃpraharṣaya // 6.048.078	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇas tu durdharṣo bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam / tathety uktvā mahāvīryaḥ śayanād utpapāta ha // 6.048.079	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṣālya vadanaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ snātaḥ paramabhūṣitaḥ / pipāsus tvarayām āsa pānaṃ balasamīraṇam // 6.048.080	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te tvaritās tasya rājṣasā rāvaṇājñayā / madyaṃ bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhān kṣipram evopahārayan // 6.048.081	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pītvā ghaṭasahasraṃ sa gamanāyopacakrame // 6.048.082	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īṣatsamutkaṭo mattas tejobalasamanvitaḥ / kumbhakarṇo babhau hṛṣṭaḥ kālāntakayamopamaḥ // 6.048.083	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātuḥ sa bhavanaṃ gacchan rakṣobalasamanvitaḥ / kumbhakarṇaḥ padanyāsair akampayata medinīm // 6.048.084	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājamārgaṃ vapuṣā prakāśayan; sahasraraśmir dharaṇīm ivāṃśubhiḥ / jagāma tatrāñjalimālayā vṛtaḥ; śatakratur geham iva svayambhuvaḥ // 6.048.085	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
ke cic charaṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ sma rāmaṃ; vrajanti ke cid vyathitāḥ patanti / ke cid diśaḥ sma vyathitāḥ prayānti; ke cid bhayārtā bhuvi śerate sma // 6.048.086	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tam adriśṛṅgapratimaṃ kirīṭinaṃ; spṛśantam ādityam ivātmatejasā / vanaukasaḥ prekṣya vivṛddham adbhutaṃ; bhayārditā dudruvire tatas tataḥ // 6.048.087	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato rāmo mahātejā dhanur ādāya vīryavān / kirīṭinaṃ mahākāyaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ dadarśa ha // 6.049.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ parvatākāradarśanam / kramamāṇam ivākāśaṃ purā nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum // 6.049.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satoyāmbudasaṃkāśaṃ kāñcanāṅgadabhūṣaṇam / dṛṣṭvā punaḥ pradudrāva vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūḥ // 6.049.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā vardhamānaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ / savismayam idaṃ rāmo vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha // 6.049.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko 'sau parvatasaṃkaśaḥ kirīṭī harilocanaḥ / laṅkāyāṃ dṛśyate vīraḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ // 6.049.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛthivyāḥ ketubhūto 'sau mahān eko 'tra dṛśyate / yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve vidravanti tatas tataḥ // 6.049.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ācakṣva me mahān ko 'sau rakṣo vā yadi vāsuraḥ / na mayaivaṃvidhaṃ bhūtaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kadā cana // 6.049.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pṛṣṭo rājaputreṇa rāmeṇākliṣṭakāriṇā / vibhīṣaṇo mahāprājñaḥ kākutstham idam abravīt // 6.049.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena vaivasvato yuddhe vāsavaś ca parājitaḥ / saiṣa viśravasaḥ putraḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ pratāpavān // 6.049.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etena devā yudhi dānavāś ca; yakṣā bhujaṃgāḥ piśitāśanāś ca / gandharvavidyādharakiṃnarāś ca; sahasraśo rāghava saṃprabhagnāḥ // 6.049.010	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
śūlapāṇiṃ virūpākṣaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam / hantuṃ na śekus tridaśāḥ kālo 'yam iti mohitāḥ // 6.049.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṛtyā hy eṣa tejasvī kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ / anyeṣāṃ rākṣasendrāṇāṃ varadānakṛtaṃ balam // 6.049.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etena jātamātreṇa kṣudhārtena mahātmanā / bhakṣitāni sahasrāṇi sattvānāṃ subahūny api // 6.049.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣu saṃbhakṣyamāṇeṣu prajā bhayanipīḍitāḥ / yānti sma śaraṇaṃ śakraṃ tam apy arthaṃ nyavedayan // 6.049.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kumbhakarṇaṃ kupito mahendro; jaghāna vajreṇa śitena vajrī / sa śakravajrābhihato mahātmā; cacāla kopāc ca bhṛśaṃ nanāda // 6.049.015	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tasya nānadyamānasya kumbhakarṇasya dhīmataḥ / śrutvā ninādaṃ vitrastā bhūyo bhūmir vitatrase // 6.049.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kopān mahendrasya kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ / vikṛṣyairāvatād dantaṃ jaghānorasi vāsavam // 6.049.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇaprahārārto vicacāla sa vāsavaḥ / tato viṣeduḥ sahasā devabrahmarṣidānavāḥ // 6.049.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajābhiḥ saha śakraś ca yayau sthānaṃ svayambhuvaḥ / kumbhakarṇasya daurātmyaṃ śaśaṃsus te prajāpateḥ // 6.049.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajānāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ cāpi devānāṃ cāpi dharṣaṇam // 6.049.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ prajā yadi tv eṣa bhakṣayiṣyati nityaśaḥ / acireṇaiva kālena śūnyo loko bhaviṣyati // 6.049.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāsavasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarvalokapitāmahaḥ / rakṣāṃsy āvāhayām āsa kumbhakarṇaṃ dadarśa ha // 6.049.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇaṃ samīkṣyaiva vitatrāsa prajāpatiḥ / dṛṣṭvā niśvasya caivedaṃ svayambhūr idam abravīt // 6.049.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhruvaṃ lokavināśāya paurastyenāsi nirmitaḥ / tasmāt tvam adya prabhṛti mṛtakalpaḥ śayiṣyasi // 6.049.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmaśāpābhibhūto 'tha nipapātāgrataḥ prabhoḥ // 6.049.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paramasaṃbhrānto rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt / vivṛddhaḥ kāñcano vṛkṣaḥ phalakāle nikṛtyate // 6.049.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na naptāraṃ svakaṃ nyāyyaṃ śaptum evaṃ prajāpate / na mithyāvacanaś ca tvaṃ svapsyaty eṣa na saṃśayaḥ // 6.049.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālas tu kriyatām asya śayane jāgare tathā // 6.049.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā svayambhūr idam abravīt / śayitā hy eṣa ṣaṇ māsān ekāhaṃ jāgariṣyati // 6.049.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekenāhnā tv asau vīraś caran bhūmiṃ bubhukṣitaḥ / vyāttāsyo bhakṣayel lokān saṃkruddha iva pāvakaḥ // 6.049.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'sau vyasanam āpannaḥ kumbhakarṇam abodhayat / tvatparākramabhītaś ca rājā saṃprati rāvaṇaḥ // 6.049.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa eṣa nirgato vīraḥ śibirād bhīmavikramaḥ / vānarān bhṛśasaṃkruddho bhakṣayan paridhāvati // 6.049.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇaṃ samīkṣyaiva harayo vipradudruvuḥ / katham enaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ vārayiṣyanti vānarāḥ // 6.049.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ucyantāṃ vānarāḥ sarve yantram etat samucchritam / iti vijñāya harayo bhaviṣyantīha nirbhayāḥ // 6.049.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śrutvā hetumat sumukhodgatam / uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ nīlaṃ senāpatiṃ tadā // 6.049.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaccha sainyāni sarvāṇi vyūhya tiṣṭhasva pāvake / dvārāṇy ādāya laṅkāyāś caryāś cāpy atha saṃkramān // 6.049.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailaśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca śilāś cāpy upasaṃharan / tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ sarve sāyudhāḥ śailapāṇayaḥ // 6.049.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghaveṇa samādiṣṭo nīlo haricamūpatiḥ / śaśāsa vānarānīkaṃ yathāvat kapikuñjaraḥ // 6.049.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gavākṣaḥ śarabho hanumān aṅgado nalaḥ / śailaśṛṅgāṇi śailābhā gṛhītvā dvāram abhyayuḥ // 6.049.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato harīṇāṃ tad anīkam ugraṃ; rarāja śailodyatavṛkṣahastam / gireḥ samīpānugataṃ yathaiva; mahan mahāmbhodharajālam ugram // 6.049.037	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
sa tu rākṣasaśārdūlo nidrāmadasamākulaḥ / rājamārgaṃ śriyā juṣṭaṃ yayau vipulavikramaḥ // 6.050.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasānāṃ sahasraiś ca vṛtaḥ paramadurjayaḥ / gṛhebhyaḥ puṣpavarṣeṇa kāryamāṇas tadā yayau // 6.050.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hemajālavitataṃ bhānubhāsvaradarśanam / dadarśa vipulaṃ ramyaṃ rākṣasendraniveśanam // 6.050.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tat tadā sūrya ivābhrajālaṃ; praviśya rakṣo'dhipater niveśanam / dadarśa dūre 'grajam āsanasthaṃ; svayambhuvaṃ śakra ivāsanastham // 6.050.004	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
so 'bhigamya gṛhaṃ bhrātuḥ kakṣyām abhivigāhya ca / dadarśodvignam āsīnaṃ vimāne puṣpake gurum // 6.050.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇam upasthitam / tūrṇam utthāya saṃhṛṣṭaḥ saṃnikarṣam upānayat // 6.050.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāsīnasya paryaṅke kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ / bhrātur vavande caraṇāṃ kiṃ kṛtyam iti cābravīt // 6.050.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utpatya cainaṃ mudito rāvaṇaḥ pariṣasvaje // 6.050.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhrātrā saṃpariṣvakto yathāvac cābhinanditaḥ / kumbhakarṇaḥ śubhaṃ divyaṃ pratipede varāsanam // 6.050.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tadāsanam āśritya kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ / saṃraktanayanaḥ kopād rāvaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt // 6.050.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kimartham aham ādṛtya tvayā rājan prabodhitaḥ / śaṃsa kasmād bhayaṃ te 'sti ko 'dya preto bhaviṣyati // 6.050.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātaraṃ rāvaṇaḥ kruddhaṃ kumbhakarṇam avasthitam / īṣat tu parivṛttābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ vākyam abravīt // 6.050.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya te sumahān kālaḥ śayānasya mahābala / sukhitas tvaṃ na jānīṣe mama rāmakṛtaṃ bhayam // 6.050.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa dāśarathī rāmaḥ sugrīvasahito balī / samudraṃ sabalas tīrtvā mūlaṃ naḥ parikṛntati // 6.050.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanta paśyasva laṅkāyā vanāny upavanāni ca / setunā sukham āgamya vānaraikārṇavaṃ kṛtam // 6.050.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye rākṣasā mukhyatamā hatās te vānarair yudhi / vānarāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ yuddhe na paśyāmi kadā cana // 6.050.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvakṣapitakośaṃ ca sa tvam abhyavapadya mām / trāyasvemāṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ bālavṛddhāvaśeṣitām // 6.050.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātur arthe mahābāho kuru karma suduṣkaram / mayaivaṃ noktapūrvo hi kaś cid bhrātaḥ paraṃtapa // 6.050.017.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayy asti mama ca snehaḥ parā saṃbhāvanā ca me // 6.050.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devāsuravimardeṣu bahuśo rākṣasarṣabha / tvayā devāḥ prativyūhya nirjitāś cāsurā yudhi // 6.050.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi te sarvabhūteṣu dṛśyate sadṛśo balī // 6.050.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuruṣva me priyahitam etad uttamaṃ; yathāpriyaṃ priyaraṇabāndhavapriya / svatejasā vidhama sapatnavāhinīṃ; śaradghanaṃ pavana ivodyato mahān // 6.050.019	rucirā [jBsjg]
tasya rākṣasarājasya niśamya paridevitam / kumbhakarṇo babhāṣe 'tha vacanaṃ prajahāsa ca // 6.051.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭo doṣo hi yo 'smābhiḥ purā mantravinirṇaye / hiteṣv anabhiyuktena so 'yam āsāditas tvayā // 6.051.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghraṃ khalv abhyupetaṃ tvāṃ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ / nirayeṣv eva patanaṃ yathā duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ // 6.051.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prathamaṃ vai mahārāja kṛtyam etad acintitam / kevalaṃ vīryadarpeṇa nānubandho vicāritaḥ // 6.051.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaḥ paścāt pūrvakāryāṇi kuryād aiśvaryam āsthitaḥ / pūrvaṃ cottarakāryāṇi na sa veda nayānayau // 6.051.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
deśakālavihīnāni karmāṇi viparītavat / kriyamāṇāni duṣyanti havīṃṣy aprayateṣv iva // 6.051.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trayāṇāṃ pañcadhā yogaṃ karmaṇāṃ yaḥ prapaśyati / sacivaiḥ samayaṃ kṛtvā sa sabhye vartate pathi // 6.051.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāgamaṃ ca yo rājā samayaṃ vicikīrṣati / budhyate sacivān buddhyā suhṛdaś cānupaśyati // 6.051.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca sarvān vā rakṣasāṃ pate / bhajate puruṣaḥ kāle trīṇi dvandvāni vā punaḥ // 6.051.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triṣu caiteṣu yac chreṣṭhaṃ śrutvā tan nāvabudhyate / rājā vā rājamātro vā vyarthaṃ tasya bahuśrutam // 6.051.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upapradānaṃ sāntvaṃ vā bhedaṃ kāle ca vikramam / yogaṃ ca rakṣasāṃ śreṣṭha tāv ubhau ca nayānayau // 6.051.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāle dharmārthakāmān yaḥ saṃmantrya sacivaiḥ saha / niṣevetātmavāṃl loke na sa vyasanam āpnuyāt // 6.051.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hitānubandham ālokya kāryākāryam ihātmanaḥ / rājā sahārthatattvajñaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha jīvati // 6.051.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anabhijñāya śāstrārthān puruṣāḥ paśubuddhayaḥ / prāgalbhyād vaktum icchanti mantreṣv abhyantarīkṛtāḥ // 6.051.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśāstraviduṣāṃ teṣāṃ na kāryam ahitaṃ vacaḥ / arthaśāstrānabhijñānāṃ vipulāṃ śriyam icchatām // 6.051.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahitaṃ ca hitākāraṃ dhārṣṭyāj jalpanti ye narāḥ / avekṣya mantrabāhyās te kartavyāḥ kṛtyadūṣaṇāḥ // 6.051.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vināśayanto bhartāraṃ sahitāḥ śatrubhir budhaiḥ / viparītāni kṛtyāni kārayantīha mantriṇaḥ // 6.051.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān bhartā mitrasaṃkāśān amitrān mantranirṇaye / vyavahāreṇa jānīyāt sacivān upasaṃhitān // 6.051.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
capalasyeha kṛtyāni sahasānupradhāvataḥ / chidram anye prapadyante krauñcasya kham iva dvijāḥ // 6.051.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo hi śatrum avajñāya nātmānam abhirakṣati / avāpnoti hi so 'narthān sthānāc ca vyavaropyate // 6.051.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat tu śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇasya bhāṣitam / bhrukuṭiṃ caiva saṃcakre kruddhaś cainam uvāca ha // 6.051.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānyo gurur ivācāryaḥ kiṃ māṃ tvam anuśāsati / kim evaṃ vākśramaṃ kṛtvā kāle yuktaṃ vidhīyatām // 6.051.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhramāc cittamohād vā balavīryāśrayeṇa vā / nābhipannam idānīṃ yad vyarthās tasya punaḥ kṛthāḥ // 6.051.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin kāle tu yad yuktaṃ tad idānīṃ vidhīyatām / mamāpanayajaṃ doṣaṃ vikrameṇa samīkuru // 6.051.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi khalv asti me sneho bhrātṛtvaṃ vāvagacchasi / yadi vā kāryam etat te hṛdi kāryatamaṃ matam // 6.051.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa suhṛdyo vipannārthaṃ dīnam abhyavapadyate / sa bandhur yo 'panīteṣu sāhāyyāyopakalpate // 6.051.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam athaivaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu vacanaṃ dhīradāruṇam / ruṣṭo 'yam iti vijñāya śanaiḥ ślakṣṇam uvāca ha // 6.051.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atīva hi samālakṣya bhrātaraṃ kṣubhitendriyam / kumbhakarṇaḥ śanair vākyaṃ babhāṣe parisāntvayan // 6.051.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaṃ rākṣasarājendra saṃtāpam upapadya te / roṣaṃ ca saṃparityajya svastho bhavitum arhasi // 6.051.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naitan manasi kartavvyaṃ mayi jīvati pārthiva / tam ahaṃ nāśayiṣyāmi yatkṛte paritapyase // 6.051.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyaṃ tu hitaṃ vācyaṃ sarvāvasthaṃ mayā tava / bandhubhāvād abhihitaṃ bhrātṛsnehāc ca pārthiva // 6.051.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśaṃ yat tu kāle 'smin kartuṃ snigdhena bandhunā / śatrūṇāṃ kadanaṃ paśya kriyamāṇaṃ mayā raṇe // 6.051.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya paśya mahābāho mayā samaramūrdhani / hate rāme saha bhrātrā dravantīṃ harivāhinīm // 6.051.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya rāmasya tad dṛṣṭvā mayānītaṃ raṇāc chiraḥ / sukhībhava mahābāho sītā bhavatu duḥkhitā // 6.051.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya rāmasya paśyantu nidhanaṃ sumahat priyam / laṅkāyāṃ rākṣasāḥ sarve ye te nihatabāndhavāḥ // 6.051.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya śokaparītānāṃ svabandhuvadhakāraṇāt / śatror yudhi vināśena karomy asrapramārjanam // 6.051.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya parvatasaṃkāśaṃ sasūryam iva toyadam / vikīrṇaṃ paśya samare sugrīvaṃ plavageśvaram // 6.051.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na paraḥ preṣaṇīyas te yuddhāyātula vikrama / aham utsādayiṣyāmi śatrūṃs tava mahābala // 6.051.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi śakro yadi yamo yadi pāvakamārutau / tān ahaṃ yodhayiṣyāmi kubera varuṇāv api // 6.051.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
girimātraśarīrasya śitaśūladharasya me / nardatas tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrasya bibhīyāc ca puraṃdaraḥ // 6.051.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā tyaktaśastrasya mṛdgatas tarasā ripūn / na me pratimukhe kaś cic chaktaḥ sthātuṃ jijīviṣuḥ // 6.051.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva śaktyā na gadayā nāsinā na śitaiḥ śaraiḥ / hastābhyām eva saṃrabdho haniṣyāmy api vajriṇam // 6.051.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi me muṣṭivegaṃ sa rāghavo 'dya sahiṣyati / tataḥ pāsyanti bāṇaughā rudhiraṃ rāghavasya te // 6.051.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cintayā bādhyase rājan kimarthaṃ mayi tiṣṭhati / so 'haṃ śatruvināśāya tava niryātum udyataḥ // 6.051.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muñca rāmād bhayaṃ rājan haniṣyāmīha saṃyuge / rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sugrīvaṃ ca mahābalam // 6.051.045.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asādhāraṇam icchāmi tava dātuṃ mahad yaśaḥ // 6.051.045.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhena te dāśaratheḥ sukhāvahaṃ; sukhaṃ samāhartum ahaṃ vrajāmi / nihatya rāmaṃ sahalakṣmaṇena; khādāmi sarvān hariyūthamukhyān // 6.051.046	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [ttjgg], vaṃśastha [jtjr], ajñātam [jtjgl])
ramasva kāmaṃ piba cāgryavāruṇīṃ; kuruṣva kṛtyāni vinīyatāṃ jvaraḥ / mayādya rāme gamite yamakṣayaṃ; cirāya sītā vaśagā bhaviṣyati // 6.051.047	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tad uktam atikāyasya balino bāhuśālinaḥ / kumbhakarṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvovāca mahodaraḥ // 6.052.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇakule jāto dhṛṣṭaḥ prākṛtadarśanaḥ / avalipto na śaknoṣi kṛtyaṃ sarvatra veditum // 6.052.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi rājā na jānīte kumbhakarṇa nayānayau / tvaṃ tu kaiśorakād dhṛṣṭaḥ kevalaṃ vaktum icchasi // 6.052.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca hāniṃ ca deśakālavibhāgavit / ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca budhyate rākṣasarṣabha // 6.052.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tu śakyaṃ balavatā kartuṃ prākṛtabuddhinā / anupāsitavṛddhena kaḥ kuryāt tādṛśaṃ budhaḥ // 6.052.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāṃs tu dharmārthakāmāṃs tvaṃ bravīṣi pṛthag āśrayān / anuboddhuṃ svabhāvena na hi lakṣaṇam asti te // 6.052.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karma caiva hi sarveṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ prayojanam / śreyaḥ pāpīyasāṃ cātra phalaṃ bhavati karmaṇām // 6.052.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niḥśreyasa phalāv eva dharmārthāv itarāv api / adharmānarthayoḥ prāptiḥ phalaṃ ca pratyavāyikam // 6.052.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aihalaukikapāratryaṃ karma pumbhir niṣevyate / karmāṇy api tu kalpyāni labhate kāmam āsthitaḥ // 6.052.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra kḷptam idaṃ rājñā hṛdi kāryaṃ mataṃ ca naḥ / śatrau hi sāhasaṃ yat syāt kim ivātrāpanīyate // 6.052.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekasyaivābhiyāne tu hetur yaḥ prakṛtas tvayā / tatrāpy anupapannaṃ te vakṣyāmi yad asādhu ca // 6.052.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena pūrvaṃ janasthāne bahavo 'tibalā hatāḥ / rākṣasā rāghavaṃ taṃ tvaṃ katham eko jayiṣyasi // 6.052.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye purā nirjitās tena janasthāne mahaujasaḥ / rākṣasāṃs tān pure sarvān bhītān adyāpi paśyasi // 6.052.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ siṃham iva saṃkruddhaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam / sarpaṃ suptam ivābuddhyā prabodhayitum icchasi // 6.052.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jvalantaṃ tejasā nityaṃ krodhena ca durāsadam / kas taṃ mṛtyum ivāsahyam āsādayitum arhati // 6.052.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃśayastham idaṃ sarvaṃ śatroḥ pratisamāsane / ekasya gamanaṃ tatra na hi me rocate tava // 6.052.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hīnārthas tu samṛddhārthaṃ ko ripuṃ prākṛto yathā / niścitaṃ jīvitatyāge vaśam ānetum icchati // 6.052.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya nāsti manuṣyeṣu sadṛśo rākṣasottama / katham āśaṃsase yoddhuṃ tulyenendravivasvatoḥ // 6.052.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahodaraḥ / uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇam // 6.052.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
labdhvā punas tāṃ vaidehīṃ kimarthaṃ tvaṃ prajalpasi / yadecchasi tadā sītā vaśagā te bhaviṣyati // 6.052.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭaḥ kaś cid upāyo me sītopasthānakārakaḥ / rucitaś cet svayā buddhyā rākṣaseśvara taṃ śṛṇu // 6.052.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ dvijihvaḥ saṃhrādī kumbhakarṇo vitardanaḥ / pañcarāmavadhāyaite niryāntīty avaghoṣaya // 6.052.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gatvā vayaṃ yuddhaṃ dāsyāmas tasya yatnataḥ / jeṣyāmo yadi te śatrūn nopāyaiḥ kṛtyam asti naḥ // 6.052.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha jīvati naḥ śatrur vayaṃ ca kṛtasaṃyugāḥ / tataḥ samabhipatsyāmo manasā yat samīkṣitum // 6.052.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vayaṃ yuddhād ihaiṣyāmo rudhireṇa samukṣitāḥ / vidārya svatanuṃ bāṇai rāmanāmāṅkitaiḥ śitaiḥ // 6.052.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhakṣito rāghavo 'smābhir lakṣmaṇaś ceti vādinaḥ / tava pādau grahīṣyāmas tvaṃ naḥ kāma prapūraya // 6.052.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'vaghoṣaya pure gajaskandhena pārthiva / hato rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā sasainya iti sarvataḥ // 6.052.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prīto nāma tato bhūtvā bhṛtyānāṃ tvam ariṃdama / bhogāṃś ca parivārāṃś ca kāmāṃś ca vasudāpaya // 6.052.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mālyāni vāsāṃsi vīrāṇām anulepanam / peyaṃ ca bahu yodhebhyaḥ svayaṃ ca muditaḥ piba // 6.052.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'smin bahulībhūte kaulīne sarvato gate / praviśyāśvāsya cāpi tvaṃ sītāṃ rahasi sāntvaya // 6.052.030.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanadhānyaiś ca kāmaiś ca ratnaiś caināṃ pralobhaya // 6.052.030.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anayopadhayā rājan bhayaśokānubandhayā / akāmā tvadvaśaṃ sītā naṣṭanāthā gamiṣyati // 6.052.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rañjanīyaṃ hi bhartāraṃ vinaṣṭam avagamya sā / nairāśyāt strīlaghutvāc ca tvadvaśaṃ pratipatsyate // 6.052.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā purā sukhasaṃvṛddhā sukhārhā duḥkhakarṣitā / tvayy adhīnaḥ sukhaṃ jñātvā sarvathopagamiṣyati // 6.052.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat sunītaṃ mama darśanena; rāmaṃ hi dṛṣṭvaiva bhaved anarthaḥ / ihaiva te setsyati motsuko bhūr; mahān ayuddhena sukhasya lābhaḥ // 6.052.034	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
anaṣṭasainyo hy anavāptasaṃśayo; ripūn ayuddhena jayañ janādhipa / yaśaś ca puṇyaṃ ca mahan mahīpate; śriyaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca ciraṃ samaśnute // 6.052.035	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tathoktas tu nirbhartsya kumbhakarṇo mahodaram / abravīd rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāvaṇaṃ tataḥ // 6.053.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ tava bhayaṃ ghoraṃ vadhāt tasya durātmanaḥ / rāmasyādya pramārjāmi nirvairas tvaṃ sukhībhava // 6.053.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
garjanti na vṛthā śūra nirjalā iva toyadāḥ / paśya saṃpādyamānaṃ tu garjitaṃ yudhi karmaṇā // 6.053.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na marṣayati cātmānaṃ saṃbhāvayati nātmanā / adarśayitvā śūrās tu karma kurvanti duṣkaram // 6.053.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viklavānām abuddhīnāṃ rājñāṃ paṇḍitamāninām / śṛṇvatām ādita idaṃ tvadvidhānāṃ mahodara // 6.053.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuddhe kāpuruṣair nityaṃ bhavadbhiḥ priyavādibhiḥ / rājānam anugacchadbhiḥ kṛtyam etad vināśitam // 6.053.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājaśeṣā kṛtā laṅkā kṣīṇaḥ kośo balaṃ hatam / rājānam imam āsādya suhṛccihnam amitrakam // 6.053.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa niryāmy ahaṃ yuddham udyataḥ śatrunirjaye / durnayaṃ bhavatām adya samīkartuṃ mahāhave // 6.053.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktavato vākyaṃ kumbhakarṇasya dhīmataḥ / pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ prahasan rākṣasādhipaḥ // 6.053.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahodaro 'yaṃ rāmāt tu paritrasto na saṃśayaḥ / na hi rocayate tāta yuddhaṃ yuddhaviśārada // 6.053.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaś cin me tvatsamo nāsti sauhṛdena balena ca / gaccha śatruvadhāya tvaṃ kumbhakarṇajayāya ca // 6.053.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādade niśitaṃ śūlaṃ vegāc chatrunibarhaṇaḥ / sarvakālāyasaṃ dīptaṃ taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇam // 6.053.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrāśanisamaṃ bhīmaṃ vajrapratimagauravam / devadānavagandharvayakṣakiṃnarasūdanam // 6.053.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raktamālya mahādāma svataś codgatapāvakam / ādāya niśitaṃ śūlaṃ śatruśoṇitarañjitam // 6.053.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇo mahātejā rāvaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt // 6.053.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamiṣyāmy aham ekākī tiṣṭhatv iha balaṃ mahat / adya tān kṣudhitaḥ kruddho bhakṣayiṣyāmi vānarān // 6.053.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇavacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt / sainyaiḥ parivṛto gaccha śūlamudgalapāṇibhiḥ // 6.053.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarā hi mahātmānaḥ śīghrāś ca vyavasāyinaḥ / ekākinaṃ pramattaṃ vā nayeyur daśanaiḥ kṣayam // 6.053.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt paramadurdharṣaiḥ sainyaiḥ parivṛto vraja / rakṣasām ahitaṃ sarvaṃ śatrupakṣaṃ nisūdaya // 6.053.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāsanāt samutpatya srajaṃ maṇikṛtāntarām / ābabandha mahātejāḥ kumbhakarṇasya rāvaṇaḥ // 6.053.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadān aṅgulīveṣṭān varāṇy ābharaṇāni ca / hāraṃ ca śaśisaṃkāśam ābabandha mahātmanaḥ // 6.053.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyāni ca sugandhīni mālyadāmāni rāvaṇaḥ / śrotre cāsajjayām āsa śrīmatī cāsya kuṇḍale // 6.053.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanāṅgadakeyūro niṣkābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ / kumbhakarṇo bṛhatkarṇaḥ suhuto 'gnir ivābabhau // 6.053.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śroṇīsūtreṇa mahatā mecakena virājitaḥ / amṛtotpādane naddho bhujaṃgeneva mandaraḥ // 6.053.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kāñcanaṃ bhārasahaṃ nivātaṃ; vidyutprabhaṃ dīptam ivātmabhāsā / ābadhyamānaḥ kavacaṃ rarāja; saṃdhyābhrasaṃvīta ivādrirājaḥ // 6.053.024	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sarvābharaṇanaddhāṅgaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ sa rākṣasaḥ / trivikramakṛtotsāho nārāyaṇa ivābabhau // 6.053.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātaraṃ saṃpariṣvajya kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam / praṇamya śirasā tasmai saṃpratasthe mahābaliḥ // 6.053.026.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āśīrbhiḥ praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ // 6.053.026.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkhadundubhinirghoṣaiḥ sainyaiś cāpi varāyudhaiḥ / taṃ gajaiś ca turaṃgaiś ca syandanaiś cāmbudasvanaiḥ // 6.053.027.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujagmur mahātmānaṃ rathino rathināṃ varam // 6.053.027.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarpair uṣṭraiḥ kharair aśvaiḥ siṃhadvipamṛgadvijaiḥ / anujagmuś ca taṃ ghoraṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam // 6.053.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa puṣpavarṇair avakīryamāṇo; dhṛtātapatraḥ śitaśūlapāṇiḥ / madotkaṭaḥ śoṇitagandhamatto; viniryayau dānavadevaśatruḥ // 6.053.029	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
padātayaś a bahavo mahānādā mahābalāḥ / anvayū rākṣasā bhīmā bhīmākṣāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ // 6.053.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raktākṣāḥ sumahākāyā nīlāñjanacayopamāḥ / śūrān udyamya khaḍgāṃś ca niśitāṃś ca paraśvadhān // 6.053.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahuvyāmāṃś ca vipulān kṣepaṇīyān durāsadān / tālaskandhāṃś ca vipulān kṣepaṇīyān durāsadān // 6.053.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athānyad vapur ādāya dāruṇaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / niṣpapāta mahātejāḥ kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ // 6.053.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanuḥśataparīṇāhaḥ sa ṣaṭśatasamucchitaḥ / raudraḥ śakaṭacakrākṣo mahāparvatasaṃnibhaḥ // 6.053.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃnipatya ca rakṣāṃsi dagdhaśailopamo mahān / kumbhakarṇo mahāvaktraḥ prahasann idam abravīt // 6.053.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya vānaramukhyānāṃ tāni yūthāni bhāgaśaḥ / nirdahiṣyāmi saṃkruddhaḥ śalabhān iva pāvakaḥ // 6.053.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāparādhyanti me kāmaṃ vānarā vanacāriṇaḥ / jātir asmadvidhānāṃ sā purodyānavibhūṣaṇam // 6.053.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purarodhasya mūlaṃ tu rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / hate tasmin hataṃ sarvaṃ taṃ vadhiṣyāmi saṃyuge // 6.053.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ tasya bruvāṇasya kumbhakarṇasya rākṣasāḥ / nādaṃ cakrur mahāghoraṃ kampayanta ivārṇavam // 6.053.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya niṣpatatas tūrṇaṃ kumbhakarṇasya dhīmataḥ / babhūvur ghorarūpāṇi nimittāni samantataḥ // 6.053.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ulkāśaniyutā meghā vineduś ca sudāruṇāḥ / sasāgaravanā caiva vasudhā samakampata // 6.053.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghorarūpāḥ śivā neduḥ sajvālakavalair mukhaiḥ / maṇḍalāny apasavyāni babandhuś ca vihaṃgamāḥ // 6.053.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣpapāta ca gṛdhre 'sya śūle vai pathi gacchataḥ / prāsphuran nayanaṃ cāsya savyo bāhur akampata // 6.053.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣpapāta tadā coklā jvalantī bhīmanisvanā / ādityo niṣprabhaś cāsīn na pravāti sukho 'nilaḥ // 6.053.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acintayan mahotpātān utthitāṃl lomaharṣaṇān / niryayau kumbhakarṇas tu kṛtāntabalacoditaḥ // 6.053.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa laṅghayitvā prākāraṃ padbhyāṃ parvatasaṃnibhaḥ / dadarśābhraghanaprakhyaṃ vānarānīkam adbhutam // 6.053.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ vānarāḥ parvatopamam / vāyununnā iva ghanā yayuḥ sarvā diśas tadā // 6.053.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vānarānīkam atipracaṇḍaṃ; diśo dravad bhinnam ivābhrajālam / sa kumbhakarṇaḥ samavekṣya harṣān; nanāda bhūyo ghanavad ghanābhaḥ // 6.053.048	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
te tasya ghoraṃ ninadaṃ niśamya; yathā ninādaṃ divi vāridasya / petur dharaṇyāṃ bahavaḥ plavaṃgā; nikṛttamūlā iva sālavṛkṣāḥ // 6.053.049	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
vipulaparighavān sa kumbhakarṇo; ripunidhanāya viniḥsṛto mahātmā / kapi gaṇabhayam ādadat subhīmaṃ; prabhur iva kiṃkaradaṇḍavān yugānte // 6.053.050	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
sa nanāda mahānādaṃ samudram abhinādayan / janayann iva nirghātān vidhamann iva parvatān // 6.054.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam avadhyaṃ maghavatā yamena varuṇena ca / prekṣya bhīmākṣam āyāntaṃ vānarā vipradudruvuḥ // 6.054.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃs tu vidravato dṛṣṭvā vāliputro 'ṅgado 'bravīt / nalaṃ nīlaṃ gavākṣaṃ ca kumudaṃ ca mahābalam // 6.054.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmānam atra vismṛtya vīryāṇy abhijanāni ca / kva gacchata bhayatrastāḥ prākṛtā harayo yathā // 6.054.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhu saumyā nivartadhvaṃ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha / nālaṃ yuddhāya vai rakṣo mahatīyaṃ vibhīṣikāḥ // 6.054.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahatīm utthitām enāṃ rākṣasānāṃ vibhīṣikām / vikramād vidhamiṣyāmo nivartadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.054.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛcchreṇa tu samāśvāsya saṃgamya ca tatas tataḥ / vṛkṣādrihastā harayaḥ saṃpratasthū raṇājiram // 6.054.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te nivṛtya tu saṃkruddhāḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ vanaukasaḥ / nijaghnuḥ paramakruddhāḥ samadā iva kuñjarāḥ // 6.054.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāṃśubhir giriśṛṅgaiś ca śilābhiś ca mahābalāḥ // 6.054.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pādapaiḥ puṣpitāgraiś ca hanyamāno na kampate / tasya gātreṣu patitā bhidyante śataśaḥ śilāḥ // 6.054.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pādapāḥ puṣpitāgrāś ca bhagnāḥ petur mahītale // 6.054.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'pi sainyāni saṃkruddho vānarāṇāṃ mahaujasām / mamantha paramāyatto vanāny agnir ivotthitaḥ // 6.054.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lohitārdrās tu bahavaḥ śerate vānararṣabhāḥ / nirastāḥ patitā bhūmau tāmrapuṣpā iva drumāḥ // 6.054.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅghayantaḥ pradhāvanto vānarā nāvalokayan / ke cit samudre patitāḥ ke cid gaganam āśritāḥ // 6.054.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhyamānās tu te vīrā rākṣasena balīyasā / sāgaraṃ yena te tīrṇāḥ pathā tenaiva dudruvuḥ // 6.054.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te sthalāni tathā nimnaṃ viṣaṇṇavadanā bhayāt / ṛkṣā vṛkṣān samārūḍhāḥ ke cit parvatam āśritāḥ // 6.054.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamajjur arṇave ke cid guhāḥ ke cit samāśritāḥ / niṣeduḥ plavagāḥ ke cit ke cin naivāvatasthire // 6.054.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān samīkṣyāṅgado bhaṅgān vānarān idam abravīt / avatiṣṭhata yudhyāmo nivartadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.054.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagnānāṃ vo na paśyāmi parigamya mahīm imām / sthānaṃ sarve nivartadhvaṃ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha // 6.054.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirāyudhānāṃ dravatām asaṃgagatipauruṣāḥ / dārā hy apahasiṣyanti sa vai ghātas tu jīvitām // 6.054.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuleṣu jātāḥ sarve sma vistīrṇeṣu mahatsu ca / anāryāḥ khalu yad bhītās tyaktvā vīryaṃ pradhāvata // 6.054.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vikatthanāni vo yāni yadā vai janasaṃsadi / tāni vaḥ kva ca yatāni sodagrāṇi mahānti ca // 6.054.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhīrupravādāḥ śrūyante yas tu jīvati dhikkṛtaḥ / mārgaḥ satpuruṣair juṣṭaḥ sevyatāṃ tyajyatāṃ bhayam // 6.054.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śayāmahe vā nihatāḥ pṛthivyām alpajīvitāḥ / duṣprāpaṃ brahmalokaṃ vā prāpnumo yudhi sūditāḥ // 6.054.022.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃprāpnuyāmaḥ kīrtiṃ vā nihatya śatrum āhave // 6.054.022.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kumbhakarṇaḥ kākutsthaṃ dṛṣṭvā jīvan gamiṣyati / dīpyamānam ivāsādya pataṃgo jvalanaṃ yathā // 6.054.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
palāyanena coddiṣṭāḥ prāṇān rakṣāmahe vayam / ekena bahavo bhagnā yaśo nāśaṃ gamiṣyati // 6.054.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ śūram aṅgadaṃ kanakāṅgadam / dravamāṇās tato vākyam ūcuḥ śūravigarhitam // 6.054.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtaṃ naḥ kadanaṃ ghoraṃ kumbhakarṇena rakṣasā / na sthānakālo gacchāmo dayitaṃ jīvitaṃ hi naḥ // 6.054.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ sarve te bhejire diśaḥ / bhīmaṃ bhīmākṣam āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarayūthapāḥ // 6.054.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dravamāṇās tu te vīrā aṅgadena valīmukhāḥ / sāntvaiś ca bahumānaiś ca tataḥ sarve nivartitāḥ // 6.054.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣabhaśarabhamaindadhūmranīlāḥ; kumudasuṣeṇagavākṣarambhatārāḥ / dvividapanasavāyuputramukhyās; tvaritatarābhimukhaṃ raṇaṃ prayātāḥ // 6.054.029	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
te nivṛttā mahākāyāḥ śrutvāṅgadavacas tadā / naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhim āsthāya sarve saṃgrāmakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 6.055.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samudīritavīryās te samāropitavikramāḥ / paryavasthāpitā vākyair aṅgadena valīmukhāḥ // 6.055.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prayātāś ca gatā harṣaṃ maraṇe kṛtaniścayāḥ / cakruḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ vānarās tyaktajīvitāḥ // 6.055.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vṛkṣān mahākāyāḥ sānūni sumahānti ca / vānarās tūrṇam udyamya kumbhakarṇam abhidravan // 6.055.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kumbhakarṇaḥ saṃkruddho gadām udyamya vīryavān / ardayan sumahākāyaḥ samantād vyākṣipad ripūn // 6.055.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatāni sapta cāṣṭau ca sahasrāṇi ca vānarāḥ / prakīrṇāḥ śerate bhūmau kumbhakarṇena pothitāḥ // 6.055.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṣoḍaśāṣṭau ca daśa ca viṃśat triṃśat tathaiva ca / parikṣipya ca bāhubhyāṃ khādan viparidhāvati // 6.055.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhakṣayan bhṛśasaṃkruddho garuḍaḥ pannagān iva // 6.055.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmāñ śailaśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca vividhān bahūn / vavarṣa kumbhakarṇasya śirasy ambaram āsthitaḥ // 6.055.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni parvataśṛṅgāṇi śūlena tu bibheda ha / babhañja vṛkṣavarṣaṃ ca kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ // 6.055.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato harīṇāṃ tad anīkam ugraṃ; dudrāva śūlaṃ niśitaṃ pragṛhya / tasthau tato 'syāpatataḥ purastān; mahīdharāgraṃ hanumān pragṛhya // 6.055.010	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa kumbhakarṇaṃ kupito jaghāna; vegena śailottamabhīmakāyam / sa cukṣubhe tena tadābhibūto; medārdragātro rudhirāvasiktaḥ // 6.055.011	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa śūlam āvidhya taḍitprakāśaṃ; giriṃ yathā prajvalitāgraśṛṅgam / bāhvantare mārutim ājaghāna; guho 'calaṃ krauñcam ivograśaktyā // 6.055.012	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa śūlanirbhinna mahābhujāntaraḥ; pravihvalaḥ śoṇitam udvaman mukhāt / nanāda bhīmaṃ hanumān mahāhave; yugāntameghastanitasvanopamam // 6.055.013	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato vineduḥ sahasā prahṛṣṭā; rakṣogaṇās taṃ vyathitaṃ samīkṣya / plavaṃgamās tu vyathitā bhayārtāḥ; pradudruvuḥ saṃyati kumbhakarṇāt // 6.055.014	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
nīlaś cikṣepa śailāgraṃ kumbhakarṇāya dhīmate / tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya muṣṭinābhijaghāna ha // 6.055.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muṣṭiprahārābhihataṃ tac chailāgraṃ vyaśīryata / savisphuliṅgaṃ sajvālaṃ nipapāta mahītale // 6.055.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣabhaḥ śarabho nīlo gavākṣo gandhamādanaḥ / pañcavānaraśārdūlāḥ kumbhakarṇam upādravan // 6.055.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śailair vṛkṣais talaiḥ pādair muṣṭibhiś ca mahābalāḥ / kumbhakarṇaṃ mahākāyaṃ sarvato 'bhinijaghnire // 6.055.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sparśān iva prahārāṃs tān vedayāno na vivyathe / ṛṣabhaṃ tu mahāvegaṃ bāhubhyāṃ pariṣasvaje // 6.055.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇabhujābhyāṃ tu pīḍito vānararṣabhaḥ / nipapātarṣabho bhīmaḥ pramukhāgataśoṇitaḥ // 6.055.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muṣṭinā śarabhaṃ hatvā jānunā nīlam āhave / ājaghāna gavākṣaṃ ca talenendraripus tadā // 6.055.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dattapraharavyathitā mumuhuḥ śoṇitokṣitāḥ / nipetus te tu medinyāṃ nikṛttā iva kiṃśukāḥ // 6.055.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣu vānaramukhyeṣu patiteṣu mahātmasu / vānarāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi kumbhakarṇaṃ pradudruvuḥ // 6.055.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ śailam iva śailābhāḥ sarve tu plavagarṣabhāḥ / samāruhya samutpatya dadaṃśuś ca mahābalāḥ // 6.055.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ nakhair daśanaiś cāpi muṣṭibhir jānubhis tathā / kumbhakarṇaṃ mahākāyaṃ te jaghnuḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ // 6.055.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vānarasahasrais tair ācitaḥ parvatopamaḥ / rarāja rākṣasavyāghro girir ātmaruhair iva // 6.055.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāhubhyāṃ vānarān sarvān pragṛhya sa mahābalaḥ / bhakṣayām āsa saṃkruddho garuḍaḥ pannagān iva // 6.055.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṣiptāḥ kumbhakarṇena vaktre pātālasaṃnibhe / nāsā puṭābhyāṃ nirjagmuḥ karṇābhyāṃ caiva vānarāḥ // 6.055.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhakṣayan bhṛśasaṃkruddho harīn parvatasaṃnibhaḥ / babhañja vānarān sarvān saṃkruddho rākṣasottamaḥ // 6.055.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃsaśoṇitasaṃkledāṃ bhūmiṃ kurvan sa rākṣasaḥ / cacāra harisainyeṣu kālāgnir iva mūrchitaḥ // 6.055.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajrahasto yathā śakraḥ pāśahasta ivāntakaḥ / śūlahasto babhau tasmin kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ // 6.055.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā śuṣkāṇy araṇyāni grīṣme dahati pāvakaḥ / tathā vānarasainyāni kumbhakarṇo vinirdahat // 6.055.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te vadhyamānās tu hatayūthā vināyakāḥ / vānarā bhayasaṃvignā vinedur visvaraṃ bhṛśam // 6.055.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anekaśo vadhyamānāḥ kumbhakarṇena vānarāḥ / rāghavaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmur vyathitāḥ khinnacetasaḥ // 6.055.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam / utpapāta tadā vīraḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ // 6.055.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa parvatāgram utkṣipya samāvidhya mahākapiḥ / abhidudrāva vegena kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam // 6.055.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kumbhakarṇaḥ plavaṃgamam / tasthau vivṛtasarvāṅgo vānarendrasya saṃmukhaḥ // 6.055.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kapiśoṇitadigdhāṅgaṃ bhakṣayantaṃ mahākapīn / kumbhakarṇaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvo vākyam abravīt // 6.055.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pātitāś ca tvayā vīrāḥ kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram / bhakṣitāni ca sainyāni prāptaṃ te paramaṃ yaśaḥ // 6.055.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaja tad vānarānīkaṃ prākṛtaiḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi / sahasvaikaṃ nipātaṃ me parvatasyāsya rākṣasa // 6.055.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vākyaṃ harirājasya sattvadhairyasamanvitam / śrutvā rākṣasaśārdūlaḥ kumbhakarṇo 'bravīd vacaḥ // 6.055.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajāpates tu pautras tvaṃ tathaivarkṣarajaḥsutaḥ / śrutapauruṣasaṃpannas tasmād garjasi vānara // 6.055.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kumbhakarṇasya vaco niśamya; vyāvidhya śailaṃ sahasā mumoca / tenājaghānorasi kumbhakarṇaṃ; śailena vajrāśanisaṃnibhena // 6.055.043	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tac chailaśṛṅgaṃ sahasā vikīrṇaṃ; bhujāntare tasya tadā viśāle / tato viṣeduḥ sahasā plavaṃgamā; rakṣogaṇāś cāpi mudā vineduḥ // 6.055.044	indravajrā [ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [jtjr], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa śailaśṛṅgābhihataś cukopa; nanāda kopāc ca vivṛtya vaktram / vyāvidhya śūlaṃ ca taḍitprakāśaṃ; cikṣepa haryṛkṣapater vadhāya // 6.055.045	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tat kumbhakarṇasya bhujapraviddhaṃ; śūlaṃ śitaṃ kāñcanadāmajuṣṭam / kṣipraṃ samutpatya nigṛhya dorbhyāṃ; babhañja vegena suto 'nilasya // 6.055.046	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
kṛtaṃ bhārasahasrasya śūlaṃ kālāyasaṃ mahat / babhañja janaum āropya prahṛṣṭaḥ plavagarṣabhaḥ // 6.055.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tat tadā bhagnam avekṣya śūlaṃ; cukopa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā / utpāṭya laṅkāmalayāt sa śṛṅgaṃ; jaghāna sugrīvam upetya tena // 6.055.048	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa śailaśṛṅgābhihato visaṃjñaḥ; papāta bhūmau yudhi vānarendraḥ / taṃ prekṣya bhūmau patitaṃ visaṃjñaṃ; neduḥ prahṛṣṭā yudhi yātudhānāḥ // 6.055.049	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tam abhyupetyādbhutaghoravīryaṃ; sa kumbhakarṇo yudhi vānarendram / jahāra sugrīvam abhipragṛhya; yathānilo megham atipracaṇḍaḥ // 6.055.050	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
sa taṃ mahāmeghanikāśarūpam; utpāṭya gacchan yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ / rarāja merupratimānarūpo; merur yathātyucchritaghoraśṛṅgaḥ // 6.055.051	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ samutpāṭya jagāma vīraḥ; saṃstūyamāno yudhi rākṣasendraiḥ / śṛṇvan ninādaṃ tridaśālayānāṃ; plavaṃgarājagrahavismitānām // 6.055.052	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tatas tam ādāya tadā sa mene; harīndram indropamam indravīryaḥ / asmin hṛte sarvam idaṃ hṛtaṃ syāt; sarāghavaṃ sainyam itīndraśatruḥ // 6.055.053	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ / kumbhakarṇena sugrīvaṃ gṛhītaṃ cāpi vānaram // 6.055.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa matimān mārutātmajaḥ / evaṃ gṛhīte sugrīve kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayā bhavet // 6.055.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad vai nyāyyaṃ mayā kartuṃ tat kariṣyāmi sarvathā / bhūtvā parvatasaṃkāśo nāśayiṣyāmi rākṣasaṃ // 6.055.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā hate saṃyati kumbhakarṇe; mahābale muṣṭiviśīrṇadehe / vimocite vānarapārthive ca; bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ pravagāḥ samagrāḥ // 6.055.057	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
atha vā svayam apy eṣa mokṣaṃ prāpsyati pārthivaḥ / gṛhīto 'yaṃ yadi bhavet tridaśaiḥ sāsuroragaiḥ // 6.055.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manye na tāvad ātmānaṃ budhyate vānarādhipaḥ / śailaprahārābhihataḥ kumbhakarṇena saṃyuge // 6.055.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ muhūrtāt sugrīvo labdhasaṃjño mahāhave / ātmano vānarāṇāṃ ca yat pathyaṃ tat kariṣyati // 6.055.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā tu mokṣitasyāsya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ / aprītaś ca bhavet kaṣṭā kīrtināśaś ca śāśvataḥ // 6.055.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmān muhūrtaṃ kāṅkṣiṣye vikramaṃ pārthivasya naḥ / bhinnaṃ ca vānarānīkaṃ tāvad āśvāsayāmy aham // 6.055.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / bhūyaḥ saṃstambhayām āsa vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūm // 6.055.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kumbhakarṇo 'tha viveśa laṅkāṃ; sphurantam ādāya mahāhariṃ tam / vimānacaryāgṛhagopurasthaiḥ; puṣpāgryavarṣair avakīryamāṇaḥ // 6.055.064	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ sa saṃjñām upalabhya kṛcchrād; balīyasas tasya bhujāntarasthaḥ / avekṣamāṇaḥ purarājamārgaṃ; vicintayām āsa muhur mahātmā // 6.055.065	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
evaṃ gṛhītena kathaṃ nu nāma; śakyaṃ mayā saṃprati kartum adya / tathā kariṣyāmi yathā harīṇāṃ; bhaviṣyatīṣṭaṃ ca hitaṃ ca kāryam // 6.055.066	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tataḥ karāgraiḥ sahasā sametya; rājā harīṇām amarendraśatroḥ / nakhaiś ca karṇau daśanaiś ca nāsāṃ; dadaṃśa pārśveṣu ca kumbhakarṇam // 6.055.067	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa kumbhakarṇau hṛtakarṇanāso; vidāritas tena vimarditaś ca / roṣābhibhūtaḥ kṣatajārdragātraḥ; sugrīvam āvidhya pipeṣa bhūmau // 6.055.068	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa bhūtale bhīmabalābhipiṣṭaḥ; surāribhis tair abhihanyamānaḥ / jagāma khaṃ vegavad abhyupetya; punaś ca rāmeṇa samājagāma // 6.055.069	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
karṇanāsā vihīnasya kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ / rarāja śoṇitotsikto giriḥ prasravaṇair iva // 6.055.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa puryāḥ sahasā mahātmā; niṣkramya tad vānarasainyam ugram / babhakṣa rakṣo yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ; prajā yugāntāgnir iva pradīptaḥ // 6.055.071	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
bubhukṣitaḥ śoṇitamāṃsagṛdhnuḥ; praviśya tad vānarasainyam ugram / cakhāda rakṣāṃsi harīn piśācān; ṛkṣāṃś ca mohād yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ // 6.055.072	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
ekaṃ dvau trīn bahūn kruddho vānarān saha rākṣasaiḥ / samādāyaikahastena pracikṣepa tvaran mukhe // 6.055.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃprasravaṃs tadā medaḥ śoṇitaṃ ca mahābalaḥ / vadhyamāno nagendrāgrair bhakṣayām āsa vānarān // 6.055.074.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te bhakṣyamāṇā harayo rāmaṃ jagmus tadā gatim // 6.055.074.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin kāle sumitrāyāḥ putraḥ parabalārdanaḥ / cakāra lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho yuddhaṃ parapuraṃjayaḥ // 6.055.075	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kumbhakarṇasya śarāñ śarīre sapta vīryavān / nicakhānādade cānyān visasarja ca lakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.055.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atikramya ca saumitriṃ kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ / rāmam evābhidudrāva dārayann iva medinīm // 6.055.077	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha dāśarathī rāmo raudram astraṃ prayojayan / kumbhakarṇasya hṛdaye sasarja niśitāñ śarān // 6.055.078	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya rāmeṇa viddhasya sahasābhipradhāvataḥ / aṅgāramiśrāḥ kruddhasya mukhān niścerur arciṣaḥ // 6.055.079	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyorasi nimagnāś ca śarā barhiṇavāsasaḥ / hastāc cāsya paribhraṣṭā papātorvyāṃ mahāgadā // 6.055.080	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nirāyudham ātmānaṃ yadā mene mahābalaḥ / muṣṭibhyāṃ cāraṇābhyāṃ ca cakāra kadanaṃ mahat // 6.055.081	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bāṇair atividdhāṅgaḥ kṣatajena samukṣitaḥ / rudhiraṃ parisusrāva giriḥ prasravaṇān iva // 6.055.082	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tīvreṇa ca kopena rudhireṇa ca mūrchitaḥ / vānarān rākṣasān ṛkṣān khādan viparidhāvati // 6.055.083	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin kāle sa dharmātmā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt / kumbhakarṇavadhe yukto yogān parimṛśan bahūn // 6.055.084	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naivāyaṃ vānarān rājan na vijānāti rākṣasān / mattaḥ śoṇitagandhena svān parāṃś caiva khādati // 6.055.085	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhv enam adhirohantu sarvato vānararṣabhāḥ / yūthapāś ca yathāmukhyās tiṣṭhantv asya samantataḥ // 6.055.086	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apy ayaṃ durmatiḥ kāle gurubhāraprapīḍitaḥ / prapatan rākṣaso bhūmau nānyān hanyāt plavaṃgamān // 6.055.087	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
