adya śūlanipātaiś ca vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūm / pradahiṣyāmi saṃprāptāṃ śuṣkendhanam ivānalaḥ // 6.065.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
makarākṣasya tac chrutvā vacanaṃ te niśācarāḥ / sarve nānāyudhopetā balavantaḥ samāhitāḥ // 6.065.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te kāmarūpiṇaḥ śūrā daṃṣṭriṇaḥ piṅgalekṣaṇāḥ / mātaṃgā iva nardanto dhvastakeśā bhayānakāḥ // 6.065.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parivārya mahākāyā mahākāyaṃ kharātmajam / abhijagmus tadā hṛṣṭāś cālayanto vasuṃdharām // 6.065.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkhabherīsahasrāṇām āhatānāṃ samantataḥ / kṣveḍitāsphoṭitānāṃ ca tataḥ śabdo mahān abhūt // 6.065.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhraṣṭo 'tha karāt tasya pratodaḥ sārathes tadā / papāta sahasā caiva dhvajas tasya ca rakṣasaḥ // 6.065.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya te rathasaṃyuktā hayā vikramavarjitāḥ / caraṇair ākulair gatvā dīnāḥ sāsramukhā yayuḥ // 6.065.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pravāti pavanas tasya sapāṃsuḥ kharadāruṇaḥ / niryāṇe tasya raudrasya makarākṣasya durmateḥ // 6.065.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni dṛṣṭvā nimittāni rākṣasā vīryavattamāḥ / acintyanirgatāḥ sarve yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 6.065.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghanagajamahiṣāṅgatulyavarṇāḥ; samaramukheṣv asakṛd gadāsibhinnāḥ / aham aham iti yuddhakauśalās te; rajanicarāḥ paribabhramur nadantaḥ // 6.065.021	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
nirgataṃ makarākṣaṃ te dṛṣṭvā vānarapuṃgavāḥ / āplutya sahasā sarve yoddhukāmā vyavasthitāḥ // 6.066.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pravṛttaṃ sumahat tad yuddhaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / niśācaraiḥ plavaṃgānāṃ devānāṃ dānavair iva // 6.066.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛkṣaśūlanipātaiś ca śilāparighapātanaiḥ / anyonyaṃ mardayanti sma tadā kapiniśācarāḥ // 6.066.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaktiśūlagadākhaḍgais tomaraiś ca niśācarāḥ / paṭṭasair bhindipālaiś ca bāṇapātaiḥ samantataḥ // 6.066.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāśamudgaradaṇḍaiś ca nirghātaiś cāparais tathā / kadanaṃ kapisiṃhānāṃ cakrus te rajanīcarāḥ // 6.066.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṇaughair arditāś cāpi kharaputreṇa vānarāḥ / saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ sarve dudruvur bhayapīḍitāḥ // 6.066.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasāḥ sarve dravamāṇān vanaukasaḥ / nedus te siṃhavad dhṛṣṭā rākṣasā jitakāśinaḥ // 6.066.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidravatsu tadā teṣu vānareṣu samantataḥ / rāmas tān vārayām āsa śaravarṣeṇa rākṣasān // 6.066.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāritān rākṣasān dṛṣṭvā makarākṣo niśācaraḥ / krodhān alasam āviṣṭo vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // 6.066.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiṣṭha rāma mayā sārdhaṃ dvandvayuddhaṃ dadāmi te / tyājayiṣyāmi te prāṇān dhanurmuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // 6.066.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tadā daṇḍakāraṇye pitaraṃ hatavān mama / madagrataḥ svakarmasthaṃ smṛtvā roṣo 'bhivardhate // 6.066.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dahyante bhṛśam aṅgāni durātman mama rāghava / yan mayāsi na dṛṣṭas tvaṃ tasmin kāle mahāvane // 6.066.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyāsi darśanaṃ rāma mama tvaṃ prāptavān iha / kāṅkṣito 'si kṣudhārtasya siṃhasyevetaro mṛgaḥ // 6.066.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya madbāṇavegena pretarāḍ viṣayaṃ gataḥ / ye tvayā nihatāḥ śūrāḥ saha tais tvaṃ sameṣyasi // 6.066.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahunātra kim uktena śṛṇu rāma vaco mama / paśyantu sakalā lokās tvāṃ māṃ caiva raṇājire // 6.066.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
astrair vā gadayā vāpi bāhubhyāṃ vā mahāhave / abhyastaṃ yena vā rāma tena vā vartatāṃ yudhi // 6.066.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
makarākṣavacaḥ śrutvā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / abravīt prahasan vākyam uttarottaravādinam // 6.066.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśasahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ tvatpitā ca yaḥ / triśirā dūṣaṇaś cāpi daṇḍake nihatā mayā // 6.066.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svāśitās tava māṃsena gṛdhragomāyuvāyasāḥ / bhaviṣyanty adya vai pāpa tīkṣṇatuṇḍanakhāṅkuśāḥ // 6.066.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kharaputro niśācaraḥ / bāṇaughān asṛjat tasmai rāghavāya raṇājire // 6.066.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāñ śarāñ śaravarṣeṇa rāmaś ciccheda naikadhā / nipetur bhuvi te chinnā rukmapuṅkhāḥ sahasraśaḥ // 6.066.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad yuddham abhavat tatra sametyānyonyam ojasā / khara rākṣasaputrasya sūnor daśarathasya ca // 6.066.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jīmūtayor ivākāśe śabdo jyātalayos tadā / dhanur muktaḥ svanotkṛṣṭaḥ śrūyate ca raṇājire // 6.066.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavagandharvāḥ kiṃnarāś ca mahoragāḥ / antarikṣagatāḥ sarve draṣṭukāmās tad adbhutam // 6.066.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viddham anyonyagātreṣu dviguṇaṃ vardhate balam / kṛtapratikṛtānyonyaṃ kurvāte tau raṇājire // 6.066.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmam uktās tu bāṇaughān rākṣasas tv acchinad raṇe / rakṣomuktāṃs tu rāmo vai naikadhā prācchinac charaiḥ // 6.066.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṇaughavitatāḥ sarvā diśaś ca vidiśas tathā / saṃchannā vasudhā caiva samantān na prakāśate // 6.066.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur dhanuś ciccheda rakṣasaḥ / aṣṭābhir atha nārācaiḥ sūtaṃ vivyādha rāghavaḥ // 6.066.028.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhittvā śarai rathaṃ rāmo rathāśvān samapātayat // 6.066.028.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viratho vasudhāṃ tiṣṭhan makarākṣo niśācaraḥ / atiṣṭhad vasudhāṃ rakṣaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā // 6.066.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trāsanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yugāntāgnisamaprabham // 6.066.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhrāmya ca mahac chūlaṃ prajvalantaṃ niśācaraḥ / sa krodhāt prāhiṇot tasmai rāghavāya mahāhave // 6.066.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āpatantaṃ jvalitaṃ kharaputrakarāc cyutam / bāṇais tu tribhir ākāśe śūlaṃ ciccheda rāghavaḥ // 6.066.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sacchinno naikadhā śūlo divyahāṭakamaṇḍitaḥ / vyaśīryata mahokleva rāmabāṇārdito bhuvi // 6.066.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chūlaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmeṇādbhutakarmaṇā / sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni vyāharanti nabhogatāḥ // 6.066.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ śūlaṃ makarākṣo niśācaraḥ / muṣṭim udyamya kākutsthaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt // 6.066.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā patantaṃ vai prahasya raghunandanaḥ / pāvakāstraṃ tato rāmaḥ saṃdadhe svaśarāsane // 6.066.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenāstreṇa hataṃ rakṣaḥ kākutsthena tadā raṇe / saṃchinnahṛdayaṃ tatra papāta ca mamāra ca // 6.066.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā te rākṣasāḥ sarve makarākṣasya pātanam / laṅkām eva pradhāvanta rāmabālārditās tadā // 6.066.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśarathanṛpaputrabāṇavegai; rajanicaraṃ nihataṃ kharātmajaṃ tam / dadṛśur atha ca devatāḥ prahṛṣṭā; girim iva vajrahataṃ yathā viśīrṇam // 6.066.038	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
makarākṣaṃ hataṃ śrutvā rāvaṇaḥ samitiṃjayaḥ / ādideśātha saṃkruddho raṇāyendrajitaṃ sutam // 6.067.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jahi vīra mahāvīryau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / adṛśyo dṛśyamāno vā sarvathā tvaṃ balādhikaḥ // 6.067.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvam apratimakarmāṇam indraṃ jayasi saṃyuge / kiṃ punar mānuṣau dṛṣṭvā na vadhiṣyasi saṃyuge // 6.067.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathokto rākṣasendreṇa pratigṛhya pitur vacaḥ / yajñabhūmau sa vidhivat pāvakaṃ juhuve ndrajit // 6.067.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
juhvataś cāpi tatrāgniṃ raktoṣṇīṣadharāḥ striyaḥ / ājagmus tatra saṃbhrāntā rākṣasyo yatra rāvaṇiḥ // 6.067.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śastrāṇi śarapatrāṇi samidho 'tha vibhītakāḥ / lohitāni ca vāsāṃsi sruvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ tathā // 6.067.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvato 'gniṃ samāstīrya śarapatraiḥ samantataḥ / chāgasya sarvakṛṣṇasya galaṃ jagrāha jīvataḥ // 6.067.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caruhomasamiddhasya vidhūmasya mahārciṣaḥ / babhūvus tāni liṅgāni vijayaṃ darśayanti ca // 6.067.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradakṣiṇāvartaśikhas taptahāṭakasaṃnibhaḥ / havis tat pratijagrāha pāvakaḥ svayam utthitaḥ // 6.067.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hutvāgniṃ tarpayitvātha devadānavarākṣasān / āruroha rathaśreṣṭham antardhānagataṃ śubham // 6.067.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vājibhiś caturbhis tu bāṇaiś ca niśitair yutaḥ / āropitamahācāpaḥ śuśubhe syandanottame // 6.067.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jājvalyamāno vapuṣā tapanīyaparicchadaḥ / śaraiś candrārdhacandraiś ca sa rathaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ // 6.067.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbūnadamahākambur dīptapāvakasaṃnibhaḥ / babhūvendrajitaḥ ketur vaidūryasamalaṃkṛtaḥ // 6.067.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena cādityakalpena brahmāstreṇa ca pālitaḥ / sa babhūva durādharṣo rāvaṇiḥ sumahābalaḥ // 6.067.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhiniryāya nagarād indrajit samitiṃjayaḥ / hutvāgniṃ rākṣasair mantrair antardhānagato 'bravīt // 6.067.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya hatvāhave yau tau mithyā pravrajitau vane / jayaṃ pitre pradāsyāmi rāvaṇāya raṇādhikam // 6.067.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtvā nirvānarām urvīṃ hatvā rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam / kariṣye paramāṃ prītim ity uktvāntaradhīyata // 6.067.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpapātātha saṃkruddho daśagrīveṇa coditaḥ / tīkṣṇakārmukanārācais tīkṣṇas tv indraripū raṇe // 6.067.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśa mahāvīryau nāgau triśirasāv iva / sṛjantāv iṣujālāni vīrau vānaramadhyagau // 6.067.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau tāv iti saṃcintya sajyaṃ kṛtvā ca kārmukam / saṃtatāneṣudhārābhiḥ parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // 6.067.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu vaihāyasaṃ prāpya saratho rāmalakṣmaṇau / acakṣur viṣaye tiṣṭhan vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // 6.067.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tasya śaravegena parītau rāmalakṣmaṇau / dhanuṣī saśare kṛtvā divyam astraṃ pracakratuḥ // 6.067.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pracchādayantau gaganaṃ śarajālair mahābalau / tam astraiḥ surasaṃkāśau naiva pasparśatuḥ śaraiḥ // 6.067.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi dhūmāndhakāraṃ ca cakre pracchādayan nabhaḥ / diśaś cāntardadhe śrīmān nīhāratamasāvṛtaḥ // 6.067.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva jyātalanirghoṣo na ca nemikhurasvanaḥ / śuśruve caratas tasya na ca rūpaṃ prakāśate // 6.067.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghanāndhakāre timire śaravarṣam ivādbhutam / sa vavarṣa mahābāhur nārācaśaravṛṣṭibhiḥ // 6.067.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaiḥ śarair dattavaro bhṛśam / vivyādha samare kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāvaṇiḥ // 6.067.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau hanyamānau nārācair dhārābhir iva parvatau / hemapuṅkhān naravyāghrau tigmān mumucatuḥ śarān // 6.067.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarikṣaṃ samāsādya rāvaṇiṃ kaṅkapatriṇaḥ / nikṛtya patagā bhūmau petus te śoṇitokṣitāḥ // 6.067.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atimātraṃ śaraugheṇa pīḍyamānau narottamau / tān iṣūn patato bhallair anekair nicakartatuḥ // 6.067.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yato hi dadṛśāte tau śarān nipatitāñ śitān / tatas tato dāśarathī sasṛjāte 'stram uttamam // 6.067.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇis tu diśaḥ sarvā rathenātirathaḥ patan / vivyādha tau dāśarathī laghv astro niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // 6.067.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenātividdhau tau vīrau rukmapuṅkhaiḥ susaṃhataiḥ / babhūvatur dāśarathī puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau // 6.067.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāsya veda gatiṃ kaś cin na ca rūpaṃ dhanuḥ śarān / na cānyad viditaṃ kiṃ cit sūryasyevābhrasaṃplave // 6.067.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena viddhāś ca harayo nihatāś ca gatāsavaḥ / babhūvuḥ śataśas tatra patitā dharaṇītale // 6.067.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho bhrātaraṃ vākyam abravīt / brāhmam astraṃ prayokṣyāmi vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām // 6.067.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca tato rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam / naikasya heto rakṣāṃsi pṛthivyāṃ hantum arhasi // 6.067.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayudhyamānaṃ pracchannaṃ prāñjaliṃ śaraṇāgatam / palāyantaṃ pramattaṃ vā na tvaṃ hantum ihārhasi // 6.067.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asyaiva tu vadhe yatnaṃ kariṣyāvo mahābala / ādekṣyāvo mahāvegān astrān āśīviṣopamān // 6.067.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam enaṃ māyinaṃ kṣudram antarhitarathaṃ balāt / rākṣasaṃ nihaniṣyanti dṛṣṭvā vānarayūthapāḥ // 6.067.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady eṣa bhūmiṃ viśate divaṃ vā; rasātalaṃ vāpi nabhastalaṃ vā / evaṃ nigūḍho 'pi mamāstradagdhaḥ; patiṣyate bhūmitale gatāsuḥ // 6.067.041	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā; raghupravīraḥ plavagarṣabhair vṛtaḥ / vadhāya raudrasya nṛśaṃsakarmaṇas; tadā mahātmā tvaritaṃ nirīkṣate // 6.067.042	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
vijñāya tu manas tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ / saṃnivṛtyāhavāt tasmāt praviveśa puraṃ tataḥ // 6.068.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'nusmṛtya vadhaṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ tarasvinām / krodhatāmrekṣaṇaḥ śūro nirjagāma mahādyutiḥ // 6.068.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa paścimena dvāreṇa niryayau rākṣasair vṛtaḥ / indrajit tu mahāvīryaḥ paulastyo devakaṇṭakaḥ // 6.068.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrajit tu tato dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / raṇāyābhyudyatau vīrau māyāṃ prāduṣkarot tadā // 6.068.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrajit tu rathe sthāpya sītāṃ māyāmayīṃ tadā / balena mahatāvṛtya tasyā vadham arocayat // 6.068.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mohanārthaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ buddhiṃ kṛtvā sudurmatiḥ / hantuṃ sītāṃ vyavasito vānarābhimukho yayau // 6.068.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tv abhiniryāntaṃ nagaryāḥ kānanaukasaḥ / utpetur abhisaṃkruddhāḥ śilāhastā yuyutsavaḥ // 6.068.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmān puratas teṣāṃ jagāma kapikuñjaraḥ / pragṛhya sumahac chṛṅgaṃ parvatasya durāsadam // 6.068.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśa hatānandāṃ sītām indrajito rathe / ekaveṇīdharāṃ dīnām upavāsakṛśānanām // 6.068.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parikliṣṭaikavasanām amṛjāṃ rāghavapriyām / rajomalābhyām āliptaiḥ sarvagātrair varastriyam // 6.068.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ nirīkṣya muhūrtaṃ tu maithilīm adhyavasya ca / bāṣpaparyākulamukho hanūmān vyathito 'bhavat // 6.068.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīt tāṃ tu śokārtāṃ nirānandāṃ tapasvinām / dṛṣṭvā rathe stitāṃ sītāṃ rākṣasendrasutāśritām // 6.068.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ samarthitam asyeti cintayan sa mahākapiḥ / saha tair vānaraśreṣṭhair abhyadhāvata rāvaṇim // 6.068.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vānarabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / kṛtvā viśokaṃ nistriṃśaṃ mūrdhni sītāṃ parāmṛśat // 6.068.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ striyaṃ paśyatāṃ teṣāṃ tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ / krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti māyayā yojitāṃ rathe // 6.068.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhītamūrdhajāṃ dṛṣṭvā hanūmān dainyam āgataḥ / duḥkhajaṃ vārinetrābhyām utsṛjan mārutātmajaḥ // 6.068.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ krodhād rakṣo'dhipātmajam // 6.068.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
durātmann ātmanāśāya keśapakṣe parāmṛśaḥ / brahmarṣīṇāṃ kule jāto rākṣasīṃ yonim āśritaḥ // 6.068.017.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhik tvāṃ pāpasamācāraṃ yasya te matir īdṛśī // 6.068.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nṛśaṃsānārya durvṛtta kṣudra pāpaparākrama / anāryasyedṛśaṃ karma ghṛṇā te nāsti nirghṛṇa // 6.068.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cyutā gṛhāc ca rājyāc ca rāmahastāc ca maithilī / kiṃ tavaiṣāparāddhā hi yad enāṃ hantum icchasi // 6.068.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāṃ ca hatvā na ciraṃ jīviṣyasi kathaṃ cana / vadhārhakarmaṇānena mama hastagato hy asi // 6.068.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye ca strīghātināṃ lokā lokavadhyaiś ca kutsitāḥ / iha jīvitam utsṛjya pretya tān pratilapsyase // 6.068.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti bruvāṇo hanumān sāyudhair haribhir vṛtaḥ / abhyadhāvata saṃkruddho rākṣasendrasutaṃ prati // 6.068.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpatantaṃ mahāvīryaṃ tad anīkaṃ vanaukasām / rakṣasāṃ bhīmavegānām anīkena nyavārayat // 6.068.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tāṃ bāṇasahasreṇa vikṣobhya harivāhinīm / hariśreṣṭhaṃ hanūmantam indrajit pratyuvāca ha // 6.068.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvas tvaṃ ca rāmaś ca yannimittam ihāgatāḥ / tāṃ haniṣyāmi vaidehīm adyaiva tava paśyataḥ // 6.068.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ hatvā tato rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tvāṃ ca vānara / sugrīvaṃ ca vadhiṣyāmi taṃ cānāryaṃ vibhīṣaṇam // 6.068.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hantavyāḥ striyaś ceti yad bravīṣi plavaṃgama / pīḍā karam amitrāṇāṃ yat syāt kartavyam eta tat // 6.068.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evam uktvā rudatīṃ sītāṃ māyāmayīṃ tataḥ / śitadhāreṇa khaḍgena nijaghānendrajit svayam // 6.068.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajñopavītamārgeṇa chinnā tena tapasvinī / sā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthuśroṇī papāta priyadarśanā // 6.068.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām indrajitstriyaṃ hatvā hanūmantam uvāca ha / mayā rāmasya paśyemāṃ kopena ca niṣūditām // 6.068.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ khaḍgena mahatā hatvā tām indrajit svayam / hṛṣṭaḥ sa ratham āsthāya vinanāda mahāsvanam // 6.068.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāḥ śuśruvuḥ śabdam adūre pratyavasthitāḥ / vyāditāsyasya nadatas tad durgaṃ saṃśritasya tu // 6.068.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tu sītāṃ vinihatya durmatiḥ; prahṛṣṭacetāḥ sa babhūva rāvaṇiḥ / taṃ hṛṣṭarūpaṃ samudīkṣya vānarā; viṣaṇṇarūpāḥ samabhipradudruvuḥ // 6.068.033	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
śrutvā taṃ bhīmanirhrādaṃ śakrāśanisamasvanam / vīkṣamāṇā diśaḥ sarvā dudruvur vānararṣabhāḥ // 6.069.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān uvāca tataḥ sarvān hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / viṣaṇṇavadanān dīnāṃs trastān vidravataḥ pṛthak // 6.069.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasmād viṣaṇṇavadanā vidravadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ / tyaktayuddhasamutsāhāḥ śūratvaṃ kva nu vo gatam // 6.069.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣṭhato 'nuvrajadhvaṃ mām agrato yāntam āhave / śūrair abhijanopetair ayuktaṃ hi nivartitum // 6.069.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktāḥ susaṃkruddhā vāyuputreṇa dhīmatā / śailaśṛṅgān drumāṃś caiva jagṛhur hṛṣṭamānasāḥ // 6.069.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhipetuś ca garjanto rākṣasān vānararṣabhāḥ / parivārya hanūmantam anvayuś ca mahāhave // 6.069.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tair vānaramukhyais tu hanūmān sarvato vṛtaḥ / hutāśana ivārciṣmān adahac chatruvāhinīm // 6.069.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rākṣasānāṃ kadanaṃ cakāra sumahākapiḥ / vṛto vānarasainyena kālāntakayamopamaḥ // 6.069.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu śokena cāviṣṭaḥ krodhena ca mahākapiḥ / hanūmān rāvaṇi rathe mahatīṃ pātayac chilām // 6.069.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvaiva rathaḥ sārathinā tadā / vidheyāśva samāyuktaḥ sudūram apavāhitaḥ // 6.069.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam indrajitam aprāpya rathathaṃ sahasārathim / viveśa dharaṇīṃ bhittvā sā śilāvyartham udyatā // 6.069.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
patitāyāṃ śilāyāṃ tu rakṣasāṃ vyathitā camūḥ / tam abhyadhāvañ śataśo nadantaḥ kānanaukasaḥ // 6.069.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te drumāṃś ca mahākāyā giriśṛṅgāṇi codyatāḥ / cikṣipur dviṣatāṃ madhye vānarā bhīmavikramāḥ // 6.069.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarair tair mahāvīryair ghorarūpā niśācarāḥ / vīryād abhihatā vṛkṣair vyaveṣṭanta raṇakṣitau // 6.069.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svasainyam abhivīkṣyātha vānarārditam indrajit / pragṛhītāyudhaḥ kruddhaḥ parān abhimukho yayau // 6.069.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śaraughān avasṛjan svasainyenābhisaṃvṛtaḥ / jaghāna kapiśārdūlān subahūn dṛṣṭavikramaḥ // 6.069.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūlair aśanibhiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ kūṭamudgaraiḥ / te cāpy anucarāṃs tasya vānarā jaghnur āhave // 6.069.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saskandhaviṭapaiḥ sālaiḥ śilābhiś ca mahābalaiḥ / hanūmān kadanaṃ cakre rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām // 6.069.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nivārya parānīkam abravīt tān vanaukasaḥ / hanūmān saṃnivartadhvaṃ na naḥ sādhyam idaṃ balam // 6.069.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaktvā prāṇān viceṣṭanto rāma priyacikīrṣavaḥ / yannimittaṃ hi yudhyāmo hatā sā janakātmajā // 6.069.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imam arthaṃ hi vijñāpya rāmaṃ sugrīvam eva ca / tau yat pratividhāsyete tat kariṣyāmahe vayam // 6.069.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā vānaraśreṣṭho vārayan sarvavānarān / śanaiḥ śanair asaṃtrastaḥ sabalaḥ sa nyavartata // 6.069.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu prekṣya hanūmantaṃ vrajantaṃ yatra rāghavaḥ / nikumbhilām adhiṣṭhāya pāvakaṃ juhuve ndrajit // 6.069.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajñabhūmyāṃ tu vidhivat pāvakas tena rakṣasā / hūyamānaḥ prajajvāla homaśoṇitabhuk tadā // 6.069.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'rciḥ pinaddho dadṛśe homaśoṇitatarpitaḥ / saṃdhyāgata ivādityaḥ sa tīvrāgniḥ samutthitaḥ // 6.069.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athendrajid rākṣasabhūtaye tu; juhāva havyaṃ vidhinā vidhānavat / dṛṣṭvā vyatiṣṭhanta ca rākṣasās te; mahāsamūheṣu nayānayajñāḥ // 6.069.026	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [jtjr], indravajrā [ttjgg])
rāghavaś cāpi vipulaṃ taṃ rākṣasavanaukasām / śrutvā saṃgrāmanirghoṣaṃ jāmbavantam uvāca ha // 6.070.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumya nūnaṃ hanumatā kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram / śrūyate hi yathā bhīmaḥ sumahān āyudhasvanaḥ // 6.070.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad gaccha kuru sāhāyyaṃ svabalenābhisaṃvṛtaḥ / kṣipram ṛṣkapate tasya kapiśreṣṭhasya yudhyataḥ // 6.070.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛkṣarājas tathety uktvā svenānīkena saṃvṛtaḥ / āgacchat paścimadvāraṃ hanūmān yatra vānaraḥ // 6.070.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāyāntaṃ hanūmantaṃ dadarśarkṣapatiḥ pathi / vānaraiḥ kṛtasaṃgrāmaiḥ śvasadbhir abhisaṃvṛtam // 6.070.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā pathi hanūmāṃś ca tad ṛṣkabalam udyatam / nīlameghanibhaṃ bhīmaṃ saṃnivārya nyavartata // 6.070.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tena harisainyena saṃnikarṣaṃ mahāyaśāḥ / śīghram āgamya rāmāya duḥkhito vākyam abravīt // 6.070.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samare yudhyamānānām asmākaṃ prekṣatāṃ ca saḥ / jaghāna rudatīṃ sītām indrajid rāvaṇātmajaḥ // 6.070.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udbhrāntacittas tāṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣaṇṇo 'ham ariṃdama / tad ahaṃ bhavato vṛttaṃ vijñāpayitum āgataḥ // 6.070.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavaḥ śokamūrchitaḥ / nipapāta tadā bhūmau chinnamūla iva drumaḥ // 6.070.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ bhūmau devasaṃkāśaṃ patitaṃ dṛśya rāghavam / abhipetuḥ samutpatya sarvataḥ kapisattamāḥ // 6.070.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asiñcan salilaiś cainaṃ padmotpalasugandhibhiḥ / pradahantam asahyaṃ ca sahasāgnim ivotthitam // 6.070.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ lakṣmaṇo 'tha bāhubhyāṃ pariṣvajya suduḥkhitaḥ / uvāca rāmam asvasthaṃ vākyaṃ hetvarthasaṃhitam // 6.070.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śubhe vartmani tiṣṭhantaṃ tvām āryavijitendriyam / anarthebhyo na śaknoti trātuṃ dharmo nirarthakaḥ // 6.070.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūtānāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca jaṅgamānāṃ ca darśanam / yathāsti na tathā dharmas tena nāstīti me matiḥ // 6.070.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathaiva sthāvaraṃ vyaktaṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca tathāvidham / nāyam arthas tathā yuktas tvadvidho na vipadyate // 6.070.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady adharmo bhaved bhūto rāvaṇo narakaṃ vrajet / bhavāṃś ca dharmasaṃyukto naivaṃ vyasanam āpnuyāt // 6.070.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya ca vyasanābhāvād vyasanaṃ ca gate tvayi / dharmeṇopalabhed dharmam adharmaṃ cāpy adharmataḥ // 6.070.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi dharmeṇa yujyeran nādharmarucayo janāḥ / dharmeṇa caratāṃ dharmas tathā caiṣāṃ phalaṃ bhavet // 6.070.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmād arthā vivardhante yeṣv adharmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ / kliśyante dharmaśīlāś ca tasmād etau nirarthakau // 6.070.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhyante pāpakarmāṇo yady adharmeṇa rāghava / vadhakarmahato dharmaḥ sa hataḥ kaṃ vadhiṣyati // 6.070.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā vihitenāyaṃ hanyate hanti vā param / vidhir ālipyate tena na sa pāpena karmaṇā // 6.070.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛṣṭapratikāreṇa avyaktenāsatā satā / kathaṃ śakyaṃ paraṃ prāptuṃ dharmeṇārivikarśana // 6.070.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi sat syāt satāṃ mukhya nāsat syāt tava kiṃ cana / tvayā yadīdṛśaṃ prāptaṃ tasmāt san nopapadyate // 6.070.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā durbalaḥ klībo balaṃ dharmo 'nuvartate / durbalo hṛtamaryādo na sevya iti me matiḥ // 6.070.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balasya yadi ced dharmo guṇabhūtaḥ parākrame / dharmam utsṛjya vartasva yathā dharme tathā bale // 6.070.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha cet satyavacanaṃ dharmaḥ kila paraṃtapa / anṛtas tvayy akaruṇaḥ kiṃ na baddhas tvayā pitā // 6.070.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi dharmo bhaved bhūta adharmo vā paraṃtapa / na sma hatvā muniṃ vajrī kuryād ijyāṃ śatakratuḥ // 6.070.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adharmasaṃśrito dharmo vināśayati rāghava / sarvam etad yathākāmaṃ kākutstha kurute naraḥ // 6.070.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama cedaṃ mataṃ tāta dharmo 'yam iti rāghava / dharmamūlaṃ tvayā chinnaṃ rājyam utsṛjatā tadā // 6.070.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthebhyo hi vivṛddhebhyaḥ saṃvṛddhebhyas tatas tataḥ / kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ // 6.070.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthena hi viyuktasya puruṣasyālpatejasaḥ / vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvā grīṣme kusarito yathā // 6.070.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'yam arthaṃ parityajya sukhakāmaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ / pāpam ārabhate kartuṃ tathā doṣaḥ pravartate // 6.070.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasyārthās tasya mitrāṇi yasyārthās tasya bāndhavaḥ / yasyārthāḥ sa pumāṃl loke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ // 6.070.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasyārthāḥ sa ca vikrānto yasyārthāḥ sa ca buddhimān / yasyārthāḥ sa mahābhāgo yasyārthāḥ sa mahāguṇaḥ // 6.070.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthasyaite parityāge doṣāḥ pravyāhṛtā mayā / rājyam utsṛjatā vīra yena buddhis tvayā kṛtā // 6.070.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasyārthā dharmakāmārthās tasya sarvaṃ pradakṣiṇam / adhanenārthakāmena nārthaḥ śakyo vicinvatā // 6.070.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harṣaḥ kāmaś ca darpaś ca dharmaḥ krodhaḥ śamo damaḥ / arthād etāni sarvāṇi pravartante narādhipa // 6.070.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yeṣāṃ naśyaty ayaṃ lokaś caratāṃ dharmacāriṇām / te 'rthās tvayi na dṛśyante durdineṣu yathā grahāḥ // 6.070.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayi pravrajite vīra guroś ca vacane sthite / rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā prāṇaiḥ priyatarā tava // 6.070.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad adya vipulaṃ vīra duḥkham indrajitā kṛtam / karmaṇā vyapaneṣyāmi tasmād uttiṣṭha rāghava // 6.070.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayam anagha tavoditaḥ priyārthaṃ; janakasutā nidhanaṃ nirīkṣya ruṣṭaḥ / sahayagajarathāṃ sarākṣasendrāṃ; bhṛśam iṣubhir vinipātayāmi laṅkām // 6.070.042	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
rāmam āśvāsayāne tu lakṣmaṇe bhrātṛvatsale / nikṣipya gulmān svasthāne tatrāgacchad vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.071.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāpraharaṇair vīraiś caturbhiḥ sacivair vṛtaḥ / nīlāñjanacayākārair mātaṃgair iva yūthapaḥ // 6.071.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhigamya mahātmānaṃ rāghavaṃ śokalālasaṃ / vānarāṃś caiva dadṛśe bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇān // 6.071.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavaṃ ca mahātmānam ikṣvākukulanandanam / dadarśa moham āpannaṃ lakṣmaṇasyāṅkam āśritam // 6.071.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vrīḍitaṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ / antarduḥkhena dīnātmā kim etad iti so 'bravīt // 6.071.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇa mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaṃ tāṃś ca vānarān / uvāca lakṣmaṇo vākyam idaṃ bāṣpapariplutaḥ // 6.071.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatām indrajitā sītām iha śrutvaiva rāghavaḥ / hanūmad vacanāt saumya tato moham upāgataḥ // 6.071.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathayantaṃ tu saumitriṃ saṃnivārya vibhīṣaṇaḥ / puṣkalārtham idaṃ vākyaṃ visaṃjñaṃ rāmam abravīt // 6.071.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manujendrārtarūpeṇa yad uktas tvaṃ hanūmatā / tad ayuktam ahaṃ manye sāgarasyeva śoṣaṇam // 6.071.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiprāyaṃ tu jānāmi rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ / sītāṃ prati mahābāho na ca ghātaṃ kariṣyati // 6.071.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yācyamānaḥ subahuśo mayā hitacikīrṣuṇā / vaidehīm utsṛjasveti na ca tat kṛtavān vacaḥ // 6.071.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva sāmnā na bhedena na dānena kuto yudhā / sā draṣṭum api śakyeta naiva cānyena kena cit // 6.071.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarān mohayitvā tu pratiyātaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ / caityaṃ nikumbhilāṃ nāma yatra homaṃ kariṣyati // 6.071.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hutavān upayāto hi devair api savāsavaiḥ / durādharṣo bhavaty eṣa saṃgrāme rāvaṇātmajaḥ // 6.071.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena mohayatā nūnam eṣā māyā prayojitā / vighnam anvicchatā tāta vānarāṇāṃ parākrame // 6.071.015.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sasainyās tatra gacchāmo yāvat tan na samāpyate // 6.071.015.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyajemaṃ naraśārdūlamithyā saṃtāpam āgatam / sīdate hi balaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ śokakarśitam // 6.071.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iha tvaṃ svastha hṛdayas tiṣṭha sattvasamucchritaḥ / lakṣmaṇaṃ preṣayāsmābhiḥ saha sainyānukarṣibhiḥ // 6.071.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa taṃ naraśārdūlo rāvaṇiṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / tyājayiṣyati tat karma tato vadhyo bhaviṣyati // 6.071.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaite niśitās tīkṣṇāḥ patripatrāṅgavājinaḥ / patatriṇa ivāsaumyāḥ śarāḥ pāsyanti śoṇitam // 6.071.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat saṃdiśa mahābāho lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam / rākṣasasya vināśāya vajraṃ vajradharo yathā // 6.071.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manujavara na kālaviprakarṣo; ripunidhanaṃ prati yat kṣamo 'dya kartum / tvam atisṛja ripor vadhāya bāṇīm; asurapuronmathane yathā mahendraḥ // 6.071.021	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
samāptakarmā hi sa rākṣasendro; bhavaty adṛśyaḥ samare surāsuraiḥ / yuyutsatā tena samāptakarmaṇā; bhavet surāṇām api saṃśayo mahān // 6.071.022	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavaḥ śokakarśitaḥ / nopadhārayate vyaktaṃ yad uktaṃ tena rakṣasā // 6.072.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dhairyam avaṣṭabhya rāmaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ / vibhīṣaṇam upāsīnam uvāca kapisaṃnidhau // 6.072.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nairṛtādhipate vākyaṃ yad uktaṃ te vibhīṣaṇa / bhūyas tac chrotum icchāmi brūhi yat te vivakṣitam // 6.072.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ / yat tat punar idaṃ vākyaṃ babhāṣe sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.072.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathājñaptaṃ mahābāho tvayā gulmaniveśanam / tat tathānuṣṭhitaṃ vīra tvadvākyasamanantaram // 6.072.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāny anīkāni sarvāṇi vibhaktāni samantataḥ / vinyastā yūthapāś caiva yathānyāyaṃ vibhāgaśaḥ // 6.072.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūyas tu mama vijāpyaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāyaśaḥ / tvayy akāraṇasaṃtapte saṃtaptahṛdayā vayam // 6.072.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaja rājann imaṃ śokaṃ mithyā saṃtāpam āgatam / tad iyaṃ tyajyatāṃ cintā śatruharṣavivardhanī // 6.072.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udyamaḥ kriyatāṃ vīra harṣaḥ samupasevyatām / prāptavyā yadi te sītā hantavyaś vca niśācarāḥ // 6.072.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raghunandana vakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ me hitaṃ vacaḥ / sādhv ayaṃ yātu saumitrir balena mahatā vṛtaḥ // 6.072.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nikumbhilāyāṃ saṃprāpya hantuṃ rāvaṇim āhave // 6.072.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanurmaṇḍalanirmuktair āśīviṣaviṣopamaiḥ / śarair hantuṃ maheṣvāso rāvaṇiṃ samitiṃjayaḥ // 6.072.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena vīreṇa tapasā varadānāt svayambhutaḥ / astraṃ brahmaśiraḥ prāptaṃ kāmagāś ca turaṃgamāḥ // 6.072.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nikumbhilām asaṃprāptam ahutāgniṃ ca yo ripuḥ / tvām ātatāyinaṃ hanyād indraśatro sa te vadhaḥ // 6.072.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ vihito rājan vadhas tasyaiva dhīmataḥ // 6.072.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhāyendrajito rāma taṃ diśasva mahābalam / hate tasmin hataṃ viddhi rāvaṇaṃ sasuhṛjjanam // 6.072.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śrutva rāmo vākyam athābravīt / jānāmi tasya raudrasya māyāṃ satyaparākrama // 6.072.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi brahmāstravit prājño mahāmāyo mahābalaḥ / karoty asaṃjñān saṃgrāme devān savaruṇān api // 6.072.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāntarikṣe carato rathasthasya mahāyaśaḥ / na gatir jñāyate vīrasūryasyevābhrasaṃplave // 6.072.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavas tu ripor jñātvā māyāvīryaṃ durātmanaḥ / lakṣmaṇaṃ kīrtisaṃpannam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 6.072.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad vānarendrasya balaṃ tena sarveṇa saṃvṛtaḥ / hanūmatpramukhaiś caiva yūthapaiḥ sahalakṣmaṇa // 6.072.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbavenarkṣapatinā saha sainyena saṃvṛtaḥ / jahi taṃ rākṣasasutaṃ māyābalaviśāradam // 6.072.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ tvāṃ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ mahātmā rajanīcaraḥ / abhijñas tasya deśasya pṛṣṭhato 'nugamiṣyati // 6.072.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ / jagrāha kārmukaṃ śreṣṭham anyad bhīmaparākramaḥ // 6.072.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃnaddhaḥ kavacī khaḍgī sa śarī hemacāpadhṛk / rāmapādāv upaspṛśya hṛṣṭaḥ saumitrir abravīt // 6.072.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya matkārmukonmukhāḥ śarā nirbhidya rāvaṇim / laṅkām abhipatiṣyanti haṃsāḥ puṣkariṇīm iva // 6.072.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyaiva tasya raudrasya śarīraṃ māmakāḥ śarāḥ / vidhamiṣyanti hatvā taṃ mahācāpaguṇacyutāḥ // 6.072.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa evam uktvā dyutimān vacanaṃ bhrātur agrataḥ / sa rāvaṇivadhākāṅkṣī lakṣmaṇas tvarito yayau // 6.072.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhivādya guroḥ pādau kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam / nikumbhilām abhiyayau caityaṃ rāvaṇipālitam // 6.072.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇena sahito rājaputraḥ pratāpavān / kṛtasvastyayano bhrātrā lakṣmaṇas tvarito yayau // 6.072.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṇāṃ sahasrais tu hanūmān bahubhir vṛtaḥ / vibhīṣaṇaḥ sahāmātyas tadā lakṣmaṇam anvagāt // 6.072.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahatā harisainyena savegam abhisaṃvṛtaḥ / ṛkṣarājabalaṃ caiva dadarśa pathi viṣṭhitam // 6.072.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ / rākṣasendrabalaṃ dūrād apaśyad vyūham āsthitam // 6.072.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa saṃprāpya dhanuṣpāṇir māyāyogam ariṃdama / tasthau brahmavidhānena vijetuṃ raghunandanaḥ // 6.072.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vividham amalaśastrabhāsvaraṃ tad; dhvajagahanaṃ vipulaṃ mahārathaiś ca / pratibhayatamam aprameyavegaṃ; timiram iva dviṣatāṃ balaṃ viveśa // 6.072.033	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)

sa tvam indrāśaniprakhyaiḥ śarair avakiran parān / abhidravāśu yāvad vai naitat karma samāpyate // 6.073.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jahi vīradurātmānaṃ māyāparam adhārmikam / rāvaṇiṃ krūrakarmāṇaṃ sarvalokabhayāvaham // 6.073.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

ṛkṣāḥ śākhāmṛgāś caiva drumādrivarayodhinaḥ / abhyadhāvanta sahitās tad anīkam avasthitam // 6.073.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasāś ca śitair bāṇair asibhiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ / udyataiḥ samavartanta kapisainyajighāṃsavaḥ // 6.073.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

śastrair bahuvidhākāraiḥ śitair bāṇaiś ca pādapaiḥ / udyatair giriśṛṅgaiś ca ghorair ākāśam āvṛtam // 6.073.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

ṛkṣavānaramukhyaiś ca mahākāyair mahābalaiḥ / rakṣasāṃ vadhyamānānāṃ mahad bhayam ajāyata // 6.073.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

dṛṣṭvaiva tu rathasthaṃ taṃ paryavartata tad balam / rakṣasāṃ bhīmavegānāṃ lakṣmaṇena yuyutsatām // 6.073.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin kāle tu hanumān udyamya sudurāsadam / dharaṇīdharasaṃkāśī mahāvṛkṣam ariṃdamaḥ // 6.073.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rākṣasānāṃ tat sainyaṃ kālāgnir iva nirdahan / cakāra bahubhir vṛkṣair niḥsaṃjñaṃ yudhi vānaraḥ // 6.073.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhvaṃsayantaṃ tarasā dṛṣṭvaiva pavanātmajam / rākṣasānāṃ sahasrāṇi hanūmantam avākiran // 6.073.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śitaśūladharāḥ śūlair asibhiś cāsipāṇayaḥ / śaktibhiḥ śaktihastāś ca paṭṭasaiḥ paṭṭasāyudhāḥ // 6.073.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parighaiś ca gadābhiś ca kuntaiś ca śubhadarśanaiḥ / śataśaś ca śataghnībhir āyasair api mudgaraiḥ // 6.073.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghoraiḥ paraśubhiś caiva bhiṇḍipālaiś ca rākṣasāḥ / muṣṭibhir vajravegaiś ca talair aśanisaṃnibhaiḥ // 6.073.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhijaghnuḥ samāsādya samantāt parvatopamam / teṣām api ca saṃkruddhaś cakāra kadanaṃ mahat // 6.073.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tāni śastrāṇi ghorāṇi pratigṛhya sa mārutiḥ / roṣeṇa mahatāviṣo vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // 6.073.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si rāvaṇātmaja durmate / vāyuputraṃ samāsādya na jīvan pratiyāsyasi // 6.073.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāhubhyāṃ saṃprayudhyasva yadi me dvandvam āhave / vegaṃ sahasva durbuddhe tatas tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ varaḥ // 6.073.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmantaṃ jighāṃsantaṃ samudyataśarāsanam / rāvaṇātmajam ācaṣṭe lakṣmaṇāya vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.073.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

ity evam uktas tu tadā mahātmā; vibhīṣaṇenārivibhīṣaṇena / dadarśa taṃ parvatasaṃnikāśaṃ; rathasthitaṃ bhīmabalaṃ durāsadam // 6.073.034	upendravajrā [jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: upendravajrā [jtjgg], ajñātam [jtjr], indravajrā [ttjgg])

nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśaṃ nyagrodhaṃ bhīmadarśanam / tejasvī rāvaṇabhrātā lakṣmaṇāya nyavedayat // 6.074.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

rākṣasendrasutāsādho pāruṣyaṃ tyaja gauravāt / kule yady apy ahaṃ jāto rakṣasāṃ krūrakarmaṇām // 6.074.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guṇo 'yaṃ prathamo nṝṇāṃ tan me śīlam arākṣasaṃ // 6.074.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tamasā pihitaṃ sarvam āsīd bhīmataraṃ mahat // 6.077.027.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

saṃpetuś cātra saṃprāptā gandharvāḥ saha cāraṇaiḥ // 6.077.028.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rākṣasasiṃhasya kṛṣṇān kanakabhūṣaṇān / śaraiś caturbhiḥ saumitrir vivyādha caturo hayān // 6.077.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'pareṇa bhallena sūtasya vicariṣyataḥ / lāghavād rāghavaḥ śrīmāñ śiraḥ kāyād apāharat // 6.077.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihataṃ sārathiṃ dṛṣṭvā samare rāvaṇātmajaḥ / prajahau samaroddharṣaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ sa babhūva ha // 6.077.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣaṇṇavadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ hariyūthapāḥ / tataḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo lakṣmaṇaṃ cābhyapūjayan // 6.077.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pramāthī śarabho rabhaso gandhamādanaḥ / amṛṣyamāṇāś catvāraś cakrur vegaṃ harīśvarāḥ // 6.077.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te cāsya hayamukhyeṣu tūrṇam utpatya vānarāḥ / caturṣu sumahāvīryā nipetur bhīmavikramāḥ // 6.077.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām adhiṣṭhitānāṃ tair vānaraiḥ parvatopamaiḥ / mukhebhyo rudhiraṃ vyaktaṃ hayānāṃ samavartata // 6.077.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te nihatya hayāṃs tasya pramathya ca mahāratham / punar utpatya vegena tasthur lakṣmaṇapārśvataḥ // 6.077.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hatāśvād avaplutya rathān mathitasāratheḥ / śaravarṣeṇa saumitrim abhyadhāvata rāvaṇiḥ // 6.077.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mahendrapratimaṃh sa lakṣmaṇaḥ; padātinaṃ taṃ niśitaiḥ śarottamaiḥ / sṛjantam ādau niśitāñ śarottamān; bhṛśaṃ tadā bāṇagaṇair nyavārayat // 6.077.038	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa hatāśvo mahātejā bhūmau tiṣṭhan niśācaraḥ / indrajit paramakruddhaḥ saṃprajajvāla tejasā // 6.078.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau dhanvinau jighāṃsantāv anyonyam iṣubhir bhṛśam / vijayenābhiniṣkrāntau vane gajavṛṣāv iva // 6.078.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nibarhayantaś cānyonyaṃ te rākṣasavanaukasaḥ / bhartāraṃ na jahur yuddhe saṃpatantas tatas tataḥ // 6.078.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa lakṣmaṇaṃ samuddiśya paraṃ lāghavam āsthitaḥ / vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi varṣāṇīva puraṃdaraḥ // 6.078.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muktam indrajitā tat tu śaravarṣam ariṃdamaḥ / avārayad asaṃbhrānto lakṣmaṇaḥ sudurāsadam // 6.078.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

sa tvaṃ jīvati sugrīve rāghave ca salakṣmaṇe / mama śalyam anuddhṛtya kva gato 'si vihāya naḥ // 6.080.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evamādivilāpārtaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam / āviveśa mahān kopaḥ putravyasanasaṃbhavaḥ // 6.080.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghoraṃ prakṛtyā rūpaṃ tat tasya krodhāgnimūrchitam / babhūva rūpaṃ rudrasya kruddhasyeva durāsadam // 6.080.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya kruddhasya netrābhyāṃ prāpatann asrabindavaḥ / dīptābhyām iva dīpābhyāṃ sārciṣaḥ snehabindavaḥ // 6.080.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dantān vidaśatas tasya śrūyate daśanasvanaḥ / yantrasyāveṣṭyamānasya mahato dānavair iva // 6.080.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālāgnir iva saṃkruddho yāṃ yāṃ diśam avaikṣata / tasyāṃ tasyāṃ bhayatrastā rākṣasāḥ saṃnililyire // 6.080.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ carācaracikhādiṣum / vīkṣamāṇaṃ diśaḥ sarvā rākṣasā nopacakramuḥ // 6.080.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paramasaṃkruddho rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / abravīd rakṣasāṃ madhye saṃstambhayiṣur āhave // 6.080.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā varṣasahasrāṇi caritvā duścaraṃ tapaḥ / teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu svayambhūḥ paritoṣitaḥ // 6.080.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaiva tapaso vyuṣṭyā prasādāc ca svayambhuvaḥ / nāsurebhyo na devebhyo bhayaṃ mama kadā cana // 6.080.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kavacaṃ brahmadattaṃ me yad ādityasamaprabham / devāsuravimardeṣu na bhinnaṃ vajraśaktibhiḥ // 6.080.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena mām adya saṃyuktaṃ rathastham iha saṃyuge / pratīyāt ko 'dya mām ājau sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ // 6.080.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tadābhiprasannena saśaraṃ kārmukaṃ mahat / devāsuravimardeṣu mama dattaṃ svayambhuvā // 6.080.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya tūryaśatair bhīmaṃ dhanur utthāpyatāṃ mahat / rāmalakṣmaṇayor eva vadhāya paramāhave // 6.080.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa putravadhasaṃtaptaḥ śūraḥ krodhavaśaṃ gataḥ / samīkṣya rāvaṇo buddhyā sītāṃ hantuṃ vyavasyata // 6.080.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyavekṣya tu tāmrākṣaḥ sughoro ghoradarśanān / dīno dīnasvarān sarvāṃs tān uvāca niśācarān // 6.080.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māyayā mama vatsena vañcanārthaṃ vanaukasām / kiṃ cid eva hataṃ tatra sīteyam iti darśitam // 6.080.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad idaṃ satyam evāhaṃ kariṣye priyam ātmanaḥ / vaidehīṃ nāśayiṣyāmi kṣatrabandhum anuvratām // 6.080.032.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā sacivān khaḍgam āśu parāmṛśat // 6.080.032.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uddhṛtya guṇasaṃpannaṃ vimalāmbaravarcasaṃ / niṣpapāta sa vegena sabhāyāḥ sacivair vṛtaḥ // 6.080.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaḥ putraśokena bhṛśam ākulacetanaḥ / saṃkruddhaḥ khaḍgam ādāya sahasā yatra maithilī // 6.080.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vrajantaṃ rākṣasaṃ prekṣya siṃhanādaṃ pracukruśuḥ / ūcuś cānyonyam āśliṣya saṃkruddhaṃ prekṣya rākṣasāḥ // 6.080.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyainaṃ tāv ubhau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau pravyathiṣyataḥ / lokapālā hi catvāraḥ kruddhenānena nirjitāḥ // 6.080.036.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahavaḥ śatravaś cānye saṃyugeṣv abhipātitāḥ // 6.080.036.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ saṃjalpamānānām aśokavanikāṃ gatām / abhidudrāva vaidehīṃ rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ // 6.080.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāryamāṇaḥ susaṃkruddhaḥ suhṛdbhir hitabuddhibhiḥ / abhyadhāvata saṃkruddhaḥ khe graho rohiṇīm iva // 6.080.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maithilī rakṣyamāṇā tu rākṣasībhir aninditā / dadarśa rākṣasaṃ kruddhaṃ nistriṃśavaradhāriṇam // 6.080.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ niśāmya sanistriṃśaṃ vyathitā janakātmajā / nivāryamāṇaṃ bahuśaḥ suhṛdbhir anivartinam // 6.080.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāyaṃ mām abhikruddhaḥ samabhidravati svayam / vadhiṣyati sanāthāṃ mām anāthām iva durmatiḥ // 6.080.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahuśaś codayām āsa bhartāraṃ mām anuvratām / bhāryā bhava ramasyeti pratyākhyāto 'bhavan mayā // 6.080.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'yaṃ mām anupasthānād vyaktaṃ nairāśyam āgataḥ / krodhamohasamāviṣṭo nihantuṃ māṃ samudyataḥ // 6.080.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā tau naravyāghrau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / mannimittam anāryeṇa samare 'dya nipātitau // 6.080.044.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho dhin mannimitto 'yaṃ vināśo rājaputrayoḥ // 6.080.044.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmato hi tadvākyaṃ na kṛtaṃ kṣudrayā mayā / yady ahaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhena tadāyāsam aninditā // 6.080.045.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nādyaivam anuśoceyaṃ bhartur aṅkagatā satī // 6.080.045.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manye tu hṛdayaṃ tasyāḥ kausalyāyāḥ phaliṣyati / ekaputrā yadā putraṃ vinaṣṭaṃ śroṣyate yudhi // 6.080.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā hi janma ca bālyaṃ ca yauvanaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ / dharmakāryāṇi rūpaṃ ca rudatī saṃsramiṣyati // 6.080.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirāśā nihate putre dattvā śrāddham acetanā / agnim ārokṣyate nūnam apo vāpi pravekṣyati // 6.080.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhig astu kubjām asatīṃ mantharāṃ pāpaniścayām / yannimittam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ kausalyā pratipatsyate // 6.080.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā vilapantīṃ tapasvinīm / rohiṇīm iva candreṇa vinā grahavaśaṃ gatām // 6.080.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
supārśvo nāma medhāvī rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram / nivāryamāṇaṃ sacivair idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 6.080.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ nāma daśagrīva sākṣād vaiśravaṇānuja / hantum icchasi vaidehīṃ krodhād dharmam apāsya hi // 6.080.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
veda vidyāvrata snātaḥ svadharmanirataḥ sadā / striyāḥ kasmād vadhaṃ vīra manyase rākṣaseśvara // 6.080.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maithilīṃ rūpasaṃpannāṃ pratyavekṣasva pārthiva / tvam eva tu sahāsmābhī rāghave krodham utsṛja // 6.080.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyutthānaṃ tvam adyaiva kṛṣṇapakṣacaturdaśīm / kṛtvā niryāhy amāvāsyāṃ vijayāya balair vṛtaḥ // 6.080.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūro dhīmān rathī khaḍgī rathapravaram āsthitaḥ / hatvā dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ bhavān prāpsyati maithilīm // 6.080.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tad durātmā suhṛdā niveditaṃ; vacaḥ sudharmyaṃ pratigṛhya rāvaṇaḥ / gṛhaṃ jagāmātha tataś ca vīryavān; punaḥ sabhāṃ ca prayayau suhṛdvṛtaḥ // 6.080.057	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa praviśya sabhāṃ rājā dīnaḥ paramaduḥkhitaḥ / niṣasādāsane mukhye siṃhaḥ kruddha iva śvasan // 6.081.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca tadā sarvān balamukhyān mahābalaḥ / rāvaṇaḥ prāñjalīn vākyaṃ putravyasanakarśitaḥ // 6.081.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve bhavantaḥ sarveṇa hastyaśvena samāvṛtāḥ / niryāntu rathasaṃghaiś ca pādātaiś copaśobhitāḥ // 6.081.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekaṃ rāmaṃ parikṣipya samare hantum arhatha / prahṛṣṭā śaravarṣeṇa prāvṛṭkāla ivāmbudāḥ // 6.081.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vāhaṃ śarair tīṣkṇair bhinnagātraṃ mahāraṇe / bhavadbhiḥ śvo nihantāsmi rāmaṃ lokasya paśyataḥ // 6.081.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ rākṣasendrasya vākyam ādāya rākṣasāḥ / niryayus te rathaiḥ śīghraṃ nāgānīkaiś ca saṃvṛtāḥ // 6.081.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa saṃgrāmo mahābhīmaḥ sūryasyodayanaṃ prati / rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca tumulaḥ samapadyata // 6.081.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gadābhir vicitrābhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ / anyonyaṃ samare jaghnus tadā vānararākṣasāḥ // 6.081.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātaṃgarathakūlasya vājimatsyā dhvajadrumāḥ / śarīrasaṃghāṭavahāḥ prasasruḥ śoṇitāpagāḥ // 6.081.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhvajavarmarathān aśvān nānāpraharaṇāni ca / āplutyāplutya samare vānarendrā babhañjire // 6.081.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
keśān karṇalalāṭāṃś ca nāsikāś ca plavaṃgamāḥ / rakṣasāṃ daśanais tīkṣṇair nakhaiś cāpi vyakartayan // 6.081.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekaikaṃ rākṣasaṃ saṃkhye śataṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ / abhyadhāvanta phalinaṃ vṛkṣaṃ śakunayo yathā // 6.081.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā gadābhir gurvībhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ / nirjaghnur vānarān ghorān rākṣasāḥ parvatopamāḥ // 6.081.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasair vadhyamānānāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūḥ / śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ yātā rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam // 6.081.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmo mahātejā dhanur ādāya vīryavān / praviśya rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ śaravarṣaṃ vavarṣa ha // 6.081.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviṣṭaṃ tu tadā rāmaṃ meghāḥ sūryam ivāmbare / nābhijagmur mahāghoraṃ nirdahantaṃ śarāgninā // 6.081.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtāny eva sughorāṇi rāmeṇa rajanīcarāḥ / raṇe rāmasya dadṛśuḥ karmāṇy asukarāṇi ca // 6.081.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cālayantaṃ mahānīkaṃ vidhamantaṃ mahārathān / dadṛśus te na vai rāmaṃ vātaṃ vanagataṃ yathā // 6.081.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ śarair dagdhaṃ prabhagnaṃ śastrapīḍitam / balaṃ rāmeṇa dadṛśur na ramaṃ śīghrakāriṇam // 6.081.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praharantaṃ śarīreṣu na te paśyanti rābhavam / indriyārtheṣu tiṣṭhantaṃ bhūtātmānam iva prajāḥ // 6.081.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa hanti gajānīkam eṣa hanti mahārathān / eṣa hanti śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ padātīn vājibhiḥ saha // 6.081.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti te rākṣasāḥ sarve rāmasya sadṛśān raṇe / anyonyakupitā jaghnuḥ sādṛśyād rāghavasya te // 6.081.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na te dadṛśire rāmaṃ dahantam arivāhinīm / mohitāḥ paramāstreṇa gāndharveṇa mahātmanā // 6.081.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu rāma sahasrāṇi raṇe paśyanti rākṣasāḥ / punaḥ paśyanti kākutstham ekam eva mahāhave // 6.081.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhramantīṃ kāñcanīṃ koṭiṃ kārmukasya mahātmanaḥ / alātacakrapratimāṃ dadṛśus te na rāghavam // 6.081.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarīranābhisattvārciḥ śarāraṃ nemikārmukam / jyāghoṣatalanirghoṣaṃ tejobuddhiguṇaprabham // 6.081.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyāstraguṇaparyantaṃ nighnantaṃ yudhi rākṣasān / dadṛśū rāmacakraṃ tat kālacakram iva prajāḥ // 6.081.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anīkaṃ daśasāhasraṃ rathānāṃ vātaraṃhasām / aṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi kuñjarāṇāṃ tarasvinām // 6.081.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśasahasrāṇi sārohāṇāṃ ca vājinām / pūrṇe śatasahasre dve rākṣasānāṃ padātinām // 6.081.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divasasyāṣṭame bhāge śarair agniśikhopamaiḥ / hatāny ekena rāmeṇa rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpiṇām // 6.081.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te hatāśvā hatarathāḥ śrāntā vimathitadhvajāḥ / abhipetuḥ purīṃ laṅkāṃ hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ // 6.081.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatair gajapadāty aśvais tad babhūva raṇājiram / ākrīḍabhūmī rudrasya kruddhasyeva pinākinaḥ // 6.081.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / sādhu sādhv iti rāmasya tat karma samapūjayan // 6.081.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca tadā rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ pratyanantaram / etad astrabalaṃ divyaṃ mama vā tryambakasya vā // 6.081.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatya tāṃ rākṣasavāhinīṃ tu; rāmas tadā śakrasamo mahātmā / astreṣu śastreṣu jitaklamaś ca; saṃstūyate devagaṇaiḥ prahṛṣṭaiḥ // 6.081.035	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tāni nāgasahasrāṇi sārohāṇāṃ ca vājinām / rathānāṃ cāgnivarṇānāṃ sadhvajānāṃ sahasraśaḥ // 6.082.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasānāṃ sahasrāṇi gadāparighayodhinām / kāñcanadhvajacitrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ kāmarūpiṇām // 6.082.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇais taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ / rāvaṇena prayuktāni rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā // 6.082.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca saṃbhrāntā hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ / rākṣasyaś ca samāgamya dīnāś cintāpariplutāḥ // 6.082.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidhavā hataputrāś ca krośantyo hatabāndhavāḥ / rākṣasyaḥ saha saṃgamya duḥkhārtāḥ paryadevayan // 6.082.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ śūrpaṇakhā vṛddhā karālā nirṇatodarī / āsasāda vane rāmaṃ kandarpam iva rūpiṇam // 6.082.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukumāraṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarvabhūtahite ratam / taṃ dṛṣṭvā lokavadhyā sā hīnarūpā prakāmitā // 6.082.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ sarvaguṇair hīnā guṇavantaṃ mahaujasaṃ / sumukhaṃ durmukhī rāmaṃ kāmayām āsa rākṣasī // 6.082.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janasyāsyālpabhāgyatvāt palinī śvetamūrdhajā / akāryam apahāsyaṃ ca sarvalokavigarhitam // 6.082.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasānāṃ vināśāya dūṣaṇasya kharasya ca / cakārāpratirūpā sā rāghavasya pradharṣaṇam // 6.082.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan nimittam idaṃ vairaṃ rāvaṇena kṛtaṃ mahat / vadhāya nītā sā sītā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā // 6.082.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca sītāṃ daśagrīvaḥ prāpnoti janakātmajām / baddhaṃ balavatā vairam akṣayaṃ rāghaveṇa ha // 6.082.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehīṃ prārthayānaṃ taṃ virādhaṃ prekṣya rākṣasaṃ / hatam ekena rāmeṇa paryāptaṃ tannidarśanam // 6.082.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśasahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām / nihatāni janasthāne śarair agniśikhopamaiḥ // 6.082.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā / śarair ādityasaṃkāśaiḥ paryāptaṃ tannidarśanam // 6.082.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hato yojanabāhuś ca kabandho rudhirāśanaḥ / krodhārto vinadan so 'tha paryāptaṃ tannidarśanam // 6.082.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaghāna balinaṃ rāmaḥ sahasranayanātmajam / bālinaṃ meghasaṃkāśaṃ paryāptaṃ tannidarśanam // 6.082.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛśyamūke vasañ śaile dīno bhagnamanorathaḥ / sugrīvaḥ sthāpito rājye paryāptaṃ tannidarśanam // 6.082.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmārthasahitaṃ vākyaṃ sarveṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ hitam / yuktaṃ vibhīṣaṇenoktaṃ mohāt tasya na rocate // 6.082.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ kuryād yadi sma dhanadānujaḥ / śmaśānabhūtā duḥkhārtā neyaṃ laṅkā purī bhavet // 6.082.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇaṃ hataṃ śrutvā rāghaveṇa mahābalam / priyaṃ cendrajitaṃ putraṃ rāvaṇo nāvabudhyate // 6.082.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama putro mama bhrātā mama bhartā raṇe hataḥ / ity evaṃ śrūyate śabdo rākṣasānāṃ kule kule // 6.082.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathāś cāśvāś ca nāgāś ca hatāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ / raṇe rāmeṇa śūreṇa rākṣasāś ca padātayaḥ // 6.082.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rudro vā yadi vā viṣṇur mahendro vā śatakratuḥ / hanti no rāmarūpeṇa yadi vā svayam antakaḥ // 6.082.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatapravīrā rāmeṇa nirāśā jīvite vayam / apaśyantyo bhayasyāntam anāthā vilapāmahe // 6.082.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmahastād daśagrīvaḥ śūro dattavaro yudhi / idaṃ bhayaṃ mahāghoram utpannaṃ nāvabudhyate // 6.082.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na devā na ca gandharvā na piśācā na rākasāḥ / upasṛṣṭaṃ paritrātuṃ śaktā rāmeṇa saṃyuge // 6.082.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utpātāś cāpi dṛśyante rāvaṇasya raṇe raṇe / kathayiṣyanti rāmeṇa rāvaṇasya nibarhaṇam // 6.082.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahena prītena devadānavarākṣasaiḥ / rāvaṇasyābhayaṃ dattaṃ mānuṣebhyo na yācitam // 6.082.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad idaṃ mānuṣān manye prāptaṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ bhayam / jīvitāntakaraṃ ghoraṃ rakṣasāṃ rāvaṇasya ca // 6.082.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pīḍyamānās tu balinā varadānena rakṣasā / dīptais tapobhir vibudhāḥ pitāmaham apūjayan // 6.082.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devatānāṃ hitārthāya mahātmā vai pitāmahaḥ / uvāca devatāḥ sarvā idaṃ tuṣṭo mahad vacaḥ // 6.082.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya prabhṛti lokāṃs trīn sarve dānavarākṣasāḥ / bhayena prāvṛtā nityaṃ vicariṣyanti śāśvatam // 6.082.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daivatais tu samāgamya sarvaiś cendrapurogamaiḥ / vṛṣadhvajas tripurahā mahādevaḥ prasāditaḥ // 6.082.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasannas tu mahādevo devān etad vaco 'bravīt / utpatsyati hitārthaṃ vo nārī rakṣaḥkṣayāvahā // 6.082.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā devaiḥ prayuktā tu kṣud yathā dānavān purā / bhakṣayiṣyati naḥ sītā rākṣasaghnī sarāvaṇān // 6.082.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasyāpanītena durvinītasya durmateḥ / ayaṃ niṣṭānako ghoraḥ śokena samabhiplutaḥ // 6.082.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ na paśyāmahe loke yo naḥ śaraṇado bhavet / rāghaveṇopasṛṣṭānāṃ kāleneva yugakṣaye // 6.082.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
itīva sarvā rajanīcarastriyaḥ; parasparaṃ saṃparirabhya bāhubhiḥ / viṣedur ārtātibhayābhipīḍitā; vinedur uccaiś ca tadā sudāruṇam // 6.082.039	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
ārtānāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ tu laṅkāyāṃ vai kule kule / rāvaṇaḥ karuṇaṃ śabdaṃ śuśrāva pariveditam // 6.083.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dīrghaṃ viniśvasya muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ / babhūva paramakruddho rāvaṇo bhīmadarśanaḥ // 6.083.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃdaśya daśanair oṣṭhaṃ krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ / rākṣasair api durdarśaḥ kālāgnir iva mūrchitaḥ // 6.083.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca ca samīpasthān rākṣasān rākṣaseśvaraḥ / bhayāvyaktakathāṃs tatra nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā // 6.083.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahodaraṃ mahāpārśvaṃ virūpākṣaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ / śīghraṃ vadata sainyāni niryāteti mamājñayā // 6.083.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te bhayārditāḥ / codayām āsur avyagrān rākṣasāṃs tān nṛpājñayā // 6.083.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu sarve tathety uktvā rākṣasā ghoradarśanāḥ / kṛtasvastyayanāḥ sarve rāvaṇābhimukhā yayuḥ // 6.083.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratipūjya yathānyāyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ te mahārathāḥ / tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve bhartur vijayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 6.083.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athovāca prahasyaitān rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / mahodaramahāpārśvau virūpākṣaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ // 6.083.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya bāṇair dhanurmuktair yugāntādityasaṃnibhaiḥ / rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva neṣyāmi yamasādhanam // 6.083.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kharasya kumbhakarṇasya prahastendrajitos tathā / kariṣyāmi pratīkāram adya śatruvadhād aham // 6.083.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naivāntarikṣaṃ na diśo na nadyo nāpi sāgaraḥ / prakāśatvaṃ gamiṣyāmi madbāṇajaladāvṛtāḥ // 6.083.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya vānarayūthānāṃ tāni yūthāni bhāgaśaḥ / dhanuḥsamudrād udbhūtair mathiṣyāmi śarormibhiḥ // 6.083.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyākośapadmacakrāṇi padmakesaravarcasām / adya yūthataṭākāni gajavat pramathāmy aham // 6.083.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saśarair adya vadanaiḥ saṃkhye vānarayūthapāḥ / maṇḍayiṣyanti vasudhāṃ sanālair iva paṅkalaiḥ // 6.083.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya yuddhapracaṇḍānāṃ harīṇāṃ drumayodhinām / muktenaikeṣuṇā yuddhe bhetsyāmi ca śataṃśatam // 6.083.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hato bhartā hato bhrātā yāsāṃ ca tanayā hatāḥ / vadhenādya ripos tāsāṃ karmomy asrapramārjanam // 6.083.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya madbāṇanirbhinnaiḥ prakīrṇair gatacetanaiḥ / karomi vānarair yuddhe yatnāvekṣya talāṃ mahīm // 6.083.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya gomāyavo gṛdhrā ye ca māṃsāśino 'pare / sarvāṃs tāṃs tarpayiṣyāmi śatrumāṃsaiḥ śarārditaiḥ // 6.083.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kalpyatāṃ me rathaśīghraṃ kṣipram ānīyatāṃ dhanuḥ / anuprayāntu māṃ yuddhe ye 'vaśiṣṭā niśācarāḥ // 6.083.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā mahāpārśvo 'bravīd vacaḥ / balādhyakṣān sthitāṃs tatra balaṃ saṃtvaryatām iti // 6.083.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balādhyakṣās tu saṃrabdhā rākṣasāṃs tān gṛhād gṛhāt / codayantaḥ pariyayur laṅkāṃ laghuparākramāḥ // 6.083.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato muhūrtān niṣpetū rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ / nardanto bhīmavadanā nānāpraharaṇair bhujaiḥ // 6.083.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asibhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ śūlair galābhir musalair halaiḥ / śaktibhis tīkṣṇadhārābhir mahadbhiḥ kūṭamudgaraiḥ // 6.083.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaṣṭibhir vimalaiś cakrair niśitaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ / bhiṇḍipālaiḥ śataghnībhir anyaiś cāpi varāyudhaiḥ // 6.083.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athānayan balādhyakṣāś catvāro rāvaṇājñayā / drutaṃ sūtasamāyuktaṃ yuktāṣṭaturagaṃ ratham // 6.083.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āruroha rathaṃ divyaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā / rāvaṇaḥ sattvagāmbhīryād dārayann iva medinīm // 6.083.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇenābhyanujñātau mahāpārśvamahodarau / virūpākṣaś ca durdharṣo rathān āruruhus tadā // 6.083.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu hṛṣṭā vinardanto bhindata iva medinīm / nādaṃ ghoraṃ vimuñcanto niryayur jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 6.083.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yuddhāya tejasvī rakṣogaṇabalair vṛtaḥ / niryayāv udyatadhanuḥ kālāntakayamomapaḥ // 6.083.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prajavanāśvena rathena sa mahārathaḥ / dvāreṇa niryayau tena yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 6.083.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato naṣṭaprabhaḥ sūryo diśaś ca timirāvṛtāḥ / dvijāś ca nedur ghorāś ca saṃcacāla ca medinī // 6.083.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaś caskhaluś ca turaṃgamāḥ / dhvajāgre nyapatad gṛdhro vineduś cāśivaṃ śivāḥ // 6.083.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nayanaṃ cāsphurad vāmaṃ savyo bāhur akampata / vivarṇavadanaś cāsīt kiṃ cid abhraśyata svaraḥ // 6.083.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato niṣpatato yuddhe daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ / raṇe nidhanaśaṃsīni rūpāṇy etāni jajñire // 6.083.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarikṣāt papātolkā nirghātasamanisvanā / vinedur aśivaṃ gṛdhrā vāyasair anunāditāḥ // 6.083.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etān acintayan ghorān utpātān samupasthitān / niryayau rāvaṇo mohād vadhārthī kālacoditaḥ // 6.083.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tu rathaghoṣeṇa rākṣasānāṃ mahātmanām / vānarāṇām api camūr yuddhāyaivābhyavartata // 6.083.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ babhūva kapirakṣasām / anyonyam āhvayānānāṃ kruddhānāṃ jayam icchatām // 6.083.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ / vānarāṇām anīkeṣu cakāra kadanaṃ mahat // 6.083.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nikṛttaśirasaḥ ke cid rāvaṇena valīmukhāḥ / nirucchvāsā hatāḥ ke cit ke cit pārśveṣu dāritāḥ // 6.083.041.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cid vibhinnaśirasaḥ ke cic cakṣurvivarjitāḥ // 6.083.041.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśānanaḥ krodhavivṛttanetro; yato yato 'bhyeti rathena saṃkhye / tatas tatas tasya śarapravegaṃ; soḍhuṃ na śekur hariyūthapās te // 6.083.042	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tathā taiḥ kṛttagātrais tu daśagrīveṇa mārgaṇaiḥ / babhūva vasudhā tatra prakīrṇā haribhir vṛtā // 6.084.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasyāprasahyaṃ taṃ śarasaṃpātam ekataḥ / na śekuḥ sahituṃ dīptaṃ pataṃgā iva pāvakam // 6.084.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te 'rditā niśitair bāṇaiḥ krośanto vipradudruvuḥ / pāvakārciḥsamāviṣṭā dahyamānā yathā gajāḥ // 6.084.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
plavaṃgānām anīkāni mahābhrāṇīva mārutaḥ / sa yayau samare tasmin vidhaman rāvaṇaḥ śaraiḥ // 6.084.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kadanaṃ tarasā kṛtvā rākṣasendro vanaukasām / āsasāda tato yuddhe rāghavaṃ tvaritas tadā // 6.084.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvas tān kapīn dṛṣṭvā bhagnān vidravato raṇe / gulme suṣeṇaṃ nikṣipya cakre yuddhe drutaṃ manaḥ // 6.084.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ vīraṃ sa taṃ nikṣipya vānaram / sugrīvo 'bhimukhaḥ śatruṃ pratasthe pādapāyudhaḥ // 6.084.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāsya sarve yūthādhipāḥ svayam / anujahrur mahāśailān vividhāṃś ca mahādrumān // 6.084.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nadan yudhi sugrīvaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān / pātayan vividhāṃś cānyāñ jaghānottamarākṣasān // 6.084.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamarda ca mahākāyo rākṣasān vānareśvaraḥ / yugāntasamaye vāyuḥ pravṛddhān agamān iva // 6.084.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasānām anīkeṣu śailavarṣaṃ vavarṣa ha / aśvavarṣaṃ yathā meghaḥ pakṣisaṃgheṣu kānane // 6.084.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kapirājavimuktais taiḥ śailavarṣais tu rākṣasāḥ / vikīrṇaśirasaḥ petur nikṛttā iva parvatāḥ // 6.084.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha saṃkṣīyamāṇeṣu rākṣaseṣu samantataḥ / sugrīveṇa prabhagneṣu patatsu vinadatsu ca // 6.084.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
virūpākṣaḥ svakaṃ nāma dhanvī viśrāvya rākṣasaḥ / rathād āplutya durdharṣo gajaskandham upāruhat // 6.084.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ dviradam āruhya virūpākṣo mahārathaḥ / vinadan bhīmanirhrālaṃ vānarān abhyadhāvata // 6.084.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīve sa śarān ghorān visasarja camūmukhe / sthāpayām āsā codvignān rākṣasān saṃpraharṣayan // 6.084.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'tividdhaḥ śitair bāṇaiḥ kapīndras tena rakṣasā / cukrodha ca mahākrodho vadhe cāsya mano dadhe // 6.084.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pādapam uddhṛtya śūraḥ saṃpradhane hariḥ / abhipatya jaghānāsya pramukhe taṃ mahāgajam // 6.084.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu prahārābhihataḥ sugrīveṇa mahāgajaḥ / apāsarpad dhanurmātraṃ niṣasāda nanāda ca // 6.084.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gajāt tu mathitāt tūrṇam apakramya sa vīryavān / rākṣaso 'bhimukhaḥ śatruṃ pratyudgamya tataḥ kapim // 6.084.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ārṣabhaṃ carmakhaḍgaṃ ca pragṛhya laghuvikramaḥ / bhartsayann iva sugrīvam āsasāda vyavasthitam // 6.084.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi tasyābhisaṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ śilām / virūpākṣāya cikṣepa sugrīvo jaladopamām // 6.084.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tāṃ śilām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ / apakramya suvikrāntaḥ khaḍgena prāharat tadā // 6.084.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena khaḍgena saṃkruddhaḥ sugrīvasya camūmukhe / kavacaṃ pātayām āsa sa khaḍgābhihato 'patat // 6.084.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa samutthāya patitaḥ kapis tasya vyasarjayat / talaprahāram aśaneḥ samānaṃ bhīmanisvanam // 6.084.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
talaprahāraṃ tad rakṣaḥ sugrīveṇa samudyatam / naipuṇyān mocayitvainaṃ muṣṭinorasy atāḍayat // 6.084.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu saṃkruddhataraḥ sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ / mokṣitaṃ cātmano dṛṣṭvā prahāraṃ tena rakṣasā // 6.084.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśāntaraṃ tasya virūpākṣasya vānaraḥ / tato nyapātayat krodhāc chaṅkhadeśe mahātalam // 6.084.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahendrāśanikalpena talenābhihataḥ kṣitau / papāta rudhiraklinnaḥ śoṇitaṃ sa samudvaman // 6.084.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vivṛttanayanaṃ krodhāt saphena rudhirāplutam / dadṛśus te virūpākṣaṃ virūpākṣataraṃ kṛtam // 6.084.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sphurantaṃ parivarjantaṃ pārśvena rudhirokṣitam / karuṇaṃ ca vinardāntaṃ dadṛśuḥ kapayo ripum // 6.084.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tu tau saṃyati saṃprayuktau; tarasvinau vānararākṣasānām / balārṇavau sasvanatuḥ sabhīmaṃ; mahārṇavau dvāv iva bhinnavelau // 6.084.032	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
vināśitaṃ prekṣya virūpanetraṃ; mahābalaṃ taṃ haripārthivena / balaṃ samastaṃ kapirākṣasānām; unmattagaṅgāpratimaṃ babhūva // 6.084.033	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
hanyamāne bale tūrṇam anyonyaṃ te mahāmṛdhe / sarasīva mahāgharme sūpakṣīṇe babhūvatuḥ // 6.085.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svabalasya vighātena virūpākṣavadhena ca / babhūva dviguṇaṃ kruddho rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ // 6.085.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakṣīṇaṃ tu balaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyamānaṃ valīmukhaiḥ / babhūvāsya vyathā yuddhe prekṣya daivaviparyayam // 6.085.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca ca samīpasthaṃ mahodaram ariṃdamam / asmin kāle mahābāho jayāśā tvayi me sthitā // 6.085.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jahi śatrucamūṃ vīra darśayādya parākramam / bhartṛpiṇḍasya kālo 'yaṃ nirveṣṭuṃ sādhu yudhyatām // 6.085.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tathety uktvā rākṣasendraṃ mahodaraḥ / praviveśārisenāṃ sa pataṃga iva pāvakam // 6.085.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa kadanaṃ cakre vānarāṇāṃ mahābalaḥ / bhartṛvākyena tejasvī svena vīryeṇa coditaḥ // 6.085.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhagnāṃ samare dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūm / abhidudrāva sugrīvo mahodaram anantaram // 6.085.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pragṛhya vipulāṃ ghorāṃ mahīdhara samāṃ śilām / cikṣepa ca mahātejās tad vadhāya harīśvaraḥ // 6.085.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām āpatantīṃ sahasā śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahodaraḥ / asaṃbhrāntas tato bāṇair nirbibheda durāsadām // 6.085.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣasā tena bāṇaughair nikṛttā sā sahasradhā / nipapāta śilābhūmau gṛdhracakram ivākulam // 6.085.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tu bhinnāṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / sālam utpāṭya cikṣepa rakṣase raṇamūrdhani // 6.085.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaraiś ca vidadārainaṃ śūraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ // 6.085.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśa tataḥ kruddhaḥ parighaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi / āvidhya tu sa taṃ dīptaṃ parighaṃ tasya darśayan // 6.085.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parighāgreṇa vegena jaghānāsya hayottamān // 6.085.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād dhatahayād vīraḥ so 'vaplutya mahārathāt / gadāṃ jagrāha saṃkruddho rākṣaso 'tha mahodaraḥ // 6.085.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gadāparighahastau tau yudhi vīrau samīyatuḥ / nardantau govṛṣaprakhyau ghanāv iva savidyutau // 6.085.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājaghāna gadāṃ tasya parigheṇa harīśvaraḥ / papāta sa gadodbhinnaḥ parighas tasya bhūtale // 6.085.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato jagrāha tejasvī sugrīvo vasudhātalāt / āyasaṃ musalaṃ ghoraṃ sarvato hemabhūṣitam // 6.085.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ samudyamya cikṣepa so 'py anyāṃ vyākṣipad gadām / bhinnāv anyonyam āsādya petatur dharaṇītale // 6.085.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bhagnapraharaṇau muṣṭibhyāṃ tau samīyatuḥ / tejo balasamāviṣṭau dīptāv iva hutāśanau // 6.085.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaghnatus tau tadānyonyaṃ nedatuś ca punaḥ punaḥ / talaiś cānyonyam āhatya petatur dharaṇītale // 6.085.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utpetatus tatas tūrṇaṃ jaghnatuś ca parasparam / bhujaiś cikṣepatur vīrāv anyonyam aparājitau // 6.085.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājahāra tadā khagḍam adūraparivartinam / rākṣasaś carmaṇā sārdhaṃ mahāvego mahodaraḥ // 6.085.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaiva ca mahākhaḍgaṃ carmaṇā patitaṃ saha / jagrāha vānaraśreṣṭhaḥ sugrīvo vegavattaraḥ // 6.085.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tu roṣaparītāṅgau nardantāv abhyadhāvatām / udyatāsī raṇe hṛṣṭau yudhi śastraviśāradau // 6.085.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dakṣiṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cobhau tau tūrṇaṃ saṃparīyatuḥ / anyonyam abhisaṃkruddhau jaye praṇihitāv ubhau // 6.085.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu śūro mahāvego vīryaślāghī mahodaraḥ / mahācarmaṇi taṃ khaḍgaṃ pātayām āsa durmatiḥ // 6.085.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lagnam utkarṣataḥ khaḍgaṃ khaḍgena kapikuñjaraḥ / jahāra saśiras trāṇaṃ kuṇḍalopahitaṃ śiraḥ // 6.085.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nikṛttaśirasas tasya patitasya mahītale / tad balaṃ rākṣasendrasya dṛṣṭvā tatra na tiṣṭhati // 6.085.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatvā taṃ vānaraiḥ sārdhaṃ nanāda mudito hariḥ / cukrodha ca daśagrīvo babhau hṛṣṭaś ca rāghavaḥ // 6.085.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahodare tu nihate mahāpārśvo mahābalaḥ / aṅgadasya camūṃ bhīmāṃ kṣobhayām āsa sāyakaiḥ // 6.086.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vānarāṇāṃ mukhyānām uttamāṅgāni sarvaśaḥ / pātayām āsa kāyebhyaḥ phalaṃ vṛntād ivānilaḥ // 6.086.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
keṣāṃ cid iṣubhir bāhūn skandhāṃś cicheda rākṣasaḥ / vānarāṇāṃ susaṃkruddhaḥ pārśvaṃ keṣāṃ vyadārayat // 6.086.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te 'rditā bāṇavarṣeṇa mahāpārśvena vānarāḥ / viṣādavimukhāḥ sarve babhūvur gatacetasaḥ // 6.086.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirīkṣya balam udvignam aṅgado rākṣasārditam / vegaṃ cakre mahābāhuḥ samudra iva parvaṇi // 6.086.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyasaṃ parighaṃ gṛhya sūryaraśmisamaprabham / samare vānaraśreṣṭho mahāpārśve nyapātayat // 6.086.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu tena prahāreṇa mahāpārśvo vicetanaḥ / sasūtaḥ syandanāt tasmād visaṃjñaḥ prāpatad bhuvi // 6.086.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarkṣarājas tu tejasvī nīlāñjanacayopamaḥ / niṣpatya sumahāvīryaḥ svād yūthān meghasaṃnibhāt // 6.086.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pragṛhya giriśṛṅgābhāṃ kruddhaḥ sa vipulāṃ śilām / aśvāñ jaghāna tarasā syandanaṃ ca babhañja tam // 6.086.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muhūrtāl labdhasaṃjñas tu mahāpārśvo mahābalaḥ / aṅgadaṃ bahubhir bāṇair bhūyas taṃ pratyavidhyata // 6.086.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbavantaṃ tribhir bāṇair ājaghāna stanāntare / ṛkṣarājaṃ gavākṣaṃ ca jaghāna bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ // 6.086.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gavākṣaṃ jāmbavantaṃ ca sa dṛṣṭvā śarapīḍitau / jagrāha parighaṃ ghoram aṅgadaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ // 6.086.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṅgadaḥ prakupito rākṣasasya tam āyasaṃ / dūrasthitasya parighaṃ raviraśmisamaprabham // 6.086.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ saṃgṛhya bhrāmayitvā ca vegavān / mahāpārśvāya cikṣepa vadhārthaṃ vālinaḥ sutaḥ // 6.086.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu kṣipto balavatā parighas tasya rakṣasaḥ / dhanuś ca saśaraṃ hastāc chirastraṃ cāpy apātayat // 6.086.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ samāsādya vegena vāliputraḥ pratāpavān / talenābhyahanat kruddhaḥ karṇamūle sakuṇḍale // 6.086.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu kruddho mahāvego mahāpārśvo mahādyutiḥ / kareṇaikena jagrāha sumahāntaṃ paraśvadham // 6.086.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tailadhautaṃ vimalaṃ śailasāramayaṃ dṛḍham / rākṣasaḥ paramakruddho vāliputre nyapātayat // 6.086.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena vāmāṃsaphalake bhṛśaṃ pratyavapātitam / aṅgado mokṣayām āsa saroṣaḥ sa paraśvadham // 6.086.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vīro vajrasaṃkāśam aṅgado muṣṭim ātmanaḥ / saṃvartayan susaṃkruddhaḥ pitus tulyaparākramaḥ // 6.086.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasasya stanābhyāśe marmajño hṛdayaṃ prati / indrāśanisamasparśaṃ sa muṣṭiṃ vinyapātayat // 6.086.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena tasya nipātena rākṣasasya mahāmṛdhe / paphāla hṛdayaṃ cāśu sa papāta hato bhuvi // 6.086.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin nipatite bhūmau tat sainyaṃ saṃpracukṣubhe / abhavac ca mahān krodhaḥ samare rāvaṇasya tu // 6.086.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahodaramahāpārśvau hatau dṛṣṭvā tu rākṣasau / tasmiṃś ca nihate vīre virūpākṣe mahābale // 6.087.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āviveśa mahān krodho rāvaṇaṃ tu mahāmṛdhe / sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // 6.087.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatānām amātyānāṃ ruddhasya nagarasya ca / duḥkham eṣo 'paneṣyāmi hatvā tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // 6.087.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmavṛkṣaṃ raṇe hanmi sītāpuṣpaphalapradam / praśākhā yasya sugrīvo jāmbavān kumudo nalaḥ // 6.087.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa diśo daśa ghoṣeṇa rathasyātiratho mahān / nādayan prayayau tūrṇaṃ rāghavaṃ cābhyavartata // 6.087.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūritā tena śabdena sanadīgirikānanā / saṃcacāla mahī sarvā savarāhamṛgadvipā // 6.087.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāmasaṃ sumahāghoraṃ cakārāstraṃ sudāruṇam / nirdadāha kapīn sarvāṃs te prapetuḥ samantataḥ // 6.087.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāny anīkāny anekāni rāvaṇasya śarottamaiḥ / dṛṣṭvā bhagnāni śataśo rāghavaḥ paryavasthitaḥ // 6.087.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśa tato rāmaṃ tiṣṭhantam aparājitam / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā viṣṇunā vāsavaṃ yathā // 6.087.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ālikhantam ivākāśam avaṣṭabhya mahad dhanuḥ / padmapatraviśālākṣaṃ dīrghabāhum ariṃdamam // 6.087.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṃś ca raṇe bhagnān āpatantaṃ ca rāvaṇam / samīkṣya rāghavo hṛṣṭo madhye jagrāha kārmukam // 6.087.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visphārayitum ārebhe tataḥ sa dhanur uttamam / mahāvegaṃ mahānādaṃ nirbhindann iva medinīm // 6.087.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayoḥ śarapathaṃ prāpya rāvaṇo rājaputrayoḥ / sa babhūva yathā rāhuḥ samīpe śaśisūryayoḥ // 6.087.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya ca bāṇaughai rāmavispharitena ca / śabdena rākṣasās tena petuś ca śataśas tadā // 6.087.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam icchan prathamaṃ yoddhuṃ lakṣmaṇo niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / mumoca dhanur āyamya śarān agniśikhopamān // 6.087.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān muktamātrān ākāśe lakṣmaṇena dhanuṣmatā / bāṇān bāṇair mahātejā rāvaṇaḥ pratyavārayat // 6.087.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekam ekena bāṇena tribhis trīn daśabhir daśa / lakṣmaṇasya praciccheda darśayan pāṇilāghavam // 6.087.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyatikramya saumitriṃ rāvaṇaḥ samitiṃjayaḥ / āsasāda tato rāmaṃ sthitaṃ śailam ivācalam // 6.087.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa saṃkhye rāmam āsādya krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ / vyasṛjac charavarṇāni rāvaṇo rāghavopari // 6.087.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaradhārās tato rāmo rāvaṇasya dhanuścyutāḥ / dṛṣṭvaivāpatitāḥ śīghraṃ bhallāñ jagrāha satvaram // 6.087.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāñ śaraughāṃs tato bhallais tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda rāghavaḥ / dīpyamānān mahāvegān kruddhān āśīviṣān iva // 6.087.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavo rāvaṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ rāvaṇo rāghavaṃ tathā / anyonyaṃ vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ śarair abhivavarṣatuḥ // 6.087.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ceratuś ca ciraṃ citraṃ maṇḍalaṃ savyadakṣiṇam / bāṇavegān samudīkṣya samareṣv aparājitau // 6.087.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayor bhūtāni vitreṣur yugapat saṃprayudhyatoḥ / raudrayoḥ sāyakamucor yamāntakanikāśayoḥ // 6.087.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃtataṃ vividhair bāṇair babhūva gaganaṃ tadā / ghanair ivātapāpāye vidyunmālāsamākulaiḥ // 6.087.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gavākṣitam ivākāśaṃ babhūva śūravṛṣṭibhiḥ / mahāvegaiḥ sutīkṣṇāgrair gṛdhrapatraiḥ suvājitaiḥ // 6.087.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarāndhakāraṃ tau bhīmaṃ cakratuḥ paramaṃ tadā / gate 'staṃ tapane cāpi mahāmeghāv ivotthitau // 6.087.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhūva tumulaṃ yuddham anyonyavadhakāṅkṣiṇoḥ / anāsādyam acintyaṃ ca vṛtravāsavayor iva // 6.087.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhau hi parameṣvāsāv ubhau śastraviśāradau / ubhau cāstravidāṃ mukhyāv ubhau yuddhe viceratuḥ // 6.087.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhau hi yena vrajatas tena tena śarormayaḥ / ūrmayo vāyunā viddhā jagmuḥ sāgarayor iva // 6.087.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃsaktahastas tu rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ / nārācamālāṃ rāmasya lalāṭe pratyamuñcata // 6.087.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raudracāpaprayuktāṃ tāṃ nīlotpaladalaprabhām / śirasā dhārayan rāmo na vyathāṃ pratyapadyata // 6.087.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha mantrān api japan raudram astram udīrayan / śarān bhūyaḥ samādāya rāmaḥ krodhasamanvitaḥ // 6.087.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mumoca ca mahātejāś cāpam āyamya vīryavān / tāñ śarān rākṣasendrāya cikṣepācchinnasāyakaḥ // 6.087.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te mahāmeghasaṃkāśe kavace patitāḥ śarāḥ / avadhye rākṣasendrasya na vyathāṃ janayaṃs tadā // 6.087.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
punar evātha taṃ rāmo rathasthaṃ rākṣasādhipam / lalāṭe paramāstreṇa sarvāstrakuśalo 'bhinat // 6.087.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te bhittvā bāṇarūpāṇi pañcaśīrṣā ivoragāḥ / śvasanto viviśur bhūmiṃ rāvaṇapratikūlatāḥ // 6.087.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatya rāghavasyāstraṃ rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / āsuraṃ sumahāghoram anyad astraṃ samādade // 6.087.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhavyāghramukhāṃś cānyān kaṅkakāka mukhān api / gṛdhraśyenamukhāṃś cāpi sṛgālavadanāṃs tathā // 6.087.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īhāmṛgamuhāṃś cānyān vyāditāsyān bhayāvahān / pañcāsyāṃl lelihānāṃś ca sasarja niśitāñ śarān // 6.087.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarān kharamukhāṃś cānyān varāhamukhasaṃsthitān / śvānakukkuṭavaktrāṃś ca makarāśīviṣānanān // 6.087.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāṃś cānyāṃś ca māyābhiḥ sasarja niśitāñ śarān / rāmaṃ prati mahātejāḥ kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan // 6.087.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsureṇa samāviṣṭaḥ so 'streṇa raghunandanaḥ / sasarjāstraṃ mahotsāhaḥ pāvakaṃ pāvakopamaḥ // 6.087.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agnidīptamukhān bāṇāṃs tathā sūryamukhān api / candrārdhacandravaktrāṃś ca dhūmaketumukhān api // 6.087.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
grahanakṣatravarṇāṃś ca maholkā mukhasaṃsthitān / vidyujjihvopamāṃś cānyān sasarja niśitāñ śarān // 6.087.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te rāvaṇaśarā ghorā rāghavāstrasamāhatāḥ / vilayaṃ jagmur ākāśe jagmuś caiva sahasraśaḥ // 6.087.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad astraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā / hṛṣṭā nedus tataḥ sarve kapayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // 6.087.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin pratihate 'stre tu rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / krodhaṃ ca dviguṇaṃ cakre krodhāc cāstram anantaram // 6.088.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayena vihitaṃ raudram anyad astraṃ mahādyutiḥ / utsraṣṭuṃ rāvaṇo ghoraṃ rāghavāya pracakrame // 6.088.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śūlāni niścerur gadāś ca musalāni ca / kārmukād dīpyamānāni vajrasārāṇi sarvaśaḥ // 6.088.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kūṭamudgarapāśāś ca dīptāś cāśanayas tathā / niṣpetur vividhās tīkṣṇā vātā iva yugakṣaye // 6.088.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad astraṃ rāghavaḥ śrīmān uttamāstravidāṃ varaḥ / jaghāna paramāstreṇa gandharveṇa mahādyutiḥ // 6.088.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin pratihate 'stre tu rāghaveṇa mahātmanā / rāvaṇaḥ krodhatāmrākṣaḥ sauram astram udīrayat // 6.088.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataś cakrāṇi niṣpetur bhāsvarāṇi mahānti ca / kārmukād bhīmavegasya daśagrīvasya dhīmataḥ // 6.088.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair āsīd gaganaṃ dīptaṃ saṃpatadbhir itas tataḥ / patadbhiś ca diśo dīptaiś candrasūryagrahair iva // 6.088.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāni ciccheda bāṇaughaiś cakrāṇi tu sa rāghavaḥ / āyudhāni vicitrāṇi rāvaṇasya camūmukhe // 6.088.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad astraṃ tu hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / vivyādha daśabhir bāṇai rāmaṃ sarveṣu marmasu // 6.088.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa viddho daśabhir bāṇair mahākārmukaniḥsṛtaiḥ / rāvaṇena mahātejā na prākampata rāghavaḥ // 6.088.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vivyādha gātreṣu sarveṣu samitiṃjayaḥ / rāghavas tu susaṃkruddho rāvaṇaṃ bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ // 6.088.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare kruddho rāghavasyānujo balī / lakṣmaṇaḥ sāyakān sapta jagrāha paravīrahā // 6.088.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taiḥ sāyakair mahāvegai rāvaṇasya mahādyutiḥ / dhvajaṃ manuṣyaśīrṣaṃ tu tasya ciccheda naikadhā // 6.088.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāratheś cāpi bāṇena śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam / jahāra lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nairṛtasya mahābalaḥ // 6.088.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya bāṇaiś ca ciccheda dhanur gajakaropamam / lakṣmaṇo rākṣasendrasya pañcabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // 6.088.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlameghanibhāṃś cāsya sadaśvān parvatopamān / jaghānāplutya gadayā rāvaṇasya vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.088.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatāśvād vegavān vegād avaplutya mahārathāt / krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ bhrātaraṃ prati rāvaṇaḥ // 6.088.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śaktiṃ mahāśaktir dīptāṃ dīptāśanīm iva / vibhīṣaṇāya cikṣepa rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān // 6.088.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aprāptām eva tāṃ bāṇais tribhiś ciccheda lakṣmaṇaḥ / athodatiṣṭhat saṃnādo vānarāṇāṃ tadā raṇe // 6.088.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa papāta tridhā chinnā śaktiḥ kāñcanamālinī / savisphuliṅgā jvalitā maholkeva divaś cyutā // 6.088.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃbhāvitatarāṃ kālenāpi durāsadām / jagrāha vipulāṃ śaktiṃ dīpyamānāṃ svatejasā // 6.088.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā veginā balavatā rāvaṇena durātmanā / jajvāla sumahāghorā śakrāśanisamaprabhā // 6.088.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇas taṃ vibhīṣaṇam / prāṇasaṃśayam āpannaṃ tūrṇam evābhyapadyata // 6.088.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ vimokṣayituṃ vīraś cāpam āyamya lakṣmaṇaḥ / rāvaṇaṃ śaktihastaṃ taṃ śaravarṣair avākirat // 6.088.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kīryamāṇaḥ śaraugheṇa visṛṣṭtena mahātmanā / na prahartuṃ manaś cakre vimukhīkṛtavikramaḥ // 6.088.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mokṣitaṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇena sa rāvaṇaḥ / lakṣmaṇābhimukhas tiṣṭhann idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 6.088.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
