mokṣitas te balaślāghin yasmād evaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ / vimucya rākṣasaṃ śaktis tvayīyaṃ vinipātyate // 6.088.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā te hṛdayaṃ bhittvā śaktir lohitalakṣaṇā / madbāhuparighotsṛṣṭā prāṇān ādāya yāsyati // 6.088.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam uktvā tāṃ śaktim aṣṭaghaṇṭāṃ mahāsvanām / mayena māyāvihitām amoghāṃ śatrughātinīm // 6.088.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇāya samuddiśya jvalantīm iva tejasā / rāvaṇaḥ paramakruddhaś cikṣepa ca nanāda ca // 6.088.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā kṣiptā bhīmavegena śakrāśanisamasvanā / śaktir abhyapatad vegāl lakṣmaṇaṃ raṇamūrdhani // 6.088.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām anuvyāharac chaktim āpatantīṃ sa rāghavaḥ / svastyas tu lakṣmaṇāyeti moghā bhava hatodyamā // 6.088.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nyapatat sā mahāvegā lakṣmaṇasya mahorasi / jihvevoragarājasya dīpyamānā mahādyutiḥ // 6.088.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāvaṇavegena sudūram avagāḍhayā / śaktyā nirbhinnahṛdayaḥ papāta bhuvi lakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.088.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadavasthaṃ samīpastho lakṣmaṇaṃ prekṣya rāghavaḥ / bhrātṛsnehān mahātejā viṣaṇṇahṛdayo 'bhavat // 6.088.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa muhūrtam anudhyāya bāṣpavyākulalocanaḥ / babhūva saṃrabdhataro yugānta iva pāvakaḥ // 6.088.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na viṣādasya kālo 'yam iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ / cakre sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhe dhṛtaḥ // 6.088.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśa tato rāmaḥ śaktyā bhinnaṃ mahāhave / lakṣmaṇaṃ rudhirādigdhaṃ sapannagam ivācalam // 6.088.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām api prahitāṃ śaktiṃ rāvaṇena balīyasā / yatnatas te hariśreṣṭhā na śekur avamarditum // 6.088.040.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arditāś caiva bāṇaughaiḥ kṣiprahastena rakṣasā // 6.088.040.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitriṃ sā vinirbhidya praviṣṭā dharaṇītalam / tāṃ karābhyāṃ parāmṛśya rāmaḥ śaktiṃ bhayāvahām // 6.088.041.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhañja samare kruddho balavad vicakarṣa ca // 6.088.041.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya niṣkarṣataḥ śaktiṃ rāvaṇena balīyasā / śarāḥ sarveṣu gātreṣu pātitā marmabhedinaḥ // 6.088.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acintayitvā tān bāṇān samāśliṣyā ca lakṣmaṇam / abravīc ca hanūmantaṃ sugrīvaṃ caiva rāghavaḥ // 6.088.043.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇaṃ parivāryeha tiṣṭhadhvaṃ vānarottamāḥ // 6.088.043.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parākramasya kālo 'yaṃ saṃprāpto me cirepsitaḥ / pāpātmāyaṃ daśagrīvo vadhyatāṃ pāpaniścayaḥ // 6.088.044.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāṅkṣitaḥ stokakasyeva gharmānte meghadarśanam // 6.088.044.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin muhūrte nacirāt satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi vaḥ / arāvaṇam arāmaṃ vā jagad drakṣyatha vānarāḥ // 6.088.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyanāśaṃ vane vāsaṃ daṇḍake paridhāvanam / vaidehyāś ca parāmarśaṃ rakṣobhiś ca samāgamam // 6.088.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahad ghoraṃ kleśaṃ ca nirayopamam / adya sarvam ahaṃ tyakṣye hatvā taṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe // 6.088.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadarthaṃ vānaraṃ sainyaṃ samānītam idaṃ mayā / sugrīvaś ca kṛto rājye nihatvā vālinaṃ raṇe // 6.088.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadarthaṃ sāgaraḥ krāntaḥ setur baddhaś ca sāgare / so 'yam adya raṇe pāpaś cakṣurviṣayam āgataḥ // 6.088.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cakṣurviṣayam āgamya nāyaṃ jīvitum arhati / dṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭiviṣasyeva sarpasya mama rāvaṇaḥ // 6.088.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svasthāḥ paśyata durdharṣā yuddhaṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ / āsīnāḥ parvatāgreṣu mamedaṃ rāvaṇasya ca // 6.088.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya rāmasya rāmatvaṃ paśyantu mama saṃyuge / trayo lokāḥ sagandharvāḥ sadevāḥ sarṣicāraṇāḥ // 6.088.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya karma kariṣyāmi yal lokāḥ sacarācarāḥ / sadevāḥ kathayiṣyanti yāvad bhūmir dhariṣyati // 6.088.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā śitair bāṇais taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ / ājaghāna daśagrīvaṃ raṇe rāmaḥ samāhitaḥ // 6.088.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha pradīptair nārācair musalaiś cāpi rāvaṇaḥ / abhyavarṣat tadā rāmaṃ dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ // 6.088.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmarāvaṇamuktānām anyonyam abhinighnatām / śarāṇāṃ ca śarāṇāṃ ca babhūva tumulaḥ svanaḥ // 6.088.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te bhinnāś ca vikīrṇāś ca rāmarāvaṇayoḥ śarāḥ / antarikṣāt pradīptāgrā nipetur dharaṇītale // 6.088.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayor jyātalanirghoṣo rāmarāvaṇayor mahān / trāsanaḥ sarvabūtānāṃ sa babhūvādbhutopamaḥ // 6.088.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kīryamāṇaḥ śarajālavṛṣṭibhir; mahātmanā dīptadhanuṣmatārditaḥ / bhayāt pradudrāva sametya rāvaṇo; yathānilenābhihato balāhakaḥ // 6.088.059	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa dattvā tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ / visṛjan eva bāṇaughān suṣeṇaṃ vākyam abravīt // 6.089.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa rāvaṇavegena lakṣmaṇaḥ patitaḥ kṣitau / sarpavad veṣṭate vīro mama śokam udīrayan // 6.089.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śoṇitārdram imaṃ vīraṃ prāṇair iṣṭataraṃ mama / paśyato mama kā śaktir yoddhuṃ paryākulātmanaḥ // 6.089.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ sa samaraślāghī bhrātā me śubhalakṣaṇaḥ / yadi pañcatvam āpannaḥ prāṇair me kiṃ sukhena vā // 6.089.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lajjatīva hi me vīryaṃ bhraśyatīva karād dhanuḥ / sāyakā vyavasīdanti dṛṣṭir bāṣpavaśaṃ gatā // 6.089.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cintā me vardhate tīvrā mumūrṣā copajāyate // 6.089.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātaraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena durātmanā / paraṃ viṣādam āpanno vilalāpākulendriyaḥ // 6.089.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi yuddhena me kāryaṃ naiva prāṇair na sītayā / bhrātaraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ raṇapāṃsuṣu // 6.089.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ me rājyena kiṃ prāṇair yuddhe kāryaṃ na vidyate / yatrāyaṃ nihataḥ śete raṇamūrdhani lakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.089.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmam āśvāsayan vīraḥ suṣeṇo vākyam abravīt / na mṛto 'yaṃ mahābāhur lakṣmaṇo lakṣmivardhanaḥ // 6.089.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāsya vikṛtaṃ vaktraṃ nāpi śyāmaṃ na niṣprabham / suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca mukham asyābhilakṣyate // 6.089.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padmaraktatalau hastau suprasanne ca locane / evaṃ na vidyate rūpaṃ gatāsūnāṃ viśāṃ pate // 6.089.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃ viṣādaṃ kṛtvā vīra saprāṇo 'yam ariṃdama // 6.089.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ākhyāsyate prasuptasya srastagātrasya bhūtale / socchvāsaṃ hṛdayaṃ vīra kampamānaṃ muhur muhuḥ // 6.089.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu vākyajñaḥ suṣeṇo rāghavaṃ vacaḥ / samīpastham uvācedaṃ hanūmantam abhitvaran // 6.089.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumya śīghram ito gatvā śailam oṣadhiparvatam / pūrvaṃ hi kathito yo 'sau vīra jāmbavatā śubhaḥ // 6.089.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dakṣiṇe śikhare tasya jātām oṣadhim ānaya / viśalyakaraṇī nāma viśalyakaraṇīṃ śubhām // 6.089.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sauvarṇakaraṇīṃ cāpi tathā saṃjīvanīm api / saṃdhānakaraṇīṃ cāpi gatvā śīghram ihānaya // 6.089.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃjīvanārthaṃ vīrasya lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ // 6.089.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evam ukto hanumān gatvā cauṣadhiparvatam / cintām abhyagamac chrīmān ajānaṃs tā mahauṣadhīḥ // 6.089.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā māruter amitaujasaḥ / idam eva gamiṣyāmi gṛhītvā śikharaṃ gireḥ // 6.089.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agṛhya yadi gacchāmi viśalyakaraṇīm aham / kālātyayena doṣaḥ syād vaiklavyaṃ ca mahad bhavet // 6.089.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti saṃcintya hanumān gatvā kṣipraṃ mahābalaḥ / utpapāta gṛhītvā tu hanūmāñ śikharaṃ gireḥ // 6.089.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
oṣadhīr nāvagachāmi tā ahaṃ haripuṃgava / tad idaṃ śikharaṃ kṛtsnaṃ gires tasyāhṛtaṃ mayā // 6.089.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ kathayamānaṃ taṃ praśasya pavanātmajam / suṣeṇo vānaraśreṣṭho jagrāhotpāṭya cauṣadhīḥ // 6.089.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃkṣodayitvā tām oṣadhiṃ vānarottamaḥ / lakṣmaṇasya dadau nastaḥ suṣeṇaḥ sumahādyutiḥ // 6.089.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saśalyaḥ sa samāghrāya lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā / viśalyo virujaḥ śīghram udatiṣṭhan mahītalāt // 6.089.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samutthitaṃ te harayo bhūtalāt prekṣya lakṣmaṇam / sādhu sādhv iti suprītāḥ suṣeṇaṃ pratyapūjayan // 6.089.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ehy ehīty abravīd rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ paravīrahā / sasvaje snehagāḍhaṃ ca bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ // 6.089.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca pariṣvajya saumitriṃ rāghavas tadā / diṣṭyā tvāṃ vīra paśyāmi maraṇāt punar āgatam // 6.089.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi me jīvitenārthaḥ sītayā ca jayena vā / ko hi me jīvitenārthas tvayi pañcatvam āgate // 6.089.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ vadatas tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ / khinnaḥ śithilayā vācā lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt // 6.089.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ pratijñāṃ pratijñāya purā satyaparākrama / laghuḥ kaś cid ivāsattvo naivaṃ vaktum ihārhasi // 6.089.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na pratijñāṃ hi kurvanti vitathāṃ sādhavo 'nagha / lakṣmaṇaṃ hi mahat tv asya pratijñāparipālanam // 6.089.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nairāśyam upagantuṃ te tad alaṃ matkṛte 'nagha / vadhena rāvaṇasyādya pratijñām anupālaya // 6.089.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na jīvan yāsyate śatrus tava bāṇapathaṃ gataḥ / nardatas tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrasya siṃhasyeva mahāgajaḥ // 6.089.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tu vadham icchāmi śīghram asya durātmanaḥ / yāvad astaṃ na yāty eṣa kṛtakarmā divākaraḥ // 6.089.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇena tu tad vākyam uktaṃ śrutvā sa rāghavaḥ / rāvaṇāya śarān ghorān visasarja camūmukhe // 6.090.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśagrīvo rathasthas tu rāmaṃ vajropamaiḥ śaraiḥ / ājaghāna mahāghorair dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ // 6.090.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīptapāvakasaṃkāśaiḥ śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ / nirbibheda raṇe rāmo daśagrīvaṃ samāhitaḥ // 6.090.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūmisthitasya rāmasya rathasthasya ca rakṣasaḥ / na samaṃ yuddham ity āhur devagandharvadānavāḥ // 6.090.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kāñcanacitrāṅgaḥ kiṃkiṇīśatabhūṣitaḥ / taruṇādityasaṃkāśo vaidūryamayakūbaraḥ // 6.090.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadaśvaiḥ kāñcanāpīḍair yuktaḥ śvetaprakīrṇakaiḥ / haribhiḥ sūryasaṃkāśair hemajālavibhūṣitaiḥ // 6.090.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rukmaveṇudhvajaḥ śrīmān devarājaratho varaḥ / abhyavartata kākutstham avatīrya triviṣṭapāt // 6.090.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ sapratodo rathe sthitaḥ / prāñjalir mātalir vākyaṃ sahasrākṣasya sārathiḥ // 6.090.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahasrākṣeṇa kākutstha ratho 'yaṃ vijayāya te / dattas tava mahāsattva śrīmāñ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ // 6.090.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idam aindraṃ mahaccāpaṃ kavacaṃ cāgnisaṃnibham / śarāś cādityasaṃkāśāḥ śaktiś ca vimalā śitāḥ // 6.090.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āruhyemaṃ rathaṃ vīra rākṣasaṃ jahi rāvaṇam / mayā sārathinā rāma mahendra iva dānavān // 6.090.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktaḥ sa parikramya rathaṃ tam abhivādya ca / āruroha tadā rāmo lokāṃl lakṣmyā virājayan // 6.090.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad babhūvādbhutaṃ yuddhaṃ dvairathaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / rāmasya ca mahābāho rāvaṇasya ca rakṣasaḥ // 6.090.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gāndharveṇa gāndharvaṃ daivaṃ daivena rāghavaḥ / astraṃ rākṣasarājasya jaghāna paramāstravit // 6.090.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
astraṃ tu paramaṃ ghoraṃ rākṣasaṃ rākasādhipa / sasarja paramakruddhaḥ punar eva niśācaraḥ // 6.090.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te rāvaṇadhanurmuktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ / abhyavartanta kākutsthaṃ sarpā bhūtvā mahāviṣāḥ // 6.090.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te dīptavadanā dīptaṃ vamanto jvalanaṃ mukhaiḥ / rāmam evābhyavartanta vyāditāsyā bhayānakāḥ // 6.090.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair vāsukisamasparśair dīptabhogair mahāviṣaiḥ / diśaś ca saṃtatāḥ sarvāḥ pradiśaś ca samāvṛtāḥ // 6.090.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān dṛṣṭvā pannagān rāmaḥ samāpatata āhave / astraṃ gārutmataṃ ghoraṃ prāduścakre bhayāvaham // 6.090.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te rāghavadhanurmuktā rukmapuṅkhāḥ śikhiprabhāḥ / suparṇāḥ kāñcanā bhūtvā viceruḥ sarpaśatravaḥ // 6.090.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tān sarvāñ śarāñ jaghnuḥ sarparūpān mahājavān / suparṇarūpā rāmasya viśikhāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // 6.090.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
astre pratihate kruddho rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / abhyavarṣat tadā rāmaṃ ghorābhiḥ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ // 6.090.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śarasahasreṇa rāmam akliṣṭakāriṇam / ardayitvā śaraugheṇa mātaliṃ pratyavidhyata // 6.090.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pātayitvā rathopasthe rathāt ketuṃ ca kāñcanam / aindrān abhijaghānāśvāñ śarajālena rāvaṇaḥ // 6.090.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣedur devagandharvā dānavāś cāraṇaiḥ saha / rāmam ārtaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ // 6.090.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyathitā vānarendrāś ca babhūvuḥ savibhīṣaṇāḥ / rāmacandramasaṃ dṛṣṭvā grastaṃ rāvaṇarāhuṇā // 6.090.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prājāpatyaṃ ca nakṣatraṃ rohiṇīṃ śaśinaḥ priyām / samākramya budhas tasthau prajānām aśubhāvahaḥ // 6.090.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadhūmaparivṛttormiḥ prajvalann iva sāgaraḥ / utpapāta tadā kruddhaḥ spṛśann iva divākaram // 6.090.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śastravarṇaḥ suparuṣo mandaraśmir divākaraḥ / adṛśyata kabandhāṅgaḥ saṃsakto dhūmaketunā // 6.090.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kosalānāṃ ca nakṣatraṃ vyaktam indrāgnidaivatam / ākramyāṅgārakas tasthau viśākhām api cāmbare // 6.090.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśāsyo viṃśatibhujaḥ pragṛhītaśarāsanaḥ / adṛśyata daśagrīvo maināka iva parvataḥ // 6.090.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirasyamāno rāmas tu daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā / nāśakad abhisaṃdhātuṃ sāyakān raṇamūrdhani // 6.090.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kṛtvā bhrukuṭīṃ kruddhaḥ kiṃ cit saṃraktalocanaḥ / jagāma sumahākrodhaṃ nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā // 6.090.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya kruddhasya vadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmasya dhīmataḥ / sarvabhūtāni vitreṣuḥ prākampata ca medinī // 6.091.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhaśārdūlavāñ śailaḥ saṃcacālācaladrumaḥ / babhūva cāpi kṣubhitaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // 6.091.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
khagāś ca kharanirghoṣā gagane paruṣasvanāḥ / autpātikā vinardantaḥ samantāt paricakramuḥ // 6.091.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā susaṃkruddham utpātāṃś ca sudāruṇān / vitreṣuḥ sarvabhūtāni rāvaṇasyāviśad bhayam // 6.091.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimānasthās tadā devā gandharvāś ca mahoragāḥ / ṛṣidānavadaityāś ca garutmantaś ca khecarāḥ // 6.091.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadṛśus te tadā yuddhaṃ lokasaṃvartasaṃsthitam / nānāpraharaṇair bhīmaiḥ śūrayoḥ saṃprayudhyatoḥ // 6.091.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūcuḥ surāsurāḥ sarve tadā vigraham āgatāḥ / prekṣamāṇā mahāyuddhaṃ vākyaṃ bhaktyā prahṛṣṭavat // 6.091.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśagrīvaṃ jayety āhur asurāḥ samavasthitāḥ / devā rāmam athocus te tvaṃ jayeti punaḥ punaḥ // 6.091.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare krodhād rāghavasya sa rāvaṇaḥ / prahartukāmo duṣṭātmā spṛśan praharaṇaṃ mahat // 6.091.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajrasāraṃ mahānādaṃ sarvaśatrunibarhaṇam / śailaśṛṅganibhaiḥ kūṭaiś citaṃ dṛṣṭibhayāvaham // 6.091.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadhūmam iva tīkṣṇāgraṃ yugāntāgnicayopamam / atiraudram anāsādyaṃ kālenāpi durāsadam // 6.091.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trāsanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dāraṇaṃ bhedanaṃ tathā / pradīpta iva roṣeṇa śūlaṃ jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ // 6.091.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chūlaṃ paramakruddho madhye jagrāha vīryavān / anekaiḥ samare śūrai rākṣasaiḥ parivāritaḥ // 6.091.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samudyamya mahākāyo nanāda yudhi bhairavam / saṃraktanayano roṣāt svasainyam abhiharṣayan // 6.091.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca diśaś ca pradiśas tathā / prākampayat tadā śabdo rākṣasendrasya dāruṇaḥ // 6.091.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atinādasya nādena tena tasya durātmanaḥ / sarvabhūtāni vitreṣuḥ sāgaraś ca pracukṣubhe // 6.091.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gṛhītvā mahāvīryaḥ śūlaṃ tad rāvaṇo mahat / vinadya sumahānādaṃ rāmaṃ paruṣam abravīt // 6.091.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūlo 'yaṃ vajrasāras te rāma roṣān mayodyataḥ / tava bhrātṛsahāyasya sadyaḥ prāṇān hariṣyati // 6.091.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣasām adya śūrāṇāṃ nihatānāṃ camūmukhe / tvāṃ nihatya raṇaślāghin karomi tarasā samam // 6.091.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tiṣṭhedānīṃ nihanmi tvām eṣa śūlena rāghava / evam uktvā sa cikṣepa tac chūlaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ // 6.091.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āpatantaṃ śaraugheṇa vārayām āsa rāghavaḥ / utpatantaṃ yugāntāgniṃ jalaughair iva vāsavaḥ // 6.091.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirdadāha sa tān bāṇān rāmakārmukaniḥsṛtān / rāvaṇasya mahāśūlaḥ pataṃgān iva pāvakaḥ // 6.091.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān dṛṣṭvā bhasmasād bhūtāñ śūlasaṃsparśacūrṇitān / sāyakān antarikṣasthān rāghavaḥ krodham āharat // 6.091.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tāṃ mātalinānītāṃ śaktiṃ vāsavanirmitām / jagrāha paramakruddho rāghavo raghunandanaḥ // 6.091.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tolitā balavatā śaktir ghaṇṭākṛtasvanā / nabhaḥ prajvālayām āsa yugāntoklena saprabhā // 6.091.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā kṣiptā rākṣasendrasya tasmiñ śūle papāta ha / bhinnaḥ śaktyā mahāñ śūlo nipapāta gatadyutiḥ // 6.091.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirbibheda tato bāṇair hayān asya mahājavān / rāmas tīkṣṇair mahāvegair vajrakalpaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // 6.091.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirbibhedorasi tadā rāvaṇaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / rāghavaḥ paramāyatto lalāṭe patribhis tribhiḥ // 6.091.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śarair bhinnasarvāṅgo gātraprasruta śoṇitaḥ / rākṣasendraḥ samūhasthaḥ phullāśoka ivābabhau // 6.091.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmabāṇair atividdhagātro; niśācarendraḥ kṣatajārdragātraḥ / jagāma khedaṃ ca samājamadhye; krodhaṃ ca cakre subhṛśaṃ tadānīm // 6.091.030	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
sa tu tena tadā krodhāt kākutsthenārdito raṇe / rāvaṇaḥ samaraślāghī mahākrodham upāgamat // 6.092.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dīptanayano roṣāc cāpam āyamya vīryavān / abhyardayat susaṃkruddho rāghavaṃ paramāhave // 6.092.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṇadhārā sahasrais tu sa toyada ivāmbarāt / rāghavaṃ rāvaṇo bāṇais taṭākam iva pūrayat // 6.092.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūritaḥ śarajālena dhanurmuktena saṃyuge / mahāgirir ivākampyaḥ kākustho na prakampate // 6.092.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śaraiḥ śarajālāni vārayan samare sthitaḥ / gabhastīn iva sūryasya pratijagrāha vīryavān // 6.092.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi kṣiprahasto niśācaraḥ / nijaghānorasi kruddho rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ // 6.092.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śoṇita samādigdhaḥ samare lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / dṛṣṭaḥ phulla ivāraṇye sumahān kiṃśukadrumaḥ // 6.092.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarābhighātasaṃrabdhaḥ so 'pi jagrāha sāyakān / kākutsthaḥ sumahātejā yugāntādityavarcasaḥ // 6.092.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'nyonyaṃ susaṃrabdhāv ubhau tau rāmarāvaṇau / śarāndhakāre samare nopālakṣayatāṃ tadā // 6.092.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ krodhasamāviṣṭo rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / uvāca rāvaṇaṃ vīraḥ prahasya paruṣaṃ vacaḥ // 6.092.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama bhāryā janasthānād ajñānād rākṣasādhama / hṛtā te vivaśā yasmāt tasmāt tvaṃ nāsi vīryavān // 6.092.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā virahitāṃ dīnāṃ vartamānāṃ mahāvane / vaidehīṃ prasabhaṃ hṛtvā śūro 'ham iti manyase // 6.092.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
strīṣu śūra vināthāsu paradārābhimarśake / kṛtvā kāpuruṣaṃ karma śūro 'ham iti manyase // 6.092.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhinnamaryāda nirlajja cāritreṣv anavasthita / darpān mṛtyum upādāya śūro 'ham iti manyase // 6.092.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūreṇa dhanadabhrātrā balaiḥ samuditena ca / ślāghanīyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ karma mahat tvayā // 6.092.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utsekenābhipannasya garhitasyāhitasya ca / karmaṇaḥ prāpnuhīdānīṃ tasyādya sumahat phalam // 6.092.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūro 'ham iti cātmānam avagacchasi durmate / naiva lajjāsti te sītāṃ coravad vyapakarṣataḥ // 6.092.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi matsaṃnidhau sītā dharṣitā syāt tvayā balāt / bhrātaraṃ tu kharaṃ paśyes tadā matsāyakair hataḥ // 6.092.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyāsi mama duṣṭātmaṃś cakṣurviṣayam āgataḥ / adya tvāṃ sāyakais tīkṣṇair nayāmi yamasādanam // 6.092.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya te maccharaiś chinnaṃ śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam / kravyādā vyapakarṣantu vikīrṇaṃ raṇapāṃsuṣu // 6.092.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nipatyorasi gṛdhrās te kṣitau kṣiptasya rāvaṇa / pibantu rudhiraṃ tarṣād bāṇaśalyāntarothitam // 6.092.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya madbāṇābhinnasya gatāsoḥ patitasya te / karṣantv antrāṇi patagā garutmanta ivoragān // 6.092.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ sa vadan vīro rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ / rākṣasendraṃ samīpasthaṃ śaravarṣair avākirat // 6.092.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
babhūva dviguṇaṃ vīryaṃ balaṃ harṣaś ca saṃyuge / rāmasyāstrabalaṃ caiva śatror nidhanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 6.092.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prādurbabhūvur astrāṇi sarvāṇi viditātmanaḥ / praharṣāc ca mahātejāḥ śīghrahastataro 'bhavat // 6.092.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śubhāny etāni cihnāni vijñāyātmagatāni saḥ / bhūya evārdayad rāmo rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasāntakṛt // 6.092.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harīṇāṃ cāśmanikaraiḥ śaravarṣaiś ca rāghavāt / hanyamāno daśagrīvo vighūrṇahṛdayo 'bhavat // 6.092.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā ca śastraṃ nārebhe na vyakarṣac charāsanam / nāsya pratyakarod vīryaṃ viklavenāntarātmanā // 6.092.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣiptāś cāpi śarās tena śastrāṇi vividhāni ca / na raṇārthāya vartante mṛtyukāle 'bhivartataḥ // 6.092.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūtas tu rathanetāsya tadavasthaṃ nirīkṣya tam / śanair yuddhād asaṃbhānto rathaṃ tasyāpavāhayat // 6.092.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu mohāt susaṃkruddhaḥ kṛtāntabalacoditaḥ / krodhasaṃraktanayano rāvaṇo sūtam abravīt // 6.093.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hīnavīryam ivāśaktaṃ pauruṣeṇa vivarjitam / bhīruṃ laghum ivāsattvaṃ vihīnam iva tejasā // 6.093.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimuktam iva māyābhir astrair iva bahiṣkṛtam / mām avajñāya durbuddhe svayā buddhyā viceṣṭase // 6.093.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kimarthaṃ mām avajñāya macchandam anavekṣya ca / tvayā śatrusamakṣaṃ me ratho 'yam apavāhitaḥ // 6.093.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayādya hi mamānārya cirakālasamārjitam / yaśo vīryaṃ ca tejaś ca pratyayaś ca vināśitha // 6.093.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatroḥ prakhyātavīryasya rañjanīyasya vikramaiḥ / paśyato yuddhalubdho 'haṃ kṛtaḥ kāpuruṣas tvayā // 6.093.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tvaṃ ratham imaṃ mohān na codvahasi durmate / satyo 'yaṃ pratitarko me pareṇa tvam upaskṛtaḥ // 6.093.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hīdaṃ vidyate karma suhṛdo hitakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / ripūṇāṃ sadṛśaṃ caitan na tvayaitat svanuṣṭhitam // 6.093.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ yāvan nāpaiti me ripuḥ / yadi vāpy uṣito 'si tvaṃ smaryante yadi vā guṇāḥ // 6.093.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ paruṣam uktas tu hitabuddhir abuddhinā / abravīd rāvaṇaṃ sūto hitaṃ sānunayaṃ vacaḥ // 6.093.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na bhīto 'smi na mūḍho 'smi nopajapto 'smi śatrubhiḥ / na pramatto na niḥsneho vismṛtā na ca satkriyā // 6.093.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā tu hitakāmena yaśaś ca parirakṣatā / snehapraskannamanasā priyam ity apriyaṃ kṛtam // 6.093.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāsminn arthe mahārāja tvaṃ māṃ priyahite ratam / kaś cil laghur ivānāryo doṣato gantum arhasi // 6.093.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi yannimittaṃ mayā rathaḥ / nadīvega ivāmbhobhiḥ saṃyuge vinivartitaḥ // 6.093.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śramaṃ tavāvagacchāmi mahatā raṇakarmaṇā / na hi te vīra saumukhyaṃ praharṣaṃ vopadhāraye // 6.093.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathodvahanakhinnāś ca ta ime rathavājinaḥ / dīnā gharmapariśrāntā gāvo varṣahatā iva // 6.093.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nimittāni ca bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yāni prādurbhavanti naḥ / teṣu teṣv abhipanneṣu lakṣayāmy apradakṣiṇam // 6.093.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
deśakālau ca vijñeyau lakṣmaṇānīṅgitāni ca / dainyaṃ harṣaś ca khedaś ca rathinaś ca balābalam // 6.093.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthalanimnāni bhūmeś ca samāni viṣamāṇi ca / yuddhakālaś ca vijñeyaḥ parasyāntaradarśanam // 6.093.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upayānāpayāne ca sthānaṃ pratyapasarpaṇam / sarvam etad rathasthena jñeyaṃ rathakuṭumbinā // 6.093.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava viśrāmahetos tu tathaiṣāṃ rathavājinām / raudraṃ varjayatā khedaṃ kṣamaṃ kṛtam idaṃ mayā // 6.093.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na mayā svecchayā vīra ratho 'yam apavāhitaḥ / bhartṛsnehaparītena mayedaṃ yatkṛtaṃ vibho // 6.093.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājñāpaya yathātattvaṃ vakṣyasy ariniṣūdana / tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ vīraṃ gatānṛṇyena cetasā // 6.093.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃtuṣṭas tena vākyena rāvaṇas tasya sāratheḥ / praśasyainaṃ bahuvidhaṃ yuddhalubdho 'bravīd idam // 6.093.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathaṃ śīghram imaṃ sūta rāghavābhimukhaṃ kuru / nāhatvā samare śatrūn nivartiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ // 6.093.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tatas tuṣṭo rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / dadau tasya śubhaṃ hy ekaṃ hastābharaṇam uttamam // 6.093.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato drutaṃ rāvaṇavākyacoditaḥ; pracodayām āsa hayān sa sārathiḥ / sa rākṣasendrasya tato mahārathaḥ; kṣaṇena rāmasya raṇāgrato 'bhavat // 6.093.027	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tam āpatantaṃ sahasā svanavantaṃ mahādhvajam / rathaṃ rākṣasarājasya nararājo dadarśa ha // 6.094.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛṣṇavājisamāyuktaṃ yuktaṃ raudreṇa varcasā / taḍitpatākāgahanaṃ darśitendrāyudhāyudham // 6.094.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaradhārā vimuñcantaṃ dhārāsāram ivānbudam // 6.094.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā meghasaṃkāśam āpatantaṃ rathaṃ ripoḥ / girer vajrābhimṛṣṭasya dīryataḥ sadṛśasvanam // 6.094.003.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca mātaliṃ rāmaḥ sahasrākṣasya sārathim // 6.094.003.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātale paśya saṃrabdham āpatantaṃ rathaṃ ripoḥ / yathāpasavyaṃ patatā vegena mahatā punaḥ // 6.094.004.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samare hantum ātmānaṃ tathānena kṛtā matiḥ // 6.094.004.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad apramādam ātiṣṭha pratyudgaccha rathaṃ ripoḥ / vidhvaṃsayitum icchāmi vāyur megham ivotthitam // 6.094.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aviklavam asaṃbhrāntam avyagrahṛdayekṣaṇam / raśmisaṃcāraniyataṃ pracodaya rathaṃ drutam // 6.094.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmaṃ na tvaṃ samādheyaḥ puraṃdararathocitaḥ / yuyutsur aham ekāgraḥ smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye // 6.094.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parituṣṭaḥ sa rāmasya tena vākyena mātaliḥ / pracodayām āsa rathaṃ surasārathisattamaḥ // 6.094.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apasavyaṃ tataḥ kurvan rāvaṇasya mahāratham / cakrotkṣiptena rajasā rāvaṇaṃ vyavadhūnayat // 6.094.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvas tāmravisphāritekṣaṇaḥ / rathapratimukhaṃ rāmaṃ sāyakair avadhūnayat // 6.094.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharṣaṇāmarṣito rāmo dhairyaṃ roṣeṇa laṅghayan / jagrāha sumahāvegam aindraṃ yudhi śarāsanam // 6.094.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarāṃś ca sumahātejāḥ sūryaraśmisamaprabhān // 6.094.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad upoḍhaṃ mahad yuddham anyonyavadhakāṅkṣiṇoḥ / parasparābhimukhayor dṛptayor iva siṃhayoḥ // 6.094.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / samīyur dvairathaṃ draṣṭuṃ rāvaṇakṣayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 6.094.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samutpetur athotpātā dāruṇā lomaharṣaṇāḥ / rāvaṇasya vināśāya rāghavasya jayāya ca // 6.094.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devo rāvaṇasya rathopari / vātā maṇḍalinas tīvrā apasavyaṃ pracakramuḥ // 6.094.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahad gṛdhrakulaṃ cāsya bhramamāṇaṃ nabhastale / yena yena ratho yāti tena tena pradhāvati // 6.094.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃdhyayā cāvṛtā laṅkā japāpuṣpanikāśayā / dṛśyate saṃpradīteva divase 'pi vasuṃdharā // 6.094.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sanirghātā maholkāś ca saṃpracetur mahāsvanāḥ / viṣādayantyo rakṣāṃsi rāvaṇasya tadāhitāḥ // 6.094.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaś ca yatas tatra pracacāla vasuṃdharā / rakṣasāṃ ca praharatāṃ gṛhītā iva bāhavaḥ // 6.094.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ patitāḥ sūryaraśmayaḥ / dṛśyante rāvaṇasyāṅge parvatasyeva dhātavaḥ // 6.094.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛdhrair anugatāś cāsya vamantyo jvalanaṃ mukhaiḥ / praṇedur mukham īkṣantyaḥ saṃrabdham aśivaṃ śivāḥ // 6.094.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratikūlaṃ vavau vāyū raṇe pāṃsūn samutkiran / tasya rākṣasarājasya kurvan dṛṣṭivilopanam // 6.094.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nipetur indrāśanayaḥ sainye cāsya samantataḥ / durviṣahya svanā ghorā vinā jaladharasvanam // 6.094.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diśaś ca pradiśaḥ sarvā babhūvus timirāvṛtāḥ / pāṃsuvarṣeṇa mahatā durdarśaṃ ca nabho 'bhavat // 6.094.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kurvantyaḥ kalahaṃ ghoraṃ sārikās tadrathaṃ prati / nipetuḥ śataśas tatra dāruṇā dāruṇasvanāḥ // 6.094.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaghanebhyaḥ sphuliṅgāṃś ca netrebhyo 'śrūṇi saṃtatam / mumucus tasya turagās tulyam agniṃ ca vāri ca // 6.094.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ prakārā bahavaḥ samutpātā bhayāvahāḥ / rāvaṇasya vināśāya dāruṇāḥ saṃprajajñire // 6.094.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasyāpi nimittāni saumyāni ca śivāni ca / babhūvur jayaśaṃsīni prādurbhūtāni sarvaśaḥ // 6.094.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nirīkṣyātmagatāni rāghavo; raṇe nimittāni nimittakovidaḥ / jagāma harṣaṃ ca parāṃ ca nirvṛtiṃ; cakāra yuddhe 'bhyadhikaṃ ca vikramam // 6.094.029	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ pravṛttaṃ sukrūraṃ rāmarāvaṇayos tadā / sumahad dvairathaṃ yuddhaṃ sarvalokabhayāvaham // 6.095.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rākṣasasainyaṃ ca harīṇāṃ ca mahad balam / pragṛhītapraharaṇaṃ niśceṣṭaṃ samatiṣṭhata // 6.095.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃprayuddhau tato dṛṣṭvā balavan nararākṣasau / vyākṣiptahṛdayāḥ sarve paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ // 6.095.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāpraharaṇair vyagrair bhujair vismitabuddhayaḥ / tasthuḥ prekṣya ca saṃgrāmaṃ nābhijaghnuḥ parasparam // 6.095.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣasāṃ rāvaṇaṃ cāpi vānarāṇāṃ ca rāghavam / paśyatāṃ vismitākṣāṇāṃ sainyaṃ citram ivābabhau // 6.095.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tu tatra nimittāni dṛṣṭvā rāghavarāvaṇau / kṛtabuddhī sthirāmarṣau yuyudhāte abhītavat // 6.095.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jetavyam iti kākutstho martavyam iti rāvaṇaḥ / dhṛtau svavīryasarvasvaṃ yuddhe 'darśayatāṃ tadā // 6.095.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ krodhād daśagrīvaḥ śarān saṃdhāya vīryavān / mumoca dhvajam uddiśya rāghavasya rathe sthitam // 6.095.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te śarās tam anāsādya puraṃdararathadhvajam / raktaśaktiṃ parāmṛśya nipetur dharaṇītale // 6.095.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmo 'bhisaṃkruddhaś cāpam āyamya vīryavān / kṛtapratikṛtaṃ kartuṃ manasā saṃpracakrame // 6.095.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇadhvajam uddiśya mumoca niśitaṃ śaram / mahāsarpam ivāsahyaṃ jvalantaṃ svena tejasā // 6.095.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jagāma sa mahīṃ bhittvā daśagrīvadhvajaṃ śaraḥ / sa nikṛtto 'patad bhūmau rāvaṇasya rathadhvajaḥ // 6.095.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhvajasyonmathanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaḥ sumahābalaḥ / krodhajenāgninā saṃkhye pradīpta iva cābhavat // 6.095.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa roṣavaśam āpannaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mahad vaman / rāmasya turagān divyāñ śarair vivyādha rāvaṇaḥ // 6.095.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te viddhā harayas tasya nāskhalan nāpi babhramuḥ / babhūvuḥ svasthahṛdayāḥ padmanālair ivāhatāḥ // 6.095.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām asaṃbhramaṃ dṛṣṭvā vājināṃ rāvaṇas tadā / bhūya eva susaṃkruddhaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha // 6.095.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gadāś ca parighāṃś caiva cakrāṇi musalāni ca / giriśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca tathā śūlaparaśvadhān // 6.095.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māyā vihitam etat tu śastravarṣam apātayat / sahasraśas tato bāṇān aśrāntahṛdayodyamaḥ // 6.095.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tumulaṃ trāsajananaṃ bhīmaṃ bhīmapratisvanam / durdharṣam abhavad yuddhe naikaśastramayaṃ mahat // 6.095.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimucya rāghavarathaṃ samantād vānare bale / sāyakair antarikṣaṃ ca cakārāśu nirantaram // 6.095.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mumoca ca daśagrīvo niḥsaṅgenāntarātmanā // 6.095.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyāyacchamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tatparaṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe / prahasann iva kākutsthaḥ saṃdadhe sāyakāñ śitān // 6.095.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mumoca tato bāṇān raṇe śatasahasraśaḥ / tān dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaś cakre svaśaraiḥ khaṃ nirantaram // 6.095.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tābhyāṃ prayuktena śaravarṣeṇa bhāsvatā / śarabaddham ivābhāti dvitīyaṃ bhāsvad ambaram // 6.095.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānimitto 'bhavad bāṇo nātibhettā na niṣphalaḥ / tathā visṛjator bāṇān rāmarāvaṇayor mṛdhe // 6.095.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāyudhyetām avicchinnam asyantau savyadakṣiṇam / cakratus tau śaraughais tu nirucchvāsam ivāmbaram // 6.095.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya hayān rāmo hayān rāmasya rāvaṇaḥ / jaghnatus tau tadānyonyaṃ kṛtānukṛtakāriṇau // 6.095.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tathā yudhyamānau tu samare rāmarāvaṇau / dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni vismitenāntarātmanā // 6.096.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardayantau tu samare tayos tau syandanottamau / parasparavadhe yuktau ghorarūpau babhūvatuḥ // 6.096.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maṇḍalāni ca vīthīś ca gatapratyāgatāni ca / darśayantau bahuvidhāṃ sūtau sārathyajāṃ gatim // 6.096.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardayan rāvaṇaṃ rāmo rāghavaṃ cāpi rāvaṇaḥ / gativegaṃ samāpannau pravartana nivartane // 6.096.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣipatoḥ śarajālāni tayos tau syandanottamau / ceratuḥ saṃyugamahīṃ sāsārau jaladāv iva // 6.096.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśayitvā tadā tau tu gatiṃ bahuvidhāṃ raṇe / parasparasyābhimukhau punar eva ca tasthatuḥ // 6.096.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhuraṃ dhureṇa rathayor vaktraṃ vaktreṇa vājinām / patākāś ca patākābhiḥ sameyuḥ sthitayos tadā // 6.096.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya tato rāmo dhanurmuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ / caturbhiś caturo dīptān hayān pratyapasarpayat // 6.096.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa krodhavaśam āpanno hayānām apasarpaṇe / mumoca niśitān bāṇān rāghavāya niśācaraḥ // 6.096.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'tividdho balavatā daśagrīveṇa rāghavaḥ / jagāma na vikāraṃ ca na cāpi vyathito 'bhavat // 6.096.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cikṣepa ca punar bāṇān vajrapātasamasvanān / sārathiṃ vajrahastasya samuddiśya niśācaraḥ // 6.096.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātales tu mahāvegāḥ śarīre patitāḥ śarāḥ / na sūkṣmam api saṃmohaṃ vyathāṃ vā pradadur yudhi // 6.096.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayā dharṣaṇayā kroddho mātaler na tathātmanaḥ / cakāra śarajālena rāghavo vimukhaṃ ripum // 6.096.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṃśatiṃ triṃśataṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / mumoca rāghavo vīraḥ sāyakān syandane ripoḥ // 6.096.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gadānāṃ musalānāṃ ca parighāṇāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ / śarāṇāṃ puṅkhavātaiś ca kṣubhitāḥ saptasāgarāḥ // 6.096.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣubdhānāṃ sāgarāṇāṃ ca pātālatalavāsinaḥ / vyathitāḥ pannagāḥ sarve dānavāś ca sahasraśaḥ // 6.096.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cakampe medinī kṛtsnā saśailavanakānanā / bhāskaro niṣprabhaś cābhūn na vavau cāpi mārutaḥ // 6.096.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / cintām āpedire sarve sakiṃnaramahoragāḥ // 6.096.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svasti gobrāhmaṇebhyo 'stu lokās tiṣṭhantu śāśvatāḥ / jayatāṃ rāghavaḥ saṃkhye rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram // 6.096.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kruddho mahābāhū raghūṇāṃ kīrtivardhanaḥ / saṃdhāya dhanuṣā rāmaḥ kṣuram āśīviṣopamam // 6.096.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya śiro 'cchindac chrīmaj jvalitakuṇḍalam // 6.096.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chiraḥ patitaṃ bhūmau dṛṣṭaṃ lokais tribhis tadā / tasyaiva sadṛśaṃ cānyad rāvaṇasyotthitaṃ śiraḥ // 6.096.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat kṣipraṃ kṣiprahastena rāmeṇa kṣiprakāriṇā / dvitīyaṃ rāvaṇaśiraś chinnaṃ saṃyati sāyakaiḥ // 6.096.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
chinnamātraṃ ca tac chīrṣaṃ punar anyat sma dṛśyate / tad apy aśanisaṃkāśaiś chinnaṃ rāmeṇa sāyakaiḥ // 6.096.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam eva śataṃ chinnaṃ śirasāṃ tulyavarcasām / na caiva rāvaṇasyānto dṛśyate jīvitakṣaye // 6.096.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sarvāstravid vīraḥ kausalyānandivardhanaḥ / mārgaṇair bahubhir yuktaś cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ // 6.096.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārīco nihato yais tu kharo yais tu sudūṣaṇaḥ / krañcāraṇye virādhas tu kabandho daṇḍakā vane // 6.096.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ta ime sāyakāḥ sarve yuddhe pratyayikā mama / kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena rāvaṇe mandatejasaḥ // 6.096.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti cintāparaś cāsīd apramattaś ca saṃyuge / vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi rāghavo rāvaṇorasi // 6.096.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇo 'pi tataḥ kruddho rathastho rākṣaseśvaraḥ / gadāmusalavarṣeṇa rāmaṃ pratyardayad raṇe // 6.096.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ piśācoragarakṣasām / paśyatāṃ tan mahad yuddhaṃ sarvarātram avartata // 6.096.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva ratriṃ na divasaṃ na muhūrtaṃ na cakṣaṇam / rāmarāvaṇayor yuddhaṃ virāmam upagacchati // 6.096.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha saṃsmārayām āsa rāghavaṃ mātalis tadā / ajānann iva kiṃ vīra tvam enam anuvartase // 6.097.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visṛjāsmai vadhāya tvam astraṃ paitāmahaṃ prabho / vināśakālaḥ kathito yaḥ suraiḥ so 'dya vartate // 6.097.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃsmārito rāmas tena vākyena mātaleḥ / jagrāha sa śaraṃ dīptaṃ niśvasantam ivoragam // 6.097.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yam asmai prathamaṃ prādād agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / brahmadattaṃ mahad bāṇam amoghaṃ yudhi vīryavān // 6.097.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ pūrvam indrārtham amitaujasā / dattaṃ surapateḥ pūrvaṃ trilokajayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 6.097.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya vājeṣu pavanaḥ phale pāvakabhāskarau / śarīram ākāśamayaṃ gaurave merumandarau // 6.097.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jājvalyamānaṃ vapuṣā supuṅkhaṃ hemabhūṣitam / tejasā sarvabhūtānāṃ kṛtaṃ bhāskaravarcasaṃ // 6.097.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadhūmam iva kālāgniṃ dīptam āśīviṣaṃ yathā / rathanāgāśvavṛndānāṃ bhedanaṃ kṣiprakāriṇam // 6.097.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvārāṇāṃ parighāṇāṃ ca girīṇām api bhedanam / nānārudhirasiktāṅgaṃ medodigdhaṃ sudāruṇam // 6.097.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajrasāraṃ mahānādaṃ nānāsamitidāruṇam / sarvavitrāsanaṃ bhīmaṃ śvasantam iva pannagam // 6.097.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaṅkagṛdhrabalānāṃ ca gomāyugaṇarakṣasām / nityaṃ bhakṣapradaṃ yuddhe yamarūpaṃ bhayāvaham // 6.097.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nandanaṃ vānarendrāṇāṃ rakṣasām avasādanam / vājitaṃ vividhair vājaiś cārucitrair garutmataḥ // 6.097.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uttameṣuṃ lokānām ikṣvākubhayanāśanam / dviṣatāṃ kīrtiharaṇaṃ praharṣakaram ātmanaḥ // 6.097.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhimantrya tato rāmas taṃ maheṣuṃ mahābalaḥ / vedaproktena vidhinā saṃdadhe kārmuke balī // 6.097.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāvaṇāya saṃkruddho bhṛśam āyamya kārmukam / cikṣepa param āyattas taṃ śaraṃ marmaghātinam // 6.097.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vajra iva durdharṣo vajrabāhuvisarjitaḥ / kṛtānta iva cāvāryo nyapatad rāvaṇorasi // 6.097.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa visṛṣṭo mahāvegaḥ śarīrāntakaraḥ śaraḥ / bibheda hṛdayaṃ tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ // 6.097.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rudhirāktaḥ sa vegena jīvitāntakaraḥ śaraḥ / rāvaṇasya haran prāṇān viveśa dharaṇītalam // 6.097.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śaro rāvaṇaṃ hatvā rudhirārdrakṛtacchaviḥ / kṛtakarmā nibhṛtavat svatūṇīṃ punar āviśat // 6.097.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya hastād dhatasyāśu kārmukaṃ tat sasāyakam / nipapāta saha prāṇair bhraśyamānasya jīvitāt // 6.097.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatāsur bhīmavegas tu nairṛtendro mahādyutiḥ / papāta syandanād bhūmau vṛtro vajrahato yathā // 6.097.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ / hatanāthā bhayatrastāḥ sarvataḥ saṃpradudruvuḥ // 6.097.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nardantaś cābhipetus tān vānarā drumayodhinaḥ / daśagrīvavadhaṃ dṛṣṭvā vijayaṃ rāghavasya ca // 6.097.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arditā vānarair hṛṣṭair laṅkām abhyapatan bhayāt / hatāśrayatvāt karuṇair bāṣpaprasravaṇair mukhaiḥ // 6.097.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vineduḥ saṃhṛṣṭā vānarā jitakāśinaḥ / vadanto rāghavajayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca taṃ vadham // 6.097.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāntarikṣe vyanadat saumyas tridaśadundubhiḥ / divyagandhavahas tatra mārutaḥ susukho vavau // 6.097.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nipapātāntarikṣāc ca puṣpavṛṣṭis tadā bhuvi / kirantī rāghavarathaṃ duravāpā manoharāḥ // 6.097.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavas tava saṃyuktā gagane ca viśuśruve / sādhu sādhv iti vāg agryā devatānāṃ mahātmanām // 6.097.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āviveśa mahān harṣo devānāṃ cāraṇaiḥ saha / rāvaṇe nihate raudre sarvalokabhayaṃkare // 6.097.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sakāmaṃ sugrīvam aṅgadaṃ ca mahābalam / cakāra rāghavaḥ prīto hatvā rākṣasapuṃgavam // 6.097.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prajagmuḥ praśamaṃ marudgaṇā; diśaḥ prasedur vimalaṃ nabho 'bhavat / mahī cakampe na ca mārutā vavuḥ; sthiraprabhaś cāpy abhavad divākaraḥ // 6.097.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tatas tu sugrīvavibhīṣaṇādayaḥ; suhṛdviśeṣāḥ sahalakṣmaṇās tadā / sametya hṛṣṭā vijayena rāghavaṃ; raṇe 'bhirāmaṃ vidhinābhyapūjayan // 6.097.032	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sa tu nihataripuḥ sthirapratijñaḥ; svajanabalābhivṛto raṇe rarāja / raghukulanṛpanandano mahaujās; tridaśagaṇair abhisaṃvṛto yathendraḥ // 6.097.033	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
rāvaṇaṃ nihataṃ śrutvā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā / antaḥpurād viniṣpetū rākṣasyaḥ śokakarśitāḥ // 6.098.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāryamāṇāḥ subahuśo vṛṣṭantyaḥ kṣitipāṃsuṣu / vimuktakeśyo duḥkhārtā gāvo vatsahatā yathā // 6.098.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttareṇa viniṣkramya dvāreṇa saha rākṣasaiḥ / praviśyāyodhanaṃ ghoraṃ vicinvantyo hataṃ patim // 6.098.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āryaputreti vādinyo hā nātheti ca sarvaśaḥ / paripetuḥ kabandhāṅkāṃ mahīṃ śoṇitakardamām // 6.098.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tā bāṣpaparipūrṇākṣyo bhartṛśokaparājitāḥ / kareṇva iva nardantyo vinedur hatayūthapāḥ // 6.098.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadṛśus tā mahākāyaṃ mahāvīryaṃ mahādyutim / rāvaṇaṃ nihataṃ bhūmau nīlāñjanacayopamam // 6.098.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāḥ patiṃ sahasā dṛṣṭvā śayānaṃ raṇapāṃsuṣu / nipetus tasya gātreṣu chinnā vanalatā iva // 6.098.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahumānāt pariṣvajya kā cid enaṃ ruroda ha / caraṇau kā cid āliṅgya kā cit kaṇṭhe 'valambya ca // 6.098.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uddhṛtya ca bhujau kā cid bhūmau sma parivartate / hatasya vadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā kā cin moham upāgamat // 6.098.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kā cid aṅke śiraḥ kṛtvā ruroda mukham īkṣatī / snāpayantī mukhaṃ bāṣpais tuṣārair iva paṅkajam // 6.098.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ārtāḥ patiṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaṃ nihataṃ bhuvi / cukruśur bahudhā śokād bhūyas tāḥ paryadevayan // 6.098.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena vitrāsitaḥ śakro yena vitrāsito yamaḥ / yena vaiśravaṇo rājā puṣpakeṇa viyojitaḥ // 6.098.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandharvāṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām / bhayaṃ yena mahad dattaṃ so 'yaṃ śete raṇe hataḥ // 6.098.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asurebhyaḥ surebhyo vā pannagebhyo 'pi vā tathā / na bhayaṃ yo vijānāti tasyedaṃ mānuṣād bhayam // 6.098.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avadhyo devatānāṃ yas tathā dānavarakṣasām / hataḥ so 'yaṃ raṇe śete mānuṣeṇa padātinā // 6.098.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo na śakyaḥ surair hantuṃ na yakṣair nāsurais tathā / so 'yaṃ kaś cid ivāsattvo mṛtyuṃ martyena lambhitaḥ // 6.098.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vadantyo bahudhā rurudus tasya tāḥ striyaḥ / bhūya eva ca duḥkhārtā vilepuś ca punaḥ punaḥ // 6.098.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśṛṇvatā tu suhṛdāṃ satataṃ hitavādinām / etāḥ samam idānīṃ te vayam ātmā ca pātitāḥ // 6.098.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bruvāṇo 'pi hitaṃ vākyam iṣṭo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ / dhṛṣṭaṃ paruṣito mohāt tvayātmavadhakāṅkṣiṇā // 6.098.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi niryātitā te syāt sītā rāmāya maithilī / na naḥ syād vyasanaṃ ghoram idaṃ mūlaharaṃ mahat // 6.098.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vṛttakāmo bhaved bhrātā rāmo mitrakulaṃ bhavet / vayaṃ cāvidhavāḥ sarvāḥ sakāmā na ca śatravaḥ // 6.098.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā punar nṛśaṃsena sītāṃ saṃrundhatā balāt / rākṣasā vayam ātmā ca trayaṃ tulaṃ nipātitam // 6.098.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kāmakāraḥ kāmaṃ vā tava rākṣasapuṃgava / daivaṃ ceṣṭayate sarvaṃ hataṃ daivena hanyate // 6.098.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāṇāṃ vināśo 'yaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca te raṇe / tava caiva mahābāho daivayogād upāgataḥ // 6.098.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naivārthena na kāmena vikrameṇa na cājñayā / śakyā daivagatir loke nivartayitum udyatā // 6.098.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vilepur evaṃ dīnās tā rākṣasādhipayoṣitaḥ / kurarya iva duḥkhārtā bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇāḥ // 6.098.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsāṃ vilapamānānāṃ tathā rākṣasayoṣitām / jyeṣṭhā patnī priyā dīnā bhartāraṃ samudaikṣata // 6.099.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśagrīvaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmeṇācintyakarmaṇā / patiṃ mandodarī tatra kṛpaṇā paryadevayat // 6.099.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nanu nāma mahābāho tava vaiśravaṇānuja / kruddhasya pramukhe sthātuṃ trasyaty api puraṃdaraḥ // 6.099.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣayaś ca mahīdevā gandharvāś ca yaśasvinaḥ / nanu nāma tavodvegāc cāraṇāś ca diśo gatāḥ // 6.099.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ mānuṣamātreṇa rāmeṇa yudhi nirjitaḥ / na vyapatrapase rājan kim idaṃ rākṣasarṣabha // 6.099.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ trailokyam ākramya śriyā vīryeṇa cānvitam / aviṣahyaṃ jaghāna tvaṃ mānuṣo vanagocaraḥ // 6.099.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānuṣāṇām aviṣaye carataḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / vināśas tava rāmeṇa saṃyuge nopapadyate // 6.099.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na caitat karma rāmasya śraddadhāmi camūmukhe / sarvataḥ samupetasya tava tenābhimarśanam // 6.099.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indriyāṇi purā jitvā jitaṃ tribhuvaṇaṃ tvayā / smaradbhir iva tad vairam indriyair eva nirjitaḥ // 6.099.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā rāmarūpeṇa vāsavaḥ svayam āgataḥ / māyāṃ tava vināśāya vidhāyāpratitarkitām // 6.099.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadaiva hi janasthāne rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtaḥ / kharas tava hato bhrātā tadaivāsau na mānuṣaḥ // 6.099.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadaiva nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ duṣpraveṣāṃ surair api / praviṣṭo hanumān vīryāt tadaiva vyathitā vayam // 6.099.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kriyatām avirodhaś ca rāghaveṇeti yan mayā / ucyamāno na gṛhṇāsi tasyeyaṃ vyuṣṭir āgatā // 6.099.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akasmāc cābhikāmo 'si sītāṃ rākṣasapuṃgava / aiśvaryasya vināśāya dehasya svajanasya ca // 6.099.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arundhatyā viśiṣṭāṃ tāṃ rohiṇyāś cāpi durmate / sītāṃ dharṣayatā mānyāṃ tvayā hy asadṛśaṃ kṛtam // 6.099.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kulena na rūpeṇa na dākṣiṇyena maithilī / mayādhikā vā tulyā vā tvaṃ tu mohān na budhyase // 6.099.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā sarvabhūtānāṃ nāsti mṛtyur alakṣaṇaḥ / tava tāvad ayaṃ mṛtyur maithilīkṛtalakṣaṇaḥ // 6.099.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maithilī saha rāmeṇa viśokā vihariṣyati / alpapuṇyā tv ahaṃ ghore patitā śokasāgare // 6.099.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kailāse mandare merau tathā caitrarathe vane / devodyāneṣu sarveṣu vihṛtya sahitā tvayā // 6.099.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimānenānurūpeṇa yā yāmy atulayā śriyā / paśyantī vividhān deśāṃs tāṃs tāṃś citrasragambarā // 6.099.020.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhraṃśitā kāmabhogebhyaḥ sāsmi vīravadhāt tava // 6.099.020.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyavāk sa mahābhāgo devaro me yad abravīt / ayaṃ rākṣasamukhyānāṃ vināśaḥ paryupasthitaḥ // 6.099.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmakrodhasamutthena vyasanena prasaṅginā / tvayā kṛtam idaṃ sarvam anāthaṃ rakṣasāṃ kulam // 6.099.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi tvaṃ śocitavyo me prakhyātabalapauruṣaḥ / strīsvabhāvāt tu me buddhiḥ kāruṇye parivartate // 6.099.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvaṃ gṛhītvā svāṃ gatiṃ gataḥ / ātmānam anuśocāmi tvadviyogena duḥkhitām // 6.099.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśaḥ pītāmbaraśubhāṅgadaḥ / sarvagātrāṇi vikṣipya kiṃ śeṣe rudhirāplutaḥ // 6.099.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasupta iva śokārtāṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase // 6.099.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahāvīryasya dakṣasya saṃyugeṣv apalāyinaḥ / yātudhānasya dauhitrīṃ kiṃ tvaṃ māṃ nābhyudīkṣase // 6.099.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena sūdayase śatrūn samare sūryavarcasā / vajro vajradharasyeva so 'yaṃ te satatārcitaḥ // 6.099.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raṇe śatrupraharaṇo hemajālapariṣkṛtaḥ / parigho vyavakīrṇas te bāṇaiś chinnaḥ sahasradhā // 6.099.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhig astu hṛdayaṃ yasyā mamedaṃ na sahasradhā / tvayi pañcatvam āpanne phalate śokapīḍitam // 6.099.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare rāmo vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha / saṃskāraḥ kriyatāṃ bhrātuḥ striyaś caitā nivartaya // 6.099.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ praśritas tato rāmaṃ śrutavākyo vibhīṣaṇaḥ / vimṛśya buddhyā dharmajño dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ // 6.099.031.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasyaivānuvṛttyartham uttaraṃ pratyabhāṣata // 6.099.031.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaktadharmavrataṃ krūraṃ nṛśaṃsam anṛtaṃ tathā / nāham arho 'smi saṃskartuṃ paradārābhimarśakam // 6.099.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātṛrūpo hi me śatrur eṣa sarvāhite rataḥ / rāvaṇo nārhate pūjāṃ pūjyo 'pi gurugauravāt // 6.099.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nṛśaṃsa iti māṃ rāma vakṣyanti manujā bhuvi / śrutvā tasya guṇān sarve vakṣyanti sukṛtaṃ punaḥ // 6.099.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā paramaprīto rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ / vibhīṣaṇam uvācedaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam // 6.099.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavāpi me priyaṃ kāryaṃ tvatprabhavāc ca me jitam / avaśyaṃ tu kṣamaṃ vācyo mayā tvaṃ rākṣaseśvara // 6.099.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adharmānṛtasaṃyuktaḥ kāmam eṣa niśācaraḥ / tejasvī balavāñ śūraḥ saṃgrāmeṣu ca nityaśaḥ // 6.099.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatakratumukhair devaiḥ śrūyate na parājitaḥ / mahātmā balasaṃpanno rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ // 6.099.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maraṇāntāni vairāṇi nirvṛttaṃ naḥ prayojanam / kriyatām asya saṃskāro mamāpy eṣa yathā tava // 6.099.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvatsakāśān mahābāho saṃskāraṃ vidhipūrvakam / kṣipram arhati dharmajña tvaṃ yaśobhāg bhaviṣyasi // 6.099.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā tvaramāṇo vibhīṣaṇaḥ / saṃskāreṇānurūpeṇa yojayām āsa rāvaṇam // 6.099.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadau pāvakaṃ tasya vidhiyuktaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ / tāḥ striyo 'nunayām āsa sāntvam uktvā punaḥ punaḥ // 6.099.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviṣṭāsu ca sarvāsu rākṣasīṣu vibhīṣaṇaḥ / rāmapārśvam upāgamya tadātiṣṭhad vinītavat // 6.099.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo 'pi saha sainyena sasugrīvaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ / harṣaṃ lebhe ripuṃ hatvā yathā vṛtraṃ śatakratuḥ // 6.099.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te rāvaṇavadhaṃ dṛṣṭvā devagandharvadānavāḥ / jagmus tais tair vimānaiḥ svaiḥ kathayantaḥ śubhāḥ kathāḥ // 6.100.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya vadhaṃ ghoraṃ rāghavasya parākramam / suyuddhaṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca sugrīvasay ca mantritam // 6.100.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anurāgaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saumitrer lakṣmaṇasya ca / kathayanto mahābhāgā jagmur hṛṣṭā yathāgatam // 6.100.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavas tu rathaṃ divyam indradattaṃ śikhiprabham / anujñāya mahābhāgo mātaliṃ pratyapūjayat // 6.100.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghaveṇābhyanujñāto mātaliḥ śakrasārathiḥ / divyaṃ taṃ ratham āsthāya divam evāruroha saḥ // 6.100.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tu divam ārūḍhe surasārathisattame / rāghavaḥ paramaprītaḥ sugrīvaṃ pariṣasvaje // 6.100.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pariṣvajya ca sugrīvaṃ lakṣmaṇenābhivāditaḥ / pūjyamāno hariśreṣṭhair ājagāma balālayam // 6.100.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca tadā rāmaḥ samīpaparivartinam / saumitriṃ sattvasaṃpannaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ // 6.100.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇam imaṃ saumya laṅkāyām abhiṣecaya / anuraktaṃ ca bhaktaṃ ca mama caivopakāriṇam // 6.100.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yad imaṃ rāvaṇānujam / laṅkāyāṃ saumya paśyeyam abhiṣiktaṃ vibhīṣaṇam // 6.100.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu saumitrī rāghaveṇa mahātmanā / tathety uktvā tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sauvarṇaṃ ghaṭam ādade // 6.100.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghaṭena tena saumitrir abhyaṣiñcad vibhīṣaṇam / laṅkāyāṃ rakṣasāṃ madhye rājānaṃ rāmaśāsanāt // 6.100.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyaṣiñcat sa dharmātmā śuddhātmānaṃ vibhīṣaṇam / tasyāmātyā jahṛṣire bhaktā ye cāsya rākṣasāḥ // 6.100.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvābhiṣiktaṃ laṅkāyāṃ rākṣasendraṃ vibhīṣaṇam / rāghavaḥ paramāṃ prītiṃ jagāma sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // 6.100.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tad rājyaṃ mahat prāpya rāmadattaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ / prakṛtīḥ sāntvayitvā ca tato rāmam upāgamat // 6.100.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṣatān modakāṃl lājān divyāḥ sumanasas tathā / ājahrur atha saṃhṛṣṭāḥ paurās tasmai niśācarāḥ // 6.100.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tān gṛhītvā durdharṣo rāghavāya nyavedayat / maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ sarvaṃ lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān // 6.100.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtakāryaṃ samṛddhārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo vibhīṣaṇam / pratijagrāha tat sarvaṃ tasyaiva priyakāmyayā // 6.100.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śailopamaṃ vīraṃ prāñjaliṃ pārśvataḥ sthitam / abravīd rāghavo vākyaṃ hanūmantaṃ plavaṃgamam // 6.100.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anumānya mahārājam imaṃ saumya vibhīṣaṇam / praviśya rāvaṇagṛhaṃ vinayenopasṛtya ca // 6.100.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehyā māṃ kuśalinaṃ sasugrīvaṃ salakṣmaṇam / ācakṣva jayatāṃ śreṣṭha rāvaṇaṃ ca mayā hatam // 6.100.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyam etad udāhṛtya maithilyās tvaṃ harīśvara / pratigṛhya ca saṃdeśam upāvartitum arhasi // 6.100.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti pratisamādiṣṭo hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ pūjyamāno niśācaraiḥ // 6.101.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśya tu mahātejā rāvaṇasya niveśanam / dadarśa śaśinā hīnāṃ sātaṅkām iva rohiṇīm // 6.101.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nibhṛtaḥ praṇataḥ prahvaḥ so 'bhigamyābhivādya ca / rāmasya vacanaṃ sarvam ākhyātum upacakrame // 6.101.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehi kuśalī rāmaḥ sasugrīvaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ / kuśalaṃ cāha siddhārtho hataśatrur ariṃdamaḥ // 6.101.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇasahāyena rāmeṇa haribhiḥ saha / nihato rāvaṇo devi lakṣmaṇasya nayena ca // 6.101.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rāmo vīras tvāṃ raghunandanaḥ / abravīt paramaprītaḥ kṛtārthenāntarātmanā // 6.101.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyam ākhyāmi te devi tvāṃ tu bhayaḥ sabhājaye / diṣṭyā jīvasi dharmajñe jayena mama saṃyuge // 6.101.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
labdho no vijayaḥ sīte svasthā bhava gatavyathā / rāvaṇaḥ sa hataḥ śatrur laṅkā ceyaṃ vaśe sthitā // 6.101.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā hy alabdhanidreṇa dhṛtena tava nirjaye / pratijñaiṣā vinistīrṇā baddhvā setuṃ mahodadhau // 6.101.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃbhramaś ca na kartavyo vartantyā rāvaṇālaye / vibhīṣaṇa vidheyaṃ hi laṅkaiśvaryam idaṃ kṛtam // 6.101.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad āśvasihi viśvastā svagṛhe parivartase / ayaṃ cābhyeti saṃhṛṣṭas tvaddarśanasamutsukaḥ // 6.101.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā samutpatya sītā śaśinibhānanā / praharṣeṇāvaruddhā sā vyājahāra na kiṃ cana // 6.101.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca hariśreṣṭhaḥ sītām apratijalpatīm / kiṃ tvaṃ cintayase devi kiṃ ca māṃ nābhibhāṣase // 6.101.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā hanumatā sītā dharme vyavasthitā / abravīt paramapritā harṣagadgadayā girā // 6.101.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyam etad upaśrutya bhartur vijayasaṃśritam / praharṣavaśam āpannā nirvākyāsmi kṣaṇāntaram // 6.101.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi paśyāmi sadṛśaṃ cintayantī plavaṃgama / matpriyākhyānakasyeha tava pratyabhinandanam // 6.101.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca paśyāmi tat saumya pṛthivyām api vānara / sadṛśaṃ matpriyākhyāne tava dātuṃ bhavet samam // 6.101.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hiraṇyaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā ratnāni vividhāni ca / rājyaṃ vā triṣu lokeṣu naitad arhati bhāṣitum // 6.101.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu vaidehyā pratyuvāca plavaṃgamaḥ / pragṛhītāñjalir vākyaṃ sītāyāḥ pramukhe sthitaḥ // 6.101.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhartuḥ priyahite yukte bhartur vijayakāṅkṣiṇi / snigdham evaṃvidhaṃ vākyaṃ tvam evārhasi bhāṣitum // 6.101.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavaitad vacanaṃ saumye sāravat snigdham eva ca / ratnaughād vividhāc cāpi devarājyād viśiṣyate // 6.101.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arthataś ca mayā prāptā devarājyādayo guṇāḥ / hataśatruṃ vijayinaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi yat sthitam // 6.101.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imās tu khalu rākṣasyo yadi tvam anumanyase / hantum icchāmy ahaṃ sarvā yābhis tvaṃ tarjitā purā // 6.101.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kliśyantīṃ patidevāṃ tvām aśokavanikāṃ gatām / ghorarūpasamācārāḥ krūrāḥ krūratarekṣaṇāḥ // 6.101.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasyo dāruṇakathā varam etaṃ prayaccha me / icchāmi vividhair ghātair hantum etāḥ sudāruṇāḥ // 6.101.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muṣṭibhiḥ pāṇibhiś caiva caraṇaiś caiva śobhane / ghorair jānuprahāraiś ca daśanānāṃ ca pātanaiḥ // 6.101.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhakṣaṇaiḥ karṇanāsānāṃ keśānāṃ luñcanais tathā / bhṛśaṃ śuṣkamukhībhiś ca dāruṇair laṅghanair hataiḥ // 6.101.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃprakārair bahubhir viprakārair yaśasvini / hantum icchāmy ahaṃ devi tavemāḥ kṛtakilbiṣāḥ // 6.101.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā mahumatā vaidehī janakātmajā / uvāca dharmasahitaṃ hanūmantaṃ yaśasvinī // 6.101.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājasaṃśrayavaśyānāṃ kurvatīnāṃ parājñayā / vidheyānāṃ ca dāsīnāṃ kaḥ kupyed vānarottama // 6.101.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāgyavaiṣamya yogena purā duścaritena ca / mayaitet prāpyate sarvaṃ svakṛtaṃ hy upabhujyate // 6.101.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptavyaṃ tu daśā yogān mayaitad iti niścitam / dāsīnāṃ rāvaṇasyāhaṃ marṣayāmīha durbalā // 6.101.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājñaptā rāvaṇenaitā rākṣasyo mām atarjayan / hate tasmin na kuryur hi tarjanaṃ vānarottama // 6.101.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ vyāghrasamīpe tu purāṇo dharmasaṃhitaḥ / ṛkṣeṇa gītaḥ śloko me taṃ nibodha plavaṃgama // 6.101.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na paraḥ pāpam ādatte pareṣāṃ pāpakarmaṇām / samayo rakṣitavyas tu santaś cāritrabhūṣaṇāḥ // 6.101.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāpānāṃ vā śubhānāṃ vā vadhārhāṇāṃ plavaṃgama / kāryaṃ kāruṇyam āryeṇa na kaś cin nāparādhyati // 6.101.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lokahiṃsāvihārāṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpiṇam / kurvatām api pāpāni naiva kāryam aśobhanam // 6.101.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu hanumān sītayā vākyakovidaḥ / pratyuvāca tataḥ sītāṃ rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm // 6.101.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuktā rāmasya bhavatī dharmapatnī yaśasvinī / pratisaṃdiśa māṃ devi gamiṣye yatra rāghavaḥ // 6.101.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā hanumatā vaidehī janakātmajā / abravīd draṣṭum icchāmi bhartāraṃ vānarottama // 6.101.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā hanumān pavanātmajaḥ / harṣayan maithilīṃ vākyam uvācedaṃ mahādyutiḥ // 6.101.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrṇacandrānanaṃ rāmaṃ drakṣyasy ārye salakṣmaṇam / sthiramitraṃ hatāmitraṃ śacīva tridaśeśvaram // 6.101.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām evam uktvā rājantīṃ sītāṃ sākṣād iva śriyam / ājagāma mahāvego hanūmān yatra rāghavaḥ // 6.101.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa uvāca mahāprajñam abhigamya plavaṃgamaḥ / rāmaṃ vacanam arthajño varaṃ sarvadhanuṣmatām // 6.102.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yannimitto 'yam ārambhaḥ karmaṇāṃ ca phalodayaḥ / tāṃ devīṃ śokasaṃtaptāṃ maithilīṃ draṣṭum arhasi // 6.102.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā hi śokasamāviṣṭā bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇā / maithilī vijayaṃ śrutvā tava harṣam upāgamat // 6.102.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvakāt pratyayāc cāham ukto viśvastayā tayā / bhartāraṃ draṣṭum icchāmi kṛtārthaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam // 6.102.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto hanumatā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ / agacchat sahasā dhyānam āsīd bāṣpapariplutaḥ // 6.102.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya medinīm avalokayan / uvāca meghasaṃkāśaṃ vibhīṣaṇam upasthitam // 6.102.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyāṅgarāgāṃ vaidehīṃ divyābharaṇabhūṣitām / iha sītāṃ śiraḥsnātām upasthāpaya māciram // 6.102.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa tvaramāṇo vibhīṣaṇaḥ / praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ sītāṃ strībhiḥ svābhir acodayat // 6.102.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyāṅgarāgā vaidehī divyābharaṇabhūṣitā / yānam āroha bhadraṃ te bhartā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati // 6.102.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu vaidehī pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam / asnātā draṣṭum icchāmi bhartāraṃ rākṣasādhipa // 6.102.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ / yathāhaṃ rāmo bhartā te tat tathā kartum arhasi // 6.102.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā maithilī bhrātṛdevatā / bhartṛbhaktivratā sādhvī tatheti pratyabhāṣata // 6.102.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sītāṃ śiraḥsnātāṃ yuvatībhir alaṃkṛtām / mahārhābharaṇopetāṃ mahārhāmbaradhāriṇīm // 6.102.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āropya śibikāṃ dīptāṃ parārdhyāmbarasaṃvṛtām / rakṣobhir bahubhir guptām ājahāra vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.102.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhigamya mahātmānaṃ jñātvābhidhyānam āsthitam / praṇataś ca prahṛṣṭaś ca prāptāṃ sītāṃ nyavedayat // 6.102.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām āgatām upaśrutya rakṣogṛhaciroṣitām / harṣo dainyaṃ ca roṣaś ca trayaṃ rāghavam āviśat // 6.102.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pārśvagataṃ dṛṣṭvā savimarśaṃ vicārayan / vibhīṣaṇam idaṃ vākyam ahṛṣṭo rāghavo 'bravīt // 6.102.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasādhipate saumya nityaṃ madvijaye rata / vaidehī saṃnikarṣaṃ me śīghraṃ samupagacchatu // 6.102.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tadvacanam ājñāya rāghavasya vibhīṣaṇaḥ / tūrṇam utsāraṇe yatnaṃ kārayām āsa sarvataḥ // 6.102.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kañcukoṣṇīṣiṇas tatra vetrajharjharapāṇayaḥ / utsārayantaḥ puruṣāḥ samantāt paricakramuḥ // 6.102.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛkṣāṇāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvataḥ / vṛndāny utsāryamāṇāni dūram utsasṛjus tataḥ // 6.102.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām utsāryamāṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dhvanir utthitaḥ / vāyunodvartamānasya sāgarasyeva nisvanaḥ // 6.102.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utsāryamāṇāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā samantāj jātasaṃbhramān / dākṣiṇyāt tadamarṣāc ca vārayām āsa rāghavaḥ // 6.102.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃrabdhaś cābravīd rāmaś cakṣuṣā pradahann iva / vibhīṣaṇaṃ mahāprājñaṃ sopālambham idaṃ vacaḥ // 6.102.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kimarthaṃ mām anādṛtya kṛśyate 'yaṃ tvayā janaḥ / nivartayainam udyogaṃ jano 'yaṃ svajano mama // 6.102.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na gṛhāṇi na vastrāṇi na prākārās tiraskriyāḥ / nedṛśā rājasatkārā vṛttam āvaraṇaṃ striyaḥ // 6.102.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyasaneṣu na kṛcchreṣu na yuddhe na svayaṃ vare / na kratau no vivāhe ca darśanaṃ duṣyate striyaḥ // 6.102.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saiṣā yuddhagatā caiva kṛcchre mahati ca sthitā / darśane 'syā na doṣaḥ syān matsamīpe viśeṣataḥ // 6.102.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad ānaya samīpaṃ me śīghram enāṃ vibhīṣaṇa / sītā paśyatu mām eṣā suhṛdgaṇavṛtaṃ sthitam // 6.102.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa savimarśo vibhīṣaṇaḥ / rāmasyopānayat sītāṃ saṃnikarṣaṃ vinītavat // 6.102.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato lakṣmaṇasugrīvau hanūmāṃś ca plavaṃgamaḥ / niśamya vākyaṃ rāmasya babhūvur vyathitā bhṛśam // 6.102.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kalatranirapekṣaiś ca iṅgitair asya dāruṇaiḥ / aprītam iva sītāyāṃ tarkayanti sma rāghavam // 6.102.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lajjayā tv avalīyantī sveṣu gātreṣu maithilī / vibhīṣaṇenānugatā bhartāraṃ sābhyavartata // 6.102.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā vastrasaṃruddhamukhī lajjayā janasaṃsadi / rurodāsādya bhartāram āryaputreti bhāṣiṇī // 6.102.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vismayāc ca praharṣāc ca snehāc ca paridevatā / udaikṣata mukhaṃ bhartuḥ saumyaṃ saumyatarānanā // 6.102.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha samapanudan manaḥklamaṃ sā; suciram adṛṣṭam udīkṣya vai priyasya / vadanam uditapūrṇacandrakāntaṃ; vimalaśaśāṅkanibhānanā tadāsīt // 6.102.036	puṣpitāgrā (1,3: nnry, 2,4: njjrg)
tāṃ tu pārśve sthitāṃ prahvāṃ rāmaḥ saṃprekṣya maithilīm / hṛdayāntargatakrodho vyāhartum upacakrame // 6.103.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣāsi nirjitā bhadre śatruṃ jitvā mayā raṇe / pauruṣād yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tad etad upapāditam // 6.103.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gato 'smy antam amarṣasya dharṣaṇā saṃpramārjitā / avamānaś ca śatruś ca mayā yugapad uddhṛtau // 6.103.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya me pauruṣaṃ dṛṣṭam adya me saphalaḥ śramaḥ / adya tīrṇapratijñatvāt prabhavāmīha cātmanaḥ // 6.103.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā tvaṃ virahitā nītā calacittena rakṣasā / daivasaṃpādito doṣo mānuṣeṇa mayā jitaḥ // 6.103.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃprāptam avamānaṃ yas tejasā na pramārjati / kas tasya puruṣārtho 'sti puruṣasyālpatejasaḥ // 6.103.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya laṅkāyāś cāvamardanam / saphalaṃ tasya tac chlāghyam adya karma hanūmataḥ // 6.103.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuddhe vikramataś caiva hitaṃ mantrayataś ca me / sugrīvasya sasainyasya saphalo 'dya pariśramaḥ // 6.103.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirguṇaṃ bhrātaraṃ tyaktvā yo māṃ svayam upasthitaḥ / vibhīṣaṇasya bhaktasya saphalo 'dya pariśramaḥ // 6.103.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ bruvatas tasya sītā rāmasya tadvacaḥ / mṛgīvotphullanayanā babhūvāśrupariplutā // 6.103.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśyatas tāṃ tu rāmasya bhūyaḥ krodho 'bhyavartata / prabhūtājyāvasiktasya pāvakasyeva dīpyataḥ // 6.103.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa baddhvā bhrukuṭiṃ vaktre tiryakprekṣitalocanaḥ / abravīt paruṣaṃ sītāṃ madhye vānararakṣasām // 6.103.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat kartavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa dharṣaṇāṃ parimārjatā / tat kṛtaṃ sakalaṃ sīte śatruhastād amarṣaṇāt // 6.103.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirjitā jīvalokasya tapasā bhāvitātmanā / agastyena durādharṣā muninā dakṣiṇeva dik // 6.103.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viditaś cāstu bhadraṃ te yo 'yaṃ raṇapariśramaḥ / sa tīrṇaḥ suhṛdāṃ vīryān na tvadarthaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ // 6.103.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣatā tu mayā vṛttam apavādaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / prakhyātasyātmavaṃśasya nyaṅgaṃ ca parimārjatā // 6.103.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptacāritrasaṃdehā mama pratimukhe sthitā / dīpo netrāturasyeva pratikūlāsi me dṛḍham // 6.103.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad gaccha hy abhyanujñātā yateṣṭaṃ janakātmaje / etā daśa diśo bhadre kāryam asti na me tvayā // 6.103.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaḥ pumān hi kule jātaḥ striyaṃ paragṛhoṣitām / tejasvi punar ādadyāt suhṛllekhena cetasā // 6.103.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇāṅkaparibhraṣṭāṃ dṛṣṭāṃ duṣṭena cakṣuṣā / kathaṃ tvāṃ punarādadyāṃ kulaṃ vyapadiśan mahat // 6.103.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadarthaṃ nirjitā me tvaṃ yaśaḥ pratyāhṛtaṃ mayā / nāsti me tvayy abhiṣvaṅgo yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatām itaḥ // 6.103.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti pravyāhṛtaṃ bhadre mayaitat kṛtabuddhinā / lakṣmaṇe bharate vā tvaṃ kuru buddhiṃ yathāsukham // 6.103.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīve vānarendre vā rākṣasendre vibhīṣaṇe / niveśaya manaḥ śīte yathā vā sukham ātmanaḥ // 6.103.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi tvāṃ rāvaṇo dṛṣṭvā divyarūpāṃ manoramām / marṣayate ciraṃ sīte svagṛhe parivartinīm // 6.103.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ priyārhaśvaraṇā tad apriyaṃ; priyād upaśrutya cirasya maithilī / mumoca bāṣpaṃ subhṛśaṃ pravepitā; gajendrahastābhihateva vallarī // 6.103.025	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
evam uktā tu vaidehī paruṣaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / rāghaveṇa saroṣeṇa bhṛśaṃ pravyathitābhavat // 6.104.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tad aśrutapūrvaṃ hi jane mahati maithilī / śrutvā bhartṛvaco rūkṣaṃ lajjayā vrīḍitābhavat // 6.104.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśantīva gātrāṇi svāny eva janakātmajā / vākśalyais taiḥ saśalyeva bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat // 6.104.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bāṣpaparikliṣṭaṃ pramārjantī svam ānanam / śanair gadgadayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt // 6.104.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ mām asadṛśaṃ vākyam īdṛśaṃ śrotradāruṇam / rūkṣaṃ śrāvayase vīra prākṛtaḥ prākṛtām iva // 6.104.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tathāsmi mahābāho yathā tvam avagacchasi / pratyayaṃ gaccha me svena cāritreṇaiva te śape // 6.104.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛthak strīṇāṃ pracāreṇa jātiṃ tvaṃ pariśaṅkase / parityajemāṃ śaṅkāṃ tu yadi te 'haṃ parīkṣitā // 6.104.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady ahaṃ gātrasaṃsparśaṃ gatāsmi vivaśā prabho / kāmakāro na me tatra daivaṃ tatrāparādhyati // 6.104.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madadhīnaṃ tu yat tan me hṛdayaṃ tvayi vartate / parādhīneṣu gātreṣu kiṃ kariṣyāmy anīśvarā // 6.104.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahasaṃvṛddhabhāvāc ca saṃsargeṇa ca mānada / yady ahaṃ te na vijñātā hatā tenāsmi śāśvatam // 6.104.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
preṣitas te yadā vīro hanūmān avalokakaḥ / laṅkāsthāhaṃ tvayā vīra kiṃ tadā na visarjitā // 6.104.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyakṣaṃ vānarendrasya tvadvākyasamanantaram / tvayā saṃtyaktayā vīra tyaktaṃ syāj jīvitaṃ mayā // 6.104.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na vṛthā te śramo 'yaṃ syāt saṃśaye nyasya jīvitam / suhṛjjanaparikleśo na cāyaṃ niṣphalas tava // 6.104.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā tu naraśārdūla krodham evānuvartatā / laghuneva manuṣyeṇa strītvam eva puraskṛtam // 6.104.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apadeśena janakān notpattir vasudhātalāt / mama vṛttaṃ ca vṛttajña bahu te na puraskṛtam // 6.104.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na pramāṇīkṛtaḥ pāṇir bālye bālena pīḍitaḥ / mama bhaktiś ca śīlaṃ ca sarvaṃ te pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtam // 6.104.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇā rudatī bāṣpagadgadabhāṣiṇī / abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā dīnaṃ dhyānaparaṃ sthitam // 6.104.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
citāṃ me kuru saumitre vyasanasyāsya bheṣajam / mithyāpavādopahatā nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // 6.104.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aprītasya guṇair bhartus tyaktayā janasaṃsadi / yā kṣamā me gatir gantuṃ pravekṣye havyavāhanam // 6.104.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu vaidehyā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā / amarṣavaśam āpanno rāghavānanam aikṣata // 6.104.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vijñāya manaśchandaṃ rāmasyākārasūcitam / citāṃ cakāra saumitrir mate rāmasya vīryavān // 6.104.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhomukhaṃ tato rāmaṃ śanaiḥ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam / upāsarpata vaidehī dīpyamānaṃ hutāśanam // 6.104.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praṇamya devatābhyaś ca brāhmaṇebhyaś ca maithilī / baddhāñjalipuṭā cedam uvācāgnisamīpataḥ // 6.104.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā me hṛdayaṃ nityaṃ nāpasarpati rāghavāt / tathā lokasya sākṣī māṃ sarvataḥ pātu pāvakaḥ // 6.104.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu vaidehī parikramya hutāśanam / viveśa jvalanaṃ dīptaṃ niḥsaṅgenāntarātmanā // 6.104.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
janaḥ sa sumahāṃs tatra bālavṛddhasamākulaḥ / dadarśa maithilīṃ tatra praviśantīṃ hutāśanam // 6.104.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyām agniṃ viśantyāṃ tu hāheti vipulaḥ svanaḥ / rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca saṃbabhūvādbhutopamaḥ // 6.104.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vaiśravaṇo rājā yamaś cāmitrakarśanaḥ / sahasrākṣo mahendraś ca varuṇaś ca paraṃtapaḥ // 6.105.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṣaḍardhanayanaḥ śrīmān mahādevo vṛṣadhvajaḥ / kartā sarvasya lokasya brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ // 6.105.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete sarve samāgamya vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃnibhaiḥ / āgamya nagarīṃ laṅkām abhijagmuś ca rāghavam // 6.105.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sahastābharaṇān pragṛhya vipulān bhujān / abruvaṃs tridaśaśreṣṭhāḥ prāñjaliṃ rāghavaṃ sthitam // 6.105.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kartā sarvasya lokasya śreṣṭho jñānavatāṃ varaḥ / upekṣase kathaṃ sītāṃ patantīṃ havyavāhane // 6.105.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ devagaṇaśreṣṭham ātmānaṃ nāvabudhyase // 6.105.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛtadhāmā vasuḥ pūrvaṃ vasūnāṃ ca prajāpatiḥ / tvaṃ trayāṇāṃ hi lokānām ādikartā svayaṃprabhuḥ // 6.105.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rudrāṇām aṣṭamo rudraḥ sādhyānām api pañcamaḥ / aśvinau cāpi te karṇau candrasūryau ca cakṣuṣī // 6.105.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ante cādau ca lokānāṃ dṛśyase tvaṃ paraṃtapa / upekṣase ca vaidehīṃ mānuṣaḥ prākṛto yathā // 6.105.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity ukto lokapālais taiḥ svāmī lokasya rāghavaḥ / abravīt tridaśaśreṣṭhān rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // 6.105.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātmānaṃ mānuṣaṃ manye rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam / yo 'haṃ yasya yataś cāhaṃ bhagavāṃs tad bravītu me // 6.105.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti bruvāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ / abravīc chṛṇu me rāma satyaṃ satyaparākrama // 6.105.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavān nārāyaṇo devaḥ śrīmāṃś cakrāyudho vibhuḥ / ekaśṛṅgo varāhas tvaṃ bhūtabhavyasapatnajit // 6.105.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṣaraṃ brahmasatyaṃ ca madhye cānte ca rāghava / lokānāṃ tvaṃ paro dharmo viṣvaksenaś caturbhujaḥ // 6.105.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śārṅgadhanvā hṛṣīkeśaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣottamaḥ / ajitaḥ khaḍgadhṛg viṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaś caiva bṛhadbalaḥ // 6.105.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
senānīr grāmaṇīś ca tvaṃ buddhiḥ sattaṃ kṣamā damaḥ / prabhavaś cāpyayaś ca tvam upendro madhusūdanaḥ // 6.105.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrakarmā mahendras tvaṃ padmanābho raṇāntakṛt / śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ ca tvām āhur divyā maharṣayaḥ // 6.105.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahasraśṛṅgo vedātmā śatajihvo maharṣabhaḥ / tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvam oṃkāraḥ paraṃtapa // 6.105.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhavaṃ nidhanaṃ vā te na viduḥ ko bhavān iti / dṛśyase sarvabhūteṣu brāhmaṇeṣu ca goṣu ca // 6.105.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dikṣu sarvāsu gagane parvateṣu vaneṣu ca / sahasracaraṇaḥ śrīmāñ śataśīrṣaḥ sahasradhṛk // 6.105.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni vasudhāṃ ca saparvatām / ante pṛthivyāḥ salile dṛśyase tvaṃ mahoragaḥ // 6.105.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trīṃl lokān dhārayan rāma devagandharvadānavān / ahaṃ te hṛdayaṃ rāma jihvā devī sarasvatī // 6.105.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devā gātreṣu lomāni nirmitā brahmaṇā prabho / nimeṣas te 'bhavad rātrir unmeṣas te 'bhavad divā // 6.105.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃskārās te 'bhavan vedā na tad asti tvayā vinā / jagat sarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyamṃ te vasudhātalam // 6.105.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agniḥ kopaḥ prasādas te somaḥ śrīvatsalakṣaṇa / tvayā lokās trayaḥ krāntāḥ purāṇe vikramais tribhiḥ // 6.105.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahendraś ca kṛto rājā baliṃ baddhvā mahāsuram / sītā lakṣmīr bhavān viṣṇur devaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ // 6.105.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhārthaṃ rāvaṇasyeha praviṣṭo mānuṣīṃ tanum / tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // 6.105.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihato rāvaṇo rāma prahṛṣṭo divam ākrama / amoghaṃ balavīryaṃ te amoghas te parākramaḥ // 6.105.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amoghās te bhaviṣyanti bhaktimantaś ca ye narāḥ / ye tvāṃ devaṃ dhruvaṃ bhaktāḥ purāṇaṃ puruṣottamam // 6.105.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye narāḥ kīrtayiṣyanti nāsti teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ // 6.105.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ pitāmahasamīritam / aṅkenādāya vaidehīm utpapāta vibhāvasuḥ // 6.106.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taruṇādityasaṃkāśāṃ taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇām / raktāmbaradharāṃ bālāṃ nīlakuñcitamūrdhajām // 6.106.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akliṣṭamālyābharaṇāṃ tathā rūpāṃ manasvinīm / dadau rāmāya vaidehīm aṅke kṛtvā vibhāvasuḥ // 6.106.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ sākṣī lokasya pāvakaḥ / eṣā te rāma vaidehī pāpam asyā na vidyate // 6.106.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naiva vācā na manasā nānudhyānān na cakṣuṣā / suvṛttā vṛttaśauṇḍīrā na tvām aticacāra ha // 6.106.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇenāpanītaiṣā vīryotsiktena rakṣasā / tvayā virahitā dīnā vivaśā nirjanād vanāt // 6.106.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ruddhā cāntaḥpure guptā tvakcittā tvatparāyaṇā / rakṣitā rākṣasī saṃghair vikṛtair ghoradarśanaiḥ // 6.106.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pralobhyamānā vividhaṃ bhartsyamānā ca maithilī / nācintayata tad rakṣas tvadgatenāntarātmanā // 6.106.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśuddhabhāvāṃ niṣpāpāṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva rāghava / na kiṃ cid abhidhātavyam aham ājñāpayāmi te // 6.106.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto mahātejā dhṛtimān dṛḍhavikramaḥ / abravīt tridaśaśreṣṭhaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // 6.106.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu sītā pāvanam arhati / dīrghakāloṣitā ceyaṃ rāvaṇāntaḥpure śubhā // 6.106.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāliśaḥ khalu kāmātmā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ / iti vakṣyanti māṃ santo jānakīm aviśodhya hi // 6.106.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ananyahṛdayāṃ bhaktāṃ maccittaparirakṣaṇīm / aham apy avagacchāmi maithilīṃ janakātmajām // 6.106.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyayārthaṃ tu lokānāṃ trayāṇāṃ satyasaṃśrayaḥ / upekṣe cāpi vaidehīṃ praviśantīṃ hutāśanam // 6.106.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imām api viśālākṣīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā / rāvaṇo nātivarteta velām iva mahodadhiḥ // 6.106.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi śaktaḥ sa duṣṭātmā manasāpi hi maithilīm / pradharṣayitum aprāptāṃ dīptām agniśikhām iva // 6.106.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
neyam arhati caiśvaryaṃ rāvaṇāntaḥpure śubhā / ananyā hi mayā sītāṃ bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā // 6.106.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśuddhā triṣu lokeṣu maithilī janakātmajā / na hi hātum iyaṃ śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā // 6.106.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyaṃ ca mayā kāryaṃ sarveṣāṃ vo vaco hitam / snigdhānāṃ lokamānyānām evaṃ ca bruvatāṃ hitam // 6.106.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
itīdam uktvā vacanaṃ mahābalaiḥ; praśasyamānaḥ svakṛtena karmaṇā / sametya rāmaḥ priyayā mahābalaḥ; sukhaṃ sukhārho 'nubabhūva rāghavaḥ // 6.106.020	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāghaveṇa subhāṣitam / idaṃ śubhataraṃ vākyaṃ vyājahāra maheśvaraḥ // 6.107.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣkarākṣa mahābāho mahāvakṣaḥ paraṃtapa / diṣṭyā kṛtam idaṃ karma tvayā śastrabhṛtāṃ vara // 6.107.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā sarvasya lokasya pravṛddhaṃ dāruṇaṃ tamaḥ / apāvṛttaṃ tvayā saṃkhye rāma rāvaṇajaṃ bhayam // 6.107.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśvāsya bharataṃ dīnaṃ kausalyāṃ ca yaśasvinīm / kaikeyīṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇamātaram // 6.107.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāpya rājyam ayodhyāyāṃ nandayitvā suhṛjjanam / ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule vaṃśaṃ sthāpayitvā mahābala // 6.107.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iṣṭvā turagamedhena prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ / brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā tridivaṃ gantum arhasi // 6.107.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa rājā vimānasthaḥ pitā daśarathas tava / kākutstha mānuṣe loke gurus tava mahāyaśāḥ // 6.107.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indralokaṃ gataḥ śrīmāṃs tvayā putreṇa tāritaḥ / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā tvam enam abhivādaya // 6.107.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahādevavacaḥ śrutvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ / vimānaśikharasthasya praṇāmam akarot pituḥ // 6.107.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīpyamānaṃ svayāṃ lakṣmyā virajo'mbaradhāriṇam / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dadarśa pitaraṃ prabhuḥ // 6.107.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭo vimānastho mahīpatiḥ / prāṇaiḥ priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā putraṃ daśarathas tadā // 6.107.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āropyāṅkaṃ mahābāhur varāsanagataḥ prabhuḥ / bāhubhyāṃ saṃpariṣvajya tato vākyaṃ samādade // 6.107.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na me svargo bahumataḥ saṃmānaś ca surarṣibhiḥ / tvayā rāma vihīnasya satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi te // 6.107.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaikeyyā yāni coktāni vākyāni vadatāṃ vara / tava pravrājanārthāni sthitāni hṛdaye mama // 6.107.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā kuśalinaṃ pariṣvajya salakṣmaṇam / adya duḥkhād vimukto 'smi nīhārād iva bhāskaraḥ // 6.107.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tārito 'haṃ tvayā putra suputreṇa mahātmanā / aṣṭāvakreṇa dharmātmā tārito brāhmaṇo yathā // 6.107.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idānīṃ ca vijānāmi yathā saumya sureśvaraiḥ / vadhārthaṃ rāvaṇasyeha vihitaṃ puruṣottamam // 6.107.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siddhārthā khalu kausalyā yā tvāṃ rāma gṛhaṃ gatam / vanān nivṛttaṃ saṃhṛṣṭā drakṣyate śatrusūdana // 6.107.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siddhārthāḥ khalu te rāma narā ye tvāṃ purīṃ gatam / jalārdram abhiṣiktaṃ ca drakṣyanti vasudhādhipam // 6.107.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anuraktena balinā śucinā dharmacāriṇā / iccheyaṃ tvām ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ bharatena samāgatam // 6.107.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśasamāḥ saumya vane niryāpitās tvayā / vasatā sītayā sārdhaṃ lakṣmaṇena ca dhīmatā // 6.107.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivṛttavanavāso 'si pratijñā saphalā kṛtā / rāvaṇaṃ ca raṇe hatvā devās te paritoṣitāḥ // 6.107.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtaṃ karma yaśaḥ ślāghyaṃ prāptaṃ te śatrusūdana / bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rājyastho dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi // 6.107.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti bruvāṇaṃ rājānaṃ rāmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt / kuru prasādaṃ dharmajña kaikeyyā bharatasya ca // 6.107.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saputrāṃ tvāṃ tyajāmīti yad uktā kaikayī tvayā / sa śāpaḥ kaikayīṃ ghoraḥ saputrāṃ na spṛśet prabho // 6.107.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tatheti mahārājo rāmam uktvā kṛtāñjalim / lakṣmaṇaṃ ca pariṣvajya punar vākyam uvāca ha // 6.107.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaṃ śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā / kṛtā mama mahāprītiḥ prāptaṃ dharmaphalaṃ ca te // 6.107.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmaṃ prāpsyasi dharmajña yaśaś ca vipulaṃ bhuvi / rāme prasanne svargaṃ ca mahimānaṃ tathaiva ca // 6.107.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaṃ śuśrūṣa bhadraṃ te sumitrānandavardhana / rāmaḥ sarvasya lokasya śubheṣv abhirataḥ sadā // 6.107.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete sendrās trayo lokāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / abhigamya mahātmānam arcanti puruṣottamam // 6.107.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat tad uktam avyaktam akṣaraṃ brahmanirmitam / devānāṃ hṛdayaṃ saumya guhyaṃ rāmaḥ paraṃtapaḥ // 6.107.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
