avāptaṃ dharmacaraṇaṃ yaśaś ca vipulaṃ tvayā / rāmaṃ śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā // 6.107.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tathoktvā mahābāhur lakṣmaṇaṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitam / uvāca rājā dharmātmā vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ śubham // 6.107.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kartavyo na tu vaidehi manyus tyāgam imaṃ prati / rāmeṇa tvadviśuddhyarthaṃ kṛtam etad dhitaiṣiṇā // 6.107.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tvaṃ subhru samādheyā patiśuśrūvaṇaṃ prati / avaśyaṃ tu mayā vācyam eṣa te daivataṃ param // 6.107.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti pratisamādiśya putrau sītāṃ tathā snuṣām / indralokaṃ vimānena yayau daśaratho jvalan // 6.107.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratiprayāte kākutsthe mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ / abravīt paramaprīto rāghavaṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitam // 6.108.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amoghaṃ darśanaṃ rāma tavāsmākaṃ paraṃtapa / prītiyukto 'smi tena tvaṃ brūhi yan manasecchasi // 6.108.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā cāpi bhāryayā // 6.108.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi prītiḥ samutpannā mayi sarvasureśvara / vakṣyāmi kuru me satyaṃ vacanaṃ vadatāṃ vara // 6.108.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama hetoḥ parākrāntā ye gatā yamasādanam / te sarve jīvitaṃ prāpya samuttiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ // 6.108.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
matpriyeṣv abhiraktāś ca na mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti ca / tvatprasādāt sameyus te varam etad ahaṃ vṛṇe // 6.108.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīrujān nirvraṇāṃś caiva saṃpannabalapauruṣān / golāṅgūlāṃs tathaivarkṣān draṣṭum icchāmi mānada // 6.108.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akāle cāpi mukhyāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca / nadyaś ca vimalās tatra tiṣṭheyur yatra vānarāḥ // 6.108.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ / mahendraḥ pratyuvācedaṃ vacanaṃ prītilakṣaṇam // 6.108.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahān ayaṃ varas tāta tvayokto raghunandana / samutthāsyanti harayaḥ suptā nidrākṣaye yathā // 6.108.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suhṛdbhir bāndhavaiś caiva jñātibhiḥ svajanena ca / sarva eva sameṣyanti saṃyuktāḥ parayā mudā // 6.108.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akāle puṣpaśabalāḥ phalavantaś ca pādapāḥ / bhaviṣyanti maheṣvāsa nadyaś ca salilāyutāḥ // 6.108.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
savraṇaiḥ prathamaṃ gātraiḥ saṃvṛtair nivraṇaiḥ punaḥ / babhūvur vānarāḥ sarve kim etad iti vismitaḥ // 6.108.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kākutsthaṃ paripūrṇārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve surottamāḥ / ūcus te prathamaṃ stutvā stavārhaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam // 6.108.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gacchāyodhyām ito vīra visarjaya ca vānarān / maithilīṃ sāntvayasvainām anuraktāṃ tapasvinīm // 6.108.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātaraṃ paśya bharataṃ tvacchokād vratacāriṇam / abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ paurān gatvā praharṣaya // 6.108.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tam āmantrya rāmaṃ saumitriṇā saha / vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃkāśair hṛṣṭā jagmuḥ surā divam // 6.108.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādya ca kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tāṃs tridaśottamān / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vāsam ājñāpayat tadā // 6.108.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu sā lakṣmaṇarāmapālitā; mahācamūr hṛṣṭajanā yaśasvinī / śriyā jvalantī virarāja sarvato; niśāpraṇīteva hi śītaraśminā // 6.108.019	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tāṃ rātrim uṣitaṃ rāmaṃ sukhotthitam ariṃdamam / abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ jayaṃ pṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.109.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snānāni cāṅgarāgāṇi vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca / candanāni ca divyāni mālyāni vividhāni ca // 6.109.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaṃkāravidaś cemā nāryaḥ padmanibhekṣaṇāḥ / upasthitās tvāṃ vidhivat snāpayiṣyanti rāghava // 6.109.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam / harīn sugrīvamukhyāṃs tvaṃ snānenopanimantraya // 6.109.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu tāmyati dharmātmā mamahetoḥ sukhocitaḥ / sukumāro mahābāhuḥ kumāraḥ satyasaṃśravaḥ // 6.109.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ vinā kaikeyīputraṃ bharataṃ dharmacāriṇam / na me snānaṃ bahumataṃ vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca // 6.109.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ita eva pathā kṣipraṃ pratigacchāma tāṃ purīm / ayodhyām āyato hy eṣa panthāḥ paramadurgamaḥ // 6.109.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu kākutsthaṃ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ / ahnā tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi tāṃ purīṃ pārthivātmaja // 6.109.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpakaṃ nāma bhadraṃ te vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham / mama bhrātuḥ kuberasya rāvaṇenāhṛtaṃ balāt // 6.109.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad idaṃ meghasaṃkāśaṃ vimānam iha tiṣṭhati / tena yāsyasi yānena tvam ayodhyāṃ gajajvaraḥ // 6.109.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ te yady anugrāhyo yadi smarasi me guṇān / vasa tāvad iha prājña yady asti mayi sauhṛdam // 6.109.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā / arcitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ tato rāma gamiṣyasi // 6.109.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prītiyuktas tu me rāma sasainyaḥ sasuhṛdgaṇaḥ / satkriyāṃ vihitāṃ tāvad gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mayodyatām // 6.109.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praṇayād bahumānāc ca sauhṛdena ca rāghava / prasādayāmi preṣyo 'haṃ na khalv ājñāpayāmi te // 6.109.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tato rāmaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam / rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ copaśṛṇvatām // 6.109.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjito 'haṃ tvayā vīra sācivyena paraṃtapa / sarvātmanā ca ceṣṭibhiḥ sauhṛdenottamena ca // 6.109.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na khalv etan na kuryāṃ te vacanaṃ rākṣaseśvara / taṃ tu me bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ bharataṃ tvarate manaḥ // 6.109.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃ nivartayituṃ yo 'sau citrakūṭam upāgataḥ / śirasā yācato yasya vacanaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā // 6.109.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ ca yaśasvinīm / gurūṃś ca suhṛdaś caiva paurāṃś ca tanayaiḥ saha // 6.109.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ vimānaṃ rākṣaseśvara / kṛtakāryasya me vāsaḥ kathaṃ cid iha saṃmataḥ // 6.109.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujānīhi māṃ saumya pūjito 'smi vibhīṣaṇa / manyur na khalu kartavyas tvaritas tvānumānaye // 6.109.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kāñcanacitrāṅgaṃ vaidūryamaṇivedikam / kūṭāgāraiḥ parikṣiptaṃ sarvato rajataprabham // 6.109.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇḍurābhiḥ patākābhir dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtam / śobhitaṃ kāñcanair harmyair hemapadmavibhūṣitam // 6.109.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prakīrṇaṃ kiṅkiṇījālair muktāmaṇigavākṣitam / ghaṇṭājālaiḥ parikṣiptaṃ sarvato madhurasvanam // 6.109.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan meruśikharākāraṃ nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā / bahubhir bhūṣitaṃ harmyair muktārajatasaṃnibhau // 6.109.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
talaiḥ sphaṭikacitrāṅgair vaidūryaiś ca varāsanaiḥ / mahārhāstaraṇopetair upapannaṃ mahādhanaiḥ // 6.109.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upasthitam anādhṛṣyaṃ tad vimānaṃ manojavam / nivedayitvā rāmāya tasthau tatra vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.109.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upasthitaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṣpakaṃ puṣpabhūṣitam / avidūre sthitaṃ rāmaṃ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.110.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu baddhāñjaliḥ prahvo vinīto rākṣaseśvaraḥ / abravīt tvarayopetaḥ kiṃ karomīti rāghavam // 6.110.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam abravīn mahātejā lakṣmaṇasyopaśṛṇvataḥ / vimṛśya rāghavo vākyam idaṃ snehapuraskṛtam // 6.110.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtaprayatnakarmāṇo vibhīṣaṇa vanaukasaḥ / ratnair arthaiś ca vivibhair bhūṣaṇaiś cābhipūjaya // 6.110.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahaibhir arditā laṅkā nirjitā rākṣaseśvara / hṛṣṭaiḥ prāṇabhayaṃ tyaktvā saṃgrāmeṣv anivartibhiḥ // 6.110.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ saṃmānitāś ceme mānārhā mānada tvayā / bhaviṣyanti kṛtajñena nirvṛtā hariyūthapāḥ // 6.110.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyāginaṃ saṃgrahītāraṃ sānukrośaṃ yaśasvinam / yatas tvām avagacchanti tataḥ saṃbodhayāmi te // 6.110.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vānarāṃs tān vibhīṣaṇaḥ / ratnārthaiḥ saṃvibhāgena sarvān evānvapūjayat // 6.110.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tān pūjitān dṛṣṭvā ratnair arthaiś ca yūthapān / āruroha tato rāmas tad vimānam anuttamam // 6.110.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ lajjamānāṃ yaśasvinīm / lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vikrāntena dhanuṣmatā // 6.110.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca vimānasthaḥ kākutsthaḥ sarvavānarān / sugrīvaṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ rākṣasaṃ ca vibhīṣaṇam // 6.110.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mitrakāryaṃ kṛtam idaṃ bhavadbhir vānarottamāḥ / anujñātā mayā sarve yatheṣṭaṃ pratigacchata // 6.110.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tu kāryaṃ vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa / kṛtaṃ sugrīva tat sarvaṃ bhavatā dharmabhīruṇā // 6.110.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṣkindhāṃ pratiyāhy āśu svasainyenābhisaṃvṛtaḥ // 6.110.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svarājye vasa laṅkāyāṃ mayā datte vibhīṣaṇa / na tvāṃ dharṣayituṃ śaktāḥ sendrā api divaukasaḥ // 6.110.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyāṃ pratiyāsyāmi rājadhānīṃ pitur mama / abhyanujñātum icchāmi sarvān āmantrayāmi vaḥ // 6.110.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktās tu rāmeṇa vānarās te mahābalāḥ / ūcuḥ prāñjalayo rāmaṃ rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.110.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyāṃ gantum icchāmaḥ sarvān nayatu no bhavān // 6.110.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā tvām abhiṣekārdraṃ kausalyām abhivādya ca / acireṇāgamiṣyāmaḥ svān gṛhān nṛpateḥ suta // 6.110.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu dharmātmā vānaraiḥ savibhīṣaṇaiḥ / abravīd rāghavaḥ śrīmān sasugrīvavibhīṣaṇān // 6.110.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyāt priyataraṃ labdhaṃ yad ahaṃ sasuhṛjjanaḥ / sarvair bhavadbhiḥ sahitaḥ prītiṃ lapsye purīṃ gataḥ // 6.110.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣipram āroha sugrīva vimānaṃ vānaraiḥ saha / tvam adhyāroha sāmātyo rākṣasendravibhīṣaṇa // 6.110.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tat puṣpakaṃ divyaṃ sugrīvaḥ saha senayā / adhyārohat tvarañ śīghraṃ sāmātyaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.110.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣv ārūḍheṣu sarveṣu kauberaṃ paramāsanam / rāghaveṇābhyanujñātam utpapāta vihāyasaṃ // 6.110.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yayau tena vimānena haṃsayuktena bhāsvatā / prahṛṣṭaś ca pratītaś ca babhau rāmaḥ kuberavat // 6.110.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anujñātaṃ tu rāmeṇa tad vimānam anuttamam / utpapāta mahāmeghaḥ śvasanenoddhato yathā // 6.111.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pātayitvā tataś cakṣuḥ sarvato raghunandanaḥ / abravīn maithilīṃ sītāṃ rāmaḥ śaśinibhānanām // 6.111.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kailāsaśikharākāre trikūṭaśikhare sthitām / laṅkām īkṣasva vaidehi nirmitāṃ viśvakarmaṇā // 6.111.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad āyodhanaṃ paśya māṃsaśoṇitakardamam / harīṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sīte viśasanaṃ mahat // 6.111.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavahetor viśālākṣi rāvaṇo nihato mayā / kumbhakarṇo 'tra nihataḥ prahastaś ca niśācaraḥ // 6.111.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇenendrajic cātra rāvaṇir nihato raṇe / virūpākṣaś ca duṣprekṣyo mahāpārśvamahodarau // 6.111.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akampanaś ca nihato balino 'nye ca rākṣasāḥ / triśirāś cātikāyaś ca devāntakanarāntakau // 6.111.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra mandodarī nāma bhāryā taṃ paryadevayat / sapatnīnāṃ sahasreṇa sāsreṇa parivāritā // 6.111.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat tu dṛśyate tīrthaṃ samudrasya varānane / yatra sāgaram uttīrya tāṃ rātrim uṣitā vayam // 6.111.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa setur mayā baddhaḥ sāgare salilārṇave / tavahetor viśālākṣi nalasetuḥ suduṣkaraḥ // 6.111.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya sāgaram akṣobhyaṃ vaidehi varuṇālayam / apāram abhigarjantaṃ śaṅkhaśuktiniṣevitam // 6.111.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hiraṇyanābhaṃ śailendraṃ kāñcanaṃ paśya maithili / viśramārthaṃ hanumato bhittvā sāgaram utthitam // 6.111.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra rākṣasarājo 'yam ājagāma vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.111.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā sā dṛśyate sīte kiṣkindhā citrakānanā / sugrīvasya purī ramyā yatra vālī mayā hataḥ // 6.111.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛśyate 'sau mahān sīte savidyud iva toyadaḥ / ṛśyamūko giriśreṣṭhaḥ kāñcanair dhātubhir vṛtaḥ // 6.111.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atrāhaṃ vānarendreṇa sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ / samayaś ca kṛtaḥ sīte vadhārthaṃ vālino mayā // 6.111.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā sā dṛśyate pampā nalinī citrakānanā / tvayā vihīno yatrāhaṃ vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ // 6.111.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asyās tīre mayā dṛṣṭā śabarī dharmacāriṇī / atra yojanabāhuś ca kabandho nihato mayā // 6.111.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛśyate 'sau janasthāne sīte śrīmān vanaspatiḥ / yatra yuddhaṃ mahad vṛttaṃ tavahetor vilāsini // 6.111.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya nṛśaṃsasya jaṭāyoś ca mahātmanaḥ // 6.111.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kharaś ca nihataś saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ / triśirāś ca mahāvīryo mayā bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ // 6.111.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parṇaśālā tathā citrā dṛśyate śubhadarśanā / yatra tvaṃ rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt // 6.111.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā godāvarī ramyā prasannasalilā śivā / agastyasyāśramo hy eṣa dṛśyate paśya maithili // 6.111.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehi dṛśyate cātra śarabhaṅgāśramo mahān / upayātaḥ sahasrākṣo yatra śakraḥ puraṃdaraḥ // 6.111.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete te tāpasāvāsā dṛśyante tanumadhyame / atriḥ kulapatir yatra sūryavaiśvānaraprabhaḥ // 6.111.024.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra sīte tvayā dṛṣṭā tāpasī dharmacāriṇī // 6.111.024.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin deśe mahākāyo virādho nihato mayā // 6.111.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asau sutanuśailendraś citrakūṭaḥ prakāśate / yatra māṃ kaikayīputraḥ prasādayitum āgataḥ // 6.111.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā sā yamunā dūrād dṛśyate citrakānanā / bharadvājāśramo yatra śrīmān eṣa prakāśate // 6.111.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā tripathagā gaṅgā dṛśyate varavarṇini / śṛṅgaverapuraṃ caitad guho yatra samāgataḥ // 6.111.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā sā dṛśyate 'yodhyā rājadhānī pitur mama / ayodhyāṃ kuru vaidehi praṇāmaṃ punar āgatā // 6.111.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ / utpatyotpatya dadṛśus tāṃ purīṃ śubhadarśanām // 6.111.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu tāṃ pāṇḍuraharmyamālinīṃ; viśālakakṣyāṃ gajavājisaṃkulām / purīm ayodhyāṃ dadṛśuḥ plavaṃgamāḥ; purīṃ mahendrasya yathāmarāvatīm // 6.111.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
pūrṇe caturdaśe varṣe pañcabhyāṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / bharadvājāśramaṃ prāpya vavande niyato munim // 6.112.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'pṛcchad abhivādyainaṃ bharadvājaṃ tapodhanam / śṛṇoṣi ka cid bhagavan subhikṣānāmayaṃ pure // 6.112.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccic ca yukto bharato jīvanty api ca mātaraḥ // 6.112.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ / pratyuvāca raghuśreṣṭhaṃ smitapūrvaṃ prahṛṣṭavat // 6.112.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paṅkadigdhas tu bharato jaṭilas tvāṃ pratīkṣate / pāduke te puraskṛtya sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ gṛhe // 6.112.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvāṃ purā cīravasanaṃ praviśantaṃ mahāvanam / strītṛtīyaṃ cyutaṃ rājyād dharmakāmaṃ ca kevalam // 6.112.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padātiṃ tyaktasarvasvaṃ pitur vacanakāriṇam / svargabhogaiḥ parityaktaṃ svargacyutam ivāmaram // 6.112.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā tu karuṇā pūrvaṃ mamāsīt samitiṃjaya / kaikeyīvacane yuktaṃ vanyamūlaphalāśanam // 6.112.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāmprataṃ susamṛddhārthaṃ samitragaṇabāndhavam / samīkṣya vijitāriṃ tvāṃ mama prītir anuttamā // 6.112.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhaṃ te viditaṃ mama rāghava / yat tvayā vipulaṃ prāptaṃ janasthānavadhādikam // 6.112.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇārthe niyuktasya rakṣataḥ sarvatāpasān / mārīcadarśanaṃ caiva sītonmathanam eva ca // 6.112.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kabandhadarśanaṃ caiva pampābhigamanaṃ tathā / sugrīveṇa ca te sakhyaṃ yac ca vālī hatas tvayā // 6.112.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārgaṇaṃ caiva vaidehyāḥ karma vātātmajasya ca / viditāyāṃ ca vaidehyāṃ nalasetur yathā kṛtaḥ // 6.112.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā ca dīpitā laṅkā prahṛṣṭair hariyūthapaiḥ // 6.112.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saputrabāndhavāmātyaḥ sabalaḥ saha vāhanaḥ / yathā ca nihataḥ saṃkhye rāvaṇo devakaṇṭakaḥ // 6.112.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāgamaś ca tridaśair yathādattaś ca te varaḥ / sarvaṃ mamaitad viditaṃ tapasā dharmavatsala // 6.112.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham apy atra te dadmi varaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ vara / arghyaṃ pratigṛhāṇedam ayodhyāṃ śvo gamiṣyasi // 6.112.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tac chirasā vākyaṃ pratigṛhya nṛpātmajaḥ / bāḍham ity eva saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śrīmān varam ayācata // 6.112.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akālaphalino vṛkṣāḥ sarve cāpi madhusravāḥ / bhavantu mārge bhagavann ayodhyāṃ prati gacchataḥ // 6.112.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niṣphalāḥ phalinaś cāsan vipuṣpāḥ puṣpaśālinaḥ / śuṣkāḥ samagrapatrās te nagāś caiva madhusravāḥ // 6.112.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyāṃ tu samālokya cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ / cintayitvā tato dṛṣṭiṃ vānareṣu nyapātayat // 6.113.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyakāmaḥ priyaṃ rāmas tatas tvaritavikramam / uvāca dhīmāṃs tejasvī hanūmantaṃ plavaṃgamam // 6.113.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyāṃ tvarito gaccha kṣipraṃ tvaṃ plavagottama / jānīhi kaccit kuśalī jano nṛpatimandire // 6.113.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṅgaverapuraṃ prāpya guhaṃ gahanagocaram / niṣādādhipatiṃ brūhi kuśalaṃ vacanān mama // 6.113.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu māṃ kuśalinam arogaṃ vigatajvaram / bhaviṣyati guhaḥ prītaḥ sa mamātmasamaḥ sakhā // 6.113.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyāyāś ca te mārgaṃ pravṛttiṃ bharatasya ca / nivedayiṣyati prīto niṣādādhipatir guhaḥ // 6.113.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatas tu tvayā vācyaḥ kuśalaṃ vacanān mama / siddhārthaṃ śaṃsa māṃ tasmai sabhāryaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam // 6.113.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haraṇaṃ cāpi vaidehyā rāvaṇena balīyasā / sugrīveṇa ca saṃvādaṃ vālinaś ca vadhaṃ raṇe // 6.113.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maithilyanveṣaṇaṃ caiva yathā cādhigatā tvayā / laṅghayitvā mahātoyam āpagāpatim avyayam // 6.113.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upayānaṃ samudrasya sāgarasya ca darśanam / yathā ca kāritaḥ setū rāvaṇaś ca yathā hataḥ // 6.113.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varadānaṃ mahendreṇa brahmaṇā varuṇena ca / mahādevaprasādāc ca pitrā mama samāgamam // 6.113.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jitvā śatrugaṇān rāmaḥ prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ / upayāti samṛddhārthaḥ saha mitrair mahābalaḥ // 6.113.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā yamākāraṃ bhajate bharatas tataḥ / sa ca te veditavyaḥ syāt sarvaṃ yac cāpi māṃ prati // 6.113.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jñeyāḥ sarve ca vṛttāntā bharatasyeṅgitāni ca / tattvena mukhavarṇena dṛṣṭyā vyābhāṣaṇena ca // 6.113.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvakāmasamṛddhaṃ hi hastyaśvarathasaṃkulam / pitṛpaitāmahaṃ rājyaṃ kasya nāvartayen manaḥ // 6.113.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃgatyā bharataḥ śrīmān rājyenārthī svayaṃ bhavet / praśāstu vasudhāṃ sarvām akhilāṃ raghunandanaḥ // 6.113.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya buddhiṃ ca vijñāya vyavasāyaṃ ca vānara / yāvan na dūraṃ yātāḥ smaḥ kṣipram āgantum arhasi // 6.113.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti pratisamādiṣṭo hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ / mānuṣaṃ dhārayan rūpam ayodhyāṃ tvarito yayau // 6.113.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅghayitvā pitṛpathaṃ bhujagendrālayaṃ śubham / gaṅgāyamunayor bhīmaṃ saṃnipātam atītya ca // 6.113.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṅgaverapuraṃ prāpya guham āsādya vīryavān / sa vācā śubhayā hṛṣṭo hanūmān idam abravīt // 6.113.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakhā tu tava kākutstho rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / sasītaḥ saha saumitriḥ sa tvāṃ kuśalam abravīt // 6.113.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pañcamīm adya rajanīm uṣitvā vacanān muneḥ / bharadvājābhyanujñātaṃ drakṣyasy adyaiva rāghavam // 6.113.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā mahātejāḥ saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ / utpapāta mahāvego vegavān avicārayan // 6.113.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'paśyad rāmatīrthaṃ ca nadīṃ vālukinīṃ tathā / gomatīṃ tāṃ ca so 'paśyad bhīmaṃ sālavanaṃ tathā // 6.113.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ tvaritaḥ kapikuñjaraḥ / āsasāda drumān phullān nandigrāmasamīpajān // 6.113.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krośamātre tv ayodhyāyāś cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaram / dadarśa bharataṃ dīnaṃ kṛśam āśramavāsinam // 6.113.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭilaṃ maladigdhāṅgaṃ bhrātṛvyasanakarśitam / phalamūlāśinaṃ dāntaṃ tāpasaṃ dharmacāriṇam // 6.113.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samunnatajaṭābhāraṃ valkalājinavāsasaṃ / niyataṃ bhāvitātmānaṃ brahmarṣisamatejasaṃ // 6.113.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāduke te puraskṛtya śāsantaṃ vai vasuṃdharām / caturvarṇyasya lokasya trātāraṃ sarvato bhayāt // 6.113.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upasthitam amātyaiś ca śucibhiś ca purohitaiḥ / balamukhyaiś ca yuktaiś ca kāṣāyāmbaradhāribhiḥ // 6.113.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi te rājaputraṃ taṃ cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaram / parimoktuṃ vyavasyanti paurā vai dharmavatsalāḥ // 6.113.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dharmam iva dharmajñaṃ devavantam ivāparam / uvāca prāñjalir vākayṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ // 6.113.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasantaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye yaṃ tvaṃ cīrajaṭādharam / anuśocasi kākutsthaṃ sa tvā kuśalam abravīt // 6.113.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyam ākhyāmi te deva śokaṃ tyakṣyasi dāruṇam / asmin muhūrte bhrātrā tvaṃ rāmeṇa saha saṃgataḥ // 6.113.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatya rāvaṇaṃ rāmaḥ pratilabhya ca maithilīm / upayāti samṛddhārthaḥ saha mitrair mahābalaiḥ // 6.113.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇaś ca mahātejā vaidehī ca yaśasvinī / sītā samagrā rāmeṇa mahendreṇa śacī yathā // 6.113.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto hanumatā bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ / papāta sahasā hṛṣṭo harṣān mohaṃ jagāma ha // 6.113.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato muhūrtād utthāya pratyāśvasya ca rāghavaḥ / hanūmantam uvācedaṃ bharataḥ priyavādinam // 6.113.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśokajaiḥ prītimayaiḥ kapim āliṅgya saṃbhramāt / siṣeca bharataḥ śrīmān vipulair aśrubindubhiḥ // 6.113.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devo vā mānuṣo vā tvam anukrośād ihāgataḥ / priyākhyānasya te saumya dadāmi bruvataḥ priyam // 6.113.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ ca grāmāṇāṃ ca śataṃ param / sakuṇḍalāḥ śubhācārā bhāryāḥ kanyāś ca ṣoḍaśa // 6.113.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hemavarṇāḥ sunāsorūḥ śaśisaumyānanāḥ striyaḥ / sarvābharaṇasaṃpannā saṃpannāḥ kulajātibhiḥ // 6.113.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśamya rāmāgamanaṃ nṛpātmajaḥ; kapipravīrasya tadādbhutopamam / praharṣito rāmadidṛkṣayābhavat; punaś ca harṣād idam abravīd vacaḥ // 6.113.043	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
bahūni nāma varṣāṇi gatasya sumahad vanam / śṛṇomy ahaṃ prītikaraṃ mama nāthasya kīrtanam // 6.114.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kalyāṇī bata gātheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me / eti jīvantam ānando naraṃ varṣaśatād api // 6.114.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya harīṇāṃ ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ / kasmin deśe kim āśritya tat tvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ // 6.114.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pṛṣṭo rājaputreṇa bṛsyāṃ samupaveśitaḥ / ācacakṣe tataḥ sarvaṃ rāmasya caritaṃ vane // 6.114.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā pravrajito rāmo mātur datte vare tava / yathā ca putraśokena rājā daśaratho mṛtaḥ // 6.114.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā dūtais tvam ānītas tūrṇaṃ rājagṛhāt prabho / tvayāyodhyāṃ praviṣṭena yathā rājyaṃ na cepsitam // 6.114.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
citrakūṭaṃ giriṃ gatvā rājyenāmitrakarśanaḥ / nimantritas tvayā bhrātā dharmam ācaritā satām // 6.114.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sthitena rājño vacane yathā rājyaṃ visarjitam / āryasya pāduke gṛhya yathāsi punar āgataḥ // 6.114.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvam etan mahābāho yathāvad viditaṃ tava / tvayi pratiprayāte tu yad vṛttaṃ tan nibodha me // 6.114.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apayāte tvayi tadā samudbhrāntamṛgadvijam / praviveśātha vijanaṃ sumahad daṇḍakāvanam // 6.114.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ purastād balavān gacchatāṃ gahane vane / vinadan sumahānādaṃ virādhaḥ pratyadṛśyata // 6.114.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam utkṣipya mahānādam ūrdhvabāhum adhomukham / nikhāte prakṣipanti sma nadantam iva kuñjaram // 6.114.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat kṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau / sāyāhne śarabhaṅgasya ramyam āśramam īyatuḥ // 6.114.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarabhaṅge divaṃ prāpte rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / abhivādya munīn sarvāñ janasthānam upāgamat // 6.114.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśasahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām / hatāni vasatā tatra rāghaveṇa mahātmanā // 6.114.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ paścāc chūrpaṇakhā rāmapārśvam upāgatā / tato rāmeṇa saṃdiṣṭo lakṣmaṇaḥ sahasotthitaḥ // 6.114.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pragṛhya khaḍgaṃ ciccheda karṇanāse mahābalaḥ / tatas tenārditā bālā rāvaṇaṃ samupāgatā // 6.114.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇānucaro ghoro mārīco nāma rākṣasaḥ / lobhayām āsa vaidehīṃ bhūtvā ratnamayo mṛgaḥ // 6.114.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā rāmam abravīd dṛṣṭvā vaidehī gṛhyatām iti / aho manoharaḥ kānta āśrame no bhaviṣyati // 6.114.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmo dhanuṣpāṇir dhāvantam anudhāvati / sa taṃ jaghāna dhāvantaṃ śareṇānataparvaṇā // 6.114.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha saumyā daśagrīvo mṛgaṃ yāte tu rāghave / lakṣmaṇe cāpi niṣkrānte praviveśāśramaṃ tadā // 6.114.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jagrāha tarasā sītāṃ grahaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva // 6.114.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trātukāmaṃ tato yuddhe hatvā gṛdhraṃ jaṭāyuṣam / pragṛhya sītāṃ sahasā jagāmāśu sa rāvaṇaḥ // 6.114.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tv adbhutasaṃkāśāḥ sthitāḥ parvatamūrdhani / sītāṃ gṛhītvā gacchantaṃ vānarāḥ parvatopamāḥ // 6.114.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadṛśur vismitās tatra rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam // 6.114.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviverśa tadā laṅkāṃ rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ // 6.114.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ suvarṇaparikrānte śubhe mahati veśmani / praveśya maithilīṃ vākyaiḥ sāntvayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ // 6.114.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivartamānaḥ kākutstho dṛṣṭvā gṛdhraṃ pravivyathe // 6.114.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛdhraṃ hataṃ tadā dagdhvā rāmaḥ priyasakhaṃ pituḥ / godāvarīm anucaran vanoddeśāṃś ca puṣpitān // 6.114.027.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsedatur mahāraṇye kabandhaṃ nāma rākṣasaṃ // 6.114.027.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kabandhavacanād rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ / ṛśyamūkaṃ giriṃ gatvā sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ // 6.114.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayoḥ samāgamaḥ pūrvaṃ prītyā hārdo vyajāyata / itaretara saṃvādāt pragāḍhaḥ praṇayas tayoḥ // 6.114.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaḥ svabāhuvīryeṇa svarājyaṃ pratyapādayat / vālinaṃ samare hatvā mahākāyaṃ mahābalam // 6.114.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvaḥ sthāpito rājye sahitaḥ sarvavānaraiḥ / rāmāya pratijānīte rājaputryās tu mārgaṇam // 6.114.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādiṣṭā vānarendreṇa sugrīveṇa mahātmanā / daśakoṭyaḥ plavaṃgānāṃ sarvāḥ prasthāpitā diśaḥ // 6.114.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ no vipranaṣṭānāṃ vindhye parvatasattame / bhṛśaṃ śokābhitaptānāṃ mahān kālo 'tyavartata // 6.114.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātā tu gṛdhrarājasya saṃpātir nāma vīryavān / samākhyāti sma vasatiṃ sītāyā rāvaṇālaye // 6.114.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ duḥkhaparītānāṃ duḥkhaṃ tajjñātināṃ nudan / ātmavīryaṃ samāsthāya yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ // 6.114.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāham ekām adrākṣam aśokavanikāṃ gatām / kauśeyavastrāṃ malināṃ nirānandāṃ dṛḍhavratām // 6.114.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayā sametya vidhivat pṛṣṭvā sarvam aninditām / abhijñānaṃ maṇiṃ labdhvā caritārtho 'ham āgataḥ // 6.114.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā ca punar āgamya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / abhijñānaṃ mayā dattam arciṣmān sa mahāmaṇiḥ // 6.114.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tāṃ maithilīṃ hṛṣṭas tv āśaśaṃse sa jīvitam / jīvitāntam anuprāptaḥ pītvāmṛtam ivāturaḥ // 6.114.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udyojayiṣyann udyogaṃ dadhre laṅkāvadhe manaḥ / jighāṃsur iva lokāṃs te sarvāṃl lokān vibhāvasuḥ // 6.114.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ samudram āsādya nalaṃ setum akārayat / atarat kapivīrāṇāṃ vāhinī tena setunā // 6.114.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahastam avadhīn nīlaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ tu rāghavaḥ / lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇasutaṃ svayaṃ rāmas tu rāvaṇam // 6.114.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śakreṇa samāgamya yamena varuṇena ca / surarṣibhiś ca kākutstho varāṃl lebhe paraṃtapaḥ // 6.114.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dattavaraḥ prītyā vānaraiś ca samāgataḥ / puṣpakeṇa vimānena kiṣkindhām abhyupāgamat // 6.114.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ gaṅgāṃ punar āsādya vasantaṃ munisaṃnidhau / avighnaṃ puṣyayogena śvo rāmaṃ draṣṭum arhasi // 6.114.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa satyaṃ hanumadvaco mahan; niśamya hṛṣṭo bharataḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ / uvāca vāṇīṃ manasaḥ praharṣiṇī; cirasya pūrṇaḥ khalu me manorathaḥ // 6.114.046	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
śrutvā tu param ānandaṃ bharataḥ satyavikramaḥ / hṛṣṭam ājñāpayām āsa śatrughnaṃ paravīrahā // 6.115.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daivatāni ca sarvāṇi caityāni nagarasya ca / sugandhamālyair vāditrair arcantu śucayo narāḥ // 6.115.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājadārās tathāmātyāḥ sainyāḥ senāgaṇāṅganāḥ / abhiniryāntu rāmasya draṣṭuṃ śaśinibhaṃ mukham // 6.115.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā śatrughnaḥ paravīrahā / viṣṭīr anekasāhasrīś codayām āsa vīryavān // 6.115.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samīkuruta nimnāni viṣamāṇi samāni ca / sthānāni ca nirasyantāṃ nandigrāmād itaḥ param // 6.115.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siñcantu pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ himaśītena vāriṇā / tato 'bhyavakiraṃs tv anye lājaiḥ puṣpaiś ca sarvataḥ // 6.115.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samucchritapatākās tu rathyāḥ puravarottame / śobhayantu ca veśmāni sūryasyodayanaṃ prati // 6.115.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sragdāmamuktapuṣpaiś ca sugandhaiḥ pañcavarṇakaiḥ / rājamārgam asaṃbādhaṃ kirantu śataśo narāḥ // 6.115.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mattair nāgasahasraiś ca śātakumbhavibhūṣitaḥ / apare hemakakṣyābhiḥ sagajābhiḥ kareṇubhiḥ // 6.115.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niryayus tvarayā yuktā rathaiś ca sumahārathāḥ // 6.115.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yānāny upārūḍhāḥ sarvā daśarathastriyaḥ / kausalyāṃ pramukhe kṛtvā sumitrāṃ cāpi niryayuḥ // 6.115.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśvānāṃ khuraśabdena rathanemisvanena ca / śaṅkhadundubhinādena saṃcacāleva medinī // 6.115.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtsnaṃ ca nagaraṃ tat tu nandigrāmam upāgamat / dvijātimukhyair dharmātmā śreṇīmukhyaiḥ sanaigamaiḥ // 6.115.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mālyamodaka hastaiś ca mantribhir bharato vṛtaḥ / śaṅkhabherīninādaiś ca bandibhiś cābhivanditaḥ // 6.115.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āryapādau gṛhītvā tu śirasā dharmakovidaḥ / pāṇḍuraṃ chatram ādāya śuklamālyopaśobhitam // 6.115.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śukle ca vālavyajane rājārhe hemabhūṣite / upavāsakṛśo dīnaś cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaraḥ // 6.115.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātur āgamanaṃ śrutvā tat pūrvaṃ harṣam āgataḥ / pratyudyayau tadā rāmaṃ mahātmā sacivaiḥ saha // 6.115.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samīkṣya bharato vākyam uvāca pavanātmajam / kaccin na khalu kāpeyī sevyate calacittatā // 6.115.017.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi paśyāmi kākutsthaṃ rāmam āryaṃ paraṃtapam // 6.115.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athaivam ukte vacane hanūmān idam abravīt / arthaṃ vijñāpayann eva bharataṃ satyavikramam // 6.115.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadā phalān kusumitān vṛkṣān prāpya madhusravān / bharadvājaprasādena mattabhramaranāditān // 6.115.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya caiṣa varo datto vāsavena paraṃtapa / sasainyasya tadātithyaṃ kṛtaṃ sarvaguṇānvitam // 6.115.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nisvanaḥ śrūyate bhīmaḥ prahṛṣṭānāṃ vanaukasām / manye vānarasenā sā nadīṃ tarati gomatīm // 6.115.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rajovarṣaṃ samudbhūtaṃ paśya vālukinīṃ prati / manye sālavanaṃ ramyaṃ lolayanti plavaṃgamāḥ // 6.115.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad etad dṛśyate dūrād vimalaṃ candrasaṃnibham / vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ divyaṃ manasā brahmanirmitam // 6.115.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaṃ bāndhavaiḥ sārdhaṃ hatvā labdhaṃ mahātmanā / dhanadasya prasādena divyam etan manojavam // 6.115.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasmin bhrātarau vīrau vaidehyā saha rāghavau / sugrīvaś ca mahātejā rākṣasendro vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.115.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato harṣasamudbhūto nisvano divam aspṛśat / strībālayuvavṛddhānāṃ rāmo 'yam iti kīrtitaḥ // 6.115.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathakuñjaravājibhyas te 'vatīrya mahīṃ gatāḥ / dadṛśus taṃ vimānasthaṃ narāḥ somam ivāmbare // 6.115.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāñjalir bharato bhūtvā prahṛṣṭo rāghavonmukhaḥ / svāgatena yathārthena tato rāmam apūjayat // 6.115.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manasā brahmaṇā sṛṣṭe vimāne lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ / rarāja pṛthudīrghākṣo vajrapāṇir ivāparaḥ // 6.115.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vimānāgragataṃ bharato bhrātaraṃ tadā / vavande praṇato rāmaṃ merustham iva bhāskaram // 6.115.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āropito vimānaṃ tad bharataḥ satyavikramaḥ / rāmam āsādya muditaḥ punar evābhyavādayat // 6.115.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ samutthāpya kākutsthaś cirasyākṣipathaṃ gatam / aṅke bharatam āropya muditaḥ pariṣaṣvaje // 6.115.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato lakṣmaṇam āsādya vaidehīṃ ca paraṃtapaḥ / abhyavādayata prīto bharato nāma cābravīt // 6.115.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvaṃ kaikayī putro jāmbavantaṃ tathāṅgadam / maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ nīlam ṛṣabhaṃ caiva sasvaje // 6.115.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te kṛtvā mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / kuśalaṃ paryapṛṣhanta prahṛṣṭā bharataṃ tadā // 6.115.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇaṃ ca bharataḥ sāntvayan vākyam abravīt / diṣṭyā tvayā sahāyena kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram // 6.115.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughnaś ca tadā rāmam abhivādya salakṣmaṇam / sītāyāś caraṇau paścād vavande vinayānvitaḥ // 6.115.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo mātaram āsādya viṣaṇṇaṃ śokakarśitām / jagrāha praṇataḥ pādau mano mātuḥ prasādayan // 6.115.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādya sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ ca yaśasvinīm / sa mātṝś ca tadā sarvāḥ purohitam upāgamat // 6.115.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svāgataṃ te mahābāho kausalyānandavardhana / iti prāñjalayaḥ sarve nāgarā rāmam abruvan // 6.115.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tany añjalisahasrāṇi pragṛhītāni nāgaraiḥ / ākośānīva padmāni dadarśa bharatāgrajaḥ // 6.115.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāduke te tu rāmasya gṛhītvā bharataḥ svayam / caraṇābhyāṃ narendrasya yojayām āsa dharmavit // 6.115.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ bharataḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ / etat te rakṣitaṃ rājan rājyaṃ niryātitaṃ mayā // 6.115.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya janma kṛtārthaṃ me saṃvṛttaś ca manorathaḥ / yas tvāṃ paśyāmi rājānam ayodhyāṃ punar āgatam // 6.115.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avekṣatāṃ bhavān kośaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ puraṃ balam / bhavatas tejasā sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ daśaguṇaṃ mayā // 6.115.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhrātṛvatsalam / mumucur vānarā bāṣpaṃ rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.115.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ praharṣād bharatam aṅkam āropya rāghavaḥ / yayau tena vimānena sasainyo bharatāśramam // 6.115.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatāśramam āsādya sasainyo rāghavas tadā / avatīrya vimānāgrād avatasthe mahītale // 6.115.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca tadā rāmas tadvimānam anuttamam / vaha vaiśravaṇaṃ devam anujānāmi gamyatām // 6.115.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmābhyanujñātaṃ tadvimānam anuttamam / uttarāṃ diśam uddiśya jagāma dhanadālayam // 6.115.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purohitasyātmasamasya rāghavo; bṛhaspateḥ śakra ivāmarādhīaph / nipīḍya pādau pṛthag āsane śubhe; sahaiva tenopaviveśa vīryavān // 6.115.051	upajāti (jagatī: vaṃśastha [jtjr], ajñātam [jtjm]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
śirasy añjalim ādāya kaikeyīnandivardhanaḥ / babhāṣe bharato jyeṣṭhaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam // 6.116.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama / tad dadāmi punas tubhyaṃ yathā tvam adadā mama // 6.116.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhuram ekākinā nyastām ṛṣabheṇa balīyasā / kiśoravad guruṃ bhāraṃ na voḍhum aham utsahe // 6.116.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vārivegena mahatā bhinnaḥ setur iva kṣaran / durbandhanam idaṃ manye rājyacchidram asaṃvṛtam // 6.116.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatiṃ khara ivāśvasya haṃsasyeva ca vāyasaḥ / nānvetum utsahe deva tava mārgam ariṃdama // 6.116.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā ca ropito vṛkṣo jātaś cāntarniveśane / mahāṃś ca sudurāroho mahāskandhaḥ praśākhavān // 6.116.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīryeta puṣpito bhūtvā na phalāni pradarśayet / tasya nānubhaved arthaṃ yasya hetoḥ sa ropyate // 6.116.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi / yady asmān manujendra tvaṃ bhaktān bhṛtyān na śādhi hi // 6.116.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jagad adyābhiṣiktaṃ tvām anupaśyatu sarvataḥ / pratapantam ivādityaṃ madhyāhne dīptatejasaṃ // 6.116.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tūryasaṃghātanirghoṣaiḥ kāñcīnūpuranisvanaiḥ / madhurair gītaśabdaiś ca pratibudhyasva śeṣva ca // 6.116.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvad āvartate cakraṃ yāvatī ca vasuṃdharā / tāvat tvam iha sarvasya svāmitvam abhivartaya // 6.116.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ / tatheti pratijagrāha niṣasādāsane śubhe // 6.116.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śatrughnavacanān nipuṇāḥ śmaśruvardhakāḥ / sukhahastāḥ suśīghrāś ca rāghavaṃ paryupāsata // 6.116.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvaṃ tu bharate snāte lakṣmaṇe ca mahābale / sugrīve vānarendre ca rākṣasendre vibhīṣaṇe // 6.116.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśodhitajaṭaḥ snātaś citramālyānulepanaḥ / mahārhavasanopetas tasthau tatra śriyā jvalan // 6.116.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratikarma ca rāmasya kārayām āsa vīryavān / lakṣmaṇasya ca lakṣmīvān ikṣvākukulavardhanaḥ // 6.116.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratikarma ca sītāyāḥ sarvā daśarathastriyaḥ / ātmanaiva tadā cakrur manasvinyo manoharam // 6.116.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāghavapatnīnāṃ sarvāsām eva śobhanam / cakāra yatnāt kausalyā prahṛṣṭā putravatsalā // 6.116.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śatrughnavacanāt sumantro nāma sārathiḥ / yojayitvābhicakrāma rathaṃ sarvāṅgaśobhanam // 6.116.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arkamaṇḍalasaṃkāśaṃ divyaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ sthitam / āruroha mahābāhū rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ // 6.116.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyāyāṃ tu sacivā rājño daśarathasya ye / purohitaṃ puraskṛtya mantrayām āsur arthavat // 6.116.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantrayan rāmavṛddhyarthaṃ vṛttyarthaṃ nagarasya ca / sarvam evābhiṣekārthaṃ jayārhasya mahātmanaḥ // 6.116.022.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kartum arhatha rāmasya yad yan maṅgalapūrvakam // 6.116.022.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti te mantriṇaḥ sarve saṃdiśya tu purohitam / nagarān niryayus tūrṇaṃ rāmadarśanabuddhayaḥ // 6.116.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hariyuktaṃ sahasrākṣo ratham indra ivānaghaḥ / prayayau ratham āsthāya rāmo nagaram uttamam // 6.116.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jagrāha bharato raśmīñ śatrughnaś chatram ādade / lakṣmaṇo vyajanaṃ tasya mūrdhni saṃparyavījayat // 6.116.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvetaṃ ca vālavyajanaṃ sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ / aparaṃ candrasaṃkāśaṃ rākṣasendro vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.116.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣisaṃghair tadākāśe devaiś ca samarudgaṇaiḥ / stūyamānasya rāmasya śuśruve madhuradhvaniḥ // 6.116.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śatruṃjayaṃ nāma kuñjaraṃ parvatopamam / āruroha mahātejāḥ sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ // 6.116.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
navanāgasahasrāṇi yayur āsthāya vānarāḥ / mānuṣaṃ vigrahaṃ kṛtvā sarvābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ // 6.116.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkhaśabdapraṇādaiś ca dundubhīnāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ / prayayū puruṣavyāghras tāṃ purīṃ harmyamālinīm // 6.116.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadṛśus te samāyāntaṃ rāghavaṃ sapuraḥsaram / virājamānaṃ vapuṣā rathenātirathaṃ tadā // 6.116.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te vardhayitvā kākutsthaṃ rāmeṇa pratinanditāḥ / anujagmur mahātmānaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritam // 6.116.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amātyair brāhmaṇaiś caiva tathā prakṛtibhir vṛtaḥ / śriyā viruruce rāmo nakṣatrair iva candramāḥ // 6.116.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa purogāmibhis tūryais tālasvastikapāṇibhiḥ / pravyāharadbhir muditair maṅgalāni yayau vṛtaḥ // 6.116.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṣataṃ jātarūpaṃ ca gāvaḥ kanyās tathā dvijāḥ / narā modakahastāś ca rāmasya purato yayuḥ // 6.116.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sakhyaṃ ca rāmaḥ sugrīve prabhāvaṃ cānilātmaje / vānarāṇāṃ ca tat karma vyācacakṣe 'tha mantriṇām // 6.116.036.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā ca vismayaṃ jagmur ayodhyāpuravāsinaḥ // 6.116.036.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dyutimān etad ākhyāya rāmo vānarasaṃvṛtaḥ / hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇām ayodhyāṃ praviveśa ha // 6.116.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato hy abhyucchrayan paurāḥ patākās te gṛhe gṛhe / aikṣvākādhyuṣitaṃ ramyam āsasāda pitur gṛham // 6.116.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitur bhavanam āsādya praviśya ca mahātmanaḥ / kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ cābhyavādayat // 6.116.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīd rājaputro bharataṃ dharmiṇāṃ varam / athopahitayā vācā madhuraṃ raghunandanaḥ // 6.116.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yac ca madbhavanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sāśokavanikaṃ mahat / muktāvaidūryasaṃkīrṇaṃ sugrīvasya nivedaya // 6.116.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā bharataḥ satyavikramaḥ / pāṇau gṛhītvā sugrīvaṃ praviveśa tam ālayam // 6.116.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tailapradīpāṃś ca paryaṅkāstaraṇāni ca / gṛhītvā viviśuḥ kṣipraṃ śatrughnena pracoditāḥ // 6.116.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca ca mahātejāḥ sugrīvaṃ rāghavānujaḥ / abhiṣekāya rāmasya dūtān ājñāpaya prabho // 6.116.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sauvarṇān vānarendrāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ caturo ghaṭān / dadau kṣipraṃ sa sugrīvaḥ sarvaratnavibhūṣitān // 6.116.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā pratyūṣasamaye caturṇāṃ sāgarāmbhasām / pūrṇair ghaṭaiḥ pratīkṣadhvaṃ tathā kuruta vānarāḥ // 6.116.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā mahātmāno vānarā vāraṇopamāḥ / utpetur gaganaṃ śīghraṃ garuḍā iva śīghragāḥ // 6.116.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbavāṃś ca hanūmāṃś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ / ṛṣabhaś caiva kalaśāñ jalapūrṇān athānayan // 6.116.048.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nadīśatānāṃ pañcānāṃ jale kumbhair upāharan // 6.116.048.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvāt samudrāt kalaśaṃ jalapūrṇam athānayat / suṣeṇaḥ sattvasaṃpannaḥ sarvaratnavibhūṣitam // 6.116.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣabho dakṣiṇāt tūrṇaṃ samudrāj jalam āharat // 6.116.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
raktacandanakarpūraiḥ saṃvṛtaṃ kāñcanaṃ ghaṭam / gavayaḥ paścimāt toyam ājahāra mahārṇavāt // 6.116.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ratnakumbhena mahatā śītaṃ mārutavikramaḥ / uttarāc ca jalaṃ śīghraṃ garuḍānilavikramaḥ // 6.116.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣekāya rāmasya śatrughnaḥ sacivaiḥ saha / purohitāya śreṣṭhāya suhṛdbhyaś ca nyavedayat // 6.116.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa prayato vṛddho vasiṣṭho brāhmaṇaiḥ saha / rāmaṃ ratnamayo pīṭhe sahasītaṃ nyaveśayat // 6.116.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ / kātyāyanaḥ suyajñaś ca gautamo vijayas tathā // 6.116.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhyaṣiñcan naravyāghraṃ prasannena sugandhinā / salilena sahasrākṣaṃ vasavo vāsavaṃ yathā // 6.116.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛtvigbhir brāhmaṇaiḥ pūrvaṃ kanyābhir mantribhis tathā / yodhaiś caivābhyaṣiñcaṃs te saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ sanaigamaiḥ // 6.116.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvauṣadhirasaiś cāpi daivatair nabhasi sthitaiḥ / caturhir lokapālaiś ca sarvair devaiś ca saṃgataiḥ // 6.116.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
chatraṃ tasya ca jagrāha śatrughnaḥ pāṇḍuraṃ śubham / śvetaṃ ca vālavyajanaṃ sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ // 6.116.059.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aparaṃ candrasaṃkāśaṃ rākṣasendro vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 6.116.059.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mālāṃ jvalantīṃ vapuṣā kāñcanīṃ śatapuṣkarām / rāghavāya dadau vāyur vāsavena pracoditaḥ // 6.116.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaratnasamāyuktaṃ maṇiratnavibhūṣitam / muktāhāraṃ narendrāya dadau śakrapracoditaḥ // 6.116.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajagur devagandharvā nanṛtuś cāpsaro gaṇāḥ / abhiṣeke tad arhasya tadā rāmasya dhīmataḥ // 6.116.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūmiḥ sasyavatī caiva phalavantaś ca pādapāḥ / gandhavanti ca puṣpāṇi babhūvū rāghavotsave // 6.116.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahasraśatam aśvānāṃ dhenūnāṃ ca gavāṃ tathā / dadau śataṃ vṛṣān pūrvaṃ dvijebhyo manujarṣabhaḥ // 6.116.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triṃśatkoṭīr hiraṇyasya brāhmaṇebhyo dadau punaḥ / nānābharaṇavastrāṇi mahārhāṇi ca rāghavaḥ // 6.116.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arkaraśmipratīkāśāṃ kāñcanīṃ maṇivigrahām / sugrīvāya srajaṃ divyāṃ prāyacchan manujarṣabhaḥ // 6.116.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidūryamaṇicitre ca vajraratnavibhūṣite / vāliputrāya dhṛtimān aṅgadāyāṅgade dadau // 6.116.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maṇipravarajuṣṭaṃ ca muktāhāram anuttamam / sītāyai pradadau rāmaś candraraśmisamaprabham // 6.116.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
araje vāsasī divye śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca / avekṣamāṇā vaidehī pradadau vāyusūnave // 6.116.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avamucyātmanaḥ kaṇṭhād dhāraṃ janakanandinī / avaikṣata harīn sarvān bhartāraṃ ca muhur muhuḥ // 6.116.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām iṅgitajñaḥ saṃprekṣya babhāṣe janakātmajām / pradehi subhage hāraṃ yasya tuṣṭāsi bhāmini // 6.116.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pauruṣaṃ vikramo buddhir yasminn etāni nityadā / dadau sā vāyuputrāya taṃ hāram asitekṣaṇā // 6.116.072	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmāṃs tena hāreṇa śuśubhe vānararṣabhaḥ / candrāṃśucayagaureṇa śvetābhreṇa yathācalaḥ // 6.116.073	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dvivida maindābhyāṃ nīlāya ca paraṃtapaḥ / sarvān kāmaguṇān vīkṣya pradadau vasudhādhipaḥ // 6.116.074	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvavānaravṛddhāś ca ye cānye vānareśvarāḥ / vāsobhir bhūṣaṇaiś caiva yathārhaṃ pratipūjitāḥ // 6.116.075	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathārhaṃ pūjitāḥ sarve kāmai ratnaiś ca puṣkalair / prahṛṣṭamanasaḥ sarve jagmur eva yathāgatam // 6.116.076	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavaḥ paramodāraḥ śaśāsa parayā mudā / uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo dharmajñaṃ dharmavatsalaḥ // 6.116.077	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ātiṣṭha dharmajña mayā sahemāṃ; gāṃ pūrvarājādhyuṣitāṃ balena / tulyaṃ mayā tvaṃ pitṛbhir dhṛtā yā; tāṃ yauvarājye dhuram udvahasva // 6.116.078	indravajrā [ttjgg]
sarvātmanā paryanunīyamāno; yadā na saumitrir upaiti yogam / niyujyamāno bhuvi yauvarājye; tato 'bhyaṣiñcad bharataṃ mahātmā // 6.116.079	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
rāghavaś cāpi dharmātmā prāpya rājyam anuttamam / īje bahuvidhair yajñaiḥ sasuhṛdbhrātṛbāndhavaḥ // 6.116.080	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pauṇḍarīkāśvamedhābhyāṃ vājapeyena cāsakṛt / anyaiś ca vividhair yajñair ayajat pārthivarṣabhaḥ // 6.116.081	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājyaṃ daśasahasrāṇi prāpya varṣāṇi rāghavaḥ / śatāśvamedhān ājahre sadaśvān bhūridakṣiṇān // 6.116.082	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājānulambibāhuś ca mahāskandhaḥ pratāpavān / lakṣmaṇānucaro rāmaḥ pṛthivīm anvapālayat // 6.116.083	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na paryadevan vidhavā na ca vyālakṛtaṃ bhayam / na vyādhijaṃ bhayaṃ vāpi rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // 6.116.084	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirdasyur abhaval loko nānarthaḥ kaṃ cid aspṛśat / na ca sma vṛddhā bālānāṃ pretakāryāṇi kurvate // 6.116.085	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaṃ muditam evāsīt sarvo dharmaparo 'bhavat / rāmam evānupaśyanto nābhyahiṃsan parasparam // 6.116.086	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsan varṣasahasrāṇi tathā putrasahasriṇaḥ / nirāmayā viśokāś ca rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // 6.116.087	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityapuṣpā nityaphalās taravaḥ skandhavistṛtāḥ / kālavarṣī ca parjanyaḥ sukhasparśaś ca mārutaḥ // 6.116.088	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svakarmasu pravartante tuṣṭhāḥ svair eva karmabhiḥ / āsan prajā dharmaparā rāme śāsati nānṛtāḥ // 6.116.089	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve lakṣaṇasaṃpannāḥ sarve dharmaparāyaṇāḥ / daśavarṣasahasrāṇi rāmo rājyam akārayat // 6.116.090	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptarājyasya rāmasya rākṣasānāṃ vadhe kṛte / ājagmur ṛṣayaḥ sarve rāghavaṃ pratinanditum // 7.001.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kauśiko 'tha yavakrīto raibhyaś cyavana eva ca / kaṇvo medhātitheḥ putraḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ye śritāḥ // 7.001.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svastyātreyaś ca bhagavān namuciḥ pramucus tathā / ājagmus te sahāgastyā ye śritā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam // 7.001.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣadguḥ kavaṣo dhaumyo raudreyaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ / te 'py ājagmuḥ saśiṣyā vai ye śritāḥ paścimāṃ diśam // 7.001.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapo 'thātrir viśvāmitro 'tha gautamaḥ / jamadagnir bharadvājas te 'pi saptamaharṣayaḥ // 7.001.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃprāpyaite mahātmāno rāghavasya niveśanam / viṣṭhitāḥ pratihārārthaṃ hutāśanasamaprabhāḥ // 7.001.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratihāras tatas tūrṇam agastyavacanād atha / samīpaṃ rāghavasyāśu praviveśa mahātmanaḥ // 7.001.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāmaṃ dṛśya sahasā pūrṇacandrasamadyutim / agastyaṃ kathayām āsa saṃprātam ṛṣibhiḥ saha // 7.001.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā prāptān munīṃs tāṃs tu bālasūryasamaprabhān / tadovāca nṛpo dvāḥsthaṃ praveśaya yathāsukham // 7.001.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā prāptān munīṃs tāṃs tu pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ / rāmo 'bhivādya prayata āsanāny ādideśa ha // 7.001.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣu kāñcanacitreṣu svāstīrṇeṣu sukheṣu ca / yathārham upaviṣṭās te āsaneṣv ṛṣipuṃgavāḥ // 7.001.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmeṇa kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭāḥ saśiṣyāḥ sapurogamāḥ / maharṣayo vedavido rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan // 7.001.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśalaṃ no mahābāho sarvatra raghunandana / tvāṃ tu diṣṭyā kuśalinaṃ paśyāmo hataśātravam // 7.001.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi bhāraḥ sa te rāma rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / sadhanus tvaṃ hi lokāṃs trīn vijayethā na saṃśayaḥ // 7.001.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā tvayā hato rāma rāvaṇaḥ putrapautravān / diṣṭyā vijayinaṃ tvādya paśyāmaḥ saha bhāryayā // 7.001.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā prahasto vikaṭo virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ / akampanaś ca durdharṣo nihatās te niśācarāḥ // 7.001.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya pramāṇād vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate / diṣṭyā te samare rāma kumbhakarṇo nipātitaḥ // 7.001.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā tvaṃ rākṣasendreṇa dvandvayuddham upāgataḥ / devatānām avadhyena vijayaṃ prāptavān asi // 7.001.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃkhye tasya na kiṃ cit tu rāvaṇasya parābhavaḥ / dvandvayuddham anuprāpto diṣṭyā te rāvaṇir hataḥ // 7.001.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā tasya mahābāho kālasyevābhidhāvataḥ / muktaḥ suraripor vīra prāptaś ca vijayas tvayā // 7.001.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vismayas tv eṣa naḥ saumya saṃśrutyendrajitaṃ hatam / avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ mahāmāyādharo yudhi // 7.001.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dattvā puṇyām imāṃ vīra saumyām abhayadakṣiṇām / diṣṭyā vardhasi kākutstha jayenāmitrakarśana // 7.001.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām / vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā rāmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // 7.001.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavantaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ ca niśācaram / atikramya mahāvīryau kiṃ praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim // 7.001.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahodaraṃ prahastaṃ ca virūpākṣaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ / atikramya mahāvīryān kiṃ praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim // 7.001.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kīdṛśo vai prabhāvo 'sya kiṃ balaṃ kaḥ parākramaḥ / kena vā kāraṇenaiṣa rāvaṇād atiricyate // 7.001.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śakyaṃ yadi mayā śrotuṃ na khalv ājñāpayāmi vaḥ / yadi guhyaṃ na ced vaktuṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām // 7.001.027.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ śakro jitas tena kathaṃ labdhavaraś ca saḥ // 7.001.027.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ / kumbhayonir mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.002.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ yasya tejobalaṃ mahat / jaghāna ca ripūn yuddhe yathāvadhyaś ca śatrubhiḥ // 7.002.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ te rāvaṇasyedaṃ kulaṃ janma ca rāghava / varapradānaṃ ca tathā tasmai dattaṃ bravīmi te // 7.002.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā kṛtayuge rāma prajāpatisutaḥ prabhuḥ / pulastyo nāma brahmarṣiḥ sākṣād iva pitāmahaḥ // 7.002.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānukīrtyā guṇās tasya dharmataḥ śīlatas tathā / prajāpateḥ putra iti vaktuṃ śakyaṃ hi nāmataḥ // 7.002.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dharmaprasaṅgena meroḥ pārśve mahāgireḥ / tṛṇabindvāśramaṃ gatvā nyavasan munipuṃgavaḥ // 7.002.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapas tepe sa dharmātmā svādhyāyaniyatendriyaḥ / gatvāśramapadaṃ tasya vighnaṃ kurvanti kanyakāḥ // 7.002.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devapannagakanyāś ca rājarṣitanayāś ca yāḥ / krīḍantyo 'psarasaś caiva taṃ deśam upapedire // 7.002.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvartuṣūpabhogyatvād ramyatvāt kānanasya ca / nityaśas tās tu taṃ deśaṃ gatvā krīḍanti kanyakāḥ // 7.002.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha ruṣṭo mahātejā vyājahāra mahāmuniḥ / yā me darśanam āgacchet sā garbhaṃ dhārayiṣyati // 7.002.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tās tu sarvāḥ pratigatāḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ / brahmaśāpabhayād bhītās taṃ deśaṃ nopacakramuḥ // 7.002.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tṛṇabindos tu rājarṣes tanayā na śṛṇoti tat / gatvāśramapadaṃ tasya vicacāra sunirbhayā // 7.002.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasminn eva tu kāle sa prājāpatyo mahān ṛṣiḥ / svādhyāyam akarot tatra tapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ // 7.002.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tu vedadhvaniṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā caiva tapodhanam / abhavat pāṇḍudehā sā suvyañjitaśarīrajā // 7.002.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā paramasaṃvignā sā tu tadrūpam ātmanaḥ / idaṃ me kiṃ nv iti jñātvā pitur gatvāgrataḥ sthitā // 7.002.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathā bhūtāṃ tṛṇabindur athābravīt / kiṃ tvam etat tv asadṛśaṃ dhārayasy ātmano vapuḥ // 7.002.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tu kṛtvāñjaliṃ dīnā kanyovāca tapodhanam / na jāne kāraṇaṃ tāta yena me rūpam īdṛśam // 7.002.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tu pūrvaṃ gatāsmy ekā maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ / pulastyasyāśramaṃ divyam anveṣṭuṃ svasakhījanam // 7.002.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca paśyāmy ahaṃ tatra kāṃ cid apy āgatāṃ sakhīm / rūpasya tu viparyāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāham ihāgatā // 7.002.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tṛṇabindus tu rājarṣis tapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ / dhyānaṃ viveśa tac cāpi apaśyad ṛṣikarmajam // 7.002.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu vijñāya taṃ śāpaṃ maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ / gṛhītvā tanayāṃ gatvā pulastyam idam abravīt // 7.002.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavaṃs tanayāṃ me tvaṃ guṇaiḥ svair eva bhūṣitām / bhikṣāṃ pratigṛhāṇemāṃ maharṣe svayam udyatām // 7.002.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapaścaraṇayuktasya śrāmyamāṇendriyasya te / śuśrūṣātatparā nityaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // 7.002.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājarṣiṃ dhārmikaṃ tadā / jighṛkṣur abravīt kanyāṃ bāḍham ity eva sa dvijaḥ // 7.002.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dattvā tu sa gato rājā svam āśramapadaṃ tadā / sāpi tatrāvasat kanyā toṣayantī patiṃ guṇaiḥ // 7.002.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prītaḥ sa tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.002.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te guṇānāṃ saṃpadā bhṛśam / tasmāt te viramāmy adya putram ātmasamaṃ guṇaiḥ // 7.002.026.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhayor vaṃśakartāraṃ paulastya iti viśrutam // 7.002.026.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmāt tu viśruto vedas tvayehābhyasyato mama / tasmāt sa viśravā nāma bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // 7.002.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu sā kanyā prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā / acireṇaiva kālena sūtā viśravasaṃ sutam // 7.002.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu lokatraye khyātaḥ śaucadharmasamanvitaḥ / piteva tapasā yukto viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ // 7.002.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha putraḥ pulastyasya viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ / acireṇaiva kālena piteva tapasi sthitaḥ // 7.003.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyavāñ śīlavān dakṣaḥ svādhyāyanirataḥ śuciḥ / sarvabhogeṣv asaṃsakto nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇaḥ // 7.003.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jñātvā tasya tu tadvṛttaṃ bharadvājo mahān ṛṣiḥ / dadau viśravase bhāryāṃ svāṃ sutāṃ devavarṇinīm // 7.003.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya tu dharmeṇa bharadvājasutāṃ tadā / mudā paramayā yukto viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ // 7.003.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tasyāṃ vīryasaṃpannam apatyaṃ paramādbhutam / janayām āsa dharmātmā sarvair brahmaguṇair yutam // 7.003.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiñ jāte tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa babhūva pitāmahaḥ / nāma cāsyākarot prītaḥ sārdhaṃ devarṣibhis tadā // 7.003.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmād viśravaso 'patyaṃ sādṛśyād viśravā iva / tasmād vaiśravaṇo nāma bhaviṣyaty eṣa viśrutaḥ // 7.003.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu vaiśravaṇas tatra tapovanagatas tadā / avardhata mahātejā hutāhutir ivānalaḥ // 7.003.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāśramapadasthasya buddhir jajñe mahātmanaḥ / cariṣye niyato dharmaṃ dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ // 7.003.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahāvane / pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu taṃ taṃ vidhim avartata // 7.003.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jalāśī mārutāhāro nirāhāras tathaiva ca / evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi jagmus tāny eva varṣavat // 7.003.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha prīto mahātejāḥ sendraiḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha / gatvā tasyāśramapadaṃ brahmedaṃ vākyam abravīt // 7.003.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parituṣṭo 'smi te vatsa karmaṇānena suvrata / varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te varārhas tvaṃ hi me mataḥ // 7.003.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīd vaiśravaṇaḥ pitāmaham upasthitam / bhagavaṃl lokapālatvam iccheyaṃ vittarakṣaṇam // 7.003.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīd vaiśravaṇaṃ parituṣṭena cetasā / brahmā suragaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bāḍham ity eva hṛṣṭavat // 7.003.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ hi lokapālānāṃ caturthaṃ sraṣṭum udyataḥ / yamendravaruṇānāṃ hi padaṃ yat tava cepsitam // 7.003.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatkṛtaṃ gaccha dharmajña dhaneśatvam avāpnuhi / yamendravaruṇānāṃ hi caturtho 'dya bhaviṣyasi // 7.003.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac ca puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham / pratigṛhṇīṣva yānārthaṃ tridaśaiḥ samatāṃ vraja // 7.003.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmaḥ sarva eva yathāgatam / kṛtakṛtyā vayaṃ tāta dattvā tava mahāvaram // 7.003.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gateṣu brahmapūrveṣu deveṣv atha nabhastalam / dhaneśaḥ pitaraṃ prāha vinayāt praṇato vacaḥ // 7.003.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavaṃl labdhavān asmi varaṃ kamalayonitaḥ / nivāsaṃ na tu me devo vidadhe sa prajāpatiḥ // 7.003.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat paśya bhagavan kaṃ cid deśaṃ vāsāya naḥ prabho / na ca pīḍā bhaved yatra prāṇino yasya kasya cit // 7.003.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu putreṇa viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ / vacanaṃ prāha dharmajña śrūyatām iti dharmavit // 7.003.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkā nāma purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā / rākṣasānāṃ nivāsārthaṃ yathendrasyāmarāvatī // 7.003.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ramaṇīyā purī sā hi rukmavaidūryatoraṇā / rākṣasaiḥ sā parityaktā purā viṣṇubhayārditaiḥ // 7.003.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūnyā rakṣogaṇaiḥ sarvai rasātalatalaṃ gataiḥ // 7.003.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ tatra nivāsāya rocayasva matiṃ svakām / nirdoṣas tatra te vāso na ca bādhāsti kasya cit // 7.003.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā tu dharmātmā dharmiṣṭhaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ / niveśayām āsa tadā laṅkāṃ parvatamūrdhani // 7.003.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nairṛtānāṃ sahasrais tu hṛṣṭaiḥ pramuditaiḥ sadā / acireṇaikakālena saṃpūrṇā tasya śāsanāt // 7.003.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tatrāvasat prīto dharmātmā nairṛtādhipaḥ / samudraparidhānāyāṃ laṅkāyāṃ viśravātmajaḥ // 7.003.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāle kāle vinītātmā puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaraḥ / abhyagacchat susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca saḥ // 7.003.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa devagandharvagaṇair abhiṣṭutas; tathaiva siddhaiḥ saha cāraṇair api / gabhastibhiḥ sūrya ivaujasā vṛtaḥ; pituḥ samīpaṃ prayayau śriyā vṛtaḥ // 7.003.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
śrutvāgastyeritaṃ vākyaṃ rāmo vismayam āgataḥ / pūrvam āsīt tu laṅkāyāṃ rakṣasām iti saṃbhavaḥ // 7.004.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śiraḥ kampayitvā tretāgnisamavigraham / agastyaṃ taṃ muhur dṛṣṭvā smayamāno 'bhyabhāṣata // 7.004.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan pūrvam apy eṣā laṅkāsīt piśitāśinām / itīdaṃ bhavataḥ śrutvā vismayo janito mama // 7.004.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pulastyavaṃśād udbhūtā rākṣasā iti naḥ śrutam / idānīm anyataś cāpi saṃbhavaḥ kīrtitas tvayā // 7.004.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇāt kumbhakarṇāc ca prahastād vikaṭād api / rāvaṇasya ca putrebhyaḥ kiṃ nu te balavattarāḥ // 7.004.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ka eṣāṃ pūrvako brahman kiṃnāmā kiṃtapobalaḥ / aparādhaṃ ca kaṃ prāpya viṣṇunā drāvitāḥ purā // 7.004.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad vistarataḥ sarvaṃ kathayasva mamānagha / kautūhalaṃ kṛtaṃ mahyaṃ nuda bhānur yathā tamaḥ // 7.004.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya tu tac chrutvā saṃskārālaṃkṛtaṃ vacaḥ / īṣadvismayamānas tam agastyaḥ prāha rāghavam // 7.004.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajāpatiḥ purā sṛṣṭvā apaḥ salilasaṃbhavaḥ / tāsāṃ gopāyane sattvān asṛjat padmasaṃbhavaḥ // 7.004.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te sattvāḥ sattvakartāraṃ vinītavad upasthitāḥ / kiṃ kurma iti bhāṣantaḥ kṣutpipāsābhayārditāḥ // 7.004.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajāpatis tu tāny āha sattvāni prahasann iva / ābhāṣya vācā yatnena rakṣadhvam iti mānadaḥ // 7.004.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣāma iti tatrānyair yakṣāmeti tathāparaiḥ / bhuṅkṣitābhuṅkṣitair uktas tatas tān āha bhūtakṛt // 7.004.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ rākṣasās te bhavantu vaḥ / yakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ te vai yakṣā bhavantu vaḥ // 7.004.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra hetiḥ prahetiś ca bhrātarau rākṣasarṣabhau / madhukaiṭabhasaṃkāśau babhūvatur ariṃdamau // 7.004.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahetir dhārmikas tatra na dārān so 'bhikāṅkṣati / hetir dārakriyārthaṃ tu yatnaṃ param athākarot // 7.004.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kālabhaginīṃ kanyāṃ bhayāṃ nāma bhayāvahām / udāvahad ameyātmā svayam eva mahāmatiḥ // 7.004.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tasyāṃ janayām āasa hetī rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ / putraṃ putravatāṃ śreṣṭho vidyutkeśa iti śrutam // 7.004.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidyutkeśo hetiputraḥ pradīptāgnisamaprabhaḥ / vyavardhata mahātejās toyamadhya ivāmbujam // 7.004.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa yadā yauvanaṃ bhadram anuprāpto niśācaraḥ / tato dārakriyāṃ tasya kartuṃ vyavasitaḥ pitā // 7.004.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃdhyāduhitaraṃ so 'tha saṃdhyātulyāṃ prabhāvataḥ / varayām āsa putrārthaṃ hetī rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ // 7.004.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyam eva dātavyā parasmai seti saṃdhyayā / cintayitvā sutā dattā vidyutkeśāya rāghava // 7.004.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃdhyāyās tanayāṃ labdhvā vidyutkeśo niśācaraḥ / ramate sa tayā sārdhaṃ paulomyā maghavān iva // 7.004.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kena cit tv atha kālena rāma sālakaṭaṃkaṭā / vidyutkeśād garbham āpa ghanarājir ivārṇavāt // 7.004.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sā rākṣasī garbhaṃ ghanagarbhasamaprabham / prasūtā mandaraṃ gatvā gaṅgā garbham ivāgnijam // 7.004.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam utsṛjya tu sā garbhaṃ vidyutkeśād ratārthinī / reme sā patinā sārdhaṃ vismṛtya sutam ātmajam // 7.004.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayotsṛṣṭaḥ sa tu śiśuḥ śaradarkasamadyutiḥ / pāṇim āsye samādhāya ruroda ghanarāḍ iva // 7.004.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athopariṣṭād gacchan vai vṛṣabhastho haraḥ prabhuḥ / apaśyad umayā sārdhaṃ rudantaṃ rākṣasātmajam // 7.004.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāruṇyabhāvāt pārvatyā bhavas tripurahā tataḥ / taṃ rākṣasātmajaṃ cakre mātur eva vayaḥ samam // 7.004.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amaraṃ caiva taṃ kṛtvā mahādevo 'kṣayo 'vyayaḥ / puram ākāśagaṃ prādāt pārvatyāḥ priyakāmyayā // 7.004.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
umayāpi varo datto rākṣasīnāṃ nṛpātmaja / sadyopalabdhir garbhasya prasūtiḥ sadya eva ca // 7.004.030.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadya eva vayaḥprāptir mātur eva vayaḥ samam // 7.004.030.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sukeśo varadānagarvitaḥ; śriyaṃ prabhoḥ prāpya harasya pārśvataḥ / cacāra sarvatra mahāmatiḥ khagaḥ; khagaṃ puraṃ prāpya puraṃdaro yathā // 7.004.031	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
sukeśaṃ dhārmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā varalabdhaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ / grāmaṇīr nāma gandharvo viśvāvasusamaprabhaḥ // 7.005.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya devavatī nāma dvitīyā śrīr ivātmajā / tāṃ sukeśāya dharmeṇa dadau dakṣaḥ śriyaṃ yathā // 7.005.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varadānakṛtaiśvaryaṃ sā taṃ prāpya patiṃ priyam / āsīd devavatī tuṣṭā dhanaṃ prāpyeva nirdhanaḥ // 7.005.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tayā saha saṃyukto rarāja rajanīcaraḥ / añjanād abhiniṣkrāntaḥ kareṇveva mahāgajaḥ // 7.005.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devavatyāṃ sukeśas tu janayām āsa rāghava / trīṃs trinetrasamān putrān rākṣasān rākṣasādhipaḥ // 7.005.005.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mālyavantaṃ sumāliṃ ca māliṃ ca balināṃ varam // 7.005.005.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trayo lokā ivāvyagrāḥ sthitās traya ivāgnayaḥ / trayo mantrā ivātyugrās trayo ghorā ivāmayāḥ // 7.005.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trayaḥ sukeśasya sutās tretāgnisamavarcasaḥ / vivṛddhim agamaṃs tatra vyādhayopekṣitā iva // 7.005.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varaprāptiṃ pitus te tu jñātvaiśvaryaṃ tato mahat / tapas taptuṃ gatā meruṃ bhrātaraḥ kṛtaniścayāḥ // 7.005.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pragṛhya niyamān ghorān rākṣasā nṛpasattama / vicerus te tapo ghoraṃ sarvabhūtabhayāvaham // 7.005.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyārjavadamopetais tapobhir bhuvi duṣkaraiḥ / saṃtāpayantas trīṃl lokān sadevāsuramānuṣān // 7.005.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vibhuś caturvaktro vimānavaram āsthitaḥ / sukeśaputrān āmantrya varado 'smīty abhāṣata // 7.005.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmāṇaṃ varadaṃ jñātvā sendrair devagaṇair vṛtam / ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve vepamānā iva drumāḥ // 7.005.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapasārādhito deva yadi no diśase varam / ajeyāḥ śatruhantāras tathaiva cirajīvinaḥ // 7.005.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhaviṣṇavo bhavāmeti parasparam anuvratāḥ // 7.005.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bhaviṣyatīty uktvā sukeśatanayān prabhuḥ / prayayau brahmalokāya brahmā brāhmaṇavatsalaḥ // 7.005.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varaṃ labdhvā tataḥ sarve rāma rātriṃcarās tadā / surāsurān prabādhante varadānāt sunirbhayāḥ // 7.005.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair vadhyamānās tridaśāḥ sarṣisaṃghāḥ sacāraṇāḥ / trātāraṃ nādhigacchanti nirayasthā yathā narāḥ // 7.005.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha te viśvakarmāṇaṃ śilpināṃ varam avyayam / ūcuḥ sametya saṃhṛṣṭā rākṣasā raghusattama // 7.005.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhakartā bhavān eva devānāṃ hṛdayepsitam / asmākam api tāvat tvaṃ gṛhaṃ kuru mahāmate // 7.005.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
himavantaṃ samāśritya meruṃ mandaram eva vā / maheśvaragṛhaprakhyaṃ gṛhaṃ naḥ kriyatāṃ mahat // 7.005.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvakarmā tatas teṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahābhujaḥ / nivāsaṃ kathayām āsa śakrasyevāmarāvatīm // 7.005.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre trikūṭo nāma parvataḥ / śikhare tasya śailasya madhyame 'mbudasaṃnibhe // 7.005.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śakunair api duṣprāpe ṭaṅkacchinnacaturdiśi // 7.005.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triṃśadyojanavistīrṇā svarṇaprākāratoraṇā / mayā laṅketi nagarī śakrājñaptena nirmitā // 7.005.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṃ vasata durdharṣāḥ puryāṃ rākṣasasattamāḥ / amarāvatīṃ samāsādya sendrā iva divaukasaḥ // 7.005.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkādurgaṃ samāsādya rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtāḥ / bhaviṣyatha durādharṣāḥ śatrūṇāṃ śatrusūdanāḥ // 7.005.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvakarmavacaḥ śrutvā tatas te rāma rākṣasāḥ / sahasrānucarā gatvā laṅkāṃ tām avasan purīm // 7.005.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛḍhaprākāraparikhāṃ haimair gṛhaśatair vṛtām / laṅkām avāpya te hṛṣṭā viharanti niśācarāḥ // 7.005.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
narmadā nāma gandharvī nānādharmasamedhitā / tasyāḥ kanyātrayaṃ hy āsīd dhīśrīkīrtisamadyuti // 7.005.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jyeṣṭhakrameṇa sā teṣāṃ rākṣasānām arākṣasī / kanyās tāḥ pradadau hṛṣṭā pūrṇacandranibhānanāḥ // 7.005.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trayāṇāṃ rākṣasendrāṇāṃ tisro gandharvakanyakāḥ / mātrā dattā mahābhāgā nakṣatre bhagadaivate // 7.005.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtadārās tu te rāma sukeśatanayāḥ prabho / bhāryābhiḥ saha cikrīḍur apsarobhir ivāmarāḥ // 7.005.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra mālyavato bhāryā sundarī nāma sundarī / sa tasyāṃ janayām āsa yad apatyaṃ nibodha tat // 7.005.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajramuṣṭir virūpākṣo durmukhaś caiva rākṣasaḥ / suptaghno yajñakopaś ca mattonmattau tathaiva ca // 7.005.032.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
analā cābhavat kanyā sundaryāṃ rāma sundarī // 7.005.032.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumālino 'pi bhāryāsīt pūrṇacandranibhānanā / nāmnā ketumatī nāma prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī // 7.005.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumālī janayām āsa yad apatyaṃ niśācaraḥ / ketumatyāṃ mahārāja tan nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ // 7.005.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahasto 'kampanaiś caiva vikaṭaḥ kālakārmukaḥ / dhūmrākśaś cātha daṇḍaś ca supārśvaś ca mahābalaḥ // 7.005.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃhrādiḥ praghasaś caiva bhāsakarṇaś ca rākṣasaḥ / rākā puṣpotkaṭā caiva kaikasī ca śucismitā // 7.005.036.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhīnasī ca ity ete sumāleḥ prasavāḥ smṛtāḥ // 7.005.036.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māles tu vasudā nāma gandharvī rūpaśālinī / bhāryāsīt padmapatrākṣī svakṣī yakṣīvaropamā // 7.005.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumāler anujas tasyāṃ janayām āsa yat prabho / apatyaṃ kathyamānaṃ tan mayā tvaṃ śṛṇu rāghava // 7.005.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
analaś cānilaś caiva haraḥ saṃpātir eva ca / ete vibhīṣaṇāmātyā māleyās te niśācarāḥ // 7.005.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu te rākṣasapuṃgavās trayo; niśācaraiḥ putraśataiś ca saṃvṛtāḥ / surān sahendrān ṛṣināgadānavān; babādhire te balavīryadarpitāḥ // 7.005.040	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
jagad bhramanto 'nilavad durāsadā; raṇe ca mṛtyupratimāḥ samāhitāḥ / varapradānād abhigarvitā bhṛśaṃ; kratukriyāṇāṃ praśamaṃkarāḥ sadā // 7.005.041	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tair vadhyamānā devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ / bhayārtāḥ śaraṇaṃ jagmur devadevaṃ maheśvaram // 7.006.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te sametya tu kāmāriṃ tripurāriṃ trilocanam / ūcuḥ prāñjalayo devā bhayagadgadabhāṣiṇaḥ // 7.006.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukeśaputrair bhagavan pitāmahavaroddhataiḥ / prajādhyakṣa prajāḥ sarvā bādhyante ripubādhana // 7.006.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaraṇyāny aśaraṇyāni āśramāṇi kṛtāni naḥ / svargāc ca cyāvitaḥ śakraḥ svarge krīḍanti śakravat // 7.006.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ rudro brahmāhaṃ devarāḍ aham / ahaṃ yamo 'haṃ varuṇaś candro 'haṃ ravir apy aham // 7.006.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti te rākṣasā deva varadānena darpitāḥ / bādhante samaroddharṣā ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ // 7.006.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan no devabhayārtānām abhayaṃ dātum arhasi / aśivaṃ vapur āsthāya jahi daivatakaṇṭakān // 7.006.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktas tu suraiḥ sarvaiḥ kapardī nīlalohitaḥ / sukeśaṃ prati sāpekṣa āha devagaṇān prabhuḥ // 7.006.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāhaṃ tān nihaniṣyāmi avadhyā mama te 'surāḥ / kiṃ tu mantraṃ pradāsyāmi yo vai tān nihaniṣyati // 7.006.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam eva samudyogaṃ puraskṛtya surarṣabhāḥ / gacchantu śaraṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ haniṣyati sa tān prabhuḥ // 7.006.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te jayaśabdena pratinandya maheśvaram / viṣṇoḥ samīpam ājagmur niśācarabhayārditāḥ // 7.006.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkhacakradharaṃ devaṃ praṇamya bahumānya ca / ūcuḥ saṃbhrāntavad vākyaṃ sukeśatanayārditāḥ // 7.006.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukeśatanayair devatribhis tretāgnisaṃnibhaiḥ / ākramya varadānena sthānāny apahṛtāni naḥ // 7.006.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkā nāma purī durgā trikūṭaśikhare sthitā / tatra sthitāḥ prabādhante sarvān naḥ kṣaṇadācarāḥ // 7.006.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvam asmatpriyārthaṃ tu jahi tān madhusūdana / cakrakṛttāsyakamalān nivedaya yamāya vai // 7.006.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhayeṣv abhayado 'smākaṃ nānyo 'sti bhavatā samaḥ / nuda tvaṃ no bhayaṃ deva nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ // 7.006.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ daivatair ukto devadevo janārdanaḥ / abhayaṃ bhayado 'rīṇāṃ dattvā devān uvāca ha // 7.006.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukeśaṃ rākṣasaṃ jāne īśāna varadarpitam / tāṃś cāsya tanayāñ jāne yeṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ sa mālyavān // 7.006.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān ahaṃ samatikrāntamaryādān rākṣasādhamān / sūdayiṣyāmi saṃgrāme surā bhavata vijvarāḥ // 7.006.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktās te surāḥ sarve viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / yathā vāsaṃ yayur hṛṣṭāḥ praśamanto janārdanam // 7.006.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibudhānāṃ samudyogaṃ mālyavān sa niśācaraḥ / śrutvā tau bhrātarau vīrāv idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 7.006.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amarā ṛṣayaś caiva saṃhatya kila śaṃkaram / asmadvadhaṃ parīpsanta idam ūcus trilocanam // 7.006.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sukeśatanayā deva varadānabaloddhatāḥ / bādhante 'smān samudyuktā ghorarūpāḥ pade pade // 7.006.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasair abhibhūtāḥ sma na śaktāḥ sma umāpate / sveṣu veśmasu saṃsthātuṃ bhayāt teṣāṃ durātmanām // 7.006.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad asmākaṃ hitārthe tvaṃ jahi tāṃs tāṃs trilocana / rākṣasān huṃkṛtenaiva daha pradahatāṃ vara // 7.006.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ tridaśair ukto niśamyāndhakasūdanaḥ / śiraḥ karaṃ ca dhunvāna idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 7.006.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avadhyā mama te devāḥ sukeśatanayā raṇe / mantraṃ tu vaḥ pradāsyāmi yo vai tān nihaniṣyati // 7.006.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaḥ sa cakragadāpāṇiḥ pītavāsā janārdanaḥ / haniṣyati sa tān yuddhe śaraṇaṃ taṃ prapadyatha // 7.006.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harān nāvāpya te kāmaṃ kāmārim abhivādya ca / nārāyaṇālayaṃ prāptās tasmai sarvaṃ nyavedayan // 7.006.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nārāyaṇenoktā devā indrapurogamāḥ / surārīn sūdayiṣyāmi surā bhavata vijvarāḥ // 7.006.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devānāṃ bhayabhītānāṃ hariṇā rākṣasarṣabhau / pratijñāto vadho 'smākaṃ tac cintayatha yat kṣamam // 7.006.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hiraṇyakaśipor mṛtyur anyeṣāṃ ca suradviṣām / duḥkhaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ jetuṃ yo no hantum abhīpsati // 7.006.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sumālī mālī ca śrutvā mālyavato vacaḥ / ūcatur bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhagāṃśāv iva vāsavam // 7.006.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svadhītaṃ dattam iṣṭaṃ ca aiśvaryaṃ paripālitam / āyur nirāmayaṃ prāptaṃ svadharmaḥ sthāpitaś ca naḥ // 7.006.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devasāgaram akṣobhyaṃ śastraughaiḥ pravigāhya ca / jitā devā raṇe nityaṃ na no mṛtyukṛtaṃ bhayam // 7.006.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārāyaṇaś ca rudraś ca śakraś cāpi yamas tathā / asmākaṃ pramukhe sthātuṃ sarva eva hi bibhyati // 7.006.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣṇor doṣaś ca nāsty atra kāraṇaṃ rākṣaseśvara / devānām eva doṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ pracalitaṃ manaḥ // 7.006.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād adya samudyuktāḥ sarvasainyasamāvṛtāḥ / devān eva jighāṃsāmo yebhyo doṣaḥ samutthitaḥ // 7.006.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti mālī sumālī ca mālyavān agrajaḥ prabhuḥ / udyogaṃ ghoṣayitvātha rākṣasāḥ sarva eva te // 7.006.039.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuddhāya niryayuḥ kruddhā jambhavṛtrabalā iva // 7.006.039.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
syandanair vāraṇendraiś ca hayaiś ca girisaṃnibhaiḥ / kharair gobhir athoṣṭraiś ca śiṃśumārair bhujaṃ gamaiḥ // 7.006.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
makaraiḥ kacchapair mīnair vihaṃgair garuḍopamaiḥ / siṃhair vyāghrair varāhaiś ca sṛmaraiś camarair api // 7.006.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyaktvā laṅkāṃ tataḥ sarve rākṣasā balagarvitāḥ / prayātā devalokāya yoddhuṃ daivataśatravaḥ // 7.006.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkāviparyayaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāni laṅkālayāny atha / bhūtāni bhayadarśīni vimanaskāni sarvaśaḥ // 7.006.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaumās tathāntarikṣāś ca kālājñaptā bhayāvahāḥ / utpātā rākṣasendrāṇām abhāvāyotthitā drutam // 7.006.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asthīni meghā varṣanti uṣṇaṃ śoṇitam eva ca / velāṃ samudro 'py utkrāntaś calante cācalottamāḥ // 7.006.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṭṭahāsān vimuñcanto ghananādasamasvanān / bhūtāḥ paripatanti sma nṛtyamānāḥ sahasraśaḥ // 7.006.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛdhracakraṃ mahac cāpi jvalanodgāribhir mukhaiḥ / rākṣasānām upari vai bhramate kālacakravat // 7.006.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān acintyamahotpātān rākṣasā balagarvitāḥ / yanty eva na nivartante mṛtyupāśāvapāśitāḥ // 7.006.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mālyavāṃś ca sumālī ca mālī ca rajanīcarāḥ / āsan puraḥsarās teṣāṃ kratūnām iva pāvakāḥ // 7.006.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mālyavantaṃ tu te sarve mālyavantam ivācalam / niśācarā āśrayante dhātāram iva dehinaḥ // 7.006.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad balaṃ rākṣasendrāṇāṃ mahābhraghananāditam / jayepsayā devalokaṃ yayau mālī vaśe sthitam // 7.006.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasānāṃ samudyogaṃ taṃ tu nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ / devadūtād upaśrutya dadhre yuddhe tato manaḥ // 7.006.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa devasiddharṣimahoragaiś ca; gandharvamukhyāpsarasopagītaḥ / samāsasādāmaraśatrusainyaṃ; cakrāsisīrapravarādidhārī // 7.006.053	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
suparṇapakṣānilanunnapakṣaṃ; bhramatpatākaṃ pravikīrṇaśastram / cacāla tad rākṣasarājasainyaṃ; calopalo nīla ivācalendraḥ // 7.006.054	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
tatha śitaiḥ śoṇitamāṃsarūṣitair; yugāntavaiśvānaratulyavigrahaiḥ / niśācarāḥ saṃparivārya mādhavaṃ; varāyudhair nirbibhiduḥ sahasraśaḥ // 7.006.055	upajāti (jagatī: ajñātam [ntjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
nārāyaṇagiriṃ te tu garjanto rākṣasāmbudāḥ / avarṣann iṣuvarṣeṇa varṣeṇādrim ivāmbudāḥ // 7.007.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śyāmāvadātas tair viṣṇur nīlair naktaṃcarottamaiḥ / vṛto 'ñjanagirīvāsīd varṣamāṇaiḥ payodharaiḥ // 7.007.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śalabhā iva kedāraṃ maśakā iva parvatam / yathāmṛtaghaṭaṃ jīvā makarā iva cārṇavam // 7.007.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā rakṣodhanur muktā vajrānilamanojavāḥ / hariṃ viśanti sma śarā lokāstam iva paryaye // 7.007.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
syandanaiḥ syandanagatā gajaiś ca gajadhūr gatāḥ / aśvārohāḥ sadaśvaiś ca pādātāś cāmbare carāḥ // 7.007.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasendrā girinibhāḥ śaraśaktyṛṣṭitomaraiḥ / nirucchvāsaṃ hariṃ cakruḥ prāṇāyāma iva dvijam // 7.007.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niśācarais tudyamāno mīnair iva mahātimiḥ / śārṅgam āyamya gātrāṇi rākṣasānāṃ mahāhave // 7.007.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaraiḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair vajravaktrair manojavaiḥ / ciccheda tilaśo viṣṇuḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // 7.007.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vidrāvya śaravarṣaṃ taṃ varṣaṃ vāyur ivotthitam / pāñcajanyaṃ mahāśaṅkhaṃ pradadhmau puruṣottamaḥ // 7.007.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'mbujo hariṇā dhmātaḥ sarvaprāṇena śaṅkharāṭ / rarāsa bhīmanihrādo yugānte jalado yathā // 7.007.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkharājaravaḥ so 'tha trāsayām āsa rākṣasān / mṛgarāja ivāraṇye samadān iva kuñjarān // 7.007.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na śekur aśvāḥ saṃsthātuṃ vimadāḥ kuñjarābhavan / syandanebhyaś cyutā yodhāḥ śaṅkharāvitadurbalāḥ // 7.007.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śārṅgacāpavinirmuktā vajratulyānanāḥ śarāḥ / vidārya tāni rakṣāṃsi supuṅkhā viviśuḥ kṣitim // 7.007.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhidyamānāḥ śaraiś cānye nārāyaṇadhanuścyutaiḥ / nipetū rākṣasā bhīmāḥ śailā vajrahatā iva // 7.007.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vraṇair vraṇakarārīṇām adhokṣajaśarodbhavaiḥ / asṛk kṣaranti dhārābhiḥ svarṇadhārām ivācalāḥ // 7.007.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaṅkharājaravaś cāpi śārṅgacāparavas tathā / rākṣasānāṃ ravāṃś cāpi grasate vaiṣṇavo ravaḥ // 7.007.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūryād iva karā ghorā ūrmayaḥ sāgarād iva / parvatād iva nāgendrā vāryoghā iva cāmbudāt // 7.007.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā bāṇā vinirmuktāḥ śārṅgān narāyaṇeritāḥ / nirdhāvantīṣavas tūrṇaṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // 7.007.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarabheṇa yathā siṃhāḥ siṃhena dviradā yathā / dviradena yathā vyāghrā vyāghreṇa dvīpino yathā // 7.007.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvīpinā ca yathā śvānaḥ śunā mārjārakā yathā / mārjāreṇa yathā sarpāḥ sarpeṇa ca yathākhavaḥ // 7.007.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā te rākṣasā yuddhe viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / dravanti drāvitāś caiva śāyitāś ca mahītale // 7.007.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasānāṃ sahasrāṇi nihatya madhusūdanaḥ / vārijaṃ nādayām āsa toyadaṃ surarāḍ iva // 7.007.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārāyaṇaśaragrastaṃ śaṅkhanādasuvihvalam / yayau laṅkām abhimukhaṃ prabhagnaṃ rākṣasaṃ balam // 7.007.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhagne rākṣasabale nārāyaṇaśarāhate / sumālī śaravarṣeṇa āvavāra raṇe harim // 7.007.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utkṣipya hemābharaṇaṃ karaṃ karam iva dvipaḥ / rarāsa rākṣaso harṣāt sataḍit toyado yathā // 7.007.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumāler nardatas tasya śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam / ciccheda yantur aśvāś ca bhrāntās tasya tu rakṣasaḥ // 7.007.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair aśvair bhrāmyate bhrāntaiḥ sumālī rākṣaseśvaraḥ / indriyāśvair yathā bhrāntair dhṛtihīno yathā naraḥ // 7.007.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mālī cābhyadravad yuddhe pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ / māler dhanuścyutā bāṇāḥ kārtasvaravibhūṣitāḥ // 7.007.028.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viviśur harim āsādya krauñcaṃ patrarathā iva // 7.007.028.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardyamānaḥ śaraiḥ so 'tha mālimuktaiḥ sahasraśaḥ / cukṣubhe na raṇe viṣṇur jitendriya ivādhibhiḥ // 7.007.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha maurvī svanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ / mālinaṃ prati bāṇaughān sasarjāsigadādharaḥ // 7.007.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te mālideham āsādya vajravidyutprabhāḥ śarāḥ / pibanti rudhiraṃ tasya nāgā iva purāmṛtam // 7.007.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mālinaṃ vimukhaṃ kṛtvā mālimauliṃ harir balāt / rathaṃ ca sadhvajaṃ cāpaṃ vājinaś ca nyapātayat // 7.007.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
virathas tu gadāṃ gṛhya mālī naktaṃcarottamaḥ / āpupluve gadāpāṇir giryagrād iva keṣarī // 7.007.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
