sa tayā garuḍaṃ saṃkhye īśānam iva cāntakaḥ / lalāṭadeśe 'bhyahanad vajreṇendro yathācalam // 7.007.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gadayābhihatas tena mālinā garuḍo bhṛśam / raṇāt parāṅmukhaṃ devaṃ kṛtavān vedanāturaḥ // 7.007.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parāṅmukhe kṛte deve mālinā garuḍena vai / udatiṣṭhan mahānādo rakṣasām abhinardatām // 7.007.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣasāṃ nadatāṃ nādaṃ śrutvā harihayānujaḥ / parāṅmukho 'py utsasarja cakraṃ mālijighāṃsayā // 7.007.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat sūryamaṇḍalābhāsaṃ svabhāsā bhāsayan nabhaḥ / kālacakranibhaṃ cakraṃ māleḥ śīrṣam apātayat // 7.007.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tacchiro rākṣasendrasya cakrotkṛttaṃ vibhīṣaṇam / papāta rudhirodgāri purā rāhuśiro yathā // 7.007.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ suraiḥ susaṃhṛṣṭaiḥ sarvaprāṇasamīritaḥ / siṃhanādaravo muktaḥ sādhu deveti vādibhiḥ // 7.007.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mālinaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā sumālī malyavān api / sabalau śokasaṃtaptau laṅkāaṃ prati vidhāvitau // 7.007.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
garuḍas tu samāśvastaḥ saṃnivṛtya mahāmanāḥ / rākṣasān drāvayām āsa pakṣavātena kopitaḥ // 7.007.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārāyaṇo 'pīṣuvarāśanībhir; vidārayām āsa dhanuḥpramuktaiḥ / naktaṃcarān muktavidhūtakeśān; yathāśanībhiḥ sataḍinmahendraḥ // 7.007.043	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
bhinnātapatraṃ patamānaśastraṃ; śarair apadhvastaviśīrṇadeham / viniḥsṛtāntraṃ bhayalolanetraṃ; balaṃ tad unmattanibhaṃ babhūva // 7.007.044	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
siṃhārditānām iva kuñjarāṇāṃ; niśācarāṇāṃ saha kuñjarāṇām / ravāś ca vegāś ca samaṃ babhūvuḥ; purāṇasiṃhena vimarditānām // 7.007.045	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
saṃchādyamānā haribāṇajālaiḥ; svabāṇajāalāni samutsṛjantaḥ / dhāvanti naktaṃcarakālameghā; vāyupraṇunnā iva kālameghāḥ // 7.007.046	indravajrā [ttjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
cakraprahārair vinikṛttaśīrṣāḥ; saṃcūrṇitāṅgāś ca gadāprahāraiḥ / asiprahārair bahudhā vibhaktāḥ; patanti śailā iva rākṣasendrāḥ // 7.007.047	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
cakrakṛttāsyakamalā gadāsaṃcūrṇitorasaḥ / lāṅgalaglapitagrīvā musalair bhinnamastakāḥ // 7.007.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cic caivāsinā chinnās tathānye śaratāḍitāḥ / nipetur ambarāt tūrṇaṃ rākṣasāḥ sāgarāmbhasi // 7.007.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadāmbaraṃ vigalitahārakuṇḍalair; niśācarair nīlabalāhakopamaiḥ / nipātyamānair dadṛśe nirantaraṃ; nipātyamānair iva nīlaparvataiḥ // 7.007.050	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
hanyamāne bale tasmin padmanābhena pṛṣṭhataḥ / mālyavān saṃnivṛtto 'tha velātiga ivārṇavaḥ // 7.008.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃraktanayanaḥ kopāc calan maulir niśācaraḥ / padmanābham idaṃ prāha vacanaṃ paruṣaṃ tadā // 7.008.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārāyaṇa na jānīṣe kṣatradharmaṃ sanātanam / ayuddhamanaso bhagnān yo 'smān haṃsi yathetaraḥ // 7.008.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parāṅmukhavadhaṃ pāpaṃ yaḥ karoti sureśvara / sa hantā na gataḥ svargaṃ labhate puṇyakarmaṇām // 7.008.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuddhaśraddhātha vā te 'sti śaṅkhacakragadādhara / ahaṃ sthito 'smi paśyāmi balaṃ darśaya yat tava // 7.008.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca rākṣasendraṃ taṃ devarājānujo balī / yuṣmatto bhayabhītānāṃ devānāṃ vai mayābhayam // 7.008.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasotsādanaṃ dattaṃ tad etad anupālyate // 7.008.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāṇair api priyaṃ kāryaṃ devānāṃ hi sadā mayā / so 'haṃ vo nihaniṣyāmi rasātalagatān api // 7.008.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devam evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu raktāmburuhalocanam / śaktyā bibheda saṃkruddho rākṣasendro rarāsa ca // 7.008.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mālyavad bhujanirmuktā śaktir ghaṇṭākṛtasvanā / harer urasi babhrāja meghastheva śatahradā // 7.008.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tām eva cotkṛṣya śaktiṃ śaktidharapriyaḥ / mālyavantaṃ samuddiśya cikṣepāmburuhekṣaṇaḥ // 7.008.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
skandotsṛṣṭeva sā śaktir govindakaraniḥsṛtā / kāṅkṣantī rākṣasaṃ prāyān maholkevāñjanācalam // 7.008.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tasyorasi vistīrṇe hārabhāsāvabhāsite / apatad rākṣasendrasya girikūṭa ivāśaniḥ // 7.008.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayā bhinnatanutrāṇāḥ prāviśad vipulaṃ tamaḥ / mālyavān punar āśvastas tasthau girir ivācalaḥ // 7.008.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kārṣṇāyasaṃ śūlaṃ kaṇṭakair bahubhiś citam / pragṛhyābhyahanad devaṃ stanayor antare dṛḍham // 7.008.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaiva raṇaraktas tu muṣṭinā vāsavānujam / tāḍayitvā dhanurmātram apakrānto niśācaraḥ // 7.008.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'mbare mahāñ śabdaḥ sādhu sādhv iti cotthitaḥ / āhatya rākṣaso viṣṇuṃ garuḍaṃ cāpy atāḍayat // 7.008.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vainateyas tataḥ kruddhaḥ pakṣavātena rākṣasaṃ / vyapohad balavān vāyuḥ śuṣkaparṇacayaṃ yathā // 7.008.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvijendrapakṣavātena drāvitaṃ dṛśya pūrvajam / sumālī svabalaiḥ sārdhaṃ laṅkām abhimukho yayau // 7.008.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pakṣavātabaloddhūto mālyavān api rākṣasaḥ / svabalena samāgamya yayau laṅkāṃ hriyā vṛtaḥ // 7.008.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ te rākṣasā rāma hariṇā kamalekṣaṇa / bahuśaḥ saṃyuge bhagnā hatapravaranāyakāḥ // 7.008.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśaknuvantas te viṣṇuṃ pratiyoddhuṃ bhayārditāḥ / tyaktvā laṅkāṃ gatā vastuṃ pātālaṃ sahapatnayaḥ // 7.008.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumālinaṃ samāsādya rākṣasaṃ raghunandana / sthitāḥ prakhyātavīryās te vaṃśe sālakaṭaṅkaṭe // 7.008.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tvayā nihatās te vai paulastyā nāma rākṣasāḥ / sumālī mālyavān mālī ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ // 7.008.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarva ete mahābhāga rāvaṇād balavattarāḥ // 7.008.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cānyo rakṣasāṃ hantā sureṣv api puraṃjaya / ṛte nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam // 7.008.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavān nārāyaṇo devaś caturbāhuḥ sanātanaḥ / rākṣasān hantum utpanno ajeyaḥ prabhur avyayaḥ // 7.008.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya cit tv atha kālasya sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ / rasātalān martyalokaṃ sarvaṃ vai vicacāara ha // 7.009.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ / kanyāṃ duhitaraṃ gṛhya vinā padmam iva śriyam // 7.009.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāpaśyat sa gacchantaṃ puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaram // 7.009.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvāmarasaṃkāśaṃ gacchantaṃ pāvakopamam / athābbravīt sutāṃ rakṣaḥ kaikasīṃ nāma nāmataḥ // 7.009.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putri pradānakālo 'yaṃ yauvanaṃ te 'tivartate / tvatkṛte ca vayaṃ sarve yantritā dharmabuddhayaḥ // 7.009.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ hi sarvaguṇopetā śrīḥ sapadmeva putrike / pratyākhyānāc ca bhītais tvaṃ na varaiḥ pratigṛhyase // 7.009.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kanyāpitṛtvaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ mānakāṅkṣiṇām / na jñāyate ca kaḥ kanyāṃ varayed iti putrike // 7.009.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātuḥ kulaṃ pitṛkulaṃ yatra caiva pradīyate / kulatrayaṃ sadā kanyā saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati // 7.009.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tvaṃ munivaraśreṣṭhaṃ prajāpatikulodbhavam / gaccha viśravasaṃ putri paulastyaṃ varaya svayam // 7.009.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īdṛśās te bhaviṣyanti putrāḥ putri na saṃśayaḥ / tejasā bhāskarasamā yādṛśo 'yaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ // 7.009.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare rāma pulastyatanayo dvijaḥ / agnihotram upātiṣṭhac caturtha iva pāvakaḥ // 7.009.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tu tāṃ dāruṇāṃ velām acintya pitṛgauravāt / upasṛtyāgratas tasya caraṇādhomukhī sthitā // 7.009.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu tāṃ vīkṣya suśroṇīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām / abravīt paramodāro dīpyamāna ivaujasā // 7.009.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhadre kasyāsi duhitā kuto vā tvam ihāgatā / kiṃ kāryaṃ kasya vā hetos tattvato brūhi śobhane // 7.009.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu sā kanyā kṛtāñjalir athābravīt / ātmaprabhāvena mune jñātum arhasi me matam // 7.009.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tu viddhi hi māṃ brahmañ śāsanāt pitur āgatām / kaikasī nāma nāmnāhaṃ śeṣaṃ tvaṃ jñātum arhasi // 7.009.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu gatvā munir dhyānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha / vijñātaṃ te mayā bhadre kāraṇaṃ yan manogatam // 7.009.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dāruṇāyāṃ tu velāyāṃ yasmāt tvaṃ mām upasthitā / śṛṇu tasmāt sutān bhadre yādṛśāñ janayiṣyasi // 7.009.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dāruṇān dāruṇākārān dāruṇābhijanapriyān / prasaviṣyasi suśroṇi rākṣasān krūrakarmaṇaḥ // 7.009.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā praṇipatyābravīd vacaḥ / bhagavan nedṛśāḥ putrās tvatto 'rhā brahmayonitaḥ // 7.009.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīn munis tatra paścimo yas tavātmajaḥ / mama vaṃśānurūpaś ca dharmātmā ca bhaviṣyati // 7.009.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu sā kanyā rāma kālena kena cit / janayām āsa bībhatsaṃ rakṣorūpaṃ sudāruṇam // 7.009.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśaśīrṣaṃ mahādaṃṣṭraṃ nīlāñjanacayopamam / tāmrauṣṭhaṃ viṃśatibhujaṃ mahāsyaṃ dīptamūrdhajam // 7.009.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jātamātre tatas tasmin sajvālakavalāḥ śivāḥ / kravyādāś cāpasavyāni maṇḍalāni pracakrire // 7.009.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devo meghāś ca kharanisvanāḥ / prababhau na ca khe sūryo maholkāś cāpatan bhuvi // 7.009.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha nāmākarot tasya pitāmahasamaḥ pitā / daśaśīrṣaḥ prasūto 'yaṃ daśagrīvo bhaviṣyati // 7.009.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tv anantaraṃ jātaḥ kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ / pramāṇād yasya vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate // 7.009.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā nāma saṃjajñe vikṛtānanā / vibhīṣaṇaś ca dharmātmā kaikasyāḥ paścimaḥ sutaḥ // 7.009.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu tatra mahāraṇye vavṛdhuḥ sumahaujasaḥ / teṣāṃ krūro daśagrīvo lokodvegakaro 'bhavat // 7.009.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇaḥ pramattas tu maharṣīn dharmasaṃśritān / trailokyaṃ trāsayan duṣṭo bhakṣayan vicacāra ha // 7.009.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharmapathe sthitaḥ / svādhyāyaniyatāhāra uvāsa niyatendriyaḥ // 7.009.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vitteśvaro devas tatra kālena kena cit / āgacchat pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ puṣpakeṇa mahaujasaṃ // 7.009.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikasī tatra jvalantam iva tejasā / āsthāya rākṣasīṃ buddhiṃ daśagrīvam uvāca ha // 7.009.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putravaiśravaṇaṃ paśya bhrātaraṃ tejasā vṛtam / bhrātṛbhāve same cāpi paśyātmānaṃ tvam īdṛśam // 7.009.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśagrīva tathā yatnaṃ kuruṣvāmitavikrama / yathā bhavasi me putra śīghraṃ vaiśvaraṇopamaḥ // 7.009.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātus tad vacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān / amarṣam atulaṃ lebhe pratijñāṃ cākarot tadā // 7.009.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyaṃ te pratijānāmi tulyo bhrātrādhiko 'pi vā / bhaviṣyāmy acirān mātaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tyaja hṛdgatam // 7.009.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ krodhena tenaiva daśagrīvaḥ sahānujaḥ / prāpsyāmi tapasā kāmam iti kṛtvādhyavasya ca // 7.009.037.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgacchad ātmasiddhyarthaṃ gokarṇasyāśramaṃ śubham // 7.009.037.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīd dvijaṃ rāmaḥ kathaṃ te bhrātaro vane / kīdṛśaṃ tu tadā brahmaṃs tapaś cerur mahāvratāḥ // 7.010.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agastyas tv abravīt tatra rāmaṃ prayata mānasaṃ / tāṃs tān dharmavidhīṃs tatra bhrātaras te samāviśan // 7.010.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇas tadā yatto nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇaḥ / tatāpa graiṣmike kāle pañcasv agniṣv avasthitaḥ // 7.010.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varṣe meghodakaklinno vīrāsanam asevata / nityaṃ ca śaiśire kāle jalamadhyapratiśrayaḥ // 7.010.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi daśa tasyāticakramuḥ / dharme prayatamānasya satpathe niṣṭhitasya ca // 7.010.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharmaparaḥ śuciḥ / pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi pādenaikena tasthivān // 7.010.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāpte niyame tasya nanṛtuś cāpsarogaṇāḥ / papāta puṣpavarṣaṃ ca kṣubhitāś cāpi devatāḥ // 7.010.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi sūryaṃ caivānvavartata / tasthau cordhvaśiro bāhuḥ svādhyāyadhṛtamānasaḥ // 7.010.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vibhīṣaṇasyāpi gatāni niyatātmanaḥ / daśavarṣasahasrāṇi svargasthasyeva nandane // 7.010.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśavarṣasahasraṃ tu nirāhāro daśānanaḥ / pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu śiraś cāgnau juhāva saḥ // 7.010.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi nava tasyāticakramuḥ / śirāṃsi nava cāpy asya praviṣṭāni hutāśanam // 7.010.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha varṣasahasre tu daśame daśamaṃ śiraḥ / chettukāmaḥ sa dharmātmā prāptaś cātra pitāmahaḥ // 7.010.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahas tu suprītaḥ sārdhaṃ devair upasthitaḥ / vatsa vatsa daśagrīva prīto 'smīty abhyabhāṣata // 7.010.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghraṃ varaya dharmajña varo yas te 'bhikāṅkṣitaḥ / kiṃ te kāmaṃ karomy adya na vṛthā te pariśramaḥ // 7.010.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīd daśagrīvaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā / praṇamya śirasā devaṃ harṣagadgadayā girā // 7.010.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan prāṇināṃ nityaṃ nānyatra maraṇād bhayam / nāsti mṛtyusamaḥ śatrur amaratvam ato vṛṇe // 7.010.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suparṇanāgayakṣāṇāṃ daityadānavarakṣasām / avadhyaḥ syāṃ prajādhyakṣa devatānāṃ ca śāśvatam // 7.010.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi cintā mamānyeṣu prāṇiṣv amarapūjita / tṛṇabhūtā hi me sarve prāṇino mānuṣādayaḥ // 7.010.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu dharmātmā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā / uvāca vacanaṃ rāma saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ // 7.010.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaviṣyaty evam evaitat tava rākṣasapuṃgava / śṛṇu cāpi vaco bhūyaḥ prītasyeha śubhaṃ mama // 7.010.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hutāni yāni śīrṣāṇi pūrvam agnau tvayānagha / punas tāni bhaviṣyanti tathaiva tava rākṣasa // 7.010.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ pitāmahoktasya daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ / agnau hutāni śīrṣāṇi yāni tāny utthitāni vai // 7.010.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvvā tu taṃ rāma daśagrīvaṃ prajāpatiḥ / vibhīṣaṇam athovāca vākyaṃ lokapitāmahaḥ // 7.010.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇa tvayā vatsa dharmasaṃhitabuddhinā / parituṣṭo 'smi dharmajña varaṃ varaya suvrata // 7.010.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā vacanaṃ prāha sāñjaliḥ / vṛtaḥ sarvaguṇair nityaṃ candramā iva raśmibhiḥ // 7.010.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan kṛtakṛtyo 'haṃ yan me lokaguruḥ svayam / prīto yadi tvaṃ dātavyaṃ varaṃ me śṛṇu suvrata // 7.010.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā yā me jāyate buddhir yeṣu yeṣv āśrameṣv iha / sā sā bhavatu dharmiṣṭhā taṃ taṃ dharmaṃ ca pālaye // 7.010.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa me paramodāra varaḥ paramako mataḥ / na hi dharmābhiraktānāṃ loke kiṃ cana durlabham // 7.010.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha prajāpatiḥ prīto vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha / dharmiṣṭhas tvaṃ yathā vatsa tathā caitad bhaviṣyati // 7.010.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmād rākṣasayonau te jātasyāmitrakarṣaṇa / nādharme jāyate buddhir amaratvaṃ dadāmi te // 7.010.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇāya tu varaṃ prayacchantam ariṃdama / prajāpatiṃ surāḥ sarve vākyaṃ prāñjalayo 'bruvan // 7.010.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tāvat kumbhakarṇāya pradātavyo varas tvayā / jānīṣe hi yathā lokāṃs trāsayaty eṣa durmatiḥ // 7.010.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nandane 'psarasaḥ sapta mahendrānucarā daśa / anena bhakṣitā brahman ṛṣayo mānuṣās tathā // 7.010.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varavyājena moho 'smai dīyatām amitaprabha / lokānāṃ svasti caiva syād bhaved asya ca saṃnatiḥ // 7.010.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ surair brahmācintayat padmasaṃbhavaḥ / cintitā copatasthe 'sya pārśvaṃ devī sarasvatī // 7.010.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāñjaliḥ sā tu parśvasthā prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatī / iyam asmy āgatā devakiṃ kāryaṃ karavāṇy aham // 7.010.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajāpatis tu tāṃ prāptāṃ prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatīm / vāṇi tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhava yā devatepsitā // 7.010.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathety uktvā praviṣṭā sā prajāpatir athābravīt / kumbhakarṇa mahābāho varaṃ varaya yo mataḥ // 7.010.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇas tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vacanam abravīt / svaptuṃ varṣāṇy anekāni devadeva mamepsitam // 7.010.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam astv iti taṃ coktvā saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ / devī sarasvatī caiva muktvā taṃ prayayau divam // 7.010.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇas tu duṣṭātmā cintayām āsa duḥkhitaḥ / kīrdṛśaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ vākyaṃ mamādya vadanāc cyutam // 7.010.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ labdhavarāḥ sarve bhrātaro dīptatejasaḥ / śleṣmātakavanaṃ gatvā tatra te nyavasan sukham // 7.010.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumālī varalabdhāṃs tu jñātvā tān vai niśācarān / udatiṣṭhad bhayaṃ tyaktvā sānugaḥ sa rasātalāt // 7.011.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārīcaś ca prahastaś ca virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ / udatiṣṭhan susaṃrabdhāḥ sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ // 7.011.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumālī caiva taiḥ sarvair vṛto rākṣasapuṃgavaiḥ / abhigamya daśagrīvaṃ pariṣvajyedam abravīt // 7.011.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā te putrasaṃprāptaś cintito 'yamṃ manorathaḥ / yas tvaṃ tribhuvaṇaśreṣṭhāl labdhavān varam īdṛśam // 7.011.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatkṛte ca vayaṃ laṅkāṃ tyaktvā yātā rasātalam / tad gataṃ no mahābāho mahad viṣṇukṛtaṃ bhayam // 7.011.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asakṛt tena bhagnā hi parityajya svam ālayam / vidrutāḥ sahitāḥ sarve praviṣṭāḥ sma rasātalam // 7.011.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmadīyā ca laṅkeyaṃ nagarī rākṣasoṣitā / niveśitā tava bhrātrā dhanādhyakṣeṇa dhīmatā // 7.011.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi nāmātra śakyaṃ syāt sāmnā dānena vānagha / tarasā vā mahābāho pratyānetuṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet // 7.011.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ ca laṅkeśvaras tāta bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ / sarveṣāṃ naḥ prabhuś caiva bhaviṣyasi mahābala // 7.011.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīd daśagrīvo mātāmaham upasthitam / vitteśo gurur asmākaṃ nārhasy evaṃ prabhāṣitum // 7.011.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uktavantaṃ tathā vākyaṃ daśagrīvaṃ niśācaraḥ / prahastaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam idam āha sakāraṇam // 7.011.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśagrīva mahābāho nārhas tvaṃ vaktum īdṛśam / saubhrātraṃ nāsti śūrāṇāṃ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama // 7.011.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aditiś ca ditiś caiva bhaginyau sahite kila / bhārye paramarūpiṇyau kaśyapasya prajāpateḥ // 7.011.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aditir janayām āsa devāṃs tribhuvaṇeśvarān / ditis tv ajanayad daityān kaśyapasyātmasaṃbhavān // 7.011.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daityānāṃ kila dharmajña pureyaṃ savanārṇavā / saparvatā mahī vīra te 'bhavan prabhaviṣṇavaḥ // 7.011.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatya tāṃs tu samare viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / devānāṃ vaśam ānītaṃ trailokyam idam avyayam // 7.011.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naitad eko bhavān eva kariṣyati viparyayam / surair ācaritaṃ pūrvaṃ kuruṣvaitad vaco mama // 7.011.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto daśagrīvaḥ prahastena durātmanā / cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ vai bāḍham ity eva so 'bravīt // 7.011.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu tenaiva harṣeṇa tasminn ahani vīryavān / vanaṃ gato daśagrīvaḥ saha taiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ // 7.011.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trikūṭasthaḥ sa tu tadā daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ / preṣayām āsa dautyena prahastaṃ vākyakovidam // 7.011.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahasta śīghraṃ gatvā tvaṃ brūhi nairṛtapuṃgavam / vacanān mama vitteśaṃ sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ // 7.011.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ laṅkā purī rājan rākṣasānāṃ mahātmanām / tvayā niveśitā saumya naitad yuktaṃ tavānagha // 7.011.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad bhavān yadi sāmnaitāṃ dadyād atulavikrama / kṛtā bhaven mama prītir dharmaś caivānupālitaḥ // 7.011.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktaḥ sa tadā gatvā prahasto vākyakovidaḥ / daśagrīvavacaḥ sarvaṃ vitteśāya nyavedayat // 7.011.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahastād api saṃśrutya devo vaiśravaṇo vacaḥ / pratyuvāca prahastaṃ taṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ // 7.011.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brūhi gaccha daśagrīvaṃ purī rājyaṃ ca yan mama / tavāpy etan mahābāho bhuṅkṣvaitad dhatakaṇṭakam // 7.011.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaṃ kartāsmi bhadraṃ te rākṣaseśa vaco 'cirāt / kiṃ tu tāvat pratīkṣasva pitur yāvan nivedaye // 7.011.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā dhanādhyakṣo jagāma pitur antikam / abhivādya guruṃ prāha rāvaṇasya yadīpsitam // 7.011.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa tāta daśagrīvo dūtaṃ preṣitavān mama / dīyatāṃ nagarī laṅkā pūrvaṃ rakṣogaṇoṣitā // 7.011.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayātra yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tan mamācakṣva suvrata // 7.011.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmarṣis tv evam ukto 'sau viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ / uvāca dhanadaṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇu putra vaco mama // 7.011.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśagrīvo mahābāhur uktavān mama saṃnidhau / mayā nirbhartsitaś cāsīd bahudhoktaḥ sudurmatiḥ // 7.011.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa krodhena mayā cokto dhvaṃsasveti punaḥ punaḥ / śreyo'bhiyuktaṃ dharmyaṃ ca śṛṇu putra vaco mama // 7.011.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varapradānasaṃmūḍho mānyāmānyaṃ sudurmatiḥ / na vetti mama śāpāc ca prakṛtiṃ dāruṇāṃ gataḥ // 7.011.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād gaccha mahābāho kailāsaṃ dharaṇīdharam / niveśaya nivāsārthaṃ tyaja laṅkāṃ sahānugaḥ // 7.011.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra mandākinī ramyā nadīnāṃ pravarā nadī / kāñcanaiḥ sūryasaṃkāśaiḥ paṅkajaiḥ saṃvṛtodakā // 7.011.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi kṣamaṃ tvayā tena vairaṃ dhanadarakṣasā / jānīṣe hi yathānena labdhaḥ paramako varaḥ // 7.011.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto gṛhītvā tu tad vacaḥ pitṛgauravāt / sadāra pauraḥ sāmātyaḥ savāhanadhano gataḥ // 7.011.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahastas tu daśagrīvaṃ gatvā sarvaṃ nyavedayat / śūnyā sā nagarī laṅkā triṃśadyojanam āyatā // 7.011.038.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviśya tāṃ sahāsmābhiḥ svadharmaṃ tatra pālaya // 7.011.038.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ prahastena rāvaṇo rākṣasas tadā / viveśa nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ sabhrātā sabalānugaḥ // 7.011.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa cābhiṣiktaḥ kṣaṇadācarais tadā; niveśayām āsa purīṃ daśānanaḥ / nikāmapūrṇā ca babhūva sā purī; niśācarair nīlabalāhakopamaiḥ // 7.011.040	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
dhaneśvaras tv atha pitṛvākyagauravān; nyaveśayac chaśivimale girau purīm / svalaṃkṛtair bhavanavarair vibhūṣitāṃ; puraṃdarasyeva tadāmarāvatīm // 7.011.041	rucirā [jBsjg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
rākṣasendro 'bhiṣiktas tu bhrātṛbhyāṃ sahitas tadā / tataḥ pradānaṃ rākṣasyā bhaginyāḥ samacintayat // 7.012.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadau tāṃ kālakeyāya dānavendrāya rākṣasīm / svasāṃ śūrpaṇakhāṃ nāma vidyujjihvāya nāmataḥ // 7.012.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha dattvā svasāraṃ sa mṛgayāṃ paryaṭan nṛpaḥ / tatrāpaśyat tato rāma mayaṃ nāma diteḥ sutam // 7.012.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kanyāsahāyaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ / apṛcchat ko bhavan eko nirmanuṣya mṛge vane // 7.012.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayas tv athābravīd rāma pṛcchantaṃ taṃ niśācaram / śrūyatāṃ sarvam ākhyāsye yathāvṛttam idaṃ mama // 7.012.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hemā nāmāpsarās tāta śrutapūrvā yadi tvayā / daivatair mama sā dattā paulomīva śatakratoḥ // 7.012.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṃ saktamanās tāta pañcavarṣaśatāny aham / sā ca daivata kāryeṇa gatā varṣaṃ caturdaśam // 7.012.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāḥ kṛte ca hemāyāḥ sarvaṃ hemapuraṃ mayā / vajravaidūryacitraṃ ca māyayā nirmitaṃ tadā // 7.012.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāham aratiṃ vindaṃs tayā hīnaḥ suduḥkhitaḥ / tasmāt purād duhitaraṃ gṛhītvā vanam āgataḥ // 7.012.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ mamātmajā rājaṃs tasyāḥ kukṣau vivardhitā / bhartāram anayā sārdham asyāḥ prāpto 'smi mārgitum // 7.012.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kanyāpitṛtvaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi narāṇāṃ mānakāṅkṣiṇām / kanyā hi dve kule nityaṃ saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati // 7.012.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvau sutau tu mama tv asyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ saṃbabhūvatuḥ / māyāvī prathamas tāta dundubhis tadanantaram // 7.012.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ / tvām idānīṃ kathaṃ tāta jānīyāṃ ko bhavān iti // 7.012.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto rākṣasendro vinītam idam abravīt / ahaṃ paulastya tanayo daśagrīvaś ca nāmataḥ // 7.012.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmarṣes taṃ sutaṃ jñātvā mayo harṣam upāgataḥ / dātuṃ duhitaraṃ tasya rocayām āsa tatra vai // 7.012.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahasan prāha daityendro rākṣasendram idaṃ vacaḥ / iyaṃ mamātmajā rājan hemayāpsarasā dhṛtā // 7.012.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kanyā mandodarī nāma patnyarthaṃ pratigṛhyatām // 7.012.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāḍham ity eva taṃ rāma daśagrīvo 'bhyabhāṣata / prajvālya tatra caivāgnim akarot pāṇisaṃgraham // 7.012.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi tasya mayo rāma śāpābhijñas tapodhanāt / viditvā tena sā dattā tasya paitāmahaṃ kulam // 7.012.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amoghāṃ tasya śaktiṃ ca pradadau paramādbhutām / pareṇa tapasā labdhāṃ jaghnivāṃl lakṣmaṇaṃ yayā // 7.012.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa kṛtadāro vai laṅkāyām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ / gatvā tu nagaraṃ bhārye bhrātṛbhyāṃ samudāvahat // 7.012.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vairocanasya dauhitrīṃ vajrajvāleti nāmataḥ / tāṃ bhāryāṃ kumbhakarṇasya rāvaṇaḥ samudāvahat // 7.012.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandharvarājasya sutāṃ śailūṣasya mahātmana / saramā nāma dharmajño lebhe bhāryāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 7.012.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tīre tu sarasaḥ sā vai saṃjajñe mānasasya ca / mānasaṃ ca saras tāta vavṛdhe jaladāgame // 7.012.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātrā tu tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ snehanākranditaṃ vacaḥ / saro mā vardhatety uktaṃ tataḥ sā saramābhavat // 7.012.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ te kṛtadārā vai remire tatra rākṣasāḥ / svāṃ svāṃ bhāryām upādāya gandharvā iva nandane // 7.012.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mandodarī putraṃ meghanādam asūyata / sa eṣa indrajin nāma yuṣmābhir abhidhīyate // 7.012.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jātamātreṇa hi purā tena rākṣasasūnunā / rudatā sumahān mukto nādo jaladharopamaḥ // 7.012.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaḍīkṛtāyāṃ laṅkāyāṃ tena nādena tasya vai / pitā tasyākaron nāma meghanāda iti svayam // 7.012.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'vardhata tadā rāma rāvaṇāntaḥpure śubhe / rakṣyamāṇo varastrībhiś channaḥ kāṣṭhair ivānalaḥ // 7.012.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha lokeśvarotsṛṣṭā tatra kālena kena cit / nidrā samabhavat tīvrā kumbhakarṇasya rūpiṇī // 7.013.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bhrātaram āsīnaṃ kumbhakarṇo 'bravīd vacaḥ / nidrā māṃ bādhate rājan kārayasva mamālayam // 7.013.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viniyuktās tato rājñā śilpino viśvakarmavat / akurvan kumbhakarṇasya kailāsasamam ālayam // 7.013.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vistīrṇaṃ yojanaṃ śubhraṃ tato dviguṇam āyatam / darśanīyaṃ nirābādhaṃ kumbhakarṇasya cakrire // 7.013.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sphāṭikaiḥ kāñcanaiś citraiḥ stambhaiḥ sarvatra śobhitam / vaidūryakṛtaśobhaṃ ca kiṅkiṇījālakaṃ tathā // 7.013.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dantatoraṇavinyastaṃ vajrasphaṭikavedikam / sarvartusukhadaṃ nityaṃ meroḥ puṇyāṃ guhām iva // 7.013.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra nidrāṃ samāviṣṭaḥ kumbhakarṇo niśācaraḥ / bahūny abdasahasrāṇi śayāno nāvabudhyate // 7.013.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nidrābhibhūte tu tadā kumbhakarṇe daśānanaḥ / devarṣiyakṣagandharvān bādhate sma sa nityaśaḥ // 7.013.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udyānāni vicitrāṇi nandanādīni yāni ca / tāni gatvā susaṃkruddho bhinatti sma daśānanaḥ // 7.013.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nadīṃ gaja iva krīḍan vṛkṣān vāyur iva kṣipan / nagān vajra iva sṛṣṭo vidhvaṃsayati nityaśaḥ // 7.013.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā vṛttaṃ tu vijñāya daśagrīvaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ / kulānurūpaṃ dharmajña vṛttaṃ saṃsmṛtya cātmanaḥ // 7.013.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saubhrātradarśanārthaṃ tu dūtaṃ vaiśvaraṇas tadā / laṅkāṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa daśagrīvasya vai hitam // 7.013.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā nagarīṃ laṅkām āsasāda vibhīṣaṇam / mānitas tena dharmeṇa pṛṣṭhaś cāgamanaṃ prati // 7.013.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājño jñātīn api ca bāndhavān / sabhāyāṃ darśayām āsa tam āsīnaṃ daśānanam // 7.013.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā tatra rājānaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā / jayena cābhisaṃpūjya tūṣṇīm āsīn muhūrtakam // 7.013.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyopanīte paryaṅke varāstaraṇasaṃvṛte / upaviśya daśagrīvaṃ dūto vākyam athābravīt // 7.013.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājan vadāmi te sarvaṃ bhrātā tava yad abravīt / ubhayoḥ sadṛśaṃ saumya vṛttasya ca kulasya ca // 7.013.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhu paryāptam etāvat kṛtaś cāritrasaṃgrahaḥ / sādhu dharme vyavasthānaṃ kriyatāṃ yadi śakyate // 7.013.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭaṃ me nandanaṃ bhagnam ṛṣayo nihatāḥ śrutāḥ / devānāṃ tu samudyogas tvatto rājañ śrutaś ca me // 7.013.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirākṛtaś ca bahuśas tvayāhaṃ rākṣasādhipa / aparāddhā hi bālyāc ca rakṣaṇīyāḥ svabāndhavāḥ // 7.013.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ tu himavatpṛṣṭhaṃ gato dharmam upāsitum / raudraṃ vrataṃ samāsthāya niyato niyatendriyaḥ // 7.013.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra devo mayā dṛṣṭaḥ saha devyomayā prabhuḥ / savyaṃ cakṣur mayā caiva tatra devyāṃ nipātitam // 7.013.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kā nv iyaṃ syād iti śubhā na khalv anyena hetunā / rūpaṃ hy anupamaṃ kṛtvā tatra krīḍati pārvatī // 7.013.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devyāḥ prabhāvena dagdhaṃ savyaṃ mamekṣaṇam / reṇudhvastam iva jyotiḥ piṅgalatvam upāgatam // 7.013.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'ham anyad vistīrṇaṃ gatvā tasya gires taṭam / pūrṇaṃ varṣaśatāny aṣṭau samavāpa mahāvratam // 7.013.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāpte niyame tasmiṃs tatra devo maheśvaraḥ / prītaḥ prītena manasā prāha vākyam idaṃ prabhuḥ // 7.013.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prīto 'smi tava dharmajña tapasānena suvrata / mayā caitad vrataṃ cīrṇaṃ tvayā caiva dhanādhipa // 7.013.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tṛtīyaḥ puruṣo nāsti yaś cared vratam īdṛśam / vrataṃ suduścaraṃ hy etan mayaivotpāditaṃ purā // 7.013.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat sakhitvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ rocayasva dhaneśvara / tapasā nirjitatvād dhi sakhā bhava mamānagha // 7.013.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devyā dagdhaṃ prabhāvena yac ca sāvyaṃ tavekṣaṇam / ekākṣi piṅgalety eva nāma sthāsyati śāśvatam // 7.013.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ tena sakhitvaṃ ca prāpyānujñāṃ ca śaṃkarāt / āgamya ca śruto 'yaṃ me tava pāpaviniścayaḥ // 7.013.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadadharmiṣṭhasaṃyogān nivarta kuladūṣaṇa / cintyate hi vadhopāyaḥ sarṣisaṃghaiḥ surais tava // 7.013.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto daśagrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ / hastān dantāṃś a saṃpīḍya vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.013.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vijñātaṃ te mayā dūta vākyaṃ yat tvaṃ prabhāṣase / naiva tvam asi naivāsau bhrātrā yenāsi preṣitaḥ // 7.013.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hitaṃ na sa mamaitad dhi bravīti dhanarakṣakaḥ / maheśvarasakhitvaṃ tu mūḍha śrāvayase kila // 7.013.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hantavyo gurur jyeṣṭho mamāyam iti manyate / tasya tv idānīṃ śrutvā me vākyam eṣā kṛtā matiḥ // 7.013.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trīṃl lokān api jeṣyāmi bāhuvīryam upāśritaḥ / etan muhūrtam eṣo 'haṃ tasyaikasya kṛte ca vai // 7.013.037.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturo lokapālāṃs tān nayiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // 7.013.037.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu laṅkeśo dūtaṃ khaḍgena jaghnivān / dadau bhakṣayituṃ hy enaṃ rākṣasānāṃ durātmanām // 7.013.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kṛtasvastyayano ratham āruhya rāvaṇaḥ / trailokyavijayākāṅkṣī yayau tatra dhaneśvaraḥ // 7.013.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍbhir nityaṃ balotkaṭaiḥ / mahodaraprahastābhyāṃ mārīcaśukasāraṇaiḥ // 7.014.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhūmrākṣeṇa ca vīreṇa nityaṃ samaragṛdhnunā / vṛtaḥ saṃprayayau śrīmān krodhāl lokān dahann iva // 7.014.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purāṇi sa nadīḥ śailān vanāny upavanāni ca / atikramya muhūrtena kailāsaṃ girim āviśat // 7.014.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ niviṣṭaṃ girau tasmin rākṣasendraṃ niśamya tu / rājño bhrātāyam ity uktvā gatā yatra dhaneśvaraḥ // 7.014.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatvā tu sarvam ācakhyur bhrātus tasya viniścayam / anujñātā yayuś caiva yuddhāya dhanadena te // 7.014.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato balasya saṃkṣobhaḥ sāgarasyeva vardhataḥ / abhūn nairṛtarājasya giriṃ saṃcālayann iva // 7.014.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yuddhaṃ samabhavad yakṣarākṣasasaṃkulam / vyathitāś cābhavaṃs tatra sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ // 7.014.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ sainyaṃ daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ / harṣān nādaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā roṣāt samabhivartata // 7.014.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye tu te rākṣasendrasya sacivā ghoravikramaḥ / te sahasraṃ sahasrāṇām ekaikaṃ samayodhayan // 7.014.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gadābhiḥ parighair asibhiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ / vadhyamāno daśagrīvas tat sainyaṃ samagāhata // 7.014.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tair nirucchvāsavat tatra vadhyamāno daśānanaḥ / varṣamāṇair iva ghanair yakṣendraiḥ saṃnirudhyata // 7.014.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa durātmā samudyamya kāladaṇḍopamāṃ gadām / praviveśa tataḥ sainyaṃ nayan yakṣān yamakṣayam // 7.014.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kakṣam iva vistīrṇaṃ śuṣkendhanasamākulam / vātenāgnir ivāyatto 'dahat sainyaṃ sudāruṇam // 7.014.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tais tu tasya mṛdhe 'mātyair mahodaraśukādibhiḥ / alpāvaśiṣṭās te yakṣāḥ kṛtā vātair ivāmbudāḥ // 7.014.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cit tv āyudhabhagnāṅgāḥ patitāḥ samarakṣitau / oṣṭhān svadaśanais tīkṣṇair daṃśanto bhuvi pātitāḥ // 7.014.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhayād anyonyam āliṅgya bhraṣṭaśastrā raṇājire / niṣedus te tadā yakṣāḥ kūlā jalahatā iva // 7.014.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatānāṃ svargasaṃsthānāṃ yudhyatāṃ pṛthivītale / prekṣatām ṛṣisaṃghānāṃ na babhūvāntaraṃ divi // 7.014.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare rāma vistīrṇabalavāhanaḥ / agamat sumahān yakṣo nāmnā saṃyodhakaṇṭakaḥ // 7.014.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena yakṣeṇa mārīco viṣṇuneva samāhataḥ / patitaḥ pṛthivīṃ bheje kṣīṇapuṇya ivāmbarāt // 7.014.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāptasaṃjño muhūrtena viśramya ca niśācaraḥ / taṃ yakṣaṃ yodhayām āsa sa ca bhagnaḥ pradudruve // 7.014.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kāñcanacitrāṅgaṃ vaidūryarajatokṣitam / maryādāṃ dvārapālānāṃ toraṇaṃ tat samāviśat // 7.014.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāma daśagrīvaṃ praviśantaṃ niśācaram / sūryabhānur iti khyāto dvārapālo nyavārayat // 7.014.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas toraṇam utpāṭya tena yakṣeṇa tāḍitaḥ / rākṣaso yakṣasṛṣṭena toraṇena samāhataḥ // 7.014.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kṣitiṃ prayayau rāma varāt salilayoninaḥ // 7.014.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu tenaiva taṃ yakṣaṃ toraṇena samāhanat / nādṛśyata tadā yakṣo bhasma tena kṛtas tu saḥ // 7.014.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pradudruvuḥ sarve yakṣā dṛṣṭvā parākramam / tato nadīr guhāś caiva viviśur bhayapīḍitāḥ // 7.014.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tān vidrutān dṛṣṭvā yakṣāñ śatasahasraśaḥ / svayam eva dhanādhyakṣo nirjagāma raṇaṃ prati // 7.015.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra māṇicāro nāma yakṣaḥ paramadurjayaḥ / vṛto yakṣasahasraiḥ sa caturbhiḥ samayodhayat // 7.015.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te gadāmusalaprāsaśaktitomaramudgaraiḥ / abhighnanto raṇe yakṣā rākṣasān abhidudruvuḥ // 7.015.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahastena tadā sahasraṃ nihataṃ raṇe / mahodareṇa gadayā sahasram aparaṃ hatam // 7.015.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kruddhena ca tadā rāma mārīcena durātmanā / nimeṣāntaramātreṇa dve sahasre nipātite // 7.015.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhūmrākṣeṇa samāgamya māṇibhadro mahāraṇe / musalenorasi krodhāt tāḍito na ca kampitaḥ // 7.015.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gadāṃ samāvidhya māṇibhadreṇa rākṣasaḥ / dhūmrākṣas tāḍito mūrdhni vihvalo nipapāta ha // 7.015.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhūmrākṣaṃ tāḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ śoṇitokṣitam / abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddho māṇibhadraṃ daśānanaḥ // 7.015.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ kruddham abhidhāvantaṃ yugāntāgnim ivotthitam / śaktibhis tāḍayām āsa tisṛbhir yakṣapuṃgavaḥ // 7.015.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rākṣasarājena tāḍito gadayā raṇe / tasya tena prahāreṇa mukuṭaḥ pārśvam āgataḥ // 7.015.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadā prabhṛti yakṣo 'sau pārśvamaulir iti smṛtaḥ // 7.015.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tu vimukhe yakṣe māṇibhadre mahātmani / saṃnādaḥ sumahān rāma tasmiñ śaile vyavardhata // 7.015.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dūrāt pradadṛśe dhanādhyakṣo gadādharaḥ / śukraproṣṭaḥpadābhyāṃ ca śaṅkhapadmasamāvṛtaḥ // 7.015.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ saṃkhye śāpād vibhraṣṭagauravam / uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān yuktaṃ paitāmahe kule // 7.015.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā tvaṃ vāryamāṇo 'pi nāvagacchasi durmate / paścād asya phalaṃ prāpya jñāsyase nirayaṃ gataḥ // 7.015.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo hi mohād viṣaṃ pītvā nāvagacchati mānavaḥ / pariṇāme sa vi mūḍho jānīte karmaṇaḥ phalam // 7.015.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daivatāni hi nandanti dharmayuktena kena cit / yena tvam īdṛśaṃ bhāvaṃ nītas tac ca na budhyase // 7.015.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo hi mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn ācaryāṃś cāvamanyate / sa paśyati phalaṃ tasya pretarājavaśaṃ gataḥ // 7.015.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhruve hi śarīre yo na karoti tapo 'rjanam / sa paścāt tapyate mūḍho mṛto dṛṣṭvātmano gatim // 7.015.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya cin na hi durbudheś chandato jāyate matiḥ / yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ phalam aśnute // 7.015.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
buddhiṃ rūpaṃ balaṃ vittaṃ putrān māhātmyam eva ca / prapnuvanti narāḥ sarvaṃ svakṛtaiḥ pūrvakarmabhiḥ // 7.015.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ nirayagāmī tvaṃ yasya te matir īdṛśī / na tvāṃ samabhibhāṣiṣye durvṛttasyaiṣa nirṇayaḥ // 7.015.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tatas tena tasyāmātyāḥ samāhatāḥ / mārīcapramukhāḥ sarve vimukhā vipradudruvuḥ // 7.015.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tena daśagrīvo yakṣendreṇa mahātmanā / gadayābhihato mūrdhni na ca sthānād vyakampata // 7.015.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tau rāma nighnantāv anyonyaṃ paramāhave / na vihvalau na ca śrāntau babhūvatur amarṣaṇaiḥ // 7.015.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgneyam astraṃ sa tato mumoca dhanado raṇe / vāruṇena daśagrīvas tad astraṃ pratyavārayat // 7.015.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato māyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasīṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ / jaghāna mūrdhni dhanadaṃ vyāvidhya mahatīṃ gadām // 7.015.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa tenābhihato vihvalaḥ śoṇitokṣitaḥ / kṛttamūla ivāśoko nipapāta dhanādhipaḥ // 7.015.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ padmādibhis tatra nidhibhiḥ sa dhanādhipaḥ / nandanaṃ vanam ānīya dhanado śvāsitas tadā // 7.015.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nirjitya taṃ rāma dhanadaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ / puṣpakaṃ tasya jagrāha vimānaṃ jayalakṣaṇam // 7.015.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanastambhasaṃvītaṃ vaidūryamaṇitoraṇam / muktājālapraticchannaṃ sarvakāmaphaladrumam // 7.015.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat tu rājā samāruhya kāmagaṃ vīryanirjitam / jitvā vaiśravaṇaṃ devaṃ kailāsād avarohata // 7.015.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa jitvā bhrātaraṃ rāma dhanadaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ / mahāsenaprasūtiṃ tu yayau śaravaṇaṃ tataḥ // 7.016.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāpaśyad daśagrīvo raukmaṃ śaravaṇaṃ tadā / gabhastijālasaṃvītaṃ dvitīyam iva bhāskaram // 7.016.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parvataṃ sa samāsādya kiṃ cid ramyavanāntaram / apaśyat puṣpakaṃ tatra rāma viṣṭambhitaṃ divi // 7.016.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣṭabdhaṃ puṣpakaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmagaṃ hy agamaṃ kṛtam / rākṣasaś cintayām āsa sacivais taiḥ samāvṛtaḥ // 7.016.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim idaṃ yannimittaṃ me na ca gacchati puṣpakam / parvatasyoparisthasya kasya karma tv idaṃ bhavet // 7.016.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīd daśagrīvaṃ mārīco buddhikovidaḥ / naitan niṣkāraṇaṃ rājan puṣpako 'yaṃ na gacchati // 7.016.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pārśvam upāgamya bhavasyānucaro balī / nandīśvara uvācedaṃ rākṣasendram aśaṅkitaḥ // 7.016.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivartasva daśagrīva śaile krīḍati śaṃkaraḥ // 7.016.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suparṇanāgayakṣāṇāṃ daityadānavarakṣasām / prāṇinām eva sarveṣām agamyaḥ parvataḥ kṛtaḥ // 7.016.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa roṣāt tāmranayanaḥ puṣpakād avaruhya ca / ko 'yaṃ śaṃkara ity uktvā śailamūlam upāgamat // 7.016.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nandīśvaram athāpaśyad avidūrasthitaṃ prabhum / dīptaṃ śūlam avaṣṭabhya dvitīyam iva śaṃkaram // 7.016.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vānaramukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tam avajñāya rākṣasaḥ / prahāsaṃ mumuce maurkhyāt satoya iva toyadaḥ // 7.016.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃkruddho bhagavān nandī śaṃkarasyāparā tanuḥ / abravīd rākṣasaṃ tatra daśagrīvam upasthitam // 7.016.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmād vānaramūrtiṃ māṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasadurmate / maurkhyāt tvam avajānīṣe parihāsaṃ ca muñcasi // 7.016.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmān madrūpasaṃyuktā madvīryasamatejasaḥ / utpatsyante vadhārthaṃ hi kulasya tava vānarāḥ // 7.016.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ yat tvāṃ niśācara / na hantavyo hatas tvaṃ hi pūrvam eva svakarmabhiḥ // 7.016.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
acintayitvā sa tadā nandivākyaṃ niśācaraḥ / parvataṃ taṃ samāsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.016.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpakasya gatiś chinnā yatkṛte mama gacchataḥ / tad etac chailam unmūlaṃ karomi tava gopate // 7.016.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kena prabhāvena bhavas tatra krīḍati rājavat / vijñātavyaṃ na jānīṣe bhayasthānam upasthitam // 7.016.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tato rājan bhujān prakṣipya parvate / tolayām āsa taṃ śailaṃ samṛgavyālapādapam // 7.016.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāma mahādevaḥ prahasan vīkṣya tatkṛtam / pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ śailaṃ pīḍayām āsa līlayā // 7.016.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te pīḍitās tasya śailasyādho gatā bhujāḥ / vismitāś cābhavaṃs tatra sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ // 7.016.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣasā tena roṣāc ca bhujānāṃ pīḍanāt tathā / mukto virāvaḥ sumahāṃs trailokyaṃ yena pūritam // 7.016.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānuṣāḥ śabdavitrastā menire lokasaṃkṣayam / devatāś cāpi saṃkṣubdhāś calitāḥ sveṣu karmasu // 7.016.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prīto mahādevaḥ śailāgre viṣṭhitas tadā / muktvā tasya bhujān rājan prāha vākyaṃ daśānanam // 7.016.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prīto 'smi tava vīryāc ca śauṇḍīryāc ca niśācara / ravato vedanā muktaḥ svaraḥ paramadāruṇaḥ // 7.016.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmāl lokatrayaṃ tv etad rāvitaṃ bhayam āgatam / tasmāt tvaṃ rāvaṇo nāma nāmnā tena bhaviṣyasi // 7.016.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devatā mānuṣā yakṣā ye cānye jagatītale / evaṃ tvām abhidhāsyanti rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam // 7.016.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaccha paulastya visrabdhaḥ pathā yena tvam icchasi / mayā tvam abhyanujñāto rākṣasādhipa gamyatām // 7.016.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sākṣān maheśvareṇaivaṃ kṛtanāmā sa rāvaṇaḥ / abhivādya mahādevaṃ vimānaṃ tat samāruhat // 7.016.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mahītale rāma paricakrāma rāvaṇaḥ / kṣatriyān sumahāvīryān bādhamānas tatas tataḥ // 7.016.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rājan mahābāhur vicaran sa mahītalam / himavadvanam āsādya paricakrāma rāvaṇaḥ // 7.017.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāpaśyata vai kanyāṃ kṛṣṭājinajaṭādharām / ārṣeṇa vidhinā yuktāṃ tapantīṃ devatām iva // 7.017.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā rūpasaṃpannāṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ sumahāvratām / kāmamohaparītātmā papraccha prahasann iva // 7.017.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim idaṃ vartase bhadre viruddhaṃ yauvanasya te / na hi yuktā tavaitasya rūpasyeyaṃ pratikriyā // 7.017.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasyāsi duhitā bhadre ko vā bhartā tavānaghe / pṛcchataḥ śaṃsa me śīghraṃ ko vā hetus tapo'rjane // 7.017.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu sā kanyā tenānāryeṇa rakṣasā / abravīd vidhivat kṛtvā tasyātithyaṃ tapodhanā // 7.017.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśadhvajo nāma pitā brahmarṣir mama dhārmikaḥ / bṛhaspatisutaḥ śrīmān buddhyā tulyo bṛhaspateḥ // 7.017.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāhaṃ kurvato nityaṃ vedābhyāsaṃ mahātmanaḥ / saṃbhūtā vānmayī kanyā nāmnā vedavatī smṛtā // 7.017.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ sagandharvā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ / te cāpi gatvā pitaraṃ varaṇaṃ rocayanti me // 7.017.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca māṃ sa pitā tebhyo dattavān rākṣaseśvara / kāraṇaṃ tad vadiṣyāmi niśāmaya mahābhuja // 7.017.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitus tu mama jāmātā viṣṇuḥ kila surottamaḥ / abhipretas trilokeśas tasmān nānyasya me pitāḥ // 7.017.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dātum icchati dharmātmā tac chrutvā baladarpitaḥ / śambhur nāma tato rājā daityānāṃ kupito 'bhavat // 7.017.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena rātrau prasupto me pitā pāpena hiṃsitaḥ // 7.017.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato me jananī dīnā tac charīraṃ pitur mama / pariṣvajya mahābhāgā praviṣṭā dahanaṃ saha // 7.017.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato manorathaṃ satyaṃ pitur nārāyaṇaṃ prati / karomīti mamecchā ca hṛdaye sādhu viṣṭhitā // 7.017.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ pretagatasyāpi kariṣye kāṅkṣitaṃ pituḥ / iti pratijñām āruhya carāmi vipulaṃ tapaḥ // 7.017.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ mayā rākṣasapuṃgava / āśritāṃ viddhi māṃ dharmaṃ nārāyaṇapatīcchayā // 7.017.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vijñātas tvaṃ hi me rājan gaccha paulastyanandana / jānāmi tapasā sarvaṃ trailokye yad dhi vartate // 7.017.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bravīd rāvaṇas tatra tāṃ kanyāṃ sumahāvratām / avaruhya vimānāgrāt kandarpaśarapīḍitaḥ // 7.017.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaliptāsi suśroṇi yasyās te matir īdṛśī / vṛddhānāṃ mṛgaśāvākṣi bhrājate dharmasaṃcayaḥ // 7.017.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpannā nārhase kartum īdṛśam / trailokyasundarī bhīru yauvane vārdhakaṃ vidhim // 7.017.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaś ca tāvad asau yaṃ tvaṃ viṣṇur ity abhibhāṣase / vīryeṇa tapasā caiva bhogena ca balena ca // 7.017.021.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na mayāsau samo bhadre yaṃ tvaṃ kāmayase 'ṅgane // 7.017.021.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ma maivam iti sā kanyā tam uvāca niśācaram / mūrdhajeṣu ca tāṃ rakṣaḥ karāgreṇa parāmṛśat // 7.017.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vedavatī kruddhā keśān hastena sācchinat / uvācāgniṃ samādhāya maraṇāya kṛtatvarā // 7.017.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharṣitāyās tvayānārya nedānīṃ mama jīvitam / rakṣas tasmāt pravekṣyāmi paśyatas te hutāśanam // 7.017.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmāt tu dharṣitā cāham apāpā cāpy anāthavat / tasmāt tava vadhārthaṃ vai samutpatsyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ // 7.017.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi śakyaḥ striyā pāpa hantuṃ tvaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ / śāpe tvayi mayotsṛṣṭe tapasaś ca vyayo bhavet // 7.017.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tv asti mayā kiṃ cit kṛtaṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ tathā / tena hy ayonijā sādhvī bhaveyaṃ dharmiṇaḥ sutā // 7.017.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā praviṣṭā sā jvalantaṃ vai hutāśanam / papāta ca divo divyā puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ samantataḥ // 7.017.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvaṃ krodhahataḥ śatrur yayāsau nihatas tvayā / samupāśritya śailābhaṃ tava vīryam amānuṣam // 7.017.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam eṣā mahābhāgā martyeṣūtpadyate punaḥ / kṣetre halamukhagraste vedyām agniśikhopamā // 7.017.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā vedavatī nāma pūrvam āsīt kṛte yuge / tretāyugam anuprāpya vadhārthaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ // 7.017.031.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītotpanneti sītaiṣā mānuṣaiḥ punar ucyate // 7.017.031.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviṣṭāyāaṃ hutāśaṃ tu vedavatyāṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ / puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya paricakrāma medinīm // 7.018.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato maruttaṃ nṛpatiṃ yajantaṃ saha daivataiḥ / uśīrabījam āsādya dadarśa sa tu rākṣasaḥ // 7.018.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃvarto nāma brahmarṣir bhrātā sākṣād bṛhaspateḥ / yājayām āsa dharmajñaḥ sarvair brahmagaṇair vṛtaḥ // 7.018.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā devās tu tad rakṣo varadānena durjayam / tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ samāpannās tasya dharṣaṇabhīravaḥ // 7.018.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indro mayūraḥ saṃvṛtto dharmarājas tu vāyasaḥ / kṛkalāso dhanādhyakṣo haṃso vai varuṇo 'bhavat // 7.018.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ ca rājānam āsādya rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / prāha yuddhaṃ prayacceti nirjito 'smīti vā vada // 7.018.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato marutto nṛpatiḥ ko bhavān ity uvāca tam / avahāsaṃ tato muktvā rākṣaso vākyam abravīt // 7.018.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akutūhalabhāvena prīto 'smi tava pārthiva / dhanadasyānujaṃ yo māṃ nāvagacchasi rāvaṇam // 7.018.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
triṣu lokeṣu kaḥ so 'sti yo na jānāti me balam / bhrātaraṃ yena nirjitya vimānam idam āhṛtam // 7.018.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato marutto nṛpatis taṃ rākṣasam athābravīt / dhanyaḥ khalu bhavān yena jyeṣṭho bhrātā raṇe jitaḥ // 7.018.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nādharmasahitaṃ ślāghyaṃ na lokapratisaṃhitam / karma daurātmyakaṃ kṛtvā ślāghase bhrātṛnirjayāt // 7.018.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tvaṃ prāk kevalaṃ dharmaṃ caritvā labdhavān varam / śrutapūrvaṃ hi na mayā yādṛśaṃ bhāṣase svayam // 7.018.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śarāsanaṃ gṛhya sāyakāṃś ca sa pārthivaḥ / raṇāya niryayau kruddhaḥ saṃvarto mārgam āvṛṇot // 7.018.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bravīt snehasaṃyuktaṃ maruttaṃ taṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ / śrotavyaṃ yadi madvākyaṃ saṃprahāro na te kṣamaḥ // 7.018.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māheśvaram idaṃ satram asamāptaṃ kulaṃ dahet / dīkṣitasya kuto yuddhaṃ krūratvaṃ dīkṣite kutaḥ // 7.018.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃśayaś ca raṇe nityaṃ rākṣasaś caiṣa durjayaḥ / sa nivṛtto guror vākyān maruttaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // 7.018.016.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ svastho makhamukho 'bhavat // 7.018.016.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ nirjitaṃ matvā ghoṣayām āsa vai śukaḥ / rāvaṇo jitavāṃś ceti harṣān nādaṃ ca muktavān // 7.018.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān bhakṣayitvā tatrasthān maharṣīn yajñam āgatān / vitṛpto rudhirais teṣāṃ punaḥ saṃprayayau mahīm // 7.018.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇe tu gate devāḥ sendrāś caiva divaukasaḥ / tataḥ svāṃ yonim āsādya tāni sattvāny athābruvan // 7.018.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
harṣāt tadābravīd indro mayūraṃ nīlabarhiṇam / prīto 'smi tava dharmajña upakārād vihaṃgama // 7.018.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama netrasahasraṃ yat tat te barhe bhaviṣyati / varṣamāṇe mayi mudaṃ prāpsyase prītilakṣaṇam // 7.018.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nīlāḥ kila purā barhā mayūrāṇāṃ narādhipa / surādhipād varaṃ prāpya gatāḥ sarve vicitratām // 7.018.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmarājo 'bravīd rāma prāgvaṃśe vāyasaṃ sthitam / pakṣiṃs tavāsmi suprītaḥ prītasya ca vacaḥ śṛṇu // 7.018.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathānye vividhai rogaiḥ pīḍyante prāṇino mayā / te na te prabhaviṣyanti mayi prīte na saṃśayaḥ // 7.018.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛtyutas te bhayaṃ nāsti varān mama vihaṃgama / yāvat tvāṃ na vadhiṣyanti narās tāvad bhaviṣyasi // 7.018.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye ca madviṣayasthās tu mānavāḥ kṣudhayārditāḥ / tvayi bhukte tu tṛptās te bhaviṣyanti sabāndhavāḥ // 7.018.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varuṇas tv abravīd dhaṃsaṃ gaṅgātoyavicāriṇam / śrūyatāṃ prītisaṃyuktaṃ vacaḥ patraratheśvara // 7.018.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varṇo manoharaḥ saumyaś candramaṇḍalasaṃnibhaḥ / bhaviṣyati tavodagraḥ śuklaphenasamaprabhaḥ // 7.018.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maccharīraṃ samāsādya kānto nityaṃ bhaviṣyasi / prāpsyase cātulāṃ prītim etan me prītilakṣaṇam // 7.018.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haṃsānāṃ hi purā rāma na varṇaḥ sarvapāṇḍuraḥ / pakṣā nīlāgrasaṃvītāḥ kroḍāḥ śaṣpāgranirmalāḥ // 7.018.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīd vaiśravaṇaḥ kṛkalāsaṃ girau sthitam / hairaṇyaṃ saṃprayacchāmi varṇaṃ prītis tavāpy aham // 7.018.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadravyaṃ ca śiro nityaṃ bhaviṣyati tavākṣayam / eṣa kāñcanako varṇo matprītyā te bhaviṣyati // 7.018.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ dattvā varāṃs tebhyas tasmin yajñotsave surāḥ / nivṛtte saha rājñā vai punaḥ svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ // 7.018.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha jitvā maruttaṃ sa prayayau rākṣasādhipaḥ / nagarāṇi narendrāṇāṃ yuddhakāṅkṣī daśānanaḥ // 7.019.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa samāsādya rājendrān mahendravaruṇopamān / abravīd rākṣasendras tu yuddhaṃ me dīyatām iti // 7.019.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirjitāḥ smeti vā brūta eṣo hi mama niścayaḥ / anyathā kurvatām evaṃ mokṣo vo nopapadyate // 7.019.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu bahavaḥ prājñāḥ pārthivā dharmaṇiścayāḥ / nirjitāḥ smety abhāṣanta jñātvā varabalaṃ ripoḥ // 7.019.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duṣyantaḥ suratho gādhir gayo rājā purūravāḥ / ete sarve 'bruvaṃs tāta nirjitāḥ smeti pārthivāḥ // 7.019.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāyodhyāṃ samāsādya rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / suguptām anaraṇyena śakreṇevāmarāvatīm // 7.019.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāha rājānam āsādya yuddhaṃ me saṃpradīyatām / nirjito 'smīti vā brūhi mamaitad iha śāsanam // 7.019.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anaraṇyaḥ susaṃkruddho rākṣasendram athābravīt / dīyate dvandvayuddhaṃ te rākṣasādhipate mayā // 7.019.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha pūrvaṃ śrutārthena sajjitaṃ sumahad dhi yat / niṣkrāmat tan narendrasya balaṃ rakṣovadhodyatam // 7.019.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāgānāṃ bahusāhasraṃ vājinām ayutaṃ tathā / mahīṃ saṃchādya niṣkrāntaṃ sapadātirathaṃ kṣaṇāt // 7.019.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad rāvaṇabalaṃ prāpya balaṃ tasya mahīpateḥ / prāṇaśyata tadā rājan havyaṃ hutam ivānale // 7.019.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'paśyata narendras tu naśyamānaṃ mahad balam / mahārṇavaṃ samāsādya yathā pañcāpagā jalam // 7.019.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śakradhanuḥprakhyaṃ dhanur visphārayan svayam / āsadāda narendrās taṃ rāvaṇaṃ krodhamūrchitaḥ // 7.019.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bāṇaśatāny aṣṭau pātayām āsa mūrdhani / tasya rākṣasarājasya ikṣvākukulanandanaḥ // 7.019.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya bāṇāḥ patantas te cakrire na kṣataṃ kva cit / vāridhārā ivābhrebhyaḥ patantyo nagamūrdhani // 7.019.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rākṣasarājena kruddhena nṛpatis tadā / talena bhihato mūrdhni sa rathān nipapāta ha // 7.019.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā patito bhūmau vihvalāṅgaḥ pravepitaḥ / vajradagdha ivāraṇye sālo nipatito mahān // 7.019.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ prahasyābravīd rakṣa ikṣvākuṃ pṛthivīpatim / kim idānīṃ tvayā prāptaṃ phalaṃ māṃ prati yudhyatā // 7.019.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trailokye nāsti yo dvandvaṃ mama dadyān narādhipa / śaṅke pramatto bhogeṣu na śṛṇoṣi balaṃ mama // 7.019.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaivaṃ bruvato rājā mandāsur vākyam abravīt / kiṃ śakyam iha kartuṃ vai yat kālo duratikramaḥ // 7.019.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy ahaṃ nirjito rakṣas tvayā cātmapraśaṃsinā / kāleneha vipanno 'haṃ hetubhūtas tu me bhavān // 7.019.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ prāṇaparikṣaye / ikṣvākuparibhāvitvād vaco vakṣyāmi rākṣasa // 7.019.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi dattaṃ yadi hutaṃ yadi me sukṛtaṃ tapaḥ / yadi guptāḥ prajāḥ samyak tathā satyaṃ vaco 'stu me // 7.019.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utpatsyate kule hy asminn ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām / rājā paramatejasvī yas te prāṇān hariṣyati // 7.019.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato jaladharodagras tāḍito devadundubhiḥ / tasminn udāhṛte śāpe puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca khāc cyutā // 7.019.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa rājā rājendra gataḥ sthānaṃ triviṣṭapam / svargate ca nṛpe rāma rākṣasaḥ sa nyavartata // 7.019.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vitrāsayan martyān pṛthivyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ / āsasāda ghane tasmin nāradaṃ munisattamam // 7.020.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāradas tu mahātejā devarṣir amitaprabhaḥ / abravīn meghapṛṣṭhastho rāvaṇaṃ puṣpake sthitam // 7.020.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasādhipate saumya tiṣṭha viśravasaḥ suta / prīto 'smy abhijanopeta vikramair ūrjitais tava // 7.020.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣṇunā daityaghātaiś ca tārkṣyasyoragadharṣaṇaiḥ / tvayā samaramardaiś ca bhṛśaṃ hi paritoṣitaḥ // 7.020.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi tāvat te śrotavyaṃ śroṣyase yadi / śrutvā cānantaraṃ kāryaṃ tvayā rākṣasapuṃgava // 7.020.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim ayaṃ vadhyate lokas tvayāvadhyena daivataiḥ / hata eva hy ayaṃ loko yadā mṛtyuvaśaṃ gataḥ // 7.020.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśya tāvan mahābāho rākṣaseśvaramānuṣam / lokam enaṃ vicitrārthaṃ yasya na jñāyate gatiḥ // 7.020.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva cid vāditranṛttāni sevyante muditair janaiḥ / rudyate cāparair ārtair dhārāśrunayanānanaiḥ // 7.020.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātā pitṛsutasnehair bhāryā bandhumanoramaiḥ / mohenāyaṃ jano dhvastaḥ kleśaṃ svaṃ nāvabudhyate // 7.020.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat kim evaṃ parikliśya lokaṃ mohanirākṛtam / jita eva tvayā saumya martyaloko na saṃśayaḥ // 7.020.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu laṅkeśo dīpyamāna ivaujasā / abravīn nāradaṃ tatra saṃprahasyābhivādya ca // 7.020.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maharṣe devagandharvavihāra samarapriya / ahaṃ khalūdyato gantuṃ vijayārthī rasātalam // 7.020.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato lokatrayaṃ jitvā sthāpya nāgān surān vaśe / samudram amṛtārthaṃ vai mathiṣyāmi rasālayam // 7.020.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīd daśagrīvaṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / kva khalv idānīṃ mārgeṇa tvayānena gamiṣyate // 7.020.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ khalu sudurgamyaḥ pitṛrājñaḥ puraṃ prati / mārgo gacchati durdharṣo yamasyāmitrakarśana // 7.020.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu śāradameghābhaṃ muktvā hāsaṃ daśānanaḥ / uvāca kṛtam ity eva vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // 7.020.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād eṣa mahābrahman vaivasvatavadhodyataḥ / gacchāmi dakṣiṇām āśāṃ yatra sūryātmajo nṛpaḥ // 7.020.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā hi bhagavan krodhāt pratijñātaṃ raṇārthinā / avajeṣyāmi caturo lokapālān iti prabho // 7.020.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenaiṣa prasthito 'haṃ vai pitṛrājapuraṃ prati / prāṇisaṃkleśakartāraṃ yojayiṣyāmi mṛtyunā // 7.020.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā daśagrīvo muniṃ tam abhivādya ca / prayayau dakṣiṇām āśāṃ prahṛṣṭaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ // 7.020.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāradas tu mahātejā muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ / cintayām āsa viprendro vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ // 7.020.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yena lokās trayaḥ sendrāḥ kliśyante sacarācarāḥ / kṣīṇe cāyuṣi dharme ca sa kālo hiṃsyate katham // 7.020.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya nityaṃ trayo lokā vidravanti bhayārditāḥ / taṃ kathaṃ rākṣasendro 'sau svayam evābhigacchati // 7.020.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo vidhātā ca dhātā ca sukṛte duṣkṛte yathā / trailokyaṃ vijitaṃ yena taṃ kathaṃ nu vijeṣyati // 7.020.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aparaṃ kiṃ nu kṛtvaivaṃ vidhānaṃ saṃvidhāsyati / kautūhalasamutpanno yāsyāmi yamasādanam // 7.020.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ saṃcintya viprendro jagāma laghuvikramaḥ / ākhyātuṃ tad yathāvṛttaṃ yamasya sadanaṃ prati // 7.021.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apaśyat sa yamaṃ tatra devam agnipuraskṛtam / vidhānam upatiṣṭhantaṃ prāṇino yasya yādṛśam // 7.021.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dṛṣṭvā yamaḥ prāptaṃ maharṣiṃ tatra nāradam / abravīt sukham āsīnam arghyam āvedya dharmataḥ // 7.021.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kaccit kṣemaṃ nu devarṣe kaccid dharmo na naśyati / kim āgamanakṛtyaṃ te devagandharvasevita // 7.021.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīt tu tadā vākyaṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi vidhānaṃ ca vidhīyatām // 7.021.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa nāmnā daśagrīvaḥ pitṛrāja niśācaraḥ / upayāti vaśaṃ netuṃ vikramais tvāṃ sudurjayam // 7.021.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etena kāraṇenāhaṃ tvarito 'smy āgataḥ prabho / daṇḍapraharaṇasyādya tava kiṃ nu kariṣyati // 7.021.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare dūrād aṃśumantam ivoditam / dadṛśe divyam āyāntaṃ vimānaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ // 7.021.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ deśaṃ prabhayā tasya puṣpakasya mahābalaḥ / kṛtvā vitimiraṃ sarvaṃ samīpaṃ samavartata // 7.021.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tv apaśyan mahābāhur daśagrīvas tatas tataḥ / prāṇinaḥ sukṛtaṃ karma bhuñjānāṃś caiva duṣkṛtam // 7.021.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tān vadhyamānāṃs tu karmabhir duṣkṛtaiḥ svakaiḥ / rāvaṇo mocayām āsa vikrameṇa balād balī // 7.021.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
preteṣu mucyamāneṣu rākṣasena balīyasā / pretagopāḥ susaṃrabdhā rākṣasendram abhidravan // 7.021.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te prāsaiḥ parighaiḥ śūlair mudgaraiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ / puṣpakaṃ samavarṣanta śūrāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // 7.021.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāsanāni prāsādān vedikāstaraṇāni ca / puṣpakasya babhañjus te śīghraṃ madhukarā iva // 7.021.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devaniṣṭhānabhūtaṃ tad vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ mṛdhe / bhajyamānaṃ tathaivāsīd akṣayaṃ brahmatejasā // 7.021.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te rāvaṇāmātyā yathākāmaṃ yathābalam / ayudhyanta mahāvīryāḥ sa ca rājā daśānanaḥ // 7.021.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu śoṇitadigdhāṅgāḥ sarvaśastrasamāhatāḥ / amātyā rākṣasendrasya cakrur āyodhanaṃ mahat // 7.021.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyonyaṃ ca mahābhāgā jaghnuḥ praharaṇair yudhi / yamasya ca mahat sainyaṃ rākṣasasya ca mantriṇaḥ // 7.021.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amātyāṃs tāṃs tu saṃtyajya rākṣasasya mahaujasaḥ / tam eva samadhāvanta śūlavarṣair daśānanam // 7.021.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śoṇitadigdhāṅgaḥ prahārair jarjarīkṛtaḥ / vimāne rākṣasaśreṣṭhaḥ phullāśoka ivābabhau // 7.021.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śūlāni gadāḥ prāsāñ śaktitomarasāyakān / musalāni śilāvṛkṣān mumocāstrabalād balī // 7.021.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃs tu sarvān samākṣipya tad astram apahatya ca / jaghnus te rākṣasaṃ ghoram ekaṃ śatasahasrakaḥ // 7.021.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parivārya ca taṃ sarve śailaṃ meghotkarā iva / bhindipālaiś ca śūlaiś ca nirucchvāsam akārayan // 7.021.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimuktakavacaḥ kruddho siktaḥ śoṇitavisravaiḥ / sa puṣpakaṃ parityajya pṛthivyām avatiṣṭhata // 7.021.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa kārmukī bāṇī pṛthivyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ / labdhasaṃjño muhūrtena kruddhas tasthau yathāntakaḥ // 7.021.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pāśupataṃ divyam astraṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke / tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti tān uktvā tac cāpaṃ vyapakarṣata // 7.021.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jvālāmālī sa tu śaraḥ kravyādānugato raṇe / mukto gulmān drumāṃś caiva bhasmakṛtvā pradhāvati // 7.021.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tasya tejasā dagdhāḥ sainyā vaivasvatasya tu / raṇe tasmin nipatitā dāvadagdhā nagā iva // 7.021.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣaso bhīmavikramaḥ / nanāda sumahānādaṃ kampayann iva medinīm // 7.021.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu tasya mahānādaṃ śrutvā vaivasvato yamaḥ / śatruṃ vijayinaṃ mene svabalasya ca saṃkṣayam // 7.022.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu yodhān hatān matvā krodhaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ / abravīt tvaritaṃ sūtaṃ rathaḥ samupanīyatām // 7.022.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya sūto rathaṃ divyam upasthāpya mahāsvanam / sthitaḥ sa ca mahātejā āruroha mahāratham // 7.022.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāśamudgarahastaś ca mṛtyus tasyāgrato sthitaḥ / yena saṃkṣipyate sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram // 7.022.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāladaṇḍaś ca pārśvastho mūrtimān syandane sthitaḥ / yamapraharaṇaṃ divyaṃ prajvalann iva tejasā // 7.022.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato lokās trayas trastāḥ kampante ca divaukasaḥ / kālaṃ kruddhaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā lokatrayabhayāvaham // 7.022.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā tu te taṃ vikṛtaṃ rathaṃ mṛtyusamanvitam / sacivā rākṣasendrasya sarvalokabhayāvaham // 7.022.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laghusattvatayā sarve naṣṭasaṃjñā bhayārditāḥ / nātra yoddhuṃ samarthāḥ sma ity uktvā vipradudruvuḥ // 7.022.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu taṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ lokabhayāvaham / nākṣubhyata tadā rakṣo vyathā caivāsya nābhavat // 7.022.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu rāvaṇam āsādya visṛjañ śaktitomarān / yamo marmāṇi saṃkruddho rākṣasasya nyakṛntata // 7.022.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇas tu sthitaḥ svasthaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha / tasmin vaivasvatarathe toyavarṣam ivāmbudaḥ // 7.022.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mahāśaktiśataiḥ pātyamānair mahorasi / pratikartuṃ sa nāśaknod rākṣasaḥ śalyapīḍitaḥ // 7.022.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāpraharaṇair evaṃ yamenāmitrakarśinā / saptarātraṃ kṛte saṃkhye na bhagno vijito 'pi vā // 7.022.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bhavat punar yuddhaṃ yamarākṣasayos tadā / vijayākāṅkṣiṇos tatra samareṣv anivartinoḥ // 7.022.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / prajāpatiṃ puraskṛtya dadṛśus tad raṇājiram // 7.022.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃvarta iva lokānām abhavad yudhyatos tayoḥ / rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pretānām īśvarasya ca // 7.022.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasendras tataḥ kruddhaś cāpam āyamya saṃyuge / nirantaram ivākāśaṃ kurvan bāṇān mumoca ha // 7.022.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛtyuṃ caturbhir viśikhaiḥ sūtaṃ saptabhir ardayat / yamaṃ śarasahasreṇa śīghraṃ marmasv atāḍayat // 7.022.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kruddhasya sahasā yamasyābhiviniḥsṛtaḥ / jvālāmālo viniśvāso vadanāt krodhapāvakaḥ // 7.022.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'paśyaṃs tadāścaryaṃ devadānavarākṣasāḥ / krodhajaṃ pāvakaṃ dīptaṃ didhakṣantaṃ ripor balam // 7.022.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mṛtyus tu paramakruddho vaivasvatam athābravīt / muñca māṃ deva śīghraṃ tvaṃ nihanmi samare ripum // 7.022.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
narakaḥ śambaro vṛtraḥ śambhuḥ kārtasvaro balī / namucir virocanaś caiva tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau // 7.022.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete cānye ca bahavo balavanto durāsadāḥ / vinipannā mayā dṛṣṭāḥ kā cintāsmin niśācare // 7.022.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muñca māṃ sādhu dharmajña yāvad enaṃ nihanmy aham / na hi kaś cin mayā dṛṣṭo muhūrtam api jīvati // 7.022.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balaṃ mama na khalv etan maryādaiṣā nisargataḥ / saṃspṛṣṭo hi mayā kaś cin na jīved iti niścayaḥ // 7.022.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmarājaḥ pratāpavān / abravīt tatra taṃ mṛtyumayam enaṃ nihanmy aham // 7.022.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ saṃraktanayanaḥ kruddho vaivasvataḥ prabhuḥ / kāladaṇḍam amoghaṃ taṃ tolayām āsa pāṇinā // 7.022.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya pārśveṣu niśchidrāḥ kālapāśāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ / pāvakasparśasaṃkāśo mudgaro mūrtimān sthitaḥ // 7.022.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśanād eva yaḥ prāṇān prāṇinām uparudhyati / kiṃ punas tāḍanād vāpi pīḍanād vāpi dehinaḥ // 7.022.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa jvālāparivāras tu pibann iva niśācaram / karaspṛṣṭo balavatā daṇḍaḥ kruddhaḥ sudāruṇaḥ // 7.022.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vidudruvuḥ sarve sattvās tasmād raṇājirāt / surāś ca kṣubhitā dṛṣṭvā kāladaṇḍodyataṃ yamam // 7.022.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin prahartukāme tu daṇḍam udyamya rāvaṇam / yamaṃ pitāmahaḥ sākṣād darśayitvedam abravīt // 7.022.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaivasvata mahābāho na khalv atulavikrama / prahartavyaṃ tvayaitena daṇḍenāsmin niśācare // 7.022.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varaḥ khalu mayā dattas tasya tridaśapuṃgava / tat tvayā nānṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yan mayā vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ // 7.022.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amogho hy eṣa sarvāsāṃ prajānāṃ vinipātane / kāladaṇḍo mayā sṛṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ mṛtyupuraskṛtaḥ // 7.022.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan na khalv eṣa te saumya pātyo rākṣasamūrdhani / na hy asmin patite kaś cin muhūrtam api jīvati // 7.022.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi hy asmin nipatite na mriyetaiṣa rākṣasaḥ / mriyeta vā daśagrīvas tathāpy ubhayato 'nṛtam // 7.022.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasendrān niyacchādya daṇḍam enaṃ vadhodyatam / satyaṃ mama kuruṣvedaṃ lokāṃs tvaṃ samavekṣya ca // 7.022.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu dharmātmā pratyuvāca yamas tadā / eṣa vyāvartito daṇḍaḥ prabhaviṣṇur bhavān hi naḥ // 7.022.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ raṇagatena hi / yan mayā yan na hantavyo rākṣaso varadarpitaḥ // 7.022.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa tasmāt praṇaśyāmi darśanād asya rakṣasaḥ / ity uktvā sarathaḥ sāśvas tatraivāntaradhīyata // 7.022.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśagrīvas tu taṃ jitvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ / puṣpakeṇa tu saṃhṛṣṭo niṣkrānto yamasādanāt // 7.022.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vaivasvato devaiḥ saha brahmapurogamaiḥ / jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭo nāradaś ca mahāmuniḥ // 7.022.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu jitvā daśagrīvo yamaṃ tridaśapuṃgavam / rāvaṇas tu jayaślāghī svasahāyān dadarśa ha // 7.023.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jayena vardhayitvā ca mārīcapramukhās tataḥ / puṣpakaṃ bhejire sarve sāntvitā ravaṇena ha // 7.023.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rasātalaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ payaso nidhim / daityoraga gaṇādhyuṣṭaṃ varuṇena surakṣitam // 7.023.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu bhogavatīṃ gatvā purīṃ vāsukipālitām / sthāpya nāgān vaśe kṛtvā yayau maṇimatīṃ purīm // 7.023.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivātakavacās tatra daityā labdhavarā vasan / rākṣasas tān samāsādya yuddhena samupāhvayat // 7.023.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu sarve suvikrāntā daiteyā balaśālinaḥ / nānāpraharaṇās tatra prayuddhā yuddhadurmadāḥ // 7.023.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tu yudhyamānānāṃ sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ / na cānyatarayos tatra vijayo vā kṣayo 'pi vā // 7.023.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pitāmahas tatra trailokyagatir avyayaḥ / ājagāma drutaṃ devo vimānavaram āsthitaḥ // 7.023.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivātakavacānāṃ tu nivārya raṇakarma tat / vṛddhaḥ pitāmaho vākyam uvāca viditārthavat // 7.023.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy ayaṃ rāvaṇo yuddhe śakyo jetuṃ surāsuraiḥ / na bhavantaḥ kṣayaṃ netuṃ śakyāḥ sendraiḥ surāsuraiḥ // 7.023.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasasya sakhitvaṃ vai bhavadbhiḥ saha rocate / avibhaktā hi sarvārthāḥ suhṛdāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // 7.023.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'gnisākṣikaṃ sakhyaṃ kṛtavāṃs tatra rāvaṇaḥ / nivātakavacaiḥ sārdhaṃ prītimān abhavat tadā // 7.023.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arcitas tair yathānyāyaṃ saṃvatsarasukhoṣitaḥ / svapurān nirviśeṣaṃ ca pūjāṃ prāpto daśānanaḥ // 7.023.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tūpadhārya māyānāṃ śatam ekonam ātmavān / salilendrapurānveṣī sa babhrāma rasātalam // 7.023.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'śmanagaraṃ nāma kālakeyābhirakṣitam / taṃ vijitya muhūrtena jaghne daityāṃś catuḥśatam // 7.023.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pāṇḍurameghābhaṃ kailāsam iva saṃsthitam / varuṇasyālayaṃ divyam apaśyad rākṣasādhipaḥ // 7.023.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣarantīṃ ca payo nityaṃ surabhiṃ gām avasthitām / yasyāḥ payoviniṣyandāt kṣīrodo nāma sāgaraḥ // 7.023.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmāc candraḥ prabhavati śītaraśmiḥ prajāhitaḥ / yaṃ samāsādya jīvanti phenapāḥ paramarṣayaḥ // 7.023.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amṛtaṃ yatra cotpannaṃ surā cāpi surāśinām // 7.023.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāṃ bruvanti narā loke surabhiṃ nāma nāmataḥ / pradakṣiṇaṃ tu tāṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ paramādbhutām // 7.023.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviveśa mahāghoraṃ guptaṃ bahuvidhair balaiḥ // 7.023.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dhārāśatākīrṇaṃ śāradābhranibhaṃ tadā / nityaprahṛṣṭaṃ dadṛśe varuṇasya gṛhottamam // 7.023.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato hatvā balādhyakṣān samare taiś ca tāḍitaḥ / abravīt kva gato yo vo rājā śīghraṃ nivedyatām // 7.023.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuddhārthī rāvaṇaḥ prāptas tasya yuddhaṃ pradīyatām / vada vā na bhayaṃ te 'sti nirjito 'smīti sāñjaliḥ // 7.023.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare kruddhā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ / putrāḥ pautrāś ca niṣkrāman gauś ca puṣkara eva ca // 7.023.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu vīryaguṇopetā balaiḥ parivṛtāḥ svakaiḥ / yuktvā rathān kāmagamān udyadbhāskaravarcasaḥ // 7.023.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yuddhaṃ samabhavad dāruṇaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / salilendrasya putrāṇāṃ rāvaṇasya ca rakṣasaḥ // 7.023.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amātyais tu mahāvīryair daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ / vāruṇaṃ tad balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kṣaṇena vinipātitam // 7.023.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samīkṣya svabalaṃ saṃkhye varuṇasyā sutās tadā / arditāḥ śarajālena nivṛttā raṇakarmaṇaḥ // 7.023.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahītalagatās te tu rāvaṇaṃ dṛśya puṣpake / ākāśam āśu viviśuḥ syandanaiḥ śīghragāmibhiḥ // 7.023.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahad āsīt tatas teṣāṃ tulyaṃ sthānam avāpya tat / ākāśayuddhaṃ tumulaṃ devadānavayor iva // 7.023.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe śaraiḥ pāvakasaṃnibhaiḥ / vimukhīkṛtya saṃhṛṣṭā vinedur vividhān ravān // 7.023.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mahodaraḥ kruddho rājānaṃ dṛśya dharṣitam / tyaktvā mṛtyubhayaṃ vīro yuddhakāṅkṣī vyalokayat // 7.023.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena teṣāṃ hayā ye ca kāmagāḥ pavanopamāḥ / mahodareṇa gadayā hatās te prayayuḥ kṣitim // 7.023.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ varuṇasūnūnāṃ hatvā yodhān hayāṃś ca tān / mumocāśu mahānādaṃ virathān prekṣya tān sthitān // 7.023.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu teṣāṃ rathāḥ sāśvāḥ saha sārathibhir varaiḥ / mahodareṇa nihatāḥ patitāḥ pṛthivītale // 7.023.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu tyaktvā rathān putrā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ / ākāśe viṣṭhitāḥ śūrāḥ svaprabhāvān na vivyathuḥ // 7.023.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanūṃṣi kṛtvā sajyāni vinirbhidya mahodaram / rāvaṇaṃ samare kruddhāḥ sahitāḥ samabhidravan // 7.023.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ kālāgnir iva viṣṭhitaḥ / śaravarṣaṃ mahāvegaṃ teṣāṃ marmasv apātayat // 7.023.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
musalāni vicitrāṇi tato bhallaśatāni ca / paṭṭasāṃś caiva śaktīś ca śataghnīs tomarāṃs tathā // 7.023.038.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pātayām āsa durdharṣas teṣām upari viṣṭhitaḥ // 7.023.038.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha viddhās tu te vīrā viniṣpetuḥ padātayaḥ // 7.023.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rakṣo mahānādaṃ muktvā hanti sma vāruṇān / nānāpraharaṇair ghorair dhārāpātair ivāmbudaḥ // 7.023.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te vimukhāḥ sarve patitā dharaṇītale / raṇāt svapuruṣaiḥ śīghraṃ gṛhāṇy eva praveśitāḥ // 7.023.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān abravīt tato rakṣo varuṇāya nivedyatām / rāvaṇaṃ cābravīn mantrī prabhāso nāma vāruṇaḥ // 7.023.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gataḥ khalu mahātejā brahmalokaṃ jaleśvaraḥ / gāndharvaṃ varuṇaḥ śrotuṃ yaṃ tvam āhvayase yudhi // 7.023.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat kiṃ tava vṛthā vīra pariśrāmya gate nṛpe / ye tu saṃnihitā vīrāḥ kumārās te parājitāḥ // 7.023.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasendras tu tac chrutvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ / harṣān nādaṃ vimuñcan vai niṣkrānto varuṇālayāt // 7.023.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgatas tu pathā yena tenaiva vinivṛtya saḥ / laṅkām abhimukho rakṣo nabhastalagato yayau // 7.023.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivartamānaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇaḥ sa durātmavān / jahre pathi narendrarṣidevagandharvakanyakāḥ // 7.024.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśanīyāṃ hi yāṃ rakṣaḥ kanyāṃ strīṃ vātha paśyati / hatvā bandhujanaṃ tasyā vimāne saṃnyaveśayat // 7.024.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra pannagayakṣāṇāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca rakṣasām / daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca kanyā jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ // 7.024.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīrghakeśyaḥ sucārvaṅgyaḥ pūrṇacandranibhānanāḥ / śokāyattās taruṇyaś ca samastā stananamritāḥ // 7.024.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tulyam agnyarciṣāṃ tatra śokāgnibhayasaṃbhavam / pravepamānā duḥkhārtā mumucur bāṣpajaṃ jalam // 7.024.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsāṃ niśvasamānānāṃ niśvasaiḥ saṃpradīpitam / agnihotram ivābhāti saṃniruddhāgnipuṣpakam // 7.024.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kā cid dadhyau suduḥkhārtā hanyād api hi mām ayam / smṛtvā mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn putrān vai śvaśurān api // 7.024.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duḥkhaśokasamāviṣṭā vilepuḥ sahitāḥ striyaḥ // 7.024.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ nu khalu me putraḥ kariṣyati mayā vinā / kathaṃ mātā kathaṃ bhrātā nimagnāḥ śokasāgare // 7.024.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hā kathaṃ nu kariṣyāmi bhartāraṃ daivataṃ vinā / mṛtyo prasīda yāce tvāṃ naya māṃ yamasādanam // 7.024.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu me duṣkṛtaṃ karma kṛtaṃ dehāntare purā / tato 'smi dharṣitānena patitā śokasāgare // 7.024.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na khalv idānīṃ paśyāmi duḥkhasyāntam ihātmanaḥ / aho dhin mānuṣāṃl lokān nāsti khalv adhamaḥ paraḥ // 7.024.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad durbalā balavatā bāndhavā rāvaṇena me / uditenaiva sūryeṇa tārakā iva nāśitāḥ // 7.024.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho subalavad rakṣo vadhopāyeṣu rajyate / aho durvṛttam ātmānaṃ svayam eva na budhyate // 7.024.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā sadṛśas tāvad vikramo 'sya durātmanaḥ / idaṃ tv asadṛśaṃ karma paradārābhimarśanam // 7.024.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmād eṣa parakhyāsu strīṣu rajyati durmatiḥ / tasmād dhi strīkṛtenaiva vadhaṃ prāpsyati vāraṇaḥ // 7.024.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaptaḥ strībhiḥ sa tu tadā hatatejāḥ suniṣprabha / pativratābhiḥ sādhvībhiḥ sthitābhiḥ sādhu vartmani // 7.024.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ vilapamānāsu rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ pūjyamāno niśācaraiḥ // 7.024.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rākṣasarājasya svasā paramaduḥkhitā / pādayoḥ patitā tasya vaktum evopacakrame // 7.024.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ svasāram utthāpya rāvaṇaḥ parisāntvayan / abravīt kim idaṃ bhadre vaktum arhasi me drutam // 7.024.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā bāṣpapariruddhākṣī rākṣasī vākyam abravīt / hatāsmi vidhavā rājaṃs tvayā balavatā kṛtā // 7.024.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete viryāt tvayā rājan daityā vinihatā raṇe / kālakeyā iti khyātā mahābalaparākramāḥ // 7.024.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra me nihato bhartā garīyāñ jīvitād api / sa tvayā dayitas tatra bhrātrā śatrusamena vai // 7.024.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yā tvayāsmi hatā rājan svayam eveha bandhunā / duḥkhaṃ vaidhavyaśabdaṃ ca dattaṃ bhokṣyāmy ahaṃ tvayā // 7.024.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nanu nāma tvayā rakṣyo jāmātā samareṣv api / taṃ nihatya raṇe rājan svayam eva na lajjase // 7.024.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tayā rakṣo bhaginyā krośamānayā / abravīt sāntvayitvā tāṃ sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ // 7.024.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alaṃ vatse viṣādena na bhetavyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / mānadānaviśeṣais tvāṃ toṣayiṣyāmi nityaśaḥ // 7.024.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuddhe pramatto vyākṣipto jayakāṅkṣī kṣipañ śarān / nāvagacchāmi yuddheṣu svān parān vāpy ahaṃ śubhe // 7.024.027.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenāsau nihataḥ saṃkhye mayā bhartā tava svasaḥ // 7.024.027.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin kāle tu yat prāptaṃ tat kariṣyāmi te hitam / bhrātur aiśvaryasaṃsthasya kharasya bhava pārśvataḥ // 7.024.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturdaśānāṃ bhrātā te sahasrāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati / prabhuḥ prayāṇe dāne ca rākṣasānāṃ mahaujasām // 7.024.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra mātṛṣvasuḥ putro bhrātā tava kharaḥ prabhuḥ / bhaviṣyati sadā kurvan yad vakṣyasi vacaḥ svayam // 7.024.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghraṃ gacchatv ayaṃ śūro daṇḍakān parirakṣitum / dūṣaṇo 'sya balādhyakṣo bhaviṣyati mahābalaḥ // 7.024.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi śapto vanoddeśaḥ kruddhenośanasā purā / rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāso bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // 7.024.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā daśagrīvaḥ sainyaṃ tasyādideśa ha / caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpiṇām // 7.024.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taiḥ sarvaiḥ parivṛto rākṣasair ghoradarśanaiḥ / kharaḥ saṃprayayau śīghraṃ daṇḍakān akutobhayaḥ // 7.024.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tatra kārayām āsa rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam / sā ca śūrpaṇakhā prītā nyavasad daṇḍakāvane // 7.024.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dattvā daśagrīvo vanaṃ ghoraṃ kharasya tat / bhaginīṃ ca samāśvāsya hṛṣṭaḥ svasthataro 'bhavat // 7.025.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nikumbhilā nāma laṅkāyāḥ kānanaṃ mahat / mahātmā rākṣasendras tat praviveśa sahānugaḥ // 7.025.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra yūpaśatākīrṇaṃ saumyacaityopaśobhitam / dadarśa viṣṭhitaṃ yajñaṃ saṃpradīptam iva śriyā // 7.025.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kṛṣṇājinadharaṃ kamaṇḍaluśikhādhvajam / dadarśa svasutaṃ tatra meghanādam ariṃdamam // 7.025.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rakṣaḥpatiḥ samāsādya samāśliṣya ca bāhubhiḥ / abravīt kim idaṃ vatsa vartate tad bravīhi me // 7.025.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uśanā tv abravīt tatra gurur yajñasamṛddhaye / rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ dvijaśreṣṭho mahātapāḥ // 7.025.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham ākhyāmi te rājañ śrūyatāṃ sarvam eva ca / yajñās te sapta putreṇa prāptāḥ subahuvistarāḥ // 7.025.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agniṣṭomo 'śvamedhaś ca yajño bahusuvarṇakaḥ / rājasūyas tathā yajño gomedho vaiṣṇavas tathā // 7.025.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māheśvare pravṛtte tu yajñe pumbhiḥ sudurlabhe / varāṃs te labdhavān putraḥ sākṣāt paśupater iha // 7.025.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmagaṃ syandanaṃ divyam antarikṣacaraṃ dhruvam / māyāṃ ca tāmasīṃ nāma yayā saṃpadyate tamaḥ // 7.025.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etayā kila saṃgrāme māyayā rākṣaseśvara / prayuddhasya gatiḥ śakyā na hi jñātuṃ surāsuraiḥ // 7.025.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṣayāv iṣudhī bāṇaiś cāpaṃ cāpi sudurjayam / astraṃ ca balavat saumya śatruvidhvaṃsanaṃ raṇe // 7.025.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etān sarvān varāṃl labdhvā putras te 'yaṃ daśānana / adya yajñasamāptau ca tvatpratīkṣaḥ sthito aham // 7.025.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīd daśagrīvo na śobhanam idaṃ kṛtam / pūjitāḥ śatravo yasmād dravyair indrapurogamāḥ // 7.025.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ehīdānīṃ kṛtaṃ yad dhi tad akartuṃ na śakyate / āgaccha saumya gacchāmaḥ svam eva bhavanaṃ prati // 7.025.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato gatvā daśagrīvaḥ saputraḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ / striyo 'vatārayām āsa sarvās tā bāṣpaviklavāḥ // 7.025.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣiṇyo ratnabūtāś ca devadānavarakṣasām / nānābhūṣaṇasaṃpannā jvalantyaḥ svena tejasā // 7.025.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇas tu tā nārīr dṛṣṭvā śokasamākulāḥ / tasya tāṃ ca matiṃ jñātvā dharmātmā vākyam abravīt // 7.025.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
