īdṛśais taiḥ samācārair yaśo'rthakulanāśanaiḥ / dharṣaṇaṃ prāṇināṃ dattvā svamatena viceṣṭase // 7.025.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jñātīn vai dharṣayitvemās tvayānītā varāṅganāḥ / tvām atikramya madhunā rājan kumbhīnasī hṛtā // 7.025.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇas tv abravīd vākyaṃ nāvagacchāmi kiṃ tv idam / ko vāyaṃ yas tvayākhyāto madhur ity eva nāmataḥ // 7.025.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇas tu saṃkruddho bhrātaraṃ vākyam abravīt / śrūyatām asya pāpasya karmaṇaḥ phalam āgatam // 7.025.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātāmahasya yo 'smākaṃ jyeṣṭho bhrātā sumālinaḥ / mālyavān iti vikhyāto vṛddhaprājño niśācaraḥ // 7.025.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitur jyeṣṭho jananyāś ca asmākaṃ tv āryako 'bhavat / tasya kumbhīnasī nāma duhitur duhitābhavat // 7.025.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātṛṣvasur athāsmākaṃ sā kanyā cānalodbhavā / bhavaty asmākam eṣā vai bhrātṝṇāṃ dharmataḥ svasā // 7.025.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā hṛtā madhunā rājan rākṣasena balīyasā / yajñapravṛtte putre te mayi cāntarjaloṣite // 7.025.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nihatya rākṣasaśreṣṭhān amātyāṃs tava saṃmatān / dharṣayitvā hṛtā rājan guptā hy antaḥpure tava // 7.025.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tv etan mahārāja kṣāntam eva hato na saḥ / yasmād avaśyaṃ dātavyā kanyā bhartre hi dātṛbhiḥ // 7.025.028.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asminn evābhisaṃprāptaṃ loke viditam astu te // 7.025.028.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bravīd daśagrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ / kalpyatāṃ me rathaḥ śīghraṃ śūrāḥ sajjībhavantu ca // 7.025.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātā me kumbhakarṇaś ca ye ca mukhyā niśācarāḥ / vāhanāny adhirohantu nānāpraharaṇāyudhāḥ // 7.025.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya taṃ samare hatvā madhuṃ rāvaṇanirbhayam / indralokaṃ gamiṣyāmi yuddhakāṅkṣī suhṛdvṛtaḥ // 7.025.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vijitya tridivaṃ vaśe sthāpya puraṃdaram / nirvṛto vihariṣyāmi trailokyaiśvaryaśobhitaḥ // 7.025.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṣauhiṇīsahasrāṇi catvāry ugrāṇi rakṣasām / nānāpraharaṇāny āśu niryayur yuddhakāṅkṣiṇām // 7.025.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrajit tv agrataḥ sainyaṃ sainikān parigṛhya ca / rāvaṇo madhyataḥ śūraḥ kumbhakarṇaś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ // 7.025.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā laṅkāyāṃ dharmam ācarat / te tu sarve mahābhāgā yayur madhupuraṃ prati // 7.025.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathair nāgaiḥ kharair uṣṭrair hayair dīptair mahoragaiḥ / rākṣasāḥ prayayuḥ sarve kṛtvākāśaṃ nirantaram // 7.025.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daityāś ca śataśas tatra kṛtavairāḥ suraiḥ saha / rāvaṇaṃ prekṣya gacchantam anvagacchanta pṛṣṭhataḥ // 7.025.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu gatvā madhupuraṃ praviśya ca daśānanaḥ / na dadarśa madhuṃ tatra bhaginīṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān // 7.025.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā prahvā prāñjalir bhūtvā śirasā pādayor gatā / tasya rākṣasarājasya trastā kumbhīnasī svasā // 7.025.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ samutthāpayām āsa na bhetavyam iti bruvan / rāvaṇo rākṣasaśreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ cāpi karavāṇi te // 7.025.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sābravīd yadi me rājan prasannas tvaṃ mahābala / bhartāraṃ na mamehādya hantum arhasi mānada // 7.025.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyavāg bhava rājendra mām avekṣasva yācatīm / tvayā hy uktaṃ mahābāho na bhetavyam iti svayam // 7.025.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇas tv abravīd dhṛṣṭaḥ svasāraṃ tatra saṃsthitām / kva cāsau tava bhartā vai mama śīghraṃ nivedyatām // 7.025.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saha tena gamiṣyāmi suralokaṃ jayāya vai / tava kāruṇyasauhārdān nivṛtto 'smi madhor vadhāt // 7.025.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktā sā prasuptaṃ taṃ samutthāpya niśācaram / abravīt saṃprahṛṣṭeva rākṣasī suvipaścitam // 7.025.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa prāpto daśagrīvo mama bhrātā niśācaraḥ / suralokajayākāṅkṣī sāhāyye tvāṃ vṛṇoti ca // 7.025.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad asya tvaṃ sahāyārthaṃ sabandhur gaccha rākṣasa / snigdhasya bhajamānasya yuktam arthāya kalpitum // 7.025.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tathety āha madhur vacaḥ / dadarśa rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ yathānyāyam upetya saḥ // 7.025.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjayām āsa dharmeṇa rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam / prāptapūjo daśagrīvo madhuveśmani vīryavān // 7.025.049.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra caikāṃ niśām uṣya gamanāyopacakrame // 7.025.049.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kailāsam āsādya śailaṃ vaiśravaṇālayam / rākṣasendro mahendrābhaḥ senām upaniveśayat // 7.025.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu tatra daśagrīvaḥ saha sainyena vīryavān / astaṃ prāpte dinakare nivāsaṃ samarocayat // 7.026.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udite vimale candre tulyaparvatavarcasi / sa dadarśa guṇāṃs tatra candrapādopaśobhitān // 7.026.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karṇikāravanair divyaiḥ kadambagahanais tathā / padminībhiś ca phullābhir mandākinyā jalair api // 7.026.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ghaṇṭānām iva saṃnādaḥ śuśruve madhurasvanaḥ / apsarogaṇasaṃghanāṃ gāyatāṃ dhanadālaye // 7.026.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpavarṣāṇi muñcanto nagāḥ pavanatāḍitāḥ / śailaṃ taṃ vāsayantīva madhumādhavagandhinaḥ // 7.026.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madhupuṣparajaḥpṛktaṃ gandham ādāya puṣkalam / pravavau vardhayan kāmaṃ rāvaṇasya sukho 'nilaḥ // 7.026.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
geyāt puṣpasamṛddhyā ca śaityād vāyor guṇair gireḥ / pravṛttāyāṃ rajanyāṃ ca candrasyodayanena ca // 7.026.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaḥ sumahāvīryaḥ kāmabāṇavaśaṃ gataḥ / viniśvasya viniśvasya śaśinaṃ samavaikṣata // 7.026.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare tatra divyapuṣpavibhūṣitā / sarvāpsarovarā rambhā pūrṇacandranibhānanā // 7.026.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtair viśeṣakair ārdraiḥ ṣaḍartukusumotsavaiḥ / nīlaṃ satoyameghābhaṃ vastraṃ samavaguṇṭhitā // 7.026.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya vaktraṃ śaśinibhaṃ bhruvau cāpanibhe śubhe / ūrū karikarākārau karau pallavakomalau // 7.026.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sainyamadhyena gacchantī rāvaṇenopalakṣitā // 7.026.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ samutthāya rakṣendraḥ kāmabāṇabalārditaḥ / kare gṛhītvā gacchantīṃ smayamāno 'bhyabhāṣata // 7.026.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kva gacchasi varārohe kāṃ siddhiṃ bhajase svayam / kasyābhyudayakālo 'yaṃ yas tvāṃ samupabhokṣyate // 7.026.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavānanarasasyādya padmotpalasugandhinaḥ / sudhāmṛtarasasyeva ko 'dya tṛptiṃ gamiṣyati // 7.026.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svarṇakumbhanibhau pīnau śubhau bhīru nirantarau / kasyorasthalasaṃsparśaṃ dāsyatas te kucāv imau // 7.026.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suvarṇacakrapratimaṃ svarṇadāmacitaṃ pṛthu / adhyārokṣyati kas te 'dya svargaṃ jaghanarūpiṇam // 7.026.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madviśiṣṭaḥ pumān ko 'nyaḥ śakro viṣṇur athāśvinau / mām atītya hi yasya tvaṃ yāsi bhīru na śobhanam // 7.026.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśrama tvaṃ pṛthuśroṇi śilātalam idaṃ śubham / trailokye yaḥ prabhuś caiva tulyo mama na vidyate // 7.026.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad eṣa prāñjaliḥ prahvo yācate tvāṃ daśānanaḥ / yaḥ prabhuś cāpi bhartā ca trailokyasya bhajasva mām // 7.026.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktābravīd rambhā vepamānā kṛtāñjaliḥ / prasīda nārhase vaktum īdṛśaṃ tvaṃ hi me guruḥ // 7.026.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyebhyo 'pi tvayā rakṣyā prāpnuyāṃ dharṣaṇaṃ yadi / dharmataś ca snuṣā te 'haṃ tattvam etad bravīmi te // 7.026.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīt tāṃ daśagrīvaś caraṇādhomukhīṃ sthitām / sutasya yadi me bhāryā tatas tvaṃ me snuṣā bhaveḥ // 7.026.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāḍham ity eva sā rambhā prāha rāvaṇam uttaram / dharmatas te sutasyāhaṃ bhāryā rākṣasapuṃgava // 7.026.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putraḥ priyataraḥ prāṇair bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya te / khyāto yas triṣu lokeṣu nalakūbara ity asau // 7.026.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmato yo bhaved vipraḥ kṣatriyo vīryato bhavet / krodhād yaś ca bhaved agniḥ kṣāntyā ca vasudhāsamaḥ // 7.026.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāsmi kṛtasaṃketā lokapālasutasya vai / tam uddiśya ca me sarvaṃ vibhūṣaṇam idaṃ kṛtam // 7.026.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasya tasya hi nānyasya bhāvo māṃ prati tiṣṭhati / tena satyena māṃ rājan moktum arhasy ariṃdama // 7.026.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi tiṣṭhati dharmātmā sāmprataṃ matsamutsukaḥ / tan na vighnaṃ sutasyeha kartum arhasi muñca mām // 7.026.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadbhir ācaritaṃ mārgaṃ gaccha rākṣasapuṃgava / mānanīyo mayā hi tvaṃ lālanīyā tathāsmi te // 7.026.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇāṃ rambhāṃ tāṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ / nirbhartsya rākṣaso mohāt pratigṛhya balād balī // 7.026.030.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāmamohābhisaṃrabdho maithunāyopacakrame // 7.026.030.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā vimuktā tato rambhā bhraṣṭamālyavibhūṣaṇā / gajendrākrīḍamathitā&nbsp;&nbsp;nadīvākulatāṃ gatā // 7.026.031	upajāti (anuṣṭubh: ajñātam [yslg], ajñātam [yBlg]) (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
sā vepamānā lajjantī bhītā karakṛtāñjaliḥ / nalakūbaram āsādya pādayor nipapāta ha // 7.026.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadavasthāṃ ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmā nalakūbaraḥ / abravīt kim idaṃ bhadre pādayoḥ patitāsi me // 7.026.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tu niśvasamānā ca vepamānātha sāñjaliḥ / tasmai sarvaṃ yathātathyam ākhyātum upacakrame // 7.026.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa deva daśagrīvaḥ prāpto gantuṃ triviṣṭapam / tena sainyasahāyena niśeha pariṇāmyate // 7.026.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyāntī tena dṛṣṭāsmi tvatsakāśam ariṃdama / gṛhītvā tena pṛṣṭāsmi kasya tvam iti rakṣasā // 7.026.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā tu sarvaṃ yat satyaṃ tad dhi tasmai niveditam / kāmamohābhibhūtātmā nāśrauṣīt tad vaco mama // 7.026.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yācyamāno mayā deva snuṣā te 'ham iti prabho / tat sarvaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā balāt tenāsmi dharṣitā // 7.026.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ tvam aparādhaṃ me kṣantum arhasi mānada / na hi tulyaṃ balaṃ saumya striyāś ca puruṣasya ca // 7.026.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ śrutvā tu saṃkruddhas tadā vaiśvaraṇātmajaḥ / dharṣaṇāṃ tāṃ parāṃ śrutvā dhyānaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha // 7.026.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tat karma vijñāya tadā vaiśravaṇātmajaḥ / muhūrtād roṣatāmrākṣas toyaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā // 7.026.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhītvā salilaṃ divyam upaspṛśya yathāvidhi / utsasarja tadā śāpaṃ rākṣasendrāya dāruṇam // 7.026.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akāmā tena yasmāt tvaṃ balād bhadre pradharṣitā / tasmāt sa yuvatīm anyāṃ nākāmām upayāsyati // 7.026.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā tv akāmāṃ kāmārto dharṣayiṣyati yoṣitam / mūrdhā tu saptadhā tasya śakalībhavitā tadā // 7.026.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasminn udāhṛte śāpe jvalitāgnisamaprabhe / devadundubhayo neduḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca khāc cyutā // 7.026.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajāpatimukhāś cāpi sarve devāḥ praharṣitāḥ / jñātvā lokagatiṃ sarvāṃ tasya mṛtyuṃ ca rakṣasaḥ // 7.026.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu sa daśagrīvas taṃ śāpaṃ romaharṣaṇam / nārīṣu maithunaṃ bhāvaṃ nākāmāsv abhyarocayat // 7.026.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kailāsaṃ laṅghayitvātha daśagrīvaḥ sarākṣasaḥ / āsasāda mahātejā indralokaṃ niśācaraḥ // 7.027.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya rākṣasasainyasya samantād upayāsyataḥ / devalokaṃ yayau śabdo bhidyamānārṇavopamaḥ // 7.027.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu rāvaṇaṃ prāptam indraḥ saṃcalitāsanaḥ / abravīt tatra tān devān sarvān eva samāgatān // 7.027.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādityān savasūn rudrān viśvān sādhyān marudgaṇān / sajjībhavata yuddhārthaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ // 7.027.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktās tu śakreṇa devāḥ śakrasamā yudhi / saṃnahyanta mahāsattvā yuddhaśraddhāsamanvitāḥ // 7.027.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dīnaḥ paritrasto mahendro rāvaṇaṃ prati / viṣṇoḥ samīpam āgatya vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.027.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣṇo kathaṃ kariṣyāmo mahāvīryaparākrama / asau hi balavān rakṣo yuddhārtham abhivartate // 7.027.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varapradānād balavān na khalv anyena hetunā / tac ca satyaṃ hi kartavyaṃ vākyaṃ deva prajāpateḥ // 7.027.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad yathā namucir vṛtro balir narakaśambarau / tvan mataṃ samavaṣṭabhya yathā dagdhās tathā kuru // 7.027.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy anyo deva devānām āpatsu sumahābala / gatiḥ parāyaṇaṃ vāsti tvām ṛte puruṣottama // 7.027.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ hi nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān padmanābhaḥ sanātanaḥ / tvayāhaṃ sthāpitaś caiva devarājye sanātane // 7.027.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad ākhyāhi yathātattvaṃ devadeva mama svayam / asicakrasahāyas tvaṃ yudhyase saṃyuge ripum // 7.027.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ sa śakreṇa devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ / abravīn na paritrāsaḥ kāryas te śrūyatāṃ ca me // 7.027.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tāvad eṣa durvṛttaḥ śakyo daivatadānavaiḥ / hantuṃ yudhi samāsādya varadānena durjayaḥ // 7.027.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā tu mahat karma kariṣyati balotkaṭaḥ / rakṣaḥ putrasahāyo 'sau dṛṣṭam etan nisargataḥ // 7.027.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bravīṣi yat tu māṃ śakra saṃyuge yotsyasīti ha / naivāhaṃ pratiyotsye taṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam // 7.027.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anihatya ripuṃ viṣṇur na hi pratinivartate / durlabhaś caiṣa kāmo 'dya varam āsādya rākṣase // 7.027.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratijānāmi devendra tvatsamīpaṃ śatakrato / rākṣasasyāham evāsya bhavitā mṛtyukāraṇam // 7.027.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi rāvaṇaṃ sasutaṃ yudhi / devatās toṣayiṣyāmi jñātvā kālam upasthitam // 7.027.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare nādaḥ śuśruve rajanīkṣaye / tasya rāvaṇasainyasya prayuddhasya samantataḥ // 7.027.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha yuddhaṃ samabhavad devarākṣasayos tadā / ghoraṃ tumulanirhrādaṃ nānāpraharaṇāyudham // 7.027.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare śūrā rākṣasā ghoradarśanāḥ / yuddhārtham abhyadhāvanta sacivā rāvaṇājñayā // 7.027.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārīcaś ca prahastaś ca mahāpārśvamahodarau / akampano nikumbhaś ca śukaḥ sāraṇa eva ca // 7.027.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃhrādir dhūmaketuś ca mahādaṃṣṭro mahāmukhaḥ / jambumālī mahāmālī virūpākṣaś ca rākṣasaḥ // 7.027.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etaiḥ sarvair mahāvīryair vṛto rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ / rāvaṇasyāryakaḥ sainyaṃ sumālī praviveśa ha // 7.027.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi devagaṇān sarvān nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ / vidhvaṃsayati saṃkruddhaḥ saha taiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ // 7.027.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare śūro vasūnām aṣṭamo vasuḥ / sāvitra iti vikhyātaḥ praviveśa mahāraṇam // 7.027.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat surāṇāṃ rākṣasaiḥ saha / kruddhānāṃ rakṣasāṃ kīrtiṃ samareṣv anivartinām // 7.027.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrā devāṃs tān samare sthitān / nānāpraharaṇair ghorair jaghnuḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // 7.027.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
surās tu rākṣasān ghorān mahāvīryān svatejasā / samare vividhaiḥ śastrair anayan yamasādanam // 7.027.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare śūraḥ sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ / nānāpraharaṇaiḥ kruddho raṇam evābhyavartata // 7.027.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devānāṃ tad balaṃ sarvaṃ nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ / vidhvaṃsayati saṃkruddho vāyur jaladharān iva // 7.027.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te mahābāṇavarṣaiś ca śūlaiḥ prāsaiś ca dāruṇaiḥ / pīḍyamānāḥ surāḥ sarve na vyatiṣṭhan samāhitāḥ // 7.027.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vidrāvyamāṇeṣu tridaśeṣu sumālinā / vasūnām aṣṭamo devaḥ sāvitro vyavatiṣṭhata // 7.027.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃvṛtaḥ svair anīkais tu praharantaṃ niśācaram / vikrameṇa mahātejā vārayām āsa saṃyuge // 7.027.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumattayos tayor āsīd yuddhaṃ loke sudāruṇam / sumālino vasoś caiva samareṣv anivartinoḥ // 7.027.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tasya mahābāṇair vasunā sumahātmanā / mahān sa pannagarathaḥ kṣaṇena vinipātitaḥ // 7.027.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatvā tu saṃyuge tasya rathaṃ bāṇaśataiḥ śitaiḥ / gadāṃ tasya vadhārthāya vasur jagrāha pāṇinā // 7.027.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ pradīptāṃ pragṛhyāśu kāladaṇḍanibhāṃ śubhām / tasya mūrdhani sāvitraḥ sumāler vinipātayat // 7.027.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya mūrdhani solkābhā patantī ca tadā babhau / sahasrākṣasamutsṛṣṭā girāv iva mahāśaniḥ // 7.027.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya naivāsthi kāyo vā na māṃsaṃ dadṛśe tadā / gadayā bhasmasādbhūto raṇe tasmin nipātitaḥ // 7.027.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ saṃkhye rākṣasās te samantataḥ / dudruvuḥ sahitāḥ sarve krośamānā mahāsvanam // 7.027.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumālinaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā vasunā bhasmasātkṛtam / vidrutaṃ cāpi svaṃ sainyaṃ lakṣayitvārditaṃ śaraiḥ // 7.028.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa balavān kruddho rāvaṇasya suto yudhi / nivartya rākṣasān sarvān meghanādo vyatiṣṭhata // 7.028.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rathenāgnivarṇena kāmagena mahārathaḥ / abhidudrāva senāṃ tāṃ vanāny agnir iva jvalan // 7.028.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ praviśatas tasya vividhāyudhadhāriṇaḥ / vidudruvur diśaḥ sarvā devās tasya ca darśanāt // 7.028.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tatrāvasthitaḥ kaś cid raṇe tasya yuyutsataḥ / sarvān āvidhya vitrastān dṛṣṭvā śakro 'bhyabhāṣata // 7.028.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na bhetavyaṃ na gantavyaṃ nivartadhvaṃ raṇaṃ prati / eṣa gacchati me putro yuddhārtham aparājitaḥ // 7.028.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śakrasuto devo jayanta iti viśrutaḥ / rathenādbhutakalpena saṃgrāmam abhivartata // 7.028.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve parivārya śacīsutam / rāvaṇasya sutaṃ yuddhe samāsādya vyavasthitāḥ // 7.028.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ mahad abhūt sadṛśaṃ devarakṣasām / kṛte mahendraputrasya rākṣasendrasutasya ca // 7.028.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mātaliputre tu gomukhe rākṣasātmajaḥ / sārathau pātayām āsa śarān kāñcanabhūṣaṇān // 7.028.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śacīsutas tv api tathā jayantas tasya sārathim / taṃ caiva rāvaṇiṃ kruddhaḥ pratyavidhyad raṇājire // 7.028.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kruddho mahātejā rakṣo visphāritekṣaṇaḥ / rāvaṇiḥ śakraputraṃ taṃ śaravarṣair avākirat // 7.028.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pragṛhya śastrāṇi sāravanti mahānti ca / śataghnīs tomarān prāsān gadākhaḍgaparaśvadhān // 7.028.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumahānty adriśṛṅgāṇi pātayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ // 7.028.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pravyathitā lokāḥ saṃjajñe ca tamo mahat / tasya rāvaṇaputrasya tadā śatrūn abhighnataḥ // 7.028.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tad daivatabalaṃ samantāt taṃ śacīsutam / bahuprakāram asvasthaṃ tatra tatra sma dhāvati // 7.028.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nābhyajānaṃs tadānyonyaṃ śatrūn vā daivatāni vā / tatra tatra viparyastaṃ samantāt paridhāvitam // 7.028.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare śūraḥ pulomā nāma vīryavān / daiteyas tena saṃgṛhya śacīputro 'pavāhitaḥ // 7.028.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gṛhītvā taṃ tu naptāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa mahodadhim / mātāmaho 'ryakas tasya paulomī yena sā śacī // 7.028.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praṇāśaṃ dṛśya tu surā jayantasyātidāruṇam / vyathitāś cāprahṛṣṭāś ca samantād vipradudruvuḥ // 7.028.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇis tv atha saṃhṛṣṭo balaiḥ parivṛtaḥ svakaiḥ / abhyadhāvata devāṃs tān mumoca ca mahāsvanam // 7.028.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā praṇāśaṃ putrasya rāvaṇeś cāpi vikramam / mātaliṃ prāha devendro rathaḥ samupanīyatām // 7.028.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu divyo mahābhīmaḥ sajja eva mahārathaḥ / upasthito mātalinā vāhyamāno manojavaḥ // 7.028.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato meghā rathe tasmiṃs taḍidvanto mahāsvanāḥ / agrato vāyucapalā gacchanto vyanadaṃs tadā // 7.028.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāvādyāni vādyanta stutayaś ca samāhitāḥ / nanṛtuś cāpsaraḥsaṃghāḥ prayāte vāsave raṇam // 7.028.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rudrair vasubhir ādityaiḥ sādhyaiś ca samarudgaṇaiḥ / vṛto nānāpraharaṇair niryayau tridaśādhipaḥ // 7.028.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirgacchatas tu śakrasya paruṣaṃ pavano vavau / bhāskaro niṣprabhaś cāsīn maholkāś ca prapedire // 7.028.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare śūro daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān / āruroha rathaṃ divyaṃ nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // 7.028.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pannagaiḥ sumahākāyair veṣṭitaṃ lomaharṣaṇaiḥ / yeṣāṃ niśvāsavātena pradīptam iva saṃyugam // 7.028.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daityair niśācaraiḥ śūrai rathaḥ saṃparivāritaḥ / samarābhimukho divyo mahendram abhivartata // 7.028.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putraṃ taṃ vārayitvāsau svayam eva vyavasthitaḥ / so 'pi yuddhād viniṣkramya rāvaṇiḥ samupāviśat // 7.028.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tu surāṇāṃ rākṣasaiḥ saha / śastrābhivarṣaṇaṃ ghoraṃ meghānām iva saṃyuge // 7.028.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumbhakarṇas tu duṣṭātmā nānāpraharaṇodyataḥ / nājñāyata tadā yuddhe saha kenāpy ayudhyata // 7.028.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dantair bhujābhyāṃ padbhyāṃ ca śaktitomarasāyakaiḥ / yena kenaiva saṃrabdhas tāḍayām āsa vai surān // 7.028.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rudrair mahābhāgaiḥ sahādityair niśācaraḥ / prayuddhas taiś ca saṃgrāme kṛttaḥ śastrair nirantaram // 7.028.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tad rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ tridaśaiḥ samarudgaṇaiḥ / raṇe vidrāvitaṃ sarvaṃ nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ // 7.028.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cid vinihatāḥ śastrair veṣṭanti sma mahītale / vāhaneṣv avasaktāś ca sthitā evāpare raṇe // 7.028.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rathān nāgān kharān uṣṭrān pannagāṃs turagāṃs tathā / śiṃśumārān varāhāṃś ca piśācavadanāṃs tathā // 7.028.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān samāliṅgya bāhubhyāṃ viṣṭabdhāḥ ke cid ucchritāḥ / devais tu śastrasaṃviddhā mamrire ca niśācarāḥ // 7.028.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
citrakarma ivābhāti sa teṣāṃ raṇasaṃplavaḥ / nihatānāṃ pramattānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahītale // 7.028.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śoṇitodaka niṣyandākaṅkagṛdhrasamākulā / pravṛttā saṃyugamukhe śastragrāhavatī nadī // 7.028.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare kruddho daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān / nirīkṣya tad balaṃ sarvaṃ daivatair vinipātitam // 7.028.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ prativigāhyāśu pravṛddhaṃ sainyasāgaram / tridaśān samare nighnañ śakram evābhyavartata // 7.028.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śakro mahac cāpaṃ visphārya sumahāsvanam / yasya visphāraghoṣeṇa svananti sma diśo daśa // 7.028.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vikṛṣya mahac cāpam indro rāvaṇamūrdhani / nipātayām āsa śarān pāvakādityavarcasaḥ // 7.028.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaiva ca mahābāhur daśagrīvo vyavasthitaḥ / śakraṃ kārmukavibhraṣṭaiḥ śaravarṣair avākirat // 7.028.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prayudhyator atha tayor bāṇavarṣaiḥ samantataḥ / nājñāyata tadā kiṃ cit sarvaṃ hi tamasā vṛtam // 7.028.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tamasi saṃjāte rākṣasā daivataiḥ saha / ayudhyanta balonmattāḥ sūdayantaḥ parasparam // 7.029.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu devasainyena rākṣasānāṃ mahad balam / daśāṃśaṃ sthāpitaṃ yuddhe śeṣaṃ nītaṃ yamakṣayam // 7.029.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tu tamasā naddhe sarve te devarākṣasāḥ / anyonyaṃ nābhyajānanta yudhyamānāḥ parasparam // 7.029.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indraś ca rāvaṇaś caiva rāvaṇiś ca mahābalaḥ / tasmiṃs tamojālavṛte moham īyur na te trayaḥ // 7.029.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu dṛṣṭvā balaṃ sarvaṃ nihataṃ rāvaṇo raṇe / krodham abhyāgamat tīvraṃ mahānādaṃ ca muktavān // 7.029.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krodhāt sūtaṃ ca durdharṣaḥ syandanastham uvāca ha / parasainyasya madhyena yāvadantaṃ nayasva mām // 7.029.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyaitāṃs tridaśān sarvān vikramaiḥ samare svayam / nānāśastrair mahāsārair nāśayāmi nabhastalāt // 7.029.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham indraṃ vadhiṣyāmi varuṇaṃ dhanadaṃ yamam / tridaśān vinihatyāśu svayaṃ sthāsyāmy athopari // 7.029.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṣādo na ca kartavyaḥ śīghraṃ vāhaya me ratham / dviḥ khalu tvāṃ bravīmy adya yāvadantaṃ nayasva mām // 7.029.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ sa nandanoddeśo yatra vartāmahe vayam / naya mām adya tatra tvam udayo yatra parvataḥ // 7.029.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā turagān sa manojavān / ādideśātha śatrūṇāṃ madhyenaiva ca sārathiḥ // 7.029.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya taṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā śakro deveśvaras tadā / rathasthaḥ samarasthāṃs tān devān vākyam athābravīt // 7.029.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
surāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yat tāvan mama rocate / jīvann eva daśagrīvaḥ sādhu rakṣo nigṛhyatām // 7.029.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa hy atibalaḥ sainye rathena pavanaujasā / gamiṣyati pravṛddhormiḥ samudra iva parvaṇi // 7.029.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy eṣa hantuṃ śakyo 'dya varadānāt sunirbhayaḥ / tad grahīṣyāmahe rakṣo yattā bhavata saṃyuge // 7.029.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā baliṃ nigṛhyaitat trailokyaṃ bhujyate mayā / evam etasya pāpasya nigraho mama rocate // 7.029.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'nyaṃ deśam āsthāya śakraḥ saṃtyajya rāvaṇam / ayudhyata mahātejā rākṣasān nāśayan raṇe // 7.029.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttareṇa daśagrīvaḥ praviveśānivartitaḥ / dakṣiṇena tu pārśvena praviveśa śatakratuḥ // 7.029.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa yojanaśataṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasādhipaḥ / devatānāṃ balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ śaravarṣair avākirat // 7.029.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śakro nirīkṣyātha praviṣṭaṃ taṃ balaṃ svakam / nyavartayad asaṃbhrāntaḥ samāvṛtya daśānanam // 7.029.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare nādo mukto dānavarākṣasaiḥ / hā hatāḥ smeti taṃ dṛṣṭvā grastaṃ śakreṇa rāvaṇam // 7.029.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rathaṃ samāruhya rāvaṇiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / tat sainyam atisaṃkruddhaḥ praviveśa sudāruṇam // 7.029.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tāṃ praviśya māyāṃ tu dattāṃ gopatinā purā / adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tat sainyaṃ samavākirat // 7.029.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa devān saṃtyajya śakram evābhyayād drutam / mahendraś ca mahātejā na dadarśa sutaṃ ripoḥ // 7.029.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mātaliṃ hayāṃś caiva tāḍayitvā śarottamaiḥ / mahendraṃ bāṇavarṣeṇa śīghrahasto hy avākirat // 7.029.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śakro rathaṃ tyaktva visṛjya ca sa mātalim / airāvataṃ samāruhya mṛgayām āsa rāvaṇim // 7.029.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu māyā balād rakṣaḥ saṃgrāme nābhyadṛśyata / kiramāṇaḥ śaraughena mahendram amitaujasaṃ // 7.029.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ yadā pariśrāntam indraṃ mene 'tha rāvaṇiḥ / tadainaṃ māyayā baddhvā svasainyam abhito 'nayat // 7.029.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvātha balāt tasmin māyayāpahṛtaṃ raṇe / mahendram amarāḥ sarve kiṃ nv etad iti cukruśuḥ // 7.029.029.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi dṛśyati vidyāvān māyayā yena nīyate // 7.029.029.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare cāpi sarve suragaṇās tadā / abhyadravan susaṃkruddhā rāvaṇaṃ śastravṛṣṭibhiḥ // 7.029.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇas tu samāsādya vasvādityamarudgaṇān / na śaśāka raṇe sthātuṃ na yoddhuṃ śastrapīḍitaḥ // 7.029.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pariśrāntaṃ prahārair jarjaracchavim / rāvaṇiḥ pitaraṃ yuddhe 'darśanastho 'bravīd idam // 7.029.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgaccha tāta gacchāvo nivṛttaṃ raṇakarma tat / jitaṃ te viditaṃ bho 'stu svastho bhava gatajvaraḥ // 7.029.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ hi surasainyasya trailokyasya ca yaḥ prabhuḥ / sa gṛhīto mayā śakro bhagnamānāḥ surāḥ kṛtāḥ // 7.029.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yatheṣṭaṃ bhuṅkṣva trailokyaṃ nigṛhya ripum ojasā / vṛthā te kiṃ śramaṃ kṛtvā yuddhaṃ hi tava niṣphalam // 7.029.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa daivatabalāt tasmān nivṛtto raṇakarmaṇaḥ / tac chrutvā rāvaṇer vākyaṃ svasthacetā daśānanaḥ // 7.029.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha raṇavigatajvaraḥ prabhur; vijayam avāpya niśācarādhipaḥ / bhavanam abhi tato jagāma hṛṣṭaḥ; svasutam avāpya ca vākyam abravīt // 7.029.037	mālatī [njjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [nnry], ajñātam [njjr], ajñātam [nnrlg])
atibalasadṛśaiḥ parākramais tair; mama kulamānavivardhanaṃ kṛtam / yad amarasamavikrama tvayā; tridaśapatis tridaśāś ca nirjitāḥ // 7.029.038	mālatī [njjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ) atha vā upajāti (triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara: ajñātam [nnry], mālatī [njjr], ajñātam [nnrlg])
tvaritam upanayasva vāsavaṃ; nagaram ito vraja sainyasaṃvṛtaḥ / aham api tava gacchato drutaṃ; saha sacivair anuyāmi pṛṣṭhataḥ // 7.029.039	aparavaktra (1,3: nnrlg, 2,4: njjr)
atha sa balavṛtaḥ savāhanas; tridaśapatiṃ parigṛhya rāvaṇiḥ / svabhavanam upagamya rākṣaso; muditamanā visasarja rākṣasān // 7.029.040	aparavaktra (1,3: nnrlg, 2,4: njjr)
jite mahendre 'tibale rāvaṇasya sutena vai / prajāpatiṃ puraskṛtya gatā laṅkāṃ surās tadā // 7.030.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ rāvaṇaṃ samāsādya putrabhrātṛbhir āvṛtam / abravīd gagane tiṣṭhan sāntvapūrvaṃ prajāpatiḥ // 7.030.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vatsa rāvaṇa tuṣṭo 'smi tava putrasya saṃyuge / aho 'sya vikramaudāryaṃ tava tulyo 'dhiko 'pi vā // 7.030.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jitaṃ hi bhavatā sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ svena tejasā / kṛtā pratijñā saphalā prīto 'smi svasutena vai // 7.030.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ ca putro 'tibalas tava rāvaṇarāvaṇiḥ / indrajit tv iti vikhyāto jagaty eṣa bhaviṣyati // 7.030.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balavāñ śatrunirjetā bhaviṣyaty eṣa rākṣasaḥ / yam āśritya tvayā rājan sthāpitās tridaśā vaśe // 7.030.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tan mucyatāṃ mahābāho mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ / kiṃ cāsya mokṣaṇārthāya prayacchanti divaukasaḥ // 7.030.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīn mahātejā indrajit samitiṃjayaḥ / amaratvam ahaṃ deva vṛṇomīhāsya mokṣaṇe // 7.030.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīt tu tadā devo rāvaṇiṃ kamalodbhavaḥ / nāsti sarvāmaratvaṃ hi keṣāṃ cit prāṇināṃ bhuvi // 7.030.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athābravīt sa tatrastham indrajit padmasaṃbhavam / śrūyatāṃ yā bhavet siddhiḥ śatakratuvimokṣaṇe // 7.030.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mameṣṭaṃ nityaśo deva havyaiḥ saṃpūjya pāvakam / saṃgrāmam avatartuṃ vai śatrunirjayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 7.030.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃś ced asamāpte tu japyahome vibhāvasoḥ / yudhyeyaṃ deva saṃgrāme tadā me syād vināśanam // 7.030.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvo hi tapasā caiva vṛṇoty amaratāṃ pumān / vikrameṇa mayā tv etad amaratvaṃ pravartitam // 7.030.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam astv iti taṃ prāha vākyaṃ devaḥ prajāpatiḥ / muktaś cendrajitā śakro gatāś ca tridivaṃ surāḥ // 7.030.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare śakro dīno bhraṣṭāmbarasrajaḥ / rāma cintāparītātmā dhyānatatparatāṃ gataḥ // 7.030.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtaṃ prāha devaḥ prajāpatiḥ / śakrakrato kim utkaṇṭhāṃ karoṣi smara duṣkṛtam // 7.030.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amarendra mayā bahvyaḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ purā prabho / ekavarṇāḥ samābhāṣā ekarūpāś ca sarvaśaḥ // 7.030.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsāṃ nāsti viśeṣo hi darśane lakṣaṇe 'pi vā / tato 'ham ekāgramanās tāḥ prajāḥ paryacintayam // 7.030.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ tāsāṃ viśeṣārthaṃ striyam ekāṃ vinirmame / yad yat prajānāṃ pratyaṅgaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tat tad uddhṛtam // 7.030.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato mayā rūpaguṇair ahalyā strī vinirmitā / ahalyety eva ca mayā tasyā nāma pravartitam // 7.030.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirmitāyāṃ tu devendra tasyāṃ nāryāṃ surarṣabha / bhaviṣyatīti kasyaiṣā mama cintā tato 'bhavat // 7.030.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ tu śakra tadā nārīṃ jānīṣe manasā prabho / sthānādhikatayā patnī mamaiṣeti puraṃdara // 7.030.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā mayā nyāsabhūtā tu gautamasya mahātmanaḥ / nyastā bahūni varṣāṇi tena niryātitā ca sā // 7.030.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tasya parijñāya mayā sthairyaṃ mahāmuneḥ / jñātvā tapasi siddhiṃ ca patnyarthaṃ sparśitā tadā // 7.030.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tayā saha dharmātmā ramate sma mahāmuniḥ / āsan nirāśā devās tu gautame dattayā tayā // 7.030.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ kruddhas tv iha kāmātmā gatvā tasyāśramaṃ muneḥ / dṛṣṭavāṃś ca tadā tāṃ strīṃ dīptām agniśikhām iva // 7.030.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tvayā dharṣitā śakra kāmārtena samanyunā / dṛṣṭas tvaṃ ca tadā tena āśrame paramarṣiṇā // 7.030.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kruddhena tenāsi śaptaḥ paramatejasā / gato 'si yena devendra daśābhāgaviparyayam // 7.030.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmān me dharṣitā patnī tvayā vāsava nirbhayam / tasmāt tvaṃ samare rājañ śatruhastaṃ gamiṣyasi // 7.030.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ tu bhāvo durbuddhe yas tvayeha pravartitaḥ / mānuṣeṣv api sarveṣu bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // 7.030.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrādharmaḥ subalavān samutthāsyati yo mahān / tatrārdhaṃ tasya yaḥ kartā tvayy ardhaṃ nipatiṣyati // 7.030.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na ca te sthāvaraṃ sthānaṃ bhaviṣyati puraṃdara / etenādharmayogena yas tvayeha pravartitaḥ // 7.030.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaś ca yaś ca surendraḥ syād dhruvaḥ sa na bhaviṣyati / eṣa śāpo mayā mukta ity asau tvāṃ tadābravīt // 7.030.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ tu bhāryāṃ vinirbhartsya so 'bravīt sumahātapāḥ / durvinīte vinidhvaṃsa mamāśramasamīpataḥ // 7.030.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rūpayauvanasaṃpannā yasmāt tvam anavasthitā / tasmād rūpavatī loke na tvam ekā bhaviṣyasi // 7.030.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rūpaṃ ca tat prajāḥ sarvā gamiṣyanti sudurlabham / yat tavedaṃ samāśritya vibhrame 'yam upasthitaḥ // 7.030.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadā prabhṛti bhūyiṣṭhaṃ prajā rūpasamanvitāḥ / śāpotsargād dhi tasyedaṃ muneḥ sarvam upāgatam // 7.030.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat smara tvaṃ mahābāho duṣkṛtaṃ yat tvayā kṛtam / yena tvaṃ grahaṇaṃ śatror gato nānyena vāsava // 7.030.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghraṃ yajasva yajñaṃ tvaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ susamāhitaḥ / pāvitas tena yajñena yāsyasi tridivaṃ tataḥ // 7.030.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putraś ca tava devendra na vinaṣṭo mahāraṇe / nītaḥ saṃnihitaś caiva aryakeṇa mahodadhau // 7.030.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etac chrutvā mahendras tu yajñam iṣṭvā ca vaiṣṇavam / punas tridivam ākrāmad anvaśāsac ca devatāḥ // 7.030.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad indrajito rāma balaṃ yat kīrtitaṃ mayā / nirjitas tena devendraḥ prāṇino 'nye ca kiṃ punaḥ // 7.030.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmo mahātejā vismayāt punar eva hi / uvāca praṇato vākyam agastyam ṛṣisattamam // 7.031.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan kiṃ tadā lokāḥ śūnyā āsan dvijottama / dharṣaṇāṃ yatra na prāpto rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ // 7.031.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utāho hīnavīryās te babhuvuḥ pṛthivīkṣitaḥ / bahiṣkṛtā varāstraiś ca bahavo nirjitā nṛpāḥ // 7.031.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / uvāca rāmaṃ prahasan pitāmaha iveśvaram // 7.031.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa evaṃ bādhamānas tu pārthivān pārthivarṣabha / cacāra rāvaṇo rāma pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpate // 7.031.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato māhiṣmatīṃ nāma purīṃ svargapurīprabhām / saṃprāpto yatra sāmnidhyaṃ paramaṃ vasuretasaḥ // 7.031.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tulya āsīn nṛpas tasya pratāpād vasuretasaḥ / arjuno nāma yasyāgniḥ śarakuṇḍe śayaḥ sadā // 7.031.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam eva divasaṃ so 'tha haihayādhipatir balī / arjuno narmadāṃ rantuṃ gataḥ strībhiḥ saheśvaraḥ // 7.031.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇo rākṣasendras tu tasyāmātyān apṛcchata / kvārjuno vo nṛpaḥ so 'dya śīghram ākhyātum arhatha // 7.031.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇo 'ham anuprāpto yuddhepsur nṛvareṇa tu / mamāgamanam avyagrair yuṣmābhiḥ saṃnivedyatām // 7.031.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ rāvaṇenoktās te 'mātyāḥ suvipaścitaḥ / abruvan rākṣasapatim asāmnidhyaṃ mahīpateḥ // 7.031.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā viśravasaḥ putraḥ paurāṇām arjunaṃ gatam / apasṛtyāgato vindhyaṃ himavatsaṃnibhaṃ girim // 7.031.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tam abhram ivāviṣṭam udbhrāntam iva medinīm / apaśyad rāvaṇo vindhyam ālikhantam ivāmbaram // 7.031.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahasraśikharopetaṃ siṃhādhyuṣitakandaram / prapāta patitaiḥ śītaiḥ sāṭṭahāsam ivāmbubhiḥ // 7.031.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devadānavagandharvaiḥ sāpsarogaṇakiṃnaraiḥ / sāha strībhiḥ krīḍamānaiḥ svargabhūtaṃ mahocchrayam // 7.031.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nadībhiḥ syandamānābhir agatipratimaṃ jalam / sphuṭībhiś calajihvābhir vamantam iva viṣṭhitam // 7.031.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ulkāvantaṃ darīvantaṃ himavatsaṃnibhaṃ girim / paśyamānas tato vindhyaṃ rāvaṇo narmadāṃ yayau // 7.031.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
calopalajalāṃ puṇyāṃ paścimodadhigāminīm / mahiṣaiḥ sṛmaraiḥ siṃhaiḥ śārdūlarkṣagajottamaiḥ // 7.031.018.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uṣṇābhitaptais tṛṣitaiḥ saṃkṣobhitajalāśayām // 7.031.018.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cakravākaiḥ sakāraṇḍaiḥ sahaṃsajalakukkuṭaiḥ / sārasaiś ca sadāmattaiḥ kokūjadbhiḥ samāvṛtām // 7.031.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phulladrumakṛtottaṃsāṃ cakravākayugastanīm / vistīrṇapulinaśroṇīṃ haṃsāvalisumekhalām // 7.031.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpareṇvanuliptāṅgīṃ jalaphenāmalāṃśukām / jalāvagāhasaṃsparśāṃ phullotpalaśubhekṣaṇām // 7.031.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpakād avaruhyāśu narmadāṃ saritāṃ varām / iṣṭām iva varāṃ nārīm avagāhya daśānanaḥ // 7.031.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tasyāḥ puline ramye nānākusumaśobhite / upopaviṣṭaḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ // 7.031.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
narmadā darśajaṃ harṣam āptavān rākṣaseśvaraḥ // 7.031.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ salīlaṃ prahasān rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / uvāca sacivāṃs tatra mārīcaśukasāraṇān // 7.031.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa raśmisahasreṇa jagat kṛtveva kāñcanam / tīkṣṇatāpakaraḥ sūryo nabhaso madhyam āsthitaḥ // 7.031.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mām āsīnaṃ viditveha candrāyāti divākaraḥ // 7.031.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
narmadā jalaśītaś ca sugandhiḥ śramanāaśanaḥ / madbhayād anilo hy eṣa vāty asau susamāhitaḥ // 7.031.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ cāpi saricchreṣṭhā narmadā narma vardhinī / līnamīnavihaṃgormiḥ sabhayevāṅganā sthitā // 7.031.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad bhavantaḥ kṣatāḥ śastrair nṛpair indrasamair yudhi / candanasya raseneva rudhireṇa samukṣitāḥ // 7.031.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te yūyam avagāhadhvaṃ narmadāṃ śarmadāṃ nṛṇām / mahāpadmamukhā mattā gaṅgām iva mahāgajāḥ // 7.031.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asyāṃ snātvā mahānadyāṃ pāpmānaṃ vipramokṣyatha // 7.031.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham apy atra puline śaradindusamaprabhe / puṣpopaharaṃ śanakaiḥ kariṣyāmi umāpateḥ // 7.031.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇenaivam uktās tu mārīcaśukasāraṇāḥ / samahodaradhūmrākṣā narmadām avagāhire // 7.031.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasendragajais tais tu kṣobhyate narmadā nadī / vāmanāñjanapadmādyair gaṅgā iva mahāgajaiḥ // 7.031.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te rākṣasāaḥ snātvā narmadāyā varāmbhasi / uttīrya puṣpāṇy ājahrur balyarthaṃ rāvaṇasya tu // 7.031.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
narmadā puline ramye śubhrābhrasadṛśaprabhe / rākṣasendrair muhūrtena kṛtaḥ puṣpamayo giriḥ // 7.031.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpeṣūpahṛteṣv eva rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / avatīrṇo nadīṃ snātuṃ gaṅgām iva mahāgajaḥ // 7.031.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra snātvā ca vidhivaj japtvā japyam anuttamam / narmadā salilāt tasmād uttatāra sa rāvaṇaḥ // 7.031.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaṃ prāñjaliṃ yāntam anvayuḥ saptarākṣasāḥ / yatra yatra sa yāti sma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ // 7.031.038.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāmbūnadamayaṃ liṅgaṃ tatra tatra sma nīyate // 7.031.038.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vālukavedimadhye tu tal liṅgaṃ sthāpya rāvaṇaḥ / arcayām āsa gandhaiś ca puṣpaiś cāmṛtagandhibhiḥ // 7.031.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ satām ārtiharaṃ haraṃ paraṃ; varapradaṃ candramayūkhabhūṣaṇam / samarcayitvā sa niśācaro jagau; prasārya hastān praṇanarta cāyatān // 7.031.040	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
narmadā puline yatra rākṣasendraḥ sa rāvaṇaḥ / puṣpopahāraṃ kurute tasmād deśād adūrataḥ // 7.032.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arjuno jayatāṃ śreṣṭho māhiṣmatyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ / krīḍite saha nārībhir narmadātoyam āśritaḥ // 7.032.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsāṃ madhyagato rāja rarāja sa tato 'rjunaḥ / kareṇūnāṃ sahasrasya madhyastha iva kuñjaraḥ // 7.032.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jijñāsuḥ sa tu bāhūnāṃ sahasrasyottamaṃ balam / rurodha narmadā vegaṃ bāhubhiḥ sa tadārjunaḥ // 7.032.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kārtavīryabhujāsetuṃ taj jalaṃ prāpya nirmalam / kūlāpahāraṃ kurvāṇaṃ pratisrotaḥ pradhāvati // 7.032.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samīnanakramakaraḥ sapuṣpakuśasaṃstaraḥ / sa narmadāmbhaso vegaḥ prāvṛṭkāla ivābabhau // 7.032.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vegaḥ kārtavīryeṇa saṃpreṣiṭa ivāmbhasaḥ / puṣpopahāraṃ tat sarvaṃ rāvaṇasya jahāra ha // 7.032.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇo 'rdhasamāptaṃ tu utsṛjya niyamaṃ tadā / narmadāṃ paśyate kāntāṃ pratikūlāṃ yathā priyām // 7.032.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paścimena tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā sāgarodgārasaṃnibham / vardhantam ambhaso vegaṃ pūrvām āśāṃ praviśya tu // 7.032.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'nudbhrāntaśakunāṃ svābhāvye parame sthitām / nirvikārāṅganābhāsāṃ paśyate rāvaṇo nadīm // 7.032.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
savyetarakarāṅgulyā saśabdaṃ ca daśānanaḥ / vegaprabhavam anveṣṭuṃ so 'diśac chukasāraṇau // 7.032.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau tu rāvaṇasaṃdiṣṭau bhrātarau śukasāraṇau / vyomāntaracarau vīrau prasthitau paścimonmukhau // 7.032.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardhayojanamātraṃ tu gatvā tau tu niśācarau / paśyetāṃ puruṣaṃ toye krīḍantaṃ sahayoṣitam // 7.032.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bṛhatsālapratīkaśaṃ toyavyākulamūrdhajam / madaraktāntanayanaṃ madanākāravarcasaṃ // 7.032.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nadīṃ bāhusahasreṇa rundhantam arimardanam / giriṃ pādasahasreṇa rundhantam iva medinīm // 7.032.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bālānāṃ varanārīṇāṃ sahasreṇābhisaṃvṛtam / samadānāṃ kareṇūnāṃ sahasreṇeva kuñjaram // 7.032.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam adbhutatamaṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasau śukasāraṇau / saṃnivṛttāv upāgamya rāvaṇaṃ tam athocatuḥ // 7.032.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bṛhatsālapratīkāśaḥ ko 'py asau rākṣaseśvara / narmadāṃ rodhavad ruddhvā krīḍāpayati yoṣitaḥ // 7.032.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tena bāhusahasreṇa saṃniruddhajalā nadī / sāgarodgārasaṃkāśān udgārān sṛjate muhuḥ // 7.032.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ bhāṣamāṇau tau niśamya śukasāraṇau / rāvaṇo 'rjuna ity uktvā uttasthau yuddhalālasaḥ // 7.032.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arjunābhimukhe tasmin prasthite rākṣaseśvare / sakṛd eva kṛto rāvaḥ saraktaḥ preṣito ghanaiḥ // 7.032.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahodaramahāpārśvadhūmrākṣaśukasāraṇaiḥ / saṃvṛto rākṣasendras tu tatrāgād yatra so 'rjunaḥ // 7.032.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nātidīrgheṇa kālena sa tato rākṣaso balī / taṃ narmadā hradaṃ bhīmam ājagāmāñjanaprabhaḥ // 7.032.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tatra strīparivṛtaṃ vāśitābhir iva dvipam / narendraṃ paśyate rājā rākṣasānāṃ tadārjunam // 7.032.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa roṣād raktanayano rākṣasendro baloddhataḥ / ity evam arjunāmātyān āha gambhīrayā girā // 7.032.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amātyāḥ kṣipram ākhyāta haihayasya nṛpasya vai / yuddhārthaṃ samanuprāpto rāvaṇo nāma nāmataḥ // 7.032.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā mantriṇo 'thārjunasya te / uttasthuḥ sāyudhās taṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ vākyam abruvan // 7.032.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuddhasya kālo vijñātaḥ sādhu bhoḥ sādhu rāvaṇa / yaḥ kṣībaṃ strīvṛtaṃ caiva yoddhum icchasi no nṛpam // 7.032.028.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāśitāmadhyagaṃ mattaṃ śārdūla iva kuñjaram // 7.032.028.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣamasvādya daśagrīva uṣyatāṃ rajanī tvayā / yuddhaśraddhā tu yady asti śvas tāta samare 'rjunam // 7.032.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi vāpi tvarā tubhyaṃ yuddhatṛṣṇāsamāvṛtā / nihatyāsmāṃs tato yuddham arjunenopayāsyasi // 7.032.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas te rāvaṇāmātyair amātyāḥ pārthivasya tu / sūditāś cāpi te yuddhe bhakṣitāś ca bubhukṣitaiḥ // 7.032.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato halahalāśabdo narmadā tira ābabhau / arjunasyānuyātrāṇāṃ rāvaṇasya ca mantriṇām // 7.032.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iṣubhis tomaraiḥ śūlair vajrakalpaiḥ sakarṣaṇaiḥ / sarāvaṇān ardayantaḥ samantāt samabhidrutāḥ // 7.032.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haihayādhipayodhānāṃ vega āsīt sudāruṇaḥ / sanakramīnamakarasamudrasyeva nisvanaḥ // 7.032.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇasya tu te 'mātyāḥ prahastaśukasāraṇāḥ / kārtavīryabalaṃ kruddhā nirdahanty agnitejasaḥ // 7.032.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arjunāya tu tat karma rāvaṇasya samantriṇaḥ / krīḍamānāya kathitaṃ puruṣair dvārarakṣibhiḥ // 7.032.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uktvā na bhetavyam iti strījanaṃ sa tato 'rjunaḥ / uttatāra jalāt tasmād gaṅgātoyād ivāñjanaḥ // 7.032.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
krodhadūṣitanetras tu sa tato 'rjuna pāvakaḥ / prajajvāla mahāghoro yugānta iva pāvakaḥ // 7.032.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tūrṇataram ādāya varahemāṅgado gadām / abhidravati rakṣāṃsi tamāṃsīva divākaraḥ // 7.032.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāhuvikṣepakaraṇāṃ samudyamya mahāgadām / gāruḍaṃ vegam āsthāya āpapātaiva so 'rjunaḥ // 7.032.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya margaṃ samāvṛtya vindhyo 'rkasyeva parvataḥ / sthito vindhya ivākampyaḥ prahasto musalāyudhaḥ // 7.032.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'sya musalaṃ ghoraṃ lohabaddhaṃ madoddhataḥ / prahastaḥ preṣayan kruddho rarāsa ca yathāmbudaḥ // 7.032.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāgre musalasyāgnir aśokāpīḍasaṃnibhaḥ / prahastakaramuktasya babhūva pradahann iva // 7.032.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādhāvamānaṃ musalaṃ kārtavīryas tadārjunaḥ / nipuṇaṃ vañcayām āsa sagado gajavikramaḥ // 7.032.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tam abhidudrāva prahastaṃ haihayādhipaḥ / bhrāmayāṇo gadāṃ gurvīṃ pañcabāhuśatocchrayām // 7.032.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenāhato 'tivegena prahasto gadayā tadā / nipapāta sthitaḥ śailo vajrivajrahato yathā // 7.032.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahastaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mārīcaśukasāaraṇāḥ / samahodaradhūmrākṣā apasṛptā raṇājirāt // 7.032.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apakrānteṣv amātyeṣu prahaste ca nipātite / rāvaṇo 'bhyadravat tūrṇam arjunaṃ nṛpasattamam // 7.032.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahasrabāhos tad yuddhaṃ viṃśadbāhoś ca dāruṇam / nṛparākṣasayos tatra ārabdhaṃ lomaharṣaṇam // 7.032.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāgarāv iva saṃkṣubdhau calamūlāv ivācalau / tejoyuktāv ivādityau pradahantāv ivānalau // 7.032.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
baloddhatau yathā nāgau vāśitārthe yathā vṛṣau / meghāv iva vinardantau siṃhāv iva balotkaṭau // 7.032.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rudrakālāv iva kruddhau tau tathā rākṣasārjunau / parasparaṃ gadābhyāṃ tau tāḍayām āsatur bhṛśam // 7.032.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajraprahārān acalā yathā ghorān viṣehire / gadāprahārāṃs tadvat tau sahete nararākṣasau // 7.032.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāśaniravebhyas tu jāyate vai pratiśrutiḥ / tathā tābhyāṃ gadāpātair diśaḥ sarvāḥ pratiśrutāḥ // 7.032.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arjunasya gadā sā tu pātyamānāhitorasi / kāñcanābhaṃ nabhaś cakre vidyutsaudāmanī yathā // 7.032.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaiva rāvaṇenāpi pātyamānā muhur muhuḥ / arjunorasi nirbhāti gadolkeva mahāgirau // 7.032.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nārjunaḥ khedam āpnoti na rākṣasagaṇeśvaraḥ / samam āsīt tayor yuddhaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ balīndrayoḥ // 7.032.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṅgair maharṣabhau yadvad dantāgrair iva kuñjarau / parasparaṃ vinighnantau nararākṣasasattamau // 7.032.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'rjunena kruddhena sarvaprāṇena sā gadā / stanayor antare muktā rāvaṇasya mahāhave // 7.032.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varadānakṛtatrāṇe sā gadā rāvaṇorasi / durbaleva yathā senā dvidhābhūtāpatat kṣitau // 7.032.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tv arjunapramuktena gadāpātena rāvaṇaḥ / apāsarpad dhanurmātraṃ niṣasāada ca niṣṭanan // 7.032.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vihvalaṃ tad ālakṣya daśagrīvaṃ tato 'rjunaḥ / sahasā pratijagrāha garutmān iva pannagam // 7.032.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ bāhusahasreṇa balād gṛhya daśānanam / babandha balavān rājā baliṃ nārāyaṇo yathā // 7.032.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
badhyamāne daśagrīve siddhacāraṇadevatāḥ / sādhvīti vādinaḥ puṣpaiḥ kiranty arjunamūrdhani // 7.032.064	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyāghro mṛgam ivādāya siṃharāḍ iva dantinam / rarāsa haihayo rājā harṣād ambudavan muhuḥ // 7.032.065	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahastas tu samāśvasto dṛṣṭvā baddhaṃ daśānanam / saha tai rākasaiḥ kruddha abhidudrāva pārthivam // 7.032.066	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naktaṃcarāṇāṃ vegas tu teṣām āpatatāṃ babhau / uddhṛta ātapāpāye samudrāṇām ivādbhutaḥ // 7.032.067	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muñca muñceti bhāṣantas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cāsakṛt / musalāni ca śūlāni utsasarjus tadārjune // 7.032.068	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aprāptāny eva tāny āśu asaṃbhrāntas tadārjunaḥ / āyudhāny amarārīṇāṃ jagrāha ripusūdanaḥ // 7.032.069	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tair eva rakṣāṃsi durdharaiḥ pravarāyudhaiḥ / bhittvā vidrāvayām āsa vāyur ambudharān iva // 7.032.070	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasāṃs trāsayitvā tu kārtavīryārjunas tadā / rāvaṇaṃ gṛhya nagaraṃ praviveśa suhṛdvṛtaḥ // 7.032.071	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kīryamāṇaḥ kusumākṣatotkarair; dvijaiḥ sapauraiḥ puruhūtasaṃnibhaḥ / tadārjunaḥ saṃpraviveśa tāṃ purīṃ; baliṃ nigṛhyaiva sahasralocanaḥ // 7.032.072	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
rāvaṇagrahaṇaṃ tat tu vāyugrahaṇasaṃnibham / ṛṣiḥ pulastyaḥ śuśrāva kathitaṃ divi daivataiḥ // 7.033.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ putrasutasnehāt kampyamāno mahādhṛtiḥ / māhiṣmatīpatiṃ draṣṭum ājagāma mahān ṛṣiḥ // 7.033.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vāyumārgam āsthāya vāyutulyagatir dvijaḥ / purīṃ māhiṣmatīṃ prāpto manaḥsaṃtāpavikramaḥ // 7.033.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'marāvatisaṃkāśāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtām / praviveśa purīṃ brahmā indrasyevāmarāvatīm // 7.033.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pādacāram ivādityaṃ niṣpatantaṃ sudurdṛśam / tatas te pratyabhijñāya arjunāya nyavedayan // 7.033.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pulastya iti taṃ śrutvā vacanaṃ haihayādhipaḥ / śirasy añjalim uddhṛtya pratyudgacchad dvijottamam // 7.033.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purohito 'sya gṛhyārghyaṃ madhuparkaṃ tathāiva ca / purastāt prayayau rājña indrasyeva bṛhaspatiḥ // 7.033.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tam ṛṣim āyāntam udyantam iva bhāskaram / arjuno dṛśya saṃprāptaṃ vavandendra iveśvaram // 7.033.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tasya madhuparkaṃ ca pādyam arghyaṃ ca dāpayan / pulastyam āha rājendro harṣagadgadayā girā // 7.033.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyeyam amarāvatyā tulyā māhiṣmatī kṛtā / adyāhaṃ tu dvijendrendra yasmāt paśyāmi durdṛśam // 7.033.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya me kuśalaṃ deva adya me kulam uddhṛtam / yat te devagaṇair vandyau vande 'haṃ caraṇāv imau // 7.033.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ rājyam ime putrā ime dārā ime vayam / brahman kiṃ kurma kiṃ kāryam ājñāpayatu no bhavān // 7.033.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dharme 'gniṣu bhṛtyeṣu śivaṃ pṛṣṭvātha pārthivam / pulastyovāca rājānaṃ haihayānāṃ tadārjunam // 7.033.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājendrāmalapadmākṣapūrṇacandranibhānana / atulaṃ te balaṃ yena daśagrīvas tvayā jitaḥ // 7.033.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhayād yasyāvatiṣṭhetāṃ niṣpandau sāgarānilau / so 'yam adya tvayā baddhaḥ pautro me 'tīvadurjayaḥ // 7.033.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat putraka yaśaḥ sphītaṃ nāma viśrāvitaṃ tvayā / madvākyād yācyamāno 'dya muñca vatsa daśānanam // 7.033.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pulastyājñāṃ sa gṛhyātha akiṃcanavaco 'rjunaḥ / mumoca pārthivendrendro rākṣasendraṃ prahṛṣṭavat // 7.033.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ pramuktvā tridaśārim arjunaḥ; prapūjya divyābharaṇasragambaraiḥ / ahiṃsākaṃ sakhyam upetya sāgnikaṃ; praṇamya sa brahmasutaṃ gṛhaṃ yayau // 7.033.018	upajāti (jagatī: vaṃśastha [jtjr], ajñātam [ytjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
pulastyenāpi saṃgamya rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān / pariṣvaṅgakṛtātithyo lajjamāno visarjitaḥ // 7.033.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahasutaś cāpi pulastyo munisattamaḥ / mocayitvā daśagrīvaṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma saḥ // 7.033.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ prāptaḥ kārtavīryāt tu dharṣaṇāt / pulastyavacanāc cāpi punar mokṣam avāptavān // 7.033.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ balibhyo balinaḥ santi rāghavanandana / nāvajñā parataḥ kāryā ya icchec chreya ātmanaḥ // 7.033.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa rājā piśitāśanānāṃ; sahasrabāhor upalabhya maitrīm / punar narāṇāṃ kadanaṃ cakāra; cacāra sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca darpāt // 7.033.023	upendravajrā [jtjgg]
arjunena vimuktas tu rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ / cacāra pṛthivīṃ sarvām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ // 7.034.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā śṛṇute yaṃ balādhikam / rāvaṇas taṃ samāsādya yuddhe hvayati darpitaḥ // 7.034.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kadā cit kiṣkindhāṃ nagarīṃ vālipālitām / gatvāhvayati yuddhāya vālinaṃ hemamālinam // 7.034.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas taṃ vānarāmātyas tāras tārāpitā prabhuḥ / uvāca rāvaṇaṃ vākyaṃ yuddhaprepsum upāgatam // 7.034.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasendra gato vālī yas te pratibalo bhavet / nānyaḥ pramukhataḥ sthātuṃ tava śaktaḥ plavaṃgamaḥ // 7.034.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturbhyo 'pi samudrebhyaḥ saṃdhyām anvāsya rāvaṇa / imaṃ muhūrtam āyāti vālī tiṣṭha muhūrtakam // 7.034.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etān asthicayān paśya ya ete śaṅkhapāṇḍurāḥ / yuddhārthinām ime rājan vānarādhipatejasā // 7.034.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad vāmṛtarasaḥ pītas tvayā rāvaṇarākṣasa / tathā vālinam āsādya tadantaṃ tava jīvitam // 7.034.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā tvarase martuṃ gaccha dakṣiṇasāgaram / vālinaṃ drakṣyase tatra bhūmiṣṭham iva bhāskaram // 7.034.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu tāraṃ vinirbhartsya rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ / puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya prayayau dakṣiṇārṇavam // 7.034.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra hemagiriprakhyaṃ taruṇārkanibhānanam / rāvaṇo vālinaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃdhyopāsanatatparam // 7.034.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṣpakād avaruhyātha rāvaṇo 'ñjanasaṃnibhaḥ / grahītuṃ vālinaṃ tūrṇaṃ niḥśabdapadam ādravat // 7.034.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadṛcchayonmīlayatā vālināpi sa rāvaṇaḥ / pāpābhiprāyavān dṛṣṭaś cakāra na ca saṃbhramam // 7.034.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaśam ālakṣya siṃho vā pannagaṃ garuḍo yathā / na cintayati taṃ vālī rāvaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam // 7.034.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jighṛkṣamāṇam adyainaṃ rāvaṇaṃ pāpabuddhinam / kakṣāvalambinaṃ kṛtvā gamiṣyāmi mahārṇavān // 7.034.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
drakṣyanty ariṃ mamāṅkasthaṃ sraṃsitorukarāmbaram / lambamānaṃ daśagrīvaṃ garuḍasyeva pannagam // 7.034.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity evaṃ matim āsthāya vālī karṇam upāśritaḥ / japan vai naigamān mantrāṃs tasthau parvatarāḍ iva // 7.034.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāv anyonyaṃ jighṛkṣantau harirākṣasapārthivau / prayatnavantau tat karma īhatur baladarpitau // 7.034.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hastagrāhyaṃ tu taṃ matvā pādaśabdena rāvaṇam / parāṅmukho 'pi jagrāha vālī sarpam ivāṇḍajaḥ // 7.034.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
grahītukāmaṃ taṃ gṛhya rakṣasām īśvaraṃ hariḥ / kham utpapāta vegena kṛtvā kakṣāvalambinam // 7.034.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa taṃ pīḍdayamānas tu vitudantaṃ nakhair muhuḥ / jahāra rāvaṇaṃ vālī pavanas toyadaṃ yathā // 7.034.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha te rākṣasāmātyā hriyamāṇe daśānane / mumokṣayiṣavo ghorā ravamāṇā hy abhidravan // 7.034.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anvīyamānas tair vālī bhrājate 'mbaramadhyagaḥ / anvīyamāno meghaughair ambarastha ivāṃśumān // 7.034.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te 'śaknuvantaḥ saṃprāptaṃ vālinaṃ rākṣasottamāḥ / tasya bāhūruvegena pariśrāntaḥ patanti ca // 7.034.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vālimārgād apākrāman parvatendrā hi gacchataḥ // 7.034.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apakṣigaṇasaṃpāto vānarendro mahājavaḥ / kramaśaḥ sāgarān sarvān saṃdhyākālam avandata // 7.034.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sabhājyamāno bhūtais tu khecaraiḥ khecaro hariḥ / paścimaṃ sāgaraṃ vālī ājagāma sarāvaṇaḥ // 7.034.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra saṃdhyām upāsitvā snātvā japtvā ca vānaraḥ / uttaraṃ sāgaraṃ prāyād vahamāno daśānanam // 7.034.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttare sāgare saṃdhyām upāsitvā daśānanam / vahamāno 'gamad vālī pūrvam ambumahānidhim // 7.034.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāpi saṃdhyām anvāsya vāsaviḥ sa harīśvaraḥ / kiṣkindhābhimukho gṛhya rāvaṇaṃ punar āgamat // 7.034.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
caturṣv api samudreṣu saṃdhyām anvāsya vānaraḥ / rāvaṇodvahanaśrāntaḥ kiṣkindhopavane 'patat // 7.034.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaṃ tu mumocātha svakakṣāt kapisattamaḥ / kutas tvam iti covāca prahasan rāvaṇaṃ prati // 7.034.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vismayaṃ tu mahad gatvā śramalokanirīkṣaṇaḥ / rākṣaseśo harīśaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 7.034.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarendra mahendrābha rākṣasendro 'smi rāvaṇaḥ / yuddhepsur ahaṃ saṃprāptaḥ sa cādyāsāditas tvayā // 7.034.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aho balam aho vīryam aho gambhīratā ca te / yenāhaṃ paśuvad gṛhya bhrāmitaś caturo 'rṇavān // 7.034.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam aśrāntavad vīra śīghram eva ca vānara / māṃ caivodvahamānas tu ko 'nyo vīraḥ kramiṣyati // 7.034.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ gatir eṣā plavaṃgama / mano'nilasuparṇānāṃ tava vā nātra saṃśayaḥ // 7.034.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ dṛṣṭabalas tubhyam icchāmi haripuṃgava / tvayā saha ciraṃ sakhyaṃ susnigdhaṃ pāvakāgrataḥ // 7.034.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dārāḥ putrāḥ puraṃ rāṣṭraṃ bhogācchādanabhojanam / sarvam evāvibhaktaṃ nau bhaviṣyati harīśvara // 7.034.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prajvālayitvāgniṃ tāv ubhau harirākṣasau / bhrātṛtvam upasaṃpannau pariṣvajya parasparam // 7.034.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyonyaṃ lambitakarau tatas tau harirākṣasau / kiṣkindhāṃ viśatur hṛṣṭau siṃhau giriguhām iva // 7.034.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tatra māsam uṣitaḥ sugrīva iva rāvaṇaḥ / amātyair āgatair nīcas trailokyotsādanārthibhiḥ // 7.034.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam etat purāvṛttaṃ vālinā rāvaṇaḥ prabho / dharṣitaś ca kṛtaś cāpi bhrātā pāvakasaṃnidhau // 7.034.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balam apratimaṃ rāma vālino 'bhavad uttamam / so 'pi tayā vinirdagdhaḥ śalabho vahninā yathā // 7.034.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apṛcchata tato rāmo dakṣiṇāśālayaṃ munim / prāñjalir vinayopeta idam āha vaco 'rthavat // 7.035.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atulaṃ balam etābhyāṃ vālino rāvaṇasya ca / na tv etau hanumadvīryaiḥ samāv iti matir mama // 7.035.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ prājñatā nayasādhanam / vikramaś ca prabhāvaś ca hanūmati kṛtālayāḥ // 7.035.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvodadhiṃ viṣīdantīṃ tadaiṣa kapivāhinīm / samāśvāsya kapīn bhūyo yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ // 7.035.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharṣayitvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ tathā / dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣitā cāpi sītā viśvāsitā tathā // 7.035.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
senāgragā mantrisutāḥ kiṃkarā rāvaṇātmajaḥ / ete hanumatā tatra ekena vinipātitāḥ // 7.035.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūyo bandhād vimuktena saṃbhāṣitvā daśānanam / laṅkā bhasmīkṛtā tena pāvakeneva medinī // 7.035.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kālasya na śakrasya na viṣṇor vittapasya ca / karmāṇi tāni śrūyante yāni yuddhe hanūmataḥ // 7.035.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasya bāhuvīryeṇa laṅkā sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ / prāpto mayā jayaś caiva rājyaṃ mitrāṇi bāndhavāḥ // 7.035.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hanūmān yadi me na syād vānarādhipateḥ sakhā / pravṛttam api ko vettuṃ jānakyāḥ śaktimān bhavet // 7.035.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kimarthaṃ vālī caitena sugrīvapriyakāmyayā / tadā vaire samutpanne na dagdho vīrudho yathā // 7.035.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi veditavān manye hanūmān ātmano balam / yad dṛṣṭavāñ jīviteṣṭaṃ kliśyantaṃ vānarādhipam // 7.035.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etan me bhagavan sarvaṃ hanūmati mahāmune / vistareṇa yathātattvaṃ kathayāmarapūjita // 7.035.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetuyuktam ṛṣis tataḥ / hanūmataḥ samakṣaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 7.035.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyam etad raghuśreṣṭha yad bravīṣi hanūmataḥ / na bale vidyate tulyo na gatau na matau paraḥ // 7.035.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amoghaśāpaiḥ śāpas tu datto 'sya ṛṣibhiḥ purā / na veditā balaṃ yena balī sann arimardanaḥ // 7.035.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bālye 'py etena yat karma kṛtaṃ rāma mahābala / tan na varṇayituṃ śakyam atibālatayāsya te // 7.035.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi vāsti tv abhiprāyas tac chrotuṃ tava rāghava / samādhāya matiṃ rāma niśāmaya vadāmy aham // 7.035.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sūryadattavarasvarṇaḥ sumerur nāma parvataḥ / yatra rājyaṃ praśāsty asya keṣarī nāma vai pitā // 7.035.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya bhāryā babhūveṣṭā hy añjaneti pariśrutā / janayām āsa tasyāṃ vai vāyur ātmajam uttamam // 7.035.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāliśūkasamābhāsaṃ prāsūtemaṃ tadāñjanā / phalāny āhartukāmā vai niṣkrāntā gahane carā // 7.035.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa mātur viyogāc ca kṣudhayā ca bhṛśārditaḥ / ruroda śiśur atyarthaṃ śiśuḥ śarabharāḍ iva // 7.035.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatodyantaṃ vivasvantaṃ japā puṣpotkaropamam / dadṛśe phalalobhāc ca utpapāta raviṃ prati // 7.035.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bālārkābhimukho bālo bālārka iva mūrtimān / grahītukāmo bālārkaṃ plavate 'mbaramadhyagaḥ // 7.035.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasmin plavanāne tu śiśubhāve hanūmati / devadānavasiddhānāṃ vismayaḥ sumahān abhūt // 7.035.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāpy evaṃ vegavān vāyur garuḍo na manas tathā / yathāyaṃ vāyuputras tu kramate 'mbaram uttamam // 7.035.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi tāvac chiśor asya īdṛśau gativikramau / yauvanaṃ balam āsādya kathaṃ vego bhaviṣyati // 7.035.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam anuplavate vāyuḥ plavantaṃ putram ātmanaḥ / sūryadāhabhayād rakṣaṃs tuṣāracayaśītalaḥ // 7.035.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahuyojanasāhasraṃ kramaty eṣa tato 'mbaram / pitur balāc ca bālyāc ca bhāskarābhyāśam āgataḥ // 7.035.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śiśur eṣa tv adoṣajña iti matvā divākaraḥ / kāryaṃ cātra samāyattam ity evaṃ na dadāha saḥ // 7.035.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yam eva divasaṃ hy eṣa grahītuṃ bhāskaraṃ plutaḥ / tam eva divasaṃ rāhur jighṛkṣati divākaram // 7.035.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anena ca parāmṛṣṭo rāma sūryarathopati / apakrāntas tatas trasto rāhuś candrārkamardanaḥ // 7.035.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa indrabhavanaṃ gatvā saroṣaḥ siṃhikāsutaḥ / abravīd bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā devaṃ devagaṇair vṛtam // 7.035.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bubhukṣāpanayaṃ dattvā candrārkau mama vāsava / kim idaṃ tat tvayā dattam anyasya balavṛtrahan // 7.035.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyāhaṃ parvakāle tu jighṛkṣuḥ sūryam āgataḥ / athānyo rāhur āsādya jagrāha sahasā ravim // 7.035.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rāhor vacanaṃ śrutvā vāsavaḥ saṃbhramānvitaḥ / utpapātāsanaṃ hitvā udvahan kāñcanasrajam // 7.035.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kailāsakūṭābhaṃ caturdantaṃ madasravam / śṛṅgārakāriṇaṃ prāṃṣuṃ svarṇaghaṇṭāṭṭahāsinam // 7.035.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indraḥ karīndram āruhya rāhuṃ kṛtvā puraḥsaram / prāyād yatrābhavat sūryaḥ sahānena hanūmatā // 7.035.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athātirabhasenāgād rāhur utsṛjya vāsavam / anena ca sa vai dṛṣṭa ādhāvañ śailakūṭavat // 7.035.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sūryaṃ samutsṛjya rāhum evam avekṣya ca / utpapāta punar vyoma grahītuṃ siṃhikā sutam // 7.035.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
utsṛjyārkam imaṃ rāma ādhāvantaṃ plavaṃgamam / dṛṣṭvā rāhuḥ parāvṛtya mukhaśeṣaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ // 7.035.041	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indram āśaṃsamānas tu trātāraṃ siṃhikāsutaḥ / indra indreti saṃtrāsān muhur muhur abhāṣata // 7.035.042	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāhor vikrośamānasya prāg evālakṣitaḥ svaraḥ / śrutvendrovāca māṃ bhaiṣīr ayam enaṃ nihanmy aham // 7.035.043	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
airāvataṃ tato dṛṣṭvā mahat tad idam ity api / phalaṃ taṃ hastirājānam abhidudrāva mārutiḥ // 7.035.044	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadāsya dhāvato rūpam airāvatajighṛkṣayā / muhūrtam abhavad ghoram indrāgnyor iva bhāsvaram // 7.035.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ādhāvamānaṃ tu nātikruddhaḥ śacīpatiḥ / hastāntenātimuktena kuliśenābhyatāḍayat // 7.035.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato girau papātaiṣa indravajrābhitāḍitaḥ / patamānasya caitasya vāmo hanur abhajyata // 7.035.047	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tu patite bāle vajratāḍanavihvale / cukrodhendrāya pavanaḥ prajānām aśivāya ca // 7.035.048	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viṇmūtrāśayam āvṛtya prajāsv antargataḥ prabhuḥ / rurodha sarvabhūtāni yathā varṣāṇi vāsavaḥ // 7.035.049	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāyuprakopād bhūtāni nirucchvāsāni sarvataḥ / saṃdhibhir bhajyamānāni kāṣṭhabhūtāni jajñire // 7.035.050	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niḥsvadhaṃ nirvaṣaṭkāraṃ niṣkriyaṃ dharmavarjitam / vāyuprakopāt trailokyaṃ nirayastham ivābabhau // 7.035.051	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prajāḥ sagandharvāḥ sadevāsuramānuṣāḥ / prajāpatiṃ samādhāvann asukhārtāḥ sukhaiṣiṇaḥ // 7.035.052	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūcuḥ prāñjalayo devā darodaranibhodarāḥ / tvayā sma bhagavan sṛṣṭāḥ prajānātha caturvidhāḥ // 7.035.053	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā datto 'yam asmākam āyuṣaḥ pavanaḥ patiḥ / so 'smān prāṇeśvaro bhūtvā kasmād eṣo 'dya sattama // 7.035.054	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rurodha duḥkhaṃ janayann antaḥpura iva striyaḥ / tasmāt tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptā vāyunopahatā vibho // 7.035.055	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāyusaṃrodhajaṃ duḥkham idaṃ no nuda śatruhan // 7.035.056	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat prajānāṃ śrutvā tu prajānāthaḥ prajāpatiḥ / kāraṇād iti tān uktvā prajāḥ punar abhāṣata // 7.035.057	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmin vaḥ kāraṇe vāyuś cukrodha ca rurodha ca / prajāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrotavyaṃ cātmanaḥ kṣamam // 7.035.058	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putras tasyāmareśena indreṇādya nipātitaḥ / rāhor vacanam ājñāya rājñā vaḥ kopito 'nilaḥ // 7.035.059	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśarīraḥ śarīreṣu vāyuś carati pālayan / śarīraṃ hi vinā vāyuṃ samatāṃ yāti reṇubhiḥ // 7.035.060	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāyuḥ prāṇāḥ sukhaṃ vāyur vāyuḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat / vāyunā saṃparityaktaṃ na sukhaṃ vindate jagat // 7.035.061	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adyaiva ca parityaktaṃ vāyunā jagad āyuṣā / adyaiveme nirucchvāsāḥ kāṣṭhakuḍyopamāḥ sthitāḥ // 7.035.062	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad yāmas tatra yatrāste māruto rukprado hi vaḥ / mā vināśaṃ gamiṣyāma aprasādyāditeḥ sutam // 7.035.063	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prajābhiḥ sahitaḥ prajāpatiḥ; sadevagandharvabhujaṃgaguhyakaḥ / jagāma tatrāsyati yatra mārutaḥ; sutaṃ surendrābhihataṃ pragṛhya saḥ // 7.035.064	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tato 'rkavaiśvānarakāñcanaprabhaṃ; sutaṃ tadotsaṅgagataṃ sadā gateḥ / caturmukho vīkṣya kṛpām athākarot; sadevasiddharṣibhujaṃgarākṣasaḥ // 7.035.065	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
tataḥ pitāmahaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyuḥ putravadhārditaḥ / śiśukaṃ taṃ samādāya uttasthau dhātur agrataḥ // 7.036.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
calatkuṇḍalamaulisraktapanīyavibhūṣaṇaḥ / pādayor nyapatad vāyus tisro' vasthāya vedhase // 7.036.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu vedavidādyas tu lambābharaṇaśobhinā / vāyum utthāpya hastena śiśuṃ taṃ parimṛṣṭavān // 7.036.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
spṛṣṭamātras tataḥ so 'tha salīlaṃ padmajanmanā / jalasiktaṃ yathā sasyaṃ punar jīvitam āptavān // 7.036.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāṇavantam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāṇo gandhavaho mudā / cacāra sarvabhūteṣu saṃniruddhaṃ yathāpurā // 7.036.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
marudrogavinirmuktāḥ prajā vai muditābhavan / śītavātavinirmuktāḥ padminya iva sāmbujāḥ // 7.036.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas triyugmas trikakut tridhāmā tridaśārcitaḥ / uvāca devatā brahmā mārutapriyakāmyayā // 7.036.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bho mahendrāgnivaruṇadhaneśvaramaheśvarāḥ / jānatām api tat sarvaṃ hitaṃ vakṣyāmi śrūyatām // 7.036.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anena śiśunā kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ vo bhaviṣyati / dadatāsya varān sarve mārutasyāsya tuṣṭidān // 7.036.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sahasranayanaḥ prītiraktaḥ śubhānanaḥ / kuśe śayamayīṃ mālāṃ samutkṣipyedam abravīt // 7.036.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
matkarotsṛṣṭavajreṇa hanur asya yathā kṣataḥ / nāmnaiṣa kapiśārdūlo bhavitā hanumān iti // 7.036.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aham evāsya dāsyāmi paramaṃ varam uttamam / ataḥ prabhṛti vajrasya mamāvadhyo bhaviṣyati // 7.036.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārtāṇḍas tv abravīt tatra bhagavāṃs timirāpahaḥ / tejaso 'sya madīyasya dadāmi śatikāṃ kalām // 7.036.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā tu śāstrāṇy adhyetuṃ śaktir asya bhaviṣyati / tadāsya śāstraṃ dāsyāmi yena vāgmī bhaviṣyati // 7.036.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varuṇaś ca varaṃ prādān nāsya mṛtyur bhaviṣyati / varṣāyutaśatenāpi matpāśād udakād api // 7.036.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yamo 'pi daṇḍāvadhyatvam arogatvaṃ ca nityaśaḥ / diśate 'sya varaṃ tuṣṭa aviṣādaṃ ca saṃyuge // 7.036.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gadeyaṃ māmikā nainaṃ saṃyugeṣu vadhiṣyati / ity evaṃ varadaḥ prāha tadā hy ekākṣipiṅgalaḥ // 7.036.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
matto madāyudhānāṃ ca na vadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati / ity evaṃ śaṃkareṇāpi datto 'sya paramo varaḥ // 7.036.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarveṣāṃ brahmadaṇḍānām avadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati / dīrghāayuś ca mahātmā ca iti brahmābravīd vacaḥ // 7.036.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
viśvakarmā tu dṛṣṭvainaṃ bālasūryopamaṃ śiśum / śilpinā pravaraḥ prāha varam asya mahāmatiḥ // 7.036.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinirmitāni devānām āyudhānīha yāni tu / teṣāṃ saṃgrāmakāle tu avadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati // 7.036.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ surāṇāṃ tu varair dṛṣṭvā hy enam akaṃkṛtam / caturmukhas tuṣṭamukho vāyum āha jagadguruḥ // 7.036.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
amitrāṇāṃ bhayakaro mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ / ajeyo bhavitā te 'tra putro mārutamārutiḥ // 7.036.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇotsādanārthāni rāmaprītikarāṇi ca / romaharṣakarāṇy eṣa kartā karmāṇi saṃyuge // 7.036.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tam āmantrya mārutaṃ te 'maraiḥ saha / yathāgataṃ yayuḥ sarve pitāmahapurogamāḥ // 7.036.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'pi gandhavahaḥ putraṃ pragṛhya gṛham ānayat / añjanāyāstam ākhyāya varaṃ dattaṃ viniḥsṛtaḥ // 7.036.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāpya rāma varān eṣa varadānabalānvitaḥ / balenātmani saṃsthena so 'pūryata yathārṇavaḥ // 7.036.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balenāpūryamāṇo hi eṣa vānarapuṃgavaḥ / āśrameṣu maharṣīṇām aparādhyati nirbhayaḥ // 7.036.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
srugbhāṇḍān agnihotraṃ ca valkalānāṃ ca saṃcayān / bhagnavicchinnavidhvastān suśāntānāṃ karoty ayam // 7.036.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarveṣāṃ brahmadaṇḍānām avadhyaṃ brahmaṇā kṛtam / jānanta ṛṣayas taṃ vai kṣamante tasya nityaśaḥ // 7.036.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā keṣariṇā tv eṣa vāyunā sāñjanena ca / pratiṣiddho 'pi maryādāṃ laṅghayaty eva vānaraḥ // 7.036.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato maharṣayaḥ kruddhā bhṛgvaṅgirasavaṃśajāḥ / śepur enaṃ raghuśreṣṭha nātikruddhātimanyavaḥ // 7.036.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bādhase yat samāśritya balam asmān plavaṃgama / tad dīrghakālaṃ vettāsi nāsmākaṃ śāpamohitaḥ // 7.036.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tu hṛtatejaujā maharṣivacanaujasā / eṣo śramāṇi nānyeti mṛdubhāvagataś caran // 7.036.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha ṛkṣarajā nāma vālisugrīvayoḥ pitā / sarvavānararājāsīt tejasā iva bhāskaraḥ // 7.036.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu rājyaṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā vānarāṇāṃ harīśvaraḥ / tatas tvarkṣarajā nāma kāladharmeṇa saṃgataḥ // 7.036.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasminn astamite vālī mantribhir mantrakovidaiḥ / pitrye pade kṛto rājā sugrīvo vālinaḥ pade // 7.036.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīveṇa samaṃ tv asya advaidhaṃ chidravarjitam / ahāryaṃ sakhyam abhavad anilasya yathāgninā // 7.036.038	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa śāpavaśād eva na vedabalam ātmanaḥ / vālisugrīvayor vairaṃ yadā rāmasamutthitam // 7.036.039	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy eṣa rāma sugrīvo bhrāmyamāṇo 'pi vālinā / vedayāno na ca hy eṣa balam ātmani mārutiḥ // 7.036.040	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parākramotsāha matipratāpaiḥ; sauśīlyamādhuryanayānayaiś ca / gāmbhīryacāturyasuvīryadhairyair; hanūmataḥ ko 'py adhiko 'sti loke // 7.036.041	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
asau purā vyākaraṇaṃ grahīṣyan; sūryonmukhaḥ pṛṣṭhagamaḥ kapīndraḥ / udyadgirer astagiriṃ jagāma; granthaṃ mahad dhārayad aprameyaḥ // 7.036.042	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
pravīvivikṣor iva sāgarasya; lokān didhakṣor iva pāvakasya / lokakṣayeṣv eva yathāntakasya; hanūmataḥ sthāsyati kaḥ purastāt // 7.036.043	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
eṣo 'pi cānye ca mahākapīndrāḥ; sugrīvamaindadvividāḥ sanīlāḥ / satāratāreyanalāḥ sarambhās; tvatkāraṇād rāma surair hi sṛṣṭāḥ // 7.036.044	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
tad etat kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi / hanūmato bālabhāve karmaitat kathitaṃ mayā // 7.036.045	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭaḥ saṃbhāṣitaś cāsi rāma gacchamahe vayam / evam uktvā gatāḥ sarve ṛṣayas te yathāgatam // 7.036.046	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vimṛśya ca tato rāmo vayasyam akutobhayam / pratardanaṃ kāśipatiṃ pariṣvajyedam abravīt // 7.037.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
darśitā bhavatā prītir darśitaṃ sauhṛdaṃ param / udyogaś ca kṛto rājan bharatena tvayā saha // 7.037.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad bhavān adya kāśeyīṃ purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ vraja / ramaṇīyāṃ tvayā guptāṃ suprākārāṃ sutoraṇām // 7.037.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāvad uktvā utthāya kākutsthaḥ paramāsanāt / paryaṣvajata dharmātmā nirantaram urogatam // 7.037.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visṛjya taṃ vayasyaṃ sa svāgatān pṛthivīpatīn / prahasan rāghavo vākyam uvāca madhurākṣaram // 7.037.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavatāṃ prītir avyagrā tejasā parirakṣitā / dharmaś ca niyato nityaṃ satyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sadā // 7.037.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuṣmākaṃ ca prabhāvena tejasā ca mahātmanām / hato durātmā durbuddhī rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ // 7.037.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hetumātram ahaṃ tatra bhavatāṃ tejasāṃ hataḥ / rāvaṇaḥ sagaṇo yuddhe saputraḥ sahabāndhavaḥ // 7.037.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavantaś ca samānītā bharatena mahātmanā / śrutvā janakarājasya kānane tanayāṃ hṛtām // 7.037.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
udyuktānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ pārthivānāṃ mahātmanām / kālo hy atītaḥ sumahān gamane rocatāṃ matiḥ // 7.037.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyūcus taṃ ca rājāno harṣeṇa mahatānvitāḥ / diṣṭyā tvaṃ vijayī rāma rājyaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam // 7.037.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā pratyāhṛtā sītā diṣṭyā śatruḥ parājitaḥ / eṣa naḥ paramaḥ kāma eṣā naḥ kīrtir uttamā // 7.037.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tvāṃ vijayinaṃ rāma paśyāmo hataśātravam / upapannaṃ ca kākutstha yat tvam asmān praśaṃsasi // 7.037.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praśaṃsārhā hi jānanti praśaṃsāṃ vaktum īdṛśīm / āpṛcchāmo gamiṣyāmo hṛdistho naḥ sadā bhavān // 7.037.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavec ca te mahārāja prītir asmāsu nityadā // 7.037.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te prayātā mahātmānaḥ pārthivāḥ sarvato diśam / kampayanto mahīṃ vīrāḥ svapurāṇi prahṛṣṭavat // 7.038.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṣauhiṇī sahasrais te samavetās tv anekaśaḥ / hṛṣṭāḥ pratigatāḥ sarve rāghavārthe samāgatāḥ // 7.038.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūcuś caiva mahīpālā baladarpasamanvitāḥ / na nāma rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe paśyāmaḥ purataḥ sthitam // 7.038.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatena vayaṃ paścāt samānītā nirarthakam / hatā hi rākṣasās tatra pārthivaiḥ syur na saṃśayaḥ // 7.038.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya bāhuvīryeṇa pālitā lakṣmaṇasya ca / sukhaṃ pāre samudrasya yudhyema vigatajvarāḥ // 7.038.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etāś cānyāś ca rājānaḥ kathās tatra sahasraśaḥ / kathayantaḥ svarāṣṭrāṇi viviśus te mahārathāḥ // 7.038.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāpurāṇi te gatvā ratnāni vividhāni ca / rāmāya priyakāmārtham upahārān nṛpā daduḥ // 7.038.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśvān ratnāni vastrāṇi hastinaś ca madotkaṭān / candanāni ca divyāni divyāny ābharaṇāni ca // 7.038.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharato lakṣmaṇaś caiva śatrughnaś ca mahārathaḥ / ādāya tāni ratnāni ayodhyām agaman punaḥ // 7.038.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āgatāś ca purīṃ ramyām ayodhyāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ / daduḥ sarvāṇi ratnāni rāghavāya mahātmane // 7.038.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ prītiyuktaḥ sa rāghavaḥ / sarvāṇi tāni pradadau sugrīvāya mahātmane // 7.038.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇāya ca dadau ye cānye ṛkṣavānarāḥ / hanūmatpramukhā vīrā rākṣasāś ca mahābalāḥ // 7.038.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te sarve hṛṣṭamanaso rāmadattāni tāny atha / śirobhir dhārayām āsur bāhubhiś ca mahābalāḥ // 7.038.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
papuś caiva sugandhīni madhūni vividhāni ca / māṃsāni ca sumṛṣṭāni phalāny āsvādayanti ca // 7.038.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ teṣāṃ nivasatāṃ māsaḥ sāgro gatas tadā / muhūrtam iva tat sarvaṃ rāmabhaktyā samarthayan // 7.038.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
reme rāmaḥ sa taiḥ sārdhaṃ vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ / rājabhiś ca mahāvīryai rākṣasaiś ca mahābalaiḥ // 7.038.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ teṣāṃ yayau māso dvitīyaḥ śaiśiraḥ sukham / vānarāṇāṃ prahṛṣṭānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // 7.038.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā sma teṣāṃ vasatām ṛkṣavānararakṣasām / rāghavas tu mahātejāḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt // 7.039.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamyatāṃ saumya kiṣkindhāṃ durādharṣaṃ surāsuraiḥ / pālayasva sahāmātyai rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam // 7.039.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadaṃ ca mahābāho prītyā paramayānvitaḥ / paśya tvaṃ hanumantaṃ ca nalaṃ ca sumahābalam // 7.039.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suṣeṇaṃ śvaśuraṃ śūraṃ tāraṃ ca balināṃ varam / kumudaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ nīlaṃ ca sumahābalam // 7.039.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīraṃ śatabaliṃ caiva maindaṃ dvividam eva ca / gajaṃ gavākṣaṃ gavayaṃ śarabhaṃ ca mahābalam // 7.039.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛkṣarājaṃ ca durdharṣaṃ jāmbavantaṃ mahābalam / paśya prītisamāyukto gandhamādanam eva ca // 7.039.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye cānye sumahātmāno madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ / paśya tvaṃ prītisaṃyukto mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ // 7.039.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā ca sugrīvaṃ praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ / vibhīṣaṇam athovāca rāmo madhurayā girā // 7.039.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṅkāṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa saṃmato hy asi pārthiva / purasya rākṣasānāṃ ca bhrātur vaiśvaraṇasya ca // 7.039.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā ca buddhim adharme tvaṃ kuryā rājan kathaṃ cana / buddhimanto hi rājāno dhruvam aśnanti medinīm // 7.039.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ ca nityaśo rājan sugrīvasahitas tvayā / smartavyaḥ parayā prītyā gaccha tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ // 7.039.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā ṛṣkavānararākṣasāḥ / sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥ // 7.039.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava buddhir mahābāho vīryam adbhutam eva ca / mādhuryaṃ paramaṃ rāma svayambhor iva nityadā // 7.039.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām evaṃ bruvāṇānāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rakṣasām / hanūmatpraṇato bhūtvā rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt // 7.039.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sneho me paramo rājaṃs tvayi nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ / bhaktiś ca niyatā vīra bhāvo nānyatra gacchati // 7.039.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvad rāmakathāṃ vīra śroṣye 'haṃ pṛthivītale / tāvac charīre vatsyantu mama prāṇā na saṃśayaḥ // 7.039.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rājendro hanūmantam athāsanāt / utthāya ca pariṣvajya vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.039.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam etat kapiśreṣṭha bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ / lokā hi yāvat sthāsyanti tāvat sthāsyati me kathā // 7.039.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cariṣyati kathā yāval lokān eṣā hi māmikā / tāvac charīre vatsyanti prāṇās tava na saṃśayaḥ // 7.039.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'sya hāraṃ candrābhaṃ mucya kaṇṭhāt sa rāghavaḥ / vaidūryataralaṃ snehād ābabandhe hanūmati // 7.039.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenorasi nibaddhena hāreṇa sa mahākapiḥ / rarāja hemaśailendraś candreṇākrāntamastakaḥ // 7.039.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu rāghavasyaitad utthāyotthāya vānarāḥ / praṇamya śirasā pādau prajagmus te mahābalāḥ // 7.039.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sugrīvaś caiva rāmeṇa pariṣvakto mahābhujaḥ / vibhīṣaṇaś ca dharmātmā nirantaram urogataḥ // 7.039.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve ca te bāṣpagalāḥ sāśrunetrā vicetasaḥ / saṃmūḍhā iva duḥkhena tyajante rāghavaṃ tadā // 7.039.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visṛjya ca mahābāhur ṛkṣavānararākṣasān / bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rāmaḥ pramumoda sukhī sukham // 7.040.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāparāhṇasamaye bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rāghavaḥ / śuśrāva madhurāṃ vāṇīm antarikṣāt prabhāṣitām // 7.040.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumya rāma nirīkṣasva saumyena vadanena mām / kailāsaśikharāt prāptaṃ viddhi māṃ puṣkaraṃ prabho // 7.040.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tava śāsanam ājñāya gato 'smi dhanadaṃ prati / upasthātuṃ naraśreṣṭha sa ca māṃ pratyabhāṣata // 7.040.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirjitas tvaṃ narendreṇa rāghaveṇa mahātmanā / nihatya yudhi durdharṣaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam // 7.040.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamāpi paramā prītir hate tasmin durātmani / rāvaṇe sagaṇe saumya saputrāmātyabāndhave // 7.040.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ rāmeṇa laṅkāyāṃ nirjitaḥ paramātmanā / vaha saumya tam eva tvam aham ājñāpayāmi te // 7.040.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yat tvaṃ rāghavanandanam / vaher lokasya saṃyānaṃ gacchasva vigatajvaraḥ // 7.040.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tacchāsanam ahaṃ jñātvā dhanadasya mahātmanaḥ / tvatsakāśaṃ punaḥ prāptaḥ sa evaṃ pratigṛhṇa mām // 7.040.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāḍham ity eva kākutsthaḥ puṣpakaṃ samapūjayat / lājākṣataiś ca puṣpaiś ca gandhaiś ca susugandhibhiḥ // 7.040.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gamyatāṃ ca yathākāmam āgacches tvaṃ yadā smare / evam astv iti rāmeṇa visṛṣṭaḥ puṣpakaḥ punaḥ // 7.040.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhipretāṃ diśaṃ prāyāt puṣpakaḥ puṣpabhūṣitaḥ // 7.040.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam antarhite tasmin puṣpake vividhātmani / bharataḥ prāñjalir vākyam uvāca raghunandanam // 7.040.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
