atyadbhutāni dṛśyante tvayi rājyaṃ praśāsati / amānuṣāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ vyāhṛtāni muhur muhuḥ // 7.040.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anāmayāc ca martyānāṃ sāgro māso gato hy ayam / jīrṇānām api sattvānāṃ mṛtyur nāyāti rāghava // 7.040.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putrān nāryaḥ prasūyante vapuṣmantaś ca mānavāḥ / harṣaś cābhyadhiko rājañ janasya puravāsinaḥ // 7.040.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāle ca vāsavo varṣaṃ pātayaty amṛtopamam / vāyavaś cāpi vāyante sparśavantaḥ sukhapradāḥ // 7.040.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īdṛśo naś ciraṃ rājā bhavatv iti nareśvara / kathayanti pure paurā janā janapadeṣu ca // 7.040.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etā vācaḥ sumadhurā bharatena samīritāḥ / śrutvā rāmo mudā yuktaḥ pramumoda sukhī sukham // 7.040.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa visṛjya tato rāmaḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam / praviveśa mahābāhur aśokavanikāṃ tadā // 7.041.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candanāgaru cūtaiś ca tuṅga kāleyakair api / devadāruvanaiś cāpi samantād upaśobhitām // 7.041.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
priyaṅgubhiḥ kadambaiś ca tathā kurabakair api / jambūbhiḥ pāṭalībhiś ca kovidāraiś ca saṃvṛtām // 7.041.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvadā kusumai ramyaiḥ phalavadbhir manoramaiḥ / cārupallavapuṣpāḍhyair mattabhramarasaṃkulaiḥ // 7.041.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kokilair bhṛṅgarājaiś ca nānāvarṇaiś ca pakṣibhiḥ / śobhitāṃ śataśaś citraiś cūtavṛkṣāvataṃsakaiḥ // 7.041.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śātakumbhanibhāḥ ke cit ke cid agniśikhopamāḥ / nīlāñjananibhāś cānye bhānti tatra sma pādapāḥ // 7.041.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīrghikā vividhākārāḥ pūrṇāḥ paramavāriṇā / mahārhamaṇisopānasphaṭikāntarakuṭṭimāḥ // 7.041.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phullapadmotpalavanāś cakravākopaśobhitāḥ / prākārair vividhākāraiḥ śobhitāś ca śilātalaiḥ // 7.041.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra tatra vanoddeśe vaidūryamaṇisaṃnibhaiḥ / śādvalaiḥ paramopetāḥ puṣpitadrumasaṃyutāḥ // 7.041.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nandanaṃ hi yathendrasya brāhmaṃ caitrarathaṃ yathā / tathārūpaṃ hi rāmasya kānanaṃ tan niveśitam // 7.041.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahvāsanagṛhopetāṃ latāgṛhasamāvṛtām / aśokavanikāṃ sphītāṃ praviśya raghunandanaḥ // 7.041.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āsane tu śubhākāre puṣpastabakabhūṣite / kuthāstaraṇasaṃvīte rāmaḥ saṃniṣasāda ha // 7.041.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāṃ saṃgṛhya bāhubhyāṃ madhumaireyam uttamam / pāyayām āsa kākutsthaḥ śacīm indro yathāmṛtam // 7.041.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃsāni ca vicitrāṇi phalāni vividhāni ca / rāmasyābhyavahārārthaṃ kiṃkarās tūrṇam āharan // 7.041.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upanṛtyanti rājānaṃ nṛtyagītaviśāradāḥ / bālāś ca rūpavatyaś ca striyaḥ pānavaśaṃ gatāḥ // 7.041.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ rāmo mudā yuktā sītāṃ surucirānanām / ramayām āsa vaidehīm ahany ahani devavat // 7.041.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tu ramamāṇasya tasyaivaṃ śiśiraḥ śubhaḥ / atyakrāman narendrasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ // 7.041.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvāhṇe paurakṛtyāni kṛtvā dharmeṇa dharmavit / śeṣaṃ divasabhāgārdham antaḥpuragato 'bhavat // 7.041.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītā ca devakāryāṇi kṛtvā paurvāhṇikāni tu / śvaśrūṇām aviśeṣeṇa sarvāsāṃ prāñjaliḥ sthitā // 7.041.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmam upāgacchad vicitrabahubhūṣaṇā / triviṣṭape sahasrākṣam upaviṣṭaṃ yathā śacī // 7.041.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ patnīṃ kalyāṇena samanvitām / praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt // 7.041.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apatyalābho vaidehi mamāyaṃ samupasthitaḥ / kim icchasi hi tad brūhi kaḥ kāmaḥ kriyatāṃ tava // 7.041.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prahasantī tu vaidehī rāmaṃ vākyam athābravīt / tapovanāni puṇyāni draṣṭum icchāmi rāghava // 7.041.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaṅgātīre niviṣṭāni ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām / phalamūlāśināṃ vīra pādamūleṣu vartitum // 7.041.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yan mūlaphalabhojiṣu / apy ekarātraṃ kākutstha vaseyaṃ puṇyaśāliṣu // 7.041.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti ca pratijñātaṃ rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā / visrabdhā bhava vaidehi śvo gamiṣyasy asaṃśayam // 7.041.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu kākutstho maithilīṃ janakātmajām / madhyakakṣāntaraṃ rāmo nirjagāma suhṛdvṛtaḥ // 7.041.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatropaviṣṭaṃ rājānam upāsante vicakṣaṇāḥ / kathānāṃ bahurūpāṇāṃ hāsya kārāḥ samantataḥ // 7.042.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vijayo madhumattaś ca kāśyapaḥ piṅgalaḥ kuśaḥ / surājiḥ kāliyo bhadro dantavakraḥ samāgadhaḥ // 7.042.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete kathā bahuvidhā parihāsasamanvitāḥ / kathayanti sma saṃhṛṣṭā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ // 7.042.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāṃ cid rāghavaḥ samabhāṣata / kāḥ kathā nagare bhadra vartante viṣayeṣu ca // 7.042.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mām āśritāni kāny āhuḥ paurajānapadā janāḥ / kiṃ ca sītāṃ samāśritya bharataṃ kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇam // 7.042.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu śatrughnam āśritya kaikeyīṃ mātaraṃ ca me / vaktavyatāṃ ca rājāno nave rājye vrajanti hi // 7.042.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukte tu rāmeṇa bhadraḥ prāñjalir abravīt / sthitāḥ kathāḥ śubhā rājan vartante puravāsinām // 7.042.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ tu vijayaḥ saumya daśagrīvavadhāśritaḥ / bhūyiṣṭhaṃ svapure pauraiḥ kathyate puruṣarṣabha // 7.042.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu bhadreṇa rāghavo vākyam abravīt / kathayasva yathā tathyaṃ sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ // 7.042.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śubhāśubhāni vākyāni yāny āhuḥ puravāsinaḥ / śrutvedānīṃ śubhaṃ kuryāṃ na kuryām aśubhāni ca // 7.042.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathayasva ca visrabdho nirbhayo vigatajvaraḥ / kathayante yathā paurā janā janapadeṣu ca // 7.042.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu bhadraḥ suruciraṃ vacaḥ / pratyuvāca mahābāhuṃ prāñjaliḥ susamāhitaḥ // 7.042.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṇu rājan yathā paurāḥ kathayanti śubhāśubham / catvarāpaṇarathyāsu vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca // 7.042.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duṣkaraṃ kṛtavān rāmaḥ samudre setubandhanam / akṛtaṃ pūrvakaiḥ kaiś cid devair api sadānavaiḥ // 7.042.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāvaṇaś ca durādharṣo hataḥ sabalavāhanaḥ / vānarāś ca vaśaṃ nītā ṛṣkāś ca saha rākṣasaiḥ // 7.042.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatvā ca rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe sītām āhṛtya rāghavaḥ / amarṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā svaveśma punar ānayat // 7.042.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kīdṛśaṃ hṛdaye tasya sītāsaṃbhogajaṃ sukham / aṅkam āropya hi purā rāvaṇena balād dhṛtām // 7.042.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
laṅkām api punar nītām aśokavanikāṃ gatām / rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannāṃ kathaṃ rāmo na kutsate // 7.042.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmākam api dāreṣu sahanīyaṃ bhaviṣyati / yathā hi kurute rājā prajā tam anuvartate // 7.042.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bahuvidhā vāco vadanti puravāsinaḥ / nagareṣu ca sarveṣu rājañ janapadeṣu ca // 7.042.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaitad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāghavaḥ paramārtavat / uvāca sarvān suhṛdaḥ katham etan nivedyatām // 7.042.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve tu śirasā bhūmāv abhivādya praṇamya ca / pratyūcū rāghavaṃ dīnam evam etan na saṃśayaḥ // 7.042.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu vākyaṃ kākutsthaḥ sarveṣāṃ samudīritam / visarjayām āsa tadā sarvāṃs tāñ śatrutāpanaḥ // 7.042.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visṛjya tu suhṛdvargaṃ buddhyā niścitya rāghavaḥ / samīpe dvāḥstham āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 7.043.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghram ānaya saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam / bharataṃ ca mahābāhuṃ śatrughnaṃ cāparājitam // 7.043.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ / lakṣmaṇasya gṛhaṃ gatva praviveśānivāritaḥ // 7.043.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca ca tadā vākyaṃ vardhayitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ / draṣṭum icchasi rājā tvāṃ gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // 7.043.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāḍham ity eva saumitriḥ śrutvā rāghava śāsanam / prādravad ratham āruhya rāghavasya niveśanam // 7.043.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prayāntaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā dvāḥstho bharatam antikāt / uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati // 7.043.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatas tu vacaḥ śrutvā dvāḥsthād rāmasamīritam / utpapātāsanāt tūrṇaṃ padbhyām eva tato 'gamat // 7.043.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā prayāntaṃ bharataṃ tvaramāṇaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ / śatrughnabhavanaṃ gatvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha // 7.043.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ehy āgaccha raghuśreṣṭha rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati / gato hi lakṣmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ bharataś ca mahāyaśāḥ // 7.043.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya śatrughno rāmaśāsanam / śirasā vandya dharaṇīṃ prayayau yatra rāghavaḥ // 7.043.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kumārān āgatāñ śrutvā cintāvyākulitendriyaḥ / avākśirā dīnamanā dvāḥsthaṃ vacanam abravīt // 7.043.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praveśaya kumārāṃs tvaṃ matsamīpaṃ tvarānvitaḥ / eteṣu jīvitaṃ mahyam ete prāṇā bahiścarāḥ // 7.043.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ājñaptās tu narendreṇa kumārāḥ śuklavāsasaḥ / prahvāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā viviśus te samāhitāḥ // 7.043.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ tasya sagrahaṃ śaśinaṃ yathā / saṃdhyāgatam ivādityaṃ prabhayā parivarjitam // 7.043.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāṣpapūrṇe ca nayane dṛṣṭva rāmasya dhīmataḥ / hataśobhāṃ yathā padmaṃ mukhaṃ vīkṣya ca tasya te // 7.043.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bhivādya tvaritāḥ pādau rāmasya mūrdhabhiḥ / tasthuḥ samāhitāḥ sarve rāmaś cāśrūṇy avartayat // 7.043.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān pariṣvajya bāhubhyām utthāpya ca mahābhujaḥ / āsaneṣv ādhvam ity uktvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha // 7.043.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavanto mama sarvasvaṃ bhavanto mama jīvitam / bhavadbhiś ca kṛtaṃ rājyaṃ pālayāmi nareśvarāḥ // 7.043.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhavantaḥ kṛtaśāstrārthā buddhau ca pariniṣṭhitāḥ / saṃbhūya ca madartho 'yam anveṣṭavyo nareśvarāḥ // 7.043.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dīnacetasām / uvāca vākyaṃ kākutstho mukhena pariśuṣyatā // 7.044.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve śṛṇuta bhadraṃ vo mā kurudhvaṃ mano 'nyathā / paurāṇāṃ mama sītāyāṃ yādṛśī vartate kathā // 7.044.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paurāpavādaḥ sumahāṃs tathā janapadasya ca / vartate mayi bībhatsaḥ sa me marmāṇi kṛntati // 7.044.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ kila kule jata ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām / sītāṃ pāpasamācārām ānayeyaṃ kathaṃ pure // 7.044.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānāsi hi yathā saumya daṇḍake vijane vane / rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā sa ca vidhvaṃsito mayā // 7.044.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyakṣaṃ tava saumitre devanāṃ havyavāhanaḥ / apāpāṃ maithilīm āha vāyuś cākāśagocaraḥ // 7.044.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candrādityau ca śaṃsete surāṇāṃ saṃnidhau purā / ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva sarveṣām apāpāṃ janakātmajām // 7.044.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ śuddha samācārā devagandharvasaṃnidhau / laṅkādvīpe mahendreṇa mama haste niveśitā // 7.044.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarātmā ca me vetti sītāṃ śuddhāṃ yaśasvinīm / tato gṛhītvā vaidehīm ayodhyām aham āgataḥ // 7.044.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ tu me mahān vādaḥ śokaś ca hṛdi vartate / paurāpavādaḥ sumahāṃs tathā janapadasya ca // 7.044.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akīrtir yasya gīyeta loke bhūtasya kasya cit / pataty evādhamāṃl lokān yāvac chabdaḥ sa kīrtyate // 7.044.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akīrtir nindyate daivaiḥ kīrtir deveṣu pūjyate / kīrtyarthaṃ ca samārambhaḥ sarva eva mahātmanām // 7.044.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ yuṣmān vā puruṣarṣabhāḥ / apavādabhayād bhītāḥ kiṃ punar janakātmajām // 7.044.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād bhavantaḥ paśyantu patitaṃ śokasāgare / na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ bhūyaḥ kiṃ cid duḥkham ato 'dhikam // 7.044.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvas tvaṃ prabhāte saumitre sumantrādhiṣṭhitaṃ ratham / āruhya sītām āropya viṣayānte samutsṛja // 7.044.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaṅgāyās tu pare pāre vālmīkeḥ sumahātmanaḥ / āśramo divyasaṃkāśas tamasātīram āśritaḥ // 7.044.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatraināṃ vijane kakṣe visṛjya raghunandana / śīghram āgaccha saumitre kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama // 7.044.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cāsmi prativaktavyaḥ sītāṃ prati kathaṃ cana / aprītiḥ paramā mahyaṃ bhavet tu prativārite // 7.044.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāpitāś ca mayā yūyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ jīvitena ca / ye māṃ vākyāntare brūyur anunetuṃ kathaṃ cana // 7.044.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānayantu bhavanto māṃ yadi macchāsane sthitāḥ / ito 'dya nīyatāṃ sītā kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama // 7.044.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvam ukto 'ham anayā gaṅgātīre mahāśramān / paśyeyam iti tasyāś ca kāmaḥ saṃvartyatām ayam // 7.044.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu kākutstho bāṣpeṇa pihitekṣaṇaḥ / praviveśa sa dharmātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ // 7.044.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ / sumantram abravīd vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā // 7.045.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sārathe turagāñ śīghraṃ yojayasva rathottame / svāstīrṇaṃ rājabhavanāt sītāyāś cāsanaṃ śubham // 7.045.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītā hi rājabhavanād āśramaṃ puṇyakarmaṇām / mayā netā maharṣīṇāṃ śīghram ānīyatāṃ rathaḥ // 7.045.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantras tu tathety uktvā yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ / rathaṃ suruciraprakhyaṃ svāstīrṇaṃ sukhaśayyayā // 7.045.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādāyovāca saumitriṃ mitrāṇāṃ harṣavardhanam / ratho 'yaṃ samanuprāpto yat kāryaṃ kriyatāṃ prabho // 7.045.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktaḥ sumantreṇa rājaveśma sa lakṣmaṇaḥ / praviśya sītām āsādya vyājahāra nararṣabhaḥ // 7.045.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaṅgātīre mayā devi munīnām āśrame śubhe / śīghraṃ gatvopaneyāsi śāsanāt pārthivasya naḥ // 7.045.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktā tu vaidehī lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā / praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe gamanaṃ cābhyarocayat // 7.045.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca / gṛhītvā tāni vaidehī gamanāyopacakrame // 7.045.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāni munipatnīnāṃ dāsyāmy ābharaṇāny aham / saumitris tu tathety uktvā ratham āropya maithilīm // 7.045.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prayayau śīghraturago rāmasyājñām anusmaran // 7.045.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca tadā sītā lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam / aśubhāni bahūny adya paśyāmi raghunandana // 7.045.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nayanaṃ me sphuraty adya gātrotkampaś ca jāyate / hṛdayaṃ caiva saumitre asvastham iva lakṣaye // 7.045.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
autsukyaṃ paramaṃ cāpi adhṛtiś ca parā mama / śūnyām iva ca paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ pṛthulocana // 7.045.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
api svasti bhavet tasya bhrātus te bhrātṛbhiḥ saha / śvaśrūṇāṃ caiva me vīra sarvāsām aviśeṣataḥ // 7.045.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pure janapade caiva kuśalaṃ prāṇinām api / ity añjalikṛtā sītā devatā abhyayācata // 7.045.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇo 'rthaṃ tu taṃ śrutvā śirasā vandya maithilīm / śivam ity abravīd dhṛṣṭo hṛdayena viśuṣyatā // 7.045.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vāsam upāgamya gomatītīra āśrame / prabhāte punar utthāya saumitriḥ sūtam abravīt // 7.045.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yojayasva rathaṃ śīghram adya bhāgīrathī jalam / śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi tryambakaḥ parvate yathā // 7.045.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'śvān vicārayitvāśu rathe yuktvā manojavān / ārohasveti vaidehīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // 7.045.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tu sūtasya vacanād āruroha rathottamam / sītā saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sumitreṇa ca dhīmatā // 7.045.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athārdhadivasaṃ gatvā bhāgīrathyā jalāśayam / nirīkṣya lakṣmaṇo dīnaḥ praruroda mahāsvanam // 7.045.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītā tu paramāyattā dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam āturam / uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajña kim idaṃ rudyate tvayā // 7.045.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jāhvanī tīram āsādya cirābhilaṣitaṃ mama / harṣakāle kim arthaṃ māṃ viṣādayasi lakṣmaṇa // 7.045.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nityaṃ tvaṃ rāmapādeṣu vartase puruṣarṣabha / kaccid vinā kṛtas tena dvirātre śokam āgataḥ // 7.045.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamāpi dayito rāmo jīvitenāpi lakṣmaṇa / na cāham evaṃ śocāmi maivaṃ tvaṃ bāliśo bhava // 7.045.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tārayasva ca māṃ gaṅgāṃ darśayasva ca tāpasān / tato dhanāni vāsāṃsi dāsyāmy ābharaṇāni ca // 7.045.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kṛtvā maharṣīṇāṃ yathārham abhivādanam / tatra caikāṃ niśām uṣya yāsyāmas tāṃ purīṃ punaḥ // 7.045.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pramṛjya nayane śubhe / titīrṣur lakṣmaṇo gaṅgāṃ śubhāṃ nāvam upāharat // 7.045.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha nāvaṃ suvistīrṇāṃ naiṣādīṃ rāghavānujaḥ / āruroha samāyuktāṃ pūrvam āropya maithilīm // 7.046.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sumantraṃ caiva sarathaṃ sthīyatām iti lakṣmaṇaḥ / uvāca śokasaṃtaptaḥ prayāhīti ca nāvikam // 7.046.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tīram upāgamya bhāgīrathyāḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ / uvāca maithilīṃ vākyaṃ prāñjalir bāṣpagadgadaḥ // 7.046.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛdgataṃ me mahac chalyaṃ yad asmy āryeṇa dhīmatā / asmin nimitte vaidehi lokasya vacanīkṛtaḥ // 7.046.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śreyo hi maraṇaṃ me 'dya mṛtyor vā yat paraṃ bhavet / na cāsminn īdṛśe kārye niyojyo lokanindite // 7.046.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasīda na ca me roṣaṃ kartum arhasi suvrate / ity añjalikṛto bhūmau nipapāta sa lakṣmaṇaḥ // 7.046.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rudantaṃ prāñjaliṃ dṛṣṭvā kāṅkṣantaṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ / maithilī bhṛśasaṃvignā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt // 7.046.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim idaṃ nāvagacchāmi brūhi tattvena lakṣmaṇa / paśyāmi tvāṃ ca na svatham api kṣemaṃ mahīpateḥ // 7.046.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāpito 'si narendreṇa yat tvaṃ saṃtāpam ātmanaḥ / tad brūyāḥ saṃnidhau mahyam aham ājñāpayāmi te // 7.046.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vaidehyā codyamānas tu lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ / avāṅmukho bāṣpagalo vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.046.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā pariṣado madhye apavādaṃ sudāruṇam / pure janapade caiva tvatkṛte janakātmaje // 7.046.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tāni vacanīyāni mayā devi tavāgrataḥ / yāni rājñā hṛdi nyastāny amarṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtaḥ // 7.046.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā tvāṃ tyaktā nṛpatinā nirdoṣā mama saṃnidhau / paurāpavāda bhītena grāhyaṃ devi na te 'nyathā // 7.046.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśramānteṣu ca mayā tyaktavyā tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi / rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tavaivaṃ kila daurhṛdam // 7.046.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad etaj jāhnavītīre brahmarṣīṇāṃ tapovanam / puṇyaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ śubhe // 7.046.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājño daśarathasyaiṣa pitur me munipuṃgavaḥ / sakhā paramako vipro vālmīkiḥ sumahāyaśāḥ // 7.046.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pādacchāyām upāgamya sukham asya mahātmanaḥ / upavāsaparaikāgrā vasa tvaṃ janakātmaje // 7.046.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pativratātvam āsthāya rāmaṃ kṛtvā sadā hṛdi / śreyas te paramaṃ devi tathā kṛtvā bhaviṣyati // 7.046.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dāruṇaṃ janakātmajā / paraṃ viṣādam āgamya vaidehī nipapāta ha // 7.047.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā muhūrtam ivāsaṃjñā bāṣpavyākulitekṣaṇā / lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnayā vācā uvāca janakātmajā // 7.047.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māmikeyaṃ tanur nūnaṃ sṛṣṭā duḥkhāya lakṣmaṇa / dhātrā yasyās tathā me 'dya duḥkhamūrtiḥ pradṛśyate // 7.047.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ ko vā dārair viyojitaḥ / yāhaṃ śuddha samācārā tyaktā nṛpatinā satī // 7.047.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purāham āśrame vāsaṃ rāmapādānuvartinī / anurudhyāpi saumitre duḥkhe viparivartinī // 7.047.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā kathaṃ hy āśrame saumya vatsyāmi vijanīkṛtā / ākhyāsyāmi ca kasyāhaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaparāyaṇā // 7.047.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ ca vakṣyāmi muniṣu kiṃ mayāpakṛtaṃ nṛpe / kasmin vā kāraṇe tyaktā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā // 7.047.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na khalv adyaiva saumitre jīvitaṃ jāhnavī jale / tyajeyaṃ rājavaṃśas tu bhartur me parihāsyate // 7.047.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathājñāṃ kuru saumitre tyaja māṃ duḥkhabhāginīm / nideśe sthīyatāṃ rājñaḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama // 7.047.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvaśrūṇām aviśeṣeṇa prāñjaliḥ pragraheṇa ca / śirasā vandya caraṇau kuśalaṃ brūhi pārthivam // 7.047.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā bhrātṛṣu vartethās tathā paureṣu nityadā / paramo hy eṣa dharmaḥ syād eṣā kīrtir anuttamā // 7.047.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat tvaṃ paurajanaṃ rājan dharmeṇa samavāpnuyāḥ / ahaṃ tu nānuśocāmi svaśarīraṃ nararṣabha // 7.047.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāpavādaṃ paurāṇāṃ tathaiva raghunandana // 7.047.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvantyāṃ sītāyāṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ / śirasā dharaṇīṃ gatvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha // 7.047.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kṛtvā sa rudann eva mahāsvanam / āruroha punar nāvaṃ nāvikaṃ cābhyacodayat // 7.047.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā cottaraṃ kūlaṃ śokabhārasamanvitaḥ / saṃmūḍha iva duḥkhena ratham adhyāruhad drutam // 7.047.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muhur muhur apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā sītām anāthavat / veṣṭantīṃ paratīrasthāṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayāv atha // 7.047.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūrasthaṃ ratham ālokya lakṣmaṇaṃ ca muhur muhuḥ / nirīkṣamāṇām udvignāṃ sītāṃ śokaḥ samāviśat // 7.047.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā duḥkhabhārāvanatā tapasvinī; yaśodharā nātham apaśyatī satī / ruroda sā barhiṇanādite vane; mahāsvanaṃ duḥkhaparāyaṇā satī // 7.047.018	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
sītāṃ tu rudatīṃ dṛṣṭvā ye tatra munidārakāḥ / prādravan yatra bhagavān āste vālmīkir agryadhīḥ // 7.048.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādya muneḥ pādau muniputrā maharṣaye / sarve nivedayām āsus tasyās tu ruditasvanam // 7.048.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛṣṭapūrvā bhagavan kasyāpy eṣā mahātmanaḥ / patnī śrīr iva saṃmohād virauti vikṛtasvarā // 7.048.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan sādhu paśyemāṃ devatām iva khāc cyutām / na hy enāṃ mānuṣīṃ vidmaḥ satkriyāsyāḥ prayujyatām // 7.048.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā buddhyā niścitya dharmavit / tapasā labdhacakṣuṣmān prādravad yatra maithilī // 7.048.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ tu deśam abhipretya kiṃ cit padbhyāṃ mahāmuniḥ / arghyam ādāya ruciraṃ jāhvanī tīram āśritaḥ // 7.048.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadarśa rāghavasyeṣṭāṃ patnīṃ sītām anāthavat // 7.048.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ sitāṃ śokabhārārtāṃ vālmīkir munipuṃgavaḥ / uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ hlādayann iva tejasā // 7.048.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snuṣā daśarāthasya tvaṃ rāmasya mahiṣī satī / janakasya sutā rājñaḥ svāgataṃ te pativrate // 7.048.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyānty evāsi vijñātā mayā dharmasamādhinā / kāraṇaṃ caiva sarvaṃ me hṛdayenopalakṣitam // 7.048.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apāpāṃ vedmi sīte tvāṃ tapo labdhena cakṣuṣā / viśuddhabhāvā vaidehi sāmprataṃ mayi vartase // 7.048.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āśramasyāvidūre me tāpasyas tapasi sthitāḥ / tās tvāṃ vatse yathā vatsaṃ pālayiṣyanti nityaśaḥ // 7.048.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idam arghyaṃ pratīccha tvaṃ visrabdhā vigatajvarā / yathā svagṛham abhyetya viṣādaṃ caiva mā kṛthāḥ // 7.048.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu bhāṣitaṃ sītā muneḥ paramam adbhutam / śirasā vandya caraṇau tathety āha kṛtāñjaliḥ // 7.048.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ prayāntaṃ muniṃ sītā prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt / anvayād yatra tāpasyo dharmanityāḥ samāhitāḥ // 7.048.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dṛṣṭvā munim āyāntaṃ vaidehyānugataṃ tadā / upājagmur mudā yuktā vacanaṃ caidam abruvan // 7.048.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svāgataṃ te muniśreṣṭha cirasyāgamanaṃ prabho / abhivādayāmaḥ sarvās tvām ucyatāṃ kiṃ ca kurmahe // 7.048.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vālmīkir idam abravīt / sīteyaṃ samanuprāptā patnī rāmasya dhīmataḥ // 7.048.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snuṣā daśaradhasyaiṣā janakasya sutā satī / apāpā patinā tyaktā paripālyā mayā sadā // 7.048.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ bhavatyaḥ paśyantu snehena parameṇa ha / gauravān mama vākyasya pūjyā vo 'stu viśeṣataḥ // 7.048.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muhur muhuś ca vaidehīṃ parisāntvya mahāyaśāḥ / svam āśramaṃ śiṣya vṛtaḥ punar āyān mahātapāḥ // 7.048.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā tu maithilīṃ sītām āśramaṃ saṃraveśitām / saṃtāpam akarod ghoraṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ // 7.049.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca mahātejāḥ sumantraṃ mantrasārathim / sītāsaṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ paśya rāmasya dhīmataḥ // 7.049.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu rāghavasya bhaviṣyati / patnīṃ śuddhasamācārāṃ visṛjya janakātmajām // 7.049.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vyaktaṃ daivād ahaṃ manye rāghavasya vinā bhavam / vaidehyā sārathe sārdhaṃ daivaṃ hi duratikramam // 7.049.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo hi devān sagandharvān asurān saha rākṣasaiḥ / nihanyād rāghavaḥ kruddhaḥ sa daivam anuvartate // 7.049.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā mama pitur vākyair daṇḍake vijane vane / uṣito navavarṣāṇi pañca caiva sudāruṇe // 7.049.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato duḥkhataraṃ bhūyaḥ sītāyā vipravāsanam / paurāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā nṛśaṃsaṃ pratibhāti me // 7.049.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko nu dharmāśrayaḥ sūta karmaṇy asmin yaśohare / maithilīṃ prati saṃprāptaḥ paurair hīnārthavādibhiḥ // 7.049.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etā bahuvidhā vācaḥ śrutvā lakṣmaṇabhāṣitāḥ / sumantraḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.049.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ saumitre maithilīṃ prati / dṛṣṭam etat purā vipraiḥ pitus te lakṣmaṇāgrataḥ // 7.049.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhaviṣyati dṛḍhaṃ rāmo duḥkhaprāyo 'lpasukhyavān / tvāṃ caiva maithilīṃ caiva śatrughnabharatau tathā // 7.049.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃtyajiṣyati dharmātmā kālena mahatā mahān // 7.049.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tv idaṃ tvayi vaktavyaṃ saumitre bharate 'pi vā / rājñā vo 'vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ durvāsā yad uvāca ha // 7.049.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahārājasamīpe ca mama caiva nararṣabha / ṛṣiṇā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃnidhau // 7.049.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā mām āha puruṣarṣabhaḥ / sūta na kva cid evaṃ te vaktavyaṃ janasaṃnidhau // 7.049.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāhaṃ lokapālasya vākyaṃ tat susamāhitaḥ / naiva jātv anṛtaṃ kuryām iti me saumya darśanam // 7.049.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvathā nāsty avaktavyaṃ mayā saumya tavāgrataḥ / yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā śrūyatāṃ raghunandana // 7.049.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady apy ahaṃ narendreṇa rahasyaṃ śrāvitaḥ purā / tac cāpy udāhariṣyāmi daivaṃ hi duratikramam // 7.049.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya gambhīrārthapadaṃ mahat / tathyaṃ brūhīti saumitriḥ sūtaṃ vākyam athābravīt // 7.049.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā saṃcoditaḥ sūto lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā / tad vākyam ṛṣiṇā proktaṃ vyāhartum upacakrame // 7.050.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā nāmnā hi durvāsā atreḥ putro mahāmuniḥ / vasiṣṭhasyāśrame puṇye sa vārṣikyam uvāsa ha // 7.050.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam āśramaṃ mahātejāḥ pitā te sumahāyaśāḥ / purodhasaṃ mahātmānaṃ didṛkṣur agamat svayam // 7.050.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā sūryasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā / upaviṣṭaṃ vasiṣṭhasya savye pārśve mahāmunim // 7.050.004.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau munī tāpasa śreṣṭhau vinītas tv abhyavādayat // 7.050.004.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tābhyāṃ pūjito rājā svāgatenāsanena ca / pādyena phalamūlaiś ca so 'py āste munibhiḥ saha // 7.050.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tatropaviṣṭānāṃ tās tāḥ sumadhurāḥ kathāḥ / babhūvuḥ paramarṣīṇāṃ madhyādityagate 'hani // 7.050.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāṃ cit prāñjaliḥ pragraho nṛpaḥ / uvāca taṃ mahātmānam atreḥ putraṃ tapodhanam // 7.050.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan kiṃ pramāṇena mama vaṃśo bhaviṣyati / kimāyuś ca hi me rāmaḥ putrāś cānye kimāyuṣaḥ // 7.050.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya ca sutā ye syus teṣām āyuḥ kiyad bhavet / kāmyayā bhagavan brūhi vaṃśasyāsya gatiṃ mama // 7.050.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rājño daśarathasya tu / durvāsāḥ sumahātejā vyāhartum upacakrame // 7.050.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyāyāḥ patī rāmo dīrghakālaṃ bhaviṣyati / sukhinaś ca samṛddhāś ca bhaviṣyanty asya cānujāḥ // 7.050.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasmiṃś cit karaṇe tvāṃ ca maithilīṃ ca yaśasvinīm / saṃtyajiṣyati dharmātmā kālena mahatā kila // 7.050.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśavarṣasahasraṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca / rāmo rājyam upāsitvā brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati // 7.050.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samṛddhair hayamedhaiś ca iṣṭvā parapuraṃjayaḥ / rājavaṃśāṃś ca kākutstho bahūn saṃsthāpayiṣyati // 7.050.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa sarvam akhilaṃ rājño vaṃśasyāsya gatāgatam / ākhyāya sumahātejās tūṣṇīm āsīn mahādyutiḥ // 7.050.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tūṣṇīṃbhūte munau tasmin rājā daśarathas tadā / abhivādya mahātmānau punar āyāt purottamam // 7.050.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad vaco mayā tatra muninā vyāhṛtaṃ purā / śrutaṃ hṛdi ca nikṣiptaṃ nānyathā tad bhaviṣyati // 7.050.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃgate na saṃtāpaṃ gantum arhasi rāghava / sītārthe rāghavārthe vā dṛḍho bhava narottama // 7.050.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ sūtasya paramādbhutam / praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt // 7.050.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ sūtalakṣmaṇayoḥ pathi / astam arko gato vāsaṃ gomatyāṃ tāv athoṣatuḥ // 7.050.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra tāṃ rajanīm uṣya gomatyāṃ raghunandanaḥ / prabhāte punar utthāya lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayau tadā // 7.051.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'rdhadivase prāpte praviveśa mahārathaḥ / ayodhyāṃ ratnasaṃpūrṇāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtām // 7.051.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitris tu paraṃ dainyaṃ jagāma sumahāmatiḥ / rāmapādau samāsādya vakṣyāmi kim ahaṃ gataḥ // 7.051.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaivaṃ cintayānasya bhavanaṃ śaśisaṃnibham / rājasya paramodāraṃ purastāt samadṛśyata // 7.051.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājñas tu bhavanadvāri so 'vatīrya narottamaḥ / avānmukho dīnamanāḥ prāviveśānivāritaḥ // 7.051.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavaṃ dīnam āsīnaṃ paramāsane / netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ dadarśāgrajam agrataḥ // 7.051.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jagrāha caraṇau tasya lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ / uvāca dīnayā vācā prāñjaliḥ susamāhitaḥ // 7.051.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āryasyājñāṃ puraskṛtya visṛjya janakātmajām / gaṅgātīre yathoddiṣṭe vālmīker āśrame śubhe // 7.051.008.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
punar asmy āgato vīra pādamūlam upāsitum // 7.051.008.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā śucaḥ puruṣavyāghra kālasya gatir īdṛśī / tvadvidhā na hi śocanti sattvavanto manasvinaḥ // 7.051.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ / saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam // 7.051.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaktas tvam ātmanātmānaṃ vijetuṃ manasaiva hi / lokān sarvāṃś ca kākutstha kiṃ punar duḥkham īdṛśam // 7.051.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nedṛśeṣu vimuhyanti tvadvidhāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ / yadarthaṃ maithilī tyaktā apavādabhayān nṛpa // 7.051.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla dhairyeṇa susamāhitaḥ / tyajemāṃ durbalāṃ buddhiṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kuruṣva ha // 7.051.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu kākutstho lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā / uvāca parayā prītyā saumitriṃ mitravatsalam // 7.051.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam etan naraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa / paritoṣaś ca me vīra mama kāryānuśāsane // 7.051.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirvṛtiś ca kṛtā saumya saṃtāpaś ca nirākṛtaḥ / bhavadvākyaiḥ sumadhurair anunīto 'smi lakṣmaṇa // 7.051.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sumantras tv āgamya rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt / ete nivāritā rājan dvāri tiṣṭhanti tāpasāḥ // 7.052.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhārgavaṃ cyavanaṃ nāma puraskṛtya maharṣayaḥ / darśanaṃ te mahārāja codayanti kṛtatvarāḥ // 7.052.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prīyamāṇā naravyāghra yamunātīravāsinaḥ // 7.052.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāmaḥ provāca dharmavit / praveśyantāṃ mahātmāno bhārgavapramukhā dvijāḥ // 7.052.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājñas tv ājñāṃ puraskṛtya dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ / praveśayām āsa tatas tāpasān saṃmatān bahūn // 7.052.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śataṃ samadhikaṃ tatra dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā / praviṣṭaṃ rājabhavanaṃ tāpasānāṃ mahātmanām // 7.052.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te dvijāḥ pūrṇakalaśaiḥ sarvatīrthāmbusatkṛtam / gṛhītvā phalamūlaṃ ca rāmasyābhyāharan bahu // 7.052.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya tu tat sarvaṃ rāmaḥ prītipuraskṛtaḥ / tīrthodakāni sarvāṇi phalāni vividhāni ca // 7.052.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca ca mahābāhuḥ sarvān eva mahāmunīn / imāny āsanamukhyāni yathārham upaviśyatām // 7.052.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā sarva eva maharṣayaḥ / bṛsīṣu rucirākhyāsu niṣeduḥ kāñcanīṣu te // 7.052.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upaviṣṭān ṛṣīṃs tatra dṛṣṭvā parapuraṃjayaḥ / prayataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā rāghavo vākyam abravīt // 7.052.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim āgamanakaryaṃ vaḥ kiṃ karomi tapodhanāḥ / ājñāpyo 'haṃ maharṣīṇāṃ sarvakāmakaraḥ sukham // 7.052.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ rājyaṃ ca sakalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca hṛdi sthitam / sarvam etad dvijārthaṃ me satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ // 7.052.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sādhuvādo mahān abhūt / ṛṣīṇām ugratapasāṃ yamunātīravāsinām // 7.052.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūcuś ca te mahātmāno harṣeṇa mahatānvitāḥ / upapannaṃ naraśreṣṭha tavaiva bhuvi nānyataḥ // 7.052.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahavaḥ pārthivā rājann atikrāntā mahābalāḥ / kāryagauravam aśrutvā pratijñāṃ nābhyarocayan // 7.052.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā punar brāhmaṇa gauravād iyaṃ; kṛtvā pratijñā hy anavekṣya kāraṇam / kuruṣva kartā hy asi nātra saṃśayo; mahābhayāt trātum ṛṣīṃs tvam arhasi // 7.052.016	upajāti (jagatī: indravaṃśā [ttjr], vaṃśastha [jtjr]) atha vā vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
bruvadbhir evam ṛṣibhiḥ kākutstho vākyam abravīt / kiṃ kāryaṃ brūta bhavatāṃ bhayaṃ nāśayitāsmi vaḥ // 7.053.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā vadati kākutsthe bhargavo vākyam abravīt / bhayaṃ naḥ śṛṇu yan mūlaṃ deśasya ca nareśvara // 7.053.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge rāma daiteyaḥ sumahābalaḥ / lolāputro 'bhavaj jyeṣṭho madhur nāma mahāsuraḥ // 7.053.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ / suraiś ca paramodāraiḥ prītis tasyātulābhavat // 7.053.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa madhur vīryasaṃpanno dharme ca susamāhitaḥ / bahumānāc ca rudreṇa dattas tasyādbhuto varaḥ // 7.053.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūlaṃ śūlād viniṣkṛṣya mahāvīryaṃ mahāprabham / dadau mahātmā suprīto vākayṃ caitad uvāca ha // 7.053.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayāyam atulo dharmo matprasādāt kṛtaḥ śubhaḥ / prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmy āyudham uttamam // 7.053.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvat suraiś ca vipraiś ca na virudhyer mahāsura / tāvac chūlaṃ tavedaṃ syād anyathā nāśam āpnuyāt // 7.053.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaś ca tvām abhiyuñjīta yuddhāya vigatajvaraḥ / taṃ śūlaṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā punar eṣyati te karam // 7.053.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ rudrād varaṃ labdhvā bhūya eva mahāsuraḥ / praṇipatya mahādevaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.053.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan mama vaṃśasya śūlam etad anuttamam / bhavet tu satataṃ deva surāṇām īśvaro hy asi // 7.053.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ bruvāṇaṃ madhuṃ devaḥ sarvabhūtapatiḥ śivaḥ / pratyuvāca mahādevo naitad evaṃ bhaviṣyati // 7.053.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mā bhūt te viphalā bāṇī matprāsādakṛtā śubhā / bhavataḥ putram ekaṃ tu śūlam etad gamiṣyati // 7.053.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvat karasthaḥ śūlo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati sutasya te / avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ śūlahasto bhaviṣyati // 7.053.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ madhuvaraṃ labdhvā devāt sumahad adbhutam / bhavanaṃ cāsuraśreṣṭhaḥ kārayām āsa suprabham // 7.053.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya patnī mahābhagā priyā kumbhīnasī hi yā / viśvāsayor apatyaṃ sā hy analāyāṃ mahāprabhā // 7.053.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāḥ putro mahāvīryo lavaṇo nāma dāruṇaḥ / bālyāt prabhṛti duṣṭātmā pāpāny eva samācarat // 7.053.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ putraṃ durvinītaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā duḥkhasamanvitaḥ / madhuḥ sa śokam āpede na cainaṃ kiṃ cid abravīt // 7.053.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa vihāya imaṃ lokaṃ praviṣṭo varuṇālayam / śūlaṃ niveśya lavaṇe varaṃ tasmai nyavedayat // 7.053.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa prabhāvena śūlasya daurātmyenātmanas tathā / saṃtāpayati lokāṃs trīn viśeṣeṇa tu tāpasān // 7.053.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃprabhāvo lavaṇaḥ śūlaṃ caiva tathāvidham / śrutvā pramāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ // 7.053.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahavaḥ pārthivā rāma bhayārtair ṛṣibhiḥ purā / abhayaṃ yācitā vīra trātāraṃ na ca vidmahe // 7.053.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te vayaṃ rāvaṇaṃ śrutvā hataṃ sabalavāhanam / trātāraṃ vidmahe rāma nānyaṃ bhuvi narādhipam // 7.053.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat paritrātum icchāmo lavaṇād bhayapīḍitāḥ // 7.053.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathokte tān ṛṣīn rāmaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ / kimāhāraḥ kimācāro lavaṇaḥ kva ca vartate // 7.054.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣayaḥ sarva eva te / tato nivedayām āsur lavaṇo vavṛdhe yathā // 7.054.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āhāraḥ sarvasattvāni viśeṣeṇa ca tāpasāḥ / ācāro raudratā nityaṃ vāso madhuvane sadā // 7.054.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatvā daśasahasrāṇi siṃhavyāghramṛgadvipān / mānuṣāṃś caiva kurute nityam āhāram āhnikam // 7.054.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'parāṇi sattvāni khādate sa mahābalaḥ / saṃhāre samanuprāpte vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ // 7.054.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā rāghavo vākyam uvāca sa mahāmunīn / ghātayiṣyāmi tad rakṣo vyapagacchatu vo bhayam // 7.054.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā teṣāṃ pratijñāya munīnām ugratejasām / sa bhrātṝn sahitān sarvān uvāca raghunandanaḥ // 7.054.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko hantā lavaṇaṃ vīrāḥ kasyāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām / bharatasya mahābāhoḥ śatrughnasyāthavā punaḥ // 7.054.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu bharato vākyam abravīt / aham enaṃ badhiṣyāmi mamāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām // 7.054.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā śauryavīryasamanvitam / lakṣmaṇāvarajas tasthau hitvā sauvarṇam āsanam // 7.054.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughnas tv abravīd vākyaṃ praṇipatya narādhipam / kṛtakarmā mahābāhur madhyamo raghunandanaḥ // 7.054.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āryeṇa hi purā śūnyā ayodhyā rakṣitā purī / saṃtāpaṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā āryasyāgamanaṃ prati // 7.054.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duḥkhāni ca bahūnīha anubhūtāni pārthiva / śayāno duḥkhaśayyāsu nandigrāme mahātmanā // 7.054.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
phalamūlāśano bhūtvā jaṭācīradharas tathā / anubhūyedṛśaṃ duḥkham eṣa rāghavanandanaḥ // 7.054.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
preṣye mayi sthite rājan na bhūyaḥ kleśam āpnuyāt // 7.054.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā bruvati śatrughne rāghavaḥ punar abravīt / evaṃ bhavatu kākutstha kriyatāṃ mama śāsanam // 7.054.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājye tvām abhiṣekṣyāmi maghos tu nagare śubhe / niveśaya mahābāho bharataṃ yady avekṣase // 7.054.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūras tvaṃ kṛtavidyaś ca samarthaḥ saṃniveśane / nagaraṃ madhunā juṣṭaṃ tathā janapadāñ śubhān // 7.054.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo hi vaṃśaṃ samutpāṭya pārthivasya punaḥ kṣaye / na vidhatte nṛpaṃ tatra narakaṃ sa nigacchati // 7.054.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ hatvā madhusutaṃ lavaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam / rājyaṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa vākyaṃ me yady avekṣase // 7.054.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttaraṃ ca na vaktavyaṃ śūra vākyāntare mama / bālena pūrvajasyājñā kartavyā nātra saṃśayaḥ // 7.054.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣekaṃ ca kākutstha pratīcchasva mayodyatam / vasiṣṭhapramukhair viprair vidhimantrapuraskṛtam // 7.054.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa parāṃ vrīḍām upāgataḥ / śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha // 7.055.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca śāsanaṃ puruṣarṣabha / tava caiva mahābhāga śāsanaṃ duratikramam // 7.055.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ kāmakaro rājaṃs tavāsmi puruṣarṣabha // 7.055.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukte tu śūreṇa śatrughnena mahātmanā / uvāca rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ tathā // 7.055.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃbhārān abhiṣekasya ānayadhvaṃ samāhitāḥ / adyaiva puruṣavyāghram abhiṣekṣyāmi durjayam // 7.055.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purodhasaṃ ca kākutsthau naigamān ṛtvijas tathā / mantriṇaś caiva me sarvān ānayadhvaṃ mamājñayā // 7.055.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tathākurvan mahārathaḥ / abhiṣekasamārambhaṃ puraskṛtya purodhasaṃ // 7.055.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praviṣṭā rājabhavanaṃ puraṃdara gṛhopamam // 7.055.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bhiṣeko vavṛdhe śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ / saṃpraharṣakaraḥ śrīmān rāghavasya purasya ca // 7.055.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ śatrughnam aṅkam āropya rāghavaḥ / uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tejas tasyābhipūrayan // 7.055.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ śaras tv amoghas te divyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ / anena lavaṇaṃ saumya hantāsi raghunandana // 7.055.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sṛṣṭaḥ śaro 'yaṃ kākutstha yadā śete mahārṇave / svayambhūr ajito devo yaṃ nāpaśyan surāsurāḥ // 7.055.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tenāyaṃ hi śarottamaḥ / sṛṣṭaḥ krodhābhibhūtena vināśārthaṃ durātmanoḥ // 7.055.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madhukauṭabhayor vīra vighāte vartamānayoḥ // 7.055.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sraṣṭukāmena lokāṃs trīṃs tau cānena hatau yudhi / anena śaramukhyena tato lokāṃś cakāra saḥ // 7.055.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāyaṃ mayā śaraḥ pūrvaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhārthinā / mukhaḥ śatrughna bhūtānāṃ mahāṃs trāso bhaved iti // 7.055.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yac ca tasya mahac chūlaṃ tryambakeṇa mahātmanā / dattaṃ śatruvināśāya madhor āyudham uttamam // 7.055.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat saṃnikṣipya bhavane pūjyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ / diśaḥ sarvāḥ samālokya prāpnoty āhāram ātmanaḥ // 7.055.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā tu yuddham ākāṅkṣan kaś cid enaṃ samāhvayet / tadā śūlaṃ gṛhītvā tad bhasma rakṣaḥ karoti tam // 7.055.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla tam āyudhavivarjitam / apraviṣṭapuraṃ pūrvaṃ dvāri tiṣṭha dhṛtāyudhaḥ // 7.055.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apraviṣṭaṃ ca bhavanaṃ yuddhāya puruṣarṣabha / āhvayethā mahābāho tato hantāsi rākṣasaṃ // 7.055.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyathā kriyamāṇe tu avadhyaḥ sa bhaviṣyati / yadi tv evaṃ kṛte vīra vināśam upayāsyati // 7.055.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ śūlasya ca viparyayam / śrīmataḥ śitikaṇṭhasya kṛtyaṃ hi duratikramam // 7.055.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ / punar evāparaṃ vākyam uvāca raghunandanaḥ // 7.056.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāny aśvasahasrāṇi catvāri puruṣarṣabha / rathānāṃ ca sahasre dve gajānāṃ śatam eva ca // 7.056.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarāpaṇavīthyaś ca nānāpaṇyopaśobhitāḥ / anugacchantu śatrughna tathaiva naṭanartakāḥ // 7.056.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hiraṇyasya suvarṇasya ayutaṃ puruṣarṣabha / gṛhītvā gaccha śatrughna paryāptadhanavāhanaḥ // 7.056.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
balaṃ ca subhṛtaṃ vīra hṛṣṭapuṣṭam anuttamam / saṃbhāṣya saṃpradānena rañjayasva narottama // 7.056.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hy arthās tatra tiṣṭhanti na dārā na ca bāndhavāḥ / suprīto bhṛtyavargas tu yatra tiṣṭhati rāghava // 7.056.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ato hṛṣṭajanākīrṇāṃ prasthāpya mahatīṃ camūm / eka eva dhanuṣpānis tad gaccha tvaṃ madhor vanam // 7.056.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā tvāṃ na prajānāti gacchantaṃ yuddhakāṅkṣiṇam / lavaṇas tu madhoḥ putras tathā gaccher aśaṅkitaḥ // 7.056.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tasya mṛtyur anyo 'sti kaścid dhi puruṣarṣabha / darśanaṃ yo 'bhigaccheta sa vadhyo lavaṇena hi // 7.056.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa grīṣme vyapayāte tu varṣarātra upasthite / hanyās tvaṃ lavaṇaṃ saumya sa hi kālo 'sya durmateḥ // 7.056.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
maharṣīṃs tu puraskṛtya prayāntu tava sainikāḥ / yathā grīṣmāvaśeṣeṇa tareyur jāhnavījalam // 7.056.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sthāpya balaṃ sarvaṃ nadītīre samāhitaḥ / agrato dhanuṣā sārdhaṃ gaccha tvaṃ laghuvikrama // 7.056.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu rāmeṇa śatrughnas tān mahābalān / senāmukhyān samānīya tato vākyam uvāca ha // 7.056.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete vo gaṇitā vāsā yatra yatra nivatsyatha / sthātavyaṃ cāvirodhena yathā bādhā na kasya cit // 7.056.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tāṃs tu samājñāpya niryāpya ca mahad balam / kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaukeyīṃ cābhyavādayat // 7.056.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca / rāṇeṇa cābhyanujñātaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ // 7.056.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ caiva praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ / purodhasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ prayatātmavān // 7.056.017.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pradakṣiṇam atho kṛtvā nirjagāma mahābalaḥ // 7.056.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasthāpya tad balaṃ sarvaṃ māsamātroṣitaḥ pathi / eka evāśu śatrughno jagāma tvaritas tadā // 7.057.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvirātram antare śūra uṣya rāghavanandanaḥ / vālmīker āśramaṃ puṇyam agacchad vāsam uttamam // 7.057.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ vālmīkiṃ munisattamam / kṛtāñjalir atho bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.057.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan vastum icchāmi guroḥ kṛtyād ihāgataḥ / śvaḥ prabhāte gamiṣyāmi pratīcīṃ vāruṇīṃ diśam // 7.057.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughnasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahasya munipuṃgavaḥ / pratyuvaca mahātmānaṃ svāgataṃ te mahāyaśaḥ // 7.057.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svam āśramam idaṃ saumya rāghavāṇāṃ kulasya ha / āsanaṃ pādyam arghyaṃ ca nirviśaṅkaḥ pratīccha me // 7.057.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya tataḥ pūjāṃ phalamūlaṃ ca bhojanam / bhakṣayām āsa kākutsthas tṛptiṃ ca paramāṃ gataḥ // 7.057.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu bhuktvā mahābāhur maharṣiṃ tam uvāca ha / pūrvaṃ yajñavibhūtīyaṃ kasyāśramasamīpataḥ // 7.057.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā vālmīkir vākyam abravīt / śatrughna śṛṇu yasyedaṃ babhūvāyatanaṃ purā // 7.057.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuṣmākaṃ pūrvako rājā sudāsasya mahātmanaḥ / putro mitrasaho nāma vīryavān atidhārmikaḥ // 7.057.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bāla eva saudāso mṛgayām upacakrame / cañcūryamāṇaṃ dadṛśe sa śūro rākṣasadvayam // 7.057.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śārdūlarūpiṇau ghorau mṛgān bahusahasraśaḥ / bhakṣayāṇāv asaṃtuṣṭau paryāptiṃ ca na jagmatuḥ // 7.057.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu tau rākṣasau dṛṣṭvā nirmṛgaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtam / krodhena mahatāviṣṭo jaghānaikaṃ maheṣuṇā // 7.057.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vinipātya tam ekaṃ tu saudāsaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ / vijvaro vigatāmarṣo hataṃ rakṣo 'bhyavaikṣata // 7.057.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nirīkṣamāṇaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahāyas tasya rakṣasaḥ / saṃtāpam akarod ghoraṃ saudāsaṃ cedam abravīt // 7.057.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmād anaparāddhaṃ tvaṃ sahāyaṃ mama jaghnivān / tasmāt tavāpu pāpiṣṭha pradāsyāmi pratikriyām // 7.057.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu taṃ rakṣas tatraivāntaradhīyata / kālaparyāya yogena rājā mitrasaho 'bhavat // 7.057.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājāpi yajate yajñaṃ tasyāśramasamīpataḥ / aśvamedhaṃ mahāyajñaṃ taṃ vasiṣṭho 'bhyapālayat // 7.057.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra yajño mahān āsīd bahuvarṣa gaṇāyutān / samṛddhaḥ parayā lakṣmyā devayajñasamo 'bhavat // 7.057.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāvasāne yajñasya pūrvavairam anusmaran / vasiṣṭharūpī rājānam iti hovāca rākṣasaḥ // 7.057.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya yajñāvasānānte sāmiṣaṃ bhojanaṃ mama / dīyatām iti śīghraṃ vai nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // 7.057.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā / bhakṣasaṃskārakuśalam uvāca pṛthivīpatiḥ // 7.057.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
haviṣyaṃ sāmiṣaṃ svādu yathā bhavati bhojanam / tathā kuruṣva śīghraṃ vai parituṣyed yathā guruḥ // 7.057.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śāsanāt pārthivendrasya sūdaḥ saṃbhrāntamānasaḥ / sa ca rakṣaḥ punas tatra sūdaveṣam athākarot // 7.057.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa mānuṣam atho māṃsaṃ pārthivāya nyavedayat / idaṃ svāduhaviṣyaṃ ca sāmiṣaṃ cānnam āhṛtam // 7.057.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhojanaṃ vasiṣṭhāya patnyā sārdham upāharat / madayantyā naravyāghra sāmiṣaṃ rakṣasā hṛtam // 7.057.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jñātvā tadāmiṣaṃ vipro mānuṣaṃ bhojanāhṛtam / krodhena mahatāviṣṭo vyāhartum upacakrame // 7.057.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmāt tvaṃ bhojanaṃ rājan mamaitad dātum icchasi / tasmād bhojanam etat te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // 7.057.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā saha patnyā vai praṇipatya muhur muhuḥ / punar vasiṣṭhaṃ provāca yad uktaṃ brahmarūpiṇā // 7.057.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutā pārthivendrasya rakṣasā vikṛtaṃ ca tat / punaḥ provāca rājānaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ puruṣarṣabham // 7.057.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā roṣaparītena yad idaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ / naitac chakyaṃ vṛthā kartuṃ pradāsyāmi ca te varam // 7.057.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālo dvādaśa varṣāṇi śāpasyāsya bhaviṣyati / matprasādāc ca rājendra atītaṃ na smariṣyasi // 7.057.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa rājā taṃ śāpam upabhujyārimardanaḥ / pratilebhe punā rājyaṃ prajāś caivānvapālayat // 7.057.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya kalmāṣapādasya yajñasyāyatanaṃ śubham / āśramasya samīpe 'smin yasmin pṛcchasi rāghava // 7.057.034	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tāṃ pārthivendrasya kathāṃ śrutvā sudāruṇam / viveśa parṇaśālāyāṃ maharṣim abhivādya ca // 7.057.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yām eva rātriṃ śatrughna parṇaśālāṃ samāviśat / tām eva rātriṃ sītāpi prasūtā dārakadvayam // 7.058.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'rdharātrasamaye bālakā munidārakāḥ / vālmīkeḥ priyam ācakhyuḥ sītāyāḥ prasavaṃ śubham // 7.058.002.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya rakṣāṃ mahātejaḥ kuru bhūtavināśinīm // 7.058.002.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā munir harṣam upāgamat / bhūtaghnīṃ cākarot tābhyā rakṣāṃ rakṣovināśinīm // 7.058.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśamuṣṭim upādāya lavaṃ caiva tu sa dvijaḥ / vālmīkiḥ pradadau tābhyāṃ rakṣāṃ bhūtavināśinīm // 7.058.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yas tayoḥ pūrvajo jātaḥ sa kuśair mantrasaṃskṛtaiḥ / nirmārjanīyas tu bhavet kuśa ity asya nāmataḥ // 7.058.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaś cāparo bhavet tābhyāṃ lavena susamāhitaḥ / nirmārjanīyo vṛddhābhir lavaś ceti sa nāmataḥ // 7.058.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ kuśalavau nāmnā tāv ubhau yamajātakau / matkṛtabhyāṃ ca namābhyāṃ khyātiyuktau bhaviṣyataḥ // 7.058.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te rakṣāṃ jagṛhus tāṃ ca munihastāt samāhitāḥ / akurvaṃś ca tato rakṣāṃ tayor vigatakalmaṣāḥ // 7.058.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tāṃ kriyamāṇāṃ tu rakṣāṃ gotraṃ ca nāma ca / saṃkīrtanaṃ ca rāmasya sītāyāḥ prasavau śubhau // 7.058.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardharātre tu śatrughnaḥ śuśrāva sumahat priyam / parṇaśālāṃ gato rātrau diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti cābravīt // 7.058.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatha tasya prahṛṣṭasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ / vyatītā vārṣikī rātriḥ śrāvaṇī laghuvikramā // 7.058.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhāte tu mahāvīryaḥ kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ kramam / muniṃ prāñjalir āmantrya prāyāt paścānmukhaḥ punaḥ // 7.058.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā yamunātīraṃ saptarātroṣitaḥ pathi / ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyakīrtīnām āśrame vāsam abhyayāt // 7.058.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tatra munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhārgavapramukhair nṛpaḥ / kathābhir bahurūpābhir vāsaṃ cakre mahāyaśāḥ // 7.058.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rātryāṃ pravṛttāyāṃ śatrughno bhṛgunandanam / papraccha cyavanaṃ vipraṃ lavaṇasya balābalam // 7.059.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūlasya ca balaṃ brahman ke ca pūrvaṃ nipātitāḥ / anena śūlamukhena dvandvayuddham upāgatāḥ // 7.059.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ / pratyuvāca mahātejāś cyavano raghunandanam // 7.059.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asaṃkhyeyāni karmāṇi yāny asya puruṣarṣabha / ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhave yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva me // 7.059.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayodhyāyāṃ purā rājā yuvanāśvasuto balī / māndhatā iti vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān // 7.059.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kṛtvā pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ śāsane pṛthivīpatiḥ / suralokam atho jetum udyogam akaron nṛpaḥ // 7.059.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indrasya tu bhayaṃ tīvraṃ surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām / māndhātari kṛtodyoge devalokajigīṣayā // 7.059.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardhāsanena śakrasya rājyārdhena ca pārthivaḥ / vandyamānaḥ suragaṇaiḥ pratijñām adhyarohata // 7.059.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya pāpam abhiprāyaṃ viditvā pākaśāsanaḥ / sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vākyam uvāca yuvanāśvajam // 7.059.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā tvaṃ mānuṣaṃ loke na tāvat puruṣarṣabha / akṛtvā pṛthivīṃ vaśyāṃ devarājyam ihecchasi // 7.059.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi vīra samagrā te medinī nikhilā vaśe / devarājyaṃ kuruṣveha sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ // 7.059.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
indram evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu māndhātā vākyam abravīt / kva me śakrapratihataṃ śāsanaṃ pṛthivītale // 7.059.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca sahasrākṣo lavaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ / madhuputro madhuvane nājñāṃ te kurute 'nagha // 7.059.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vipriyaṃ ghoraṃ sahasrākṣeṇa bhāṣitam / vrīḍito 'vāṅmukho rājā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha // 7.059.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āmantrya tu sahasrākṣaṃ hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ / punar evāgamac chrīmān imaṃ lokaṃ nareśvaraḥ // 7.059.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kṛtvā hṛdaye 'marṣaṃ sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ / ājagāma madhoḥ putraṃ vaśe kartum aninditaḥ // 7.059.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kāṅkṣamāṇo lavaṇaṃ yuddhāya puruṣarṣabhaḥ / dūtaṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa sakāśaṃ lavaṇasya saḥ // 7.059.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā vipriyāṇy āha bahūni madhunaḥ sutam / vadantam evaṃ taṃ dūtaṃ bhakṣayām āsa rākṣasaḥ // 7.059.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cirāyamāṇe dūte tu rājā krodhasamanvitaḥ / ardayām āsa tad rakṣaḥ śaravṛṣṭyā samantataḥ // 7.059.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahasya lavaṇaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā / vadhāya sānubandhasya mumocāyudham uttamam // 7.059.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chūlaṃ dīpyamānaṃ tu sabhṛtyabalavāhanam / bhasmīkṛtya nṛpaṃ bhūyo lavaṇasyāgamat karam // 7.059.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa rājā sumahān hataḥ sabalavāhanaḥ / śūlasya ca balaṃ vīra aprameyam anuttamam // 7.059.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvaḥ prabhāte tu lavaṇaṃ vadhiṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ / agṛhītāyudhaṃ kṣipraṃ dhruvo hi vijayas tava // 7.059.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathāṃ kathayatāṃ teṣāṃ jayaṃ cākāṅkṣatāṃ śubham / vyatītā rajanī śīghraṃ śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ // 7.060.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prabhāte vimale tasmin kāle sa rākṣasaḥ / nirgatas tu purād vīro bhakṣāhārapracoditaḥ // 7.060.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare śūraḥ śatrughno yamunāṃ nadīm / tīrtvā madhupuradvāri dhanuṣpāṇir atiṣṭhata // 7.060.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'rdhadivase prāpte krūrakarmā sa rākṣasaḥ / āgacchad bahusahasraṃ prāṇinām udvahan bharam // 7.060.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dadarśa śatrughnaṃ sthitaṃ dvāri dhṛtāyudham / tam uvāca tato rakṣaḥ kim anena kariṣyasi // 7.060.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īdṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi sāyudhānāṃ narādhama / bhakṣitāni mayā roṣāt kālam ākāṅkṣase nu kim // 7.060.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āhāraś cāpy asaṃpūrṇo mamāyaṃ puruṣādhama / svayaṃ praviṣṭo nu mukhaṃ katham āsādya durmate // 7.060.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya hasataś ca muhur muhuḥ / śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno roṣād aśrūṇy avartayat // 7.060.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya roṣābhibhūtasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ / tejomayā marīcyas tu sarvagātrair viniṣpatan // 7.060.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca ca susaṃkruddhaḥ śatrughnas taṃ niśācaram / yoddhum icchāmi durbuddhe dvandvayuddhaṃ tvayā saha // 7.060.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
putro daśarathasyāhaṃ bhrātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ / śatrughno nāma śatrughno vadhākāṅkṣī tavāgataḥ // 7.060.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya me yuddhakāmasya dvandvayuddhaṃ pradīyatām / śatrus tvaṃ sarvajīvānāṃ na me jīvan gamiṣyasi // 7.060.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tathā bruvāṇe tu rākṣasaḥ prahasann iva / pratyuvāca naraśreṣṭhaṃ diṣṭyā prāpto 'si durmate // 7.060.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mama mātṛṣvasur bhrātā rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ / hato rāmeṇa durbuddhe strīhetoḥ puruṣādhama // 7.060.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac ca sarvaṃ mayā kṣāntaṃ rāvaṇasyā kulakṣayam / avajñāṃ purataḥ kṛtvā mayā yūyaṃ viśeṣataḥ // 7.060.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hatāś ca hi me sarve paribhūtās tṛṇaṃ yathā / bhūtaś caiva bhaviṣyāś ca yūyaṃ ca puruṣādhamāḥ // 7.060.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya te yuddhakāmasyā yuddhaṃ dāsyāmi durmate / īpsitaṃ yādṛśaṃ tubhyaṃ sajjaye yāvad āyudham // 7.060.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvācātha śatrughna kva me jīvan gamiṣyasi / durbalo 'py āgataḥ śatrur na moktavyaḥ kṛtātmanā // 7.060.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo hi viklavayā buddhyā prasaraṃ śatrave dadau / sa hato mandabuddhitvād yathā kāpuruṣas tathā // 7.060.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ / krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt // 7.061.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pāṇau pāṇiṃ viniṣpiṣya dantān kaṭakaṭāyya ca / lavaṇo raghuśārdūlam āhvayām āsa cāsakṛt // 7.061.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tathā vākyaṃ lavaṇaṃ ghoravikramam / śatrughno deva śatrughna idaṃ vacanam abravīt // 7.061.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughno na tadā jāto yadānye nirjitās tvayā / tad adya bāṇābhihato vraja taṃ yamasādanam // 7.061.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣayo 'py adya pāpātman mayā tvāṃ nihataṃ raṇe / paśyantu viprā vidvāṃsas tridaśā iva rāvaṇam // 7.061.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayi madbāṇanirdagdhe patite 'dya niśācara / puraṃ janapadaṃ cāpi kṣemam etad bhaviṣyati // 7.061.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya madbāhuniṣkrāntaḥ śaro vajranibhānanaḥ / pravekṣyate te hṛdayaṃ padmam aṃśur ivārkajaḥ // 7.061.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam ukto mahāvṛkṣaṃ lavaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / śatrughnorasi cikṣepa taṃ śūraḥ śatadhācchinat // 7.061.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad dṛṣṭvā viphalaṃ karma rākṣasaḥ punar eva tu / pādapān subahūn gṛhya śatrughne vyasṛjad balī // 7.061.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughnaś cāpi tejasvī vṛkṣān āpatato bahūn / tribhiś caturbhir ekaikaṃ ciccheda nataparvabhiḥ // 7.061.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjad rākṣasor asi / śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno vivyathe na ca rākṣasaḥ // 7.061.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahasya lavaṇo vṛkṣam utpāṭya līlayā / śirasy abhyahanac chūraṃ srastāṅgaḥ sa mumoha vai // 7.061.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin nipatite vīre hāhākāro mahān abhūt / ṛṣīṇāṃ deva saṃghānāṃ gandharvāpsarasām api // 7.061.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam avajñāya tu hataṃ śatrughnaṃ bhuvi pātitam / rakṣo labdhāntaram api na viveśa svam ālayam // 7.061.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāpi śūlaṃ prajagrāha taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhuvi pātitam / tato hata iti jñātvā tān bhakṣān samudāvahat // 7.061.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muhūrtāl labdhasaṃjñas tu punas tasthau dhṛtāyudhaḥ / śatrughno rākṣasadvāri ṛṣibhiḥ saṃprapūjitaḥ // 7.061.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato divyam amoghaṃ taṃ jagrāha śaram uttamam / jvalantaṃ tejasā ghoraṃ pūrayantaṃ diśo daśa // 7.061.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vajrānanaṃ vajravegaṃ merumandara gauravam / nataṃ parvasu sarveṣu saṃyugeṣv aparājitam // 7.061.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asṛkcandanadigdhāṅgaṃ cārupatraṃ patatriṇam / dānavendrācalendrāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca dāruṇam // 7.061.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ yugānte samupasthite / dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni paritrāsam upāgaman // 7.061.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadevāsuragandharvaṃ samuniṃ sāpsarogaṇam / jagad dhi sarvam asvasthaṃ pitāmaham upasthitam // 7.061.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ūcuś ca devadeveśaṃ varadaṃ prapitāmaham / kaccil lokakṣayo deva prāpto vā yugasaṃkayaḥ // 7.061.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na śrutaṃ vā prapitāmaha / devānāṃ bhayasaṃmoho lokānāṃ saṃkṣayaḥ prabho // 7.061.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā lokapitāmanaḥ / bhayakāraṇam ācaṣṭe devānām abhayaṃkaraḥ // 7.061.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vadhāya lavaṇasyājau śaraḥ śatrughnadhāritaḥ / tejasā yasya sarve sma saṃmūḍhāḥ surasattamāḥ // 7.061.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣo hi pūrvaṃ devasya lokakartuḥ sanātanaḥ / śaras tejomayo vatsā yena vai bhayam āgatam // 7.061.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa vai kaiṭabhasyārthe madhunaś ca mahāśaraḥ / sṛṣṭo mahātmanā tena vadhārthaṃ daityayos tayoḥ // 7.061.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam etaṃ prajānīdhvaṃ viṣṇos tejomayaṃ śaram / eṣā caiva tanuḥ pūrvā viṣṇos tasya mahātmanaḥ // 7.061.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ito gacchatā paśyadhvaṃ vadhyamānaṃ mahātmanā / rāmānujena vīreṇa lavaṇaṃ rākṣasottamam // 7.061.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya te devadevasya niśamya madhurāṃ giram / ājagmur yatra yudhyete śatrughnalavaṇāv ubhau // 7.061.030	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ śaraṃ divyasaṃkāśaṃ śatrughnakaradhāritam / dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni yugāntāgnim ivotthitam // 7.061.031	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ākāśam āvṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā devair hi raghunandanaḥ / siṃhanādaṃ muhuḥ kṛtvā dadarśa lavaṇaṃ punaḥ // 7.061.032	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āhūtaś ca tatas tena śatrughnena mahātmanā / lavaṇaḥ krodhasaṃyukto yuddhāya samupasthitaḥ // 7.061.033	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ākarṇāt sa vikṛṣyātha tad dhanur dhanvināṃ varaḥ / sa mumoca mahābāṇaṃ lavaṇasya mahorasi // 7.061.034.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uras tasya vidāryāśu praviveśa rasātalam // 7.061.034.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatvā rasātalaṃ divyaṃ śaro vibudhapūjitaḥ / punar evāgamat tūrṇam ikṣvākukulanandanam // 7.061.035	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughnaśaranirbhinno lavaṇaḥ sa niśācaraḥ / papāta sahasā bhūmau vajrāhata ivācalaḥ // 7.061.036	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac ca divyaṃ mahac chūlaṃ hate lavaṇarākṣase / paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ rudrasya vaśam anvagāt // 7.061.037	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekeṣupātena bhayaṃ nihatya; lokatrayasyāsya raghupravīraḥ / vinirbabhāv udyatacāpabāṇas; tamaḥ praṇudyeva sahasraraśmiḥ // 7.061.038	upajāti (triṣṭubh: upendravajrā [jtjgg], indravajrā [ttjgg])
hate tu lavaṇe devāḥ sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ / ūcuḥ sumadhurāṃ vāṇīṃ śatrughnāṃ śatrutāpanam // 7.062.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
diṣṭyā te vijayo vatsa diṣṭya lavaṇarākṣasaḥ / hataḥ puruṣaśārdūlavaraṃ varaya rāghava // 7.062.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
varadāḥ sma mahābāho sarva eva samāgatāḥ / vijayākāṅkṣiṇas tubhyam amoghaṃ darśanaṃ hi naḥ // 7.062.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā śūro mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ / pratyuvāca mahābāhuḥ śatrughnaḥ prayatātmavān // 7.062.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāṃ madhupurīṃ ramyāṃ madhurāṃ deva nirmitām / niveśaṃ prapnuyāṃ śīghram eṣa me 'stu varo mataḥ // 7.062.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ devāḥ prītamanaso bāḍham ity eva rāghavam / bhaviṣyati purī ramyā śūrasenā na saṃśayaḥ // 7.062.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tathoktvā mahātmāno divam āruruhus tadā / śatrughno 'pi mahātejās tāṃ senāṃ samupānayat // 7.062.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā sena śīghram āgacchac chrutvā śatrughnaśāsanam / niveśanaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ śāsanena samārabhat // 7.062.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā purī divyasaṃkāśā varṣe dvādaśame śubhā / niviṣṭā śūrasenānāṃ viṣayaś cākutobhayaḥ // 7.062.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣetrāṇi sasya yuktāni kāle varṣati vāsavaḥ / arogā vīrapuruṣā śatrughnabhujapālitā // 7.062.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardhacandrapratīkāśā yamunātīraśobhitā / śobhitā gṛhamukhyaiś ca śobhitā catvarāpaṇaiḥ // 7.062.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yac ca tena mahac chūnyaṃ lavaṇena kṛtaṃ purā / śobhayām āsa tad vīro nānāpaṇyasamṛddhibhiḥ // 7.062.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ samṛddhāṃ samṛddhārthaḥ śatrughno bharatānujaḥ / nirīkṣya paramaprītaḥ paraṃ harṣam upāgamat // 7.062.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā niveśya madhurāṃ purīm / rāmapādau nirīkṣeyaṃ varṣe dvādaśame śubhe // 7.062.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dvādaśame varṣe śatrughno rāmapālitām / ayodhyāṃ cakame gantum alpabhṛtyabalānugaḥ // 7.063.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantriṇo balamukhyāṃś ca nivartya ca purodhasaṃ / jagāma rathamukhyena hayayuktena bhāsvatā // 7.063.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā gaṇitān vāsān saptāṣṭau raghunandanaḥ / ayodhyām agamat tūrṇaṃ rāghavotsukadarśanaḥ // 7.063.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa praviśya purīṃ ramyāṃ śrīmān ikṣvākunandanaḥ / praviveśa mahābāhur yatra rāmo mahādyutiḥ // 7.063.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā / uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā rāmaṃ satyaparākramam // 7.063.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yad ājñaptaṃ mahārāja sarvaṃ tat kṛtavān aham / hataḥ sa lavaṇaḥ pāpaḥ purī sā ca niveśitā // 7.063.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvādaśaṃ ca gataṃ varṣaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana / notsaheyam ahaṃ vastuṃ tvayā virahito nṛpa // 7.063.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa me prasādaṃ kākutstha kuruṣvāmitavikrama / mātṛhīno yathā vatsas tvāṃ vinā pravasāmy aham // 7.063.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ śatrughnaṃ pariṣvajyedam abravīt / mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā vīra naitat kṣatriya ceṣṭitam // 7.063.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāvasīdanti rājāno vipravāseṣu rāghava / prajāś ca paripālyā hi kṣatradharmeṇa rāghava // 7.063.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāle kāle ca māṃ vīra ayodhyām avalokitum / āgaccha tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gantāsi ca puraṃ tava // 7.063.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mamāpi tvaṃ sudayitaḥ prāṇair api na saṃśayaḥ / avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca rājyasya paripālanam // 7.063.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmāt tvaṃ vasa kākutstha pañcarātraṃ mayā saha / ūrdhvaṃ gantāsi madhurāṃ sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ // 7.063.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasyaitad vacaḥ śrutvā dharmayuktaṃ mano'nugam / śatrughno dīnayā vācā bāḍham ity eva cābravīt // 7.063.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pañcarātraṃ kākutstho rāghavasya yathājñayā / uṣya tatra maheṣvāso gamanāyopacakrame // 7.063.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āmantrya tu mahātmānaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam / bharataṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva mahāratham upāruhat // 7.063.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūraṃ tābhyām anugato lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā / bharatena ca śatrughno jagāmāśu purīṃ tadā // 7.063.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasthāpya tu sa śatrughnaṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ saha rāghavaḥ / pramumoda sukhī rājyaṃ dharmeṇa paripālayan // 7.064.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ katipayāhaḥsu vṛddho jānapado dvijaḥ / śavaṃ bālam upādāya rājadvāram upāgamat // 7.064.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rudan bahuvidhā vācaḥ snehākṣarasamanvitāḥ / asakṛt putraputreti vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.064.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ nu me duṣkṛtaṃ karma pūrvaṃ dehāntare kṛtam / yad ahaṃ putram ekaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi nidhanaṃ gatam // 7.064.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aprāptayauvanaṃ bālaṃ pañcavarṣasamanvitam / akāle kālam āpannaṃ duḥkhāya mama putraka // 7.064.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
alpair ahobhir nidhanaṃ gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ / ahaṃ ca jananī caiva tava śokena putraka // 7.064.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na smarāmy anṛtaṃ hy uktaṃ na ca hiṃsāṃ smarāmy aham / kena me duṣkṛtenādya bāla eva mamātmajaḥ // 7.064.007.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṛtvā pitṛkāryāṇi nīto vaivasvatakṣayam // 7.064.007.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ me śrutaṃ vā ghoradarśanam / mṛtyur aprāptakālānāṃ rāmasya viṣaye yathā // 7.064.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ / tvaṃ rājañ jīvayasvainaṃ bālaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatam // 7.064.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājan dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi / uṣitāḥ sma sukhaṃ rājye tavāsmin sumahābala // 7.064.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃpraty anātho viṣaya ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām / rāmaṃ nātham ihāsādya bālāntakaraṇaṃ nṛpam // 7.064.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājadoṣair vipadyante prajā hy avidhipālitāḥ / asadvṛtte tu nṛpatāv akāle mriyate janaḥ // 7.064.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā pureṣv ayuktāni janā janapadeśu ca / kurvate na ca rakṣāsti tadākālakṛtaṃ bhayam // 7.064.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
savyaktaṃ rājadoṣo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ / pure janapade vāpi tadā bālavadho hy ayam // 7.064.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bahuvidhair vākyair nindayāno muhur muhuḥ / rājānaṃ duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ sutaṃ tam upagūhati // 7.064.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tu karuṇaṃ tasya dvijasya paridevitam / śuśrāva rāghavaḥ sarvaṃ duḥkhaśokasamanvitam // 7.065.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa duḥkhena susaṃtapto mantriṇaḥ samupāhvayat / vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca bhrātṝṃś ca sahanaigamān // 7.065.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dvijā vasiṣṭhena sārdham aṣṭau praveśitāḥ / rājānaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ vardhasveti tato 'bruvan // 7.065.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mārkaṇḍeyo 'tha maudgalyo vāmadevaś ca kāśyapaḥ / kātyāyano 'tha jābālir gautamo nāradas tathā // 7.065.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete dvijarṣabhāḥ sarve āganeṣūpaveśitāḥ / mantriṇo naigamāś caiva yathārham anukūlataḥ // 7.065.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dīptatejasām / raghavaḥ sarvam ācaṣṭe dvijo yasmāt praroditi // 7.065.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājño dīnasya nāradaḥ / pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyam ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau nṛpam // 7.065.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṇu rājan yathākāle prāpto 'yaṃ bālasaṃkṣayaḥ / śrutvā kartavyatāṃ vīra kuruṣva raghunandana // 7.065.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā kṛtayuge rāma brāhmaṇā vai tapasvinaḥ / abrāhmaṇas tadā rājan na tapasvī kathaṃ cana // 7.065.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin yuge prajvalite brahmabhūte anāvṛte / amṛtyavas tadā sarve jajñire dīrghadarśinaḥ // 7.065.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tretāyugaṃ nāma mānavānāṃ vapuṣmatām / kṣatriyā yatra jāyante pūrveṇa tapasānvitāḥ // 7.065.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vīryeṇa tapasā caiva te 'dhikāḥ pūrvajanmani / mānavā ye mahātmānas tasmiṃs tretāyuge yuge // 7.065.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmakṣatraṃ tu tat sarvaṃ yat pūrvam aparaṃ ca yat / yugayor ubhayor āsīt samavīryasamanvitam // 7.065.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apaśyantas tu te sarve viśeṣam adhikaṃ tataḥ / sthāpanaṃ cakrire tatra cāturvarṇyasya sarvataḥ // 7.065.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adharmaḥ pādam ekaṃ tu pātayat pṛthivītale / adharmeṇa hi saṃyuktās tena mandābhavan dvijāḥ // 7.065.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prāduṣkṛtaṃ pūrvam āyuṣaḥ pariniṣṭhitam / śubhāny evācaraṃl lokāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥ // 7.065.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tretāyuge tv avartanta brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyaś ca ye / tapo 'tapyanta te sarve śuśrūṣām apare janāḥ // 7.065.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dharmaḥ paramas teṣāṃ vaiśyaśūdram athāgamat / pūjāṃ ca sarvavarṇānāṃ śūdrāś cakrur viśeṣataḥ // 7.065.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pādam adharmasya dvitīyam avatārayat / tato dvāparasaṃkhyā sā yugasya samajāyata // 7.065.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin dvāparasaṃkhye tu vartamāne yugakṣaye / adharmaś cānṛtaṃ caiva vavṛdhe puruṣarṣabha // 7.065.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin dvāparasaṃkhyāte tapo vaiśyān samāviśat / na śūdro labhate dharmam ugraṃ taptaṃ nararṣabha // 7.065.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hīnavarṇo naraśreṣṭha tapyate sumahat tapaḥ / bhaviṣyā śūdrayonyāṃ hi tapaścaryā kalau yuge // 7.065.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adharmaḥ paramo rāma dvāpare śūdradhāritaḥ / sa vai viṣayaparyante tava rājan mahātapāḥ // 7.065.023.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūdras tapyati durbuddhis tena bālavadho hy ayam // 7.065.023.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo hy adharmam akāryaṃ vā viṣaye pārthivasya hi / karoti rājaśārdūla pure vā durmatir naraḥ // 7.065.024.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣipraṃ hi narakaṃ yāti sa ca rājā na saṃśayaḥ // 7.065.024.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla mārgasva viṣayaṃ svakam / duṣkṛtaṃ yatra paśyethās tatra yatnaṃ samācara // 7.065.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ te dharmavṛddhiś ca nṛṇāṃ cāyurvivardhanam / bhaviṣyati naraśreṣṭha bālasyāsya ca jīvitam // 7.065.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā / praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe lakṣmaṇaṃ cedam abravīt // 7.066.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaccha saumya dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ samāśvāsaya lakṣmaṇa / bālasya ca śarīraṃ tat tailadroṇyāṃ nidhāpaya // 7.066.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandhaiś ca paramodārais tailaiś ca susugandhibhiḥ / yathā na kṣīyate bālas tathā saumya vidhīyatām // 7.066.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathā śarīre bālasya guptasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / vipattiḥ paribhedo vā bhaven na ca tathā kuru // 7.066.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā saṃdiśya kākutstho lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam / manasā puṣpakaṃ dadhyāv āgaccheti mahāyaśāḥ // 7.066.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iṅgitaṃ sa tu vijñāya puṣpako hemabhūṣitaḥ / ājagāma muhūrtena saṃpīpaṃ rāghavasya vai // 7.066.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bravīt praṇato bhūtvā ayam asmi narādhipa / vaśyas tava mahābāho kiṃkaraḥ samupasthitaḥ // 7.066.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāṣitaṃ ruciraṃ śrutvā puṣpakasya narādhipaḥ / abhivādya maharṣīs tān vimānaṃ so 'dhyarohata // 7.066.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanur gṛhītvā tūṇīṃ ca khagdaṃ ca ruciraprabham / nikṣipya nagare vīrau saumitribharatāv ubhau // 7.066.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāyāt pratīcīṃ sa marūn vicinvaṃś ca samantataḥ / uttarām agamac chrīmān diśaṃ himavadāvṛtam // 7.066.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
apaśyamānas tatrāpi svalpam apy atha duṣkṛtam / pūrvām api diśaṃ sarvām athāpaśyan narādhipaḥ // 7.066.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ākrāmat tato rājarṣinandanaḥ / śaivalasyottare pārśve dadarśa sumahat saraḥ // 7.066.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin sarasi tapyantaṃ tāpasaṃ sumahat tapaḥ / dadarśa rāghavaḥ śrīmāṃl lambamānam adho mukham // 7.066.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athainaṃ samupāgamya tapyantaṃ tapa uttamam / uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ dhanyas tvam asi suvrata // 7.066.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasyāṃ yonyāṃ tapovṛddhavartase dṛḍhavikrama / kautūhalāt tvāṃ pṛcchāmi rāmo dāśarathir hy aham // 7.066.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
manīṣitas te ko nv arthaḥ svargalābho varāśrayaḥ / yam aśritya tapas taptaṃ śrotum icchāmi tāpasa // 7.066.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brāhmaṇo vāsi bhadraṃ te kṣatriyo vāsi durjayaḥ / vaiśyo vā yadi vā śūdraḥ satyam etad bravīhi me // 7.066.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / avākśirās tathābhūto vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.067.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śūdrayonyāṃ prasūto 'smi tapa ugraṃ samāsthitaḥ / devatvaṃ prārthaye rāma saśarīro mahāyaśaḥ // 7.067.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na mithyāhaṃ vade rājan devalokajigīṣayā / śūdraṃ māṃ viddhi kākutstha śambūkaṃ nāma nāmataḥ // 7.067.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhāṣatas tasya śūdrasya khaḍgaṃ suruciraprabham / niṣkṛṣya kośād vimalaṃ śiraś ciccheda rāghavaḥ // 7.067.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin muhūrte bālo 'sau jīvena samayujyata // 7.067.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'gastyāśramapadaṃ rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ / sa gatvā vinayenaiva taṃ natvā mumude sukhī // 7.067.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā / ātithyaṃ paramaṃ prāpya niṣasāda narādhipaḥ // 7.067.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca mahātejāḥ kumbhayonir mahātapāḥ / svāgataṃ te naraśreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava // 7.067.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ me bahumato rāma guṇair bahubhir uttamaiḥ / atithiḥ pūjanīyaś ca māma rājan hṛdi sthitaḥ // 7.067.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
surā hi kathayanti tvām āgataṃ śūdraghātinam / brāhmaṇasya tu dharmeṇa tvayā jīvāpitaḥ sutaḥ // 7.067.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uṣyatāṃ ceha rajanīṃ sakāśe mama rāghava / prabhāte puṣpakeṇa tvaṃ gantā svapuram eva hi // 7.067.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ cābharaṇaṃ saumya nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā / divyaṃ divyena vapuṣā dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā // 7.067.012.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhṇīṣva kākutstha matpriyaṃ kuru rāghava // 7.067.012.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dattasya hi punar dānaṃ sumahat phalam ucyate / tasmāt pradāsye vidhivat tat pratīccha nararṣabha // 7.067.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad rāmaḥ pratijagrāha munes tasya mahātmanaḥ / divyam ābharaṇaṃ citraṃ pradīptam iva bhāskaram // 7.067.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratigṛhya tato rāmas tad ābharaṇam uttamam / āgamaṃ tasya divyasya praṣṭum evopacakrame // 7.067.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman vapuṣā yuktam uttamam / kathaṃ bhagavatā prāptaṃ kuto vā kena vāhṛtam // 7.067.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kutūhalatayā brahman pṛcchāmi tvāṃ mahāyaśaḥ / āścaryāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ hi nidhiḥ paramako bhavān // 7.067.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe munir vākyam athābravīt / śṛṇu rāma yathāvṛttaṃ purā tretāyuge gate // 7.067.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā tretāyuge hy āsīd araṇyaṃ bahuvistaram / samantād yojanaśataṃ nirmṛgaṃ pakṣivarjitam // 7.068.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin nirmānuṣe 'raṇye kurvāṇas tapa uttamam / aham ākramituṃ śaumya tad araṇyam upāgamam // 7.068.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya rūpam araṇyasya nirdeṣṭuṃ na śaśāka ha / phalamūlaiḥ sukhāsvādair bahurūpaiś ca pādapaiḥ // 7.068.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāraṇyasya madhye tu saro yojanam āyatam / padmotpalasamākīrṇaṃ samatikrāntaśaivalam // 7.068.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad āścaryam ivātyarthaṃ sukhāsvādam anuttamam / arajaskaṃ tathākṣobhyaṃ śrīmatpakṣigaṇāyutam // 7.068.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin saraḥsamīpe tu mahad adbhutam āśramam / purāṇaṃ puṇyam atyarthaṃ tapasvijanavarjitam // 7.068.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrāham avasaṃ rātriṃ naidāghīṃ puruṣarṣabha / prabhāte kālyam utthāya saras tad upacakrame // 7.068.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāpaśyaṃḥ śavaṃ tatra supuṣṭam ajaraṃ kva cit / tiṣṭhantaṃ parayā lakṣmyā tasmiṃs toyāśaye nṛpa // 7.068.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam arthaṃ cintayāno 'haṃ muhūrtaṃ tatra rāghava / viṣṭhito 'smi sarastīre kiṃ nv idaṃ syād iti prabho // 7.068.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
athāpaśyaṃ muhūrtāt tu divyam adbhutadarśanam / vimānaṃ paramodāraṃ haṃsayuktaṃ manojavam // 7.068.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atyarthaṃ svargiṇaṃ tatra vimāne raghunandana / upāste 'psarasāṃ vīra sahasraṃ divyabhūṣaṇam // 7.068.011.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gānti geyāni ramyāṇi vādayanti tathāparāḥ // 7.068.011.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśyato me tadā rāma vimānād avaruhya ca / taṃ śavaṃ bhakṣayām āsa sa svargī raghunandana // 7.068.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato bhuktvā yathākāmaṃ māṃsaṃ bahu ca suṣṭhu ca / avatīrya saraḥ svargī saṃspraṣṭum upacakrame // 7.068.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upaspṛśya yathānyāyaṃ sa svargī puruṣarṣabha / āroḍhum upacakrāma vimānavaram uttamam // 7.068.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ahaṃ devasaṃkāśam ārohantam udīkṣya vai / athāham abruvaṃ vākyaṃ tam eva puruṣarṣabha // 7.068.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ko bhavān devasaṃkāśa āhāraś ca vigarhitaḥ / tvayāyaṃ bhujyate saumya kiṃ karthaṃ vaktum arhasi // 7.068.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āścaryam īdṛśo bhāvo bhāsvaro devasaṃmataḥ / āhāro garhitaḥ saumya śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // 7.068.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhuktvā tu bhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ mama rāma śubhākṣaram / prāñjaliḥ pratyuvācedaṃ sa svargī raghunandana // 7.069.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṇu brahman yathāvṛttaṃ mamaitat sukhaduḥkhayoḥ / duratikramaṇīyaṃ hi yathā pṛcchasi māṃ dvija // 7.069.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā vaidarbhako rājā pitā mama mahāyaśāḥ / sudeva iti vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān // 7.069.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya putradvayaṃ brahman dvābhyāṃ strībhyām ajāyata / ahaṃ śveta iti khyāto yavīyān suratho 'bhavat // 7.069.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pitari svaryāte paurā mām abhyaṣecayan / tatrāhaṃ kṛtavān rājyaṃ dharmeṇa susamāhitaḥ // 7.069.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi samatītāni suvrata / rājyaṃ kārayato brahman prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ // 7.069.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ nimitte kasmiṃś cid vijñātāyur dvijottama / kāladharmaṃ hṛdi nyasya tato vanam upāgamam // 7.069.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ mṛgapakṣivivarjitam / tapaś cartuṃ praviṣṭo 'smi samīpe sarasaḥ śubhe // 7.069.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātaraṃ surathaṃ rājye abhiṣicya narādhipam / idaṃ saraḥ samāsādya tapas taptaṃ mayā ciram // 7.069.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ varṣasahasrāṇi tapas trīṇi mahāmune / taptvā suduṣkaraṃ prāpto brahmalokam anuttamam // 7.069.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato māṃ svargasaṃsthaṃ vai kṣutpipāse dvijottama / bādhete paramodāra tato 'haṃ vyathitendriyaḥ // 7.069.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gatvā tribhuvaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ pitāmaham uvāca ha / bhagavan brahmaloko 'yaṃ kṣutpipāsāvivarjitaḥ // 7.069.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasyeyaṃ karmaṇaḥ prāptiḥ kṣutpipāsāvaśo 'smi yat / āhāraḥ kaś ca me deva tan me brūhi pitāmaha // 7.069.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahas tu mām āha tavāhāraḥ sudevaja / svādūni svāni māṃsāni tāni bhakṣaya nityaśaḥ // 7.069.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svaśarīraṃ tvayā puṣṭaṃ kurvatā tapa uttamam / anuptaṃ rohate śveta na kadā cin mahāmate // 7.069.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dattaṃ na te 'sti sūkṣmo 'pi vane sattvaniṣevite / tena svargagato vatsa bādhyase kṣutpipāsayā // 7.069.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ supuṣṭam āhāraiḥ svaśarīram anuttamam / bhakṣayasvāmṛtarasaṃ sā te tṛptir bhaviṣyati // 7.069.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā tu tad vanaṃ śveta agastyaḥ sumahān ṛṣiḥ / ākramiṣyati durdharṣas tadā kṛcchād vimokṣyase // 7.069.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa hi tārayituṃ saumya śaktaḥ suragaṇān api / kiṃ punas tvāṃ mahābāho kṣutpipāsāvaśaṃ gatam // 7.069.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ bhagavataḥ śrutvā devadevasya niścayam / āhāraṃ garhitaṃ kurmi svaśarīraṃ dvijottama // 7.069.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahūn varṣagaṇān brahman bhujyamānam idaṃ mayā / kṣayaṃ nābhyeti brahmarṣe tṛptiś cāpi mamottamā // 7.069.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
