tasya me kṛcchrabhūtasya kṛcchrād asmād vimokṣaya / anyeṣām agatir hy atra kumbhayonim ṛte dvijam // 7.069.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idam ābharaṇaṃ saumya tāraṇārthaṃ dvijottama / pratigṛhṇīṣva brahmarṣe prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // 7.069.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāhaṃ svargiṇo vākyaṃ śrutvā duḥkhasamanvitam / tāraṇāyopajagrāha tad ābharaṇam uttamam // 7.069.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā pratigṛhīte tu tasminn ābharaṇe śubhe / mānuṣaḥ pūrvako deho rājarṣeḥ sa nanāśa ha // 7.069.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pranaṣṭe tu śarīre 'sau rājarṣiḥ parayā mudā / tṛptaḥ pramudito rājā jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ // 7.069.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tenedaṃ śakratulyena divyam ābharaṇaṃ mama / tasmin nimitte kākutstha dattam adbhutadarśanam // 7.069.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad adbhutatamaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvāgastyasya rāghavaḥ / gauravād vismayāc caiva bhūyaḥ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame // 7.070.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavaṃs tad vanaṃ ghoraṃ tapas tapyati yatra saḥ / śveto vaidarbhako rājā kathaṃ tad amṛgadvijam // 7.070.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niḥsattvaṃ ca vanaṃ jātaṃ śūnyaṃ manujavarjitam / tapaś cartuṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // 7.070.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā kautūhalasamanvitam / vākyaṃ paramatejasvī vaktum evopacakrame // 7.070.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā kṛtayuge rāma manur daṇḍadharaḥ prabhuḥ / tasya putro mahān āsīd ikṣvākuḥ kulavardhanaḥ // 7.070.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ putraṃ pūrvake rājye nikṣipya bhuvi durjayam / pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānāṃ bhava kartety uvāca ha // 7.070.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti ca pratijñātaṃ pituḥ putreṇa rāghava / tataḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo manuḥ punar uvāca ha // 7.070.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prīto 'smi paramodārakartā cāsi na saṃśayaḥ / daṇḍena ca prajā rakṣa mā ca daṇḍam akāraṇe // 7.070.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aparādhiṣu yo daṇḍaḥ pātyate mānaveṣu vai / sa daṇḍo vidhivan muktaḥ svargaṃ nayati pārthivam // 7.070.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād daṇḍe mahābāho yatnavān bhava putraka / dharmo hi paramo loke kurvatas te bhaviṣyati // 7.070.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti taṃ bahu saṃdiśya manuḥ putraṃ samādhinā / jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭo brahmalokam anuttamam // 7.070.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prayāte tridive tasminn ikṣvākur amitaprabhaḥ / janayiṣye kathaṃ putrān iti cintāparo 'bhavat // 7.070.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karmabhir bahurūpaiś ca tais tair manusutaḥ sutān / janayām āsa dharmātmā śataṃ devasutopamān // 7.070.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣām avarajas tāta sarveṣāṃ raghunandana / mūḍhaś cākṛtividyaś ca na śuśrūṣati pūrvajān // 7.070.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nāma tasya ca daṇḍeti pitā cakre 'lpatejasaḥ / avaśyaṃ daṇḍapatanaṃ śarīre 'sya bhaviṣyati // 7.070.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa paśyamānas taṃ doṣaṃ ghoraṃ putrasya rāghava / vindhyaśaivalayor madhye rājyaṃ prādād ariṃdama // 7.070.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa daṇḍas tatra rājābhūd ramye parvatarodhasi / puraṃ cāpratimaṃ rāma nyaveśayad anuttamam // 7.070.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purasya cākaron nāma madhumantam iti prabho / purohitaṃ cośanasaṃ varayām āsa suvratam // 7.070.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa rājā tad rājyaṃ kārayat sapurohitaḥ / prahṛṣṭamanujākīrṇaṃ devarājyaṃ yathā divi // 7.070.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad ākhyāya rāmāya maharṣiḥ kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ / asyām evāparaṃ vākyaṃ kathāyām upacakrame // 7.071.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa daṇḍaḥ kākutstha bahuvarṣagaṇāyutam / akarot tatra mandātmā rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam // 7.071.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha kāle tu kasmiṃś cid rājā bhārgavam āśramam / ramaṇīyam upākrāmac caitre māsi manorame // 7.071.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatra bhārgavakanyāṃ sa rūpeṇāpratimāṃ bhuvi / vicarantīṃ vanoddeśe daṇḍo 'paśyad anuttamām // 7.071.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sudurmedhā anaṅgaśarapīḍitaḥ / abhigamya susaṃvignaḥ kanyāṃ vacanam abravīt // 7.071.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kutas tvam asi suśroṇi kasya vāsi sutā śubhe / pīḍito 'ham anaṅgena pṛcchāmi tvāṃ sumadhyame // 7.071.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tv evaṃ bruvāṇasya mohonmattasya kāminaḥ / bhārgavī pratyuvācedaṃ vacaḥ sānunayaṃ nṛpam // 7.071.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhārgavasya sutāṃ viddhi devasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / arajāṃ nāma rājendra jyeṣṭhām āśramavāsinīm // 7.071.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
guruḥ pitā me rājendra tvaṃ ca śiṣyo mahātmanaḥ / vyasanaṃ sumahat kruddhaḥ sa te dadyān mahātapāḥ // 7.071.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi vātra mayā kāryaṃ dharmadṛṣṭena satpathā / varayasva nṛpa śreṣṭha pitaraṃ me mahādyutim // 7.071.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyathā tu phalaṃ tubhyaṃ bhaved ghorābhisaṃhitam / krodhena hi pitā me 'sau trailokyam api nirdahet // 7.071.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bruvāṇām arajāṃ daṇḍaḥ kāmaśarārditaḥ / pratyuvāca madonmattaḥ śirasy ādhāya so 'ñjalim // 7.071.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prasādaṃ kuru suśroṇi na kālaṃ kṣeptum arhasi / tvatkṛte hi mama prāṇā vidīryante śubhānane // 7.071.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvāṃ prāpya hi vadho vāpi pāpaṃ vāpi sudāruṇam / bhaktaṃ bhajasva māṃ bhīru bhajamānaṃ suvihvalam // 7.071.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktvā tu tāṃ kanyāṃ dorbhyāṃ gṛhya balād balī / visphurantīṃ yathākāmaṃ maithunāyopacakrame // 7.071.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam anarthaṃ mahāghoraṃ daṇḍaḥ kṛtvā sudāruṇam / nagaraṃ prayayau cāśu madhumantam anuttamam // 7.071.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
arajāpi rudantī sā āśramasyāvidūrataḥ / pratīkṣate susaṃtrastā pitaraṃ devasaṃnibham // 7.071.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa muhūrtād upaśrutya devarṣir amitaprabhaḥ / svam āśramaṃ śiṣya vṛtaḥ kṣudhārtaḥ saṃnyavartata // 7.072.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'paśyad arajāṃ dīnāṃ rajasā samabhiplutām / jyotsnām ivāruṇagrastāṃ pratyūṣe na virājatīm // 7.072.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya roṣaḥ samabhavat kṣudhārtasya viśeṣataḥ / nirdahann iva lokāṃs trīñ śiṣyāṃś cedam uvāca ha // 7.072.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paśyadhvaṃ viparītasya daṇḍasyāviditātmanaḥ / vipattiṃ ghorasaṃkāśāṃ kruddhām agniśikhām iva // 7.072.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣayo 'sya durmateḥ prāptaḥ sānugasya durātmanaḥ / yaḥ pradīptāṃ hutāśasya śikhāṃ vai spraṣṭum icchati // 7.072.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yasmāt sa kṛtavān pāpam īdṛśaṃ ghoradarśanam / tasmāt prāpsyati durmedhāḥ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ // 7.072.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saptarātreṇa rājāsau sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ / pāpakarmasamācāro vadhaṃ prāpsyati durmatiḥ // 7.072.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samantād yojanaśataṃ viṣayaṃ cāsya durmateḥ / dhakṣyate pāṃsuvarṣeṇa mahatā pākaśāsanaḥ // 7.072.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvasattvāni yānīha sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca / mahatā pāṃsuvarṣeṇa nāśaṃ yāsyanti sarvaśaḥ // 7.072.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daṇḍasya viṣayo yāvat tāvat sarvasamucchrayaḥ / pāṃsubhuta ivālakṣyaḥ saptarātrād bhaviṣyati // 7.072.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā krodhasaṃtapas tam āśramanivāsinam / janaṃ janapadānteṣu sthīyatām iti cābravīt // 7.072.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tūśasano vākyaṃ sa āśramāvasatho janaḥ / niṣkrānto viṣayāt tasya sthānaṃ cakre 'tha bāhyataḥ // 7.072.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tathoktvā munijanam arajām idam abravīt / ihaiva vasa durmedhe āśrame susamāhitā // 7.072.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ yojanaparyantaṃ saraḥ suruciraprabham / araje vijvarā bhuṅkṣva kālaś cātra pratīkṣyatām // 7.072.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvatsamīpe tu ye sattvā vāsam eṣyanti tāṃ niśām / avadhyāḥ pāṃsuvarṣeṇa te bhaviṣyanti nityadā // 7.072.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ity uktvā bhārgavo vāsam anyatra samupākramat / saptāhād bhasmasādbhūtaṃ yathoktaṃ brahmavādinā // 7.072.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāsau daṇḍaviṣayo vindhyaśaivalasānuṣu / śapto brahmarṣiṇā tena purā vaidharmake kṛte // 7.072.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prabhṛti kākutstha daṇḍakāraṇyam ucyate / tapasvinaḥ sthitā yatra janasthānam atho 'bhavat // 7.072.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi rāghava / saṃdhyām upāsituṃ vīra samayo hy ativartate // 7.072.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete maharṣayaḥ sarve pūrṇakumbhāḥ samantataḥ / kṛtodako naravyāghra ādityaṃ paryupāsate // 7.072.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tair ṛṣibhir abhyastaḥ sahitair brahmasattamaiḥ / ravir astaṃ gato rāma gacchodakam upaspṛśa // 7.072.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣer vacanam ājñāya rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāsitum / upākrāmat saraḥ puṇyam apsarobhir niṣevitam // 7.073.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatrodakam upaspṛṣśya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām / āśramaṃ prāviśad rāmaḥ kumbhayoner mahātmanaḥ // 7.073.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asyāgastyo bahuguṇaṃ phalamūlaṃ tathauṣadhīḥ / śākāni ca pavitrāṇi bhojanārtham akalpayat // 7.073.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa bhuktavān naraśreṣṭhas tad annam amṛtopamam / prītaś ca parituṣṭaś ca tāṃ rātriṃ samupāvasat // 7.073.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhāte kālyam utthāya kṛtvāhnikam ariṃdamaḥ / ṛṣiṃ samabhicakrāma gamanāya raghūttamaḥ // 7.073.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādyābravīd rāmo maharṣiṃ kumbhasaṃbhavam / āpṛcche tvāṃ gamiṣyāmi mām anujñātum arhasi // 7.073.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi darśanena mahātmanaḥ / draṣṭuṃ caivāgamiṣyāmi pāvanārtham ihātmanaḥ // 7.073.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā vadati kākutsthe vākyam adbhutadarśanam / uvāca paramaprīto dharmanetras tapodhanaḥ // 7.073.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atyadbhutam idaṃ vākyaṃ tava rāma śubhākṣaram / pāvanaḥ sarvalokānāṃ tvam eva raghunandana // 7.073.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
muhūrtam api rāma tvāṃ ye nu paśyanti ke cana / pāvitāḥ svargabhūtās te pūjyante divi daivataiḥ // 7.073.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye ca tvāṃ ghoracakṣurbhir īkṣante prāṇino bhuvi / hatās te yamadaṇḍena sadyo nirayagāminaḥ // 7.073.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gaccha cāriṣṭam avyagraḥ panthānam akutobhayam / praśādhi rājyaṃ dharmeṇa gatir hi jagato bhavān // 7.073.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam uktas tu muninā prāñjaliḥ prpagraho nṛpaḥ / abhyavādayata prājñas tam ṛṣiṃ puṇyaśīlinam // 7.073.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhivādya muniśreṣṭhaṃ tāṃś ca sarvāṃs tapodhanān / adhyārohat tad avyagraḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam // 7.073.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ prayāntaṃ munigaṇā āśīrvādaiḥ samantataḥ / apūjayan mahendrābhaṃ sahasrākṣam ivāmarāḥ // 7.073.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
svasthaḥ sa dadṛśe rāmaḥ puṣpake hemabhūṣite / śaśī meghasamīpastho yathā jaladharāgame // 7.073.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'rdhadivase prāpte pūjyamānas tatas tataḥ / ayodhyāṃ prāpya kākutstho vimānād avarohata // 7.073.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato visṛjya ruciraṃ puṣpakaṃ kāmagāminam / kakṣyāntaravinikṣiptaṃ dvāḥsthaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ // 7.073.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ caiva gatvā tau laghuvikramau / mamāgamanam ākhyāya śabdāpaya ca māṃ ciram // 7.073.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / dvāḥsthaḥ kumārāv āhūya rāghavāya nyavedayat // 7.074.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ prāptau priyau bharatalakṣmaṇau / pariṣvajya tato rāmo vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.074.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtaṃ mayā yathātathyaṃ dvijakāryam anuttamam / dharmasetumato bhūyaḥ kartum icchāmi rāghavau // 7.074.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yuvābhyām ātmabhūtābhyāṃ rājasūyam anuttamam / sahito yaṣṭum icchāmi tatra dharmo hi śāśvataḥ // 7.074.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iṣṭvā tu rājasūyena mitraḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ / suhutena suyajñena varuṇatvam upāgamat // 7.074.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
somaś ca rājasūyena iṣṭvā dharmeṇa dharmavit / prāptaś ca sarvalokānāṃ kīrtiṃ sthānaṃ ca śāśvatam // 7.074.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asminn ahani yac chreyaś cintyatāṃ tan mayā saha / hitaṃ cāyati yuktaṃ ca prayatau vaktum arhatha // 7.074.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutā tu rāghavasyaitad vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ / bharataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.074.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayi dharmaḥ paraḥ sādho tvayi sarvā vasuṃdharā / pratiṣṭhitā mahābāho yaśaś cāmitavikrama // 7.074.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mahīpālāś ca sarve tvāṃ prajāpatim ivāmarāḥ / nirīkṣante mahātmāno lokanāthaṃ yathā vayam // 7.074.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajāś ca pitṛvad rājan paśyanti tvāṃ mahābala / pṛthivyāṃ gatibhūto 'si prāṇinām api rāghava // 7.074.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ yajñam āhartāsi kathaṃ nṛpa / pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānāṃ vināśo yatra dṛśyate // 7.074.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛthivyāṃ ye ca puruṣā rājan pauruṣam āgatāḥ / sarveṣāṃ bhavitā tatra kṣayaḥ sarvāntakopamaḥ // 7.074.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla guṇair atulavikrama / pṛthivīṃ nārhase hantuṃ vaśe hi tava vartate // 7.074.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā / praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ // 7.074.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uvāca ca śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ kaikeyyā nandivardhanam / prīto 'smi parituṣṭo 'smi tavādya vacanena hi // 7.074.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
idaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ tvayā dharmasamāhitam / vyāhṛtaṃ puruṣavyāghra pṛthivyāḥ paripālanam // 7.074.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣa tasmād abhiprāyād rājasūyāt kratūttamān / nivartayāmi dharmajña tava suvyāhṛtena vai // 7.074.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajānāṃ pālanaṃ dharmo rājñāṃ yajñena saṃmitaḥ / tasmāc chṛṇomi te vākyaṃ sādhūktaṃ susamāhitam // 7.074.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathoktavati rāme tu bharate ca mahātmani / lakṣmaṇo 'pi śubhaṃ vākyam uvāca raghunandanam // 7.075.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśvamedho mahāyajñaḥ pāvanaḥ sarvapāpmanām / pāvanas tava durdharṣo rocatāṃ kratupuṃgavaḥ // 7.075.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyate hi purāvṛttaṃ vāsave sumahātmani / brahmahatyāvṛtaḥ śakro hayamedhena pāvitaḥ // 7.075.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
purā kila mahābāho devāsurasamāgame / vṛtro nāma mahān āsīd daiteyo lokasaṃmataḥ // 7.075.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vistīrṇā yojanaśatam ucchritas triguṇaṃ tataḥ / anurāgeṇa lokāṃs trīn snehāt paśyati sarvataḥ // 7.075.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ / śaśāsa pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ dharmeṇa susamāhitaḥ // 7.075.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin praśāsati tadā sarvakāmadughā mahī / rasavanti prasūtāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca // 7.075.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī susaṃpannā mahātmanaḥ / sa rājyaṃ tādṛśaṃ bhuṅkte sphītam adbhutadarśanam // 7.075.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā tapaḥ kuryām anuttamam / tapo hi paramaṃ śreyas tapo hi paramaṃ sukham // 7.075.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa nikṣipya sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ paureṣu parameśvaram / tapa ugram upātiṣṭhat tāpayan sarvadevatāḥ // 7.075.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapas tapyati vṛtre tu vāsavaḥ paramārtavat / viṣṇuṃ samupasaṃkramya vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.075.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapasyatā mahābāho lokā vṛtreṇa nirjitāḥ / balavān sa hi dharmātmā nainaṃ śakṣyāmi bādhitum // 7.075.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yady asau tapa ātiṣṭhed bhūya eva sureśvara / yāval lokā dhariṣyanti tāvad asya vaśānugāḥ // 7.075.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ cainaṃ paramodāram upekṣasi mahābala / kṣaṇaṃ hi na bhaved vṛtraḥ kruddhe tvayi sureśvara // 7.075.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadā hi prītisaṃyogaṃ tvayā viṣṇo samāgataḥ / tadā prabhṛti lokānāṃ nāthatvam upalabdhavān // 7.075.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ lokānāṃ kuruṣva sumahāyaśaḥ / tvatkṛtena hi sarvaṃ syāt praśāntam ajaraṃ jagat // 7.075.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime hi sarve viṣṇo tvāṃ nirīkṣante divaukasaḥ / vṛtraghatena mahatā eṣāṃ sāhyaṃ kuruṣva ha // 7.075.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvayā hi nityaśaḥ sāhyaṃ kṛtam eṣāṃ mahātmanām / asahyam idam anyeṣām agatīnāṃ gatir bhavān // 7.075.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā śatrunibarhaṇaḥ / vṛtraghātam aśeṣeṇa kathayety āha lakṣmaṇam // 7.076.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu sumitrānandavardhanaḥ / bhūya eva kathāṃ divyāṃ kathayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ // 7.076.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sahasrākṣavacaḥ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ ca divaukasām / viṣṇur devān uvācedaṃ sarvān indrapurogamān // 7.076.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūrvaṃ sauhṛdabaddho 'smi vṛtrasya sumahātmanaḥ / tena yuṣmat priyārthaṃ vai nāhaṃ hanmi mahāsuram // 7.076.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sukham uttamam / tasmād upāyam ākhyāsye yena vṛtraṃ haniṣyatha // 7.076.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tridhā bhūtaṃ kariṣye 'ham ātmānaṃ surasattamāḥ / tena vṛtraṃ sahasrākṣo haniṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // 7.076.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eko 'ṃśo vāsavaṃ yātu dvitīyo vajram eva tu / tṛtīyo bhūtalaṃ śakras tato vṛtraṃ haniṣyati // 7.076.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā bruvati deveśe devā vākyam athābruvan / evam etan na saṃdeho yathā vadasi daityahan // 7.076.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmo vṛtrāsuravadhaiṣiṇaḥ / bhajasva paramodāravāsavaṃ svena tejasā // 7.076.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sarve mahātmānaḥ sahasrākṣapurogamāḥ / tad araṇyam upākrāman yatra vṛtro mahāsuraḥ // 7.076.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te 'paśyaṃs tejasā bhūtaṃ tapantam asurottamam / pibantam iva lokāṃs trīn nirdahantam ivāmbaram // 7.076.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭvaiva cāsuraśreṣṭhaṃ devās trāsam upāgaman / katham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ kathaṃ na syāt parājayaḥ // 7.076.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ cintayatāṃ tatra sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ / vajraṃ pragṛhya bāhubhyāṃ prahiṇod vṛtramūrdhani // 7.076.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kālāgnineva ghoreṇa dīpteneva mahārciṣā / prataptaṃ vṛtraśirasi jagat trāsam upāgamat // 7.076.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asaṃbhāvyaṃ vadhaṃ tasya vṛtrasya vibudhādhipaḥ / cintayāno jagāmāśu lokasyāntaṃ mahāyaśāḥ // 7.076.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam indraṃ brahmahatyāśu gacchantam anugacchati / apatac cāsya gātreṣu tam indraṃ duḥkham āviśat // 7.076.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hatārayaḥ pranaṣṭendrā devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ / viṣṇuṃ tribhuvaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ muhur muhur apūjayan // 7.076.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ gatiḥ paramā deva pūrvajo jagataḥ prabhuḥ / rathārthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viṣṇutvam upajagmivān // 7.076.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hataś cāyaṃ tvayā vṛtro brahmahatyā ca vāsavam / bādhate suraśārdūla mokṣaṃ tasya vinirdiśa // 7.076.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā devānāṃ viṣṇur abravīt / mām eva yajatāṃ śakraḥ pāvayiṣyāmi vajriṇam // 7.076.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puṇyena hayamedhena mām iṣṭvā pākaśāsanaḥ / punar eṣyati devānām indratvam akutobhayaḥ // 7.076.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ saṃdiśya devānāṃ tāṃ vāṇīm amṛtopamā / jagāma viṣṇur deveśaḥ stūyamānas triviṣṭapam // 7.076.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā vṛtravadhaṃ sarvam akhilena sa lakṣmaṇaḥ / kathayitvā naraśreṣṭhaḥ kathāśeṣam upākramat // 7.077.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato hate mahāvīrye vṛtre devabhayaṃkare / brahmahatyāvṛtaḥ śakraḥ saṃjñāṃ lebhe na vṛtrahā // 7.077.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'ntam āśritya lokānāṃ naṣṭasaṃjño vicetanaḥ / kālaṃ tatrāvasat kaṃ cid veṣṭamāno yathoragaḥ // 7.077.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha naṣṭe sahasrākṣe udvignam abhavaj jagat / bhūmiś ca dhvastasaṃkāśā niḥsnehā śuṣkakānanā // 7.077.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niḥsrotasaś cāmbuvāhā hradāś ca saritas tathā / saṃkṣobhaś caiva sattvānām anāvṛṣṭikṛto 'bhavat // 7.077.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣīyamāṇe tu loke 'smin saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ surāḥ / yad uktaṃ viṣṇunā pūrvaṃ taṃ yajñaṃ samupānayan // 7.077.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sarve suragaṇāḥ sopādhyāyāḥ saharṣibhiḥ / taṃ deśaṃ sahitā jagmur yatrendro bhayamohitaḥ // 7.077.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tu dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaṃ mohitaṃ brahmahatyayā / taṃ puraskṛtya deveśam aśvamedhaṃ pracakrire // 7.077.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'śvamedhaḥ sumahān mahendrasya mahātmanaḥ / vavṛdhe brahmahatyāyāḥ pāvanārthaṃ nareśvara // 7.077.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yajñasamāptau tu brahmahatyā mahātmanaḥ / abhigamyābravīd vākyaṃ kva me sthānaṃ vidhāsyatha // 7.077.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te tām ūcus tato devās tuṣṭāḥ prītisamanvitāḥ / caturdhā vibhajātmānam ātmanaiva durāsade // 7.077.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā brahmahatyā mahātmanām / saṃnidhau sthānam anyatra varayām āsa durvasā // 7.077.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekenāṃśena vatsyāmi pūrṇodāsu nadīṣu vai / dvitīyena tu vṛkṣeṣu satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ // 7.077.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yo 'yam aṃśas tṛtīyo me strīṣu yauvanaśāliṣu / trirātraṃ darpaparṇāsu vasiṣye darpaghātinī // 7.077.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hantāro brāhmaṇān ye tu prekṣāpūrvam adūṣakān / tāṃś caturthena bhāgena saṃśrayiṣye surarṣabhāḥ // 7.077.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyūcus tāṃ tato devā yathā vadasi durvase / tathā bhavatu tat sarvaṃ sādhayasva yathepsitam // 7.077.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prītyānvitā devāḥ sahasrākṣaṃ vavandire / vijvaraḥ pūtapāpmā ca vāsavaḥ samapadyata // 7.077.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praśāntaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ sahasrākṣe pratiṣṭhate / yajñaṃ cādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ tadā śakro 'bhyapūjayat // 7.077.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īdṛśo hy aśvamedhasya prabhāvo raghunandana / yajasva sumahābhāga hayamedhena pārthiva // 7.077.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇenoktaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ / pratyuvāca mahātejāḥ prahasan rāghavo vacaḥ // 7.078.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam etan naraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa / vṛtraghātam aśeṣeṇa vājimedhaphalaṃ ca yat // 7.078.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrūyate hi purā saumya kardamasya prajāpateḥ / putro bāhlīśvaraḥ śrīmān ilo nāma sudhārmikaḥ // 7.078.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ vaśe kṛtvā mahāyaśāḥ / rājyaṃ caiva naravyāghra putravat paryapālayat // 7.078.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suraiś ca paramodārair daiteyaiś ca mahāsuraiḥ / nāgarākṣasagandharvair yakṣaiś ca sumahātmabhiḥ // 7.078.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pūjyate nityaśaḥ saumya bhayārtai raghunandana / abibhyaṃś ca trayo lokāḥ saroṣasya mahātmanaḥ // 7.078.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā tādṛśo hy āsīd dharme vīrye ca niṣṭhitaḥ / buddhyā ca paramodāro bāhlīkānāṃ mahāyaśāḥ // 7.078.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa pracakre mahābāhur mṛgayāṃ rucire vane / caitre manorame māsi sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ // 7.078.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajaghne sa nṛpo 'raṇye mṛgāñ śatasahasraśaḥ / hatvaiva tṛptir nābhūc ca rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ // 7.078.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānāmṛgāṇām ayutaṃ vadhyamānaṃ mahātmanā / yatra jāto mahāsenas taṃ deśam upacakrame // 7.078.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tu devadeveśaḥ śailarājasutāṃ haraḥ / ramayām āsa durdharṣaiḥ sarvair anucaraiḥ saha // 7.078.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtvā strībhūtam ātmānam umeśo gopatidhvajaḥ / devyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ sa tasmin parvatanirjhare // 7.078.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye ca tatra vanoddeśe sattvāḥ puruṣavādinaḥ / yac ca kiṃ cana tat sarvaṃ nārīsaṃjñaṃ babhūva ha // 7.078.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etasminn antare rājā sa ilaḥ kardamātmajaḥ / nighnan mṛgasahasrāṇi taṃ deśam upacakrame // 7.078.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā strīkṛtaṃ sarvaṃ savyālamṛgapakṣiṇam / ātmānaṃ sānugaṃ caiva strībhūtaṃ raghunandana // 7.078.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya duḥkhaṃ mahat tv āsīd dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ tathā gatam / umāpateś ca tat karma jñātvā trāsam upāgamat // 7.078.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato devaṃ mahātmānaṃ śitikaṇṭhaṃ kapardinam / jagāma śaraṇaṃ rājā sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ // 7.078.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahasya varadaḥ saha devyā mahāyaśāḥ / prajāpatisutaṃ vākyam uvāca varadaḥ svayam // 7.078.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha rājarṣe kārdameya mahābala / puruṣatvam ṛte saumya varaṃ varaya suvrata // 7.078.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa rājā śokārtāḥ pratyākhyāto mahātmanā / na sa jagrāha strībhūto varam anyaṃ surottamāt // 7.078.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ śokena mahatā śailarājasutāṃ nṛpaḥ / praṇipatya mahādevīṃ sarveṇaivāntarātmanā // 7.078.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īśe varāṇāṃ varade lokānām asi bhāmini / amoghadarśane devi bhaje saumye namo 'stu te // 7.078.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛdgataṃ tasya rājarṣer vijñāya harasaṃnidhau / pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ devī rudrasya saṃmatā // 7.078.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ardhasya devo varado varārdhasya tathā hy aham / tasmād ardhaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ strīpuṃsor yāvad icchasi // 7.078.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad adbhutatamaṃ śrutvā devyā varam anuttamam / saṃprahṛṣṭamanā bhūtvā rājā vākyam athābravīt // 7.078.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi devi prasannā me rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi / māsaṃ strītvam upāsitvā māsaṃ syāṃ puruṣaḥ punaḥ // 7.078.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īpsitaṃ tasya vijñāya devī surucirānanā / pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyam evam etad bhaviṣyati // 7.078.027	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājan puruṣabhūtas tvaṃ strībhāvaṃ na smariṣyasi / strībhūtaś cāparaṃ māsaṃ na smariṣyasi pauruṣam // 7.078.028	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa rājā puruṣo māmaṃ bhūtvātha kārdamiḥ / trailokyasundarī nārī māsam ekam ilābhavat // 7.078.029	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ kathām ilasaṃbaddhāṃ rāmeṇa samudīritām / lakṣmaṇo bharataś caiva śrutvā paramavismitau // 7.079.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tau rāmaṃ prāñjalībhūtvā tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ / vistaraṃ tasya bhāvasya tadā papracchatuḥ punaḥ // 7.079.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kathaṃ sa rājā strībhūto vartayām āsa durgatim / puruṣo vā yadā bhūtaḥ kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayaty asau // 7.079.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayos tad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā kautūhalasamanvitam / kathayām āsa kākutṣṭhas tasya rājño yathā gatam // 7.079.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam eva prathamaṃ māsaṃ strībhūtvā lokasundarī / tābhiḥ parivṛtā strībhir ye 'sya pūrvaṃ padānugāḥ // 7.079.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat kānanaṃ vigāhyāśu vijahre lokasundarī / drumagulmalatākīrṇaṃ padbhyāṃ padmadalekṣaṇā // 7.079.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vāhanāni ca sarvāṇi saṃtyaktvā vai samantataḥ / parvatābhogavivare tasmin reme ilā tadā // 7.079.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tasmin vanoddeśe parvatasyāvidūrataḥ / saraḥ suruciraprakhyaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇāyutam // 7.079.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dadarśa sā ilā tasmin budhaṃ somasutaṃ tadā / jvalantaṃ svena vapuṣā pūrṇaṃ somam ivoditam // 7.079.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapantaṃ ca tapas tīvram ambhomadhye durāsadam / yaśak saraṃ kāmagamaṃ tāruṇye paryavasthitam // 7.079.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā taṃ jalāśayaṃ sarvaṃ kṣobhayām āsa vismitā / saha taiḥ pūra puruṣaiḥ strībhūtai raghunandana // 7.079.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
budhas tu tāṃ nirīkṣyaiva kāmabāṇābhipīḍitaḥ / nopalebhe tadātmānaṃ cacāla ca tadāmbhasi // 7.079.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ilāṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sa trailokyābhyadhikāṃ śubhām / cintāṃ samabhyatikrāmat kā nv iyaṃ devatādhikā // 7.079.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na devīṣu na nāgīṣu nāsurīṣv apsaraḥsu ca / dṛṣṭapūrvā mayā kā cid rūpeṇaitena śobhitā // 7.079.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sadṛśīyaṃ mama bhaved yadi nānyaparigrahā / iti buddhiṃ samāsthāya jalāt sthalam upāgamat // 7.079.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa āśramaṃ samupāgamya catasraḥ pramadās tataḥ / śabdāpayata dharmātmā tāś cainaṃ ca vavandire // 7.079.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tāḥ papraccha dharmātma kasyaiṣā lokasundarī / kimartham āgatā ceha satyam ākhyāta māciram // 7.079.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śubhaṃ tu tasya tadvākyaṃ madhuraṃ madhurākṣaram / śrutvā tu tāḥ striyaḥ sarvā ūcur madhurayā girā // 7.079.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmākam eṣā suśroṇī prabhutve vartate sadā / apatiḥ kānanānteṣu sahāsmābhir aṭaty asau // 7.079.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vākyam avyaktapadaṃ tāsāṃ strīṇāṃ niśamya tu / vidyām āvartanīṃ puṇyām āvartayata sa dvijaḥ // 7.079.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'rthaṃ viditvā nikhilaṃ tasya rājño yathāgatam / sarvā eva striyas tāś ca babhāṣe munipuṃgavaḥ // 7.079.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atra kiṃ puruṣā bhadrā avasañ śailarodhasi / vatsyathāsmin girau yūyam avakāśo vidhīyatām // 7.079.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mūlaputraphalaiḥ sarvā vartayiṣyatha nityadā / striyaḥ kimpuruṣān nāma bhartṝn samupalapsyatha // 7.079.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāḥ śrutvā somaputrasya vācaṃ kiṃpuruṣīkṛtāḥ / upāsāṃ cakrire śailaṃ bahvyas tā bahudhā tadā // 7.079.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā kimpuruṣotpattiṃ lakṣmaṇo bharatas tadā / āścaryam iti cābrūtām ubhau rāmaṃ janeśvaram // 7.080.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha rāmaḥ kathām etāṃ bhūya eva mahāyaśāḥ / kathayām āsa dharmātmā prajāpatisutasya vai // 7.080.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvās tā vidrutā dṛṣṭvā kiṃnarīr ṛṣisattamaḥ / uvāca rūpasaṃpannāṃ tāṃ striyaṃ prahasann iva // 7.080.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
somasyāhaṃ sudayitaḥ sutaḥ surucirānane / bhajasva māṃ varārohe bhaktyā snigdhena cakṣuṣā // 7.080.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śūnye svajanavarjitā / ilā suruciraprakhyaṃ pratyuvāca mahāgraham // 7.080.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ kāmakarī saumya tavāsmi vaśavartinī / praśādhi māṃ somasuta yathecchasi tathā kuru // 7.080.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyās tad adbhutaprakhyaṃ śrutvā harṣasamanvitaḥ / sa vai kāmī saha tayā reme candramasaḥ sutaḥ // 7.080.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
budhasya mādhavo māsas tām ilāṃ rucirānanām / gato ramayato 'tyarthaṃ kṣaṇavat tasya kāminaḥ // 7.080.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha māse tu saṃpūrṇe pūrṇendusadṛśānanaḥ / prajāpatisutaḥ śrīmāñ śayane pratyabudhyata // 7.080.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'paśyat somajaṃ tatra tapyantaṃ salilāśaye / ūrdhvabāhuṃ nirālambaṃ taṃ rājā pratyabhāṣata // 7.080.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavan parvataṃ durgaṃ praviṣṭo 'smi sahānugaḥ / na ca paśyāmi tat sainyaṃ kva nu te māmakā gatāḥ // 7.080.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā tasya rājarṣer naṣṭasaṃjñasya bhāṣitam / pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ sāntvayan parayā girā // 7.080.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aśmavarṣeṇa mahatā bhṛtyās te vinipātitāḥ / tvaṃ cāśramapade supto vātavarṣabhayārditaḥ // 7.080.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te nirbhayo vigatajvaraḥ / phalamūlāśano vīra vasa ceha yathāsukham // 7.080.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa rājā tena vākyena pratyāśvasto mahāyaśāḥ / pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ dīno bhṛtyajanakṣayāt // 7.080.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ svakaṃ rājyaṃ nāhaṃ bhṛtyair vinā kṛtaḥ / vartayeyaṃ kṣaṇaṃ brahman samanujñātum arhasi // 7.080.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suto dharmaparo brahmañ jyeṣṭho mama mahāyaśāḥ / śaśabindur iti khyātaḥ sa me rājyaṃ prapatsyate // 7.080.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ gatvā bhṛtyadārān sukhānvitān / prativaktuṃ mahātejaḥ kiṃ cid apy aśubhaṃ vacaḥ // 7.080.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā bruvati rājendre budhaḥ paramam adbhutam / sāntvapūrvam athovāca vāsas ta iha rocatām // 7.080.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ kārdameya mahābala / saṃvatsaroṣitasyeha kārayiṣyāmi te hitam // 7.080.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā budhasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ / vāsāya vidadhe buddhiṃ yad uktaṃ brahmavādinā // 7.080.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māsaṃ sa strī tadā bhūtvā ramayaty aniśaṃ śubhā / māsaṃ puruṣabhāvena dharmabuddhiṃ cakāra saḥ // 7.080.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sa navame māsi ilā somasutātmajam / janayām āsa suśroṇī purūravasam ātmajam // 7.080.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jātamātraṃ tu suśroṇī pitur haste nyaveśayat / budhasya samavarṇābham ilāputraṃ mahābalam // 7.080.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
budho 'pi puruṣībhūtaṃ samāśvāsya narādhipam / kathābhī ramayām āsa dharmayuktābhir ātmavān // 7.080.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathoktavati rāme tu tasya janma tad adbhutam / uvāca lakṣmaṇo bhūyo bharataś ca mahāyaśāḥ // 7.081.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā priyā somaputrasya saṃvatsaram athoṣitā / akarot kiṃ naraśreṣṭha tat tvaṃ śaṃsitum arhasi // 7.081.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tayos tad vākyamādhuryaṃ niśamya paripṛcchatoḥ / rāmaḥ punar uvācemāṃ prajāpatisute kathām // 7.081.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
puruṣatvaṃ gate śūre budhaḥ paramabuddhimān / saṃvartaṃ paramodāram ājuhāva mahāyaśāḥ // 7.081.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
cyavanaṃ bhṛguputraṃ ca muniṃ cāriṣṭaneminam / pramodanaṃ modakaraṃ tato durvāsasaṃ munim // 7.081.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etān sarvān samānīya vākyajñas tattvadarśinaḥ / uvāca sarvān suhṛdo dhairyeṇa susamāhitaḥ // 7.081.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ rājā mahābāhuḥ kardamasya ilaḥ sutaḥ / jānītainaṃ yathā bhūtaṃ śreyo hy asya vidhīyatām // 7.081.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ saṃvadatām eva tam āśramam upāgamat / kardamaḥ sumahātejā dvijaiḥ saha mahātmabhiḥ // 7.081.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pulastyaś ca kratuś caiva vaṣaṭkāras tathaiva ca / oṃkāraś ca mahātejās tam āśramam upāgaman // 7.081.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te sarve hṛṣṭamanasaḥ parasparasamāgame / hitaiṣiṇo bāhli pateḥ pṛthag vākyam athābruvan // 7.081.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kardamas tv abravīd vākyaṃ sutārthaṃ paramaṃ hitam / dvijāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yac chreyaḥ pārthivasya hi // 7.081.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānyaṃ paśyāmi bhaiṣajyam antareṇa vṛṣadhvajam / nāśvamedhāt paro yajñaḥ priyaś caiva mahātmanaḥ // 7.081.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmād yajāmahe sarve pārthivārthe durāsadam / kardamenaivam uktās tu sarva eva dvijarṣabhāḥ // 7.081.013.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rocayanti sma taṃ yajñaṃ rudrasyārādhanaṃ prati // 7.081.013.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃvartasya tu rājarṣiḥ śiṣyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ / marutta iti vikhyatas taṃ yajñaṃ samupāharat // 7.081.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato yajño mahān āsīd budhāśramasamīpataḥ / rudraś ca paramaṃ toṣam ājagāma mahāyaśāḥ // 7.081.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha yajñasamāptau tu prītaḥ paramayā mudā / umāpatir dvijān sarvān uvācedam ilāṃ prati // 7.081.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prīto 'smi hayamedhena bhaktyā ca dvijasattamāḥ / asya bāhlipateś caiva kiṃ karomi priyaṃ śubham // 7.081.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā vadati deveśe dvijās te susamāhitāḥ / prasādayanti deveśaṃ yathā syāt puruṣas tv ilā // 7.081.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prītamanā rudraḥ puruṣatvaṃ dadau punaḥ / ilāyai sumahātejā dattvā cāntaradhīyata // 7.081.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nivṛtte hayamedhe tu gate cādarśanaṃ hare / yathāgataṃ dvijāḥ sarve agacchan dīrghadarśinaḥ // 7.081.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājā tu bāhlim utsṛjya madhyadeśe hy anuttamam / niveśayām āsa puraṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ yaśaskaram // 7.081.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaśabindus tu rājāsīd bāhlyāṃ parapuraṃjayaḥ / pratiṣṭhāna ilo rājā prajāpatisuto balī // 7.081.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa kāle prāptavāṃl lokam ilo brāhmam anuttamam / ailaḥ purūravā rājā pratiṣṭhānam avāptavān // 7.081.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īdṛśo hy aśvamedhasya prabhāvaḥ puruṣarṣabhau / strībhūtaḥ pauruṣaṃ lebhe yac cānyad api durlabham // 7.081.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etad ākhyāya kākutstho bhrātṛhyām amitaprabhaḥ / lakṣmaṇaṃ punār evāha dharmayuktam idaṃ vacaḥ // 7.082.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca jābālim atha kaśyapam / dvijāṃś ca sarvapravarān aśvamedhapuraskṛtān // 7.082.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
etān sarvān samāhūya mantrayitvā ca lakṣmaṇa / hayaṃ lakṣmaṇasaṃpannaṃ vimokṣyāmi samādhinā // 7.082.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vākyaṃ rāghaveṇoktaṃ śrutvā tvaritavikramaḥ / dvijān sarvān samāhūya darśayām āsa rāghavam // 7.082.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te dṛṣṭvā devasaṃkāśaṃ kṛtapādābhivandanam / rāghavaṃ sudurādharṣam āśīrbhiḥ samapūjayan // 7.082.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāñjalis tu tato bhūtvā rāghavo dvijasāttamān / uvāca dharmasaṃyuktam aśvamedhāśritaṃ vacaḥ // 7.082.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa teṣāṃ dvijamukhyānāṃ vākyam adbhutadarśanam / aśvamedhāśritaṃ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ prīto 'bhavat tadā // 7.082.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vijñāya tu mataṃ teṣāṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt / preṣayasva mahābāho sugrīvāya mahātmane // 7.082.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śīghraṃ mahadbhir haribhir bahibhiś ca tadāśrayaiḥ / sārdham āgaccha bhadraṃ te anubhoktuṃ makhottamam // 7.082.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇaś ca rakṣobhiḥ kāmagair bahubhir vṛtaḥ / aśvamedhaṃ mahābāhuḥ prāpnotu laghuvikramaḥ // 7.082.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājānaś ca naravyāghra ye me priyacikīrṣavaḥ / sānugāḥ kṣipram āyāntu yajñabhūmim anuttamām // 7.082.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
deśāntaragatā ye ca dvijā dharmaparāyaṇāḥ / nimantrayasva tān sarvān aśvamedhāya lakṣmaṇa // 7.082.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣayaś cā mahābāho āhūyantāṃ tapodhanāḥ / deśāntaragatā ye ca sadārāś ca maharṣayaḥ // 7.082.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajñavāṭaś ca sumahān gomatyā naimiṣe vane / ājñāpyatāṃ mahābāho tad dhi puṇyam anuttamam // 7.082.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śataṃ vāhasahasrāṇāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ vapuṣmatām / ayutaṃ tilamudgasya prayātv agre mahābala // 7.082.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
suvarṇakoṭyo bahulā hiraṇyasya śatottarāḥ / agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatv agre mahāmatiḥ // 7.082.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarāpaṇavīthyaś ca sarvāṃś ca naṭanartakān / naigamān bālavṛddhāṃś ca dvijāṃś ca susamāhitān // 7.082.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
karmāntikāṃś ca kuśalāñ śilpinaś ca supaṇḍitān / mātaraś caiva me sarvāḥ kumārāntaḥpurāṇi ca // 7.082.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāñcanīṃ mama patnīṃ ca dīkṣārhāṃ yajñakarmaṇi / agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatv agre mahāmatiḥ // 7.082.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tat sarvam akhilenāśu prasthāpya bharatāgrajaḥ / hayaṃ lakṣmaṇasaṃpannaṃ kṛṣṇasāraṃ mumoca ha // 7.083.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛtvigbhir lakṣmaṇaṃ sārdham aśve ca viniyujya saḥ / tato 'bhyagacchat kākutsthaḥ saha sainyena naimiṣam // 7.083.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajñavāṭaṃ mahābāhur dṛṣṭvā paramam adbhutam / praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe śrīmān iti ca so 'bravīt // 7.083.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
naimiṣe vasatas tasya sarva eva narādhipāḥ / ājagmuḥ sarvarāṣṭrebhyas tān rāmaḥ pratyapūjayat // 7.083.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
upakāryān mahārhāṃś ca pārthivānāṃ mahātmanām / sānugānāṃ naraśreṣṭho vyādideśa mahādyutiḥ // 7.083.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
annapānāni vastrāṇi sānugānāṃ mahātmanām / bharataḥ saṃdadāv āśu śatrughnasahitas tadā // 7.083.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāś ca mahātmānaḥ sugrīvasahitās tadā / viprāṇāṃ praṇatāḥ sarve cakrire pariveṣaṇam // 7.083.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vibhīṣaṇaś ca rakṣobhiḥ sragvibhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ / ṛṣīṇām ugratapasāṃ kiṃkaraḥ paryupasthitaḥ // 7.083.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ suvihito yajño hayamedho 'bhyavartata / lakṣmaṇenābhiguptā ca hayacaryā pravartitā // 7.083.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nānyaḥ śabdo 'bhavat tatra hayamedhe mahātmanaḥ / chandato dehi visrabdho yāvat tuṣyanti yācakāḥ // 7.083.010.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāvad vānararakṣobhir dattam evābhyadṛśyata // 7.083.010.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na kaś cin malinas tatra dīno vāpy atha vā kṛśaḥ / tasmin yajñavare rājño hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛte // 7.083.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye ca tatra mahātmāno munayaś cirajīvinaḥ / nāsmaraṃs tādṛśaṃ yajñaṃ dānaughasamalaṃkṛtam // 7.083.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rajatānāṃ suvarṇānāṃ ratnānām atha vāsasām / aniśaṃ dīyamānānāṃ nāntaḥ samupadṛśyate // 7.083.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na śakrasya na somasya yamasya varuṇasya vā / īdṛśo dṛṣṭapūrvo na evam ūcus tapodhanāḥ // 7.083.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvatra vānarās tasthuḥ sarvatraiva ca rākṣasāḥ / vāso dhanāni kāmibhyaḥ pūrṇahastā dadur bhṛśam // 7.083.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
īdṛśo rājasiṃhasya yajñaḥ sarvaguṇānvitaḥ / saṃvatsaram atho sāgraṃ vartate na ca hīyate // 7.083.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vartamāne tathābhūte yajñe paramake 'dbhute / saśiṣya ājagāmāśu vālmīkir munipuṃgavaḥ // 7.084.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dṛṣṭvā divyasaṃkāśaṃ yajñam adbhutadarśanam / ekānte ṛṣivāṭānāṃ cakāra uṭajāñ śubhān // 7.084.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa śiṣyāv abravīd dhṛṣṭo yuvāṃ gatvā samāhitau / kṛtsnaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kāvyaṃ gāyatāṃ parayā mudā // 7.084.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣivāṭeṣu puṇyeṣu brāhmaṇāvasatheṣu ca / rathyāsu rājamārgeṣu pārthivānāṃ gṛheṣu ca // 7.084.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya bhavanadvāri yatra karma ca vartate / ṛtvijām agrataś caiva tatra geyaṃ viśeṣataḥ // 7.084.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imāni ca phalāny atra svādūni vividhāni ca / jātāni parvatāgreṣu āsvādyāsvādya gīyatām // 7.084.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na yāsyathaḥ śramaṃ vatsau bhakṣayitvā phalāni vai / mūlāni ca sumṛṣṭāni nagarāt parihāsyatha // 7.084.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi śabdāpayed rāmaḥ śravaṇāya mahīpatiḥ / ṛṣīṇām upaviṣṭānāṃ tato geyaṃ pravartatām // 7.084.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divase viṃśatiḥ sargā geyā vai parayā mudā / pramāṇair bahubhis tatra yathoddiṣṭaṃ mayā purā // 7.084.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lobhaś cāpi na kartavyaḥ svalpo 'pi dhanakāṅkṣayā / kiṃ dhanenāśramasthānāṃ phalamūlopabhoginām // 7.084.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi pṛcchet sa kākutstho yuvāṃ kasyeti dārakau / vālmīker atha śiṣyau hi brūtām evaṃ narādhipam // 7.084.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imās tantrīḥ sumadhurāḥ sthānaṃ vā pūrvadarśitam / mūrchayitvā sumadhuraṃ gāyetāṃ vigatajvarau // 7.084.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādiprabhṛti geyaṃ syān na cāvajñāya pārthivam / pitā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ rājā bhavati dharmataḥ // 7.084.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad yuvāṃ hṛṣṭamanasau śvaḥ prabhāte samādhinā / gāyetāṃ madhuraṃ geyaṃ tantrīlayasamanvitam // 7.084.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iti saṃdiśya bahuśo muniḥ prācetasas tadā / vālmīkiḥ paramodāras tūṣṇīm āsīn mahāyaśāḥ // 7.084.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām adbhutāṃ tau hṛdaye kumārau; niveśya vāṇīm ṛṣibhāṣitāṃ śubhām / samutsukau tau sukham ūṣatur niśāṃ; yathāśvinau bhārgavanītisaṃskṛtau // 7.084.016	vaṃśastha [jtjr] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
tau rajanyāṃ prabhātāyāṃ snātau hutahutāśanau / yathoktam ṛṣiṇā pūrvaṃ tatra tatrābhyagāyatām // 7.085.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ sa śuśrāva kākutsthaḥ pūrvacaryāṃ tatas tataḥ / apūrvāṃ pāṭhya jātiṃ ca geyena samalaṃkṛtām // 7.085.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pramāṇair bahubhir baddhāṃ tantrīlayasamanvitām / bālābhyāṃ rāghavaḥ śrutvā kautūhalaparo 'bhavat // 7.085.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha karmāntare rājā samānīya mahāmunīn / pārthivāṃś ca naravyāghraḥ paṇḍitān naigamāṃs tathā // 7.085.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paurāṇikāñ śabdavito ye ca vṛddhā dvijātayaḥ / etān sarvān samānīya gātārau samaveśayat // 7.085.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hṛṣṭā ṛṣigaṇās tatra pārthivāś ca mahaujasaḥ / pibanta iva cakṣurbhyāṃ rājānaṃ gāyakau ca tau // 7.085.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parasparam athocus te sarva eva samaṃ tataḥ / ubhau rāmasya sadṛśau bimbād bimbam ivoddhṛtau // 7.085.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jaṭilau yadi na syātāṃ na valkaladharau yadi / viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchāmo gāyato rāghavasya ca // 7.085.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ saṃvadatām evaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ harṣavardhanam / geyaṃ pracakratus tatra tāv ubhau munidārakau // 7.085.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pravṛttaṃ madhuraṃ gāndharvam atimānuṣam / na ca tṛptiṃ yayuḥ sarve śrotāro geya saṃpadā // 7.085.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pravṛttam āditaḥ pūrvaṃ sargān nāradadarśanāt / tataḥ prabhṛti sargāṃś ca yāvadviṃśaty agāyatām // 7.085.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato 'parāhṇasamaye rāghavaḥ samabhāṣata / śrutvā viṃśatisargāṃs tān bharataṃ bhrātṛvatsalaḥ // 7.085.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṣṭādaśa sahasrāṇi suvarṇasya mahātmanoḥ / dadasva śīghraṃ kākutstha bālayor mā vṛthā śramaḥ // 7.085.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dīyamānaṃ suvarṇaṃ tan nāgṛhṇītāṃ kuśīlavau / ūcatuś ca mahātmānau kim aneneti vismitau // 7.085.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vanyena phalamūlena niratu svo vanaukasau / suvarṇena hiraṇyena kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vane // 7.085.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tayoḥ prabruvatoḥ kautūhalasamanvitāḥ / śrotāraś caiva rāmaś ca sarva eva suvismitāḥ // 7.085.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya caivāgamaṃ rāmaḥ kāvyasya śrotum utsukaḥ / papraccha tau mahātejās tāv ubhau munidārakau // 7.085.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃpramāṇam idaṃ kāvyaṃ kā pratiṣṭhā mahātmanaḥ / kartā kāvyasya mahataḥ ko vāsau munipuṃgavaḥ // 7.085.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛcchantaṃ rāghavaṃ vākyam ūcatur munidārakau / vālmīkir bhagavān kartā saṃprāpto yajñasaṃnidhim // 7.085.019.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yenedaṃ caritaṃ tubhyam aśeṣaṃ saṃpradarśitam // 7.085.019.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādiprabhṛti rājendra pañcasarga śatāni ca / pratiṣṭhā jīvitaṃ yāvat tāvad rājañ śubhāśubham // 7.085.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā rājañ śravaṇāya mahāratha / karmāntare kṣaṇī hūtas tac chṛṇuṣva sahānujaḥ // 7.085.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bāḍham ity abravīd rāmas tau cānujñāpya rāghavam / prahṛṣṭau jagmatur vāsaṃ yatrāsau munipuṃgavaḥ // 7.085.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo 'pi munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ pārthivaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ / śrutvā tad gītamādhuryaṃ karmaśālām upāgamat // 7.085.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmo bahūny ahāny eva tad gītaṃ paramādbhutam / śuśrāva munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ rājabhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // 7.086.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin gīte tu vijñāya sītāputrau kuśīlavau / tasyāḥ pariṣado madhye rāmo vacanam abravīt // 7.086.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madvaco brūta gacchadhvam iti bhagavato 'ntikam // 7.086.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi śuddhasamācārā yadi vā vītakalmaṣā / karotv ihātmanaḥ śuddhim anumānya mahāmunim // 7.086.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
chandaṃ munes tu vijñāya sītāyāś ca manogatam / pratyayaṃ dātukāmāyās tataḥ śaṃsata me laghu // 7.086.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śvaḥ prabhāte tu śapathaṃ maithilī janakātmajā / karotu pariṣanmadhye śodhanārthaṃ mameha ca // 7.086.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu rāghavasyaitad vacaḥ paramam adbhutam / dūtāḥ saṃprayayur vāṭaṃ yatrāste munipuṃgavaḥ // 7.086.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te praṇamya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam amitaprabham / ūcus te rāma vākyāni mṛdūni madhurāṇi ca // 7.086.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāmasya ca manogatam / vijñāya sumahātejā munir vākyam athābravīt // 7.086.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yathā tuṣyati rāghavaḥ / tathā kariṣyate sītā daivataṃ hi patiḥ striyāḥ // 7.086.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathoktā muninā sarve rāmadūtā mahaujasaḥ / pratyetya rāghavaṃ sarve munivākyaṃ babhāṣire // 7.086.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ kākutsthaḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ / ṛṣīṃs tatra sametāṃś ca rājñaś caivābhyabhāṣata // 7.086.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhagavantaḥ saśiṣyā vai sānugaś ca narādhipāḥ / paśyantu sītāśapathaṃ yaś caivānyo 'bhikāṅkṣate // 7.086.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ / sarveṣam ṛṣimukhyānāṃ sādhuvādo mahān abhūt // 7.086.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rājānaś ca mahātmānaḥ praśaṃsanti sma rāghavam / upapannaṃ naraśreṣṭha tvayy eva bhuvi nānyataḥ // 7.086.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā śvobhūta iti rāghavaḥ / visarjayām āsa tadā sarvāṃs tāñ śatrusūdanaḥ // 7.086.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasyāṃ rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ yajñavāṭagato nṛpaḥ / ṛṣīn sarvān mahātejāḥ śabdāpayati rāghavaḥ // 7.087.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ / viśvāmitro dīrghatapā durvāsāś ca mahātapāḥ // 7.087.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agastyo 'tha tathāśaktir bhārgavaś caiva vāmanaḥ / mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dīrghāyur maudgalyaś ca mahātapāḥ // 7.087.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhārgavaś cyavanaś caiva śatānandaś ca dharmavit / bharadvājaś ca tejasvī agniputraś ca suprabhaḥ // 7.087.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ete cānye ca munayo bahavaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / rājānaś ca naravyāghrāḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ // 7.087.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rākṣasāś ca mahāvīryā vānarāś ca mahābalāḥ / samājagmur mahātmānaḥ sarva eva kutūhalāt // 7.087.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṣatriyāś caiva vaiśyāś ca śūdrāś caiva sahasraśaḥ / sītāśapathavīkṣārthaṃ sarva eva samāgatāḥ // 7.087.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā samāgataṃ sarvam aśvabhūtam ivācalam / śrutvā munivaras tūrṇaṃ sasītaḥ samupāgamat // 7.087.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam ṛṣiṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītā sānvagacchad avāṅmukhī / kṛtāñjalir bāṣpagalā kṛtvā rāmaṃ manogatam // 7.087.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śrīm ivāyāntīṃ brahmāṇam anugāminīm / vālmīkeḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītāṃ sādhukāro mahān abhūt // 7.087.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato halahalā śabdaḥ sarveṣām evam ābabhau / duḥkhajena viśālena śokenākulitātmanām // 7.087.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhu sīteti ke cit tu sādhu rāmeti cāpare / ubhāv eva tu tatrānye sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan // 7.087.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato madhyaṃ janaughānāṃ praviśya munipuṃgavaḥ / sītāsahāyo vālmīkir iti hovāca rāghavam // 7.087.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ dāśarathe sītā suvratā dharmacāriṇī / apāpā te parityaktā mamāśramasamīpataḥ // 7.087.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lokāpavādabhītasya tava rāma mahāvrata / pratyayaṃ dāsyate sītā tām anujñātum arhasi // 7.087.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau ca jānakī putrāv ubhau ca yamajātakau / sutau tavaiva durdharṣo satyam etad bravīmi te // 7.087.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pracetaso 'haṃ daśamaḥ putro rāghavanandana / na smarāmy anṛtaṃ vākyaṃ tathemau tava putrakau // 7.087.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bahuvarṣasahasrāṇi tapaścaryā mayā kṛtā / tasyāḥ phalam upāśnīyām apāpā maithilī yathā // 7.087.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ahaṃ pañcasu bhūteṣu manaḥṣaṣṭheṣu rāghava / vicintya sītāṃ śuddheti nyagṛhṇāṃ vananirjhare // 7.087.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
iyaṃ śuddhasamācārā apāpā patidevatā / lokāpavādabhītasya dāsyati pratyayaṃ tava // 7.087.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vālmīkinaivam uktas tu rāghavaḥ pratyabhāṣata / prāñjalir jagato madhye dṛṣṭvā tāṃ devavarṇinīm // 7.088.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evam etan mahābhāga yathā vadasi dharmavit / pratyayo hi mama brahmaṃs tava vākyair akalmaṣaiḥ // 7.088.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyayo hi purā datto vaidehyā surasaṃnidhau / seyaṃ lokabhayād brahmann apāpety abhijānatā // 7.088.003.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
parityaktā mayā sītā tad bhavān kṣantum arhati // 7.088.003.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jānāmi cemau putrau me yamajātau kuśīlavau / śuddhāyāṃ jagato madhye maithilyāṃ prītir astu me // 7.088.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiprāyaṃ tu vijñāya rāmasya surasattamāḥ / pitāmahaṃ puraskṛtya sarva eva samāgatāḥ // 7.088.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ādityā vasavo rudrā viśve deśā marudgaṇāḥ / aśvināv ṛṣigandharvā apsarāṇāṃ gaṇās tathā // 7.088.006.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhyāś ca devāḥ sarve te sarve ca paramarṣayaḥ // 7.088.006.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vāyuḥ śubhaḥ puṇyo divyagandho manoramaḥ / taṃ janaughaṃ suraśreṣṭho hlādayām āsa sarvataḥ // 7.088.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad adbhutam ivācintyaṃ nirīkṣante samāhitāḥ / mānavāḥ sarvarāṣṭrebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge yathā // 7.088.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvān samāgatān dṛṣṭvā sītā kāṣāyavāsinī / abravīt prāñjalir vākyam adhodṛṣṭir avānmukhī // 7.088.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yathāhaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ manasāpi na cintaye / tathā me mādhavī devī vivaraṃ dātum arhati // 7.088.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā śapantyāṃ vaidehyāṃ prādurāsīt tad adbhutam / bhūtalād utthitaṃ divyaṃ siṃhāsanam anuttamam // 7.088.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhriyamāṇaṃ śirobhis tan nāgair amitavikramaiḥ / divyaṃ divyena vapuṣā sarvaratnavibhūṣitam // 7.088.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tu dharaṇī devī bāhubhyāṃ gṛhya maithilīm / svāgatenābhinandyainām āsane copaveṣayat // 7.088.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām āsanagatāṃ dṛṣṭvā praviśantīṃ rasātalam / puṇyavṛṣṭir avicchinnā divyā sītām avākirat // 7.088.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sādhukāraś ca sumahān devānāṃ sahasotthitaḥ / sādhu sādhv iti vai sīte yasyās te śīlam īdṛśam // 7.088.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ bahuvidhā vāco hy antarikṣagatāḥ surāḥ / vyājahrur hṛṣṭamanaso dṛṣṭvā sītāpraveśanam // 7.088.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yajñavāṭagatāś cāpi munayaḥ sarva eva te / rājānaś ca naravyāghrā vismayān noparemire // 7.088.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
antarikṣe ca bhūmau ca sarve sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ / dānavāś ca mahākāyāḥ pātāle pannagādhipāḥ // 7.088.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ke cid vineduḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ ke cid dhyānaparāyaṇāḥ / ke cid rāmaṃ nirīkṣante ke cit sītām acetanāḥ // 7.088.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sītāpraveśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣām āsīt samāgamaḥ / taṃ muhūrtam ivātyarthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃmohitaṃ jagat // 7.088.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tadāvasāne yajñasya rāmaḥ paramadurmanāḥ / apaśyamāno vaidehīṃ mene śūnyam idaṃ jagat // 7.089.001.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śokena paramāyatto na śāntiṃ manasāgamat // 7.089.001.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visṛjya pārthivān sarvān ṛkṣavānararākṣasān / janaughaṃ brahmamukhyānāṃ vittapūrṇaṃ vyasarjayat // 7.089.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato visṛjya tān sarvān rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ / hṛdi kṛtvā tadā sītām ayodhyāṃ praviveśa saḥ // 7.089.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na sītāyāḥ parāṃ bhāryāṃ vavre sa raghunandanaḥ / yajñe yajñe ca patnyarthaṃ jānakī kāñcanī bhavat // 7.089.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi vājimedham upākarot / vājapeyān daśaguṇāṃs tathā bahusuvarṇakān // 7.089.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agniṣṭomātirātrābhyāṃ gosavaiś ca mahādhanaiḥ / īje kratubhir anyaiś ca sa śrīmān āptadakṣiṇaiḥ // 7.089.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sa kālaḥ sumahān rājyasthasya mahātmanaḥ / dharme prayatamānasya vyatīyād rāghavasya tu // 7.089.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛkṣavānararakṣāṃsi sthitā rāmasya śāsane / anurajyanti rājāno ahany ahani rāghavam // 7.089.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kāle varṣati parjanyaḥ subhikṣaṃ vimalā diśaḥ / hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇaṃ puraṃ janapadas tathā // 7.089.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nākāle mriyate kaś cin na vyādhiḥ prāṇināṃ tadā / nādharmaś cābhavat kaś cid rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // 7.089.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha dīrghasya kālasya rāmamātā yaśasvinī / putrapautraiḥ parivṛtā kāladharmam upāgamat // 7.089.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anviyāya sumitrāpi kaikeyī ca yaśasvinī / dharmaṃ kṛtvā bahuvidhaṃ tridive paryavasthitā // 7.089.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ svarge rājñā daśarathena ca / samāgatā mahābhāgāḥ saha dharmaṃ ca lebhire // 7.089.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tāsāṃ rāmo mahādānaṃ kāle kāle prayacchati / mātṝṇām aviśeṣeṇa brāhmaṇeṣu tapasviṣu // 7.089.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitryāṇi bahuratnāni yajñān paramadustarān / cakāra rāmo dharmātmā pitṝn devān vivardhayan // 7.089.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kasya cit tv atha kālasya yudhājit kekayo nṛpaḥ / svaguruṃ preṣayām āsa rāghavāya mahātmane // 7.090.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gārgyam aṅgirasaḥ putraṃ brahmarṣim amitaprabham / daśa cāśvasahasrāṇi prītidānam anuttamam // 7.090.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kambalāni ca ratnāni citravastram athottamam / rāmāya pradadau rājā bahūny ābharaṇāni ca // 7.090.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu rāghavo gārgyaṃ maharṣiṃ samupāgatam / mātulasyāśvapatinaḥ priyaṃ dūtam upāgatam // 7.090.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pratyudgamya ca kākutsthaḥ krośamātraṃ sahānugaḥ / gārgyaṃ saṃpūjayām āsa dhanaṃ tat pratigṛhya ca // 7.090.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣṭvā ca prītidaṃ sarvaṃ kuśalaṃ mātulasya ca / upaviṣṭaṃ mahābhāgaṃ rāmaḥ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame // 7.090.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kim āha matulo vākyaṃ yadarthaṃ bhagavān iha / prāpto vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭha sākṣād iva bṛhaspatiḥ // 7.090.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā brahmarṣiḥ kāryavistaram / vaktum adbhutasaṃkāśaṃ rāghavāyopacakrame // 7.090.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mātulas te mahābāho vākyam āha nararṣabha / yudhājit prītisaṃyuktaṃ śrūyatāṃ yadi rocate // 7.090.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ayaṃ gandharvaviṣayaḥ phalamūlopaśobhitaḥ / sindhor ubhayataḥ pārśve deśaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ // 7.090.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ ca rakṣanti gandharvāḥ sāyudhā yuddhakovidāḥ / śailūṣasya sutā vīrās tisraḥ koṭyo mahābalāḥ // 7.090.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tān vinirjitya kākutstha gandharvaviṣayaṃ śubham / niveśaya mahābāho dve pure susamāhitaḥ // 7.090.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anyasya na gatis tatra deśaś cāyaṃ suśobhanaḥ / rocatāṃ te mahābāho nāhaṃ tvām anṛtaṃ vade // 7.090.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā rāghavaḥ prīto mararṣir mātulasya ca / uvāca bāḍham ity evaṃ bharataṃ cānvavaikṣata // 7.090.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bravīd rāghavaḥ prītaḥ prāñjalipragraho dvijam / imau kumārau taṃ deśaṃ brahmarṣe vijayiṣyataḥ // 7.090.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharatasyātmajau vīrau takṣaḥ puṣkala eva ca / mātulena suguptau tau dharmeṇa ca samāhitau // 7.090.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataṃ cāgrataḥ kṛtvā kumārau sabalānugau / nihatya gandharvasutān dve pure vibhajiṣyataḥ // 7.090.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niveśya te puravare ātmājau saṃniveśya ca / āgamiṣyati me bhūyaḥ sakāśam atidhārmikaḥ // 7.090.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
brahmarṣim evam uktvā tu bharataṃ sabalānugam / ājñāpayām āsa tadā kumārau cābhyaṣecayat // 7.090.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
nakṣatreṇa ca saumyena puraskṛtyāṅgiraḥ sutam / bharataḥ saha sainyena kumārābhyāṃ ca niryayau // 7.090.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sā senā śakrayukteva naragān niryayāv atha / rāghavānugatā dūraṃ durādharṣā surāsuraiḥ // 7.090.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
māṃsāśīni ca sattvāni rakṣāṃsi sumahānti ca / anujagmuś ca bharataṃ rudhirasya pipāsayā // 7.090.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhūtagrāmāś ca bahavo māṃsabhakṣāḥ sudāruṇāḥ / gandharvaputramāṃsāni bhoktukāmāḥ sahasraśaḥ // 7.090.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
siṃhavyāghrasṛgālānāṃ khecarāṇāṃ ca pakṣiṇām / bahūni vai sahasrāṇi senāyā yayur agrataḥ // 7.090.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhyardhamāsam uṣitā pathi senā nirāmayā / hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇā kekayaṃ samupāgamat // 7.090.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā senāpatiṃ prāptaṃ bharataṃ kekayādhipaḥ / yudhājid gārgyasahitaṃ parāṃ prītim upāgamat // 7.091.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa niryayau janaughena mahatā kekayādhipaḥ / tvaramāṇo 'bhicakrāma gandharvān devarūpiṇaḥ // 7.091.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataś ca yudhājic ca sametau laghuvikramau / gandharvanagaraṃ prāptau sabalau sapadānugau // 7.091.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā tu bharataṃ prāptaṃ gandharvās te samāgatāḥ / yoddhukāmā mahāvīryā vinadantaḥ samantataḥ // 7.091.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / saptarātraṃ mahābhīmaṃ na cānyatarayor jayaḥ // 7.091.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmānujaḥ kruddhaḥ kālasyāstraṃ sudāruṇam / saṃvartaṃ nāma bharato gandharveṣv abhyayojayat // 7.091.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te baddhāḥ kālapāśena saṃvartena vidāritāḥ / kṣaṇenābhihatās tisras tatra koṭyo mahātmanā // 7.091.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ ghātaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ na smaranti divaukasaḥ / nimeṣāntaramātreṇa tādṛśānāṃ mahātmanām // 7.091.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
hateṣu teṣu vīreṣu bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ / niveśayām āsa tadā samṛddhe dve purottame // 7.091.009.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
takṣaṃ takṣaśilāyāṃ tu puṣkaraṃ puṣkarāvatau // 7.091.009.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
gandharvadeśo ruciro gāndhāraviṣayaś ca saḥ / varṣaiḥ pañcabhir ākīrṇo viṣayair nāgarais tathā // 7.091.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dhanaratnaughasaṃpūrṇo kānanair upaśobhite / anyonyasaṃgharṣakṛte spardhayā guṇavistare // 7.091.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhe suruciraprakhye vyavahārair akalmaṣaiḥ / udyānayānaughavṛte suvibhaktāntarāpaṇe // 7.091.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhe puravare ramye vistarair upaśobhite / gṛhamukhyaiḥ surucirair vimānaiḥ samavarṇibhiḥ // 7.091.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śobhite śobhanīyaiś ca devāyatanavistaraiḥ / niveśya pañcabhir varṣair bharato rāghavānujaḥ // 7.091.014.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
punar āyān mahābāhur ayodhyāṃ kaikayīsutaḥ // 7.091.014.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ sākṣād dharmam ivāparam / rāghavaṃ bharataḥ śrīmān brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ // 7.091.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śaśaṃsa ca yathāvṛttaṃ gandharvavadham uttamam / niveśanaṃ ca deśasya śrutvā prīto 'sya rāghavaḥ // 7.091.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā harṣam āpede rāghavo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha / vākyaṃ cādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ bhrātṝn provāca rāghavaḥ // 7.092.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau kumārau saumitre tava dharmaviśāradau / aṅgadaś candraketuś ca rājyārhau dṛḍhadhanvinau // 7.092.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau rājye 'bhiṣekṣyāmi deśaḥ sādhu vidhīyatām / ramaṇīyo hy asaṃbādho rametāṃ yatra dhanvinau // 7.092.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na rājñāṃ yatra pīdā syān nāśramāṇāṃ vināśanam / sa deśo dṛśyatāṃ saumya nāparādhyāmahe yathā // 7.092.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathoktavati rāme tu bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha / ayaṃ kārāpatho deśaḥ suramaṇyo nirāmayaḥ // 7.092.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
niveśyatāṃ tatra puram aṅgadasya mahātmanaḥ / candraketoś ca ruciraṃ candrakāntaṃ nirāmayam // 7.092.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vākyaṃ bharatenoktaṃ pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ / taṃ ca kṛtā vaśe deśam aṅgadasya nyaveśayat // 7.092.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadīyā purī ramyā aṅgadasya niveśitā / ramaṇīyā suguptā ca rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā // 7.092.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
candraketus tu mallasya mallabhūmyāṃ niveśitā / candrakānteti vikhyātā divyā svargapurī yathā // 7.092.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato rāmaḥ parāṃ prītiṃ bharato lakṣmaṇas tathā / yayur yudhi durādharṣā abhiṣekaṃ ca cakrire // 7.092.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣicya kumārau dvau prasthāpya sabalānugau / aṅgadaṃ paścimā bhūmiṃ candraketum udaṅmukham // 7.092.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
aṅgadaṃ cāpi saumitrir lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha / candraketos tu bharataḥ pārṣṇigrāho babhūva ha // 7.092.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇas tv aṅgadīyāyāṃ saṃvatsaram athoṣitaḥ / putre sthite durādharṣe ayodhyāṃ punar āgamat // 7.092.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharato 'pi tathaivoṣya saṃvatsaram athādhikam / ayodhyāṃ punar agamya rāmapādāv upāgamat // 7.092.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ubhau saumitribharatau rāmapādāv anuvratau / kālaṃ gatam api snehān na jajñāte 'tidhārmikau // 7.092.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi daśateṣāṃ yayus tadā / dharme prayatamānānāṃ paurakāryeṣu nityadā // 7.092.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vihṛtya lākaṃ paripūrṇamānasāḥ; śriyā vṛtā dharmapathe pare sthitāḥ / trayaḥ samiddhā iva dīptatejasā; hutāgnayaḥ sādhu mahādhvare trayaḥ // 7.092.017	vaṃśastha [jtjr]
kasya cit tv atha kālasya rāme dharmapathe sthite / kālas tāpasarūpeṇa rājadvāram upāgamat // 7.093.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ dhṛtimantaṃ yaśasvinam / māṃ nivedaya rāmāya saṃprāptaṃ kāryagauravāt // 7.093.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dūto hy atibalasyāhaṃ maharṣer amitaujasaḥ / rāmaṃ didṛkṣur āyātaḥ kāryeṇa hi mahābala // 7.093.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitris tvarayānvitaḥ / nyavedayata rāmāya tāpasasya vivakṣitam // 7.093.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jayasva rājan dharmeṇa ubhau lokau mahādyute / dūtas tvāṃ draṣṭum āyātas tapasvī bhāskaraprabhaḥ // 7.093.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇenoktaṃ śrutvā rāma uvāca ha / praveśyatāṃ munis tāta mahaujās tasya vākyadhṛk // 7.093.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saumitris tu tathety uktvā prāveśayata taṃ munim / jvalantam iva tejobhiḥ pradahantam ivāṃśubhiḥ // 7.093.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhigamya raghuśreṣṭhaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā / ṛṣir madhurayā vācā vardhasvety āha rāghavam // 7.093.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmai rāmo mahātejāḥ pūjām arghya purogamām / dadau kuśalam avyagraṃ praṣṭuṃ caivopacakrame // 7.093.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pṛṣṭhaś ca kuśalaṃ tena rāmeṇa vadatāṃ varaḥ / āsane kāñcane divye niṣasāda mahāyaśāḥ // 7.093.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam uvāca tato rāmaḥ svāgataṃ te mahāmune / prāpayasva ca vākyāni yato dūtas tvam āgataḥ // 7.093.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
codito rājasiṃhena munir vākyam udīrayat / dvandvam etat pravaktavyaṃ na ca cakṣur hataṃ vacaḥ // 7.093.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yaḥ śṛṇoti nirīkṣed vā sa vadhyas tava rāghava / bhaved vai munimukhyasya vacanaṃ yady avekṣase // 7.093.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatheti ca pratijñāya rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt / dvāri tiṣṭha mahābāho pratihāraṃ visarjaya // 7.093.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa me vadhyaḥ khalu bhavet kathāṃ dvandvasamīritām / ṛṣer mama ca saumitre paśyed vā śṛṇuyā ca yaḥ // 7.093.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato nikṣipya kākutstho lakṣmaṇaṃ dvārasaṃgrahe / tam uvāca muniṃ vākyaṃ kathayasveti rāghavaḥ // 7.093.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yat te manīṣitaṃ vākyaṃ yena vāsi samāhitaḥ / kathayasva viśaṅkas tvaṃ mamāpi hṛdi vartate // 7.093.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śṛṇu rāma mahābāho yadartham aham āhataḥ / pitāmahena devena preṣito 'smi mahābala // 7.094.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tavāhaṃ pūrvake bhāve putraḥ parapuraṃjaya / māyāsaṃbhāvito vīra kālaḥ sarvasamāharaḥ // 7.094.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahaś ca bhagavān āha lokapatiḥ prabhuḥ / samayas te mahābāho svarlokān parirakṣitum // 7.094.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
saṃkṣipya ca purā lokān māyayā svayam eva hi / mahārṇave śayāno 'psu māṃ tvaṃ pūrvam ajījanaḥ // 7.094.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhogavantaṃ tato nāgam anantam udake śayam / māyayā janayitvā tvaṃ dvau ca sattvau mahābalau // 7.094.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
madhuṃ ca kaiṭabhaṃ caiva yayor asthicayair vṛtā / iyaṃ parvatasaṃbādhā medinī cābhavan mahī // 7.094.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
padme divyārkasaṃkāśe nābhyām utpādya mām api / prājāpatyaṃ tvayā karma sarvaṃ mayi niveśitam // 7.094.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'haṃ saṃnyastabhāro hi tvām upāse jagatpatim / rakṣāṃ vidhatsva bhūteṣu mama tejaḥ karo bhavān // 7.094.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tvam api durdharṣas tasmād bhāvāt sanātanāt / rakṣārthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viṣṇutvam upajagmivān // 7.094.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adityāṃ vīryavān putro bhrātṝṇāṃ harṣavardhanaḥ / samutpanneṣu kṛtyeṣu lokasāhyāya kalpase // 7.094.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ vitrāsyamānāsu prajāsu jagatāṃ vara / rāvaṇasya vadhākāṅkṣī mānuṣeṣu mano 'dadhāḥ // 7.094.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca / kṛtvā vāsasya niyatiṃ svayam evātmanaḥ purā // 7.094.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ manomayaḥ putraḥ pūrṇāyur mānuṣeṣv iha / kālo naravaraśreṣṭha samīpam upavartitum // 7.094.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi bhūyo mahārāja prajā icchasy upāsitum / vasa vā vīra bhadraṃ te evam āha pitāmahaḥ // 7.094.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha vā vijigīṣā te suralokāya rāghava / sanāthā viṣṇunā devā bhavantu vigatajvarāḥ // 7.094.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā pitāmahenoktaṃ vākyaṃ kālasamīritam / rāghavaḥ prahasan vākyaṃ sarvasaṃhāram abravīt // 7.094.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutaṃ me devadevasya vākyaṃ paramam adbhutam / prītir hi mahatī jātā tavāgamanasaṃbhavā // 7.094.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmi yata evāham āgataḥ / hṛd gato hy asi saṃprāpto na me 'sty atra vicāraṇā // 7.094.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mayā hi sarvakṛtyeṣu devānāṃ vaśavartinām / sthātavyaṃ sarvasaṃhāre yathā hy āha pitāmahaḥ // 7.094.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathā tayoḥ kathayator durvāsā bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / rāmasya darśanākāṅkṣī rājadvāram upāgamat // 7.095.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhigamya ca saumitrim uvāca ṛṣisattamaḥ / rāmaṃ darśaya me śīghraṃ purā me 'rtho 'tivartate // 7.095.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
munes tu bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā / abhivādya mahātmānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.095.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kiṃ kāryaṃ brūhi bhagavan ko vārthaḥ kiṃ karomy aham / vyagro hi rāghavo brahman muhūrtaṃ vā pratīkṣatām // 7.095.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā ṛṣiśārdūlaḥ krodhena kaluṣīkṛtaḥ / uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā // 7.095.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
asmin kṣaṇe māṃ saumitre rāmāya prativedaya / viṣayaṃ tvāṃ puraṃ caiva śapiṣye rāghavaṃ tathā // 7.095.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataṃ caiva saumitre yuṣmākaṃ yā ca saṃtatiḥ / na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ bhūyo manyuṃ dhārayituṃ hṛdi // 7.095.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ / cintayām āsa manasā tasya vākyasya niścayam // 7.095.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ekasya maraṇaṃ me 'stu mā bhūt sarvavināśanam / iti buddhyā viniścitya rāghavāya nyavedayat // 7.095.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ kālaṃ visṛjya ca / niṣpatya tvaritaṃ rājā atreḥ putraṃ dadarśa ha // 7.095.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā / kiṃ kāryam iti kākutsthaḥ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata // 7.095.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tad vākyaṃ rāghaveṇṇoktaṃ śrutvā munivaraḥ prabhuḥ / pratyāha rāmaṃ durvāsāḥ śrūyatāṃ dharmavatsala // 7.095.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya varṣasahasrasya samāptir mama rāghava / so 'haṃ bhojanam icchāmi yathāsiddhaṃ tavānagha // 7.095.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ rāmo harṣeṇa mahatānvitaḥ / bhojanaṃ munimukhyāya yathāsiddham upāharat // 7.095.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tu bhuktvā muniśreṣṭhas tad annam amṛtopamam / sādhu rāmeti saṃbhāṣya svam āśramam upāgamat // 7.095.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmin gate mahātejā rāghavaḥ prītamānasaḥ / saṃsmṛtya kālavākyāni tato duḥkham upeyivān // 7.095.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
duḥkhena ca susaṃtaptaḥ smṛtvā tad ghoradarśanam / avānmukho dīnamanā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha // 7.095.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato buddhyā viniścitya kālavākyāni rāghavaḥ / naitad astīti coktvā sa tūṣṇīm āsīn mahāyaśāḥ // 7.095.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avāṅmukham atho dīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā somam ivāplutam / rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ hṛṣṭo madhuram abravīt // 7.096.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na saṃtāpaṃ mahābāho madarthaṃ kartum arhasi / pūrvanirmāṇabaddhā hi kālasya gatir īdṛśī // 7.096.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jahi māṃ saumya visrabdaḥ pratijñāṃ paripālaya / hīnapratijñāḥ kākutstha prayānti narakaṃ narāḥ // 7.096.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi prītir mahārāja yady anugrāhyatā mayi / jahi māṃ nirviśaṅkas tvaṃ dharmaṃ vardhaya rāghava // 7.096.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇena tathoktas tu rāmaḥ pracalitendriyaḥ / mantriṇaḥ samupānīya tathaiva ca purodhasaṃ // 7.096.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abravīc ca yathāvṛttaṃ teṣāṃ madhye narādhipaḥ / durvāso'bhigamaṃ caiva pratijñāṃ tāpasasya ca // 7.096.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā mantriṇaḥ sarve sopādhyāyāḥ samāsata / vasiṣṭhas tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha // 7.096.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dṛṣṭam etan mahābāho kṣayaṃ te lomaharṣaṇam / lakṣmaṇena viyogaś ca tava rāma mahāyaśaḥ // 7.096.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tyajainaṃ balavān kālo mā pratijñāṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ / vinaṣṭāyāṃ pratijñāyāṃ dharmo hi vilayaṃ vrajet // 7.096.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato dharme vinaṣṭe tu trailokye sacarācaram / sadevarṣigaṇaṃ sarvaṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ // 7.096.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla trailokyasyābhipālanam / lakṣmaṇasya vadhenādya jagat svasthaṃ kuruṣva ha // 7.096.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ tat samavetānāṃ vākyaṃ dharmārthasaṃhitam / śrutvā pariṣado madhye rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // 7.096.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visarjaye tvāṃ saumitre mā bhūd dharmaviparyayaḥ / tyāgo vadho vā vihitaḥ sādhūnām ubhayaṃ samam // 7.096.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmeṇa bhāṣite vākye bāṣpavyākulitekṣaṇaḥ / lakṣmaṇas tvaritaḥ prāyāt svagṛhaṃ na viveśa ha // 7.096.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa gatvā sarayūtīram upaspṛśya kṛtāñjaliḥ / nigṛhya sarvasrotāṃsi niḥśvāsaṃ na mumoca ha // 7.096.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
anucchvasantaṃ yuktaṃ taṃ saśakrāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ / devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve puṣpair avakiraṃs tadā // 7.096.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adṛśyaṃ sarvam anujaiḥ saśarīraṃ mahābalam / pragṛhya lakṣmaṇaṃ śakro divaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha // 7.096.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato viṣṇoś caturbhāgam āgataṃ surasattamāḥ / hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāḥ sarve 'pūjayan ṛṣibhiḥ saha // 7.096.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
visṛjya lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo duḥkhaśokasamanvitaḥ / purodhasaṃ mantriṇaś ca naigamāṃś cedam abravīt // 7.097.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adya rājye 'bhiṣekṣyāmi bharataṃ dharmavatsalam / ayodhyāyāṃ patiṃ vīraṃ tato yāsyāmy ahaṃ vanam // 7.097.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
praveśayata saṃbhārān mā bhūt kālātyayo yathā / adyaivāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇena gatāṃ gatim // 7.097.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā rāghaveṇoktaṃ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo bhṛśam / mūrdhabhiḥ praṇatā bhūmau gatasattvā ivābhavan // 7.097.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bharataś ca visaṃjño 'bhūc chrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam / rājyaṃ vigarhayām āsa rāghavaṃ cedam abravīt // 7.097.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
satyena hi śape rājan svargaloke na caiva hi / na kāmaye yathā rājyaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana // 7.097.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
imau kuśīlavau rājann abhiṣiñca narādhipa / kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam // 7.097.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śatrughnasya tu gacchantu dūtās tvaritavikramāḥ / idaṃ gamanam asmākaṃ svargāyākhyāntu māciram // 7.097.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā bharatenoktaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāpi hy adho mukhān / paurān duḥkhena saṃtaptān vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt // 7.097.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vatsa rāma imāḥ paśya dharaṇīṃ prakṛtīr gatāḥ / jñātvaiṣām īpsitaṃ kāryaṃ mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ // 7.097.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vasiṣṭhasya tu vākyena utthāpya prakṛtījanam / kiṃ karomīti kākutsthaḥ sarvān vacanam abravīt // 7.097.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan / gacchantam anugacchāmo yato rāma gamiṣyasi // 7.097.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
eṣā naḥ paramā prītir eṣa dharmaḥ paro mataḥ / hṛdgatā naḥ sadā tuṣṭis tavānugamane dṛḍhā // 7.097.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
paureṣu yadi te prītir yadi sneho hy anuttamaḥ / saputradārāḥ kākutstha samaṃ gacchāma satpatham // 7.097.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tapovanaṃ vā durgaṃ vā nadīm ambhonidhiṃ tathā / vayaṃ te yadi na tyājyāḥ sarvān no naya īśvara // 7.097.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa teṣāṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā kṛtāntaṃ ca nirīkṣyaca / paurāṇāṃ dṛḍhabhaktiṃ ca bāḍham ity eva so 'bravīt // 7.097.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā tasminn ahani rāghavaḥ / kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam // 7.097.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣiñcan mahātmānāv ubhāv eva kuśīlavau / rathānāṃ tu sahasrāṇi trīṇi nāgāyutāni ca // 7.097.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
daśa cāśvasahasrāṇi ekaikasya dhanaṃ dadau / bahuratnau bahudhanau hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtau // 7.097.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
abhiṣicya tu tau vīrau prasthāpya svapure tathā / dūtān saṃpreṣayām āsa śatrughnāya mahātmane // 7.097.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te dūtā rāmavākyena coditā laghuvikramāḥ / prajagmur madhurāṃ śīghraṃ cakrur vāsaṃ na cādhvani // 7.098.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tatas tribhir aho rātraiḥ saṃprāpya madhurām atha / śatrughnāya yathāvṛttam ācakhyuḥ sarvam eva tat // 7.098.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
lakṣmaṇasya parityāgaṃ pratijñāṃ rāghavasya ca / putrayor abhiṣekaṃ ca paurānugamanaṃ tathā // 7.098.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kuśasya nagarī ramyā vindhyaparvatarodhasi / kuśāvatīti nāmnā sā kṛtā rāmeṇa dhīmatā // 7.098.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrāvitā ca purī ramyā śrāvatīti lavasya ca / ayodhyāṃ vijanāṃ caiva bharataṃ rāghavānugam // 7.098.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ sarvaṃ nivedyāśu śatrughnāya mahātmane / viremus te tato dūtās tvara rājann iti bruvan // 7.098.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śrutvā taṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ kulakṣayam upasthitam / prakṛtīs tu samānīya kāñcanaṃ ca purohitam // 7.098.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
teṣāṃ sarvaṃ yathāvṛttam ākhyāya raghunandanaḥ / ātmanaś ca viparyāsaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha // 7.098.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ putradvayaṃ vīraḥ so 'bhyaṣiñcan narādhipaḥ / subāhur madhurāṃ lebhe śatrughātī ca vaidiśam // 7.098.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
dvidhākṛtvā tu tāṃ senāṃ mādhurīṃ putrayor dvayoḥ / dhanadhānyasamāyuktau sthāpayām āsa pārthivau // 7.098.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato visṛjya rājānaṃ vaidiśe śatrughātinam / jagāma tvarito 'yodhyāṃ rathenaikena rāghavaḥ // 7.098.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam / kṣaumasūkṣmāmbaradharaṃ munibhiḥ sārdham akṣayaiḥ // 7.098.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
so 'bhivādya tato rāmaṃ prāñjaliḥ prayatendriyaḥ / uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajño dharmam evānucintayan // 7.098.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
kṛtvābhiṣekaṃ sutayor yuktaṃ rāghavayor dhanaiḥ / tavānugamane rājan viddhi māṃ kṛtaniścayam // 7.098.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na cānyad atra vaktavyaṃ dustaraṃ tava śāsanam / tyaktuṃ nārhasi māṃ vīra bhaktimantaṃ viśeṣataḥ // 7.098.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya tāṃ buddhim aklībāṃ vijñāya raghunandanaḥ / bāḍham ity eva śatrughnaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt // 7.098.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasya vākyasya vākyānte vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / ṛkṣarākṣasasaṃghāś ca samāpetur anekaśaḥ // 7.098.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
devaputrā ṛṣisutā gandharvāṇāṃ sutās tathā / rāma kṣayaṃ viditvā te sarva eva samāgatāḥ // 7.098.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
te rāmam abhivādyāhuḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ / tavānugamane rājan saṃprāptāḥ sma mahāyaśaḥ // 7.098.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yadi rāma vināsmābhir gacches tvaṃ puruṣarṣabha / yamadaṇḍam ivodyamya tvayā sma vinipātitāḥ // 7.098.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
evaṃ teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣkavānararakṣasām / vibhīṣaṇam athovāca madhuraṃ ślakṣṇayā girā // 7.098.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yāvat prajā dhariṣyanti tāvat tvaṃ vai vibhīṣaṇa / rākṣasendra mahāvīrya laṅkāsthaḥ svaṃ dhariṣyasi // 7.098.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prajāḥ saṃrakṣa dharmeṇa nottaraṃ vaktum arhasi // 7.098.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tam evam uktvā kākutstho hanūmantam athābravīt / jīvite kṛtabuddhis tvaṃ mā pratijñāṃ vilopaya // 7.098.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
matkathāḥ pracariṣyanti yāval loke harīśvara / tāvat tvaṃ dhārayan prāṇān pratijñām anupālaya // 7.098.025	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tathaivam uktvā kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tān ṛkṣavānarān / mayā sārdhaṃ prayāteti tadā tān rāghavo 'bravīt // 7.098.026	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pṛthuvakṣā mahāyaśāḥ / rāmaḥ kamalapatrākṣaḥ purodhasam athābravīt // 7.099.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
agnihotraṃ vrajatv agre sarpir jvalitapāvakam / vājapeyātapatraṃ ca śobhayānaṃ mahāpatham // 7.099.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato vasiṣṭhas tejasvī sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ / cakāra vidhivad dharmyaṃ mahāprāsthānikaṃ vidhim // 7.099.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ kṣaumāmbaradharo brahma cāvartayan param / kuśān gṛhītvā pāṇibhyāṃ prasajya prayayāv atha // 7.099.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
avyāharan kva cit kiṃ cin niśceṣṭo niḥsukhaḥ pathi / nirjagāma gṛhāt tasmād dīpyamāno yathāṃśumān // 7.099.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmasya pārśve savye tu padmā śrīḥ susamāhitā / dakṣiṇe hrīr viśālākṣī vyavasāyas tathāgrataḥ // 7.099.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
śarā nānāvidhāś cāpi dhanur āyatavigraham / anuvrajanti kākutsthaṃ sarve puruṣavigrahāḥ // 7.099.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vedā brāhmaṇarūpeṇa sāvitrī sarvarakṣiṇī / oṃkāro 'tha vaṣaṭkāraḥ sarve rāmam anuvratāḥ // 7.099.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣayaś ca mahātmānaḥ sarva eva mahīsurāḥ / anvagacchanta kākutsthaṃ svargadvāram upāgatam // 7.099.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
taṃ yāntam anuyānti sma antaḥpuracarāḥ striyaḥ / savṛddhabāladāsīkāḥ savarṣavarakiṃkarāḥ // 7.099.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sāntaḥpuraś ca bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau / rāmavratam upāgamya rāghavaṃ samanuvratāḥ // 7.099.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato viprā mahātmānaḥ sāgnihotrāḥ samāhitāḥ / saputradārāḥ kākutstham anvagacchan mahāmatim // 7.099.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mantriṇo bhṛtyavargāś ca saputrāḥ sahabāndhavāḥ / sānugā rāghavaṃ sarve anvagacchan prahṛṣṭavat // 7.099.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtāḥ / anujagmuḥ pragacchantaṃ rāghavaṃ guṇarañjitāḥ // 7.099.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
snātaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ hṛṣṭapuṣpam anuttamam / dṛptaṃ kilikilāśabdaiḥ sarvaṃ rāmam anuvratam // 7.099.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
na tatra kaś cid dīno 'bhūd vrīḍito vāpi duḥkhitaḥ / hṛṣṭaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ babhūva paramādbhutam // 7.099.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
draṣṭukāmo 'tha niryāṇaṃ rājño jānapado janaḥ / saṃprāptaḥ so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva saha sarvair anuvrataḥ // 7.099.017	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛkṣavānararakṣāṃsi janāś ca puravāsinaḥ / agachan parayā bhaktyā pṛṣṭhataḥ susamāhitāḥ // 7.099.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
adhyardhayojanaṃ gatvā nadīṃ paścān mukhāśritām / sarayūṃ puṇyasalilāṃ dadarśa raghunandanaḥ // 7.100.001	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha tasmin muhūrte tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ / sarvaiḥ parivṛto devair ṛṣibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ // 7.100.002	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
āyayau yatra kākutsthaḥ svargāya samupasthitaḥ / vimānaśatakoṭībhir divyābhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ // 7.100.003	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
papāta puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca vāyumuktā mahaughavat // 7.100.004	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tasmiṃs tūryaśatākīrṇe gandharvāpsarasaṃkule / sarayūsalilaṃ rāmaḥ padbhyāṃ samupacakrame // 7.100.005	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tataḥ pitāmaho vāṇīm antarikṣād abhāṣata / āgaccha viṣṇo bhadraṃ te diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava // 7.100.006	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhrātṛbhiḥ saha devābhaiḥ praviśasva svakāṃ tanum / vaiṣṇavīṃ tāṃ mahātejas tad ākāśaṃ sanātanam // 7.100.007	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvaṃ hi lokagatir deva na tvāṃ ke cit prajānate / ṛte māyāṃ viśālākṣa tava pūrvaparigrahām // 7.100.008	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tvam acintyaṃ mahad bhūtam akṣayaṃ sarvasaṃgraham / yām icchasi mahātejas tāṃ tanuṃ praviśa svayam // 7.100.009	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā viniścitya mahāmatiḥ / viveśa vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ saśarīraḥ sahānujaḥ // 7.100.010	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tato viṣṇugataṃ devaṃ pūjayanti sma devatāḥ / sādhyā marudgaṇāś caiva sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ // 7.100.011	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ye ca divyā ṛṣigaṇā gandharvāpsarasaś ca yāḥ / suparṇanāgayakṣāś ca daityadānavarākṣasāḥ // 7.100.012	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvaṃ hṛṣṭaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ pūrṇamanoratham / sādhu sādhv iti tat sarvaṃ tridivaṃ gatakalmaṣam // 7.100.013	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
atha viṣṇur mahātejāḥ pitāmaham uvāca ha / eṣāṃ lokāñ janaughānāṃ dātum arhasi suvrata // 7.100.014	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ime hi sarve snehān mām anuyātā manasvinaḥ / bhaktā bhājayitavyāś ca tyaktātmānaś ca matkṛte // 7.100.015	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tac chrutvā viṣṇuvacanaṃ brahmā lokaguruḥ prabhuḥ / lokān sāntānikān nāma yāsyantīme samāgatāḥ // 7.100.016	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
yac ca tiryaggataṃ kiṃ cid rāmam evānucintayat / prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati bhaktyā vai saṃtāne tu nivatsyati // 7.100.017.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
sarvair eva guṇair yukte brahmalokād anantare // 7.100.017.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
vānarāś ca svakāṃ yonim ṛkṣāś caiva tathā yayuḥ / yebhyo viniḥsṛtā ye ye surādibhyaḥ susaṃbhavāḥ // 7.100.018	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ṛṣibhyo nāgayakṣebhyas tāṃs tān eva prapedire / tathoktavati deveśe gopratāram upāgatāḥ // 7.100.019	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
bhejire sarayūṃ sarve harṣapūrṇāśruviklavāḥ / avagāhya jalaṃ yo yaḥ prāṇī hy āsīt prahṛṣṭavat // 7.100.020	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
mānuṣaṃ deham utsṛjya vimānaṃ so 'dhyarohata / tiryagyonigatāś cāpi saṃprāptāḥ sarayūjalam // 7.100.021	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
divyā divyena vapuṣā devā dīptā ivābhavan / gatvā tu sarayūtoyaṃ sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca // 7.100.022	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
prāpya tat toyavikledaṃ devalokam upāgaman / devānāṃ yasya yā yonir vānarā ṛṣka rākṣasāḥ // 7.100.023	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
tām eva viviśuḥ sarve devān nikṣipya cāmbhasi / tathā svargagataṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā lokagurur divam // 7.100.024	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
jagāma tridaśaiḥ sārdhaṃ hṛṣṭair hṛṣṭo mahāmatiḥ / etāvad eva ākhyānaṃ sottaraṃ brahmapūjitam // 7.100.025.1	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
rāmāyaṇam iti khyātaṃ mukhyaṃ vālmīkinā kṛtam // 7.100.025.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
samāptam: 19354 padyāni, 2.632148 kṣaṇāḥ
